Title: <letter>Ա</letter> (aïp)
Definition_1: the first letter & the first vowel of the alphabet; one, first; It is sometimes changed for ե, է, ը & օ, as, աղտիւր — եղտիւր, Եւրոպա — Եւրոպէ, անկողին — ընկողին, աճառ — օճառ, And sometimes it is used for ornament, as, ատեամ — ատեմ, ղեակ — ղեկ.

Title: Ա՜
Definition_1: ah! oh! alas! oh heavens ! ա՜ ա՜, տէր տէր, alas! o Lord god ! ա՜ Թշուառական, o miserable ! o villain ! o rascal !

Title: Աբ
Definition_1: the twelfth month of the Hebrews.

Title: Աբբայ
Definition_1: abba, abbot, superior; ընդհանրական աբբայ —, abbot general; աբբայ հայր, cf. Աբբահայր.

Title: Աբեղայ
Definition_1: monk, friar; — լինել, to turn or become monk.

Title: *Աբեղուկ
Definition_1: lark, tit-lark; երգէ —, the lark carols.

Title: Ագահ
Definition_1: avaricious, stingy, grasping, sordid; դժոխային —, very greedy or insatiable avaricious.

Title: Ագահանամ
Definition_1: to be avaricious, niggard, to save sordidly; to be sparing of, to hoard avariciously.

Title: Ագահեմ
Definition_1: to be avaricious, niggard, to save sordidly; to be sparing of, to hoard avariciously; — զագահութիւն, to be given to covetousness; — ի ժամանակն, to be sparing of one's time.

Title: Ագանիմ
Definition_1: to clothe or dress oneself, to wear, to put on; to take lodgings, to pass the night, to sojourn, to dwell; to stay; — զրահս, to put on a breastplate or cuirass.

Title: Ագարակ
Definition_1: farm, land, field; country, village; — տեղիք, rural or country places.

Title: Ագարակային
Definition_1: agrarian; rural, rustic, country; — օրէնք, agrarian law.

Title: Ագետակ
Definition_1: the under part of the tail.

Title: Ագոյցք
Definition_1: lever, bar, crowbar; ring; enchasing, jointing, staple of a lock.

Title: Ագուռ
Definition_1: palm, hollow of the hand; brick.

Title: Ագուցանեմ
Definition_1: to clothe, to dress; to enchase, to set, to fit in; to harbour, to lodge; — կօշիկս, to put on the shoes of; — մատանիս ումեք, to put a ring in a person's finger.

Title: Ագռաւ
Definition_1: raven, crow; cf. Կռնչեմ; cf. Կռչեմ.

Title: Ադար
Definition_1: adar, the sixth month of the Hebrews.

Title: Ազազանամ
Definition_1: to grow dry or lean, to fade, to wither.

Title: Ազազեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fade, to tarnish, to dry.

Title: Ազազուն
Definition_1: dry, arid, dead; lean, slender, wasted away.

Title: Ազատ
Definition_1: free, independent; freed, affranchised, redeemed, quit, ransomed; large, vast; noble; — Մասիս, the great Ararat; — առնել cf. Ազատեմ; — կացուցանել; to dispense, to exempt;

Title: Ազատագունդ
Definition_1: the noble corps, corps of nobles.

Title: Ազատանամ
Definition_1: to free or rid oneself, to shake off, to break away; to be ennobled or exalted.

Title: Ազատանի
Definition_1: the nobility, the aristocracy, the court.

Title: Ազատեմ
Definition_1: to liberate, to deliver, to save; to enfranchise, to emancipate; to free, to exempt, to disentangle, to disengage.

Title: Ազատորդի
Definition_1: free-born, son of a noble, nobleman.

Title: Ազատութիւն
Definition_1: liberty, freedom; exemption; privilege; emancipation, deliverance, enfranchisement; nobleness; generosity; frankness.

Title: Ազգ
Definition_1: nation, people; generation; race; gender; kind, sort, quality; sex, age, epoch; century; manner, way; Գիրք —ազգաց, Book of Judges; յագէ յազգ, from age to age, from generation to generation; ազգ Հայոց, the Armenian nation; Անգլիացի յազգէ, of the English nation, English; Ամերիկացի եմ ազգաւ, I am American by birth; — կանանց, the female sex, the fair sex, the woman kind; — մարդկան, the human kind, humanity; ազգով, with all the nation; մի —, the same, the same manner, equally; ազգք ազգք բանասիրութեան, the different kinds of literature; ազգք եւ ազինք, all nations, all people.

Title: Ազգաբանեմ
Definition_1: to draw or write a genealogy, to number ancestors.

Title: Ազգագով
Definition_1: admirer of his country, who praises his country.

Title: Ազգադղորդ
Definition_1: who shakes, overthrows, upsets the nation.

Title: Ազգածանօթ
Definition_1: known by the nation; known to the nation.

Title: Ազգական
Definition_1: relation, kinsman or kinswoman; մերձաւոր —, next of kin;

Title: Ազգականութիւն
Definition_1: relationship, consanguinity, kin, cognation; race, family; likeness, analogy; զօդք ազգականութեան, the ties of relationship.

Title: Ազգակեղծ
Definition_1: who hides or dissimulates his nationality.

Title: Ազգակից
Definition_2: national, of the same nation; allied to, near, like, similar, analogous.

Title: Ազգակցութիւն
Definition_1: consanguinity; affinity, alliance by marriage; analogy, likeness, resemblance.

Title: Ազգահամար
Definition_1: census; enumeration; — առնել, to make the census of a nation or people.

Title: Ազգահաւ
Definition_1: chief, father of a nation or race.

Title: Ազգային
Definition_1: national; related, allied to by marriage;
Definition_2: parent, relation; — բարք, national character; աւանդութիւն —, national tradition; — ժողովն Հայոց, the national assembly or synod of the Armenians.

Title: Ազգանուէր
Definition_1: devoted to the nation; offered by the nation.

Title: Ազգապանծ
Definition_1: who is proud of his nation.

Title: Ազգապետ
Definition_1: chief, governor of a nation or family.

Title: Ազգապետութիւն
Definition_1: charge or office of a governor of the people.

Title: Ազգասէր
Definition_1: loving his country or nation, patriotic.

Title: Ազգասիրութիւն
Definition_1: attachment to his country or nation, patriotism.

Title: Ազգավայել
Definition_1: worthy or becoming to the nation.

Title: Ազգատ առնեմ
Definition_1: to extirpate a family or race.

Title: Ազդ
Definition_1: sensation, feeling; advice; — առնել, to give notice or information, to notify; to instruct; to advise, to admonish; to announce, to publish; — առնել յառաջագոյն or կանխաւ, to precaution, to premonish, to put on guard; — լինել, to be aware of, to be informed of; to be announced or published.

Title: Ազդարան
Definition_1: place where a public notice is proclaimed; instrument with which notice is given, horn, trumpet.

Title: Ազդարարութիւն
Definition_1: advice, admonition, counsel; warning, summons; notice, information.

Title: Ազդեմ
Definition_1: to inform, to advertise, to announce; to influence, to inspire, to dictate; to work upon, move or affect; to suggest, to insinuate.

Title: Ազդեցութիւն
Definition_1: notice, warning, admonition; perception, instinct; inspiration; suggestion, instigation; efficacy, force, power; emphasis, energy.

Title: Ազդոյ
Definition_1: efficacious, strong, energetic, penetrative; pathetic, expressive, emphatic, significative; active, vehement, spirituous, violent.

Title: Ազդումն
Definition_1: cf. Ազդեցութիւն; ազդմամբ, cf. Իրաւ, cf. Իրօք, cf. Արդարև, cf. Իսկապէս; — առնուլ, cf. Զգամ.

Title: Ազնիւ
Definition_1: fine, good, exquisite, excellent, precious, rare, choice, worthy; noble, great; genteel, civil;

Title: Ազնուազարմ
Definition_1: noble, illustrious, of a noble family.

Title: Ազնուականութիւն
Definition_1: nobility, birth, gentility; civility, genteelness; generosity, nobleness.

Title: Ազնուանամ
Definition_1: to grow better, to mend; to receive a grant of nobility; to be ennobled, to become noble.

Title: Ազնուացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to improve, to civilize; to refine; to confer a title, to grant nobility, to ennoble.

Title: Ազնուութիւն
Definition_1: fineness, goodness, costliness, excellence, rarity; genteelness, civility; dignity, nobility.

Title: Աթոռ
Definition_1: chair, seat; stool; throne; bench; նստուցանել յաթոռ, to make one sit on a throne or chair; to throne; նստել յաթոռ, to sit on a chair or throne; աթոռս արկանել, to give seats or chairs; ելանել յաթոռոյ, to rise up, to get up.

Title: Աթոռաժառանգ
Definition_1: possessor, successor to any place or dignity.

Title: Աթոռակալութիւն
Definition_1: vicarship, vicarage; possession of a chair, succession to a dignity.

Title: Աթոռակից
Definition_1: colleague or companion in the same dignity, or on the same throne.

Title: Աժան
Definition_1: cheap, cheaply; — գնել, to buy cheaply.

Title: Ալաւսունք
Definition_1: the pleiades or pleiads; cf. Բազմաստեղք.

Title: Ալեւորիմ
Definition_1: to grow gray-haired, to grow old.

Title: Ալեւորութիւն
Definition_1: old age, the state of being gray-haired.

Title: Ալէծուփ
Definition_1: subject to tempests, tempest-beaten, floating, agitated, troubled; — առնեմ cf. Ալէկոծեմ; — լինիմ, cf. Ալէկոծիմ.

Title: Ալէկոծեմ
Definition_1: to beat to and fro; to agitate violently, to trouble.

Title: Ալէկոծիմ
Definition_1: to float, to chafe, to grow troubled or agitated.

Title: Ալէկոծութիւն
Definition_1: agitation of the sea, storm, tempest; trouble, agitation.

Title: Ալիասաստ
Definition_1: having large waves, swelling, stormy; subject to tempests.

Title: Ալիւր
Definition_1: meal, flour; ցանել զ— ի վերայ, to powder or whiten with flour.

Title: Ալիք
Definition_1: wave, billow, surge, swell of the sea; gray hairs, old age; ծաղկիլ ալեաց, խոնարհիլ յալիս, to grow gray-haired, to get old; ալիս յարուցանել, to agitate the waves; հերձանել՝ պատառել գալիս, to cleave the waves.

Title: Ալուց
Definition_1: hollow, cavity, inside; hollow, interior, deep.

Title: Ախերակ
Definition_2: յախերկան, cf. Յախերական; յախերկան, cf. Յախերկան.

Title: Ախոյան
Definition_1: antagonist, adversary, opponent; rival, competitor; champion, hero; triumpher.

Title: Ախորժ
Definition_1: savoury; sweet, agreeable, delicious; — բանք, agreeable words; — վայրք, enchanting places;

Title: Ախորժք
Definition_1: appetite; desire, wish; savour, taste; satisfaction, pleasure; ըստ մտացն ախորժից, ըստ ախորժից իմն, capriciously.

Title: Ախորժաբար
Definition_1: with appetite; with pleasure, readily, willingly.

Title: Ախորժալուր
Definition_1: who grants; accords, listens willingly; pleasurable to the ear, gratifying.

Title: Ախորժակ
Definition_1: taste; appetite; affection, will, inclination, willingness; passion, sentiment; ունել —, to be hungry; to have a taste; չունել — իմիք, to have a taste for nothing; պակասութիւն ախորժակի, want of appetite; ախորժակաւ ուտել, to eat with appetite; շարժել՝ բանալ զախորժակ, to excite the appetite; բառնալ զախորժակ, to take away the appetite; ընտիր՝ կիրթ —, անկիրթ —, good, bad taste; ըստ իմոյս ախորժակի, according to my taste.

Title: Ախորժահամ
Definition_1: pleasing to the taste, savoury, sweet; good to eat, savoury.

Title: Ախորժանք
Definition_1: appetite; desire, pleasure; ախորժանօք, with appetite; with pleasure.

Title: Ախորժեմ
Definition_1: to taste of, to relish, to like; to love, to take pleasure in; to desire, to aim at; ոչ —, to take a disgust for or to; Թէ ախորժէք, if you please.

Title: Ախտ
Definition_1: illness, disease, indisposition; affection, passion; vice, bad habit; menses; seed of man; — ցաւոց՝ դառնութեան, calamity, plague, disaster, any thing troublesome; — արտասուաց, tears; — քնոյ, sleep; — մահու՝ մահացու, mortal malady; զ—ս մահու ջերանիլ, to be seriously, mortally ill; — մարդահաճութեան, adulation, flattery; ապաս ունել ախտի, մեծարել զախտ, to give one's self up to vice, pleasure.

Title: Ախտաժետ
Definition_1: sick, ill, of a bad constitution or temperament; unhealthy.

Title: Ախտաժէտութիւն
Definition_1: bad temperature, indisposition, languor, sickness, cacochymia.

Title: Ախտալից
Definition_1: full of diseases, ill; vicious, bad, passionate.

Title: Ախտակից
Definition_1: that has the same sickness; compassionate; — լինել ումեք, to have compassion, pity on some one, to compassionate.

Title: Ախտակցեմ
Definition_1: to have compassion, to compassionate, to pity.

Title: Ախտահալած
Definition_1: that drives away or cures diseases.

Title: Ախտանամ
Definition_1: to be sick or ill; to have bad habits, to be vicious.

Title: Ախտասէր
Definition_1: that loves vices, vicious, devoted to passions.

Title: Ախտասիրութիւն
Definition_1: sensuality, love of vice, dishonest desires.

Title: Ախտասպան
Definition_1: that mortifies or controls his passions.

Title: Ախտարակք
Definition_3: յախտարակաց, physically, naturally.

Title: Ախտարծարծ
Definition_1: that excites illness, bad passions; — կերպարան, voluptuous image.

Title: Ախտարմոլ
Definition_1: astrologer, one who professes judiciary astrology, magician, sorcerer.

Title: Ախտաւորութիւն
Definition_1: illness, malady; bad disposition, vice, passion.

Title: Ածանցիմ
Definition_1: to be derived from, to come from.

Title: Ածեմ
Definition_1: to carry, to fetch, to bring; to strike; — ընդ իւր, to conduct; — ի ներքս, — ի մէջ, to introduce; — ի վերայ or — թափել, to infer; — ի or վերածել, to reduce; — ընդ քարշ, to drag along; — զբոցով, to pass through flame, to enflame, to burn; — զմտաւ, to consider, to think, to reflect; — զբռամբ, to seize, to lay hold of; — զձու, to lay eggs; առանց ընդ բանս ինչ ածելոյ, without making any objection, readily; — զհերս, to raze; — զիրեւ՝ յինքն, to seduce, to entice.

Title: Ածու
Definition_1: nation, people; bed of a garden; parterre.

Title: Ակահ
Definition_1: having a knowledge of, well versed.

Title: Ակաղձեալ
Definition_1: filled, full; — պտղովք ծառք, trees loaded with fruit.

Title: Ակամայ
Definition_1: involuntarily; by force, with regret, reluctantly; եթէ կամաւ, եթէ ակամայ, willing or unwilling.

Title: Ակամայութիւն
Definition_1: the state of being involuntary; repugnance, reluctance, constraint, necessity.

Title: Ականակապ
Definition_1: ornamented or inlaid with precious stones, worked in jewels.

Title: Ականատես
Definition_1: ocular, witnessed by the eye; visible, apparent; — վկայ, eye-witness; — ճշմարտութիւն, an evident truth;
Definition_2: visibly, seeing with one's own eyes.

Title: Ականատեսութիւն
Definition_1: act of seeing with ones own eyes.

Title: Ականաւոր
Definition_1: that has eyes; signal, illustrious, famous.

Title: Ականեմ
Definition_1: to look at, to see, to cast eyes upon.

Title: Ականջ
Definition_1: ear; — ծովու, cove, creek; — ձկան, mussel; ձգել զականջ ուրուք, to pinch the ear of some one; to rub his ears; խնուլ զականջս, to stop one's ears; ասել՝ խօսել յականջս, to speak in one's ear; ցաւ ականջաց, ear-ache; գէջ ականջաց, ear-wax.

Title: Ականջալուր
Definition_1: auricular; that has heard; that is heard; — վկայ auricular witness;
Definition_2: յականջալուրս, auricularly; յականջալուրս լսել, to hear with one's own ears; յականջալուր գալ, to be heard.

Title: Ականջացաւ
Definition_2: who suffers malady of the ear.

Title: Ականջեմ
Definition_1: to listen, to hear, to be attentive.

Title: Ակառանք
Definition_1: garrison; the inhabitants of the citadel.

Title: Ակաստան
Definition_1: surety, shelter; կալ յակաստանի, to fortify one's self, to sustain one's self in a position.

Title: Ակիշ
Definition_1: hook, hasp; a sort of iron shovel.

Title: Ակճիռ
Definition_1: sole of the foot; յակճիռս կալ, յաթիռս եւ յակճիռս կալ, to listen, to look at with admiration, attention, to be all eyes, all ears, in suspens, enchanted.

Title: Ակմբիմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to form a circle.

Title: Ակն
Definition_1: eye; sight, look; bud, germ; hope, expectation; opinion, suspicion; յականէ անուանէ, by name, specially, expressly; յական թոթափել, in the twinkling of an eye, instantaneously; — առնուլ, to show a respect of persons, to be partial, cf. Աչառեմ; զակն արկանել, to cast eyes upon, cf. Անտեսեմ; յակն արկանել, to show; to review, to read; ընդ ակամբ ակնարկել, to scowl; — ունել, to hope, to expect, cf. Ակնկալեմ, cf. Յուսամ; — յայտնի, — յանդիման, in presence of, visibly, openly; — յանդիման առնել, to represent, to lay before; առ ական դիպել to see by accident; առ ականէ, ostentatiously; յ— առնուլ, to have an eye to, to watch, to take care of; —ի խոնարհ, quite confused, cf. Ակնկոր; կորովաբիբ —, Argus-eyed, piercing eye; — կառուցեալ հայել, to look fixedly; տալ ակն, cf. Նայիմ, cf. Նկատեմ; ակն դնել, cf. Ցանկամ; ակն ածել, cf. Պատկառեմ, cf. Ակնառեմ, cf. Ամաչեմ, cf. Խնամեմ;

Title: Ակն
Definition_1: precious stone, jewel, gem; pearl; cameo; — բազմագունի, cf. Բազմագունի; — վանի, cf. Վանի.

Title: Ակն
Definition_1: source, origin; water-spout, spring; hole, stitch; ring, link; — արեւու՝ լուսոյ՝ տունջեան, day-star, the sun, cf. Արեգակն; — գերեզմանի, grave, tomb; — տապարի, the orifice of the hatchet, axe; ակունք լուսարձակք, glass.

Title: Ակնագործ
Definition_1: jeweller, lapidary, worker of precious stones.

Title: Ակնածեմ
Definition_1: to respect, to reverence, to esteem highly; to fear; to take care of, to super-intend.

Title: Ակնածութիւն
Definition_1: respect, consideration; fear, constraint, circumspection; care, superintendence.

Title: Ակնակապիճք
Definition_1: socket of the eye; bezel of a ring in which a precious stone is set.

Title: Ակնառու
Definition_1: that pays respect to persons, partial.

Title: Ակնարկեմ
Definition_1: to make signs with the eyes; to indicate, to show, to mark, to denote, to signify; to regard, to see, to revise; to concern, to belong to; to permit; — ընդ ակամբ, to scowl.

Title: Ակնարկի առնեմ
Definition_1: to make signs with the eyes, to indicate; to laugh at, to make fun of, to mock at.

Title: Ակնարկութիւն
Definition_1: sign, mark; meaning, signification; permission given with a sign.

Title: Ակնկառոյց
Definition_1: that looks attentively; — լինել, to regard with attention or pleasure.

Title: Ակումբ
Definition_1: circle, assembly, company; banquet, feast; mattress, canopy-bed, sofa; — առնուլ՝ բոլորել, to assemble, to sit in a circle; to feast together.

Title: Ակօս
Definition_1: furrow; — ձգել, to make a furrow, to plough.

Title: Ահ
Definition_1: fear, dread, fright, terror; — արկանել, to frighten, to terrify, to intimidate; — յահի լինել՝ զահի հարկանիլ, to fear, to be seized with alarm;
Definition_3: ահ ընդ ահ, with fear, with a timid air.

Title: Ահաբեկ
Definition_1: terrified, dismayed, thunderstruck; — առնել, to terrify, to frighten, to dismay; — լինել, to be frightened or dismayed.

Title: Ահագին
Definition_1: terrible, alarming, frightful; horrible, hideous, monstrous.

Title: Ահագնատեսիլ
Definition_1: frightful, shocking to the sight; horrible, hideous.

Title: Ահագնութիւն
Definition_1: enormity, atrocity; dreadfulness, hideousness, terribleness, tearfulness.

Title: Ահաւորափայլ
Definition_1: that shines in a frightful manner.

Title: Ահափետ
Definition_1: cf. Ահաբեկ; cf. Ահաբեկութիւն; — առնեմ, cf. Ահաբեկեմ.

Title: Ահեակ
Definition_2: the left hand, the left; յաջմէ եւ յահեկէ, right and left, on both sides.

Title: Ահեկան
Definition_2: the ninth ancient month of the Armenians; cf. Ամիս.

Title: Ահեկեայ
Definition_1: that who is to the left.

Title: Ահեղագոչ
Definition_1: roaring terribly, making an awful noise, loud.

Title: Ահիպարանոց
Definition_1: that carries its neck proudly, spirited (applied to horses).

Title: Աղ
Definition_1: salt; — ուխտի, ուխատզի, — կնքեալ, sign of true friendship; — եւ հաց, commensality, love; — առնուլ, — եւ հաց ուտել, to eat in company, to be social, to be convivial.

Title: Աղաբողոն
Definition_1: great coat, surtout, cloak, mantle, gown.

Title: Աղագաւ
Definition_1: by reason of; in reason; է՞ր —, why ? for what reason ?

Title: Աղախին
Complement: խնոյ, խնով, աւ, նայք, նայց, նանց, նաց, նովք, նեայք, նեայց, նեօք
Definition_1: maid-servant, housekeeper; female slave; nursery-maid, child's maid.

Title: Աղախնածին
Definition_1: born of a female slave or maid-servant.

Title: Աղախնորդի
Definition_1: son of a female slave or maid-servant.

Title: Աղախնութիւն
Definition_1: the condition of a female slave or maid-servant, domesticity, menial condition.

Title: Աղածք
Definition_1: salt food; the action of salting.

Title: Աղակատանք
Definition_1: debauch, debauchery; excess; յաղակատանս հասանել, to fall into debauchery.

Title: Աղաղ
Definition_1: the action of tanning; յաղաղգնել, to tan.

Title: Աղաղակ
Definition_1: cry, scream, clamour, uproar, alarm, racket, noise, shout; scolding; voice; exclamation; — առնել՝ բառնալ՝ դնել՝ հարկանել՝ տալ, to cry, to make a noise, to alarm, cf. Աղաղակեմ.

Title: Աղաղակեմ
Definition_1: to cry, to make a loud noise, to halloo, to shout; to scold; to make an exclamation.

Title: Աղամ
Definition_1: to grind; to pound, to reduce to powder.

Title: Աղամասուկ ածեմ
Definition_1: to destroy, to throw down, to overthrow, to ruin.

Title: Աղանդ
Definition_1: sect, false doctrine; school, doctrine; magic, charm, enchantment, sorcery.

Title: Աղանդեմ
Definition_1: to seduce, to deceive, to lead into error, to teach a false doctrine.

Title: Աղանդինք
Definition_1: formule of a sect; amulet, phylactery; heresy.

Title: Աղանդիք
Definition_1: formule of a sect; amulet, phylactery; heresy.

Title: Աղանդութիւն
Definition_1: formule of a sect; amulet, phylactery; heresy.

Title: Աղանձեմ
Definition_1: to brown, to roast, to broil, to toast.

Title: Աղաչանք
Definition_1: supplication, prayer, orison, entreaty, humble request; — or նամակ աղաչանաց, petition.

Title: Աղաչեմ
Definition_1: to supplicate, to pray, to conjure.

Title: Աղարձան
Definition_1: pillar of salt, statue of salt.

Title: Աղարտ վարեմ
Definition_1: to spoil, to desolate, to ruin, to destroy.

Title: Աղարտեմ
Definition_1: to besprinkle with salt; to spoil, to desolate; to cast a stain upon, to wound the reputation of, to slander, to calumniate.

Title: Աղաւաղ
Definition_1: spoiled, vitiated, corrupted, adulterated, tainted, impaired; disordered, discomposed.

Title: Աղաւաղեմ
Definition_1: to spoil, to corrupt, to adulterate, to taint, to impair, to disorder, to discompose, to vitiate.

Title: Աղաւնակերպ
Definition_1: like a dove, in the form of a dove.

Title: Աղաւնեակ
Definition_1: dove, pigeon; վայրի —, stock-dove, wood-pigeon, wild pigeon.

Title: Աղբ
Definition_1: excrement, dung, faeces; muck, manure; — արկանել, to manure, to muck.

Title: Աղբեմ
Definition_1: to go to stool, to dung;

Title: Աղբերահոս
Definition_1: flowing like a fountain, fluent, streaming; copious, abundant.

Title: Աղբերանամ
Definition_1: to flow as a fountain, to stream; to abound.

Title: Աղբերացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make to flow as a fountain, to make to flow or gush out; to pour forth abundantly.

Title: Աղբեւք
Definition_1: excrement, dung; muck, manure; filth; place for the reception of all filth.

Title: Աղբիւր
Complement: բեր, բերաւ, բիւրք, բերք, բերաց, բերց, բերբք, բերօք

Title: Աղբիւրաբար
Definition_1: like a fountain, fluently; abundantly, copiously.

Title: Աղեղն
Definition_1: bow; arc of a circle, arch; — երկնից, rainbow; այր աղեղան, archer.

Title: Աղեղնաձեւ
Definition_1: arched, bent in form of a bow.

Title: Աղերս
Definition_1: supplication, petition, deprecation, entreaty; — արկանել, — մատուցանել, յ— մատչել, to supplicate, to implore, to pray, to request.

Title: Աղերսանք
Definition_1: supplication, petition; գիր աղեբսանաց cf. Աղերսագիր.

Title: Աղերսեմ
Definition_1: to supplicate, to implore, to entreat, to petition.

Title: Աղէխորով
Definition_1: pitiable, worthy of compassion; afflicted with grief; heart-breaking.

Title: Աղէկեր
Definition_1: eating bowels, that eats its young; cruel, barbarous, inhuman, devoid of pity.

Title: Աղէկիղիմ
Definition_1: to yearn with compassion, to be compassionate.

Title: Աղէտ
Definition_1: misfortune, misery, evil, calamity, disaster; ո՜վ աղետիցս, alas! oh how unfortunate I am !

Title: Աղէտաւոր
Definition_1: fatal, calamitous, bringing evil, disastrous, grievous, mournful; full of misery, piteous, exciting pity.

Title: Աղիւսագործութիւն
Definition_1: the employment, the art of making bricks.

Title: Աղիւսակ
Definition_1: little brick; tablet; draught-board; arithmetical table, logarithm.

Title: Աղիւսեմ
Definition_1: to floor with tiles; to imitate brick.

Title: Աղիք
Definition_1: bowels, guts; tripe, garbage; intestines, entrails; strings, chords; խռովին — իմ, I have pity, compassion; որդի աղեաց, well loved son.

Title: Աղխ
Definition_1: buckle, ring; button; lock; baggage, equipage; goods and chattels.

Title: Աղխաղխեմ
Definition_1: to join together, to chain, to fasten, to buckle; to button; to lock.

Title: Աղխատրոյզ
Definition_1: rude, barbarous, coarse, uncivilised, gross; that has a disagreeable sound.

Title: Աղխեմ
Definition_1: to lock, to fasten, to enclose, to shut up; to stop or close up; to button.

Title: Աղճատաբանեմ
Definition_1: to talk extravagantly, to chatter, to prattle, to be tedious in conversation.

Title: Աղճատանք
Definition_1: idle words, frivolous discourse, chitchat, nonsense; cf. Աղճատաբանութիւն.

Title: Աղճատիմ
Definition_1: to grow childish, to dote, to rave, to talk nonsense; to stagger, to reel, to waver; աղճատեալ ծեր, garrulous and decrepit old man.

Title: Աղճատիչ
Definition_1: loquacious, chattering, prating; putting into disorder, that spoils, ruinous, that causes the loss of reputation.

Title: Աշմկասէր
Definition_1: mutinous, seditious, turbulent, inclined to excite sedition.

Title: Աղմկեմ
Definition_1: to trouble, to disquiet; to alarm; to put into disorder, to jumble, to mix, to confound.

Title: Աղմուկ
Definition_1: alarm, noise, uproar, tumult, bustle; squabble, fray, scuffle, broil, quarrel, contest; disorder, confusion; clamour, riot, rising, sedition, revolt, revolution; plot, intrigue; — առնել՝ յարուցանել, յարուցանել աղմուկս շփոթից, աղմուկս յուզել, to trouble, to disturb, to alarm, to embroil, to excite to mutiny or sedition; զաղմկաւ լինել, to be troubled, in confusion, agitated, embroiled.

Title: Աղու
Definition_1: soft, sweet, agreeable, affable; delicious, tender, delicate; knavish, dodge.

Title: Աղուաշիկ
Definition_1: half-witted, apish, trifling, silly, that plays the fool; ninny, simpleton.

Title: Աղջիկ
Definition_1: maid, girl, virgin; chamber-maid, female servant; nursery-maid, child's maid.

Title: Աղջուր
Definition_1: brine; the action of salting in brine.

Title: Աղտ
Definition_1: grease, scurf, stain, grease-spot, dirt, impurity; sweat; after-birth.

Title: Աղտեղանամ
Definition_1: to be stained or soiled, to grow greasy or dirty.

Title: Աղտեղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to soil, to dirty, to stain, to besmear with filth or grease, to befoul, to bedaub, to sully, to tarnish, to grease.

Title: Աղտեղի
Definition_1: soiled, dirtied, spotted, befouled, stained; impure, filthy, obscene; greasy, muddy, mucky, nasty, dirty.

Title: Աղտեղութիւն
Definition_1: greasiness, dirtiness, foulness, stain, impurity; turpitude, excess; sweepings; excrement; տուն աղտեղութեան, privy, necessary; անօթ աղտեղութեան, chamber-pot or utensil.

Title: Աղքատ
Definition_1: beggar, mendicant, pauper; poor, indigent, needy, necessitous, miserable, beggarly.

Title: Աղքատակերութիւն
Definition_1: act of spoiling the poor, extortion of the poor.

Title: Աղքատամիտ
Definition_1: of poor abilities, weak, foolish, imbecile.

Title: Աղքատանամ
Definition_1: to grow, to get poor, to render one's self poor, to become impoverished.

Title: Աղքատանոց
Definition_1: poor-house, almshouse, hospital for the poor.

Title: Աղքատիմաց
Definition_1: poor in understanding, shallow, empty, witless.

Title: Աղքատութիւն
Definition_1: poverty, indigence, beggary, want, necessity, penury; meanness.

Title: Աղօթամատոյց
Definition_1: that prays to God, that addresses his prayers to God;

Title: Աղօթանուէր
Definition_1: that offers up his prayers to God; suppliant.

Title: Աղօթարար
Definition_1: that prays to God; that addresses God in prayer.

Title: Աղօթեմ
Definition_1: to pray, to address one's self to God in prayer; to supplicate; to intercede.

Title: Աղօթք
Definition_1: prayer, orison, supplication; աղօթս առնել, յաղօթս կանխել, յաղօթս կալ, cf. Աղօթեմ.

Title: Աղօտ
Definition_1: obscure, dull, dim, cloudy, dark, hidden, without lustre; tawny; wan; feeble, indistinct, small; — լոյս, darkness visible, glimmer, faint light; ընդ — տեսանել՝ ակնարկել, to catch a glimpse of, to see indistinctly, to blink.

Title: Աղօտագոյն
Definition_1: more obscure or dim; very small or feeble.

Title: Աղօտանամ
Definition_1: to grow dim, to become obscure, to grow dark; to grow tarnished, to lose its lustre or polish; to grow feeble, to be diminished.

Title: Աղօտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to obscure, to cloud, to diminish the splendour of any thing or person, to eclipse, to extinguish; to tarnish, to sully, to take away the polish from any thing; to slander; to enfeeble, to debilitate, to diminish.

Title: Աղօրի
Definition_1: mill; the teeth called grinders; — ձերաց, hand-mill.

Title: Աճապարեմ
Definition_1: to make haste, to use diligence; to forward, to hasten, to press or push forward; to prevent, to anticipate, to get the start.

Title: Աճեմ
Definition_1: to grow, to increase, to be augmented, to grow tall or stout; to make progress; to vegetate, to sprout, to come up; to be multiplied; to be heightened, to grow upon or out of; to grow dear.

Title: Աճեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to increase, to make to grow, to augment, to enlarge, to heighten, to make stout, to multiply; to exaggerate; to make dear, to raise the price of.

Title: Աճեցուցիչ
Definition_1: that makes to grow or increases, augmentative; increaser.

Title: Աճիւն
Definition_1: ashes; յ— դառձուցանել՝ դատել, to reduce to ashes.

Title: Աճումն
Definition_1: growth, augmentation, increase, enlargement, progress, extension, amplification, multiplication; exaggeration; augment; vegetation.

Title: Աճուրդ
Definition_1: public sale, auction; արկանել՝ հանել յ—, to sell by auction.

Title: Ամ
Definition_2: ամի ամի, ամ յամէ, ամ ըստ ամէ, yearly, annually, a year, every year; յամէ եւս, the following year, the year after; յառաջիկայ ամի, next year; յանցելումամի, last year; զայս —, յայսմ ամի, this year; զամն ողջոյն, all the year; ի վերջ կոյս ամին, towards the end of the year.

Title: Ամամ
Definition_1: to pour out, to empty, to discharge; to cast forth or emit.

Title: Ամայանամ
Definition_1: to become desert, to be uninhabited or uninhabitable.

Title: Ամայացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to devastate, to deprive, to spoil.

Title: Ամայեմ
Definition_1: to pour out, to empty; to collect together; cf. Ամանեմ; — ծարիր յաչս, to colour the eyes with prepared antimony.

Title: Ամայի
Definition_1: desert, uninhabited, deserted, uninhabitable, solitary, uncultivated, desolate.

Title: Աման
Definition_1: vase, vessel, pot; bag, sack, purse, cloak-bag; ոտից —, shoe.

Title: Ամանակ
Definition_1: time; time or measure in music; cf. Ժամանակ.

Title: Ամանեմ
Definition_1: to put in a vessel or bag, to bag.

Title: Ամանոր
Definition_1: new year; տօն ամանորայ, new-year's day.

Title: Ամաչեմ
Definition_1: to be ashamed, to blush with shame, to be confounded.

Title: Ամբառնալիք
Definition_1: lever, a piece of wood to raise or move any burden.

Title: Ամբառնամ
Definition_1: to raise, to raise up, to take up, to heighten, to lift up.

Title: Ամբառնամ
Definition_1: to rise, to get up, to go up, to ascend.

Title: Ամբաստանեմ
Definition_1: to accuse, to inform against, to charge, to complain against; to plead guilty, to confess.

Title: Ամբարեմ
Definition_1: to provide, to store; cf. Համբարեմ.

Title: Ամբարիշտ
Definition_1: ungodly, impious, irreligious, sacrilegious, unholy, unrighteous, profane, extremely wicked, flagitious.

Title: Ամբարհաւաճեմ
Definition_1: to grow proud, to grow arrogant, to be presumptuous.

Title: Ամբարհաւաճեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make proud, to render arrogant, to cause to be presumptuous.

Title: Ամբարշտաբար
Definition_1: impiously; irreligiously, ungodlily, sacrilegiously, unrighteously, profanely.

Title: Ամբարշտանամ
Definition_1: to be irreligious, to be ungodly, to be sacrilegious, to be profane, to be impious or unrighteous.

Title: Ամբարշտութիւն
Definition_1: impiety, irreligion, ungodliness, iniquity, unrighteousness, profaneness, wickedness, flagitiousness.

Title: Ամբարտակ
Definition_1: bank, dam, dike, mound; beach, strand, bank of a river; mole, pier; tower.

Title: Ամբարտաւան
Definition_1: proud, haughty, stiff, high, arrogant, vain, conceited; presumptuous;

Title: Ամբիծ
Definition_1: unsoiled, clean, neat; immaculate, spotless, pure, innocent, honest, just.

Title: Ամբոխ
Definition_1: mob, riotous assembly, bear-garden; crowd, multitude; rabble, populace, the vulgar; riot, tumult;

Title: Ամբոխալից
Definition_1: turbulent, riotous, seditious; crowded, thronged, full of people.

Title: Ամբոխեմ
Definition_1: to crowd; to embroil, to put in confusion, to disturb; to stir up or excite to sedition.

Title: Ամբոխիմ
Definition_1: to be in confusion; to be embroiled, disturbed, to riot, to be in commotion.

Title: Ամբոկ
Definition_1: finishing; յ— գործոյն ժամանել, to attain one's end or object, to complete, to bring to a conclusion.

Title: Ամբողջ
Definition_1: entire, complete; whole, total; neat, perfect, exact.

Title: Ամբողջանամ
Definition_1: to be an integer; to be entire or perfect.

Title: Ամբողջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make whole, entire, to complete, to perfect.

Title: Ամբողջութիւն
Definition_1: entire state, totality, completeness, whole; accomplishment.

Title: Ամեհեմ
Definition_1: to become wild, to be unruly; to make ferocious, ungovernable.

Title: Ամեհի
Definition_1: fierce, ferocious, savage, wild, unruly, untameable; raging, furious.

Title: Ամենաբարւոք
Definition_1: very good, best, very excellent; very well, excellently, exceedingly well.

Title: Ամենագեղեցիկ
Definition_1: very pretty, very handsome, charming, very genteel; extremely agreeable, most beautiful.

Title: Ամենագթած
Definition_1: most merciful, most compassionate, most kind, most tender.

Title: Ամենագով
Definition_1: most praise-worthy, very laudable, most commendable.

Title: Ամենադժնդակ
Definition_1: very hard, burdensome, very troublesome, severe.

Title: Ամենազդաստ
Definition_1: very vigilant, watchful, diligent; very sober, moderate, most temperate.

Title: Ամենազօր
Definition_1: omnipotent, all-sufficient; most powerful, very strong.

Title: Ամենաթագաւոր
Definition_1: king of the universe, the Creator.

Title: Ամենաթշուառ
Definition_1: very unfortunate, most miserable, most calamitous.

Title: Ամենալաւ
Definition_1: best, finest, choicest, most exquisite; excellent, worthiest.

Title: Ամենախնամ
Definition_1: that takes care of all his creatures, all-provident.

Title: Ամենակալ
Definition_1: preserving or governing all things, omnipotent, all-powerful.

Title: Ամենահամ
Definition_1: very savoury, very high-seasoned, most delicious.

Title: Ամենահայր
Definition_1: father of all men, the Creator.

Title: Ամենահարուստ
Definition_1: very wealthy, very rich, very opulent.

Title: Ամենահնար
Definition_1: very ingenious, very artful, very dexterous, skilful, most able.

Title: Ամենահրաշ
Definition_1: most miraculous, very prodigious, wonderful, amazing, astonishing.

Title: Ամենայաղթ
Definition_1: all-conquering, subduing all enemies, very victorious, that gains the advantage always.

Title: Ամենայն
Definition_1: all, total, whole; each, every; all, every thing; — ոք, every one; who ever, whosoever, whatever, whatsoever; — ինչ, every thing, whatever; ամենայնիւ, յամենայնի, altogether, entirely, quite; — ուստեք, from all sides, from all parts; — ուրեք, ընդ — տեղիս, every where, in all places; զգիշերն —, all the night; զ— աւուրս, every day; յառաջ քան զ—, before all; յետ —ի after all; պատրաստ լինել —ի, to be ready for every thing; ի վեր քան զ—, above all or every thing.

Title: Ամենայորդոր
Definition_1: very prompt, very willing, very eager, very ready, very much inclined, very well disposed, very diligent.

Title: Ամենանուշակ
Definition_1: very sweet, very savoury, very good, very delicate.

Title: Ամենաչար
Definition_1: worst, very bad; very wicked, very malicious, execrable, abominable.

Title: Ամենապայծառ
Definition_1: very bright, very clear, very shining; very splendid, very illustrious; most honourable, right honourable.

Title: Ամենապատիր
Definition_1: very deceitful, very fraudulent, very knavish, very roguish.

Title: Ամենապատիւ
Definition_1: very venerable, very respectable, very estimable; right or most reverend; most honourable.

Title: Ամենապարգեւ
Definition_1: that gives to all, generous, liberal; given to all.

Title: Ամենապիղծ
Definition_1: very unclean, most impure, execrable, detestable.

Title: Ամենառատ
Definition_1: very abundant, most plentiful; very generous, most liberal.

Title: Ամենասուրբ
Definition_1: holiest, very sacred, very holy; — Կոյս, the very holy Virgin.

Title: Ամենաստեղծ
Definition_1: that has created all things, all-creating, omnipotent.

Title: Ամենասփիւռ
Definition_1: diffused every where, spread far and wide, very extensive.

Title: Ամենավայելուչ
Definition_1: most becoming, decent, suitable, appropriate, very convenient.

Title: Ամենավարան
Definition_1: most perplexed, very anxious, very embarrassed; very irresolute, full of inquietude.

Title: Ամենատարած
Definition_1: diffused every where, very extensive, most ample.

Title: Ամենատէր
Definition_1: the Lord or Creator of all things.

Title: Ամենարար
Definition_1: that has made all things, all-creating.

Title: Ամենարուեստ
Definition_1: very skilful, ingenious; very instructive; most wise.

Title: Ամենափայլ
Definition_1: most shining, brightest, very bright, resplendent, shiny, glittering, blazing or beamy.

Title: Ամենափափաքելի
Definition_1: very much to be wished, most desirable.

Title: Ամենեւին
Definition_1: not at all, by no means, no wise, not in the least; quite, wholly, totally, entirely.

Title: Ամենեքեան
Definition_1: all men, all persons, every body, as many as, whoever.

Title: Ամենիշխան
Definition_1: prince or master of the universe.

Title: Ամէն
Definition_1: amen, so be it, verily, truly, certainly, positively.

Title: Ամիս
Definition_1: month; ամիս յամսոյ, ամսոյ ամսոյ, every —; առաջին օր ամսոյ, the first day of the month; ի սկիզբն ամսեան, the beginning of the month; ի վերջ ամսոյ, the end of the month; ի մէջ կոյս ամսեան, towards the middle of the month.

Title: Ամլորդի
Definition_1: son of a barren woman; St. John-Baptist.

Title: Ամղան
Definition_1: great coat, riding-coat or hood, cloak.

Title: Ամոխախ
Definition_1: brought up together, comrade, companion, play-fellow;

Title: Ամորձատեմ
Definition_1: to castrate, to cut, to geld.

Title: Ամորձիք
Definition_1: testicles; պարկ ամորձեաց, scrotum; — շատ, orchis, satyrion.

Title: Ամուսնասէր
Definition_1: that loves his or her consort.

Title: Ամուսնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to marry, to give in marriage, to wed.

Title: Ամուսնաւորութիւն
Definition_1: the married state, wedlock; cf. Ամուսնութիւն.

Title: Ամուսնութիւն
Definition_1: marriage, nuptials, wedding; matrimony, wedlock; առնուլ յ—, to take in marriage; եղծանել ըղպսակն ամուսնութեան, to annul or do away a marriage; գալ յ—, to marry.

Title: Ամուր
Definition_1: solid, stable, durable, tough, lasting; hard, strong, firm, fast; compact, massive, thick; locked, fastened.
Definition_2: —, ամրի, րաց, րոյ, ոց, fort, fortification, fortress; grotto, cave, cavern.

Title: Ամուրի
Definition_1: unmarried person, maid, bachelor; that is about to be married, that is in a marriageable state; վիճակ ամուրեաց, celibacy.

Title: Ամոք
Definition_1: soft, sweet, gentle, agreeable, inviting, engaging, winning, attractive, affable, conciliating, persuasive.

Title: Ամոքեմ
Definition_1: to soften, to calm, to compose; to conciliate, to appease, to allay, to pacify, to reconcile; to affect, to move, to touch; to abate, to diminish; to sooth, to caress; to engage, to win over, to persuade.

Title: Ամոքումն
Definition_1: appeasement, assuagement, moderation, abatement; inducement, persuasion.

Title: Ամպ
Definition_1: cloud; — փոշւոյ՝ ծխբյ, a cloud of dust, smoke.

Title: Ամպագոյն
Definition_1: having the colour or appearance of a cloud.

Title: Ամպախաղաց
Definition_1: moving towards the clouds, rising to the clouds.

Title: Ամպահարեմ
Definition_1: to strike with a thunderbolt or by lightning.

Title: Ամպանամ
Definition_1: to be transformed into clouds, to become clouds.

Title: Ամպաչու
Definition_1: that travels in the clouds, reaching the clouds.

Title: Ամպաչուեմ
Definition_1: to travel, to be or to rise in the clouds.

Title: Ամպեմ
Definition_1: to grow cloudy, to be clouded or cloudy.

Title: Ամպհովանի
Definition_1: canopy, awning; a pall; a portable canopy.

Title: Ամպրոպ
Definition_1: thunder-clap, thunder; noise, explosion, crash, report.

Title: Ամսագլուխ
Definition_1: first day of the month, calends.

Title: Ամսօրեայ
Definition_1: lasting a month, of a month's duration; — մի ժամանակ, a month's time, space of a month.

Title: Ամրագոյն
Definition_1: more solid or strong, very durable, well fortified.

Title: Ամրածածուկ
Definition_1: very secret, very private; very intricately fortified; protecting, sheltering.

Title: Ամրական
Definition_1: inhabiting a fortified place; guard of a fortress.

Title: Ամրակառոյց
Definition_1: strongly built, very strong or solid.

Title: Ամրակողմն
Definition_1: strongest side of a fortress, most fortified part; citadel, castle, fortress.

Title: Ամրակուռ
Definition_1: extremely strong or solid, very hard; made hard under the hammer.

Title: Ամրանամ
Definition_1: to establish one's self, to fortify one's self, to be intrenched, strongly posted.

Title: Ամրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fortify, to garrison, to put in a state of defence; to re-enforce, to strengthen, to confirm, to corroborate, to establish, to settle, to cement; to encourage, to hearten, to animate, to embolden; to prop, to support, to sustain, to stay, to keep up, to hold up; to bar, to fasten, to shut, to stop up, to close.

Title: Ամրափակ
Definition_1: well shut or locked, strongly barred, well fastened.

Title: Ամրափակեմ
Definition_1: to shut up strongly, to lock well, to preserve; to fasten, to bar, to close.

Title: Ամրոց
Definition_1: castle; citadel; fort, fortress; redoubt, outwork.

Title: Ամրութիւն
Definition_1: solidity, durability, strength; re-enforcement, establishment, confirmation, settlement, corroboration; fort, fortification; redoubt, outwork.

Title: Ամփոփ
Definition_1: gathered together, close, concentrated; — ունել, to keep together, to hold collected.

Title: Ամփոփեմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to concentrate; to enclose, to confine; to fold, to furl, to tighten, to pack, to tuck; to shorten, to restrain, to contract; to straiten, to stint, to limit, to bound; — զմիտս՝ զանձն, to recollect one's self, to collect one's ideas; — զմեռեալն, to bury the dead, to inter; — զսուրն, to sheathe a sword.

Title: Ամփոփիմ
Definition_1: to contain, to be closed or shut up; to draw closer, to be contracted, concentrated, to assemble; to fold up; to fall back; to reflect.

Title: Ամփոփումն
Definition_1: restriction, modification, contraction, limitation; — մտաց, attention.

Title: Ամօթ
Definition_1: shame, confusion, abashment; bashfulness; ignominy, turpitude; baseness; յ— առնել, to put to shame, to confound; յ— լինել՝ զամօթի հարկանել, to be ashamed, to be confounded, to blush; —ք, privy parts.

Title: Ամօթանք
Definition_1: shame, confusion, abashment; bashfulness; parts of shame.

Title: Ամօթապարտ
Definition_1: abashed, confounded, put to shame, shamed, overwhelmed with confusion; bashful.

Title: Ամօթերես
Definition_1: abashed, put to the blush, confounded; shamefaced.

Title: Այգ
Definition_1: daybreak, dawn, aurora; day-light, morning; ընդ այգն, ընդ այգս այգուն, այգուցն, at day-break, at the dawn of day, in the morning; — լինել cf. Այգանամ; յայգուէ մինչեւ յերեկոյ, from morning till night.

Title: Այգանամ
Definition_1: to dawn, to grow light, to be light, to be day-light.

Title: Այգաւէտ
Definition_1: wine-growing, planted with vines, full of vines.

Title: Այգեգործ
Definition_1: vine-dresser, husbandman, that cultivates the vine, wine-grower.

Title: Այգեստան
Definition_1: vineyard, large extent of country planted with vines.

Title: Այգետէր
Definition_1: wine-grower, owner or master of the vineyard.

Title: Այգի
Definition_1: vineyard, land planted with slips of the vine; անկել զայգիս, to plant the vineyard; կթող այգւոյ, cf. Այգեկութ; տէր այգւոյ, cf. Այգետէր; պահապան այգւոյ, keeper or guard of the vineyard.

Title: Այգողք
Definition_1: funerals performed the day after death.

Title: Այգուն
Definition_1: at day-break, at the dawn of day, in the morning; — —, every morning.

Title: Այդչափ
Definition_1: so much, so many; so, so much, to such a degree.

Title: Այդր
Definition_1: just there, in the same place; from the same place, again, over again, anew, afresh.

Title: Այժմ
Definition_1: now, at present, at this time; just now, immediately, instantly, by and by; recently, newly, freshly; — իսկ, presently; just now.

Title: Այժմէն
Definition_1: from this moment or time, henceforth, henceforward.

Title: Այլ
Definition_1: another, other; different, unlike; some; —ով ճանապարհաւ, by another way; —ով օրինակաւ, in another manner; —ոք, another; եւ ոչ — ոք, even another; յայլմէ կողմանէ, another side, the other side; — է ասել եւ — գործել, it is one thing to say, another to do; եւ այլն, —ովքն հանդերձ, and so on; — ընդ այլոյ, one for another, pellmell; — յայլմէ լինել, to lose one's presence of mind, to be overcome by joy or fear; ոչ — իւիք, in no other way; — ընդ —ոյ ասել, to say equivocally, ambiguously.

Title: Այլ
Definition_1: but, yet, still, however; only, but; now, then.

Title: Այլաբան
Definition_1: that says or speaks otherwise; allegorical.

Title: Այլաբանական
Definition_1: allegorical, enigmatical, mystical; typical, symbolical; emblematic; figurative, metaphorical.

Title: Այլաբանեմ
Definition_1: to use allegories in speech; to use the figures of rhetoric; to allegorise.

Title: Այլաբանութիւն
Definition_1: allegory; symbol, type; emblem; figure, metaphor; enigma, riddle, rebus.

Title: Այլաբուն
Definition_1: of a different nature or kind, heterogeneous.

Title: Այլագոյն
Definition_1: of a different colour; unlike, different.

Title: Այլագունեմ
Definition_1: to discolour, to tarnish, to stain; to turn pale.

Title: Այլադէմ
Definition_1: of a different aspect; different, unlike.

Title: Այլազանեմ
Definition_1: to vary, to change, to diversify.

Title: Այլազգաբար
Definition_1: in a different manner, otherwise, differently; as an infidel, as a pagan, as a heathen.

Title: Այլազգի
Definition_1: foreigner, stranger; pagan, gentile, heathen; foreign; different, unlike.

Title: Այլակերպ
Definition_1: transformed, transfigured; changed, metamorphosed; different, unlike; disguised, masked; յայլակերպս, incognito, in disguise; յայլակերպս լինել, to be masked, to be in disguise, to disguise ones self; to be transfigured; to be metamorphosed, to be transformed; — յորջորջումն, allegory, metaphor.

Title: Այլակերպեմ
Definition_1: to transform; to disguise, to mask, to change; to transfigure; to metamorphose.

Title: Այլակերպիմ
Definition_1: to be transformed; to be disguised; to be transfigured.

Title: Այլահաւատ
Definition_1: of a different belief, sectary; pagan; heterodox.

Title: Այլաձայն
Definition_1: of a different voice; discordant, dissonant.

Title: Այլաձեւ
Definition_1: of a different form or figure.

Title: Այլաղանդ
Definition_1: of another sect, of a different faith; sectary.

Title: Այլամիտ
Definition_1: of a different sentiment or opinion; whose ideas wander, flighty, lightheaded.

Title: Այլամտիմ
Definition_1: to be lightheaded, to undergo an alienation of mind, to be delirious.

Title: Այլայլասեռ
Definition_1: of a different sex or kind; mixed.

Title: Այլայլեմ
Definition_1: to alter, to change; to vary, to diversify; to corrupt; to disaffect, to alienate; to discountenance; to falsify, to counterfeit; to distemper, to disorder.

Title: Այլայլիմ
Definition_1: to vary, to be altered, to change; to degenerate, to become corrupt; to be disaffected, to be alienated; to be indisposed.

Title: Այլայլութիւն
Definition_1: alteration, changement, variation, mutation; emotion, perturbation; corruption, degeneration; falsification; distemper, disorder, indisposition.

Title: Այլանդակ
Definition_1: whimsical, odd, capricious, fanciful, fantastical, extravagant, mad, ridiculous, extraordinary, singular, strange, enormous, uncouth; grotesque, distorted.

Title: Այլանդակիմ
Definition_1: to be extravagant or whimsical; to be distorted, disfigured, spoiled; to be dissolute.

Title: Այլանդակութիւն
Definition_1: extraordinariness, uncouthness, extravagance, strangeness, oddness; dissoluteness, irregularity of conduct.

Title: Այլաշուրթն
Definition_1: who speaks differently to what he thinks, double-faced or dealer.

Title: Այլասեր
Definition_1: of a different sex; of a different gender, kind or species; heterogeneous, of a different nature or quality.

Title: Այլասեռութիւն
Definition_1: difference of sex, gender, nature and quality.

Title: Այլասերեմ
Definition_1: to change to a different gender or kind; to make degenerate, to spoil.

Title: Այլատարազ
Definition_1: of a different mode, fashion, manner.

Title: Այլափառեմ
Definition_1: to apostatise, to be heterodox, heretical; to teach heresy; to err in the catholic faith.

Title: Այլափոխ
Definition_1: changed, altered, converted, turned; degenerate; different; allegorical;

Title: Այլափոխեմ
Definition_1: to change, to alter; to counterfeit; to metamorphose; to diversify.

Title: Այլափոխիմ
Definition_1: to change; to grow worse, to degenerate.

Title: Այլափոխութիւն
Definition_1: change, transmutation, conversion; metamorphosis; corruption, degeneration.

Title: Այլ եւ
Definition_1: besides, over and above, moreover, also, more, in addition.

Title: Այլուսումն
Definition_1: of a different doctrine; of or belonging to a sect.

Title: Այլուստ
Definition_1: from another place or situation; otherwise.

Title: Այլուստեք
Definition_1: from some other place, from somewhere else.

Title: Այլուր
Definition_1: elsewhere, in another place, in some other place.

Title: Այծարած
Definition_1: goat-herd, peasant who drives the goats to feed.

Title: Այծեամն
Definition_1: wild goat; roe; buck, hart; deer.

Title: Այծեայ
Definition_1: goat's hair; stuff made of goat's hair; of or belonging to goats.

Title: Այծենակաճ
Definition_1: stuff made with the hair of goats.

Title: Այն զի
Definition_1: because; where as; even as; more than, rather; since, that, seeing that.

Title: Այն է
Complement: Այն ինքն է, Այն իսկ է
Definition_1: that is to say, to wit, namely, videlicet.

Title: Այն ինչ
Definition_1: whilst, as long as, so long as; recently, freshly, newly.

Title: Այնուհետեւ
Definition_1: ever, since, from that time, thenceforward, thenceforth.

Title: Այնչափ
Definition_2: so, so much, in such a manner.

Title: Այնպէս
Definition_1: so, also, equally, as much, in like manner, likewise, as well as.

Title: Այնպիսի
Definition_1: such, similar, like; equal, same; as great, as much.

Title: Այպանեմ
Definition_1: to jeer, to make a jest of, to ridicule, to mock, to deride, to hold in contempt, to despise, to scoff at, to scorn, to banter, to rally, to rail at, to revile, to abuse; to treat with contempt, with abuse or ridicule.

Title: Այպանութիւն
Definition_1: derision, mockery, raillery, ridicule, scorn, contempt.

Title: Այպանուլ
Definition_1: that derides, ridicules; contemptuous, scornful; abusive, insulting.

Title: Այպն
Definition_1: raillery, mockery, derision; — կատականաց, ignominy, contempt; — առնել, — եւ կատակ առնել, — կատականաց առնել, to jeer, to deride, to mock, to ridicule, to rail, to insult, to despise, to scorn; — լինել, to be derided or a laughing-stock.

Title: Այս
Definition_1: this; ասացից զայս ինչ եւ զայն, I shall say this and that, so and so.

Title: Այս
Definition_1: evil genius, evil spirit, demon, devil; genius, spirit, ghost, apparition; goblin, imp, sprite, hobgoblin, familiar, elf, fairy; tempest, storm; thundering noise, hurly-burly.

Title: Այսակիր
Definition_1: possessed with a devil or evil genius, tormented with a devil, demoniac.

Title: Այսահարեալ
Definition_1: possessed with devil; mad, phrenetic, frantic.

Title: Այսահարիմ
Definition_1: to be possessed with a devil; to roar, to make a dreadful noise; to rave, to be frantic, to storm, to be furious.

Title: Այսահարութիւն
Definition_1: the state of a demoniac or of a person possessed with a devil; madness, frenzy, fury, franticness.

Title: Այսանակ
Definition_1: such, like, in this manner or fashion.

Title: Այս ինքն
Definition_1: namely, that is to say, to wit.

Title: Այս նիշ
Definition_1: marked thus, having this mark, such.

Title: Այսու ամենայնիւ
Definition_1: still, nevertheless, as for the rest.

Title: Այսուհետեւ
Definition_1: henceforth, henceforward, hereafter, for the future; as for the rest; now, then, but.

Title: Այսչափ
Definition_1: to this degree, in this quantity, so great;

Title: Այսպէս
Definition_1: thus, in this manner, in the same manner; so.

Title: Այսպիսի
Definition_1: such, like, in this manner, of this sort; such, so great.

Title: Այսր
Definition_1: here, in this place; hither, to this place; — աղագաւ, therefore, for this reason.

Title: Այսրէն
Definition_1: back, again; եկից — ենդհուպ, I shall return here immediately, I shall be hack presently.

Title: Այսքան
Complement: ոյ, ի, ից, Այսքանի, նւոյ, նեաց
Definition_1: in this quantity, such, so numerous, thus great.

Title: Այսօր
Definition_1: today, this day; մինչեւ ցայսօր, to this day, up to this time.

Title: Այտ
Definition_1: cheek; համբուրել զայտս, to embrace, to kiss the cheek.

Title: Այտնում
Definition_1: to swell, to puff, to be inflamed, to be bloated.

Title: Այտոյց
Definition_1: swelling, protuberance, enlargement; excrescence, hump, wart, corn, wen, push, pimple, pustule; tumour, inflammation, tumefaction.

Title: Այտումն
Definition_1: inflammation, tumefaction, swelling, protuberance, enlargement; cf. Այտոյց.

Title: Այտուցանեմ
Definition_1: to swell, to inflame, to tumefy.

Title: Այր
Complement: առն, յառնէ, արամբ, արք, արանց, արամբք
Definition_1: man; husband, spouse; person; youth, young man; — երեւելի, personage; — իւրաքանչիւր, every one, every person, every body; — ոք, a person, some one; — ընդ արամբ, — զարամբ, in competition; with emulation; — ցընկեր, one to another; ընդ — եւ ընդ կին, the men as well as the women, both men and women; առ —, յայր, each person, a head, a man; առն տալ, to marry; առն՝ արանց լինել, to get, to be married; վատ արանց, coward; քաջ արանց, brave, courageous; — խաղաղութեան, peaceful man; — գործոյ, ingenious, active man; — զօրութեան, valorous man; — մահու, guilty, worthy of death; — պատերազմի, belligerous, warlike, martial; արք արեանց, sanguinary, bloody men; — Աստուծոյ, man of God.

Title: Այրասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of the wife for her husband, conjugal affection.

Title: Այրեաց տալ
Definition_1: to burn; յարեաց եւ յաւեր դարձուցանել, to burn and to ravage.

Title: Այրեմ
Definition_1: to burn, to enflame, to fire; to torrefy, to scorch, to parch, to dry.

Title: Այրեցած
Definition_1: burning, deflagration; burn, mark caused by fire; soot; torrid.

Title: Այրիանամ
Definition_1: to become a widow or widower, to be a widow or widower; cf. Արիանամ.

Title: Այրութիւն
Definition_1: virile age, age of manhood, virility, manhood; widow-hood.

Title: Այց
Definition_1: visit; search; inspection; — առնել, յայց ելանել, to visit, to go to see, to make a visit; — եւ խնդիր առնել, յայց եւ ի խնդիր ելանել, to search, to examine, to observe.

Title: Անագ
Definition_1: tin; օծանել՝ գրուագել անագաւ, to tin, to cover with tin; օծումն անագաւ, act or employment of tinning.

Title: Անագան
Definition_1: late, behindhand, tardily, long, slowly; late, tardy; long, slow, not ready, not prompt; — ուրոմն, — երբէք, too late very late; at latest, at the latest.

Title: Անագանեղ
Definition_1: produced, done, born, created too late.

Title: Անագանի
Definition_1: late, late in the evening, at a late hour.

Title: Անագանիմ
Definition_1: to delay, to linger, to loiter, to tarry, to stay; to arrive late, to be late.

Title: Անագեայ
Definition_1: made of tin; plated or covered with tin.

Title: Անագորոյն
Definition_1: perfidious, disloyal, traitorous, treacherous, treasonable, faithless; cruel, ferocious, inhuman, barbarous.

Title: Անագորոյնութիւն
Definition_1: perfidy, treachery, disloyalty; cruelty, inhumanity, ferocity, barbarity.

Title: Անազատ
Definition_1: not free, dependant; mean, ignoble, niggardly.

Title: Անազգի
Definition_1: ignoble, vulgar, of low extraction, of mean birth.

Title: Անազդական
Definition_1: strange, extraordinary; undutiful, insolent, impudent, froward, obstinate, stubborn; rascally, wicked.

Title: Անախտ
Definition_1: not subject to diseases or passions; innocent, pure.

Title: Անախտաբար
Definition_1: without vices or passions, honestly, innocently.

Title: Անախտակիր
Definition_1: not subject to diseases or passions.

Title: Անախտութիւն
Definition_1: apathy, dispassion; integrity, purity; good constitution, health.

Title: Անակնկալ
Definition_1: hopeless, despondent, desperate; unexpected, unforeseen, unlooked-for, sudden.

Title: Անահատկան
Definition_1: of or belonging to Venus or Diana.

Title: Անամօթանամ
Definition_1: to lose all shame, to be shameless.

Title: Անանձնգով
Definition_1: that does not praise one's self.

Title: Անանց
Definition_1: that passes not away, eternal; impassable.

Title: Անաշխարհիկ
Definition_1: banished or driven from his country; captive, enslaved; strange, foreign.

Title: Անաչառ
Definition_1: impartial, showing no respect of persons, upright, disinterested, just, fair, righteous, exact; strict, austere, severe, rigid, rigorous;

Title: Անաչառաբար
Definition_1: impartially, without respect of persons, justly; rigorously, strictly, austerely.

Title: Անաչառատես
Definition_1: that takes an impartial view, sincere, ingenuous.

Title: Անաչառասփիւռ
Definition_1: that scatters impartially, that diffuses liberally.

Title: Անաչառութիւն
Definition_1: impartiality, disinterestedness, uprightness, justness, sincerity; strictness, rigour, austerity, severity.

Title: Անապատ
Definition_1: desert, hermitage, solitude; solitary, uninhabited lonely, unfrequented.

Title: Անապատաբնակ
Definition_1: living in a lonely place, eremitical.

Title: Անապատանամ
Definition_1: to become a desert, to be deserted; to fall, to decay.

Title: Անապատասէր
Definition_1: loving solitude, or retired situations, retired, solitary.

Title: Անապատացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to be deserted, to lay waste, to unpeople.

Title: Անառակ
Definition_1: dissolute, debauched, libertine, licentious, wanton, lewd; prodigal, profuse.

Title: Անառակիմ
Definition_1: to be dissolute, to be debauched, to be a libertine; to be prodigal or lavish.

Title: Անառակութիւն
Definition_1: debauchery, dissoluteness, libertinism, excess, disorderly life, wantonness, lasciviousness, lust; unchastity, prostitution.

Title: Անառաջնորդ
Definition_1: without a guide or chief, indirected.

Title: Անասնաբոյծ
Definition_1: that rears, breeds animals or cattle.

Title: Անասնագէտ
Definition_1: guilty of an unnatural crime with a beast, bestial.

Title: Անասնագիտութիւն
Definition_1: unnatural knowledge of a beast, bestiality.

Title: Անասնախառն
Definition_1: of or belonging to the brute creation, animal; brutal, brutish.

Title: Անասնակեցաղ
Definition_1: that lives like a beast, brutal, bestial.

Title: Անասնակերպ
Definition_1: having the form of a beast, brutish.

Title: Անասնամիտ
Definition_1: having the understanding of a brute, stupid, dull.

Title: Անասնանամ
Definition_1: to become quite a brute, to lead the life of a brute; to be clownish or churlish, to be besotted.

Title: Անասնավայել
Definition_1: fit for a brute, brutal, bestial.

Title: Անասնիկ
Definition_1: a small beast; animalcule; a lean beast.

Title: Անասնութիւն
Definition_1: nature of the brute creation; brutality, bestiality.

Title: Անարատ
Definition_1: immaculate, without sin, innocent, irreproachable; clear, refined; intact, pure, whole, perfect.

Title: Անարգ
Definition_1: worthless, contemptible, vile, abject, despicable, ignoble.

Title: Անարգամահ
Definition_1: by an ignoble death, dying ingloriously.

Title: Անարգանամ
Definition_1: to be debased; to become abject or contemptible; to lose value; to humble or abase one's self.

Title: Անարգանք
Definition_1: affront, offence, wrong, insult; indignity, slight, contempt, disgrace, shame, opprobrium, discredit, blame.

Title: Անարգելութիւն
Definition_1: freedom, state of any thing free from obstacle or hinderance.

Title: Անարգեմ
Definition_1: to offend, to shock; to despise, to depreciate, to disparage; to disapprove, to disallow, to refuse, to reject; to blame, to find fault with.

Title: Անարգութիւն
Definition_1: offence, slight, refusal, reprobation; humiliation; vileness, meanness, worthlessness; յ— իջանել, to demean, to degrade one's self.

Title: Անարժան
Definition_1: unworthy, unfit, improper; condemnable, blamable, illegal, dishonest; — համարել, to disdain.

Title: Անարի
Definition_1: weak, feeble, unmanly, timid, pusillanimous, cowardly; gigantic, enormous, monstrous.

Title: Անարիագոյն
Definition_1: more or very feeble, very weak, very timid.

Title: Անարիութիւն
Definition_1: timidity, pusillanimity, tearfulness, cowardice; gigantic size.

Title: Անարիւն
Definition_1: that has no blood, bloodless; that does not bleed.

Title: Անարծաթասէր
Definition_1: that does not love money, generous, liberal.

Title: Անարծարծելի
Definition_1: that cannot be revived, or rekindled, not renewable, extinct.

Title: Անարուեստ
Definition_1: of no trade, or profession; artless; guileless; immaterial, simple, natural; rough, rude.

Title: Անարտաբերելի
Definition_1: that cannot be pronounced distinctly, difficult to articulate.

Title: Անաւագ
Definition_1: feeble, poor, low, humble, petty; minor.

Title: Անաւագեմ
Definition_1: to weaken, to humble, to abase.

Title: Անաւարտ
Definition_1: infinite, interminable, endless, continual, perpetual; not finished.

Title: Անբաժ
Definition_1: without portion, destitute, unprovided for; indivisible, inseparable.

Title: Անբամբաս
Definition_1: that does not calumniate, that does not detract; irreproachable, irreprehensible.

Title: Անբանս
Definition_1: stupidly, irrationally, like a dumb animal.

Title: Անբանական
Definition_1: like a dumb animal, stupid; irrational.

Title: Անբամագոյն
Definition_1: very stupid, more irrational or brutal.

Title: Անբաւանամ
Definition_1: to grow or increase excessively, to be immense.

Title: Անբթելի
Definition_1: that cannot be blunted, unblunted, sharp.

Title: Անբնակ
Definition_1: houseless; uninhabited, desert; — առնել, to depopulate, to unpeople.

Title: Անբուն
Definition_1: of a different nature, bastard, spurious.

Title: Անգամ
Definition_1: once, at one time; even, notwithstanding; այս —, this once; այլ —, another time; առաջին —, the first time; մի —, only once; բազում —, many times, often; միւսանգամ, once more, over again; առ — մի, at once, this time; քանիցս —, every time; how many times?

Title: Անգայթ
Definition_1: not liable to stumble, surefooted; not liable to scandal.

Title: Անգայտ
Definition_1: thin, incompact, porous; rare, subtile; soft, liquid.

Title: Անգայտանամ
Definition_1: to be dilated, to rarefy; to become liquid, to liquefy.

Title: Անգառագեղ
Definition_1: that cannot be kept in a cage, wild, untameable.

Title: Անգարշ
Definition_1: that does not disgust; — լինել, not to disgust.

Title: Անգէտ
Definition_2: յանգէտս, ignorantly, inadvertently; at all events, at all hazards; յանգէտս լինել, to connive, to dissemble.

Title: Անգիծ
Definition_1: not described, not marked, not written; that cannot be marked, hard.

Title: Անգիտանամ
Definition_1: to be ignorant; to forget one's self.

Title: Անգիր
Definition_1: without letters, — print; unwritten, verbal, oral; ignorant, uninstructed; verbally, by word of mouth.

Title: Անգլուխ
Definition_1: without a head, headless; without a leader or chief.

Title: Անգղիաբան
Definition_1: who employs English phrases; who knows how to speak English.

Title: Անգղիական
Definition_1: English; — եկեղեցի, the Anglican church; — բարբառ, the English language; ոճ —, anglicism.

Title: Անգղիարէն
Definition_1: in English; after the English manner;
Definition_2: English, the English language; — ուսանել՝ խօսիլ, to learn, to speak English.

Title: Անգոյ
Definition_1: not existing, having no being; non-existence, non-entity; nothing; արար Աստուած զաշխարհս յանգոյից, God created the world from nothing; յանգոյս, vainly.

Title: Անգոսնեմ
Definition_1: to despise, to slight, to reprove, to blame; to jeer, to ridicule, to mock.

Title: Անգործ
Definition_1: idle, inactive, indolent, lazy; ineffectual, inefficacious, ineffective; unexecuted, incomplete; uncultivated; երկիր —, waste land.

Title: Անգութ
Definition_1: incompassionate, unpitying, inhuman; cruel, barbarous, implacable.

Title: Անդ
Definition_1: there, yonder, in that place; — ի ներքս, therein, within; ի վեր —, there above, yonder above; — ի վայր, down there, below; — ... աստ, then... and now; աստ եւ —, here and there.

Title: Անդ
Definition_1: field; fallow, soil; —ք, the fields, country.

Title: Անդաճեմ
Definition_1: to examine, to search; to think, to meditate.

Title: Անդամ
Definition_1: limb, member; — — յօշել, to dissect, to dismember, to anatomize, to carve.

Title: Անդամալուծիմ
Definition_1: to be struck with a palsy, to have a paralytic stroke.

Title: Անդանդաղ
Definition_1: prompt, diligent; diligently, promptly, without delay.

Title: Անդարձ
Definition_1: irrevocable, irreclaimable; impenitent; held in mortmain;

Title: Անդէն
Definition_2: -, — առ մնին, — վաղվաղակի, — իսկ, — եւ անդ, on the spot, immediately, out of hand, without delay.

Title: Անդէպ
Definition_1: indecent, unbecoming, unseasonable; absurd, clumsy, extravagant, ridiculous; յանդէպս, indecently, unbecomingly; awkwardly, unseasonably.

Title: Անդժրելի
Definition_1: inviolable; that cannot be contravened or mistaken; irrefragable.

Title: Անդնդաբնակ
Definition_1: dwelling in the abyss; infernal; spread over the abyss.

Title: Անդնդալիր
Definition_1: swallowed up in an abyss, sunk deeply; to a great depth.

Title: Անդնդայեղց
Definition_1: sunk in an abyss; very deep.

Title: Անդնդապետական
Definition_1: belonging to the prince of hell; prince of hell.

Title: Անդնդապտոյտ
Definition_1: making a deep vortex; turning itself in the abyss.

Title: Անդնդասոյզ
Definition_1: plunged, submerged, precipitated in an abyss; engulfed; — լինել, to plunge, to engulf, to sink to the bottom; — առնել, to submerge, to precipitate, to sink.

Title: Անդնդփոս
Definition_1: fortified by a deep trench; very deep.

Title: Անդորր
Definition_1: quiet, still, tranquil, calm, mild, peaceable; easy, convenient, comfortable; — or յանդորրու, peaceably, in tranquillity; comfortably, at ease; — առնել, յ— հանել, to calm, to quiet, to soften, to appease, to comfort.

Title: Անդորրամիտ
Definition_1: possessing a tranquil mind, calm, of a peaceable disposition; magnanimous.

Title: Անդորրանամ
Definition_1: to compose one's self; to be easy, to be comfortable.

Title: Անդորրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to calm, to pacify; to comfort, to soften, to alleviate.

Title: Անդունդք
Definition_1: abyss, gulf; precipice; the infernal regions, hell, tartar.

Title: Անդուռն
Definition_1: without gates, open; — բերան՝ լեզու, tattler, person of an unbridled tongue.

Title: Անդստին
Definition_1: from, since, as soon as, when; radically, originally, naturally; anew, afresh; even then; — ի մանկութենէ իմնէ, from my infancy; — յարարչութենէ աշխարհի, from the creation of the world.

Title: Անդր
Definition_1: there; beyond, on the other side; yonder; ի քաղաք —, to the city;
Definition_2: — քան, beyond, further than, on the other side of, over; — քան զծով, beyond the sea.

Title: Անդրադարձ
Definition_1: reciprocal, mutual; inverse; retrograde; requital, return, exchange.

Title: Անդրադարձուցանեմ
Definition_1: to drive back; to reverberate; to reflect; to repel, to cause to rebound.

Title: Անդրանամ
Definition_1: to go beyond, to go further, to pass, to go before.

Title: Անդրանկանամ
Definition_1: to be eldest; to claim primogeniture.

Title: Անդրանկարար
Definition_1: that gives the right of primogeniture.

Title: Անդրանկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make eldest, to give the right of primogeniture.

Title: Անդրէն
Definition_1: again, anew, afresh; from or to the same place, in the same situation; — դառնալ, to return; — սկսանել, to recommence; — ասել, to repeat or say over again; cf. Անդէն.

Title: Անդրոշմ
Definition_1: uninscribed; without mark; unsealed; not ratified; without confirmation.

Title: Անել
Definition_1: much embarrassed, much perplexed, inextricable, without escape; — եւ անմուտ առնել, to hem in en all sides, to cut off all means of escape from; — փողոց, blind alley; street or court with only one entrance.

Title: Անեղծ
Definition_1: incorruptible, indissoluble; indelible, not to be effaced; inviolable.

Title: Աներ
Definition_1: wife's father, father-in-law; — Լիբանանու or Լիբանաներ, Antilibanus.

Title: Աներասան
Definition_1: not broken in, unruly; unbridled, unreined, ungoverned, debauched.

Title: Աներեկ
Definition_1: that has no night, that always enjoys the light; eternal, endless.

Title: Աներեւոյթ
Definition_1: invisible, vanished; imperceptible, insensible; —, յ—ս լինել, to vanish, to disappear, cf. Աներեւութանամ; — լինելն, disappearance;
Definition_3: Աներեւոյթ, Յաներեւոյթս, աներեւութաբար, invisibly.

Title: Աներեւութացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to disappear, to hide.

Title: Աներկբայ
Definition_1: doubtless, indubitable, sure, certain, unquestionable, incontestable, indisputable;

Title: Աներկեւան
Definition_1: safe, free from danger; bold, fearless; certain, doubtless; infallible, faithful;
Definition_2: safely, in safety; certainly; boldly, fearlessly.

Title: Աներկիւղ
Definition_1: fearless, bold, courageous, intrepid; fearlessly; courageously, intrepidly.

Title: Աներկիւղած
Definition_1: that has no fear of God, irreligious.

Title: Աներկրպագու
Definition_1: that does not adore, indevout, irreligious.

Title: Անզարդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to divest of ornament, to despoil, to disfigure.

Title: Անզարդութիւն
Definition_1: state of any thing without ornament, disfiguration, despoliation.

Title: Անզաւակեմ
Definition_1: to deprive of childring, to kill children.

Title: Անզաւակութիւն
Definition_1: state of a person bereft of children; barrenness.

Title: Անզգամ
Definition_1: rascally, knavish, roguish, wicked; foolish, mad.

Title: Անզգամիմ
Definition_1: to be rascally, to be knavish, to be wicked; to become mad, to grow mischievous.

Title: Անզգամութիւն
Definition_1: roguery, knavery; malignity, ill turn, wicked action.

Title: Անզգայ
Definition_1: insensible, inanimate, dull, stupid; besotted, infatuated, stupefied.

Title: Անզգայանամ
Definition_1: to be insensible, to be stupid; to be infatuated.

Title: Անզգայացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to infatuate, to stupefy, to hebetate; to deprive of reason.

Title: Անզգաստութիւն
Definition_1: want of a vigilance, carelessness, inattention.

Title: Անզգոյշ
Definition_1: incautious, uncircumspect, inconsiderate, imprudent, unwary, heedless.

Title: Անզգուշութիւն
Definition_1: want of circumspection, unwariness, imprudence, inconsiderateness, negligence.

Title: Անզղջանալի
Definition_1: not to be repented of, not to be regretted.

Title: Անզոհ
Definition_1: without sacrifice; unworthy to be sacrificed.

Title: Անզոյգ
Definition_1: odd, not a pair; different, dissimilar; — գործել, to spoil the pair, to render dissimilar.

Title: Անզուզութիւն
Definition_1: disparity, inequality; disjunction, separation; discord, division, dissension, disunion; virginity.

Title: Անզօր
Definition_1: without power, weak, impotent, feeble; unmanly, fainthearted; inefficacious, insufficient; invalid.

Title: Անզօրանամ
Definition_1: to lose strength, to be feeble.

Title: Անզօրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render feeble, without force, to render powerless.

Title: Անէ
Definition_1: that does not exist, null, none; nothing, non-entity.

Title: Անըմբռնելի
Definition_1: that cannot be taken; incomprehensible, inconceivable.

Title: Անընդոստ
Definition_1: that cannot be jolted out of its place, fast; firm, steadfast.

Title: Անընկալ
Definition_1: cf. Անընդունելի; — լինել, to be inadmissible.

Title: Անընտել
Definition_1: not familiar, strange; unaccustomed; indocile, wild, savage.

Title: Անընտելութիւն
Definition_1: want of familiarity; disuse; indocility, ferocity.

Title: Անթանոցիկ
Definition_1: armful, any thing carried under the arm-pit.

Title: Անթարգման
Definition_1: without interpreter; that cannot be translated; inexplicable.

Title: Անթեղ
Definition_1: wood embers; — հարկանեմ, to cover the fire with ashes.

Title: Անթոշակ
Definition_1: without pension, wages; without the last Sacrament.

Title: Անժաման
Definition_1: that cannot arrive; not arrived, slow, tardy.

Title: Անժամանակ
Definition_1: not limited or subject to time, eternal; unseasonable.

Title: Անժառանգեմ
Definition_1: to deprive of heirs; to disinherit.

Title: Անժառանգութիւն
Definition_1: heirless state, want of succession; disinherison.

Title: Անժոյժ
Definition_1: intolerant, impatient; incontinent, intemperate, immoderate; violent.

Title: Անժուժանամ
Definition_1: to lose patience, to grow impatient.

Title: Անժուժկալութիւն
Definition_1: impatience; intolerance; incontinence, intemperance; immoderation, violence.

Title: Անիծաբեր
Definition_1: that bears a curse; that curses.

Title: Անիծակուռ
Definition_1: loaded with curses; — առնել, to load with maledictions.

Title: Անիծանեմ
Definition_1: to curse, to imprecate; to detaste, to loathe, to abhor, to forswear, to deny upon oath.

Title: Անիծապարտ
Definition_1: worthy to be cursed; cf. Անիծակուռ.

Title: Անիմաստասէր
Definition_1: that does not love wisdom, ignorant; unphilosophical.

Title: Անիշխան
Definition_1: without a prince, — chief, — governor, in anarchy; vulgar, plebeian.

Title: Անիրաւ
Definition_1: unjust, iniquitous, wicked; injurious, offensive; perfidious, disloyal; false, illegitimate; tyrannical;

Title: Անիբաւատեաց
Definition_1: that hates the unjust or the injustice.

Title: Անիրաւեմ
Definition_1: to offend, to sin against, to wrong, to injure, to abuse, to hurt.

Title: Անիրաւիմ
Definition_1: to be unjust, to be unrighteous; to sin, to fail in duty.

Title: Անիրաւութիւն
Definition_1: injustice, iniquity; injury, wrong, offence, affront; trespass; oppression.

Title: Անիւ
Definition_1: wheel; — մեքենայի, — of a machine; — յեսանի, grindstone; — խորտկաց, jack; — տղայոց, gig; — առաջակողման նաւին, capstern, capstan.

Title: Անլծակից
Definition_1: disjoined, separate; that cannot be united; virgin.

Title: Անլուծական
Definition_1: indissoluble, incorruptible; insoluble, not to be decomposed; that cannot be deciphered

Title: Անլուր
Definition_1: unheard of, new, extraordinary; deaf; disobedient; without news, — tidings.

Title: Անլռաբար
Definition_1: that never ceases to speak; incessant;

Title: Անխայեմ
Definition_1: to be economical; to spare, to except; to respect; to preserve.

Title: Անխարդախ
Definition_1: sincere, ingenuous; loyal, faithful; simple, unadulterated; well disposed;
Definition_2: sincerely; loyally, faithfully, with simplicity, innocently.

Title: Անխափան
Definition_2: without opposition or intermission, constantly, incessantly, continually.

Title: Անխնամակալու
Definition_1: that does not protect; unprotected, forlorn.

Title: Անխնայեմ
Definition_1: to be lavish, to be prodigal; to be void of compassion.

Title: Անխոյզ
Definition_1: that does not search or examine; unsought, unsearohed; inscrutable, unsearchable.

Title: Անխոնարհելի
Definition_1: that cannot be humbled, stern, undaunted; firm.

Title: Անխոռ
Definition_1: not stolen, not purloined, not undermined, entire, perfect.

Title: Անխորհրդապահ
Definition_1: that does not keep secret, indiscreet.

Title: Անխօսանամ
Definition_1: to become dumb; to be dumb; to be silent.

Title: Անծադելի
Definition_1: that cannot be enlightened, dark, gloomy.

Title: Անծաղիկ
Definition_1: that does not flower or blossom.

Title: Անծաղրածու
Definition_1: that does not ridicule, not scornful, not apt to deride.

Title: Անծանակ
Definition_1: that is not mocked; free from shame.

Title: Անծանօթ
Definition_2: յանծանօթս, ignorantly, unwittingly; incognito, without being known; յանծանոթս — լինել, to be in disguise; to feign or counterfeit.

Title: Անծանօթանամ
Definition_1: to be unknown; to be disguised.

Title: Անծեր
Definition_1: not subject to the effects of age, perpetual, durable.

Title: Անծուծ
Definition_1: that does not give suck; that no longer suckles.

Title: Անծուփ
Definition_1: not agitated by the waves, calm, peaceable.

Title: Անկ
Definition_2: — է, it ought, it is right, it is proper; յ— ելանել, to be completed, accomplished, finished.

Title: Անկազմ
Definition_1: unbuilt, unfurnished, unprepared, not ready; unbound.

Title: Անկազմութիւն
Definition_1: want of construction, unfurnished state, imperfection.

Title: Անկախ
Definition_1: independent, free; free from all attachment, disengaged.

Title: Անկած
Definition_1: fallen; abject, vile, despicable; booty, spoil.

Title: Անկան
Definition_1: mortar; լեսուլ յ—ի, to pound or beat in a mortar.

Title: Անկանգնելի
Definition_1: that cannot rise again; that cannot be reestablished.

Title: Անկանեմ
Definition_1: to lay the groundwork of lace; to weave; to twine.

Title: Անկանիմ
Definition_1: to fall; to chance, to happen; to descend, to flow; to steal away, to slip away, to escape; to fall to ruin, to decay, to be impaired, to decline, to fail; to place one's self, to fix one's self, to belong, to have relation to; to put down, to deposit; to pass away; — ընդ, to undergo; to sink under; — երեսաց, to be put out of countenance, to be abashed; — զբանիւք, to hold a long discourse; — յոք, to associate with (any one), to be intimate with, to confide in; — ի միտս՝ զմտօք՝ ի սիրտ, to remember, to recall, cf. Յիշեմ; — ի ճանապարհ՝ իչու՝ յուղի, to voyage, to travel, cf. Ուղեւորեմ; — ի վերայ, to come upon unawares, to attack, to surprise; — ի մտաց, to become made, to lose one's reason, cf. Խելագարիմ, cf. Յիմարանամ; — ի կենաց, to die, to lose one's life; — ի յուսոյ, to lose hope, to become desperate; — ի վերայ երեսաց, to fall upon one's face, to prostrate; — յոտս ուրուք, to throw one's self or fall at the feet of some one; — ի ձեռս ուրուք, to fall in the bands or power of some one; — ընդ ումէք՝ ընդ միմեանս՝ այր ընդ այր, to come to blows, to fight, to combat, to quarrel, to dispute; — յիշխանութենէ, to lose one's authority, to fall from one's power.

Title: Անկաշառ
Definition_1: that does not take bribes, incorruptible, honest.

Title: Անկապուտ
Definition_1: that cannot be plundered or robbed.

Title: Անկատար
Definition_3: imperfect tense.

Title: Անկատարելութիւն
Definition_1: imperfection, incomplete state; defectiveness, want, faultiness.

Title: Անկար
Definition_1: seamless; not sewed; incapable, unable, weak, feeble, impotent; impossible; — է, it is impossible.

Title: Անկարանամ
Definition_1: to be unable, to be incapable, to be insufficient.

Title: Անկարգ
Definition_1: without order, in disorder, disorderly, irregular, confused, indistinct, not methodical; intemperate, inordinate, immoderate, excessive, licentious;

Title: Անկարգութիւն
Definition_1: disorder, confusion, irregularity; inordinateness, intemperance, excess, immoderation.

Title: Անկարօտաճեմ
Definition_1: not compelled to move on the ground.

Title: Անկեղծ
Definition_1: sincere, candid, frank, ingenuous; true, loyal, faithful;

Title: Անկեղծութիւն
Definition_1: sincerity, candour; loyalty, fidelity; honour, truth.

Title: Անկենդան
Definition_1: lifeless, dead; cold, without ardour, — animation; inanimate;

Title: Անկեր
Definition_1: that does not eat; not eaten; that has nothing to eat, famished.

Title: Անկերպադրելի
Definition_1: that cannot be figured; not to be described; unimaginable

Title: Անկէտ
Definition_1: without a point; without pause, eternal.

Title: Անկիղանող
Definition_1: not fit to burn; that will not burn.

Title: Անկիր
Definition_1: not subject to passions; impassive, incapable of suffering.

Title: Անկից
Definition_1: not united, separate; not closed, not healed.

Title: Անկիւն
Definition_1: angle; corner, nook; — ճանապարհի, turning of the road; բութ —, obtus-angled, obtus-angular; սուր — acute-angled; — հատանել, cf. Ական հատանել.

Title: Անկշիռ
Definition_1: that cannot be weighed; inestimable, incomparable.

Title: Անկողին
