Definition_1: bed; mattress; nuptial couch; — անպիտան, անարդ, truckle-bed; խորշ անկողնոյ, alcove; դնել յանկողնի, ննջեցուցանել, to put to bed; գնալ յ—, ննջել, to go to bed; փետրալից —, feather-bed; յարդալից —, straw-bed; —ս արկանել, to make a bed; մտանել յ—, to go to bed; յառնել յանկողնէ, to get up; յարդարել զ—, to make the bed; անկեալ դնել յանկողնի, to take to one's bed.

Title: Անկողոպուտ
Definition_1: that cannot be plundered, not subject to devastation.

Title: Անկոչ
Definition_1: uncalled, not named; uninvited; — բազմական, parasite, smell-feast, trencher-friend.

Title: Անկործան
Definition_1: not fallen; that cannot fall or be thrown down.

Title: Անկումն
Definition_1: fall, tumble; overthrow, ruin, subversion; degradation; cadence; վերստին —, second fall; relapse.

Title: Անկուշեմ
Definition_1: to kick, to strike with the hind feet; to resist, to reject.

Title: Անկռինչ
Definition_1: without cries; unable to cry out.

Title: Անկռիւ
Definition_1: without contention; without resistance; without quarrel.

Title: Անկցորդ
Definition_1: disjoined, separate; that does not participate, that takes no share.

Title: Անհաղորդ
Definition_1: that does not participate; incommunicable; that does not receive the communion.

Title: Անհաճոյ
Definition_1: unpleasant, disagreeable, offensive; disgustful; — իմն օրինակաւ, disagreeably; — լինել, to displease; to disgust.

Title: Անհամաձայնութիւն
Definition_1: discord, dissension, misunderstanding; disconvenience, incongruity, unsuitableness; cf. Անմիաբանութիւն.

Title: Անհամանամ
Definition_1: to grow insipid, to be nauseous, to be disgustful.

Title: Անհամբոյր
Definition_1: haughty, unsociable, reserved, austere, churlish, uncivil, morose, sullen, surly, harsh, forbidding.

Title: Անհանգէտ
Definition_1: not conformable, dissimilar, unequal; inconsequent, not inferible.

Title: Անհանգիստ
Definition_1: restless, fretful, agitated; turbulent, unquiet, tumultuous;
Definition_2: incessantly, always; — կալ, to fret, to be agitated, to fidget; — առնել, to fret, to agitate.

Title: Անհարազատ
Definition_1: illegitimate, bastard, base-born, natural; altered, corrupted, false.

Title: Անհարթ
Definition_1: crooked, uneven, rough, rugged; awkward, rude, unpolished, coarse.

Title: Անհարթութիւն
Definition_1: unevenness, inequality of surface; want of politeness, rudeness, awkwardness, harshness, roughness, coarseness; — օդոյ, intemperance

Title: Անհարսն
Definition_1: unmarried; whose marriage has not been consummated, virgin.

Title: Անհաց
Definition_1: without bread, — the means of subsistence.

Title: Անհաւան
Definition_1: incredulous, who makes difficulties; obstinate, subborn, headstrong.

Title: Անհաւանիմ
Definition_1: to differ in opinion, to disagree; to be obstinate; to disapprove, to disallow.

Title: Անհաւատ
Definition_1: incredulous, unbelieving, infidel, irreligious; incredible; — լինել, to disbelieve.

Title: Անհեդեդ
Definition_1: unfit, inept, foolish, absurd, fantastical, whimsical, grotesque, ridiculous, extravagant, silly, ill-shaped, ill-contrived, awkward;

Title: Անհետ
Definition_1: without vestige, untraced; — առնել, to annihilate; — լինել, to be annihilated.

Title: Անհետազօտ
Definition_1: that cannot be traced or investigated; impenetrable, inscrutable.

Title: Անհնազանդ
Definition_1: disobedient, refractory, rebellious; — լինել, to disobey.

Title: Անհնար
Definition_1: impossible; յանհնարս մտանել, to get embarrassed, to be entangled, to want resources, to be reduced to extremities, not to know what to do; յանհնարիցն է, it is impossible.

Title: Անհնարիմ
Definition_1: to be impossible; to be irremediable, to be desperate.

Title: Անհնարին
Definition_1: impossible; extremely difficult; insupportable, intolerable; extreme, violent, excessive, enormous, horrible, terrible.

Title: Անհոգ
Definition_1: negligent, heedless, indifferent, inattentive; confident, sure;
Definition_2: Անհոգ, Յանհոգս, negligently, carelessly; confidently; indifferently; յ—ս կալ՝ լինել, to be negligent or indifferent.

Title: Անհողմ
Definition_1: not agitated by the wind, calm, serene.

Title: Անհուպ
Definition_1: that does not approach, come near, touch; inaccessible; distant, far.

Title: Անհուր
Definition_1: without fire; that has no need of fire.

Title: Անհրապոյր
Definition_1: that does not allure or seduce.

Title: Անձայն
Definition_1: without voice; mute, without sound; consonant.

Title: Անձեռագործ
Definition_1: not made by hands, natural, spiritual.

Title: Անձեռնարկելի
Definition_1: that cannot be taken in hand, extremely difficult; untractable.

Title: Անձեռնհաս
Definition_1: that cannot reach or accomplish, incapable, unskilful.

Title: Անձեւանամ
Definition_1: to lose shape, to become deformed.

Title: Անձկամ
Definition_1: to desire, to wish; to aspire to, to sigh for, to long for.

Title: Անձկանք
Definition_2: անձկանօք, impatiently; սպասել անձկանօք, to wait impatiently.

Title: Անձկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to extremities, to force; to narrow, to contract, to restringe.

Title: Անձկութիւն
Definition_1: narrowness, contractedness; pressure; constraint; anxiety, inquietude, chagrin, trouble, vexation, care, affliction, tribulation, anguish.

Title: Անձն
Definition_1: person; hypostasis, personality; creature, being; soul; mind; heart; myself, thyself, himself; անձամբ, personally; անձամբ անձին, by one's self, personally; զանձամբ դառնալ, to turn back; զանձամբ արկանել, to put on, յանձին բերել, to imitate; յանձին ունել, to accept, to approve; չառնուլ յ—, to refuse, to deny; սիրէ նա զ— իւր, he loves himself; վասն անձին եւեթ տամ պատասխանի, I only answer for myself; երգնում յ— իմ, թէ այդ այդպէս է, on my soul, it is so; զգաստանալ յանձին, to revive, to recover one's senses; փոյթ ունի նա վասն անձին, he takes care of himself; անձին առնել, to commit suicide; եռն յանձին հարկանել, to boast of, to flatter one's self, to prick one's self; յ— առնել, to recommend, to confide; յ— լինել, to commend one's self, to have confidence in, to confide in, to be committed.

Title: Անձնադիր
Definition_1: that gives bail for another, responsible.

Title: Անձնամատն
Definition_1: that betrays himself; — լինել, to betray one's self.

Title: Անձնապահ
Definition_2: royal guard, body-guard; — լինել, to be cautious, to be on guard.

Title: Անձնապահապետ
Definition_1: the commander or captain of the guard.

Title: Անձնապանծ
Definition_1: boastful, full of vanity; — լինել, to be extolled.

Title: Անձնապաշտ
Definition_1: that adores himself, interested, selfish, egoistical.

Title: Անձնապուր
Definition_1: to escape, to fly, to have a narrow escape, to run away.

Title: Անձնասէր
Definition_1: selfish, self-interested; guilty of egotism; mild, courteous.

Title: Անձնատուր
Definition_1: that surrenders; addicted, subject; determined, desperate; — լինել, to abandon himself, to be addicted; to surrender, to capitulate; to refer.

Title: Անձնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to be the vital or principal to an organized body, to animate; to vivify, to personify, to personate.

Title: Անձնաւորիմ
Definition_1: to have a soul; to be animate; to live, to exist.

Title: Անձնդիւր
Definition_1: given to pleasure, to one's own comforts, lazy, dissipated; selfish; comfortable.

Title: Անձնդիւրութիւն
Definition_1: dissipation; egotism, selfishness; comfortableness; անձնդիւրութեամբ շրջել, to live delicately.

Title: Անձնեայ
Definition_1: personable, of good appearance, tall, well made, fine limbed.

Title: Անձուկ
Definition_1: narrow, strait; narrow passage, defile, strait, pass; desire, wish; — ունել, to desire, to wish.

Title: Անձրեւ
Definition_1: rain; — իջանել, to rain; — արտասուաց, a flood of tears; յորդ —, violent, pouring rain; անձրեւաչափ (գործի), rain-guage.

Title: Անձրեւային
Definition_1: rainy, that abounds in rain, formed from rain.

Title: Անձրեւեմ
Definition_1: to rain, to shower, to pour down; անձրեւէ, it rains.

Title: Անճառաշնորհ
Definition_1: of wonderful grace, very graceful, admirable; very abundant.

Title: Անճապատկեր
Definition_1: that has an admirable figure or appearance.

Title: Անճարանամ
Definition_1: to be incapable; to be without remedy, to despair.

Title: Անճիտեմ
Definition_1: to destroy the race of, to extirpate the posterity of.

Title: Անճոռնի
Definition_1: gigantic, enormous, monstrous; grotesque, extravagant, absurd, ridiculous, unseemly.

Title: Անմահաճաշակ
Definition_1: that does not taste death, immortal; that has a foretaste of immortality.

Title: Անմասն
Definition_1: without share or portion, that does not participate; bereft, destitute; — լինել, to be destitute, to be bereft; — առնել, to deprive.

Title: Անմարդագոյն
Definition_1: more or very inhuman, — fierce, — unkind.

Title: Անմարդանամ
Definition_1: to be deserted, to be dispeopled.

Title: Անմարդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to depopulate, to dispeople, to desolate.

Title: Անմարդի
Definition_1: inhuman; unkind, uncivil, brutal; desert, uninhabited; — կացուցանել, յ— դնել, to unman, to divest of humanity; to depopulate.

Title: Անմարթ
Definition_1: impossible; very difficult; indecent, unseemly; — է, it is not fit; it is impossible.

Title: Անմաքրասէր
Definition_1: that does not love purity, uncleanly, filthy, indecent.

Title: Անմեծարգի
Definition_1: who desires not honour or preferment.

Title: Անմեծարգութիւն
Definition_1: want of ambition, indifference to honour.

Title: Անմեկին
Definition_1: not clear, indistinct, not evident, not explicit, not plain; indivisible.

Title: Անմեղ
Definition_1: impeccable; innocent; harmless, silly; — կացուցանել, to acquit.

Title: Անմեղադիր
Definition_1: that excuses, pardons; — առնել, to excuse, to pardon; — զանձն, to excuse one's self, to justify himself.

Title: Անմեղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to acquit, to declare innocent, to clear.

Title: Անմեղկելի
Definition_1: not to be softened, hardhearted, inflexible, inexorable.

Title: Անմերձենալի
Definition_1: not to be accosted, inaccessible; untouched.

Title: Անմի՞՞՞առնեմ
Definition_1: to leave not one, to exterminate.

Title: Անմիաբան
Definition_1: discordant, different, dissonant, diverse, divided, not agreed, at variance, contrary; irreconcilable; — լինել, to differ, to disagree.

Title: Անմիաբանութիւն
Definition_1: discord, dissension, disagreement, difference, misunderstanding; — ձայնի, discordance, dissonance.

Title: Անմիտ
Definition_1: mad, silly, brainless, senseless, stupid, foolish, irrational, crazy.

Title: Անմոռանալի
Definition_1: that does not forget; unforgotten; that cannot be forgotten;

Title: Անմուտ
Definition_1: the entrance to which is shut; without entrance; impenetrable, inaccessible.

Title: Անմռչելի
Definition_1: mute, speechless; that will not speak.

Title: Անմտաբար
Definition_1: foolishly, stupidly, inconsiderately, ignorantly, rashly, madly.

Title: Անմատգոյն
Definition_1: more of very senseless, — foolish, — stupid.

Title: Անմտադրութիւն
Definition_1: inattention, want of application, carelessness, inconsiderateness, inadvertence.

Title: Անմտանամ
Definition_1: to lose senses, to become crazy or stupid.

Title: Անմտութիւն
Definition_1: madness, craziness, fatuity; phrensy; folly, silliness, imprudence, extravagancy, absurdity.

Title: Անյագ
Definition_1: insatiable, greedy, gluttonous; — ուտել, to devour;

Title: Անյայտ
Definition_1: not evident, not manifest, obscure, hidden, secret; apocryphal.

Title: Անյայտիմ
Definition_1: to be annihilated, to vanish, to disappear.

Title: Անյարդար
Definition_1: unpolished, unfurnished, unprovided, unprepared, out of order; hard, cold, raw; կին —, slut.

Title: Անյարմար
Definition_1: incongruous, unsuitable, unbecoming, not appropriate; unskilful, insufficient, incapable.

Title: Անյարմարագիր
Definition_1: that writes in an unbecoming manner; indecently written.

Title: Անյիշաչար
Definition_1: that easily forgives, that does not bear malice.

Title: Անյոյս
Definition_1: hopeless, desperate; despaired of; unhoped, unexpected;
Definition_2: desperately; — առնել, to render hopeless; — լինել, to despair, to give way to despair, cf. Յուսահատ լինել, cf. Յուսահատեմ, cf. Անյուսանամ.

Title: Անյուշ
Definition_1: forgotten; — առնել, to bury in oblivion.

Title: Անյօժար
Definition_1: without desire, — wish or inclination; involuntary, forced.

Title: Աննախանձաւորութիւն
Definition_1: absence of all feeling of envy.

Title: Աննկար
Definition_1: without painting, figure or device; unformed, imperfect, shapeless.

Title: Աննման
Definition_1: unlike, dissimilar, different; not uniform; incomparable.

Title: Աննշան
Definition_1: without mark, without sign, without character; ignoble, unknown, obscure; — վարել կեանս, to leave retired.

Title: Աննուիրական
Definition_1: that cannot be offered, not sacred, profane.

Title: Անշաղախ
Definition_1: free from dirt, clean; not contaminated, pure, clear.

Title: Անշարժ
Definition_1: immovable, fixed, stable, firm; not commutable; real, not personal.

Title: Անշնորհ
Definition_1: ill-favoured, disfigured, deformed; ungracious, ungraceful, unpleasant; unfortunate, unlucky; ungrateful, unthankful.

Title: Անշնչանամ
Definition_1: to expire, to die; to commit suicide by suffocation.

Title: Անշշուկ
Definition_1: dumb with amazement, astonished, surprised; — լինել, to be astonished, to wonder; — լռութիւն, utter or profound silence.

Title: Անշուք
Definition_1: inglorious, unhonoured, ignoble, vile; ill-favoured, deformed; — վարել կենցաղ, to live retired.

Title: Անշփոթ
Definition_1: without confusion; unperplexed, not embarrassed; tranquil.

Title: Անշքանամ
Definition_1: to become vile, to grow despicable; to grow ugly, to fade.

Title: Անշքացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to disfigure, to deform, to spoil.

Title: Անոխակալ
Definition_1: without malice, not revengeful, not malignant.

Title: Անոխակալութիւն
Definition_1: absence of maliciousness, freedom from revenge or hatred.

Title: Անողորմ
Definition_1: unpitying, imcompassionate, inhuman, barbarous, cruel, brutal.

Title: Անողորմաբար
Definition_1: cruelly, barbarously, atrociously; — չարչարել, to tyrannize.

Title: Անոճ
Definition_1: without style, orderless, confused; — իմն, pellmell, promiscuously.

Title: Անոյշ
Definition_1: sweet, agreeable; հոտ — բուրել, to give an agreeable odour; հոտ անուշից, perfume.

Title: Անոպայ
Definition_1: untoward, rude, rough, rustic; uncivil, disobliging; awkward, unbecoming.

Title: Անոստ
Definition_1: without branches; that does not rise or stir.

Title: Անոտնաձայն առնեմ
Definition_2: to walk on the tip of one's toes.

Title: Անորդի
Definition_1: childless, heirless; steril, barren; — մեռանել, to die without children.

Title: Անորդիմ
Definition_1: to remain without children, to lose one's children.

Title: Անորոճ
Definition_1: that does not ruminate or chew the cud.

Title: Անորոշ
Definition_1: undetermined, indefinite, uncertain; vague, indistinct, confused; inarticulate; contingent;

Title: Անուաձեւ
Definition_1: in the shape of a wheel.

Title: Անուանադիր
Definition_1: that gives a name to, that names.

Title: Անուանադրեմ
Definition_1: to give a name to, to name.

Title: Անուանակիր
Definition_1: that bears the name of another.

Title: Անուանակրութիւն
Definition_1: act of bearing the same name, homonymy.

Title: Անուանարկ
Definition_1: infamous, notorious; shameful, scandalous, disgraceful, vile; — առնել, to disgrace, to bring to shame, to dishonour.

Title: Անուանեմ
Definition_1: to name, to call, to denominate, to term.

Title: Անուանի
Definition_1: renowed, famous, illustrious; — լինել, to become illustrious.

Title: Անուն
Definition_1: name; renown, glory, reputation, honour, title;
Definition_2: — բայի, nominative; noun, substantive; — շքոյ, title.

Title: Անունակ
Definition_1: that does not contain, that has not; poor, needy.

Title: Անունդ առնեմ
Definition_1: to destroy the name, the race.

Title: Անուշակ
Definition_1: sweet, agreeable to the taste, savoury, delicate; benign, gracious.

Title: Անուշահոտ
Definition_1: sweet, odoriferous, delicate; — առնել, to perfume, to scent.

Title: Անուշահոտիմ
Definition_1: to smell sweet, to be odoriferous.

Title: Անուշութիւն
Definition_1: sweetness; delicacy, exquisite flavour; affability, cheerfulness.

Title: Անուորդ
Definition_1: windlass; gin or triangle for pullies; engine.

Title: Անուր
Definition_1: iron collar (of a pillory); collar; ring.

Title: Անուրեք
Definition_1: not confined to one place, unbounded, infinite; houseless, homeless.

Title: Անչար
Definition_1: not vicious, harmless, void of malice.

Title: Անչափ
Definition_1: immense, infinite; extreme, excessive, enormous, immoderate, superfluous, superabundant; intemperate, disordinate; dreadful, violent, grievous;

Title: Անչափահաս
Definition_1: not adult, not arrived at puberty.

Title: Անչափութիւն
Definition_1: immensity; enormity; superfluity, superabundance, exuberance; immoderation, intemperance.

Title: Անպակաս
Definition_1: faultless, perfect, accomplished, complete; unfailing; indefectible, inexhaustible;

Title: Անպահակիմ
Definition_1: to be irresolute, to hesitate, to delay; cf. Ըմպահկեմ.

Title: Անպահպանութիւն
Definition_1: want of observation, negligence, infringement, infraction.

Title: Անպատեհ
Definition_1: unbecoming, improper, unsuitable, unfit, absurd, unseemly.

Title: Անպատժեմ
Definition_1: to remove punishment, not to punish.

Title: Անպատիր
Definition_1: not deceitful, sincere; that cannot be deceived.

Title: Անպատճառ
Definition_1: without cause, — principle, causeless; without reason or motive;

Title: Անպատուաստ
Definition_1: not grafted; that cannot be grafted; that cannot be united.

Title: Անպատրաստ
Definition_2: յանպատրաստից, without preparation, unawares, unexpectedly; cf. Յանկարծակի.

Title: Անպարապ
Definition_1: busy, not at leisure; not engaged in business

Title: Անպարապանամ
Definition_1: to be busy, to be occupied.

Title: Անպարկեշտ
Definition_1: immodest, unchaste, indecent, bawdy, obscene; dissolute, debauched;

Title: Անպարտ
Definition_1: unblamable, innocent; not due; — առնել՝ կացուցանել, to clear, to acquit.

Title: Անպէտ
Definition_1: useless, vain, frivolous, insignificant; vile, abject, miserable, despicable, worthless; — առնել, to render useless, to spoil;

Title: Անպիտանանամ
Definition_1: to be useless, to become useless, to spoil.

Title: Անջատեմ
Definition_1: to separate, to detach, to disjoin, to disunite; to uncouple.

Title: Անջրպետ
Definition_1: intermedium, space, interval, interstice; partition, boundary.

Title: Անջրպետեմ
Definition_1: to separate, to cutoff, to shut out, to exclude.

Title: Անսահման
Definition_1: infinite, unbounded; interminable; unlimited; indefinite; incomprehensible.

Title: Անսամ
Definition_1: to listen, to obey, to give ear to, to acquiesce, to yield, to consent, to submit; չ-, to turn a deaf ear, to refuse consent, to disobey.

Title: Անսայթաք
Definition_1: that is not slippery; that does not stumble; firm, sure; infallible.

Title: Անսանձ
Definition_1: without bridle, without reins; unbridled, unrestrained; unruly, ungovernable.

Title: Անսաստեմ
Definition_1: to disobey, to resist, to be refractory.

Title: Անսեղան
Definition_1: without having a table for eating.

Title: Անսիրելի
Definition_1: who has neither lovers nor friends; antipathetic.

Title: Անսիրելութիւն
Definition_1: want of love or affection; antipathy.

Title: Անսկզբնական
Definition_1: without beginning, that has existed from all eternity.

Title: Անսովոր
Definition_1: unaccustomed; unusual; strange, extraordinary, new; irregular.

Title: Անսուաղ
Definition_1: hungry, unfed, troubled with hunger; fasting; without food; լինել՝ կալ —, to fast.

Title: Անստին
Definition_1: without breast or udder; without milk.

Title: Անվայել
Definition_1: unbecoming, indecent, unsuitable, improper, unfit; dishonourable;

Title: Անվան
Definition_1: that cannot be repulsed or put to flight, invincible, impregnable.

Title: Անվարձ
Definition_1: without salary, unpaid; without merit or recompense.

Title: Անվաւեր
Definition_1: invalid, null, illegal, insufficient; apocryphal; — առնել, to invalidate.

Title: Անվիշտ
Definition_1: without pain, that has nothing to suffer.

Title: Անվկանդ
Definition_1: firm, determined, steady, resolute, invincible, inexpugnable.

Title: Անվնաս
Definition_1: harmless, innocent, innoxious; unhurt, undamaged, safe and sound;

Title: Անվստահ
Definition_1: distrustful, suspicious; — լինել, to distrust, to suspect.

Title: Անվտանգ
Definition_1: out of danger, safe; unhurt, free from harm.

Title: Անվրէպ
Definition_1: unfailing, punctual, exact, regular, correct, sure, certain;
Definition_2: without fail, punctually, precisely, exactly, correctly.

Title: Անտանելի
Definition_1: insupportable, intolerable, heavy, burdensome; incomprehensible, inconceivable.

Title: Անտառ
Definition_1: forest, wood; — փոքր, grove, copse, thicket; — թաւ, thickest part of a forest; վերակացու անտառի, ranger of a forest, forester.

Title: Անտառամոլ
Definition_1: become a forest, overgrown with wood.

Title: Անտեղագոյն
Definition_1: more or very absurd, more or very extravagant.

Title: Անտեղի
Definition_1: not confined to one place, uncircumscribed; absurd, extravagant; unbecoming, unsuitable.

Title: Անտեղութիւն
Definition_1: absurdity, extravagance, incongruity, unsuitableness, unfitness, impropriety.

Title: Անտենչիկ
Definition_1: who does not aspire, unaspiring, unambitious; — աւագութեան, not desiring honour.

Title: Անտես
Definition_1: invisible; incomprehensible; — առնել, to neglect, to take no care of, to despise, to quit, to abandon, cf. Անտեսել.

Title: Անտեսեմ
Definition_1: to neglect, to abandon, to slight; to connive at.

Title: Անտերունչ
Definition_1: without master or governor; unassisted, forlorn, abandoned.

Title: Անտի
Definition_1: thence; there; ի լեռնէ —, from yonder mountain; աստի եւ —, from each side.

Title: Անտի
Definition_1: tho world to come; <ab>pl.</ab> the blessings of the world to come.

Title: Անցագիր
Definition_1: passport; — տալ, to give a -; հաստատել զ—, to viser the -.

Title: Անցանեմ
Definition_1: to pass; to flow, to run; to pass away, to end, to cease; to passover, to omit; — զանցանել, to exceed; to surpass, to excel, cf. Գերազանցեմ, cf. Յառաջատեմ; զբանիւ՝ ըստ հրամանն, to infringe, to transgress, to violate, to break; — ընդ մէջ, to cross; to pierce, to penetrate; — վերստին, to repass; —ի տեղի այլոյ, to succeed; — ընդոստ, to leap; — արագ, to hasten; — զաւուրբք, to grow old, cf. Ծերանամ, cf. Պառաւեմ, cf. Զառամանամ; — ճրագի, to be extinguished; — ժամանակի, to elapse; — անցից, to happen; — յաշխարհէ, to die, to expire; հասանել —, to cross, to traverse; — ըստ չափ՝ ըստ սահման, to surpass, to exceed, to go beyond the limit; հապճեպ զբազում իւիք, to pass rapidly over many things; սակաւ ինչ — բանիւ, to speak briefly.

Title: Անցաւոր
Definition_1: passenger, traveller; fugitive, transitory, perishable, temporal, frail, vain.

Title: Անցաւութիւն
Definition_1: health, freedom from pain; insensibility; apathy, inaction; impassibility.

Title: Անցեալ
Definition_1: passed; — զաւուրբք, old, advanced in age; — ժամանակ, the time past.

Title: Անցուկ
Definition_1: open to the public, frequented by passengers; — փողոց, great thoroughfare.

Title: Անցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to pass, to cause to pass; to transmit; to dissipate, to drive away; to consume, to employ; to transport; to carry back; to pierce; to twine; to enchase; to omit, to pass over; to surpass, to excel; — զմեղս, to pardon sins; — զաւուրս՝ զժամանակ կենաց, to pass away the time, to live; — զճրագ՝ զհուր, to extinguish or put out the candle or fire; — ընդ սուր՝ ի սայր սուսերի, to put to the sword; — դրամ փոխանակալ or ի ձեռն դրամափոխութեան, to remit money, to send letters of change; — զզաւակն, to miscarry in child-birth; — զանցուցանել, to excel, to surpass, cf. Անցանեմ զանցանել; — ընդ թիւ, to count, to enumerate; — զցասումն, to appease anger; — զքննութիւն իւր, to pass one's examination; չարիս — ընդ, to hurt some one.

Title: Անցք
Definition_1: passage, journey; pass, defile; street, lane; avenue; channel, canal; hole, opening; gate; accident, event; leap; flux; — բնակարանաց՝ սենեկաց, gallery, corridor; — ժամանակի, space of time, lapse of time; — or բերան անոթոց, orifice; անց եւ դարձ առնել, to pass, to go, cf. Երթեւեկել; անց եւ դարձ առնել, to come and go, to traverse; բազում — անցին ընդ իս, I have suffered much; պատմէին իրերաց ու ինչ — ընդ իւրեանս անցեալ էին, they told each other every thing that had happened them.

Title: Անփառութիւն
Definition_1: inglorious state, abject condition, vileness, baseness.

Title: Անփոխադրելի
Definition_1: immutable, not liable to change, invariable.

Title: Անփոյթ
Definition_1: negligent, careless, inattentive, indifferent, indolent; — առնել, — լինել, to neglect, to slight, cf. Անտեսել.

Title: Անփորձ
Definition_1: that does not put to the test; that is not tried or put to the test; inexperienced, untried, new; pure, chaste.

Title: Անփուտ
Definition_1: not rotten, incorruptible, not liable to decay.

Title: Անփրկանաւոր
Definition_1: that cannot be ransomed or redeemed.

Title: Անքատանամ
Definition_1: to be indigent, to be poor.

Title: Անքթթելի
Definition_1: that does not wink the eye;

Title: Անքուն
Definition_1: awake, wakeful, sleepless, watchful, — լինել, կալ to be awake; to be wakeful, sleepless.

Title: Անօգնականիմ
Definition_1: to be unassisted, to be helpless.

Title: Անօթ
Definition_1: vase, vessel, pot; box; piece of furniture; tool, instrument; —ք խոհակերոցի, kitchen-range, set of pots and kettles, յ— առնուլ, խնդրել, to borrow; յ— տալ, to lend.

Title: Անօսր
Definition_1: slender; rare; fine, subtile, thin, delicate; feeble, meager, lean; light.

Title: Անօսրագոյն
Definition_1: more or very thin, very subtile.

Title: Անօսրամասն
Definition_1: composed of thin or subtile particles.

Title: Անօսրամարմին
Definition_1: that has a body subtile, thin.

Title: Անօսրանամ
Definition_1: to rarefy; to become thin; to be diminished; to waste; to become fine or subtile.

Title: Անօսրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to rarefy; to make thin; to lessen, to diminish, to subtilize.

Title: Անօրէն
Definition_1: unjust, wicked; impious; untoward; illicit, base; profane.

Title: Անօրինեմ
Definition_1: to be iniquitous, to be unjust; to sin, to transgress.

Title: Աշալուրշք
Definition_2: ընդ աշալուրշսն, at dawn, at break of day.

Title: Աշակերտ
Definition_1: disciple, student, pupil, scholar; foster-child; seetator, follower; — արուեստի, apprentice.

Title: Աշակերտասէր
Definition_1: that loves his scholar or disciple.

Title: Աշակերտեմ
Definition_1: to hare in tuition, to teach, to instruct.

Title: Աշխատ առնեմ
Definition_1: to give trouble, to fatigue, to harass, to incommode, to disquiet, to disturb; to torment, to plague, to rack; to weary; to importune, to pester.

Title: Աշխատասիրեմ
Definition_1: to labour diligently; to compose, to write.

Title: Աշխատասիրութիւն
Definition_1: diligent labour, elaborate study, industry; work, production.

Title: Աշխատաւոր
Definition_1: that works, that labours; servant; — եղբայր, lay-brother.

Title: Աշխատեմ
Definition_1: to fatigue, to trouble, to incommode, to disquiet, to disturb.

Title: Աշխատեցուցիչ
Definition_1: troublesome, tedious; which makes work, fatiguing.

Title: Աշխատիմ
Definition_1: to work, to take trouble, to toil, to labour.

Title: Աշխատութիւն
Definition_1: fatigue, trouble, labour, care, endeavour, effort; work, business; exeroise; fabrication; — մտաց, stretch of the mind, intense application; աշխատութեամբ, with difficulty, with great trouble.

Title: Աշխար
Definition_1: mourning, lamentation, complaint; — դնեմ, cf. Աշխարեմ.

Title: Աշխարան
Definition_1: a place for tears or lamentation.

Title: Աշխարեմ
Definition_1: to complain of, to lament, to mourn, to deplore.

Title: Աշխարհ
Definition_1: world, universe; land, country, region; փոքր —, microcosm; հանդերձեալ —, the other world, future life; ընդ ամենայն —, through all the world; — ամենայն, all the world or people, every body; ըստ — հանել, to expatriate, to exile, cf. Արտաքսեմ, cf. Աքսորեմ; ելանել՝ փոխիլ յաշխարհէ, to go in the other world; գալ յ—, to be born, to come into the world; յաչս —ի, in the eyes of the world; զուլ զ—, to leave the world.

Title: Աշխարհաբնակ
Definition_1: that inhabits the world or a country; cosmopolitan.

Title: Աշխարհագիր
Definition_1: geographer; cosmographer; geography; cosmography, poll-tax; — առնել, to take a census, cf. Աշխարհագրեմ.

Title: Աշխարհագոյժ առնեմ
Definition_1: to proclame every where or with a loud voice, to divulge, to noise abroad.

Title: Աշխարհագոչ
Definition_1: published or that publishes throughout the world.

Title: Աշխարհագովութիւն
Definition_1: the reception of universal praise; universal praise.

Title: Աշխարհադիտեմ
Definition_1: to observe or spy a country.

Title: Աշխարհազօր
Definition_1: composed of all sorts of warriors.

Title: Աշխարհալոյս
Definition_1: that gives light to all the world

Title: Աշխարհախորհ
Definition_1: thought or done by universal consent.

Title: Աշխարհախումբ
Definition_1: in universal or general assembly; universal, general.

Title: Աշխարհածանօթ
Definition_1: acknowledged by all the world; notorious, manifest; — հրատարակութիւն, notoriety.

Title: Աշխարհածուփ
Definition_1: that agitates or troubles the world; agitated or troubled in the world.

Title: Աշխարհական
Definition_1: worldly, temporal; secular, lay; universal, general;
Definition_2: lay or secular man; — առնել, to secularize; — վիճակ՝ կարգ, a secular life.

Title: Աշխարհակուլ
Definition_1: that absorbs or swallows up the world.

Title: Աշխարհամար
Definition_1: list or register of the people, census of the population;
Definition_2: that keeps the register of the people; առնել գիր զ—, to register the number of the people.

Title: Աշխարհամէջ
Definition_1: public square or place in a town or country.

Title: Աշխարհամուտ
Definition_1: open to public entrance, frequented, resorted to; — Դուռն, Court.

Title: Աշխարհանազ
Definition_1: esteemed or respected by all men.

Title: Աշխարհաշէն
Definition_1: that causes a country to nourish; blooming, in bloom.

Title: Աշխարհապատում
Definition_1: that relates from the creation of the world.

Title: Աշխարհասէր
Definition_1: worldly, attached to the wordly vanities.

Title: Աշխարհավարիմ
Definition_1: to live according to the rules of good policy; to live a secular life.

Title: Աշխարհատած
Definition_1: that takes care of the people.

Title: Աշխարհատեաց
Definition_1: that detests the world, that is not attached to the vanities of the world.

Title: Աշխարհատես
Definition_1: that has seen much of the world; known by all, notorious, public, manifest; — ցուցանել, to publish, to make known.

Title: Աշխարհատէր
Definition_1: master of the world, conqueror; prince.

Title: Աշխարհացոյց
Definition_1: map; համատարած —, map of the world.

Title: Աշխարհիկ
Definition_1: secular; lay, vulgar, popular; — լեզու, vulgar tongue.

Title: Աշխէտ
Definition_1: reddish; of a fiery colour; — ձի, chesnut horse.

Title: Աշխոյժ
Definition_1: ardent, spirited, lively, sprightly, mettlesome, fiery; adroit, skilful; alert, vigilant; — ձի, a spirited horse.

Title: Աշխուժութիւն
Definition_1: vivacity, spirit, gaiety, sprightliness; rapture; mettle.

Title: Աշտանակեմ
Definition_1: to be on horse-back, to ride, to mount a horse; to break in a horse.

Title: Աշտարակազարդ
Definition_1: set round with towers or turrets, turreted.

Title: Աշտարակաձեւ
Definition_1: which has the forme of a tower, turreted.

Title: Աշտարակեալ
Definition_1: having towers, set round with towers.

Title: Աչագար
Definition_1: who has bad or sore eyes.

Title: Աչալուրջ
Definition_1: alert, sprightly, vigilant, active, gay; circumspect.

Title: Աչառեմ
Definition_1: to have respect to the appearance of persons.

Title: Աչառու
Definition_1: that respects the appearance of persons, partial.

Title: Աչարձակութիւն
Definition_1: look of love, longing eye, amorous glance, lust.

Title: Աչացաւութիւն
Definition_1: complaint, pain in the eyes; ophthalmy.

Title: Աչք
Definition_1: eyes, sight, look; աչս արկանել՝ արձակել, to cast eyes upon, to desire; ըստ աչս դատել, to judge by first sight; յաչս դնել, to despise; առ աչս հայել, to pay respect to persons; յաչաց հանել, to render odious; յաչաց ելանել, to be in disgrace, to lose the good graces of any one; առ աչօք, fantastical, fanciful, chimerical; visibly; առ աչօք ինչ՝ տեսիլ՝ երեւոյթ, spectre, phantom, ghost, vision, illusion; կալ աչաց, to become blind, cf. Կուրանամ; աչս առնուլ, cf. Աչառեմ; թերաբաց —, half-closed eyes; յաչս դնել, to be bold, to brave, to defy; — յարտասուս, tears in the eyes, weeping; զաչս ի վայր արկանել, to lower the eyes; ցաւ աչաց, cf. Աչացաւ, cf. Աչացաւութիւն.

Title: Ապա
Definition_1: afterwards, then, immediately afterwards; consequently, in consequence; finally, at last; secondly;
Definition_2: then, therefore; առ յապա, one day, some day; for the future; յ—յս, առի յ—յս, henceforth, for the future; առ ի յ—յսն յիշատակ, a monument for posterity, for the remembrance or memory;
Definition_3: առ յապայք, the future; future things; յիշեա, որդեակ, զառ յապայսն, remember, son, the future.

Title: Ապաբան
Definition_1: without reason, without answer, without reply.

Title: Ապագայ
Definition_1: that is to come, future, posterior.

Title: Ապա եթէ
Definition_1: but if, if, in case that; — ոչ, if not, otherwise, else.

Title: Ապաղէն
Definition_1: unarmed; յ— մարանչել, to fight without weapons.

Title: Ապաժամ
Definition_1: tardy, too late; out of season.

Title: Ապաժաման
Definition_1: that comes or happens too late, tardy; out of season.

Title: Ապաժոյժ
Definition_2: menses; blood, river or shedding of blood; տապալիլ յարիւն յ—, յ— թաւալիլ, յարիւն եւ յ— համակիլ, արեամբ եւ ապաժուժաւ թաւալիլ, to be bloody, stained with blood; ընդ քիրտն եւ ընդ — գալ, ընդ քիրտն եւ ընդ — գալ, to sweat blood and water, to make great force, to fatigue on'es self to death; — բերումն, intemperateness, violence.

Title: Ապախտ
Definition_1: vain, useless, neglected, slighted, forgotten; — առնել, to neglect, to forget, to slight, to violate, to infringe, cf. Արհամարհեմ, cf. Խոտեմ; — լինել, cf. Անպիտանամ.

Title: Ապակագործութիւն
Definition_1: art of making glass; glass-house, glass-works, glass-trade; glazing, glazier's work.

Title: Ապականեմ
Definition_1: to corrupt, to spoil; to alter, to change, to falsify; to contaminate, to soil, to dirt, to spot; to cause to rot, to putrefy; to deform, to disfigure; to deprave, to seduce; to pollute, to profane; to poison, to infect; to vitiate; to debauch, to lead astray; — զկոյս, to deflour, to debauch; — զսիրտ, to corrupt the heart; — զտեսիլ մորուաց, to shave; — զառողջութիւն, to ruin the health; — զբարս, to corrupt the morals; — զօդ, to infect the air; — զհամբաւ, to libel; — հրոյ զլերինս, to consume, to burn, to devour the mountains; — զխորհուրդս ուրուք, to render useless advice; — զմիտս, to seduce.

Title: Ապականիմ
Definition_1: to be corrupted, ruined, spoiled; to dirty one's self; — ընդ ումեք, to sin with some one.

Title: Ապականութիւն
Definition_1: corruption; destruction, ruin; contamination, infection; depravity, perversion, degeneration; putrefaction, rottenness, sourness, staleness, rancidity; — կուսի, defloration, debauchment; տեղի՝ դուբ ապականութեան, sepulchre, tomb; — բարուց, corruption, depravation of morals or manners; յ— դնել՝ դարձուցանել, կարգել, հասուցանել, cf. Ապականեմ; յ— դառնալ, լինել, անցեալ գնալ, cf. Ապականիմ; ձմեռն ապականութեան, the winter destroyer or spoiler.

Title: Ապահարզան
Definition_1: repudiation, divorce; գիր՝ թուղթ ապահարզանի, act of divorce.

Title: Ապահարկ
Definition_1: exempt from taxes; — առնել, to exempt one from taxes.

Title: Ապահարկութիւն
Definition_1: exemption, freedom from taxes, franchise, immunity.

Title: Ապահով
Definition_2: յ—ս, assuredly; յ—ս լինել, to be sure, to be certain.

Title: Ապահովանամ
Definition_1: to be sure, to be assured.

Title: Ապահովացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make sure, to assure; to give security for.

Title: Ապաշաւ
Definition_1: repentance, regret; remorse; penitence, compunction, contrition; — առնուլ, զեղջ եւ — լինել, to repent, to feel regret, cf. Ապաշաւեմ.

Title: Ապաշաւեմ
Definition_1: to regret, to repent of, to lament.

Title: Ապառաժ
Definition_2: rocky, rugged, hilly, stony; —ն Արաբիա, stony Arabia.

Title: *Ապառիկ
Definition_1: on credit; — գնել վաճառել, to buy or sell on credit.

Title: Ապառնի
Definition_3: — ժամանակ բայից, future tense.

Title: Ապաստան
Definition_1: asylum, refuge, place of safety, shelter; a. sheltered, placed uuder protection; — առնեմ, to confide, to intrust, to secure, cf. Ապաւինեմ, cf. Յանձնեմ; — լինիմ, to take refuge; to confide, to trust, to be confident, cf. Ապաստանել, cf. Պատսպարել, cf. Ապաւինել, cf. Վստահել; յոգիս — լինել, յոգւոցն պարզել — լինել, to be in the last agonies, to be at the point of death.

Title: Ապաստանապահ
Definition_1: kept in a place of safety.

Title: Ապարանք
Definition_1: palace, court, regal mansion; house, dwelling.

Title: Ապարում
Definition_1: border or edge of a tent or pavilion, fringe.

Title: Ապացոյց
Definition_1: index, sign, mark; example, model; proof, argument, reason, evidence, testimony; demonstration; յայտնի —, evident proof.

Title: Ապաւինիմ
Definition_1: to trust, to confide, to rely; to take refuge, to take shelter.

Title: Ապաքէն
Definition_1: then, therefore; perhaps; already; in effect, in fact, indeed, truly, really;

Title: Ապաքինացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cure, to restore to health; to take away, to cause to cease.

Title: Ապխտեմ
Definition_1: to dry salt-meat, to cure hams.

Title: Ապշեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to astonish, to surprise, to enchant, to enrapture, to amaze.

Title: Ապշիմ
Definition_1: to be astonished, surprised, enraptured, amazed; to grow stupid.

Title: Ապշոպեմ
Definition_1: to seize; to take by force.

Title: Ապշութիւն
Definition_1: astonishment, surprise, amazement, stupor; dulness, heaviness, stupidity; lethargy; յ— կործանել, to be hebetate; cf. Ապշեցուցանեմ; յ— կործանիլ, ընկղմիլ, cf. Ապշիմ.

Title: Ապուխտ
Definition_1: salted and dried meat; ham; ապուխտք, pig-meat.

Title: Ապուշ
Definition_1: stupid, dull, heavy, foolish, silly; astonished, surprised, amazed; յ— կրթել, հարկանել, արկանել, դարձուցանել, to strike with astonishment, to surprise, to amaze, cf. Ապշեցուցանեմ; յ— կրթիլ, հարկանիլ, դառնալ, լինել, to be struck with astonishment, to be surprised, amazed, to wonder, cf. Ապշիմ.

Title: Ապռեմ
Definition_1: to plunder, to pillage, to ravage.

Title: Ապստամբ
Definition_1: rebellious, disobedient, refractory, contumacious, factious, seditious; —ք, conspirators; ժողով, միաբանութիւն —աց, conspiracy.

Title: Ապստամբեմ
Definition_1: to rebel, to revolt, to mutiny, to conspire; — ի հաւատոց, to apostatize, to abjure religion.

Title: Ապստամբեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to excite to sedition, to stir up to rebellion, to cause to revolt.

Title: Ապստամբութիւն
Definition_1: rebellion, revolt, mutiny, sedition, faction, revolution.

Title: Ապտակ
Definition_1: slap, box, tap; — ածել՝ հանել՝ մատուցանել, to slap, cf. Ապտակեմ; — առնուլ՝ ըմպել՝ ուտօլ, to receive a box on the ear.

Title: Ապտակատու
Definition_1: that gives box on the ear.

Title: Ապտակեմ
Definition_1: to box, to slap, to cuff.

Title: Ապրանք
Definition_1: life, duration of life; ոչ լինել ապրանաց, to be in a dying state, to be dying.

Title: Ապրեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to deliver, to set at liberty; to save, to preserve.

Title: Ապրիմ
Definition_1: to live; to obtain freedom, to escape, to fly.

Title: Աջ
Definition_1: right; right hand; ընդ աջմէ, to the right; աջոյ ձեռամբ յաջողակ, right-handed; յաջմէ եւ յահեկէ՝ յաջուց եւ յահեկաց, to the right and left, on each side; — թեւ բանակի, right wing of an army; — հաւանութեան տալ՝ կարկարել ումեք, to offer one's hand, to consent; յ— եւ յահեակ, right or wrong.

Title: Աջակողմեան
Definition_1: to the right, on the right side; յ— դասու, to the right.

Title: Աջակողմն
Definition_1: right side, right hand; — նաւու, starboard; յաջակողման, to the right.

Title: Աջակցիմ
Definition_1: to aid, to assist, to succour; to league, to confederate.

Title: Աջակցութիւն
Definition_1: coadjuvancy; aid, assistance, succour; confederation, league, alliance.

Title: Աջահամբոյր
Definition_1: kissing of the hand; homage; compliments.

Title: Առ
Definition_1: taking, capture, seizure; plunder, pillage; — աւար, — եւ ապուռ, cf. Աւար, cf. Աւարառութիւն, cf. Կողոպուտ;

Title: Առ
Definition_1: at; near; among; in comparison of; with regard to; relatively to; during, in, under; against; with; towards; next to; by; for; on; in presence of, before; առ իս է յամենայն ժամ, he is always near me; արգարացուսջիք զնա առ հօր իւրում, make excuses for him to his father; աղէտք քո ոչինչ են առ իմովս, your misfortune is nothing in comparison of mine; գնաց առ դուքսն, he is gone to the duke; առ Հայս եւ առ Յոյնս, among the Armenians and Greeks; ոչ է նոյնպէս առ Անգղիացիս, it is not even among the English; սակաւ ինչ է այդ առ պարտեօքս՝ զոր ունիմ առ քեզ, it is little in comparison of what I owe you; յարդոյ՝ մեծարու է առ ամենեսին, he is respected by all men; կայթել or խայտալ առ խնդութեան, to leap for joy; պարտ է լինել ազնուաբարոյ առ անձն եւ առ այլս, it is right to respect one's self as well as others; առ բարեկամս ունիմ զնա, I keep him for my friend; նստել, բազմել առ ումեմն or առ ումեք, to sit down near any one; առ թագաւորութեամբ, under the reign of Tiridates; առ ի տեսանել զնա, to see him; առ արտաքս, on the outside; առ երի, near, towards; առ երկրաւ, on the ground; առ այր, to each person, a piece; առ չարութեան, for malice, through malice; առ ահի, երկիւղի, for or through fear; առ նովին ժամանակաւ, at that time, then.

Title: Առագաստ
Definition_1: curtain, veil, net; pretext; nuptial couch; gynaeceum; bed-curtain; pavilion, sail of a ship; մտնկունք —ի, young persons that accompany the bridegroom, paranymphs; — պարզել՝ վերացուցանել, to sail; իջուցանել զ—, to strike sail.

Title: Առագաստաձեւ
Definition_1: in the shape of a sail.

Title: Առագաստաձիք
Definition_1: that draws the curtain; that veils; that sets sail.

Title: Առագաստասպաս
Definition_1: for the service of the nuptial room.

Title: Առագաստափակ
Definition_1: veiled, covered with a veil or curtain.

Title: Առագաստեմ
Definition_1: to veil, to cover with a veil or curtain; to cloak under a pretence, to mask; to set sail, to make sail, to sail.

Title: Առադրեմ
Definition_1: to attribute, to ascribe; to prefix, to put before; to set, to apply, to put, to join, to add; to establish, to appoint, to make.

Title: Առած
Definition_1: adage, proverb, saying, aphorism, sentence, apophthegm; axiom, maxim, general proposition, rule, principle; oracle.

Title: Առակ
Definition_1: proverb, adage; figure, enigma; parable, simile, allegory; apologue, fable; spectacle; —աւ, proverbially; առ —է, to be exposed to public laughter or contempt; յ—ս տալ, to expose to public attention or censure; յ—ս, — նշաւակի լինել, to be exposed to public view, to lay open to public contempt; ըստ —ին, according to the proverb; — արկանել, —օք խօսել, to tell a proverb, parable, fables; to proverb; to give an enigma or charade to guess or divine; յ— ածել, to give an example, to quote; յ— գալ, յ—ս լինել, to become proverbial or a proverb.

Title: Առակաբանեմ
Definition_1: to proverb, to speak proverbs; to speak figuratively.

Title: Առակագիր
Definition_1: that writes proverbs or moral fables.

Title: Առակագրութիւն
Definition_1: book of proverbs or moral fables; the act of writing fables.

Title: Առականեմ
Definition_1: to expose to public notice; to conceal, to hide; to dissemble, to play the hypocrite.

Title: Առակարկու
Definition_1: who propounds enigmas; who talks in proverbs.

Title: Առակեմ
Definition_1: to allegorize, to make use of parables; to confront, to compare, to resemble; to expbse to public censure.

Title: Առակօրինակի
Definition_1: mysterious; — հրաման, վարդապետութիւնք հաւատոյ, eminent, sublime, mysterious dogma.

Title: Առանձին
Definition_1: peculiar, singular, special; insulated; solitary, lonely, obscure; specific; — յատկութիւն, speciality;
Definition_2: particularly, especially, expressly; singularly, specifically, narrowly; apart, in reserve, secretly, aside, separately, solitarily.

Title: Առանց
Definition_1: without, except, save; — իմ, without me.

Title: Առանցանեմ
Definition_1: to lose ones head, to rave, to talk nonsense; to surpass, to go to extremes.

Title: Առաջ
Definition_1: front, head; arm, division, branch; —ք գետոյ, arm of a river; յ—ոյ or յ—ոյ կողմանէ, before, in front, at the head of; զ—ս ունել, առնուլ, to obviate, to be beforehand, to prevent, cf. Սկսանել; — նաւու, head, prow, how of a ship; — զօրաց, division of forces; ընդ առաջ գնալ ելանել, to go to meet.

Title: Առաջադրեմ
Definition_1: to set before, to place before, to propose; to intend, to design.

Title: Առաջապահ
Definition_1: vanguard, van; guard; — նաւաց, pilot, steersman.

Title: Առաջարկեմ
Definition_1: to propose, to offer; to propose for consideration.

Title: Առաջարկութիւն
Definition_1: proposition, proposal, project, question; establishment, introduction, motion; arrangement; theme; problem; discourse; —ք, premises.

Title: Առաջեւ
Definition_1: before; զառաջեօք անկանել, to go to meet (a person), to advance before (the enemy).

Title: Առաջի
Definition_1: before, in presence of, in front of, opposite; forward; — իմ, before me, in my presence; գնալ —, to go before, to precede; — առնել, դնել, արկանել, to propose, to assert, to project, to offer, to represent, to produce to decree, to exhibit, cf. Յառաջարկել, cf. Յառաջադրել, cf. Առարկանել, cf. Մատուցանել; to explain, to declare; — կալ, to present one's self, to appear, to resist, to oppose, cf. Դիմադրել, cf. Տոկալ;
Definition_2: — կայ, <ab>v. imp.</ab> which is or are in front, forward, before; որ —ս կայ խրատ, the present maxim; կամքն — կան ինձ, I have the will before me; ինձ չարն — կայ, the ill is near me; զոր ասել կայ մեզ —, what we have to say; ամենեցուն մեզ յանդիման լինել կայ —, it is necessary for us all to appear before.

Title: Առաջիկայ
Definition_2: assistant; — տարի, the current year; — ամիս, present month; յ— շաբաթու, in the next week; — լինել, to be present, to interpose; յերեսուն — ամսեան, the thirtieth inst.;
Definition_3: յ—սն for the future, henceforth.

Title: Առաջին
Definition_1: first; prior, antecedent; ancient, primitive, chief; previous, original; precocious; in the first place;
Definition_2: —ք, ancestors, predecessors, the ancients; cf. Նախնիք;
Definition_3: յառաջնմէ, յառանջնում, before, at first.

Title: Առաջնորդ
Definition_1: author, creator; captain, chief, conductor, guide, escort, director, guardian, rector; ordinary principal, provost, overseer, prelate, superior, father; — կարգել, to set over.

Title: Առաջնորդական
Definition_1: belonging to a prelate; that conducts, that regulates.

Title: Առաջնորդասիրութիւն
Definition_1: immoderate thirst of dignity or power.

Title: Առաջնորդարան
Definition_1: residence of a prelate, — presbyter or ordinary.

Title: Առաջնորդեմ
Definition_1: to Conduct, to lead, to guide, to command, to head, to rule, to govern, to direct, to escort, to accompany.

Title: Առաջնորդութիւն
Definition_1: conduct, command, governance, direction; provost-ship, prelature.

Title: Առաջոյ
Definition_1: forward, before; — կողմանէ, in front of, in presence of;

Title: Առասան
Definition_1: packthread, string; waxed thread; rope, cord, line; thread.

Title: Առասանեմ
Definition_1: to tie with string; to cord.

Title: Առասանութիւն
Definition_1: name, title; diction, elocution; tale, recital.

Title: Առասպել
Definition_1: fable, fiction, tale, romance, novel; apologue; mythology; enigma.

Title: Առասպելաբան
Definition_1: narrator, fabulist; mythologist; romancer; quack, story-teller.

Title: Առասպելաբանեմ
Definition_1: to tell tales, to talk nonsense.

Title: Առասպելաբանութիւն
Definition_1: tale, fable, story; tales, idle talk; quackery, romancing; mythology.

Title: Առասպելապատում
Definition_1: who tells idle stories, novelist, who spreads news; fabulist; fabulous.

Title: Առատ
Definition_1: abundant, superabundant, copious; rich, full, plentiful; liberal, generous; simple, plain, clear.

Title: Առատաբաշխ
Definition_1: who gives or distributes bountifully, liberal, generous.

Title: Առատաձեռնեմ
Definition_1: to give bountifully, liberally, to gratify, to favour.

Title: Առատաձեռնութիւն
Definition_1: liberality, generosity, bounty, munificence, favour, gift, privilege.

Title: Առատաձիր
Definition_1: who gives liberally; that is given adundantly, abundant, copious.

Title: Առատամիտ
Definition_1: liberal, noble, generous, magnanimous; ingenious, intelligent.

Title: Առատամտութիւն
Definition_1: generosity, liberality; abundance, fertility of mind, intelligence.

Title: Առատանամ
Definition_1: to abound, to increase, to augment; to overflow; to run over; to be bountiful, generous; to be proud; to be angry, to be in a passion.

Title: Առատապէս
Definition_1: abundantly, superabundantly, copiously, plentifully, liberally, greatly, nobly, richly, splendidly; profusely; fruitfully.

Title: Առատացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fill, to heap up; to augment.

Title: Առատութիւն
Definition_1: abundance, plenty, superabundance, exuberance, copiousness; fulness, repletion; fertility, fecundity; անչափ —, profusion.

Title: Առաւել
Definition_2: more, rather; too much; — եւս, more, over and above, besides, so much, the more, cf. Աւելի, cf. Առաւելապէս, cf. Առաւելագոյնս, cf. Մանաւանդ; — քան, more than; — քան զ—, —ագոյն, more and more, too much; — եմ, լինիմ, գատնիմ, cf. Առաւելում.

Title: Առաւելում
Definition_1: to favour, to advantage; to increase, to augment, to enlarge, to grow, to multiply, to accumulate, to amass; to raise, to enhance.

Title: Առաւելում
Definition_1: to grow, to increase, to augment; to ahound, to superahound, to overflow; to be redundant; to overcome, to surpass, to exceed, to excel, to predominate, to prevail; to remain.

Title: Առաւելութիւն
Definition_1: growth, increase, addition, augmentation, redundancy, superabundance, superfluity, exuberance, diffusion, transcendency; enhancement of price; excess; prerogative, distinction, superiority.

Title: Առաւօտ
Definition_1: morning; ածջոյն —, forenoon; ընդ —ն, ընդ —ս, the —, cf. Առաւօտու; ընդ —ս ընդ —ս, every -; յառնել ընդ —ն, վաղքաջ ընդ —ն, — առնել, to rise early or betimes; յ—է մինչեւ ցերեկոյ, from till evening.

Title: Առաքելագործ
Definition_1: who does or lives after the manner of the apostles; — մատեան, the Acts of the Apostles.

Title: Առաքելախօս
Definition_1: that is said or spoken like an apostle.

Title: Առաքելակից
Definition_1: companion of the apostles, companion of mission.

Title: Առաքելանշան
Definition_1: who has the sign of the apostles; who performs miracles like the apostles.

Title: Առաքելաշնորհ
Definition_1: who has the gifts of the apostles.

Title: Առաքելաւանդ
Definition_1: that is founded or transmitted by the apostles, apostolic.

Title: Առաքելուհի
Definition_1: who fills the office of anapostle.

Title: Առաքելօրէն
Definition_1: after the manner of the apostles, apostolically.

Title: Առաքեմ
Definition_1: to send, to dispatch, to expedite; անդրէն —, to send back, to return.

Title: Առաքինագոյն
Definition_1: more or very virtuous; very courageous.

Title: Առաքինագործ
Definition_1: who acts virtuously or bravely; virtuous; courageous.

Title: Առաքինանամ
Definition_1: to labour, to strive, to take pains, to have or show bravery; tu be virtuous.

Title: Առաքինասէր
Definition_1: who loves virtue or bravery, virtuous.

Title: Առաքինարան
Definition_1: place for the practise of virtue or bravery.

Title: Առաքինացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render valiant, to inspire courage; to render virtuous.

Title: Առաքինութիւն
Definition_1: valour, bravery; virtue, probity; goodness; politics, government; conduct, behaviour.

Title: Առաքինուսոյց
Definition_1: who teaches virtue; who is taught by virtue, virtuous.

Title: Առբերեմ
Definition_1: to bring, to carry; to present, to offer.

Title: Առգնեմ
Definition_1: to propose, to set over; to put, to insert; to suppose, to believe.

Title: Առեղծանելի
Definition_1: dissolvable; explicable; that dissolves; that explains.

Title: Առեղծանեմ
Definition_1: to undo; to untie, to dissolve, to ruin; to explain an enigma.

Title: Առեղծուած
Definition_1: dissolution; explication; enigma, proverb; — **** ***, to propose an enigma or charade, to tell a parable, to proverb.

Title: Առեւանգեմ
Definition_1: to rap, to seize, to carry off.

Title: Առեւգնաց առնեմ
Definition_1: to take away, to carry off.

Title: Առէչ
Definition_1: chain (threads stretched lengthwise on a weaver's loom).

Title: Առընթեր
Definition_1: near, next, close, contiguous, nigh, beside; նստել — ումեք, to sit near some one; դիտել —, to observe closely; — ինձ, near me; կալ 'ի սպասու — ումեք, to serve some one; գայ —, he comes near; տուն նորա է — իմումս, his house is close to mine; լինել —, to be near or close; բնակէ նա — այն ինչ պալատի, he lodges quite close to such a palace; — կալ, to attend, to be present, to wait; — դնել, to put, to place near, to join.

Title: Առընկենում
Definition_1: to throw, to push; to despise, to abandon.

Title: Առթեմ
Definition_1: to occasion, to cause, to produce, to engender.

Title: Առժամայն
Definition_2: presently, immediately; soon, forthwith, directly, suddenly; առժամայս, at present, now; for the present.

Title: Առժամայք
Definition_1: the present world, things temporal; the moderns.

Title: Առ ի
Definition_1: to; from; for; by; towards, with respect to; in order to; — նոսա, to them; — մէնջ, from us; — սրբել, in order to purify; — յիշատակ, for the memory, for the remembrance; — չգոյէ, not having, because he had not; — մահ վիրաւորեալ, wounded to death or mortally wounded; — մահ մեղանչել, to commit a deadly sin; — հօրէ, from the father; paternal; — չգիտելոյ, ignorantly; — զարգ, ornamental, by way of ornament.

Title: Առիթ
Definition_1: occasion, opportunity, accurrence; subject, cause, matter, motive, convenience, conjuncture, object.

Title: Առ ի՞մ
Definition_1: why? for what cause or reason ?

Title: Առ ի՞նչ
Definition_1: how ? why ? for what cause ? — իցէ ինձ, no matter to me! what does it matter to me ? — իցեն այն ամենայն, of what use is all that ?

Title: Առիւծ
Definition_1: lion; մատակ —, lionesss; կորիւն առիւծու, lion's whelp, young lion; մռնչիւն՝ մռնչել, roaring, to roar.

Title: Առիւծացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make to become like a lion.

Title: Առլնում
Definition_1: to fill, to fill to the brim, to brim.

Title: Առկախեալ
Definition_1: suspended, in suspense; hung up, pendulous, declivous.

Title: Առկայանամ
Definition_1: to settle, to fix, to determine.

Title: Առկայեմ
Definition_1: to establish, to fix, to constitute.

Title: Առկայծիմ
Definition_1: to flame very little, to be nearly extinguished.

Title: Առհաւատչեայ
Definition_1: earnest, earnest money; pledge, essay, token, sign, testimony.

Title: Առձեռն
Definition_1: ready to the hand, handy, manual, portatif;
Definition_2: in part payment, on account; — տալ, to give in part payment; — բառարան, pocket dictionary.

Title: Առձեռնպատրաստ
Definition_1: prompt, ready; imminent, threatening; evident, clear, manifest; promptly, quickly; — դրամ, ready money, cash.

Title: Առնապատկեր
Definition_1: figure or statue of a man.

Title: Առնեմ
Definition_1: to make, to do, to form, to produce, to compose, to fabric, to operate, to act, to render, to commit, to effectuate, to execute, to cause; — յոչնչէ, to create; — վերստին, to remake; կին —, to marry; ատելի —, to make odious; բարւոք չարւոք առնէք, you do well, — ill; բարի՝ չարիս՝ վնաս — ումեք, to do good, ill, wrong to some one; ինչ ոչ արարի քեզ, I have done nothing to you; զի՛նչ — իցէ զայս, what to do with that ? չգիտեմ որպէս —, I do not know how to do that; չգիտեմ զի՛նչ —, I know not what to do; ձայն — հաւուց, the singing of birds; — ողջակէղ, to sacrifice, to immolate; խնդիր, մոռացումն, յիշատակ, ծառայութիւն, զյարձակումն, դատաստան, վախճան —, to seek; to forget; to remember; to serve; to assail; to judge; to finish or end.

Title: Առնի
Definition_1: virile; — անդամք, genitals, cf. Արութիւն, cf. Պոչ.

Title: Առնութիւն
Definition_1: virile mind, bravery, strength of mind, courage; virtue.

Title: Առնում
Definition_1: to receive, to take, to accept, to admit, to collect, to welcome; to reap, to derive, to gather; to have, to occupy; to take away, to carry off, to ravish, to rob; — վերստին, to retake; — ապտակո, to receive a box on the ear; — զատամունս, to set the teeth on edge; — արմատ, to take root; — զդրունս, to surround, to enclose; - երգս, to sing; ի մէջ —, to encompass; խորհուրդ —, խորհուրդ ի մէջ —, to consult, to deliberate; ի միտ —, to conceive, to comprehend, to understand; to learn by heart; խումբ —, to assemble; մեղս —, to sin, to be culpable; ի բաց —, to substract, to take away; to remove; սուգ —, to mourn, to be afflicted; առիթ —, to take the opportunity, to profit by it; — ընդ կատակս, to take a thing in jest; կասկած —, to suspect; — ի կին, ի կնութիւն, to marry; — ողչոյն հրաժարական, to take leave of, to bid adieu to; — օրինակ, to take example; շունչ —, to breathe; զէն —, to take arms, to arm one's self; մարմին —, to incarnate, to be incarnate; ծագումն —, to take birth, to shoot out; առնոյր առնէր ոք, how I should wish that some one had done it !

Title: Առոգանեմ
Definition_1: to pronounce words regularly; to sprinkle, to wet.

Title: Առողջ
Definition_1: healthy; alive, vivacious; salubrious, wholesome; valid, entire, complete, perfect.

Title: Առողջամիտ
Definition_1: who is in his senses, whose judgement is souud; lively.

Title: Առողջանամ
Definition_1: to be cured, to heal, to recover health.

Title: Առողջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cure, to heal, to restore to health or to life, to resuscitate; — զմիտս, to undeceive.

Title: Առողջութիւն
Definition_1: health, life; salubrity, healthfulness; cure, recovery of health; յ— ձեր, to your health ! հաստանիլ յառողջութեան, to be convalescent, to return in health; քնքուչ, ակար, յեզյեղուկ —, a delicat, feeble, wavering health; պահպանել զ—, to keep one's health; խանգարել —, to destroy, to ruin the health; զօրանալ սակաւ յ—, to be convalescent.

Title: Առոյգաբարձ
Definition_1: whose haunches are young, that has firm hips.

Title: Առոյգանամ
Definition_1: to grow young, to become young again.

Title: Առոյգացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make young, to make look younger.

Title: Առոյգութիւն
Definition_1: youth, bloom, growing young again; prime of life, vigour.

Title: Առու
Definition_1: trench, channel; brook, small stream of water; հեղուլ՝ հոսել —ս արտասուաց, to shed tears profusely.

Title: Առուակարկաչ
Definition_1: that runs like a rivulet with a great noise.

Title: Առումն
Definition_1: taking, reception, capture, possession; acceptation, sense, signification; assumption (in logic); lemma; receipt.

Title: Առպատարաստ
Definition_1: prompt, prepared; — լինել, to be prompt, to prepare one's self.

Title: Առտնին
Definition_1: at home, at one's house; domestic, belonging to the house; familiar; — ուսուցանել, to teach at home; — անկարգութիւնք, family discords; — պատերազմ, civil war; — ճաշել, to dine at home; — իրք, domestic affairs; — հանդերձ, house dress; morning-gown.

Title: Առօրեայ
Definition_1: diurnal; ephemeral; daily; inconstant, uncertain, temporal, perishable.

Title: Ասացած
Definition_1: saying, word, term, expression; proverb; dictate; recital.

Title: Ասեղն
Definition_1: needle; ծակ ասղան, eye of a -; մագնիսեալ —, magnetic; անցուցանել դերձան ընդ ծակ ասղան, to thread a -.

Title: Ասեմ
Definition_1: to say, to express, to speak, to relate, to recite, to tell, to recount, to declave, to pronounce, to utter, to dictate; — յառաջագոյն, to foretell; — վերստին, to repeat; բարիս՝ չարիս — զումեքէ, to speak well, badly of a person; ասա՜ ինձ, tell me; պարտ է —, one must say; որպէս ասացաք, as we have said; համառօտ —, briefly, in one word; չգիտեմ զի՞նչ —, I know not what to say; զի՞նչ ասիցեն զքէն, what will they say of you ? անհիմն է զոր ասեսդ, what you say is without foundation; չգիտէ զոր ինչ ասէ, he does not know what he says; ցանգ զնոյն —, to repeat always the same thing; — զկարծիս իւր զիմեքէ, to give one's opinion on some thing; սուտ —, to tell falsehoods or lies; — զճշմարտութիւն, to speak the truth; այո՝ ոչ —, to say yes, no; զի՞նչ կամիցի — այս, what does that mean ? այլ զի՞նչ ասեմս, but what do I say ? ըստ ասելոյ իւրաքանչիւր, as every one says; — ընդ միտս, to say to one's self; զայս իրրեւ ասաց, when he has said that, at these words; զայս ասացեալ, that said.

Title: Ասղանի
Definition_1: needleful, thread, string; անցուցանել զ— ընդ ծակ ասղան, to thread a needle.

Title: Ասղնագործեմ
Definition_1: to embroider; to purfle or purflew.

Title: Ասուն
Definition_1: that is endowed with the faculty of speaking, reasonable, gifted with reason.

Title: Ասպազէն
Definition_1: iron armour, horse armour; trooper, horseman;

Title: Ասպատակ
Definition_1: straggler, marauder; inroad, incursion; — ծովու, corsair, pirate, sea-robber; — առնել՝ դնել՝ տալ՝ արձակել՝ սփռել, to go marauding, to infest, cf. Ասպատակել, cf. Արշաւել.

Title: Ասպատակեմ
Definition_1: to go marauding, to go plundering, to plunder, to infest.

Title: Ասպատակութիւն
Definition_1: cruise, excursion, incursion, descent, irruption, marauding, plundering; — ի ծովու, piracy.

Title: Ասպարաբեկ
Definition_1: fragment of a shield; small shield.

Title: Ասպարափակ
Definition_1: surrounded, protected by shields or bucklers.

Title: Ասպարէզ
Definition_1: career, course, horse-race; furlong; field, place, area, arena; — ըմբշամարտութիւն, wrestling place; դիմել, իջանել, խոյանալ, ելանել յ—, to throw self, to brave, to descend, to fling, to rush, to hurl in the arena.

Title: Ասպարընկէց
Definition_1: who throws away, who abandons his shield or buckler.

Title: Աստ
Definition_1: here, in this place; — է, he or it is here; — եւ անդ, here and there, this way, that way.

Title: Աստանդական
Definition_1: wandering, vagrant, vagabond; — շրջիլ, cf. Աստանդիմ.

Title: Աստանդեմ
Definition_1: to lead about, to lead np and down, to walk about.

Title: Աստանդիմ
Definition_1: to rove, to ramble, to wander.

Title: Աստեղաբան
Definition_1: astronomer; astrologer, observer of the stars.

Title: Աստեղազարդ
Definition_1: full of stars, starry, studded with stars.

Title: Աստեղազարդեմ
Definition_1: to decorate, to stud with stars.

Title: Աստեղանիշ
Definition_1: starlike, that has the shape of a star;

Title: Աստի
Definition_1: hence, thence; here; this, present; գնասցուք —, come let us go hence; — սկսանի թագաւորութիւնն Արշակայ, here begins the reign of Arsaces; — առ յապայ, henceforward; ի մարդոյ —, from this man; ի տանէ —, from this house; — կեանք, this life, the present life; — եւ անտի, here and there, on each side.

Title: Աստի
Definition_1: present life, world, temporal things; youth, young people, yonng folks; vigour, force, freshness;
Definition_2: firm, sure; vehement, impetuous, strong; յ—ս մանկութեան, in the flower of age; յ—ս երիտասարդութեան, in all the vigour of youth.

Title: Աստիճան
Definition_1: stair, step; pace; stair-case; steps; gradation; graduation; story; degree, dignity, character, class, condition, honour, place; quality, rank; — եկեղեցական, holy orders; հոսիլ ընդ —ս ի վայր, to run down stairs; տալ —, բաժանել յ—ս, to graduate.

Title: Աստիճանեմ
Definition_1: to graduate; to ascend gradually, to go by degrees.

Title: Աստղ
Definition_1: star; asterisk; — գիշերոյ, star of night, the moon; — տուընջեան, star of day, the sun; — առաւօտին, morning-star, Venus, Lucifer; — սլացեալ, թռիչ —, shooting, flying star; բեւեռային, հաստատուն —, polar, fixed star.

Title: Աստղագուշակ
Definition_1: that is announced by a star; prognosticator.

Title: Աստղակերպ
Definition_1: that has the form of a star.

Title: Աստուածաբանեմ
Definition_1: to write, to discourse or speak theologically.

Title: Աստուածաբուն
Definition_1: that partakes of the nature of God, that belongs to God, divine.

Title: Աստուածագէտ
Definition_1: who has the knowledge of God.

Title: Աստուածագնաց
Definition_1: who walks in the ways of God.

Title: Աստուածագործ
Definition_1: made by God; that consecrates, that causes God to descend; divine, sacred.

Title: Աստուածազարդ
Definition_1: adorned by God, or with the grace of God.

Title: Աստուածազգեաց
Definition_1: that bears god; carried by God.

Title: Աստուածազօր
Definition_1: strengthened by God; who has divine strength.

Title: Աստուածախնամ
Definition_1: cared for by God; — տեսչութիւն, divine Providence.

Title: Աստուածախումբ
Definition_1: brought together by the inspiration of God.

Title: Աստուածախօս
Definition_1: who speaks of God; declared by God.

Title: Աստուածախօսեմ
Definition_1: to speak, to discourse of God or with God; to talk divinely.

Title: Աստուածախօսութիւն
Definition_1: discourse of God or with God; theology.

Title: Աստուածածագ
Definition_1: produced by, born of or proceeding from God.

Title: Աստուածածանօթ
Definition_1: who has the knowledge of God.

Title: Աստուածակամ
Definition_1: willed by God, agreeable to God.

Title: Աստուածակեաց
Definition_1: who lives with God or according to the will of God.

Title: Աստուածակերպ
Definition_1: godlike, in the form of God, divinely.

Title: Աստուածակից
Definition_1: that participates in the divine nature or grace.

Title: Աստուածակոխ
Definition_1: where God has walked or placed his foot.

Title: Աստուածակոչ
Definition_1: called by God; where Godwas invited.

Title: Աստուածահաշտ
Definition_1: that calms or appeases the anger of God.

Title: Աստուածահրաշ
Definition_1: done by a miracle or divinely.

Title: Աստուածաճառ
Definition_1: declared by God; who discourses of God.

Title: Աստուածամարտ
Definition_1: that wars against Heaven, that is repugnant to God; յ— մատչել, to declare against Heaven.

Title: Աստուածամուխ
Definition_1: who is profoundly learned or versed in divine things; who is familiar with God; hardened by God.

Title: Աստուածային
Definition_1: divine, belonging to God; sacred, pious.

Title: Աստուածայնութիւն
Definition_1: state of a divine or sacred thing.

Title: Աստուածանամ
Definition_1: to make one's self God; to become God; to unite one's self, to join one's self to God; to resemble God.

Title: Աստուածաշնորհ
Definition_1: given by God; full of the grace of God.

Title: Աստուածաշունչ
Definition_1: inspired by God, divine, holy; Bible, holy Scripture.

Title: Աստուածաչարչար
Definition_1: who has caused God to suffer; who holds the doctrine that God is amenable to suffer.

Title: Աստուածապաշտ
Definition_1: who worships God, pious, religious, devout, spiritual.

Title: Աստուածապատիւ
Definition_1: honoured hy God, who has divine honour.

Title: Աստուածապատում
Definition_1: who relates, narrates, speaks of God.

Title: Աստուածասաստ
Definition_1: chastised by God; that comes of divine wrath.

Title: Աստուածասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of God, piety, religion, devotion.

Title: Աստուածասնունդ
Definition_1: cherished by God; brought up in the fear of God.

Title: Աստուածասպան
Definition_1: that has put God to death.

Title: Աստուածատես
Definition_1: that has seen, that sees God.

Title: Աստուածարեալ
Definition_1: strengthened by God; friend of God or familiar with God; divine, holy; — հայրապետ, holy pontiff.

Title: Աստուածացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make a god of any thing, to deify, to admit into the number of gods, to idolize.

Title: Աստուածացուցիչ
Definition_1: that makes a god of any thing; that deifies.

Title: Աստուածաւանդ
Definition_1: given, transmitted or taught by God.

Title: Աստուածափախոյց
Definition_1: that drives away, that causes God to remove far off; unpleasant to God.

Title: Աստուածընկալ
Definition_1: that has received God; received or accepted of God, agreeable to God.

Title: Աստուածիմաստ
Definition_1: that has the wisdom of God, instructed by heaven.

Title: Աստուածունակ
Definition_1: that has received or embraced God.

Title: Աստուածուստ
Definition_1: heavenly, by God, of God, divinely.

Title: Աստուածպաշտութիւն
Definition_1: piety, religion, love or worship of God.

Title: Ատակ
Definition_1: clever, capable; — լինել, to be capable, cf. Ատակել.

Title: Ատակեմ
Definition_1: to be capable, to be clever.

Title: Ատամն
Definition_1: tooth; պարք, շարք ատամանց, set, row of teeth; յօրինել ատամունս, to indent; խորտակել, փշրել զատամունս, to break the teeth, to notch, to break off; — ածել, bite; առնուլ ատամանց, to set the teeth on edge; հանել զ—, to extract or draw out a tooth; ցաւ ատամանց, tooth-ache; ցաւէ — իմ, I have the toothache; փուտ —, carious tooth; մաքրել զատամունս, to brush or clean the teeth; կրճտել զատամունս, to gnash, to show the teeth.

Title: Ատամնաթափ
Definition_2: toothless; — լինիմ, to lose the teeth.

Title: Ատամնախիլ առնեմ
Definition_1: to extract or draw out a tooth.

Title: Ատամնաձեւ
Definition_1: denticulated, notched, indented; — գործել, to notch, to break a piece off.

Title: Ատամնառու
Definition_1: that sets the teeth on edge.

Title: Ատամնավէր
Definition_1: bit or bitten; — առնել, to bite, to wound with the teeth.

Title: Ատեան
Definition_1: tribunal, court, audience, auditory, assembly of judges, seat, bar; magistrate; senate; յ— մատնել, to call before a tribunal or council; գումարել զ—, to convoke, to call together an assembly.

Title: Ատելի
Definition_1: hateful, odious; tiresome, disagreeable, unpleasant; that bears hatred, malevolent.

Title: Ատելութիւն
Definition_1: hate, aversion, horrour, rancour, enmity, dislike.

Title: Ատեմ
Definition_1: to hate, to abhor, to detest; to become tired of, to take a dislike to.

Title: Ատենաբանեմ
Definition_1: to harangue, to speak in public, to declaim.

Title: Ատենական
Definition_1: that belongs to courts of justice, judicial; public, oratorical;

Title: Ատենաքարշ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be surnmoned before a tribunal.

Title: Ատոք
Definition_1: full, fat, abundant, fertile; — հառկ, eared, an ear (of corn).

Title: Ատոքանամ
Definition_1: to fill, to be full, fertile or fat.

Title: Ատոքատեսիլ
Definition_1: cf. Ատոք; — հասկք, yel low ear (of corn).

Title: Ատոքացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fill, to make full or fat.

Title: Արագ
Definition_1: quick, prompt, dexterous, nimble; rapid, swift; expeditious; frequent;
Definition_2: quickly, promptly, adroitly, swiftly, speedily; արագ արագ, very quickly, very soon, cf. Անյապաղ.

Title: Արագաբանութիւն
Definition_1: quickness of speech, verbosity; facility of expression.

Title: Արագագնաց
Definition_1: that walks or goes quick, swift, rapid.

Title: Արագազ
Definition_1: toil, net to catch animals; cf. Ցանց; cf. Վարմ.

Title: Արագաթեւ
Definition_1: that flies fast, winged, swift, rapid, nimble, prompt.

Title: Արագալուր
Definition_1: that hears, understands easily or readily; that has fine ears.

Title: Արագախամուր
Definition_1: that fades, withers or dries soon.

Title: Արագահաս
Definition_1: that happens, arrives or comes quickly.

Title: Արագաշարժ
Definition_1: that moves quick, light, active, nimble, quick, dexterous.

Title: Արագավախճան
Definition_1: that is soon ended or dead.

Title: Արագեմ
Definition_1: to hurry ones self, to hasten, to be diligent.

Title: Արագեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to hasten, to press, to accelerate, to dispatch.

Title: Արագութիւն
Definition_1: celerity, velocity, acceleration, rapidity, nimbleness, swiftness, speed.

Title: Արածդէմ
Definition_1: marked or pitted with the small pox.

Title: Արածեմ
Definition_1: to graze, to pasture, to keep, to take care of; — զհողմս, to cherish vain hopes, to build castles in the air.

Title: Արական
Definition_2: masculine; —ք, cf. Առականք; —թիւ, odd; — or արեկան, jaundice.

Title: Արահետ
Definition_1: public; — ճանապարհ, պողոտայ, road much frequented, thoroughfare.

Title: Արամբի
Definition_1: married woman; — առնել, to impregnate, to violate.

Title: Արատ
Definition_1: spot, stain, blemish; vice, fault, defect; sign, natural mark; blot, disgrace; յ— հայել, to regard amorously or indecently.

Title: Արատահայեաց
Definition_1: that regards indecently or amorously, immodest.

Title: Արատաւորութիւն
Definition_1: stain, contamination; vice, defect, imperfection; deficiency.

Title: Արատեմ
Definition_1: to spot, to stain, to soil, to spoil, to blot, to vitiate, to contaminate.

Title: Արար
Definition_1: act, action, fact, deed, work; production, creation; —ք երեւելի, exploit, achievement.

Title: Արարած
Definition_1: creature, created being; creation; generation; work, deed, action.

Title: Արարածապատում
Definition_1: who writes the creation of the world (Moses).

Title: Արարատեան
Definition_1: of Ararat; — թագաւորութիւն, the kingdom of Armenia.

Title: Արարողութիւն
Definition_1: rite, ceremony; — պատարագի or պատարագամատոյց, liturgy.

Title: Արարուած
Definition_1: action; work, deed; an act of theatre.

Title: Արարչագիր
Definition_1: written by the hand or by the inspiration of the creator.

Title: Արարչադիր
Definition_1: established or ordained by the creator.

Title: Արարչական
Definition_1: that belongs to the creator; that creates; efficient, plastic.

Title: Արարչակերտ
Definition_1: made or constructed by the creator.

Title: Արարչակիր
Definition_1: that has carried or carries the creator.

Title: Արարչատես
Definition_1: that has seen the creator; that is seen by the creator.

Title: Արարչատիպ
Definition_1: that resembles the creator, that is made after the image of the creator.

Title: Արաց
Definition_1: sixth ancient month of the Armenians.

Title: Արբանեկեմ
Definition_1: to serve; — ցանկութեանց, to be the slave of one's passions.

Title: Արբանեկութիւն
Definition_1: service; — հարկանեմ, cf. Սպասաւորեմ, cf. Ծառայեմ.

Title: Արբեալ
Definition_1: drunk, inebriated, intoxicated; գան —, whipped, beaten with a stick.

Title: Արբենամ
Definition_1: to get drunk, to intoxicate, to drink to excess.

Title: Արբեցութիւն
Definition_1: drunkenness, intoxication, inebriation; — ախտից, intoxication of the passions; — հրճուանաց, transport of joy; զմայլել արբեցութեամբ, to enjoy drunkenness.

Title: Արբեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to intoxicate, to inebriate; to soak, to make drink.

Title: Արբշռութիւն
Definition_1: drunkenness, inebriation; յ— հատանել, to intoxicate, to get drunk, tipsy.

Title: Արբունք
Definition_1: puberty, age of puberty; յարբունս հասանել, to attain the age of puberty, to grow; յարբունս հասեալ, adult, pubescent, marriageable.

Title: Արբուցանեմ
Definition_1: to give to drink, to soak; to water, to steep.

Title: Արբուցումն
Definition_1: the act of making one drink; tbe act of watering.

Title: Արգահատեմ
Definition_1: to have pity or compassion, to grieve, to console, to comfort; to conjure, to entreat, to demand, to intercede.

Title: Արգահատութիւն
Definition_1: compassion, care; consolation, comfort; prayer, supplication, intercession.

Title: Արգանդ
Definition_1: matrix, womb, belly, bosom; abdomen; փող, անցք —ի, vagina.

Title: Արգասիք
Definition_1: fruit, production; benediction, grace, favour; effect, work.

Title: Արգել
Definition_1: binderance, obstacle, opposition, impediment, embarrassment, difficulty, delay, obstruction; encumbrance; prohibition, forbiddance, inhibition, interdiction; arrest; detention, prison; contrary, opposing; — եկեղեցական, interdict; — առնել՝ արկանել՝ լինել, to arrest, to hinder, to contradict, to oppose, to embarrass, cf. Արգելուլ, cf. Խափանել; յ— արկանել, to arrest, to imprison, to immure, to encloister, cf. Շրջափակել, cf. Շրջապատել.

Title: Արգելան
Definition_1: arrest, detention, prison; lazaretto, quarantine; դնել յ—ս, to arrest, to imprison.

Title: Արգելում
Definition_1: to hinder, to obstruct, to arrest; to close, to shut, to enclose; to sequester, to hold, to imprison; to forbid, to interdict, to prohibit; to amuse, to occupy; to interrupt, to disturb.

Title: Արգելումն
Definition_1: forbiddance, prohibition, interdiction; retention, hinderance; եկեղեցական —, interdict.

Title: Արգոյ
Definition_1: important, considerable; efficacious; working; — օր, a working day.

Title: Արդ
Definition_1: now; accordingly; at present, now, presently, recently, lately; — իսկ, just now; directly, newly, very lately.

Title: Արդար
Definition_1: just, upright, faithful, honest, loyal, well disposed, worthy, equitable, reasonable, legitimate;

Title: Արդարագործութիւն
Definition_1: justice, equity, integrity, probity; justification, act of justifying.

Title: Արդարախոհ
Definition_1: that thinks justly, that is just, equitable in his judgement.

Title: Արդարակշիռ
Definition_1: who weighs, judges equitably, just, equitable.

Title: Արդարանամ
Definition_1: to justify one's self, to prove one's innocence; to be justified.

Title: Արդարապէս
Definition_1: justly, equitably, deservedly, rightly, fitly, exactly.

Title: Արդարավճիռ
Definition_1: sentenced or judged equitably; who sentences justly.

Title: Արդարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to justify, to declare innocent, to acquit, to excuse, to exculpate, to clear, to absolve, to save; — զանձն, to make excuses; —ն, justification.

Title: Արդարեւ
Definition_1: truly, in truth, certainly, surely, yes, yes truly, yes indeed, really.

Title: Արդարութիւն
Definition_1: justice, equity, right, uprightness, loyalty, fidelity; rectitude, reason.

Title: Արդեօք
Definition_1: perhaps, never, if, not, still, even; certainly, undoubtedly, indeed; կամիք —, will you ? ոչ կարեմ —, I Cannot; այնչափ իմաստուն է, որպիսի ոչ ոք —, he is as learned as any one; չգիտեմ արարից — թէ ոչ, I know not whether I shall do it or not ? հարցանէք թէ — սիրեցեմ զձեզ, you ask if I love you? մի —, God forbid !

Title: Արդի
Definition_1: present, new, recent, modern; — ծնեալ, newly born; —ք, the moderns.

Title: Արդիւնանամ
Definition_1: to be carried into effect, to produce some effect or fruit.

Title: Արդիւնատրեմ
Definition_1: to fructify, to bear fruit, to make a favourable impression, to be advantageous.

Title: Արդիւնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make useful or fruitful, to produce, to fructify; to effect, to execute, to complete.

Title: Արդիւնք
Definition_1: production, fruit, utility; work; merit; deed, effect, operation; price; reality;
Definition_2: արդեամբք, in effect, really, actually, positively; յարդիւնս ածել, to effect, to execute, to fulfil; բանքն — լինէին, the words were fulfilled, realized; իրացն իսկ — աղաղակեն եւ վկայեն, the actions speak for themselves; — իրաց, experience; յարդեանց իրացն, by experience.

Title: Արդկեմ
Definition_1: to polish up; — զկտաւիս, to iron linen.

Title: Անդնընկէց
Definition_1: tilter; — լինել, to tilt; — խաղարկութիւն, joust, tournament.

Title: Արդու
Definition_1: artabe, epha, (an ancient measure of the capacity of 65 litres).

Title: Արեգ
Definition_1: sun; the eighth ancient month of the Armenians;
Definition_2: — քաղաք, city of the sun, Heliopolis; յ— կուսէ, on the eastern side.

Title: Արեգակնաճեմ
Definition_1: where the sun shoots or enters, bright; solar.

Title: Արեգակնատես
Definition_1: where the sun shines or shoots, luminous, clear.

Title: Արեգակնափայլ
Definition_1: shining like the sun, brilliant, resplendent, clear.

Title: Արենակից
Definition_1: of the same blood, consanguineous, kindred, relation.

Title: Արեւ
Definition_1: sun; light; life, day; յ—ու գալ, to come in broad, day-light, to come before the sun sets; յ—ն երգնուլ, to swear by one's days or life; զքաղցր —ն յաչաց հանել, ղրկել յ—է, to deprive of light, to blind; յ—է արկանել, զ— հատանել, to murder, to kill; to lose one's life; ի մտանել —ու, the setting of the sun; յելանել, ի ծագել —ու, the rising of the sun; ըմպել յ— ուրուք, to drink to the health of some one, to toast; մուտք, ելք —ու, sun set or – down, sun rise.

Title: Արեւելաժառանդ
Definition_1: conqueror or master of the eastern regions.

Title: Արեւելանշան
Definition_1: that has appeared or shone in the East.

Title: Արեւելեայ
Definition_1: Oriental; —ք, արեւելիք, the orientals; the eastern regions.

Title: Արեւելեան
Definition_1: oriental, eastern; հողմն —, east-wind; երկիր, կողմն —, East, eastern region.

Title: Արեւելք
Definition_1: East; sun rise; eastern regions, the orientals; դարձուցանել յարեւելս, to set towards the East; կորուսանել, շփոթել զարեւելս, to turn from the East.

Title: Արեւմուտք
Definition_1: West sun set; the western nations; յարեւմուտս կոյս, westerly, towards the west.

Title: Արեւմտեայ
Definition_1: west; —ք, the western nations, cf. Արեւմուտք.

Title: Արեւմտեան
Definition_1: westerly, western, west; հողմն —, west, westerly wind; կողմն —, west, western region.

Title: Արեւշատութիւն
