Definition_1: health; toast; ըմպել յ— ուրուք, to give toast, to drink to the health of some one.

Title: Արեւորդիք
Definition_1: sons or worshippers of the sun.

Title: Արթնութիւն
Definition_1: watch; want of sleep; vigilance, diligence, precaution, care.

Title: Արթուն
Definition_1: watchful, that does not sleep; alert, lively, vigilant, diligent, careful; — կալ, to watch, cf. Տքնել, cf. Հսկել, cf. Սկել, cf. Արթնանալ, cf. Զարթնուլ; քուն ընդ —ս լինիմ, to doze, to drowse, to be half asleep.

Title: Արժան
Definition_2: dignity; right, equity, justice; —է, it suits, it befits, it is necessary; ոչ է —, it is not just, necessary, convenient; — համարել, to judge worthy; to deign; ոչ — համարիլ, to disdain, to judge unworthy; — ինչ էր, was it necessary ? — եւ իրաւ է, it is just to, fit; յարժանս ou — տալ կաճառել՝ գնել, to give, to sell, to buy cheap or cheaply.

Title: Արժանահաւատ
Definition_1: credible, wo thy of being believed, faithful, worthy to be trusted or believed.

Title: Արժանանամ
Definition_1: to be worthy, to deserve, to make one's self worthy.

Title: Արժանապատիւ
Definition_1: worthy of honour, honourable, that deserves respect, respectable.

Title: Արժանապատուութիւն
Definition_1: dignity, eminent quality, greatness, honour, character.

Title: Արժանաւորեմ
Definition_1: to deserve, to render worthy; to obtain, to procure.

Title: Արժանափառ
Definition_1: worthy of glory, that deserves to be glorified.

Title: Արժանեմ
Definition_1: — արժան, to coin, to mint; to stamp, to impress.

Title: Արժանընդունակ
Definition_1: that is worthy of being received or granted, agreeable.

Title: Արժանի
Definition_1: worthy, that deserves something; just, convenient, suitable, decent, proper; — համարել, to deign; գնալ —, to go worthily, conformably;
Definition_2: — ըստ արժանւոյն, յարժանի, worthily, justly, suitably, cf. Արժանապէս;
Definition_3: — լինել, to be worthy, to deserve;
Definition_4: — առնել, cf. Արժանաւորեմ.

Title: Արժեմ
Definition_1: to cost, to amount, to stand in; to be worth; հաւասար —, to be equivalent.

Title: Արժեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to estimate, to price, to value.

Title: Արի
Definition_1: valiant, valorous, courageous, manly, strong, bold, intrepid, brave; Արիք, the Persians.

Title: Արիաբար
Definition_1: valiantly, valorously, courageously, manly, bravely, strongly, vigorously; resolutely, generously, magnanimously.

Title: Արիական
Definition_1: masculine, manly, strong; valiant, courageous; — ազդ, the Persian nation.

Title: Արիանամ
Definition_1: to have courage, energy, to be strong, to be notable for courage.

Title: Արիացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to encourage, to embolden, to strengthen.

Title: Արիութիւն
Definition_1: valour, courage, bravery, boldness, firmness, steadiness.

Title: Արիւն
Definition_1: blood, kin; — խաղողոյ, unpressed wine, must, wine; արեամբ ներկել՝ շաղախել, to imbrue with blood, to spot with blood; — հեղուլ, to shed blood, to kill, to wound; — հանել, to bleed; հոսումն արեան, hemorrhage; կցորդ արեան, who sheds blood with another, consanguineous, of the same blood, related; cf. Ապաժոյժ.

Title: Արիւնագոյն
Definition_1: of a blood colour, red, sanguine.

Title: Արիւնախանձ
Definition_1: bloody, bloodthirsty, sanguinary, cruel, that delights in shedding human blood; that loves blood.

Title: Արիւնակալ
Definition_1: vessel to hold blood, cup of libation.

Title: Արիւնային
Definition_1: sanguine, that abounds in blood, sanguineous.

Title: Արիւնանամ
Definition_1: to be turned or changed into blood; to become rod.

Title: Արիւնորակ
Definition_1: having the colour of blood, sanguine, red.

Title: Արիւնռուշտ
Definition_1: bloody, full of blood; sanguinary, bloodthirsty.

Title: Արծաթ
Definition_1: silver; coin, money, species; —ոյ տալ, վաճառել, to sell for ready money; քերել զ—, to take or wear the silver off; անօթ —ոյ, a silver vase.

Title: Արծաթագոյն
Definition_1: silvery, having the colour of silver.

Title: Արծաթազօծեմ
Definition_1: to silver, to plate, to wash with silver.

Title: Արծաթածրար
Definition_1: that hides or has hidden the money.

Title: Արծաթաձոյլ
Definition_2: melted or mado with silver; that is entirely of silver.

Title: Արծաթառու
Definition_1: that has received or borrowed money.

Title: Արծաթասէր
Definition_1: that loves money, avaricious, covetous, too fond of money.

Title: Արծաթափայլ
Definition_1: shining or polished like silver, silvery, having the colour of silver.

Title: Արծարծանեմ
Definition_1: to stir, to poke, to blow the fire; to incense, to animate, to irritate; to revive, to renovate, to renew.

Title: Արծուէնշան
Definition_1: that has the sign of an eagle;

Title: Արծուի
Definition_1: eagle; ձագ արծուոյ, eaglet; էգ —, eagless.

Title: Արկած
Definition_1: misfortune, disaster, calamity, mischance, mishap, danger, peril, risk, hazard, chance, adversity, storm, tempest, evil.

Title: Արկանելի
Definition_1: clothing, dress, apparel; cloak; that throws, that puts, that pours.

Title: Արկանեմ
Definition_1: to cast, to throw, to shoot; to put away, to reject; to reduce to, to bring to; to sow, to scatter, to spread; to pour out, to shed; to mix; ի մէջ — զանձն, to intermeddle, to intrude, to enter; — ի մէջ ի ներքս, to thrust in, to introduce, to mix; — ի միտս, to insinuate; — զանձն ընդ, ի ներքոյ, to undergo; — զիւրեւ, զանձամբ, to endorse, to put on one's back; to put on, to dress one's self; — աղիւս, to make brieks; — զկալ, to winnow corn; — ողորմութիւն, to pity; ընդ յեսան, ընդ սրոց —, to whet, to sharpen; — ընդ սղոցաւ, to saw; — ջուր, to pour water; գութս —, to pity; խունկ —, to cense, to perfume with incense; ի խնդիր —, to seek, to trouble one's self to find; ձայն —, to cry, to scream, to shriek; վարձս, սակ —, to bargain, to make an agreement, to contract; վիճակ —, to cast or draw lots; ի կիր, ի վար, ի գործ —, to use, to employ, to make use of; ձեռն —, to undertake; — ընդ տարակուսանօք, to make doubtful, to doubt; — ի մոռացօնս, to forget; — զանձն ի վատնգ, to place one's self in danger; — ի յուսահատութիւն, to reduce to despair.

Title: Արկանիմ
Definition_1: to throw ones self, to fall; to dress one's self.

Title: Արկղ
Definition_1: chest; caisson; trunk, box; դնել յարկեղ, to pack up, to put in a chest; հանել յարկեղէ, to unpack.

Title: Արկղագործ
Definition_1: trunk maker, box-maker; made like a box or trunk.

Title: Արհամարհ
Definition_1: despicable, contemptible, vile, abject, low, poor, sorry.

Title: Արհամարհեմ
Definition_1: to despise, to repulse, to disdain; to aggrieve, to offend; to vex; to debase.

Title: Արհամարհութիւն
Definition_1: contempt, disdain, abjection, shame; vexation, offence, humiliation.

Title: Արհաւիրք
Definition_1: fright, terrour, great and sudden fear, dread, consternation, shock.

Title: Արձագանգ
Definition_1: echo; resound, repercussion; — տալ, to echo.

Title: Արձակ
Definition_1: free, loose, untied; open, unsealed; vast, spacious; ample; licentious, rash, dissolute, debauched, unbridled; prosaic; — բան, prose; — համարձակ, boldly, frankly; — —, freely.

Title: Արձակաքայլ
Definition_1: free, that goes without hinderance, freely.

Title: Արձակեմ
Definition_1: to untie, to loosen, to detach, to break; to unchain, to slacken; to unpack, to unfold; to unload, to deliver; to dispatch, to expedite, to send; to release, to let go; to relax; to throw, to thrust, to fling, to shoot; to discharge, to disband, to dismiss; — ի մեղաց, to absolve; — քարինս պարսատկաւ, to sling; ձայն —, to scream, to cry; աչս —, to ogle, to cast eyes on; — ճառագայթս, to cast a brilliancy, to shine; բոցս, կայծակունս —, to sparkle; կիցս —, to fling, to yerk; նետս —, to draw the bow; հրացան —, to let off a gun; հրետ —, to fire a cannon; — զկին, to divorce; — զատեան, to dismiss the session; — զոք, to dismiss a person; փուք —, to fart, to break wind.

Title: Արձակիմ
Definition_1: to be untied, delivered, detached, liberated.

Title: Արձակումն
Definition_1: deliverance; shoot; disbanding troops; dismission; —ի մեղաց, absolution; — հրացանի, discharge; — կնոջ, divorce.

Title: Արձան
Definition_1: column; statue, figure, image, idol; instrument, writing; Հերակլեան —ք, the pillars of Hercules; կալ — անմոռաց, to become an eternal monument.

Title: Արձանագիր
Definition_1: inscription, title; epitaph; trophy, protocol; matriculation.

Title: Արձանագրեմ
Definition_1: to inscribe, to write; to enrol, to check; to register; to record, to draw deeds; to enter a will.

Title: Արձանագրութիւն
Definition_1: acts, registers; enrolment, writing, deed, book, roll, record, protocol; inscription; account, list, memorial; calendar of the ancient Romans.

Title: Արձանանամ
Definition_1: to become like a statue, to be firm, fixed; to stop; to stand, to stand upright.

Title: Արձանացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to convert into a statue; to raise, to erect; to establish; to exhibit, to represent; to inscribe, to write; to register, to record.

Title: Արմ
Definition_1: stump, root; stem, set, block, chump; առ արմամբ խլել, to eradicate; առ արմին դնել, to place near the root.

Title: Արմանամ
Definition_1: to be benumbed; to be stunned; to be astonished.

Title: Արմատ
Definition_1: root; stump; trunk, stem; source, origin, cause; —ս առնուլ, արձակել, to take root.

Title: Արմատախլեմ
Definition_1: to eradicate, to pull up, to extirpate.

Title: Արմատանամ
Definition_1: to take root, to take hold, to grow.

Title: Արմատաքի
Definition_1: rootedly, radically; — խլել, to pull up by the roots, to eradicate, to displant, to grub up; — խլումն, eradication.

Title: Արմաւենի
Definition_1: palm-tree, date-tree; palm; branch of a palm-tree, palm; իւղ արմաւենւոյ, palm-oil.

Title: Արմուկն
Definition_1: elbow; fore-arm; խթել արմկամբ, մղել, to elbow, to push or thrust with the elbow.

Title: Արշալոյս
Definition_1: dawn, daybreak, twilight, aurora; cf. Արշալուրշք.

Title: Արշաւան
Definition_1: course; erruption, invasion, incursion, excursion, descent; expedition; —ք ձիոյ, league (four kilometres, two and a half English miles), cf. Ասպարէս.

Title: Արշաւեմ
Definition_1: to run; to go quick and with impetuosity, to run as fast as possible; to gallop; to make an incursion or excursion, to pursue; cf. Արշաւեմ.

Title: Արշաւեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to gallop, to cause to gallop; to make run; to force one to make an excursion, invasion.

Title: Արուարձանեայք
Definition_1: inhabitants of a suburb; outskirts, suburbs.

Title: Արուեստ
Definition_1: art, trade, profession, study, condition, office; artifice, expedient, means, invention, ingenuity; sign, miracle; գեղեցիկ ազատական մեքենական —ք, the liberal, mechanical, fine arts.

Title: Արուեստագիտութիւն
Definition_1: knowledge of arts; state of one skilled in the arts; qualification to become rmyster, skil-fulness.

Title: Արուեստական
Definition_1: technical, artificial; artful; factitious; skilful; musical; musician, composer; music, symphony.

Title: Արուեստակեմ
Definition_1: to make with art or cunning; to invent, to affect, to pry into.

Title: Արուեստակիտուած
Definition_2: embroidered with art; delicately painted in miniature.

Title: Արուեստակից
Definition_1: companion, associate in the same art.

Title: Արուեստապետ
Definition_1: master of arts, foreman, overseer; chief artist.

Title: Արուեստասէր
Definition_1: industrious, who works diligently, skilful, ingenious, artful.

Title: Արուեստաւորեմ
Definition_1: to make with art; to invent, to find.

Title: Արութիւն
Definition_1: virility, manhood; courage, valour; fortitude, virtue; male sex; seed of man.

Title: Արջ
Definition_1: bear; — մատակ, she-bear; կորիւն արջու or արչուկ, bear's cub.

Title: Արջառամորթ
Definition_1: skin or hide of an ox.

Title: Արջնազգեստ
Definition_1: dressed in a black or dark coat.

Title: Արջնատես
Definition_1: dull, dark, black, gloomy, sad, melancholy.

Title: Արտ
Definition_1: field, piece of arable land, soil.

Title: Արտադրութիւն
Definition_1: production, generation, reproduction; expression; - հագւատոյ, creed.

Title: Արտալածեմ
Definition_1: to drive out, to banish, to exile.

Title: Արտայայտեմ
Definition_1: to declare, to express, to utter.

Title: Արտաշիկագոյն
Definition_1: very or more ardent, much inflamed.

Title: Արտաշիկանամ
Definition_1: to become ardent or red, to catch fire, to inflame.

Title: Արտաշնչեմ
Definition_1: to expire, to die; to exhale; to exude, to perspire, to transpire.

Title: Արտասանեմ
Definition_1: to pronounce, to utter, to articulate, to sound, to recite.

Title: Արտասուաբեր
Definition_1: that causes, produces tears, that weeps.

Title: Արտասուագին
Definition_1: me ting in tears, all in tears, weeping; lamentably.

Title: Արտասուակից
Definition_1: that weeps with, that partecipates in the sorrow of another; — լինիմ, to weep together; to console.

Title: Արտասուեմ
Definition_1: to weep, to shed tears; to lament, to groan, to complain; to deplore.

Title: Արտասուք
Definition_1: tears, lamentation; յարտասուս, հարկանել, լուծանել, to melt in tears; արտասուօք, with tears; ջերմ արտասուս իջուցանել, լալ ջերմ արտասուօք, to cry bitterly; աչք յարտասուս, with tears in the eyes; արտասուօքս թանալ ոռոգել, to water with tears; — հոսէին յաչաց նորա, the tears ran from his eyes; սրբել զարտասուս յաչաց, to dry one's tears.

Title: Արտավար
Definition_1: husbandman; ground for tillage, arable land.

Title: Արտափայլեմ
Definition_1: to shine, to sparkle, to be resplendent; to glitter.

Title: Արտաքնայարդար
Definition_1: that is only outwardly clean, false, feigned, pretending; — առաքինութիւն, pretending, deceptive virtue.

Title: Արտաքոյ
Definition_1: out, abroad; outwardly, outward, externally; — քաղաքին, out of town; — ժամու, beyond the hour.

Title: Արտաքուստ
Definition_1: out, outwardly, externally; սուգն — միայն է, mourning is merely outward shown.

Title: Արտաքսեմ
Definition_1: to put out, to drive out, to exclude.

Title: Արտեւան
Definition_1: top, summit, the highest part of a mountain, of an edifice.

Title: Արտուղի
Definition_1: stray, misled; — շաւիղ, by-way; ըստ — անկանել՝ մոլորել, to go wrong way, to err.

Title: Արտունութիւն
Definition_1: privilege, prerogative, right, favour, exemption, immunity.

Title: Արփի
Definition_1: sun, luminary; heaven, ether; light, brightness, splendour.

Title: Արփիաբնակ
Definition_1: that dwells in heaven or light.

Title: Արփիագեղ
Definition_1: beautiful, luminous like the sun, bright, brilliant.

Title: Արփիագնաց
Definition_1: that walks boldly in the light; that goes to heaven or towards the sun.

Title: Արփիազարգ
Definition_1: adorned by the sun or light, luminous, bright.

Title: Արփիահրաշ
Definition_1: very luminous, extremely bright, brilliant, resplendent.

Title: Արփիաճեմ
Definition_1: that walks in the light; that goes like the sun; bright, luminous.

Title: Արքայ
Definition_1: king; prince, monarch, potentate, sovereign; արքայից —, king of kings, emperor; կեցցէ՛ —, God save the King! long live the King!

Title: Արքայաշէն
Definition_1: made or built by the king; royal, magnificent.

Title: Արքայարան
Definition_1: palace or city of the king.

Title: Արքայուհի
Definition_1: queen; կեցցե՜ —, God save the Queen!

Title: Արքեան
Definition_1: royal; — թագաւորութիւն, reign; — տիկին, queen, royal princess.

Title: Արքունատուր
Definition_1: given by the king or Court.

Title: Արքունի
Definition_1: royal; aulic; — ճանապարհ, պողոտայ, high-way, road-way.

Title: Արքունիք
Definition_1: palace, royal residence; court, courtier; յարքունիս առնուլ, գրաւել, to confiscate.

Title: Արքունուստ
Definition_1: from the Porte of Grand-Seigniors court; from the public treasure.

Title: Արօտական
Definition_1: that pastures, eats grass, at pasture, at feed; that leads cattle to pasture, herdsman, shepherd; pasturage.

Title: Արօրադիր
Definition_2: ploughed up, tilled; —, արօրաձիգ առնել, to plough up, to till; — լինել, to be ploughed up or tilled.

Title: Աւագ
Definition_1: greater, eldest, oldest, senior; chief, first, noble, nobleman; prior, superior; — շաբաթ, holy-week; — ուրբաթ, good-friday; — սեղան, խորան, high altar.

Title: Աւագախումբ
Definition_1: composed of nobility; — ատեան, assembly of emperors, kings, etc.

Title: Աւագամեծար
Definition_1: noble, excellent, much honoured, very estimable.

Title: Աւագութիւն
Definition_1: greatness, excellence, sublimity, dignity, degree, degree of honour, nobility; majority.

Title: Աւազ
Definition_1: sand, gravel; powder; — ցանել, to gravel; խրել յ—ի, to run upon a sand, to stick fast in the sand; շփել —ով, to scour with sand; տեղի, փոս —ոյ, sand-pit; ժամացոյց յ—ոյ, hour-glass.

Title: Աւազակ
Definition_1: thief, robber, rifler; assassin, brigand, high-wayman.

Title: Աւազակեմ
Definition_1: to assassinate, to plunder, to rob.

Title: Աւազակուտ
Definition_1: full of robbers; who loves robbery.

Title: Աւազան
Definition_1: basin of a fountain; bath, bathing tub; pool, reservoir of water; horsepond; basin; — մկրտութեան, font, baptistery.

Title: Աւազափուլ
Definition_1: fallen or ruined from having been built on sand.

Title: Աւազին
Definition_1: sandy, gravelly; —ք, sand-banks, quick-sands, downs; sand-pit; խրել յ—ս, to run upon a sand.

Title: Աւա՜ղ
Definition_1: alas ! —ս արկանել, to complain, to lament.

Title: Աւաղեմ
Definition_1: to pity, to complain, to bewail, to lament, to be displeased.

Title: Աւանդ
Definition_1: deposit; consignment; tradition; offer; յ— տալ, դնել յ—ի, to consign, to deposit.

Title: Աւանդակիր
Definition_1: that keeps a deposit; that preserves the tradition, depositary; sacrist, sexton.

Title: Աւանդառու
Definition_1: that has received a deposit, depositary, trustee.

Title: Աւանդատու
Definition_1: that deposits; who has given, who is the author of a tradition.

Title: Աւանդեմ
Definition_1: to consign, to deposit; to leave, to commit, to deliver, to remit, to transmit; to recommend; to toach; to give; — զոգի, to give up the ghost, to die.

Title: Աւանդիչ
Definition_1: that consigns, deposits; that teaches; that gives.

Title: Աւանդումն
Definition_1: cf. Աւանդութիւն; — հոգւոյ, commendation of the soul.

Title: Աւանիկ
Definition_1: see there, see here; here is, there is.

Title: Աւաչ
Definition_1: voice, sound; melody, harmony; — ասեմ, to sing.

Title: Աւատ
Definition_1: faith; fidelity; յ— գործել, to make, to work faithfully.

Title: Աւար
Definition_1: booty; pillage, sack, capture, recapture, prey; plunder, marauding; devastation, depredation, disorder; — ածել՝ առնուլ հարկանել, յ— մատնել, յաւարի առնուլ՝ տանել, to spoil, to make booty, to pillage, to sack, to plunder, to ravage; լիաձեռն աւարաւ, charged with plunder; յ— մատնիլ, to be a prey, to be given to pillage.

Title: Աւարեմ
Definition_1: to make booty; to sack, to pillage, to ravage.

Title: Աւարտ
Definition_1: termination, completion, consummation, end, term, point, extremity, issue, exit, conclusion; fall, termination, cadence; — դնել, to end.

Title: Աւարտեմ
Definition_1: to terminate, to finish, to end, to complete, to consummate, to close, to conclude, to make an end.

Title: Աւաքեմ
Definition_1: to cure, to deliver from sickness; cf. Հաւաքեմ.

Title: Աւել
Definition_1: broom; hair or feather broom; brush; coat-brush; — ածել, to sweep; to brush; to dust.

Title: Աւելագրեմ
Definition_1: to join, to add, to increase.

Title: Աւելի
Definition_1: exceeding, superfluous; more, ahove, beyond; աւելեաց բանք, exaggeration;
Definition_2: աւելեաց, the five epagomene days of the Armenian calendar.

Title: Աւեղկեմ
Definition_1: to regret, to be sorry for.

Title: Աւետաբանեմ
Definition_1: to give, to announce good news.

Title: Աւետագիր
Definition_1: copy or writing of good news; a. that writes goodnews.

Title: Աւետապարգեւ
Definition_1: that gives good news; that is given with good news.

Title: Աւետարան
Definition_1: Gospel; պատմել, քարոզել զ—, to preach the -.

Title: Աւետարանեմ
Definition_1: to give good news, to announce; to evangelize, to preach the Gospel.

Title: Աւետարանութիւն
Definition_1: notification of goodnews; preaching the Gospel.

Title: Աւետաւորեմ
Definition_1: to give, to bring good news, to announce.

Title: Աւետիք
Definition_1: good news, notification of good news; երկիր աւետեաց, land of promise; աւետիս տալ, cf. Աւետեմ; տօն աւետեաց, Lady-day.

Title: Աւետչեայ
Definition_1: present given to one who brings good news.

Title: Աւեր
Definition_2: ruin, destruction; demolition, dismantling overthrow; waste, damage; havock, devastation, desolation; յ— դառնալ՝ լինել՝ մատնիլ, to be ruined, to decay, to be desolate; յ— դարձուցանել, յ— անմարդի դնել, to ruin, to destroy, to ravage, to desolate, to harass, to infest.

Title: Աւերեմ
Definition_1: to ruin, to destroy, to demolish, to undo, to overthrow; to ravage, to desolate, to break, to spoil.

Title: Աւիշ
Definition_1: lymph, humour, fluid substance, serosity, liquid.

Title: Աւոլոց ելանեմ
Definition_1: to run away, to vanish, to drop off.

Title: Ափ
Definition_2: — յ—ոյ, in haste, on a sudden; —ս զ—ի հարկանեմ, to clap the hands, to applaud.

Title: Ափափայք
Definition_1: pl summit, side, declivity of a mountain, rock, high and steep place.

Title: Ափիբերանեմ
Definition_1: to confound, to stop the mouth of some one, to silence; — լինել, to be confounded, to be unable to answer.

Title: Ափն
Definition_1: shore, bank, brink, coast; steep bank, bold shore.

Title: Աքաղաղ
Definition_1: clock; գագացել —ի, crowing of a cock.

Title: Աքացեմ
Definition_1: to kick, to kick up one's heels.

Title: Աքսոտեմ
Definition_1: to leap, to skip, to bounce; cf. Աքացեմ.

Title: Աքսորեմ
Definition_1: to exile, to banish, to transport, to send away, to confine, to proscribe.

Title: <letter>Բ</letter> (pèn)
Definition_1: the second letter of the alphabet and the first consonant; its sound is between պ and փ; two; second.

Title: Բա
Definition_1: that; ասացի բա, I have said that;
Definition_3: hey! bah!

Title: Բաբախեմ
Definition_1: to strike; to palpitate, to heat; — զձեռս, to clap the hands; — սրտի, to palpitate.

Title: Բաբախիւն
Definition_1: pulsation, palpitation, irregular beating of the heart.

Title: Բաբան
Definition_1: balister; swing, see-saw; խաղալ բաբնու, to swing, to see-saw.

Title: Բագ
Definition_1: barnacle, muzzle; part, portion; արկանել զ— ի ցռուկն, to muzzle; — արկանել, to participate.

Title: Բագին
Definition_1: altar of an idol; idol, statue of a false god; altar; temple.

Title: Բագձաձեմ
Definition_1: to amass, to gather, to collect.

Title: Բագնաձեւ
Definition_1: in the shape of idolatrous temples.

Title: Բագնապետ
Definition_1: keeper of the temple; priest of the idol; pontiff of the heathens.

Title: Բադ
Definition_1: drake; էգ —, duck; ձագ —ու, duckling; — ընտանի, tame duck; — վայրենի, wild duck, teal; գրգրայ —ն, the duck quacks.

Title: Բազէակալ
Definition_1: that fowls with, carries or has a falcon, falconer.

Title: Բազկաձիգ
Definition_1: that stretches out the arm; received with open arms.

Title: Բազկաստածու
Definition_1: that puts forth branches, ramous (tree), branchy.

Title: Բազկատարած
Definition_1: that stretches out its arms, spread;

Title: Բազկեմ
Definition_1: to divide into several branches; to out, to cut off; to abridge, to resume in a few words.

Title: Բազմաբանեմ
Definition_1: to talk much, to be verbose.

Title: Բազմաբաշխ
Definition_1: that distributes, gives much; that is given abundantly, abundant; polynomial.

Title: Բազմաբարբառ
Definition_1: that speaks, contains many languages; polyglot; — քնար, an harmonious lyre.

Title: Բազմաբերանեան
Definition_1: that has many mouths or branches; ճրագ —, chandelier.

Title: Բազմաբիւր
Definition_1: very numerous; that has many forces.

Title: Բազմագանձ
Definition_1: wealthy, opulent, very rich; precious, very dear.

Title: Բազմագթելի
Definition_1: very slippery, where one slips, stumbles often or very easily.

Title: Բազմագոյն
Definition_1: of many colours; more, much, various.

Title: Բազմագով
Definition_1: very celebrated; very praiseworthy; that praises or is praised much.

Title: Բազմագութ
Definition_1: very mild, merciful, full of fondness, compassionate.

Title: Բազմագունակ
Definition_1: that has many colours or shapes, diverse, multifarious.

Title: Բազմագունի
Definition_1: of several colours or shapes, diverse, multifarious; — ակն, succinum (yellow amber), cf. Սաթ.

Title: Բազմադարեան
Definition_1: of several, ages; — հնութիւն remote antiquity; — ժամանակ, a long suite of centuries.

Title: Բազմադարման
Definition_1: that is carefully nourished, of which much care is taken.

Title: Բազմադեւ
Definition_1: who is possessed by demons; idolator of many gods.

Title: Բազմադէմ
Definition_1: polyedrical; equivocal; multiform, diverse, manifold, multifarious;

Title: Բազմազարդ
Definition_1: tbat is adorned magnificently; that has many ornaments.

Title: Բազմազգի
Definition_1: of several species, sorts or kinds, diverse, manifold.

Title: Բազմաժողով
Definition_2: great assembly, meeting, party; crowd, multitude.

Title: Բազմախաբ
Definition_1: that deceives or that is much or often deceived.

Title: Բազմախիտ
Definition_1: very thick; very frequented (way); very difficult; very abundant.

Title: Բազմախնդիր
Definition_1: that asks, demands much; liable to many discussions or disputes; much sought.

Title: Բազմախոյզ
Definition_1: a much sought; — լինիմ, to make researches, to be curious, inquisitive, cf. Բազմախուզեմ, cf. Հետազօտեմ.

Title: Բազմախորան
Definition_1: that has many tabernacles; — սաղաւարտ, helmet of many crests.

Title: Բազմախորտիկ
Definition_1: full of victuals, splendid, magnificent entertainment or fare.

Title: Բազմախուռն
Definition_1: of a great concourse; thick, thronged, mixed.

Title: Բազմախտեան
Definition_1: unhealthy, that is subject to many maladies.

Title: Բազմածախ
Definition_1: expensive, costly; splendid, sumptuous, rich, magnificent.

Title: Բազմական
Definition_1: guest, invited person; table, banquet; carpet, mattress, couch, sofa; bench, seat; —ս —ս բաշխել, to divide tho guests, to form several banquets apart; —ս արկանել, to offer chairs or seats.

Title: Բազմականատու
Definition_1: that gives a feast or banquet.

Title: Բազմակապ
Definition_1: that is joined or tiedwith many strings.

Title: Բազմակոխ
Definition_1: that is trampled on or oppressed much or often; — ճանապարհ, public or much frequented road.

Title: Բազմակոյտ
Definition_1: of a great assembly, where there are many people; in great quantity, many; crowd; assembly.

Title: Բազմահամբար
Definition_1: that has much provision, well provided with necessary things.

Title: Բազմահանդէս
Definition_1: pompous, with great solemnity; glorious, victorious.

Title: Բազմահանճար
Definition_1: that has much wisdom, very wise, — learned.

Title: Բազմահատուած
Definition_1: divided into several parts or sections.

Title: Բազմահետ
Definition_1: that has many tracks or ways.

Title: Բազմահիւս
Definition_1: well woven, that has much web, closely woven.

Title: Բազմահմուտ
Definition_1: very skilful, full of erudition, very learned.

Title: Բազմահնար
Definition_1: very ingenious, dexterous; several, diverse, in several ways.

Title: Բազմահոգ
Definition_1: pensive, gloomy, anxious, full of care or anxiety.

Title: Բազմահոլով
Definition_1: that has many windings or ways.

Title: Բազմահոս
Definition_1: that flows or spreads abundantly, copious.

Title: Բազմահունձ
Definition_1: having an abundant harvest, that has much fruit.

Title: Բազմահունչ
Definition_1: that has much sound; that has several sounds, very sonorous; polyacoustic.

Title: Բազմաձայն
Definition_1: that has several sounds, that speaks several languages, resounding; in various voices.

Title: Բազմաձեռն
Definition_1: powerful, strong; numerous, much, in several manners.

Title: Բազմաձեռնութիւն
Definition_1: hand, power, great number of people.

Title: Բազմաձիգ
Definition_1: that is thrown or spread several times.

Title: Բազմաճաճանչ
Definition_1: full of rays or light, splendid, brilliant.

Title: Բազմաճիւղ
Definition_1: polypetalous, branchy, ramous, full of boughs.

Title: Բազմամագիլ
Definition_1: that has many claws or fangs.

Title: Բազմաման
Definition_1: that is well or in several ways woven, that has many turnsand windings, tortuous.

Title: Բազմամասն
Definition_1: that is formed of several parts; diverse, various, multifarious.

Title: Բազմամարդութիւն
Definition_1: state of an inhabited town; great population.

Title: Բազմամբոխ
Definition_1: peopled; of great concourse, numerous; tumultuous.

Title: Բազմամբոխութիւն
Definition_1: great multitude of people; tumult, great noise with confusion and disorder.

Title: Բազմամեայ
Definition_1: old, aged, ancient, of old date.

Title: Բազմամեղ
Definition_1: burdened with many sins, great sinner.

Title: Բազմամեքենեայ
Definition_1: furnished with many machines; full of machinations, very cunning.

Title: Բազմամուսին
Definition_1: who has had many wives or husbands; polygamist.

Title: Բազմանամ
Definition_1: to increase, to grow in great numbers, to shoot, to multiply, to enlarge; to abound, to overflow.

Title: Բազմանիւթ
Definition_1: that abounds in materials; that contrives in several ways.

Title: Բազմանշան
Definition_1: that has many significations, equivocal, ambiguous; that has many marks.

Title: Բազմանուագ
Definition_1: that is composed of, or has many tunes; harmonious, melodious.

Title: Բազմաշահ
Definition_1: very useful, profitable; բազմաշահ լինել, cf. Շահել, cf. Ճոխանալ, cf. Հարստանալ.

Title: Բազմաշաւիղ
Definition_1: thas has many tracks or turns; tortuous.

Title: Բազմաշխատ
Definition_1: laborious, that loves work, that has worked much; laborious, painful, heavy, difficult, hard;
Definition_2: laboriously, with much difficulty and work.

Title: Բազմաշնորհ
Definition_1: that does many favours, that gives bountifully; that abounds in favours.

Title: Բազմապատիկ
Definition_1: multiple; diverse, much, several; magnificent; — առնել, to multiply, cf. Բազմացուցանեմ, cf. Բազմապատկացուցանեմ, cf. Բազմապակեմ; — լինել, to multiply, cf. Բազմանամ, cf. Շատանամ, cf. Բազմապատկանամ;

Title: Բազմապարգեւ
Definition_1: that gives or is given abundantly.

Title: Բազմապիսի
Definition_1: of many forms or fashions, diverse, various, many.

Title: Բազմապտուղ
Definition_1: that abounds in fruit, that produces much, fruitful.

Title: Բազմաջան
Definition_1: painful, fatiguing; laborious, busy, diligent, careful;

Title: Բազմասերեմ
Definition_1: to multiply, to increase by propagation.

Title: Բազմաստեղն
Definition_1: that has many branches, boughs or parts.

Title: Բազմավէր
Definition_1: much wounded, that has many sores.

Title: Բազմատեսիլ
Definition_1: of many looks, aspects or forms; բազմատեսիլք, cf. Բազմատեսակութիւն, cf. Պէսպիսութիւն.

Title: Բազմատիպ
Definition_1: of many forms, editions or types; various, different.

Title: Բազմատխուր
Definition_1: very sad, grieved or melancholy; very vexatious.

Title: Բազմատոհմ
Definition_1: of many species or kinds; populous.

Title: Բազմարդիւն
Definition_1: very useful, profitable; very meritorious; full of merit, well deserved.

Title: Բազմարուեստ
Definition_1: ingenious, full of cunning, of ingenuity, artful; polytechnic.

Title: Բազմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to augment, to grow, to enlarge, to increase, to multiply; to accumulate; to re-inforce; to fill, to people, to repeople.

Title: Բազմաքանդակ
Definition_1: that has many fine sculptures; well engraved; well worked.

Title: Բազմաքանքար
Definition_1: very clever; very valuable, rich, precious; very heavy.

Title: Բազմերամ
Definition_1: of several flocks, orders or ranks, numerous.

Title: Բազմեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to set, to place, to lay down, to put.

Title: Բազմիմ
Definition_1: to sit down, to sit, to place one's self.

Title: Բազմորակ
Definition_1: having many qualities or accidents; of many colours.

Title: Բազմորդութիւն
Definition_1: state of a person having many children.

Title: Բազմորոգայթ
Definition_1: full of snares or springes, dangerous, perilous.

Title: Բազմոց
Definition_1: altar or resting-place; chair, seat; mattress; couch, sofa.

Title: Բազմութիւն
Definition_1: multitude, great number, quantity, crowd, gross, heap, mass, bulk, body; abundance, increase, inundation; multiplicity, plurality, infinity; people, troops, regiment, force, retinue.

Title: Բազմունակ
Definition_1: that contains much or many things.

Title: Բազմօրեայ
Definition_1: many days since; old, that has existed a long time.

Title: Բազմօրինակ
Definition_1: in several ways or manners, divers, various; in many shapes.

Title: Բազուկ
Definition_2: beet, strawberry-spinach; — առ — մարտնչել, կարկառել, to come to blows, to fight; — առ — գնալ, to hold by the hand, to give each other the hand, to go arm in arm, together.

Title: Բազում
Definition_1: several, diverse, much, thick, great, large, full, abundant, copious, numerous, considerable, frequent, very, too much, excessive; ոչ —, but little, not much; — անգամ, բազմիցս, several times, often, frequently, cf. Յոլով անգամ, cf. Շատ անգամ; — ինչ պէտք են, it is necessary much trouble, many things; յետ ոչ — աւուրց, in few days; ի բազմաց հետէ, a long time ago; —ք, many people; —ք ի մարդականէ, the most part of men;
Definition_2: —ս, — ինչ, much, too much; — ինչ գոչել ծովու, roaring of the waves; —ս չարչարիլ, to suffer much; ընդ — ժամանակս, for a longtime.

Title: Բաժ
Definition_1: impost, duty, tax, contribution, levy, custom; — անցից, toll.

Title: Բաժակ
Definition_1: cup, glass, mug, goblet; chalice; bumper.

Title: Բաժակեմ
Definition_1: to soak, to water; — զգետինն, զտունկս, to water the ground, the plants.

Title: Բաժանեմ
Definition_1: to divide, to separate; to share, to distribute; to cut, to decompound, to disjoin, to uncouple, to disunite, to split, to cleave, to scatter, to behead, to make an incision; — վիճակաւ, to allot.

Title: Բաժանորդ
Definition_1: partaker, concerned, participant; subscriber, sharing; — լինել, to participate, to subscribe.

Title: Բաժանումն
Definition_1: division, share, distribution, partition, repartition, dispensation; decomposition, dismemberment, disengagement, disjunction, distraction, dissolution; stitch, rupture, departure; separation, disunion, scission, retrenchment, section, segregation.

Title: Բաժառու
Definition_1: receiver of duties or taxes, custom-house officer.

Title: Բաժեմ
Definition_1: to tax, to levy a duty.

Title: Բաժին
Definition_1: part, share, portion, quota, proportion, distribution, equality, parcel, piece; dose; lot; — հարկաց, assessment.

Title: Բալ
Definition_1: cherry; large black cherry; morello cherry; fog, mist; pale colour, paleness.

Title: Բախեմ
Definition_1: to strike, to beat; to shock, to knock; to touch; to scourge; —ի քարի զոտս, to strike one's foot in a stone; — հողմոց զտուն, raging of the wind against the houses; — զգուռն, ի գրան, to knock at the door; — զկուրծս, to beat one's breast; — զքնար, to touch a cithern, harp, lyre; — ճառագայթից զաչս, to dazzle the eyes; բախեալ արտասուօք, burst into toars.

Title: Բախիմ
Definition_1: to be beaten; to fight, to combat, to attack; — ընդ միմեանս, to fight together, to knock, to dash against each other.

Title: Բախիւն
Definition_1: heating, percussion, blow; knock, shock; rencounter, combat.

Title: Բախտ
Definition_1: fortune, prosperity, luck; destiny, fate, fatality; chance, hazard; Fortune, Good Genius; չեղեւ ինձ —, I have not had the happiness; ըստ չար բախտին, by ill luck, unfortunately; ըստ յաջաղելոյ —ի եղեւ ինձ հյրաժարել, by chance, fortunately his enemy dies.

Title: Բախտախնդիր
Definition_1: adventurous; — լինել, to seek fortune, to adventure.

Title: Բախտացի
Definition_1: fortunately, luckily; at all events or hazards, by chance, by good luck.

Title: Բակ
Definition_1: porch, portico; halo, red circle round the sun or moon; sheepfold, fold; circumference, round, circuit; — առնուլ՝ արկանել, to enccompass, to surround, to begird, cf. Բոլորեմ, cf. Շրջապատեմ.

Title: Բակառեմ
Definition_1: to encompass, to begird; to contain, to comprehend.

Title: Բահ
Definition_1: spade, hoe; mattock; բահեմ, to hoe.

Title: Բահուանդ
Definition_1: necklace, diamond to hang on the neck; iron collar.

Title: Բաղադրեմ
Definition_1: to compose, to conjoin; to ally; to mingle, to mix; to compound.

Title: Բաղադրութիւն
Definition_1: compound, composition, synthesis, combination, condition, confection, formation, mixture.

Title: Բաղայք
Definition_1: pretext, excuse, subterfuge; suspicion; stain, fault; cause, reason; բաղայս ի վերոյ դնել, զբաղայցն յօգել պատճառս, to seek excuses or pretexts; բաղայս ստութեան կարկատել ի վերայ, to slander; առանց բաղայց, innocent, inculpable, blameless;

Title: Բաղանիք
Definition_1: baths, bathhouse; bathing place; տաշտ բաղանեաց, bathing-tub; վերարկու բաղանեաց, bathing-gown; եղանակ բաղանեաց, bathing season; սրահ, սենեակ բաղանեաց, bath-room; ի բաղանիս մտանել, բաղանիս առնուլ, to bathe, to take a bath; ի բաղանիս երթալ, to go to the baths; գետոյ, ծովու —, river-baths, sea-baths; — գոլորշւոյ, բժշկական —, vapour, medicated bath; նստական —, hip bath; ցուրտ, ջերմ ջրոյ —, cold, hot or warm baths.

Title: Բաղբաղայք
Definition_1: pretext, colour, cloak; calumny, false accusation; cf. Բաղայք.

Title: Բաղբաղեմ
Definition_1: to pretend, to conceal under a pretext; to calumniate; to accuse, to impeach.

Title: Բաղիստր
Definition_1: stone-bow; crossbow; catapult; dart, arrow; small dagger.

Title: Բաղկանամ
Definition_1: to consist; to be composed, constructed, constituted.

Title: Բաղհիւսեմ
Definition_1: to make an intermixture, to conjoin.

Title: Բաճկոն
Definition_1: vest; waistcoat; flannel waistcoat; night waistcoat; bodice; cloak, mantle; tunic.

Title: Բաճկոնակ
Definition_1: waistcoat; jacket; little old cloak; short cloak.

Title: Բամբասեմ
Definition_1: to detract, to slander, to speak ill of, to calumniate, to defame, to backbite.

Title: Բայ
Definition_1: verb; word, speech, discours; cf. Բայոց.

Title: Բայանամ
Definition_1: to be clayed, to hide one's self in a den.

Title: Բայց
Definition_1: but, yet, notwithstanding, however, nevertheless, though, still; save, except, without; — եթէ, except; unless; — միայն, if, provided, with the exception of, excepted, but, hesides; if not; — ասկայն, yet, however, nevertheless.

Title: Բան
Definition_1:
speech, word, term, saying, dictate, expression, oration, discourse, language, history; proposal, treaty, promise; thing; reason, intellect; understanding, intelligence; oracle; the Word; ի —ի առնել, to interpose, to employ; ընդ բանիւ առնել, to excommunicate, cf. Բանադրեմ; — առ —, word for word; միով —իւ, in a word; զբանիւք առնել, to converse, to speak; ի բանս արկանել, ի —ի առնել to persuade, to convince, to gain; զ—իւք անկանել, to converse with, to hold a conversation; ի բանս հրապուրանաց արկանել, ի —ս ելու առնել, to charm or to allure with one's words; —ս ընդ իրեարս դնել, ի բանի լինել ուրուք, —ունել ընդ ումեք, — կապել առ ոք, to understand, to be understood, to come to an understanding; ըստ իմունս —ի, որպէս իմ —ս է, according to me; ի — տանել, արկանել, to employ, to serve one's self; —ել, կալաւ, it is said; զոյզ ընդ —իցս, at these words; ասել — չարութեան զումեքէ, —ս բարեաց խօսել վասն, to speak ill or well of some one; զի՞նչ է —ս այս, what is this ?
— տալ, to promise, to give one's word, cf. Խոստանամ; թողէք ի բաց զ—երդ, leave these things; —ի գործ առնել, to begin to speak; վախճանել զբանս իւր, to finish one's discourse; — վճարել, to do some thing; ոչ եւս ընդ —ս ինչ ածեալ, without any hesitation; — ինչ է ինձ ընդ քեզ, I have a word to say to you; ըստ —ի ամենեցուն, according to every body; վասն քո բանիդ, upon your word; ըստ —ի քո, according to what you have said; գիտես ընդ ում է —դ, you know well with whom you have to do; մինչգեռ —քն ի բերան նորա կային, hardly had he spoken; —ք ինչ են իմ ընդ ունեք, I have a suspicion of some one; I have intrigues or connections with some one; —ք ինչ ոչ էին, ոչ գոյին նոցա ընդ ումեք ի մարդկանէ, they have neither society nor commerce with other men; առանց —ի պոռնըկութեան, except for cause of adultery; բան առնել՝ կապել՝ ունել, cf. Ուխտ դնել.

Title: Բանագնաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to parley, to enter into a treaty of peace, cf. Պատգամաւորեմ.

Title: Բանագտակ լինիմ
Definition_1: to excuse one's self, to pretend; to feign, to allege.

Title: Բանալի
Definition_1: key; lock; explainer, expounder; — նուագարանաց a, tuning key; — հասարակաց, master-key; — ժամացուցի, watch key; գաղտ —, false key.

Title: Բանակ
Definition_1: camp; army; encampment; castramentation; — առնուլ, հարկանել, to encamp, to pitch a camp; բառնալ զ—ն, to remove the camp.

Title: Բանակամէջ
Definition_1: the middle or centre of a camp or army.

Title: Բանական
Definition_1: reasonable, endowed with reason, discursive, intelligent; logical.

Title: Բանակատեղ
Definition_1: camp, campaign, place where an army is encamped.

Title: Բանակիմ
Definition_1: to encamp, to place ones self, to pitch the camp.

Title: Բանակռիւ
Definition_1: contentious, that is fond of disputing, captious, cavillous; — լինել, to cavil, to carp, to chicane, to dispute, cf. Բանակռուիմ; — լինել յոչինչ պէտս, to dispute about trifles.

Title: Բանաճառեմ
Definition_1: to reason, to narrate, to discourse.

Title: Բանամ
Definition_1: to open, to discover, to disclose, to develop, to explain; to loosen; to perforate, to pierce, to bore; to spread, to enlarge, to extend; to unfold, to untwist, to unlink; to rub; — զգլուխ, to take off one's hat; — ումեք զսիրտ իւր, to unbosom, to open one's heart; — զախորժակ, to excite appetite; — զշիշ, to uncork a bottle; ծակ —, to perforate, to pierce, to bore; — զկնիք, to unseal; — զմիտս, to illuminate, to enlighten the mind; — զխցանս, to unstop; — զծրարն, to unpack; — ճանապարհ, to trace, to mark out a path; to open a way, to make a road.

Title: *Բանիմ
Definition_1: to open; to be detached one from another.

Title: Բանասիրական
Definition_1: philological; — հմտութիւն or ուսմունք, literature, humanity.

Title: Բանաստեղծ
Definition_1: poet; յոռի or զձուձ —, poetaster, rhymer.

Title: Բանավաճառ
Definition_1: boaster, braggart; — լինել, to boast, to exaggerate; to swagger.

Title: Բանարար
Definition_1: poet; writer, composer; complaisant, obedient; delegate, deputy.

Title: Բանարարութիւն
Definition_1: composition, work of sense; poem, poetry; delegation, deputation.

Title: Բանաւորութիւն
Definition_1: reason; intelligence; rationality, understanding, intellect; prudence, wisdom.

Title: Բանգիտութիւն
Definition_1: erudition, learning, literature, science; վերնային —, astronomy, cf. Աստեղաբաշխութիւն.

Title: Բանդագուշանք
Definition_1: folly, extrava-gance, revery, idle talking, delirium, enthusiasm; chimera.

Title: Բանդագուշիմ
Definition_1: to talk extravagantly, to talk nonsense, to rave, to dote; to vacillate, to totter, to stagger.

Title: Բանեար
Definition_1: feud, quarrel, dispute, wrangling; cf. Բան.

Title: Բանիբուն
Definition_1: learned, skilful, experienced, versed, wise; eloquent.

Title: Բանսարկեմ
Definition_1: to slander, to calumniate, to report.

Title: Բանսարկու
Definition_1: tell-tale, talebearer, sycophant, opponent, adversary; satan, devil, tempter.

Title: Բանսարկութիւն
Definition_1: tale, slander, false accusation, calumny; contrariety, opposition; witchcraft.

Title: Բանտ
Definition_1: prison, gaol; դնել ի բանտի, ի — արկանել, to imprison; խուսել ի —է, to make one's escape from prison, to escape; հանել ի —է, to let out of prison; ելանել ի —է, to go out of prison.

Title: Բանտարգել
Definition_1: prisoned; — առնել, to imprison, cf. Զնդանեմ, cf. Բանդեմ, cf. Կալանեմ.

Title: Բաշխ
Definition_1: distribution; assessment; share, lot; division; weevil, mite.

Title: Բաշխեմ
Definition_1: to distribute, to share, to part, to divide, to dispense, to assess; to disseminate.

Title: Բաջաղանք
Definition_1: story, idle talk, stories, nonsense, prattle, quackery.

Title: Բաջաղեմ
Definition_1: to tattle, to prattle, to talk idly, to tell idle tales, to speak of trifles.

Title: Բառ
Definition_1: word, term, speech, expression; air, song; — առ —, word for word; ըստ բառին, literally.

Title: Բառաչեմ
Definition_1: to bellow, to low; to roar.

Title: Բառնամ
Definition_1: to take away, to remove, to carry off, to displace; to retrench; to derogate, to suppress, to withdraw; to cause to cease, to destroy, to dispel, to efface, to extinguish, to stifle; to take away, to ravish, to take, to steal, to rob; to lift up, to raise; to bear, to support, to sustain; — ի վերայ, to put, to put on, to load; — ի հաշուէ, to discount, to deduct, to abate; — զօրէնս, to repeal a law, to cancel, to annul; — զխոչս, to clear, to extricate; — զցանկն, to unbar; — զմանուկն յարգանդէ, to deliver a woman; — թողուլ, բարձի թողի առնել, to abandon, to forsake entirely, cf. Մերժեմ, cf. Լքանեմ; —ի լուծ կշռոց, to weigh; — զգլուխ, to behead, cf. Գլխատեմ; աղաղակ կական՝ կառաչ՝ ձայն՝ ճիչ —, to scream, to cry out; to weep; — ի միջոյ, to carry away, to stroy, to annul; — զամենայն դժուարութիւն, to take away all difficulty; — զկեանս ուրուք, to take away the life of some one, to kill, to murder; բաղոք —, to appeal, to invoke, to lament; — զցաւս, to support pain; — ուստեք, to go away, to depart; — զթիւ, to subtract; — արձակել, to dismiss; բարձեալ բերել, to carry;
Definition_2: to be carried or brought; to liken, to compare; to be taken away; to be destroyed; to be estinguished; բարձիր եւ անկիր ի ծով, be thou removed and cast into the sea; — մտաց հպարտութեամբ, to be proud of; արք արգարք բառնիմ, the just perish; Դամասկոս բարձցի ի քաղաքաց, Damascus will soon be no longer a city; բարձաւ ուխան, the pact is broken; — ի կենաց, to die; նմա բարձին զխանչն, they put on him the cross.

Title: Բաստ
Definition_1: fortune, luck; destiny, fate; wager, bet, stake; —ս արկանել, to lay a wager, to bet.

Title: Բասրեմ
Definition_1: to reproach, to blame, to condemn, to rebuke, to censure.

Title: Բարակ
Definition_1: subtile; — ցաւ, ջերմ, phthisis; cf. Նուրբ; brach (sporting dog); nitre; cf. Բորակ.

Title: Բարակաման
Definition_1: that spins or weaves finely; finely spun or woven.

Title: Բարակավիղ
Definition_1: a skinny neck; a long or thin neck.

Title: Բարբանջ
Definition_1: idle tales, nonsense, tiresome repetitions, silly story, prating, gossip, dotage

Title: Բարբանջեմ
Definition_1: to make tiresome repetitions, to chat, to prattle, to bawl, to tattle.

Title: Բարբառ
Definition_1: speech, voice, accent, language, idiom, dialect; acclamation, exclamation; cry, clamour; sound; կերկերեալ դողդոջ՝ ընդհատ սպառնալից —, a hoarse or gruff, trembling, interrupted, menacing voice; յօդել —, to offer a word, to speak; ածել ի —, to make one speak; — արձակել, to cry, to raise the voice, to exclaim; հնչեցին օդք ի — ցնծութեան, the air was filled with cries or a thousand cries of joy; ի Հայ —, in the Armenian language; — ամպոց, սրաման, thunder, noise; — ամբոխին, clamour, cry; — փողոյ, հաւուց, վահանաց, հողմոց, blast of trumpets, ruff; cackling; noise or clashing of shields; whistling or bluster of the wind; — առիւծու, դաղանաց, cf. Մռնչիւն; — աղաղակի, rumour

Title: Բարբառիմ
Definition_1: to speak; to cry out, to exclaim.

Title: Բարբարիմ
Definition_1: to hesitate, to haggle; to be busy, embroiled, perplexed.

Title: Բարգաւաճ
Definition_1: signal, illustrious; cheerful; increased, flourished, flourishing, civilised.

Title: Բարգաւաճանք
Definition_1: increase, abundance; profit, improvement, bloom, lustre, splendour, renown.

Title: Բարգաւաճիմ
Definition_1: to increase, to flourish, to be in repute, in honour, in vogue, to profit, to improve.

Title: Բարդ
Definition_1: hay-rick; heaped up, piled, bound up; polypetalous;

Title: Բարդեմ
Definition_1: to accumulate, to hoard; to bind up; to compound, to conjoin.

Title: Բարեասեաց
Definition_1: that hates the good, evil, malicious, wicked.

Title: Բարեաւ
Definition_1: well, right; safely; — եկիք, be welcome; — նմա՜, adieu ! — մնալ ասել, to bid farewell, to take leave; to renounce, to forsake.

Title: Բարեբախտ
Definition_1: fortunate, lucky; prosperous, happy, favourable, propitious.

Title: Բարեբախտիկ
Definition_1: cf. Բարեբախտ; բարեբախտիկ լինել, cf. Բարեբախտիմ.

Title: Բարեբախտանամ
Definition_1: to prosper, to be fortunate, to succeed, to be happy.

Title: Բարեբանակից
Definition_1: that praises with another or together.

Title: Բարեբաշխ
Definition_1: beneficent, bounteous, that does good, liberal.

Title: Բարեբարոյ
Definition_1: goodnatured, good-tempered, civil, benign, affable, kind.

Title: Բարեբեր
Definition_1: productive of good, fruitful, fertile, abundant.

Title: Բարեբողբոջ
Definition_1: that has good suckers, shoots or sprouts.

Title: Բարեբոյս
Definition_1: that produces good fruit fruitful; good-natured.

Title: Բարեբուղխ
Definition_1: that causes good to come forth.

Title: Բարեբուն
Definition_1: naturally good, that has a good disposition, humane.

Title: Բարեգեղ
Definition_1: beautiful, graceful, charming, genteel, pretty, handsome.

Title: Բարեգնաց
Definition_1: that runs, walks, converses, lives well.

Title: Բարեգործ
Definition_1: beneficent, virtuous, pious, that does good.

Title: Բարեգութ
Definition_1: benign, humane, merciful, compassionate, tender, charitable, flexible.

Title: Բարեզարդեմ
Definition_1: to embellish, to adorn; to reform.

Title: Բարեժառանգութիւն
Definition_1: inheritance of great property; good inheritance.

Title: Բարեխառնեմ
Definition_1: to temper, to moderate, to soften, to modify.

Title: Բարեխառնութիւն
Definition_1: temperance; temperature, moderation, modification, mitigation; — օդոց, temperature of the air.

Title: Բարեխնամ
Definition_1: careful, that provides for wants, for an affair

Title: Բարեխնդիր
Definition_1: that asks for, that seeks for good things.

Title: Բարեխրատ
Definition_1: that gives good advice, good instruction; well instructed.

Title: Բարեկամ
Definition_1: friend; familiar, dear; մտերիմ՝ անկեղծ՝ ճշմարիտ՝ անձնանուէր՝ սիրելի սուտ —, intimate, sincere, true, devoted, dear, false friend.

Title: Բարեկամանամ
Definition_1: to be friendly, familiar, to make one's self familiar.

Title: Բարեկամութիւն
Definition_1: friendship, familiarity, attachment; սերտ —, intimacy; անկեղծ —, cordiality.

Title: Բարեկարգեմ
Definition_1: to order properly, to dispose, to put in order; to amend, to reform.

Title: Բարեկարգութիւն
Definition_1: good order, organization; reform, reformation; discipline; policy.

Title: Բարեկենդան
Definition_1: carnival, holy day time; բուն —, the day before lent, shrovetuesday, shrovetide.

Title: Բարեկերպ
Definition_1: that has a good figure, handsome, graceful, genteel, pretty, well-made.

Title: Բարեկերպութիւն
Definition_1: fine figure, good shape, grace, gentility.

Title: Բարեկեցիկ
Definition_1: happy, prosperous, in good circumstances, rich.

Title: Բարեկիր
Definition_1: good, honest, virtuous; բարեկիր առնել, cf. Հաճեմ, cf. Բերկրեցուցանեմ, cf. Հեշտացուցանեմ.

Title: Բարեկրօն
Definition_1: of good morals, pious, virtuous, honest, religious.

Title: Բարեկրօնութիւն
Definition_1: good morals, honesty, probity, piety, religion, goodness.

Title: Բարեհաճիմ
Definition_1: to vouchsafe, to accept, to receive favourably, to please.

Title: Բարեհաճոյ
Definition_1: very agreeable; բարեհաճոյ լինել, cf. Բարեհաճոյանամ.

Title: Բարեհաճոյանամ
Definition_1: to be very agreeable or very amiable.

Title: Բարեհամբաւ
Definition_1: of good renown, of great reputation, famous, renowned, celebrated.

Title: Բարեհամբաւեմ
Definition_1: to celebrate, to publish with praise.

Title: Բարեհամբաւութիւն
Definition_1: good name, renown, reputation, fame, praise.

Title: Բարեհամբոյր
Definition_1: agreeable, amiable, graceful, polite, civil, gentle, tractable, humane, kind, courteous, complaisant, beneficent.

Title: Բարեհասակ
Definition_1: having a fine shape or stature.

Title: Բարեհատոյց
Definition_1: rewarder, that recompenses well, that does good.

Title: Բարեհրաւէր
Definition_1: that invites, exhorts to good things.

Title: Բարեձեւ
Definition_1: of a good shape, well made, genteel; graceful.

Title: Բարեմասնութիւն
Definition_1: good fortune, happiness, participation of good; goodness, perfection.

Title: Բարեմարդիկ
Definition_1: coaxer, cajoler, gallant, complaisant; յ— լինել, to please, to flatter, to coax, to cajole, to adulate.

Title: Բարեմիտ
Definition_1: sincere, ingenuous, frank, naive; innocent, good, well disposed.

Title: Բարեյիշատակ
Definition_1: of happy memory, whose memory is venerated.

Title: Բարեյոյս
Definition_1: of good or of great hope.

Title: Բարեյորդոր
Definition_1: that exhorts to good things; well inclined, very willing.

Title: Բարենշան
Definition_1: of good sign; signalized, remarkable, famous.

Title: Բարեշունչ
Definition_1: mild (speaking of the wind), the mild zephyr.

Title: Բարեշուք
Definition_1: splendid, magnificent; superb, graceful, pretty; venerable; modest, chaste, bashful; առնուլ զիւրեաւ ծածկոյթ —, to cover one's self with a veil for modesty.

Title: Բարեշքեղութիւն
Definition_1: splendour, magnificence, pomp, lustre, refulgence; honesty, modesty.

Title: Բարեչափ
Definition_1: well measured or proportioned, exact, well made.

Title: Բարեպաշտեմ
Definition_1: to be religious, to lead a pious life, to do good works.

Title: Բարեպատեհ
Definition_1: very convenient, proper, decent, fit, worthy.

Title: Բարեսէր
Definition_1: good, virtuous, pious, religious; benevolent, indulgent, obliging.

Title: Բարեսնունդ
Definition_1: well instructed, well brought up, well educated.

Title: Բարեվայելուչ
Definition_1: becoming, conformable, convenient, proper, handsome, pretty; graceful.

Title: Բարետաւիղ
Definition_1: that sounds well, sweet, harmonious, well adjusted or organized.

Title: Բարետեսակ
Definition_1: having a good prospect, aspect or countenance, handsome, charming, graceful, genteel, delicate, pretty, agreeable.

Title: Բարետիպ
Definition_1: becoming, proper; of good figure, genteel.

Title: Բարետոհմ
Definition_1: that is of good family, noble, illustrious.

Title: Բարերար
Definition_1: beneficent, benefactor, friend, obliging, indulgent, favourable, kind.

Title: Բարերարեմ
Definition_1: to do good, to gratify, to favour, to oblige.

Title: Բարերարութիւն
Definition_1: benefit, bounty, good, beneficence, kindness, favour, service, pleasure, gratification, liberality.

Title: Բարեքեմ
Definition_1: to hide, to veil, to dissimulate.

Title: Բարի
Definition_1: good, nice, kind, indulgent; fit; fine, handsome;
Definition_3: good, benefit, favour, goods; — է, it is good; — առնել, to do well; — or բարեաւ եկիք, be welcome ! համբաւ բարեաց, good reputation; գիտել զ— կամ զչար, to ignore the difference between good and evil; զինչ — գործեցից, what shall I do well ? հատուցեր ինձ —ս, you have done me good; ընկալար անդէն զ—ս քո, you have received good in your life; յորժամ — լինիցի քեզ, when will you be happy; բարեօք, cf. Բարւոք; բարով իմն, cf. Սիրելապէս, cf. Մարդասիրապէս;
Definition_4: cf. Բարեաւ.

Title: Բարիոք
Definition_2: well, softly, leisurely; ծածկել — է, it is better to hide it; — է, it is well; որպէս եւ —թուի քեզ, as you like it, if you please.

Title: Բարկ
Definition_1: sharp, pungent, acrid; acid, sour, rough.

Title: Բարկանամ
Definition_1: to be angry, provoked, to storm, to rage.

Title: Բարկասիրտ
Definition_1: passionate, apt to be angry, fretful, pettish, peevish, impatient.

Title: Բարկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to exasperate, to irritate, to anger, to displease, to offend, to enrage.

Title: Բարկութիւն
Definition_1: anger, wrath, ire, indignation, passion; harshness; disgrace; զիջանել, ցածնուլ, դառնալ ի բարկութենէ, to be appeased, to allay one's anger; թափել զ—, to give vent to one's anger; — or հրացան —, thunder-bolt; սրտմտիլ բարկութեամբ, to rage, to get into a passion; — սրտմտութեան, սրտմտութիւն բարկութեան, furry, ire, wrath.

Title: Բարձ
Definition_1: cushion; bolster, pillow; squab, mattress, divan; bench, sofa; hip, thigh; dignity, degree, throne; floor or board of a ship; փետրալից —, downy pillow; — երեսաց, pillow; առաջին —, first place, place of honour; — տալ ումեք, to confer a dignity of some one.

Title: Բարձաբեկութիւն
Definition_1: fracture of the leg, broken leg.

Title: Բարձակից
Definition_1: that sits on the same mattress, that is partaker of the same banquet or dignity; colleague.

Title: Բարձաձգութիւն
Definition_1: search of dignity, pursuit of honour; competition, rivalry, ambition.

Title: Բարձերէց
Definition_1: president; — տեղի or —ք, the first place, honourable place.

Title: Բարձընտիր
Definition_1: that seeks the first place, fixed in an honourable place; — լինել, to seek the first place.

Title: Բարձի թողի առնեմ
Definition_1: to abandon, to leave, to forsake entirely.

Title: Բարձումն
Definition_1: act of raising; carriage; subtraction; exception; suppression, repeal, derogation; degradation, dissolution, extinction; deduction, defalcation.

Title: Բարձր
Definition_1: high, elevated; sublime, eminent, great, excellent; հոսել ի բարձուէ, to fling, to throw from above;
Definition_2: ի ձայն բարձր, — ձայնի, ձայնիւ բարձու, aloud, loudly; — առնել, to elevate, to raise on high, to magnify, to exalt, cf. Բարձրացուցանեմ, cf. Վերացուցանեմ, cf. Համբառնամ, cf. Օրհնեմ; — լինիմ, to be elevated, glorified, cf. Բարձրանամ, cf. Փառաւորեմ; ճանաչել զբարձունս, to know sublime or profound things; սեղան —, splendid, sumptuous dinner, banquet; ի բարձուէ, from above; — ոճ, elevated style; — քանդակ, relief, basso-rilievo.

Title: Բարձունք
Definition_1: height, top, summit, eminence, elevation; heaven; թագաւոր բարձանց, king of heaven; թռչունք բարձանց, birds of air.

Title: Բարձրաբաղուկ
Definition_1: that has a, strong arm, strong hand, valiant; vigorous.

Title: Բարձրաբարբառ
Definition_1: that has a strong voice; sounding, that has a loud or shrill sound; resounding, clamorous, sonorous, clangous;

Title: Բարձրագագաթն
Definition_1: whose summit is very high, lofty.

Title: Բարձրագահ
Definition_1: seat, the chair, the highest place; president, the most honourable; high, elevated.

Title: Բարձրագէտ
Definition_1: that knows sublime or profound things.

Title: Բարձրահասակ
Definition_1: that has a large size, tall.

Title: Բարձրամուր
Definition_1: fortified in a very high place.

Title: Բարձրամտեմ
Definition_1: to be proud of, to be selfcon-ceited.

Title: Բարձրանամ
Definition_1: to rise, to ascend, to re-ascend, to surmount, to exceed, to surpass; to increase, to grow; to be proud, to pride one's self; բարձրացեալ, cf. Բարձր, cf. Բարձրաբերձ, cf. Փառաւոր, cf. Յաղթական.

Title: Բարձրապատում
Definition_1: that relates sublime things, sublime, profound.

Title: Բարձրապարանոց
Definition_1: puffed up, arrogant, proud; — շրջիլ, to be puffed up, to be proud of, to bridle up.

Title: Բարձրավարս
Definition_1: that has high branches; covered with many leaves, leafy.

Title: Բարձրավզանամ
Definition_1: to be puffed up, to be proud of, to bridle up, to assume airs of importance.

Title: Բարձրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to elevate, to lift up, to raise, to exalt, to raise higher, to raise again, to ascend, to promote, to advance.

Title: Բարձրաւանդ
Definition_1: height, hill, eminence, summit, top, ridge, hillock; promontory, cape;

Title: Բարձրութիւն
Definition_1: height, eminence, zlevation, act of raising up, summit, sublimity, grandeur, highness.

Title: Բարոյական
Definition_2: moralist; moral; — իմաստասիրութիւն, ethics; — գիտութիւն, morality, ethics; — իմաստ, morality; առնել — խորհրդածութիւնս, to moralize, to make moral reflections.

Title: Բորոյակից
Definition_1: that has the same disposition or humour.

Title: Բարութիւն
Definition_1: goodness, probity; benignity, mildness, clemency; proceeds, produce.

Title: Բարուրանք
Definition_1: crimination, imputation, calumny, false accusation; pretext; motive.

Title: Բարւոք
Definition_2: well; եթէ — թուի առաջի or յաչս, if you please or like; — ծերութիւն, a prosperous old age; — վարդապետութիւն, good or sound doctrine; — այր, a good man; — խոտել, to despise or to scorn well; — է մեզ աստ լինել, it is a good thing for us to remain here; — է or — է բանդ, վադապետ, you say well, master; ոչ է — մարդոյգ միայն լինել, it is not well for man to be alone; տուժել զայր արդար չէ —, it is not a good thing to do ill to the just.

Title: Բարք
Definition_1: manners, custom, disposition, inclination, conduct, manner of acting; բոյս բարուց, nature, character, natural, disposition, inclination; — քաղցունք, good manners, morals; անբիծ, անարատ —, pure morals; խրոխտ —, proud character; խանգարել՝ եղծանել զբարս, to corrupt the morals; ամոքել զբարս, to soften the morals; յիւրոց բարուցն, ի կամաց բարուցն, կամաւոր բարուք, բարուք, յօժարութեան, willingly, spontaneously.

Title: Բաց
Definition_1: open, uncovered; բացաւ գլխով, with an uncovered head, bareheaded, cf. Հոլանի; impudently; աչօք —օք or —աւ աչօք ոչ զոք տեսանէր, with the eyes open, he saw nothing; —աւ երեսօք or —օք երեսօք, with the face uncovered; թողուլ ի — զքաղաքն, to leave open the gates of a city; ի — է դուռն, the door is open; ի — ունել զգլուխն, to have the head uncovered; ի — զնա՜, go away !
Definition_2: —է ի —, ի —, far, very far; quite; out, abroad; — ի —, openly, evidently; բացուստ ի բաց, from afar; far; ի —ի, in a field, out of the city, in the country, in the open air, under the open sky, cf. Արտաքս, cf. Հեռի; ի — առնել, to remove, to send away; քաջ ի — անցանել զբազմօք, to surpass many; ի — բառնալ, to take away; երթալ ի —, ի — գնալ, to go away, to depart; ի — եգաւ ձմեռնային ցրտութիւն, the rigour of winter is past; ի — քակել վաղաղակն, to cease from crying;
Definition_3: ի — տար, ի — անդր տար, never ! no ! God forbid! come along ! fy !
Definition_4: — ի, except, excepted, besides, save; without.

Title: Բացագանչեմ
Definition_1: to cry out, to scream; to exclaim.

Title: Բացագոյն
Definition_2: —, —ս, far, at a great distance, very far; — կանաչ, sea-green.

Title: Բացակայիմ
Definition_1: to absent one's self, to go away.

Title: Բացահայեաց գիծ
Definition_1: divergent; — աչօք, ակամբ, with open eyes.

Title: Բացայայտ
Definition_1: evident, manifest, clear, intelligible; formal, express.

Title: Բացայայտեմ
Definition_1: to declare, to set forth, to explain, to utter; to unfold, to clear.

Title: Բացատ
Definition_1: distant, far off; camp; suburb; interval.

Title: Բացատրեմ
Definition_1: to explain, to set forth, to declare, to specify, to express; to comment; to remove, to scatter.

Title: Բացատրոհեմ
Definition_1: to remove, to distinguish, to discern, to divide, to separate.

Title: Բացատրութիւն
Definition_1: explanation, exposition, enunciation, elucidation; commentary, gloss; առանձին —, specification; — նշանագրաց, the act of deciphering.

Title: Բացարձակ
Definition_1: much extended, vast, ample, full; absolute, independent, despotic; free; distant, far.

Title: Բացեայ
Definition_1: remote, distant, far; ի — լինել, to absent one's self, to quit.

Title: Բացէ
Definition_1: very far; from afar; out; cf. Բաց.

Title: Բացխփիկ
Definition_1: to lose all shame, to be shameless.

Title: Բացումն
Definition_1: act of opening, opening, discovery, expansion, extent.

Title: Բացուստ
Definition_1: far, very far; — ի բաց cf. Բաց.

Title: Բացօթեագ
Definition_1: who lives, sleeps in the open air; shelterless;
Definition_2: uncovered, in the open air, under the open sky; — լինել, to sleep, to lodge in the open air or under the stars; to pass the night in the fields.

Title: Բաւ
Definition_2: — է, <ab>v. imp.</ab> it suffices, it is enough; իմաստութեան նորա ոչ գոյ —, his wisdom is without measure.

Title: Բաւական
Definition_2: worthy, capacity, ability; —ն or Աստուած —, God, omnipotent, Almighty; — լինել, to suffice, to be capable; — լինել անձին, to content one's self; — առնել, to enable, to capacitate; to content, to satisfy;
Definition_3: sufficiently, enough; ըստ —ի, passably, tolerably, so-so; — է, it is enough, it suffices, cf. Շատ է; չէ —, it is not enough or sufficient.

Title: Բաւեմ
Definition_1: to suffice, to be capable, to be able; to furnish; to suffer.

Title: Բաւեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render sufficient, to give sufficiently; to satisfy, to content; to suffice.

Title: Բաւղակաձեւ
Definition_1: in the shape of a labyrinth.

Title: Բդեշխ
Definition_1: consul; mayor; prince; փոխանակ —ի, proconsul, cf. Անթիհիւպատոս, cf. Անթիպատոս.

Title: Բեկանեմ
Definition_1: to break; to break to pieces; to crack, to split; to dishearten.

Title: Բեկանիմ
Definition_1: to break; to lose courage, to be discouraged; to reflect.

Title: Բեկբեկ
Definition_1: broken; interrupted, discontinued; full of caresses, effeminate, soft, affectedly delicate, affected;

Title: Բեկբեկեմ
Definition_1: to break, to break to pieces; to reflect; to prim; to stammer, to stutter;

Title: Բեկբեկումն
Definition_1: fracture; refraction; inflection; quaver; affected ways, lolling, grimace.

Title: Բեկոր
Definition_1: fragment, piece, morsel; —ք քարանց, շինուածոյ, rubbish.

Title: Բեկումն
Definition_1: breaking; rupture, fracture; fraction; refraction; rebuff; — ոգւոյ, discouragement, despondency.

Title: Բեկտեմ
Definition_1: to break to pieces, to break.

Title: Բեղնաւորեմ
Definition_1: to make fruitful, to fecundity, to produce.

Title: Բեմ
Definition_1: step; sanctuary; seat, bench, bar; tribunal.

Title: Բեմական
Definition_1: that beholds the altar or sanctuary; clerk, clergyman.

Title: Բեմասացութիւն
Definition_1: oration or discourse delivered from the chancel, the pulpit or the tribunal.

Title: Բեռն
Definition_1: burden, load, weight; cargo; duty; bale.

Title: Բեր
Definition_1: product, fruit; a not in music.

Title: Բերան
Definition_1: mouth; entrance, opening; narrow entrance of a harbour; orifice; defile; anus; — ի —, face to face; ի —, ի —ոյ, by heart, by rote, cf. Անգիր; ի — գիտել, ուսանել, առնուլ, ունել, to leam by heart; — սրոյ, edge; — գետոյ, mouth; արկանել, կոտորել ի — սրոյ, հարկանել —ով սուսերի, to kill with the sword, to put to the sword; ի — սովուն, at the beginning of the famine; ըստ —, each, so much a head, apiece; աղաղակէր ամենայն —, every one or body cried out, all the people cried out; — ժողովոյն, orator of the assembly or council; նա եղիցի քեզ —, he will speak for you; գրել ինչ ի —ոյ ուրուք, to write under dictation; ի —ս լինել, հարկանել, տապալիլ, — ի վայր անկանիլ, to fall upon one's face; գոյժ ի — առնուլ, to bring bad news; երդս ի — առնուլ, to sing, to warble; ի —ոյ ուրուք, on account of or in the name of some one; ի մի՝ ընդ մի —, ի միոջէ —ոյ, with one voice, unanimous, cf. Միաձայն, cf. Միաբերան; — ի վայր, ի վերայ —ոյ, lying upon one's face; ընը — ածել, to repeat incessantly; բանս ի — դնել, to suggest, to hint; —ք ճրադաց, cf. Բազմակալ.

Title: Բերանաբաց
Definition_1: that has the mouth open, open-mouthed; delighted to admiration;
Definition_2: open-mouth, open-mouthed; — լեալ հայել, — պշուցեալ հայել, to gape after, at, for, to desire ardently, to long for impatiently, to contemplate open-mouth.

Title: Բերանալոյծ
Definition_1: that says whatever comes uppermost; not fasting; gluttonous.

Title: Բերանալուծութիւն
Definition_1: too great a freedom of speech; gluttony; state of a person who is not fasting.

Title: Բերանակապ
Definition_2: with the mouth shut, dumb, speechless; — լինել, to become dumb.

Title: Բերանանամ
Definition_1: to form itself a mouth, to open, to flow away, to stream.

Title: Բերանացաւ
Definition_1: that has a pain in the mouth;

Title: Բերանացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make a mouth, an aperture, to open.

Title: Բերդակալ
Definition_1: governor of a castle, commander of a fortress, castellan; —ք, garrison.

Title: Բերդամէջ
Definition_1: the interior or centre of a fortress.

Title: Բերեմ
Definition_1: to carry, to bring, to bear; to produce; to conduct, to lead back, to drag along; to provoke; to refer; to render; to suffer, to support; — զնմանութիւն, to imitate; to resemble, to be like; յինքեանս — զկեղծիս, to feign, to dissimulate, to pretend; — ընդ միոյ երեսուն, to give thirty for one; — զվճիռ, to give sentence; — զլռութիւն, to be silent, to hold ones tongue; ոչ բերէ ատել կարդ բանիս, the order of mine discourse does not permit me to say; — ատելութիւն ընդ ումեք, to hate, to dislike some one; նախանձ — ընդ ումեք, to envy some one; — սրամտութիւն ընդ ումեք, to be angry with some one; to be offended; ի գործ —, to make use of; խորհուրդ — ընդ ումեք, to consult, to take counsel with some one; ոգի —, to strengthen one's self, to become strong; ոչ — զփառս ուրուք, to envy the glory of some one; ի համար, ի հաշիւ, to count, to enumerate, cf. Համարեմ, cf. Հաշուեմ; տալ —, to cause to be conveyed, to despatch; ի միտս, ի յուշ —, to remember; օտարացուցիչս իմն բերես ի լսելիս մեր, you tell us strange things.

Title: Բերիմ
Definition_1: to go; to carry or to bear ones self; to be inclined, to lean; to behave one's self, to act; զի՞նչ օգուտ յայնմանէ բերցի, what advantage will result from it ? — ի վերայ ջրոց, to walk on the waters; ընդ երկիր —, to travel, to voyage; to be busy with mundane things; առ երկրաւ —, to travel round the world; to shed on the earth; անխտիր ընդ մեզս —, to be given up to sin; այսր անդր — or բերեալ լինել, to go here and there; to be taken hither and thither; շուրջ — զօրինօք Աստուծոյ, to observe the laws of God; — ի կործանումն, ի վայր, to fall into ruin, to fall down; ի նախանձ or նախանձու —, to envy, to covet; ի բարկութիւն orբարկութեամբ —, to get angry; ընդ քիրտն —, to sweat, to perspire; եւ այլ որ ընդ սոքօք բերին, եւ որ զկնի բերին ասացեալքն, and so on for the rest, as follows.

Title: Բերկրալի
Definition_1: joyful, delicious, delightful, pleasant, diverting, delectable; content, cheerful.

Title: Բերկրարար
Definition_1: gay, joyful, that gives joy, delightful, pleasant.

Title: Բերկրեմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to give joy, to recreate, to divert, to delight, to enliven, to please.

Title: Բերկրիմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to be delighted, pleased.

Title: Բերկրութիւն
Definition_1: joy, mirth, contentment, pleasure, delight, gaiety, agree-ableness, satisfaction, complaisance, mildness.

Title: Բերումն
Definition_1: portage, carriage; exigence; tendency; proneness, propension, inclination; fertility.

Title: Բեւեկնի
Definition_1: turpentine-tree; juniper-tree; բեւեկնոյ խիժ orկռէզ, colophony, rosin.

Title: Բեւեռ
Definition_1: nail; pole; դարբնոց բեւեռաց, nail-trade; բեւեռօք հաստատել, to nail; հանել զբեւեռն, to unnail; բեւեռով զ— թափել, one ill chases another; (diamond cut diamond).

Title: Բեւեռեմ
Definition_1: to nail, to nail up, to fasten with nails.

Title: Բզզամ
Definition_1: to buzz, to hum, to murmur.

Title: Բէջ
Definition_1: back, shonlder; handle of a weavers comb.

Title: Բթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to blunt, to make less sharp or piercing, to take off the point, to rust; to stupify, to make stupid or heavy.

Title: Բթիմ
Definition_1: to make ones self dull, less keen; to be dull, stupid, to grow rusty.

Title: Բժժագործ
Definition_1: talismanic, that makes talismans or amulets.

Title: Բժշկարան
Definition_1: place of cure; doctors shop; medical book.

Title: Բժշկեմ
Definition_1: to cure, to physic, to remedy, to dress.

Title: Բժշկութիւն
Definition_1: cure, attendance, recovery, dressing; medicament, medecine, remedy.

Title: Բիբլոս
Definition_1: papyrus; bark, peel, skin; parchment, book.

Title: Բիծ
Definition_1: spot, stain; sun-burning; blot, blemish; soil; small pustule;
Definition_2: spotty, nasty; — աչաց, web; — ի մարմնի, mole, mark, spot; —ք ագամանդի, flaws, specks in a diamond; — դնել, —ս արկանել՝ կարկատել, ի — տանել, to blame, to find fault with, to accuse, to criticise, to censure, to calumniate.

Title: Բիրտ
Definition_1: big, coarse, aukward, rude, clownish, rough, rustic, wild, base, un-genteel, clumsy, heavy, impolite, dull, ignorant, brutal.

Title: Բիւր
Definition_3: —, —ս, —իցս, ten thousand times, several times, often.

Title: Բիւրազգի
Definition_1: of several shapes or kinds, several, many, multitudinous.

Title: Բիւրասպի
Definition_1: that has ten thousand horses; that has many wounds.

Title: Բիւրաւոր
Definition_1: ten thousand or ten millenaries; thousand, many, immense, numberless.

Title: Բլթակ
Definition_1: lobe of the ear; — սրտի, auricles of the heart; — լերդի, lobe of the lungs.

Title: Բլշակն
Definition_1: cover, lid; that has a cataract in the eye, blind.

Title: Բլշակնիմ
Definition_1: to have a cataract in the eye.

Title: Բլշակնութիւն
Definition_1: state of a person who has a cataract or web in the eye, obscurity of vision.

Title: Բլշացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to obscure the sight, to blind; to blunt, to rust.

Title: Բծիծ
Definition_1: louse; քաղել զ—ս, to louse, to free from lice.

Title: Բղխեմ
Definition_1: to produce, to cause; to spread; to pour.

Title: Բղխիմ
Definition_1: to flow, to drop, to gush, to stream, to spout out; to derive, to emanate, to come, to proceed, to arise, to spring from.

Title: Բղխումն
Definition_1: source, gush, eruption; emission, spiration, proceeding, emanation.

Title: Բնախօսեմ
Definition_1: to philosophize; to discourse of natural things.

Title: Բնակ
Definition_1: inhabitant, native, indigenous; inherent; habitation, dwelling; sepulchre, tomb; բնակք, cf. Գերեզման, cf. Շիրիմ.

Title: Բնական
Definition_1: natural; —, — իմաստասէր, այր, philosopher; physician; —ն, physics; —ք արուաց, genitals; —ք, — լոյս, օրէնք, light of nature, natural law.

Title: Բնակարան
Definition_1: habitation, house, home, lodging, dwelling, chamber.

Title: Բնակաւէտ
Definition_1: adapted for lodging; full of habitations.

Title: Բնակեմ
Definition_1: to inhabit, to dwell, to lodge, to reside, to make abode, to sojourn, to settle, to occupy; —ի միասին, to cohabit.

Title: Բնակից
Definition_1: of the same nature or essence, consubstantial; that dwells together, cohabitant.

Title: Բնակութիւն
Definition_1: habitation, inhabitation, inhabitanee, dwelling, residence; station, lodging, home, establishment, house; habit, custom.

Title: Բնաջինջ՞՞՞առնեմ
Definition_1: to exterminate, to destroy entirely, to extirpate.

Title: Բնաւ
Definition_1: all, total, entire; — ոչ, ոչ —, — սիկ ոչ, not, none, never, nothing;
Definition_2: —, — իսկ, totally, entirely, absolutely; ընդ —, everywhere; throughly.

Title: Բնաւորիմ
Definition_1: to custom or habituate one's self.

Title: Բնաւորութիւն
Definition_1: habit, custom; character, temper, disposition, nature, humour, inclination, genius.

Title: Բնիկ
Definition_1: natural, innate, original, proper, radical, native, natural, indigenous; — քաղաքակցութիւն, state of a native;

Title: Բնութիւն
Definition_1:
nature; essenoe, substance; being, entity; the elements; disposition, constitution, temper; humour, inclination, genius; birth, naturalism; person, hypostasis; quality, manner; sex; ստուեր է եւ ոչ — ինչ, it is a shadow and not a substance; հատուցանել զհարկ բնութեան, to pay the tribute of nature; դղորդին արարածոց —ք, all nature is in commotion or confounded; են սոքա բնութեամբ Գերմանացի, these are by origin Germans; մի թէ յիւրմէ բնութենէ եգ զբանն, did he say it out of his own head ?
բնութեամբ, naturally, really, truly, physically, personally, hypostatically.

Title: Բնչեմ
Definition_1: to bellow, to low, to roar.

Title: Բոզաբոյծ
Definition_1: whoremonger, whoremaster, that keeps a strumpet, that frequents brothels, lewd, lecherous, lecher.

Title: Բոզանամ
Definition_1: to prostitute one's self, to whore.

Title: Բոժոժ
Definition_1: bell, small bell, handbell, rattle; coral.

Title: Բոլոր
Definition_1: all total, entire; garland, crown, circle; bud, button; environs; — գիր, primer.

Title: Բոլորեմ
Definition_1: toround; to crown, to finish; to environ, to surround, to begird; to bring together.

Title: Բոլորեքեան
Definition_1: all, every body, every one, all things.

Title: Բոլորումն
Definition_1: rotundity; roundness, circle; completion, accomplishment, end.

Title: Բոկանամ
Definition_1: to pull off one's shoes or stockings.

Title: Բոկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to pull off stockings or shoes.

Title: Բոհոհեմ
Definition_1: to foam, to slaver; to grunt.

Title: Բողբոջեմ
Definition_1: to bud, to bud again, to pullulate, to shoot, to germinate, to sprout.

Title: Բողկուկ
Definition_1: new horn of animals, little horn.

Title: Բողոք
Definition_1: appeal; complaint, recourse; claim, lodging an appeal; — արկանել բառնալ՝ հարկանել ունել cf. Բողոքեմ.

Title: Բողոքեմ
Definition_1: to appeal, to complain, to claim; to lodge an appeal; to complain.

Title: Բոմբիւն
Definition_1: sound, resound, detonation, crash, great noise, explosion; echo; —ս արձակել, to resound, to clap; to crack.

Title: Բոյն
Definition_1: nest; niche; dwelling, lodging; —ս դնել՝ կառուցանել, to nestle, to make one's nest; հանել ի բունոյ, to take out of the nest.

Title: Բոյս
Definition_1: herb, plant, simple; vegetative body; — բարուց, —ք բնութեան, բարք բուսոց, nature, temper, natural character, cf. Բարք, cf. Բնութիւն, cf. Սովորութիւն; to pullulate.

Title: Բոսորային
Definition_1: reddish, red, dyed red; colour of blood.

Title: Բով
Definition_1: furnace, forge, ooppel; mine; chimney, stove; grief, affliction; heat, ardour.

Title: Բովանդակ
Definition_1: all, total, entire, perfect, complete; —ն, the whole, the total, together.

Title: Բովանդակեմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to gather; to complete, to accomplete, to accomplish, to finish; to contain, to inclose, to comprehend; ի համառօտն —, to abridge.

Title: Բովանդակութիւն
Definition_1: total, totality, sum, amount; summary, abridgement, contents; completion.

Title: Բովեմ
Definition_1: to be able; to suffer; to wait, to expect.

Title: Բովհրեմ
Definition_1: to torrefy, to toast, to brown, to parch.

Title: Բոտոտակեր
Definition_1: mothy, worm-eaten; — լինել, to get moth-eaten.

Title: Բորակ
Definition_1: nitre, borax; հանք —ի, vein of nitre.

Title: Բորբոս
Definition_1: mould, mouldiness, mustiness; ունել զհոտ —ի, to smell musty.

Title: Բորբոսիմ
Definition_1: to mouldy, to grow mouldy, to become musty.

Title: Բորբորիտ
Definition_1: that loves mire or mud; lascivious, lewd.

Title: Բորբոք
Definition_1: heat, violent heat, inflammation, fire; effervescence; fervour, rapture.

Title: Բորբոքեմ
Definition_1: to inflame, to kindle, to set on fire, to burn; to warm, to heat; to rekindle, to revive.

Title: Բորբոքիմ
Definition_1: to be inflamed, kindled, to flame, to crackle; to be in a passion; to be mad.

Title: Բորոտանամ
Definition_1: to be or become leprous or scurvy.

Title: Բոցակէզ
Definition_1: inflamed; kindled, burnt; — առնեմ, cf. Բոցակիզեմ.

Title: Բոցակիզեմ
Definition_1: to flame, to pass above the flame; to burn, to kindle.

Title: Բացանիւթ
Definition_1: made or composed of flame or fire, luminous;

Title: Բոցատես
Definition_1: like a flame, flaming, blazing, sparkling, bright, brilliant.

Title: Բոցափոյլ
Definition_3: angel.

Title: Բութ
Definition_1: blunt, dull, whose edge is worn; stupid, heavy; — անկիւն, obtuse angle;

Title: Բութակ
Definition_1: thumb; prop, support; pin, peg; coppel, crucible; cork; ring put on the thumb.

Title: Բուժեմ
Definition_1: to cure, to heal, to physic; to deliver; — զծարաւ, to quench or slake thirst.

Title: Բուժումն
Definition_1: cure, recovery of health; treatment, dressing of some disease or wound; medicament, remedy.

Title: Բուծանեմ
Definition_1: to nourish, to feed; to treat, to dress; to fatten.

Title: Բուն
Definition_1: nature, native, origin, spring, root; stock, stalk, trunk, set, stake, stem; baggage; camp, army; ancestor; chief;
Definition_2: own, natural, real, original, radical, true, principal; — աշտանակի, socket; — սեան, shaft of a column; ի —, ց—, մինչեւ ի —, մինչեւ ց-, ի բնի, to the end, entirely; զգիշերն ի —, all the night;
Definition_3: —, ի բնէ, naturally, by origin; — ի ներս մտանել, to enter precisely, exactly; ի — իսկ ուսանել, to learn thoroughly; դոք որ — անարդ էք, you who are by nature vile; ի քաղաքն ի — նոցա, in their own capital; ի — իսկ յերկինս, in the heaven itself; ի բնին իսկ ի զտակի, in the same day of Easter; — բարեկենդան, quin-quagesima Sunday; — բարեկամ, intimate friend; cf. Յարմատոյ.

Title: Բունեմ
Definition_1: to nestle, to make ones nest; to place one's self.

Title: Բուռն
Definition_2: tyrant, usurper; impetuous, furious, fiery, spirited, energetic, unruly, vehement, vigorous, angry, enraged, tyrannical, predominant, powerful;
Definition_3: violently, ardently; with violence; — մի, a handful; — առնել՝ լինել՝ ի վերայ դնել, to force, to offer violence; — հարկանել, to undertake; ի — արկանել, առնուլ, զբռամբ, ածել, արկանել, ընդ բռամբ ունել, to take, to grasp, to arrest; to rule, to conquer, to subjugate; — հարկանել զօձեաց, to take by the nack; ի բռին ունել, դնել զոգի or զոդիոն, to risk, to hazard, to expose one's self to peril; ի — գալ, անկանել, to be taken, seized, arrested; — դէպ or դէպ ունել, to aim at.

Title: Բուսանիմ
