Definition_1: to spring, to grow, to pullutate, to bud, to shoot, to take root, to appear, to vegetate, to sprout out; to grow again.

Title: Բուսուցանեմ
Definition_1: to produce, to put forth, to shoot, to sprout.

Title: Բուրեմ
Definition_1: to smell, to exhale, to issue; — զհոտ անոյշ, to embalm, to perfume; — ժահահոտ, to stink, to have a bad smell.

Title: Բուրումն
Definition_1: smell, odour; flavour; fumigation; — անուշից, perfume, pleasant scent.

Title: Բռեմ
Definition_1: to plaster; to whitewash; to roughcast.

Title: Բռնադատեմ
Definition_1: to violate, to force, to oblige, to necessitate, to compel, to convince, to subject, to constrain, to exact, to persecute.

Title: Բռնադատութիւն
Definition_1: violence, force, constraint, assault, persecution, extortion; violation, rape.

Title: Բռնալիր
Definition_1: with unsparing hand, by handfuls, liberally.

Title: Բռնակալ
Definition_1: tyrant, despot, usurper; բռնակալ լինիմ, cf. Բռնակալեմ.

Title: Բռնահարեմ
Definition_1: to force, to oppress, to molest; to fist.

Title: Բռնամահ
Definition_1: died by a violent death, killed, murdered;

Title: Բռնամարտիկ
Definition_1: wrestler, pugilist, boxer, athlete, martial, warliko; inexpugnable.

Title: Բռնանամ
Definition_1: to encroach, to invade, to subject, to tyrannize, to rule, to reign.

Title: Բռնապտակ
Definition_1: blow with the fist, fisticuffs; բռնապատակօք ձեռակոծել, to beat with the fist, to thrash, to thump.

Title: Բռնաւորեմ
Definition_1: to force; to tyrannize, to encroach.

Title: Բռնի
Definition_1: violently, forcibly, in spite of, by all means, involuntarily;

Title: Բռնութիւն
Definition_1: violence, force, concussion, constraint; usurpation, tyranny; push, assault, vehemence, vivacity, transport; fury, phrensy, impetuosity.

Title: Բռնցի
Definition_1: with fist; — հարկանել, to cuff, to box, to fist; — հարուած, fisti-cuffs.

Title: Բռշոպ
Definition_1: carried off by force; tumultuous, troubled.

Title: Բրածեծ
Definition_1: struck with a stick; — առնել, to bastinade, to beat with a stick; — գան, to bastinado; — լինել, cf. Գանահարեմ

Title: Բրդազգեաց
Definition_1: hairy, furnished with wool, covered with mourning, woolly.

Title: Բրդեմ
Definition_1: to crumble; — ի բարկութիւն, — ի սրտմտութիւն բարկութեան, to be on a passion, to be angry, mad.

Title: Բրեմ
Definition_1: to dig, to hoe, to dig with a mattock, to hollow, to trench, to sink, to undermine; to scratch.

Title: Բրտանամ
Definition_1: to become rude, rough, gross or uncivil; to thicken.

Title: Բրտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make hard, coarse, thick or rusty.

Title: Բրտութիւն
Definition_1: harshness, asperity, roughness, crudity, aridity; rusticity, incivility, rudeness, impoliteness, brutality, caprice; — մարմնոյ, callosity, callus.

Title: Բօթաբեր
Definition_1: that brings sad news, sorrowful; bearer of unhappy news.

Title: Բօթալի
Definition_1: full of sad news, sorrowful, vexatious.

Title: <letter>Գ</letter> (kim)
Definition_1: the third letter of the alphabet and the second of the consonants. It is sometimes confounded with or used for the letters կ and ք; three; third.

Title: Գագաթն
Definition_1: top of the head, skull, head; height, summit, top, ridge, pinnacle, extremity, ond, brow.

Title: Գադիշ
Definition_1: heap of sheaves or bundles of cut corn.

Title: Գազաղանամ
Definition_1: to be reduced to ashes, to burn to ashes.

Title: Գազաղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to ashes, to burn.

Title: Գազանաբարոյ
Definition_1: brutal, beastly, fierce, inhuman, savage, wild, rude.

Title: Գազանակեաց կեանք
Definition_1: brutal, beastly, that lives like a beast.

Title: Գազանակուր
Definition_1: devoured or torn by a wild beast.

Title: Գազանամարտ
Definition_1: that fights with wild beasts; combat and place to combat with wild beasts; — ի լնել, to combat with wild beasts.

Title: Գազանամիտ
Definition_1: brutal, beastly, fierce, savage, inhuman, cruel.

Title: Գազանանամ
Definition_1: become cruel, savage, to be fierce.

Title: Գազանասնոյց
Definition_1: that produces or nourishes wild beasts.

Title: Գազանութիւն
Definition_1: brutality, bestiality; fierceness, ferocity, inhumanity, barbarity, cruelty, rage, madness.

Title: Գալար
Definition_1: turn, rotation; tenderness of heart, bowel.

Title: Գալարազի
Definition_1: pitiful, that has a tender heart.

Title: Գալարեմ
Definition_1: to roll, to roll up; to twist, to writhe, to bend; to shrivel; to curl.

Title: Գալարիմ
Definition_1: to wriggle, to shrink, to curl, to roll up; to squat.

Title: Գալարումն
Definition_1: roll; fold, contraction, shrink; wrench, sprain, distortion, twisting, tortuosity.

Title: Գահ
Definition_1: throne; seat, chair; dignity; precipice, high and very steep place; անկանել ի —է, —է ի ժ կործանիլ, հտիլ ի —ից, ի —իցն վիժել, to be precipitated, to be thrown or to fall from one precipice to another; ի —ից մղել, to precipitate.

Title: Գահագլուխ
Definition_1: first rank, head, first place; president.

Title: Գահակալեմ
Definition_1: to succeed to the throne, to take the place of some one in dignity.

Title: Գահակալութիւն
Definition_1: succession to the throne or to some dignity.

Title: Գահակից
Definition_1: partner of the same throne or dignity.

Title: Գահակցիմ
Definition_1: to sit on the same throne, to have the same dignity as another.

Title: Գահամեծար
Definition_1: honourable, primary; — իշխանք, grandee, court, nobility.

Title: Գահասէր
Definition_1: ambitious, desirous of grandeur or dignity.

Title: Գահասիրութիւն
Definition_1: ambition, immoderate desire of honour and grandeur.

Title: Գահավէժ
Definition_1: precipitated; — առնել, to precipitate, to throw from a precipice; — լինել, to be precipitated, to fall from above; — տեղի, precipice;

Title: Գահաւանդակ
Definition_1: cap, height, ele vation, precipice, very high and steep place.

Title: Գահաւոր
Definition_1: that keeps a seat; page of the hack stairs; throne.

Title: Գահոյք
Definition_1: throne; high canopy, arm-chair; state-bed, palanquin.

Title: Գաղափար
Definition_1: idea, notion, imagc; opinion, thought; design, project, plan, conception; pattern, model, exemplar, form, example, cast, mould; copy, apograph.

Title: Գաղափարեմ
Definition_1: to Conform, to imitate; to copy, to transcribe.

Title: Գաղթ
Definition_1: transmigration, emigration, flight; journey; pilgrimage; the colony, the settlers or fugitives.

Title: Գաղթեմ
Definition_1: to send abroad or from home;

Title: Գաղթիմ
Definition_1: to leave ones home or country, to emigrate; to steal away, to escape, to flee; to take refuge, to retire.

Title: Գաղղիաբան
Definition_1: who employs French phrases; who knows French.

Title: Գաղղիական
Definition_1: french; — եկեղեցի, the gallican church; — բարբառ, the French language; ոճ — լեզուի, gallicism.

Title: Գաղղիարէն
Definition_1: in French; after the French manner;
Definition_2: French, the French language; — գիտել, ուսանել, խօսիլ, to know, to learn, to speak French; խօսի՞ք —, do you speak French ? չգիտեմ, Տէր, չխօսիմ —, I do not know, Sir, I cannot speak French.

Title: Գաղջանամ
Definition_1: to cool, to grow tepid, lukewarm; to slacken.

Title: Գաղտ
Definition_1: in secret, secretly, by stealth, unknown, underhand; — ընդ —, covertly, clandestinely.

Title: Գաղտագնաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to steal away, to slip away.

Title: Գաղտագողօնք
Definition_1: theft; ի գաղտադողօնս անկանիմ, to conceal one's self, to hide.

Title: Գաղտակեր
Definition_1: that eats by stealth or secretly.

Title: Գաղտաձիգ
Definition_1: who throws secretly; that is thrown secretly.

Title: Գաղտամարտ
Definition_1: that makes war secretly or invisibly.

Title: Գաղտառու
Definition_1: that takes by stealth, deceitful, malicious.

Title: Գաղտնագործ
Definition_1: that docs, that works in secret.

Title: Գաղտնածածուկ
Definition_1: secret, occult, hidden, impenetrable; furtive, stolen.

Title: Գաղտնաշշունչ
Definition_1: that speaks or whispers in secret, informer.

Title: Գաղտնի
Definition_1: secret, oecult, latent, hidden; stolen, furtive; clandestine

Title: Գաղտնիք
Definition_1: secret, mystery; hidden or private place.

Title: Գաղտնորոգայթ
Definition_1: that lays snares in secret, insidious.

Title: Գամ
Definition_1: to come; to arrive, to attain; to behave, to demean one's self, to act; to be inclined; to apply ones self with ardour; յառաջ —, to spring, to proceed, to emanate, to rise, to derive, to result; — ի միտս, յինքն, to recover one's senses; — ի լաւութիւն, to amend, to reform; — ի յառութիւն, to grow worse; ընդ արհամարհանս —, to be despised; եկն ի վախճանել, he was near death; — աւուրն, it is getting light; ի — աւուրն, at the break of day, at dawn; ի — երեկոյին, towards evening; — ի վտանգ, to run into danger or peril; — ի զարմացումն, to admire; — ի հարցումն, to interrogate; յերկիւղ — to fear; — յոզորմութիւն, to have pity; — ի զղջումն, to repent; — յիմն, to undertake; ի քնին —, to examine; — ի կարծիս ուրուք, to consent; յաղերս —, to grant, to become compassionate; ընդ ձեռամբ —, to fall into the hands of; — ընդ աղբ or ապաւառ, to stain, to soil one's self; — ընդ ծուխ, ընդ փոշի, to be smoked; to cover with dust; — ընդ կուսական արգանդ, to be born of a virgin; ընդ ուրուք կեանս —, to examine the life of some one; — ըստ կամաց or ըստ բանի ուրուք, to listen, to give attention; ըստ կարծեաց ուրուք —, to speak according to the opinion of some one; սիրով — զմատնըչաւ, to love traitors; — զայլ արամբ, to love another persons husband; — զտամբ իւրով, to take care of one's own household; զերկրաւ —, to turn, to travel round the world; — զիւիք, to applicate one's self, to give one's self to; գինւոյ — զտկամբ, to see double from wine; զօրինօք —, to keep the laws; զանառակութեամբ —, to be inclined to debauchery; — զարբեցութեամբ, զընչիւգ —, to give one's self to drink, — to avarice; զբանիւք —, to chatter, to tattle; որքան — է քեզ, according to your strength; որչափ իւր — էր, as much as he could; — ի վերայ, to assail, to come upon; to happen some misfortune.

Title: Գամ
Definition_1: means, resources, remedy; hold, crack, opening; time, retaking; ոչ կարել —ս գտանել, not to know where to put the hands or feet, to be without remedely; —ս եւ հնարս գտանել, to find the way to do a thing; ոչ կարացին — եւ մուտ գտանել, they could not do more;
Definition_2: — մի, once; —ու, —ու, many times, successively, always; — քան զ—, little at a time, more and more.

Title: Գամագիծ՞՞՞գսանեմ
Definition_1: to find means or place, to take, to lay, to have hold; to find the means of .vanquishing or to wrong, to obtain ones intention or design; to succeed; ոչինչ — լինել, to succeed never; իբրեւ — չլինէր պաշարմանն, despairing to take the city by siege.

Title: Գայթ
Definition_1: slip, slide; scandal; obstacle, stumbling; fart; —ս արձակել, to fart, to break wind;
Definition_2: գայթ ի գայթ, գայթ ի գայթի, hesitating, uncertain, inconstant;
Definition_3: irresolutely, remissly, in stumbling.

Title: Գայթագղեմ
Definition_2: to scandalize, to supplant; to stumble, to trip.

Title: Գայթագղիմ
Definition_1: to be scanda-lized, offended, to take offence, to be in a passion; to stumble, to slip, to trip.

Title: Գայթագղոտ
Definition_1: slippery, slippy, sliding; who, is easily scandalized.

Title: Գայթեմ
Definition_1: to stumble, to trip, to glid, to slip.

Title: Գայլ
Definition_1: wolf; — մատակ, she-wolf; կորիւն —ոյ, wolfs cub; ցնկնիլ —ոյ, to whelp; առնալ —ոյ, to howl.

Title: Գայլ
Definition_1: gag; — ի բերան ածել, արկանել, հարկանել, to gag.

Title: Գայլանամ
Definition_1: to be like a wolf; to be ravenous.

Title: Գան
Definition_1: bastinado, blows with a stick, whip, lash, whipping; scourge, chastisement, punishment; — հարկանել, to cudgel, to strike with a stick, to whip; — ըմպել, to receive a bastinade, beating, blows, to be beaten with a stick or whip.

Title: Գանալից
Definition_1: much cudgeled, punished, chastised; — առնել, to give a heavy blow with a stick, to strike with a stick; — լինել, to be struck with a stick.

Title: Գանգաչեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to ring(the bells), to resound, to echo.

Title: Գանգատ
Definition_1: complaint, lament, quarrel, woe, claim; — ունել՝ առնել, cf. Գանգատիմ.

Title: Գանգատիմ
Definition_1: to complain, to implore, to grumble; — զմիմեանց, to quarrel together.

Title: Գանգուր
Definition_1: frizzled, curled; —ք, curl; —ք ջրոց, ալեաց, little waves, bubbles.

Title: Գանգրահեր
Definition_1: curled, frizzled; whose hair is curled.

Title: Գանգրեմ
Definition_1: to frizzle, to curl, to crisp, to buckle.

Title: Գանեմ
Definition_1: to cudgel, to scourge, to whip, to thump, to beat.

Title: Գանձ
Definition_1: treasure; heap; hymn; — արքունի, exchequer, finances; տուն —ու, treasure, treasury; — արքայի, privy purse of the king.

Title: Գանձանակ
Definition_1: box, chest, casket; alms-box; poor-box; treasure, treasury; — մանկտոյ, money-box.

Title: Գանձատուն
Definition_1: treasure, treasury; casket, chest, box (where in money is put).

Title: Գանձեմ
Definition_1: to treasure up, to hoard, to amass treasures; to lay up in a trunk; to pocket.

Title: Գառագեղ
Definition_1: cage, park; menagery; den, haunt; prison; դնել ի —, to shut up in a cage.

Title: Գառացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to stretch on the ground, to lay down.

Title: Գառեմ
Definition_1: to stretch or to lay one's self down.

Title: Գառնազեն
Definition_2: immolation of the pascal lamb, Easter.

Title: Գարգափումն
Definition_1: cracking, noise of planks; ի գարգափս յառնել, to jump, to dance, to stamp.

Title: Գարեղէն
Definition_1: of barley, that is made of barley.

Title: Գարեջուր
Definition_1: orgeat, beer; հանել, յօրինել զ—, to brew, to make beer.

Title: Գարնանաբեր
Definition_1: that brings spring; that is produced in spring.

Title: Գարշ
Definition_1: execrable, ugly, deformed, slovenly; exerementitious; impure; unchaste, smutty, obscene, lewd.

Title: Գարշահոտ
Definition_3: stinkingly.

Title: Գարշահոտութիւն
Definition_1: stink, tank or bad smell, infection, fetidness.

Title: Գարշանամ
Definition_1: to be execrable; to soil one's self.

Title: Գարշելի
Definition_1: execrable, abominable, detestable; deformed, ugly, frightful, slovenly, dirty, filthy, fetid, loathsome, bad, base, infamous.

Title: Գարշելիք
Definition_1: abomination, abominable thing or person; excrement; idols.

Title: Գարշեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to abhor; to abhor, to detest; to make execrable.

Title: Գարշեցուցիչ
Definition_1: that causes to abhor; that abhors, detests.

Title: Գարշիմ
Definition_1: to abhor, to abominate, to detest, to hate.

Title: Գարշութիւն
Definition_1: abomination, detestation, horrour, execration; ugliness, deformity, the act of growing ugly; dirt, filth, ordure, stain, nastiness, filthiness.

Title: Գաւազան
Definition_1: stick; rod, switch, whip; wand; cudgel; crook; flail; bar; sprig, shoot; twig; stock, lineage; — իշխանութեան, sceptre; — եպիսկոպոսական, crosier.

Title: Գաւազանագիրք
Definition_1: book containing the history or the series of kings and patriarchs of a nation, catalogue, list, index, series; chronicle.

Title: Գաւազանաձեւ
Definition_1: in the form of a rod.

Title: Գաւազանասաստ
Definition_1: that has punished or is punished with a rod.

Title: Գաւազանաւոր
Definition_1: that carries a'stiek or sceptre; cf. Գաւազանակիր.

Title: Գաւազանեմ
Definition_1: to beat with a stick, to whip, to cudgel.

Title: Գաւառ
Definition_1: province, region, country; sky, climate; native land.

Title: Գաւառապետ
Definition_1: governor of a province, prefect; agent, manager; — միմանձանց, provincial.

Title: Գաւառապետութիւն
Definition_1: dignity of a provincial; prefecture; — վանորէից, provincialship.

Title: Գաւառատէր
Definition_1: master, prefect, governor of a province.

Title: Գաւիթ
Definition_1: vestibule, court, forecourt, porch, portico, —, — ոչխանրաց, sheepfold, sheepcote; — եկեղեցւոյ, parvise.

Title: Գգուեմ
Definition_1: to caress, to cajole, to coax, to fondle, to flatter, to cocker, to dandle.

Title: Գդակ
Definition_1: cap, bonnet, coif; biggin; — ծաղկանց, calix.

Title: Գելանիմ
Definition_1: to twist, to wring, to writhe; to distress, to break one's heart; to grow tender, to be moved, to pity.

Title: Գելարան
Definition_1: an instrument of torture, press, gag, torture, fetters.

Title: Գելում
Definition_1: to tighten. fo press, to close; to wring, to distress.

Title: Գելումն
Definition_1: distortion, contortion, sprain, sfrain, wrench, twist; commotion.

Title: Գեհ
Definition_1: valley; ditch, trench; grave; flock, herd.

Title: Գեղ
Definition_1: beauty, charm, attraction, allurement good grace.

Title: Գեղագրեմ
Definition_1: to paint, to adorn; to write beautifully.

Title: Գեղազան
Definition_1: handsome, charming, polite, pretty, genteel, graceful.

Title: Գեղականութիւն
Definition_1: the condition of a peasant; peasant-life.

Title: Գեղապաճոյճ
Definition_1: well adorned, adjusted, compounded; embellished, decorated; — զարդարել, to embellish; to adorn, to decorate.

Title: Գեղապարեմ
Definition_1: to dance prettily; to advance excellently.

Title: Գեղապարոյր
Definition_1: encompassed or endowed with beauty, very handsome, graceful, charming.

Title: Գեղապարութիւն
Definition_1: dance or agreeable movement of the feet.

Title: Գեղապճեմ
Definition_1: to adorn, to embellish, to deck, to decorate.

Title: Գեղարդն
Definition_1: dart, javelin, lance, halberd; — արձակել, to dart, to lance, to throw a dart.

Title: Գեղարդնախոց
Definition_1: broken or opened by a lance.

Title: Գեղգեղեմ
Definition_1: to trill, to modulate, to quaver, to shake, to sing agreeably.

Title: Գեղերեսեմ
Definition_1: to polish; to paint, to plaster; to paint one's self.

Title: Գեղերփնեմ
Definition_1: to embellish, to adorn with good colour.

Title: Գեղեցիկ
Definition_1: handsome, pretty, genteel, gallant, agreeable, smiling, graceful, cheerful; polite, becoming, proper, decent, light, elegant, happy, good;
Definition_2: —, —ս, — իմն, well, very well, prettily, politely, decently; bravely, excellently, gallantly; — դպրութիւնք, fine letters.

Title: Գեղեցկաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak well, elegantly, to have a fine language, a florid style.

Title: Գեղեցկաբանութիւն
Definition_1: fine speaking, eloquence, elegance of expression.

Title: Գեղեցկագիր
Definition_2: caligraphic; — լինել, to have a fine caligraphy.

Title: Գեղեցկագոյն
Definition_1: very pretty, — agreeable, genteel, graceful, charming.

Title: Գեղեցկագործ
Definition_1: who works well; done or composed elegantly.

Title: Գեղեցկադիր
Definition_1: becoming, decent, well made, situated, placed.

Title: Գեղեցկախայտուց
Definition_1: very speckled, much spotted or diversified with colours.

Title: Գեղեցկակերտ
Definition_1: well made, well built, well constructed.

Title: Գեղեցկահայեաց
Definition_1: good looking; of a fine aspect.

Title: Գեղեցկահիւս
Definition_1: well woven, well composed, well made.

Title: Գեղեցկահրաշ
Definition_1: charming, astonishing, wonderfully fine or handsome.

Title: Գեղեցկաձայն
Definition_1: that has a good voice, sweet, euphonical.

Title: Գեղեցկամարմին
Definition_1: of a fine form or shape, handsome, well shaped.

Title: Գեղեցկայարմար
Definition_1: worthy, proper, becoming; fit, well made, shaped, arranged, proportioned.

Title: Գեղեցկանուագ
Definition_1: that sings, that is sung agreeably, sweet, harmonious.

Title: Գեղեցկանուն
Definition_1: that has a good or mystical name; renowned, famous.

Title: Գեղեցկասէր
Definition_1: who loves the beautiful, who admires fine things.

Title: Գեղեցկաստեղն
Definition_1: furnished with good branches or shoots.

Title: Գեղեցկատես
Definition_1: having a good aspect, well looking, handsome, graceful, agreeable.

Title: Գեղեցկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to embellish, to adorn; to enrich, to fashion, to revive, to render handsome.

Title: Գեղեցկոտն
Definition_1: that has good feet or legs.

Title: Գեղեցկութիւն
Definition_1: beauty, charms, graces, delicacy, gentility, decency, neatness, elegance; ornament, enamel, flower, embellishment, bloom; — տեղւոյ, amenity.

Title: Գեղձ
Definition_1: yew; cartilage, kernel, gland; cf. Գեղձումն.

Title: Գեղձամ
Definition_1: to desire, to wish, to be inclined, moved, to grow tender.

Title: Գեղձումն
Definition_1: strong or intense desire, eagerness, wish, longing.

Title: Գեղջկաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak vulgarly or like a peasant.

Title: Գեղջկօրէն
Definition_1: in a rural manner, rustically, rudely.

Title: Գեղօն
Definition_1: dancing music; dancing with singing; pomp, show.

Title: Գետածին
Definition_1: engendered or produced in a river.

Title: Գետակուր
Definition_1: drowned or suffocated in a river; — առնել, ծախել, կորուսանել, to drown, to drown in a river; — լինել, ծախիլ, կորնչիլ, to drown one's self, to die in a river.

Title: Գետահետեմ
Definition_1: to make flow like a river;

Title: Գետայարոյցք
Definition_1: over-flow of the river, inundation, flood.

Title: Գետառու
Definition_1: a branch or arm of a river.

Title: Գետասոյզ առնեմ
Definition_1: to drown, to throw in the river.

Title: Գետասոյզ լինիմ
Definition_1: to submerge, to drown one's self in the river.

Title: Գետափն
Definition_1: edge of a river, hank, shore; beach; quay.

Title: Գետընկէց
Definition_1: thrown into a river; գետընկէց առնեմ, to throw into a river.

Title: Գետին
Definition_1: ground, earth, soil, land, place; զգետնի, ընդ —, ի գետնի, ի —, on the ground, in the earth; կորացեալ մտանել or պշնուլ ընդ —, covered with confusion to look on the ground; անկեալ ի — երկիր պագանել, prostrated to worship; հարկանել զգլուխն ի —, to knock one's head on the ground; զարկանիլ, հարկանիլ զգետնի, to throw one's self violently on the ground; զարկուցանել, հարկանել զգետնի, cf. Զգետնեմ; գետնի աղիք or պտուղ, earth-worm.

Title: Գետնագնաց
Definition_1: reptile, that creeps, crawls on the ground; tortuous; — ճանապարհորդեմ; to travel or to go on foot.

Title: Գետնախշտեայ
Definition_1: that stretches it self, that lies on the ground.

Title: Գետնախշտի
Definition_2: to stretch one's self, to lie on the ground.

Title: Գետնախշտութիւն
Definition_1: the lying down on the ground.

Title: Գետնակոխ
Definition_1: that treads on the zarth, that walks on the earth, mortal.

Title: Գետնամածիմ
Definition_1: to attach one's self to earth; to prostrate one's self.

Title: Գետնամուտ
Definition_1: that sinks, hides it self under the earth.

Title: Գետնանախանձ
Definition_1: that loves the ground, that stretches it self on the ground; attached to the vanities of the world, secular, mundane; low, vile.

Title: Գետնանախանձութիւն
Definition_1: attachment to earth, love of the vanities of the world.

Title: Գետնատարած
Definition_1: prostrate or stretched on the ground; — անկողին, pallet.

Title: Գետնատարածութիւն
Definition_1: prostration; the lying down on the ground.

Title: Գետնատուն
Definition_1: cellar, vault, subterraneous place; ground-floor; the inferior part of the honey-comb.

Title: Գետնաքարշ
Definition_1: that crawls on the ground, creeping; mundane; vile, low; — տանել, to drag on the ground; — լինել, cf. Գետնաքարշիմ.

Title: Գեր
Definition_1: weeping, wailing, noise; — գործել, to weep;
Definition_2: on, up, above; more, very, much.

Title: Գերաբնութիւն
Definition_1: superior or excellent nature; state of a supernatural thing.

Title: Գերագոյութիւն
Definition_1: essence or excellent nature; supreme being.

Title: Գերադասեմ
Definition_1: to elevate, to raise, to put higher or in the first place; to prefer.

Title: Գերադրեմ
Definition_1: to elevate, to prefer; to augment, to benefit.

Title: Գերազանց
Definition_1: excellent, sublime, eminent, superior, magnificent, extraordinary; — իմն օրինակալ, excellently, eminently, supremely.

Title: Գերազանցեմ
Definition_1: to surpass, to surmount, to excel, to exceed.

Title: Գերակայիմ
Definition_1: to excel, to surpass, to surmount.

Title: Գերահռչակեմ
Definition_1: to celebrate, to praise publicly, to render famous.

Title: Գերահրաշ
Definition_1: astonishing, surprising, marvellous, very admirable, miraculous.

Title: Գերամաքուր
Definition_1: very clean, very pure, spotless; very holy.

Title: Գերանաձեւ
Definition_1: in the shape of a beam.

Title: Գերանանամ
Definition_1: to become a beam, to make one's self a beam.

Title: Գերանդալից
Definition_1: full of or furnished with scythes.

Title: Գերաշխարհ
Definition_1: celestial, divine, supernatural, extraordinary; excellent, rare, peculiar.

Title: Գերապայծառ
Definition_1: most illustious; splendid, brilliant; *—, — տէր, my Lord, your Lordship.

Title: Գերարտօսրալից
Definition_1: very full of tears, melting into tears;

Title: Գերեդարձ
Definition_1: repurchase, emanicipation of slaves, deliverance, redemption;

Title: Գերեզման
Definition_1: grave, sepulchre, pit, tomb, monument, vault; churchyard; հանել ի —է, to dig out of the ground, to disinter.

Title: Գերեզմանական
Definition_1: sepulchral, funeral; — վայրք, cemetery, burial-ground; —ք, the deads.

Title: Գերեզմանակուր
Definition_1: that is consumed in the grave.

Title: Գերեզմանակրկիտ
Definition_1: that strips sepulchres or the hurried dead.

Title: Գերեզմանասէր
Definition_1: who diligently visits and ornaments sepulchres.

Title: Գերեկից
Definition_1: enslaved with another, companion of a captive or slave.

Title: Գերեմ
Definition_1: to make prisoner, to enslave; to take captive, to take; to seduce, to gain.

Title: Գերեվար
Definition_1: that makes prisoner, that leads into slavery, captivity, that takes captive.

Title: Գերի
Definition_1: captive, slave, prisoner; — վարիլ, to be prisoner; — ունել, to keep prisoner; — վարել, to bring captive.

Title: Գերիմ
Definition_1: to become a prisoner, to go into captivity.

Title: Գեր իվերոյ
Definition_1: supreme, superior, excellent, sublime, pre-eminent, higher;
Definition_2: — քան, over, upon, above, beyond; — լինել, to be above, to excel, to surpass, to surmount, cf. Յաղթեմ.

Title: Գերծումն
Definition_1: act of shaving or making bald.

Title: Գերմակ
Definition_1: fine, thin, subtile, delicate; white; — ալիւր, fine flour; — հաց, finest bread.

Title: Գերմաներէն
Definition_2: German, the German language; — ուսանել՝ գիտել՝ խօսել, to learn, to know, to speak German.

Title: Գերութիւն
Definition_1: captivity, slavery, servitude, yoke; tie; transmigration; ի — վարեմ, վարիմ, ի գերութեան վարեմ, cf. Գերեմ, cf. Գերիմ.

Title: Գերունակ
Definition_1: sublime, eminent, excellent; գերունակ լինիմ, cf. Գերազանցեմ.

Title: Գերփեմ
Definition_1: to ravage, to ruin, to pillage, to sack.

Title: Գզեմ
Definition_1: to card, to comb (wool); to tear; ի հուր — եւ ի ջուր աղալ, to make ropes of sand.

Title: Գզեռեմ
Definition_1: to attract, to grapple, to grasp, to catch.

Title: Գզրոց
Definition_1: casket, drawer, small box, till; desk.

Title: Գէշ
Definition_2: bad, ill; — արկանել, to devour or make beasts eat.

Title: Գէշագէշ
Definition_1: in several pieces, by bits, piecemeal.

Title: Գէջ
Definition_1: humid, moist; lewd, libidinous; — ականջաց, ear-wax.

Title: Գէս
Definition_1: hair, head of hair, long hanging hair.

Title: Գէտ
Definition_1: skilful, learned man; magician, sorcerer, astrologer, prophetic.

Title: Գթած
Definition_1: clement, compassionate, merciful, humane, benign, mild, charitable, flexible, tender.

Title: Գթամ
Definition_1: to compassionate, to pity, to be moved to compassion, to pardon, to grow tender.

Title: Գթեմ
Definition_1: to stumble, to trip; to commit a fault; to fail;

Title: Գթեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to stumble, to make one stumble, to seduce, to pervert.

Title: Գթութիւն
Definition_1: clemency, mildness, pity, compassiou, mercy, humanity.

Title: Գժդմիմ
Definition_1: to pout, to be sulky with, angry, offended, in a passion; to take offence.

Title: Գժտիմ
Definition_1: to differ, to disagree, to quarrel.

Title: Գժտութիւն
Definition_1: altercation, contention, dispute, quarrel, discord, dissension, disagreement.

Title: Գիլ
Definition_1: stone easily thrown by the hand; ի — գալ, to wheel.

Title: Գիծ
Definition_1: line, stroke, dash, trace; notch, incision, cut; flourish; hyphen.

Title: Գին
Definition_1: price; value; tax, estimate, valuation; rate, tariff; purchase, bargain; — հատանել, արկանել, to rate, to appreciate, to value, to estimate, to tax, to set a price on a thing; անարգ — հատանել, to undervalue; գնոյ առնուլ, գնոց ստանալ, to buy, to purchase for money; գնոյ ըմպել զջուր, to drink water that has cost money; բարձրացուցանել, աճեցուցանել, իջուցանել, նուազեցուցանել զ—, to buy dearly; վիճել վասն գնոյ, to raise, to augment, to reduce, to lower the price; վիճել վասն գնոյ, to bargain; սովորական —, price-current; որոշեալ —, no abatement; դնելով դնեցից ի քէն դնոց, I will pay you the price.

Title: Գինեբեր
Definition_1: that produces much wine, abounding in wine.

Title: Գինեծաղիկ
Definition_1: flowered sour grapes or verjuice; flower of the wild wine.

Title: Գինեհամ
Definition_1: that has the flavour of wine, winy, vinous.

Title: Գինեհարիմ
Definition_1: to get drunk, intoxicated, to fuddle, to tipple.

Title: Գինեսէր
Definition_1: that loves to drink, drinker, tippler.

Title: Գինեվաճառ
Definition_1: tavern keeper, wine-merchant or seller; —ք selling of wine, wine-shop.

Title: Գինի
Definition_1: wine; զգինեօք անկանել, ընդ գինիս մտանել, ի գինւոջ լինել, to be merry with wine, to drink, to get drunk; թափել զ—, սթափել ի գինւոյ, to sleep one's self sober; զուարթացուցանել ի գինւոյ, to make tipsy, to fuddle; պարզել զ—, to clear the wine.

Title: Գիշախանձ
Definition_1: that eats dead bodies, carnivorous, ravenous.

Title: Գիշատեմ
Definition_1: to tear, to devour; — զմիմեանս, to tear each other, to tear one another to pieces.

Title: Գիշեր
Definition_2: —աւ, ի —ի, by night, during the night; nightly; զ—ն ողջոյն, or ի բուն, all the night, անքուն —, sleepless night; — յաւիտենական, eternal night, night of the tomb; հեշտալի աննշոյլ —, delicious, impenetrable night; զտիւն ամենայն եւ զ—ն ամենայն, all day and night; զհասաբակ —աւ, at mid-night; զ— իւր օգնական առեալ, hidden by the night or darkness; անքուն անցուցանել զգիշերն, to pass a sleepless or bad night; —ի տուրնջեան եղեւ, the day changed into night; տիւ առնել զ—ն, to turn night into day; ընդ մութ —ոյն, in the darkness of night; ագանել ուրեք զ—ն, to set up all night, to pass the whole night; մաշել զերկայնութիւն —ացն յերգս, to pass every night in singing; մինչդեռ կայր եւս —ոյ, while it was yet dark.

Title: Գիշերամարտ
Definition_1: that makes war during the night;

Title: Գիշերայն
Definition_1: by night, nightly, in the night time.

Title: Գիշերանամ
Definition_1: to grow dark, to become obscure.

Title: Գիշերավար
Definition_1: Venus, the evening star; cf. Գիշերագնաց.

Title: Գիշերեմ
Definition_1: to pass the whole night; to sit up or to watch all night in the open air.

Title: Գիջանամ
Definition_1: to get humid, to become damp; to pollute one's self.

Title: Գիջութիւն
Definition_1: humidity, moisture; pollution, masturbation, onanism; impurity

Title: Գիսաբուղխ
Definition_1: that which makes the hair grow.

Title: Գիսագերծ
Definition_1: cut or shaved head of hair.

Title: Գիտանամ
Definition_1: to know, to have commerce or intimate relations with some one.

Title: Գիտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to acquaint, to instruct, to inform.

Title: Գիտեմ
Definition_1: to know, to perceive; to learn, to understand; to feel, to recognize; to be able; to consider, to observe, to note; to believe; to know, to have a carnal connection with; ոչ —, to be ignorant of, not to know; — զայր or զկին, to lie with a man or woman; ոչ գիտէ զամօթ, he has no shame; քաջ, ճարտար գիտեմ զայն, I know it throughly; չգիտեմ, I do not know, I am ignorant of it; գիտասջիր, know ! չ— զի՛նչ առնել, to be at a loss what to do.

Title: Գիտութիւն
Definition_1: science, knowledge; doctrine, understanding, wisdom, study, art; — լիցի, know, you are informed, you must know; գիտութեամբ, knowingly.

Title: Գիտուն
Definition_1: learned, lettered, literate, wise, knowing, well performed; skilful, intelligent; diviner, foreteller; — լիցի, know, you are informed, you must know; — առնել, to inform.

Title: Գիր
Definition_1: letter, character; hook, volume, writing; letter, epistle; letters, soience, literature; holy scripture, Bible; — or թուղթ մեկնելոյ, act of divorce; cf. Ապահարզան; — առնել՝ հանել՝ հաստատեմ, to publish, to write, cf. Գրեմ; — հաստանել, to post up or stake on the wall a bill, writing or advertisement; ի —՝ ընդ գրով արկանել՝ լինել, to be written or registered; զգրով or զրովք գալ, to dedicate one's self to reading; ի —՝ ընդ գրով արկանել, ի գրի առնել՝ հարկանել, ի — դրոշմել՝ արձանացուցանել, to write, to write down, to registrate; to treat a subject; to circumscribe.

Title: Գիրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fatten, to make fat; to make clammy.

Title: Գիրկ
Definition_1: the two arms extended, open arms; bosom, breast; fathom; —ս արկանել, — ընդ —ս խառն լինել, to embrace, to hug one another; ընդ —ս մտանել, ընդ աղեղն լինել, to draw the bow well; այն ինչ լինէր զոգիսն ի —ս իւր թափել, whilst he drew his bow tight; — ընդ — խառնել or խառն լինել, — ընդ խառն or գրկընդխառն or գրկախառն լինել, to wrestle, to struggle with one; — ընդ խառն կռիւ or մարտ, wrestling.

Title: Գիւղ
Definition_1: village; country; գնալ՝ բնակել ի —, to go or live in the country.

Title: Գիւտ
Definition_1: invention, discovery, findling; profit; artifice; salvation; finder; առ —, for the want of; չքնաղ —ք, fine or rare inventions or discoveries; —ք ձկանց, fishing; — որսոյ, hunting; —ք որովայնի, tape-worm; եղիցի քեզ անձն քո ի —ս, you will save your soul; ի — ածել, to invent; ի — ածիլ, to be invented.

Title: Գլանամ
Definition_1: to become blunted, to get dull.

Title: Գլաջարդ առնեմ
Definition_1: to break, to bruise with a stone.

Title: Գլեմ
Definition_1: to roll; to wheel; to surpass, to excel; to bend, to incline; — զձեռն, to extend or stretch out the hand; — զոք զինքեամբ, to win over, to attract, to gain one's favour; զյունովք — խորհրգովն, to be on the Greeks side, to be a partisan of the greeks; — զփայլումն արեգական, to din, offuscate, darken or eclipse the splendour of the sun.

Title: Գլխագար
Definition_1: that has a headache; dizzy, giddy; whose hrains are disordered, mad; — թմբրութիւն, dizziness.

Title: Գլխադիր
Definition_1: coif, head-dress; where is the head of a Saint preserved.

Title: Գլխակարգութիւն
Definition_1: division into several chapters, order, arrangement; summary, compendium; index.

Title: Գլխապարտ
Definition_1: capital, that de serves capital punishment.

Title: Գլխաւոր
Definition_1: prince, master, superior, deacon; capital, principal, fundamental, essential, first.

Title: Գլխաւորեմ
Definition_1: to finish, to end, to terminate; to abridge, to reduce.

Title: Գլխաւորիմ
Definition_1: to have the pre-eminence, to be at the head; to be finished;

Title: Գլխեմ
Definition_1: to decapitate the idols, to destroy; to turn about; cf. Գլխաւորեմ.

Title: Գլխովին
Definition_1: himself, personally, in person; all, totally, entirely.

Title: Գլուխ
Definition_1:
head; chief; summit, top; individual; the first place, the first rank; — գրոց, chapter; — նաւի, prow; — գործոց, master-piece; — ցամաքի, point, cape; — անկեան, angular stone; — սեան, capital; — գրամոց, capital, funds, principal, capital or principal sum; ըստ գլխոյ, ըստ գլխոց, ըստ —, առ —, by head, for each person; so much a head; զայն ութ օրն ի —, all this week; ծածկել —, to be covered, to put on one's hat; բանալ զ—, to uncover, to take off one's hat; ի — հանել՝ տանել՝ ածել, to finish, to conclude, to bring to a head, to end, cf. Գլխաւորեմ; ի — ելանել՝ հասանել՝ գալ՝ երթալ, to be finished or brought to a close, to end, to come to an end; — ամսոց, the first day of the month, new moon; — տարւոյ, new year's day; — բանից, exordium, preamble; point, article; — ճանապարհաց, end of the street; — տողին, beginning of a verse; առնու Տէր զտէրդ ի զլխոյ քումնէ, Lord will take away thy master from thee; ունել զթիւ գլխոց որդaւոցն, to take the number of the children; քանի՞ —ք պատժոց, how many punishments ?
հանել ընդ —ն or ընդ կառափն զյանցանս ուրուք, to have one's revenge, to punish; — ամբառնալ, to revolt; անկանիլ զգլխով, to fall suddenly on the enemy; դնել զ— ի կշիռս, to put one's life in jeopardy; կալ ի —, to put one's self at the head, to be the leader; — բանիցս, finally, at length, in conclusion.

Title: Գծագիր
Definition_2: designer; draught; drawing; sketch; writing, letter.

Title: Գծագրեմ
Definition_1: to trace, to draw, to delineate, to design; to project, to describe, to paint; to sketch; to write, to form.

Title: Գծագրութիւն
Definition_1: dash, trace; drawing, design; sketch, draught; form, delineation; writing.

Title: Գծեմ
Definition_1: to strike out; to erase, to mark with a flourish; to write; to cut, to scratch.

Title: Գձձիմ
Definition_1: to be debased, to become abject or contemptible.

Title: Գճիմ
Definition_1: to kneel down, to sit squat.

Title: Գմբեթաձեւ
Definition_1: in the shape of a dome, vaulted, convex.

Title: Գմբեթեայ
Definition_1: vaulted, wainscotted, that has a ceiling.

Title: Գնահատեմ
Definition_1: to appraise, to estimate, to value, to tax.

Title: Գնամ
Definition_1: to go, to walk, to repair; to abandon; to behave one's self, to conduct one's self; to flow, to flow away; to be in circulation; to act, to prevail; to run, to overflow; — զկնի, զհետ —, to follow, — ճանապարհ, զճանապարհաւ, ընդ ճանապարհ, զկողմամբք, to walk; — ի վերայ ջրոց, to swim; — ի չորս, to go on hands and feet, to grope; որ գնայ ի ձեռս or ի վերայ ձեռաց, that walks on its hands, or who walks on his hands; յապականութիւն անցեալ —, to be corrupted; ի բաց —, to go away; to depart; — յաշխարհէ, to die; ոչ ինչ գնան առ նոսա բանք սպառնալեացն, the threats make no impression on them; ընդդէմ —, to resist; — արուեստի, to be in use, vogue or fashion; գործք գնացեալք, things that are past; ի գնացելում աւուր, yesterday, the other day; գնացեալ, deceased.

Title: Գնաց
Definition_1: gait, step, pace, course; passage; walk; departure; circuit; way, journey; current; conduct, behaviour, demeanour, manners, custom; գնացին եբից աւուրց գնաց ճանապարհի՝ յերկիր անապատ, they walked three days through the desert; դառնալ ի գնացից չարաց, to reform, to lead a better life.

Title: Գնացական
Definition_1: ambulatory, that walks; fuggitive; dying; deceased.

Title: Գնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to walk or run.

Title: Գնացուցիչ
Definition_1: that causes to walk, that moves.

Title: Գնդակ
Definition_1: globule, globe, bowl, spherical or round body; pincushion; apple; — խաղու or խաղալիկ, ball, bowl; ball (at tennis); — մեղուաց, swarm of bees; — հրացանից, ball; bullet, large ball; — ձեռնածուաց, juggler's cork-ball; — որթոյ, bud, button.

Title: Գնդեմ
Definition_1: to make round or spherical; to condense; to become round.

Title: Գնեմ
Definition_1: to buy, to purchase for money, to take; արժան —, to buy cheap; թամկագնի —, to buy dear.

Title: Գոգ
Definition_1: bosom; lap; hollow, cavity; — լերանց or վիմաց, grotto, cavern, den; — ծովու, handle; creek; — նաւու, hold of a ship; — գործել or —ս առնուլ, to be concave or filled.

Title: Գոգանամ
Definition_1: to be hollow, to become hollow.

Title: Գոգեմ
Definition_1: to dig, to hollow; to contain, to include.

Title: Գոհ
Definition_1: content, easy, satisfied; — լինել, to be content, satisfied, to take it kindly.

Title: Գոհար
Definition_1: precious stone, gem, diamond; a precious thing; **** —, false stone, paste; ****** -**, facet.

Title: Գոհարան
Definition_1: place or instrument of praise, of thanks.

Title: Գոհացողութիւն
Definition_1: grace, thanksgiving, thanks; — or Խորհուրդ գոհութեան, Eucharist.

Title: Գողանամ
Definition_1: to rob, to steal, to take clandestinely, to take away, to purloin; to pillage, to filch; to embezzle, to misapply; գաղտ —, to juggle; հնարիւք —, to cheat; զմիտս, զսիրտ, to captivate, to entice.

Title: Գողեմ
Definition_1: to hide, to conceal; to rob.

Title: Գողութիւն
Definition_1: theft, robbery, rapine, expilation; extortion, plunder.

Title: Գողտրաբարբառ
Definition_1: who has a fine language or tender voice, soft or gentle in speaking; alluring.

Title: Գոմ
Complement: գոս, գոյ, գոյր, գուցէ, գոլ, գոլով
Definition_1: to be, to exist, to subsist.

Title: Գոյ
Definition_1: being, existence, that is, substance; goods;
Definition_2: ըստ գոյին, գոյիւ, գոյիւ իւրով, գոյիւ չափ, as much as his means or property allow, as much as he had; entirely, completely; ի — ածել, to create, to cause to exist.

Title: Գոյակից
Definition_1: of the same nature; consubstantial, coexistent.

Title: Գոյանամ
Definition_1: to be created, to exist, to be; to be formed, produced.

Title: Գոյացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to create, to give existence; to produce.

Title: Գոյացուցիչ
Definition_1: creator, that gives existence or being.

Title: Գոյաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be created, to exist; to be formed, produced; to grow rich.

Title: Գոյժ
Definition_1: lamentation, complaint accompanied with groans and cries; sad news; — առնուլ, — ի բերան առնուլ, — դնել, to lament, to deplore; — արկանել, առնել, տալ, to bring bad news, cf. Գուժեմ.

Title: Գոյն
Definition_1: colour; complexion, ornament; tint, dye; jaundice; թափել, հատանել or բառնալ զ—, to discolour.

Title: Գոյշ
Definition_1: God preserve us from it, God forbid; take care.

Title: Գոյութիւն
Definition_1: existence, being, nature, essence, substance, reality; goods.

Title: Գոնեայ
Definition_1: at least, above all things, however; only, yet.

Title: Գոչեմ
Definition_1: to cry, to exclaim, to cry out; to call; to bellow, to roar.

Title: Գոչեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to sound, to cause to sound or resound.

Title: Գոչիւն
Definition_1: clamour, great cry, crash, noise, voice, exclamation; hue and cry, uproar; bellowing, roar.

Title: Գոռամ
Definition_1: to make a great noise, to be violently angry; to assault, to attack; to insult.

Title: Գոռոզանամ
Definition_1: to be proud of, puffed up, elated.

Title: Գոռոզութիւն
Definition_1: pride, haughtiness; insolence, arrogance, presumption; lordliness, tyranny.

Title: Գոս
Definition_1: kettle-drum; գոսերս գոչել, to beat the kettle-drum.

Title: Գովեմ
Definition_1: to praise, to glorify, to exalt, to magnify, to applaud, to celebrate, to renown; to cense; — կարի իմն or յանչափ, to extol, to commend excessively; — զամձմ, to glory, to boast.

Title: Գովութիւն
Definition_1: praise, eulogy; honour, glory; գովութեամբ, laudably.

Title: Գործ
Definition_1: work, affair, thing, deed, action, operation, business, trade, negotiation, practice, agency, enterprise, labour; commission; fact, effect, merit; manufacture; make; — քաջութեան, esploit, signal action in war; այր —ոց or —ոյ, an active man, a clever man; օր —ոյ, a working day; — է գտանել, it is difficult to find; — առնել, ընդ — արկանել, to make use of, to employ, to use; to practise, to effect, to accomplish, to execute, to realize; ի — ածել, to use, to employ, to make use of; բան ի — առնել, to establish, to advance, to take for granted, to agree; ձեռն ի — արկանել, to undertake, to begin, to commence; —, or —ք Առաքելոց, the Acts of the Apostles; նովին իսկ ով, ipso facto, caught in the act; — առ —ով, — ընդ —ով, transitorily, indifferently, cf. Երկրորդաբար, cf. Հարևանցի; ի — or ընդ — մտանել, to enter on one's duties; — ունել ընդ ումեք, to have to do with some one, to have business with some one; ի — արկանել զերկիր, to cultivate or till the ground; — դնել հողմոյ, to make use of the wind; — օրական, journey work.

Title: Գործակալ
Definition_1: officer, minister, commissary, commissioner; manager, agent, factor, negotiator; attorney.

Title: Գործակալութիւն
Definition_1: place, office; agency, business of an agent; procuration.

Title: Գործակից
Definition_1: cooperator; associate, coadjutor; — լինել, to cooperate; to contribute, to concur.

Title: Գործառնութիւն
Definition_1: act, affair, work, enterprise, business, office, place, employment.

Title: Գործասիրութիւն
Definition_1: activity, love of work or labour.

Title: Գործաւոր
Definition_1: maker, workman, labourer, worker; husbandman, farmor; efficacious; — օրական, journeyman; դաս —աց working-class.

Title: Գործեմ
Definition_1: to work, to make, to do, to fashion, to manufacture; to commit, to perpetrate; to knit; to twist; — զերկիր, to cultivate, to labour, to till; — զերկաթ, to forge; չար գործեցէք զոր արտրէքդ, you have done very wrong; զի՞նչ գործ գործեցեր դու ընդ մեզ, why have you done this to us ? — զանօրէնութիւն, to do wrong; to commit a crime; — զարդարութին, to act with justice; — զփրկութիւն, to effect salvation; — զհանդերձս, to make clothes; խորշս խորշս — զտապանն, to make small compartments in the ark; ճաշ —, to give a dinner; ճանապարհ —, to open up a way.

Title: Գործի
Definition_1: instrument, machine, tool; organ; utensil, furniture.

Title: Գործունեայ
Definition_1: workman, maker; minister; active, busy; efficacious.

Title: Գորով
Definition_1: tenderness, sensibility, pity, compassion; fondness, sympathy; a. affectionate, tender.

Title: Գորովագին
Definition_1: tender, affectionate, sensible, affecting, charitable; compassionate, feeling; pathetic;

Title: Գորովամայր
Definition_1: affectionate towards ones mother, or who has an affectionate mother;

Title: Գորովեմ
Definition_1: to be affected, tonched with compassion; to affect, to flatter, to caress.

Title: Գորտ
Definition_1: frog; — թունաւոր, toad; — կարկաչէ, the — croaks.

Title: Գուբ
Definition_1: ditch, hollow; well, cistern; abyss; subterraneous place; cell of honeycomb.

Title: Գութ
Definition_1: pity, compassion, tenderness, commiseration, feeling, mercy, sensibility, tender heart; ի — ածել՝ շարժել, — արկանել, ի — խանդաղատանաց շարժել, to move, to soften, to entreat tenderly; փակել զ—ս իւր յումեքէ, to harden one's heart against another; —ք նորա առաւել եւս են ի ձեզ, he loves yon more intensely; առ — տոհմի նորա, for the love of his race; յիմրիլ ի — երեսաց ուրուք, to go mad on account of the beauty of some one; — մեր առաջի երեսաց քոց, let our supplications find favour in thy sight; կին առնուլ ի նմանէ զի — անկցի, to marry into bis family for the purpose of strengthening the bonds of friendship;
Definition_2: -ք, the Goths, the nation of Goths.

Title: Գութա
Definition_1: several pair of oxen to draw the plough.

Title: Գուժաբեր
Definition_1: that brings sad news, sad, fatal; bearer of unhappy news.

Title: Գուժապարտ
Definition_1: lamentable, deplorable, worthy to be deplored.

Title: Գուժարկեմ
Definition_1: to lament, to deplore; to carry or give sad news.

Title: Գուժեմ
Definition_1: to bring or give sad news; to lament, to deplore, to cry, to scream; to sound.

Title: Գուժկան
Definition_1: that carries or gives sad news; bearer of unhappy news; weeping, in tears; sad news.

Title: Գուլպայ
Definition_1: sock; short-stocking; երկայն —, stocking, hose; հանել զ—ս, to pull off the stockings; դնել զ—ս, to put on one's stockings.

Title: Գուճ
Definition_1: knee, knees; ի գուճս անկանել՝ իջանել՝ կալ՝ հարկանիլ, to bend the knees, to prostrate one's self, cf. Ծունր դնել, cf. Ի ծունր իջանել, cf. Խոնարհեմ, cf. Ընդգճիմ; to squat.

Title: Գումակ
Definition_1: large waggon or cart; the harness of a carriage.

Title: Գումար
Definition_1: assembly, session; action; addition, summing up; sum, amount; — առնուլ, to assemble; — դնել ընդ ումեք, to fight or quarrel with some one.

Title: Գումարեմ
Definition_1: to assemble; to convoke; to gather together, to add, to sum.

Title: Գումարիմ
Definition_1: to assemble together, to gather together; to be astonished, amazed, surprised, confused.

Title: Գումարտակ
Definition_1: assembly, assemblage, mob, band, corps, forces;
Definition_2: assembled, gathered together; — նաւուց, squadron; — առնել՝ դնել՝ կազմել՝ կարգել՝ սփռել, to assemble, to gather together; to levy troops, to send a body of troops; ի —ի, in war.

Title: Գուն
Definition_1: effort; — գործեմ՝ դնեմ, — ի վերայ դնեմ, to study, to devise, to strive, to try, to labour, to intrigue.

Title: Գունակ
Definition_2: dye, colour; kind, sort; manner; difference; — —, in several colours; various, different;
Definition_3: — —, —ս —ս, differently, variously.

Title: Գունակեմ
Definition_1: to colour, to illuminate; to dye.

Title: Գունատեմ
Definition_1: to tarnish; to discolour, to tan; to fade.

Title: Գունաւոր
Definition_1: coloured; dyed; having several colours; quick, diligent, violent.

Title: Գունդ
Definition_1: assemblage, band; troops, brigade, battalion, regiment, legion, cohort, phalanx; globe; sphere; ball, bowl; pincushion; pommel; sounding line, plummet; — փոքրիկ, bullet; globule; — անսւոյ, nave of a wheel; — կշռոց, weight; — կապարեայ, lead; չափել զծով գնտով, to sound;

Title: Գունդագունդ
Definition_1: in several regiments; in a crowd, like a crowd; large, much.

Title: Գուներանգ
Definition_1: of good colour or of many colours.

Title: Գուշակ
Definition_1: diviner, conjurer, prognosticator; informer, denunciator; sign, mark; that expounds, manifests; մատն եւ — լինել, to denounce, to impeach, to accuse.

Title: Գուշակեմ
Definition_1: to predict, to prophesy; to foresee, to presage, to conjecture, to guess, to augur, to cast one's nativity, to prognosticate; to denounce.

Title: Գուշակութիւն
Definition_1: prophecy; presage, omen, prognostic; augury, auspice, divination, denunciation.

Title: Գուպար
Definition_1: war, combat; wrestling; assembly; dispute; —ս նստիլ, to assemble or sit down altogether; ի — կռուոյ մտանել, to enter the lists, to wrestle.

Title: Գուպարած
Definition_1: struggle, wrestling, fight; duel; war; dispute; — դնել, to fight, to attack.

Title: Գուպարեմ
Definition_1: to make war, to fight; to dispute.

Title: Գուսանամոլ
Definition_1: passionately fond of operas or opera-singers; mad for musicians.

Title: Գուսանամուտ
Definition_1: where a singer or musician enters; — առնել, to receive opera-singers into one's house; — լինել, to visit the opera-singers.

Title: Գչիր
Definition_1: wimble, auger; — փոքրիկ, small auger; — տակառաց, piercer, gimlet.

Title: Գռգռամ
Definition_1: to croak; to gargle, to bubble.

Title: Գռեհիկ
Definition_1: plebeian, clownish, rude, coarse; peasant, clown.

Title: Գռեհկանամ
Definition_1: to become rude or clownish, to keep low company.

Title: Գռոհ
Definition_1: crew, band, crowd; assault, attack; — տալ, to assault, to attack.

Title: Գտակ
Definition_1: cap, bonnet; calix, flower-cup; inventor, author; — լինել, to invent;

Title: Գտանեմ
Definition_1: to find, to invent, to discover, to find out; to gain, to have; to meet; — շնարհս առաջի ուրուք, to gain or acquire the heart, friendship, goodwill of some one; to regain the favour of some one.

Title: Գտանիմ
Definition_1: to find ones self; to appear, to show one's self; հաւատարիմ —, to be faithful.

Title: Գտանք
Definition_1: the finding again; fiction, invention; զբան —, fiction, fable.

Title: Գրաբար
Definition_3: literal.

Title: Գրագարձ
Definition_1: the dividing of words into syllables for the end of the line.

Title: Գրապան
Definition_1: hem, border, list; collar of a coat; ephod.

Title: Գրապանակ
Definition_1: phylactery, amulet; letter case; pocket; ephod.

Title: Գրաստ
Definition_1: led-horse, beast for the saddle, surapter, sorry horse, ass, short or thick horse, animal, beast, tit; — մատակ, mare.

Title: Գրատ
Definition_1: great coat, loose coat, Persian dress.

Title: Գրաւ
Definition_1: earnest money, assurance, security, pledge, engagement; mort-gage; wager, bet; detention; — դնել, to wager, to lay a bet; to hire, to give wages or salary; — առնել ընդ ումեք, to lay a wager.

Title: Գրաւականեմ
Definition_1: to hire, to engage; to mortgage; to detain, to occupy.

Title: Գրաւեմ
Definition_1: to hire, to engage, to secure; to redeem; to hold, to detain, to usurp, to occupy, to seize, to appropriate, to encroach; to stride; to prepossess, to preoccupy; — յարքունիս, to confiscate.

Title: Գրաւումն
Definition_1: detention, encroachment, usurpation, occupation, seizure; — յարքունիս, confiscation.

Title: Գրգանամ
Definition_1: to enjoy, to amuse, to cocker one's self, to live a merry life.

Title: Գրգանք
Definition_1: delicacy, effeminacy; delight, pleasure, voluptuousness; caress, cockering.

Title: Գրգարան
Definition_1: place of pleasure, of delight, paradise.

Title: Գրգեմ
Definition_1: to fondle, to treat delicately or effeminately, to caress; to feed delicately.

Title: Գրգիռ
Definition_1: defiance, provocation, challenge, incitement, impulse, instigation, inducement, solicitation, suggestion, temptation, allurement, stimulation, motive.

Title: Գրգռեմ
Definition_1: to irritate, to excite, to provoke; to incite, to alarm, to inflame, to instigate, to move, to foment, to nettle, to urge, to rekindle, to revive, to rouse, to rebel.

Title: Գրեա՞՞՞թէ
Definition_1: nearly, almost, about; hardly, like, well.

Title: Գրեմ
Definition_1: to write, to compose; to engrave, to carve; to paint; to esteem, to value; ոչ ինչ —, to despise, to disesteem.

Title: Գրթեմ
Definition_1: to stumble; to deceive; to seduce.

Title: Գրիմ
Definition_1: to be inscribed; to be steemed or valued.

Title: Գրիչ
Definition_1: writer, scribe, author; pen; — երկաթի, style; graver; steel-pen; փետուր —, goose-quill; — նկարչի, pencil.

Title: Գրկալիր
Definition_1: full bosomed; — աղեղն, a bow well drawn.

Title: Գրկախառն
Definition_2: with embracements; — սիրով ողջունել զմիյեանս, to salute by embracing each other; — լինիմ, to embrace; cf. Գիրկ ընդ խառն լինիմ.

Title: Գրկախառնիմ
Definition_1: to embrace; cf. Գիրկ ընդ խառն լինիմ.

Title: Գրկընկալ
Definition_1: who is in the arms or at the breast (a baby).

Title: Գրոհ
Definition_1: assault, irruption; nation, people; — տալ, to storm; cf. Գռոհ.

Title: Գրպան
Definition_1: pocket; purse; դնել ի —ի, to pocket.

Title: Գօշեմ
Definition_1: to bite, to sting; to mangle, to lacerate.

Title: Գօտէպինդ
Definition_1: girt; prompt, active, diligent; — լինել, to gird one's self; to be prompt.

Title: Գօտի
Definition_1: girdle; twist; belt; zone; — ածել, — ընդ մէջ ածել, to gird, to tie or to draw close round the body; to be prompt; այրեցած՝ բարեխառն՝ սառուցեալ —, torrid, temperate, glacial zone; — լերանց, chain of mountains.

Title: Գօտիածու
Definition_1: that girds the body; that girds on the sword.

Title: <letter>Դ</letter> (ta)
Definition_1: the fourth letter of the alphabet and the third of the consonants. It is sometimes used for, or confounded with the letters տ and թ; four; fourth.

Title: Դ
Definition_1: thou, thee, you; this, that, it; these; սուրբդ սրբոց, you who are the holy of holy ones; կորուսեր զհոգիդ եւ զինչսդ, you have lost your soul and your property.

Title: Դա աւադիկ
Definition_1: here is, there is; see here; behold; but; now; դա եւ դուք աւադիկ, there you too.

Title: Դագաղ
Definition_1: bier, coffin litter, sedan; gridiron, grate.

Title: Դադար
Definition_1: cessation, rest; pause; establishment, dwelling; station; —ք գազանաց, den; —ք խաշանց, անասնոց, stable; —ք հաւուց, roost; perch; —ք նաւուց, harbour.

Title: Դադարեմ
Definition_1: to cease, to stop, to interrupt; to become calm, to give over; to desist, to rest one's self, to remain; to drain.

Title: Դադարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cease, to stop, to calm, to interrupt; to extinguish, to stanch, to quench; to drain.

Title: Դադարումն
Definition_1: cessation, desistance, repose, rest, pause; discontinuance, vacation; extinction, redemption, act of stanching; silence; interruption; inaction.

Title: Դաժան
Definition_1: hard, harsh, rough, sharp, sour, atrocious, austere, morose, blunt, cross, fro ward, difficult, inaccessible, cruel, merciless.

Title: Դաժանաբոյս
Definition_1: whose productions are harsh or hard.

Title: Դաժանագոյն
Definition_1: harder or very hard; very harsh; haughty, cruel.

Title: Դաժանահոտ
Definition_1: that has a bad smell, stinking.

Title: Դաժանիմ
Definition_1: to be angry, mad, to sour, to turn sour, to get worse.

Title: Դաժանութիւն
Definition_1: atrocity, haughtiness, austerity, harshness; sharpness, asperity.

Title: Դալակիմ
Definition_1: to endeavour, to study, to labour.

Title: Դալար
Definition_1: green, that is not dry; fresh;

Title: Դալարաբերեմ
Definition_1: to produce verdure; to become green, to become green again.

Title: Դալարագեղ
Definition_1: green, covered with verdure, verdant, fresh.

Title: Դալարանամ
Definition_1: to become green, verdant, to sprout.

Title: Դալարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make green; to renew, to restore.

Title: Դահադրամ
Definition_1: ten pence, coin of ten pence.

Title: Դահեկան
Definition_1: penny; drachm; gold coin; coin; — հատանել, to coin, to mint.

Title: Դամբարան
Definition_1: vault, charnel-house, catacombs, church-yard; cf. Դամբան.

Title: Դայեակ
Definition_1: wet-nurse; nurse; midwife; preceptor; tutor, governor.

Title: Դայեկեմ
Definition_1: to nourish, to bring up, to educate.

Title: Դայլ
Definition_1: the first milk of a cow, colostrum.

Title: Դան
Definition_1: knife claspknife; սրել զ—, to sharpen a knife.

Title: Դանդաղիմ
Definition_1: to loiter, to trifle, to slumber, to dally, to waver.

Title: Դանդաղութիւն
Definition_1: slowness, tardiness, delay, frivolity, idleness, indolence.

Title: Դանդաչեմ
Definition_1: to waver, to hesitate; to grope; to talk idly, to dream.

Title: Դանդաչեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to waver or tinkle, to resound.

Title: Դաշն
Definition_1: contract, convention, bargain, treaty, engagement; condition, capitulation; compact, agreement; concurrence, alliance; harmony;
Definition_3: with a low voice; դաշինս կռել՝ հաստատել, ի — մտանել, to contract, to make an agreement; to stipulate, to transact; to confederate; — խօսիլ, to speak very mildly; — նայիլ, to look tenderly, affectionately, or sweetly on one; անցանել զդաշամբ, to break the conditions, the alliance or faith; անցանել զամուսնութեան զառն դաշամբք, to be unfaithful to the marriage-bed; — հաւատոյ, the Creed; — քաղաքական, civil contract.

Title: Դաշնադիր
Definition_1: contractor, that contracts; — լինել, to contract, to make an agreement, to negotiate.

Title: Դաշնադրութիւն
Definition_1: contract, pact, covenant, treaty, compact, engagement; stipulation; capitulation; alliance.

Title: Դաշնակ
Definition_1: poniard, cimeter, cutlass, dagger, sabre; piano; — հարկանել, to play on the piano.

Title: Դաշնակից
Definition_1: confederate, leaguer; conspirator; — լինել, to confederate, to unite, to league, to accede, cf. Դաշնաւորիմ.

Title: Դաշնակցութիւն
Definition_1: confederacy, league, alliance, connexion; treaty; plot, conspiracy.

Title: Դաշնաւորիմ
Definition_1: to agree; to confederate, to ally; to conspire, to plot.

Title: Դաշտ
Definition_1: field, country, soil, heath, fallow ground, plain; Եղիսեան —ք, Elysian fields; Արիսեան —ք, field of Mars.

Title: Դաշտաբերան
Definition_1: opening or entrance to a plain or field.

Title: Դաշտագետին
Definition_1: campestral, flat; — վայր, plain, flat country, meadow.

Title: Դաշտակողմն
Definition_1: part or side of the country.

Title: Դաշտաձեւ
Definition_1: plain, in form of a plain.

Title: Դաշտամուխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to enter into an open country.

Title: Դաշտանամ
Definition_1: to become a plain, to be flat.

Title: Դաշտաւէտ
Definition_1: abounding in open country, in fields.

Title: Դառն
Definition_1: bitter; sour, acrid, sharp, harsh, grievous, painful, disagreeable, tiresome, tedious, disgraceful, fatal, sad, tormenting, austere; maddening; biting, satirical.

Title: Դառնաթորմի
Definition_1: furnished with, or full of bitterness, very bitter

Title: Դառնախայրի
Definition_1: productive of bitter or deleterious fruit.

Title: Դառնահամ
Definition_1: that has a bitter taste, bitter, sharp, acrid, harsh, sour.

Title: Դառնաճաշակ
Definition_1: cf. Դառնահամ; — լինիմ, to taste gall or anything bitter.

Title: Դառնամ
Definition_1: to turn, to turn about, to return, to go or come hack again; to repair; to be converted; — յետս or ընդ կրունկն, to recede; ընդէմ —, to object, to resist, to oppose; — ի քրիստինէութիւն, to become a christian; — առ Տէր, to repent, to reform; — յաստուծոյ, to rebel against God; — աւուր, to draw towards night; ի — տարւոյն, the year after; ի ղէն —, to arm one's self, to take arms.

Title: Դառնամահ
Definition_1: of a painful or violent death.

Title: Դառնանամ
Definition_1: to become bitter, to turn sour; to be offended, irritated; to be tired, displeased.

Title: Դառնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to imbitter; to sour, to irritate, to offend, to tire, to displease.

Title: Դառնութիւն
Definition_1: bitterness, disgust, sharpness, gall, distaste; grief, displeasure, vexation; rigour; enormity; mordacity.

Title: Դաս
Definition_1: order, rank, division, body, class; choir; place; lesson, precept, dictate, instruction; — ասել ումեք, to lecture, to read, to teach.

Title: Դասաբանեմ
Definition_1: to arrange, to put in order.

Title: Դաս դաս
Definition_1: in several orders or assemblages, in several companies.

Title: Դասալիք
Definition_1: deserter; — լինել, to desert; to apostatise.

Title: Դասակ
Definition_1: troop, order, division; flock (of sheep, etc.); herd (of oxen, etc.).

Title: Դասակարգեմ
Definition_1: to put in order, to associate, to enrol.

Title: Դասակարգութիւն
Definition_1: order, sign; enrolment; choir; hierarchy; category.

Title: Դասակից
Definition_1: of the same order or class;

Title: Դասակցիմ
Definition_1: to be in the same class or society, to enrol one's self.

Title: Դասապետ
Definition_1: the first of an order or class; chorister, precentor, master of the choir.

Title: Դասապետեմ
Definition_1: to be the first or chief in an assemblage.

Title: Դասապետութիւն
Definition_1: office of a master of the choir; hierarchy.

Title: Դասաւորութիւն
Definition_1: order, ordonnance, arrangement; system; — բառից, syntax.

Title: Դասեմ
Definition_1: to put in order, to order, to arrange, to distribute; to enrol, to associate.

Title: Դաստակ
Definition_1: wrist; hand, palm; — սրոյ, hilt of a sword; —ս դնել, to haft, to set in a handle.

Title: Դաստակետղ
Definition_1: place where one rests the wrist or hand.

Title: Դաստակերտ
Definition_1: manufactory, edifice, building; estate, village, country house, villa.

Title: Դաստապան
Definition_1: hit of a sword; guard (of a gun).

Title: Դաստիարակեմ
Definition_1: to bring up, to educate, to instruct, to train up, to discipline.

Title: Դատ
Definition_1: lawsuit, cause, litigation; justice; — վարել, դնել, to proceed, to sue in law, to bring an action; — առնել, to do justice; to judge a lawsuit; — տալ հատուցանել, to judge one's self, to condemn one's self, to be condemned; ի — կոչել, to summon, to cite.

Title: Դատախազ
Definition_1: accuser, informer, plaintiff; — լինել cf. Դատախազեմ.

Title: Դատախազեմ
Definition_1: to accuse, to denounce; to oppose.

Title: Դատախնդիր
Definition_1: judge; pleader; — լինել, to litigate, to pleade, to contest; to be revenged.

Title: Դատակնքեմ
Definition_1: to sentence, to execute, to condemn, to censure, to proscribe, to fulminate.

Title: Դատապարտ
Definition_2: crime; — առնել, to condemn, cf. Դատապարտեմ; — լինել, to be condemned.

Title: Դատապարտեմ
Definition_1: to condemn, to damn, to censure, to reprobate; to sentence, to execute.

Title: Դատաստան
Definition_1: judgement, discernment, criticism; sentence, condemnation; act, arbitration, judgement; justice; cause, lawsuit, proceedings; -աւ, judicially; կոչել ի —, to summon, to cite before a judge; — տալ, to be condemned; — առնել, cf. Դատապարտեմ, cf. Մեղադրեմ.

Title: Դատարկ
Definition_1: empty, void; hollow; vain, useless; idle, indolent, unoccupied, lazy;

Title: Դատարկաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak to no purpose or in vain.

Title: Դատարկաձեռն
Definition_1: emptyhanded, without a present, without offering.

Title: Դատարկայած
Definition_1: vagabond, sauntering, lounging; — լինել, to lounge, to saunter, to stroll.

Title: Դատարկանամ
Definition_1: to be vacant, void; to be empty; to be useless; to be idle or unoccupied.

Title: Դատարկապորտ
Definition_1: blackguard, rogue, rover, vagabond; — կեանս վարել, to play the blackguard.

Title: Դատարկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to empty, to evacuate, to clear; to exhaust.

Title: Դատարկութիւն
Definition_1: emptying, vacuum, space; evacuation; vacuity; vacancy; exhaustion; idleness, sloth-fulness, laziness, leisure.

Title: Դատաւոր
Definition_1: judge; arbiter; counsellor, corrector; bailiff; police-officer; censurer, critic.

Title: Դատաւորաբար
Definition_1: like a judge, in justice, with authority.

Title: Դատաւորական
Definition_1: judicial, done by authority of justice.

Title: Դատաւորութիւն
Definition_1: judicature, office of judge, bailiwic, officialty, administration.

Title: Դատափետ
Definition_1: summoned; ill-treated; — առնել, to condemn, to blame, to reprobate, to ill-treat, to offend in words, cf. Դատափետեմ, cf. Հարստահարեմ, cf. Նեղեմ, cf. Ատեմ.

Title: Դատեմ
Definition_1: to judge; to discern; to criticize; to know; to think, to esteem; to reason; to condemn; — ընդ ումեք, to bring an action against some one; հրով, ի հուր —, to burn, to consume by fire, cf. Այրիմ; սրով՝ ի սուր —, to kill with a stroke of a sword, cf. Կոտորեմ, cf. Խոցեմ.

Title: Դատումն
Definition_1: judgement, opinion, sentiment, advice, understanding; judgement, reasoning, criticism; discernment, decision.

Title: Դար
Definition_1: age; century; ոսկի՝ ոսկեղինիկ —, the golden age; միջին —, the middle ages; ի մերում դարու, in our times; դարուց ի դարս, from age to age, for ever and ever.

Title: Դար
Definition_1: height, hill, eminence, precipice; դարիւ եւ դարիւ գալ, to come, to flow in many waves or surges.

Title: Դար
Definition_1: even number; — եւ կոճատ խաղալ, to play at even or odd.

Title: Դարահոս՞՞՞լինիմ
Definition_1: to throw, to precipitate one's self, to tumble down.

Title: Դարան
Definition_1: cupboard; watch, ambush, ambuscade; trap, caltrop, gin, snare; subterraneous passage; plot, cheat, deceit, intrigue; — գործել՝ դնել, ի — մտանել, to lay an ambush, to lie in ambuscade, to be on the watch; to dupe, to cheat, to plot; — մատենից, book-case.

Title: Դարանագործ
Definition_1: insidious, footpad, plotter; — լինել, to seek to surprize some one, to watch, to beset, to supplant.

Title: Դարանայոյզ առնեմ
Definition_1: to investigate or observe the ambushes, to beware of.

Title: Դարանիմ
Definition_1: to lie in ambuscade, to be on the watch, to suborn, to circumvent; to hide one's self.

Title: Դարաստան
Definition_1: garden; orchard, place planted with trees.

Title: Դարբնութիւն
Definition_1: lock-smiths trade or work, ironmongers trade, ironware, smithcraft.

Title: Դարգճակալ
Definition_1: that lies on a litter, that is ill in bed.

Title: Դարեմ
Definition_1: to roost, to perch; to remain, to stay.

Title: Դարձ
Definition_1: turn, circuit, return; reference; reduction; increase; burden (of a song); conversion, change; — յետս or ընդ կրունկն, recoil, putting or drawing back, retreat; — հիւանդութեան, paroxysm; — փոխարինի, recompense, return; retaliation, compensation, retribution; — առնել, to turn, to turn about, to return;

Title: Դարձադարձ
Definition_1: return; relapse; new fall; — առնել, to turn or return several times.

Title: Դարձեալ
Definition_2: again, anew; moreover, besides, otherwise, even, likewise; bis; also.

Title: Դարձընթաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to pass by; to return running.

Title: Դարձուած
Definition_1: circuit, return; reward, retribution; answer, report, signification; — բանից, phrase, sentence, style.

Title: Դարձուցանեմ
Definition_1: to return, to turn; to avert; to restore; to bring or carry back, to reinstate; to bring back, to recall; to return, to send back; to make over again; to reduce; to distract; to abate; to resolve; to convert; — յետս or ի բաց —, to revoke; to reject; to reflect; — անդրէն, to cede, to resign, to yield; — զերախտիս, to remunerate; — զմաղձ, to vomit.

Title: Դարման
Definition_1: cure, dressing; culture; remedy, reparation; refreshment; provender, provision, victuals; subsistence, nourishment, maintenance; — տամ, cf. Դարմանեմ.

Title: Դարմանեմ
Definition_1: to nourish, to sustain, to feed; to fodder; to cherish, to foment; to physic, to dress, to heal; to repair.

Title: Դաւ
Definition_1: stratagem, fraud, contrivance, machination, cheat, circumvention, deceit, trick, imposture, plot, snare, trap, device; — գործել, to conspire, to circumvent, to plot, to lie in wait; — անձին առնել, to kill one's self; —ով, deceitfully, treacherously.

Title: Դաւաճան
Definition_1: fraudulent, fallacious, disloyal; impostor; felon, cheat, prevaricator, sycophant, traitor.

Title: Դաւաճանեմ
Definition_1: to betray, to defraud, to deceive, to prevaricate.

Title: Դաւաճանութիւն
Definition_1: treason, deceit, intrigue, rebellion, fraud, prevarication; stratagem; ambush.

Title: Դաւանաւոր
Definition_1: that has or gives the confession of faith.

Title: Դաւանեմ
Definition_1: to confess, to avow, to profess, to protest.

Title: Դաւեմ
Definition_1: to defraud, to cheat, to contrive.

Title: Դափեմ
Definition_1: to strike or sound the tabour.

Title: Դափիւն
Definition_1: the sound of a tabour; uproar, noise, rumour.

Title: Դափր՞՞՞հատանեմ
Definition_1: to tap, to stamp with the foot, to scrape the ground.

Title: Դդըչիւն
Definition_1: noise, murmuring of a river; uproar, noise, cry.

Title: Դեգ
Definition_1: odd, fantastical, morose, difficult, extravagant, surly, humour-some man, peevish, unsociable, intractable, froward, untoward, restive.

Title: Դեգերիմ
Definition_1: to frequent company; to trifle; to wander, to recreate one's self.

Title: Դեդեւեմ
Definition_1: to vacillate, to stagger, to totter.

Title: Դեդեւիմ
Definition_1: to vacillate, to totter, to waver, to shake, to fluctuate.

Title: Դեհկան
Definition_1: governor of a province; cf. Կողմնակալ.

Title: Դեհկանութիւն
Definition_1: government of a province; office or dignity of the governor of a province; cf. Կողմնակալութիւն.

Title: Դեղ
Definition_1: remedy, medicine, medicament, purgative, potion, draught; spice, drug; cure, dressing; poison, venom; ink; die, colour; amulet, talisman; — դալար, grass, herbage, green; nacea; dress; verdure; ամենաբոյժ —, panacea; — մատուցանել, to physic, to dress; — առնուլ, to take a remedy; to take poison; անոյշ՝ դառն՝ սաստիկ՝ գօրաւոր՝ ազդու —, sweet, bitter, violent, powerful, efficacious remedy.

Title: Դեղագործ
Definition_1: apothecary; that prepares tinctures, physic or poison.

Title: Դեղագործութիւն
Definition_1: pharmacy; art of preparing tinctures or physic; painting.

Title: Դեղադիր
Definition_1: who applies a plaister or administers medicine;

Title: Դեղակուր
Definition_1: poisoned; դեղակուր առնեմ, to poison, to give poison, to infect with poisoned; դեղակուր լինիմ, to be poisoned.

Title: Դեղանի
Definition_1: beggars pouch or wallet; skirt, border.

Title: Դեղավաճառ
Definition_1: druggist, grocer, quack, apothecary; seller of tinctures.

Title: Դեղատու
Definition_1: that gives medicaments; poisoner; sorcerer, bewitcher.

Title: Դեղատուեմ
Definition_1: to physic, to cure; to poison.

Title: Դեղատութիւն
Definition_1: medicament, remedy, medicine, cure; poisoning, act of giving poison; witchcraft, enchantment.

Title: Դեղարան
Definition_1: pharmacy, apothecarys or chemists shop; drug-box.

Title: Դեղեմ
Definition_1: to poison; to infect with poison; to physic; to dye.

Title: Դեղըմպու
Definition_1: that takes physic; that takes poison.

Title: Դեղնիմ
Definition_1: to become yellow; to become fair; to grow red; to become pale.

Title: Դենագարձ
Definition_1: that has forsaken his religion, irreligious.

Title: Դեռ
Definition_1: still, yet, to this hour; newly, recently.

Title: Դեռաբողբոջ
Definition_1: born, grown or produced recently; young, new.

Title: Դեռախօս
Definition_1: that has recently begun to speak.

Title: Դեռածին
Definition_1: recently born or produced; that has recently engendered.

Title: Դեռակիթ
Definition_1: fresh; — կաթն՝ ձու, fresh milk, new-laid eggs.

Title: Դերեւ
Definition_1: eluded, vain, useless, frustrated; —, ի —, ի —ս առնել, կացուցանել, հանել, to frustrate, to deceive, to deprive, to elude, to avoid, to render vain, to render abortive, to make useless; to annul, to invalidate; —, —ս լինել, ելանել, to deceive one's self, to be frustrated, to deprive one's self, to be vain, useless, to miscarry, to escape.

Title: Դեւ
Definition_1: demon, devil, evil spirit; gnome, spirit, genius.

Title: Դէզ
Definition_1: heap, assemblage, collection, confused collection, mass, pile.

Title: Դէզադէզ
Definition_1: much heaped up; in great quantity.

Title: Դէմ
Definition_1: cf. Դէմք; — դնել, to propose, to purpose, to design; զ— ունել, to oppose, to resist, to face, to endure, to thwart, to cross; ի դիմի հարկանել, to encounter, to assail, to attack; to strike, to oppose;
Definition_3: — յանդիման, before, opposite, in presence; publicly, openly, in face; — ի —, — առ —, face to face, man to man; ի դիմի, before, opposite to.

Title: Դէմք
Definition_1: aspect, sight, visage, front; face, presence; air, mien, countenance; manner, fashion, form; regard, consideration; person, hypostasis; — բայից, the persons of verbs; — գերանուանց, the persons of pronouns; ի դիմաց, in front, before; ասա նմա ի դիմաց իմոց, tell him from me; ի դէմս ածել, to represent, to remonstrate; to reproach, to object; դեղնեալ or այլագունեալ՝ առոյգ տխուր՝ զուարթ ou զուարթատեսիլ՝ խոժոռ՝ խորշոմ —, pale, florid, sad, serene, severe, wrinlded, livid, disfigured countenance; դիմիւ ելանել, to run up to one; յամենայն դէմս, thoroughly.

Title: Դէպ
Definition_1: fit, proper, suitable, decent, convenient; accident, case, incident, hazard, chance; ի — լինել, to suit, to be proper or fit; ի — ժամանակի, in due time; — լինել, to chance, to happen, to fall out accidentally; ի — գալ՝ ելանել՝ պատահել, to agree, to suit, to be convenient; to succeed, to happen; ի — է, it is hecoming, necessary; — է, it is possible; — թուիլ, to appear suitable; եթէ — տացէ, if by chance; — եղեւ ընձ, it has happened to me; — եղեւ ի միում աւուրց, it happened one day;
Definition_2: towards, with respect to, in the place where; to the side of; — եւ —, very suitable; properly;
Definition_3: —ու —, fixedly, attentively; — նկատել, to look at with surprise or astonishment.

Title: Դէպք
Definition_1: occurrence, accident, chance, event, incident, hazard, fortune, fate, conjuncture, circumstance, contingency; season, place;
Definition_2: ըստ դիպաց, ի դիպաց իմն, fortuitously, by chance, incidentally, occasionally.

Title: Դէտ
Definition_1: guard, guardian, inspector; spy; sentinel, sentry; informer, emissary; examiner; object, design, end; observatory; — ունել, առնել, to look, to observe attentively.

Title: Դէտակն ունիմ
Definition_1: to regard, to look attentively; to be on the watch, to lie in wait; — ի վեր ունել, ամբառնալ, to look with attention, to raise the eyes.

Title: Դժբախտութիւն
Definition_1: misfortune, ill luck, disgrace, disaster, adversity.

Title: Դժգունիմ
Definition_1: to be discoloured, to fade, to lose colour.

Title: Դժկամ
Definition_1: involuntary, disgusted, tired; disastrous, disagreeable; — լինել, գտանիլ, to be angry, displeased.

Title: Դժկամակեմ
Definition_1: to be angry, displeased, tired, to dislike, to grieve; to disobey, to oppose.

Title: Դժկամակութիւն
Definition_1: disgust, aversion, dislike, distaste, vexation; resistance.

Title: Դժնաբոյս
Definition_1: of a bad plant; whose production is had.

Title: Դժնահայեաց
Definition_1: that has a bad or malignant look or aspect; haggard.

Title: Դժնդակ
Definition_1: painful, troublesome, uneasy, tiresome, bitter, odious, cruel; haughty, austere, grievous, vexatious, mortal, terrible.

Title: Դժնդակագոյն
Definition_1: very troublesome, very harsh, haughty, wicked.

Title: Դժնդականամ
Definition_1: to be angry, to make ones self odious, rude or troublesome.

Title: Դժնդակխտէգ
Definition_1: that wounds; that penetrates like a fatal dart.

Title: Դժնդակարմատ
Definition_1: that has a bad or bitter root.

Title: Դժնդակութիւն
Definition_1: atrocity, enormity; cruelty, inhumanity, inclemency; bittorness; harshness; intemperateness.

Title: Դժնեակ
Definition_1: atrocious, haughty, violent, tyrannical; harsh, grievous, severe, austere, difficult.

Title: Դժնեմ
Definition_1: to be angry, haughty, to become atrocious or fierce.

Title: Դժոխալուր
Definition_1: harsh to the ear, that has a disagreeable sound.

Title: Դժոխախեռ
Definition_1: very bad, wicked, atrocious, fierce, wild.

Title: Դժոխակէզ
Definition_1: what burns or is burnt in hell.

Title: Դժոխամարտ
Definition_1: inexpugnable; that war against the devil.

Title: Դժոխապետ
Definition_1: ehief or prince of hell, Satan.

Title: Դժոխելանելի
Definition_1: very diffiicult to ascend or to issue.

Title: Դժոխըմբրագոյն
Definition_1: more or very hard, very insupportable.

Title: Դժուար
Definition_1: difficult, vexatious, incommodious; rough, rugged; —ք լերանց, rock, cragged or steep place; ի — լինել, to be in agony; ի — անկանել, to run the risk, to be in danger; —օք բերել, to be afflicted.

Title: Դժուարաբարոյ
Definition_1: whimsical, odd, capricious, humoursome, hard, impracticable.

Title: Դժուարաբաց
Definition_1: obscure, that is not clear or open.

Title: Դժուարադէպ
Definition_1: rare, extraordinary, that happens with difficulty.

Title: Դժուարաթափ
Definition_1: that can be freed or set at liberty with difficulty.

Title: Դժուարալոյծ
Definition_1: difficult to be untied or explained.

Title: Դժուարալուր
Definition_1: hard of hearing, rather deaf; inexorable, hard, inflexible

Title: Դժուարախիլ
Definition_1: difficult to root out or detach.

Title: Դժուարակիր
Definition_1: burdensome, onerous, heavy; difficult, painful, vexatious.

Title: Դժուարակնճիռն
Definition_1: full of difficulties, very complicated, embarrassed.

Title: Դժուարահաճ
Definition_1: discontented, disgusted, weary; disgusting, unpleasant, disagreeable, tiresome.

Title: Դժուարանամ
Definition_1: to be difficult, to have trouble; to be angry, perplexed.

Title: Դժուարավաստակ
Definition_1: difficult to cultivate, rough, hard, uncultivated; painful.

Title: Դժուարատես
Definition_1: that sees, comprehends with difficulty; obscure.

Title: Դժուարատեսութիւն
Definition_1: difficulty or trouble of seeing, of understanding; obscurity.

Title: Դժուարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render difficult, to embarrass, to entangle.

Title: Դժուարափակ
Definition_1: shut or enclosed in a narrow compass.

Title: Դժուարընկալ
Definition_1: that has trouble in conceiving or understanding; difficult to understand, ohscure.

Title: Դժուարիմ
Definition_1: to be angry, enraged, vexed, offended; to have trouble or difficulty.

Title: Դժուարին
Definition_1: difficult, hard, impracticable, painful, laborious, fatiguing, grievous, unpleasant, vexatious, thorny, delicate, imposing; heavy, weighty, onerous, rough, rugged.

Title: Դժուարորս
Definition_1: difficult to be caught in hunting or fishing.

Title: Դժուարութիւն
Definition_1: difficulty, trouble, fatigue, distress, perplexity, intrigue, inconvenience, contrariety; difficult point, knot, hinderance, obstacle; asperity, rigidity; բայց ոչ առանց դժուարութեան, but not without fatigue; բառնալ զ—, to smoothe difficulties; — կրել, to meet with difficulties; —ս հանել, to make difficulties; յաղթել դժուարութեանց, to overcome difficulties.

Title: Դժուարուսումն
Definition_1: difficult to learn; who learns with difficulty.

Title: Դժպատեհ
Definition_1: indecent, unsuitable, unbecoming, unworthy, impertinent, loathsome;

Title: Դժպարտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to confound, to convince, to cover with shame.

Title: Դժպհի
Definition_1: refractory, discordant, contrary, opponent, disagreeable, vexatious.

Title: Դժպհիմ
Definition_1: to be angry, enraged; to resist, to oppose.

Title: Դժրողութիւն
Definition_1: fraud, infidelity, perfidy, non-observance; snare, contravention; deceit.

Title: Դիագող
Definition_1: who lifts or plunders dead bodies; who steals idols

Title: Դիազարդեմ
Definition_1: to dress a dead body; to embalm; to bury.

Title: Դիազարդութիւն
Definition_1: act of dressing a dead body; act of embalming; burial

Title: Դիազերծ առնեմ
Definition_1: to disinter, to strip dead bodies.

Title: Դիաթաւալ
Definition_1: dead, killed, stretched on the ground; — կացուցանել, — յերկիր կործանել, to overturn, to throw down dead bodies, to strike stiff to the ground.

Title: Դիակն
Definition_1: corpse, dead body; պաճուճել գեղովք զ—, to embalm; առնել — անթուելի, to make great carnage; դիակունք կռոց, destruction of idols.

Title: Դիակնանամ
Definition_1: to become a corpse, to die.

Title: Դիասնունդ՞՞՞լինիմ
Definition_1: to be nourished with a mothers milk, to suck milk from the breast.

Title: Դիդրաքմայ
Definition_1: didrachm, piece of money; cf. Երկդրամեան.

Title: Դիեմ
