Definition_1: recovery of senses, return to sense, amendment; wisdom, prudence; sobriety, chastity; watchfulness, watching; զգաստութեամբ, soberly; — ի կերակուրս, abstemiousness; — մըտաց, readiness of wit, presence of mind; դառնալ, գալ ի —, to recover one's self, or one's wits, to come to one's self again; to be cured (of), weaned (from); ածել ի —, cf. Զգաստացուցանեմ.

Title: Զգացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to warn, to advise, to notify, to instruct, to inform, to announce.

Title: Զգենում
Definition_1: to clothe, to dress one's self, to put on one's back, to put on, to wear, to put on clothes; — հանդերձ սգոյ, to put on mourning; — հանդերձս ուրախութեան, to put on garments of gladness; մի զգեցցի այր զգեստ կանացի, man shall not put on the garments of woman; բարւոք զգենու, he dresses well, with taste; մարմին —, to incarnate, to take on himself human nature; — զարգարութիւն, to clothe one's self with justice; to do good works; փառս եւ պատիւ —, to clothe one's self with glory and honour; զօրութիւն —, to clothe one's self with strength, to gather strength; — զպատկեր ուրուք, to assume the appearance of another person, to resemble; զգենում բանին զմարմին, cf. Մարմնանամ, cf. Մարդանամ.

Title: Զգեստ
Definition_1: dress, robe, garment, clothes; — յօրինել ումեք, to dress, to make a dress for one; — ամենօրեայ, every day clothes; — հարսանեաց, wedding garb; — այրութեան, widows weeds; սեաւ —ք, dress coat; պաշտօնական —, regimentals; հասարակաց —ուք, in plain or private clothes; — աւազանին, baptismal grace; ծառայական —, towel, napkin; — ստին, boot, shoe; մերկ ի —ուց, undressed, disrobed, naked; դարան —ուց, clothes-press.

Title: Զգեստապարոյր
Definition_1: clothed, dressed; as a dress, that serves to clothe one's self with; surrounded, covered with a dress.

Title: Զգեստասէր
Definition_1: loving to array one's self in finery.

Title: Զգետասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of fine clothes, of dressing showily, dandyism.

Title: Զգեստիկ
Definition_1: bad dress; little coat, small garment.

Title: Զգետնեմ
Definition_1: to fling down, to throw on the ground, to beat down, to overturn; զգետնեաց զնա դեւն ի միջի անդ, the devil had thrown him in the midst.

Title: Զգեցութիւն
Definition_1: dressing or robing one's self; մարմնոյ զգեցմամբ, clothing himself in flesh.

Title: Զգեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to clothe, to dress, to put a dress on any one; to furnish with clothes, to adorn; եթէ զխոտն ի վայրի Աստուած այնպէս զգեցուցանէ, if God so clothe the grass of the field.

Title: Զգլխեմ գինւով
Definition_1: to inebriate, to get tipsy; to fly to the head as wine does.

Title: Զգնամ
Definition_1: to walk, to take a walk, a turn, to walk out; — ի վերայ տանեաց, ի բուրաստանի, to walk upon the roofs, in the garden; — ընդ եղբ ծովուն, to wander along the sea shore.

Title: Զգոյշ
Definition_1: sly, circurnspect, considerate, guarded, wary; sure, safe, secure; զգուշ լինել կալ, cf. Զգուշանամ; ի զգուշի առնել, cf. Զգուշացուցանեմ; — վայր, place of safety.

Title: Զգուշագոյն
Definition_1: very or more circumspect, very strict, rigorous; more sure; — առնիցէք զորդիսն Իսրայէլի ի պղծութեանց նոցա, you shall cause the children of Israel to avoid their uncleanness.

Title: Զգուշալի
Definition_1: hurtful, to be abstained from or avoided; important, imposing, considerable; cautious, circumspect; certain, secure, sure.

Title: Զգուշակ
Definition_1: that renders cautious; that announces, warns.

Title: Զգուշական
Definition_1: hurtful; to be avoided; cf. Զգուշաւոր; sober, moderate; — կենցաղ, կեանք, ascetic life.

Title: Զգուշանամ
Definition_1: to take care, to provide one's self, to watch, to superintend, to look after, to be cautious, to defend one's self, to mistrust; to evade, to fly, to keep, to stand out of the way; to manage with economy; to abate, to secure one's self, to observe, to parry, to consider, to reserve to one's self, to act up to ones dignity, to retain; — անձին, to take care of one's self, to be on one's guard; — յառաջ, to await the future; — պահել, — ի կերակոց, to fast; to diet; — զսաս ուրաք ի փայտի, to put in irons, to lay by the heels; — ի կառաց, to get out of the way.

Title: Զգուշացող
Definition_1: cautious, wary, circumspect, prudent; ոչ —, inconsiderate, unwary, negligent.

Title: Զգուշացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to precaution; to forewarn, to preserve; — զբերան իւր, to guard one's tongue, to keep the tongue between the teeth.

Title: Զգուշաւոր
Definition_1: provident, circumspect, considerate; exact, just, punctual, scrupulous; sly, politic; sober, moderate; wary, mature.

Title: Զգուշողական
Definition_1: that conserves or keeps in safe custody.

Title: Զգուշութիւն
Definition_1: sliness, precaution, circumspection, consideration, guard, watch, attention, measure, constraint, preservation, management, heed, admonition, defence; discretion; exactitude, accuracy, punctuality; foresight; reserve; diet; sobriety; դնել ի զգուշութեան, to heed, to assure; դնել ծովու —, to set a bar to the sea, to put a dyke; — տալ, to prohibit, to forbid; — ի կերակրոց, diet, regime; յառաջատես —, foresight; — եղեալ նմա՝ զոր նայն խոկայր, he having divined his thoughts; զգուշութեամբ, cf. Զգուշաբար.

Title: Զգրգռեմ
Definition_1: to provoke, to incite, to excite, to irritate, to incense

Title: Զգրգռիմ
Definition_1: to grow angry, to become incensed, provoked, exasperated, to chafe at.

Title: Զգօն
Definition_1: wise, learned, skilful; sober, discreet, prudent; tame, familiar, gentle.

Title: Զգօնաբարոյ
Definition_1: good, well-behaved, peaceful, quiet, affable, courteous.

Title: Զգօնանամ
Definition_1: to become wise; to grow familiar.

Title: Զգօնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render wise; to tame, to subdue, to humanize.

Title: Զգօնութիւն
Definition_1: wisdom, maturity, good sense, good judgment; mildness, gentleness, benignity, affability; —, Գիրք զգօնութեան, the Book of Wisdom and the Proverbs of Solomon; սկիգբն — զգօնութեան երկիւղ Տէառն, the fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.

Title: Զեան
Definition_1: damage, loss, prejudice; — առնել, to damage, to injure.

Title: Զելանեմ
Definition_1: to go out, to free one's self, to set one's self at liberty.

Title: Զեկուցանեմ
Definition_1: to warn, to announce, to declare, to notify, to learn, to instruct, to inform; — կանխաւ, to foretell.

Title: Զեղանիմ
Definition_1: to flock together, to abound, to overabound, to flow, to inundate, to overflow, to purge, to run over, to gush out; to diffuse itself, to spread itself; to rush upon one, to assault; cf. Զեղում.

Title: Զեղխ
Definition_1: intemperate, lewd, debauched, luxurious, dissolute, spoiled; slippery, lubricous, inconstant, voluble; frail, weak; —ք են ճանապարհք նորա, his ways are dissolute.

Title: Զեղխեմ
Definition_1: to abandon ones self to luxury, excess, debauch, to be dissolute; to be intemperate, licentious, prodigal, extravagant; — ի դինւոջ, to drink hard, to gormandize; ըստ մոլորութեանն Բաղաամու զեղխեցան զհետ վարձուց, they ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward.

Title: Զեղխութիւն
Definition_1: intemperance, orgies, debauch, luxury, excess, extravagance, extremity, depravation, lust, licentiousness.

Title: Զեղծ
Definition_1: dissolute, incontinent, free, wanton, debauched; spoiled; careless, neglected, indolent, sluggish;
Definition_3: negligently.

Title: Զեղծանեմ
Definition_1: to spoil, to ruin; to abuse, to deceive, to delude, to seduce, to beguile; to rob, to steal, to ravish; զեղծեմ զգատաւորս (ընչիւք), to corrupt judges.

Title: Զեղծանիմ
Definition_1: to be spoiled, ruined; to be abused, corrupted; to make a bad use of, to misuse; — իշխանութեամբն, to abuse one's power.

Title: Զեղում
Definition_1: to shed, to pour out, to spill; to fill up; — ումեք, (յօք) զվարդապետութիւն, to preach redundantly, to be verbose; բազում ծաղր զեղեալ հեղուլ, to laugh immoderately; զեղուին զնովաւ զամենայն ամբոխն, the people crowded around him.

Title: Զեղում
Definition_1: cf. Զեղանիմ; — խնդութեամբ, to be filled with joy; — ծովու, to be at the flood; — իմիք ի յուշոյ, to slip one's memory, to forget; — զոմամբ, to embrace, to clasp to one's bosom; զեղաւ սիրտ նորա, his heart swelled with emotion, overflowed, outpoured itself.

Title: Զեղումն
Definition_1: affluence, abundance, exuberance; breaking out, overflowing, defluxion; shedding, effusion; jet, eruption; — խնդութեան, transport, rapture; — շնորհաց, fullness or abundance of grace; — սրտի, overflowing, outpouring, effusion, largeness of heart; — վտակաց, overflowing or inundation.

Title: Զեղուն
Definition_1: heaped, brimful, redundant; թաթաղուն, շարժուն եւ —, pressed down, shaken together and running over.

Title: Զեղչեմ
Definition_1: to restrain, to retrench, to contract; to throw into the shade, to eclipse, to darken, to obscure, to cloud;

Title: Զեղջ
Definition_2: repentant, contrite; — լինել մտաց ուրուք, to scruple; to have qualms of conscience, to be smitten with remorse; — լինել ումեք, — ապաշաւ անկանիլ ի միտս, զղջի ունել զոք, ի — գալ, հարկանիլ, ի — ապաշաւանաց գալ, ընդունել, to repent, to afflict one's conscience; ի — ածել, — բերել, to cause to repent, to reform; որպիսի՜ — կալցի զմեզ, how we shall repent!

Title: Զեմեղ
Definition_1: cf. Զետեղ; — պահել, to place in safety.

Title: Զեմեղեմ
Definition_1: to have pity or compassion; to free from danger.

Title: Զենարան
Definition_1: shambles, slaughterhouse; altar; the Cross, the Holy Rood.

Title: Զենլի
Definition_1: victim, that is ready to be sacrificed; immolation.

Title: Զենում
Definition_1: to slaughter, to kill; to immolate, to sacrifice.

Title: Զեռամ
Definition_1: to creep; to swarm; to crawl; — եռալ, to burn, to be fervid; — ցանկութեամբ, to burn with concupiscence; յամենայն զեռնոց որ զեռայցեն ի վերայ երկրի, from all creeping things that creep upon the earth.

Title: Զեռնում
Definition_1: to boil, to bubble up; to be inflamed, to be on fire.

Title: Զետեղ
Definition_2: placed, arranged; assured, firm; — առնուլ, to place one's self, to put one's self, to stop, to stand still, to halt, cf. Ետեղանամ.

Title: Զետեղեմ
Definition_1: to place, to deposit, to put, to establish, to dispose, to plant, to install, to procure a situation or place for.

Title: Զետեղիմ
Definition_1: to place one's self, to install or settle or establish one's self; to find a situation, to obtain or find a place.

Title: Զետեղուած
Definition_1: placing, settlement, installation; disposition, arrangement, ordering.

Title: Զերթ
Definition_1: as, the same as, as well as, like.

Title: Զերծ
Definition_2: deliverance, safety; — առնել, cf. Զերծանեմ; — կալ, լինել; to be secure from, sheltered from, exempt from; — կացուցանել, to shelter, to secure, to screen; to exempt, to free, to dispense from.

Title: Զերծանեմ
Definition_1: to take away, to earry off; to detach; to atrip, to despoil, to rob.

Title: Զերծանիմ
Definition_1: to be freed, delivered, to escape, to make one's escape, to disengage one's self, to save one's self, to run away, to detach one's self; to slip off, to slide away; — յառողջութիւն, to be cured; — ի խաւարէ ի լոյս, to pass from darkness to light; — յամուսնոյ, to be widowed, deprived of one's husband.

Title: Զերծում
Definition_1: to dispossess, to strip, to carry away; to snatch, to deprave, to ravish, to pull off;
Definition_2: to free one's self, to get rid of, to have ricourse to, to escape to, to take refuge.

Title: Զերծումն
Definition_1: deliverance, liberation, freedom; stripping off, spoiling, divesting; — ելից, decease, death.

Title: Զերծուցանեմ
Definition_1: to deliver, to free, to save, to undo, to disengage, to liberate, to preserve, to get out; — ի մահու պարտեաց, to reprieve from capital punishment, from death.

Title: Զեփիւռ
Definition_1: zephyr; քաղցրաշունչ, the gentle -; զովարար —, refreshing breeze; cf. Էրան.

Title: Զզուանք
Definition_1: oppression, vexation, vexatious measures; nausea, disgust, aversion, loathing, rising of the stomach; horror, detestation, abomination.

Title: Զզուեմ
Definition_1: to disgust, to vex, to persecute, to importune; to revile, to abuse, to outrage.

Title: Զզուիմ
Definition_1: to be disgusted, tired, to hate, to ahhor, to abominate, to detest.

Title: Զէն
Definition_1: arm, weapon; armament, armour, munition, harness; հին —ն, woman, female; — եւ զարդ, armour, arming; — ի ձեռին, in arms; armed, arms in the hands; զինու զօրութեամբ, with arms; hy main strength; —ս կրել, to carry, to bear arms; ի — գնալ, ընթանալ, դառնալ, — առնուլ, զգենուլ, ի վեր առնուլ, ի — վառիլ, to fly to arms, to buckle on one's armour, to take up arms, to arm one's self; — առնուլ ընդդէմ, to bear arms against; ի — վառել, to put under arms; ի բաց թողուլ զ—ս, to lay down one's arms; հրաման կրելոյ —ս, license to shoot; հրաթափ —ք (հրազէնք), fire arms, guns, muskets, rifles; հատու —ք (սուսեր սուին), side arms, weapons, cutting, edge; վառեալ ի — եւ ի զարդ, armed from head to foot; առաջին փորձ զինուց, one's first passage in arms; այր զինու, man at arms; ազգ կիրթ ի հրահանդս զինուց, a nation inured to war; ի — ! ի -! to arms! — ի վեր ! — յառաջ ! — ի վայր ! carry, present, ground arms ! կազմ ի — ! ready ! — կալէք, — առէք, — ի ձեռս ! support arms! սպանամել զինուք, to put the sword; ելանել ընդ —ս, cf. Ելանեմ; դուլ զինուց, a truce; սահմանք քաջաց —ն իւրեանց, the arms of the brave decide the limits of their power.

Title: Զէնընկէց
Definition_1: that abandons, throws away his arms, fugitive; — փախստեայ գնալ, to throw down one's arms and flee; — լինել, to lay down one's arms, to unarm, to surrender; — առնել, to unarm, to disarm.

Title: Զէնընտիր
Definition_1: splendidly armed, well mailed; — ժողովել, to riunite well-armed troops or persons.

Title: Զընկենում
Definition_1: to throw, to thrust, to cast far from one; to drive away, to remove; — զամօթ, to throw off all sense of shame, to become immodest.

Title: Զի
Definition_1: for, because, in order that, to the end that; that;
Definition_2: զի՞, what? what thing? why? for what reason? զի՞ կայ իմ եւ քո, what do you want, or what do you want of me ? զի՞ է զի, what is the motive for which? why? what is it ? why then ? զի՞ է զի յարեւու եկիք այսօր, how happens it that you are returned before sun-down? քեզ զի՞ փոյթ է, what does it matter to you ? զի՞ է որդեակ, what do you want my son?
Definition_3: զի՜, how! how much! զի՜ անգութ ես, how cruel you are! զի՜ բարի կամ զի՜ վայելուչ, how good and how pleasant!

Title: Զիա՞րդ
Definition_1: how, of what sort, in what manner, according to; what? how? why? for what reason?
Definition_2: how! how much! — դժուարին է ! how difficult it is!
Definition_3: —ն, զ—ն, condition, quality, how, the why, the wherefore; գիտել զ—ն ամենայնի, to know the why and the wherefore of every thing.

Title: Զի՞ արդեօք
Definition_1: what? how? what is it? — Պետրոսն եղեւ ? what has happened to Peter?

Title: Զիղջ
Definition_1: regret, grief; — է ինձ, I regret, I repent; — մեծ է ինձ, I bitterly reproach myself, I am very sorry; cf. Զեղջ.

Title: Զի մի
Definition_1: lest, for fear that, that never.

Title: Զինագործութիւն
Definition_1: trade of making arms; arming, armament.

Title: Զինադադար
Definition_1: armistice, truce; — առնել, to make a truce.

Title: Զինազարդ
Definition_1: armed, invested, furnishedwith arms; -****, to arm one's self, to take, to bear arms.

Title: Զինազարդիմ
Definition_1: to arm one's self, to put on arms.

Title: Զինախաղ
Definition_1: fencer; cf. Զինախաղութիւն; — առնել, to fence, ուսուցիչ —ի, fencing-master; մարզարան —ի, fencing-school.

Title: Զինակիր
Definition_1: that carries arms; squire; soldier, swordsman; officer.

Title: Զինակցիմ
Definition_1: to fight together, to accompany in battle.

Title: Զինահարիմ
Definition_1: to be wounded with a weapon.

Title: Զինատեաց
Definition_1: avoiding, abhorring war, desiring peace at all price.

Title: Զինաքաղ
Definition_1: gathering the arms of the fallen.

Title: Զինեմ
Definition_1: to arm, to provide with arms, to man, to equip; to provide with, to fortify.

Title: Զինիմ
Definition_1: to arm one's self, to take up arms, to oppose; to provide one's self with.

Title: Զինուոր
Definition_1: militia-man, warrior, soldier; իբրեւ զ—, in a military manner; — սոսկական, private or common soldier; հետեւակ —, foot-soldier; հեծեալ —, horse-soldier

Title: Զինուորաբար
Definition_1: in a military way, like a soldier.

Title: Զինուորակից
Definition_1: fellow-soldier; —ք իմ, my comrades, my brothers in arms.

Title: Զինուորանամ
Definition_1: to be soldier, to turn soldier.

Title: Զինուորեմ
Definition_1: to enlist, to maintain soldiers; to exercise in the art of war; to arm.

Title: Զինուորիմ
Definition_1: to take up arms, to fly to arms, to arm one's self; to oppose; to take up the profession of arms; ո՞սք երբեք զինուորիցի իւրովք թոշակօք, who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges ? զի գու զինուորիցիս նոքօք զգեղեցիկ զինուորութիւնն, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare.

Title: Զինուորութիւն
Definition_1: militia, arms, profession of war; army; armament; tactics; soldiership; մտանել, գրիլ ի —, to enlist; — հրեշտակաց, զուարթնոց, անմարմնոց, choir, or host of angels.

Title: Զի՞նչ
Definition_3: that, which, what; — կերիցուք, կամ — արբցուք, կամ — զգեցցուք, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink, what ye shall put on; — եւ իցէ, whatever, whichever; — է ինձ ? what does it matter? — կամիք ? what do you like ? — խնդրէք ? what are you seeking ? — աղագաւ ? why ? for what cause ? — օրինակ ? in what manner? — ասիցեն ? what will they say? — ինչ ? what ? — ինչ առնել էր եւ ես ոչ արարի ? what is that which I ought to have done and have not done ? — ապա ? what ? what then ?

Title: Զինչ
Definition_1: nature, substance, state of a thing.

Title: Զինչուզինչ
Definition_1: how ? what can it be ? how can it be ?

Title: Զինչպիտութիւն
Definition_1: caprice, whim, freak, humour, fantasy; ի կամս անձին զինչպիտութեան բերիլ, to follow one's own caprice or fancy; թողուլ զոք ի կամս անձին զինչպիտութեան, to leave one to his ways or caprices.

Title: Զիջանեմ
Definition_1: to calm one's self, to relent, to grow tranquil, to yield, to cool, to comply; to acquiesce, to listen, to condescend, to connive; to become extinct; — յառաջին զուարթութենէն, to lose one's cheerfulness; — յաղաչանս, to be moved by entreaties, to acquiesce in, to comply with, to yield to; զիջանէր տակաւ երթայր ջուրն եւ թուլանայր յերկրէ, the waters returned from off the earth continually; էջ եւ զիջիր ի խորս երկրի, yet shalt thou be brought down unto the nether parts of the earth.

Title: Զիջութիւն
Definition_1: calmness, tranquillity; subsiding; condescension, connivance, deference; indulgence.

Title: Զիջուցանեմ
Definition_1: to calm; to eool; to extinguish; — զոք առ ի վշտակցութիւն, to soften, to render compassionate.

Title: Զիստ
Definition_1: thigh; haunch; — կենդանեաց, leg; — կամրջի, stern; — նաւու, keel of a ship.

Title: Զիրարեմ
Definition_1: to raise a tumult or disturbance; — զաղանդ, fo divulge, to publish.

Title: Զիւրովի՞՞՞երթալ
Definition_1: to kill one's self, to put one's self to death.

Title: Զլանամ
Definition_1: to deny, to retract, to refuse, to deprive, to rocain.

Title: Զկծեմ
Definition_1: to embitter, to afflict, to torment; cf. Զկծիմ.

Title: Զկծեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to displease, to vex, to trouble, to offend, to chagrin; to nettle, to sting, to peck at; զկծեցուցից եւ ես զձեզ բանիւք, I will sting yon with my words.

Title: Զկծեցուցիչ
Definition_1: sharp, biting, piquant; — բանք, biting words, sarcasm.

Title: Զկծիմ
Definition_1: to be vexed, grieved, concerned, moved, soured, exasperated; — գինւով, to intoxicate, to get drunk.

Title: Զկնի
Definition_2: after, since, then, afterwards, hereafter, underneath, behind, one after another, next to, subsequently; Տրայիանոս կալաւ զինքնակալութիւնն — Ներուասայ, Trajan was emperor after Nerva; — միմեանց, զմիմեանց կնի, մի զմիոյ կնի, one after the other, subsequently, blow upon blow; — երկուց ամաց, two years ago; — ոչ բազում աւուրց, some days after; — ապա, at length; զերիս ամս ամ զամի —, during three successive years; եկայք — իմ, follow me; որ զմեր կնի ոչ շրջի, who is not of us; զդուռն ձգել — իւր, to shut the door behind or after one; մի զմիոյ կնի կցեալ, one tied to another; linked; եւ որ ինչ — այսորիկ, եւ որ —, and so on, & etc.; — բնութեանս, suitable or according to the nature, natural, like nature; — գալ, գնալ, երթալ, ընթանալ —, to follow; — պնդիլ, մտանել, լինեմ, to pursue, to follow up, to hunt, to persecute; — խոտորիլ, to be allured; to be carried away; մոլորիլ — խրատու, to be swayed by bad advice; — կամաց իւրոց ածել զոք, to make the slave of one's will.

Title: Զկնիս
Definition_1: that which follows, following, posterity, future, hereafter;

Title: Զհետ
Definition_1: after, then, since; with, together; — առաքել, to send for; — բերել, to add, to subjoin; — գալ, to follow, to come after; to result; to depend; գնալ, երթալ —, — շրջիլ, to follow, to go after; to imitate; — երթալ դատարկութեան, to love idleness; — ելանել, ընթանալ, հեծանել, մտանել, յարձակիլ, ունել, պնդիլ, վարիլ, to run after, to pursue, to overtake, to follow, to persecute, to be at the heels, to give chase; իւրաքանչիւր — միմեանց, one near the other, close to; — լինել ճանապարհաց ուրուք, to follow tracks; զհաց ոչ առաք — մեր, we have brought no bread with us; մի զմիոյ հետ, one after the other, a little at a time, by degrees; զոյր — ելեալ ես, who is he whom thou pursuest?

Title: Զղջամ
Definition_1: to repent; to be sorry, to regret, to complain, to acknowledge one's fault.

Title: Զղջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make repent, to affect, to move.

Title: Զղջութիւն
Definition_1: compunction, repentance, contrition; penitence; ի — գալ, ի զղջման լինել, to repent; ի — ածել, to make repent.

Title: Զճանապարհայն
Definition_1: by way of, by the way, on the way.

Title: Զմայլեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to charm, to please extremely, to fill with rapture, to enchant, to put in extasy; to satiate, to satisfy, to sate.

Title: Զմայլիմ
Definition_1: to be charmed, delighted; to enjoy; to take one's fill of, to glut one's self with, to be satiated, glutted, to be intoxicated, enraptured.

Title: Զմայլութիւն
Definition_1: satiety; delight, transport, rapture; witchery, enchantment.

Title: Զմբաղ
Definition_1: anguish, affliction, anxiety, trouble, tribulation, consternation; whimsy, wild fancy, phantom.

Title: Զմբաղիմ
Definition_1: to torment one's self, to toss about, to tumble and toss.

Title: Զմբրիմ
Definition_1: to grow torpid, stiff, numb, to be benumbed, dulled; to lose ones senses, to be stunned; to feel giddy.

Title: Զմռսեմ
Definition_1: to mix or fill with myrrh; to embalm.

Title: Զմտաւ ածեմ
Definition_1: to think, to regard, to consider; cf. Միտ.

Title: Զնդամ
Definition_1: to spare, to save, to be careful;
Definition_2: to tremble, to shiver; to throb, to palpitate.

Title: Զնդան
Definition_1: prison; տալ ի —, արդելուլ —աւ, to put in —, to throw into a dungeon; cf. Բանտ.

Title: Զնին
Definition_1: observation, examination; spectacle, view; ի — ելանել, մատչել, կալ, to visit, to go to see; to look at, to observe, to examine; ի — գալ, to come within view, to be observed.

Title: Զննարան
Definition_1: judgment hall; court of justice, tribunal.

Title: Զննեմ
Definition_1: to look at, to observe, to stare at, to aim at, to contemplate; to examine, to study, to discuss; to remark, to clear up, to recognize; to visit; to feel, to touch.

Title: Զնստանիմ
Definition_1: to settle, to grow calm, to relent.

Title: Զնստուցանեմ
Definition_1: to weigh down, to cause to sink; to depress, to calm.

Title: Զոհ
Definition_1: victim, sacrifice, immolation, host; — ողջակէզ, holocaust; — մատուցանել, to make a sacrifice; — առնել (զոք), to kill.

Title: Զոհարան
Definition_1: altar of sacrifice; vase of immolation.

Title: Զոհեալ
Definition_2: things offered to idols, flesh of the victims.

Title: Զոյգ
Definition_1: even; conjoined, united, equal, alike, similar;
Definition_2: level, without odds, equally; close to; conjointly, with, together;
Definition_3: pair, couple; —ք, —ք կշռոց, balance; a coach and two or four; — պարանոցին, nape of the neck; — մի եղանց, a yoke of oxen or bullocks; —ք իշոց, a couple of asses; —ք կաքաւուց, ատրճանակաց, brace of partridges, of pistols; — մի կօշկաց, a pair of boots; —, — ընդ, directly, forthwith, as soon; — ընդ բանին եղեւ, no sooner said than done; —ս —ս, in pairs, by twos, two and two.

Title: Զովանամ
Definition_1: to cool, to grow cool, to become cool.

Title: Զովացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to refresh; to give freshness; to refrigerate.

Title: Զովող
Definition_1: companion, fellow, comrade, mate; school-fellow, fellow-student; associate, partaker; accomplice, party, abettor, follower.

Title: Զովութիւն
Definition_1: coolness, freshness, refreshment, refrigeration; ի զովութեան երեկոյի, in the cool of the evening.

Title: Զուարակափիղ
Definition_1: chimera partaking of the bull and the elephant.

Title: Զուարթ
Definition_1: joyful, cheerful, smiling; gay, sprightly, lively, merry; serene, clear.

Title: Զուարթագեղ
Definition_1: blithesome, smiling, cheerful; — մանկութիւն, joyful youth.

Title: Զուարթագին
Definition_2: joyfully, gaily; — են աչք նորա ի գինւոյ, his eyes are merry with wine.

Title: Զուարթածաղիկ
Definition_1: smiling, florid, young, graceful; — հասակ, sprightly youth, youthfulness; — մանկութիւն, infancy, childhood, the prime of life, best time of life; — ալիք, gray-beard.

Title: Զուարթակից
Definition_1: rejoicing together; — լինիմ, to congratulate, to share ones joy, happiness or satisfaction; — առնել, to make a sharer in one's joy.

Title: Զուարթահայեաց
Definition_1: of gentle aspect, mild looking, laughing, joyous, happy.

Title: Զուարթամիտ
Definition_1: sweet or good tempered, gay, sprightly; joyful, merry.

Title: Զուարթամտութիւն
Definition_1: good humour, joyfulness, gaiety; generosity, benignity.

Title: Զուարթանամ
Definition_1: to be joyful, to rejoice, to be diverted; to rouse one's self, to give one's self up to gaiety;
Definition_2: to shine, to enlighten, to cheer up, to be kindled; to be vigilant, sober, to watch; — ի գինւոյ, to be seasoned with wine; զուարթացեալ ի գինւոյ, tipsy, cf. Գինի; զուարթացաւ սիրտ նորա, his heart was merry, expanded, dilated; զուարթացան երեսք նորա, countenance brightened up; — հրոյ, to relight, to rekindle.

Title: Զուարթատեսիլ
Definition_1: of fine aspect, pretty, beautiful, handsome; — դէմք երեսք, cheerful countenance, serene aspect.

Title: Զուարթարար
Definition_1: jesting, that makes merry, diverting; that gives joy, joyful.

Title: Զուարթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to divert, to exhilarate; to drive away melancholy, to enliven, to animate, to revive; — զմիտս, to cheer, to soothe the spirit; — զլսելիս, to delight the ears, to please, to solace.

Title: Զուարթերես
Definition_1: blithe, smiling, graceful, cheerful, laughing, pleasant looking; shameless, bold.

Title: Զուարթութիւն
Definition_1: gaiety, joy, good humour; activity, vigilance.

Title: Զուարճաբան
Definition_1: facetious, pleasant, joker, comic fellow; jocose, waggish, droll.

Title: Զուարճալի
Definition_1: pleasing, recrea, tive, delectable, delicious, diverting, mild, agreeable; jocose, merry, pleasant, jovial, smiling; —ք, pleasures, enjoyments of this world.

Title: Զուարճախօս
Definition_1: cf. Զուարճաբան; — լինել, to amuse, to joke, to tell stories; այր —, an amusing fellow; story-teller.

Title: Զուարճանալի
Definition_1: pleasing, enjoyable, fo be enjoyed; cf. Զուարճալի.

Title: Զուարճանամ
Definition_1: to enjoy, to rejoice, to delight in any thing, to be delighted, to amuse one's self, to be diverted, to play; to laugh, to jest, to divert one's self;
Definition_2: to flourish; — սրտի, to rejoice one's heart, to solace; — ընդ գեզ, to be delighted with beauty; — իբրեւ զգալարի, to flourish like an herb; զուարճացեալ ալիք, grey, hairs, hoariness.

Title: Զուարճացումն
Definition_1: rejoicing, happiness, delight; flourishing anew, growing green again.

Title: Զուարճացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to recreate, to delight, to divert, to drive away melancholy, to amuse, to give pleasure.

Title: Զուարճութիւն
Definition_1: joy, enjoyment, rejoicing, pleasure, deliciousness, delight, diversion, cheerfulness; contentment, complaisance, pleasure, pleasantry; amusement, recreation, pastime; gaiety, frolicsomeness; — տեղւոյ, amenity.

Title: Զուգաբան
Definition_1: unanimous, with ono opinion or voice.

Title: Զուգաբանեմ
Definition_1: to agree, to be of one mind.

Title: Զուգաբնակ
Definition_1: that lives or dwells together, neighbouring, adjacent.

Title: Զուգագործ
Definition_1: that works or labours together, that does the same thing.

Title: Զուգադասեմ
Definition_1: to range together, to put in the same class.

Title: Զուգաթիւ
Definition_1: even; equal, alike; of the same number; consubstantial.

Title: Զուգախաղաց
Definition_1: that stirs together, that walks with another.

Title: Զուգախառնեմ
Definition_1: to mix together, to compose, to allay.

Title: Զուգածիրանի
Definition_1: clothed with the same purple, that has the same dignity.

Title: Զուգակարգեմ
Definition_1: to put in order, to dispose; to put into verse.

Title: Զուգակշռեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to an equilibrium, to render equivalent; to equal, to compare; to counterbalance, to make up for, to counterveil.

Title: Զուգահայր
Definition_1: of the same paternity, that has the same quality as the father.

Title: Զուգահասակ
Definition_1: of equal age; of the same height.

Title: Զուգահեռագիծ
Definition_1: parallelogram; — զօրութեանց, — of forces; — յօդաւոր, parallel joint.

Title: Զուգաձայն
Definition_1: correspondent, equal, unanimous; joining in accord;
Definition_2: of one accord; — գտանիլ, to come to terms, to agree, to be of one mind;
Definition_3: to be in tune.

Title: Զուգաձայնեմ
Definition_1: to form an accord, to put in tune, to make harmony.

Title: Զուգաձայնութիւն
Definition_1: correspondence, union, equality, concord; unison, symphony;

Title: Զուգամասնեմ
Definition_1: to impart, to make partake of.

Title: Զուգաշաւիղ
Definition_1: that holds the same course, companion on the road.

Title: Զուգաշուրթն
Definition_1: of the same tongue or language.

Title: Զուգապատուութիւն
Definition_1: the same dignity, participation in the same dignity.

Title: Զուգապարակցեմ
Definition_1: to receive or rank in the same company, to associate.

Title: Զուգապարիմ
Definition_1: to mix in the same company or circle.

Title: Զուգապարութիւն
Definition_1: the same company, participation in the same company.

Title: Զուգաց
Definition_1: together, conjointly; — նստել, to sit beside, contiguous; — —, by two and two, in pairs.

Title: Զուգաւորեմ
Definition_1: to join together, to couple, to pair, to match, to tie or put two by two, to unite, to join; to liken, to compare; to marry, to join in wedlock.

Title: Զուգաւորութիւն
Definition_1: conjunction, union; coition, embrace; parity, equality; the equinox; relation, connexion; union, match, marriage; երջանիկ — դարնայնոյ ընդ աշնան, happy union of spring and autumn.

Title: Զուգեմ
Definition_2: to sum up; — զկերակուրս, to season, to flavour; — զսապատ, to make basket-work; — զոք ընդ աշխարհ, to join in wedlock.

Title: Զուգընթաց
Definition_1: that runs together, that accompanies, concomitant; — զօրութիւն, concurrent.

Title: Զուգիմ
Definition_1: to couple, to join together, to be united; to pair, to yoke, to match; to be connected with, in correspondence, in communication, to have friendly intercourse.

Title: Զուգիցս
Definition_1: in like manner, likewise, equally, as much; twice, double.

Title: Զուգութիւն
Definition_1: conjunction, coupling; equality, likeness; union, concord, agreement; coupling, pairing; conjunction, union, wedlock; communication, intercourse; կշիռ զուգութեան բերել (ընդ ումեք), to be like, to resemble, to seem like.

Title: Զուլամբիմ
Definition_1: to splay, to fall headlong, to dislocate or sprain the shoulder, to put the shoulder out of joint; cf. Երթամ.

Title: Զուսպ
Definition_1: close, narrow; subdued; — եւ զերծ ի մարդկանէ (տեղի), distant, far from, isolated.

Title: Զուր
Definition_2: —, ի —, ընդ —, — ուրեմն, vainly, in vain, uselessly, invalidly, unjustly; — սարջանք, unavailing regrets; — ջան, անօգուտ վաստակ, labour lost; — խօսել (զումեքէ), to calumniate, to impute, to accuse; ի — ճգնել, to labour in vain.

Title: Զոփամ
Definition_1: to tremble, to shudder, to shake, to quiver, to take fright, to be scared, startled; to be uneasy, alarmed, to concern one's self; — ի ցրտոյ, to shiver with cold.

Title: Զչարանամ
Definition_1: to be exasperated, irritated, to put one's self in a passion, to take offence, to resent, to be vexed, to bear malice; to grieve, to complain, to lament.

Title: Զսպեմ
Definition_1: to bind, to tie close, to press; to subdue, to hold, to hinder; to draw, to draw again.

Title: Զտեմ
Definition_1: to clear, to cleanse, to fine, to refine; to clarify, to filter, to purify; to rectify; to revive.

Title: Զտիչ
Definition_3: — սիւնակ, refiner, beater.

Title: Զրաբան
Definition_2: everlasting or great talker, chatterer; accuser.

Title: Զրաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak uselessly or unjustly, to talk nonsense; to calumniate.

Title: Զրաբանութիւն
Definition_1: useless discourse, idle talk, nonsensical stuff; calumny.

Title: Զրահ
Definition_1: cuirass; corslet; coat of mail, small coat of mail; breast-plate.

Title: Զրահաւորիմ
Definition_1: to arm one's self with a cuirass.

Title: Զրահեղեղ
Definition_1: that flows, inundates uselessly or unjustly.

Title: Զրահեմ
Definition_1: to cuirass, to arm with a cuirass.

Title: Զրաջան
Definition_1: vain, labouring in vain, fatiguing uselessly; — լինել, to labour in vain, to work without result, to make a hole in the water, to make ropes of sand, to miscarry; — վաստակ, labour lost.

Title: Զրաւ
Definition_1: limit, end; — առնել, to end, to finish; — առնել կենաց (ուրուք), to exterminate, to extirpate; — լինել, to end, to be bounded.

Title: Զրաւամահ լինիմ
Definition_1: to die, to cease to live, to be killed.

Title: Զրաւեմ
Definition_1: to terminate, to finish; — ի կենաց, to kill, to take away life, to put to death, to slay, to cut the thread of one's days.

Title: Զրաւիմ
Definition_1: to put an end to, to end, to come to a conclusion, to draw to an end; — ի կենցաղոյս, յաստեացս, to depart this life, to die.

Title: Զրկանք
Definition_1: extortion, exaction, encroachment, injustice, insult, rapine; breach, diminution, loss, grief, wrong, injury, hardship; despoiling, privation, degradation, exclusion, dispossession.

Title: Զրկեմ
Definition_1: to deprive, to rob, to despoil, to commit rapine; to defraud, to frustrate; to vex; to strip, to displace, to depose, to leave destitute; — զանձն, to deprive, to debar one's self from.

Title: Զրկիմ
Definition_1: to deprive one's self of; to abstain from.

Title: Զրոյ
Definition_1: nought, cipher; — ջերմաչափի, freezing point, zero.

Title: Զրոյց
Definition_1: term, word, discourse, recital, narrative, narration; talk, conversation, familiar chat; news, hearsay, rumour; — առնել, բերել, տալ, to bring, to give news, to announce, to recount, to inform, to relate; — արկանել, to talk, to converse; ի — or ի —ս լինել, to become a by word; ընդ հանճարեղս եղիցի — քո, let thy conversation be with the wise; ել —, the tale spreads, the report prevails.

Title: Զրուցատար
Definition_1: who brings news; — լինիմ, to bring news.

Title: Զրուցատրեմ
Definition_1: to narrate, to relate, to discourse, to talk.

Title: Զրպարտեմ
Definition_1: to calumniate, to be censorious; to slander.

Title: Զրպարտութիւն
Definition_1: calumny, imposture, inculpation, slander; զրպարտութեամբ, calumniously.

Title: Զփախչիմ
Definition_1: to flee hurriedly, to run away.

Title: Զօդ
Definition_1: withe, band; tie, bond, link, joint, union.

Title: Զօդամանեալ
Definition_1: tied, joined, annexed, connected; malicious, cunning, hidden, embroiled.

Title: Զօդեմ
Definition_1: to tie, to bind, to fasten, to attach; to salder.

Title: Զօդուած
Definition_1: seam, joint, suture; cf. Յօդ; cf. Յօդուած.

Title: Զօշաքաղեմ
Definition_1: to seek unlawful profits, to gain illeeitly, to procure by fraud; to flatter, to allure.

Title: Զօշաքաղութիւն
Definition_1: sordid interest, avarice; sordidness, niggardness, stinginess; թիւրիլ զհետ զօշաքաղութեան, to turn aside after lucre.

Title: Զօշոտեմ
Definition_1: to dazzle, to charm; to effeminate; գեզ նորա զօշոտէր զաչս ամենեցուն, her beauty attracted every one's gaze.

Title: Զօշոտութիւն
Definition_1: covetousness, lust; ogling, wooing; filthiness, lewdness.

Title: Զօր
Definition_1: army, host, soldiery, militia, soldiers, forces, troops; հետեւակ —ք, infantry, foot-soldier; — առնել, հատանել, cf. Զօրաժողով լինել; ընտիր ընտիր —ուց, the flower of the troops, the best troops in an army; — ծանր, սաուար, բազմաձեռն, great army, numerous troops, overwhelming forces; քաջակիրթ, պատերազմափորձ, մարզիկ —, disciplined, experienced, troops inured to war; —ք երկնից, երկնաւոր —ք, the host of angels; —, strength, vigour, force; մինչդեռ —ն եւ սգիքն անդէն կային, and still breathing, giving signs of life.

Title: Զօրագլխական
Definition_1: belonging to a general, or to his command.

Title: Զօրագլուխ
Definition_1: general, commander, leader; — հաւատոց, author of the faith.

Title: Զօրաժողով
Definition_1: levy of troops, enrolment, recruiting; — առնել, լինել, to levy soldiers, to enrol troops, to subsidize an army, to recruit; — է նա, he is gathering together an army; he is ready with an army; — առնել հոգւոց, to select, to separate, or to gather together souls.

Title: Զօրախաղաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to lead troops against, to make an expedition, to enter on a campaign.

Title: Զօրական
Definition_1: army, guards, soldiery, militia; soldier, militiaman;

Title: Զօրահանդէս
Definition_1: review; — առնել, to pass in review, to review troops, to review.

Title: Զօրահատոյց՞՞՞առնեմ
Definition_1: to detach troops, to expedite forces.

Title: Զօրանամ
Definition_1: to grow stronger, to recover one's self; to take root; to revive; to reign, to predominate; to grow, to increase; to be able; — անդրէն, to collect one's strength, to gather strength, to recover; to fortify one's self; զօրասցին ձերք քո, courage! thy arms shall be strengthened; զօրացիր, take heart! courage! cheer up!

Title: Զօրապետ
Definition_1: commander in chief, supreme head of the army, generalissimo.

Title: Զօրավարեմ
Definition_1: to command, to lead an army.

Title: Զօրավիգն
Definition_1: aid, support, help; defender, partisan; succour, reinforcement; —, — օգնականութեան լինել, to aid, to help, to bring succour; — ունել զոք, to be sustained, or supported by; որդեակ, — լեր ծերութեան հօր քում, my son, help thy father in his age.

Title: Զօրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fortify, to strengthen, to sustain, to harden, to fence, to establish, to secure, to repair, to reinforce, to restore, to corroborate; to brighten up, to comfort, to embolden, to reanimate, to revive, to cheer up, to make revive; — զձեռս or զբաղուկս ուրուք, to lend or bring help, to succour, to aid; ի յազթութիւն — զոք, to render victorious, to give the victory.

Title: Զօրաւոր
Definition_1: strong, vigorousi; powerful; energetic, pathetic; possible, efficacious; valorous.

Title: Զօրեմ
Definition_1: to be able, worth; to govern; to act, to produce an effect.

Title: Զօրէն
Definition_1: as, like, so that; as if; almost; for instance; — անասնոց, like beasts;

Title: Զօրընտիր լինիմ
Definition_1: to assemble the staff; cf. Զօրաժողով; to pick out or unite the flower of the army.

Title: Զօրութիւն
Definition_1: power; authority, vigour, valour, heart, courage, nerve, force, spirit, faculty; corroboration, supply, reinforcement, aid, energy, efficacy, virtue; resource; sense, meaning, signification; weight, importance; prodigy, miracle, virtue; army; person; distinct substance or person; —ք երկնից, the angels; celestial bodies, stars, etc; —ք մտաց, the faculties, qualities of the mind; Տէր զօրութեանց, the Lord of hosts; այր, կին զօրութեան, valorous man, virtuous woman; ըստ առն եւ — իւր, as the man is, so is his strength; դու՞ ագուցեր ձիոյ —, hast thou clothed the horse with strength ? զինու զօրութեամբ, with arms; by main strength; գիտել զ— արուի, to lie with a man; զօրութեամբ, powerfully, emphatically, understood, by virtue of, with all one's strength; բարձրացո զօրութեաթբ զբարբառ քո, lift up thy voice loudly; սիրել յամենայն զօրութենէ, to love with all one's heart; անկանել ի զօրութենէ, to be weakened or exhausted; — խաչի քո Քրիստոս, զի ..., upon my faith! i faith!
Definition_3: force; — անգործութիւն, vis inertiae; դիմակալ —, resistance force; ելեքտրական —, electric force; զուգահեռական —, parallel force; կեդրոնական —, central force; կեդրոնախոյս —, centrifugal -; կեդրոնաձիգ —, centripetal force; կենդանի —, vis viva; կենսական —, vital power; ձգողական —, attractive power; մադնիսական —, magnetic force; մասնկային —, molecular force; շարժիչ —, motive force; վանողական —, repulsive force; օդընկէց —, projectile force.

Title: <letter>Է</letter> (é)
Definition_1: the seventh letter of the alphabet and the third of the vowels; seven, seventh; It is sometimes changed for, or confounded with the letters ե and ա, for example : երէ, էրէ — երէկ, երեկ — բազէ, բազայ — Եւրոպէ, Եւրոպա; It often enters into the composition of words, for example : ոսկէօզ; prefixed to a missive letter signifies the Supreme Being.

Title: Է
Definition_1: Է, ի, Էն or Էնն, Էին, that exists, existence; that is of itself, the Supreme Being, the Most High, God; ես եմ որ Էն, I am that I am; որ Էն առաքեաց զիս առ ձեզ, I am sent me unto you;
Definition_2: էք, the divine persons, the Trinity.
Definition_3: Էմ ից, being, existence, that exists; creature, matter;
Definition_4: he is; անդ է տեսանել, one saw there, one sees; գեղով էիցս զուարճացեալ, intoxicated with the beauties of nature.
Definition_5: Է՜, eh! hey! oh! o! alas! է՜ Պետրէ, oh Peter !

Title: Է որ
Definition_1: some, some one; one ... and the other; some... others; some ... some;

Title: Էակ
Definition_1: being, existence, that exists; creator, that causes to exist, that extracts from nothing.

Title: Էական
Definition_1: that exists, that is of itself, increate; essential, substantial;

Title: Էակից
Definition_1: that partakes of the same existence, consubstantial, coexistent.

Title: Էանամ
Definition_1: to be, to exist, to subsist.

Title: Էապէս
Definition_1: essentially, really, in reality, in fact.

Title: Էացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to exist, to extract from nothing, to create.

Title: Էշ
Definition_1: ass, jackass, donkey; machine of war, (battering-ram);
Definition_2: bridge of a violin, etc; — մատակ, she-ass, donkey; կաթ իշոյ, ass's milk; հեծանել յ—, to ride on a donkey; խանչէ, անըռկէ, զռնչէ —, the ass brays.

Title: Էշայծեամն
Definition_1: she-goat that resembles an ass; deer; chamois.

Title: Էութիւն
Definition_1: essence, nature, constitution; existence; substance; divinity, God; property, fortune, wealth; յ— ածել՝ յօրինել, to create.

Title: Էջ
Definition_1: page (of a book); descent, going down; declivity; էջս առնել, to descend, to go down; —ս եւ ելս առնել, to go up and down; ահա գեղապանծ — կենաց նորա, this is the brightest page in his life; — սնդկի յօդաչափի, falling of the mercury.

Title: Է՞ր
Definition_1: why ? for what reason or cause ? յէ՞ր վերայ, on what ? on which?

Title: Էրան
Definition_1: gentle breeze, pleasant wind, zephyr; քեզ շունչ համայն պախըրցի, ինձ — շունչ փոթորկի, each breeze for you is a furious blast, while to me the blast is a gentle breeze.

Title: <letter>Ը</letter> (yét)
Definition_1: the eighth letter of the alphabet and the fourth of the vowels; eight, eighth.

Title: Ըղձալի
Definition_1: desirable, to be wished for, amiable; desirous, anxious; — է ինձ, I wish.

Title: Ըղձական
Definition_2: optative (mood); — դիւթութիւն, witchcraft, sorcery, spell, charm.

Title: Ըղձակերտ
Definition_1: desirable, to be wished for; desirous, longing, greedy, thirsty, eager; — or —ս առնել, to render desirable, to make valuable, interesting, to excite desire; — լինել, to desire, to wish for, to aspire after, to covet, to long after, to be greedy of.

Title: Ըղձամ
Definition_1: to desire, to wish, to long for; to guess, to divine; ողջ լինել ձեզ —, I wish you health, I hope you will enjoy good health; adieu! good bye!

Title: Ըղձանք
Definition_1: strong desire, longing, eagerness; — առաջնորդութեան, ambition.

Title: Ըղձափափաք
Definition_1: very desirable; — առնել, to make one's mouth water; — լինել, to desire passionately.

Title: Ըմբերանեմ
Definition_1: to shut a persons mouth, to put to silence; to leave one not a word to say, to dispirit, to convince, to put to a nonplus; — զեզն կալոտի, to muzzle the ox.

Title: Ըմբերանիմ
Definition_1: to keep silence, to hold one's tongue, to remain silent, to be struck dumb, to be tongue-tied.

Title: Ըմբշամարտիմ
Definition_1: to wrestle, to contend in wrestling.

Title: Ըմբոն
Definition_1: proper, suitable, convenient; probable; — է, it is proper, right.

Title: Ըմբոշխնեմ
Definition_1: to taste, to eat, to feed on; to enjoy, to delight in, to take pleasure in; to gain, to obtain, to possess; to chew, to masticate, to break with the teeth; — զպատիւ, զվարձս, զփառս, զպսակ, to obtain honours, to gain recompense, or reward, to acquire glory, to win crowns; — զուսոմն, զմահ, զեպերանս, to acquire knowledge; to die; to be despised, contemned, abused.

Title: Ըմբոստ
Definition_1: refractory, contumacious, disobedient, indocile, crabbed, stubborn, peevish, rebellious.

Title: Ըմբոստանամ
Definition_1: to resist, to kick, to disobey, to revolt, to mutiny; to grow insolent, bold, proud.

Title: Ըմբռնաղ
Definition_1: 23rd. November (the day on which sheep are folded).

Title: Ըմբռնեմ
Definition_1: to take, to surprise, to hold, to seize; to entrap, to catch again, to retake, to grapple, to match; to reach; to comprehend, to conceive, to undertake; ձուկն —, to catch fish, to fish; — զոք բանիւք, to surprise, to convince or confound one in argument; to address or question with art, insidiously.

Title: Ըմբռնիմ
Definition_1: to let ones self be taken, to be taken, surprised; — յորոգայթ, to be caught in a trap; to entangle one's self; — ի շնութեան, to be taken in adultery; — խաւարաւ, to be surrounded by darkness; — յարատոյ մեղաց, to be contaminated, or stained by sin; — բանիւ բերանոյ իւրոյ, to be surprised, or convinced in argument, to be confounded; — ի պատրանս, to be deceived, caught, duped; — մտաց, to wonder; — աչօք, to be deceived by the eyes, to deceive one's self; — ցաւով երկանց, to be in travail, to be surprised by the pains of childbirth; ըմբռնեցան ծածուկք նորա, his secrets were discovered.

Title: Ըմբռնողական
Definition_1: having the virtue or power to take, to apprehend, to understand; — մէգ, surrounding, circumambient; foggy; — կոկորդ, attracting, swallowing.

Title: Ըմբռնողութիւն
Definition_1: hold, retention, surprise; comprehension, perception; — ախտից, attack, fit, stroke.

Title: Ըմպահկեմ
Definition_1: to resist, to growproud, ferocious, to rebel; cf. Ըմպահկեցուցանեմ.

Title: Ըմպահկեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to restrain, to bridle, to repress, to tame, to break in.

Title: Ըմպելական
Definition_1: potable, drinkable, fit to be drunk

Title: Ըմպելի
Definition_2: drinker; drink, draught, beverage, liquor, potation;
Definition_3: cf. Ըմպակ; զովացուցիչ —, refreshing draught; կերակուր եւ —, food and drink; թակոյկք եւ —ք, vessels and drink; ի տուն ըմպելեաց մի մտանիցես նստել ընդ նոսա՝ ուտել եւ ըմպել, thou shalt, not go into the house of feasting to sit with them tp eat and to drink; անուշակ —, cf. Օշարակ; — քդից, cf. Նեկտար.

Title: Ըմպեմ
Definition_1: to drink; — անյագաբար, — eagerly, greedily; — սաստիկ յոյժ, — hard or deep, — like a piper, to tipple, to tope to be a hearty toper; — ի կենդանութիւն թագաւորի, — the king's health; — ի յաջողութիւն..., — to the success of; գան —, to receive a thrashing, a blow; ապտակ —, to be struck in the face; զջուր գնոյ —, to obtain water by dint of money, to pay for water -; որ ընպէ զանօրէնութիւնս հանգոյն ըմպելւոյ, who drinks iniquity like water; տուր ինձ —, give me ... -; cf. Արբեալ, cf. Արբենամ.

Title: Ընդ
Definition_1: to, at, towards, by; through; among, in the midst, into, in; with; for; under, below; upon; soon, as soon as; in the place, instead, of; հայել — երկինս, to look at the sky; թագաւորել — նորա, to reign instead of him, to succeed him; տուր — իմ եւ — քո, give for me and for you; — աղօտ, obscurely; — ամենայն, totally, in all; — ակամբ հայել, to look upon one with an evil eye or with aversion; — ձեռն, with or by the hand; — մէջ, in; into, inside, in the midst; through; — մէջ կարել, to split, to. pass or go across; — աջմէ, to the right; — գիրկս մտանել, to draw the bow strongly; — ժամս ժամս, sometimes; — խաբս, fraudulently, erroneously; — խազ, կատակս, ludicrously, facetiously; — այր եւ — կին, as much the man as the woman; — ծառով, under a tree; փոխանակ — այնր, for it; — մի բերան, with one voice, unanimously; դիր զգիրսդ — այլս, put these books with the others; եկ — իս, come away with me; — անցանելն, going along; — ո՞ր ճանապարհ, by what road ? — արեւելս, towards the East; — ամենայն երկիր, in all countries; անցանել — Կարին, — այն, to pass through Erzerum, to go that way; — ջուր եւ — ցամաք, by sea and land; — երկինս եւ — երկիր, between heaven and earth; — հեծեալ եւ — հետեւակ, between cavalry and infantry together; — աւուրսն — այնոսիկ, — ժամանական — այնոսիկ, — այնու ժամանակաւ, in those days, at that time; — շատ եւ — փոքր, more or less, a little more, a little less; — այս եւ — այն, between this and that; altogether, unitedly; ընկենուլ — պատուհանն, to throw out of window; — ամենայն տեղիս, every where; — մահճօք, under the bed; — երկնիւք, under heaven; — իւրեւ or իւրեաւ, under him; — պատրուակաւ, under pretence; — առաւօտն, այգն, at break of day; — երեկս, երեկոյս, or երեկոյն, towards the evening; մեկնեցաւ — լուր համբաւոյ գալստեան նորա, he set out on the report of his coming; — հակառակն, on the contrary; cross-wise; — միտ ածել or հարկանել, to think, to reason in one's mind; — ոտն հարկանել, to trample under foot; — թիւ մտանել, to be reckoned among; — ամս տասն, during ten years; եօթանասուն եւ հինգ ամք — ութ հարիւրով, eight hundred and seventy five years; — փթթելն եւ գօսասցի, it will fade as soon as it uncloses.

Title: Ընդաթուր հարկանեմ
Definition_1: to put to the sword, to kill with the sword; to trample under foot.

Title: Ընդականութիւն
Definition_1: mild or gentle looking, affectionate or tender care, protection.

Title: Ընդ աղօտ
Definition_2: near sighted; hazy, obscure; իբրեւ — իմն շունչ յըռնգունս ունէին, they were at the last gasp.

Title: Ընդաղօտատեսիլ
Definition_1: seeing dimly; — առնել, to darken, to obscure.

Title: Ընդանթական
Definition_1: under the armpits; — մազք, the hair growing -.

Title: Ընդ առաջ
Definition_1: before, against; — գալ, յառնել, գնալ, ելանել, լինել, to go to meet; to anticipate, to obviate, to prevent, to meet, to affront, to face.

Title: Ընդասուն
Definition_1: tamed, domestic, familiar; sedentary, home-keeping; delicate, nice.

Title: Ընդարձակ
Definition_1: free; large, ample, vast, spacious, great; diffuse; — ժամս, for a long time, or duration; — ի նեղութիւնս, magnanimous, long-suffering, patient; — կեանք, a dissolute life; — է, it is lawful, permitted, it is not prohibited; — կեալ, to live daintily; — գնալ, to live dissolutely; — առնել, to facilitate;
Definition_2: at length, lengthily; diffusely; dissolutely; յ—ի, freely, at large; յ—ի լինել, to be free, in liberty, at large; to be unbound.

Title: Ընդարձակագոյն
Definition_1: larger, vast; very long, lengthy, more diffuse, very prolix;
Definition_2: more diffusely, minutely, in all its details.

Title: Ընդարձակասուն
Definition_1: reared in ease, dainty, delicate, commodious; unbridled, dissolute.

Title: Ընդարձակեմ
Definition_1: to dilate, to enlarge, to make greater, to increase, to augment, to extend, to prolong; to disband, to relax, to spread, to widen, to reach, to stretch, to give ground, to amplify; — բանիւ, to exaggerate;
Definition_2: to relax, to give repose to; to tranquilize; ընդարձակելով — զձեռն յօք or ումեք, to open the hand, to give freely, to be generous; — ումեք, to give rest or repose, liberty, license.

Title: Ընդարձակիմ
Definition_1: to extend, to widen, to spread, to dilate; to be generous; սիրտք մեր ընդարձակեալք... ընդարձակեցարուք եւ դուք, our heart is enlarged... be ye also enlarged; ընդարձակեալ է, it is allowed or permitted, it is lawful.

Title: Ընդարձակութիւն
Definition_1: extent, extension, size, latitude, greatness, width, amplitude, amplification, enlargement; diffusion; field; capacity, capaciousness;

Title: Ընդարմանամ
Definition_1: to grow stupid, numb, to fall asleep;
Definition_2: to be benumbed, dulled; — ի ցրտոյ, to be benumbed with cold, to be frozen, to become torpid; — աչօք յիմն, to gaze at, to stare at; — զբաղանօք, to preoccupy one's self, to plunge in, to engulf one's self; զբաղմակոյտ ոսկերաց նորա ընդարմացոյց, he has benumhed the multitude of his bones.

Title: Ընդարմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to benumb, to lull asleep; to chill;

Title: Ընդաւազեմ
Definition_1: to cover with sand, to bury.

Title: Ընդգճիմ
Definition_1: to fall on one's knees; to coil one's self up.

Title: Ընդգոգեմ
Definition_1: to take or receive to one's bosom, to make welcome.

Title: Ընդգրկեմ
Definition_1: to embrace, to clasp in ones arms, to clasp or throw one's arms round, to hug; to undertake; — զձեռն ի վերայ լանջաց, to remain with the arms crossed.

Title: Ընդդէմ
Definition_1: contrary, opposed; opposite, mimical; unfortunate; — պատասխանի, an adeguate or prompt reply;
Definition_2: against, on the contrary, the wrong side, outward, the wrong way; before, in face; — դառնալ, կալ, գտանիլ, հարկանիլ, to oppose, to resist, to counteract, to make head against, to cope with; — յառնել, to rise up against; to combat; — գանձանակին, opposite the money-box; վէմ — դնել դրամ, to place a stone against the door; զդուրս — դնել, to close the doors; բանիցն — բերել, to reply opportunely, to respond; — եղեւ նոցա իրն, they succeeded badly in that affair; յետս — ընթեռնուլ, to cavil, to sophisticate;
Definition_3: instead otherwise, on the contrary; — հակառակութիւն, cf. Ընդդէմդարձութիւն.

Title: Ընդդիմաբաժանեմ
Definition_1: to divide in opposite parts, to place one against the other.

Title: Ընդդիմաբախիմ
Definition_1: to come in contact with, to strike against.

Title: Ընդդիմաբանեմ
Definition_1: to contradiet, to counteract, to contest, to answer;

Title: Ընդդիմաբար
Definition_1: on the contrary, in a contrary manner.

Title: Ընդդիմակ
Definition_2: opposite extremes, adversity, disgrace, calamity; — զօրութիւն, coercive power; —ս դնել, to oppose, to contract.

Title: Ընդդիմակայ
Definition_1: cf. Ընդդիմակաց; — ցաւք or —ք, adversity, calamity.

Title: Ընդդիմակայութիւն
Definition_1: opposition, resistance; confutation, refutation, dispute, controversy.

Title: Ընդդիմահար
Definition_1: ppposite, that opposes, resists; hard, solid, opaque.

Title: Ընդդիմահարիմ
Definition_1: to resist; to repel, to repercute.

Title: Ընդդիմանամ
Definition_1: to resist, to contrast, to be repugnant, to mutitiny.

Title: Ընդդիմարգել
Definition_1: barricade; — կանգնել, to raise a -; կործանել զ—, to force a; -

Title: Ընդդիմութիւն
Definition_1: resistance, opposition; contradiction, contrariety, discord; hinderance, obstacle; strife; dislike, aversion, repugnance, conflict, trouble, implication.

Title: Ընդել
Definition_1: familiar, domestic, tame, easy, mild, tractable, approachable.

Title: Ընդելակից
Definition_1: familiar, intimate, bosom, linked or knit together in the closest bonds of friendship, intimately acquainted; — լինել, cf. ԸՆդելակցիմ.

Title: Ընդելակցիմ
Definition_1: to grow familiar, to make acquaintance.

Title: Ընդելանիմ
Definition_1: to grow familiar, to become familiar; to make acquaintance; to get used or accustomed to, to habituate one's self.

Title: Ընդելացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make familiar, to tame; to instruct; to tame, to render mild and less ferocious.

Title: Ընդելուզանեմ
Definition_1: to enchase, to fit into, to set, to mount, to enchase, to set in a bezel; to string pearls, to interweave, to entwine, to braid, to form a tress; ընդելուզեալ ակամբք՝ մարգարտով, adorned, set with jewels or pearls, ornamented with gold, or arabesqued; ընդելուզեալ յոսկի, set in gold.

Title: Ընդելուզուած
Definition_1: setting, mounting, enchasing, fitting in; weaving, web, braid, texture.

Title: Ընդելութիւն
Definition_1: familiarity; acquaintance; custom; յ— ածել, to familiarize with; — ունել ընդ ումեք, to be familiar with.

Title: Ընդեղձանիմ
Definition_1: to supplicate, to implore, to beseech, to entreat, to beg.

Title: Ընդերկար
Definition_2: long, at length; long time; amply, diffusely, tediously; — առնել, to prolong; — լինել, to be prolonged.

Title: Ընդերկարաձգեմ
Definition_1: to prolong, to make last a long time; to extend; to defer, to spin out, to groat length.

Title: Ընդերկարութիւն
Definition_1: length, extent, duration; — կենաց, long life, longevity.

Title: Ընդերկնահաջ
Definition_1: baying the moon; barking at in vain.

Title: Ընդերք
Definition_1: entrails, guts, bowels, intestine, tripe; caecum, blind-gut; զսուրս նոցա —բաց իւրեանց մատուցանել, to slay others with their own swords.

Title: Ընդէ՞ր
Definition_1: why ? for what reason ? wherefore ? — ոչ ? why not?

Title: Ընդլծեալ
Definition_1: yoked together; bearing the same yoke.

Title: Ընդխառնիմ
Definition_1: to become incorporated; to intermeddle; to come to blows, to come to battle, to join battle; ընդխառնեցաւ պատերազմն, the battle was commenced.

Title: Ընդհանուր
Definition_1: universal, general, common; —ք, or — տիեզերք, the universe, the whole world, or earth; — առնել, to generalize;

Title: Ընդհանրական
Definition_1: universal, general, catholic; — եկեղեցի, the catholic or universal church; cf. Թուղթ, cf. Ժողով.

Title: Ընդհատ
Definition_2: discontinued, intermittent; loose; different, separate; less, lesser;
Definition_3: intermittent;
Definition_4: differently, otherwise; nor more nor less; ամք սակաւ ինչ — իբիւրուց, a little less than 10 000 years; ի՞ւ իցեմք — ի նոցանէ, in what do we differ from them ? ոչ ինչ — է ի նմանէ, he differs not from him; նուազ ինչ — ի փչմանէ լինել շնչոյն, to be almost at the last extremity, or last gasp; չեն — յերազոց, they resemble dreams.

Title: Ընդհատեմ
Definition_1: to interrupt, to discontinue, to cease.

Title: Ընդհատիմ
Definition_1: to break off, to interrupt one's self.

Title: Ընդհատութիւն
Definition_1: interruption, intermittence, intermission, discontinuance, relaxation, cessation.

Title: Ընդհարկանեմ
Definition_1: to knock, to clash, to strike, to heat; — զերկաթ, to strike fire.

Title: Ընդհարկանիմ
Definition_1: to fight, to smite, to knock, to strike, to thump at; — ընդ միմեանս, to knock against each other; to encounter each other; — գլխոյն ընդ որմն, to knock one's head against a wall; — ընդ ճանապարհ, to be on the way to ...; — ի խղճէ մտաց, to have remorse.

Title: Ընդձեռեմ
Definition_1: to give, to put into ones hands, to grant; to take away, to appropriate to one's self.

Title: Ընդմիջաբար
Definition_1: by means of, by some expedient.

Title: Ընդմիջաշաւիղ
Definition_1: the middle of a way, or road, carriage-road, pitching.

Title: Ընդմիջեմ
Definition_1: to interrupt, to discontinue; to divide into two parts; to separate, to hinder; to intermeddle; — զխոսս ուրուք, to interrupt, to break in upon; — զճանապարհն, to go half the way.

Title: Ընդմիջիմ
Definition_1: to be split, to be in half; to discontinue; իբրեւ տօնն ընդմիջեցաւ, passed the middle of the feast.

Title: Ընդմտանեմ
Definition_1: to penetrate, to pierce, to strike through or pass across; to insinuate one's self; to pass through a filter.

Title: Ընդմտատար
Definition_1: touchy, easily offended, sensible, feeling; thoughtful, pensive, anxious, gloomy, full of care.

Title: Ընդոծին
Definition_1: born in the house of, one's master, domestic, servant; —ք, family; cf. Ընդաբոյս.

Title: Ընդողնիմ
Definition_1: to lie down at length, supine; to become idle, negligent, feeble; to adorn one's self magnificently, gorgeously; to make an ostentatious display, to dress pretentiously; to become vain or insolent.

Title: Ընդոստ
Definition_1: that leaps, that bounds; jumping, starting;
Definition_2: by stealth, stealthily; rebounding, by fits and starts; by skips and jumps; palpitating, bounding; — ի քնոյ լինել, to awake suddenly, to start from sleep; — ի քնոյն զարթուցանել, to rouse suddenly, hurriedly; — կալ, to leap, to hop, to rebound; to start back with fear, to be startled, to retire, to frighten; — խաղալ, to leap, to jump up, to rouse one's self; — երթալ, to go with fear and trembling; to go by leaps; — խաղացումն ուսոց, շարժումն թիկանց, աչաց, shrugging of the shoulders; nervous twitching of the eyes; — անցանել, to leap, to leap over.

Title: Ընդոստնում
Definition_1: to leap, to recoil, to start with fear; to be aroused, frightened, dismayed; to shy, to be testive; to be disturbed, disconcerted; to get angry.

Title: Ընդոստուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to leap or recoil; to shake, to move; to impel, to push, to spur on, to thrust; to awaken, to excite.

Title: Ընդոտնեմ
Definition_1: to trample under foot; to despise; to dishearten, to humble, to subdue, to drive out, to push.

Title: Ընդուլնեմ
Definition_1: to twist or break the neck; to tame, to bridle.

Title: Ընդունակ
Definition_1: receiving, welcoming; capable, susceptible; acceptable, agreeable.

Title: Ընդունայն
Definition_1: vain, void, useless; empty; indolent, idle;
Definition_2: in vain, uselessly, empty; — առնել զակնկալութիւն, to deceive, to disappoint, to frustrate, to destroy the illusions of; ամենայն ինչ — է, all is vanity.

Title: Ընդունայնանամ
Definition_1: to be vain or empty; to vanish, to pass away, to come to nothing; to seek vanities.

Title: Ընդունարան
Definition_1: vase, vessel, receptacle; recipient, reservoir; asylum, refuge, shelter;
Definition_2: well, tank, cistern; — օդոյ, air-box; — շոդւոյ, steam-chamber; — ջերմջրոյ, hot-water well.

Title: Ընդունելի
Definition_1: acceptable, admissible; agreeable, welcome; obtainable; that accepts, that receives.

Title: Ընդունելութիւն
Definition_1: reception, taking, acceptance, admission, obtaining, acquisition; cheer, feast, entertainment;
Definition_2: participle; — փոխանադրոյ, acceptation of a letter of credit, of a bill of exchange; — առնել ումեք, to welcome, to feast, to entertain; — առնել օտարաց, to lodge strangers; առնել — ցրտագին, to receive coldly, to give a cool reception; — գոյր յարքունիս, ի դեսպանատան, there was a reception at court, at the embassy; յ— լինել Աստուծոյ, to believe in God.

Title: Ընդունիմ
Definition_1: to receive, to take, to admit, to embrace, to accept, to make welcome; to gather together; to derive; to impetrate, to obtain; to suit, to agree; to approve, to confess, to consent, to acknowledge; ոչ —, to deny, to disavow, to disapprove; — զոք յաւազանէ, to stand godfather, godmother to a child; մեղս —, to fall into sin; — մտաց աչօք, to conceive, to seize mentally; պատուով — զոք, to receive with honour; ոչ բարւոք — զոք, to give a bad reception; — յինքետն, to learn by heart; յաստուածս ընդկալաւ զնոսա, he has made of them his gods; ի քէն ընդկալայ զկեանս, I owe you my life.

Title: Ընդպահկեմ
Definition_1: to abandon, to despise; to compel to walk; to vex, to harass.

Title: Ընդ վայր
Definition_1: in vain, uselessly; — հարկանել, to throw away, to abandon, to despise; — յածիլ, to run here and there, to rove, to wander; — խօսել, to talk in vain right or wrong, at random; — պայթարումն, idle dispute.

Title: Ընդվայրաբան
Definition_1: quack, charlatan, who talks in vain.

Title: Ընդվայրախոյզ
Definition_1: seeking vain and foolish things; inquisitive.

Title: Ընդվայրայօն
Definition_1: shameless, lewd; — պչրանք, coaxing, dalliance, coyness, affectation, coquetry.

Title: Ընդվայրասուն
Definition_1: ill-bred, rough, rude; idle, lazy, sluggish, unoccupied.

Title: Ընդվայրաքարշիմ
Definition_1: to be dragged along the ground, to be fastened to the ground.

Title: Ընդվայրաքնին
Definition_1: curious, that seeks after useless things.

Title: Ընդվայրընկէց առնեմ
Definition_1: to debase, to vilify; to despise.

Title: Ընդվզեմ
Definition_1: to twist, to wring the neck.

Title: Ընդվզիմ
Definition_1: to revolt, to resist, to disobey, to rebel, to throw off the yoke; to lift up the horn, to become proud, arrogant, haughty, ostentatious; to turn the back disrespectfully; to throw one's self headlong, to precipitate; ընդվզեալ ի բաց վազել յեշխանութենէ, to free from domination, to shake off the yoke.

Title: Ընդօրինակեմ
Definition_1: to copy, to take a copy, to transcribe.

Title: Ընթադրեմ
Definition_1: to trample under foot; to subdue, to submit; to strike, to knock; to drive away, to disperse.

Title: Ընթադրութիւն
Definition_1: trampling upon; subjection; project, purpose, design; սպանանել ձիախրոխտ ընթադրութեամբ, to ride over and trample to death.

Title: Ընթանալի
Definition_1: that runs, that walks; current; — ճանապարհ, practicable, passable.

Title: Ընթանամ
Definition_1: to run, to run to; to apply; to slide; to gallop; to walk; to go, to depart, to pass; արշաւասոյր —, to run full speed, to rattle along full speed; երամովին՝ խուռն —, to run in company, in crowds, in a throng, to rush, to crowd, to flock; — զհետ ուրուք, to follow, to run after; — զհետ շաւղաց՝ հետոց ուրուք, to follow the tracks, to tread in the steps; — զճանապարհս իւր, to follow one's career; այսր անդր —, to dip into, to run over a book; ընթանալով ասել, to say in few words, to touch lightly; ի ճանապարհս պատուիրանաց —, to observe or obey the commandments; բարւոք ընթանան իրք, affairs are thriving, business is prosperous; cf. Զէն.

Title: Ընթաց
Definition_1: course, race, gait, step, pace, way, means; progress, succession, train, trace, thread; method; —ս առնուլ, to run; —ից գործի, the feet; — մի, walking distance; հետի —, foot-race; — մտաց, flight of thought; — կենաց, life's career; յրնթացս կենաց, in the course of life; յընթացից ճանաչել զոք, to know one by hisg ait; բարւոք լնուլ գընթացս իւր, to fulfil the duties of one's station, to discharge one's functions honourably; արգելուլ զ—ս բանին, to say concisely, to shorten discourse; —ք հողմոյ, direction Of the wind; —ք արեգական, լուսանի, եղանակաց, course of the sun, moon, seasons; —ք սակարանի, վաճառանոցի, հրապարակի, course Of Exchange, of the market.

Title: Ընթացակից
Definition_1: concurring; accompanying; agreeing, concordant; coincident; concomitant.

Title: Ընթացատեղ
Definition_1: gymnasium or place for gymnastic exercises; cf. Ասպարէզ.

Title: Ընթեռնում
Definition_1: to read; — ընդ միտս, դաշն ձայնիւ, — to one's self; — ի ձայն, բարձրաձայն —, — aloud; — յականջս ուրուք, — in the presence of; անսայթաք —, — currently; կակազելով —, — hesitatingly; to stammer; — հարեւանցի, վեր ի վերոյ, to look through, or to skim over a book; յառաջ վարել զ—ն, — on; կրկին եւ երեքկին —, — over and over again; տալ —, to cause -; մանուկ քո գիտէ՞ —, can your boy read ? ընթերցեալ զթուղթդ, after the perusal of your letter; յետս ընդդէմ —, cf. Ընդդէմ.

Title: Ընթերցասիրեմ
Definition_1: to study, to read with pleasure.

Title: Ընթերցիչ
Definition_1: reader, lecturer; ազգ առ —ցողն, advertisement, address to the reader; ներողամիտ —ցող, gentle reader.

Title: Ընթերցողութիւն
Definition_1: reading; lectureship, order of lecturers in the church.

Title: Ընթերցումն
Definition_1: lecture; տալ յ—, to give to read; to cause to read.

Title: Ընթրեմ
Definition_1: to sup, to take the evening's repast.

Title: Ընթրիք
Definition_1: supper, evening's repast; — տէրունեան, the Lor's —, the Last —, —ս առնել, գործել, տալ, to invite to -; to give a banquet; ընթրիս առնել առ ումեք, to sup with...; ի ժամ ընթրեաց, at supper-time.

Title: Ընծայ
Definition_1: present, gift, offer, offering; — առնել՝ տալ՝ մատուցանել, to give, to make a present.

Title: Ընծայաբեր
Definition_1: that carries presents or offerings; — լինել, cf. Ընծայաբերեմ.

Title: Ընծայաբերեմ
Definition_1: to carry presents, to offer, to make a present.

Title: Ընծայական
Definition_2: dedication; — գիր, թուղթ, dimissory letter, testimonials; —գեսպանաց, credentials; — բարեկամաց, letter of recommendation.

Title: Ընծայեմ
Definition_1: to offer, to present, to sacrifice, to give, to dedicate, to attribute, to lend, to propose, to refer, to confer, to devote, to render, to ascribe; to make, to furnish; to impose, to inscribe; ի լոյս —, cf. Լոյս; — զոք ի կեանս, to give life to; to vivify; — զոք առատ պարդեւօք, to load with presents; to confer great services.

Title: Ընծայիմ
Definition_1: to offer, to present one's self; to shew, to make one's self seen; — առաջի ուրուք, to introduce one's self to the presence of; մահու —, to die.

Title: Ընծայեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to offer, to present; to show, to expose, to place in sight; to recommend, to introduce; զանձն —, to pass one's self off for another, to counterfeit; այլ իմն միտս —, to possess, or bear another meaning; սիրելի զանձն, to make one's self beloved.

Title: Ընծայութիւն
Definition_1: offer, offering, dedication; presentation; թուղթ ընծայութեան, letter of recommendation; Կոչումն ընծայութեան, catechism; cf. Ընթերցուածագիր; — լուսնի, new moon.

Title: Ընծայումն
Definition_1: act of offering, of dedicating one's self; presentation; offering, present.

Title: Ընծուիմ
Definition_1: to rise, to shine, to blaze forth, to glitter, to sparkle, to glare, to be bright.

Title: Ընկալուչ
Definition_3: receiver.

Title: Ընկապճիմ
Definition_1: to bind one's self closely, to adhere to, to entwine one's self with.

Title: Ընկենլի
Definition_1: to be thrown away, to be despised.

Title: Ընկենում
Definition_1: to throw, to cast, to hurl, to repulse, to fling, to pour; to destitute, to depose, to deprive; — յերեսաց, to drive from his presence, to despise, to abandon; — յերկիւղ, to frighten; — յոք զհոգս իրիք, to confide the care of, to confide to; — — զանձն իւր յառաջ, to present one's self, to throw one's self forward, to expose one's solf; — զզէնս, to throw down one's arms, to surrender; — ի կալանս, to thrust in prison; — յերկիր, to throw down, to slay, to fell to the earth; — արտաքս, to thrust out, to hunt or drive away; to empty the stomach; — քարինս, to throw stones; կիցս —, cf. Կիցք; to despise; — զխարիսխ, to cast anchor; զաստուածութեամբն —, to attribute to God; ի վերայ միմեանց — զյանցանս, to lay the blame on one another;
Definition_2: to be thrown, or cast away; — արտաքս, արտաքոյ դրան, to be thrown out, driven away; — ի ճանապարհի, to be cast on the streets, to be thrown out on the common way.

Title: Ընկեր
Definition_1: companion, comrade, partner; female companion; consort; fellow; agent; neighbour; partaker; peer; clerk; assistant; չիք իմ —, I am peerless, I have no equal; — զընկեր, այր զ—, one to another, mutually; երդուան այր —ի իւրում, they bound themselves by mutual oaths.

Title: Ընկերաբար
Definition_1: as a companion or comrade, friendly.

Title: Ընկերագիր
Definition_1: subscriber; — առնել, cf. Ընկերագրեմ; — լինել, cf. Ընկերագրիմ.

Title: Ընկերագրութիւն
Definition_1: subscription; մտանել յ—, to subscribe to; ելանել յընկերագրութենէ, to cease to subscribe, to be no longer a subscriber; պայմանք ընկերագրութեան, terms of -.

Title: Ընկերադաւ
Definition_1: that betrays or kills his neighbour.

Title: Ընկերակից
Definition_1: companion, comrade, colleague; associate, partner; fellow-member, friar.

Title: Ընկերակցիմ
Definition_1: to accompany one's self, to associate one's self, to become a partner.

Title: Ընկերահեղձոյց
Definition_1: that suffocates his neighbour; annoying, molesting one's friends.

Title: Ընկերասէր
Definition_1: that loves his neighbour, charitable; sociable, companionable.

Title: Ընկերեմ
Definition_1: to accompany, to escort, to follow; to pair; to associate; to convoy; to aid, to assist.

Title: Ընկերհաշտութիւն
Definition_1: social harmony under various forms of government, monarchic, oligarchic, or democratic.

Title: Ընկերշակեմ
Definition_1: to associate with, to conspire, to plot.

Title: Ընկերութիւն
Definition_1: company, society; accompanying, assistance, partnership, match; train, retinue; fraternity, brotherhood, congregation, order, commonalty, body; conversation; knowledge; sociability

Title: Ընկերսիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of ones neighbour, charity; sociability.

Title: Ընկեցիկ
Definition_1: thrown away, cast, off, flung off; abject, vile; exposed, abandoned;
Definition_2: projectile; — շարժումն, projection; — ինչ, refuse; — առնել զմանկունս ի զետ, զկարասին ի ծով, to throw the children in the river, merchandize in the sea; — առնել զմանուկ, to expose a child; — լինել, to be thrown out, abandoned.

Title: Ընկիճեալ կամ
Definition_1: to resist, to act as an obstacle, to hinder; ի ծունր —, to kneel down.

Title: Ընկղմեմ
Definition_1: to sink, to deepen, to submerge; to flow, to inundate, to drown, to plunge, to absorb, to bury; to dim, to cloud; նիրհմամբ —, to lull, to make sleepy.

Title: Ընկղմիմ
Definition_1: to founder, to sink, to be plunged; to lose one's self; — ի քնոյ, to sleep soundly; յանհնարին արամութիւն, յանմխիթար սուգ —, to abandon one's self to melancholy, to be plunged in inconsolable grief; — ի ծով փափկութեանց, to swim in pleasure, in delight; ի նախանձ —, to envy, to be jealous of.

Title: Ընկճեմ
Definition_1: to oppress, to humble, to bring down, to debase, to throw down, to subdue, to humiliate; to blunt.

Title: Ընկճիմ
Definition_1: to sink, to faint, to succumb; — զոք, to be a hindrance, or stumbling block to; — ընդ բեռամբ, to bow beneath a weight; to be overwhelmed, or disheartened; ընկճեալ յամաց, ընդ ամօք, bowed by the weight of years; — զիմն, to retire, to withdraw; to impede, to hinder.

Title: Ընկողմանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to stretch, to lay down, to put to bed.

Title: Ընկողմանիմ
Definition_1: to stretch ones self in bed, to lie down, to go to bed.

Title: Ընկողմանումն
Definition_1: going to bed; the hack of a chair.

Title: Ընկողնակից
Definition_1: bed-fellow; — լինել, to be a partisan.

Title: Ընկոյզ
Definition_1: walnut; — մշկահոտ, nutmeg; — հնդկաց, cocoa-nut; — արքայական, the finest quality of -; — ործացուցիչ, nux vomica; կեղեւ ընկուզի, nut-shell; cf. Կորճ, cf. Փեճեկ; կանանչ կեղեւ ընկուզի, green husk of -; cf. Կղեղ, cf. Ոզոխ; (ներքին) մաշկ ընկուզի, epidermis or brown cuticle of -; cf. Պոպոկ, cf. Փեճեկ; միջուկ ընկուզի, the kernel of -; cf. Կթուն; ծառ ընկուզի, — tree; cf. Ընկուզի; փայտ ընկուզի, — wood; ի գոյն ընկուզի, nut-brown; cf. Ընկուզագոյն; քազել —ս, to nut; երթալ ի քաղել —ս, to go a nutting; գաւազան ի ժողովել —ս, nut-hook; cf. Թափիչ.

Title: Ընկուզուտ
Definition_1: full of walnut trees; abounding in walnuts.

Title: Ընկրկեմ
Definition_1: to reject; to draw back, to pull back; to subdue; to roll.

Title: Ընկրկիմ
Definition_1: to recede, to retreat, to flinch; to be repulsed, driven back; — անուոյ, turning of the wheel; — յազքատս, to compassionate the poor; to pardon; — երասանաւ, to be restrained, bridled, reined in; պատերազմաց — ընդ ձեռամբ ուրուք, to take by force, to storm, to subdue, to conquer.

Title: Ընձեռեմ
Definition_1: to consign, to place in the hands of some one; to lend, to give; to undertake, to prove; to transmit, to refer, to leave in writing.

Title: Ընձեռիմ
Definition_1: to receive from, to take, to obtain; to be given, consigned, recommended; թողութիւն —, to pardon, to forgive; կոչմունս — աստեղաց, to give names to the stars.

Title: Ընձիւղ
Definition_1: sucker, bud, shoot, spring, button, gem.

Title: Ընձիւղեմ
Definition_1: to bud, to shoot, to put forth, to sprout, to germinate, to blossom.

Title: Ընձուիմ
Definition_1: to unclose, to blossom, to be born; to dawn, to appear, to show one's self.

Title: Ընչաթափեմ
Definition_1: to deprive one of his property, to despoil, to exhaust, to extenuate, to reduce to the last shifts; to be deprived of one's property.

Title: Ընչասէր
Definition_1: loving riches, avaricious, greedy, covetous; — լինիմ, — սիրեմ, to hoard up, to save sordidly, to be niggardly.

Title: Ընչասիրութիւն
Definition_1: passion for riches, avarice, avidity, greediness.

Title: Ընչաւէտ
Definition_1: rich, fortunate, mouicd, opulent; loaded with riches; — լինել, to be rich, to have one's nest well feathered; անթիւ —, very wealthy, extravagantly rich; ըստ երկրի մասանց —, well off, in easy circumstances.

Title: Ընչաւէտանամ
Definition_1: to be enriched, to become wealthy.

Title: Ընչաքաղցութիւն
Definition_1: avidity for wealth, insatiable avarice; անյագ —, insatiable thirst for riches.

Title: Ընջուղ
Definition_1: heifer, bullock, calf of a year old.

Title: Ընտանամ
Definition_1: to seed, to come to seed.

Title: Ընտանեակ
Definition_1: familiar, one who is of the family, acquaintance, intimate friend.

Title: Ընտանենամ
Definition_1: to familiarize one's self, to grow tame, familiar with, to keep company, to frequent, to communicate; to get inured, to accustom one's self; անապատի —, to be accustomed to a hermits life; — կանոնի հաւատոց, to observe the precepts of the Faith.

Title: Ընտանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render familiar, to tame, to civilize, to humanize; to accustom.

Title: Ընտանի
Definition_1: familiar, domestic; proper; native; tamed; intimate, friend, relation; domestic; —ք, family; հայր —նեաց, the father of a family; — պատերազմ, intestine strife, domestic broils; civil war; — գաւաճան, թշնամի, traitor, intestine foe; — հաւատոյ, faithful to the Truth; — լինել գորց, to be familiar with, or versed in literature.

Title: Ընտանութիւն
Definition_1: familiarity, confidence, communication, frequeutation; habit; intimacy; friendship; — ընդ կնոջ, carnal intercourse with a woman; յ— կոչել, to domesticate, to tame.

Title: Ընտանուհի
Definition_1: female neighbour, intimate friend; house-maid, servant.

Title: Ընտասուն
Definition_1: familiar, brought up in the house; cf. Ընդասուն.

Title: Ընտիր
Definition_1: chosen, worthy; fine, good; civil, of good family, elegant, excellent, exquisite, nice, genteel, pretty, noble, polished, precious, pure, singular, sovereign, superb; the best, the most excellent, the choice, the select, the flower, the cream; զընտիր զարդուցն եդին ի հպարատութիւն, precious ornaments served to beget pride; զ—ս Գաղղիոյ սատակեաց, he beat down the choice troops, the flower of France; գումարել զ— նահատակս, զօրս, to reunite the bravest warriors, the picked soldiers; — անասունք, very fast animals; — յոյժ, best, first quality; cf. Ընտրելագոյն; — մատենագիր, classic author; ընդ —ս հանել, to select, to make choice of, to elect; յ— առնել, to give the choice, to permit the selection; — առնել, to choose, to make choice of, to appreciate; ընտրոյ տէր, he who has the choice, arbiter; զնոսա թողացոյց ընտրոյ տեարս լինել, he left them the choice.

Title: Ընտուստ
Definition_1: by one's self, or itself; of one's self, naturally; of one's own head; of the house, from one's home; of the family possessions, of one's own wealth.

Title: Ընտրական
Definition_1: elective, eligible, electoral; better, singular, exquisite.

Title: Ընտրան
Definition_3: by choice, by selection; մանկունք —աւ, the flower of the youth; կաչառք —աւ, rich or precious gifts.

Title: Ընտրանք
Definition_1: choice, election, prime; act of picking; garbling; արծաթ —նաց, pure silver.

Title: Ընտրելի
Definition_1: eligible; most select, best; — է քեզ զմի յայսցանէ, you must choose one of these alternatives.

Title: Ընտրեմ
Definition_1: to elect, to choose; to pick, to sort, to cull; to discern; to judge; to distinguish, to difference, to know; to decide; to love, to embrace, to prefer; — զարժանն, to discern what is just; — զժամանակն, to choose the time, to select the opportunity; անկիւնս անկիւնս ընտրեալ, angular; ընտրեալ կալաւ, he has chosen; ընտրեցից մեռանել, I would prefer to die.

Title: Ընտրող
Definition_1: cf. Ընտրիչ; discreet, prudent, judicious, wise.

Title: Ընտրողական
Definition_1: able to discern, having judgment, rational; of ones free will; wise, discreet;
Definition_2: judgment, criterion, free will or choice.

Title: Ընտրողութիւն
Definition_1: choice, election; discernment, discretion, judgment, understanding; ընտրողութեամբ, discreetly.

Title: Ընտրութիւն
