Definition_1: to assemble, to collect; to heap, to amass, to gather together; to receive, to reap, to gather, to get; to receive, to welcome; to furl; to infer, to deduce, to argue, to conclude; — առ իւր, ի տուն, to entertain, to receive hospitably, to welcome; to lodge; — ի մի, to concentrate; — զյետին շունչ ուրուք, to receive the last sigh of; զօրս —, to levy soldiers, to assemble troops; — զկաց մնաց փախստէից, to rally the flying

Title: Ժողովիմ
Definition_1: to convene, to be reunited, brought together; յինքեան —, to be wise or judicious, to have one's wits about one, to return to reason.

Title: Ժողովող
Definition_1: convener, convoker; the Wise Man, Solomon, the Preacher; the Book of Ecclesiastes.

Title: Ժողովուրդ
Definition_1: people, the multitude, the vulgar; the mob; assembly; synagogue.

Title: Ժողովրդանոց
Definition_1: place of assembly; synagogue; cf. Ժողովարան.

Title: Ժոյժ
Definition_1: patience, long-suffering; power, strength; hardihood, boldness; — ունել, առնել, to be patient, to endure suffering, to tolerate, to sustain, to bear, to suffer, to support; — ունել արտասուաց, to withhold one's tears; — ունել պաշարման, to sustain a siege; մեզ առ նոսա մերձենալ ոչ գոյր —, it was impossible for us to approach them; ոչ ունիմ — ի նայելոյ, I cannot refrain from looking at, or contemplating him; չկալան — ճշմարտութեան, they could not endure or suffer the truth.

Title: Ժուայթեմ
Definition_1: to eat and drink to excess, or voraciously.

Title: Ժուժկալ
Definition_1: patient; abstinent, sober, continent, temperate, chaste; — կեանք, continence; — լինել or կալ cf. Ժուժկալեմ.

Title: Ժուժկալեմ
Definition_1: to be patient, to suffer patiently; to resign one's self to; to be courageous, to suffer or bear with courage; to oppose, to resist; to abstain from, to be continent; to do without; — ի կերակրոց, to fast, to live on a diet; — ի դինւոյ, to abstain from wine.

Title: Ժուժկալութիւն
Definition_1: patience; abstinence, continence, temperance, chastity; sobriety, soberness; fortitude, constancy; fasting, diet; ի ժուժկալութեան gyql, to live continently.

Title: Ժում
Definition_1: time, moment; ժում մի, once, once on a time; sometime.

Title: Ժուռ
Definition_1: sour grapes; — քաղել, to gather unripe grapes; — ումուռ մեռանել, to die prematurely; ի — գալ, to walk, to take a walk.

Title: Ժպիտ
Definition_1: smile; laugh, grin, simper; — ժանտ՝ երգիծական՝ քաղցր ախորժ՝ չարիմաց դժնդակ, malicions, mocking, affected laugh; sweet, sardonic smile; — ելանել ումեք, to wish to laugh.

Title: Ժպիրհ
Definition_1: bold, audacious, insolent, rash, presumptuous, impudent.

Title: Ժպտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to smile, to draw a smile (from).

Title: Ժպտիմ
Definition_1: to smile, to sneer, to give a constrained laugh.

Title: Ժպրհիմ
Definition_1: to be bold, to have the audacity, to dare.

Title: Ժտեմ
Definition_1: to entreat earnestly, to conjure, to beseech; to importune, to tease; to dare, to be bold.

Title: Ժտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to embolden, to give or inspire with courage.

Title: Ժտիմ
Definition_1: to be importunate, to persist in entreaty; to be bold, audacious.

Title: Ժտութիւն
Definition_1: demand, solicitation, instance; importunity, hardihood; վասն ժտութեան քո, it is at your prayer that I...; վասն ժտութեանն, on account of his importunity.

Title: Ժրագլուխ
Definition_1: courageous, bold, brave; noble, magnanimous; diligent, careful.

Title: Ժրանամ
Definition_1: to take courage, to gather spirits, to grow stronger, to put forth one's strength, or courage, to be courageous; to be diligent, active, laborious.

Title: Ժրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to inspirit, to animate, to encourage.

Title: Ժրութիւն
Definition_1: courage, vigour; industry, diligence, activity; assiduity.

Title: Ժքթեմ
Definition_1: to shake up, to stir, to agitate (the water); cf. Շքթեմ.

Title: <letter>Ի</letter> (ini)
Definition_1: the eleventh letter of the alphabet and the fifth of the vowels; twenty, twentieth.

Title: Ի
Definition_1: to, of, by, for, in, at, upon, during, with; հայեցաւ ի Պետրոս, he looked at Peter; ի ժամ երրորդ, at three o'clock; գնալ ի Հայաստան, to go to Armenia; յերկրէ ի յերկինս, from earth to heaven; ի պատկեր Աստուծոյ, in the image of God; ի փրկութիւն առաքեաց, he sent to save; բաշխեաց ի մարդ հաց մի, he distributed a loaf to each person; որ ելանէ ի բերանոյ՝ ի սրտէ անտի գայ, that which comes out of the mouth comes from the heart; ոչ կարէր տեսանել ի բազմութենէն, he could not see on account of the crowd; շրջել ի զպոյ, to walk with a stick; ի ձախմէ Դամասկոսի, to the left of Damascus; նստել ի տան, to be at home; ի տեղւոջ անդ, in that place; ի տունջեան եւ գիշերի, by day and night; ի նմիմ ամի, in the same year; ի գարնան, in spring; ի ննջելն, asleep, sleeping; ի գնալն, in going, while going; ի գլուխ իմ, on my head; ի բարկութեան իմում, in my anger; ի հանդերձս աղտեղիս, with soiled clothes.

Title: Ի բաց
Definition_1: far, afar; outside; apart, aside; — գնալ, to depart; to steal away; — կալ, to keep away, to desist, to leave off; to refrain; — կալ ի հաւատոց, to renounce the faith; — արձակել, to deliver up, to abandon; — խափանել, to hidder; — առնել, բառնալ, to take away, to estrange, to remove, to snatch away, cf. Հեռացուցանեմ, cf. Օտարացուցանեմ; — առնուլ, to carry or clear away, to take off, to abstract, cf. Բացաբառնամ; — թողուլ, to abandon, to leave off, to cease from; — դնել, to put on one side, to lay aside or apart; զոգի — դնել, to affront, to brave death; — մերժել զերկիւղ, to drive away fear; անդր —, քաջ —, very, much; քաջ — քան զնոցա անասնութիւնն գնաս գնացս, you are filthier than a beast; — տար ! God forbid! Fie! Fie upon you! — գնա ! begone! Get out! Go away! to the devil with you! cf. Բաց.

Title: Ի բացէ
Definition_1: from afar; afar; in an open place, abroad; — առնել, to send away; cf. Բաց.

Title: Ի բաց ընկեցիկ
Definition_1: cast out, cast off; abject; cf. Բացընկեցիկ.

Title: Ի բացի
Definition_1: in the open air, abroad, out, in an open place; cf. Բաց.

Title: Իբր
Definition_1: as, like, in the same manner as; whilst, when, while; nearly, within a little, almost, about; as if; — այն թէ, — զի, — եթէ, as if; like as it were; ոչ եթէ, not that, not only; — ? how? by what means ? in what manner ? — ապա ? — արդեօք ? how then? how ever? — է? how is it? — ոչ ? of course, without doubt.

Title: Իբրեւ
Definition_1: as; in quality of; nearly, rather like;
Definition_2: when; —, — այն թէ, — զի՝ եթէ, as if, as though; because, seeing that; — ոչ եթէ, not as if, uot only, as if it were not; — զմիոյ միոյ լերանց, like the mountains; — զարմանալով իմն, as if surprised; ամաց — երեսնից, about thirty years of age;
Definition_3: — զի ! how! how much! how many! — գեղեցիկ է առաքինութիւնն ! how beautiful is virtue !

Title: Իբրու
Definition_1: as, so that, like; when; almost, nearly; —, — այն թէ, — եթէ՝ թէ, as if, in some way; — զի, as, because; — ոչ եթէ cf. Իբրեւ ոչ եթէ.

Title: Իգական
Definition_2: feminine gender; — տոհմ, the fair sex, women; — ախտ, hemorrhage.

Title: Իգակերպ
Definition_1: that has a female form, like a woman.

Title: Իգամոլ
Definition_1: addieted to women, abandoned to the love of women, immoderately fond of women, in love, amorous madman;
Definition_2: slave of the fair sex, general lover.

Title: Իգամոլիմ
Definition_1: to be addicted to women, abandoned to the lust of women.

Title: Իգանամ
Definition_1: to become effeminate; to be guilty of sodomy;
Definition_3: sodomite.

Title: Իգասէր
Definition_1: loving, fond of women; dandy, coxeomb; gallant; cf. Իգամոլ.

Title: Իդոս
Definition_1: idea, kind, sort, form, model; —ք, Ides.

Title: Ի դուրս
Definition_1: out; — կողզել, to pull out, to extract; cf. Դուռն.

Title: Ի զուր
Definition_1: in vain, vainly, to no purpose; without force; unjustly; cf. Զուր.

Title: Իժ
Definition_3: malicious.

Title: Իլ
Definition_1: spindle; — փաթութեալ, — մի լի, spindle-ful; իլոյ տալ զմատունս, to twirl the spindle.

Title: Իղձ
Definition_1: desire, wish, will; prayer; avidity, eagerness; magician, sorcerer, foreteller of events; guessing, divination, prophecy; — լինել, to wish for, to envy, to covet, to desire eagerly, to burn with envy, with impatience, cf. Փափագեմ; — առնել, cf. Աղօթեմ; լնուլ զիղձս իւր, to satisfy one's desire, one's curiosity.

Title: Իմ
Definition_2: my own, mine, my family, friends, people.

Title: Իմանալի
Definition_1: intelligible, comprehensible, perceptible, conceivable; intellectual, intelligent; —ք, spiritual intelligences; — է, it is to be understood, it means.

Title: Իմանամ
Definition_1: to understand, to know, to feel; to conceive, to comprehend, to perceive, to learn, to find out, to discover; to think, to consider; to believe; զօրութեամբ —, to understand (something omitted); հնարս —, ելս՝ ելս իրաց —, to find means, to exercise one's ingenuity, to invent; իմաստս չարս —, to weave a conspiracy, to form a plot, to cabal, to conspire; զանձին — բարի, to seek one's interest, to consult one's own happiness; գիտէ — զամենայն հնարս, he knows how to attain his end, how to manage.

Title: Իմաստ
Definition_1: signification, sense, meaning, substance, drift; acceptation; understanding, good sense, judgment; notion, knowledge; conception; thought, idea, design, project; maxim, axiom; invention; expedient, means; intrigue, machination, plot, snare; —ք ուղղութեան՝ առաքինութեան, sentiment of probity, of virtue; մեծահրաշ —ք, mysteries; զգայարանք —ից, the mind, intelligence; ուշ —ին՝ —ից, spirit, thought; յ— եւ ի բան հասանել, to arrive at the years of discretion; գալ յ—, to return to one's self, to recover the senses; to be known, understood; ունել զիմաստս իրիք, յիմաստս իրիք երթալ, to understand, to seize the meaning, to comprehend; —ս չարս իմանալ, cf. Իմանամ; զ— խորհդեան կատարել, to execute the deliberation of council; զիմաստս խաբէութեանն լուծանել, to frustrate a plot, to baffle an intrigue; —քն գործք լինէին, the ideas were realized.

Title: Իմաստագործ
Definition_1: intelligent, skilful, clever; well made, well constructed, skilfully made.

Title: Իմաստազեղ
Definition_1: replete with wisdom, vevy learned, very skilful; sententious, pithy; sentimental.

Title: Իմաստախոհ
Definition_1: tinking wisely or judiciously, wise, sensible, judicious, provident, cautious.

Title: Իմաստակեմ
Definition_1: to sophisticate, to play the pedant, to subtilize, to quibble.

Title: Իմաստակութիւն
Definition_1: sophism, sophistry, pedantry, cavil, chicanery, quibble, paralogism, paralogy.

Title: Իմաստաճեմ
Definition_1: that studies the sciences, that cultivates wisdom, lettered, learned; — հանճար, elevated genius.

Title: Իմաստասէր
Definition_1: philosopher; sage, man of science, of learning.

Title: Իմաստասիրանամ
Definition_1: to be philosophioal; to be virtuous.

Title: Իմաստասիրեմ
Definition_1: to study the sciences; to philosophize, to reason philosophically; to argue, to conclude, to infer; to live or behave wisely.

Title: Իմաստասպառ
Definition_1: that has lost his senses, mad, foolish.

Title: Իմաստնաբար
Definition_1: wisely, learnedly, skilfully, sensibly, prudently, judiciously, ingeniously; discreetly; sentimentally.

Title: Իմաստնանամ
Definition_1: to grow wise, to learn, to know, to be instructed; to understand, to comprehend.

Title: Իմաստնարան
Definition_1: the seat of wisdom; intellect, sense.

Title: Իմաստնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render wise, to improve in wisdom; to free from infatuation, to disabuse, to undeceive.

Title: Իմաստութիւն
Definition_1: wisdem, sense, reason; understanding, knowledge; philosophy; skill, science; գերաբուն —, sovereign wisdom; իմաստութեամբ, wisely, sensibly, judiciously; prudently, discreetly.

Title: Իմաստուն
Definition_1: wise, learned; intelligent; prudent, judicious, discreet, sensible; skilful; sentimental; philosopher; — առնել, cf. Իմաստնացուցանեմ;

Title: Իմաց
Definition_1: cf. Իմացութիւն; — առնել տալ, cf. Իմացուցանեմ.

Title: Իմացական
Definition_2: the mind, the intellect, the understanding; —ք, the spirits of light, the Angels.

Title: Իմացող
Definition_1: of quick apprehension, attentive, intelligent, discerning.

Title: Իմացուած
Definition_1: intellect, understanding; sense, sentiment; cenception; meaning, sense, signification; thought, design.

Title: Իմացութիւն
Definition_1: intelligence; intellect, understanding, comprehension, perception; sentiment, opinion; thought, design, project; —ք, the celestial intelligences, the angels.

Title: Իմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to inform, to apprize, to acquaint.

Title: Ի միասին
Definition_1: together, at once; conjointly; altogether, wholly, totally, completely, entirely; գալ —, to assemble; — էական, consubstantial.

Title: Ի՞մ իմիք
Definition_1: to what end? to what purpose?

Title: Իմն
Definition_2: really, in effect; մեծ — է ինձ, it is a great thing for me; կամէի —, I could wish; I would.

Title: Իմովսանն
Definition_1: as far as I possibly can, as much as is in my power, as much as I can, the best I can; as for me.

Title: Իննամեայ
Definition_1: nine years of age, nine years old.

Title: Իննեւտասնամեայ
Definition_1: of nineteen years; nineteen years old.

Title: Ինչ
Definition_2: some, a, an, one, certain, single, any; աւուրս —, some days; պտուղ —, some fruit; չիք —, չէ —, nothing, it is nothing, no matter; չգիտեմ —, I know nothing, I know nothing about it; Ի՞նչ, what? Which? զ— ժամ է ? what o'lock is it? զ— ասէ ?what says he ? առ զ— իցէ ? to what purpose ? cf. Զի՞նչ; յ— օրէնս ? in what law? in what religion or custom?
Definition_3: իւիք իւիք, in something, somehow; by which, whereby.

Title: Ինչ ինչ
Definition_1: something; զ— ինչ ? what? what thing? cf. Զի՞նչ.

Title: Ինչ
Definition_1: thing, something; ունիմ — ասել քեզ, I have something to tell you; յ— ածել, to create; ամենայն որ — իմ է՝ քո է, all that I have is thine.

Title: Ինչք
Definition_1: property, fortune, substance, possessions; riches, effects, goods and chattels; estate, domain; արկանել յընչից, to despoil or deprive of one's possessions.

Title: Ինքն
Definition_1: he; she; self; ես —, myself; դու —, thyself; նա —, himself, herself; ընդ — բարբառել, to say to one's self, to talk with one's self; յ— գալ, գալ — առ —, to come to one's self, cf. Զգաստանամ; յ— ամփոփիլ մտաց, to concentrate one's ideas, to collect one's thoughts; յ— արկանել, to attract, to win, to allure, to draw on, to entice, to gain; յ— հանել, to snatch away, to possess one's self of, to appropriate; ինքեան զօրութեամբ, by one's own power or force; ըստ ինքեան, of oneself.

Title: Ինքնաբար
Definition_1: by himself, spontaneously, voluntarily, of one's own accord.

Title: Ինքնաբորբոք
Definition_1: that which inflames, or excites itself.

Title: Ինքնաբուղխ
Definition_1: that flows or takes its rise naturally; self-produced; spontaneous, natural.

Title: Ինքնագիւտ
Definition_1: found out, discovered or invented by one's self; self-produced, spontaneous.

Title: Ինքնագործ
Definition_1: self-created; self-acting, that makes or works for himself, or by himself.

Title: Ինքնագործեմ
Definition_1: to make by himself, to produce.

Title: Ինքնագործութիւն
Definition_1: own work, sole agency, own action, own composition.

Title: Ինքնադէմ
Definition_1: face to face, personally, in person.

Title: Ինքնազարդ
Definition_1: self-adorned, simple, natural; — շնորհք, ingenuous grace; — բանք, unaffected words

Title: Ինքնաժառանդ
Definition_1: hereditary, in his own right, possessed by inheritance.

Title: Ինքնալոյս
Definition_1: of a luminous nature, bright, shining.

Title: Ինքնալուր
Definition_1: auricular, that has heard with his own ears; that only takes counsel of himself, or only obeys himself.

Title: Ինքնախաբ
Definition_1: self-deceiving, self-beguiled; — լինիմ, to deceive, or flatter one's self.

Title: Ինքնախօս
Definition_1: that speaks to himself; that soliloquizes.

Title: Ինքնակալ
Definition_2: self-depending, independent, absolute, free; — կամք, free will.

Title: Ինքնակամ
Definition_1: voluntary, spontaneous, willing; wilful, self-willed; capricious;
Definition_2: voluntarily, willingly, spontaneously; — կրօնք, superstition; — անձնիշխանութիւն, free will

Title: Ինքնակերպ
Definition_1: in his own form, in proper form.

Title: Ինքնակոչ
Definition_1: uninvited, self-invited; — լինել, to come without invitation; — բազմական, parasite, smell-feast.

Title: Ինքնահալած
Definition_1: fugitive, that flies of his own accord; — լինել, to take to flight.

Title: Ինքնահաճ
Definition_1: self-admiring, self-conceited, self-pleasing, presumptuous, arrogant; capricious, whimsical; affected.

Title: Ինքնաձայն
Definition_1: vowel; that has a sound by itself.

Title: Ինքնաձեռն
Definition_1: voluntary; powerful; self-sufficient; — լինել, to take too much liberty, too great a latitude; — լինել յիմն, to dare to undertake something, to attempt, to dare, to presume; — լինել յիւր որդիս, to kill one's children with one's own hands; — խեղդամահ սատակիլ, to strangle, or choke one's self, to commit suicide

Title: Ինքնամատոյց
Definition_1: self-devoted; that produces naturally, natural; favorable;
Definition_2: accident, fate, destiny; — դիմագրաւել, to expose one's self, to devote one's self; — տալ զօրինակն, to give an exemple easily imitated.

Title: Ինքնամարտ
Definition_1: that mortifies himself, that wages war against his passions; that wars against self.

Title: Ինքնամեռ
Definition_1: that dies a natural death; — լինել, to die a natural death.

Title: Ինքնայորդոր
Definition_1: voluntary, spontaneous, prompt, ready, inclined; — լինել, to crave, to have a longing for, to desire, to want, to long; — յորդոր յօժարութեամբ, of one's own freewill, willingly, cheerfully, voluntarily.

Title: Ինքնանամ
Definition_1: to become a man, a free man; to emancipate one's self; to exist by itself.

Title: Ինքնանուէր
Definition_1: that offers his services, that gives himself, voluntary, free, self-devoted.

Title: Ինքնապատում
Definition_1: that relates himself; related by himself.

Title: Ինքնասանձ լինիմ
Definition_1: to restrain oneself, to keep within bounds.

Title: Ինքնասպան
Definition_1: cf. Անձնասպան; — լինել անձին իւրոյ, to commit suicide, to kill one's self.

Title: Ինքնաստեղծ
Definition_1: self-created, invented; fictitious, imaginary, fancied, fantastical.

Title: Ինքնատէր
Definition_1: one's own master, absolute, independent; — եմք գործոց մերոց, we are masters of our own actions.

Title: Ինքնատէրութիւն
Definition_1: being one's own master, free will, liberty, independence; absolute or supreme dominion.

Title: Ինքնեակ
Definition_1: that comes of his own accord, voluntary; self-produced, fortuitous, natural;

Title: Ինքնին
Definition_1: by himself, personally, in person; դու —, yourself, (thyself); ես — իսկ եմ, it is I (myself); թագաւորն —, the king himself, in person; դուռն — բացաւ, the door opened of itself.

Title: Ինքնիշխան
Definition_1: absolute, sovereign, independent, free, uncontrolled; despotic

Title: Ինքնութիւն
Definition_1: selfhood, individuality, personality; essence, nature, property.

Title: Ինքնօրէն
Definition_3: capriciously.

Title: Ինքնօրինութիւն
Definition_1: autonomy, independence, freedom; law established by caprice;

Title: Իշանդամ
Definition_1: lascivious; whose flesh is as the flesh of asses.

Title: Իշավար
Definition_1: donkey-driver; goad, spur, stimulus for asses.

Title: Իշխան
Definition_1: prince, sovereign, despot; minister; magistrate; ruler, governor, chief, commander; —աց —, — աշխարհի, the sovereign, the king; prince, crown-prince, heir-apparent; — զօրուն, general of the army; —երգոց, cf. Դասապետ; —ք, the authorities; — լինել, to rule, to command, to be in power, in authority; — առնել զոք, to give power to some one; — էր իւրոց ախտից, he was master of himself, or his own master; քում գլխոյդ չես —, you are not lord of your own life; չէ —, he cannot, he is not authorised to; cf. Թեկն.

Title: Իշխանաբար
Definition_1: as a sovereign, as a commander, authoritatively; magisterially, imperiously; willingly; — կեալ, to live like a prince, to lead a princely life.

Title: Իշխանազն
Definition_1: prince, prince royal, prince of the blood; petty sovereign.

Title: Իշխանական
Definition_1: sovoreign, imperial; seigneurial, of or belonging to a baron; magisterial; absolute; lordly; noble; ruling, in power, in authority; —ն տունջեան, — գիշերոյ, the sun; the moon, the stars.

Title: Իշխանակից
Definition_1: joint ruler, joint sovereign; partner in dignity, colleague.

Title: Իշխանանամ
Definition_1: to become a prince er sovereign; to rule, to have dominion, to sway, to command.

Title: Իշխանանիստ
Definition_1: where the sovereign resides, capital, metropolitan.

Title: Իշխանապետ
Definition_1: chief ruler, first prince; prime minister; dictator.

Title: Իշխանասիրութիւն
Definition_1: ambition, immoderate thirst of dignity or power.

Title: Իշխանատուն
Definition_1: principality, dominion, lordship, power, rule, state; family or household of a prince, court.

Title: Իշխանափոխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to change one's prince or king.

Title: Իշխանութիւն
Definition_1: sovereignty, principality, lordship; authority, faculty; empire, dynasty, sway, rule, dominion, domination; abselute power; dignity; right, privilege; government, command, power, jurisdiction; free will, liberty; licence, exclusive permission; place, post; diocese; —ք, principalities (tho third order in the celestial hierarchy); հոգեւոր՝ ժամանակաւոր, spiritual and temporal power; առաւելազանց —, too much authority; յ— հասանել, to rise to dignities; to get into office, or power; տալ ումեք զամենայն —, to empower, to give carte-blanche, or full powers to; լինել ընդ իշխանութեամբ ուրուք, to be in the power of some one, or dependent on some one; այս ի վեր քան գիմս է —, that is beyond my power, that surpasses my capacity.

Title: Իշխեմ
Definition_1: to reign, to rule, to govern, to be master; to be in power, to have power or authority; to presume, to take the liberty, to dare; — կրից՝ ախտից, to master, to dominate, or command one's passions; — մտաց ուրուք, to hook, to lay one's hand on some one, to influence the thoughts and actions of some one.

Title: Իշխեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to give power, authority, to cause to dominate; իշխեցուցեր ի վերայ իմ զմահ, you placed me in the power of death, you put death in authority over me.

Title: Իշուկ
Definition_1: young ass, foal; great ass, blockhead.

Title: Ի՜շա
Definition_1: oh! fie! pugh! pish ho there I holla!

Title: Իջակ
Definition_1: half a page, little column (of a book).

Title: Իջանեմ
Definition_1: to descend; to fall; to decline; to sink; to settle, to subside; to light, to sit down; to empty itself; to lodge, to stop at, to sojourn; cf. Սերիմ; ի ծառայութիւն —, to lower one's self to servitude, to become a servant; յաղքատութիւն —, to impoverish one's self, to become poor; — ի նաւէ, ի կառաց, յերիվարէ, to disembark, to go ashore, to land; to alight, to get out of a carriage; to dismount or alight, to get off, to get down from a horse; — ի գերեզման՝ իհող մահու, to descend into the grave, to be buried; — յօթեւան ուրեք, to put up at an hotel; — ի հպարտութենէն, to humiliate one's self; to relent, to soften, to become calmed, appeased; ի թիկունս —, to go to the rescue, to succour; — ի հանդէս մարտի, to come to blows, to fight; — գետոց ի ծով, to discharge, to fall into, to disembogue, to disgorge, to empty itself, to overflow; արտասուք զծնօտիւք իջանեն, the tears fell down his (or her) rosy cheeks; էջ մրրիկ հողմոյ ի ծովակն, a storm broke over the lake.

Title: Իջավան
Definition_1: inn, hotel, lodging; —ս առնել, to take lodgings, to lodge; —ս տալ, to lodge, to receive into one's hotel, to accomodate with lodgings, to harbour; to entertain.

Title: Իջավանիմ
Definition_1: to lodge, to take up ones abode, to stop, to reside, to dwell, to nestle.

Title: Իջումն
Definition_1: descent; fall; declivity; act of sinking; subsidence.

Title: Իջուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make to descend, to cause to fall; to let down, to lower; to pull down, to take down; to unfasten, to untie; to turn out, to discard, to dismiss, to remove; — զառագաստ նաւու, to lower sail, to strike sail; արտասուս —, to shed tears, to weep.

Title: Իսկ
Definition_3: besides, moreover; but, still, yet; in fact, really; even; as for, as to; զիսկն գիտել, զիսկն ասել, to be thorougly acquainted with; to tell the simple truth; to exhaust a subject; մեզէն — լուաք, we ourselves have heard; ինձ — գլխովին, to me; to myself; բնաւ — ոչ, not at all; բնաւ — զի՞ լսէք նմա, why do you listen to him ? չէ եւ չէ —, by no means, in no way whatever; յայտ —է, it is palpable, evident, clear; — ես, for me, as for me; — վասն, as for;
Definition_4: — եւ —, in a moment, soon, speedily, immediately, instantly, directly, forthwith; truly, in effect, really.

Title: Իսկական
Definition_1: real, effective, true, essential, natural, proper;

Title: Իսկակից
Definition_1: of the same nature, or essence, consubstantial.

Title: Իսկաճեմ
Definition_1: walking, or flying with a graceful motion; seeking after the truth.

Title: Իսկապէս
Definition_1: really, in effect, in fact, truly; — բարի, essentially good; — բերկրանք, true or durable pleasures.

Title: Ի սկզբանէ
Definition_1: from the beginning, at the beginning; cf. Սկիզբն.

Title: Իսկութիւն
Definition_1: reality, truth; essence, substance, nature; naturalness; personality, hypostasis;
Definition_2: essence, essential or volatile oil; — բեւեկնոյ, spirit, or — of turpentine.

Title: Իսկուհի
Definition_1: Queen; — Կոյս, the Holy Virgin; — երկնից, queen of heaven.

Title: Ի սպառ
Definition_1: to the end; finally, at length, at last; fully, altogether, wholly, entirely, quite.

Title: Իր
Definition_1: thing; affair; fact, effect, substance; reality; յ— արկանել, to use, to wear; to put in execution; օգնել իւիք, to procure assistance; — ոչ կարեմ առնել —ս ինչ, I can do nothing; —ք առն յառաջադէմ յաջողէին, this man's affairs prospered; այր հմուտ —աց պատերազմի, a man experienced in warfare; կարեւոր —, an important affair; —ք աշխարհին, public business; իրաց իրաց, of various, or many things; յ—ս յ—ս, in various matters; —օք, by deeds; really, effectively; ամենայն —օք, in any vay, or manner, at all events; սմին, դմին, նմին —ի, for this, therefore, for this, that reason; բարւոք ընթանան —ք, cf. Ընթանամ; ընդ բան եւ ընդ — է մեծ ինչ խտիր, saying and doing are two things.

Title: Իրագէտ
Definition_1: well versed, well informed, acquainted, intelligent; — լինել, to be in confidence, to be made acquainted with an affair, to know the case.

Title: Իրագործեմ
Definition_1: to effect, to do, to execute.

Title: Իրազեկ առնել
Definition_1: to inform, to initiate, to let into a secret, to make acquainted; — լինել, to be informed, to be made acquainted, to be aware of, to acquaint one's self with, to know; զորոց — եղեն զքէն, those things they have heard about you.

Title: Իրական
Definition_1: real, effective, actual, substantial, positive; —աց պատմութիւն, the history of events.

Title: Իրան
Definition_1: trunk, upper part of the body.

Title: Իրապէս
Definition_1: really, in effect, positively; substantially, physically, naturally.

Title: Իրաւ
Definition_3: justly, reasonably, rightly; — առնել, to do justice, to justice; դուք ձեզէն տուք զ—ն, be ye yourselves the judges, judge for yourselves.

Title: Իրաւաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak truth; to plead; to practise law.

Title: Իրաւադատ
Definition_1: that judges righteously, just, equitable, incorruptible.

Title: Իրաւախոհ
Definition_1: whose thoughts are bent on justice, just, equitable; — լինել, to be composed, adjusted; — առնել, to accord, to conciliate, to reconcile.

Title: Իրաւասոյզ
Definition_1: unjust, corrupt; that conceals the truth or justice, corrupting, bribing.

Title: Իրաւարար
Definition_2: judge, arbiter, umpire, mediator; — կացուցանել, to make judge; — անբողոքելի, sovereign judge.

Title: Իրաւացի
Definition_1: just, equitable, right, reasonable; lawful, legal; honest, worthy, righteous;
Definition_2: justly, equitably, reasonably; — է, it is right, just.

Title: Իրաւացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to justify, to approve, to do justice; — զիրաւունս այրուոյն, to support the cause of widows; — զոք թագաւորել, to confer the right to reign, to legitimate the reign.

Title: Իրաւընտիր
Definition_1: who discerns between and judges, who decides;

Title: Իրաւորեմ
Definition_1: to effect, to put in execution, to do.

Title: Իրաւունք
Definition_1: right, justice, equity; due; law; duty; reason; rectitude, uprightness; right, faculty, power, competence;
Definition_2: իրաւամբք or ըստ իրաւանց, by right, rightfully, justly, duly, lawfully; որո՞վ իրաւամբք, by what right ? with what authority ? աստուածային —, divine-right; ամենայն իրաւամբք, with all one's authority; —նս առնել or ընտրել, to render justice, to judge; զիրաւունս ուրուք ի գլուխ հանել, to justify completely; առնել ումեք —նս ի ձեռաց թշնամեաց, to free one from his adversaries, to acquit; —նս համարել՝ վարկանել, to think, or repute right, to think it proper, to believe oneself right; —նս տալ, to show with reason, to bring proofs; to justify, or exculpate oneself; զիրաւունս ցուցանել, to prove one's rights, to adduce or allege proofs in one's defence; to contest, to bring an action against; —նս հանել, to judge rightly; to justify; զ—նս ի նա հանել, to pronounce judgment in one's favour; զիրաւունս իւր կացուցանել, զիրաւունս անձին ցուցանել, to put in one's claim, to avail oneself of one's rights; —նս խնդրել, to ask for justice, to demande one's right; պինդ կալ յիրաւունս, պահանջել զիրաւունս, to sustain one's rights; թիւրել զիրաւունս, to cavil, to sophisticate, to overstain the law; — են նոցա բողոք ունելոյ, they have reason for complaint; եւ իրաւամբք արդեօք, that is not without reason.

Title: Իրեար
Definition_1: one another, each other; reciprocally; չեն յ— նման, they are not like, they do not resemble each other; շաղկապէ զինքեանս առ —, it unites one to the other, colleagues; ընդ — անկանել, to rise one against the other, to fall out, or disagree among themselves, to quarrel, to come to blows, to fight; անդամք ընդ իրեարս պատշաճ, well proportioned limbs; տեսանել զերեասս իրերաս, to see each other; ի վերաս իրերաց սպանանել, to kill one after the other; անդոսնել զիրերօք, to despise one another; իրերօք օգնել միմեանց, to help one another.

Title: Իրողութիւն
Definition_1: affair, transaction, circumstance; occupation, employment, negotiation of affairs, business, practice; cf. Գործ.

Title: Իցէ
Definition_1: can it be! is it possible ? — թէ տեսից ? when shall I see ? will it ever happen that I shall see ? իցէ՜ թէ, oh that! would to Heaven that when will it be ? please God ! իցէ՜ թէ հաճեսցին դիք, the gods permitting; իցէ՜ թէ արշաւեսցեն երիվարք ընդ վէմս, can horses run on loose stones!

Title: Ի՞ւ
Definition_1: in what? with what? in what way, or manner? ի՞ւ գիտացից, how shall I know it ?

Title: Իւլապենի
Definition_1: zizvphus, lok-tree or jujube-tree; cf. Յունապի.

Title: Իւղ
Definition_1: oil olive-oil; butter; ointment, salve, ungnent; pomatum; essence, essential oil; perfume; —ք անուշունք, անուշից, perfumery; — օծութեան, extreme unction; holy oil; chrism; — ողորմութեան, alms, charity; օծանել զերեսս անոյշ —ով, to anoint one's face with precious ointment; առնուլ զհոտ —ոյ, to smell of oil; զտել զ—, to clarify oil; խանութ —ոյ, oil-shop; հնձան —ոյ, oil-press; վաճառականութիւն —ոյ, the oil-trade; շիշ —ոյ, oil-bottle, or cruet; — սեղանոց, salad-oil.

Title: Իւղաբեր
Definition_1: that produces, or brings oil, ointment or essence.

Title: Իւղագլխեմ
Definition_1: to anoint the head, to initiate, to conseerate, to ordain.

Title: Իւղագլխիմ
Definition_1: to be initiated; to be consecrated, ordained.

Title: Իւղագլխութիւն
Definition_1: hair-ointment; sacred unction for the head only; initiation; admission to the rites and mysteries of a religion.

Title: Իւղաթուրմ
Definition_1: steeped in aromatic oil, unctuous, all over oil; — գլուխ, perfumed head.

Title: Իւղաներկ
Definition_1: oil-colours; — նկար, պատկեր, oil painting; նկարել —, to paint in oil.

Title: Իւղավաճառ
Definition_1: oil-man, oil merchant; կրպակ —ի, oil-shop; հնձան —ի, oil press.

Title: Իւղարան
Definition_1: pot, or vase for ointment; the vase for holy oil; place for anointing; oil factory.

Title: Իւղարկեմ
Definition_1: to oil, to anoint, to grease.

Title: Իւղենի
Definition_1: that produces oleaginous fruits, perfumes, ineenses; olibanum, frankincense, incense-tree.

Title: Իւր
Definition_1: his, her; his own; —ով անձամբ, personally, in person; իբրեւ —ոյ հայէր մեծութեանն, he considered riches as belonging to himself; — առնել, to be appropriated; cf. Իւրացուցանեմ; յ— վերայ or ի վերայ —, on him; —քն, his relations, friends, dependents.

Title: Իւրաբնակ
Definition_1: where he dwells; of his habitation.

Title: Իւրակից
Definition_1: the same as he, in conjunction with him.

Title: Իւրահոգ
Definition_1: egotist, that thinks only of self; — շահասիրութիւն, self-interest.

Title: Իւրային
Definition_1: his, his own; —քն; his parents, servants; his works, deeds, property, wealth, goods.

Title: Իւրանման
Definition_1: like himself, of his own nature.

Title: Իւրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to appropriate to himself; to usurp.

Title: Իւրաքանչիւր
Definition_1: each, every; respective; — ոք, each individually; — ոք առանձինն, each one separately; մեկնեցան — յեղբօրէ իւրմէ, brother was separated from brother; առն —, to each one; — ումեք ի նոցանէ, to each of them; գործք — ուրուք, each man's acts; յ— աւուր, each day, every day.

Title: Իւրովի
Definition_1: of or by himself; spontaneously, voluntarily, of his own free will;
Definition_2: his, her; — զիւր անձն անիծանէ, he curses himself; ինքն — կործանէ զանձն չարութիւնն, malice prepares its own punishment; — երթալ, to go personally; զ— երթալ, to commit suicide.

Title: Իւրովսանն
Definition_1: as much as he could, as much as lay in his power, as much as is possible for him, his best.

Title: Իւրութիւն
Definition_1: the act of appropriation; property, substance.

Title: <letter>Լ</letter> (lioun)
Definition_1: the twelfth letter of the alphabet, and the seventh of the consonants; thirty, thirtieth.

Title: Լալ
Definition_1: cf. Լալիւն; զ— հարկանել՝ առնուլ, to wail, to weep, to lament, to deplore; to be in mourning.

Title: Լալագին
Definition_1: tearful, pitiful, rueful, weeping, in tears;

Title: Լալական
Definition_1: that weeps, plaintive, mournful, dreary, sad; groaning, moaning, wailing; —ք, female mourners, hired female weepers at funerals, mutes; —ն, faculty of weeping.

Title: Լալահառաչ
Definition_1: broken by sighs and sobs, groaning, moaning, wailing.

Title: Լալիւն
Definition_1: weeping, bewailing, tears, lamentation, mourning, groaning; լալ ի լալիւն՝ լալիւն մեծ, to melt or burst into tears, to weep bitterly, to shed a shower of tears, to shed bitter tears; լալիս դնել, to weep, to cry, to groan; լալիք, mourning, time of mourning.

Title: Լախուր
Definition_1: apium; նեմէական — (ի յաղթանակս ողիմպեանս), a crown of apium (in the Nemean games).

Title: Լախտ
Definition_1: club, mace, mall, bat; ոստախիտ —, knotty club.

Title: Լակ
Definition_1: licking, lapping; dog-por-ridge, (made of meal and water for the dogs); bread boiled in water.

Title: Լակագէտ
Definition_1: a. sorcerer by means of a basin full of water.

Title: Լակեմ
Definition_1: to lap up, to lick up.

Title: Լակոնական
Definition_1: laconic, short, concise; — ոճ, laconism; — ոճով, laconically, briefly; վարել զոճ —, to be laconic, to speak laconically, to express much in few words.

Title: Լաճ
Definition_1: boy, lad; waiter; pot-boy; shop-boy; page, servant; serf.

Title: Լամ
Definition_1: to weep, to shed tears, to cry; — դառնապէս, to weep bitterly, to shed bitter tears; — վայրապար, զ— կեղծաւորիլ, to have tears at command; — ի ծաղուէ, to cry with laughing; — զմեղս իւր, to mourn for, or bewail one's sins; — զոք or ի վերայ ուրուք, to weep, to bewail, to deplore some one; cf. Լալիւն.

Title: Լամա
Definition_1: lama, (the human idol of the Asiatic Tartars);
Definition_2: lama, (a South American beast of burden).

Title: Լամբ
Definition_1: ring, circle, hoop, handle; buckle, staple;

Title: Լամբատք
Definition_1: torches, flam-beaux; a sort of meteor like a torch.

Title: Լայն
Definition_1: large, broad, ample, vast, spacious, extensive; գետ ի — ծաւալեալ, a mighty mass of flowing water, an immense, or over flowing river; բարձր եւ — հասակաւ, a tall and stout man, fleshy, corpulent.

Title: Լայնագոյն
Definition_1: wider, more ample, vory extensive; —ս, largely, copiously, amply.

Title: Լայնադէմ
Definition_1: having a bloated face, whose features are too large.

Title: Լայնադիր
Definition_1: of a wide and roomy situation.

Title: Լայնալանջ
Definition_1: high chested, broad chested; — երասանակք, rudders, helms.

Title: Լայնալիճ
Definition_2: a well-braced bow, a great and strong bow, a far-shooting bow.

Title: Լայնախորհուրդ
Definition_1: that has great longanimity, or great forbearance, very patient.

Title: Լայնակամար
Definition_1: that has a large girdle, or zone.

Title: Լայնաձիգ
Definition_1: long-drawn, far stretched, long and large; —ք երկրի, the immense size of the earth.

Title: Լայնանամ
Definition_1: to widen, to stretch, to extend, to grow larger, to branch out; — մարմնոյ, թիկանց, to pick up flesh, to fatten, to get fat, plump, chubby, stout.

Title: Լայնասփիւռ
Definition_1: far-spread, great, extensive, ample, vast, spacious; ի — դաշտի, in the middle of a large plain.

Title: Լայնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to widen, to enlarge, to extend; to dilate, to stretch; to unfold, to unrol, to draw out, to spread, to open.

Title: Լայնիմ
Definition_1: to be widened, enlarged, extended; — շրթամբք, to prate, to chatter, to blab, to croak; — ամենայն անցաւորաց ճանապարհի, to abbandon, or prostitute one's elf to every passer by.

Title: Լայնութիւն
Definition_1: width, breadth, extent, space, size; enlargement;
Definition_3: amplitude.

Title: Լանջաբերձ
Definition_1: high breasted; up to the breast.

Title: Լանջակից
Definition_1: in mutual embrace; լանջակից լինիմ, to embrace each other, to be embraced.

Title: Լանջակողմն
Definition_1: the shoulder (that part of a mountain which lies between the summit and the middle).

Title: Լաստ
Definition_1: train of boats; raft, float; vessel, ship, boat; Noahs ark; bedstead;

Title: Լաստակոտոր առնեմ
Definition_1: to break, or take to pieces, or destroy a raft or ship; to sink.

Title: Լաստափայտ
Definition_1: float or raft of timber; ship.

Title: Լաստեմ
Definition_1: to build or construct; to put in a serviceable state; to get ready.

Title: Լատին
Definition_1: latin; — բարբառ, the latin language; — եկեղեցի, the latin church.

Title: Լատինագէտ
Definition_1: latinist, skilled in the latin language.

Title: Լատինամոլութիւն
Definition_1: mania to become latinized or romanized.

Title: Լատրատեմ
Definition_1: to bark; to speak ill of.

Title: Լար
Definition_1: string, packthread, twine; line, rope; galloon, ribbon; snare, gin, noose; bird-cage; opisthotones, contraction of the tendons of the neck; cf. Լորցք; back-bone, or spinal marrow: 30 anciently 60 stadia or furlongs among the Egyptians;
Definition_2: chord, string; լար անյարդար, a false chord;
Definition_3: chord.

Title: Լարաբաժին
Definition_1: measured with a surveyor's chain; measurement; — առնել, to measure with the chain, to lay out by the line, to survey, to parcel out; — առնել զերկիր, to divide, to portion, or to measure out the land; — բաժանիլ, to be divided, or measured by line.

Title: Լարագիր առնեմ
Definition_1: to take the measurement and plan.

Title: Լարաչափեմ
Definition_1: to measure with a line or chain.

Title: Լարեմ
Definition_1: to stretch, to draw, to spread; to set, to fix; — որոգայթս, to lay snares, to stretch out nets; — զոք ի պատրանս, to spread a snare, to deceive; — զքիլ, to stretch forth the hand; խոզի — զբաշն, to bristle up.

Title: Լաւ
Definition_1: good, excellent; superior, better; praiseworthy; honest, upright; — վարկանել՝ համարել, to esteem or love more, to prefer; առ —ս ունել, to hold in honour, to reverence; ի — անդր գալ, to become better, to improve, to ameliorate; — է, it is good, it is better or wortb more; — եւս, so much the better; ո՞չ — եւս իցէ, would it not be better ? ո՞չ — եմ ես քեզ քան զտասն որդի, am I not worth more than ten sons to you ? — էր թէ մեռեալ էաք, would that we also had not survived !

Title: Լաւագոյն
Definition_1: better; — առնել, to ameliorate, to make better, to improve; — վարկանել համարել, to consider highly, to prefer; — կեանք, the future life.

Title: Լաւակամութիւն
Definition_1: bounty, benevolence, kindness, good disposition, obligingness.

Title: Լաւանամ
Definition_1: to grow better, to be ameliorated, to improve.

Title: Լաւութիւն
Definition_1: goodness, improvement, excellence, worthiness; good quality; գալ ի —, to amend, to reform; լաւութեանց հանդէս, parts.

Title: Լափ
Definition_1: cf. Լակ; paste; pap (for the babies); hasty-pudding, hodgepodge.

Title: Լափատեմ
Definition_1: to devour, to swallow, to drink hard, to gulp down;

Title: Լափեմ
Definition_1: to lap up, to lick up, to eat up greedily, to quaff, to toss down, to swill; to devour, to consume.

Title: Լափլիզեմ
Definition_1: to devour, to eat up, to raven, to gorge, to glut, to consume; — զմատեան, to devour, to be a book-worm, to pore night and day, to read over hastily and greedily.

Title: Լափումն
Definition_1: act of licking or lapping up.

Title: Լեառն
Definition_1: mountain; — տեառն, — սուրբ, heaven, paradise; լիրինք յաւիտենից, յաւիտենական or մշտնջենաւոր, the angels, the prophets, the apostles; արտեւան, գագաթն, կատար լերանց, the summit, the ridge of the mountain; կապան, կիրճ լերանց, strait, defile, pass; գօտի, շղթայ, պար լերանց, chain, ridges of mountains; հրաբուղխ լեառն, volcano, a burning mountain; սառնատափ լերինք, glaciers; լուղական լերինք, iceberg; մոլորակային, լուսնային լերինք, the planetary, the lunar mountains; զլեառն լեռնայն գնալ, to go from mountain to mountain, or by mountain paths; լեառն Սինա, Մասիս, mount Sinai, Ararat; իբրեւ զլերինս ելանէին բարձրանային փրփրադէզ ալիքն, the foaming waves ran mountains high; եւ լեառն մուկն ծնաւ, the mountain brought forth a mouse.

Title: Լեարդ
Definition_1: liver; — որթու, calf's -; ցաւ լերդի, — complaint; տապ, բորբոքումն լերդի, hepatite, inflammation of the liver.

Title: Լեզու
Definition_1: tongue; language, speech, idiom; nation, people; — լեզու ապխտեալ, smoke-dried tongue; լեզու աղտեղի, foul tongue; լեզու կօշկի, toe of a boot or shoe; լեզու զանգակի, clapper, tongue of a bell; լեզու երկրի, neck of land; հայ լեզու, the Armenian language; գաւառական լեզու, dialect, idiom; մայրենի լեզու, mother-tongue, vernacular idiom, native language; կենդանի լեզու, living, dead language; ուսուցիչ լեզուաց, language-master; վարժապետ գաղղիական լեզուի, teacher, professor of french; լեզու չար, սուտ, նենգաւոր, a malicious, slanderous tongue; լեզու անուշակ, մեղրակաթ, honey-tongued; լեզու քաջ, վսեմ, eloquent; խօսել այլ եւ այլ լեզուս, to speak many languages; to have the gift of tongues; լեզուի տալ, to speake inconsiderately, cf. Շաղակրատեմ; to be full of talk; ի լեզու գալ, արձակել լեզու, to be able to talk, to receive the faculty of speech; արձակել, ձգել առ ոք զլեզու, to speak openly against, to contradict; լեզուոյ դրունս դնել, ունել զլեզուն, կարճել՝ սանձել զլեզուն, to hold one's tongue; to bridle one's tongue; մերձ ի ծայր լեզուին ունել, to have at one's tongues end; լեզուն ի քիմս կցիլ, to lose the use of speech, to be tongue-tied, speechless or dumb, to be struck dumb; անոսկր է լեզու, այլ զոսկերս լեսու, the tongue has no bones and yet it breaks bones; որպիսի՜ լեզու շաղակրատ, what a chatter-box ! կարի քաջ փոխեաց զլեզու իւր, he has much changed his language, he now sings quite an other tune.

Title: Լեզուագարիմ
Definition_1: to have a great itching to talk, to be all tongue, to let one's tongue run on, to chatter, to prattle.

Title: Լեզուագարութիւն
Definition_1: too great a freedom of speech, flippancy of tongue, the being too free with one's tongue, prate, prattle, loquacity.

Title: Լեզուախօսութիւն
Definition_1: the gift of tongues, gift or power of speaking many languages;

Title: Լեզուածայր
Definition_1: pronounced with the tip of the tongue.

Title: Լեզուանիմ
Definition_1: to have a glib or flippant tongue, to have the gift of the gab.

Title: Լեզուատ
Definition_1: that lisps or stammers; cf. Լեզուահատ.

Title: Լեղի
Definition_2: gall, spleen, rancour, malice, wrath, choler;
Definition_3: bitter; պարկ լեղւոյ, gallbladder.

Title: Լեղում
Definition_1: to temper, to dilute, to dissolve.

Title: Լեշկ
Definition_1: hairless, napless, worn out, consumed, wasted.

Title: Լեշկիմ
Definition_1: to lose the hair; to lose the nap, to wear out.

Title: Լեռնաբերձ
Definition_1: high, very high, as high as a mountain.

Title: Լեռնախոյզ
Definition_1: seekingamoug mountains; wandering or roving among mountains.

Title: Լեռնակարկառ
Definition_1: steep, rising high, very elevated, very lofty, towering.

Title: Լեռնակեաց
Definition_1: mountaineer; hermit; — լինիմ, to live, to dwell in the mountains.

Title: Լեռնակեցութիւն
Definition_1: sojourn, retired life among the mountains; զանձն լեռնակեցութեան տալ, to withdraw to the mountains; to live a hermit's life.

Title: Լեռնակողմն
Definition_1: mountainside, highland, mountainous country, region or place.

Title: Լեռնակոյտ
Definition_1: heaped up, gathered into a mass, amassed, drifted into a heap like a mountain; լեռնակոյտ կարկառ, heap, mass; rick; pile.

Title: Լեռնակուտակ
Definition_1: cf. Լեռնակոյտ; լեռնակուտակ ալիք, a heavy sea, mountainous billows.

Title: Լեռնականգէտ
Definition_1: like a mountain, very high, enormous.

Title: Լեռնաձեւ
Definition_1: mountain like, very high; — կուտակիլ, to be heaped up; — կոհակք, waves like mountains, enormous billows.

Title: Լեռնամուտ
Definition_1: retired to, or fled in the mountains.

Title: Լեռնանամ
Definition_1: to become a mountain; to rise like a mountain, to rise aloft, to elevate, to tower.

Title: Լեռնասէր
Definition_1: that loves the mountains, fond of mountainous country.

Title: Լեռնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to hoard, to accumulate, to heap together.

Title: Լեռնոտեայք
Definition_1: the dwellers on the slopes, or at the foot of a mountain, lowlanders.

Title: Լեռնոտն
Definition_1: foot of a mount-ain; the country extending from the foot of mountains, lowlands.

Title: Լեռնորդեայք
Definition_1: mountaineers, mountain population, people dwelling in the mountains.

Title: Լեռնցի
Definition_1: mountaineer; աղջիկ —, mountain-lass, mountain-maid; — մանուկ, mountain-lad.

Title: Լեսած
Definition_1: pounded matter, (any substance triturated, pounded, or reduced to small bits or to powder).

Title: Լեսան
Definition_1: slab used by painters for grinding and mixing paints.

Title: Լեսում
Definition_1: to grind, to pound, to beat, to powder, to bruise, to crush;

Title: Լեսուրք
Definition_1: places water-worn by currents, or torrents;

Title: Լերանցամէջք
Definition_1: mountain valley, vale, dale, dell; սառնակոյտ ի լերանցամէջս, glacier.

Title: Լերդաբեկեմ
Definition_1: to frighten, to dread, to terrify, to scare.

Title: Լերդակից
Definition_1: akin, related, consanguinous; — արիւն, relationship, consanguinity, ties of blood.

Title: Լերդահմայ
Definition_1: haruspex, augur, diviner, soothsayer; — լինիմ, to examine or consult the entrails, to prognosticate like an augur.

Title: Լերդահմայութիւն
Definition_1: soothsaying, (divination by the entrails of victims); augury, omen.

Title: Լերինաթինդ
Definition_1: causing the mountains to tremble and quake.

Title: Լերկամարմին
Definition_1: whose body or skin is without hair.

Title: Լերկանամ
Definition_1: to become bald, to peel off, to come off.

Title: Լեփ
Definition_1: declivity, incline, slope; steepness, a steep & profonnd declivity;
Definition_2: առ —, — առ —, precipitous; in a sloping manner, downwards.

Title: Լի
Definition_2: fully, completely, thoroughly, entirely; perfectly; լի առնել, to fill, to load, to heap; զբազում լսելիս լի արար բանն, many have heard him; լի լինել, cf. Լիանամ; լի եւ լի, cf. Լիուլի; լի ափով, ձեռօք, by handsful, profusely, generously; լի աւաբաւ, loaded with booty; լի փառօք, covered with glory; լի աւուրք, full of years, old; լի մտօք, sensible, judicious, wise; լի երախտագիտութեամբ, full of gratitude, of affection, of faults; զաւուրս տասն լի, ten entire days; լի կատարեալ, բովանդակ, perfectly full, entire, complete, perfect, cf. Լիակատար; լուսին լիով լուսով նկարեալ, full moon; բաժակ գինի լի արկանել, a glass of wine full to the brim; լի զհասակ մարմնոյն ունել, to be adult, to arrive at man's estate; լի են բերանք նոցա ծաղու, they are full of laughter, of merriment; լի ասացեր, you are quite right.

Title: Լիաբախտիկ
Definition_1: full of happiness, very happy, joyful.

Title: Լիադոյն
Definition_1: full, abundant, very copious, in the highest perfection.

Title: Լիազօր
Definition_1: who has unlimited authority, plenary powers; — ոստիկան, minister plenipotentiary.

Title: Լիախորտիկ
Definition_1: abundant, plentiful; sumptuous; festive, merry; gluttonous.

Title: Լիակատար
Definition_2: perfectly, entirely, fully; — իշխանութիւն, absolute power, full authority; — իշխանաւոր, a plenipotentiary; — ներողութիւն, plenary indulgence.

Title: Լիահանճար
Definition_1: full of wisdom, sensible, prudent; ingenious, skilful.

Title: Լիաձեռն
Definition_1: with a bountiful hand, liberal, generous.

Title: Լիամագիլ
Definition_1: clawed, armed with claws, or talons.

Title: Լիանամ
Definition_1: to be full, to abound; to be filled with, to be satiated.

Title: Լիապատար
Definition_1: heaped up, running over, full to overflowing; complete, perfect.

Title: Լիացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fill up, to fill with; to satiate, to fill to overflowing, to load with; to satisfy; to perfect, to finish, to ultimate.

Title: Լիզանեմ
Definition_1: to lick; to lap; to devour, to consume; to destroy, to annihilate.

Title: Լիզաջինջ առնեմ
Definition_1: to lick up, to devour, to exterminate.

Title: Լիկ
Definition_1: lake, lagoon; basin; wash-hand basin, wash-pot, tub.

Title: Լիճ
Definition_2: — լուսոյ or արտասուաց, lake of tears, eye; — հրոյ, lake of fire, hell.

Title: Լինդ
Definition_1: gum; ցաւել լնդաց, to have sore gumes.

Title: Լինելութիւն
Definition_1: being, origin, generation, creation, birth; ի — ածել, to create, to produce from nothing, to call into existence; յանէութենէ or յոչէից ի — գալ, to be created, to exist.

Title: Լինիմ
Definition_1: to be; to exist, to live; to consist; to become, to turn, to make one's self; to happen, to take place, to occur, to chance; to come to pass; — առն, to marry, to be married, cf. Ամուսնանամ; — ընդ կնոջ ընդ միմեանս, to have commerce with, to be in intimate relation with; — ընդ ումեք, to stay with, to live together; — ուրեք, to sojourn; to dwell; — բերկրութիւն ուրուք, to be the joy or happiness of; — այր, to become a man, to arrive at man's estate; — քահանայ, to be ordained priest; զի՞նչ լինիցի ընդ իս, what shall I do ? what will become of me ? ի ցնծութիւն եւ ի հիացումն եղեւ աշխարհի, he was the glory and admiration of the whole world; են նորա երկու որդիք, he has two sons; իցեն այսոքիկ որպէս եւ են, whatever it may be; քաւ եւ մի լիցի, God forbid ! արանց եւ կանանց լինէին, they married and were given in marriage; որ ինչ լինելոց է եղիցի, happen what may ! ողջ լիք or լերուք, adieu! good bye! farewell!

Title: Լիով
Definition_1: plentifully, abundantly, copiously, fully; completely; amply, largely; diffusely.

Title: Լիութիւն
Definition_1: plenty, abundance, fulness; repletion; riches; կեալ ի լիութեան, to live in abundance; ի —, in abundance, profusely; ի — բաւականի, sufficiently, enough.

Title: Լիսեռն
Definition_1: axle-tree; whirl put to a spindle; shin or shin-bone, the tibia.

Title: Լիր
Definition_1: fulness, plenitude; — արկանել, to fill a ditch; լրիւ իւրով, totally, entirely, completely; ապականել զերկիրն լրիւ իւրով, to lay waste the land; to desolate the land in the fulness thereof; Տեառն է երկիր լրիւ իւրով, the earth is the Lord's and all that therein is.

Title: Լիրբ
Definition_1: impudent, insolent, impertinent, brazenfaced, bold; immodest, indecent, shameless; cynic.

Title: Լիցք
Definition_1: stuffing; any thing used to fill up a vacancy; knuckle-bones; dice; — խաղալ, to play at knuckle-bones.

Title: Լլկանք
Definition_1: vexation, torment, oppression, ill usage; anguish, sorrow, affliction, trouble.

Title: Լլկեմ
Definition_1: to vex, to torment, to oppress, to torture, to maltreat; to afflict, to trouble, to molest; to be possessed by devils; to violate, to deflower, to dishonour; to ravish.

Title: Լլկիչ
Definition_1: that which vexes, torments, oppresses, troubles.

Title: Լծաբարձ
Definition_1: that bears the yoke; obedient, submissive.

Title: Լծադիր
Definition_1: that imposes a yoke; — լինել, to suhject, to place under the yoke.

Title: Լծակ
Definition_1: lever; balance; — քառաթեւին, arms of the cross; — կշռոյ, beam of an assaying balance; — թեքեալ or արմկնաձեւ, crook or elbow -; — արգելիչ, detent -.

Title: Լծակից
Definition_1: bearing the same yoke, yoke-fellow, companion, fellow, colleague, partner; husband, spouse; — հարազատութիւն, consanguinity; — լինել, to be united, accompanied; to be married.

Title: Լծակռուիմ
Definition_1: to quarrel (among yoke-fellows); to fall out with one's companions, to make a quarrelsome household; to litigate, to contend, to dispute.

Title: Լծակռուութիւն
Definition_1: yoke-fellow war, dispute among persons subject to the same authority; a quarrelsome household; controversy, dispute, quarrel; law-suit.

Title: Լծակցեմ
Definition_1: to place under the same yoke, to harness together; to conjoin, to join, to league, to unite, to confederate; to couple, to pair; to unite in marriage.

Title: Լծակցիմ
Definition_1: to be united, conjoined; to be agreed; to be married.

Title: Լծակցութիւն
Definition_3: substitution of letters having similar sounds.

Title: Լծեմ
Definition_1: to yoke; to couple, to join; — զկառս, to harness the horses to a carriage, to get a coach ready, — զերիվարս, to match two horses; to put horses to a coach; — զանձն յինչ, to apply oneself to;
Definition_2: to substitute one letter for another.

Title: Լծընկէց
Definition_1: that shakes off the yoke, disobedient, refractory, froward, rebellious; — լինել, to shake off the yoke, to obtain liberty; to be refractory.

Title: Լծորդ
Definition_1: united under the same yoke; joined, associated, allied; equal, matched;

Title: Լծորդեմ
Definition_1: to join, to conjoin; ի մի —, to unite in one; — զզգաստութիւն պարկեշտութեան ընդ գեղոյ, to unite chastity with beauty;

Title: Լծորդութիւն
Definition_3: conjunction.

Title: Լկնիմ
Definition_1: to become soft, or tender; moist.

Title: Լկտամ
Definition_1: to be impudent, shameless, insolent; to lose all sense of shame, to lay aside decency, to become shameless, to lead a debauched life; to dare; լկնիլ աչաց, to look impudently; cf. Լկնիմ.

Title: Լկտի
Definition_1: impudent, immodest, shameless, lecherous, lewd, libertine, licentious, insolent, unblushing, brazen-faced; lascivious, wanton, lustful, obscene; — կաքաւել, to dance indecently.

Title: Լկտութիւն
Definition_1: impudence, efffont-ery, immodesty, indecency, shamelessness, licentiousness, obscenity, libertinism, dissolute life.

Title: Լճամէջ
Definition_1: the middle of a lake, the deepest part.

Title: Լճափն
Definition_1: side, margin, shore of a lake.

Title: Լմեմ
Definition_1: to press, to squeeze; to soften, to make tender; to knead;

Title: Լնում
Definition_1: to fill; to accomplish, to fulfil; to spread, to diffuse; to complete, to consmnate; to load, tore-load, to fill again; to repeople; to glut; to stuff; — զաղեղն, to bend the bow; — լուսնի, to be at the full (moon); — զօրէնս, to fulfil the law; — զօրէնս բնութեան, to satisfy the laws of nature; — զոք օրինօք տեառն, to instruct in, to fill with knowledge of the divine law; — զքաղց, զծարաւ, to drive away hunger, to satisfy; to quench thirst; — զիղձս, to satisfy or content on's wishes; — զպէտս, to satisfy one's necessities; — զձեռս, to give to the priest, to consecrate; to be consecrated; արեամբ — զձեռս, to dip the hands in blood, to assassinate; — զոք պարգեւօք, to load with gifts; — զտեղի, to take the place of, to substitute, to replace; — մինչ ի վեր, to fill up to the brim; ընդ ամենայն տեղիս — զաւետարանն Քրիստոսի, to spread the gospel of Christ everywhere.

Title: Լնում
Definition_1: to be filled, to come to its highest pitch, to complete; լնու չափ հասակին, he becomes adult.

Title: Լոգանամ
Definition_1: to wash, to batho one's elf, to take a bath; — բուսոց, տնկոց, to bedew; to water plants.

Title: Լոկ
Definition_1: sole, alone, only, simple; empty, desert; deprived of; — օր, work-day; — մնալ ի մարդկանէ, to be, or to remain unpeopled; — եւ մերկ ի սփոփութենէ, disconsolate, very sad;
Definition_2: — or — ի լոկոյ, only, simply; բանիւ լոկով, with the word alone.

Title: Լոկիմ
Definition_1: to be alone, abandoned; to be empty, void, desert; to deprived of.

Title: Լոկութիւն
Definition_1: privation, want, emp-tyness, void; — ընչից, poverty, indigence.

Title: Լող
Definition_1: swimming; flying; — քար, stone-roller; ի — անկանել, to swim, to take to the water, to jump into the water; արկանել —, to set floating, to float, to launch; ի —, by swimming; ի — հատանել անցանել, to swim over, or across; ի — հասանել ի ցամաք, to swim to the shore; ի — երթալ, to swim to, to swim beyond.

Title: Լողամ
Definition_1: to swim; to float, to be buoyed up; — յօդս, to fly, to float in the air.

Title: Լողեմ
Definition_1: to roll, to level with a cylinder.

Title: Լոյծ
Definition_1: liquid, fluid; loose, free; soft, mellow, tender; — որովայն, open, easy in the bowels; — լինել բնութեան, to be easy in the bowels; to have the diarrhoea, flux, looseness; — հանդերձք, immodest dress; — կեանք, debauchery, dissolute life.

Title: Լոյս
Definition_1: light; brightness, splendour; fire; illumination; day; sun; sky; eye; լոյս, լոյս անեղ, Eternal light; լոյս հաւատոյ, լոյս մտաց, the light of faith; light of intellect; լոյս քաղցր, a gentle light; լոյս զոդիակոսի, northern lights, (aurora borealis); լոյս ելեկտրական, electric light; լոյս կազի, gas light; ի լոյս, by the light of, in broad daylight, openly, visibly; եղիցի՛ լոյս, եւ եղեւ լոյս, let there be light! and there was light; լոյս սո՛ւրբ, ողջո՛յն ընդ քեզ, անդրանիկ դու երկնից ծնունդ, եւ կամ՝ մշտնջենին յաւատակից դու ճառագայթ, hail, holy Light! offspring of heaven firstborn, or of the Eternal coeterhal beam; չիք լոյս անվթար կամ բաժակ անմրուր, no joy without alloy; ծագել լուսոյ, to dawn; մինչ լոյսն զգիշերն մերկանայր, it was scarcely break of day, at day break, at early down; ի լոյս գալ, ի կենաց հասանել, to come out, to appear; to come into the world, to be born; to give birth or life to; կորուսանել զլոյս աչաց, to lose one's sight; լոյս տալ աչաց, to open the eyes, to cause to perceive, to warn; ամփոփել լուսոյ ուրուք, no longer to behold the light of day, to die; ի լոյս ածել, հանել ի լոյս, to bring to light, to discover, to publish, to illustrate; ի լոյս ընծայել զմատեան, bring out, to publish a work; լոյս առնուլ, to see the day; to grow light;
Definition_2: to be enlightened, illuminated; ի լոյս դառնալ, to issue from an eclipse; լոյս տալ, to instruct, to enlighten; լոյս աչաց իմոց, լոյսդ իմ անձկութեան, light of my eyes, my life, my heart, my love, my darling, my dearest one, my sweet one; աչք իմ մի՛ տեսցէն զլոյս, may I be struck blind! damn my eyes!
Definition_3: consolation, relief, balm, balsam.

Title: Լորձ
Definition_1: saliva, spittle, slobber, slaver, drivel; լորձունս ծորեցուցանել, to slaver, to slabber, to drivel.

Title: Լորտնիմ
Definition_1: to be tired, fatigued, wearied; լորտնեալ մշակ, a wearied peasant.

Title: Լորտու
Definition_1: adder, a small non venomous yellow serpent adored by the ancient Egyptians.

Title: Լորցք
Definition_1: convulsion, violent contracting of the sinews, spasm.

Title: Լու
Definition_1: flea; մաքրել որոնել զլուս, to flea, to clear from fleas.

Title: Լու
Definition_1: the hearing, the act of hearing; լու առնել, to make known, to bring intelligence, to announce, to publish, to divulgate, to spread the news; լու լինել, to be heard of, to be announced, to be made known, to be published, promulgated; լու եղեն բանք նորա, his words were heard; — ի —, publicly, in presence, in the hearing of; եւ ասէ ցնոսա ինձ — ի —, he told them in my hearing.

Title: Լուալի
Definition_1: bath; wash-house; scullery; privy, watercloset, close-stool; slop-pail; ջուր —լեաց, suds, slop sink, drain; ջերմ —ք, thermal baths, hot baths.

Title: Լուանալի
Definition_1: cleansing substance; —ք, washer, scourer, fuller; washerwoman, laundress; hath.

Title: Լուանամ
Definition_1: to wash, to cleanse, to bathe; to rinse; — զերեսս, to wash the face of; to wash one's face; լուանամ զձեռս, I wash my hands of it, I'll have nothing to do with it; — զոք թշնամանօք, to scold, to upbraid, to reprimand, to blow up; ջուրբ —, to innundate, to wash away, to destroy by floods.

Title: Լուանամ
Definition_1: to wash, to wash one's self; to bathe, to bathe one's self; <ab>fig.</ab> to clear one's self from, to wash out a stain of dishonour; — զփոխարէնն, to refuse a recompense; — զսերմն առն, to lose, to abort, to fail, to miscarry, to have an abortion, a premature birth; զայլս եւս լուանաս քոյով անօրէնութեամբն, you contaminate others by your iniquities.

Title: Լուարան
Definition_1: wash-hand basin; basin or tub to wash in; lavatorium; lavabo.

Title: Լուացիկ
Definition_1: that serves to wash in; կոնք —, washing tub, bath.

Title: Լուացք
Definition_1: washing, whitening; bleaching; օր —ցից, washing day.

Title: Լուիճ
Definition_1: aphis, plant-louse, wine-fretter, insect blight on plants.

Title: Լուծ
Definition_1: yoke; pair, couple; լուծք եզանց, yoke of oxen; լուծ կշռոց, pair of scales; beam of a balance; բառնալ ինչ ի լուծ կշռոց, to weigh with scales; —ք, a pair; — —, in pairs; լուծ իմ քաղցր է եւ բեռն իմ փոքրոգի, my yoke is easy and my burden light; աունուլ զլուծ կրօնաւորական կարգի, to take the cowl (monk), to take the veil (nun), to pronounce the vows, to become a monk or nun; մտանել ընդ լծով ամուսնութեան, to bear the yoke of matrimony; ընդ լըծով արկանել, to place under the yoke; <ab>fig.</ab> to subject, to reduce to slavery; խոնարհել ընդ լծով, to bend under the yoke; <ab>fig.</ab> to submit tamely to slavery; ընդ լծով կալ, ընդ լծով ծառայութեան մտանել, to pass under the yoke, to become a vassal, or tributary; լուծանել, բառնալ զլուծ, to unharness; to take off the yoke; ընկենուլ, թօթափել, նշկահել զլուծ, ի բաց ընկենուլ զլուծն, to throw off the yoke, to slip the collar; զերծանիլ ի լծոյ, to be freed;
Definition_3: yoke;
Definition_4: libra, the balance (sign of the zodiac).

Title: Լուծական
Definition_2: fugitive, transitory; — կերակուր, flesh, meat food.

Title: Լուծանեմ
Definition_1: to untie, to unyoke, to unchain, to unbind, to undo, to loose; to dissolve, to decompose, to break; to resolve, to decide; to temper; to dilute, to soften; to unfold, to develope; to dissipate, to disperse; to melt, to dissolve; to explain; to analyse; to change; to violate, to infringe; լուծանել զերկունս, to free from the pains of labour, to cause to bring forth; լուծանել զերկունս նորա, to be born of her; լուծանել զքաղց, զքերան, to breakfast, to take refreshment; լուծանել զպահս, to break one's fast; լուծանել զոք ի կենցաղոյս, to take away a perso's life, to kill, to slay, to murder; լուծանել զկեանս աշխարհիս, զկեանս իւր, զկենցաղ մարդկան, to end one's days, to depart this life, to cease to live, to die; լուծանել զմեղս, to absolve, or remit sin; լուծանել զդատակնիք, to annul a sentence; լուծանել զօրէնս, to violate the laws, to transgress; լուծանել զշաբաթս, to break the sabbath; լուծանել զխաւար, to shed a light in the darkness, to make darkness light; վրէժս լուծանել, to be punished; լուծանել զլեզու, to untie, to cause to speak; լուծանել զամուսնութիւն, to dissolve a marriage; լուծանել զարգանդ կուսին ի պղծութիւն, to deflower, to violate; լուծանել զսէրն հայրենի, to act in disregard of paternal love; լուծանել զքուրձ, to open a sack; լուծանել զորովայն, to loosen, or move the bowels; to purge; զարժանին պատուհաս ելոյծ զյանցանացն, he met with the punishment his crimes deserved.

Title: Լուծանիմ
Definition_1: to get loose, to become untied, to be dissolved, decomposed; to languish, to fall off, to flag; to be consumed, to waste away; to grow soft or slack; to stop, to stay, to lodge with; to be dismissed, destituted, deposed; լուծանել ի վաւաշ ցանկութիւնս, to give up one's elf entirely to luxury; յարտասուս լուծանել, to melt into tears; լուծանել ի կենաց, յաշխարհէ, to cease to live, to die; լուծանել ի շոգի, to evaporate; լուծանել ի ծաղուէ, to laugh heartily, cf. Թալանամ; լուծան պէտք նոցա, their wants were provided for.

Title: Լուծանք
Definition_1: cessation; the laying waste, ruin, spoiling, destruction.

Title: Լուծեալ
Definition_1: degraded, dismissed; sickly, infirm; languid, faint; paralytic.

Title: Լուծումն
Definition_1: solution; decomposition, resolution, dissolution, dispersion; explication, discovery, explanation; dilution; liquefaction; fluidity; abolition; infraction, infringement, violation; fainting; — ամուսնութեան՝ ժողովոյ, dissolution of matrimony; dissolving of an assembly; — որովայնի, diarrhoea, looseness, flux; — կենաց, death; — սառնամանեաց, thaw.

Title: Լումայափոխ
Definition_1: money-changer; banker; տուն, սեղան —ի, exchange office; bank.

Title: Լումայափոխութիւն
Definition_1: exchange, change; շահել, կորուսանել լումայափախութեամբ, to win, to lose by the exchange.

Title: Լուռ
Definition_1: mute, silent, taciturn; — բերանով, in silence; լուռ հաւատք, absolute, blind faith; լուռ լինել՝ կալ, to be silent, to keep silence, to remain mute, cf. Լռեմ; լուռ լինել ի թշնամութենէ, to cease from being enemies; to conceal enmity; լուռ լինել յաստիճանէ, to be deprived of, to be degraded, deposed; լուռ լե՛ր, silence! hush! hold your tongue! ի լուռ լե՛ր, do not celebrate; չկարէր լուռ կալ, he could not refrain from speaking.

Title: Լուռ լուռ
Definition_1: silently, tacitly, in silence; զմանկունս — ուսուցանել, to teach the children silence;

Title: Լուսաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak early; to explain, to make clear.

Title: Լուսաբեր
Definition_2: window; Lucifer, the Morning-star; heavenly bodies, sun, moon, stars.

Title: Լուսաբորբոք
Definition_1: fiery, on fire, in flames, bright with heat, red hot.

Title: Լուսագարիմ
Definition_1: to be deprived of sight; to be blind.

Title: Լուսագեղ
Definition_1: beautiful as light, lucid, clear, luminous, bright.

Title: Լուսագնաց
Definition_1: illuminated, lighted; that walks in light.

Title: Լուսազարդեմ
Definition_1: to furnish with light, to illuminate

Title: Լուսազգեաց
Definition_1: clothed or surrounded with light, bright, luminous, radiant.

Title: Լուսածագիմ
Definition_1: to shine, to give light, to illuminate.

Title: Լուսակերպ
Definition_1: like a light, clear, luminous; —ք, angels

Title: Լուսակիզն
Definition_1: of very white wool; bright, shining.

Title: Լուսակրօն
Definition_1: candid, holy, pure, spotless, without stain or blemish.

Title: Լուսամուտ
Definition_1: any opening to admit light; sky-light, window, casement, dormer-window.

Title: Լուսանամ
Definition_1: to be light, to be daylight, to dawn; մինչեւ լուսասցի օր, till tomorrow's dawn, till daybreak, tomorrow; օրն լուսանայ, daybreak begins to appear; լուսացաւ նոցա ի Բլէւնա, they arrived at Plewna with day-break; եւ շաբաթ լուսանայր, and saturday commenced to appear; յառաջ քան զաւուրն, before day-break.

Title: Լուսանն
Definition_1: lynx; ունել աչս լուսանունս, to be lynx-eyed.

Title: Լուսանցոյց
Definition_1: that permits the light to pass;

Title: Լուսանց
Definition_1: margin; — բնութեանց, the eyes; գրել ի —ս, to make marginal notes.

Title: Լուսապատար
Definition_1: full of light; — լուսին, full moon.

Title: Լուսասահման
Definition_1: surrounded with light, splendid, bright, luminous.

Title: Լուսասնունդ
Definition_1: furnished with divine light; illustrious, brilliant

Title: Լուսասփիւռ
Definition_1: that sheds light, resplendent, shining, radiant.

Title: Լուսատարմիկ
Definition_1: surrounded by a bright array; — երկնային թռչունք, angels.

Title: Լուսատես
Definition_1: that sees the light (eye); of brilliant aspect.

Title: Լուսատեսակ
Definition_1: like the light, clear, bright, brilliant; beautiful.

Title: Լուսատու
Definition_1: that gives light, enlightening; — լինել, to teach, to enlighten, to illuminate; — աշտարակ, light-house; —ք, the stars.

Title: Լուսաւոր
Definition_3: apostles, prophets, doctors; — առնել, cf. Լուսաւորեմ.

Title: Լուսաւորագոյն
Definition_1: very luminous, most splendid; —, —ս ad. clearly, evidently, in the clearest manner.

Title: Լուսաւորեմ
Definition_1: to illuminate, to make light, to render clear, to brighten;
Definition_2: to enlighten, to illumine; to light, to kindle; to make serene; to restore to sight, to open the eyes of; to manifest;
Definition_3: to shine, to glitter, to sparkle, to brighten.

Title: Լուսաւորիչ
Definition_1: illuminator; սուրբ Գրիգոր՝ — Հայաստանեայց, St. Gregory, the illuminator of the Armenian nation.

Title: Լուսափայլ
Definition_1: shining with light, resplendent, glittering, refulgent, dazzling.

Title: Լուսափայլեմ
Definition_1: to shine, to shed light, to be brilliant.

Title: Լուսափառ
Definition_1: brilliant, luminous; splendid, illustrious; —ք burning and shining light.

Title: Լուսիկ
Definition_1: small light; rush-light, night-light; an agreeable light.

Title: Լուսին
Definition_1: moon, the planet, or the luminary of the night; moon, month; ծագումն լուսնի, moon-rise; լոյս լուսնի, moon-shine, moonlight; շող լուսնի, moon-beam; նոր, ամսագլուխ լուսին, new moon; կարակնաձեւ, ուռճալիր լուսին, full moon; աճեցուն, նուազուն, լուսալիր լուսին, crescent, waning, harvest moon; կարմրորակ լուսին, red moon, April moon; փուլ լուսնի, the waning of the moon; cf. Քառորդ; եւ ոչ լուսին կասէ ի մաշել եւ լնուլ, not even the moon ceases to wax and wane; եւ էր գիշեր պայծառափայլ լուսնի, it was a beautiful moon-lit night, the moon shone bright; լուսին ձիոց, horse-shoe;
Definition_2: տեսիլ լուսնի, phase; ընթացք լուսնի, lunation, the lunar course.

Title: Լուսն
Definition_1: speck, film, cataract; pearl or web; բուժել, կեղեւել զ—ն, to couch a cataract.

Title: Լուսնակ
Definition_1: moonlight, moon-shine; moon-light night; ի լուսնակի, by moon-light, in the moon-light.

Title: Լուսնական
Definition_1: lunar, lunary; monthly; lunatic; epileptic; — ամիս, տարի, lunar month, lunar year.

Title: Լուսնամուտ
Definition_1: neomenia (Roman feast of the new moon).

Title: Լուսնոտիմ
Definition_1: to be lunatic; to be subject to epileptic fits.

Title: Լուտամ
Definition_1: to scold, to reproach, to abuse, to imprecate.

Title: Լուր
Definition_1: hearing, audition; audience; news, account, report, relation; hearsay, rumour; renown, fame; discourse, sermon; obedience; noise that wakes or rouses; sound, voice, cry; Աստուած ամենայնիւ լուր է, the ail-hearing God; լուր չարեաց, bad news, ill news; լուր առնել, to warn, to avert; to acquaint; to announce; զխուլս ի լուր առնել; to cause the deaf to hear; լուր լինել; to be heard; to be announced; լուր դնել; to listen; to hear; լուր լինել առ ոք, to come to one's knowledge; ելանել լրոյ ուրուք, to spread one's fame; լուր ի ականջաց լսել, to hear with one's own ears; ի լրոյ, by hear-say, by current report; — ! listen ! — օր, workday.

Title: Լուրթ
Definition_1: greenish-grey, ash-coloured; azure, blue, sky-ooleured, sky-blue.

Title: Լուրջ
Definition_1: gay, joyful; sprightly, lively; sober, grave, imposing, serious; — երեսօք, seriously; ի բարբառ —, with a serieus voice;
Definition_2: ի լրջեաց, ի լրջէ, in a waking state.
Definition_3: cf. Լուրթ.

Title: Լուցանեմ
Definition_1: to light, to kindle; to inflame, to burn.

Title: Լուցումն
Definition_1: lighting or setting on fire; illumination; fire, conflagration.

Title: Լպրծեմ
Definition_1: to cause to slip; to slip; to slide, to glide.

Title: Լռարան
Definition_1: place ef silence; —ք, silence; —ք Պիւթագորացւոց, the five years' silence imposed on his scholars by Pythagoras.

Title: Լռելեայն
Definition_1: tacitly, by implication; secretly, in secret; silently, without bustle, in a private manner.

Title: Լռեմ
Definition_1: to hold one's tongue, to remain silent, to be silent; to keep silence, to cease to speak, to hold one's peace; to cease, to be at rest, to repose, to rest; to be out of work;
Definition_2: net to mention, to say nothing of, to suppress, to pass over in silence.

Title: Լռեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to silence, to put to silence, to impose silence; to interrupt, to cause to cease; — զխիղճ մտաց, to stifle one's remorse or compunction.

Title: Լռիկ
Definition_1: taciturn, silent, mute; lonely, solitary; quiet, calm, peaceful; private; secret;
Definition_2: tacitly, silently, in silence; without bustle; — կալ, to be silent; լռիկ մնջիկ, silent, mute;
Definition_3: silently.

Title: Լռութիւն
Definition_1: silence, secrecy; taciturnity; calm, quiet, tranquillity; պատուել զ—, to preserve silence; լուծանել, աղմկել զ—, to break silence; նստել ի լռութեան, to live in tranquillity, to lead a peaceful life; ընդ լռութեամբ անցանել, to pass over silently; ի խոր լռութեան գիշերոյ, in the deep silence of night; եթէ խօսքն է արծաթի՝ —ն է ոսկի, words are silver, silence is gold; — ! silence ! hush !

Title: Լսասէր
Definition_1: that loves to hear, eager to listen; attentive, obedient.

Title: Լսարան
Definition_1: hearing, ear; hall of audience, auditory; university.

Title: Լսելափակ
Definition_1: that stops his ears; that shuts his ears to.

Title: Լսելի
Definition_1: audible; that hears; — առնել, to cause to hearken to, to cause to grant; — լինել, to be heard or listened to; to be hearkened to; — եղեն աղօթք քո, your prayers have been heard; — եղեն դից մաղթանք նորա, the gods grant him.

Title: Լսելիք
Definition_1: ears; sense of hearing; cf. Զուարթացուցանեմ.

Title: Լսեմ
Definition_1: to hear; to give audience to, to listen to; to grant, to hearken to the prayer of; to understand; — զչար հոտ, to perceive the odour; չլսելոյն, չլուելոյն առնել, to turn a deaf ear to; լուայ զի, I have heard it said that; լուարուք ինձ, listen to me, hear me; լուր մեզ, hearken to us, grant our prayer; ոչ լսեն ինձ, they do not listen to me.

Title: Լսնանամ
Definition_1: to become white, to whiten, to bleach.

Title: Լսնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to whiten, to render white, to bleach.

Title: Լսող
Definition_1: listening, hearing; auditor; scholar, disciple; obedient, docile; — լինել, to hear, to hearken to, to lend an ear to.

Title: Լրագիր
Definition_1: gazzette, newspaper; paper, journal; gazzetteer, newsman.

Title: Լրանամ
Definition_1: to be accomplished, finished; to overflow with.

Title: Լրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to complete, to accomplish, to finish, to crown, to complete the measure of, to carry to its highest pitch.

Title: Լրբացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render impudent, to divest of shame.

Title: Լրբենի
Definition_1: cf. Լիրբ; — երեսք, brazen-face, bare-face; — սէր, illicit love.

Title: Լրբիմ
Definition_1: to be shameless, impudent, bold, brazen-faced; to behave with insolence, to say silly, or impertinent things.

Title: Լրբութիւն
Definition_1: impudence, impertinence, insolence, shamelessness, arrogance, cynism; ի — դարձուցանել, to render insolent.

Title: Լրութիւն
Definition_1: entire estate, complement, completeness, fulness; accomplishment, completion, perfection, consummation; satiety; reunion, multitude; — լուսնի, full moon; ի — ածել, to accomplish, to complete, to finish, to crown, cf. Կատարեմ; ի — գալ՝ ելանել՝ հասանել, to be accomplished, to be fulfilled; ի —, for the completion of; ի — աղետիցս, to complete my misfortunes, to give me the finishing blow, to fill up the measure of my misfortunes; — ժպրհութեան, եղերան, the height of insolence; the lowest depth of crime; — եղեւ փառաց նորա, his glory was at the highest pitch.

Title: Լրջադէմ
Definition_1: joyful, gay, of a cheerful countenance.

Title: Լրջանամ
Definition_1: to awaken, to wake up; to become sprightly, to indulge in mirth, to make merry.

Title: Լրջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to awaken; to rouse to gaiety, to render merry, to put into good humour; to lighten; to brighten.

Title: Լրջմտութիւն
Definition_1: good humour, merriment, jollity, gaiety, joy; vivacity; vigilance, alertness, watchfulness.

Title: Լրտես
Definition_1: spy, informer, police-spy; betrayer, traitor; emissary; scout.

Title: Լրտեսեմ
Definition_1: to spy, to play the spy, to watch, to search narrowly, to observe in secret; to waylay, to lie in wait for.

Title: Լրտեսութիւն
Definition_1: office or employment of a spy, espionage.

Title: Լցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fill, to fill up; to satiate; to accomplish, to complete, to effect.

Title: Լքանեմ
Definition_1: to leave, to abandon, to desert, to forsake, to quit, to give up; to disable; to dismantle; to discourage, to dishearten.

Title: Լքանիմ
Definition_1: to grow weak, to be disabled, to languish, to want force; to despair, to be dispirited.

Title: Լքումն
Definition_1: abandonment; desertion, defection; weakness, debility; lowness of spirits, loss of courage.

Title: Լքուցանեմ
Definition_1: to weaken, to enfeeble; to dispirit, to discourage, to dismay, to drive to despair.

Title: <letter>Խ</letter> (khé)
Definition_1: the thirteenth letter of the alphahet, and the eighth of the consonants; forty, fortieth.

Title: Խաբ
Definition_2: fraudulent, deceitful; deceived, cheated, defrauded, duped; — գործել, տալ, to cheat, to defraud, to dupe, to swindle; ի —ս անկանել, to be deceived, to fall into error; ի —ս ինչ լինել, to be in fault; ընդ —ս գտանել, to detect in fraud;
Definition_3: ընդ խաբս, ընդ խաբ, fraudulently, deceitfully, knavishly, roguishly; cunningly, astutely; — շրթանց, the spell of eloquence; գուցէ ընդ —ս ինչ իցէ, perhaps it was done by mistake.

Title: Խաբեայ
Definition_1: deceitful, fraudulent, fallacious; false, treacherous, knavish, crafty, full of imposture, roguish, cunning, villainous, rascally; fleeting, transitory;
Definition_2: sharper, swindler; hypocrite, dissembler; bait, lure, decoy; — ի խաղու, cheat, sharper, trickster; խաբեայ կերպարանք, mask.

Title: Խաբեմ
Definition_1: to cheat, to deceive; to defraud, to dupe, to trick, to gull, to inveigle, to insnare; to plot, to hatch, to contrive; to pervert, to seduce, to mislead; to mock, to laugh, not to care, to trifle; — ի խաղի, to cheat at play.

Title: Խաբեպատիր
Definition_1: fraudulent; deceitful, false, illusory, insidious, sophistical.

Title: Խաբէութիւն
Definition_1: fraud, knavery; deceit, cheat, fallacy, trick, artifice, rogu-ishness, imposture, deception; chicanery, dissimulation; villainy, dishonesty; — ի խաղու, cheat, a cheating trick.

Title: Խաբիմ
Definition_1: to be cheated, deceived; to be laughed to scorn, to be jeered at.

Title: Խաբու
Definition_1: cheating, deceitful, fallacious; crafty, smirking, smooth-tongued.

Title: Խազ
Definition_1: note; line, letter; notch of an arrow; նուագել զխազս, to solfa; նուագումն խազից, solfeggio;

Title: Խազեմ
Definition_1: to draw lines, to roll; to mark out, to delineate, to outline; to mark, to brand.

Title: Խազմ
Definition_1: war; dispute, quarrel, sedition, fight; — առնել, to dispute, to contest, to debate; to fight, to come to blows.

Title: Խազմագործ
Definition_1: warlike, martial, brave, valiant; troubling, perturbing, seditious, factious.

Title: Խաթ
Definition_1: flat side of the carpus in sheep, (small knee-bone used in the game "knuckle-bones" ).

Title: Խաթարեմ
Definition_1: to damage, to spoil; to corrupt; to ruin, to shatter; to rumple, to crumple.

Title: Խաժ
Definition_1: rude; — գոյն, of a pale grey.

Title: Խաժամուժ
Definition_1: low, vulgar, plebeian; — or — ամբոխ՝ մարդիկ, the mob, the rabble, the populace.

Title: Խալ
Definition_1: speck, point; mole on the skin.

Title: Խալիզոն
Definition_1: snail; suit of rooms or buildings.

Title: Խախանջեմ
Definition_1: to howl, to yeli, to shout.

Title: Խախուտ
Definition_1: unstable, ill-built, weak, frail; inconstant, mutable;
Definition_2: emigration; — լինել, to emigrate, to quit one's country.

Title: Խախտեմ
Definition_1: to remove, to displace, to dislodge; to move, to change; to shake, to cause to totter; to ruin; to refute, to confute; to emigrate; — զոսկերս, to dislocate, to disjoint, to put out of joint; — բանիւք, to tease, to annoy, to torment with idle gossip.

Title: Խախտումն
