Definition_1: destruction; displacing, removal; emigration; — ոսկերաց, dislocation, luxation.

Title: Խածանեմ
Definition_1: to bite; to chew, to gnaw, to tear in pieces;
Definition_2: to nettle, to sting, to snarl at, to revile; — զմիմեանս, to bite one another.

Title: Խածանող
Definition_2: satirical, cynical; — լեզու, tart tongue; — բարք, mordacity, sharpness.

Title: Խակ
Definition_2: harsh, rugged, rough, unkind, cruel, inhuman; inexpert, unpractised, ignorant; ill-bred, boorish, awkward, rude.

Title: Խակագործ
Definition_1: seditious, factious, turbulent; — ստահակութիւն, cf. Խակագործութիւն.

Title: Խակակուք
Definition_1: gathered prematurely, harsh, unripe; new, fresh; premature.

Title: Խակամիտ
Definition_1: whose judgment is immature, foolish, puerile.

Title: Խակամտութիւն
Definition_1: want of mature judgment, folly, youthful ignorance or inexperience.

Title: Խահ
Definition_1: dish, viand, mess; meat, cooked meat.

Title: Խահարան
Definition_1: kitchen; աղախին ի —ի, kitchen-maid; լուացաջուր —ի, dishwater.

Title: Խահարարութիւն
Definition_1: cookery; the dishes served up; seasoning of dishes; dainty meats.

Title: Խահրեմ
Definition_1: to overdo, to cook too much, to burn, to spoil; to corrupt, to ruin.

Title: Խաղ
Complement: ու, ուց, ի, ից, ոյ, ով
Definition_1: play, game; recreation, pastime, amusement, sport; fun, joke, raillery, pleasantery, mockery; mummery, foolery; games; scene, stage, theatre; *song, air; սէր խաղուց, gambling, gaming; խաղք Ողոմպիայ, Olympic games; խաղք ըմբշամարտից, wrestling; գնդակ խաղ, the game of tennis; խաղ կճեայ գնդակաց, game of marbles; խաղ նարտի, backgammon; խաղ աղիւսակի, draughts; խաղ սատրնջոյ, chess; խաղ աչկապուկի, blind man's buff; խաղ թղթոյ, card-playing; cf. Թուղթ; խաղ բախտի, game of chance; խաղ բառից, a pun, play upon words; չլինել կամակ ի խաղ, to be in no mood for sport, not to be in a sporting mood; ի խաղ հատանիլ, զակատիլ ի խաղս, to abandon oneself to amusements; ի խաղ մտանե, to join a game; to sit down to play; լինել յաջողակ ի խաղի, to have a good game; to hare a good-hand (cards), to be a lucky player; լինել դժբաղդ ի խաղի, to have ill luck at play; կորուսանել ի խաղի, to play or to gamble away; վատնել զամենայն ի խաղի, to gamble away one's fortune, to lose ones' fortune by gambling; դադարել ի խաղի, to leave off playing; խաղ համարել, to take as a joke; չեն ինչ խաղոյ, it is not to be trifled with, it is no joke; — խաղ առնել զոք, ընդ խաղ արկանել, to ridicule, to deride, to mock, to make sport or mockery of, to laugh at a person; ընդ խաղ առնել, to rally, to joke with, to jest with; to turn to ridicule;
Definition_2: ընդ խաղ, ընդ խաղս, for fun, in jest, for a joke, jestingly; ո՛րչափ խաղացի ընդ նոսա, how many tricks I played on them ! թո՛յլ տուր անդ զխաղդ, թո՛ղ զխաղդ, joking apart, in good earnest; խաղ կանչել, to sing a song.
Definition_3: a note.

Title: Խաղ
Definition_1: shore, side of a river; meadow; marsh, moor; gulf, roadstead; division, pigeon-hole.

Title: Խաղալիկ
Definition_1: player; dancer; game, play, toy, plaything; trifle, trifling amusement, foolery; gewgaw, bawble;
Definition_2: laughing-stock, butt; — լինել, to become the laughing-stock of; — առնել, to make game of; — եղեւ բախտին, he was fortune's plaything, or the sport of fortune, fortune mocked him; հողմոց եւ ալեաց —, at the mercy of winds and waves.

Title: Խաղալիք
Definition_1: plaything, toy, knick-knack, trinket; trifle, trash, thing of nought; game, play; touch, feeling; վաճառող —լեաց, toy-man; մի ժամավաճառ լինիր ի —լիս, do not waste your time with trifles.

Title: Խաղաղ
Definition_1: calm, tranquil, serene, peaceful, undisturbed, quiet; — միտք, serene mind;

Title: Խաղաղական
Definition_2: supplimentary vesper service; certificate of poverty; — Ովկիանոս, the Pacific Ocean; — զոհ, peace-offering.

Title: Խաղաղամբոխ
Definition_1: peace-breaker, turbulent, unquiet, restless, seditious, rebellious.

Title: Խաղաղանամ
Definition_1: to be appeased, tranquillized, to grow calm.

Title: Խաղաղասէր
Definition_1: fond of peace, that loves tranquillity, peaceable, peaceful.

Title: Խաղաղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to pa cify, to calm; to conciliate, to reconcile.

Title: Խաղաղեմ
Definition_1: to pacify, to appease, to calm, to allay, to assuage; to conciliate, to reconcile, to accommodate, to adjust; to hide, to conceal, to keep secret.

Title: Խաղաղիմ
Definition_1: to become calm, to be pacified, tranquillized; to be reconciled; խաղաղեաց, be quiet, be tranquil, compose yourself.

Title: Խաղաղութիւն
Definition_1: peace; calm, tranquillity, quiet, rest, repose; pacification, conciliation; — ընդ ձեզ, peace be with you; — ոգւոյ, մտաց, peace of mind; այր խաղաղութեան, angel or messenger of peace; քաղցր՝ խորին՝ անդորր —, perfect peace, profound tranquillity, sweet repose; — առնել, to make peace; կեալ ի խաղաղութեան, to live in peace; առնել — ընդ ումեք, to make one's peace with; խաղաղութեամբ լինել ընդ ումեք, to be at peace with; վայելել ի խոր՝ յանվրդով խաղաղութեան, to enjoy profound peace; to live in comfort; աղմկել զ—, to disturb, to break the peace; աղաչել, խօսել ի -՝ ի հաշտութիւն խաղաղութեան, to sue for peace; մերժել զբան խաղաղութեան, to refuse terms of peace, to reject means for reconciliation, to be opposed to conciliatory measures; խաղաղութեամբ, peaceably, peacefully, in peace; արարտասուահայց խաղաղութիւն, խաղաղութիւն ըղձիւք ըղձացեալ, the longed for peace; խաղաղութիւն է ինձ, I am happy and contented; խաղաղութիւն պարգեւեսցէ նմա Տէր, God rest his soul; peace to his soul; ե՛րթ ի խաղաղութիւն, երթայք խաղաղութեամբ, go in peace; God be with you; մնա՛, մնայք խաղաղութեամբ, goodbye! adieu!

Title: Խաղամ
Definition_1: to play, to sport, to amuse oneself; to jump, to leap, to dance, to gambol, to frolic, to frisk about;
Definition_2: to ridicule, to mock, to deride; to jest, to joke, to play the fool; to move, to walk, to go, to depart; to go away, to march, to start on a journey; to take the field; to rush at, to swoop down on; to gush out, to spout forth, to spirt; խաղասցէ ի վերայ քո Հոգի Տեառն, the spirit of the Lord shall fall upon you; ամպք զամպօք ելեւել խաղային, the clouds were gathering round; — ընդ միմեանս, to fall in love with, to be smitten with love; — զոմամբ, to make game of, to deride, to jeer, to insult; մուտ եւ ելս —, to go in and out, to frequent; ընդ ամուրս խաղալով —, to laugh, to scorn, to scoff at fortresses; — ի պատերազմ, — ի վերայ մարտիւ պատերազմի, to move against, to advance to the attack, to rush to battle; — բանակին, to decamp; to change quarters; յառաջ —, — գնալ, to march, to advance; յետս —, to retrograde, to retreat; տիգաւ աչաց — ի վերայ ուրուք, to scowl at, to menace with threatening looks, to frown; — բանիւք ի վերայ, to apostrophize, to rail at or against some one, to revile, to burst into bitter invectives, to inveigh against; — գթոց, to pity, to have compassion on; — ի սնոտիս, to trifle, to waste one's time on trivial occupations.

Title: Խաղապատիմ
Definition_1: to embrace affectionately, to caress, to fondle; to embrace the knees, to supplicate with weeping; օձատիպ խաղապատեալ, interwoven, interlaced, entwined like serpents.

Title: Խաղարկութիւն
Definition_1: play, sport, diversion; թատրոնական —ք, theatrical representations.

Title: Խաղացումն
Definition_1: cf. Խաղացք; խաղացմունք շնորհաց, inspiration of the Divine Spirit.

Title: Խաղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to move, to march, to transfer, to transport, to carry away; to advance, to drive forward, to push on; to pour out, to spirt; cf. Թաւալգլոր.

Title: Խաղացք
Definition_1: course, current; pouring out, effusion; forward movement, progress, advance.

Title: Խաղաւարտ
Definition_1: abscess, apostume; swelling; wen; wart; pimple, pustule, tubercle; եռալ, ի վեր եռալ —ից, to suppurate, to form an abscess, or tumour.

Title: Խաղբակեմ
Definition_1: to deceive, to entrap, to draw into a snare, to inveigle; to vex, to trouble.

Title: Խաղբք
Definition_1: snare, trap, ambush; ընդ աղբ եւ ընդ խաղբ գալ, to be ill clothed, to be poorly or shabbily dressed.

Title: Խաղթուղթ
Definition_1: card, playing card; հմայել խաղթղթովք, cf. Թուղթ.

Title: Խաղխամ
Definition_1: bars, rails; grating, railing, rail-fence; palissade.

Title: Խաղխամեայ
Definition_1: grated, cross-barred; open, openwork; — դուռն, iron-gate.

Title: Խաղող
Definition_1: grapes; պտուղ —ոյ՝ —ապտուղ, a grape; կուտ —ոյ, grape-stone; խակ —, աղոխ, sour -; կթել զ—, to gather -; արիւն —ոյ, wine.

Title: Խաղողեայ թաղանթ
Definition_1: uvea, uveous coat of the eye.

Title: Խաղողիկ
Definition_1: currants, small grapes; gooseberry; night-shade, bane-wort, morel;

Title: Խաղտալեզու
Definition_1: guttural, rough, harsh, hard, unpleasing, grating to the ear (language).

Title: Խամանամ
Definition_1: to be unskilful or inexpert; to leave off a habit, to break a custom.

Title: Խամութիւն
Definition_1: ignorance, want of skill, or practice.

Title: Խամրանամ
Definition_1: to fade, to wither, to dry, to shrink, to waste away, to languish, to grow weak, to be stunted; to spoil, to tarnish.

Title: Խամրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to wither, to cause to shrink, to weaken, to stunt, to kill; to tarnish, to spoil.

Title: Խայթ
Definition_2: incentive; —ք մտաց, խղճի, remorse, stings of conscience, compunction.

Title: Խայթահարեմ
Definition_1: to sting, to spur, to goad.

Title: Խայթեմ
Definition_2: to nettle, to pique; խիղճն խայթէ զնա, he feels remorse, he scruples at.

Title: Խայթուած
Definition_1: sting, prick, insect-bite; bite; — վիրաբուժական, puncture.

Title: Խայթումն
Definition_1: stinging, tingling, prickling; quilting, stitching, pinking.

Title: Խայծ
Definition_1: bait, decoy; slice, bit, piece, morsel; spot, speckle; *dark or ripening colour of fruits.

Title: Խայծեմ
Definition_1: to begin to ripen, to ripen, to grow ripe (grapes).

Title: Խայծեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to ripen, to mature; to ripen grapes.

Title: Խայծուած
Definition_1: colouring, beginning of ripeness in grapes.

Title: Խայտախարիւ
Definition_1: speckled, spotted; dapple, motley, sorrel, roan, piebald; կիճ —, serpentine marble.

Title: Խայտաճամուկ
Definition_1: spotted, speckled, marked; գործ —, inlaid work; — յօրինել, to inlay, to mark, to speckle.

Title: Խայտամ
Definition_1: to leap for joy, to be in extasy, to frolio, to sport about; — զիւիք, to become insolent, to rebel.

Title: Խայտառակ
Definition_1: covered with disgrace, loaded with shame, infamous, ignominious, disgraceful, shameful;

Title: Խայտառակեմ
Definition_1: to put to shame, to shame, to make ashamed; to unmask; to debauch, to ruin, to corrupt; to expose naked; to violate, to dishonour, to blast.

Title: Խայտառակութիւն
Definition_1: shame, opprobrium, disgrace, ignominy, infamy, turpitude, dishonour; the private parts.

Title: Խան
Definition_1: dish, platter, tray; basket, hamper; crumbs; raspings; filings, chips; *inn, hostelry.

Title: Խանաթ
Definition_1: trace, footstep; ի — անկանել, to trace, to follow a track.

Title: Խանգար
Definition_1: disorder, confusion, disturbance; waste, ruin, corruption; perversion, depravation; overthrow;
Definition_2: disordered, confused, spoiled; — առնել, cf. Խանգարեմ.

Title: Խանգարեմ
Definition_1: to disorder, to disturb, to confuse, to confound, to disconcert, to put out of countenance; to spoil, to mar, to break, to destroy; to corrupt, to ruin; — զառողջութիւն, to ruin the health.

Title: Խանգարիմ
Definition_1: to be out of order, to be spoiled; to give one's self up or over to, to addict one's self to.

Title: Խանգարիչ
Definition_2: disturber, corrupter, destroyer; perverter, seducer; perturber.

Title: Խանդ
Definition_1: desire, inclination, wish; fury, transport; poetic fire, genius, enthusiasm; tenderness, affection, love; — առնել, to despise, to reproach, to contemn.

Title: Խանդակաթ
Definition_1: tender, compassionate, full of tenderness, affectionate, loving, warmly attached, dotingly fond; affecting, moving, touching, piteous;
Definition_2: tenderly, affectionately, lovingly; — սիրել, to love dearly, to be passionately fond of; — սէր, tender love, fondness.

Title: Խանդակաթիմ
Definition_1: to melt with tenderness, compassion or love, to grow attached.

Title: Խանդաղատագին
Definition_1: tender, fond, loving, affectionate; moving, melting, affecting, pathetic.

Title: Խանդաղատանք
Definition_1: tenderness, affection, emotion, compassion, pity; ի խանդաղատանս ածել, to move, to affect; to touch; խանդաղատանօք, tenderly, affectionately.

Title: Խանդաղատեմ
Definition_1: to move to compassion, to excite pity, to compel to tears.

Title: Խանդաղատիմ
Definition_1: to melt to tenderness, to be moved with compassion, to have pity; to entreat, to beseech, to supplicate, to implore; խանդաղատէր սիրտ նորա, he was deeply moved; խանդաղատեցաւ զնովաւ, he took compassion on him; — ընդ, to be moved to pity by.

Title: Խանդամ
Definition_1: to envy, to be envious of, to grow or to be jealous of, to look at with a jealous eye.

Title: Խանդանք
Definition_1: envy, spite, jealousy; desire, covetousness, greed.

Title: Խանծ
Definition_2: allurement, charm, attraction; match; percussion-cap; burn, burning, scorching; odour of burning or scorching, *burnt smell; —իւ որսալ, to bait, to allure, to decoy, to entice; — արկանել, to kindle, to light; to stir up, to poke a fire; — փառաց, շահու the attraction of glory; the allurement of gain.

Title: Խանձատեմ
Definition_1: to burn, to scorch, to singe.

Title: Խանձարուր
Definition_1: swaddling-band, swaddling clothes; cradle; ապտել ի —ս, to swathe, to swaddle; արձակել ի խանձարրոց, to unswathe, to take out of swaddling clothes; ի խանձարրոց՝ անդստին ի խանձարրոց, from the cradle, from childhood, from infancy; ուր —ք են նորա, his birthplace; —ք քաղաքակրթութեան, the cradle of civilization.

Title: Խանձարրապատ
Definition_1: swaddled; — լինել, to be wrapped in swaddling clothes.

Title: Խանձեմ
Definition_1: to roast, to broil, to toast, to scorch, to singe, to burn; to set fire to, to kindle; — զպատերազմ, to inflame to war, to kindle the flames of war; — զհուր ապստամբութեան, to stir up the fire of rebellion.

Title: Խանձեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to allure, to entice; to familiarize, to attach, to attract, to draw with.

Title: Խանձիմ
Definition_1: to roast, to broil, to scorch, to burn, to glow;
Definition_2: to be fired with, to bend one's wbole soul to, to become attached to, to apply one's self to, to get accustomed or inured to, to give one's self up to; to be eager, to long, to hurn with envy or desire, to be enamoured of, to be smitten with, to burn with love, to be mad with love for; — յանառակութիւնս, to be sunk in dissoluteness

Title: Խանձրահամ
Definition_1: that has an odour or flavour of burning, having a burnt taste or smell.

Title: Խանութ
Definition_1: shop; manufactory; treasure; store, warehouse, magazine.

Title: Խանչանամ
Definition_1: to be puffed up, proud, swollen with pride.

Title: Խանչեմ
Definition_1: to roar, to bellow; to bray; to grunt.

Title: Խանչումն
Definition_3: swelling, puffing up, pride; inclination, propensity.

Title: Խաշար
Definition_2: young tree, shoot, sucker; stake, pile.

Title: Խաշնարած
Definition_1: shepherd; կին, աղջիկ —, shepherdess; մանուկ —, shepherd boy.

Title: Խաչ
Definition_2: cross, sorrows, tribulation; սուրբ —, the Cross, the Holy Rood; ի — հանել, կախել զ—է, to crucify; ի — ելանել, to be crucified; — առնել, հանել, to make the sign of the cross, to cross one's self.

Title: Խաչազգեաց
Definition_1: bearing the cross, enduring patiently, patient.

Title: Խաչալուայ առնեմ
Definition_1: to bless water by immersing a crucifix.

Title: Խաչակալ
Definition_1: desk or rest for a crucifix.

Title: Խաչական
Definition_1: crucial, that appertains to the cross.

Title: Խաչակիր
Definition_2: cruciferous plant; cross-bearer; crusader; —ք, the crusades, the crusaders.

Title: Խաչակից
Definition_1: companion in crucifixion; crucified together; — լինել, cf. Խաչակցիմ.

Title: Խաչակնքեմ
Definition_1: to make the sign of the cross, to cross.

Title: Խաչակրօն
Definition_1: suffering for Christ's sake, patient, austere; christian.

Title: Խաչակցիմ
Definition_1: to be a companion in crucifixion, to be crucified with another.

Title: Խաչակցութիւն
Definition_1: the being crucified with another; participation in the passion of our Lord.

Title: Խաչամահ
Definition_1: dead on the cross, crucified; — սպանանել, to put to fieath on the cross, to crucify.

Title: Խաչամարտութիւն
Definition_1: hostility to the adoration of the Holy Cross.

Title: Խաչանիշ
Definition_1: cf. Խաչաձեւ; — փայտ, the cross; — հատանել, to cross, to place across.

Title: Խաչանշան
Definition_2: the sign of the cross; — առնել, to make -.

Title: Խաչապէս
Definition_1: in form of a cross, crosswise; — դնել առ իրեարս զձեռս, to cross the arms.

Title: Խաչափայտ
Definition_1: wood of the cross, cross; crucifix;

Title: Խաչեմ
Definition_1: to crucify, to fix on the cross.

Title: Խառանաձիգ
Definition_1: collared, wearing a collar or chain.

Title: Խառանեմ
Definition_1: to chain up; to tie with ropes.

Title: Խառատեմ
Definition_1: to destroy, to crumble; to gnaw, to bite.

Title: Խառեմ
Definition_1: to wring the neck, to twist, to wrench, to draw, to pull out.

Title: Խառն
Definition_1: mixed, compound; confused, in disorder; complicated, indistinct; impure, obscene, lewd;
Definition_3: mixture, conjunction; coition, copulation, coupling, pairing, rut, rutting; ի խառնս լինել, to be in rut, on heat, in pairing time; ի —ս գալ, to pair, to couple, to leap, to mount, to cover; ածել ի —ս, to yoke, to match, to pair, to couple, to join together.

Title: Խառնաբան
Definition_1: obscure in speech, difficult to understand; indistinct, confused.

Title: Խառնախօս
Definition_1: that speaks confusedly or impurely, confused; unchaste, impure.

Title: Խառնախօսութիւն
Definition_1: idle talk, prating; buffoonery, scurrility; confused or impure language, barbarism; obscene discourse.

Title: Խառնակ
Definition_1: mixed, confused, embroiled, complicated; impure, obscene;
Definition_2: tie, bond, union; copulation, pairing; the rabble, the mob.

Title: Խառնակեմ
Definition_1: to mix, to blend; to confuse, to perplex, to embarrass, to confound; to intrigue; to disturb, to embroil; to twist; to couple or pair.

Title: Խառնակիմ
Definition_1: to be mixed, confused, confounded with; to come to blows, to fight; to be in communication with, to haunt, to frequent; to have commerce

Title: Խառնակութիւն
Definition_1: medley, confusion, disorder, chaos; disturbance, perturbation, tumult; profanation; coition, copulation;

Title: Խառնակրօն
Definition_1: incredulous, unbelieving, impious; vulgar; cf. Խառնագնաց.

Title: Խառնաձայն
Definition_2: not clearly audible, indistinct, confused; — հնչել, to give an uncertain sound; to utter confused cries; — շշունջ, confused murmur.

Title: Խառնաղանճ
Definition_1: the mass, the common herd, the multitude, the rabble, the mob;
Definition_2: low, vulgar, plebeian; — ամբոխ, the lower classes, the common people, the scum or dregs of the people, the vulgar.

Title: Խառնավար
Definition_1: ill-used, ill-treated; — առնեմ, to abuse, to misuse, to make a bad or ill use of.

Title: Խառնարան
Definition_1: goblet, cnp, howl; banquet, feast; crater;

Title: Խառնափնդորեմ
Definition_1: to throw into disorder or confusion; to embroil, to confuse, to perplex, to disturb.

Title: Խառնելի
Definition_1: cup, goblet, bowl; liquor, beverage, drink, potion, libation; crater; —ք թեւոց, the tiller ropes; խառնել —ս, to offer, to pour out libations.

Title: Խառնեմ
Definition_1: to mix, to mingle, to blend; to join, to incorporate, to unite; to combine, to amalgamate; to confound, to confuse, to perplex; to mix up, to season; to intermix, to intermingle; to intertwine, to interweave; to adulterate, to taint, to tinge; — բարեկամութիւն, to knit in friendship; սէր —, to fall in love with; — զկերակուրս, to lay the cloth, to spread the table, to serve up; — զօղս ընդ ճարմանդս, to button; to buckle; to unite; — զձեռն իւր ընդ ձեռն ընկերի, to take one another by the hand; խելս —, to exert all one's powers of ingenuity; — ի ծով, to sail in the open sea; զխորս —, to swim in the sea; — զանձն, to meddle, to intermeddle, to interfere, to interpose, to intrude.

Title: Խառնիմ
Definition_1: to intermingle, to mingle together, to get mixed up, to amalgamate, to meddle; to engage, to entwine; to engage in conflict, to fight, to come to blows; to be joined, to join, to unite; to take a share in, to be concerned in; to conjoin, to have carnal knowledge of; to join, to form a friendship; խառնեցաւ պատերազմն, the battle began.

Title: Խառնիխուռն
Definition_1: confusedly, tumultuously, disorderly, at random, right and left, right or wrong, helter-skelter, pell-mell; — բանք, rigmarole; — խօսել, to bungle, to stammer out.

Title: Խառնուած
Definition_1: mixture, composition, compound; temper or tempering; paste, luting; complexion, constitution, temperament, nature; junction; consanguinity, relationship; conjunction, union; the sense of feeling, touch; tie, bond; concert, harmony

Title: Խառնումն
Definition_1: cf. Խառնուած; — զօրաց, engagement, conflict; — գետոց, confluence of rivers.

Title: Խառնուրդ
Definition_1: mixture; jumble, medley; conflict, close fight, engagement, action; union, reunion; carnal connection; confluence.

Title: Խար
Definition_1: grass, hay, forage; food for cattle, pasture; — or խառ, thorn; —ի պտուղ, hips, haws.

Title: Խարազան
Definition_1: rod, switch, whip, knout, lash, scourge, cat-o-nine tails; discipline, flagellum.

Title: Խարազանաբախ լինիմ
Definition_1: to thrash one's elf with the discipline, to scourge, to flagellate one'self.

Title: Խարազանահալած առնեմ
Definition_1: to drive away with the whip.

Title: Խարազանեմ
Definition_1: to whip, to scourge, to lash, to thrash, to flog.

Title: Խարազն
Definition_2: hair-cloth, sack-cloth, hair-shirt; — զգենուլ, to wear haircloth.

Title: Խարազնազգեաց
Definition_1: wearing sack-cloth; — լինել, to wear haircloth.

Title: Խարակեմ
Definition_1: to burn, to scorch, to tan, to brown; to toast; to heat, to warm; to imbibe, to anoint.

Title: Խարան
Definition_1: cautery; cauterization; blister; brand; (կնիք) brand-iron; —ս արկանել, —ս ի վերայ դնել, ի —ս մատչել, to cauterize.

Title: Խարանաքար
Definition_1: lunar caustic, nitrate of silver; caustic potash.

Title: Խարբալեմ
Definition_1: to sift, to riddle, to bolt;

Title: Խարբուխ
Definition_1: catarrh, cold; ծանր՝ թեթեւ —, severe, slight cold; — գլխոյ, cold in the head; — լինել, to catch a cold.

Title: Խարդախ
Definition_1: knavish, roguish; that falsifies, that forges; false, counterfeit, adulterated.

Title: Խարդախանք
Definition_1: cf. Խարդախութիւն; խարդախանս նիւթել, to deceive, to dupe, to entrap.

Title: Խարդախեմ
Definition_1: tocheat; to falsify, to counterfeit, to forge; to feign, to simulate; to corrupt, to adulterate; to sophisticate; to dissemble; — ումեք զմահ, to plotthe death of.

Title: Խարդախութիւն
Definition_1: fraud, knavery; falsification, forgery, act of counterfeiting; adulteration; chicanery; violation, rape.

Title: Խարդաւանակ լինիմ
Definition_1: to conspire against, to attempt evil, to deceive;
Definition_2: to risk, to be exposed to danger.

Title: Խարդաւանեմ
Definition_1: to cheat, to overreach, to circumvent, to defraud; to implicate, to involve, to entangle; to precipitate; to deflower, to violate.

Title: Խարդաւանութիւն
Definition_1: fraud, deceit, circumvention, crime, outrage; — կուսի, violation, deflowering.

Title: Խարեմ
Definition_1: to cauterize; to brand; to blind with hot irons;
Definition_2: to stigmatize, to afflict, to distress, to cut to the heart.

Title: Խարիսխ
Definition_1: base, foundation; pedestal; legs, feet; anchor; — արկանել՝ ընկենուլ զ—, to anchor, to cast anchor; — վերացուցանել՝ լուծանել զ—ն, to weigh anchor; — արկեալ կալ, to be, to ride or to lie at anchor; — յուսոյ, anchor of hope; — փրկութեան, sheet anchor;

Title: Խարխալեմ
Definition_1: to shake, to shatter, to demolish, to ruin, to destroy; to deteriorate, to hurt, to corrupt; to renew pain or grief; — զվէրս, to tear open healing wounds;

Title: Խարխալիմ
Definition_1: to fall to ruin or decay, to perish.

Title: Խարխափ
Definition_1: gropingly; — շրջել՝ գնալ, to grope along, to feel one's way, to go groping; — խնդրել, to grope about for; cf. Խարշափ.

Title: Խարխափեմ
Definition_1: to grope along, to feel ones way; to fumble; to shake, to rustle.

Title: Խարշատիմ
Definition_1: to burn, to scorch, to be parched, to wither; — ի ծարաւոյ, to be parched with thirst; — գորովով՝ գթով, to burn with love, with tenderness.

Title: Խարշեմ
Definition_1: to boil, to stew; to scald; to scorch, to burn.

Title: Խարոյկ
Definition_1: fire, fire-brand; live-coal; pyre, funeral-pile; — արկանել՝ լուցանել՝ վառել, to light a fire, to set on fire; — մահահամբոյր, funeral pile.

Title: Խարուկածին
Definition_1: born of, or produced by fire, ardent, luminous, fiery.

Title: Խարսխեմ
Definition_1: to fix, to establish, to found; — զնաւն, to cast anchor; — զյոյս իւր յիմն, to fix or anchor ones hopes on.

Title: Խարսխիմ
Definition_1: to be fixed, established, based, founded.

Title: Խաւ
Definition_1: couch, cot, bed; plait, fold; nap on cloth, down on fruit or plants; — հանածոյից, stratum, layer, bed; խաւ ի խաւ, խաւ ի խաւոյ, folded, plaited, doubled; in folds, doubly.

Title: Խաւար
Definition_2: grief, sorrow, affliction; blindness, delusion, ignorance; hell; devil;
Definition_3: dark, obscure, gloomy, murky; ընդ —, ի —ի, in the darkness, darkly; խաւար աղջամուղջ, utter darkness; խաւար շօշափելի, darkness that could be felt; խաւար գիշերոյ, the shades of night; — ******խաւար տգիտութեան, the darkness of ignorance; ի խաւար դառնալ, to get or to grow dark, to become obscure; ընդ խաւար գնալ, to walk in darkness, to be ignorant of; բաժին խաւարին առնել, to condemn, to damn; խաւար կալու զամենայն երկիր, darkness covered the whole earth; cf. Ըմբռնիմ.

Title: Խաւարազգած
Definition_1: dark, gloomy, dismal, sad; — լինել, to become darkened, or obscured; — խափնուլ, to become blind.

Title: Խաւարազգեաց
Definition_1: clothed in darkness, surrounded with gloom, darkling.

Title: Խաւարակուլ
Definition_1: that dissipates darkness; plunged in obscurity.

Title: Խաւարամած
Definition_1: surrounded with darkness, obscure, gloomy, dark.

Title: Խաւարասոյզ
Definition_1: immersed in obscurity, buried in darkness.

Title: Խաւարարգել
Definition_1: kept in obscurity, hidden; that keeps in obscurity (tomb), sombre, obscure, black, dark.

Title: Խաւարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to darken, to spread darkness, to obscure, to dim; to eclipse; to extinguish; to blind; լուսինն խաւարեցուցանէ զարեգակն, the moon eclipses the sun.

Title: Խաւարիմ
Definition_1: to be darkened, obscured, eclipsed; to be blinded; խաւարեցաւ արեգակն ընդ ժամս երիս, the sun remained eclipsed three hours.

Title: Խաւարծի
Definition_1: tendril; shoot, offshoot, bud, sprout, germ.

Title: Խաւարծիլ
Definition_1: rhubarb plant; the tendrils of the vine.

Title: Խաւարումն
Definition_2: eclipse; — արեգական՝ լուսնի, solar, lunar -; — բոլորական, մասնական, մանեկաձեւ, total, partial, annular -.

Title: Խաւարուտ
Definition_1: obscure, gloomy, dark; murky, misty, foggy.

Title: Խաւարտածին
Definition_1: bearing or producing vegetables; reared on vegetables.

Title: Խաւեակ
Definition_1: amphora, urn, earthen pitcher, jug, jar, pot.

Title: Խափ
Definition_1: surprise, surprising; seizure, seizing; impediment, hinder-ance; agitation, transport, fury; ընդ խափս by surprise; ի խափս անկանել, to be surprised, seized, led away.

Title: Խափան
Definition_1: hinderance, impediment, obstacle; encumbering; inactivity, idleness, sloth;
Definition_2: idle, unoccupied; hindered, prevented; stopped, discontinued; — առնել՝ լինել, to hinder, to impede, to prevent; — կալ, to be disoccupied; to be in idleness.

Title: Խափանեմ
Definition_1: to hinder, to stop, to impede, to obstruct, to embarrass, to cross, to delay, to interrupt; to intercept; to interdict, to prohibit; to abolish, to abrogate, to annul, to revoke; to take away; to sippress; — զճանապարհն, զանցս ուրուք, to stop the way or passage, to stop up, to obstruct, to encumber; — զերկիր, to encumber the earth.

Title: Խափանիմ
Definition_1: to be hindered, impeded, prohibited, forbidden; to cease, to remain suspended; to be abolished; — սովորութեան, to fall in disuse.

Title: Խափանուած
Definition_1: hinderance, impediment, obstruction, obstacle; difficulty; interdiction, prohibition; diversion; interception; abolition, abrogation; suppression; cessation; ի խափանումն գալ՝ անկանել, to cease, to fall in desuetude, to be no longer in force.

Title: Խափնում
Definition_1: to shut; to faint; to be extinguished; to be blinded.

Title: Խափուցանեմ
Definition_1: to hinder; to shut; to extinguish; to blind; — զճրագ, to put out the candle, to blow out the light; — զհուր, to quench the fire, to extinguish the conflagration.

Title: Խեթ
Definition_1: squinting; short-sighted; dim-eyed or blear-eyed; խեթի հայել, to look askance at, to look surlily, to scowl upon, to look at with aversion or dislike.

Title: Խեթամ
Definition_1: to regard with a rancorous or malevolent eye, to detest, to hate, to envy.

Title: Խեթեմ
Definition_1: to push, to thrust, to drive forward.

Title: Խեթի
Definition_1: squintingly; surlily, grimly, bitterly, angrily, crossly; — գնալ, to go astray, to fall into knavish practices.

Title: Խեթկեմ
Definition_1: to strike, to clash, to shock, to knock, to hit; to vex, to torture; — եղջերօք, to butt; to toss, to gore.

Title: Խելաբերեմ
Definition_1: to cause one to recover his senses, to restore from fainting.

Title: Խելագարիմ
Definition_1: to become crazy, to go mad, to lose ones senses, to be mad.

Title: Խելամուտ
Definition_1: intelligent, well-informed, skilful, learned; — առնել՝ կացուցանել, to initiate, to instruct, to inform; — լինել, to be well-informed, to have profound knowledge, to be well versed in, to understand thoroughly, to know perfectly; — լինել ապագայից, to penetrate the future; — լինել ի մէջ բարւոյ եւ չարի, to distinguish, to know good from evil; — լինել յամենայն ճանապարհս իւր, to be have prudently or wisely; — լինել ի սրտի իւրում, to revolve, to turn over in one's mind, to reflect, to consider, to mediate, to ruminate, to ponder; — լինել ոգւոյ նորա, to seize the meaning, to enter into the spirit of; — ամենայն իմաստութեան, learned in all knowledge.

Title: Խելամտութիւն
Definition_1: understanding, intelligence, comprehension, knowledge, capacity; reflexion, consideration; synecdoche; յիմաստիցն ածել —ս, to teach science; առ քաջ — իրացդ, in order thoroughly to understand these things.

Title: Խելայեղիմ
Definition_1: to be cracked, to have taken leave of one's senses, to bemad; tolapse into second child-hood.

Title: Խելապատակ
Definition_1: cerebellum, coats of the brains, meninges.

Title: Խելացի
Definition_1: intelligent, clever, sensible, judicious, steady, prudent, wise.

Title: Խելացնորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to distract, to madden, to craze, to drive to fury, to goad to insanity.

Title: Խելացնորիմ
Definition_1: to be out of one's senses, to rave, to be delirious, mad, crazy, insane; to swoon or faint away, to fall into a swoon.

Title: Խելք
Definition_1: brains; mind, sense, wit, understanding, intelligence, wisdom;
Definition_2: խելօք, skilfully, ingeniously, cleverly, dexterously; bench for rowers; — կամրջաց, bridge-head; — գետոց, source of ariver; —լս ունել, to be wise, judicious, prudent; ի խելաց ելանել, to lose one's reason, to become mad; գնալ խելօք, յայլ խելս շրջել, յայլոյ խելս լինել, to be out of one's mind, to turn mad; ցնորիլ ի խելաց, to faint, to swoon; ի խելս գալ, to come to one's self, to recover one's self; to amend; խելս խառնել, to tax one's ingenuity, to contrive, to set one's wits to work, to try, to attempt; to dupe, to outwit, to use artifice, craft, guile; ի խերս կերպարանեալս, feignedly, with simulation, in appearance; astutely, cunningly; բանք բազում — սակաւ, much tongue and little judgment; ի խելաց եւ ի մտաց թափեալ, hair-brained, cracked, foolish, insane, mad; գինին կալաւ զխելս նորա, he became intoxicated, tipsy.
Definition_3: — նաւի, poop, stern of a ship; ի խելս նաւին, on the poop.

Title: Խեղ
Definition_1: crippled, maimed; infirm, helpless; bad, wicked; ugly; filthy; — ձեռօք, crippled in the arm; — ստիւք, lame, crippled in the feet; handy-legged.

Title: Խեղաթիւրեմ
Definition_1: to grimace, to grin, to make wry faces; to pervert.

Title: Խեղաթիւրիմ
Definition_1: to be bent, ill-fashioned, awkward; to be perverted, depraved.

Title: Խեղաթիւրութիւն
Definition_1: obliquity, crookedness, contortion; grimace, wry face, mouth;

Title: Խեղբիմ
Definition_1: to be attached or bound to.

Title: Խեղդ
Definition_1: halter, rope, noose; bowstring; strangulation, suffocation; —ք շրթանց, flattery, wheedling, cajolery; — առնել, — արկանել, ի — գալ, ի — մտաբերել, to strangle, to choke one's self; — ընդ անձն ուրուք արկանել, առ —ս ածել զոք, to put a rope on the neck of, to bring to the halter, to strangle, to throttle, to choke; — ընդ անձին հեղձամղձուկ պաշարիլ բանիւն, to be embarrassed & conounded by, not know what to say or do.

Title: Խեղդամահ
Definition_1: strangled, suffocated; — առնել, to strangle, to suffocate; — լինել, to be strangled, suffocated.

Title: Խեղդեմ
Definition_1: to strangle, to suffocate, to stifle; to wring, to twist (the neck); to vex, to torment, to doviolence to.

Title: Խեղդիմ
Definition_1: to choke onesself, to be suffocated, stifled;
Definition_2: to burst, to crack, to break out, to melt away.

Title: Խեղեմ
Definition_1: to cripple, to lame, to maim, to mutilate, to mangle.

Title: Խեղկատակ
Definition_1: buffoon, jester, banterer, wag, mimic, merry-Andrew, fool;
Definition_2: scurrilous, waggish, jocular, given to buffoonery or raillery.

Title: Խեղկատակեմ
Definition_1: vna. to play the buffoon, to play the fool, to jest, to jeer, to joke, to mimic.

Title: Խեղկատակութիւն
Definition_1: buffoneryy, scurrility, lampoon, bantering, jeering, mockery, raillery, jocularity, waggery.

Title: Խեղութիւն
Definition_1: crippled state of a limb, privation of the use of a limb, lameness, palsy, paralysis.

Title: Խեճեպ
Definition_1: egg-shell or nut-shell; հանել ի —ոյ, to shell, to husk.

Title: Խենեշանամ
Definition_1: to live in effeminaoy, to plunge into voluptuousness and debauchery, to revel, to feast, to be immodest, dissolute, debauched.

Title: Խենեշացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to corrupt, to debauch, to make dissolute.

Title: Խենեշութիւն
Definition_1: voluptuous and effeminate life, lasciviousness, debauchery, wantonness, dissoluteness.

Title: Խենէշ
Definition_1: effeminate, luxurious; lascivious, debauched, wanton, dissolute.

Title: Խեշերանք
Definition_1: minutiae, trifles; trash, rubbish; parings, leavings.

Title: Խեչակեմ
Definition_1: to support, to prop, to prop up, to shore.

Title: Խեռ
Definition_1: froward, wilful, stubborn, perverse, rebellious, refractory; currish, surly, bitter;
Definition_2: rancour, hatred, spite, envy; — հայել, to look surlily; —իւ լինել, to be enraged or furious with.

Title: Խեռեմ
Definition_1: to be disobedient, insubordinate, to rebel, to revolt, to be disheartened; — ի սանձուց, not to obey the bridle; — զայրագին ի վերայ միմեանց, to be furiously maddened one against, the other.

Title: Խեր
Definition_1: dish made from the first milk of a cow.

Title: Խերեւէշ
Definition_1: cf. Լումայ; —ս —ս, piece by piece, little by little, slice by slice.

Title: Խեց
Definition_1: tortoise shell; cf. Խեցի; cf. Հեց.

Title: Խեցբեկ
Definition_1: badly pronounced, barbarous, corrupted, spurious, harsh.

Title: Խեցբեկագոյն
Definition_1: very barbarous, unpolished, very corrupt, very rude, very harsh.

Title: Խեցբեկեմ
Definition_1: to jabber; — զգաղղիարէն, to speak broken English, to talk gibberish.

Title: Խեցեգործ
Definition_1: earthen-ware manufacturer; potter; brick-maker or tile-maker; գործատուն —աց, earthen-ware manufactury.

Title: Խեցեգործութիւն
Definition_1: ceramic art, fictile art; the potters art, pottery.

Title: Խեցեղէն
Definition_1: made of brick or baked earth; —ք, —անօթք, crockery, earthen-ware, delft-ware.

Title: Խեցեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to dry, to dry up; to parch.

Title: Խեցի
Definition_1: brick, tile; pottery, earthen-ware, crockery; porcelain, China-ware, Wedgewood-ware; potsherd, fragment of earthen-ware; fish-shell; shell, conch; —ք, pottery; Wedgewood-ware, Wedgewood-manufactory;
Definition_2: earthen, delft; զ— կարկատել, to beat the air, to pound the water.

Title: Խզեմ
Definition_1: to cut, to cut off, to break off, to tear off or away; to burst open; — զհերս, to tear out the hair; — ներքինիս, to castrate.

Title: Խզիմ
Definition_1: to be cut or torn off, to be broken off.

Title: Խէթ
Definition_1: knock, blow; obstacle, hinderance, impediment; fraud, cheat; hate, ill will, aversion; jealousy; remorse, scruple; pain, affliction, grief; doubt, distrust, apprehension; gripes, colic; — եւ խութ ընդ ոտն անկանել, to trip up, to oppose, to obstruct, to embarrass; խեթիւ հայել՝ տեսանել, to look daggers, to look grim, to scowl; խեթիւ հայել արեգական, to sunburn, to tan, to freckle, to brown.

Title: Խէչ
Definition_1: prop, stay, support; back, back-side; clothes' pocket;

Title: Խթան
Definition_3: butting; — իշոյ, ass-goad; ընդդէմ —ի աքացել, to kick against the pricks.

Title: Խթեմ
Definition_1: to goad, to spur, to incite, to drive, to spur on, to urge on; կաշառս —, to bribe, to corrupt; to buy over.

Title: Խթիմ
Definition_1: to thrust one's self in, to creep into.

Title: Խթումն
Definition_1: vigil; fast-day with milk-food; fasting on milk-food.

Title: Խժդան
Definition_1: to be obstinate, headstrong, stubborn, to persist doggedly.

Title: Խժդմագոյն
Definition_1: very rude, very barbarous; խժդմագոյնս, barbarously, coarsely, harshly.

Title: Խժդուժ
Definition_1: barbarous, fierce, ferocious, savage; rude, rough, harsh, coarse.

Title: Խիզախ
Definition_1: bold, courageous, brave, manly, spirited, haughty.

Title: Խիզախեմ
Definition_1: to hector, to swagger, to brave, to bully, to insult; to laugh to scorn, to laugh at; to advance fearlessly, to have the hardihood or boldness, to face, to brave; to attempt, to risk; to rush upon, to assault, to attack; — ի վտանգս, to run risks, to seek perils, to brave or to face dangers; — ի մարտ, to plunge into the thickest of the fight; յաղօթս —, to confide in prayer.

Title: Խիզախեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to embolden, to encourage, to inspirit, to give heart to.

Title: Խիզախիւն
Definition_1: boldness, audacity, hardihood, confidence; bravado, rodomontade; insult; assault, rushing.

Title: Խիթ
Definition_1: gripes, colic; twinge, twitch, shooting pain; blister, sore, swelling; rock, reef, sand-bank;

Title: Խիթամ
Definition_1: to doubt, to suspect, to disbelieve, to distrust; to look at with an evil eye.

Title: Խիթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to be tortured by remorse; to pain, to afflict, to grieve, to vex.

Title: Խիժային
Definition_1: mucous, glutinous; viscous; — հիւթ, mucus, snot.

Title: Խիլ
Definition_1: search, perquisition, investigation, strict inquiry; plucking up, snatching away; — արկանել, to search out, to investigate, to rummage, to inquire into.

Title: Խիղբ
Definition_1: tendril, clasper; sucker, shoot; fibre, filament, stamen; —ս արկանել, to cling to, to hold fast to, to clasp, to strain to; to twine, to entwine; — արկանել՝ առնուլ, to be thoughtful, melancholy; to clasp one's knees.

Title: Խիղճ
Definition_1: scruple; conscience; doubt, distrust; anguish, sorrow, affliction;
Definition_2: scrupulous, conscientious; — մտաց, conscience; scruple; remorse, compunction; խղճիւ մտաց, conscientiously, scrupulously; ազատութիւն խղճի, liberty of conscience; կշտամբանք խղճի մտաց, accusation, reproach of conscience; — պահել, ի խղճի լինել մտաց ուրուք, to pretend to have scruples, to scruple to, to be conscientious; լռեցուցանել զ— մտաց, to stifle remorse; յազատութիւն խղճի մտացն, for conscience sake.

Title: Խիճ
Definition_1: small stone, pebble, gravel; — նաւու, ballast.

Title: Խինդ
Definition_1: joy, mirth; առ խնդին, for joy.

Title: Խինծ
Definition_1: bosom, cavity, hollow; bottom; — սրտի, ventricle.

Title: Խիստ
Definition_1: hard, stiff, harsh, tough; sharp, strict, severe, rigorous, rigid, austere; rough, rude; cruel, merciless; haughty, arrogant, supercilious, overhearing; inflexible, obstinate, untoward, stubborn, untamable; difficult, inaccessible; —, խստիւ, harshly; roughly, cruelly; severely; — բանք, harsh words; — կեանք, austere, hard life; խստիւ գնալ, to be blunt with; to treat with brutality or severity, to maltreat; —ս բարբառել՝ խօսել ընդ ումեք, to speak bluntly or harshly to, to say unpalatable things; — է քեզ, it is hard forthee.

Title: Խիտ
Definition_2: close, dense, thick, serried; compact, dense; crowded, numerous, frequent; full;
Definition_3: —, — առ, — ընդ —, thickly, densely; frequently, often, much; — առ — հարուածք, repeated blows.

Title: Խիրտ
Definition_1: startling; — լինել, to shy, to start at; to doubt, to fear, to suspect;
Definition_3: doubtfully, suspiciously; with a start.

Title: Խից
Definition_1: closing or shutting; cork, stopper, bung, plug; valve; — արկանել, to cork, to bung, to dam, to stop; to hinder, to oppose.

Title: Խլայեմ
Definition_1: to give a robe of honour.

Title: Խլանամ
Definition_1: to become deaf, to be made deaf;
Definition_2: to stop one's ears, to turn a deaf ear to.

Title: Խլատեռ
Definition_1: outer garment or veil of oriental women.

Title: Խլեմ
Definition_1: to pluck up, to root out, to extirpate; to unclasp; to sweep away; to force, to take by force, to extort, to take away; to demolish, to destroy, to pull down, to ruin; — զատամն, to draw, to pull out, to extract a tooth; — զաչս, to put, to tear the eyes out.

Title: Խլեփ
Definition_1: salix caprea latifolia ( species of willow).

Title: Խլինքային
Definition_1: snotty, mucous; — մարմին, թաղանթ, mucous body, — membrane.

Title: Խլիրդն
Definition_2: a shrewd person, a sly one.

Title: Խլխլեմ
Definition_1: to pull or haul about; to tease, to plague; to neglect, to omit; to counterfeit, to feign, to pretend; to pretend not to understand.

Title: Խլումն
Definition_1: pulling out, tearing up, rooting out, extirpation.

Title: Խլրտեմ
Definition_1: to move; to stir; to agitate, to shake.

Title: Խլրտիմ
Definition_1: to be moved, stirred, shaken; to creep, to insinuate.

Title: Խխնջեմ
Definition_1: to neigh; to shout, to halloo, to roar out, to yell, to hoot.

Title: Խծբծեմ
Definition_1: to censure, to criticize; to discuss, to examine, to debate, to sift.

Title: *Խծիպ
Definition_1: quilting; — առնել, to quilt, to stitch.

Title: Խծկեմ
Definition_1: to stuff, to cram, to gorge; — — զորովայն, to gorge one's self.

Title: Խծուծ
Definition_1: tow, hards of flax or hemp; լնուլ խծծով, to stop with tow;

Title: *Խծպեմ
Definition_1: to quilt, to stitch, to pink.

Title: Խղիկ
Definition_1: small cottage, hut, cot; small room, closet, cell.

Title: Խղխայթ
Definition_2: hypocrisy; —ք երկրի, earth-worms; —ք խոտոց, liquid refuse from putrid vegetation.

Title: Խղխայթեմ
Definition_2: to dissemble, to conceal enmity; to foment, to plot.

Title: Խղխայթիմ
Definition_1: to be ulcerated, to form an abscess, to gather, to discharge matter, to suppurate.

Title: Խղխթեմ
Definition_1: to apply, to devote one's self to; to explore.

Title: Խղճադատ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be judged by one's own conscience.

Title: Խղճական
Definition_1: guilty, pricked by conscience; miserable, pitiful.

Title: Խղճամ
Definition_1: to scruple; to doubt, to mistrust; to abstain from, to shun; to have pity, compassion.

Title: Խղճամիտ
Definition_1: over-scrupulous, over-nice, too rigid; cowardly, pusillanimous, chicken-hearted.

Title: Խղճեմ
Definition_1: to make case of conscience of, to scruple, to doubt; ոչ ինչ խղճեմ, my conscience does not blame me; երթ առանց իրիք —ոյ, go without scruple or hesitation.

Title: Խղուըրտիւն
Definition_1: noise, clatter, hubbub, uproar, rumour, turmoil, din, confusion.

Title: Խճողեմ
Definition_1: to fill, to heap up, to stuff, to cram; — զորովայն, to gorge, to gormandize, to stuff or cram one's self, to eat too much.

Title: Խմբագիր
Definition_1: collection of national historical facts; editor; compiler.

Title: Խմբագործեմ
Definition_1: to assemble; to contain, to enclose.

Title: Խմբագրեմ
Definition_1: to compile, to write, to edit.

Title: Խմբակից
Definition_1: of the same troop or regiment, comrade, companion.

Title: Խմբեմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to rally, to gather together, to convoke; to excite to blows, to set fighting; to keep, to celebrate a feast; — պատերազմ՝ խումբս —, to fight, to come to blows, to join battle.

Title: Խմբիմ
Definition_1: to be assembled, convoked, gathered together; to rally, to flock together, to form groups; to be engaged in war; խմբեցաւ պատերազմն, the battle began.

Title: Խմբովին
Definition_1: in company, in crowds, in troops.

Title: Խմեմ
Definition_1: to drink; to imbibe, to suck up, to absorb.

Title: Խմորուն
Definition_1: risen, fermented, leavened; — հաց, leavened bread.

Title: Խնամ
Definition_1: care, attention, solicitude; nursing, attendance, duty, task; mindfulness, diligence, assiduity; —ով, carefully, mindfully, attentively; — ածել՝ ունել՝ տանել, to take care of, to be mindful of, to look after; to nurse, to tend, to attend; to provide, to procure; զամենայն փոյթ եւ զ— ունել զումեքէ, to take every care of; to take great pains with; տարածել ի վերայ ուրուք քլխնամս իւր՝ զգութ խնամոց, to surround with loving cares or kind offices, to be particularly attentive to, to wait assiduously upon; հաստատեալ ի խնամս չարին, prone to evil.

Title: Խնամակալ
Definition_2: guardian; trustee, administrator; regent; prefect; curator, custodian.

Title: Խնամակալութիւն
Definition_1: care, attention, solicitude; tutelage; regency; protection, guardianship; Divine Providence.

Title: Խնամարկեմ
Definition_1: to take care of, to attend to, to occupy one's elf solicitously about, to patronize.

Title: Խնամեխօս
Definition_1: matrimonial mediator, go between, match-maker; — լինել, to arrange a wedding between.

Title: Խնամենամ
Definition_1: to hecome related, allied, to be united by marriage.

Title: Խնամի
Definition_1: relation, kindred, connexion; — առնել, to ally, to unite, to match; — լինել, cf. Խնամենամ.

Title: Խնամոտ
Definition_1: careful, diligent, attentive; full of regard, of solicitude, benevolent, charitable.

Title: Խնամութիւն
Definition_1: affinity, alliance, relationship; հոգեւոր —, sponsorship; արկանել —, — առնել ընդ, cf. Խնամենամ.

Title: Խնայեմ
Definition_1: to spare, to be sparing of; to pardon, to respect, to exempt, to privilege; to save, to spare, to husband, to be thrifty, to administer or manage well, to be sparing of expence, to economize; — ի կերակրոյն, to stint one's self; — ի ժամանակն, to economize time; — ի շրթունս, to bridle one's tongue; — ի բարկութիւն, to abstain from wrath.

Title: Խնայեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to be sparing, to create thrift or economy.

Title: Խնայութիւն
Definition_1: regard, compassion, pity; pardon; thriftness, saving, economy, parsimony, frugality.

Title: Խնդալի
Definition_2: gaily, cheerfully, merrily; — լինել, to be transported with joy.

Title: Խնդակից
Definition_1: rejoioing together; — լինել, to rejoice with any one, to compliment, to congratulate, to felicitate.

Title: Խնդակցութիւն
Definition_1: congratulation, felicitation, complimenting; թուղթ խնդակցութեան, letter of congratulation.

Title: Խնդամ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to be merry, delighted, glad; greeting; — ընդ ումեք, to rejoice with; բազում — ասել, to wish good morning, good bye; խնդա՛, rejoice! good morning, good day; adieu, God be with you.

Title: Խնդամտիմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to be joyful, glad.

Title: Խնդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make merry, to rejoice, to give joy, to divert, to recreate.

Title: Խնդբունդ
Definition_2: —ք, spot, stain; inequality, unevenness, roughness, ruggedness, asperity.

Title: Խնդիր
Definition_1: question; interrogation, inquiry, demand; discussion, examination; perquisition, search, quest; visit, inquisition; proposition, thesis; litigation, contest, dispute, debate, quarrel; request, requisition; խօսեսցուք զայսր խնդրոյ, let us discourse on this chapter; խնդիր առնել, ի խնդիր երթալ, գալ, ելանել, շրջել, անկանել, արկանել, to seek, to look for, to search for or after, to make inquiries, to investigate, to examine, to inquire into; ի խնդիր լինել ուրուք, to trace, to be in search of, to follow the track of; խնդիր ի մէջ առնուլ, to commence an argument; խնդիրս յուզել, to raise a doubt, to create a discussion; խնդիր եղեւ, there arose a question; a dispute was raised; խնդիր ի միջի կայ, the question is; խնդիր է ինձ ի քէն, խնդիր մի ունիմ ի քէն, I have a favour to beg of you.

Title: Խնդութիւն
Definition_1: joy, mirth, pleasure, gaiety, cheerfulness, merriment.

Title: Խնդրակ
Definition_1: seeker-after, inquirer; guardian, trustee; emissary; —ս արձակել զկնի ուրուք, to run after, to hunt for or seek after some one.

Title: Խնդրականք
Definition_1: object of research; subject of dispute.

Title: Խնդրեմ
Definition_1: to search for, to ask, to solicit, to implore; to demand, to claim, to require, to run after, to pursue; to ransack, to rummage; — զանձն ուրուք, to seek one's life; զարիւն նորա ի ձեռաց քոց խնդրեցից, I will require his blood at your hands; զքէնս վրիժուց —, to revenge oneself, to be avenged; — զերեսս Աստուծոյ, to seek God's face; զշահս անձին եւեթ —, to have no other aim but self-interest.

Title: Խնծիղք
Definition_1: laugh, laughter, gaiety, toying, dalliance, rapture.

Title: Խնծղամ
Definition_1: laugh, to rejoice, to leap with joy.

Title: Խնկաբեր
Definition_1: that bears or produces aromatic or odoriferous gums.

Title: Խնկազգեաց
Definition_1: carrying incense, aromatic gums, or precious ointments.

Title: Խնկալիր
Definition_1: full of incense, odoriferous; praiseworthy, honourable.

Title: Խնկակալ
Definition_1: altar to burn incense upon; censer.

Title: Խնկաղաց
Definition_1: mortar for pounding incense; incense-box; perfumer.

Title: Խնկաման
Definition_1: incense box; censer; pan to burn incense on; perfume-box.

Title: Խնկելի
Definition_1: worthy to be incensed, praiseworthy, honourable.

Title: Խնկեմ
Definition_1: to incense; to perfume; to embalm; to offer up, to offer; to intoxicate;
Definition_2: to praise, to honour, to adore; to extol, to flatter, to flatter grossly.

Title: Խնճոյք
Definition_1: treat, feast, banquet, great feast, entertainment; feasting, rejoicing; assembly, company.

Title: Խնում
Definition_1: to cork, to stop, to bung; to close, to shut; to oppilate, to constipate; — զբերան ուրուք, to put to silence; — զպատուհան լսելեաց, to turn a deaf ear to, to refuse to listen.

Title: Խշտեակ
Definition_1: bedstead, pallet, truckle-bed; halting-place; den, haunt, lair, cave of wild beasts.

Title: *Խշրիմ
Definition_1: to have a thirsty longing for acid things.

Title: Խոզ
Definition_1: boar, sow; pig, hog, swine; —ք, spoke of a wheel; scrofula, king's evil; — մատակ, sow; — մալեալ, hog; — ծովային, sea-hog; ցնկնիլ —ի, to farrow, to pig; ծնունդք —ի, litter of pigs; — խանչէ՝ բոհբոհէ՝ կնչէ՝ գրդայ՝ կռնչէ, the hog grunts.

Title: Խոզաբարոյ
Definition_1: hoggish, behaving like a hog, rude.

Title: Խոզակ
Definition_1: fruit of cypress, plane-tree; — շերամոյ, cocoon.

Title: Խոզանամ
Definition_2: to behave like a hog, to be hoggish.

Title: Խոթոտեմ
Definition_1: <ab>vn.</ab> to see with displeasure, to scowl at; to despise.

Title: Խոժոռ
Definition_1: harsh; frowning, surly, threatening; hideous, frightful, horrible, dreadful, shocking; coarse, gross, rude, rough; sad, sorrowful; grave, stern; — դէմք, stern and haughty countenance; — աչք, threatening eye, gloomy eye; — ակնարկել յոք, to look at sternly or angrily, to frown, to scowl, to knit the brows; — հայել, to look surly at, to sulk, to turn a wild haggard look upon.

Title: Խոժոռագեղ
Definition_1: gruff-look ing, surly-looking, of a stern or austere countenance, scowling, lowering; sorrowful, gloomy, sullen; — ցնորք, frightful spectres.

Title: Խոժոռեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to irritate, to anger, to incense, to chafe, to provoke, to exasperate; — զդեմս, to pucker up one's features, to put on a surly look.

Title: Խոժոռիմ
Definition_1: to frown, to knit one's brows, to be sulky, cross, ill-tempered, to grow angry, to be nettled; to be soured, embittered, exasperated; — երկնից, to cover with gloomy clouds, to lower, to get cloudy, murky.

Title: Խոժոռութիւն
Definition_1: frown, wrinkle, knitting of the hrows, scowling, pouting, sulkiness, sulks, wry face; vexation, sorrow, melancholy.

Title: Խոլեմ
Definition_1: to disperse, to scatter, to drive.

Title: Խոխոմ
Definition_1: well-watered, abounding in springs, or running waters.

Title: Խոխոմք
Definition_1: ravine, deep hollow; sylvan valleys, forest; mountain streams, torrents.

Title: Խոխոջեմ
Definition_1: to murmur, to purl, to babble, to gurgle; ի վեր —, to vomit.

Title: Խոխոտեմ
Definition_1: to think, to invent, to attempt, to try.

Title: Խոկ
Definition_2: thoughtful, discreet, prudent; ի — արկանել, to think, to consider, to ruminate; — ի միտս կայր նորա, he had the intention to, he intended to.

Title: Խոկամ
Definition_1: to think, to reflect, to meditate, to consider, to contemplate, to imagine.

Title: Խոկումն
Definition_1: thought, meditation, consideration, contemplation, reflexion, imagination, speculation.

Title: Խոհական
Definition_1: thoughtful, prudent, wise, judicious, sensible, intelligent, cautious, provident, circumspect, discreet;

Title: Խոհականութիւն
Definition_1: prudence, wisdom, discretion, wariness, circumspection, cautiousness, good sense.

Title: Խոհամանամ
Definition_1: to precipitate one's self, to fling, to cast or throw one's self headlong.

Title: Խոհեր
Definition_2: filth, obscenity, villany, wantonness; ի —ի՝ ընդ — թաւալիլ, to get splashed, to be bemired, covered with mud; —ք պղծութեանց, defilement; —ք միմեանց, sodomites.

Title: Խոհերական
Definition_1: muddy, dirty, filthy, impure, obscene; — ձեռք, unclean hands.

Title: Խողխողեմ
Definition_1: to butcher, to slaughter, to kill, to massacre.

Title: Խողխոնջեմ
Definition_1: to hear a loud burst of laughter.

Title: Խողովակ
Definition_1: pipe, tube, canal, conduit; — ջրոյ, spout.

Title: Խոճոճեմ
Definition_1: to be thoughtful, anxious, absorbed in thought.

Title: Խոյ
Definition_3: battering -;
Definition_4: windlass, capstan; ջրաբաշխական —, hydraulic -.

Title: Խոյանամ
Definition_1: to soar up, to fly on high, to dart forward, to swoop down, to rush headlong on, to dash at, to pounce on, to fall on.

Title: Խոյզ
Definition_1: search, inquisition, inquest, perquisition, research, examination; — եւ խնդիր, strict inquiry; — արկանել, ի— եւ ի խնդիր արկանել, ի— եւ ի խնդիր լինել, — եւ խնդիր առնել, to search, to examine, to inquire strictly, to pry into; — եւ խնդիր առնել ումեք, to be in search of, to trace, to follow the tracks.

Title: Խոյլ
Definition_1: swelling, blotch; schirrus, scrolula; — պարանոցի, wen, goitre.

Title: Խոյս
Definition_1: flight, running away; — տալ՝ առնուլ՝ լինել, to fly, to take to flight, to escape, to decamp, to steal or slip away, to break loose; to be guilty of tergiversation; to avoid, to flee from, to shun.

Title: Խոնարհ
Definition_1: low; humble, submissive, respectful; lower, inferior, mean, base, low; feeble, weak;
Definition_2: —, ի —, low; down down below; downwards; from top to bottom; at the foot of beneath, below, underneath; below, lower, under; — առնել, to humble; — լինել, to be humble or meek, to humble one's self; to be humbled; զերեսս ի — արկանել, to be sulky or sullen; — սրտիւք, lowly in heart; աչք ի —, with downcast eyes.

Title: Խոնարհամտեմ
Definition_1: to humble or abase one's self, to be humble.

Title: Խոնարհամտութիւն
Definition_1: humility, modesty, meekness, to conjugate verbs.

Title: Խոնարհեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to humble, to abase, to subject; to bring down, to lower, to abate, to depress; to bow or bend down, to incline; — զունկն, to lend an ear to, to listen to; — զանձն, to humble oneself; to do penance, to mortify oneself, to fast; — զամբարտաւանութիւն ուրուք, to lower, to abase, to bring down the pride of; — զաստուած առ մարդիկ, to move God to compassion, to implore divine mercy; Աստուած խոնարհեցուցանէ զամբարտաւանս, God humbles the proud.

Title: Խոնարհիմ
Definition_1: to be humble; to lower oneself, to descend; to yield, to acquiesce; to lean, to bend downwards; to decline; — յամբարտաւանութենէ, to descend from one's haughtiness, to have the pride of one's countenance humbled; յերկիր —, to prostrate oneself; — առաջի Աստուծոյ, to bow before God; — անկանիլ երեսաց, to go downcast, to be dejected; — յիջեւան ուրուք, to deign to dwell in; — յալիս, to grow old; —հի օրն, the daylight fades, the day wanes or is going down; յոտն եկաց յերեսացն խոնարհելոց, he rose from his prostrate attitude;

Title: Խոնարհութիւն
Definition_1: humility; deference, submission, humiliation, abasement; baseness, lowness, inclination, declination.

Title: Խոնաւանամ
Definition_1: to grow wet, to become damp or moist.

Title: Խոնաւեմ
Definition_1: to damp, to moisten; to wet, to steep, to bathe.

Title: Խոնաւութիւն
Definition_1: humidity, damp, moisture, wet; humour, radical moisture.

Title: Խոնջեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to tire out, to fatigue, to weary.

Title: Խոշոր
Definition_1: stout; great; thick; rough, rude, rustic, unpolished; awkward, ill-shaped, ill-made; rugged, toilsome, difficult; — զգեստ, coarse cloth; — ձայն, rough voice; harsh sound; — գոյնք, stiff or unconnected colouring.

Title: Խոշորանամ
Definition_1: to grow up; to become stout or bulky; to grow rude or rough.

Title: Խոշորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to magnify, to increase, to make larger.

Title: Խոշորութիւն
Definition_1: coarseness, rudeness, want of politeness; bigness.

Title: Խոշտանգեմ
Definition_1: to pain, to torment, to torture; to thrash, to beat.

Title: Խոչ
Definition_1: obstacle, opposition; embarrassment, inconvenience, difficulty, hitch, hinderance, clog; the spines of the hedgehog; — խափանարար, great obstacle, impossibility; ահա — անկոխելի, there is an insurmountable difficulty; — եւ խութ լինել, to hinder, to clog, to embarrass, to prevent, to be a bar to; տապալել զամենայն զխոչ եւ զխութ, to surmount the greatest obstacles; cf. Խութ.

Title: Խոչընդակն
Definition_1: impediment to the sight; — լինել, to put a stop to, to hinder.

Title: Խոչընդոտն
Definition_1: obstacle, stop, hinderance, embarrassment; — լինել, to oppose, to hinder, to clog, to embarrass.

Title: Խոպան
Definition_2: waste land, desert; ի —ի, waste, fallow.

Title: Խոպանանամ
Definition_1: to become desert, uncultivated; to lie waste or fallow; to spoil, to deteriorate, to go to ruin.

Title: Խոպանացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to let lie fallow, to leave uncultivated; to lay waste, to spoil, to ruin.

Title: Խոպոպեմ
Definition_1: to curf, to frizz, to put in ringlets, to crisp.

Title: Խոպոպիմ
Definition_1: to curl one's hair; to tall into curl, to curl of itself.

Title: Խոպոպի
Definition_2: —ք, curl, lock, ringlet of hair; —ս առնել, to curl, to frizz.

Title: Խոռոչ
Definition_1: hollow, cavity, cave, hole; cavern, den.

Title: Խոստ
Definition_1: confession; promise; ի — ածել, to cause to confess; ի — գալ, to confess, to tell the truth; — լինել, to confess one's sins.

Title: Խոստանամ
Definition_1: to promise, to engage, to pledge ones word; to vow; to protest; to offer, to proffer; to propose.

Title: Խոստովան՞՞՞առնել
Definition_1: to confess, to own, to acknowledge; tomake confession, to confess, to go to confession.

Title: Խոստովանիմ
Definition_1: to own to, to acknowledge, to confess; to protest; to profess; to confess, to make confession; պարտ է —, it must be acknowledged; — զմեղս, to confess one's sins; — զյանցանս, to acknowledge one's faults; զպարտութիւն —, to acknowledge oneself overcome.

Title: Խոստովանութիւն
Definition_1: confession, avowal, acknowledgment, declaration; երթալ ի —, to go to confession.

Title: Խոստուկ
Definition_1: colic, gripes, stomachache, pain in the bowels; — ունել, to have the gripes; — լինել, to confess, to own.

Title: Խոստումն
Definition_1: promise, engagement, obligation; word, word of honour, good faith; offer, tender; protestation, declaration; profession; — տալ, to give one's word, to promise; պահել զ—, կալ ի խոստման, to keep one's word or promise; չպատել զ—, չկալ ի խոստմանն, to break one's promise, to fail to keep one's word; մեծամեծ խոստմունս առնել, to promise mountains of gold, wonders; սնոտի խոստմունք, vain or empty promises, fair words only; սնոտի խոստմամբք պարարել, to nourish with vain promises

Title: Խոտ
Definition_1: grass, herbage, turf, verdure; pasture; չոր —, bay, forage.

Title: Խոտաբեր
Definition_1: bearing or producing grass, grassy, herbaceous.

Title: Խոտաբուտ
Definition_1: fed on grass; living on herbs.

Title: Խոտալից
Definition_1: abounding in grass, full of forage.

Title: Խոտաճարակ
Definition_1: herbivorous, pasturing on herbs; — լինել՝ շրջել, to pasture, to feed.

Title: Խոտան
Definition_1: abject, vile, base, mean, worthless, despicable;
Definition_2: —աւ, meanly, basely, shamefully; in excess; — առնել, cf. Խոտեմ.

Title: Խոտեմ
Definition_1: to despise, to contemn, to scorn, to slight, to disdain; to undervalue, to depreciate.

Title: Խոտոր
Definition_1: oblique, crooked; deluded; strayed, erroneous, wrong.

Title: Խոտորեմ
Definition_1: to turn aside, to mislead, to lead astray; to divert, to distract; to twist, to contort, to bend, to make awry;
Definition_2: to lead astray, to cause to err, to delude, to unsettle.

Title: Խոտորիմ
Definition_1: to turn aside, to deviate, to swerve; to go astray, to lose the way; to decline, to shrink from; to slope, to slant;
Definition_2: to go astray, to err, to be perverted, to abandon oneself to; to avoid, to shun.

Title: Խոտորնակ
Definition_1: oblique, crooked, aslant, aslope, athwart, across, transverse; out of the way, indirect; ill-turned, ill-made; bad, perverse, wicked, froward;
Definition_3: —, —ս, obliquely, crossly, transversely.

Title: Խոտորնակիմ
Definition_1: to slant, to slope; to turn aside, to go astray.

Title: Խոտորութիւն
Definition_1: obliquity, crookedness, deviation, declination, winding, sinuosity; turning aside, going astray;

Title: Խոր
Definition_3: ի —, deeply, profoundly; thoroughly; grievously; — տգիտութիւն՝ վէրք, profound ignorance; deep wound; խաւար —, thick, dreadful darkness; — աղքատութիւն, profound misery, abject poverty; ի — ձմերան, in the depth of winter; ի — ամարան, in the middle of summer; պեղել ի —, to excavate deeply.

Title: Խորք
Definition_1: hollow, cavity, pit, depth, bottom; gulph, abyss; — ծովու, the high sea; the open sea; — սրտից, the heart's secrets; ի խորոց սրտէ, from the bottom of the heart; ի խորս անտառին, in the depth of the forest; ի խորս քարայրին, at the bottom of the grotto; բանք նորա ի խորս սրտի իմոյ ազդեցին, his words touched me to the quick; — Խորհրդոց Աստուծոյ, the inscrutable designs of God.

Title: Խորաբանութիւն
Definition_1: enigma; dark saying, profound import, hidden meaning.

Title: Խորագէտ
Definition_1: sagacious, shrewd, judicious; sensible, prudent, cautious; wary, subtil, sly, crafty; ingenious, skilful; — քաղաքավարութիւն, sagacious policy; sly conduct.

Title: Խորագնայ
Definition_1: sailing on the open sea, navigating the ocean.

Title: Խորախօս
Definition_1: profound, difficult; enigmatical, obscure; jabbering, talking gibberish.

Title: Խորամանկ
Definition_1: cunning, sly, crafty, knavish, wily, roguish, artful; fraudulent, deceitful, rascally, villanous; malicious; — կեղծաւորութիւն, profound hypocrisy.

Title: Խորամանկեմ
Definition_1: to chicane, to quirk, to quibble, to use stratagem and artifice, to deceive, to cheat; to be cunning, artful, fraudulent, knavish.

Title: Խորամանկութիւն
Definition_1: cunning, artifice, craft, chicane, quibble; cheat, deceit, fraud, base stratagem; knavery, roguery; malice.

Title: Խորամէջ
Definition_1: deep & spacious in the center; concave.

Title: Խորամուխ
Definition_1: penetrating, acute, piercing; profound, deep; — լինել, to penetrate, to fathom, to dive into, to enter deeply; — լինել ի ցաւս, to be swallowed up by, to be plunged in grief; — ի ներքս խաղալ, to enter too far, to plunge in too deeply; — դրոշմել, to inculcate, to impress deeply on the mind.

Title: Խորայոյզ
Definition_1: searching at the bottom; — լինել, to search into, to go to the bottom of, to sift, to scrutinize, to investigate.

Title: Խորան
Definition_1: pavilion, tent; vault of heaven; altar; residence, habitation, dwelling; chessboard, back-gammon board; — վկայութեան, the Tabernacle; — արքունի, royal palace, court; աւագ —, high altar; *գոգնոց —ի, frontal;

Title: Խորանակից
Definition_1: dwelling in the same paviliou or tent.

Title: Խորանամ
Definition_1: to become hollow or deep; to dive into, to go to the bottom of.

Title: Խորասոյզ
Definition_2: abyss, gulf, pit; — աչք, sunken eyes; — առնել, to submerge, to sink to the bottom, to plunge into, to immerse; — լինել, to dive to the bottom, to sink; — ի ցաւս, sunk in grief; — ի թախիծս մտաց, plunged in remorse;
Definition_3: to founder.

Title: Խորարմատ
Definition_1: deeply rooted; — հաստատիլ՝ կանդաղիլ, to strike deep into the soil, to take deep root, to be deeply rooted.

Title: Խորացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make deeper; to make abstruse, obscure, unintelligible.

Title: Խորափիտ
Definition_1: cavity, hollow, cave, cavern, excavation; —ս հատանել, to excavate, to hollow.

Title: Խորաքնին
Definition_1: scrutinizing, investigating; profound, sublime, past finding out.

Title: Խորգ
Definition_1: hair-shirt, sack-cloth, hair-cloth; ապաշխարել —ով, to repent in sack-cloth.

Title: Խորդամ
Definition_1: to snore; to snort, to rattle in the throat; to roar, to bluster (sea).

Title: Խորդիւն
Definition_1: snoring, snore; snorting; rattling, rattle in the throat.

Title: Խորեմ
Definition_1: to hollow, to excavate; to fathom; to withhold, to retain; to purloin, to steal, to rob, to embezzle; to peculate.

Title: Խորթ
Definition_1: step-son, step-daughter; bastard, natural, illegitimate; degenerate, spurious, false; alien, foreign;

Title: Խորթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to change the nature of, to adulterate, to corrupt, to debase, to spoil, to impair.

Title: Խորին
Definition_1: deep, high; impenetrable, ahstruse, obscure, hidden, difficult to understand; — ականողիք, sunken eyes.

Title: Խորխ
Definition_1: slough; skin, hide; shell, bark, rind, peel; *spittle, phlegm.

Title: Խորխոլիմ
Definition_1: to fall in, to sink, to give way.

Title: Խորհիմ
Definition_1: to think, to meditate, to consider, to cogitate, to study; to reason, to reflect; to suppose, to judge, to imagine, to fancy; to bring to memory, to call to mind, to recollect; — ընդ միմեանս, to consult, to advise together, to deliberate, to concert; — ի սնոտիս, to meditate on trifles; ի խորհելն անգամ սոսկամ, the mere thought of it makes me shudder; յայն խորհէր հանապազ, he thought of nothing else.

Title: Խորհուրդ
Definition_1: thought; design, intention, resolution; imagination, fancy, inspiration; sentiment, disposition; idea, fantasy, revery; advice, counsel; deliberation, consultation; secret; mystery; symbol; sacrament; designedly, intentionally, on purpose, purposely; փրկական —, the Holy Sacrament; տուն, տաճար խորհդոյ, council-hall; խորհրդեան դպիր, secretary; — չար, pernicious advice; — առնել՝ ի մէջ առնուլ՝ ունել, to consult, to determine, to decide on, to resolve on; to deliberate, to confer together, to take counsel, to advise with; — տալ, to counsel, to give advice, to advise; — հարցանել, to ask advice, to consult, to take counsel; ի մի — միաբանել, to think together, to deliberate unanimously; շրջել ի խոհրդոց, to change or alter one's mind; շրջել զոք ի խորհրդոց, to dissuade from, to advise against; — ի մտի եդի գիտել, I had conceived the idea of knowing; — արարի ընդ միտս իմ, I deliberated with myself; — կալաւ, he conceived the idea to; զյանդուգն զայն խորհեցաւ —, he formed the hardy design to; մինչդեռ յայսմ խորհրդի էր, in the midst of these thoughts, while thus deliberating.

Title: Խորհրդագէտ
Definition_1: astute, shrewd, wary, cautious; initiated, adept; — առնել, to let into a secret, to initiate into a mystery; — լինել, to be initiated.

Title: Խորհրդածեմ
Definition_1: to reflect, to ponder, to think, to revolve, to meditate, to consider; to imagine, to form an idea of, to suppose; to consult, to deliberate; to explain, to expound, to comment upon; to administer the sacraments; to celebrate mass.

Title: Խորհրդածու
Definition_1: thinker; counsellor; the initiated; minister, priest.

Title: Խորհրդածութիւն
Definition_1: thought, reflection; deliberation; secret; mystery; administration of the sacraments; celebration of mass.

Title: Խորհրդական
Definition_1: mystical; mysterious; sacramental; emblematical, symbolical; rational, thinking, prudent;
Definition_2: adviser, counsellor; — իմաստ, rhapsody, religious rapture.

Title: Խորհրդականութիւն
Definition_1: deliberation, council, consultation; mystery, sacrament; mysticalness, mysteriousness; wisdom, prudence, wariness, cautiousness.

Title: Խորհրդակցիմ
Definition_1: to consult, to confer, to hold a parley or conference.

Title: Խորհրդատուն
Definition_1: place of conference, council-chamber; vestry-room; offertory.

Title: Խորհրդատօնք
Definition_1: mysteries; orgies, drunken revelry, feasts of Bacchus, bacchanals, drinking-bout.

Title: Խորհրդարան
Definition_1: house of Parliament, hall of Assembly, chamber of deputies; place of administration of the sacramants; offering-place;

Title: Խորհրդաւոր
Definition_1: mysterious, mystical, arcane; figurative, emblematic, symbolical; hieroglyphical; — նշան՝ պատկեր, emblem.

Title: Խորշ
Definition_1: corner; compartment, division, pigeon-hole; chess-squares, chequers; niche; cell, partition; nook, lurking-place, hidden corner; hollow, cavity; — հանդերձիկ, fold, plait, crease; — երեսաց, ճակատու, dimple; wrinkle, puckering; — ծովու, gulf, bay; creek, cove; — նաւի, hold of a ship; — լերանց, cave, cavern; — կենդանեաց, den, haunt, lair; — թռչնոց, eyrie, nest; ի — մի, in a corner; — զխորշիւ իջանել, to fold, to plait, to crease; to become wrinkled, to knit the brow; —ս քաղել, to fold variously; —ս —ս գործել, to make smnall rooms or cells; to gather, to plait; —ս արկանել յայտս, to wrinkle, to pucker.

Title: Խորշակ
Definition_1: excessive heat; hot dry or parching wind, simoon; drought, dryness, aridity; — ժանտ, pestilential blast.

Title: Խորշակահար
Definition_1: sun-burnt, parched by excessive heat, or by a burning wind; — առնել, to burn, to parch; — լինել, to be burnt, parched.

Title: Խորշանկեմ
Definition_1: to frown, to wrinkler, to pucker; to plait, to fold.

Title: Խորշաքաղ՞՞՞առնեմ
Definition_1: to plait, to arrange gracefully, to fit, to adjust with elegance.

Title: Խորշեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to avoid or shun.

Title: Խորշիմ
Definition_1: to feel an aversion to, to loathe, to turn from with disgust, to avoid, to shun, to eschew, to flee; to be shy, to beware, to show or pay regard to; to ho respectful; — յումեքէ, to take a dislike to, to avoid of.

Title: Խորշխորշան
Definition_1: plait, double, fold, gather; wrinkle, crease;
Definition_2: plaited, folded, turned down; wrinkled, puckered.

Title: Խորշոմիմ
Definition_1: to grow wrinkled, to shrink, to shrivel up; — հանդերձից, to fold, to plait, to crease.

Title: Խորշումն
Definition_1: aversion, repugnance, dislike, reluctance; reserve, caution; regard, respect.

Title: Խորովանք
Definition_1: earnest prayer, urgent entreaty, lively instance.

Title: Խորովեմ
Definition_1: to roast, to toast, to brown; to grill, to broil, to fry.

Title: Խորովիմ
Definition_1: to suffer, to be afflicted; to sympathise, to have pity or compassion on; to entreat earnestly; to be roasted.

Title: Խորովումն
Definition_1: roasting; ի —վս արկանել, to roast, to fry.

Title: Խորոսխեմ
Definition_1: to make the honey-comb; to fill with honey-cakes.

Title: Խորտաբորտ
Definition_2: —ք, rough, craggy places, asperity, roughness, unevenness, ruggedness.

Title: Խորտակեմ
Definition_1: to bruise, to crack, to break, to crush, to dash to pieces; — զթշնամին, to crush, to bear down, to defeat, to rout, to put the enemy to flight; — զգունդս, to disband the troops; — զդուռն, to force open the door; — զգլուխ, to break the head; — զմարմինն, զանձն, to mortify one's flesh, to do penance.

Title: Խորտակիմ
Definition_1: to break, to dash to pieces; to be broken, undone, defeated, destroyed.

Title: Խորտիկ
Definition_1: dish, viand, mess; roast-meat; cooked victuals.

Title: Խոց
Definition_2: wounded; — խորամուխ՝ կարեվէր, deep, mortal wound.

Title: Խոցեմ
Definition_1: to wound, to pierce, to stab; to prick, to smite;
Definition_2: to pierce or cut to the heart.

Title: Խոցոտեմ
Definition_1: to wound severely, to cover with wounds;

Title: Խուեմ
Definition_1: to deal harshly with, to ill-use, to maltreat, to vex, to torment, to trouble, to incommode; to worry, to harass, to annoy.

Title: Խուզակ
Definition_1: searching, scrutinizing; — լինել, to search, to examine, to explore, to rummage.

Title: Խուզարկ
Definition_2: examiner, searcher, observer, busy inquirer, pryer, scrutator; — լինել, to make researches, to seek for, to hunt after.

Title: Խուզեմ
Definition_1: to search, to inquire, to seek diligently, to hunt after, to pry into; to shear, to shave; to cut off; to strip off.

Title: Խուզողութիւն
Definition_1: busy search, curiosity, quest, investigation; shearing; -զումն հերաց, shaving, tonsure.

Title: Խուժ
Definition_1: barbarous, savage, rude; rough, cruel, inhuman; խուժք եւ դուժք, the barbarians.

Title: Խուժան
Definition_1: multitude, populace, the vulgar, crowd; throng, press; hurly burly, confusion, noise, clatter; — աւերանաց զաշխարհաւ զեղուլ՝ ածել, to devastate, to lay waste.

Title: Խուժդն
Definition_1: obstinacy, stubbornness, pertinacity; ի խժդան եւ յոխորտի կալ, cf. Խժդան.

Title: Խուժեմ
Definition_1: to invade, to rush on, to fall impetuously on, to flock, to resort in numbers to.

Title: Խուլ
Definition_1: deaf; deaf, dead, dull; eyeless; — առնել, to deafen, to stun; — առնել զունկն, — լինել, to turn or give a deaf ear to.

Title: Խուլինջ
Definition_1: phlegmon, inflammatory tumour on the shoulders.

Title: Խուխ
Definition_1: phlegm, pituite; թքանել զ—, — արկանել, to expectorate; — բերել, to cough up.

Title: Խուղ
Definition_1: cot, but; cell, small room; — պահնակաց, sentry-box.

Title: Խուճապ
Definition_1: fright, terror, alarm, dread, haste, hurry, precipitation;
Definition_2: խուճապաւ, in haste, in a hurry; —ք, phantom, spectre.

Title: Խուճապական
Definition_1: alarming, startling, frightful, dreadful; urgent, pressing; precipitate, too hasty.

Title: Խուճապեմ
Definition_1: to startle, to alarm, to frighten, to terrify, to appal, to strike with terror; to frighten away; to hasten, to precipitate.

Title: Խուճապիմ
Definition_1: to be startled, alarmed, terrified; to waver, to be in suspense; to be hasty, precipitate; to flee precipitately.

Title: Խումբ
Definition_1: party, band, troop, detachment, company, regiment, brigade, division, cohort, legion; — կղզեաց, group of islands, archipelago; — առնուլ, to assemble, to flock together; — կազմել զօրաց, to muster, to form into a regiment, to embody, to enlist, to enrol, to collect together; ի խմբէ իմաստնոցն էր, he was one of the seven wise men.

Title: Խուն
Definition_2: — ինչ, — մի, a little, very small quantity, however little; — ինչ ժամանակ, a short time; — ինչ իրք են, there is very little; ի — վայրկենի, in a moment, in an instant.

Title: Խուռն
Definition_1: crowd, concourse, multitude, throng of people; affluence, great quantity; noise, tumult, confusion;
Definition_2: thick, close, dense, crowded; many, numerous;
Definition_3: in crowds, in throngs; — առ —, — ի —, in a huddle, pell-mell, disorderly, hurriedly; ի խռան, among the crowd; ի խռան մարտին, in the thickest of the fight; — բազմութիւն, a numerous crowd, a throng; — բազմութեամբ մտանել, ելանել, to crowd in; to crowd out; — բազմութիւն ժողովրդեան, immense concourse of people; — հասանեն աստ օտարականք, strangers flock here.

Title: Խուռներամ
Definition_1: in many flocks; in vast numbers; — փունջ, nosegay of various flowers.

Title: Խուռնընթաց
Definition_1: ad. very numerous, multitudinous, in a crowd; conjointly, together; — բազմութիւն, concourse, crowd.

Title: Խուսափանք
Definition_1: flight, eva-sion; subterfuge, shift, excuse, tergiversation, shuffling.

Title: Խուսափեմ
Definition_1: to escape, to flee, to take to flight, to steal away; to retreat, to retire, to disappear; to shuffle, to elude, to tergiversate.

Title: Խուսեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to escape, to save, to extricate.

Title: Խռկեմ
Definition_1: to heap, to pile; to fill, to cram, to stuff.

Title: Խռնեմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to muster; to collect, to gather; to augment, to enlarge.

Title: Խռնիմ
Definition_1: to assemble in a crowd, to collect or gather together, to flock, to crowd round; խռնէր զնովաւ ժողովուրդն, the people crowded round him; խռնեցաւ պատերազմն, the fight began.

Title: Խռնչեմ
Definition_1: to emit a gurgling sound; — շանց, to howl.

Title: Խռով
Definition_1: confusion, tumult, trouble, disorder, sedition, insurrection;
Definition_2: confused, confounded, troubled; — կալ ընդ ումեք, to have quarrelled with, to fall out, to be at variance, to disagree with.

Title: Խռովարար
Definition_1: factious, mntinous, turbulent, seditious, riotous, unquiet, restless; meddling, mischief-making; revolutionary.

Title: Խռովեմ
Definition_1: to trouble, to put into disorder, to agitate; to perplex, to disconcert, to disquiet, to disturb; to upset, to unsettle, to distract; to alarm, to rouse; to stir up, to excite to insurrection; — զմիտս, to dispirit, to unhinge; — զսիրտ, to dishearten, to unnerve.

Title: Խռովիմ
Definition_1: to be troubled, disturbed, agitated, perplexed, disquieted, disconcerted; խռովեալ ես, you are looking quite confounded, or flurried.

Title: Խռովութիւն
Definition_1: bustle; perturbation, confusion, agitation, trouble; tumult, disorder, turbulence, insurrection, sedition, revolt, revolution, mutiny, rebellion; —ս յուզել, to foment troubles; ի խռովութեան են Արեւմուտք, affairs are becoming very serious in the East.

Title: Խռուանամ
Definition_1: to dry up, to fade, to wither; to grow old, to become extenuated; խռուացեաւ հերք, bristling hair; dishevelled hair.

Title: Խռչոտիմ
Definition_1: to breathe with difficulty arising from diseased lungs.

Title: Խռպոտ
Definition_1: rough, unpleasant, disagreeable; ill-natured, ill-tempered; — ձայն, shrill voice.

Title: Խստաձայն
Definition_1: having a harsh, rough, disagreeable voice.

Title: Խստանամ
Definition_1: to harden, to become hard; to be obstinate, to persist; to be severe, rigorous, austere; — ումեք, to treat mercilessly; — որովայնի, to constipate, to close the bowels.

Title: Խստապարանոց
Definition_1: stubborn, stiff necked, pertinacious, opinionative, dogmatic.

Title: Խստասիրտ
Definition_1: hard-hearted, merciless, inflexible, obdurate, insensible, relentless;

Title: Խստասրտութիւն
Definition_1: hardness of heart, obduracy; pertinacity, obstinacy;

Title: Խստավարութիւն
Definition_1: life of privations & hardships, a Spartan existence.

Title: Խստացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to harden, to make hard; to render obstinate; — զսիրտ, to render obdurate or callous, to harden the heart; — զորովայն, to constipate.

Title: Խստացուցիչ
Definition_1: hardening, making hard; — որովայնի, astringent, binding, costive.

Title: Խստերախ
Definition_1: hard mouthed, intractable, untamable, ungovernable; inflexible, obstinate, pertinacious, impetuous, headlong, fiery, rebellious; — երիվար, fiery, spirited, high-mettled steed, courser or charger.

Title: Խստիւ
Definition_1: hardly, harshly, roughly, rudely; cruelly, severely, rigorously; rigidly, strictly; — գնալ ընդ ումեք, to treat harshly, to maltreat, to rule with a high hand; — պատուհասել, to punish rigorously, severely.

Title: Խստութիւն
