Title: Կորստասէր
Definition_1: contriving or scheming the perdition of.

Title: Կութք
Definition_1: vintage; harvest; կութ մրրախառն, wine-dregs or lees.

Title: Կուղ
Definition_1: plait, fold, doubling; texture; — կարթի, fishing-line.

Title: Կուղթ
Definition_1: large boiler or caldron used in torture.

Title: Կումբ
Definition_1: navel, umbo, nombril of a scutcheon, boss of a shield.

Title: Կուպր
Definition_1: bitumen, asphalt, pitch; tar, naphtha; petroleum, rock-oil; cf. Նաւթ.

Title: Կուռ
Definition_2: condensed, compact, firm, solid, hard; beaten, trodden, frequented; massive, large, heavy; carved, sculptured, hammered; pure, refined;
Definition_3: vehemently, forcibly; unceasingly, unremittingly, incessantly; — վառեալ, armed with a cuirass, armed cap-a-pie, from head to foot; — զմիմեամբ, — զմիմեանց զհետ, — զմիմեանց զկնի ou կնի, continually, one after the other; blow after blow.

Title: Կուռն
Definition_1: back; մերձ առ կռան կայ, it is not far distant.

Title: Կուսակալ
Definition_1: governor, prefect, pacha; փոխանորդ —ի, lieutenant governor, sub-prefect.

Title: Կուսակալեմ
Definition_1: to govern a province; to be governor of a -.

Title: Կուսակալութիւն
Definition_1: government of a province or department, prefecture.

Title: Կուսակից
Definition_1: partisan, abettor, adherent, follower; — լինել, to espouse a party, to adhere, to favour, to support; — լինել ումեք, to side with one, to follow one's party, to be of the party of, to take one's part, to undertake his defence, to be wedded to ones own opinion; եւ ոչ միումն լինել ou ոչ միում եւ ոչ միսում կողման լինել —, to rest or remain neuter; cf. Կողմն.

Title: Կուսակրօն
Definition_1: living in celibacy, virgin, single, unmarried man or woman.

Title: Կուսակրօնութիւն
Definition_2: bachelorhood; spinsterhood; կեալ կուսակրօնութեամբ, to live single.

Title: Կուսակցութիւն
Definition_1: party, partiality, favour; ոգի կուսակցութեան, party-spirit; թողուլ զ—, to give up, to desert one's party.

Title: Կուսան
Definition_1: virgin; maid; nun; — լինել, to go into a nunnery, to take the veil.

Title: Կուսանամ
Definition_1: to be pure as a virgin; to lead a life of chastity, to keep one's maidenhood; to take the veil.

Title: Կուսանոց
Definition_1: maiden's apartment; gynecasum; girls boarding-school; nunnery, convent.

Title: Կուսութիւն
Definition_2: pudicity; բառնալ զ—, արկանել ի կուսութենէ, to defile, to ravish, to violate, to deflour; ի կուսութենէ իւրմէ, from her youth; cf. Կնիք.

Title: Կուտ
Definition_2: bait, food; cf. Կորիզ; to feed its young birds or chickens, to put into their beaks.

Title: Կուտակ
Definition_1: heap, pile, accumulation, mass; vault, roof; swelling; wave, surge; globe, globule.

Title: Կուտակադէզ
Definition_1: piled one upon another, heaped up, accumulated.

Title: Կուտակեմ
Definition_1: to heap, to pile, to amass, to accumulate; to swell, to heave, to upheave; to exaggerate.

Title: Կուտեմ
Definition_1: to amass, to collect, to heap up, to heap together, to pile.

Title: Կուր
Definition_1: skiff; boat, barge, bark; hod, tray; cf. Կեր.

Title: Կուրանամ
Definition_1: to become blind, to lose one's sight, to be deprived of sight;
Definition_2: to shut ones eyes, to be blind to; — ճանապարհի, to be no longer practicable, to be stopped, unpassable or impassable (road).

Title: Կուրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to blind, to make blind, to take away the sight, to excecate; to dazzle, to offuscate; կիրք —նեն զմիտս, passions cloud or darken the understanding; cf. Շլացուցանեմ.

Title: Կուրծ
Definition_1: gnawing; core; — կաղամբի, cabbage-stump; — անկոց, ծառոց, pith; sap-wood.

Title: Կուրծք
Definition_1: breast, bosom, chest; heart, mind; ուշ ի կուրծս անկանել՝ առնել, to reflect well on, to recollect, to remember; մօտ առ կուրծս, to be imminent, near to, to impend; զձեռն ի վերայ կրծից հանգուցանել, to fold the arms in repose; մաքրել զ—ծս, to expectorate, to spit.

Title: Կուրութիւն
Definition_2: blindness, ablepsy, delusion; հարկանել կուրութեամբ, to strike blind; աբրէ մեծի կուրութեանս, what a strange blindness !

Title: Կուց
Definition_1: the hollow of the joined hands; double handful.

Title: Կոփածոյ
Definition_1: well carved or sculptured; smooth, polished; — քար, freestone.

Title: Կոփեմ
Definition_1: to cut, to hew, to carve, to sculpture; to polish; to coin; to forge, to fabricate; to beat, to hammer; — զպատկեր, to carve an image.

Title: *Կպուր
Definition_1: to come to to blows, to fight, to fall to loggerheads, to fall together by the ears.

Title: Կռածագ
Definition_1: crooked or bent at the point; — բեւեռ, hook, crook.

Title: Կռածոյ
Definition_1: cut, carved, sculptured; laminated, forged; engraved; coined; վարսք —ք, thick, curly hair.

Title: Կռակտուց
Definition_1: having a crooked or bent beak.

Title: Կռամոլ
Definition_1: given to idols, idolatrous; — պաշտօն, cf. Կռամոլութիւն.

Title: Կռանահարեմ
Definition_1: to hammer, to beat with a hammer, to forge, to beat on the anvil.

Title: Կռանաձայնք
Definition_1: clang of the smithy, ring of hammers on the anvil, hammering, noise.

Title: Կռանեմ
Definition_1: to hammer, to beat, to forge.

Title: Կռապաշտեմ
Definition_1: to worship idols, to give up to idols; to idolize.

Title: Կռեմ
Definition_1: to cut, to dress stones with the hammer; to carve, to hollow, to sculpture, to engrave, to chisel; to hammer, to beat or strike the anvil; to smooth, to polish; դաշինս —, to make a convention, to contract, to enter into an engagement, to engage oneself; — ուխտ, to conclude an alliance.

Title: Կռինչն
Definition_1: the least noise, the least thing; a mere nothing.

Title: Կռիչք
Definition_1: crakeing, creaking, cry or noise; — հաւուց, cackling; — թռչնոց, chattering; — խորդոց, crunk, crunkle of the crane.

Title: Կռիւ
Definition_1: scuffle, struggle; strife, contest, debate, dispute, squabble, difference, contention, quarrel, wrangling; skirmish, combat, battle; — ոտից, place to put one's foot; ի — կալ, to oppose, to resist, to contend, to contest, to combat; to come to blows; ի — արշաւել, to take the field, to open the campaign; ի — կոչել, to throw down one's glove, to defy, to challenge.

Title: Կռնչեմ
Definition_1: to crake, to creak; to make a shrill noise, to cry out, to shriek, to squeak, to scream; to hiss; to whistle; — գորտանց, to croak; — ագռաւուց, to caw; — խորդոց, to crunk, to crunkle; — խոզից, to grunt; — շանց, to growl; to yelp; — եղջերուի, to bell.

Title: Կռուան
Definition_1: hold; — գտանել, ունել, to get a hold on.

Title: Կռուանոց
Definition_1: wrestling-place, palcestra, arena, lists, tilt-yard; battle-field.

Title: Կռուարար
Definition_1: contentious, litigious, quarrelsome, fractious, wrangling, mischief-making, meddlesome.

Title: Կռուեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to set by the ears, to incite to strife, to urge to war.

Title: Կռուիմ
Definition_1: to take offence, to wrangle, to strive, to contend, struggle or dispute with, to debate, to contest, to quarrel; to skirmish, to grapple with each other, to clash together, to fight, to come to blows; to take hold of, to cleave to, to cling, adhere or stick to, to hold fast by, to catch or grasp at, to get entangled in; — ընդ միմեանս, to beat one another, to fight together;
Definition_2: to quarrel; թօթափել զփոշին կռուեալ, to shake the dust off one's foot; ի բեւեռ կռուեցաւ հանդերձ նորա, his coat is caught by a nail.

Title: Կռունկ
Definition_3: crane.

Title: Կռուփ
Definition_2: blame, reproach; կռուփս հանել, to pommel, to cuff, to box, to beat with the fist.

Title: Կռփամարտ
Definition_1: boxing-match, fight with fists; pugilism, boxing;

Title: Կռփանք
Definition_2: ill treatment, atrocious offence, wrong, injury.

Title: Կռփեմ
Definition_2: to vex, to plague, to use ill, to injure or affront contumeliously, to outrage; — զաղքատս, to smite with the fist of wickedness;
Definition_3: to trample the poor under foot, to oppress.

Title: Կռփիչ
Definition_1: who strikes with the fist; who uses harshly.

Title: Կսկիծ
Definition_1: smart, smarting, tingling; twinge, twitch, sharp pain; regret, vexation, displeasure, evil, affliction, heart-rending anguish.

Title: Կսկծագին
Definition_1: smarting, poignant, sharp, acute; bitter, mournful, sorrowful, painful, woeful, sad;

Title: Կսկծանք
Definition_1: cf. Կսկիծ; causticity, bitterness, sarcasm, taunt, scoff, mockery; կսկծանաց բանք, sharp, cutting, outrageous expressions.

Title: Կսկծելի
Definition_1: biting, cutting, satiric, poignant, tart; witty, sarcastic, mordacious, keen, venomous, taunting, virulent, grievous, harrowing; բանք —ք, keen words, bickering, teazing, taunt, rub, wipe.

Title: Կսկծեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to smart, to make smart, to cause pain;
Definition_2: to peck at, to bite, to taunt, to scoff; — զսիրտ, to break a persons heart, to grieve most deeply, to wound, to rend, to harrow; — զոք բանիւք, to nettle, to sting, to pique one with taunting or satirical words.

Title: Կսկծիմ
Definition_1: to be in pain, in sorrow or affliction;
Definition_2: to grieve, to take to heart, to mourn for, to feel very sorry, to be too much vexed; to repine at.

Title: Կտակ
Definition_1: will, testament, last will testament; — առնել, to make one's will; կտակաւ տալ՝ թողուլ, to bequeath by will, to leave a legacy to; կատարել զ—, to execute a will.

Title: Կտակարան
Definition_1: Testament; Հին՝ Նոր —, the Old, the New-.

Title: Կտաւ
Definition_1: flax; linen; linen-cloth or cotton-cloth; linen-garment;

Title: Կտաւի
Definition_1: cf. Կտաւեայ; շապիկ —, linen shirt; —ք, linen.

Title: Կտաւոտեակ
Definition_1: piece of linen, rag, cloth; swathing linen.

Title: Կտեմ
Definition_1: to tattoo; to prick down; to pinch; գիր կտեալ, tattooing.

Title: Կտղանք
Definition_1: fury, frenzy; erotic madness; tickling, titillation; rutting.

Title: Կտղիմ
Definition_1: to become furious, to give up to a frantic transport; to become mad with love, passionate, frenzied with desire or lust; to tickle, to titillate; to be in rutting, in pruriency.

Title: Կտուեմ
Definition_1: to lop off, to cut away, to prune, to trim.

Title: Կտուր
Definition_1: cut, cut out; — լինել ի միմեանց, to be disunited, at variance.

Title: Կտտամահ
Definition_1: putting to death cruelly, barbarously; torturing, excruciating; — սպանանել՝ սատակել, to kill in a cruel manner, to kill with tortures.

Title: Կտտանք
Definition_2: biting calunny, stinging outrage or insult, outrageous sarcasm.

Title: Կտտեմ
Definition_1: to torture, to excruciate, to tear, to lacerate, to set on the rack, to torment atrociously;
Definition_2: to abuse, to harass, to ill-treat, to vex, to outrage; to play on, to touch; to ring; — զդաշնակ, to play on the piano; կտտած գինի, soured wine.

Title: Կտրած
Definition_1: cut, cutting, incision; cut, shape, fashion;

Title: Կտրատեմ
Definition_1: to cut up, to cut or tear in pieces

Title: Կտրեմ
Definition_1: to cut, to cut off, to lop, to cut down; to divide, to separate; to take away, to discontinue, to retrench; to shear sheep; to cut hair; to castrate, to geld; — ընդ մէջ or յերկուս, to divide in halves; — ի չորս մասունս, to cut in quarters, to quarter; — զանդամս մարմնոյ, to cut off, to amputate, to maim, to mutilate.

Title: Կտրոց
Definition_1: knife; scissors; — դահեկանաց, clippings, shearings of coins, sizel.

Title: Կտրօն
Definition_1: cut, cropping, part cut off, cutting, chip, splinter; ''coupon'', dividend-warrant;

Title: Կրաբերիմ
Definition_1: to be enticed to evil; to be impelled by evil.

Title: Կրակ
Definition_2: fire, heat, flame, spirit, ardour; — լուցանել՝ վառել, to kindle, to light, to make a fire; արծարծել զ—, to stir, to poke the fire.

Title: Կրակասէր
Definition_1: fond of fire-side or chimney-corner, idle, lazy.

Title: Կրակարան
Definition_1: fire-place, hearth, heart-stone; brazier, chafing-dish or chafing-pan; stove, furnace; chimney; fire-temple.

Title: Կրակետղ
Definition_1: fire-place, brazier; burning or live coals; wood fire.

Title: Կրակից
Definition_1: subject to the same passions or weaknesses.

Title: *Կրակուբոց
Definition_1: fiery, ardent, lively, sprightly, brisk, spirited, high-mettled, active.

Title: Կրելի
Definition_3: mother.

Title: Կրեմ
Definition_1: to bear, to carry; to convey, to transport; to carry, to wear, to have on;
Definition_2: to hear, to sustain, to support, to endure, to suffer, to undergo; — դժնդակս, to be pained, grieved, to suffer cruelly, to support ill treatment, to be very ill used, to be treated severely; — զպատուհաս յանցանաց, to pay dear for, to smart for, to bear the consequences, to suffer the punishment of one's crime; — զծանրութիւն գործոց, to bear the burden of affairs; — անուն գեղեցիկ, to hear a distinguished name, to be renowned; զամօթ —, to remain confused; ընդ կրելոյն, in name only.

Title: Կրթեմ
Definition_1: to exercise, to train up, to inure, to form; to instruct, to discipline, to accustom, to civilize; to educate, to polish; — զմիտս, to inform the mind; ի զարմանս or յապուշ —, to astonish, to surprize.

Title: Կրթիմ
Definition_1: to exercise oneself, to improve, to be formed, to acquire instruction or knowledge, to instruct oneself, to improve one's mind; to become civilised; to conduce, to lead to, to tend, to incline to; to give oneself up to, to apply oneself; to be attributed, imputed; — յոք, to trust or abandon oneself to, to confide in; զհետ —, to run or follow after, to pursue, to persecute; յապուշ —, to be surprized, astonished, to fall from the clouds, to be thunderstruck, to marvel, to wonder; — ընդ ծերպս վիմաց, to trail through a hole, to crawl on the belly; ազատութիւնն յապերասանութիւն կրթէր, the liberty tended to licence; զհետ մարմնոյ կրթեալ, given to pleasure, sensual, voluptuous.

Title: Կրթութիւն
Definition_1: exercise, practice discipline, instruction; հոգեւոր —, spiritual exercises; — մարմնոյ, gymnastics.

Title: Կրծանոց
Definition_1: pectoral, breast-plate; — քահանայապետին, —, — of the high-priest; — կանանց, stays.

Title: Կրծեմ
Definition_1: to gnaw, to nibble; to corrode, to canker; to eat, to consume, to destroy; to take or carry away.

Title: Կրկին
Definition_2: doubly, two-fold, twice, as much again; — անգամ, afresh, again, anew; — եւ —, repeatedly, many times; — մեծ, twice greater; — թուով, two; — գոչել՝ կարդալ, to encore, to demand the repetition.

Title: Կրկնաբանեմ
Definition_1: to say again, to repeat, to twaddle, to say over & over again.

Title: Կրկնագիր
Definition_1: writing again; twice written, transcribed, copied, written in duplicate.

Title: Կրկնագրեմ
Definition_1: to write again, to copy, to transcribe.

Title: Կրկնազատիկ
Definition_1: first Sunday after Easter, Domenica in albis.

Title: Կրկնակ
Definition_3: binary scale.

Title: Կրկնակի
Definition_2: doubly; a second time, again; in two ways; cf. Կրկնոց.

Title: Կրկնապատիկ
Definition_3: doubly; again.

Title: Կրկնապատկեմ
Definition_1: to double, to redouble, to fold.

Title: Կրկնավտակ
Definition_1: having two springs; ուղխք — աղի արտասուաց իջանէին յաչաց նորա, two torrents of bitter tears; աչք նորա — աղբիւրք արտասուաց, her eyes had became two fountains of tears.

Title: Կրկնարօր առնեմ
Definition_2: to re-examine, to examine more minutely or thoroughly.

Title: Կրկնեմ
Definition_1: to double, to redouble, to increase; to fold, to plait, to turn down or in; to tell or say again, to repeat, to reiterate; to reply, to rejoin, to resume; ստէպ — զբանն, to inculcate; — ցաւոց, to relapse.

Title: Կրկնուած
Definition_1: fold, plait; joint, articulation, juncture; — ցաւ, relapse return of unfavourable symptoms.

Title: Կրկնութիւն
Definition_1: increase; repetition, reiteration, reply, answer, rejoinder;
Definition_3: reduplication;
Definition_4: paroxysm; — հիւանդոթեան, relapse.

Title: Կրկովիմ
Definition_1: to have the eyes starting from their sockets.

Title: Կրկուտ
Definition_1: sprig, twig; fagots, fallen-wood, brambles, bushes, briars.

Title: Կրկջեմ
Definition_1: to chuck, to churr; cf. Կաքաւ.

Title: Կրկտեմ
Definition_1: to seek, to search, to rummage;
Definition_2: to sift, to dive into, to examine, to explore.

Title: Կրճատեմ
Definition_1: to castrate; to circumcise; to cut off, to amputate, to mutilate, to crop, to dock, to curtail, to maim; — զձայնաւոր, to make an elision, to elide, to cut out.

Title: Կրճեմ
Definition_1: to gnash, to grind, to grate, to snap, to chatter; — ատամանց, gnashing, grinding of the teeth; — զատամունս, to gnash one's teeth.

Title: Կրճիմ
Definition_1: interval, space, bar, division; difference, distinction; objection, resistance, embarrassment, let, hinderance, obstacle, hitch; ի — մեծ արկ զանձն, to bring oneself into trouble, into a scrape, to be in an intricate, embarrassed or entangled state.

Title: Կրճիւն
Definition_1: gnashing, grinding or chattering of the teeth.

Title: Կրճտեմ
Definition_1: cf. Կրճեմ; — զատամունս ի վերայ ուրուք, to gnash the teeth at, to threaten.

Title: Կրուկ
Definition_1: heel; back, hind part; ընդ — դառնալ, դարձ ընդ — առնել, to fall or go retreat back, to recede, to go backwards, to retreat; յետս ընդ — դառնալ, to turn back, to retrace one's steps; cf. Կորանամ.

Title: Կրպակ
Definition_1: shop; tavern, wine shop or wine vault.

Title: Կրտսերագոյն
Definition_1: younger; — յոյժ քան զժամանակս նորա, much prior to his time.

Title: Կրօն
Definition_1: religion, faith; religious order, monastic life; law, right, custom, usage; manners conduct, life; sect; — աստուածպաշտութեան, the true faith.

Title: Կրօնաւոր
Definition_1: friar, monk, cenobite; — նորընծայ, novice; — ուխտեալ, professed monk; — լինել, to enter a convent, to take the cowl, to turn monk.

Title: Կրօնաւորիմ
Definition_1: cf. Կրօնաւոր լինիմ; to accustom oneself to the monastic life; to deprive oneself, to abstain.

Title: Կրօնաւորութիւն
Definition_1: monastic life; religion, piety; թողուլ զ—, to throw off the cowl.

Title: Կրօնաւորուհի
Definition_1: nun; — լինել, to take the veil.

Title: Կցան
Definition_1: junction; ի կցանի հարկանել to join, to unite, to tie.

Title: Կցատեմ
Definition_1: to kick, to kick out, to fling out the heels; <ab>fig.</ab> to be refractory, to kick against the pricks.

Title: Կցեմ
Definition_1: to join, to unite, to tie, to bind, to fasten; to reunite, to tie again, to rejoin; to insert, to annex, to add; to proceed, to repeat; եւ ես կցէի զամէնն, amen I replied; — զվէրս, to close, to cicatrize;

Title: Կցիմ
Definition_1: to be joined, united; to cling or stick to, to hold fast by; — վիրաց, to close up, to cicatrize, to skin over, to heal; յսատեղս կցի, it reaches the stars.

Title: Կցիր
Definition_1: shabby, beggarly, mean, stingy, scurvy, niggardly, close-fisted, covetous, sordid, miserly.

Title: Կցկցեմ
Definition_1: to conjoin, to bind together, to tie up;
Definition_2: to affect, to invent, to forge, to shuffle, to quibble, to quirk, to trump up, to borrow.

Title: Կցկցոտ
Definition_1: patched up, botched, adventitious, forged, invented, contrived, fictitious, borrowed.

Title: Կցորդ
Definition_1: participating, partaking, having part or share in;
Definition_2: party, companion, associate; partaker, partner, consort; cf. Կցուրդ; կենաց —, living together; consort, husband, wife; կարեաց —, compassionate; assisting, helping, relieving; արեան —, consanguineous, related; — չարեաց, accomplice, accessory; — առնել, to impart, to acquaint with, to inform, to oommunicate; — լինել, cf. Կցորդիմ.

Title: Կցորդեմ
Definition_1: cf. Կցորդ առնեմ; to join, to unite, to fasten;

Title: Կցորդիմ
Definition_1: to partake, to participate, to share in, to have a share or hand in; to join in, to associate, to be connected with, in communication or connexion with; to have an understanding together, to agree, to be agreed; կցորդէին միմեանց ի վտանգ եւ ի փառս, they shared the perils the glory;

Title: Կցորդութիւն
Definition_2: accompaniment, concert; — կենաց, company, society; — արեան, consanguinity, affinity; — չարեաց, the being an accomplice; ճանապարհ կցորդութեան, roads, means of communication; — ունել ընդ ումեք, to be connected, in communication with, to form a connexion with; in compliance with.

Title: Կցրեմ
Definition_1: to be stingy, miserly, covetous; — զատամունս, to grind the teeth at, to threaten.

Title: Կքեմ
Definition_1: to curve, to bend, to bow.

Title: Կքրիմ
Definition_1: to make head against, to cope with, to withstand, to face, to dare, to brave, to beard, to set at defiance; ընդդէմ —, to oppose, to resist, to withstand; թշնամի —, to declare oneself enemy, to bear enmity.

Title: Կօշիկ
Definition_2: drink-money; ներկել՝ մաքրել զ—, to black, to polish or clean boots or shoes; ագանել —ս , to put on one's boots or shoes; հանել զ—ս, to take or pull off one's boots.

Title: <letter>Հ</letter> (ho)
Definition_1: the sixteenth letter of the alphabet, and the eleventh of the consonants; seventy, seventieth.

Title: Հա
Definition_1: come ! come now ! well ! now then ! courage !
Definition_3: behold ! lo ! here is, there are.

Title: Հագագ
Definition_1: breath, respiration; throat, gullet, larynx; aspiration; pronunciation.

Title: Հագածիմ
Definition_1: to become addicted, to give oneself up, to yield; to cram oneself, to feed well, to feast.

Title: Հագներգութիւն
Definition_1: rhapsody; passage or extract from, part of a poem, canto; book, chapter.

Title: Հազ
Definition_1: cough; անընդհատ, չոր —, — հիւծիչ, a continual, dry, churchyard cough; շնչարգել — մանկանց, hooping or chin cough; —ի դեղ, tussilago, colt's foot, horse-foot; նեղիլ ի —ոյ, to suffer from a -; դառն — կալաւ զիս, I caught a violent -.

Title: Հազամ
Definition_1: to cough; անդադար —, to do nothing but cough; հազաց զգիշերն ողջոյն, he coughed all night.

Title: Հազար
Definition_2: —, —ս, thousand times; —ք —աց, million; —ս հինգ արանց, five thousand men; զօրութեամբ —օք, with an army a million strong; քոյր մեր, եղիցես ի —ս եւ ի բիւրս, o sister! may your posterity be as the sand of the sea-shore; — եւ բիւր դէպ եթէ գտցի ոք, if by chance, it happens; ամն արժանի յիշատակաց — ութ հարիւր եօթանասուն եւ ութ, the memorable year one thousand eight hundred and seventy eight.

Title: Հազարամեան
Definition_1: of a thousand years; մեայ ժամանակ, millennium.

Title: Հազարապատիկ
Definition_1: a thousand-fold, a thousand times as much.

Title: Հազարապետ
Definition_1: chiliarch, chief of a thousand men, colonel; governor, prefect, lord lieutenant; steward, agent, major-domo, controller, intendant; house-steward, manager.

Title: Հազարապետութիւն
Definition_1: command, office or dignity of a chiliarch; prefecture; stewardship, intendance, ministry, administration.

Title: Հազիւ
Complement: հազիւ թէ, — իմն, հազիւ հազ, — ուրեմն, — ուրեք

Title: Հալ
Definition_1: melting; smelting; fusion; — առնուլ, to melt; to smelt; to thaw.

Title: Հալածական
Definition_1: persecuted, expelled, fugitive; — առնուլ, տանել, արկանել, to persecute, to pursue, to expel, to chase, to give chase to, to thrust or push back or aside, to scatter, to dislodge, to drive out or away, cf. Հալածեմ, cf. Վարեմ, cf. Քշեմ; — լինել, երթալ, to be persecuted, driven away, expelled, to flee, to flee away, to take to flight.

Title: Հալական
Definition_1: apt to be melted, fusible; dissoluble.

Title: Հալեմ
Definition_1: to melt, to smelt, to found, to cast, to smelt down; to dissolve; to liquefy; to exhaust, to drain, to consume; to digest.

Title: Հալիմ
Definition_1: to melt, to be founded or cast; to dissolve, to liquefy; to melt to nothing, to dwindle away, to be exhausted, to go to decay, to run to waste, to be consumed; — սառնամանեաց, to melt, to thaw; — մաշիլ, to pine away, to wear out, to fall away, to exhaust oneself; to grow lean, to be withered.

Title: Հալոց
Definition_1: furnace; foundry; crucible, coppel; — պառակաւոր, muffle-furnace or furnace-mill.

Title: Հալումն
Definition_1: melting, liquefaction, fusion; dissolution; consumption, decay; — ջրեղէն, հրեղէն, aqueous, igneous fusion; — կերակրոց, digestion; — սառնամանեաց, thaw.

Title: Հակաճառեմ
Definition_1: to contradict, to dispute, to debate.

Title: Հակաճառութիւն
Definition_1: contradiction, controversy, dispute, discussion; dialectics; ոգի հակաճառութեան, spirit of contradiction.

Title: Հակամէտ
Definition_1: leaning, inclined; prone, bent, disposed; — ի չարն, prone to evil, inclined to mischief.

Title: Հակամիտիմ
Definition_1: to lean, to incline, to be prone to, to feel inclined or disposed for, to lean to the side of, to have an inclination to.

Title: Հակամիտութիւն
Definition_1: decline, inclination, proneness, tendency, propensity, disposition; idiopathy.

Title: Հակամտեմ
Definition_1: to emulate; to rival, to vie with, to antagonize.

Title: Հակառակ
Definition_1: contrary, opposite; adversary, hostile, unfavourable, inimical; discordant; incompatible;
Definition_2: against, contrary to; opposite, facing, in front of;
Definition_3: զնորին —ն, նմին or նորին —, ի —էն, ընդ —ն, on the contrary, on the wrong side; against the grain, in a contrary sense, backwards; ամենեւին իսկ —, directly or diametrically opposite, quite the reverse; — ուղիղ մտաց, in spite of sense and reason; — կամաց նորա, against his will or grain, in spite of him; forcibly; — կալ, to stand, remain, stay or stop in the face of, in front;
Definition_4: to oppose, to withstand, to resist, to make head against, to cope with; — լինել, to be contrary, to oppose; ընդ —ս լինել միմեանց, to be at variance; —, ի —ն or ընդ —ս ելանել, մտանել, ընթանալ, լինել, to oppose, to form an opposition to, to rise up or against, to go against, to run counter, to withstand, to counteract, to thwart, to cross; ընդ —ս ելանել, cf. Հակամտեմ.

Title: Հակառակաբար
Definition_1: in a contrary manner, in opposition.

Title: Հակառակաթոռ
Definition_1: occupying a station, an office to the prejudice of another; — պատրիարք, pseudopatriarch.

Title: Հակառակասէր
Definition_1: quarrelsome, mischief-making, meddlesome, seditious, mutinous, litigious; — միտք, spirit of contradiction, of contrariety.

Title: Հակառակեմ
Definition_1: to oppose, to resist, to thwart, to object, to be repugnant to, to revolt, to cross, to withstand, to impugn; to clash, to rencounter; to contest, to dispute, to debate; to cavil; to quarrel; to disagree; — ընդ ումեք, to rival, to vie with; առանց —կելոյ, without resistance.

Title: Հակառակութիւն
Definition_1: contrariety, opposition, resistance, hostility, adversity; contestation, dispute, quarrel, contest; combat, conflict; — յուղել զիմեքէ, to strive for; — կրել, to experience adversities; եղեւ — մէջ նոցա, a dispute arose between them; —ի ներքս անկեալ, in consequence of disagreement; — ձիոց, horse-racing.

Title: Հակարջային
Definition_1: antarctic, southern; — բեւեռ, the south pole; — շրջանակ, antarctic circle.

Title: Հակեմ
Definition_1: to incline, to lean, to bend, to bow.

Title: Հակիմ
Definition_1: to lean, to incline, to stoop, to bend or hang down; to give way, to yield;
Definition_2: to feel inclined or disposed for, to have an inclination to.

Title: Հակումն
Definition_3: inclination; — ծրի խաւարման, obliquity of the ecliptic.

Title: Հաղբք
Definition_2: snare, toils; արկանել ի —բս, to draw into snare, to entrap, to inveigle; անկանել ի —բս, to fall into a snare.

Title: Հաղորդ
Definition_2: Holy Communion; —ս առնել, to share, to give a share, to acquaint with, to impart, to communicate, cf. Հաղորդեցուցանեմ; — լինել, to participate in, to share in, to partake of, to have a share or hand in; — չարեաց, accomplice; — տալ, to administer the Holy Sacrament to; — առնուլ, to communicate, to receive the Holy Sacrament.

Title: Հաղորդակցիմ
Definition_1: to be in communication with, in correspondence with, to participate in, to share with, to impart to, to partake of.

Title: Հաղորդեմ
Definition_1: to communicate, to transmit, to hand down, to impart, to acquaint with, to inform; to communicate, to administer the Sacrament of the Lord's Supper; cf. Հաղորդիմ; — զախտ, to infect with disease.

Title: Հաղորդիմ
Definition_1: to communicate, to be communicated, to participate, to share, to be in communication with; to conjoin, to have carnal connection with; to be communicative; to lead on, to be conducive; cf. Հաղորդ առնում.

Title: Հաղորդիչ
Definition_1: conductor, good conductor; — թել, conducting wire.

Title: Հաղորդութիւն
Definition_1: communication, participation, connection; relations; intercourse; correspondence; communion; carnal communion; սուրբ —, the Eucharist, the Lord's Supper; զատկական —, pascal communion; աղօթք յետ հաղորդութեան, post-communion.

Title: Հաճ
Definition_2: satisfaction, contentedness; — առնել, to content, to satisfy; — լինել, to be content, satisfied, pleased.

Title: Հաճեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to content, to please, to satisfy, to humour, to gratify; — զմիտս ուրուք, to condescend, to please, to humour; — զախտս, to gratify the passions; — զպարտս, to pay a debt; ի — զնա, to oblige him, to satisfy him.

Title: Հաճիմ
Definition_1: to be contented, satisfied, pleased, gratified; to agree, to acquiesce, to consent, to approve; to be reconciled, to become friends again; to deign; to taste; չ— ընդ, to disapprove, to dislike; հաճեալ է նա ընդ քեզ, you please him; հաճեսցի տէր իմ արքայ, may it please your Majesty.

Title: Հաճոյ
Definition_1:
agreeable, pleasant, pleasing, complaisant, grateful, acceptable; — լինել, to please, to humour, to agree, to have pleasure; զի՞նչ — է ձեզ, what do you think of it ?
որպէս — թուեսցի քեզ, as you please or choose, as you like; —աչաց հայելոյ, comely to the eye; — եղեւ նա աչաց իմոց, he or she pleased me; —թուեցաւ նմա, it pleased him, he thought fit or proper, he approved of it; —եւս էր նմա, he preferred; արա նմա զինչ — է առաջի աչաց քոց, do with him as you will.

Title: Հաճոյք
Definition_1: will, pleasure, good will, willingness; caprice, humour, fancy, whim;
Definition_2: ըստ —յս, at one's will or pleasure, according to, at sight, at discretion; negligently, carelessly; ըստ —յից նորա, according to his caprice; գործել ըստ —յս, to do according to one's liking, fancy or humour, to follow one's own bent, to listen to nobody; անձնատուր լինել ի —յս ուրուք, to abandon oneself entirely to another's caprice or discretion; այր իւրաքանչիւր զ—յս առաջի աչաց իւրոց առնէր, every man did that which was right in his own eyes.

Title: Հաճոյանամ
Definition_1: to please, to humour; to like, to be pleased with, to consent.

Title: Հաճութիւն
Definition_1: agreement, satisfaction; accord, approbation, consent, complaisance, acquiescence, compliance; desire, wish, pleasure, will; —ք, grace, sweetness, loveliness, amiableness; առանց քոյին հաճութեան, without your consent, in spite of you; արա ընդ իս ըստ հաճութեան կամաց քոց, do with me according to your pleasure.

Title: Համ
Definition_1: savour, taste; check, moderation; — դնել, to moderate, to check.

Title: Համաբանեմ
Definition_1: to agree, to be of one mind.

Title: Համաբանութիւն
Definition_1: concord, agreement, good understanding, unanimity, intelligence.

Title: Համաբարոյ
Definition_1: of similar disposition, character or customs.

Title: Համագոյակից
Definition_1: consubstantial; —գոյք, creation, all creatures, the universe, nature.

Title: Համագումար
Definition_3: sum.

Title: Համագունդ
Definition_1: cf. Համագումար; flocked together, gathered in crowds or in a mob;
Definition_2: in a united company, with all the company, in crowds; — թռչիլ, to fly in flocks or swarms.

Title: Համադամ
Definition_1: agreeable to the taste, delicate, delicious, dainty, exquisite, savoury, succulent; —ք, dainties, delicacies, tit-bits.

Title: Համադաս
Definition_1: of the same class, order or rank.

Title: Համադասեմ
Definition_1: to range, to rank, to draw up, to place in order, to put together.

Title: Համադասիմ
Definition_1: to be classified together, placed in the same order.

Title: Համադասութիւն
Definition_1: being of the same rank, equality in rank.

Title: Համազարմ
Definition_1: of the same race, family or generation.

Title: Համազգի
Definition_1: of the same nation, family, kind or sort; national; related; homogeneous.

Title: Համազն
Definition_1: of the same nation or race.

Title: Համազօր
Definition_1: equal in power; equivalent, equipollent, adequate; — լինել, to be equivalent.

Title: Համաթիւ
Definition_1: of the same number or quantity, equal.

Title: Համալուր
Definition_1: that can be heard, or heard every where.

Title: Համախմբեմ
Definition_1: to gather or put together, to muster, to collect, to convoke.

Title: Համախորհուրդ
Definition_1: of the same opinion or mind, unanimous, agreeing, concordant;
Definition_2: adherent, partisan; — լինել, to agree with, to be of the same mind.

Title: Համախոհութիւն
Definition_1: intelligence, concord, good understanding, harmony; league, alliance, compact.

Title: Համակամ
Definition_1: of the same will, concordant; obedient to the will of, resigned.

Title: Համակամիմ
Definition_1: to agree, to be of one mind, to consent with; to be resigned, to submit oneself.

Title: Համակամութիւն
Definition_1: concord, unanimity, agreement, union, consent; համակամութիւն ընդ կամացն աստուծոյ, obedience to God's will, resignation, trust in God.

Title: Համակարգ
Definition_1: put in the same order or number.

Title: Համակարգեմ
Definition_1: to coordinate, to put in the same order.

Title: Համակարիք
Definition_1: subject to the same passions; compassionate, feeling, sensible.

Title: Համակդեն
Definition_1: well versed in the Persian religion; coreligionary.

Title: Համակեմ
Definition_1: to affect, to fill with, to immerse; cf. Թուխ.

Title: Համակերպ
Definition_1: of the same form or manner; conformable; resigned.

Title: Համակերպիմ
Definition_1: to comply with, to conform or submit to, to be resigned.

Title: Համակերտ
Definition_1: similar, like; —ք, all beings, all creatures.

Title: Համակիմ
Definition_1: to be affected, filled or covered with, immersed, sunk in; to array, clothe or invest oneself with, to bury oneself in; յոսկի — եւ ի քարինս պատուականս, to be completely covered with gold and precious stones; ի թախծութիւն, ի խոր տրտմութիւն —, to give oneself up to melancholy, to be filled with sadness; — ի սուգ, to dress in mourning; cf. Թուխ; պաճարք —կեալք ի գիրութեան, fatted cattle.

Title: Համակործան
Definition_1: utterly destroying, exterminating; — քանդումն, utter ruin, extermination; — կորուստ, total loss; — պատուհաս, exterminator.

Title: Համակրութիւն
Definition_1: sympathy; ունել —, to sympathize with, to feel a sympathy for; չունել զ—, to have no sympathy for or with.

Title: Համահաղոյն
Definition_1: together, at the same time, at once.

Title: Համահայր
Definition_1: born of the same father, consanguineous; — եղբայր քոյր, half-brother, half-sister, by the father's side.

Title: Համաձայն
Definition_3: unanimously.

Title: Համաձայնեմ
Definition_1: to accord, to bring to agree; to conciliate, to reconcile;

Title: Համաձայնիմ
Definition_1: to agree, to concord with, to be agreed; to grant, to come to terms, to comply with;

Title: Համաձայնութիւն
Definition_3: unison, tune;
Definition_4: concordance.

Title: Համաձեւ
Definition_1: of the same form or shape, conform; — առնել զկամս, to be of one mind.

Title: Համաճարակ
Definition_1: entirely consumed; all-consuming, all-devouring, epidemic, epizootic, contagious.

Title: Համամայր
Definition_1: born of the same mother; — եղբայր, uterine, by the mother's side.

Title: Համամիտ
Definition_1: of the same mind or opinion, unanimous; — լինել ումեք, to perfectly agree with, to enter into the views of; — են ցանգ, they always agree in opinion.

Title: Համամտութիւն
Definition_1: unanimity, concord, consent, conformity of opinion.

Title: Համայարկ
Definition_1: cohabitant; dwelling under the same roof.

Title: Համայն
Definition_2:
all, entirely; together, all together, together with; even, yet, still; —, —իւ, totally, completely, wholly, thoroughly; — եւ այնպէս, even though, even if, however, nevertheless; — եւ այնպէս ոչ յագեցա՞ր, what, and you are not yet satiated?
— ասել, ասացեալ, in short, in a word.

Title: Համանգամայն
Definition_2: all, all together, generally; even, yet, still.

Title: Համանման
Definition_1: equal, alike, similar; conformable, analogous; imitating, following;

Title: Համանշանակ
Definition_1: having the same meaning or signification, synonymous.

Title: Համաշխարհ
Definition_1: the whole country, the public; countryman.

Title: Համաշխարհագործ
Definition_1: done by every body, general, universal.

Title: Համաշունչ
Definition_1: of the same opinion, agreeing, unanimous.

Title: Համաչափ
Definition_1: of the same measure, equal, proportioned, symmetrical; commensurable.

Title: Համապայծառ
Definition_1: quite clear, bright, shining, luminous, resplendent.

Title: Համապաշտօն
Definition_1: having the same office or function, colleague.

Title: Համապատիւ
Definition_1: equally glorified, equally adorable; equal in rank or honour, having the same dignity.

Title: Համաջինջ
Definition_1: destroying, exterminating all; — կործանումն, entire destruction, extermination; — առնել, to exterminate, to root out, to utterly destroy; — լինել, to be totally exterminated.

Title: Համառօտ
Definition_1: brief, short, abridged, concise, succinct, summary; peremptory;
Definition_3: compendium, abridgement; final or irrevocable sentence; — հատանել, to cut short; — ասել, ասացից, եւ — իսկ ասացեալ, in short, in a word.

Title: Համառօտագիծ
Definition_1: briefly traced, succinct; — բովանդակութիւն, an abridgement; — պատկեր, sketch, short notice, cursory view.

Title: Համառօտագիր
Definition_1: written briefly, in a few words.

Title: Համառօտեմ
Definition_1: to abridge, to diminish, to shorten; to digest, to resume, to recapitulate; to reduce, to contract, to extract; ուղիղ —, to understand thoroughly and cause to be perfectly well understood; — զօրէնս, to transgress, to break a law; — քորեպիսկոպոսին զեկեղեցիս, to make a visitation of the diocese.

Title: Համառօտութիւն
Definition_1: brevity, concision, shortness; abbreviation; compendium, abridgement, summary, abstract, epitome.

Title: Համասեր
Definition_1: of the same race or stock.

Title: Համասփիւռ
Definition_1: spread, diffused, propagated throughout; — ծաւալիլ, to be -.

Title: Համավկայ
Definition_1: of a common attestation or avowal.

Title: Համատարած
Definition_1: spread throughout, very extended, universal, general; — ծով, the Ocean; — օդ, atmosphere.

Title: Համատարր
Definition_1: composed of the same element or matter.

Title: Համատեսակ
Definition_1: of the same kind or sort, equal, conformable.

Title: Համար
Definition_1: account, calculation, computation, enumeration, numeration; number; catalogue, list; roll-call, muster; examination, inventory, statement, account; esteem, respect, value, regard, station, degree; presentation or rendering of accounts; comparison; lesson; verse;
Definition_2: ի —, ի —ի, —, for, on account of; ընդ մի —, same, same thing; — առնուլ, պահանջել, to ask for an account of, to require one to account for; — առնել, to find out an explication of, to examine; to take or draw up an inventory of; to take stock; — տալ, to render an account; to give a reason; to be responsible, to account for; — առնուլ ի մէջ ծառայից իւրոց, to make an account with his servants; ի — ածել, արկանել, դնել, to count, to calculate, to compare; մտանել ի —, to be reckoned, numbered, esteemed among; ի —ի լինել, to be counted as, to pass for, to be reputed, esteemed; ընդ մարդկան կալ ի — ի, to be taken for a man; — դնել ընդ ումեք, to dispute; հանել թիւ —ոյ, to draw or cast lots; տուր զհամար տնտեսութեան քո, give an account of thy stewardship; ոչ եղեւ ի —ի բան իմ, no attention was paid to my words; չէ ինչ ի — ի, it is unimportant; no matter; թուով — ով էր ամենայն, all was counted; —ովք թուոց կատարեալ, a clever arithmetician; — առնուլ, to take lessons; գիտել, ուսանել, ասել զ—ն, to know, to learn, to say or repeat one's lesson; cf. Թիւ.

Title: Համարակար
Definition_1: reckoner, calculator, book-keeper, accountant, auditor of accounts; տուն, տեղի —ի, counting-house; accountant's office, ciphering.

Title: Համարատուութիւն
Definition_1: control, giving in or rendering of accounts.

Title: Համարեմ
Definition_1: to count, to number, to calculate; to esteem, to reckon, to consider.

Title: Համարիմ
Definition_1: to sum, to number, to count; to calculate, to compute; to esteem, to repute, to judge; to presume, to suppose, to reckon; to attribute; to pass for, to be reputed or deemed; լաւ —, to prefer; պատուական —, to appreciate; մեծ ինչ —, to value, to esteem, to repute, to rely on; առ ոչ ինչ —, not to keep any account of, not to care about, to have little esteem for, to despise; — զանձն, to look upon oneself as, to believe, deem or account oneself, to think that one is; ընդ մի — զիմն ընդ ումեմն, to mistake; երանելի զանձն —, to think oneself happy; —իմք եթէ, —րեսցուք այնպէս թէ, let us suppose that; մի —իք թէ, do not believe that.

Title: Համարեալ
Definition_1: reputed, deemed, looked upon as; ընդ մեռեալս —, thought to be dead; չ-ն յազգս, not numbered among the nations. without genealogy; ոչ էր — արծաթ թէ իցի ինչ, silver was made no account of.

Title: Համարիւն
Definition_1: of the same blood, consanguineous, related.

Title: Համարձակ
Definition_1: frank, free, bold; plain, sincere, without ceremony; determined, resolute; wide, extended;

Title: Համարձակաբար
Definition_1: frankly, freely, boldly, plainly; resolutely, firmly; clearly, openly, ingenuously; կարի իմն —, too free, bold, rash, audacious, too daring.

Title: Համարձակաբարբառ
Definition_2: frankly, openly, freely, ingenuously, without reserve.

Title: Համարձակախօս
Definition_2: — լինել, to speak freely, frankly, openly, to be plain with, to be accustomed to speak one's mind.

Title: Համարձակախօսութիւն
Definition_1: frankness of speech, openness, unreservedness, free-heartedness.

Title: Համարձակաձայն
Definition_1: speaking frankly, freely; — բարբառով, aloud, openly, publicly.

Title: Համարձակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to embolden, to make bold or courageous, to reassure; to permit, to allow; to render impertinent.

Title: Համարձակերես
Definition_1: with an open countenance, frank, free, bold.

Title: Համարձակիմ
Definition_1: to grow bold, to have the boldness to, to take the liberty of, to allow oneself, to have the courage, to be daring, to dare, to venture; կարի իմն —, to presume, to take liberties.

Title: Համարձակութիւն
Definition_1: frankness, hardihood, licence, courage, liberty; boldness, forwardness; կարի իմն —, audacity, temerity, venturesomeness; — առնուլ, to take the liberty to, to permit or allow oneself to; կարի իմն — տալ, to render impertinent, impudent; պարտ է համարձակութեամբ ասել, it must be acknowledged; համարձակութեամբ, cf. Համարձակ.

Title: Համարմատ
Definition_1: produced from the same root; innate, inborn.

Title: Համարուեստ
Definition_1: having the same trade or calling;

Title: Համարումն
Definition_1: value, esteem, reputation, respectability; cf. Յարգ.

Title: Համացեղ
Definition_1: of the same race or family; homogeneous.

Title: Համբակ
Definition_1: little child, boy; lad; apprentice, novice, beginner; scholar, disciple;
Definition_2: new, raw, inexperienced; ignorant; — կրպակաց, shop-boy; — կապեղացի, pot-boy; — նաւաստւոյ, cabin-boy.

Title: Համբառնամ
Definition_1: to elevate, to raise, to lift up, to take up; — զձեռն, to stretch forth or raise the hands; to raise the hand against; to rebel.

Title: Համբառնամ
Definition_1: to rise up, to ascend, to mount, to go up; to raise oneself, to rise, to get up; — մտօք առ աստուած, to raise the heart to God; հակառակ, ընդդէմ —, to revolt, to rise, to rise against, to rebel; ի մտաց —, to grow proud; դատախազ —, to accuse of, to charge with, to arraign, to impeach.

Title: Համբար
Definition_1: warehouse, storehouse, granary, loft; larder, pantry; provisions, furnishing, supplying, victualing; — զօրաց, magazine; stores, ammunition; — անասնոց, fodder, provender; forage.

Title: Համբարակ
Definition_1: store, deposit; warehouse; purveyor; երկինք նմացօղոյ, the heavens shall drop down dew.

Title: Համբարակապետ
Definition_1: intendant, steward, furnisher, purveyor, provider, contractor.

Title: Համբարանոց
Definition_1: larder or pantry; granary; magazine, mart; emporium.

Title: Համբարեմ
Definition_1: to warehouse; to provide, to furnish food, to victual, to revictual, to lay in a stock of, to store; to lay by, to hold in reserve, to amass, to gather, to treasure up.

Title: Համբարի
Definition_1: mermaid, siren; fairy, elf, fay; faun, sylvan god.

Title: Համբարձումն
Definition_1: lifting up, elevation, ascension, rising, ascent; Ascension-day.

Title: Համբաւ
Definition_1: credit, honour, repute; renown, fame, reputation, name, glory, celebrity; news, intelligence, rumour, report, tidings; արագաթեւ —, flying report, swift, speedy renown; — բարեաց, good repute; յեղակարծ, սուտ, չար —, strange, false, ill news; — մեծ ստանալ, to win a great reputation; վնասել անձին —ոյ, to damage one's reputation; աղարտել զ— իւր, to tarnish one's renown; կորուսանել զ—ն, to get an ill name; չունել զ—, to be unknown, of no reputation or renown; աղարտել զ— ուրուք, to blacken or ruin the reputation of; —ի հարկանիլ, to become public, to divulge; to become famous, renowned, celebrated, far-famed, to be in vogue, request or fashion; ձախողակի — հանել or ընթացուցանել զումեքէ, to spread abroad an evil report about one; — հանել, տարածել, to raise, sow or spread the news; — ընթանայ, it is said that; the story runs; ելանէր, հնչէր, տարածէր, ի դուրս յաճախէր —, the report spread; — քաջութեանն ընդ ամենայն կողմանս ընթանայր, the fame of his courage spread every where; եւ ել — զնմանէ ընդ ամենայն կողմանս գաւառին, and there went out the fame of him through all the region round about; —ի հարեալ է խաղս, this play is very popular; cf. Շռինդ.

Title: Համբաւաւոր
Definition_1: having a name worthy of envy, famous, renowned, far-famed.

Title: Համբաւեմ
Definition_1: to celebrate, to sing the praises of, to praise; to make public, to divulge, to let out, to noise or rumour abroad, to publish, to make known every where.

Title: Համբաւիմ
Definition_1: to be renowned, to become celebrated; to be divulged, spread or noised abroad.

Title: Համբերեմ
Definition_1: to have patience, to be patient, to endure, to suffer, to support, to bear, to undergo, to sustain; to persevere, to remain firm and constant, to persist; to wait; — յամուսնութէնէ, to live single; to live continently, chastely; որ համբերեսցէ ի սպառ՝ նա կեցցէ, he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.

Title: Համբերութիւն
Definition_1: patience, suffering; hope, expectation, confidence; time, delay; տանել համբերութեամբ, to be patient, to bear with patience; կորուսանել զ—, to lose one's patience, to grow impatient; տալ կորուսանել զ—, to put quite out of patience; cf. Թոյլ.

Title: Համբոյր
Definition_2: sweetness, affability, familiarity; union, joint, joining together;
Definition_3: spondee;
Definition_4: sweet-tempered, affable, benign, gentle, mild, meek; propitious, favourable; agreeing, unanimous; — ձեռաց, hand-kissing; յուդայի, մատնչի, a traitor's kiss; — տալ ումեք, to embrace, to kiss; to buss; տալ միմեանց — խաղաղութեան, to give the kiss of peace; ի — ածել, to familiarize, to tame, to domesticate; հաշտ եւ — առնել, — յարդարել, to appease, to calm, to pacify, to reconcile; գալ ի —, to get or grow tame, familiar, to be tamed; — եւ կամակ բարս ստանալ, to be good-tempered, gentle, amiable.

Title: Համբուն
Definition_1: totally, entirely; no, not, not at all.

Title: Համբուրասէր
Definition_3: fond of peace, pacific.

Title: Համբուրեմ
Definition_1: to kiss, to embrace; *to buss; — զմիմեանս, to kiss or embrace each other; — ակամայ, to kiss unwillingly; ստէպ —, to be always kissing; — ձեռս, զաջ ուրուք, to kiss the hands; համբուրեաց ընդ նմա, he kissed him.

Title: Համեղաճաշակ
Definition_1: well flavoured, pleasant to the taste, savoury.

Title: Համեղանամ
Definition_1: to become well flavoured, sweet, appetizing; to be agreeable to.

Title: Համեղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render savoury, to sweeten, to season.

Title: Համեմանք
Definition_1: aromatics, spice; sauce, seasoning, stew, ragout, high seasoned sauce; dressing of meat, condiment.

Title: Համեմատ
Definition_1: proportionate, equal, conformable, corresponding, analogous, regular, symmetrical, adequate; — գործել, to proportion; դնել —, to compare; եթէ իցեն ի քեզ առաքինութիունք —ք վեհ ճակատագրիդ, if your virtues correspond with your high destiny;

Title: Համեմատեմ
Definition_1: to compare, to confront, to confer; to put in comparison with, to equal, to parallel; to be in symmetry; — զգիրս, to collate.

Title: Համեմատութիւն
Definition_1: comparison, confront; proportion; analogy, relation, conformity, correspondence, harmony, eurythmy, symmetry;
Definition_2: ratio, proportion; — գրոց, collation; բառնալ զ—ն, to disproportion;
Definition_3: համեմատութեամբ, proportionably, in proportion, proportionally, symmetrically; comparatively, in or by comparison, relatively, in reference.

Title: Համեմեմ
Definition_1: to season, to flavour; to scent, to aromatize, to spice, to powder; — աղիւ, to sprinkle with salt, to salt.

Title: Համեստանամ
Definition_1: to become modest or wise, to put on a modest look.

Title: Համեստութիւն
Definition_1: modesty, moderation, reserve, temperance, probity; politeness.

Title: Համետ
Definition_1: saddle; harness; կողմնակի —, side-saddle; pillion; կոճղ —ի, saddle-tree; հանել ի բաց զ—ն, to unsaddle; cf. Թամբ.

Title: Համետեմ
Definition_1: to saddle, to harness; հոյակապ —եալ, in superb trappings.

Title: Համերասանակ ընթանամ
Definition_2: to compete; to concur, to coincide.

Title: Համոզակեր
Definition_1: persuading; persuasive; — լինել, to persuade, to convince; cf. Թափիչ.

Title: Համոզեմ
Definition_1: to persuade, to induce, to gain or bring over; to impel, to urge; to calm, to appease, to reconcile.

Title: Համր
Definition_1: dumb; speechless, mute, tongue-tied; — ի ծնէ, born dumb, dumb from one's birth; — բնութիւնք, babies; — լինել, or համրանամ, համրիմ, cf. Համրանամ, cf. Համրիմ.

Title: Համրիմ
Definition_1: to become or to remain dumb, to be speechless, to lose the use of speech; — ի զարմանաց, to be struck dumb with surprise, to be tongue-tied.

Title: Համրութիւն
Definition_1: state of a dumb person, dumbness.

Title: Համօրէն
Definition_2: all, entirely, totally, wholly; ընդ — աշխարհ, throughout the world; — կալ ի վերայ, understand perfectly, to know to the bottom, to penetrate deeply, to pierce to the inmost parts.

Title: Հայ
Definition_1: Armenian; —ք, Armenia; —ք or —եր, the -s, the — nation; — լեզու, բարբառ, the Armenian language; թարգմանել ի —, յեղուկ ի — բան, to translate into —, into the — language.

Title: Հայադաւան
Definition_1: armenizing, having religion, persuasion, the policy, the customs of the Armenians.

Title: Հայախնամ
Definition_1: having the care of the Armenians; nurtured by the Armenians.

Title: Հայամեծար
Definition_1: honouring the Armenians; honoured by the Armenians.

Title: Հայանախատ
Definition_1: maltreating the Armenians; unworthy of an Armenian.

Title: Հայանշան
Definition_1: bearing the emblem of Armenia; — դրօշ, cf. Հայադրօշ.

Title: Հայավայել
Definition_1: worthy of an Armenian, of Armenians.

Title: Հայելի
Definition_3: visible, observable; — կիզիչ, burning glass.

Title: Հայերէն
Definition_2: in Armenian; — գիր, Armenian writing; — տառիւք, in Armenian letters or characters; — լեզու, դպրութիւն, the Armenian language, literature; ուսնանել զ—, to learn, to study -; — թարգմանել, to translate into -; — գիտ՞էք, խօսի՞ք, do you know Armenian ? do you speak Armenian ?.

Title: Հայեցիկ
Definition_1: serving to see or to look.

Title: Հայեցուած
Definition_1: glance, look, peep; sight, view; aspect, appearance, presence; spectacle, prospect; անյողդողդ —, firm, steady, look; ի խոնարհ ունել զ—ս, to cast down the eyes; ակն տալ or դնել —ովք աչաց, to cast an amorous eye upon, to ogle; to dote upon.

Title: Հայեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to see, to view; to incline, to dispose to wards; to apply; յինքն — զոք, to attract, to draw another's eye on oneself.

Title: Հայթայթամտեմ
Definition_1: to set one's wits to work, to tax one's ingenuity, to contrive.

Title: Հայթհայթանք
Definition_1: invention, expedients, means, shift, device, way; provisions, food, victuals; relief, solace; pretext, subterfuge, pretence; — կենաց, subsistence, means, necessities of life; cf. Հնարք.

Title: Հայթայթեմ
Definition_1: to invent, to find the means or a way to do any thing, to contrive, to devise; to provide, to provision, to procure; to solace, to assuage; to pretend.

Title: Հայիմ
Definition_1: to look, to give a look, to cast the eyes on, to see; to look upon, to gaze on, to consider attentively, to look in the face, to observe, to contemplate, to speculate, to weigh well; to take care; to concern, to regard; to have in view, to aspire to, to aim at; to face, to front, to look on, to overlook; գեղեցիկ հայելով, handsome, elegant, beautiful, charming; — ի վեր, to look up; — ընդ պատուհանն, to peep or look in at the window or through the window; — գաղտագողի, to look stealthily at; պշուցեալ — յոք անյագ, to gaze with greedy or devouring eyes at, to stare at; — յայրատս or յայրատութեամբ, to look at impudently, lustfully, lewdly; — յոք սիրով, գորովալից աչօք, to look at lovingly or tenderly, to look sweet upon, to cast sheep's eyes on, to ogle; — խանդաղատանօք, to gaze on dotingly, with fondness, with glistening eyes; ընդ ակամբ — յոք, to look scornfully at or with contempt; — մտօք, to contemplate, to muse on; ոչինչ հայեցեալ ի, in spite of, despite; մինչդեռ նա այսր անդր հայէր, as he looked about or around.

Title: Հայկաբան
Definition_1: armenist, who speaks and writes pure Armenian; armenism, pure Armenian.

Title: Հայկազարմ
Definition_1: of the race of Haig, Armenian.

Title: Հայկազունք
Definition_1: the descendants of Haig, Armenian nation, the Armenians.

Title: Հայկասիրտ
Definition_1: Haig-hearted, courageous, dauntless, intrepid, valiant, bold, manly.

Title: Հայկարան
Definition_1: the centre of Armenia; Armenian anthology.

Title: Հայհոյեմ
Definition_1: to curse and swear, to blaspheme; to talk scandal; to revile, to abuse, to slander, to traduce, to defame, to speak ill of.

Title: Հայհոյութիւն
Definition_1: blasphemy, swearing; abuse, slander, scandal, backbiting, defamation.

Title: Հայր
Definition_1: father; papa, pa; dad; father, chief; founder; author, inventor; — մեր, the Lord's prayer; — երկնաւոր, գթութեան, heavenly Father, God of mercy; հարք եկեղեցւոյ, the fathers of the church; հարք միանձունք, old anchorites; հարք մեր, our fathers, forefathers, ancestors; — աշխարհի, Adam; յարգոյ —, Reverend Father; բարեյիշատակ —ն իսահակ, Father Isaac of blessed memory; — սուրբ, holy father; — խոստովանութեան, confessor; հոգեւոր —, spiritual father; — հայրենեաց, ժողովրդեան, աղքատաց, father of his country, of the people, of the poor; քերթողաց —, father of Armenian literature, Moses of Khoren; — պատմագրաց, father of history, Herodotus; — եւ մայր, father and mother, parents; որդի ի հօրէ, from father to son; — իբրեւ զ—, like a fatherly, paternal; ազնիւ, բարեգութ —, good, tender father; — սիրտ, գութ, սէր հօր, the heart, tenderness, love of a father, paternal, fatherly affection; սիրել, պատուել զ—, զօրավիգն լինել հօրին, to love, honour and succour one's father; յաւելուլ առ հարս, to go the way of all flesh, to go to kingdom come, to die; ննջեաց ընդ հարս իւր, he slept with his fathers; — որդւովք բերկրեալ, a father happy in his children; — մարդպետ, kislar-agasi, master of eunuchs.

Title: Հայրաբարոյ
Definition_1: like or resembling his father, following in the steps of his father; like a father.

Title: Հայրանամ
Definition_1: to be or become a father.

Title: Հայրապետարան
Definition_1: seat, residence of a patriarch, etc.

Title: Հայրատունկ
Definition_1: planted and cultivated by the Father.

Title: Հայրենասէր
Definition_2: patriot; ճշմարիտ, անձնանուէր —, a genuine, devoted patriot.

Title: Հայրենավրէժ
Definition_1: avenger of one's father or country.

Title: Հայրենատուր
Definition_1: left by a father, transmitted from the ancients; paternal, ancestral.

Title: Հայրենաւանդ
Definition_1: transmitted or inherited from one's father or forefathers, hereditary.

Title: Հայրենի
Definition_1: paternal; native, natal; — ժառանգութիւն, patrimony; — գաւառ, աշխարհ, երկիր, cf. Հայրենիք.

Title: Հայրենիք
Definition_1: native country, native-land, country, birth place, home; parentage; patrimony, paternal property, fortune; հող —նեաց, fatherland; սէր, յիշատակ —նեաց, patriotism; remembrance of one's native land; անձուկ, կարօտ —նեաց, longing for home; home-sickness, nostalgia; վտարել զոք ի —նեաց, to expatriate; ելանել ի —նեաց, to go abroad, to leave one's native land; թողուլ զ —նիս, to quit one's country; երթալ, դարձ առնել ի —նիս, to return to one's country; մտանել ի —նիս, to return home, to regain one's native land; արժանի լինել —նեաց, to deserve well of one's country; ծառայել —նեաց, to serve one's country; նուիրել զանձն —նեաց, զանձն դնել ի վերայ —նեաց, to devote oneself to the service of one's country, to consecrate oneself to one's country's welfare.

Title: Հայրիկ
Definition_1: dear father, papa; ընդէ՞ր ոչ ուտես —, dear papa, why don't you eat?.

Title: Հայց
Definition_1: demand, request; ընդ — անկանիլ, — եւ խնդիր լինել, to ask, to demand, to request, to be in search of, to look for.

Title: Հայցելի
Definition_1: the article required, thing asked for; առնել զ—ն, to hear, to hearken to the prayer of; ընդունել զ—ն, to obtain by dint of entreaty.

Title: Հայցեմ
Definition_1: to request, to ask; to entreat, to beg earnestly, to beseech, to implore, to solicit, to pray; to seek, to search; — օգնութիւն, to implore aid or succour; շնորհ —, to entreat a favour.

Title: Հայցուած
Definition_1: request, solicitation, entreaty, humble demand, prayer.

Title: Հանածոյ
Definition_1: mineral; ore, mineral; — բիւրեղական, երիկամնաձեւ, հատաձեւ, հողային, ձուաքարային, crystallized, kidney-shaped, globular or granular, earthy or earth-coloured, oolithic or lenticular ore.

Title: Հանանիմ
Definition_1: to be driven or cast away.

Title: Հանապազ
Definition_1: always, at all times, continually, constantly, ever; assiduously.

Title: Հանապազաջան
Definition_1: always endeavouring, always careful, industrious, active, assiduous.

Title: Հանապազորդեմ
Definition_1: to continue, to persevere, to last, to endure; to frequent; ոչ —, to discontinue, to interrupt, to cease; — յաղօթս, to continue instant in prayer.

Title: Հանգամանք
Definition_1: condition, quality, state; kind, species, nature; details, circumstances, particulars; attribute, disposition, situation; way, manner; model; proof; — ժամանակին, actual state of things; ստիպողական —, emergency;
Definition_2: յամենայն —նս, in any way, at all events.

Title: Հանգանակ
Definition_1: assessment, rating; club, clubbing, contribution, share, portion; — հաւատոյ, symbol, creed; —աւ, in clubbing together; —աւ կոչունս առնել, to club for a dinner.

Title: Հանգանակակից
Definition_1: partner in the reckoning, contributor, boon companion.

Title: Հանգանակեմ
Definition_1: to rate, to club, to contribute, to club together, to subscribe; to contribute, to have a share in, to be accessory to.

Title: Հանգիստ
Definition_1: repose; refreshment, relaxation, recreation; ease, tranquillity; convenience, wellbeing, leisure; pause, rest, intermission, truce, cessation; station, abode;
Definition_3: quiet, tranquil, peaceful;
Definition_4: —գստեամբ, conveniently, comfortably; at one's ease or leisure, leisurely; —գստեան ժամ, compline; —գստեան շարական եւ աւետարան, hymns and gospel in burial service; —գստեան պաշտօն, requiem; — առնուլ, to take rest, to be at rest, to repose; — տալ, to rest, to repose; թողուլ ի —գստեան, to leave or let alone; — առնել բանի, to end a discourse.

Title: Հանգիտանամ
Definition_1: to be equal, like, to resemble.

Title: Հանգիտապատիւ
Definition_1: having the same honour, equally honoured or honourable.

Title: Հանգիտարագ
Definition_1: of the same speed; equally swift.

Title: Հանգոյն
Definition_1: as, like, after the manner of; almost, nearly;

Title: Հանգոյց
Definition_1: knot; tie, bond; station, post, stage, resting-place; cf. Կայարան; գորդեան —, the Gordian knot;
Definition_3: knotty point, rub, difficulty, intricacy, tangle;
Definition_4: note;
Definition_5: վերելից or վերամբարձ, վայրաբեր, ascending, descending node; գիծ —գուցից, nodal line; — առնուլ, to make or tie a knot, to knot; արձակել զ—ն, to untie, to loosen or undo a knot;
Definition_6: լուծանել զ—սն, to untie or cut the knot of a difficulty or question, to delucidate; — ի —գուցէ փախչել, to flee by post, or by relays of horses.

Title: Հանգուշն
Definition_3: gathering up, picking up, closely; modestly, decently; cautiously.

Title: Հանգուցանեմ
Definition_1: to repose, to give repose, to leave to rest; to recruit, to relax, to refresh, to ease, to recreate; to lay, to set, to put, to place; to finish, to end; to bury, to inter; to translate, to remove to heaven; to make happy, to beatify, to glorify; — յերկոց տունջեան, to rest from daily labour, to repose.

Title: Հանգչիմ
Definition_1: to repose, to take repose, to be at ease; to rest, to cease from work, to relax, to refresh oneself; to end, to stop, to stand still, to halt, to be settled; to lodge, to sojourn; to cease, to end; to die, to depart this life; to be buried; to rest in heaven; — ի վաստակոց, to take rest from work, to pause from labour; — ի խաղաղութեան, to rest in peace; հանգիր ի սրտամտութէնէ, let your anger cease; եմուտ անդ —, he went in to ease himself.

Title: Հանգրիճեմ
Definition_1: to tuck, turn or truss up; to take in, to tighten; — զհանդերձս, to tuck up one's clothes or gown; — զբազուկս, to turn up the sleeves;
Definition_2: — զմիտս, to retire within oneself, to collect one's thoughts.

Title: Հանգրուան
Definition_1: lodging, abode, dwelling; suburb, village, hamlet; stable; cattle-shed, sheep-fold; cf. Կայարան; — նաւաց, road, roadstead, harbour, port; — sanctuary, relic.

Title: Հանդարտ
Definition_1: peaceable, quiet, calm, tranquil, mild; moderate, staid, sedate, grave, sober;
Definition_2: —, —ս, gently, softly, mildly, tranquilly, slowly; — լինել, կալ, to remain quiet or tranquil; — լինել, to have patience, to be patient.

Title: Հանդարտաբարոյ
Definition_1: good-tempered, peaceful, gentle, mild, meek, affable.

Title: Հանդարտահետ
Definition_1: walking slowly; flowing peacefully or placidly.

Title: Հանդարտաքայլ
Definition_1: going slowly, having a slow pace.

Title: Հանդարտեմ
Definition_1: to tranquillize, to appease, to calm; to render tranquil, to soften;
Definition_2: to be appeased, calmed, tranquillized; to abate, to be settled, to diminish, to assuage; to hold one's peace, to keep silence; to support, to endure, to suffer, to resist, to be able; — զկիրս, զամբոխեալ միտս ուրուք, to calm the passions, to relieve anxiety.

Title: Հանդարտութիւն
Definition_1: tranquillity, stillness, repose, quiet, peace, silence; phlegm, calmness, coolness, composure; — կրից, moderation; — ծովու, calm at sea, calm, smooth sea, dead calm; — հոգւոյ, մտաց, peace of soul or mind.

Title: Հանդերձ
Definition_1: coat, clothes, garb, attire, wearing apparel; old clothes; preparation, show, pomp, magnificence; — շքեղ, լայն, magnificent, flowing robe; — առանց խորշխորշանի, garment without folds; — արքայական, royal robe; հեծելազն —ք or —անք, riding habit; — բաղանեաց, bathing gown; —ք նորք, a suit of new clothes; — հարսանեաց, wedding garb; — սգոյ, mourning; արկանել զիւրեւ — այրութեան, to wear widow's weeds; ի բաց հանել զ— այրութեան, to put of widow's weeds.

Title: Հանդերձ
Definition_1: with, along with, together with; եղբարբքն —, with his brothers; — այնու, withal, besides, moreover; — այսու ամիենայնիւ, all the same, in spite of all that; after all, however; — ամենայն թերութեամբքն, in spite of all his faults or defects; — սոքիմբք, with all that; at the same time; այլովքն —, et cetera, etc., and so of the rest, so on, so forth.

Title: Հանդերձանք
Definition_1: dressing, seasoning; provisioning, furnishing, furniture; dress, attire, garb, apparel; sumptuous attire; show, pomp, solemnity, gorgeousness, gaudiness, splendour; arrangement, preparatives, disposition; goods, luggage; apparatus, machinery; implement; attendance, equipage; construction; — նաւու, equipment, manning, fitting out; —ք կերակրոց, sauce, seasoning, condiment.

Title: Հանդերձանի
Definition_1: clothes, garments, dress; drapery, woollen stuffs.

Title: Հանդերձապետ
Definition_1: master of the king's wardrobe; wardrobe-keeper; intendant, steward, manager.

Title: Հանդերձեալ
Definition_1: prepared, composed; furnished, equipped; splendid, magnificent, sumptuous; future, to come, hereafter, that is to be, coming;
Definition_2: —ք, the future, futurity, time to come; պատմուճան —, coat in reserve, put by or kept for future use; — կեանք, աշխարհ, the future life, the life to come, the other world; ի — ձելումն, in the other life.

Title: Հանդերձեմ
Definition_1: to dress, to get ready, to prepare; to make or get up; to put in order, to arrange, to dispose, to fit up, to settle; to provide, to furnish, to garnish, to set off, to deck, to adorn, to embellish, to clothe; to equip, to arm, to fit out; to construct.

Title: Հանդերձիկ
Definition_1: cheap little dress; bad, ugly coat.

Title: Հանդերձիմ
Definition_1: to prepare oneself, to get ready, to be in readiness, to set about, to fall to, to be about to, on the point of, going to; to dress, to put on one's clothes, to clothe oneself; — ի չու, to get ready or prepare for a journey; —ձեալ էր դարձ առնել ի տուն, he was ready to return, or was on the point of returning home.

Title: Հանդէպ
Definition_1: before, in face, in presence of, in front, opposite;
Definition_2: against; ի —, ի —դիպէ, ի —դիպոյ or —պոջ, before, in front;
Definition_3: convenient, fit, proper.

Title: Հանդէս
Definition_1: feast, public rejoicing; procession, solemnity, religious ceremony; pomp, show, display, gala, exhibition, parade, state; scene, spectacle, show; arena; proof, argument, demonstration; declaration, witness, testimony, evidence; trial, experience, essay; exercise, practice; audit, examination, inspection, investigation; deed, fact, act; effects; fight, assault, combat; care, diligence; bravery, great deeds; account; review (journal);
Definition_2: —դիսիւ, pompously, solemnly; համաշխարհական —, exhibition; — թաղման, burial, funeral obsequies; — զօրաց, review, muster; — յաղթանակի, triumphal rejoicings; — թատրոնական, theatre, spectacle, play; — առաքինութեան, brilliant action; — լաւութեանց, shining qualities; ի — մարտից, among combats; — առնել, to pass in review, to make a diligent investigation, to examine; to make a show or display of, to show off, to display, to expose to view, to put or set forth; to turn to account, to improve; to exercise, to practise; — առնել զօրաց, ի —դիսի անցուցանել զզօրս, to review, to muster, to pass in review; — համարոյ առնել, to examine, to register, to make a numbering or enumeration of; — առնել քաջութեան, to prove, to signalize one's valour, to signalize oneself by prowess, gallantry, bravery; — առնել զօրութեան, to use or exert one's power; — առնել պերճութեան, գիտութեան, to make a show of one's science; — առնել ի մաստութեան իւրոյ, to display one's wisdom; — առնել հանճարոյ, to heighten, to set off, to enhance, to give zest to one's parts or talent, to show one's wit, to play the sprightly, ingenious or witty; ի — ածել, to exhibit, to expose to view, to display, to show off; to represent, to play, to act; ի — անցանել, to compete, to rival, to vie with; to appear; ի — մտանել, to enter the lists; to be ranked among; ի — մատուցանել, to put to the trial, to the test, to prove; զ— առնուլ, to examine, to prove, to know by experience.

Title: Հանդիպեմ
Definition_1: to meet, to fall in with, to arrive, to come; to find, to gain, to obtain, to attain; to happen, to chance, to occur, to befall, to offer, to coincide, to tally, to jump together, to agree; — միմեանց to meet each other, to encounter; to attack each other in front, to clash, to meet face to face; չարեօք —, to happen unluckily; մեծամեծաց — շնորհաց, to receive great favours.

Title: Հանդիպի
Definition_1: it happens, it comes to pass.

Title: Հանդիպեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to succeed or happen; to apply, to adapt, to suit.

Title: Հանդիպող
Definition_1: cf. Դիպող; — միտք, ingenious, witty, subtle.

Title: Հանդիսադիր
Definition_1: agonotheta, gymnasiarch, agonistarch; president or chief of a ceremony, assembly, combat, show; *expositor, exhibiter.

Title: Հանդիսակից
Definition_1: companion in an assembly or solemnity; companion in arms, fellow-soldier, comrade.

Title: Հանդիսանամ
Definition_1: to enter the lists, to fight, to wrestle, to vie with; to labour hard, to strive, to endeavour, to try, to attempt; to signalize or distinguish oneself, to render oneself illustrious, to be celebrated, renowned, to be made public with praise; to show one's courage or mettle, to figure, to shine; to assemble at a public festival or ceremony, to celebrate; քաջայաղթ —, to make stupendous conquests, to do or work wonders; յաղթող —, to remain victorious; յաղթող — իրիք, to be victorious over, to be conqueror.

Title: Հանդիսապէս
Definition_1: in a procession, with pomp, gloriously.

Title: Հանդիսասէր
Definition_1: fond of pomp, solemnity, display; fond of shows, plays, public spectacles.

Title: Հանդիսատես
Definition_1: spectator; լինել, կալ, to be a —, present at, to assist; —ք, the spectators, the audience; the lookers on, the by-standers, the public.

Title: Հանդիսարան
Definition_1: lists, arena; court of justice; gallery, saloon; exhibition; scene, spectacle.

Title: Հանդիսացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to solemnize, celebrate with pomp or display; to signalize; to count, to enumerate; թատերախաղ —, to play, to act, to perform; անպարտելի —, to render invincible.

Title: Հանդուրժեմ
Definition_1: to suffer, to support, to sustain; to last, to endure, to resist; to be able.

Title: Հանդրին անդունդք
Definition_1: Adriatic sea, or gulf of Venice.

Title: Հանեալ
Definition_1: taken away; repudiated; ի բաց —, exclusively, to the exclusion of, except, but, save.

Title: Հանեմ
Definition_1: to draw or pull out, to take away, to abstract, to remove, to displace; to dislodge; to rise, to lift up, to carry up; to divulge, to let out, to publish; to offer, to present;
Definition_2: to subtract, to take away; — զքառակուսի արմատ թուոյ, to extract the square root of a number; — իրաւունս, to do justice to; — առնուն չար, to defame, to decry, to slander, to belie; — յաչաց, to cause to lose the favour or affection of; — յաչաց ժողովըրդեան, to render unpopular; ի վեր —, to inform of, to discover, to disclose, to reveal, to unveil, to unmask; — ընդ աշխարհ, to publish, to divulge every where; ի բանս —, to delude, to beguile, to seduce, to betray, to deceive; յինքն —, to appropriate to oneself, to take possession of, to assume wrongfully; — ինչ յոք, to ascribe, to attribute, to impute; — յոք զպատճառս ամենայն չարեաց, to accuse of every evil; — յոք զիմն, to apply to; ի բաց —, to exclude; to scatter; to send back or away, to dismiss, to discharge; — բռնի or բռնաբար, to extort, to wrest, to seize by force, to take by violence; — յարմատոց, to root up, to extirpate; *— զթեփ, to scale; to pearl or decorticate seed; — զվրէժ քինուն or — զփոխարէն չարեացն, to avenge oneself, to be revenged; to turn the tables upon; — օգուտ, to turn to account, to profit by, to derive benefit from, to avail oneself of, to improve; — հետեւանս, to desume a consequence; — զոք ի ձեռս ուրուք, to give, to deliver up; — զօրս, to levy soldiers, troops; — աւուրս, զգիշերն, to pass the days, the night; — աւուրս բազումս, to remain a long time; — ի ժառանգութէնէ, to dispossess; — յայլ լեզու, to translate into; — ողջակէզ, to sacrifice; — լեզու, to put out one's tongue; to loll out one's tongue; վիճակ —, to draw, to cast lots; — զկարասիս, to unfurnish, to strip; — զկինն, to repudiate; — կանանց զյօնսն, to paint one's eyebrows; — զջուր, to draw water, to draw up, to fetch up; — ի նաւէ, to disembark; to land, to set on shore; — ճանապարհի, դրան, to lead to, to run into, to abut or end in; — առ ոք, to present, to introduce; — զսուրն ի պատենից, to unsheathe; — ընդ սուր, to put to the edge of the sword; — զհոգին, to give up the ghost, to expire, to die; — զօրհնութիւն, to bless, to praise; հա՛ն զիս աստի, take me out of this.

Title: Հանճար
Definition_1: intelligence, intellect, understanding, wit, sense; genius, talent; wisdom, prudence; reason, sense, judiciousness;

Title: Հանճարաբան
Definition_1: of fine genius, of great wit; speaking wisely, clever, ingenious; sententious.

Title: Հանճարաբանութիւն
Definition_1: witty or sententious phrase, flash of wit, sally, witticism.

Title: Հանճարագիտութիւն
Definition_1: foresight, insight, sublime science; wisdom; sagacity.

Title: Հանճարեղ
Definition_1: full of wit, of ingenuity, of sense, witty, ingenious, intelligent, wise, sensible, clever, clear-sighted, judicious, prudent, right-minded; —եղ այր, a genius, man of great parts, of rare talent;

Title: Հանճարիմ
Definition_1: to tax one's ingenuity, to set one's wits to, to contrive, to invent, to devise, to frame.

Title: Հանուր
Definition_1: each, every, all, general, universal; ընդ —, every where; —ց ազանց, to all peoples.

Title: Հանրահռչակեմ
Definition_1: to divulge or publish every where.

Title: Հանք
Definition_1: mine; — ոսկւոյ, երկա թոյ, ածխոյ, gold-mine, iron-mine, coal-mine.

Title: Հանքային
Definition_1: mineral; — ջուր, աղ —, water; rock-salt; — ածուխ, cf. Հանքածուխ.

Title: Հաշեմ
Definition_1: to consume, to exhaust, to drain, to render lean, to make languish.

Title: Հաշիմ
Definition_1: to grow thin, to languish, to be consumed, to decay, to pine, to dwindle away.

Title: Հաշիւ
Definition_1: account, reckoning, calculation, computation; — ընտրութեան, exact, correct account; comparison, likening; ճիշդ, մանրամասն, վերջին —, accurate, detailed, final account; բոլորակ, *կլոր —, in round numbers; խառն —, confused account; սովորական —, running account, account current; ի —, on account; ի — իւր, on one's own account; ի — or հաշուով տալ, to pay on account; — առնել, to make out an account; to calculate; — տալ, to give an account;
Definition_2: to conform, to agree; ի — ածել, արկանել, to count, to calculate, to compute, to reckon, to number, to enumerate; — ցուցանել, ընդունել, քննել, ճշդել, մաքրել or սրբել զ—, to present, to receive, to examine, to verify, to audit an account; փակել, աւարտել զ—, to close, end or conclude, to settle or balance an account; մտանել ի — ընտրութեան ընդ ումեք, to be compared, confronted with; առանց հաշուի, incomparable, matchless; cf. Կշիռ.

Title: Հաշմանդամ
Definition_1: crippled, impotent; — ձեռօք, one-handed; lefthanded; — ոտիւք, lame; — անդամովք, paralytic, that has lost the use of his limbs; — մտօք, booby, noodle, blockhead, dolt, dunce, dullard.

Title: Հաշմութիւն
Definition_1: state of a crippled person; crippleness, lameness.

Title: Հաշուեմատեան
Definition_1: account book, day-book, journal; մայր —, ledger.

Title: Հաշուիմ
Definition_1: to count, to calculate, to compute, to number; to repute, to esteem, to think, to deem, to judge, to believe;
Definition_2: to pass for, to counterfeit; յառասպելս —, to treat as fables.

Title: Հաշտ
Definition_1: reconciled; propitious, favourable, friendly, kind, kindly, benevolent; — առնել, to conciliate, to reconcile; to render propitious, to propitiate; — լինել, to be reconciled; to be propitious, favourable.

Title: Հաշտադրամ
Definition_1: piece of money worth about two thirds of a penny.

Title: Հաշտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to conciliate, to reconcile, to pacify; to agree, to make up.

Title: Հաշտիմ
Definition_1: to be reconciled, to agree, to make peace, to become friends;
Definition_2: մերձ էր արեւն ի —, the sun was about to set.

Title: Հաշտումն
Definition_1: conciliation, rearrangement, peace; propitiation; cf. Կնքեմ; ի — ածել, cf. Հաշտեմ; — առնել, cf. Հաշտիմ.

Title: Հապ
Definition_1: in haste, hastily, very soon; afterwards, next, then, and then, after;
Definition_2: come! now ! well! come on! go! away! make haste! come now! quick!.

Title: Հապճեպ
Definition_1: haste, speed, hurry, diligence, promptitude, precipitation, headlong haste;
Definition_2: —, —իւ, —ով, in haste, hastily; expeditiously, diligently, promptly, swiftly, rapidly, quickly; — տագնապու, with all possible speed, in a hurry, precipitately;
Definition_3: — տալ, to hasten, to make haste, to be quick;
Definition_4: — տալ, to expedite, to hasten, to urge on, to quicken, to hurry; to despatch; cf. Փութացուցանեմ.

Title: Հապստէպ
Definition_1: often, frequently, very often, again and again.

Title: Հաջեմ
Definition_1: to bark, to bay, to growl; to howl, to yelp;
Definition_2: to cry out, to clamour, to brawl, to snarl.

Title: Հառաչանք
Definition_1: sighs; groans, lamentation, weeping; մեծ, խոր —նս արձակել, to fetch deep or heavy sighs, to sigh heavily; հեղձամղձուկ զ—նսն առնել, to stifle one's sighs; — հեղձամղձուկ զնա առնէին, his sighings stifled his utterance;
Definition_2: —նօք, with a sigh; —նօք ի խորոց սրտէ ասաց, after profoundly sighing he said.

Title: Հառաչեմ
Definition_1: to sigh; ի խորոց սրտէ, to sigh deeply; — զանլռելի զհեծութիւն, to groan incessantly; — առ խաղաղութիւն, to sigh for peace.

Title: Հաս
Definition_1: ripeness, maturity; arrival, coming; tax, duty, dues; income, rent; funds, annuity; gift, offering; ի — գալ, to arrive at maturity, to ripen, to grow ripe, to mature.

Title: Հաս եւ խած լինիմ
Definition_1: to eat greedily, to devour voraciously.

Title: Հասակ
Definition_1: shape, stature, size, height; age, years, time of life; կաթնաբոյծ —, babyhood; անտիական, մատաղ, տխեղծ —, tender age, infancy, childhood; ի սկզբնաբոյս —ին, from one's earliest years; ի տղայութեան —ի նորա, in his infancy; ի ծաղկեալ —ի, in the prime of life; աճումն — ի, growth, growing; երիտասարդ —աւ, young; կայտառ, սթափ —, a slender waist; — անձնեայ, large stature; ուղղորդ —, straight figure; բարձր —աւ, of lofty stature, tall; միջակ —աւ, middle-sized; վայելուչ —աւ, good-sized; չափաւոր —աւ, middling-sized; կարճ —աւ, short, little; հասուն —, in ripe years, years of discretion; այրական —, man's estate, manhood; ծերացեալ —, — ծերութեան, old age, age, years; ծերացեալ —աւ, aged, in years, old, stricken in years; ի — եւ ի տիս հասանել, to reach, to attain, to grow to man's estate; զարգանալ —աւ, to increase in age; ի — գալ, to arrive at the age of puberty; ի միտս եւ ի — լինել, to be of age; — նորա բարւոք կերպարանի, his figure is becoming well developed; եւ մեռաւ ի —ի երեսուն եւ երից ամաց, he died at the age of thirty three; — գարնայնոյ, spring-time, spring.

Title: Հասակեղ
Definition_1: grown up; of lofty stature, tall.

Title: Հասանեմ
Definition_1: to arrive at, to attain, to reach; to catch, to take, to surprise; to get, to obtain, to gain; to be destined, allotted or obliged to; to ripen, to become ripe; to understand; — ի վերայ, to comprehend, to conceive, to understand, to apprehend, to catch at; to penetrate, to break into; յեղակարծում, յանակնկալս ի վերայ —, to surprise, to catch; to overtake, to come on like a thunderclap; — ի պաշտօն, to obtain, to get hold of a place or post; ի պատիւ —, to rise to dignities, to be promoted to high rank; — զքաղաքաւ, to assault the city; — ի վերայ իրաց աշխարհին, to assume the direction of, to take in hand public affairs; — ի ցամաք, to disembark, to land, to arrive; — վիրաց, to draw to a head, to gather; եթէ զնա ոչ —նէ ինձ տեսանել, if I should not happen to see him; թէեւ մեռանել ինձ —նիցէ ընդ քեզ, even were I to die with thee; —նէ քեզ դարձեալ մարգարէանալ, you must prophesy anew; գուցէ —նիցէ քեզ անձրեւ, lest the rain should surprise you; ծերացեալ հասեալ յարս, old, among the elders; հասեալ ժամ, present.

Title: Հասարակ
Definition_1: common, ordinary, usual, trivial, vulgar, low; common, public; equal, alike; half, semi, demi;
Definition_3: appellative; — անուն, common gender; — բայ, deponent verb; —, —օր, noon, noon-tide, midday; ի — աւուրն, զ— աւուրբ, at noon; ց— օր, till noon; — գիշեր, midnight; — տարի, one year with another;
