Definition_4: — տեղիք, the common places, general topics; —աց կեանք, common life; թշնամի —աց, the common enemy; միտք, կարծիք, —աց, common sense; —աց հաւանութեամբ, with one accord; օգուտ —աց, the public interests; իրք —աց, public affairs; ծախիւք —աց, at the public expense; —աց վարել կեանս, to live in common; —աց ունէին զինչս, they had every thing in common.

Title: Հասարակած
Definition_1: moiety; equator; զ—աւ գիշերոյ, at midnight.

Title: Հասարակեմ
Definition_1: to equal, to divide in two parts, in halves; to share, to part equally, to portion out; to accomplish; — զսէրն ընդ ամենեսին, to love impartially, to be large-hearted; մի —եսցեն զաւուրս իւրեանց, they shall not live out half their days.

Title: Հասարակիմ
Definition_1: to be divided into halves, to be equally divided; to be half way; to share in, to partake of; to be complete, accomplished; —կեցաւ մահն յաղքատս եւ ի փարթամս, death overtook both poor and rich; —կէ գիշերն, it is midnight.

Title: Հասարակորդ
Definition_2: companion, fellow, partner; —ս առնել, to equalize, to equal, to compare;
Definition_3: to appraise, to estimate; —ս մեզ արարեր զդոսա, yon have made them equal unto us.

Title: Հասկ
Definition_1: ear or head of corn, of barley; ոսկեփայլ —ք, golden ears; —ս արձակել, to shoot into ears, to ear; to spire; քաղել —, to glean.

Title: Հասկահասուն
Definition_1: of which the ears are ripe.

Title: Հասու
Definition_1: happening: lively, clever, intelligent; — լինել, to arrive, to reach, to attain; to seize, to take, to catch, to entrap;
Definition_2: to comprehend, to conceive, to penetrate, to discover, to recognize.

Title: Հասուն
Definition_1: ripe, mature, grown up; wise, prudent, judicious; — հասակ, ripe or advanced age; — այր, man of mature age, a discreet sober-minded man; — օրիորդ, marriageable young lady; — խորհուրդ, միտք, mature judgment; — խաղաւարտ, ripe imposthume; — գործել, to ripen, to make ripe, to mature, to bring to maturity.

Title: Հասունանամ
Definition_1: to ripen, to grow ripe; — պալարի, to come or draw to a head, to gather, to suppurate.

Title: Հասուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to arrive, reach or attain; to bring, to refer; to cook, to dress, to get ready, to prepare; to ripen, to mature; հասոյց ինձ անբաւ աշխատութիան այս բառգիրք, this dictionary has cost much labour.

Title: Հաստ
Definition_1: solid, stable, firm; strong, robust; thick, coarse, large;
Definition_2: —, —ք, stability, firmness, hardness, steadiness; կալ ի —ի, to stand firm; ի —ոջ պահել, to hold fast; ի —ոջ ունել, to preserve, to keep.

Title: Հաստաբազուկ
Definition_1: strong-armed, having large and powerful arms, robust, vigorous, sturdy, stout.

Title: Հաստահիմն
Definition_1: well based or built, firm, solid, stable.

Title: Հաստաղեղն
Definition_1: furnished with a very strong or heavy bow.

Title: Հաստամագիլ
Definition_1: furnished with very strong claws or talons.

Title: Հաստանամ
Definition_1: to grow stronger, to be strengthened or confirmed; *to become larger, to increase in bulk.

Title: Հաստատ
Definition_1: solid, firm, stable; sure, certain, positive;
Definition_3: solidly, firmly, strongly, steadily; surely, truly, positively; resolutely.

Title: Հաստատանամ
Definition_1: to be confirmed, strengthened, to take root in.

Title: Հաստատեմ
Definition_1: to affirm, to sustain; to prop, to confirm, to consolidate; to fortify, to comfort, to invigorate, to strengthen, to encourage; to restore, to mend, to revive, to refresh; to assure, to guarantee, to attest, to certify, to witness, to approve, to corroborate; to legalize, to ratify; to institute, to found, to erect, to create, to make; — անդրէն, to reestablish; — զերեսս, զձեռն, զմիտս, to set out, to start, to proceed, to move on; to deliberate, to resolve, to purpose; to conduct or comport oneself, to act; to threaten; — զառաղջութիւն, to recover, improve or restore health; —եալ էր ի խորհրդեան, he was resolute and decided in action.

Title: Հաստատիմ
Definition_1: to grow harder, to become stronger; to be confirmed, to take root in; to settle oneself firmly in, to stay; to be certified, assured, proved, confirmed; to hope for, to rely on, to confide in, to be created; to recover, to be restored, to come round again; —տեցաւ ոգի նորա, he recovered his strength, his senses; —տեցան որդիք նորա, his children are grown up; —տեցաւ յառողջութեան, he has recovered his health.

Title: Հաստատութիւն
Definition_1: stability, firmness, solidity, fixedness, consistence; constancy, resolution; strengthening, consolidation, confirmation; prop, stay, support, base; affirmation, assertion, acknowledgment, authorization, certifying, approbation, ratification;
Definition_2: solidification; — երկնից, the firmament; — մտաց, constancy, firmness of purpose; — առնուլ, to be vouched for, of a certainty, to prove true, to be confirmed, attested, certified;
Definition_3: հաստատութեամբ, cf. Հաստատ; հաստատութեամբ եդեալ էր ի մտի, he was resolved, he has taken a resolution, he decided to.

Title: Հաստատուն
Definition_1: firm, solid, stable, fixed; certain, sure, positive; immovable, constant; permanent, persevering; determined;
Definition_3: cf. Հաստատ; — կերակուր, solid food.

Title: Հաստարմատ
Definition_1: well or deep-rooted, well established, firm, solid; — առնել, կանգնել, to strengthen, to root, to establish.

Title: Հաստեմ
Definition_1: to create, to produce, to make; to strengthen, to confirm, to consolidate; — զոք ի բարիս, to confirm in the right way.

Title: Հաստիմ
Definition_1: to be created, produced; to be confirmed, strengthened; to marry, to wed, to espouse.

Title: Հաստոյր
Definition_1: serious, grave, mortal; — վերք, a deep wound; տալ — հարուածս, to give the finishing stroke or death-blow, to despatch.

Title: Հաստումն
Definition_1: creation; production; strengthening, consolidation, confirmation, reestablishment, restoration.

Title: Հատ
Definition_1: cut, cutting, section; fraction, fragment, morsel, piece; corn, grain; *one, one only; —ս առնել ճանապարհաց, to rob, to take to the highway.

Title: Հատագործեմ
Definition_1: to reduce into grains, to granulate.

Title: Հատալից
Definition_1: full of corn or grain; granular.

Title: Հատած
Definition_3: cut, cut out; —ք կոնի, conics, conic sections.

Title: Հատակոտոր
Definition_1: bit, piece, morsel; remnant, shred, fragment; — առնել, կոտորել, to cut up, to cut in pieces; to break, dash or smash to pieces; to mutilate, to curtail, to change, to alter.

Title: Հատանեմ
Definition_1: to cut, to cut off, to break; to carve, to cut; to divide, to separate; to retrench, to diminish, to curtail; to castrate; to resolve, to decide, to determine; to cross, to traverse, to pass; to stop, to interrupt; — գծից զմիմեանս, to cross one another; — զծով, to plough, cross or traverse the sea; — զծով եւ զցամաք, to run over, to over-run or scour both sea and land; — ճանապարհ, to open, to pave away or road; to progress towards, to bend one's steps to, to traverse, to travel; — անցանել, to cross, to traverse, to pass, to travel over or through, to go over; — ի ստենէ, to wean; — զծառս, to fell, to cut down; to clear; դատ —, to sentence, to judge, to decide; ական —, to mine, to dig, to hollow; — զգլուխ, to cut off the head, to behead, to decapitate; — զանդամս, to cut off limbs, to amputate; — յարքունիս, to confiscate, to forfeit; — ի կենաց, to slay, to deprive of life, to kill; — զանձն ի փափկութիւն, to give oneself up to effeminacy; ի վատութիւն —, to make a coward of; — զծարաւ, to quench, to slake the thirst; — զանձն յիմեքէ, to abstain, to keep from, to refrain, to forbear, to deprive or debar oneself of, to do without, to dispense with; ակօս —, to plough, to furrow; — գունդ մի, to detach, to form a detachment; — լուսոյ զգիշեր, to drive away darkness; — զբոց հրոյ, to spark, to sparkle, to emit sparks; — զբանակն, to fray a way, to pass through, to cross; — զգրիչ, to make a penpop; գետն զդաշտն —նէ, the river traverses the plain.

Title: Հատանիմ
Definition_1: to be cut, separated, divided; to be exhausted, to decline, to fail, to desist; to abstain, to refrain; to shine, to glitter, to sparkle; to yield, to give way, to fall into; — գունոյ, to turn pale; to be discoloured, tarnished, to lose colour, to fade, to grow pale; — ի յուսոյ, to lose hope, to cease to hope, to despair; յանգործութիւն —, to foment, to cherish idleness; յանմտութիւն —, to be without even the shadow of common sense; ի զեղխութիանս —, to plunge into debauchery; ի չարութիւն —, to abandon oneself to wickedness; — բոցոյ, to flame, to cast a glare, to shine; զհետ —, to apply oneself to; ի վաճառս —, to deal, to traffic; ի գինեվաճառս —, to keep a wine-shop, a tavern; իբրեւ զկարկուտ հատեալ յամպոց, like hail fallen from the clouds; ամենայն ուրեք ոսկւոյ եւ ականց նշոյլք —նէին, all was brilliant with gold and precious stones; փայլատակունք —նէին, thunderbolts fell; գունդ մի հատեալ, a detachment of troops; հատեալ ի յուսոյ, desperate; բան հակիրճ հատեալ, brief, succinct discourse.

Title: Հատանող
Definition_3: cf. Հատու.

Title: Հատընտիր
Definition_1: select, chosen, choice; —, — բանք, chrestomathy, anthology, collection; — լինել, to gather, to collect, to make a collection of authors.

Title: Հատկլիմ
Definition_1: to be out of breath, to become breathless, to gasp for breath; ի հեկեկանացն — կլեալ, hindered by sobs.

Title: Հատոր
Definition_1: part, bit, shred, fragment, stump; volume, tome; — հոգւոյս, my life ! my darling ! my love !.

Title: Հատու
Definition_3: pickpocket, cutpurse; cf. Զէն.

Title: Հատուած
Definition_1: cut, shape, fashion; section, division; part, portion; bit, piece, fragment; retrenchment, separation; emigration, transmigration, colony; article, head, point;
Definition_2: segment; —ք կոնի, conics; առաջանիւթ — օրագիր, leading article; — գնալ ուրեք, to emigrate; գրել —, to write an article; — տալ բանին, to interrupt, to break in upon.

Title: Հատուածիմ
Definition_1: to remove, to separate or detach oneself; to retire, to go away, to cut and run; to change one's abode, to emigrate, to colonize, to settle oneself as a colonist or planter.

Title: Հատուկտիր
Definition_1: cutting or reducing to pieces; — առնել, to reduce to pieces, to atoms; to exterminate.

Title: Հատումն
Definition_1: cut, incision; division, separation; — անդամոց, amputation.

Title: Հատուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render, to restore, to give back; to pay, to discharge, to acquit; to disburse, to lay out; to recompense, to satisfy, to make amends, to compensate, to indemnify; to cut; — ի ստենէ, to wean, to take from the breast; — զփոխարէնն, to render like for like, to requite; — զվնասն, to make up for, to indemnify for; — չար փոխանակ բարւոյ, չար — երախտեաց, to render evil for good; — զմեղս հարանց՝ որդւոյ, to revenge the sins of the fathers upon the children; —ցեր ինձ բարիս, եւ ես —ցի քեզ չարիս, I have rendered you evil for good; աստուած հատուսցէ քեզ ի բարիս, may God reward you; cf. Հատուցումն.

Title: Հատուցիչ
Definition_1: who renders, restores or gives back; payer; remunerator.

Title: Հատուցումն
Definition_1: restitution; payment, reimbursement; remuneration, recompense; compensation, gift, offering, fine, amends; cutting; — վնասուց, damages, indemnity, reparation; — փոխարինի, compensation; exchange, any thing given in return; ի —, in payment; in return; օր —ցման, the Last Judgment; — առնել, to reward, to requite, to recompense; to make amends for; հատուցանել ումեք զ—, to give tit for tat, to make a return for, to requite; to avenge, to punish; հատուցանել զ—ի թշնամիս, to revenge oneself on one's enemies.

Title: Հարազատ
Definition_1: legitimate, authentic, genuine; true, frank, sincere; intimate, cordial; related, near, familiar;

Title: Հարազատիմ
Definition_1: to be legitimated; to become familiar or brotherly; to contract an alliance with; եղբայր —տեալ, own brother.

Title: Հարազատութիւն
Definition_1: legitimacy, authenticity, genuineness; fraternity, brotherhood; kindred, consanguinity.

Title: Հարաւ
Definition_1: south wind; the south; արեւելեան —, south east; արեւմտեան —, south west; հողմ —ոյ, the south wind; շնչէ —, it blows from the south.

Title: Հարաւային
Definition_1: southern, meridional, austral, southerly; — արեւելեան հողմ, sirocco.

Title: Հարաւունք
Definition_1: fields, country; seed or sowing-time, tillage, ploughing.

Title: Հարեւանցեմ
Definition_1: to pass quickly, to skip, to omit, to pass over in silence.

Title: Հարեւանցի
Definition_1: superficial, light; futile, frivolous, vain, transitory, fleeting;
Definition_2: superficially, slightly, for form's sake, negligently, in passing, with an absent look; — անցանել ընդ, to graze, to pass close to, to glide by; to skim along or over, to glance at; to touch lightly or briefly on.

Title: Հարթ
Definition_1: plain, flat, even, level; polished, smooth; uniform, alike, equal;
Definition_2: unitedly; evenly, plainly; — հաւասար, on a level with, even with; — եւ ուղիղ հասակ, fine-shaped, of a fine stature or figure; — առնել, to level, to smooth; to facilitate; եղիցին առապարքն ի — ճանապարհս, the rough places shall be made smooth.

Title: Հարթակեմ
Definition_1: to iron, to hot-press, to smooth.

Title: Հարթայատակ
Definition_1: even with the ground, plaid, flat, on the same floor, on a level, levelled; — առնել, to pull down or raze to the ground, to level with the ground, to raze; to level, to make even.

Title: Հարթաչափ
Definition_1: level; — ջրեղէն, water-mark or water-line; — պղպջակաւոր, spirit-level.

Title: Հարթեմ
Definition_1: to plain, to smooth, to make even or equal; to plane, to polish; to level, to put on a level with, to pull or beat down, to demolish, to cast to the earth, to overthrow, to destroy, to raze.

Title: Հարթնում
Definition_1: to start with fear, to be scared, to take fright or umbrage at, to start or fly off, to bound away.

Title: Հարթուցանեմ
Definition_1: to give umbrage, to scare, to startle, to fright away, to estrange, to alienate, to remove; — զվարսս, to cause the hair to stand on end.

Title: Հարիւր
Definition_2: cent; տասն առ —, ten per cent.

Title: Հարիւրամեան
Definition_1: a hundred years old, centenary; of every hundred years, centurial; զ—ամենիւք ուրեմն էր, he was about an hundred years old.

Title: Հարիւրապատիկ
Definition_1: centuple, a hundredfold, hundred times as much.

Title: Հարիւրապատկեմ
Definition_1: to centuple, to increase or multiply a hundredfold.

Title: Հարիւրաւոր
Definition_3: centurion.

Title: Հարիւրբերանեան
Definition_1: hundred-mouthed; — դիցուհի, the hundred-tongued goddess, Fame, the goddess of report.

Title: Հարիւրորդակալ
Definition_1: centiare ( part of an are; one square meter).

Title: Հարկ
Definition_1: tribute; tax, impost, duty, excise; necessity, want, exigency; constraint, obligation; homage, duty, service; հարկ վերադիր, additional tax; — տարապայման, over-assessment; — դժնդակ, shocking necessity; առանց —ի, without necessity;
Definition_2: —աւ, ի —է, առ —ի, necessarily, of necessity, essentially; inevitably, indispensably; by force, by compulsion, forcibly; ընդ —աւ արկանել, ի —ի կացուցանել, to place or lay under contribution, to tax, to load or burden with imposts, to levy contributions, to render tributary, to subdue, to subject, to enslave, to subjugate; — հանել, to gather in, to exact tribute, to raise money, to put a tax on; —ս հարկանել, to pay a tribute; to be tribute to; ի —ի կալ, մտանել ի —, to serve, to subject oneself to, to submit, to be tributary to; — առնել, to force, to constrain, to use violence; հատուցանել զ— շնորհապարտ մեծարանացն, to pay the tribute of gratitude; —է, one must, it is necessary; չէ —, չէ ինչ —, it is not necessary, there is no need, no matter; — ի վերայ կայ ինձ, necessity obliges me to; — եղեւ նմա բողոքել ի կայսրն, he was obliged to appeal to Caesar; ըստ —ի ժամանակին, according to the wants of the age; — էր, it was necessary; — եղեւ մեզ առնել, we were obliged, compelled or constrained to do; — է ինձ երթալ, I must go; մերցուք եթէ — լիցի, let us die if it must be!.

Title: Հարկադիր
Definition_1: imposing of a tax or burden; forcing, offering violence.

Title: Հարկադրեմ
Definition_1: to force, to constrain, to oblige.

Title: Հարկահանութիւն
Definition_1: the collecting of taxes, exaction or recovery of tribute or imposts; նեղել հարկահանութեամբ, to oppress, squeeze, grind or vex with excessive taxation, to load or burden with extortions.

Title: Հարկահար
Definition_1: tributary; thrall, bondsman, serf, slave, servant.

Title: Հարկանեմ
Definition_1: to beat, to strike, to give or deal a blow; to strike or sweep the chords of the lyre, to vibrate, to touch, to play or perform on; to ring; to knock, to thump; to prick, to bite; to wound, to hurt, to harm; to knock down, to beat to death, to kill; to spoil, to taint, to gnaw, to eat away; to ill-treat, to punish, to abuse; to strike against, to shock; to feel remorse; to pay tribute; to write down, to put into writing, to set down; — զքաղց եւ զծառաւ, to stay hunger; to quench, slake or allay thirst; — այսոյն պղծոյ, to possess with a devil; ի շամփուր —, to spit, to put on the spit; — զոք ի ցից, to empale; — ի մահ, — զոք յոգի, to give the death-blow, to despatch, to slay, to kill; — ի գլուխն, to cause a headache; — գինւոյ ի գլուխն, to mount to the head; to intoxicate; տաւիղ կամ ջութակ —, to harp, to play on the harp or violin; խորան —, to set up a pavilion; — զմիմեանս, to strike one another, to knock against each other; to come in collision, to collide, to come into contact with; — ընդ միմեանս, ընդ միմեանս — համեմատութեամբ, to compare, to confront with; — զճանապարհս, to go, to be on a journey, to travel; մարտ ընդ միմեանս —, to fight, to combat, to make war; — զպատերազմ, to gain the battle, to conquer; — զթշնամին, to beat the enemy, to discomfit, to defeat, to rout; — հուր զտամբ, to set a house on fire; — գաւազանաւ, to cudgel, to cane, to whip, to thrash, to belabour; խրախոյս խընդութեան —, to shout with joy; — զպէտս ուրուք, to supply the needs of, to provide or furnish the needful; — զմիտս, to strike, to impress;
Definition_2:
— զամանակ, to beat the measure; զծայրս —, to dawn, to rise; — զանձն, to be afflicted, grieved, mournful, desperate; ընդ միտ —, to think, to reflect; —նէ զդաւիթ սիրտն իւր, հարեալ գտանի ի խղճէ մտաց, David is struck by or eaten up by remorse; ընդէ՞ր —նէ զքեզ սիրտ քո, why is your conscience afflicted and why is your heart heavy within you ?
արեւն ընդ ծայրս —նէր, the sun gilded the mountain tops; ժանգն —նէ զերկաթ, rust consumes iron; կօշիկ իմ —նէ զոտս, my shoe pinches.

Title: Հարկանիմ
Definition_1: to be beaten, struck, wounded; to be smitten with, enamoured of; to approach, to incline to; — զագահութեան, to be avaricious, too fond of riches; — զախտի, to addict oneself to vice; — ի վերայ ուրուք, to assault, to attack; — ի սէր ուրուք, to fall in love with to conceive a great affection for, to be desperately in love with; ի գութ —, to be moved, touched with compassion; ընդ զգայութիւնս —, to strike the senses; — զիւիք, to tend do, to have the mind occupied with; — յաստուածս օտարս, to idolize; ի շահս կամ ի գնողս —, to traffic; ընդ միտս —, to be understood; այսր անդր —, to waver, to be unsettled, bewildered, in doubt, to hesitate; — յոք, to incline to some one, to become too familiar or very friendly with; ցաւ —նի որովայնիս, I have a stomach ache; I have the colic; հարաւ ի գեղ նորա, he was smitten with her beauty; հարաւ ի մորմոք սիրտ նորա, his heart was filled with pain or grief; երփն երփն —նէր ի նոցանէ, they shone brilliantly with many colours; —նէր ի նոցանէ հոտ անոյշ, they spread a perfume around; կարեվէր հարայ յոգիս, my heart was pierced with a hundred wounds.

Title: Հարող
Definition_1: striker; knocker; — ցուլ, a butting or mad bull.

Title: Հարկատու
Definition_1: tributary; vassal; liege, subject; ածել ի —ս, — առնել, to subject to tribute, to render tributary; — լինել, to be tributary.

Title: Հարկատրութիւն
Definition_1: act of paying tribute; thraldom, servitude.

Title: Հարկաւոր
Definition_1: necessary, important, essential; intimate; ministering, serving;

Title: Հարկաւորեմ
Definition_1: to necessitate, to oblige, to force.

Title: Հարկաւորութիւն
Definition_1: necessity, want; ministry, office, service; servitude.

Title: Հարկեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to necessitate, to constrain, to force, to compel, to oblige; to impose tributes, to render tributary; cf. Հարկիմ.

Title: Հարկեցուցիչ
Definition_1: pressing, urgent, earnest; — պէտք, pressing need.

Title: Հարկիմ
Definition_1: to contribute; to pay homage, to serve, to be constrained, forced.

Title: Հարուած
Definition_1: blow, knock, beating, striking, percussion; bastinado; slash, cut, wound; bruise, contusion; sore;
Definition_2: scourge, blow, chastening, tribulation, misfortune; repulse, rout, defeat, overthrow, considerable loss;
Definition_3: —ք, — paean; —ք եգիպտոսի, the plagues of Egypt; օրհասաբար —, mortal blow; —ս ածել, to give many blows, to cudgel, to chastise; հարկանել ի —ս մեծամեծս, to make great slaughter, havoc, carnage, butchery.

Title: Հարուածեմ
Definition_1: to beat, to strike; to cudgel, to cane; to chastise, to punish.

Title: Հարում
Definition_1: to beat, to strike; to drive in, to thrust, to push; to toss, to shake, to agitate; — զատամունս, to set the teeth on edge; ձու —, to beat eggs.

Title: Հարուստ
Definition_1: powerful, potent; strong, vigorous; monied, rich, opulent, fortunate; much, abundant; numerous; long since, remote, old; — մի, enough, sufficient, much; — մի ժամ, ժամանակ, log, a long while or time, a great while; ի — դարուց, many centuries since; — մի յառաջ, long time before; յետ — ժամանակաց, long time after; — միտք, ingenious; գունդ —, a strong force; — ձգմամբ, for a long time; — ինչ ամաց ի վերայ անցելոց, after many years.

Title: Հարսանեկան
Definition_1: nuptial, hymeneal, bridal, spousal; — զօդ, hymen; — սէր, conjugal love; զգեստ —, nuptial robe.

Title: Հարսանիք
Definition_1: wedding, nuptials; hymen, marriage, union, wedlock; հանդէս —նեաց, espousals, wedding-feast, nuptial-feast or bridal-feast; չաստուած —նեաց, Hymen; ջահ —նեաց, the torch of hymen; երգ —նեաց, marriage-song, epithalamium; ճառ —նեաց, discourse on marriage; հանդերձ —նեաց, wedding garb or garment; շօթ, բլիթ —նեաց, bride-cake; օրհնութիւն —նեաց, nuptial blessing; առագաստ —նեաց, wedding-bed, bridal-bed or marriage-bed; —նիս առնել, to celebrate a wedding; չառնել —իս, not to celebrate the wedding; երթալ ի —իս, to go to a wedding; գողանալ զ—իս, to be beforehand with one's spouse, *to get some jobs before the wedding-day.

Title: Հարսն
Definition_1: a newly married, bride, spouse; betrothed, affianced bride; daughter-in-law; nymph; larvae; յաւերժ —, nymph; —սունք լեռնայինք, oreads, mountain nymphs; խօսիլ —, to betroth, to affiance.

Title: Հարսնագեղեմ
Definition_1: to array or adorn as a bride.

Title: Հարսնանամ
Definition_1: to become a bride, to marry, to wed, to be or get married.

Title: Հարսնապաճոյճ
Definition_1: arrayed, attired or dressed like a bride.

Title: Հարսնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to marry, to join in wedlock, to give or take in marriage.

Title: Հարսնութիւն
Definition_1: marriage, wedding; wedlock; ածել հարսնութեան, to marry, to wed, to espouse; գնալ ումեք ի հարսնութեան, to be married.

Title: Հարստահարեմ
Definition_1: to oppress, to subdue by violence, to vex, to molest, to crush, to overburden, to surcharge, to extort, to maltreat; — զիւր կամս, to persist doggedly, to be obstinately resolved, to be stubborn.

Title: Հարստանամ
Definition_1: to become powerful, to be predominant, to domineer, to lord it, to rule over, to reign; to get or grow rich, to prosper, to thrive; to abound; — զբարեպաշտութիւն, to be rich in piety, to be very pious.

Title: Հարստացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make potent or glorious; to strengthen, to brace, to fortify; to make rich, to enrich.

Title: Հարստեմ
Definition_1: to drive in, to thrust down, to push, to fix, to establish, to consolidate; to tie tight.

Title: Հարստութիւն
Definition_1: dynasty; power, sway, rule, domination; riches, wealth, opulence, fortune; abundance.

Title: Հարց
Definition_1: demand, interrogation, question, examination; cf. Հարցն; — եւ խնդիր առնել, to ask, to make inquiries, to inquire about; ի — եւ ի փորձ արկանել, անկանել, to question, to examine; ի — եւ ի խնդիր մտանել ընդ ումեք, to discuss, to argue, to dispute.

Title: Հարցական
Definition_1: interrogative; magical; — կէտ, note of interrogation.

Title: Հարցանեմ
Definition_1: to ask, to inquire, to interrogate, to question; — ի տեառնէ, to consult the Lord; — զողջունէ ուրուք, to ask news of, or about some one; — զումեքէ ի խաղաղութիւն, to salute with gentle words; — զոք բանիւք բազմօք, to overload with questions.

Title: Հարցասէր
Definition_1: asking, questioning or seeking after, eager to learn, desirous of information; inquisitive.

Title: Հարցասիրութիւն
Definition_1: desire of knowledge, of information, of learning; inquisitiveness.

Title: Հարցափորձ
Definition_1: interrogation, examination, question, inquiry, proceeding, inquisition; ի հարցափորձ մուծանել, մատնել, cf. Հարցափորձեմ.

Title: Հարցափորձեմ
Definition_1: to interrogate, to question, to examine, to inquire.

Title: Հարցկութիւն
Definition_1: divination; —ս առնել, to divine, to prognosticate.

Title: Հարցն
Definition_1: the Song of the Three Children.

Title: Հարցնափառ
Definition_1: certain short Armenian canticles or hymns so called.

Title: Հարցուած
Definition_1: demand, interrogation, question; —ս առնել, մտտուցանել, to ask or address questions, to question.

Title: Հարցուկ
Definition_1: soothsayer, conjurer; sorceress; այս —, spirit of divination, Pythoness.

Title: Հարօրանամ
Definition_1: to alight or settle on the ground (birds).

Title: Հաց
Definition_1: bread; food, victuals, livelihood; meal, repast, table; — առաջաւորութեան, առաջադրութեան or երեսաց, show-bread; — կենաց, երկնաւոր —, the bread of life; the Eucharist; — սգոյ, նեղութեան, the bread of pain, of affliction; թարմ, կակուղ, քաջեփ or կսկուծ, ջերմ —, new, soft, well baked, hot bread; օթեկ՝ գահ or քարտու, կարծր, անեփ —, stale, hard, half-baked bread; սպիտակ, սեաւ or թուխ —, white, brown bread; տան, հացագործի —, household, baker's bread; — համեմաւոր, gingerbread; անխմոր —, unleavened bread; գետնոյ —, hog's-wort, sow-bread; կեղեւ —ի (կողինձ), bread-crust; ներքին կամ վերին կեղեւ, under-crust or upper-crust; միջուկ —ի, crumb; շերտ —ի կոգեզանդ, slice of bread and butter; կոտոր —ի, a morsel of bread; փշրանք —ի, crumbs; — յարգանակի, sopped bread, panado; — խորովեալ, toast, slice of toast; քրտամբք երեսաց իւրոց գտանել զ— իւր, to get one's bread by the sweat of one's brow; — թրել, գործել, to make, to bake bread; — ունել, to have bread; առանց —ի լինել, not to have bread to eat; չոր — ուտել, to eat dry bread; թանալ զ— իւր արտասուօք, to eat the bread of affliction; —ի բերան վարձու գործել, to serve for his bread; ի — կոչել զոք, to invite to dinner; — մեծ գործել, to give a grand dinner; հաղորդլ ընդ ումեք —իւ, to eat with one; արկանել —, to serve up; to give to eat; — կտրել, բեկանել, բրդել, to cut or break bread; to crumble, to crum; կեղեւել զ—, to cut off the crust, to chip it off; հատանել զ— քաղցելոց, to keep the bread from the hungry; անարժան է —ին զոր ուտէ, he is not worth his salt.

Title: Հացադիր
Definition_1: bread-basket; shepherd's scrip, pouch, bag, satchel.

Title: Հացալից
Definition_1: abounding in bread, in victuals; sated.

Title: Հացակից
Definition_1: messmate; guest; fellow-boarder, table-companion; — լինել, to eat together.

Title: Հացամոլ
Definition_1: abounding in bread or in corn, producing much corn.

Title: Հացանամ
Definition_1: to become bread, to be made into bread.

Title: Հացարարոց
Definition_1: baker's shop; bake-house; — զօրաց, army bakery.

Title: Հացերէց
Definition_1: president of the wedding banquet; bridesman, paranymph.

Title: Հացի
Definition_1: ash-tree; հացեաց դրախտ, ash-grove; — ծառոյ սերմն, cf. Ճնճղկալեզու.

Title: Հացիկ
Definition_1: roll, small loaf; morsel of bread.

Title: Հացկերութիւն
Definition_1: good cheer; banquet, feast; կոչել ի —, to invite to dinner.

Title: Հաւ
Definition_1: bird; hen; cock; grandfather; beginning, rise, origin;
Definition_2: -ք, poultry; ձագ հաւու, վառեկ, chicken, poult; աղբ —ուց, hen-dung; վանդակ —ուց, hen-coop; դադարք —ուց, hen-roost, hen-house; վաճառական —ուց, poulterer; վաճառանոց —ուց, poultry-market; միս —ու, fowl; — խորովեալ, roast fowl; —ն գրգռայ, the hen clucks; եւ խօսեցաւ —, and the cock crowed.

Title: Հաւադէտ
Definition_1: augur, diviner by augury; — լինել, to augur, to divine by -.

Title: Հաւախօս
Definition_2: ի — ի, at cockcrowing, at the peep or break of day.

Title: Հաւակեր
Definition_1: food for birds; ի —երի դնել, ի սատակումն գազանագէշ —երի նուիրել, to give a prey to the fowls of heaven.

Title: Հաւան
Definition_2: consenting, persuaded, convinced; — գտանիլ ընդ, to consent, to assent; ի — ածել, cf. Հաւանեցուցանեմ; ի — գալ, cf. Հաւանիմ; — հաճութեամբ, willingly, with pleasure; —ք եւ հաւասարք, agreeing together, unanimous.

Title: Հաւանական
Definition_1: persuasible, likely, probable, plausible; — է, չէ —, it is likely; unlikely.

Title: Հաւանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to persuade, to induce to believe, to convince; to advise, to induce to do.

Title: Հաւանիմ
Definition_1: to be persuaded, convinced; to acquiesce, to hear, to consent, to agree, to condescend; to accept, to admit, to approve; չ-, to disapprove; որպէս —եալ եմ, as I believe, as I think; որ լռէ՝ —ի, silence gives consent; —իմ, —իմ ընդ այս, I agree to it.

Title: Հաւանութիւն
Definition_1: persuasion, consent, agreement, acquiescence; approbation, suffrage; միաշունչ, միաբան հաւանութեամբ, unanimously, by common accord or agreement, in concert, by a common or unanimous consent, jointly; by mutual agreement; ի հասարակ հաւանութենէ, by common consent; — բերել, to consent, to accord, to agree; ձեռն տալ հաւանութեան, to consent to, to assent; ի — ածել, cf. Հաւանեցուցանեմ; առանց քոյն հաւանութեան, without your consent.

Title: Հաւասար
Definition_1: equal, like, same, conformable; straight, plain, even, level;
Definition_3: —, առ —, equally, alike, likewise, conformably, in the like manner; — թղթոյն, copy, duplicate; — գտանիլ, լինել, to equal, to match, to be on a par or level with; to rank, to be at par; — հրամանին առնուլ զկատարումն, to be executed according to orders or command; զանձն — առնէր աստուծոյ, he made himself equal with God; զօրութիւն եւ դաւ — են առաջն նորա, force or stratagem are the same to him.

Title: Հաւասարազօր
Definition_1: of the same power; isodynamic; equivalent, equipollent.

Title: Հաւասարակշիռ
Definition_1: of the same weight; equivalent, equal; — լինել, to counterbalance, to countervail; կատարելութիւնք նորա — ախտիցն են, his good qualities compensate his vices.

Title: Հաւասարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render equal, to equal; to equalize, to level, to make even, level or smooth, to equal, to compare; to counterbalance; to communicate, to make a sharer or partaker.

Title: Հաւասարիմ
Definition_1: to equal, to match, to be on a par or level with, to liken oneself to, to make oneself equal or conformable with, to be compared, confronted with; to communicate, to participate, to share; —իմ ընդ կնոջ, to be united, to conjoin.

Title: Հաւասարութիւն
Definition_1: equality, parity; uniformity, conformity; comparison, likening; equalization; participation, sharing; union, concord, agreement; գալ ի — ընդ, to equal;

Title: Հաւաստեաւ
Definition_1: certainly, truly, doubtlessly, assuredly, positively, upon good grounds.

Title: Հաւաստեմ
Definition_1: to show, to prove, to confirm; to justify, to vindicate; to certify, to assure; to search into, to go to the bottom of, to sift, to investigate.

Title: Հաւաստի
Definition_1: certain, true, indubitable, sure, convincing, conclusive, incontestable, positive; demonstrative, justificative;
Definition_2: cf. Հաւաստեաւ; — կորուստ, certain loss; — գիտել, to know for certain; — առնել, to assure, to convince, to prove; — իմն է զի, it is certain that.

Title: Հաւաստիք
Definition_1: certitude, assurance, good authority, best source; demonstration, token, testimony, proof; — բարձր ակնածութեան, assurance of the highest regard; ընդունել զ—իս մեծարանաց, to be assured of his highest esteem.

Title: Հաւատ
Definition_1: faith, belief, creed; trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness, good faith, sincerity; proof, testimony, evidence; Creed; —ք, յոյս եւ սէր, faith, hope and charity; քրիստոնէական —ք, the Christian religion; դաւանութիւն —ոյ, profession of faith; լոյս, ջահն —ոյ, the light of faith; մասունք, սահմանք —ոց, articles of faith; կենդանի, անյողդողդ or հաստատուն, գայթ ի գայթի, մեռեալ —ք, lively, resolute, constant or unshaken, tottering or wavering, dead faith; անխտիր ի —ս, indifferent as to religious matters; դաւանել զ—ս, to confess the faith; ունել —ս, to have faith; չունել ոչ —ս ոչ օրէնս, to regard neither law nor gospel; գալ, դառնալ ի —ս, to become converted; ածել, ձգել ի —ս, to convert; հաստատուն լինել ի —ս, to be true to the faith; —ս ի ներքս բերել, —ս բերել, to believe, to give credit to; —ս ընծայել, to believe in, to give faith to; —ս ունել յոք, to trust, to place faith in, to put trust in; — տալ միմեանց, to make a contract, to contract an alliance, to enter into an engagement, to bind oneself; ուրանել զ—ս, to deny or abjure the faith; յորում ոչ գոյ —, unbelief; անցանէ ըստ —ս, it is incredible; —ոյ, worthy of credit; cf. Թերանամ.

Title: Հաւատադրուժ
Definition_1: false-hearted, faithless, perfidious, unfaithful, disloyal; perjured, forsworn; — լինել, to infringe or break one's faith, to be false.

Title: Հաւատալի
Definition_1: credible, worthy of belief, to be believed; չ— իմն է, one can hardly believe it, it is incredible.

Title: Հաւատակից
Definition_1: of the same belief, faith or religion, coreligionary.

Title: Հաւատակցութիւն
Definition_1: having the same religion or faith.

Title: Հաւատամ
Definition_1: to believe, to give credit to; to confess; to persuade oneself; to commit oneself, to trust to, to confide in, to rely on; չ-, to disbelieve; — յաստուած, to believe in God; — բոլորով սրտիւ, to believe firmly, with all one's heart; — ամենայն բանի, to believe every thing; — զոք, to side with, to second, to lend an ear to.

Title: Հաւատասահման
Definition_1: establishing, setting forth the articles of faith.

Title: Հաւատարիմ
Definition_1: faithful, loyal, honest, trusty, trustworthy; confident; true, sure, certain, real;
Definition_2: cf. Հաւատարմաբար; — լինել, to be verified, confirmed, proved; to be justified; to be trusted, believed, adopted, or accepted; — կալ, մնալ, to rest or remain faithful to; — առնել, to prove, to justify, to verify, to accredit, to give credit to, to make credible; — առնել զոք, to assure, to cause to believe, to persuade.

Title: Հաւատարմանամ
Definition_1: to be faithful; to be confirmed, verified, justified; —նայ լուրս, this news gains credit.

Title: Հաւատարմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make credible, to give to believe, to persuade, to convince; to sanction, to certify, to confirm, to affirm, to assure.

Title: Հաւատարմութիւն
Definition_1: fidelity, loyalty; good faith, honesty, plain-dealing, sincerity; confidence, security; certitude, certainty, assurance.

Title: Հաւատացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to believe, to persuade, to convince; to impose upon.

Title: Հաւատափոխ
Definition_1: abjuring, changing one's faith; — լինել, to change one's faith, to renounce one's belief, to abjure one's religion.

Title: Հաւաքեմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to gather together, to collect; to amass, to hoard, to accumulate, to heap up; to infer, to conclude; to concentrate; to compile; to stock; — զանձն, զխորհուրդս or զմիտս, to retire within oneself; to collect one's thoughts, to meditate.

Title: Հաւաքումն
Definition_1: collection, gathering, receipt; congestion; assemblage, set, body; argument, reasoning; concentration; compilation.

Title: Հաւուկ
Definition_1: little bird, nestling a pretty -; chicken, chick.

Title: Հաւորս
Definition_1: bird-catcher, fowler; bird of prey; bird-call.

Title: Հաւորսութիւն
Definition_1: bird-catching, fowling; եղանակ հաւորսութեան, shooting season.

Title: Հեգնաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak ironically, to laugh at, to jeer, to taunt.

Title: Հեգնաբանութիւն
Definition_1: ironical speech or discourse, irony, quizzing, jeering, taunting, sarcasm.

Title: Հեգնեմ
Definition_1: to quiz, to deride, to ridicule, to jeer; to gibe, to despise.

Title: Հեգնութիւն
Definition_1: irony, sarcasm, taunt, jeer, scoff, derision, mockery;

Title: Հեզ
Definition_1: mild, meek, gentle, affable; calm, tranquil, still;

Title: Հեզաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak utter or pronounce gently, gracefully.

Title: Հեզացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render mild, affable, pleasing, agreeable, to soften, to appease, to pacify, to calm, to quiet.

Title: Հեզութիւն
Definition_1: sweetness of temper or disposition, mildness, gentleness, sweetness, affability, kindness, courteousness.

Title: Հեթանոս
Definition_1: heathen, pagan, paynim, gentile; infidel, idolater, barbarian; nation, people; —ք, the heathen.

Title: Հեթանոսացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to gentilize, to paganize, to heathenize, to convert to gentilism.

Title: Հելլենացի
Definition_1: cf. Հելլեն; — լեզու, the greek tongue or language; — գրել, խօսել, to write in greek; to speak greek.

Title: Հեծանահերձ
Definition_1: that splits or cuts joists or rafters.

Title: Հեծանաձգութիւն
Definition_1: order or position of rafters; woodwork, frame-work;

Title: Հեծանիմ
Definition_1: to mount, to ride; — ի կառս, ի ձի, to mount or enter a carriage or vehicle; to ride, to mount on horseback; — ի նաւ, to go on shipboard, to embark; անհամետ —, to ride bare-back; յորս —, to go a hunting or shooting; զհետ —, to chase, to give chase to, to persecute, to set off in pursuit of, to pursue; յաւար —, to plunder, to pillage, to sack; ապրեցաւ հեծեալ ձիով, he fled on horseback; cf. Կառք.

Title: Հեծեալ
Definition_3: versifier; —ք, cavalry, horse.

Title: Հեծելութիւն
Definition_1: riding; horsemanship, equitation; հանդերձ հեծելութեան, riding habit; կրկէս հեծելութեան, manege; raceground, course; hippodrome; մարզիչ եւ մարզարան հեծելութեան, riding-master, riding-school.

Title: Հեծեծեմ
Definition_1: to groan, to lament, to sigh for, to fill the air with sighing.

Title: Հեծկլտամ
Definition_1: to sob, to hiccup, to have the hiccups.

Title: Հեծուկ
Definition_1: the fork, the seat of a horseman.

Title: Հեծուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make mount, to put on.

Title: Հեկեկամ
Definition_1: to sob, to sigh, to groan.

Title: Հեղանիմ
Definition_1: to flow, to be poured out, to spread over; to be shed.

Title: Հեղգ
Definition_1: idle, lazy, slothful, sluggish, tardy, dull, slow, lukewarm, cowardly; listless, careless.

Title: Հեղգալուր
Definition_1: turning a deaf ear, listless, disobedient; — լինել, to turn a deaf ear, to simulate deafness, to disobey.

Title: Հեղգանամ
Definition_1: to be idle, lazy, indolent, slothful.

Title: Հեղգասիրտ
Definition_1: heavy-hearted; — ի հաւատալ, slow of heart, slow to believe.

Title: Հեղգութիւն
Definition_1: idleness, laziness, supineness, slowness, tardiness, listlessness, negligence, lukewarmness, indifference.

Title: Հեղեղ
Definition_1: torrent, flood, inundation, overflow; — ջուրց, deluge; — հրոյ, torrent of flame; — մարդկան, throng of people, crowd, immense concourse; —ս արտասուց իջուցանել, to shed a flood of tears; հոսէին արսուք իբրեւ զ—, tears ran down in torrents.

Title: Հեղեղեմ
Definition_1: to inundate, to submerge, to cover with water; to overflow, to lay under water; to hurl or fling down, to precipitate.

Title: Հեղինակ
Definition_1: cf. Առաջնորդ; cf. Գտակ; cf. Մատենագիր.

Title: Հեղձամահ
Definition_1: choked; strangled; drowned; — լինել, to be -; — առնել, to choke, to stifle, to suffocate, to drown.

Title: Հեղձամղձուկ
Definition_1: suffocated, choked, oppressed, agitated, disquieted, grievous, anxious; suffocating, stifling; — օդ կամ ջերմութիւն, sultry weather or heat; — հազ, a stifling cough; hooping cough; — ձայնիւ, in a stifled voice; — ի վշտացն, loaded with grief; woe-begone; — արտասունք, repressed tears; — առնել, to stifle, to choke; to smother, to suffocate; to drown; — լինել ի բարկութէնէ, to be half choked with rage or anger; — լինէր սիրտ իմ, my heart was ready to break, was oppressed with grief; cf. Հառաչանք.

Title: Հեղձանիմ
Definition_1: to choke, to be suffocated, stifled, drowned.

Title: Հեղձուցանեմ
Definition_1: to suffocate, to choke, to strangle, to drown; to oppress.

Title: Հեղում
Definition_1: to pour, to pour out, to empty, to pour forth, to shed; to diffuse, to scatter, to disperse, to spread; — զանձն առաջին տեառն, to pour out one's soul before the Lord; — զսիրտ իւր առաջի ուրուք, to open one's heart, to unbosom oneself to; — զբարկութիւն, զսրտմտութիւն իւր ի վերայ ուրուք, to give vent to anger, to discharge one's wrath upon; — կռոց նուէրս, to pour out libations to idols; — արիւն բազում, արեան ճապաղիս —, to cause immense bloodshed, to shed torrents of blood; արտօսր —, to shed tears; — զարիւն իւր, to shed one's blood.

Title: Հեղում
Definition_1: to be poured out, to flow, to spread; to be shed, scattered, diffused; to rush, to fall; to burst; հեղաւ ամենայն փոր նորա, all his bowels gushed out; անկաւ հեղաւ զկնի կռոցն, he followed idols; հեղեալ ցասմամբ, very angrily, wrathfully.

Title: Հեղուսեմ
Definition_1: cf. Բեւեռեմ; to write, to compose.

Title: Հեճուկք
Definition_1: spite, despite; —կս առնել, to do any thing out of spite or through spite, to despite, to spite, to vex; իբրեւ ումեք —կս առնելոյ, in spite of one, to vex one.

Title: Հենգն
Definition_1: jeer, scoff, taunt; mockery, jeering, irony, derision; rivalry, strife, contest; spite;
Definition_2: ընդ —, ընդ —գս, ironically, derisively, tauntingly; against, in dispite of, in contempt of, in defiance of; ընդ — ելանել, ի — արկանել, to scoff at, to laugh at, to ridicule, to quiz, to deride, to taunt, to jeer at; կալ ի — ի or ի — ոջ, to do in spite of, to despite, to object to, to dispute or wrangle; to vie with.

Title: Հենում
Definition_1: to weave, to warp, to plait; զչարութիւն ի ներքոյ ոստայն —, to machinate, to plot, to hatch wickedness.

Title: Հեշտ
Definition_2: easy, commodious; voluptuous; — պաշտօն, volunteer service; — ցանկութիւն, voluptuousness, concupiscence, lust;
Definition_3: ըստ —ի, at will, at pleasure, at one's ease; — եւ համբոյր մտօք, affably, benignly, kindly, condescendingly; զ— ցանկութեան զհետ անցանել, to give oneself up to pleasures; ըստ իւրեանց —ի գնալ, to go one's own way, at one's leisure, at one's ease; to live as one likes, to follow the bent of one's own inclinations.

Title: Հեշտալից
Definition_1: delectable, agreeable, sweet, relishing, amusing; delicious; voluptuous.

Title: Հեշտականութիւն
Definition_1: convenience, ease, leisure; pleasure, amusement, sport; voluptuousness.

Title: Հեշտանամ
Definition_1: to delight, to rejoice, to amuse, enjoy or divert oneself, to take pleasure or delight in, to lead a voluptuous life, to live in the midst of luxury, to give oneself up to amusement.

Title: Հեշտասուն
Definition_1: delicate, soft, effeminate; — գրգարան, paradise of delights.

Title: Հեշտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make easy, to facilitate; to rejoice, to divert, to cheer; to delight, to please, to charm.

Title: Հեշտեաւ
Definition_1: easily, with ease, naturally; conveniently, comfortably.

Title: Հեշտընկալ
Definition_1: easy to comprehend, obvious, plain, intelligible, clear, evident; pleasant, commodious.

Title: Հեշտոց
Definition_1: soft or downy place of repose; stuffed chair; spring sofa, feather bed.

Title: Հեշտութիւն
Definition_1: ease, convenience, facility, commodity, comfort; delights, joys, pleasure, voluptuousness; հեշտութեամբ, cf. Հեշտաբար.

Title: Հեռ
Definition_1: discord, strife, wrangling; hate, spite, ill-will, rancour;

Title: Հեռագիր
Definition_1: telegraph; ելեկտրական, գրաւոր or տպող, նշանաւոր, ստեղնաւոր, ցուցակաւոր, ծովածածուկ, կրելի, electric, printing, signal, keyed, dial, submarine, portable -.

Title: Հեռադիտակ
Definition_1: telescope; — գիշերային, night-glass; — անդրադարձութեամբ, բեկբեկմամբ, reflecting, refracting telescope.

Title: Հեռակէտ
Definition_1: highest pitch, tip-top; — երկրի, apogee; — արեգական, aphelion, aphelium.

Title: Հեռամ
Definition_1: to dispute, to contend for, to quarrel; to bear a hatred to, to loathe, to hate, to bear or owe a grudge, malice or ill-will.

Title: Հեռանամ
Definition_1: to remove, to go away or far, to leave, to swerve, to deviate, to depart, to start; to absent oneself; to withdraw; cf. Սիրտ.

Title: Հեռաստան
Definition_2: distant place or country, the distance;
Definition_3: ի — է, from afar, afar. off, at a great distance.

Title: Հեռատես
Definition_1: far-sighted, presbyte; — միտք, witty, subtle, ingenious, perspicacious, sharp; provident.

Title: Հեռացումն
Definition_3: elongation.

Title: Հեռացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to remove, to put or set aside, to scatter, to avert, to keep off; —ցո՛ ի քէն զկագ, avoid quarrelling.

Title: Հեռաւոր
Definition_1: remote, removed, distant, far off; absent.

Title: Հեռաւորութիւն
Definition_1: remoteness, distance; absence, length, space, interval;

Title: Հեռի
Definition_2: far; — առնել, տանել, to remove far off; to scatter; to turn aside or away, to avert, to ward off; — ունել, to keep away, or at a distance; — ունել զանձն յիմեքէ, to keep off, to avert; to abstain, to refrain; — առնիմ, լինիմ, cf. Հեռանամ; աստուած իմ, միʼ — առնիր յինէն, remove not Thyself, o God, from me!.

Title: Հեսկեան
Definition_1: long fillets or bandages for the legs; cf. Կեմ; —ք առագաստեայ, sail-rope or cordage.

Title: Հեստ
Definition_1: contumacious, refractory, froward, wayward, wilful, disobedient, transgressing, restive, stubborn; rebellious.

Title: Հեստիմ
Definition_1: to contravene, to transgress, to infringe, to disobey, to oppose; to be refractory, disobedient, to mutiny, to revolt, to rebel.

Title: Հեստութիւն
Definition_1: transgression, disobedience, refusal, contumacy, opposition, resistance; rebellion.

Title: Հետ
Definition_1:
trace, track, print, foot-mark; vestige, footstep; pace, step; way, path; —ք, iron rail, rail; ի —ոյ, from behind, from the rear; —ք նաւու, track of a ship; —ք կառաց, cart-rut, wheel-rut; —ք ամպոց, traces of cloud; —ք գազանաց, trail, track or scent of animals; —ք վիրաց, cicatrix, scar; վաղվաղակի կամ զ—, quick ! come on ! courage !
կորուսանել զ—ս, to lose the traces of; զ— լինել, to apply oneself, to give or addict oneself; ընդունայն զ— եղեն, they have attempted or tried in vain.

Title: Հետազօտեմ
Definition_1: to trace out, to try to find out, to pry into, to search, to hunt or ferret out, to inquire, to investigate, to examine, to scrutinize; խորազնին —, to search into, to go to the bottom of, to sift, to investigate; — զպատճառս, to trace back to the first cause, origin or principle, to ascend to the original source.

Title: Հետախաղաղ՞՞՞ծածկեմ
Definition_1: to hide, to put out of sight; to destroy, to exterminate; — կորնչել յամպս, to be lost in the clouds, to be cloud-topped.

Title: Հետախոյզ
Definition_1: scenting, tracking; prying, hunting, investigating, pursuing; inquisitive.

Title: Հետակորոյս առնեմ
Definition_1: to utterly destroy, to cause to disappear, to wipe out, to obliterate, to exterminate;
Definition_2: — լինել, to be lost, destroyed, obliterated, exterminated.

Title: Հետակտուր
Definition_1: outrider, guide; —կտուր առնել, to open the way, to guide.

Title: Հետահան
Definition_2: ichneumon; —հան լինիմ, to arrive with, to catch one.

Title: Հետամուտ
Definition_1: pursuing, hunting; eager, forward, aspiring or longing for; candidate, competent, concurrent; rival, emulous; — լինել, to pursue, to run after, to chase, to give chase to, to follow close;
Definition_2: to aspire, to aim at, to concur, to compete; — լինել թշնամւոյն, to fall upon the enemy.

Title: Հետամտեմ
Definition_1: to pursue, to run after; to accompany, to go with, to attend, to compete.

Title: Հետավար լինիմ
Definition_1: to set off in pursuit, in search of, to pursue.

Title: Հետավարեմ
Definition_1: to send after, to cause to pursue.

Title: Հետաքնին
Definition_1: inquisitive, curious; — լինել, to be -; to examine, to investigate, to search into.

Title: Հետաքրքրութիւն
Definition_1: curiosity, inquisitiveness; գրգռել, շարժել զ—, to excite, to stir up one's curiosity.

Title: Հետեւակ
Definition_2: hackneyed, trite, common-place, trivial, ordinary; in prose, prosaic;
Definition_3: foot-soldier; quadruped;
Definition_4: ի — ուց, on foot, afoot; —ք, — զօրք, infantry, foot-soldiers; — արձան, անդրի, pedestrian statue; — կրթութիւն, pedestrian exercise; — որսորդութիւն, hunting on foot; — ձաղումն, infantry triumph; — բանք, trite, hackneyed or common-place saying, vulgarity of expression; — գովութիւնք, vulgar praises; — երթալ, to go on foot; —ս խօսել, to talk common-place.

Title: Հետեւակեմ
Definition_1: to go on foot, to walk; կորուսանել զկիրթ —կելոյ, to lose the habit of walking.

Title: Հետեւանք
Definition_2: corollary; —նս հանել, to deduce, to infer; ծանր լիցին — գործոյս, this affair will have unpleasant or serious consequences.

Title: Հետեւիմ
Definition_1: to follow, to accompany, to attend, to go with; to follow, to follow in the steps of, to imitate; to follow, to go or come after, to result, to derive, to proceed, come from; — շաւղաց ուրուք, to follow in the steps of, to go after; — ի մօտոյ, to follow closely, near;

Title: Հետեւեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to follow, to induce; to infer, to conclude, to draw a conclusion.

Title: Հետեւող
Definition_1: follower, imitator; — լինել, գտանել, to follow, to imitate.

Title: Հետեւողութիւն
Definition_1: consequence; inference, conclusion; imitation; հետեւողութեամբ, in imitation of, in the manner or style of.

Title: Հետզհետէ
Definition_1: successively, by turns, one after another, consecutively; in proportion; by degrees.

Title: Հետէ
Definition_1: from; after, since; ի մանկութենէ —, from infancy, from the cradle; յայնմ ժամանակէ —, from that time; յայնմ —, since then, ever since, since that epoch; ի բազմաց —, long since, of old; ի սկզբանէ —, from the beginning; յայսմ — եւ աեդր, յայնմ — եւ այսր, henceforward, henceforth, hereafter; յայսմ — եւ առ յապա, henceforth; ի տասն ամաց —, ten years since, ten years ago; յայգուէ —, since morning; ի սամուէլի —, since Samuel.

Title: Հետի
Definition_1: after; after that; — աղագս գտանել, to shut the stable door when the horse is stolen.

Title: Հետի
Definition_2: —, ի —, on foot, afoot; — ընթանալ, to run or hasten on foot.

Title: Հետիոտից
Definition_1: on foot; — գնալ, ընթանալ, to go on foot, to walk; գնալ — նեղութեամբ, to trudge along.

Title: Հեր
Definition_1: hair; —ք, head of hair; cf. Մազ; անբոյս ի —աց, bald; հոպոպիք —աց, curls, ringlets; հիւսք —աց, tress or lock of hair, tresses, plait of hair; cf. Հիւսք; բուսանել —աց, growth of hair; թափիլ —աց, falling of the hair; փոքրել, հատանել, խուզել, կտրել զ—ս, to cut the hair; to crop; to shave the head; ճողել, փետել զ—ս առ ցաւոյն or յուսահատութեան, to tear one's hair for grief or despair; ունել, կալնուլ, ձգել զ—աց, to hold, to pull one by the hair; զմիմեանց ձգձգել զ—ս, զմիմեանս ձգել զ—աց, to take one another by the hair; խոպոպել, գանգրել, ծնրել զ—ս, to curl, to put on ringlets, to frizz the hair; սանտրել զ—ս, to comb one's hair; ներկել զ—ս, to dye one's hair; խրձացուցանել, խոզանել, հարթուցանել զ—ս, to cause the hair to stand on end; to ruffle the hair; cf. Ծառ; քստմնիլ, խրձանալ —աց, to bristle, to stand on end; թափել զ—ս, to destroy hair, to depilate; —ք նախաբոյսք են քան զմօրուս, the hair grows before the beard; դեռաբոյս —ք ի ծնօտս տիգեալ, new beard; —ք ծնրեալ եւ գանգրեալ, —քն ծալ ի ծալ, curly, frizzed hair; —ք քստմնեալ ի վեր դիզացեալ, with bristling hair; with hair upstanding; քստմնեալ դիզանին —ք զգլխով, the hair stood on end; blood ran cold; սպիտակին, ծաղկին —ք իմ, my hair grows grey, I begin to grow grey-haired, I begin to get grey.

Title: Հերակլեան
Definition_1: herculean, of Hercules; — արձանք, the pillars of Hercules.

Title: Հերապանծ
Definition_1: having a superb head of hair, long-haired, bushy-haired; proud of his hair;

Title: Հերաքարշ առնեմ
Definition_1: to hold or pull one by the hair.

Title: Հերիք
Definition_1: sufficient, enough; capable, able; — է, it is enough, sufficient, it suffices; — համարիլ, to be content, to content oneself; — լինել յամս, to be adult, of age; երբեք — ոչ ասէ, he never says, hold! enough!.

Title: Հերիքանամ
Definition_1: to suffice, to be sufficient or enough; to be adequate.

Title: Հերկ
Definition_1: tillage, plough, culture, tilth; ploughed land; — or —ս հարկանել, —ս հերկել, cf. Հերկեմ.

Title: Հերկեմ
Definition_1: to plough, to till, to cultivate.

Title: Հերձեմ
Definition_1: to cleave, to split, to divide, to cut; to chop; to crack; to tear; to dissect, to anatomize; to cleave diamonds;
Definition_2: to disunite, to sow division, to make a breach between, to bring out a scission; — զմորթ մարմնոյ, to chap; — զապակիս, to crack; — նաւի զծով, to plough the sea, to run a-head, to have head-way.

Title: Հերձատեմ
Definition_1: to split, to rive; to crack, to chop, to cut, to tear.

Title: Հերձնում
Definition_1: to be split or cloven, to crack, to burst; to be torn or rent.

Title: Հերձուած
Definition_1: division, separation; scission, rupture, disunion, discord, dissent, schism; sect; heresy; — առնել, to bring about a scission; to sow discord; եղեւ — ի ժողովըրդեանն վասն նորա, there was a division among the people because of him; դարձեալ — լինէր ի մեջ հրէից, there was a dissension therefore again among the Jews; — անկեալ էր ի մէջ նոցա, they were divided among themselves; they were at variance.

Title: Հերձուածապետ
Definition_1: chief of a schism, of a sect; heresiarch.

Title: Հերձումն
Definition_1: cleavage, cleaving; greet; cf. Հերձուած; — որովային, gastrotomy.

Title: Հերու
Definition_1: last year, since last year; long time since, for a long time past, long ago, long since.

Title: Հերքեմ
Definition_1: to repulse, to reprove, to refute, to contradict; ի բաց —, to refuse, to reject;

Title: Հեւամ
Definition_1: to pant, to puff, to be breathless; cf. Թասեմ.

Title: Հզօր
Definition_1: strong, powerful, mighty, vigorous, valiant; robust, lusty, stout; potent, energetic, efficacious; —ն, —ն երկնից եւ երկրի, the Almighty, Omnipotent; —ք, the mighty of the earth; — զօրութեամբ, very strong, most valiant, mighty; — թեւարկու, a professed or open protector.

Title: Հզօրագոյնս
Definition_1: strongly, vigorously, stoutly, powerfully, mightily, potently.

Title: Հզօրանամ
Definition_1: to grow stronger, to become more powerful, to make or render oneself potent, mighty; to gather strength, to be strengthened.

Title: Հզօրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render stronger, more powerful; to strengthen, to invigorate, to fortify.

Title: Հզօրեղ
Definition_1: sturdy, robust, very strong, very stout.

Title: Հէն
Definition_1: marauder, rover, robber, brigand; — ծովու, sea-robber, pirate, free-booter, corsair, sea-rover; —ք, marauding, plundering; piracy; հինից պարապիլ, to become a highwayman, to rob, to plunder; հինի or հինիւ ելանել, to take to the highway, to over-run or scour, to make incursions; զի՞նչ քան զայն — եւ աղաղակ կայցէ, what can be more grievous or more barbarous than that ?.

Title: Հիանալի
Definition_1: wonderful, surprising, marvelous, astonishing, stupendous, ravishing, charming.

Title: Հիանամ
Definition_1: to wonder, to marvel, to be astonished, surprised, amazed; to fall into ecstasies or raptures, to fall from the clouds; հիացեալ զարմանամ, I am lost in wonder, I am filled with admiration.

Title: Հիացումն
Definition_1: admiration, astonishment, surprise, wonder; charm, enchantment; ecstasy; աստուածահրաշ —, rapture, trance, divine ecstasy; — or ի — ածել, — արկանել, cf. Հիացուցանեմ; լինել ի —, to be the admiration of; արկանել — ի վերայ ուրուք, to plunge into ecstasies, to enrapture; — է մտաց լսել, it is surprising to hear.

Title: Հիացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to astonish, to surprise, to amaze, to astound, to enchant, to charm to admiration, to strike with amazement.

Title: Հիմն
Definition_1: foundation; base, basis; foot, bottom; back, back part; foundation, establishment;
Definition_2: — աղանալի, salifiable base; — ի վեր, from top to bottom; thoroughly, utterly; — ի յատակ, to its very foundations; down to the ground, to the bottom; — or հիմունս արկանել, to lay the foundations of, to found; — ի վեր առնել, կործանել, տապալել, յատակել, to cast to the earth, to throw, cast or pull down, to overthrow, to overwhelm, to subvert, to demolish, destroy or ruin utterly; ի հիմանց կործանիլ, to be overthrown; — լինել իրիք, to be the foundation of; անկանիլ հիման, to have laid the foundation; ի վերայ հաստատուն հիման, on a solid foundation.

Title: Հիմնադրեմ
Definition_1: to found, to build, to lay the foundations; to institute, to establish.

Title: Հիմնայատակ առնեմ
Definition_1: to demolish, to raze, to level with the ground.

Title: Հիմնեմ
Definition_1: to found, to establish, to lay the foundation, to build.

Title: Հիմնովին
Definition_1: thoroughly, to the bottom; — գիտել, ուսանել, to know, to learn -.

Title: Հին
Definition_3: ի հնումն, anciently, formerly, a longtime since, in days of yore; ի — or ի հնոց ժամանակաց, ի հնոց ժամանակաց հետէ, ab antiquo; — կտակարան, the old testament; — մատեանք, ancient codes; ի հնումն եւ ի նորումն, in ancient and modern law; — լուսին, waning moon; հին աւուրց, old aged in years, grown old; — աւուրցն, Ancient of days, the Eternal, the Most High; — աւուրց մանուկն, the Eternal Son; — աւուրց զօրական, a veteran; անտառ — աւուրց մայրեաց, a forest of ancient cedars; — աւուրց ատելութիան, rancour, inveterate hate.

Title: Հինահար
Definition_1: marauder, plunderer, robber, brigand; — առնել, to go marauding, to plunder, to pillage, to sack, to ravage, to rifle.

Title: Հինգ
Definition_1: five; fifth; երիւք հնգօք ամօք, for fifteen years, for three lustra; պակաս քան զյիսուն հնգիւ չափ, forty five; որ օր — էր ամսոյն, on the fifth day of the month.

Title: Հինգամեայ
Definition_1: of five years, five years old; — շրջան ուսմանց, quinquennium.

Title: Հինգերորդ
Definition_3: the fifth part.

Title: Հինգերորդեմ
Definition_1: to contribute the fifth part of, to take up or give the fifth part of the fruits.

Title: Հինգկնեմ
Definition_1: to quintuple, to increase five fold.

Title: Հինգհարիւրեակ
Definition_1: of — years; —եակ բոլոր, Dionysian or Victorian period, years.

Title: Հինգշաբաթի
Definition_1: thursday; աւագ, մեծ —, holy -; գէր —, shrove -.

Title: Հինգօրեայ
Definition_2: thursday, the fifth day; — ջերմն, quintan, five-day fever.

Title: Հինօրեայ
Definition_1: old, aged, in years; inveterate; — հիւանդութիւն, chronic distemper.

Title: Հիռ
Definition_1: turn; — գալ, to turn round and round; to revolve; — շրջանակել, to turn, to turn or whirl round, to revolve.

Title: Հիրիկ
Definition_2: flag, iris; — լճասէր, halophila, sword-grass, yellow waterflag.

Title: Հիւանդ
Definition_1: sick, ill, unwell, unhealthy, diseased; suffering, patient; invalid, infirm; — լինել, cf. Հիւանդանամ; լինել մահացու, վտանգաւոր —, լինել — ի մահ, to fall seriously ill, dangerously ill; դարմանել, խնամել զ—, հսկել առ —ին, to nurse, to take care of, to tend, to assist, to watch by, to sit up by; յայց ելանել —աց, to visit patients; — հոգւով եւ մարմնով, ill both in body and mind; — եղէ, I have been ill.

Title: Հիւանդակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to be or fall sick together; to be struck with the same illness.

Title: Հիւանդանամ
Definition_1: to fall sick, to be ill.

Title: Հիւանդատես
Definition_1: visiting the sick; — գալ, to visit the sick.

Title: Հիւանդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fall sick, to make ill or infirm.

Title: Հիւանդաքայլ
Definition_1: tottering, vacillating or walking slowly or feebly like a sick person.

Title: Հիւանդոտ
Definition_1: weakly, sickly, of unsound constitution, infirm, valetudinary.

Title: Հիւանդութիւն
Definition_1: indisposition, ailing, illness, sickness, infirmity, disease, complaint, disorder, malady, distemper; passion; թեթեւ, դժնդակ, վտանգաւոր, մահացու, ծանր —, slight, painful, dangerous, serious, fatal illness; հիւանդանալ —, անկանել ի —, to catch, to contract a disease; ախտանալ — անբուժելի, to be seized with an incurable malady; զայրացուցանել կամ մեղմացուցանել զ—, to increase, to alleviate pain or sickness; բժշկալ զ—, to cure; անցուցանել զ—, բժշկիլ, կազդուրիլ ի —թէնէ, to get well, to be cured, recovered from illness; կեղծել զ—, to feign sickness; cf. Թօթափիմ, cf. Հինօրեայ.

Title: Հիւթ
Definition_1: humour; moisture; succulency; — պտղոց, juice; syrup; — բուսոց, sap; — մսոյ, gravy; — փորոտեաց, intestinal juices; — ստամոքային, gastric juice; ապակային —, vitreous humour.

Title: Հիւթեղ
Definition_1: full of humours, plethoric; juicy, succulent; — երկիր, fertile, fruitful land.

Title: Հիւթեմ
Definition_1: to form, to compose of matter.

Title: Հիւլէական
Definition_1: atomical, corpuscular; molecular; — փիլիսոփայ, atomist; — դրութիւն, atomism.

Title: Հիւծ
Definition_1: lean, emaciated, thin, extenuated; shrivelled, shrunk, withered.

Title: Հիւծեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make lean, to extenuate, to emaciate.

Title: Հիւծիմ
Definition_1: to grow lean, to get thin, to shrink, to waste, to fall or pine away, to wither, to languish, to droop, to dwindle away, to decay; — լուսնի, to wane.

Title: Հիւծեալ
Definition_1: lean, meagre, poor, thin, puny; լուսին —, waning moon.

Title: Հիւծումն
Definition_1: decay, decline, dwindling away, leanness, marasmus, consumption.

Title: Հիւպատոս
Definition_1: consul; փոխան —ի, vice-consul; ի —տոջն, during the consulate of.

Title: Հիւս
Definition_1: texture, tissue; tress; braid; intertwining, interweaving, wreathing; knit; դեղձան —ք, golden tresses; — ձեան, avalanche, snow-slip.

Title: Հիւսակ
Definition_1: tress; braid; plait; — վարսից, tresses, plait of hair.

Title: Հիւսեմ
Definition_1: to weave; to plait; to braid; to twist, to enlace, to entwine, to intertwine; to knit;
Definition_2: to compose, to write; — զնենգութիւն, to hatch wickedness, to frame or get up a plot, to machinate, to devise.

Title: Հիւսիս
Definition_1: the north, septentrion; north-wind, aquilon, Boreas; գոռ, ամեհի —, the bleak north-wind, the lowering boreal winds.

Title: Հիւսիսաբնակ
Definition_1: inhabiting the north, northern, northerly, boreal, septentrional, hyperborean.

Title: Հիւսիսակողմ
Definition_1: north-side, the north, northward; ի — կղզւոյն, to the north of the isle.

Title: Հիւսկէն
Definition_1: woven, plaited; twisted, knit; open, in open-work;

Title: Հիւսնեմ
Definition_1: to carpenter, to work in carpentry.

Title: Հիւսուած
Definition_1: texture, tissue; tress, plait, braid; entwining, interweaving, contexture, composition; — բազմախորշ, ցանցակերպ, բազմանօթ, cellular, reticular, vascular texture.

Title: Հիւրամեծար
Definition_1: most hospitable, practising hospitality or liberality towards strangers.

Title: Հիւրանամ
Definition_1: to be a guest, to receive hospitality.

Title: Հիւրասէր
Definition_1: fond of receiving or entertaining strangers, generous, hospitable.

Title: Հիւրընկալեմ
Definition_1: to receive travellers, to welcome, to entertain, to lodge, to shelter.

Title: Հիւրութիւն
Definition_1: quality of a guest or stranger; pilgrimage.

Title: Հիքացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render unhappy or wretched, to ruin.

Title: Հլու
Definition_1: good-natured, condescending, complying, docile; pliant, supple, yielding; — բնութիւն, pliant or flexible temper.

Title: Հլութիւն
Definition_1: obedience, docility, deference, pliancy; ի — ածել, to render docile or obedient.

Title: Հծծեմ
Definition_1: to whisper; to murmur; — ումեք յունկանէ or յունկն, to whisper in a person's ear.

Title: Հմակեր
Definition_1: eating raw flesh, crudivorous, omophagous; ferocious.

Title: Հմայեմ
Definition_1: to divine, to augur, to prognosticate, to bewitch, to conjure, to charm, to enchant; հմայեալ հայելիք, magic glass; cf. Թուղթ.

Title: Հմայք
Definition_1: divination, augury, prognostication, witchcraft, sorcery, conjuration, enchantment; — յանուանէ, onomancy, nomancy; չարագոյժ —, evil presage; հմայութիւնս առնել, հմայս հմայել, to seek a sign or augury; to believe in divination; cf. Հմայեմ; հմայից անսալ, to have faith in diviners; լուծան հմայք, the charm is broken.

Title: Հմուտ
Definition_1: well versed, erudite, learned; practised, expert, experienced, skilful, skilled.

Title: Հմտանամ
Definition_1: to be well instructed, informed, versed, experienced.

Title: Հմտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to inform, to instruct, to teach, to train.

Title: Հմտութիւն
Definition_1: knowledge, erudition, science, ability; experience, practice.

Title: Հնագիտակ
Definition_1: learned in the knowledge of antiquities;

Title: Հնագիր
Definition_1: paleograph; ancient historian; writer of ancient history; — մատեան, ancient manuscript.

Title: Հնազանդ
Definition_1: obedient; — առնել, to cause to obey, to make oneself obeyed, cf. Հնազանդեցուցանեմ; — լինել, to obey, to yield, to be obedient, docile, cf. Հնազանդիմ; — առնել ընդ իւրեւ, to compel obedience, to reduce or bring to obedience.

Title: Հնազանդեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to obedience or subjection, to subject, to subdue, to subjugate.

Title: Հնազանդիմ
Definition_1: to obey, to submit, to subject oneself.

Title: Հնազանդութիւն
Definition_1: obedience, submission, subjection; homage, vassalage; կրաւորական, կոյր —, passive or blind obedience; non-resistance; լաւ է — քան զզոհ ընտիր, obedience is better than sacrifice; ի — ածել, to reduce to obedience; գալ ի —, to return to obedience; ունել ի հնազանդութեան, to maintain or hold in obedience.

Title: Հնական
Definition_1: perishable, of limited duration, subject to the effects of age.

Title: Հնահազ
Definition_1: affected with inveterate cough, broken winded; asthmatical.

Title: Հնանամ
Definition_1: to grow old; to wear out, to waste; — լուսնի, to wane; — ախտից, to grow inveterate, to get rooted, to take root, to become chronic, inveterate, rooted; — սովորութեան, to become obsolete, disused; — ուրեք, to make a lengthened sojourn, to pass many years in a place; հնացեալ մոլորութիւն, inveterate or rooted error; հնացեալ աւուրբք or ծերութեամբ, հնացեալ եւ մաշեալ ալեւոր, wasted, worn out with old age, aged, very old, in years, decrepit; հնացեալ աւուրբք չարութեան, aged in guilt.

Title: Հնավաճառ
Definition_1: dealer in second hand goods, old clothes, rags, etc.

Title: Հնար
Definition_1: means, way, expedient; way, egress; resource; solicitude, utmost diligence; industry, invention, ingenuity; deceit, artifice, insidiousness, fraud, trick, intrigue; style, method; —ք պատերազմի, stratagem; —ք հայթայթանաց, remedy, means, way; —ք բժշկութեան, remedy, cure, medicament, medicine, physic; չարարուեստ, չարիմաց, ճարտարիմաց or խորամանկ —ք, artfulness, craft, shuffling, artifice, cunning, dodge, intrigue, wiles and shifts; —ս հնարել, խորհել, իմանալ, ի —ս հայթայթանաց մտանել, to bethink oneself of a device or expedient, to tax one's ingenuity, to contrive, to adopt or employ means to; հնարել ումեք —ս, to deceive, to cheat, to dwindle, to defraud; to plot, to machinate; իմանալ զամենայն —ս, to be fertile in expedients; յանհնար —ս մտանել, to be wavering, irresolute, to vacillate, to hesitate; to know not which way to turn oneself; զամենայն —ս հնարել, ի զանազան —ս մտանել, to bend all one's mind to, to task all one's powers of ingenuity and application, to do one's utmost, to use one's utmost endeavours, to do all or any thing one can, to strive with might and main, to try every art, to leave nothing untried, to leave no stone unturned, to move heaven and earth; որպէսի —ս եւ իմանայցէ ոք, whatever artifice one may employ; բիւր ազգի ազգի —ս հնարէր, he used a thousand stratagems; —իւք իմն ուղղեցի, I found means to rectify;
Definition_3: — է, — ինչ իցէ, it is possible, it can be done, it may be; չէ —, չիք —, չիք ինչ —, it is impossible, it can't be; it is done; եթէ գոյր —, if it were possible; որքան — է, as much as possible, as much as one can; — էր նմա, he could have done it; որ —դ ես անհնարից, Thou, to whom nothing is impossible.

Title: Հնարագէտ
Definition_1: ingenious, shrewd, sharp, clever; crafty, cunning, artful.

Title: Հնարագիտութիւն
Definition_1: ingenuity, cleverness, dexterity; industry, manufacture, art; չարարուեստ —, machination, plot, contrivance, intrigue.

Title: Հնարագիւտ
Definition_2: inventive, ingenious, clever; — լինել, to invent, to contrive, to find out.

Title: Հնարաւոր
Definition_1: possible, feasible, that can be made or done; powerful, potent; cf. Հնարագէտ.

Title: Հնարաւորիմ
Definition_1: to invent, to find means or expedients, to contrive, to excogitate.

Title: Հնարիմ
Definition_1: to invent, to find out, to imagine a device, to conceive a project, to contrive; to strive, to endeavour, to exert oneself; to bend or apply one's mind to, to study; to counterfeit, to feign; cf. Հնար.

Title: Հնարիմացութիւն
Definition_1: artifice, cunning, trickery, wile, shift, craft.

Title: Հնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make old; to wear out, to use up, to waste, to consume.

Title: Հնգագլխեան
Definition_1: five headed; — գիրք մովսեսի, the Pentateuch.

Title: Հնդիկ
Definition_1: Indian; black, negro; —ք, India; — փայտ, ebony, ebon; — եղէգն, bamboo; — ընկոյզ, nutmeg; — որդն, silk-worm; — մրջիւն, ant-lion; — հաւ, turkey, turkey-cock; գնալ ի —ս, to go to the Indies.

Title: Հնդկահաւ
Definition_1: turkey, turkey-cock or turkey-hen, mushroom; ձագ հնդկահաւու or հնդկահաւուկ, young turkey; սնուցիչ —ուց, breeder of turkeys; գլգլայ —, — գլգլունս արձակէ, the turkey gobbles; ձագ հնդկահաւու or հնդկահաւուկ, young turkey.

Title: Հնդկերէն
Definition_1: in Indian, in the Indian language;

Title: Հնձան
Definition_1: press; wine-press; vat, trough of a wine-press; գուբ —, must-vessel; — հարկանել, to press, to tread grapes;

Title: Հնձեմ
Definition_1: to cut down, to reap, to mow; to gather, to get in.

Title: Հնոտի
Definition_2: —ք, old lumber, trash, rubbish; —տեաց վաճառիչ, old clothes-man.

Title: Հնոց
Definition_1: stove, furnace, oven; — հալողութեան, բարձր, կոնաձեւ, ցոլացուցիչ, խառնարանի, պառակաւոր, melting furnace, blast furnace, shaft furnace, reverberatory furnace, puddling furnace, muffle furnace.

Title: Հնոցացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to enflame, to make a furnace of.

Title: Հնութիւն
Definition_1: oldness; age, old age, decay; antiquity; relic of antiquity; old rubbish; —ք անւոյ, the antiquities, the ancient monuments of Ani; — ծերութեան or ալեաց, extreme old age, hoary old age; decrepitude; — օձից, the slough or cast off skin of serpents.

Title: Հնչեմ
Definition_1: to sound, to resound, to boom, to echo; — պղնձոյ, to toll, to ring, to gingle, to tinkle; — ծովու, to murmur, to roar; — հողմոց, to blow, to whistle, to rustle; — հրացանի, to whizz, to whistle; — հրետի, to boom; — բանից, to announce, to spread abroad, to publish; — զբառս, to pronounce; ոչ բարւոք — ականջաց, to grate upon, to offend the ear; — դրամոց, to chink.

Title: Հնչեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to sound, to resound; to ring, to toll; to divulge, to publish, to make public.

Title: Հնչումն
Definition_1: sound, noise, rumour; echo; — զանգակաց, tinkling, peal, jingle, ringing; — հողմոց, ծովու, murmur, roar; — խորտակելոյ ալեաց, rushing, dashing; — որոտման, rumbling, roll; — անձրեւոյ, pattering; — հրոյ, crackling; — հրետից, boom, roar; — թմբիկ, roll; — կառաց, rumble; — հարազանի, crack; — զինուց, clash, clang; — շղթայից, clank, clanking; — ժամացուցի, tick; — բարբառոյ, aspiration; — հանել, to make a noise; եղեւ —, a noise was heard; — դրամոց, chink.

Title: Հնչողութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Հնչիւն; պղնձագործ հնչողութեամբ, with the tinkling of bells and the clash of cymbals.

Title: Հոգ
Definition_1: care, solicitude, concern, trust, custody; care, anxiety, solicitude, inquietude, mental pain; —ք անդոհականք, տխուր, gloomy cares; — առնել, տանել, — յանձին բերել, ունել, to care, to mind, to take care for, to be mindful, cf. Հոգամ; — ունել, ի մտի արկանել, to care, to be concerned, to reck, to be anxious about; —ս ցուցանել բարեխնամս, to show or express a lively interest, to take great pains with; թող ինձ զ—դ զայդ, յիմ վերայ —դ այդ, leave that to me; — տար վասն բարի անուան, take care of your reputation; մաշեալ, ծիւրեալ ի —ոց, care-worn.

Title: Հոգաբարձու
Definition_1: guardian, trustee; intendant, steward, agent, purveyor; inspector, overseer, surveyor; — լինել, to care, to take care of.

Title: Հոգաբարձութիւն
Definition_1: guardianship, trusteeship; charge, custody, inspection, superintendence; administration, direction; watchful care, solicitude.

Title: Հոգաբեկ
Definition_1: care-worn, torn with anguish, steeped in grief, sorrowful.

Title: Հոգած
Definition_1: attentive, careful, mindful, solicitous; gloomy, anxious, uneasy, pensive, thoughtful, troubled, disquieted.

Title: Հոգամ
Definition_1: to provide, to provision; to furnish, to garnish, to store, to procure; to take care of, to preserve with care, to keep, to husband; to care, to mind; — վասն ուրուք or զումեքէ, to grow or be anxious about, disquieted, uneasy, thoughtful, to trouble one's head or oneself about, to torment oneself, to fret about; չ— վասն վաղուի, to take no thought for tomorrow; մի՛ ինչ —այք, don't be uneasy, do not distress yourself.

Title: Հոգեբերիմ
Definition_1: to recover oneself, to come to oneself again.

Title: Հոգեկիր
Definition_1: inspired by the Holy Spirit, holy, divine;

Title: Հոգեկրօն
Definition_1: living according to the spirit, spiritual, virtuous; religious.

Title: Հոգեհանճար
Definition_1: furnished with the wisdom of the Holy Spirit.

Title: Հոգեմատեան
Definition_1: written by inspiration of the Holy Ghost.

Title: Հոգեմարտ
Definition_1: warring against, or denying the divinity of the Holy Spirit;
Definition_2: follower of the doctrine of Macedonius.

Title: Հոգեմարտութիւն
Definition_1: denying the divinity of the Holy Spirit, the heresy of Macedonius.

Title: Հոգեմուխ
Definition_1: deep in the mysteries of the Holy Spirit; endowed with the Holy Spirit.

Title: Հոգենորոգ
Definition_1: soul-refreshing, soul-reviving; renewed by the Holy Ghost; refreshing or reanimating the spirit.

Title: Հոգենուագ
Definition_1: singing or sung by inspiration of the Holy Spirit.

Title: Հոգեշահ
Definition_1: salutary, useful or profitable to the soul, spiritual.

Title: Հոգեշարժ
Definition_1: moved by the Holy Spirit; soul-stirring, pathetic, moving, touching, affecting.

Title: Հոգեշնորհ
Definition_1: granted by the Holy Spirit; adorned with or full of the gift or grace of the Holy Spirit; communicating the Holy Spirit.

Title: Հոգեպատում
Definition_1: narrated by Divine Inspiration; treating or narrating by Divine Inspiration.

Title: Հոգեպէս
Definition_1: spiritually, according to the spirit, divinely; allegorically, mystically.

Title: Հոգեսէր
Definition_1: benign, soul-pitying, soul-saving; spiritual, devout, pious.

Title: Հոգեվար
Definition_1: dying, agonizing, expiring, at the last gasp, in the e pangs of death;
Definition_2: —ք, pangs, agony, death-struggle; լինել ի —ս, to be in agony, dying, giving up the ghost, to be in the last gasp or at the point of death.

Title: Հոգետես
Definition_1: knowing the inmost thoughts or secrets of the soul.

Title: Հոգետեսութիւն
Definition_1: the gift of penetrating the secrets of the heart.

Title: Հոգերգող
Definition_2: singing by inspiration of the Holy Spirit.

Title: Հոգեւոր
Definition_1: spiritual; devout, pious; animated, lively, spirited;

Title: Հոգեւորեմ
Definition_1: to give life to, to vivify, to enliven.

Title: Հոգի
Definition_1: soul, spirit, ghost; the Holy Ghost, Paraclete; spirit, angel; soul, person, individual; soul, breath; soul, spirit, life, heart; wind, breath; sprite, fiend, goblin; soul, essence, motive, principle, spirit; meaning, character, spirit; desire, genius, turn of the mind, disposition, inclination; երկնային, աստւածային, վեհ, անմահ —, celestial or blessed, divine, sublime, immortal soul; դիւցազնական, առաքինի, գեղեցիկ, ազնուական, դիւրազգած —, heroic, virtuous, high or elevated, noble or great, tender or sensible mind, soul or spirit; նուաստ, անարգ, յուզեալ, մոլորեալ —, mean or grovelling, low, vile or ungenerous, troubled, erring spirit or mind; — բանական, զգայական եւ տնկական, rational, animal and vegetable life or existence; — իմաստութեան, intellect, spirit of knowledge; — բանաստեղծական, poetic fire, genius or enthusiasm; —ք հրեղինաց, heavenly spirits, spirits of light; —ք խաւարի, spirits of darkness, devils; հրաժարեալ —ք, the dead, the defunct, the deceased; դատապարտեալ —ք, the damned; խաղաղութիւն հոգւոյ, tranquillity or peace of mind, hearts ease; վեհանձնութիւն հոգւոյ, magnanimity, generosity; կարողութիւնք հոգւոյ, the faculties of the soul;
Definition_2: հոգւով, in spirit; spiritually; feelingly, warmly; —ք իբր հարիւր հազար են ի քաղաքին կարնոյ, there are a hundred thousand souls or inhabitants in the city of Erzerum; ճշմարտութիւն է պատմութեան —, truth is the soul or life of history; մարմին ջանայ հակառակ հոգւոյ եւ — հակառակ մարմնոյ, the flesh is at war with the spirit, and the spirit with the flesh; խաղաց — տեառն ի վերայ նորա, the spirit of God fell upon him; սիրել ամենայն հոգւով, to love with all one's heart or soul; աւանդել զ—ն, to render or give up the ghost, soul or spirit; փչել, հանել զ—ն, to expire, to die; աղօթել վասն հոգւոցն ննջեցելոց, to pray for departed souls; հանգուսցէ տէր զ— նորա, God rest his, her soul; cf. Ոգի; հոգւոյ տուն, guest's house.

Title: Հոգիանամ
Definition_1: to become spiritual; to brighten up, to become animated, inspirited, to revive, to take heart.

Title: Հոգիացուցանեմ
Definition_2: to inspirit, to animate, to vivify, to reanimate, to give new life to, to raise the spirits of; to restore to life.

Title: Հոգիութիւն
Definition_1: spirituality; the proceeding of the Holy Ghost.

Title: Հոլաթեւեմ
Definition_1: to open or extend the wings; to cover with the wings.

Title: Հոլանեմ
Definition_1: to undress, to take off one's clothes, to bare, to strip;
Definition_2: to make known or evident, to reveal, to disclose.

Title: Հոլանի
Definition_1: bare-headed, unveiled, uncovered; naked, hare, undressed;
Definition_2: openly, manifestly, publicly; — առնել, cf. Հոլանեմ; — լինել, հոլանիմ, cf. Հոլանեմ.

Title: Հոլանիմ
Definition_1: to undress, uncover or strip oneself; to unveil, to put off one's hat or veil, to stand bare-headed.

Title: Հոլոնեմ
Definition_1: to bring or gather together, to assemble, to collect.

Title: Հոլիմ
Definition_1: to come together, to be gathered together.

Title: Հոլովեմ
Definition_1: to roll, to turn; to move, to change;

Title: Հոլովիմ
Definition_1: to roll, to wind, to turn; to wallow;

Title: Հոլովումն
Definition_1: rolling, rotation, whirling; movement, turn, vicissitude;

Title: Հոծ
Definition_1: dense, thick, compact, condensed; full, quite full, abundant.

Title: Հոծեմ
Definition_1: to thicken, to condense; հոծեալ բերան, thickened utterance.

Title: Հոծիմ
Definition_1: to be condensed, to grow thick; to fill, to be filled.

Title: Հող
Definition_1: earth, clay, dust; ground, land, soil; land, territory, dominions;
Definition_2: tomb; նախնական, երկրորդական, երրորդական, անցողական, ողողական —ք, primitive or primordial, secondary, tertiary, transport, alluvial soil or rock; — թափչի, fuller's earth; —ի գլուխ լինել, — արկանել զգլխով, to throw dust or ashes on one's head; ի — իջանել or ննջել, to be buried; —ոյ եւ պատանաց չլինել արժանի, to be unworthy of burial, of funeral honours; to be left unburied, without a tomb; տալ —ոյ զմարմին, to inter, to bury, to entomb.

Title: Հողաբլուր
Definition_1: hank of earth, embankment, mound, dike, dam, mole, break-water; causeway; rampart, intrenchment; —ս կանգնել, to intrench, to fortify with trenches.

Title: Հողաբոյս
Definition_1: born of, or produced by the earth;

Title: Հողազանգուած
Definition_1: kneaded or formed of earth, earthly, terrestrial.

Title: Հողաթաւալ
Definition_1: rolling on the earth, or in the dust;

Title: Հողախշտի
Definition_1: cf. Գետնախշտի; — հանգիստ, resting place in earth, grave, sepulchre, tomb.

Title: Հողանամ
Definition_1: to be reduced to earth, to return to dust.

Title: Հողացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce or change to earth; քաղաք —ուցեալ, a city built on a hill.

Title: Հողմ
Definition_1: wind; air; չորք —ք, the four winds, four quarters of heaven;
