Definition_2: —ք, jaundice; — շրջանաւոր, monsoon; —ք տարեւորք, կանոնաւորք, the trade-winds; հարուած, բաղխիւն —ոյ, gust of wind; gale; cf. Ընթացք; թեթեւ, քաղցր, զովարար, յաջող, անհաստատ —, light or gentle breeze; soft, fresh, fair, changing wind; ցըրտաշունչ, կատաղի, մոլեգին, մրրկալից, սաստկաշունչ, ուժգին, ահեղագոչ —, cold, angry or raging, furious, stormy, impetuous, violent, roaring wind; ի թեւս —ոյ, on the wings of the wind; — շնչէ, մռնչէ, փոխի, դադարէ, the wind blows, roars, changes, calms or falls; — գոյ, it is windy, gusty; — ելանէ, the wind is rising; հակառակ է —, the wind is contrary; ընդդէմ —ոյ նաւարկել, to sail against the wind, or in the wind's eye, to sail with a head wind, to haul the wind; յաջողակ —ով նաւարկել, to sail before the wind, to be to leeward, to have a fair wind, a wind right aft, to scud;
Definition_3: to prosper; տալ —ոյ զառագաստս, to unfurl the sails, to spread the canvass; — աջողակ ուռնոյր՝ լնոյր զառագաստս մեր, a favourable wind filled our sails; տալ —ոյ, to throw to the winds; շրջել յամենայն —ոյ, to turn with every wind (of fortune), to be a weather-cock, a time-server; զ—ս արածել, to feed on air, to cherish vain hopes, to build castles in the air; ջանալ —ոյ, to labour or strive in vain, to lose one's pains; գնալ զ—ով, to vanish to dissolve into air, to disappear; զ—ս ժառանգել, to be reduced to one's last shifts, on one's last legs, to amuse oneself with idle expectations, to buoy oneself up with vain hopes; ըստ շնչելոյ —ոց եւ վարելոյ ալեաց, at the mercy of the winds and waves; մարգարէքն մեր էին ի —, our prophets prophesied to the wind.

Title: Հողմախաղաղ
Definition_1: sheltered, secure from winds; tranquil, calm, peaceful.

Title: Հողմածաղիկ
Definition_1: windflower, anemone; cf. Պուտ; cf. Փեննայ.

Title: Հողմակոծ
Definition_1: storm-beaten, agitated by the wind; squally, tempestuous; — առնել, to agitate with wind.

Title: Հողմակոծիմ
Definition_1: to be agitated, tossed, troubled by the wind; to hull or float at the mercy of the winds;
Definition_2: to fluctuate, to waver, to be irresolute or wavering, bewildered, in doubt.

Title: Հողմահարիմ
Definition_1: to lash away flies with the tail; cf. Հովահարեմ.

Title: Հողմայոյզ
Definition_2: —ք, impetuous wind, squall, hurricane, heavy gale, whirl-wind.

Title: Հողմավար
Definition_1: weather-driven; whirled about by the wind.

Title: Հողմընթաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to go like the wind, to rattle along full speed, to go full speed.

Title: Հոմերոսեան
Definition_1: homeric, of Homer or his poetry; poetic.

Title: Հոմերանամ
Definition_1: to resemble Homer; to become a clever poet.

Title: Հոմերապէս
Definition_1: after the manner of Homer or his heroes, in the style of Homer; poetically.

Title: Հոյակապ
Definition_1: grand, magnificent, superb, splendid; great, excellent, eminent; — քաղաք, topping, most eminent city; — այր, a great man; — իշխան, illustrious prince; — բժիշկ, celebrated doctor.

Title: Հոյլք
Definition_1: assembly, company, party, troop, band; — երէոց, herd, drove; — թռչնոց, flight; — մեղուաց, swarm.

Title: Հոյլ ի հոյլ
Definition_1: in troops, by companies; in crowds; ծաղկունք հոյլ ի հոյլ դեռափթիթք, a thousand new-budding flowers.

Title: Հոռի
Definition_1: the second month of the ancient Armenian calendar.

Title: Հոսանուտ
Definition_3: fluid; ելեկտրական — electric fluid.

Title: Հոսանք
Definition_1: stream of water, watercourse; overflowing, flowing out; water-fall;
Definition_2: current, stream; — հոգւոյն, the gifts of the Spirit; — հրոյ, volcanic eruption; torrent of flame; — չարեաց, a torrent of ills; —նս ջուրց իջուցին աչք իմ, my eyes have become water-brooks, my eyes run down with rivers of water.

Title: Հոսեմ
Definition_1: to shed, to spill, to pour out; to flow, to fall, to drop; to gush, to stream, to run; to scatter, to disperse; to winnow, to fan; to precipitate; — յորդաբուխ արտօսր, — իբրեւ զհեղեղ զարտասուս, to shed tears abundantly, in torrents; — հողմոյ, to cast to or throw to the winds; cf. Հոսիմ.

Title: Հոսիմ
Definition_1: to run or flow out, to flow, to stream; to drain, to trickle or run down, to drop, to leak or ooze out; to be scattered, dispersed, diffused, spread; to rush on; to fling, to precipitate, to fall; յերազս —, cf. Երազ.

Title: Հոսիչ
Definition_1: shedding, pouring out; scattering, spreading; dispersing;

Title: Հոսհոսիմ
Definition_1: to flow, to run; to crowd in or out.

Title: Հոսումն
Definition_1: flowing out, outpouring, effusion, discharge; leakage.

Title: Հով
Definition_2: cool, coolness, freshness; *cf. Հողմ; folds caused by the wind draping; —, տեղիք —ոց, —ոց գետին, cool, shady places; country residence; ի — ելանել, to go into the country, to breathe the fresh air of the country.

Title: Հովահարեմ
Definition_1: to fan, to blow, to revive a fire.

Title: Հովանամ
Definition_1: to grow cold, to become cool, to get fresh; to grow cool or cold, to cool down, to become lukewarm or careless; — օդոյ, to grow chilly.

Title: Հովանանամ
Definition_1: to overshadow, to shade, to shadow; to seat or repose oneself in the shade;
Definition_2: to take under one's protection, to protect, to defend, to shelter.

Title: Հովանացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to extend or spread a shade over, to shade.

Title: Հովանաւոր
Definition_2: covering, protecting; — ապարանք, house shaded by trees; գահոյք —, bed with testers.

Title: Հովանաւորեմ
Definition_1: to shade, to cover with shade, to cast a shadow upon;
Definition_2: to protect, to take under one's shadow or patronage.

Title: Հովանի
Definition_3: — ընդ —նեաւ, in the shade, under the shadow of;
Definition_4: with the protection or under the auspices of; — լինել, առնել, cf. Հովանաւորեմ; աւուրք իմ որպէս — անցին, my life has passed away like a shadow.

Title: Հովանոց
Definition_1: belvedere, terrace, kiosk, turret; baldaquin, cover; blind; parasol or umbrella; —, տուն —, summer-residence.

Title: Հովասուն
Definition_1: airy, well-aired, fresh, cool; brought up in a fresh, breezy place; — վայրք, cool, airy places.

Title: Հովացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cool, to refresh, to make cold; to chill;
Definition_2: to cool, to relent, to slacken, to abate, to relax.

Title: Հովեմ
Definition_1: to fan; to air, to let air in.

Title: Հովիւ
Definition_1: pastor, shepherd, herdsman, neatherd; հովուի գաւազան or բիր, shepherd's rod or staff, wild thistle, dipsacus sativus, damasonium; մանուկ —, shepherd-boy; աղջիկ —, shepherdess, shepherd-girl, shepherd-lass.

Title: Հովուական
Definition_1: pastoral, pastorly, shepherdly; — գաւազան, shepherd's crook; crosier; — թուղթ, կոնդակ, pastoral letter; — կեանք, կենցաղ, pastoral life; — մախաղ, շուն, shepherd's bag, scrip; shepherd's dog.

Title: Հովուակից
Definition_1: pastor's companion, fellow pastor; bishop's colleague, coadjutor.

Title: Հովուեմ
Definition_1: to tend, to pasture, to feed one's flocks;
Definition_2: to have the cure of souls; to lead, to conduct, to guide; մահ —եսցէ զնոսա, death will pasture on them.

Title: Հովտանամ
Definition_1: to sink, to give way, to fall in.

Title: Հոտ
Definition_1: odour, smell; perfume, scent; sign, indication; — անոյշ, անուշից or անուշութեան, grateful odour, sweet, savory smell, perfume, fragrance, cf. Անուշահոտութիւն; քաղցր, ախորժելի, թեթեւ, սաստիկ, չար —, sweet or fine, agreeable or delicious, slight, strong, disagreeable or bad odour or smell; — գարշ, stench; — առնուլ, հանել, to perceive an odour, to smell, to scent, cf. Հոտոտեմ; — ունել, to smell, to be odorous; — հարկանել, բուրել, to spread, to exhale an odour; cf. Հարկանիմ; ի հեռաստանէ առնու զ— պատերազմի, he smelleth the battle afar off; ի —ոյ ջրոյ ծաղկեսցի, it will shoot up as soon as the moisture effects it.

Title: Հոտառու
Definition_1: having a keen sense of smelling.

Title: Հոտաւորիմ
Definition_1: to have a grateful odour, a nice smell.

Title: Հոտեմ
Definition_1: to render stinking, fetid; to rot, to putrefy, to stink.

Title: Հոտիմ
Definition_1: to have a nasty smell, to smell, to smell nasty, to stink; հոտեալ, stinking, fetid; rotten, corrupted, putrefied.

Title: Հոտոտելիք
Definition_1: the smell, the sense of smelling, nose.

Title: Հոտոտիմ
Definition_1: to smell, to scent; to sniff up, to breathe; to touch, to approach; — ի հոտ անուշից, to accept the sweet savour or odour.

Title: Հորդան տամ
Definition_1: to cause to advance, to lead on, to conduct, to drive forward;
Definition_2: to flock in crowds, to fall upon, to rush impetuously on, to overspread.

Title: Հորդիմ
Definition_1: to chalk out, to pave, to plane, to trace, to mark; to clear, prepare or open the way; անցս իւր —, to open a road for oneself; — իւր զճանապարհ՝ զասպարէզ փառաց, to open to oneself a way to glory.

Title: *Հորեմ
Definition_1: to store up corn in pits.

Title: Հորիզոն
Definition_2: -; — զգալի, երեւոյթ, ուսումնական, իմանալի, sensible, apparent, mathematical, rational -; քաղաքական —ն մթագնի, ամպէ, the political-horizon begins to lower, to become cloudy; —ն սկսանի պարզել, the-begins to clear up.

Title: Հորձք
Definition_1: heat, ardour, outburst of passion, sally or fit of wrath.

Title: Հուժկու
Definition_1: strong, vigorous, robust; powerful, potent, mighty.

Title: Հուն
Definition_3: fordable, passable;
Definition_4: — մի, a little, something; briefly, succinctly; ի — ելանել, to obtain one's scope.

Title: Հունձք
Definition_1: harvest; crop; summer; — խոտոյ, hay-making; ժամանակ հնձոց, reaping, harvest-time, mowing-time; (խոտոյ) hay-time; երգ հնձոց, harvest-home; առատ —, abundant harvest; ոսկեփայլ, — փունջ —, golden harvest; յաւուրս հնձոց, in harvest-time.

Title: Հուպ
Definition_2: near, close to, by, by the side of;
Definition_3: —, ընդ —, — ընդ, — առ —, ի հպոյ, near, close, at hand; by and by, shortly, soon, very soon, in a short time; — լինել, երթալ, մատչել, to be near, to approach, to draw near, to go or come near to, or towards, to go closer to; to touch.

Title: Հուսկ
Definition_1: last; — յետին, վերջին, the last, the last of all, the hindmost;
Definition_2: — յետոյ, — ուրեմն, after all, at last, lastly, finally.

Title: Հուր
Definition_2: fire, heat, spirit, ardour; passion, love, flame;
Definition_3:
fiery, igneous; —ն անշէջ, hell, hellfire; շրջմոլիկ —, night-fire, Will-o' the wisp, Jack-o' lantern, ignis fatuus; — արկանել, վառել, to set on fire, to light, to kindle, to make a fire; — հարկանել, արկանել, տալ, հրով or —բ դատել, to set fire to, to burn, to set on fire, to inflame; ի — եւ ի սուր սպառել, մաշել զամենայն, to put every thing to fire and sword, to destroy by burning; to chastise with fire and sword, to punish severely; ի — այրիլ, տոչորիլ, to be burnt, consumed by fire; իւղ արկանել զհրով, to add fuel to the flames; — առնուլ, to catch or take fire, to fire or blaze up; չառնուլ —, to miss fire; — վարեալ բորբոքէր ի գաղղիա, all France was on fire, all in a blaze; ի — ! ի — ! հարաւ զտանէ, fire ! fire ! the house is on fire !
առ սէր քո տայր զինքն or մատնէր զանձն եւ ի —, he would go through fire and water for your sake.

Title: Հպատակ
Definition_2: dependent, inferior, subordinate, obedient, obsequious; attentive, careful; — լինել, to be attentive; — կալ, to be obedient, to obey, cf. Հպատակեմ.

Title: Հպատակիմ
Definition_1: to subject, to subdue; to subject oneself, to submit to, to obey; to serve, to wait upon.

Title: Հպատակութիւն
Definition_1: subjection, dependence; vassalage; submission, obedience, deference, subordination; devotedness, devotion; care, attention; — օրինաց, veneration, respect for the laws.

Title: Հպարտ
Definition_1: proud, arrogant, haughty, lofty, lordly, overbearing, imperious, supercilious, vain.

Title: Հպարտանամ
Definition_1: to be proud, to swell with pride, to be puffed up; — ընդ տոհմ իւր, to boast of one's descent or birth.

Title: Հպարտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make proud, to puff up, to inflate, to render haughty.

Title: Հպարտութիւն
Definition_1: pride, arrogance, haughtiness, vain-glory, superciliousness; cf. Իջանեմ.

Title: Հպաւորիմ
Definition_1: to approach, to go or come near to.

Title: Հպաւորութիւն
Definition_1: proximity, vicinity, neighbourhood; touch; intimacy; habit.

Title: Հպիմ
Definition_1: to approach; to touch, to handle.

Title: Հպտանք
Definition_1: exaggeration or affectation in dress or ornament, ridiculous medley, dandyism, finery, spruceness, puerile ornament, bibs and tuckers;
Definition_2: affectation, affected ways, mincing air, simpering.

Title: Հպտիմ
Definition_1: to deck, to trim or bedizen oneself out, to spruce up, dress or adorn oneself in a studied or affected manner.

Title: Հռետորանամ
Definition_1: to be an orator, to harangue, to speak in public.

Title: Հռիկ գամ
Definition_1: to turn; շուրջ —, to turn round; to turn all around.

Title: Հռնչիւն
Definition_1: snorting or rattling in the throat; — մահուան, death-rattle.

Title: Հռչակ
Definition_1: cf. Համբաւ; exultation, rejoicing; solemnity, pomp;
Definition_2: —աւ, solemnly, pompously; — հարկանել, cf. —եմ; — լինել, to be heard, published, divulged; — հարկանիլ, to be spread the fame of; եւ երթայր — զնմանէ ընդ ամենայն կողմանս, and the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about; — ընթանայ, it is reported, there is a report, they say; the report is spread; it is rumoured.

Title: Հռչակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make famous, to trumpet, to sound the fame of, to praise, to exalt; to publish, to divulge, to make public, to noise or rumour abroad; to chant, to celebrate, to solemnize.

Title: Հռչակիմ
Definition_1: to be renowned, celebrated; to be divulged, published, to get or take wind.

Title: Հսկայաբար
Definition_1: like a giant, in a giant-like manner.

Title: Հսկայազօր
Definition_1: having the strength, vigour of a giant, very strong.

Title: Հսկայաձեւ
Definition_1: gigantic, huge, colossal, colossean; — անդրի, colossus, colosse, colossal statue.

Title: Հսկայաքայլ
Definition_1: adb. with giant strides; — ընթանալ, to walk or advance -; — յառաջադիմել, to make rapid progress;

Title: Հսկեմ
Definition_1: to watch, to abstain from sleep;
Definition_2: to watch over, to guard, to oversee, to take care of, to have an eye upon; cf. Հիւանդ.

Title: Հսկումն
Definition_1: watch, vigil; vigil, eve of a feast.

Title: Հրաբաժակ
Definition_3: fiery, full of fire.

Title: Հրաբորբոք
Definition_1: all on fire, it flames, burning, glowing, blazing, flaming; — սրտմտութիւն, gust of passion; impetuous, fiery wrath.

Title: Հրազէն
Definition_2: —ք, fire-arms, guns, muskets, rifles; artillery, ordnance.

Title: Հրազինեմ
Definition_1: to arm or furnish with fire;

Title: Հրաժարական
Definition_1: renouncing, abdicating, resigning, taking leave of;
Definition_2: resignation; leave of absence; տալ — ողջոյն, to take one's leave, to say good-bye, to bid farewell to; — կեանք, retired or solitary life.

Title: Հրաժարեմ
Definition_1: to cause to renounce or abdicate; to dismiss, to discharge; to forbid, to prohibit, to interdict;
Definition_2: to renounce, to abstain, to deprive oneself of, to forego, to forbear, to refrain, to desist, to resign; to deny, to disown, to refuse; to take leave of, to bid farewell to; to die, to decease; — յաղանդոյ, to abjure, to recant, to renounce; — յաշխարհէ, to renounce the world; to enter a convent; — յիշխնանութենէ, to abdicate, to resign, to tender, to lay down or throw up one's commission; — ի թագաւորութէնէ, to abdicate the crown; աղաչեմ զքեզ կալ զիս հրաժարեալ, I pray thee have me excused, I beg you excuse me, I pray you to be kindly indulgent towards me.

Title: Հրաժարիմ
Definition_1: cf. Հրաժարեմ; հրաժարեցան ի միմեան, they left each other, they separated.

Title: Հրաժարեալ
Definition_1: that has resigned; deceased; cf. Հրաժարեմ.

Title: Հրաժարումն
Definition_1: renouncing, giving up, resignation, renunciation, abdication; dismission; departure from this life, decease, death; monastic life; —ումն յանձնէ, ի կամաց անձին, resignation, self-denial, thorough self-forgetfulness, abnegation.

Title: Հրաժեշտ
Definition_1: renunciation, renouncing, relinquishment; abdication; resigning, resignation; denial, refusal; leave of absence; dismission, discharge; permission; parting, leave; farewell, adieu, good-bye; — առնել, տալ, cf. Տալ հրաժարական ողջոյն; to renounce, to give over, to relinquish, to resign; to retire from, to leave off; to bid adieu or farewell; ի —ի կացուցանել, to dismiss, to discharge, to send or turn away; առնուլ — անդարձ, to bid an eternal farewell, to bid adieu for ever.

Title: Հրակիզեմ
Definition_1: to burn, to fire, to set on fire.

Title: Հրահանգ
Definition_1: instruction, tuition, education, discipline, teaching; knowledge, information; regulations; system, rules; diet, regimen, low diet; —ք զինուորութեան, military discipline; —ք զինուորաց, military exercises; evolutions; ի —ս կրթութեան վարժել զզօրս, to exercise, to drill soldiers; —ք մարմնոյ, bodily exercises.

Title: Հրահանգեմ
Definition_1: to instruct, to teach, to exercise, to drill, to discipline, to tutor, to train up, to form, to regulate, to civilize, to polish, to fashion.

Title: Հրահանգիմ
Definition_1: to exercise oneself, to practise, to acquire instruction or knowledge, to improve one's mind.

Title: Հրահոսեմ
Definition_1: to flow like a torrent of fire.

Title: Հրամայեմ
Definition_1: to command, to order, to enjoin, to impose, to prescribe; to permit, to allow, to authorize; to establish, to settle, to dispose; ոչ —, to forbid, to prohibit, to proscribe, to interdict.

Title: Հրաման
Definition_1: command, order, injunction, ordination, behest; permission, authorization, license, leave; decree, edict; հակառակ —, counterorder; —ք, destiny, fate, lot, fatality; doom; — հաւատոց, doctrine of faith; — պատասխանւոյ, oracle; անդարձ —, irrevocable order; — հանել, դնել, տալ, to command, to order, to dispose; to appoint, to decree; to give leave, to permit; — առնուլ, — պատուիրանի առնուլ, to obtain leave; to receive orders or directions; — տալ վասն տանն իւրոյ, to make one's will; ես եդի զ—ս զայս, յինէն ել —ս այս, I have signed this decree; cf. Զէն; fire-pot.

Title: Հրամանագիր
Definition_1: ordinance, order, warrant; letters patent; monitory; — ձեռնադրութեան, letters dimissory; cf. Անցագիր.

Title: Հրամանադրեմ
Definition_1: to give orders; to impose; to decree.

Title: Հրամանազանց լինիմ
Definition_1: to break an order, to transgress.

Title: Հրամանատրութիւն
Definition_1: command, order, ordination; leave, license, permission.

Title: Հրամանատրեմ
Definition_1: cf. Հրաման տամ; to deliver an oracle.

Title: Հրամուխ
Definition_1: tempered (iron, etc.); — նետք սիրոյ, the fiery shafts of love.

Title: Հրայրեաց
Definition_1: burnt, consumed by fire; burning, consuming by fire.

Title: Հրանամ
Definition_1: to ignite, to become fire, to be on fire, to kindle, to be inflamed; to catch or take fire, to burn, to be lighted, set on fire;
Definition_2: to take fire, to be all fire, blaze or excitement.

Title: Հրաշ
Definition_3: — առ —, admirably, wonderfully;
Definition_4: wonders, prodigy; —ք ջրաբաշխականք, hydraulic paradox.

Title: Հրաշաբուսեալ
Definition_1: born or produced in a wonderful manner.

Title: Հրաշադիտակ
Definition_1: of a fine figure, of charming aspect, of wonderful grace, of singular beauty.

Title: Հրաշազարդեմ
Definition_1: to ornament or adorn wonderfully well.

Title: Հրաշալի
Definition_1: wonderful, marvelous, worthy of admiration, surprising, amazing.

Title: Հրաշակերտ
Definition_1: extremely well built or done, wonderful, astonishing, surprising;

Title: Հրաշակերտեմ
Definition_1: to make, build or construct wonderfully well.

Title: Հրաշակերտութիւն
Definition_1: wonderful construction, grand and imposing monument, marvelous work, surprising fact.

Title: Հրաշապատում
Definition_1: extremely well narrated; relating wonders; mysterious.

Title: Հրաշափայլ
Definition_1: very resplendent, very brilliant, most luminous.

Title: Հրաշափառապէս
Definition_1: wonderfully, marvelously, admirably; miraculously; majestically, gloriously.

Title: Հրաշէկ
Definition_1: red, red hot, all on fire, incandescent, at a white heat; fiery, ardent, burning.

Title: Հրաշունչ
Definition_1: fire-breathing; vomiting fire, volcanic; furious, raging, ardent.

Title: Հրաշք
Definition_1: miracle, marvel, wonder, prodigy, portent; monster; spectre, phantom, larvae, ghosts; — իմաստութեան, prodigy of science, of wisdom; —շս գործել, to work a miracle;
Definition_2: to perform miracles, to do or work wonders; ի —շս զարմացման ածել, to surprise, to astonish, to stun, to amaze, to astound; ո՜վ —շիցս, what a wonder ! good Heavens ! Goodness gracious !.

Title: Հրապարակ
Definition_1: place, spot, ground; public or market-place, market, exchange; town-hall, town-house; concourse of people, assembly, the public, crowd; court, tribunal; good cheer, feast; արտաքին —ք դրանց, porch, portico, atrium, vestibule; տիեզերական, ահեղ —, last judgment; — մեհենից, gymnasium; cf. Ըստ, ընթացք, թատր; ի —ս, ի —ի անդ, —աւ, in the public places, in public, publicly, notoriously, evidently, frankly, plainly, openly; — դնել, to consult, to deliberate; — առնել, cf. Հրապարակեմ.

Title: Հրապարակաբան
Definition_1: public orator, haranguer, preacher; tax-collector, tax-gatherer.

Title: Հրապարակագոյժ
Definition_1: made public, published, divulged every where, rumoured abroad; — առնել, to publish, to make known far and wide, to divulge, to noise or rumour abroad; — լինել, to become public, to take wind, to be published, divulged.

Title: Հրապարակախօս
Definition_2: public speaker, haranguer, orator, speech-maker, declaimer;
Definition_3: publicly.

Title: Հրապարակախօսիմ
Definition_1: to pronounce or recite in public, to harangue, to address, to declaim, to recite; *to spout, to speechify.

Title: Հրապարակախօսութիւն
Definition_1: discourse pronounced in public, oration, harangue, sermon, declamation.

Title: Հրապարականախատ
Definition_1: publicly reproved, blamed by every one.

Title: Հրապարակատես
Definition_1: seen by all, public; հրապարակատես առնեմ, cf. Հրապարակեմ, cf. Յայտնեմ, cf. Հանդիսացուցանեմ.

Title: Հրապարակացոյց՞՞՞առնեմ
Definition_1: to expose to public view, to show up in public.

Title: Հրապարակաքարոզ՞՞՞առնեմ
Definition_1: to expose to infamy, to defame, to slander, to lampoon.

Title: Հրապարակեմ
Definition_1: to publish, to make public, to promulgate, to divulge; to declare, to disclose, to report.

Title: Հրապոյրք
Definition_1: charms, attractions, allurements; lure, bait, wheedling, cajolery, flattery, enticement, solicitation, seduction; instigation, suggestion, impulse, incitement; — գեղոյ, charms of beauty; — հաճոյից, հեշտութեան, the allurements of pleasure, of voluptuousness; պատիր —, deceitful baits; ի —րս ուրուք ըմբռնիլ, ելանել, հարկանիլ, to be seduced, misled, tempted, led astray, allured, enticed, decoyed; ի —րս ցոփութեան դարձուցանել զոք, to entice to gluttony; to allure one to debauchery; արբուցանել ումեք —րս պղտորս, դժնեայս, to administer poison, to poison;
Definition_2: to seduce, to mislead, to pervert, to corrupt, to debauch, to lead astray, to bring into an error.

Title: Հրապուրական
Definition_1: attractive, enticing, alluring, engaging, seducing, insinuating, tempting, captivating.

Title: Հրապուրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to overstrain a word or phrase, to pervert the meaning or sense of a passage.

Title: Հրապուրեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to allure, to attract, to entice, to decoy, to inveigle, to induce, to instigate, to seduce, to suggest, to wheedle, to dupe, to coax, to cajole, to flatter; to suborn.

Title: Հրասուզեմ
Definition_1: to engulf in a vortex of flame; to set fire to.

Title: Հրավառ
Definition_3: ardent, inflamed, burning.

Title: Հրատ
Definition_3: Mars; —ս արկանել, հարկանել, to kindle, to light, to set on fire.

Title: Հրատարակ
Definition_1: publisher, announcer, crier; bill, poster, advertisement; — մարտի, declaration of war.

Title: Հրատարակեմ
Definition_1: to publish, to make public, to divulge, to promulgate; to denounce, to declare; to inform the public, to cry, to proclaim; to pronounce, to intimate; to spread a report; to post up, to set up a bill or paper, to publish; to edit.

Title: Հրացայտ
Definition_1: emitting flames; shining, sparkling, glittering; — աչք, fire-flashing eyes;

Title: Հրացան
Definition_2: gun, musket, fusil, piece, arquebuse, rifle, blunderbuss; — բաղխիչ, գայլախազեայ, կախաղանաւոր, ասղնաւոր, կրկնահար, հողմահար, յետախցիկ, որսոյ, թռչնորսական —, percussion-gun, flint-gun, pendulum-gun, needle-gun, double-barrelled gun, air-gun, breech-loading, sporting-gun or shooting-gun, fowling or birding-gun, musket or rifle; բաղխիւն —ի, musket-shot; շռինդ —ի, report of a gun; հարուած —ի, gun-shot wound; — բարկութիւն, շանթք, thunder, thunder-bolt; լնուլ զ—, to load a gun; արձակել զ—, to shoot, to let off, to discharge, to fire; չառնուլ հուր —ի, to miss fire, to flash in the pan; —ք, hail of fire; musketry.

Title: Հրացանութիւն
Definition_1: shower of fire; volley of musketry, discharge of fire arms; report, detonation; thunder-bolt.

Title: Հրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to inflame, to set on fire, to burn; to make red hot, to ignite.

Title: Հրաւէր
Definition_1: invitation; սիրալիր —, courteous -; — հարսանեաց, յուղարկաւորութեան, եւ այլն —, to a wedding, to a funeral; — տալ, to invite, to bid; մերժել զ—ն, to decline an invitation.

Title: Հրաւիրեմ
Definition_1: to invite, to desire, to invite to a feast or assembly; to convoke, to convene; յառաջագոյն —, to predestine; — ի ճաշ, to ask or invite to dinner.

Title: Հրափայլ
Definition_1: sparkling, shining as fire, luminous, brilliant.

Title: Հրդեհ
Definition_1: fire, conflagration; — ի ծովւ, ի նաւի, ship on fire out at sea; fire on board ship; — արկանել, հանել զ—, to fire, to set on fire, to give to the flames; — վառեցաւ, it was burnt; cf. Հուր; cf. Ջրհան.

Title: Հրդեհեմ
Definition_1: to burn, to kindle, to set fire to.

Title: Հրեղէն
Definition_1: of fire, fiery, igneous; empyreal, celestial, spiritual, angelic;

Title: Հրեշտակ
Definition_1:
angel; deputy; messenger, envoy, ambassador, legate; courier, express; indication, sign, token; —ք, the angels, heavenly spirits; — հայրապետին հռովմայ, nuncio, the Pope's -; — մարտի կամ հաշտութեան, herald; պահապան —, tutelary or guardian-angel; — տեառն, angelus; բարի —ք, the good angels; չար —ք, the evil spirits; —դ իմ ! my angel ! my darling !
—ս առնել, առաքել, արձակել, յղել, to send a messenger or ambassador.

Title: Հրեշտակաբար
Definition_1: in an angelic manner, angelically; like a messenger.

Title: Հրեշտակագնաց առնեմ
Definition_1: to send an embassy or a deputation;

Title: Հրեշտակագնաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to be sent on an embassy, on a mission, on an errand or message.

Title: Հրեշտակակրօն
Definition_1: living, behaving in an angelic manner, leading an angelic life.

Title: Հրեշտակահանգէտ
Definition_1: like or resembling an angel, angelic.

Title: Հրեշտականամ
Definition_1: to become an angel, to live angelically, to lead an angelic life.

Title: Հրեշտականման
Definition_1: adb. resembling an angel, like an angel.

Title: Հրեշտակապետ
Definition_1: archangel, chief or prince of the angels.

Title: Հրեշտակավայել
Definition_1: proper, becoming to an angel, worthy of an angel, angelic.

Title: Հրեշտակատիպ
Definition_1: of celestial form, of angelic appearance, or beauty.

Title: Հրեշտակութիւն
Definition_1: angelic nature; embassy, message, deputation, delegation; —ս առաքել, առնել, to send ambassadors, deputies, to depute, to send a commission.

Title: Հրետ
Definition_1: cannon, gun, piece of ordnance; հաստարան —ի, carriage; գնդակ —ի, (ռումբ), cannon-ball; — պղնձի, a bronze cannon; փոշի —ի, gunpowder; արձակմունք —ից, cannon shot; cannonade; բոմբիւն —ի, report of a cannon; cf. Հնչիւն; cf. Թնդիւն; cf. Հնչեմ; արձակել —ս, to fire off, to fire or discharge a gun, to cannonade; անգործ առնել զ— թշնամւոյն, to dismount a gun; թնդայ, որոտայ —ն, the artillery thunders.

Title: Հրէաբար
Definition_1: like a Jew, after the manner of the Hebrews.

Title: Հրէական
Definition_1: jewish, hebrew, judaical; — օրէնք, the jewish law; — հնութիւնք, judaical antiquities.

Title: Հրէայ
Definition_1: jew, hebrew, israelite; —ք, the Jews; թաղ հրէից, jewry, jew's ward, quarter in a town.

Title: Հրէանամ
Definition_1: to become a hebrew, to embrace judaism; to judaize.

Title: Հրէարէն
Definition_2: cf. Հրէական; — ուսանել, խօսել, գիտել, to learn, to speak, to know hebrew, the hebrew language or tongue.

Title: Հրիտակ
Definition_1: inheritance; legacy, bequest, gift by will, endowment; — առնել, to bequeath.

Title: Հրկէզ
Definition_2: fire; — առնել, to burn, to kindle, to consume by fire; — լինել, to burn, to be burnt or consumed by fire.

Title: Հրձգութիւն
Definition_1: act of casting fire; jet of fire; conflagration; thunderbolt.

Title: Հրձիգ
Definition_1: fire-brand, incendiary, burner; linstock; —ք, conflagration, fire; — նաւ, fire-ship; — առնել, to set on fire, to set flames to; — լինել, to be burnt, destroyed by burning.

Title: Հրճուանք
Definition_1: joy, mirth, rejoicing, cheerfulness, gaiety, sportiveness, delight, pleasure; —նս ումեք կազմել, ի —նս ածել զոք, to rejoice, to delight, to cheer; ի — նս խնճոյից, in the merriment of a feast.

Title: Հրճուեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to divert, to amuse; — զլսելիս, to delight the ears, to charm, to please.

Title: Հրճուիմ
Definition_1: to be joyful, in a merry mood, to thrill with joy, to leap for joy, to be transported with joy, to shout for joy, to be overjoyed, to exult, to rejoice greatly, to be in a rapture of joy, to be beside oneself with joy.

Title: Հրոս
Definition_1: militia men, troops; military banditti, horde; band, gang, crew; scout, rover, robber, plunderer; cf. Կաւատ.

Title: Հրոսակեմ
Definition_1: to fall upon, to make an inroad, to invade, to sack, to plunder.

Title: Հրոսակիմ
Definition_1: to rush, to fall upon impetuously.

Title: Հրովարտակ
Definition_1: edict, decree; գիր —ի, chronicles, annals; — առնել, հանել, to issue a decree; —ս առնել, to make or publish edicts.

Title: Հրոտից
Definition_1: the twelfth month of the ancient Armenian calendar.

Title: Հօտ
Definition_1: flock, flock of sheep, of goats, fold; cf. Յօտ;

Title: Հօտավատնիչ
Definition_1: dispersing, ruining or leaving one's flock a prey to wolves.

Title: Հօրամոյն
Definition_1: born of a noble, illustrious father, Eupator.

Title: Հօրան
Definition_1: flock or herd of animals; — լինել, to jump, skip or leap for joy, to bound with joy.

Title: <letter>Ձ</letter> (tza)
Definition_1: the seventeenth letter of the alphabet, and the twelfth of the consonants; eighty, eightieth.

Title: Ձաբռտեմ
Definition_1: to tremble with age, to write in a trembling hand.

Title: Ձագ
Definition_1: the young of any animal; — թռչնոց, young of a bird, nestling, brood; young sparrow; — հաւու, chick, small chicken, pullet; — կենդանեաց, young one, little one of animals, pup, whelp, cub; cf. Կորիւն; —ունք, the young or little ones, the progeny; բբիւն —ուց, the chirping or twittering of nestlings; —ու or —ի լեզու, cf. Ճնճղկի՞՞՞լեզու; — մատն, little finger; —ս հանել(հաւուց), to brood, to sit on eggs; (անասնոց) to have young, to litter, to bring forth.

Title: Ձագախոտ
Definition_1: clove; pink, carnation; caryophyllata, avens, bennet.

Title: Ձախ
Definition_2: left, left hand or side; ի —մէ, on or to the left; գիտել կամ չգիտել զաջ ե զ—, to know or not to know the right hand from the left.

Title: Ձախակողմեան
Definition_1: left, that is on the left.

Title: Ձախակողմն
Definition_1: left, left side; ի —, to the left; ննջեսցես ի — քո, you will sleep on your left side.

Title: Ձախողակ
Definition_1: sinister, sinistrous, untoward, unfortunate, unlucky, bad, sorrowful, sad, unfavourable, contrary; ի —ակս, in misfortune, adversity or calamity; — նախանձ, zeal misunderstood; feigned, affected emulation.

Title: Ձախողակի
Definition_1: sinistrously, unfavourably, awkwardly, untowardly, perversely unluckily, unfortunately;
Definition_2: cf. Ձախողակ; — բարեպաշտութիւն, mistaken piety; — պատկառանք, bashfulness, sheepishness; առ — ամօթոյ, from mere shamefacedness.

Title: Ձախողիմ
Definition_1: to be unsuccessful, not to attain one's end, to find oneself woefully disappointed, to go to rack and ruin, to endure, undergo or suffer failure, to experience misfortune, to be unfortunate.

Title: Ձախողութիւն
Definition_1: adversity, misfortune, disaster, mischance, fall, disgrace, reverse, disappointment; ձախողութեան հանդիպել, to experience great calamities, to be in distress.

Title: Ձաձեմ
Definition_1: to collect, to muster, to heap up.

Title: Ձաղ
Definition_1: derision, mockery, jeering, laughter, laughing-stock; — առնել, to taunt, to rally, to scoff, jeer or laugh at, to mock, to make game or sport of, to turn into ridicule, to make laughing-stock of, cf. Ձաղեմ; — լինել, to make a fool of oneself, to expose oneself to the laughter of every body, to be laughed at, to be the laughing-stock of.

Title: Ձաղածանակ
Definition_1: exposed to laughter, turned into derision; dishonourable, infamous, ignominious, opprobrious; — առնել, to expose to to the laughter of every body, to make a spectacle of, to expose to ignominy, to defame, cf. Ծանակեմ, cf. Խայտառակեմ.

Title: Ձաղակոծ առնեմ
Definition_1: to beat, to box on the ears, to slap the face; to use harshly, to abuse to insult.

Title: Ձաղանք
Definition_1: cf. Ձաղ; cf. Ձաղկանք; ի ծաղր եւ ի —նս լինել, cf. Ձաղ լինիմ.

Title: Ձաղեմ
Definition_1: to laugh at, to deride, to ridicule, to mock, to jeer, to make sport of; to put to shame, to affront, to vilify; to lead in triumph; to triumph, to conquer, to be triumphant, to obtain the victory; պոմպէոս ձաղեաց երիցս, Pompey triumphed thrice.

Title: Ձաղկ
Definition_1: rod, switch, stick, cudgel, whip; cf. Ձաղկանք; — հերք, մազ, bristled up, set on end.

Title: Ձաղկանք
Definition_1: flagellation, whipping, scourging, cudgeling, flogging, drubbing, discipline, chastisement.

Title: Ձաղկեմ
Definition_1: to beat, to whip, to flog, to lash, to scourge, to flagellate, to discipline.

Title: Ձաղումն
Definition_1: derision, mockery, laughter; triumph; ձաղել —ումն, —ումն յաղթութեան առնել, to triumph, to be triumphant, to conquer.

Title: Ձայն
Definition_1: voice; sound; cry, shout; noise, rumour, clamour; term, word, speech, tongue, language;
Definition_2: tone, tune; —ք պորփիւրի, the five universals, (term in logic); — թռչնաց, warbling of birds; — ցնծութեան, cry shout of joy; — աղաղակի, cry, clamour; cry of pain, moan, lament, groan; նուագումն —ի, loss of voice; կերկերումն —ի, hoarseness, raucity; ի — բարձր, aloud; զօաւոր, մեծավայելուչ, ախորժ, քաղցր, սասկայոյզ, տկար, դողդոջ, թրթռուն, անախորժ, կերեկրեալ or կերկեր, նուաղեալ —, loud or strong, grave or serious, agreeable, sweet or soft, passionate or pathetic, faint or weak, trembling, thrilling, tremulous or quivering, disagreeable or harsh, hoarse, falling voice; —թաւ or թամբ, սուր or զիլ, base, deep, soprano, shrill sound or voice; — բառնալ, արձակել, առնել, արկանել, առնուլ, to cry, to utter, to send forth cries, to cry out, to shout, to clamour; — ածել, to cause a voice or cry to be heard; to cry; — տալ, to cry out, to exclaim, to shout; to speak, to apostrophize; to defy, to challenge; ի — ասել, to say, to pronounce aloud, to tell, to recite; ի մի — պատասխանել, to answer unanimously, with one accord; աղաղակել ի — մեծ, to cry with a loud voice; to shout, to clamour, to yell; բարձրացուցանել կամ ցացուցանել զ—, to elevate, to raise; to lower, to abase the voice; բարձրացուցանել զ— աղաղակի, to raise one's voice; — բարձեալ գոչել, to cry out, to vociferate; — զկնի եդեալ կոչել ցոք, to call after one; — տուեալ խրախուսել, to exhort aloud; — տալ միմեանց, to provoke mutually, to defy; to shout on, to exhort, to animate, to inspirit, to cheer up, to inspire with courage, to excite; — տալ մարտի, to declare war, to declare oneself opposed to; — տալ ըննդէմ երկնից խիզախել, to lift up the head against high heaven, to be proud, arrogant, boastful; — նորա գելաւ, his voice failed him; նուաղեալ է —ն, he has a dying voice.

Title: Ձայնակից
Definition_1: of the same opinion, unanimous, agreeing, of one mind;
Definition_2: singing with, in chorus; unisonous, in unison;
Definition_3: consonant.

Title: Ձայնակցիմ
Definition_1: to agree, to be of one mind, unanimous; to play or execute a symphony;
Definition_2: to be in tune; to sing to, to accompany.

Title: Ձայնակցութիւն
Definition_1: agreement, consent, unanimity; concert, harmony, symphony;

Title: Ձայնահաս
Definition_1: compass or reach of voice, distance to which the human voice can reach.

Title: Ձայնատու
Definition_1: giving or emitting a voice or sound; echoing, sonorous;
Definition_2: crier; awaker, rouser; — եղջիւր, acoustic or ear-trumpet; — լինել, to cause a voice or sound to be heard, to resound, to re-echo, to cry against, to defy.

Title: Ձայնատուր
Definition_1: exhorting, exciting; cf. Ձայնատու; — լինել, to dare, to defy, to challenge, to throw down the glove or gauntlet; to provoke, to instigate; — ժամանակ, day fixed for combat or duel;
Definition_2: —ք, noise, rumour, crash, resounding, sound, echo.

Title: Ձայնարկեմ
Definition_1: to utter a cry, to cry, to shout, to call out; to speak to, to address.

Title: Ձայնարկու
Definition_2: crier, weeper, wailer, lamenter; — գուսան, կին, mourner, mourning woman.

Title: Ձայնարկութիւն
Definition_1: sound, voice, cry; shout, exclamation; complaint, lamentation.

Title: Ձայնեղ
Definition_1: having a loud or sonorous voice; sweet-voiced; canorous, harmonious.

Title: Ձայնեմ
Definition_1: to raise one's voice, to cry out, to exclaim, to vociferate; to call, to invite, to convoke; to pronounce, to utter, to address, to tell, to express; to name; ի խրախոյս —, to encourage, to inspirit, to give heart to.

Title: *Ձանձամ
Definition_1: ugly, deformed; filthy, dirty, foul, impure.

Title: Ձանձիր
Definition_1: cf. Ձանձրալի; cf. Ձանձրութիւն; — առնել, to tire, to annoy, to plague, to importune, to tease.

Title: Ձանձրանալի
Definition_1: tiresome, tedious, fastidious, troublesome; disgusting, cloying.

Title: Ձանձրանամ
Definition_1: to grow tired, to become wearied, annoyed, cloyed, disgusted; ձանձրացեալ ի կենաց, weary of life.

Title: Ձանձրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to tire, to fatigue, to trouble, to importune, to plague; — զլսելիս, to tease, to vex.

Title: Ձանձրոյթ
Definition_2: cf. Ձանձրանալի; — առնել, լինել, cf. Ձանձրացուցանեմ; cf. Ձանձրանամ.

Title: Ձանձրութիւն
Definition_1: wearisomeness, tediousness, irksomeness, ennui, annoyance; laziness, idleness; — մեծ պատճառել, տալ, to annoy greatly, to tease or plague excessively.

Title: Ձառ
Definition_1: twisted, crooked; ill made, coarse, rough.

Title: Ձառադէմ
Definition_1: grim-faced, surly, crabbed, horrid; impudent, brazen-faced.

Title: Ձգական
Definition_1: attractive, alluring, engaging; fascinating; tight, well bent.

Title: Ձգանք
Definition_1: act of stretching or spreading; *braces; drying-place or room;
Definition_3: chord of an arc, subtense; line; rope, cord; — հրացանի, trigger.

Title: Ձգեմ
Definition_1: to stretch, to spread, to extend; to throw, to hurl, to fling; to shoot, to dart; to draw; to attract, to entice, to allure, to decoy, to lure; to carry off, to bring, to drag, to drag along; to take or suck in, to suck; to inhale, to aspire, to breathe; to lengthen out, to prolong, to protract; *to leave; — զօդ, to respire, to breathe; — զաղեղն, to draw a bow; — զնետ, to let fly an arrow, to shoot; — զսուրն, to brandish; to make a sword-thrust or pass; cf. Սուր; — զթի, to row, to impel by oars; — զվարմ, to lay snares, to spread nets; — զլուծ, to bear the yoke; — զառագաստս, to sail, to unfurl or set the sails; — զձեռն, to stretch or hold out one's hand; յինքն —, to attract, to allure, to entice; յինքն — զանարգանս ամենեցին, to incur the public contempt or hatred; յանձնզցասումն ուրուք, to bring indignation or wrath upon one's head, to draw it upon oneself, to expose oneself to anger of; — ի կորուստ, to lead to ruin or destruction; — զկեանս, to pass one's life or days; — զբանս, to provoke, to rouse, to excite to anger; — առ ոք զհայհոյութեան բան, to load with insult or execration, to insult, to revile, to abuse.

Title: Ձգիմ
Definition_1: to tend towards, to lean, to incline; to linger, to last, to flag, to languish; to get on but slowly; — ի բանս ուրուք, to be allured, seduced; — զհերաց, to be caught by the hair; — ջղաց, to be strained, overstrained; ձգեալ տարածանիլ, to stretch out, to extend; ձգեցաւ ընդ ամս տասն, it lasted ten years; սարդիոստայնք ձգեցան, the spiders have woven their webs; ի մի կէտ նպատակի ձգի ամենայն, every thing in this world comes to an end; մի՛ ուրեք հեռի ձդիցիք երթալ, go no farther; եւ ձգի վարագոյրն, and the curtain falls.

Title: Ձգիչ
Definition_1: attractive; overpowering, winning; — զօրութիւն, attractive power, attraction.

Title: Ձգձգեմ
Definition_1: to pull or haul about; ձգձգեալ ի դատաստան, dragged from one tribunal to another.

Title: Ձգումն
Definition_1: draught, drawing, traction; shooting; attraction; tendency, inclination; attachment; — շնչոյ, respiration, breathing; — ըմպելեաց, draught, gulp; — վառարանի, the draught of a chimney.

Title: Ձգտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to stretch, to extend, to distend, to draw; to tighten, to stiffen.

Title: Ձգտիմ
Definition_1: to stretch, to extend, to spread; to reach, to arrive; to grow longer, to be prolonged, protracted; to drive at, to tend to, to abut in; to stretch oneself, one's limbs; to endeavour, to strive, to try, to seek; — աչօք զհետ ուրուք, to follow with the eyes; — ընդ ումեք, to vie, to emulate, to rival, to strive with.

Title: Ձգտումն
Definition_1: tension, extension, tendency; distension, lengthening, erection, expansion; — ջղաց, tension of the nerves, convulsion.

Title: Ձեզոյն
Definition_2: personally; դուք ձեզէն տուք զիրաւդ, judge of it yourselves.

Title: Ձեղուն
Definition_1: ceiling; — նաւաց, deck of a ship; — գահուց, canopy; — կառաց, roof of a coach; — բերանոյ, palate; — գլխոյ, skull, cranium.

Title: Ձեռագիտութիւն
Definition_1: work of hands, manual labour, trade, calling.

Title: Ձեռագիր
Definition_1: manuscript, hand-writing; bond, obligation, bill, note; signature.

Title: Ձեռագործ
Definition_1: made with hands, manual, artificial; manufacturing, mechanical;

Title: Ձեռագործական
Definition_1: of arts and manufactures, artificial, industrial, mechanical.

Title: Ձեռագործեմ
Definition_1: to make with the hand, to manufacture, to work.

Title: Ձեռագրեմ
Definition_1: to write with one's own hand; to sign, to subscribe.

Title: Ձեռական
Definition_1: by hand, manual; subject, submissive; own, proper.

Title: Ձեռակապ
Definition_1: handcuffs, manacles; —ս արկանել, դնել, to handcuff, to put on handcuffs.

Title: Ձեռակերտ
Definition_3: creature; building, town built by oneself; farm; craft, calling; — իւր, the work of his own hands.

Title: Ձեռակոծեմ
Definition_1: to strike with the hand, to beat with the fist.

Title: Ձեռահմուտ
Definition_1: skilful in art, expert, practised, versed.

Title: Ձեռատունկ
Definition_2: tree planted with one's own hand;
Definition_3: creature, being; pupil; client, dependent.

Title: Ձեռէք
Definition_1: glove; ագուցանել ձեռէս, to glove; ագանել ձեռէս, to put on one's gloves; հանել զձեռէս, to unglove, to take another's gloves off; to unglove, to pull or take off one's gloves.

Title: Ձեռն
Definition_2: strength, might, power, force, main strength; aid, succour, protection;
Definition_3: ի —, ընդ —, by, by means of, through the medium or channel of; զձեռամբ, as much as one can, according to one's power; ի ձեռանէ, coadjutor, assistant; պաշտօնեայ ի ձեռանէ, subaltern functionary; առ —, ready at hand, under one's hand, near, at hand; առ — բառարան, portative dictionary; — ի ձեռանէ, ընդ —, — ի —, from hand to hand, from one to another, from me to you, from you to him; որ ընդ ձեռամբ է, subordinate; հզօր ձեռամբ, with main strength, with a strong army; — օտար, a strange hand; յերկոցունց ձեռաց աջողակ, ambidexter, right-handed and left-handed person; — հաւանութեան; consent, assent; ձեռս ի կապ, with one's hand tied; with folded arms;
Definition_4: idle; ձեռս յետս կապեալ, with one's hands tied behind; —ք փապարեալք յաշխատութէնէ, hands hardened by toil; մահահամբոյր ձեռամբ, with a deadly hand; — տեառն, the hand, Spirit or Word of God; ըստ ձեռին բաւականի, ըստ կարի ձեռաց իւրոց, according to one's strength, power or means; ամբարձ զ— իւր ի տիրապետել, he formed the project of seizing the chief authority; ձեռօք իւրեանց հայթայթէին զպէտսն, they lived by their labour; ի ձեռանէ նորա վարէ իշխանութիւն, he governs under him; ի ձեռս քո է, it is in your power, it depends on you; չէր — նորա բաւական, he could not, he had not the means; ահա — իմ ընդ քեզ, my hand shall be with you; յամենայն տեղիս ուր միանգամայն հասանէր — իւր, every where he could; եղեւ — տեառն ի վերայ իմ, the hand of God was on me; — տալ իրերաց, to help or assist each other; — տալ ի, to consent to; — տալ անմեղութեան, to support, sustain or uphold innocence; — տալ, to lend a hand to, to stretch out a helping hand, to aid, to succour, to assist, to help; — արկանել, to lay hands on, to seize, to take possession of; — արկանել, —ի գործ արկանել or առնել, to lay one's hand on, to put one's hand to, to set about, to undertake, to take in hand, to begin, to attempt, to try; ի — տալ, to hand over, to deliver over, to give up; ձեռս բառնալ, to lift up the hands; ձեռս ամբարնալ, to raise one's hand against; դնել զանձն ի ձեռին իւրում, to jeopard, to risk one's life; — անձին հարկանել, to boast, to brag, to vaunt, to plume or pique oneself, to be proud of, to take to oneself the credit of, to avail oneself of, to deem it an honour; ձեռն յանձին հարկանել, to oblige oneself to; ձեռն դնել, to lay hands on, to ordain, to consecrate; to put one's signature to, to sign; — տալ աղջկան, to give one's hand, to consent to marry; ընդ or զձեռամբ լինել, to be in the hands of, under the power, in subjection to; ունել ընդ ձեռամբ, to have ready at hand; ընդ ձեռամբ առնել, նուաճել, արկանել ընդ ձեռամբ, to bring under one's power, to subdue, to subjugate; կալ ընդ ձեռամբ ուրուք, to put oneself under the protection of; to submit, to yield; to be submissive; ընդ ձեռամբ անկանիլ, գալ ի ձեռս, ի ձեռս անկանել, to fall into the hands of, to be taken or seized, to get caught; ի ձեռս բերել, to obtain, to procure, to entrap, to catch; անկանել ի ձեռս ուրուք, to fall into the power of; — օգնականութեան գտանել, to find a helping hand, to be sustained by, favoured with; զձեռանէ առնուլ, ունել, ձգել, to take or lead by the hand; ձեռամբ առնել, to indicate, to point to with the band; զձեռամբ լինել, to be able, sufficient, capable; զձեռօք ածել, to seize, to grasp; to arrest; ի — առնուլ, to obtain, to acquire; to re-acquire; to undertake, to begin; տարածել զձեռս իւր առ ոք, to open one's arms to; ճողոպրիլ ի ներքուստ ձեռին ուրուք, to escape from the hands or power of; — մխել, to meddle, to interfere; to set a hand to, to undertake; — մխել յոք, to raise the hand against, to lay violent hands on, to ill-treat; to put to death; ի բաց կալ, ապստամբել ի ձեռանէ ուրուք, to rebel, to throw off the yoke, to save or rescue from the hands of; — or ձեռս ի գլուխ ելանել, դառնալ, to be confounded by shame or grief, to be greatly abashed, or cast down; — զձեռամբ փոփոխելով քարշել զչուանն, to draw a cord, to tighten a rope hand over hand; — արկանել զգանձիւն, to try to rob the treasure;
Definition_5: լուանալ զձեռս, to wash one's hands of, to clear oneself from; — ունել, to be fortunate, to have a lucky hand; ձեռին կատակ՝ գռեհկաց կատակ, rough play is bear's play, joking with hands are jokes of blackguards.

Title: Ձեռնագիր
Definition_1: signature; — արկանել, to put one's — or name to, to sign.

Title: Ձեռնադրեմ
Definition_1: to lay hands on the head of; to ordain, to confer the orders of the church; to consecrate; to anoint, to crown.

Title: Ձեռնադրութիւն
Definition_1: laying on of hands, ordination; consecration; anointing, coronation.

Title: Ձեռնածութիւն
Definition_1: juggling, trickery, trick, sleight of hand, sleight of hand tricks, legerdemain.

Title: Ձեռնակոտոր
Definition_1: maimed of a hand or of hands.

Title: Ձեռնաձիգ լինիմ
Definition_1: to stretch out the hand; to make an attempt on, to encroach.

Title: Ձեռնամերձ լինիմ
Definition_1: to touch, to put the hand on.

Title: Ձեռնամուխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to put one's hand to, to undertake; to meddle with, to prepare or dispose oneself; — անձամբ յանձն, to lay violent hands on oneself, to commit suicide.

Title: Ձեռնարկ
Definition_1: enterprise, undertaking; subscription, signature; argument, reasoning.

Title: Ձեռնարկեմ
Definition_1: to put one's hand to, to undertake, to try, to attempt; to lay hands on, to make an attempt, to attack, to encroach; to argue, to reason, to dissert, to descant.

Title: Ձեռնարկումն
Definition_1: enterprise; attack, encroachment; argument, reasoning; objection.

Title: Ձեռներէց
Definition_1: enterprising, bold, audacious, daring; arrogant, insolent; այր —, a fussy fellow; meddling person; — լինել, to undertake, to venture, to dare, to have the boldness to; to presume, to encroach; to take too much liberty; — առնել, to embolden, to render insolent or presumptuous.

Title: Ձեռներիցութիւն
Definition_1: presumption, hardihood, arrogance; boldness, bravery, act of valour.

Title: Ձեռնընդել
Definition_1: manageable, tractable, supple, tamed, familiar, domestic.

Title: Ձեռնթափ լինիմ
Definition_1: to draw back one's hands, to withdraw from, to abandon, to forsake entirely; to extend one's empire, to conquer, to dominate; — յամենայնէ, to abandon all, to throw the helve after the hatchet; to venture the saddle after loosing the horse.

Title: Ձեռնկալիմ
Definition_1: to be helped, succoured, to find aid or assistance.

Title: Ձեռնկալեմ
Definition_1: to lend a helping hand, to help or succour.

Title: Ձեռնկալու
Definition_1: lending a hand, assisting, succouring; — լինել, cf. Ձեռնկալեմ.

Title: Ձեռնհաս
Definition_1: able, capable; — լինել, գտանիլ, to be capable, able, clever, endowed with ability, cf.Կարեմ; to be within reach of, in the way to.

Title: Ձեռնձգութիւն
Definition_1: stretching or holding out the hand; encroachment, usurpation.

Title: Ձեռնպահ լինիմ
Definition_1: not to touch, to take care, to avoid.

Title: Ձեռնտու
Definition_1: lending a hand, helping, succouring, aiding, assisting; contributing, favourable; — լինել, to cooperate, to lend a help, to succour, to aid, to assist, to relieve, to contribute, to second, to favour.

Title: Ձետ
Definition_1: tail; — առ —, — to —, one after another.

Title: Ձեր
Definition_1: your; ոչ խնդրեմ ինչ զ—, I do not require anything of yours;

Title: Ձերբազատ
Definition_1: emancipate, set free; major, of age; — առնել, to set free, to emancipate.

Title: Ձերբազատիմ
Definition_1: to be emancipated, set free; to be of age, to do without help.

Title: Ձերբակալեմ
Definition_1: to take, to seize, to arrest, to make prisoner, to take into custody, to apprehend.

Title: Ձերբաձգութիւն
Definition_1: tossing or throwing from hand to hand, or from one to another.

Title: Ձեւ
Definition_1: form, shape, figure; formula, form; mould, model; plan, design; dress, costume, apparel, garb; attitude, deportment, bearing, carriage; countenance, look, demeanour;
Definition_2: figure; ի — ժառանգաւորի, in the garb of a clergyman, in clerical attire; ի — սոսկական, in private clothes; պարզ or անպաճոյճ, ազնուական ունել —ս, to have simple, noble, gentlemanly or ladylike manners; — տալ, to give a shape to; առնուլ զ— կրօնաւորական, to become a monk; զայս — օրինակի, in this way, thus, so; գրեաց — բանից օրինակ զայս, he wrote a letter thus conceived, or in these terms; ի — առակաց, allegorically.

Title: Ձեւակերպեմ
Definition_1: to form, to figure, to fashion.

Title: Ձեւեմ
Definition_1: to form, to figure, to fashion; to model, to cut out, to shape; to cross, to get over or across.

Title: Ձէթ
Definition_1: olive-oil; oil; olive; կթել —, to gather olives.

Title: Ձի
Definition_1: horse; մատակախազ, որձի —, stallion, stone -; մալեալ, որձատ —, a gelding; մատակ —, mare; ռազմամուղ —, war horse, charger; որսոյ —, hunter; ասպարիզական —, race horse; լծաբարձ, կառաձիգ —, draught horse, carriage or coach horse; ազատ —, blood horse; հեծելութեան —, riding horse, saddle horse; պալարակապ —, prancer; բեռնաբարձ —, led, packhorse; սայլաձիգ —, cart horse; — հեծանելի կամ կառայց, a — fit to ride or drive; — մեքենական, horsepower; մատաղ —, — փոքրիկ, (բռչոյ), nag, pony; քուռակ ձիոյ, colt, foal, filly; ահիպարանոց, աշխոյժ, խրոխտ, եռանդուն, աներկիւղ, ուժեղ, հլու, հնազանդ, փափկերախ —, fiery or superb, highmettled, prancing or frisky, spirited, bold, mettlesome, tractable, well-bitted or well-broken, easy upon the hand -; խստերախ, ախտաւոր, անհլու, կատաղի or խենդ, կիցընկէց, խրչան —, hard-mouthed, vicious, untractable, furious or moon-eyed, restive or kicker, skittish horse; անպիտան —, jade; դեղձան, գորշ or մողոշիկ, պիսակ, ճանճկէն or ճանճաճերմակ, ճարտուկ, աշխէտ, ճարտուկ-ճանճկէն, շիկակարմիր or շառատ —, yellow-dun, grey, dappled, flea-bitten, piebald, chestnut or sorrel, roan, light-bay -; միս ձիոյ, horse flesh; գաւակ ձիոյ, rump, croup, hind-quarter; բաշ ձիոյ, horsehair; խար, կեր ձիոյ, forage, provender, horse-meat; ջրարբ ձիոց, horse-pond; աղբ ձիոյ, horse-dung; պայտ ձիոյ, horse-shoe; քերոց ձիոց, curry-comb; ողնուլար ձիոյ, crupper; տապճակ ձիոյ, horse-blanket or horse-cloth; վարաւանդ, կազմածք ձիոյ, horse-trappings; ընթացք ձիոյ, the paces of a -; ճախր ձիոյ, caracol, wheeling about; զբօսանք ձիոյ, a ride (on horseback); դարմանել զ—, to groom, to curry, to comb a; պայտել զ—, to shoe a -; վարժել զ—, to break in a -; սանձել զ—, to master a -; ի — ելանել, վերելակել, աշտանակել, —ի ներքս տանել, առնուլ, to ride, to get or mount on horseback, to take horse; երթալ ի —, to ride, to go on horseback; զգնալ, զբօսնուլ ձիով, to take a ride, to go on a party of ride, to go out for a ride; ճախր առնուլ ձիոյ, to caracole, to move in caracols, to wheel about; արձակերասան զ—ն առնել, to give a — the bridle, to gallop, to run full speed; խոպալ եւ ընդվղել ձիոյ, to prance, to rear; կատաղել ձիոյ, to run away, to take the bit between the teeth; իջանել, թափել զինքն ի ձիոյ, to dismount, to alight, to to get down; շրջածել երախաձգութեամբ զ—, to lead a — hither and thither, to and fro; լծեալ ի չորից ձիոց, drawn by four horses; —ն զուլամբ չոգաւ, թալալեցաւ or նստաւ ընդ նովաւ, his horse fell under him, fell heels upwards; խխնջէ, վրնջէ —ն, the — neighs; որ ձրի էառ զ—ն՝ ոչ սպասէ սանձին, you must not look a gift — in the teeth.

Title: Ձիական
Definition_3: sand-piper.

Title: Ձիահալած առնեմ
Definition_1: to pursue or hunt on horseback.

Title: Ձիանդամ
Definition_1: whose issue is like the issue of horses, excessively luxurious.

Title: Ձիասէր
Definition_1: loving horses, fond of horses, of riding.

Title: Ձիավարեմ
Definition_1: to manage, to govern or mount a horse; արշաւասոյր —, to gallop, — full speed.

Title: Ձիավարուն
Definition_1: fit or well adapted for riding (road or place).

Title: Ձիարկեմ
Definition_1: to ride, to mount a horse.

Title: Ձիարձակ՞՞՞արշաւեմ
Definition_1: to give a horse the reins, to slacken the reins of a horse, to run full speed, to gallop, to ride or go at a gallop.

Title: Ձիարշաւ
Definition_1: cf. Ձիընթացք; — առնել, խաղալ, cf. Ձիարձակ՞՞՞արշաւեմ.

Title: Ձիգ
Definition_2: stretched, well tight; extended, vast; long, prolix;
Definition_3: long, a long while or time; ի — արկանել, to prolong, to protract, to lengthen; to flag, to droop; — դնել, to bend the bow; — արշաւել or զհետ մտանել, to run or pursue far; ամիսս —ս, for months together.

Title: Ձիընթաց
Definition_3: —ք, horse-races, races; course.

Title: Ձիթեմ
Definition_1: to oil, to anoint with oil.

Title: Ձիթենի
Definition_1: olive-tree, olive; — վայրենի, wild -; ծաղիկք —նւոյ, olive-blossom; լեառն —նեաց, Mount of olives.

Title: Ձիր
Definition_1: gift, grace, present, boon; faculty, talent; privilege, advantage; մի՛ ի —ս ինչ եւ ի շնորհս խօսել, not to adulate or flatter; — պերճախօսութեան, the gift of eloquence.

Title: Ձիրեմ
Definition_1: to give, to make a gift or present.

Title: Ձիւն
Definition_1: snow; հատ ձեան, snow-flake; մանր, խոշոր —, fine snow; large flakes; հալեալ —, thawed -; կոյտ ձեան, snowdrift; հիւս ձեան, snowslip; մոյկ ձեան, snow shoe; սպիտակ իբրեւ զ—, as white as snow, snowy white; — գայ, իջանէ, it snows; —ն դիզանի, the — gathers; — բազում եկն, it had snowed very hard, there had been a heavy fall of -; ձեան գնտակս արձակել, ձգել, to snow-ball.

Title: Ձիւնաբեր
Definition_2: great abundance of snow; snow storm;
Definition_3: calamity, evils, pain, grief.

Title: Ձիւնագոյն
Definition_1: snow-coloured, as white as snow, snowy.

Title: Ձիւնանամ
Definition_1: to snow; to become like snow, to shine like snow.

Title: Ձիւնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fall like snow.

Title: Ձիւնափայլ
Definition_1: shining, very white, candid as snow.

Title: Ձիւնեմ
Definition_1: to snow; —նէ, it snows; —նեաց, it has snowed.

Title: Ձլեմ
Definition_1: to grub up, to break up.

Title: Ձկնորս
Definition_1: fisher, fisherman; նաւակ, կարթ, երեքարձէն — ի, fisherboat, smack; — hook; harpoon, fishspear; քաղաք — աց, fisher-town.

Title: Ձկնորսական
Definition_1: belonging to a fisherman, piscatory, fishing.

Title: Ձմեռն
Definition_2: affliction, trouble, grief; խիստ, դժընդակ, տխուր, ցուրտ, չոր, անձրեւային, խոնաւ, մեղմ —, very severe or hard, bitter, gloomy, cold, dry, rainy, damp, very mild winter; պտուղք ձմերան, winter-fruits; պաշար ձմերան, provisions for winter; հանդերձ ձմերան, winter-clothing; ի ձմերան, in winter; during the snowy or winter season; ի մէջ ձմերան, ի խոր ձմերան, in midwinter, in the depth of, or in the inclemency rigour of winter; անցեալ կամ այս —, last or this winter; անցուցանել զ—ի քաղաքի, ի գեղջ, to spend the winter in town, in the country; — առնուլ տնկոց, to winter, to suffer from the winter; շնչեցին ձմերունք, the wintry winds blew; զբազում ձմերանց հալեցին զսառնամանիս, they have passed many hard winters.

Title: Ձմեռնահար
Definition_2: — լինել, to be damaged or injured by the winter.

Title: Ձմեռնանամ
Definition_1: to become winter, to grow cold, to be as cold as in winter; to be exposed to the rigors of winter; to inure oneself to cold;
Definition_2: to be a prey to adversity, to be exposed to life's tempests; cf. Ձմերեմ.

Title: Ձմեռնասուն
Definition_1: nourished in or during the winter.

Title: Ձմերային
Definition_1: wintry, hibernal, winterly; —յին ձգի գիշերք, the long winter evenings;

Title: Ձմերանի
Definition_2: storm, tempest, hurricane; in winter, during the winter.

Title: Ձմերեմ
Definition_1: to winter, to pass or spend the winter; to be in winter quarters; to lodge in barracks; —լ նաւուց, to pass the winter in harbour.

Title: Ձմերոց
Definition_1: house or place serving to winter in; winter quarters, barracks.

Title: Ձող
Definition_1: bar, perch, pole, rod, vine-prop; perch(measure);

Title: Ձողաբարձ
Definition_2: arbour, vine-arbour, bower, trelliswork; — յօրինել, զարդարել, to prop or support a vine, to adorn with arbours or bowers, to enclose with trellis-work, to embower.

Title: Ձողակ
Definition_1: small perch or bar; — հրացանի, ramrod.

Title: Ձողիք
Definition_1: railings, posts and rails, palings, palisade.

Title: Ձոյլ
Definition_1: smelted, cast, founded; massive, heavy; pure, fine;
Definition_2: font, cast; mass, ingot, wedge; weight, heaviness.

Title: Ձոր
Definition_1: valley, vale, dale; bed of a torrent.

Title: Ձորախիտ
Definition_1: abounding in or full of valleys.

Title: Ձորձաբեր
Definition_1: clothes-producing, furnishing the material for cloth, lanigerous.

Title: Ձորձիկ
Definition_1: mean vest, bit of cloth; shabby coat.

Title: Ձորձիմ
Definition_1: to be fit for making clothes.

Title: Ձու
Definition_1: egg; — լողակաց, eggs, spawn, roe; —ի միջուկ, դեղնուց —ոյ, yolk of an egg; սպիտակուց —ոյ, white of an egg; — բոյնկալ, nest egg; — վաղահաս, rath -; — հնացեալ, stale -; — անծնունդ, փուտ, addled, rotten -; խեճեպ —ոյ, egg-shell; միզն —ոյ, the membrane of an -; թերխորով —, boiled eggs; պինդ —, hard -; — ի տապակի, poached eggs; fried-s; — ածել, արկանել, ծրդել, to lay eggs; ի —ս նստել, տածել զ—ս, to hatch, to sit on, to brood on.

Title: Ձուլեմ
Definition_1: to cast, to smelt, to found; to freeze, to harden by cold; to solidify; —եսցեն զսուսերս իւրեանց ի խոփս, they shall turn their swords into ploughshares.

Title: Ձուկն
Definition_2: Pisces; կապոյտ —, silurus, sheat-fish; կարմիր —, gold-fish; — ծովու, salt-water fish; ձկան ականջ, մահարար, cf. Ձկնականջ, cf. Խռնդատ; ծովու ձկան արիւն, cf. Կոնքեղ; սակառի, սոսինձ, տապակ, փամփուշտ, թեփ, մորթն ձկան, fish basket, fish glue or isinglass, fish kettle, fish maw, fish scale, fish skin; — որսալ, to fish, to go a fishing; — խորովել, to grill, to broil fish.

Title: Ձունձ
Definition_1: rag, tatter, old cloth; sackcloth, hair-cloth; — թաւարծի, coarse hairy cloth.

Title: Ձրեմ
Definition_1: to give gratis, to make a present of.

Title: Ձրի
Definition_3: for nothing, gratis, free of cost, scot free, gratuitously;
Definition_4: —ք, gifts, presents.

Title: Ձրձեմ
Definition_1: to snatch away, to pluck off; to tear in pieces, to rend, to devour.

Title: Ձօն
Definition_1: present, gift; cf. Ձօնի, cf. Ձօնումն.

Title: Ձօնեմ
Definition_1: to give, to present, to offer, to dedicate, to devote, to consecrate; to sacrifice; to initiate.

Title: Ձօնի
Definition_1: offering, gift; mystery, mysticism; sacrifice; votaries of Venus, persons dedicated to obscene rites; —ս առնել, to offer.

Title: <letter>Ղ</letter> (ghad)
Definition_1: the eighteenth letter of the alphabet, and the thirteenth of the consonants; ninety, ninetieth; It has much affinity with the letters խ and լ, and is sometimes confounded with them, for example : մժեղ — մժեխ, բաղդ — բաղտ; In foreign words with a comma placed above, it is always pronounced լ.

Title: Ղակիշ
Definition_1: intrenchment; encampment; camp; army; — ածել, գործել, to intrench, to throw up intrenchments, to pitch a camp.

Title: Ղամբարանշոյլ
Definition_1: flaming, shining, brilliant, resplendent, fulgid, glittering.

Title: Ղամբարեմ
Definition_1: to illuminate or adorn with festal lamps; to kindle, to inflame.

Title: Ղեկավարեմ
Definition_1: to be steersman, to hold the helm, to steer a vessel;
Definition_2: to govern, to direct, to manage.

Title: Ղենջակ
Definition_1: apron; jack-towel or roller-towel; towel, napkin.

Title: Ղօղանջեմ
Definition_1: to toll, to ring, to sound; to bark, to yelp, to howl, to bay, to growl;

Title: Ղօղանջութիւն
Definition_1: ringling, tinkle, tinkling; noise, sound, clang.

Title: Ղօղեմ
Definition_2: to smooth or level with a roller.

Title: Ղօղիմ
Definition_1: to hide, to conceal oneself; to lurk, to crouch, to squat; to creep into; to swim.

Title: <letter>Ճ</letter> (djé)
Definition_1: the nineteenth letter of the alphabet, and the fourteenth of the consonants; hundred, hundredth.

Title: Ճագար
Definition_1: rabbit, coney; էգ, մատակ —, doe-rabbit; արու —, buck rabbit; ձագ —ի, young rabbit; որջ, դադարք —ի, rabbit-burrow, rabbit-hutch; կաղկանձել —ի, to squeak; ղօղել —ի, to squat, to lie squat or cowering.

Title: Ճախարակ
Definition_1: turner's wheel or lathe; small wheel, pulley;

Title: Ճախարակագործ
Definition_2: turned, made or fashioned in a turning lathe.

Title: Ճախարակեայ
Definition_1: turned, formed or fashioned on a turner's wheel, in a lathe;
Definition_2: very well turned or made, well-finished, well formed.

Title: Ճախարակեմ
Definition_1: to turn, to fashion in a turning lathe;
Definition_2: to turn elegantly, to round, to pollish, to beautify.

Title: Ճախր
Definition_1: flight, soaring; turn, tumble; wheeling about; caper, somerset; — առնուլ, to take wing or flight, to fly away, to fly up, to soar on high, cf. Շրջագայիմ; to caper, to cut capers, to turn a somerset, to turn heels over head; cf. Ձի.

Title: Ճախրիմ
Definition_1: cf. Ճախր առնում; բարձրագլուխ —, to carry one's head high; to prevail over, to be victorious.

Title: Ճակատ
Definition_1: forehead; — շինուածոց, face, front, frontispiece, elevation; — գրոց, frontispiece, title-page; եռանկիւնի —, fronton, pediment; — զօրու, բանակի, army drawn up in order of battle, troops in battle-array; rank, file, order; — առ —, face to face, vis-à-vis, front to front; — լայն ցցուեալ, ճաղատ, խորշոմեալ, սպառնալից, large, protruding, bold, wrinkled, threatening -; զ— հարկանել, to strike oneʼs -; յորինել, յարդարել կազմել, վառել զ—ն, to draw up in line of battle, to put in battle array, to offer battle, to face; — տալ, ի — մը տանել, —ս դնել, to attack the enemy in front, to fight, to combat; ելանել ի —, to engage in conflict, to attack, to assault; անկանել ի —ու, to be left dead on the spot; ի — եհան ընդդէմ նոցա, he opposed them with; յառաջնում անդ —ու, in the first action or combat; — նորա նսեմանայ, his countenance becomes gloomy.

Title: Ճակատագիր
Definition_1: destiny, predestination, fate, fatality; doom, star, fortune; դառն, վեհ —, fatal, high destiny.

Title: Ճակատագրեմ
Definition_1: to predestine, to destine, to doom, to fate; յանմահութիւն —գրեալ, born or destined to immortality.

Title: Ճակատամարտ
Definition_1: troops in battle array, army drawn up in order of battle; general engagement, pitched battle, war;
Definition_2: fighting, belligerent; warlike; օր —ի, day of battle; — տալ, to wage, to make war, to fight.

Title: Ճակատամարտիմ
Definition_1: to fight a pitched battle, to attack each other in front, to meet face to face, to encounter.

Title: Ճակատայարդար
Definition_1: one who marshals troops in order of battle; adjutant general, general.

Title: Ճակատեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to put or arrange an army in order of battle, to draw up, to marshal, to array.

Title: Ճակատիմ
Definition_1: to be drawn up in battle array, to be marshalled for fight; to front the enemy; to join battle.

Title: Ճահ
Definition_1: fit, proper, decorous, suitable, becoming, seemly, decent, befitting, convenient;
Definition_3: ի —, properly, fitty, suitably, opportunely, conveniently, to the purpose;
Definition_4:
ի — է, it is fit, expedient, suitable, becoming; ի — լինել, գալ, պատահել, to suit, to be proper and suitable, to become, to be beseeming or seemly, right, proper, advisable; ի — առնուլ, to avail oneself of, to profit by; to improve, to turn to account, to the best account; չիցէ՞ի —, is it not suitable ?
ի — թուէր նմա, ի — համարէր, he thought fit to; առաւել ի — գայ, it would be better, it would be more suitable, expedient, convenient; ոչ ի — թուեցաւ, it did not seem fitting or becoming; ոչ ի — պատահէին ակնկալութեան նորա ելք գործոյն, his success did not answer his expectations, he was disappointed in his hopes.

Title: Ճահաւորեմ
Definition_1: cf. Ճահեմ; — զգոյնս, to match colours.

Title: Ճահեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make convenient, to adapt, to fit, to suit, to accommodate.

Title: Ճահիճ
Definition_1: marsh, morass, swamp, fen, bog, slough, quagmire.

Title: Ճահողասաց
Definition_1: saying or said opportunely or suitably.

Title: Ճաճանչ
Definition_1: ray; light, glare, brilliancy, splendour; — սրբութեան, monstrance.

Title: Ճաճանչաւոր
Definition_1: radiant, brilliant, shining, refulgent, dazzling, beaming, glittering, sparkling, gleaming, resplendent, glistening, bright.

Title: Ճաճանչաւուխտ
Definition_1: gay with many colours, with gold and silver embroidery;

Title: Ճաճանչեմ
Definition_1: to glitter, to sparkle, to shine, to gleam, to glisten.

Title: Ճամարտակ
Definition_1: quack, mountebank, charlatan; boaster, braggart, vaunter; bully, roisterer, blusterer;

Title: Ճամարտակեմ
Definition_1: to brag, to boast, to swagger, to bluster.

Title: Ճամարտակութիւն
Definition_1: quackery, charlatanry; bombast, fustian, turgidity, boasting, bragging.

Title: Ճամկաւորեմ
Definition_1: to adorn, to decorate, to deck, to embellish; to embroider, to work.

Title: Ճայթեմ
Definition_1: to shiver, to splinter, to split; to crackle, to crack, to crash; to burst, to blow up, to chap.

Title: Ճայթեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make a loud noise, a crash, to cause to crackle, to crack, to burst;
Definition_2: to speak in a bombastic manner, to brag, to boast.

Title: Ճայթումն
Definition_1: great noise, crash, cracking, crackling, crick-crack; bursting, blowing up, explosion.

Title: Ճայրոտեմ
Definition_1: to darken, to dim, to obscure, to cloud; — զաչս, to dazzle, to hallucinate, to offuscate, to blind.

Title: Ճայրոտութիւն
Definition_1: offuscation of the sight, blearedness, purblindness.

Title: Ճանաչեմ
Definition_1: to know; to perceive, to remark, to recollect, to recognize, to discern, to comprehend, to conceive, to understand; չ-, not to know, to be unthankful, to forget; — զիրաւունս, to listen to reason.

Title: Ճանապարհ
Definition_1: way, road, route, street, path; issue; journey; mediation; means, way, manner, method, process; —ք մարմնոյ, the senses; — արքունի, highway, public road, thoroughfare; վարուն —, great thoroughfare; կիցք —աց, cross-road; անկոխ, ղարտուղի —, by-way, by-path; — անգնաց, անկոխ, impassable road; տըղմալից —, dirty or muddy road or street; — երկնից, the way of heaven, the path of virtue; աւուր միոյ —, a day's journey; — երից աւուրց, three day's journey;
Definition_2: զ—այն, ի —ին, առ —աւ, զ—աւ, on the road, by the way, on a journey, during the journey; — արարեալ, on or by the way; — առնել, to go along, to travel, to undertake a journey; to open, to prepare a way; ի — անկանել, to set out on, to begin a journey, to start; — ունել, to advance, to go forward, to get on; անցանել զ—աւ, to take a wrong course, to go astray, to err; թիւրել զ—ս ուրուք, to mislead, to lead astray, to put out of the right way, to cause to err; արգելուլ, փակել, խափանել զ—, to interrupt or block the way, to stop up, to obstruct; դնել ի —, to see off on a journey; յաջողել զ—ս իւր, to prosper, to get on prosperously, to thrive; ի —ի իւրում երթալ, to go one's own way;
Definition_3:
to pursue one's point; գնալ զ—ս or զ— ուրուք, to go by the same way as, to tread in the same steps; to follow, to imitate; ընդ ո՞ր —, by what road ? by what way ? which way ?
ընդ ուղիղ —ն, straight forward; այս — հանէ ի գիւղ մի, this road leads to a village; զրուցատրութեամբ կարճի —ն, company shortens distance.

Title: Ճանապարհակից
Definition_2: —ք, cross-way, cross-street, place where four roads meet; —ք ի քաղաքի, public square.

Title: Ճանապարհակցիմ
Definition_1: to travel with another, to be a travelling companion.

Title: Ճանապարհացոյց
Definition_1: guide, conductor; — լինել, to direct, to show or indicate the way, to guide.

Title: Ճանապարհորդիմ
Definition_1: to travel, to make a journey; to set off, to start, to take the road, to begin one's journey, to walk, to go.

Title: Ճանապարհորդութիւն
Definition_1: journey, way; — ընդ ծով, voyage; ծախք ճանապարհորդութեան, travelling expenses; — ընդ ծով եւ ընդ ցամաք, travels and voyages.

Title: Ճանգ
Definition_2: grapnel, grappling-iron; claw, talon, paw, fang.

Title: Ճանկճանկոտ
Definition_1: clawed, furnished or armed with claws or talons.

Title: Ճանճ
Definition_1: fly; եղանակ, ծիրտ, սատակիչ —ից, — time; — blow; — bane; զ— փիղ գործել, to exaggerate, to make mountains of mole-hills.

Title: Ճանճաճերմակ
Definition_1: black and white spotted; flea-bitten; cf. Ձի.

Title: Ճանճիկ
Definition_1: gnat, midge, small fly; աստուածն ակկարոնի, Baalzebub the god of Ekron.

Title: Ճաշ
Definition_1: dinner, noon-day meal; repast, entertainment, feast; —ոյ ժամ, the three canonical hours, Third, Sixth and Ninth; cf. Ճաշաժամ; սպասք, սեղան, զանգակ —ոյ, dinner-service, dinner-table, dinner-bell; — անպաճոյճ; frugal meal or table; — գործել, to get dinner ready; — առնել, to give a dinner; — մեծ գործել, to give a grand dinner-party; պատրաստ է —ն, dinner is on the table; —ք զ—ս մղեն եւ ընթրիք զընթրեօք անցանեն, dinners follow dinners and suppers follow hard on suppers; cf. Ժամ.

Title: Ճաշագործ
Definition_1: dinner-giving; invited, asked to dinner, guest.

Title: Ճաշակ
Definition_1: taste, flavour, savour; foretaste, prelibation, proof, gustation; drinking-vessel, cup, mug, glass, tumbler; measure of gallons; դուզնաքեայ —, weak or slight effort; առնուլ զ—, to try, to taste, to relish; առնուլ զ— քաջասրտութեան նորա, to prove his courage; —աւ զծով չափել, to empty the sea with a tea-spoon.

Title: Ճաշակելի
Definition_1: that may be tasted, savoured, relished;

Title: Ճաշակեմ
Definition_1: to taste, to try, to relish; to eat, to feed; to drink;
Definition_2: to experience; — զմահ, to die; — զաշխարհ, to enjoy the world or its pleasures; — զքաղցրութիւն խաղաղութեան, to taste the sweets of peace.

Title: Ճաշակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to taste, to give to eat.

Title: Ճաշակումն
Definition_1: act of tasting or eating; Holy Communion; consumption.

Title: Ճաշեմ
Definition_1: to dine, to take the noonday meal, to eat; — արտաքս, to dine bill of fare.

Title: Ճապաղեմ
Definition_1: to spread, to disperse, to satter; to divert, to entertain; — զինչս, to squander away, to waste, to dissipate.

Title: Ճապաղիմ
Definition_1: to be scattered, dispersed; to occupy or busy oneself with, to apply oneself to; to take relaxation or recreation.

Title: Ճապաղիք
Definition_1: effusion, shedding, spreading; — արեան, blood-shed, effusion of blood, slaughter, crnage, butchery; —իս արեան գործել, հանել արեան —իս, արեան —եօք լնուլ, to slaughter, to shed rivers of blood; բազում արեան —իք եղեն or գործեցան ի ճակատամարտին, rivers of blood were shed in that battle; cf. Հեղում.

Title: Ճապատիմ
Definition_1: to glide or crawl like a serpent or worm, to twist about, to twine or coil round; to writhe.

Title: Ճապկտիմ
Definition_1: to streth oneself in yawning or awaking.

Title: Ճապուկ
Definition_1: creeping, crawling, cringing; windig, tortuous, sinuous; flexible, supple;
Definition_2: ընդ —, hurriedly, hastily, in haste; ընդ — անցանել, to insinuate, to worm oneself in, to enter cautiously but hastily, to creep or steal in swiftly.

Title: Ճապուռ
Definition_1: claw, talon; lobster's or crab's claws.

Title: Ճառ
Definition_1: discourse, harangue, oration, sermon, allocution; dissertation; history; treatise; narration, recital; — բարոյական, homily; — խրատական, parenesis;
Definition_2: առ —ն, ըստ —ին, literally, to the letter; — արկանել, to deliver an oration or harabgue, to make a speech, to preach a sermon; ի — առնուլ, to discourse, to speak, to talk; to write; — արկեալ խօսել, to descant, to hold forth, to converse, to talk, to discourse, to spout, to speechify; գրել զ—ս պատմութեանց ուրուք, to write a biography.

Title: Ճառագայթ
Definition_1: ray, beam, radiation; light, splendour, brightness, brilliancy;
Definition_3: — տանելի, vector radius; —ս արձակել, to irradiate, to beam, to emit rays.

Title: Ճառագայթաբեր
Definition_1: beaming, luciferous, radiant; crowned with rays (Diana).

Title: Ճառագայթարձակ
Definition_1: casting or emitting rays, radiant, sparkling, shining, brilliant, resplendent.

Title: Ճառագայթեմ
Definition_1: to radiate, to emit rays, to shine, to blaze, to dazzle, to glitter, to sparkle, to enlighten, to scintillate.

Title: Ճառագայթումն
Definition_1: irradiation, emission of rays, radiancy, radiance;

Title: Ճառագլուխ
Definition_1: commencement of a discourse or treatise, chapter.

Title: Ճառագրեմ
Definition_1: to write, to describe, to narrate.

Title: Ճառական
Definition_1: belonging to a discourse, discursive; narrated, described; — իմաստք, literal sense.

Title: Ճառակցեմ
Definition_1: to write or narrate the same thing with another.

Title: Ճառատանք
Definition_1: tiresome discourse, idle story, prattle, chat; cavil, dispute.

Title: Ճառատեմ
Definition_1: to prate, to prattle, to chatter; to trifle, to talk idly; to cavil, to dispute.

Title: Ճառատող
Definition_1: great talker, babbler, chatterer; caviller; declaimer.

Title: Ճառեմ
Definition_1: to discourse, to make a discourse; to treat; to narrate, to relate; to recount, to tell, to recite, to speak.

Title: Ճառընտիր
Definition_1: collection of sermons, selection of homilies.

Title: Ճատրկուց
Definition_1: chess, game of -; — խաղալ, to play at chess.

Title: Ճար
Definition_1: remedy, means, expedient; — or — եւ ճարակ գտանել, to find a means or a way, to contrive, to think of a device, to contrive; չիք —, ոչ գոյ —, there is no way or means to, there is no help, it is done; it is past all cure, it is irremediable; cf. Ճարակ.

Title: Ճարակ
Definition_1: pasture, feed, food, forage, fodder, provender; pasture ground or land, meadow;
Definition_2: food, pasture, aliment, nourishment, prey; — հրոյ, fuel, combustible; — լինել, to be food to, the prey of, a prey to; հրոյ — լինել, մատնիլ, to be a prey to the flames, to be burnt, devoured, consumed by fire; սրոյ — լինել, մատնիլ, to perish by the sword; սրոյ — տալ, to put to the edge of the sword, to slay; — գտանել, to spread over, to wind or creep about; — տալ հերձուածոց, to keep up, to foment divisions; առ — ախտից, for cherishing or caressing the passions; բազմախողխող երկաթոյն նա տայր ի —, he mowed them down with the murderous steel, or sweeping brand; գիտութիւնք — են մտաց, knowledge is the food of the mind; ճար եւ — առնել, to find a remedy; to repair, to redeem, to retrieve, to make reparation or amends for.

Title: Ճարակաշատ
Definition_1: abounding in fodder, in pasture, very grassy.

Title: Ճարակեմ
Definition_1: to lead the flocks out to pasture, to feed, to pasture; to remedy, to cure;
Definition_2: to attack, to corrupt, to waste, to devour, to consume;
Definition_3: to pasture, to graze, to browse, to feed, to bait, to feed or live upon, to eat; to expand, to extend, to dilate, to propagate, to diffuse, to spread; to take root, to get rooted; to be cured; — զանձն, to fatten oneself; բոցն հողմավար ծաւալեաւ —կէր, the flames, driven by the wind, continued to spread; յանհնարինս —կէր ի սիրտս նոցա, a deep wound rankled in their hearts; ցաւն որ յոսկերս նորա —կէր, a pain which penetrated to the very marrow of his bones.

Title: Ճարակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to feed, to pasture, to give to eat.

Title: Ճարճատիմ
Definition_1: to crack, to crackle, to crepitate.

Title: Ճարճատումն
Definition_1: crackling, creaking, crepitation, crick-crack, crash, burst.

Title: Ճարմանդ
Definition_1: clasp, hasp, buckle; hutton; loop, catch, hook; — գրոց, clasp;
Definition_2: խառնել զօղսն ընդ ճարմանդսն or ճարմանդեմ, to put the taches into the loops, to clasp, to fasten, to hook.

Title: Ճարպ
Definition_2: fat, plump; — խոզենի, bacon, seam, hog's grease or fat; — խոզենի հալեալ, lard; — ցորենոյ, the finest flour of the finest wheat; օծանել —ով, to grease; բառնալ զ—ն, to skim; to scour, clean or purify from grease; —ոյ զակամբ դալ, to become blind with rage.

Title: Ճարպաւոր
Definition_1: fat, greasy, full of grease, adipose.

Title: Ճարտասանեմ
Definition_1: to speak like an orator, to discourse with eloquence, to harangue, to declaim.

Title: Ճարտասանութիւն
Definition_1: rhetoric, oratory, oratorical art; eloquence, fecundity of expression, fluency of speech, richness of style.

Title: Ճարտար
Definition_1: dexterous, handy, industrious, ingenious, skilful, adroit, able, clever, expert;
Definition_2: artful, cunning, sharp, sly, shrewd, crafty;
Definition_3: artisan, mechanic, artificer, master;ad. well, wisely, thoroughly, to the bottom; — ի քանդակագործութիւն, excelling in sculpture; — ի կեղծաւորել, adroit at dissembling, crafty; — գիտել, to know perfectly, thoroughly.

Title: Ճարտարաբար
Definition_1: skilfully, artfully, dexterously, ingeniously, industriously, adroitly, cleverly; cunningly, craftily.

Title: Ճարտարագէտ
Definition_1: very skilful, very clever; good connoisseur; engineer.

Title: Ճարտարագործ
Definition_1: master workman, skilled artisan; artificer; artist;
Definition_2: well made, executed with great skill.

Title: Ճարտարադէտ
Definition_1: very attentive, examining or exploring diligently.

Title: Ճարտարախօսեմ
Definition_1: to speak with eloquence or art, as an orator.

Title: Ճարտարախօսութիւն
Definition_1: speaking well, fluency of speech, eloquence.

Title: Ճարտարամիտ
Definition_1: ingenious, industrious, witty, full of wit.

Title: Ճարտարամտեմ
Definition_1: to tax one's ingenuity, to discover, to find out, to invent, to contrive, to sophisticate, to subtilize.

Title: Ճարտարանամ
Definition_1: to apply oneself to, to study, to think of a device; to become industrious, ingenious, skilful, dexterous, adroit.

Title: Ճարտարանկար
Definition_1: painting skilfully, in a masterly manner; painted with art or skill.

Title: Ճարտարապետեմ
Definition_1: to be the architect of, to build or construct with art.

Title: Ճարտարապետութիւն
