Definition_1: architecture; great skill or dexterity in art.

Title: Ճարտարեմ
Definition_1: to exercise one's wits, to seek expedients, to devise means, to invent; to make use of stratagems, to use artifices, wiles, shifts; to pretend to be learned, to affect learning; մի՛ ճարտարեր առաւել, զի մի՛ թիւրեսցիս, let the cobbler stick to his last.

Title: Ճարտարմտութիւն
Definition_1: acuteness, perspicacity, penetration; dexterity, address, cleverness; sophistry, cavilling, pettifogging, sophism, subtlety, quirk.

Title: Ճարտարութիւն
Definition_1: art, skill, ability, dexterity, address; cunning, subtlety, artifice, prank, feint, policy, sharpness; penetration, sagacity, presence of mind; knowledge, erudition; genius, bent; ճարտարութեամբ, dexterously, cleverly, adroitly, artfully, craftily, cunningly; ձեռագործ, մշակական, տուր եւառիկ —, manufacturing, agricultural, commercial industry; լար ճարտարութեան, lead plummet.

Title: Ճարտուկ
Definition_1: piebald, dapple-grey; — ձի, — horse; — ճանճկէն, roan, rubican.

Title: Ճգնազգեցիկ
Definition_1: hermitical, leading an ascetic or austere life, mortified, virtuous; — կեանք, penitent life.

Title: Ճգնակից
Definition_1: fellow-sufferer; fellow-labourer, fellow-workman; brother or companion in arms.

Title: Ճգնաւոր
Definition_1: hermit, anchorite, solitary, recluse; martyr; combatant, warrior, champion, athlete;

Title: Ճգնաւորական
Definition_1: hermitical, ascetic, painful, laborious; — կեանք, ascetic life.

Title: Ճգնեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to force, to molest, to trouble, to vex, to torment; to endanger, to jeopard.

Title: Ճգնիմ
Definition_1: to torment or trouble oneself, to lead a laborious, painful life, to labour, to suffer much; to afflict one's body, to subdue one's passions, to devote oneself to an ascetic life, to mortify, to macerate; to strive, to endeavour, to make an effort, to exert oneself, to take pains; to combat, to resist; to venture, to risk, to jeopard oneself.

Title: Ճգնութիւն
Definition_1: austere or ascetic life, austerity; penitence, mortification, maceration; fatigue, labour, trouble, effort; combat, resistance; danger, risk; — մահու, death-struggle, pangs, agony; օր ճգնութեան դատաստանին, the momentous day of the Last Judgment; ամենայն ճգնութեամբ, with the utmost care or diligence.

Title: Ճեղքում
Definition_1: to cleave, to split, to rive, to rift; to crack, to chap, to crevice; to cut, to incise, to make an incision; to divide, to separate; to tear, to rend; to disunite, to sever.

Title: Ճեղքիմ
Definition_1: to be split or cloven; to separate, to fall off, to become estranged, parted, severed.

Title: Ճեղքուած
Definition_1: chink, cranny, rift, crack, fissure, cleft; cut, incision, slit, slash, gash, rupture, aperture, opening.

Title: Ճեմ
Definition_1: walk, turn, turning; — առնուլ, զբօսնուլ ի —, cf. Ճիմ, cf. Ճեմիմ;
Definition_2: — զ—ի, in taking a walk, walking; գնալ — զ—ի, to walk with a measured, haughty step;
Definition_3: cf. Սանձ.

Title: Ճեմարան
Definition_1: place for walking, covered walk, walk, alley; school of the Peripatetics; academy, Institute;
Definition_2: dwelling, abode; throne; —ք, walk, gait, step; — բանասիրական, գիտութեանց Academy of belles-lettres, of sciences; գաղղիական —, the French Academy.

Title: Ճեմելի
Definition_1: walk, covered walk; terrace, corridor, gallery; walk, gait; ծառատունկ —, avenue, broad walk or alley, vista, boulevard.

Title: Ճեմեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to walk, to take to walk.

Title: Ճեմիմ
Definition_1: to walk, to take a walk, to walk out.

Title: Ճեմիշ
Definition_1: privy, water-closet; երթալ ի —, to go to stool.

Title: Ճենճ
Definition_2: —, —եր, ոց or աց, smoke or odour of cooking or burning meat;
Definition_3: victim, holocaust, sacrifice.

Title: Ճենճերահոտ
Definition_1: having an odour of burnt grease.

Title: Ճենճերամ
Definition_1: to buzz, to hum, to whiz.

Title: Ճենճերեմ
Definition_1: to exhale an odour of cooking or burning flesh, a smell of roast meat; to burn; to sacrifice.

Title: Ճենճերիմ
Definition_1: to burn, to be burnt; — յիշատակաւ սիրոյ ուրուք, to pine for, to languish; —րեսցի զոհ քո, may he accept your sacrifice !.

Title: Ճենճերոտիմ
Definition_1: to be soiled with grease and smoke; to be half burnt.

Title: Ճեպ
Definition_2: — զ—ի, —ի —ոյ, —ով, diligently, in haste; hastily, in a hurry, hurriedly, precipitately; — շտա —պոյ, haste, alacrity; — տալ, —ս կացուցանել, cf. Ճեպեմ.

Title: Ճեպեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to hasten, to urge on, to forward, to quicken, to hurry, to despatch; — զընթացս, to accelerate, redouble or increase one's pace.

Title: Ճեպընթաց
Definition_2: diligence, stage-coach, coach; — երագութիւն, fast, express train; — լինել, to run or go at full speed.

Title: Ճեպիմ
Definition_1: to make haste, to be eager, in a hurry, to hasten, to despatch.

Title: Ճեպումն
Definition_1: alacrity, swiftness, quickness, eagerness, promptitude; assiduity.

Title: Ճերմակ
Definition_1: cf. Սպիտակ; — երիվար, a white horse.

Title: Ճիգն
Definition_1: effort, endeavour, attempt, study; labour, work, pains, suffering, hardship, toil, fatigue; danger, hazard, jeopardy; crisis; conflict, contest, combat, fight; cf. Ճգնութիւն;
Definition_2: — ի —, close or hard by, one after the other, without intervals; ամենայն ճգամբք, with all one's strength or ability; ճգունք մարտի, the toils of war; տանել մեծամեծ ճգանց, to bear or sustain great hardships; զամենայն յանձին ունել, թափել, ի մեջ առնուլ, բազում ճգունս առնել, to strive or struggle hard, to do one's best or utmost, to redouble one's endeavours, to make superhuman efforts; — դնել, to make an effort, to strive, to endeavour; — դնել զյետին —, յետին ճըգամբք գուն գործել, to make a last effort, or final efforts.

Title: Ճիկ
Definition_1: cry; warbling, chirping; — հանել, to utter a feeble cry.

Title: Ճիղմ
Definition_1: young, tender; — հասակ, tender age, childhood.

Title: Ճիշդ
Definition_1: just, exact, precise, correct, punctual, regular; strict, rigorous; sparing, scanty; sordid, niggard;

Title: Ճիչ
Definition_1: cry, shrill cry, shriek, screech, scream; squalling, wailing, outcry; աղիողորմ —, piteous cry; — առնուլ, բառնալ, ղճչի հարկանիլ, to cry, to make a loud outcry, to shriek, to scream, to screech, to squall, to howl, to yelp, to whine; — բարձեալ աղաղակել, to utter piercing screams.

Title: Ճիչեմ
Definition_1: cf. Ճչեմ; ոչ այլ ինչ լսէր, բայց վայ զվայիւ —եալ, nothing was heard but shrieks and woe.

Title: Ճիրան
Definition_1: claw, talon, nail, pounce; fang; paw; զ—սն ցցել, to stretch out the claws; —ամբք խղել, to claw, to scratch; cf. Մագիլ.

Title: Ճիւաղ
Definition_1: monster; phantom, spectre; night-mare, incubus; —ք դըժոխայինք, the Furies; — շառաչեմ, to drone, to hum, to buzz, to whiz.

Title: Ճիւաղաբարոյ
Definition_1: wild, ferocious, savage, inhuman; boorish, awkward.

Title: Ճիւղ
Definition_1: branch, bough; stump, stock, stem; finger; — գետոց, arm of a river; ի —ս բաժանիլ, to branch out, to ramify; թուել ի —ս մատանց, to count on the fingers.

Title: Ճկոյթ
Definition_1: the little finger; կապել զոք ի —ն իւր, to conquer, to overcome.

Title: Ճղճիմ
Definition_1: stingy, scurvy, niggard, sordid, covetous, miserly.

Title: Ճղմճմճիմ
Definition_1: to be very sordid or grasping, close-fisted.

Title: *Ճղփամ
Definition_1: to fall or plunge in with great noise.

Title: Ճղփումն
Definition_1: noise, splash, plunge, rumour; sound of the lash.

Title: Ճճի
Definition_1: worm, vermin, small worm; insect, animalcule; reptile.

Title: Ճճուեմ
Definition_1: to chirp, to pip, to cheep; — վհկաց, to whisper, to murmur, to mutter, to grumble.

Title: Ճմլեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to trample, to press, to squeeze, to crush, to bruise, to compress, to contuse; to soften, to move, to affect;
Definition_2: to trample on, to grind down, to oppress, to crush, to vex, to molest; — զպտուղս, to bruise fruits; — զսիրտ, to grieve, to oppress; — զսիրտ ի գորով, to affect, to melt, to move to pity; ո՞չ իսկ սիրտք մեր ճմլէին ի մեզ, did not our hearts burn within us ?

Title: Ճմլիմ
Definition_1: to be trampled, squeezed, pressed, compressed; — սրտի, to be moved, affected, to melt away, to be faint with longing.

Title: Ճմլումն
Definition_1: pressing, squeezing; contusion, bruise; — սրտի, shrinking; — պտղոց, bruising.

Title: *Ճմուռ
Definition_1: gimour, an oriental sweet, (composed of small pieces of bread, honey, and butter, pressed together and baked).

Title: Ճնճղկալեզու
Definition_1: caryophyllata, herb-bennet; seed of the ash-tree.

Title: Ճնճղուկ
Definition_1: sparrow; — ճճուէ, ճռուողէ, the sparrow chirps, chirrups, pips.

Title: Ճնշեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to press, to squeeze, to compress, to express, to strain; to macerate, to mortify, to curb, to subdue, to repress, to constrain, to restrain; to oppress, to trouble; — զմարմին, to mortify, to macerate, to afflict the flesh.

Title: Ճնշումն
Definition_1: compression, straining, pressing, squeezing; — մարմնոյ, mortification, maceration.

Title: Ճշգրիտ
Definition_1: exact, just, punctual, precise, categorical, strict, effective;
Definition_2: —, ճշգրտիւ, cf. Ճշդիւ; — ասել or ասելով, properly speaking.

Title: Ճշգրտաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak truth, to assure, to verify, to prove, to demonstrate.

Title: Ճշգրտագործ
Definition_1: exactly alike, the same; painted from nature; painting from life.

Title: Ճշգրտահան
Definition_1: strikingly, perfectly resembling, the same; hitting off or catching the exact likeness; — կենդանագիր, living likeness.

Title: Ճշգրտեմ
Definition_1: to verify, to prove the truth, to certify, to assure; diligently or exactly to investigate; to seek with accuracy, to inform oneself minutely; cf. Ճշգրտեցուցանեմ.

Title: Ճշգրտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to resemble life itself, to depict faithfully, to cause to resemble; ո՞ —եաց ղզաւակն յակոբայ, who can number the seed of Jacob ?

Title: Ճշգրտութիւն
Definition_1: truth; exactitude, punctuality; correctness, precision; likeness, naturalness.

Title: Ճշդագնող
Definition_1: beating down the price, haggling, cheapening, driving a hard bargain.

Title: Ճշդապահանջ
Definition_1: rigorously exacted or exacting, rigorous, rigid, severe.

Title: Ճշդավաճառ
Definition_1: sold or selling with difficulty, stintedly, with much ado.

Title: Ճշդեմ
Definition_1: to spare, to be saving, to economize, to be parsimonious, stingy; to settle, to adjust; cf. Ճշգրտեմ.

Title: Ճշդիւ
Definition_1: justly, exactly, strictly, precisely, punctually; rigorously, austerely, scrupulously, sparingly, savingly, stingily, niggardly, scantily, frugally, meanly, miserably; — գտակաւ, exactly, to a little, to a farthing, to the point, rightly, accurately, punctually, in all its details.

Title: Ճշդութիւն
Definition_1: exactness, punctuality, accuracy, precision, regularity; rigour, austerity; thrift, economy, parsimony, stinginess; հատուցանել բազում ճշդութեամբ, to pay exactly, strictly, rigorously, to a farthing, with rigorous exactness.

Title: Ճշմարիտ
Definition_1: true, unquestionable, real, certain, sure; veridical, faithful, upright, frank, sincere;
Definition_2: in truth, truly, indeed, really, in realty, verily; — իցէ ? is it true ?

Title: Ճշմարտաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak or tell the truth, to verify, to confirm.

Title: Ճշմարտակորոյս
Definition_1: truthless, that has lost the sight of truth; far from the truth, false.

Title: Ճշմարտահաւատ
Definition_1: orthodox, having a true belief, believing, faithful; of sound mind.

Title: Ճշմարտապատում
Definition_1: relating or narrating the truth; faithfully and truly reporting or reported, veridical, true, veritable.

Title: Ճշմարտասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of truth, veracity, sincerity, equity.

Title: Ճշմարտատեաց
Definition_1: enemy of truth, hating, detesting the truth.

Title: Ճշմարտատես
Definition_1: seeing the truth; having no respect for persons, severe, perspicacious.

Title: Ճշմարտաքնին
Definition_1: probing the truth; well examined, sure, certain.

Title: Ճշմարտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to aver, to verify, to certify, to justify, to assure, to show, to prove, to confirm.

Title: Ճշմարտիւ
Definition_1: truly, in truth, certainly, undoubtedly, effectively, unquestionably, in conscience; really, in effect.

Title: Ճշմարտութիւն
Definition_1: truth; veracity; reality; sincerity; բուն —, plain truth; — իրաց, the bottom or basis of things; անպատրուակ ասել զ—, to tell the whole truth; աղարտել զ—, to offend against truth; ճշմարտութեամբ, cf. Ճշմարտիւ.

Title: Ճոխ
Definition_1: wealthy, opulent, rich; copious, rich, abundant, great, ample; powerful, mighty, potent, grand, high;
Definition_2: master, lord, grand seigneur; —ք քաղաքին, the first or most distinguished citizens of a town, the magnates, grandees, noblemen, nobility; —ս ճեմել, to walk haughtily.

Title: Ճոխաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak imperiously, authoritatively, presumptuously; to abound in discourse, to amplify, to enlarge upon; to talk high, to boast, to brag.

Title: Ճոխագոյն
Definition_1: imperiously, with authority; opulently, richly, magnificently; amply, diffusely.

Title: Ճոխաճեմ
Definition_1: copious, abundant; haughty, pompous, stately, lofty.

Title: Ճոխանամ
Definition_1: to have, take or exercise high authority or great ascendency over, to prevail, to rule over; to give oneself great airs, to lord it, to carry it like a lord, to signorise; to be proud, puffed up; to grow rich, to abound, to thrive, to make a fortune; — կործանմամբ այլոց, to build one's fortune on, or to raise oneself by the ruin of another.

Title: Ճոխացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to enrich, to make wealthy, to endow, to gift, to adorn; — զոք պարգեւօք, to load with kindness, to heap up benefits, presents, honours upon one, to overwhelm with gifts.

Title: Ճոխճեմ
Definition_1: cf. Ճոխաճեմ ;having a majestic gait, walk, bearing or deportment.

Title: Ճոխութիւն
Definition_1: power, authority, influence, sway, empire; pride, haughtiness; riches, opulence; abundance, diffusion; ճոխութեամբ, nobly, magnificently, authoritatively, imperiously, arrogantly, haughtily, ostentatiously, pompously; քո —դ, Your Lordship.

Title: Ճոկան
Definition_1: crook; crosier; loaded stick or cudgel.

Title: Ճողեմ
Definition_1: to take off the hair, to depilate; to arrange or play with the beard.

Title: Ճողոպրեմ
Definition_1: to deliver, to take away, to save, to free, to disengage, to set at liberty.

Title: Ճողոպրիմ
Definition_1: to escape, to evade, to slip away, to get rid of, to disentangle; cf. Մազապուր.

Title: Ճողքեմ
Definition_1: to tear; to haul, to drag or draw along.

Title: Ճոռոմաբանեմ
Definition_1: to boast, to vaunt, to speak pompously, to brag, to declaim, to spout, to tear a passion to tatters.

Title: Ճոռոմաբանութիւն
Definition_1: magniloquence, pomposity, pompous nonsense, bombast, declamation.

Title: Ճոռոմանամ
Definition_1: to talk big, to boast, to brag, to bully, to be pretentious, to become arrogant.

Title: Ճչեմ
Definition_1: to cry, to scream, to squall, to shriek, to screech; to bawl, to groan, to complain, to lament.

Title: Ճչումն
Definition_1: cry, bawling, squalling, outcry; complaint, groaning, lamentation.

Title: Ճչող
Definition_1: brawling, noisy, squalling, clamorous; — թռչուն, screaming.

Title: Ճռախիտ
Definition_1: loaded with clusters of grapes, abounding in grapes.

Title: Ճռաքաղեմ
Definition_1: to glean, to gather grapes, to pick up the clusters;
Definition_2: to plunder, to lay waste; to consume, to destroy entirely, to exterminate.

Title: Ճռուողեմ
Definition_1: to chirp, to cheep, to pip, to twitter, to chirrup, to warble, to sing.

Title: Ճռուողումն
Definition_1: warbling, twittering, chirping, singing of birds.

Title: Ճրագ
Definition_1: candle, light, flambeau; taper; յարդարել, լուցանել, շիջուցանել զ—ն, to snuff; to light; to put out, extinguish or blow out a candle or light.

Title: Ճրագալոյց
Definition_1: candle-lighter, lighting-stick; lighter, illuminator; lighting of candles or lamps; Christmas eve, Epiphany, Easter eve illuminations; public illumination; — առնել, to light a candle.

Title: Ճօճան
Definition_1: balancing, oscillation, vibration; clock, time-piece; cf. Ճօճք;

Title: Ճօճեմ
Definition_1: to oscillate, to vibrate, to balance; to jog, to wag; to swing, to rock, to dangle, to move to and fro, to push; — զնիզակ, զսուր, զգեղարդն, to brandish a lance, a sword, to hurl a dart or javelin.

Title: Ճօճեմական
Definition_2: ostentatious, pompous, gaudy, gorgeous, showy, proud.

Title: Ճօճիմ
Definition_1: to oscillate, to vibrate, to balance, to move up and down, or to and fro; to swing, to have a swing, to go in a swing; to see-saw, to have a game at see-saw.

Title: Ճօճումն
Definition_1: oscillation, balancing; swinging, rocking, dangling; see-sawing, see-saw motion;

Title: <letter>Մ</letter> (mèn)
Definition_1: the twentieth letter of the alphabet, and the fifteenth of the consonants; two hundred, two hundredth.

Title: Մագիլ
Definition_1: claw, talon, nail, paw; երկաթի —ք, torturing hooks; ըմբռնալ մագլօք, to seize with the claws or talons, to clutch, to grapple, to grasp, to hook.

Title: Մագիստրոս
Definition_1: master; master of the horse; chief, magistrate.

Title: Մագլցեմ
Definition_1: to claw, to scratch; to clutch, to catch; — or ի վեր —, to climb up, to climb, to clamber up, to ascend.

Title: Մագլցի
Definition_1: with the claws; — ելանել ի վեր, cf. Ի վեր մագլեմ.

Title: Մագնիսացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to magnetize, to polarize, to rub or touch with a loadstone.

Title: Մազ
Definition_1: hair; hair, horse-hair; nap, shag; թուխ, սեաւ խարտեաշ, շագանակագոյն, կարմիր, աղեբէկ, սպիտակ —, dark, black, light, chestnut-coloured, sandy, grey, white hair; գեղեցիկ, գանգուր, բարակ, կակուղ, երկայն —, beautiful, frizzled, fine, soft, long hair; յարդարեալ, մանեկաւոր or ոլորեալ, գալարուն, խոպոպի —, dressed, crisped, in ringlets, curled hair; կարճ, տափակ, դիզացեալ, խառնափնդոր, կարծր, իւղոտ —, short, straight, standing up, dishevelled, stiff, greasy hair; կեղծ —, false hair; —ք այծեաց, goat's hair;
Definition_2: —իւ չափ, a hair's breadth farther; exactly, to a hair; ի —է ոչ վրիպիլ, to hit the mark; cf. Հեր.

Title: Մազաբեր
Definition_1: bearing or producing hair, hairy; cf. Հերագործ.

Title: Մազագործ
Definition_1: made or woven of hair, of horse-hair.

Title: Մազապուրծ
Definition_1: cf. Մազապուրծ զերծանիլ; cf. Մազապուրծ ճողոպրիլ.

Title: Մազապուրծ զերծանիլ
Definition_1: to have a narrow or hairbreadth escape, to escape narrowly, with much difficulty, to save one's life; ոչ թողուլ —, to give no quarter, to cut down, to exterminate, to destroy utterly; միայն փախուցեալ կենդանի —, escaped alone with difficulty; cf. Մահ.

Title: Մազդեզն
Definition_1: Mazdeisnan, follower of Zoroaster; օրէնք, դեն -զանց, mazdeism.

Title: Մազեկամաս
Definition_1: garment of goat's hair, or camlet.

Title: Մազեղէն
Definition_1: made or woven of hair, siliceous, hairy;

Title: Մազկռինչ
Definition_1: in agony, dying, at the last gasp; — մերձ ի մահ լինել, to be very low, dying, to be giving up the ghost, in the pangs of death, on one's death-bed.

Title: Մազմզուկք
Definition_1: radicles, fibres, comose, threads of the roots of plants.

Title: Մազտաքէ
Definition_1: mastic; — գիհոյ, sandarac, gum of the juniper-tree.

Title: Մալեմ
Definition_1: to bruise, to mash, to crush; to break to pieces; to chew; to castrate, to geld.

Title: Մալուխ
Definition_1: camel; cable, hawser, rope; *wedge; դիւրին է մալխոյ մտանել ընդ ծակ ասղան, it is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle.

Title: Մախաթ
Definition_1: large or packing-needle; awl, pricker, bodkin.

Title: Մախաղ
Definition_1: sack, bag, cloak-bag, knapsack, game-bag, wallet; basket, hamper; leather-bottle, travelling flask; — հովուի, shepherd's scrip, pouch, bag or satchel.

Title: Մախամ
Definition_1: to envy, to be envious or jealous of; to grudge.

Title: Մախանք
Definition_1: envy, jealousy; spite, rancour, ill-will, grudge; անարգ —, livid rancour.

Title: *Մախոխ
Definition_1: a kind of sour soup, prepared with bran, pumpkins.

Title: Մած
Definition_1: glued together, joined; adhesive, sticking, adherent; curdled, coagulated; dense, compact.

Title: Մածան
Definition_1: slimy, sticky, glutinous, viscid, viscous, clammy, gluey, tenacious.

Title: Մածնում
Definition_1: to be glued, to stick or cling to, to adhere; to join, to unite; to curdle, to coagulate, to clot, to congeal.

Title: Մածումն
Definition_1: pasting, gluing, soldering, cementing, conjunction, adhesion, fastening; coagulation, curdling; congelation.

Title: Մածուն
Definition_1: curds, curdled milk, clotted cream; *— ծախեմ, puss in the corner; *— ծախեմ խաղալ, to play at puss in the corner.

Title: Մածուցանեմ
Definition_1: to paste, to glue, to solder, to join, to cement, to conglutinate, to fasten; to curdle, to coagulate, to clot, to congeal, to thicken.

Title: Մակաբերեմ
Definition_1: to derive, to deduce, to infer, to conjecture, to suppose.

Title: Մակագրեմ
Definition_1: to inscribe, to write upon, to entitle; to ascribe; to compose.

Title: Մակադրեմ
Definition_1: to impose, to lay on, to put upon, to super-add; to surname.

Title: Մակակէտ
Definition_1: point or sign placed above or before a letter.

Title: Մակաղիմ
Definition_1: to be folded, in the pen, to halt, to rest, to repose, to lie down.

Title: Մակարդիմ
Definition_1: to curdle, to coagulate, to clot, to congeal.

Title: Մակաւասարիմ
Definition_1: to put on a level with, to level, to make even;
Definition_2: to dip into a liquid up to a certain mark.

Title: Մակընթացութիւն
Definition_1: flux or flow; — եւ տեղատութիւն, the ebb and flow, tide.

Title: Մակոյկ
Definition_1: skiff, wherry, bark, boat; — նաւու, yawl; հնդիկ —, canoe.

Title: Մակուկեմ
Definition_2: to row, to impel by oars.

Title: Մահ
Definition_1: death, decease, departure from this life; massacre, slaughter, carnage, butchery; plague; — անասնոց, epizooty, murrain, rot; —ունք, mortality; արհաւիրք —ու, pangs, terrors of death; վճիռ —ու, sentence, decree of death; —ու չափ, mortally, to death; at the cost of one's life; մեղք —ու չափ, deadly or mortal sin; այն հիւանդութիւն չէ ի —, that illness is not to death, not mortal, or fatal; քեւ մազապուր եղէ ի —ուանէ, I owe you my life; բնական, երջանիկ, փառաւոր, յաւերժական —, natural, happy, glorious, eternal death; յանկարծական, անճողոպրելի, բռնական, տարաժամ, եղեռնական, աղետալի, ողբալի, ցաւագին, ամօթապարտ, խայտառակ —, sudden, certain, violent or unnatural, untimely, tragical, sad, deplorable, painful, shameful, ignominious death; մերձ ի — լինել, to be dying, near one's last moment, to breathe one's last, to be at the point of death, at the last gasp; ի դրունս —ու հասանել, to be at death's door; հիւանդանալ ի —, to be deadly sick; բնական —ուամբ մեռանել, to die a natural death; ընդ —ուամբ արկանել, —ու պարտ առնել, to sentence, to condemn to death; ի — մատնել, տալ ի —, —ու սպանանել, to deliver to death, to put to death; երթալ ի —, to go in search of death; to rush on death; դիմագրաւ լինել, խիզախել ի —, to face, to dare death; խնդրել — անձին, to desire, to wish for death; երկնչել ի —ուանէ, to dread, to fear death; —ու հասանել, to meet death; խոցիլ առ ի —, to be mortally wounded; զ—ու գան հարկանել, to beat to death; —ու վախճանիլ, ճաշակել զ—, to die, to depart from this life; ածել —ունս, to carry or bring death.

Title: Մահաբեր
Definition_1: mortiferous, death bringing, destructive, baleful, deleterious, deadly, fatal.

Title: Մահագուշակ
Definition_1: death-boding, announcing death; fatal, sad, disastrous, gloomy, mournful; քուն —, sleep the forerunner of death.

Title: Մահակիր
Definition_1: mortiferous, fatal, deadly, pestilential; գուբ —, sepulchre, grave, tomb.

Title: Մահակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to die with another, to share death with another.

Title: Մահակուլ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be swallowed up by death.

Title: Մահահոտ
Definition_1: savoring of death, deadly, murderous, sanguinary.

Title: Մահանամ
Definition_1: to die, to expire; to faint; to mortify one's body.

Title: Մահապարտ
Definition_1: worthy of death, deserving death; condemned to death; — առնել, առ —ս ունել, to condemn to death.

Title: Մահապարտիմ
Definition_1: to deserve death; to be condemned to death.

Title: Մահարձան
Definition_1: monument, tomb; tower, turret; castle-keep, keep, donjon; bulwark, bastion.

Title: Մահացու
Definition_1: deadly, mortal, mortiferous, pestilential; cf. Մահկանացու;
Definition_2: mortal; —ք, mortals; mankind; — մեղք, հիւանդութիւն, վէրք, թշնամի, deadly sin; mortal sickness; fatal wound; deadly enemy.

Title: Մահացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to die, to put to death, to slay, to kill; to mortify.

Title: Մահիկ
Definition_1: lunula, crescent, waxing or waning moon; crescent shaped ornament, lunette; meniscus; — եղջիւրք, the horns of a crescent.

Title: Մահիճք
Definition_1: bed, couch, mattress; coffin; — առկախեալ, hammock; երկաթի —, iron bedstead; — ծալածոյ, folding-bed; field-bed; — հովանաւոր, canopy bed; սիւնազարդ —, four-post bedstead; ի —ճս մահու, on one's death-bed; անկեալ դնիլ ի —ճս, to take to one's bed, to keep one's bed, to be bed-rid; ելանել յօտար —ճս, յանցանել ըստ —ճս իւր, to defile another's bed; cf. Անկողին.

Title: Մահկանացու
Definition_1: mortal, subject to death; mortiferous, deadly; հէք —քս, we, poor mortals.

Title: Մահուչափ
Definition_2: mortally, to death; — ատել, to hate mortally, to bear a deadly hatred, to abhor, to loath.

Title: Մահտարաժամ
Definition_1: sudden death, untimely -; plague, pestilence, contagion, infection, mortality.

Title: Մաղ
Definition_1: sieve, riddle, bolt, bolter; կող —ից, hoop of sieve; — մեղուաց, honey-comb, cell.

Title: Մաղեմ
Definition_1: to bolt, to sift, to riddle; cf. Միտ.

Title: Մաղթանք
Definition_1: prayer, entreaty, supplication, imploration; wish, desire.

Title: Մաղթեմ
Definition_1: to pray, to supplicate, to implore, to beseech; to wish, to desire; բարիս — ումեք, to wish one well.

Title: Մաղկատիմ
Definition_1: to bite, to sting, to prick, to nettle, to pique; to transpierce, to run through.

Title: Մաղձ
Definition_2: gall, spleen, rancour, wrath, choler; սեաւ —, black bile, atrabiliary humour; անցք —ի, gall-duct, gall-pipe; աւազ —ի, gall-stone; ի դարնութեան —ի կալ, to be in a very bad humour; cf. Թափեմ.

Title: Մաղձայոյզ
Definition_1: bilious; nauseous; ill of the cholera.

Title: Մամացային
Definition_1: chylous, chylaceous; — վտառք, lacteal, chyliferous vessels.

Title: Մամուլ
Definition_1: press; wine-press, cider-press, oil-press; — պտուտակաւոր, screw press; — կերպասուց, calender, hot press; — տպագրութեան, printing press; — ջրաբաշխական, hydraulic, water press; — դրամակոփ, balancier beam.

Title: Մայեմ
Definition_1: to bleat; ոչխար մայէ, the sheep bleats.

Title: Մայիս
Definition_1: May; առաջին օր —ի, May-day; ծաղկաքաղ լինել յառաջնում աւուր —ի, to go maying; յամսեանն —ի, in the month of -.

Title: Մայր
Definition_2: mother, author, cause, source, spring, rise; cf. Մայրագիր; — անասնոց, dam, mother; — թռչնոց, mother, ben; մեծ —, grand-mother; — հասարակաց, our common mother, earth; — եկեղեցի, եկեղեցեաց, mother church; cathedral, basilic; — լեզու, mother tongue; — քաղաքաց, metropolis, capital; — արեւու, the west, sun-set; — վանից, մարց պետ, abbess, prioress; — գեղեցիկ, nurse, wet nurse; foster-mother; անգործութիւնն է — ամենային ախտից, idleness is the mother of all vice; ազնիւ, գորովագութ —, good, tender mother; անպիտան, չար —, bad, ill-natured mother; — լինել, to be a mother; կորուսանել զ— իւր, to lose one's mother; ի — դարձուցանել, to put out, to extinguish or blow out; թաղիլ ի —ն ամենեցուն, to return to mother earth; արեգակն ի —ն դառնայր or մտանէր, the sun was setting.

Title: Մայրագութ
Definition_1: full of maternal tenderness, care or love.

Title: Մայրածին
Definition_1: set and risen again (sun); born of incest.

Title: Մայրան
Definition_1: inesting or grafting place, joint, knot.

Title: Մայրաքաղաքացի
Definition_1: native or inhabitant of a metropolis; metropolitan.

Title: Մայրենի
Definition_1: maternal, motherly; by mother's side; — հաւ, maternal grandfather;

Title: Մայրեւոր
Definition_1: pine forest; woodman, hewer down or feller.

Title: Մայրի
Definition_1: wood, forest; trees, grove; cavern, den, lair.

Title: Ման
Definition_1: spinning; circular motion, turn, revolution; — առնուլ, — գալ, to turn, to move round; to take a walk; պտղոց —, bloom on fruit;
Definition_3: mina (measure).

Title: Մանանիխ
Definition_1: mustard, mustard-plant, mustard-seed; անօթ —նխոյ, mustard-pot; հատ —նխոյ, grain of mustard-seed; սպեղանի ի —նխոյ, mustard plaster, poultice or cataplasm, sinapism.

Title: Մանարան
Definition_1: spinning-mill, factory; — բամբակի, cotton-mill; — մետաքսի, silk-mill.

Title: Մանեմ
Definition_1: to spin; to twist, to twine; to complicate; to weave.

Title: Մանկաբար
Definition_1: like a child, childishly, in a puerile manner.

Title: Մանկաբարձ
Definition_2: midwife; — լինել, to deliver a woman, to perform the office of midwife.

Title: Մանկաբեր
Definition_1: parturient, confined, lying-in, in labour; — լինել, to be brought to bed, to be confined, delivered.

Title: Մանկագործեմ
Definition_1: to beget, to procreate, to generate.

Title: Մանկածնութիւն
Definition_1: childbed, childbirth, confinement, labour, delivery, lying-in; երկունք մանկածնութեան, the pains of labour; մեռանել ի մանկածնութեան, to die in childbed.

Title: Մանկամիտ
Definition_1: weak minded, puerile; crazy, stolid, stupid.

Title: Մանկանամ
Definition_1: to become as a child; to become strong and vigorous again, to grow young.

Title: Մանկասնութիւն
Definition_1: nourishment, care, or education of children.

Title: Մանկավարժեմ
Definition_1: to bring up or educate children, to instruct, to form by precept, to model.

Title: Մանկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make young again, to re-invigorate, to restore to strength and health.

Title: Մանկաւորեմ
Definition_1: to machinate, to plot, to devise.

Title: Մանկերամ
Definition_1: troop, hand or company of children.

Title: Մանկիկ
Definition_1: babe, baby; child, little or dear child.

Title: Մանկութիւն
Definition_1: infancy, childhood; youth; minority; cf. Մանկ; քաջառոյգ, գեղածիծաղ, զբօսասէր, խայտալից —, lively, sprightly, playful, sportive or cheerful youth; անդստին ի մանկութէնէդ, from your earliest years, from your youth; ի գեղածաղիկ մանկութեան, in the bloom of youth; in the prime of life; անցանել զառաջին մանկութեամբ or ըստ տիս մանկութեան, to be past youth; եւ — անցանէ, youth must have its time; cf. Զուարթածաղիկ.

Title: Մանկտի
Definition_1: infants, children, young people, youngsters, youth; servants, domestics; մանրիկ —, little children; հայ —, the Armenian youth.

Title: Մանուած
Definition_1: spinning; twisting; weaving; turn, bend, winding;
Definition_2: winding, complication, intricacy, intrigue, entanglement; — բանից, ambages, circumlocution, circuit, roundabout way; beating about the bush, circumlocutory speech; — մտածութեանց, caprice, whim, fancy, freak; — ականջաց, helix, the outer margin of the ear.

Title: Մանուածաւալ
Definition_1: winding, tortuous, meandering, sinuous; — շրջան, zigzag; crankles.

Title: Մանուածեմ
Definition_1: to weave, to intertwine, to interweave.

Title: Մանուածոյ
Definition_2: full of circuits, complicate, intricate, knotty.

Title: Մանուկ
Definition_1: babe, baby, little child; young child, little boy, boy, lad; youngster, stripling; soldier, warrior; servant, domestic; — մատաղ, babe, infant; — տղայ, child, little boy; մանկունք եկեղեցւոյ, ուխտի մանկունք, clergy; choristers; մանկունք առագաստի, paranymphs, bridegroom's friends; — կնամարդի, effeminate young man; — նաւի, ship-boy, cabin boy; — արքայի, court-page; ինքնակալն —, the young prince; մանկունք, my children; — դու, young man; — եմ ես, I am young; —տիովք վախճանեալ, dead in youth; cf. Ընտրան, cf. Ծեր.

Title: Մանր
Definition_1: small, minute, little, fine, subtile; slender, thin, slight;
Definition_2: —, —նունս, scantily, in small portions, minutely; in retail, in detail; — or — հատանել, կոտորել, to cut into small bits or pieces, to mince, to hash, to divide into morsels; to cut thin; — փշրել, to pound, to beat small, to triturate, to grind, to crush; — պատմել, ասել, to relate or narrate minutely, circumstantially; — ժպտել, to smile; — ծամել, to chew or masticate well, to chew the cud, to ruminate;
Definition_3: to examine, to study, to ruminate on; —նունս դրոշմել, to write or note down in detail; — միտ դնել, ի քնին արկանել, to ponder on, to consider or examine minutely, thoroughly.

Title: Մանրախոյզ
Definition_1: searching or examining accurately; accurate, exact, punctilious; prying, inquisitive; — լինել or —խուզիւ քննել, to examine minutely, to scan, to sift; — լինել, to refine, to be critical, to subtilize; to be inquisitive; —խուզիւ հարցանել, to interrogate inquisitively.

Title: Մանրակծծի
Definition_1: close-fisted, sordid, stingy, miserly, very avaricious.

Title: Մանրակտիտ առնեմ
Definition_1: to narrate in detail, to give a full account of.

Title: Մանրահետեմ
Definition_1: to investigate minutely, to search diligently.

Title: Մանրամաղ
Definition_1: finely sifted, minute, subtile; — փոշի, very fine powder or dust, atom, corpuscle.

Title: Մանրամասն
Definition_1: small part or portion, particle; mosaic;
Definition_2: minute, detailed; exact, particular; — կոտորել, to pound, to beat small, to triturate; ի — մասունս պարապել, to apply oneself to particulars; հանճար ամփոփեալի —մասունս, limited intelligence; միտք ցնդեալ ի —մասունս, a mind lost in details.

Title: Մանրապատում
Definition_2: in detail, minutely; — առնել, to enter into details, to describe, relate or recount circumstantially, to give a full and particular account.

Title: Մանրաքայլ
Definition_2: with small paces or steps, slowly.

Title: Մանրաքնին
Definition_1: examined minutely, thoroughly; — առնեւ, to examine accurately, strictly, to the bottom.

Title: Մանրեմ
Definition_1: to break or reduce to pieces, to grind, to pound, to bruise, to crush, to triturate; to hash, to mince.

Title: Մանրերամ
Definition_1: composed of small ones; — ձկունք, a great deal of small fry.

Title: Մանրերկրորդ
Definition_1: a second or part of a minute.

Title: Մանրերրորդ
Definition_1: third, the part of a second.

Title: Մանրուած
Definition_1: shreds, scraps, morsels, bits, particles, minutiae.

Title: Մանրուածոյ
Definition_1: cut into bits or pieces, hashed, minced, pounded, ground.

Title: Մաշ
Definition_2: used up, worn out, old; cf. Հալ եւ մաշ.

Title: Մաշարայ
Definition_1: flower or seed beds, garden-plot, parterre.

Title: Մաշեմ
Definition_1: to use up, to consume, to wear out, to waste; to corrode, to gnaw, to eat; to spoil, to destroy; to make thin or lean, to emaciate, to extenuate; to afflict, to mortify; — զժամանակ, to employ, consume, spend, or waste one's time; — զոգիս, to harass, to vex, to tease the mind with longing; — զխորհուրդս, to thwart, to baffle.

Title: Մաշիմ
Definition_1: to be consumed, worn out, wasted, to get spoiled, to go to decay, to be destroyed; to grow thin or lean, to fall, pine or dwindle away; մաշեալ հանդերձ, worn out, thread-bare coat; — լուսնոյ, to change, to wane; զի՞ այսպէս մաշելով մաշիս յառաւօտէ յառաւօտ, why do you grow thinner and paler day to day ?.

Title: Մաշկ
Definition_1: scarfskin, epidermis; membrane, tunic; film, pellicle; skin, hide; fleecy skin; fur coat, pelisse;
Definition_3: — մարդոյ, derma; — գործոյ, dressed skin, tanned hide, leather; cordovan.

Title: Մաշկաբանութիւն
Definition_1: dermatology, treatise on the skin and its diseases.

Title: Մաշկեայ
Definition_1: made of leather, of skin, membranous.

Title: Մաշկեղէն
Definition_2: garment of skins; գօտի —, leather girdle; ոտք —ք, web-footed; մարմին —, human skin;
Definition_3: mortal coil.

Title: Մաշկեմ
Definition_1: to skin, to flay, to gall; to strip off the hide.

Title: Մաշումն
Definition_1: wear, wear and tear, deterioration, consumption, use; corrosion; decay, decline; —ումն լուսնի, waning of the moon; լուսինն առնու աճումն եւ —ումն, the moon waxes and wanes.

Title: Մաշտիմ
Definition_1: to lose the hair, to become bald, depilated, bald-headed.

Title: Մառն
Definition_1: sun-set, west; ի —ն մտանել, դառնալ, to go down, to set; մառ — գինւոյ, pearly nap upon wine.

Title: Մառախլապատ
Definition_1: full of fog, foggy, hazy, cloudy; obscure, dim, gloomy.

Title: Մառախլիմ
Definition_1: to get foggy, to be hazy, cloudy.

Title: Մառախուղ
Definition_1: fog, haze, mist; darkness, obscurity; օր ամպոյ եւ —խղոյ, cloudy and tempestuous or stormy day.

Title: Մառան
Definition_1: pantry, store-room, cellar, larder, buttery; wine-cellar, wine-vault, canteen.

Title: Մասն
Definition_1: part; bit, piece, morsel; share, portion; lot, parcel; ration, allowance; contingent, quota; side, part, quarter, clime; minute; relics; holy or hallowed bread; — հաւատոյ, article of faith; մասունք բանի, the heads of a discourse; — բարի, the better part; — զգայական, սրտմըտական, ցանկական, sensitiveness; irascibility; concupiscence;
Definition_2: մասամբ, ըստ մասին, ըստ մասնեայ, ի —է, in part, partly; partially, in parts; by halves; մեծաւ մասամբ, ըստ մեծի մասին, բազում մասամբ, ըստ առաւելագոյն մասին, for the most or greatest part, mostly, chiefly; յայսմ մասին, ի մասինդ, յայդմիկ, on this side, on this consideration; ի մասին, for, instead of; — առ — or առ մասին, — —, piecemeal, in pieces, piece by piece, in shreds, limb by limb; իմով մասամբ, on my part, as for me; աղօթից մասամբ, as for, or with regard to prayers; ի պարգեւի մասին, in place of a gift, as a gift; նմա ել —, he was allotted, he had for his share, or portion; it is fallen to his lot; — ունել, to participate in, to take a part or concern in; ի բարեաց մասին առնուլ, to take in good part; ի չարի մասին առնուլ, to take ill, or amiss; գրաւիլ ընդ մասամբք ախտից, to be subject to certain vices; չիք մերընդ դաւթի, we have nothing to do with David.

Title: Մասնակից
Definition_1: sharing in, participating; — լինել, to partake of, to be a party concerned, to take a share.

Title: Մասնաւորեմ
Definition_1: to communicate, to impart; to distribute, to divide, to share; to contribute, to give.

Title: Մասնաւորիմ
Definition_1: to participate, to partake, to share in, to take part in, to be concerned, to interest oneself; — ընդ հարկաւ, to contribute in some measure.

Title: Մասնմուտ առնեմ
Definition_1: to admit, to admit to a share or part in.

Title: Մատակախազ
Definition_1: in rut, neighing after, ready to mount, covering, mounting; — ձի, stallion, stud or entire horse, stone-horse.

Title: Մատակախազութիւն
Definition_1: rut, heat, ardent desire, passion of horses.

Title: Մատակարար
Definition_1: administrator, manager; steward, provider, victualler; dispenser, distributor; — վանից, cellarer.

Title: Մատակարարեմ
Definition_1: to administer, to manage; to distribute, to dispense; to victual, to provide, to stock, to store, to furnish; — զսուրբ խորհուրդս, to administer the sacraments.

Title: Մատակարարութիւն
Definition_1: administration, management; economy; stewardship; dispensation, distribution.

Title: Մատաղ
Definition_2: child, little child; mortuary festival for the poor; — հասակաւ, յաւուրց, very young; ի — տիս, in infancy, at so tender an age; որթ —, milk-fed calf.

Title: Մատաղանամ
Definition_1: to bloom again; to renew one's youth, to grow young again.

Title: Մատաղատունկ
Definition_2: young plant, sucker, layer, shoot, sapling, off-set, slip;
Definition_3: neophyte, proselyte; թուփ —, young shrub; — նահատակ, child-martyr.

Title: Մատաղեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to restore to youth, to make young again.

Title: Մատաղերամ
Definition_1: young; — մանկտի, little children; — գառինք, lambkins.

Title: Մատանակ
Definition_1: finger, hand; ի — արկանել, to seize, to take possession of, to subject, to subdue; to win complete power over.

Title: Մատանեմ
Definition_1: to seal with a signet-ring, to seal up.

Title: Մատանի
Definition_1: ring; signet-ring, seal, stamp; cf. Մատնոց; ոսկի, ադամանդեայ —, gold-ring; diamond-ring; — պատկերեալ, cameo-ring; հարսանեկան —, wedding-ring; — կրել, to wear a ring; կնքել —նեաւ, to seal with a ring.

Title: Մատեան
Definition_1: book; parchment, scroll, roll, register; code, manuscript; աստուածային, աստուածաշունչ —ք, the Holy Scriptures, — Bible; —ենից դարան, library; ի —ենի հարկանել, տալ, to write, to set down or couch in writing, to register, to record; մատեան — գունգ, the immortal band (Persian cavalry).

Title: Մատենագէտ
Definition_1: book-learned, lettered, learned, erudite, skilled in literature;

Title: Մատենագիր
Definition_2: cf. Մատենագրական; ընտիր —, classic author; յոռի —, sorry writer, scrawler, scribbler; —ք, men of letters, the literati.

Title: Մատենագրեմ
Definition_1: to write or compose a book, to put down in writing; to book, to register, to transcribe.

Title: Մատենայած
Definition_1: immersed in study or in books, well versed in literature.

Title: Մատն
Definition_2: tune, air, strain; բոյթ —, thumb; ցուցական —, forefinger; միջին —, middle finger; մատանւոյ —, ring-finger; փոքր —, little finger; մատունք ոտից, toe; յօդք մատանց, knuckles, finger joints; մատունք նուագարանաց, keys, keyboard, stop; մատունք սանդղոց, steps, stairs; մատունք որթոյ, shoots, branches or tendrils of a vine; — աստուծոյ, the finger or hand of God; ծայրակտուր մատամբք, with maimed fingers; ուսոյց զմատունս իմ ի պատերազմ, he taught my hands to war; ի ծայր մատանց, at the finger's ends; ծայր մատանց ոտից, tiptoe; ճարճատել զմատունս, to crack one's fingers; —ն առնել, to point at one; to denounce;
Definition_3: to defame, to laugh at, to scorn; վաստակել մատամբք, to live by one's labour; ի մատունս գնալ, to walk on one's toes, to walk tiptoe; յոտն ի — յառնել, to stand tiptoe; մոռացկոտաց զ— կապել, to resolvedly to forget, to make a memorandum; մատամբ ցուցանել, to point at with the finger, to indicate; ծայրիւ միայն մատին ճաշակել, to taste, to taste slightly; դնել մատունս ի վերայ բերանոյ, to place a finger on the lips, to keep silence, to be benumbed; — անձին իւրոյ գործել, to kill oneself, to commit suicide, to make away with oneself; — լինել իւրեանց արծաթոյն, to lavish, to waste, to squander; արգելուլ, ըմբռնիլ մատին ի դռնամէջս, to jamb one's finger in a door; cf. Ճիւղ; betraying; — լինել, եղանիլ, to give or addict oneself to, to surrender, to give in;
Definition_4: — լինել, to betray; — լինել անձին or անձամբ անձին, to betray oneself, or one's own cause, to do oneself an injury; — առնել, — եւ տուր լինել, to betray;

Title: Մատնահատ
Definition_1: cutting off or amputating another's finger.

Title: Մատնամուխ
Definition_1: thrusting in one's finger; — զզուանօք փսխել, to provoke vomiting with the finger.

Title: Մատնանշան ծաղկեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to write, to compose, to trace.

Title: Մատնացոյց
Definition_1: pointing at, indicating with the finger; — առնել, լինել, to point at, to addict, to indicate; to betray;
Definition_2: to deride, to scoff, to ridicule, to quiz, to make a laughing-stock of.

Title: Մատնեմ
Definition_1: to betray, to denounce, to discover; to deliver up, to surrender; to abandon, to allow, to permit; — ի ձեռս ուրուք, to give into the hands of, at the mercy of, to deliver up; — ի վտանգս, to endanger, to expose to peril, to put in jeopardy; — զոք գազանաց, to throw to the wild beasts, to give as a prey to -; — զոք սրոյ, to kill, to slay; — զանձն յանարգութիւն, to debase, degrade or disgrace oneself; — ի կամս փառամոլ հաճոյից իւրոց, to sacrifice to one's ambition; զոք ի ծաղր եւ յայպանումն, to quiz, to burlesque, to ridicule; — զոք ամօթոյ, to cover with shame or confusion; — զոք սատանայի, to excommunicate; — զխորհուրդս իւր, to unbosom oneself to, to open one's mind to; ոչ — զհամբերութիւն, to be patient.

Title: Մատնիմ
Definition_1: to be betrayed, denounced; to betray oneself, to give in, to surrender, to abandon oneself to, to be a prey to; — ի գերութիւն, to be or become a slave to; — ի փախուստ, to run away, to take to flight; — ի նախանձ սրտմտութեան ուրուք, to become a victim to the jealousy of; — ի սուր, to be put to the sword; cf. Ատեան.

Title: Մատնտու
Definition_1: traitor; informer, denouncer; — լինել, to betray, to denounce.

Title: Մատուտակ
Definition_1: liquorice; սուտ —, wild, milk-vetch, astragal; —ի արմատ, peony.

Title: Մատուցանեմ
Definition_1: to draw or bring near, to advance, to put forward; to present, to offer, to dedicate; to sacrifice; ի մէջ —, to relate, to report.

Title: Մատչիմ
Definition_1: to gain access, to approach, to draw near, to advance, to present or offer oneself, to come, to appear; to be presented, offered, celebrated; յառաջ —, to advance, to come or go forward; cf. Հուպ, cf. վեր.

Title: Մատռուակեմ
Definition_1: to be or become cupbearer, to present drinks, to fill the glasses, to pour out wine; to administer, to distribute, to dispense.

Title: Մար
Definition_1: metretes or amphora (a liquid measure, the Roman about seven, the Attic about ten gallons).

Title: Մարախ
Definition_1: locust; grass-hopper; մարախ քաղցր —, cf. Մատուտակ.

Title: Մարանաթայ
Definition_1: Maran-atha, it signifies the Lord comes, or, the Lord is come; (it was a form of threatening, cursing or anathematizing among the Jews).

Title: Մարգագետին
Definition_1: mossy ground, turf, grass, pasture, herbage, meadow, mead;

Title: Մարգարէ
Definition_1: prophet, seer; սուտ —, false -; կին —, prophetess; փոքր —ք, the Lesser prophets.

Title: Մարգարէածին
Definition_1: begetting a prophet; born of a prophetess.

Title: Մարգարէաճառ
Definition_1: foretold, announced, or predicted by a prophet or by the prophets, declared prophetically, prophetic.

Title: Մարգարէանամ
Definition_1: to prophecy; to predict, to foretell; to play the prophet, to counterfeit.

Title: Մարգարէացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render prophetic, to cause to prophecy.

Title: Մարգարէութիւն
Definition_1: prophecy; the book of the prophets.

Title: Մարգարիտ
Definition_3: margarine; շարք —րտաց, string of pearls; pearl necklace; ծածկեալ —րտօք, pied with daisies; մի՛ արկանէք զ—ս առաջի խոզաց, don't cast pearls to swine; cf. Ընդելուզանեմ.

Title: Մարգարտախուռն
Definition_1: full of pearls, pearly; — դաշտ, plain sprinkled with daisies.

Title: Մարգարտահատ
Definition_1: grain of pearl; — ատամունք, pearly teeth.

Title: Մարգաց
Definition_1: the eleventh month of the ancient Armenian calendar, (June).

Title: Մարդ
Definition_1: man; mortal; the human race; կին —, woman; որդի —ոյ, the Son of Man; — եւ աստուած, Man-God; բարի —, worthy or honest man, man of worth; գեղեցիկ —, handsome man; բարեսիրտ —, man of feeling, generous-hearted man; —ն անօրէնութեան, antichrist; յարգէ —, man of straw; a scare-crow; — ի —ոյ, from one man to another; ամենայն —, every man; արժանի —ոյ, manly; անարժան —ոյ, unmanly; ի բաց մերկանալ զ—ն հին, to put off the old man; — առ — կուտակիլ, to crowd or rush together, to press, to throng; արար աստուած զ—ն ի պատկեր իւր, God made man after his image; ի բարեբաստութիւն —ոյս, for the happiness of mankind; cf. Այր, cf. Մարդիկ.

Title: Մարդագին
Definition_1: slave-merchant, slave-buyer or dealer; purchase of slaves.

Title: Մարդադաւան
Definition_1: believing in Christ as man only, denying the divinity of Christ, Nestorian.

Title: Մարդադէմ
Definition_1: of a human figure or countenance.

Title: Մարդազգեստ
Definition_1: clothed in human nature, incarnate, become man, made flesh.

Title: Մարդազեն
Definition_1: man sacrificing; — լինել, to immolate or sacrifice human victims.

Title: Մարդաթիւ
Definition_1: enumeration or numbering of men; ըստ —թուի, to each person, a-man, a-head.

Title: Մարդալից
Definition_1: full of man, peopled, very populous.

Title: Մարդախառն
Definition_1: hypostatically united with the human nature.

Title: Մարդախիտ
Definition_1: densely inhabited, crowded with inhabitants; cf. Մարդալից.

Title: Մարդախնդիր
Definition_1: searching, or in search of men.

Title: Մարդախոշոշ
Definition_1: slaughtering or massacring man, murderous, killing, bloody, sanguinary, cruel;

Title: Մարդածախ
Definition_1: man consuming, causing the destruction of men.

Title: Մարդածին
Definition_2: fabulous tree feigned to produce men.

Title: Մարդակ
Definition_1: joists and beams of a house; ceiling, roof.

Title: Մարդակազմութիւն
Definition_1: structure of the human body, physiology, anatomy; cf. Մարդաբանութիւն.

Title: Մարդակեր
Definition_1: cannibal, anthropophagus, man-eater; — լինել, to eat human flesh.

Title: Մարդակերպ
Definition_1: human, having a human form or figure; after the men's manner;

Title: Մարդակոյտ բաղմութիւն
Definition_1: train or suite of domestics, numerous equipage; assembly of men, multitude of people, crowd, a crew of men.

Title: Մարդակոտոր
Definition_1: murderous, exterminating; — առնել, to kill, to put to the sword.

Title: Մարդահաճոյ
Definition_1: insinuating, fawning, flattering, striving for favour, servile.

Title: Մարդահաճեմ
Definition_1: to seek men's favour, to fawn, to flatter, to seek to please by servility.

Title: Մարդահաճութիւն
Definition_1: fawning, adulation, flattery; respect for persons.

Title: Մարդահասակ
Definition_1: of the human height or form; of perfect form, well shaped (man);
Definition_2: the human stature, size or height.

Title: Մարդամարտ
Definition_1: making war on man; hostile to mankind.

Title: Մարդամօտ
Definition_1: near the habitation of men; ի —ի կեալ, to inhabit -.

Title: Մարդանամ
Definition_1: to become man, incarnate, to take human flesh or nature.

Title: Մարդաշատ
Definition_1: well peopled, full of inhabitants, populous.

Title: Մարդապատկեր
Definition_1: man-shaped, having the human form or figure;

Title: Մարդասանկ
Definition_1: litharge of silver, yellow, white litharge.

Title: Մարդասեր
Definition_1: advantageous to the propagation of the human race.

Title: Մարդասէր
Definition_1: philanthropic, humane, benevolent; kind, obliging courteous, civil, gracious; tender, compassionate, charitable.

Title: Մարդասիրապէս
Definition_1: humanely, kindly, tenderly, with kindness, lovingly.

Title: Մարդասիրեմ
Definition_1: to be philanthropic, humane, to behave with kindness, to be compassionate, courteous; to be condescending; to receive courteously, to give a hearty welcome to, to honour.

Title: Մարդասիրութիւն
Definition_1: philanthropy, humanity, kindness, benignity, affability, benevolence, courteousness; condescension; welcome; մարդասիրութեամբ, cf. Մարդասիրապէս.

Title: Մարդասպանութիւն
Definition_1: homicide, murder; — կամաւոր, wilful murder; — ակամայ, manslaughter; — յանզգոյշս, homicide by misadventure.

Title: Մարդավայելուչ
Definition_1: meet for or worthy of man.

Title: Մարդավար
Definition_1: cf. Մարդածախ; civil, polite, urbane, courteous, complaisant, obliging, genteel, kind, affable.

Title: Մարդատունկ
Definition_2: human, rational; — բուրաստան, garden planted by man.

Title: Մարդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to humanize, to civilize; to familiarize, to tame.

Title: Մարդեղութիւն
Definition_1: incarnation; our Lord's human nature; creation, gene ration or genealogy of mankind.

Title: Մարդիկ
Definition_1: men, mankind, the human race, the world; ամենայն —, all men; որդիկ մարդկան, the children of men; գրագէտ —, men of letters; —ս յարդարել, to make men of.

Title: Մարդկութիւն
Definition_1: humanity, human nature; humanity, mankind; multitude, many people.

Title: Մարդկօրէն
Definition_2: humanly, as a man, according to human nature.

Title: Մարդպետ
Definition_1: chief guardian of the harem, chief of the eunuchs, kislar agasi.

Title: Մարդպետութիւն
Definition_1: dignity, office or post of kislar-agasi.

Title: Մարերի
Definition_1: the tenth month of the ancient Armenian calendar, (May).

Title: Մարզ
Definition_1: confine or frontier of a state, march, border; province, district; — դնել, to reduce to a province.

Title: Մարզեմ
Definition_1: to instruct in athletic exercises; to inure to war; to exercise, to instruct, to initiate, to teach, to discipline, to form, to train, to civilize, to soften manners.

Title: Մարզիչ
Definition_1: instructor, teacher, one who disciplines, inures or trains to war.

Title: Մարզպան
Definition_1: governor of a march, of a county or province, exarch.

Title: Մարզպանութիւն
Definition_1: government of a march, governorship of a province.

Title: Մարթ
Definition_3: — է, it is possible, it may he so; it is fitting or proper.

Title: Մարթանք
Definition_1: stratagem; means, experient, resource, remedy; skill, art, ability, cleverness, mastery;

Title: Մարթեմ
Definition_1: to be able, possible, to have the power, faculty or means.

Title: Մարթեմ
Definition_1: to find means, to invent, to contrive, to find out.

Title: Մարթեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render possible; to execute, to carry into effect, to accomplish.

Title: Մարթիմ
Definition_1:
it is possible; զիա՞րդ — այդմ լինել, how can these things be?
չ-, ոչ —, it can't be, it is impossible; —ցի՞, is it possible?.

Title: Մարմանդ
Definition_1: hot or temperate climates; pleasant meadow, delightful spot; greensward, lawn, grass-plot.

Title: Մարմաջեմ
Definition_1: to itch, to feel an itching, titillation or pruriency, to have a tickling sensation; to feel a desire to scratch oneself;
Definition_2: to be excited, incited, provoked, tickled or pleased.

Title: Մարմաջեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to itch, to tickle, to titillate; to irritate, to exasperate;
Definition_2: to tickle, to please, to gratify.

Title: Մարմաջումն
Definition_1: itching, pruriency; incitement, tickling, titillation; smart, burning, puncture.

Title: Մարմառոտ
Definition_1: feeling a prickling, subject to a pricking sensation.

Title: Մարմարաշէն
Definition_1: made or built of marble, marmorean.

Title: Մարմարիոն
Definition_2: —, of marble; կարծր իբրեւ զ—, as hard as -.

Title: Մարմին
Definition_1: body; flesh; man, creature, mortal; corpse, dead body; carcass, carrion; body, consistency; whole, ensemble;
Definition_2: solid; — առնուլ, to become incarnate; եւ բանն — եղեւ, and the Word was made flesh; cf. Երկնային.

Title: Մարմնաբոյծ
Definition_1: too indulgent to the appetites, carnal, sensual.

Title: Մարմնազգած
Definition_1: clothed with flesh, incarnate; corporeal, bodily, mortal.

Title: Մարմնազեղծ
Definition_1: impudic, sensual, libidinous; impotent, frigid, incapable of procreation.

Title: Մարմնազեղծութիւն
Definition_1: luxury, licentiousness, lechery, wantonness; impotence, frigidity.

Title: Մարմնախորժ
Definition_1: pleasing or grateful to the senses.

Title: Մարմնածածուկ
Definition_1: hiding, covering the corpse (tomb), or the body (hair).

Title: Մարմնածնունդ
Definition_1: corporeal birth, according to the flesh.

Title: Մարմնակալ
Definition_1: corporal, a fine linen-cloth on which the priest places the chalice at mass.

Title: Մարմնական
Definition_1: corporeal, bodily; mundane, worldly; carnal, sensual.

Title: Մարմնաձեւ
Definition_1: having a bodily form or figure, corporeal.

Title: Մարմնանամ
Definition_1: to become incarnate; to take the human body or nature.

Title: Մարմնաշարժութիւն
Definition_1: tickling, titillation, stimulant; any movement of the body.

Title: Մարմնապահ
Definition_1: bodyguard, life-guardsman, yeoman of the guard.

Title: Մարմնապաշտ
Definition_1: worshipper of the flesh; sensualist; Apollinarian.

Title: Մարմնապէս
Definition_1: bodily, corporally; materially; carnally, sensually, lustfully;

Title: Մարմնասէր
Definition_1: fond of carnal pleasures, sensual, carnal, voluptuous, mundane.

Title: Մարմնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to change into flesh; to embody, to incarnate; to figure, to impress with a form.

Title: Մարմնաւորական
Definition_1: corporeal, palpable, material; of or belonging to the body, bodily; carnal, fleshly, sensual, worldly.

Title: Մարմնոյք
Definition_1: bodily things, things appertaining to the flesh; cf. Մարմնեղ.

Title: Մարտ
Definition_1: war, battle, combat; wrestling; dispute, quarrel; ի — պատերազմի պատրաստիլ, to prepare for war; ելանել ի — պատարազմի ի վերայ ուրուք, to take up arms against; — գնել, մղել ընդ ումեք, տալ — պատերազմի ընդդէմ ուրուք, to give battle, to make war on, to wage war; — ընդ միմեանս հարկանել, —եդեալ կռուել, to fight, to combat, to attack; միշտ —իւ լինել ընդ ումեք, to be in perpetual hot water with, to be continually at war with; — ի վերայ ուրուք յարուցանել, ի — պատերազմի գրգռիլ, to incite to battle, to excite or create war against; — պնտերազմի էր նոցա ընդ միմեանս վասն, they were at war for; անագորոյն —իւ պատերազմաւ, by a bloody battle, by a sanguinary conflict; —ն յերկոցունց կողմանց մնայր անպարտելի, the battle remained undecided; cf. Պատերազմ.

Title: Մարտական
Definition_1: of or belonging to war or battle, warlike;

Title: Մարտակից
Definition_1: companion in arms, fellow-soldier, comrade; adversary, antagonist, opponent;
Definition_2: confederate, leagued, allied; — գունդք, auxiliary forces; — լինել, to fight in company.

Title: Մարտակցութիւն
Definition_1: companionship in arms; alliance, confederacy; aid, succour.

Title: Մարտան
Definition_1: would to Heaven that! if it might be !.

Title: Մարտընտիր
Definition_1: brave, valiant soldier; —ք, choicest troops, the flower of, or the choice men in the army.

Title: Մարտիկ
Definition_1: warrior, soldier, combatant; ի —ս մտանել, to rush to the field of combat.

Title: Մարտիրոսակից
Definition_1: suffering a similar martyrdom separately or together.

Title: Մարտիրոսանամ
Definition_1: to be a martyr, to suffer martyrdom, to undergo death in witness of the faith.

Title: Մարտիրոսարան
Definition_1: place of martyrdom; chapel or tomb of martyrs.

Title: Մարտկոց
Definition_1: battery, bastion, bulwark; tower; ելեկտրական —, electric battery or machine; վոլդայեան —, Voltaic battery, pile.

Title: Մարտնչիմ
Definition_1: to fight, to combat, to make war, to engage in action; to quarrel, to dispute, to contest; — սկզբնամարտութեամբ, to skirmish.

Title: Մարտուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fight, to provoke to combat; to defy, to challenge.

Title: Մարտօրէն
Definition_1: according to the art of war.

Title: Մացառախիտ
Definition_1: bushy, full of bushes, thick-tangled, brakish, briery.

Title: Մացառաղօղ
Definition_1: hidden among the bushes, sylvan, woody, rural.

Title: Մացառք
Definition_1: thicket, covert, copse, wood; brushwood, underwood, bush, tuft; —ք աչաց, thick eye-lashes; սեւացուցանել թխացուցանել զ—ռսն առ բբօքն՝ ծարրօքն, to paint one's eye-lashes.

Title: Մաւրիտանական
Definition_1: Moorish, of the Moors, mauresque; — նկար, mauresque, moorish style of painting; arabesque; — կաքաւ, morris, morris-dance.

Title: Մաքառ
Definition_1: combat, fight; wrestling; contest, strife, litigation, quarrel, dispute.

Title: Մաքառիմ
Definition_1: to combat, to fight, to come to blows; to wrangle, to quarrel, to dispute, to discuss, to argue.

Title: Մաքուր
Definition_1: pure, neat, clean, unstained, unsullied; refined, purified; limpid, clear;
Definition_2: pure, modest, chaste; գրել զ—ն, to make a fair copy of.

Title: Մաքսանենգ
Definition_1: smuggler; վաճառք —աց, smuggled goods; — լինել, to be a smuggler, to smuggle.

Title: Մաքսապետ
Definition_1: director or chief officer of the customhouse, farmer general.

Title: Մաքսաւորութիւն
Definition_1: office or charge of a publican or custom-house officer; նստել ի մաքսաւորութեան, to sit at the receipt of customs.

Title: Մաքսիմ
Definition_1: to pass the custom-house, to receive or exact the custom or duty, to receive for the public revenue;
Definition_2: to pay the excise or customs dues.

Title: Մաքրազարդ
Definition_1: purified, pure, clean, clear, polished; splendid, bright.

Title: Մաքրազարդեմ
Definition_1: to purify, to cleanse, to polish; to embellish.

Title: Մաքրազգեստ
Definition_1: clean, spotless, very pure; virtuous, pious.

Title: Մաքրական
Definition_1: cf. Մաքուր; purgative, cathartic, cleansing; — դեղ, a purge; — տեսեկ, nitre, saltpetre; — աղանդաւոր, puritan.

Title: Մաքրակրօն
Definition_1: leading a pure life, chaste, modest, virtuous.

Title: Մաքրապէս
Definition_1: purely, neatly; chastely, modestly; merely, simply.

Title: Մաքրասէր
Definition_1: fond of purity, of cleanliness; neat, tidy, clean.

Title: Մաքրափայլ
Definition_1: shining, bright with cleanliness, candid, clear, pure, clean; glorious, virtuous.

Title: Մաքրեմ
Definition_1: to clean, to cleanse; to purify; to refine; to purge; to expiate, to sanctify; — զոճ, to refine the style; — զարիւն, to depurate or cleanse the blood; — զխաւարտս, զընդեղէնս, to pick or cleanse vegetables, pulse; — զանօթս խոհակերոցի, to scour, brighten or polish kitchen utensils.

Title: Մաքրիչ
Definition_1: purificatory; cf. Ածելի; — սկւոյ, altar napkin.

Title: Մաքրողական
Definition_1: purificative, depurative, purgative; detersive, abstersive; expiatory;
Definition_2: depurative; purgative, purge; — առնուլ, to purge, to take a purge.

Title: Մաքրութիւն
Definition_1: purity, cleanliness; purification; depuration; expiation; neatness, tidiness; — ջրոց, limpidity; — օդոց, pureness, serenity, clearness.

Title: Մգլիմ
Definition_1: to grow musty or mouldy, to mould; to strive, to strain.

Title: Մեծ
Definition_1: great; large, big; strong, powerful, mighty; rich, opulent; important, serious, considerable, momentous;
Definition_2: —, — իմն, —ս, —աւ, —ու, greatly, highly, much, very much, too much, excessively; — օր, feast day, high-day; — դաշտ, vast, spacious field or plain; — ժամս, ժամանակս, during many hours; for a long time; զ— ժամս գիշերոյ, a great part of the night; ո՞չ է քեզ —, is it not important?.

Title: Մեծաբան
Definition_1: magniloquent, boastful, braggart, swaggering, blustering, gasconading, vainglorious, vauntful, pompous.

Title: Մեծաբանիմ
Definition_1: to brag, to gasconade, to boast of imaginary adventures, to pretend falsely to bravery, to be vainglorious, to swagger, to vaunt, to exaggerate, to talk big, to draw the long bow, to sound one's own trumpet, to assume a consequential look, to set up for a man of consequence.

Title: Մեծաբանութիւն
Definition_1: big words, exaggeration, bombast, boasting, bragging, rodomontade, fustian, gasconade.

Title: Մեծաբարբառ
Definition_1: speaking loudly, stentorian, crying out, loud, noisy, clamorous, obstreperous, blustering, riotous;

Title: Մեծագնի
Definition_1: costly, very dear, most expensive, high-priced, too dear, precious, rich, magnificent, sumptuous;
Definition_2: dearly, at avery high price; — մեծագնել, — վաճառել, to buy or sell dearly, at a high price.

Title: Մեծագոչ
Definition_1: loud or highsounding, noisy, blustering, roaring, clamorous, vociferous, obstreperous.

Title: Մեծագործ
Definition_1: noble, generous, magnificent; ostentatious; grand, imposing, stately, superb, magnificent.

Title: Մեծագործութիւն
Definition_1: magnificence, nobility, generosity; sumptuousness; munificent act.

Title: Մեծագրեմ
Definition_1: to esteem, to value, to prize or rate highly.

Title: Մեծագրոհ
Definition_1: crowding in, rushing on in crowds.

Title: Մեծազօր
Definition_1: all powerful, omnipotent; very strong, of a great force; powerful, potent, mighty.

Title: Մեծախորհուրդ
Definition_1: of exalted sentiments, noble-minded, magnanimous, generous, noble;

Title: Մեծախոհութիւն
Definition_1: greatness of mind, high-mindedness, nobility or thought or sentiment, magnanimity, generosity.

Title: Մեծածախ
Definition_1: at a great expense, costly, expensive, sumptuous, magnificent, splendid, rich.

Title: Մեծակաթիլ
Definition_1: in great drops, raining violently, showering.

Title: Մեծակառոյց
Definition_1: built magnificently, grand, superb, splendid, sumptuous.

Title: Մեծահանդէս
Definition_1: famous, celebrated, glorious, illustrious; solemn, pompous, triumphant; փառօք, տօնիւ, solemnly, splendidly, pompously, triumphantly.

Title: Մեծահանճար
Definition_1: very intelligent, talented, witty, very wise.

Title: Մեծահաց
Definition_2: sumptuous, splendid; — գործել, to give a grand dinner-party.

Title: Մեծահաւատ
Definition_1: having great faith or belief in.

Title: Մեծահռչակ
Definition_1: farfamed, very renowned, celebrated, of great repute;

Title: Մեծաձայն
Definition_2: aloud, with loud cries or shouts, noisily, with hue and cry, clamorously; — աղաղակել, կարդալ, to cry with might and main, to roar out, to cry with all one's strength.

Title: Մեծաձիգ
Definition_1: very extensive, very vast; long-winded, diffuse, prolix, wordy; — բանիւք, diffusely, prolixly.

Title: Մեծամեծ
Definition_1: very great, grand, important, considerable; — վարուք զարդարեալ, virtuous; egregious, eminent;
Definition_2: —ք, the great; high life, fashionable society; great deeds, great things, great enterprises;
Definition_3: —, —ս, greatly, extremely, very much, excessively; —ս գործել, to perform great actions; —ս վազել, to run swiftly; to gallop; —ս խօսել, բարբառել, կոտորել, cf. Մեծաբանեմ.

Title: Մեծամտիմ
Definition_1: to be high-minded, self-conceited, presumptuous; to grow proud, haughty, arrogant.

Title: Մեծամտութիւն
Definition_1: high-mindedness, haughtiness, superciliousness, pride, conceit, presumption.

Title: Մեծայաղթ
Definition_1: victorious, conquering, triumphant; great, enormous, huge, colossal.

Title: Մեծայոյս
Definition_1: hopeful, confident; — լինել, to be hopeful, full of hope, buoyant with hope.

Title: Մեծանամ
Definition_1: to grow, to increase in stature or size; to become larger, greater; to grow rich; to become renowned; — մեծութիւն յոյժ, to become very wealthy or immensely rich.

Title: Մեծանձնութիւն
Definition_1: magnanimity, greatness of mind, generosity; great stature, tallness.

Title: Մեծանուն
Definition_1: very renowned, famous, illustrious, celebrated, great, glorious.

Title: Մեծաշուք
Definition_1: loaded with the highest honours; magnificent, splendid, grand, pompous, majestic, sumptuous, solemn;
Definition_2: with great honour; splendidly, pompously, sumptuously.

Title: Մեծապայծառ
Definition_1: very luminous, very bright, shining, brilliant; sumptuous, imposing, pompous, most illustrious; — յաղթանակ, most brilliant victory.

Title: Մեծապանծ
Definition_1: boastful, bragging; superb, eminent, excellent, glorious; — յաղթութիւն, signal victory; — լինել, to praise or vaunt oneself too much, to pretend to, to boast.

Title: Մեծապատիւ
Definition_2: honorably, splendidly, with great honour; — մեծարել, առնել, to load with honours; to welcome, to receive with honor, with open arms, to treat with great honour, to feast, to entertain.

Title: Մեծապատուեմ
Definition_1: to heap honours on, to honour magnificently.

Title: Մեծապարգեւ
Definition_1: very magnificent, very liberal, generous; — առնել, մեծարել, to load with precious gifts; — լինել յումեքէ, to receive magnificent presents.

Title: Մեծապէս
Definition_1: greatly, much, very, too much, extremely, beyond measure, infinitely; remarkably, considerably; — սխալիս, you are greatly mistaken; եւ այս նոցա — տագնապ, it is a great embarrassment for them; եւ այս — է, it is a great advantage; վկայութիւն նորա — է յայսոսիկ, his testimony is highly important in this cause.

Title: Մեծաջան
Definition_1: very diligent, careful, studious, industrious; toilsome, tiresome, hard, painful.

Title: Մեծասաստ
Definition_1: severe, austere, authoritative, imperious; awful, terrible.

Title: Մեծավայելուչ
Definition_1: very convenient, decorous; glorious, eminent, elegant; majestical, magnificent, august.

Title: Մեծավաստակ
Definition_1: meritorious, deserving, of great merit; cf. Մեծաջան.

Title: Մեծատուն
Definition_2: the wealthy, rich people, the rich.

Title: Մեծարանք
Definition_1: respect, honour, veneration, reverence, deference, homage, distinction; ceremony, compliments, respects; kind reception, welcome; — հասարակաց, universal esteem;
Definition_2: —նօք, respectfully, honorably, with regard; առնել —նս երեսաց ուրուք, to have regard for; to hearken favourably to; —նս դնել, առնել, ցուցանել, cf. Մեծարեմ.

Title: Մեծարգոյ
Definition_1: very respectable, estimable, reverend, venerable; — լինել, to be held in high esteem, to enjoy the esteem of, to be much esteemed by; — առնել, cf. Մեծարեմ.

Title: Մեծարեմ
Definition_1: to respect, to honour, to reverence, to venerate, to treat with distinction, to compliment, to pay respect to.

Title: Մեծացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to enlarge, to make to grow, to increase, to augment, to extend; to enrich; to render powerful, mighty; to favour, to befriend, to raise, to exalt, to dignify; to glorify, to celebrate; to magnify, to praise highly, to exalt, to extol; to amplify, to exaggerate.

Title: Մեծափառթամ
Definition_1: tremendously or excessively rich, very affluent, opulent.

Title: Մեծաքայլ
Definition_1: with hasty strides; — գնալ, to stride along, to make huge strides, to quicken one's step; — ընթանալ, to run as fast as the legs can carry, to run as hard as one can.

Title: Մեծաքանակ
Definition_1: wholesale; — վաճառ, the — trade; — մթերք վաճառաց, wholesale warehouse.

Title: Մեծեղեռն
Definition_1: execrable, abominable; very wicked, heinous; — ամբարըշտութիւն, horrible crime; — յանցանք, crime.

Title: Մեծիմաց
Definition_1: of vast intellect, very wise, — learned, — ingenious.

Title: Մեծութիւն
Definition_1: greatness, thickness, size, capaciousness; volume; grandeur, greatness, power, magnificence, majesty, elevation, exaltation;
Definition_2: capacity; մեծափարթամ —, great fortune, wealth; աշխարհական —ք, human greatness; լնուլ մեծութեամբք, to load with riches; ի — հասանել, to attain to dignity or honours; կորուսանել զ—ս իւր, to lose one's fortune; մերկանալ ի մեծութեանց, to sacrifice one's fortune; —դ, Your Grace.

Title: Մեծուհի
Definition_1: woman of quality, dame, lady, lady of rank.

Title: Մեկին
Definition_1: explicit, clear, evident, formal, precise; distinct, only, sole; simple, ordinary, obscure;
Definition_2: clearly, explicitly, distinctly, precisely, expressly, intelligibly.

Title: Մեկնահանդերձ
Definition_1: clad in a single garment, having but one vest.

Title: Մեկնանամ
Definition_1: to retire, to go away, to remove to a distance.

Title: Մեկնեմ
Definition_1: to separate, to divide, to detach, to loose, to remove; to explain, to expound, to develop, to resolve, to interpret, to comment upon; to hold out or stretch forth; — ի ստենէ, to wean; թուղթ մեկնելոյ, bill of divorce; cf. Թիւր.

Title: Մեկնիմ
Definition_1: to separate, to disunite, to part, to get loose; to remove, to go away, to depart, to retire, to go out, to make off, to steal away; to abstain, to forbear; to leave off, to desist, to cease; to stretch; to explain oneself; — ի ցամաքէ, to bear off from the shore, to take sea-room, to stand out to sea; — ի կնոջէ, to give a bill of divorce; — ի հիացումն, to go into ecstasies.

Title: Մեկնութիւն
Definition_1: explication, explanation, interpretation, commentary; separation, removal, retirement.

Title: Մեկուսիմ
Definition_1: to remove, to go away, to retire, to stand aloof, to withdraw to a lonely place.

Title: Մեկուսեմ
Definition_1: to remove, to separate, to keep away, to put or place farther off.

Title: Մեկուսի
Definition_1: apart, aside, separately, in private, singly; — առնել, to remove, to alienate; — կալ, լինել, to remain aloof, to withdraw, to retire, to stand in dispart.

Title: Մեհեան
Definition_1: fane, heathen temple; ara, altar; idol, image.

Title: Մեհեկան
Definition_1: the seventh month of the ancient Armenian calendar, February.

Title: Մեհենազարդ
Definition_1: neocorus, guardian or maintainer of the temples.

Title: Մեհենազարդութիւն
Definition_1: office or duties of a neocorus.

Title: Մեհենակալ
Definition_1: chief-priest or president of a heathen temple.

Title: Մեհենական
Definition_1: of a heathen temple or belonging to a heathen temple; hieroglyphical.

Title: Մեհենատեղի
Definition_1: place where heathen temples are built.

Title: Մեղ
Definition_1: fault; sin; — դնել, cf. Մեղադրեմ; — ինչ առնել ումեք, to wrong or do evil to; քո է —ն, it is all owing to you, it is your fault, you are wrong; ոչ իմ է —ն, I am not to blame, it is not my fault; իւրք — ինչ ոչ արար ինձ, he did not offend me in any way; — ինչ ոչ գոյր նոցա, they would be without fault; այս կայ — եւ մեզ, this is also partly our fault.

Title: Մեղադրանք
Definition_1: blame, obloquy, accusation, reproof, reproach, reprehension.

Title: Մեղադրեմ
Definition_1: to find fault with, to blame, to accuse, to reproach, to censure, to reprove, to criminate, to condemn; — զժամանակն, to blame the want of time.

Title: Մեղայ
Definition_1: repentance, contrition, compunction, hearty sorrow; — ! mea culpa ! I have sinned !.

Title: Մեղանչական
Definition_1: subject to sin, peccant, sinful; peccable; hurtful, detrimental, mischievous, pernicious, noxious.

Title: Մեղանչանք
Definition_1: peccability; wrong, offence, transgression, malice, wickedness.

Title: Մեղանչեմ
Definition_1: to sin, to commit crime or fault, to transgress, to do amiss, to offend, to fail in duty, to err; to mistake;
Definition_2: to wrong, to injure, to aggrieve, to do injury or harm, to harm, to be hurtful, to hurt, to be prejudicial or injurious to; մահուչափ, ծանունս, թեթեւս —, to sin mortally, grievously, lightly or venially; զի՞ մեղայ, what have I done?.

Title: Մեղանք
Definition_1: cf. Մեղք; յանձն առնուլ զ—նս, to confess one's faults.

Title: Մեղեխ
Definition_1: handle; haft; — արկանել, to put a handle to, to set in a handle; to haft; հանել զ—, to take off the handle, to take out of the handle; to unhaft.

Title: Մեղկ
Definition_2: weak, faint, nerveless, indolent, effeminate, languid, cowardly; slothful, sluggish.

Title: Մեղկանամ
Definition_1: to soften, to become loose, to slacken, to mollify, to loosen;
Definition_2: to become effeminate, to give oneself up to softness or effeminacy.

Title: Մեղկասէր
Definition_1: effeminate, luxurious, delicate, voluptuous; այր —, sybarite.

Title: Մեղկեմ
Definition_1: to soften, to loosen, to slacken, to mollify;
Definition_2: to unman, to enervate, to effeminate, to emasculate, to render cowardly.

Title: Մեղկութիւն
Definition_3: մեղկութեամբ, softly, indolently, effeminately, languishingly.

Title: Մեղմանամ
Definition_1: to grow mild, to be softened, to become moderate or temperate; to diminish, to abate, to relent.

Title: Մեղմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make mild, to soften, to moderate, to lenify; to temper, to abate, to diminish, to sooth, to assuage, to mitigate, to allay, to alleviate.

Title: Մեղմեխ
Definition_1: insinuating, alluring, enticing, smirking; unsincere, deceitful, subtile, fraudulent, wicked, malicious.

Title: Մեղմեխանք
Definition_1: dissimulation, affectation; enticing ways, mincing air or manner, smirking, wheedling, incitement; guile, deceit, fraud, wickedness, malice; — աչաց, leer, sheep's eye, ogling; — ձայնից, affected, wheedling voice.

Title: Մեղմեխեմ
Definition_1: to simulate, to feign artfully, to dissemble; to incite, to allure, to draw on; to ogle.

Title: Մեղմընթաց
Definition_1: going slowly; — երագութիւն, goods or luggage train, slow train.

Title: Մեղու
Definition_1: bee; ձագ —աց, drone maggot; գունդ, պարք —աց, swarm of bees; գործասէր, ճարտար —, diligent, industrious bee; — բզզէ, the bee buzzes.

Title: Մեղուակն
Definition_1: gentle-eyed, having a soft or mild glance.

Title: Մեղուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to sin or to transgress.

Title: Մեղսասէր
Definition_1: inclined to transgress, delighting in sin, wicked, criminal.

Title: Մեղրօղի
Definition_1: an intoxicating liquor made with honey.

Title: Մեղք
Definition_1: sin, crime, iniquity, transgression, trespass; fault, error; offence, evil, malice; — փոքր, թեթեւ, peccadillo, venial fault; եօթն մահուչափ —, the seven capital sins; մահուչափ or մահացու, սկզբնական, ներգործական, վերապահեալ —, deadly or mortal, original, actual, reserved sin; վկայք մեղաց, false witnesses; վասն մեղացն, sin-offering or trespass-offering; անկանել ի մեղս, մեղս առնել, գործել, to sin, to transgress; ի մեղս արկանել, to cause to sin; խոստովանել զմեղս իւր, to confess one's sins; թողուլ զմեղս, to remit, to absolve sin; մեռանել ի մեղս, to die in sin; ի մեղս գրել զիմն, to impute a thing as a crime to; մեղս դնել, cf. Մեղադրեմ.

Title: Մենազինիմ
Definition_1: to be armed or accoutred lightly; to be armed at all points.

Title: Մենախօսութիւն
Definition_1: an aside, words spoken aside; monologue.

Title: Մենամարտիկ
Definition_1: gladiator, wrestler, gymnast, athlete; — կռիւ, cf. Մենամարտութիւն; — լինել, cf. Մենամարտիմ; — ոգորել, cf. Մենամարտիմ.

Title: Մենամարտիմ
Definition_1: to fight a duel, hand to hand, in single combat; to wrestle, to struggle.

Title: Մենանամ
Definition_1: to lead a retired or solitary life, to be alone, to live retired.

Title: Մեռանիմ
Definition_1: to die, to expire, to breathe one's last, to give up the ghost, to depart this life, to pay the last debt to nature; to mortify one's body; մահու —, to be punished with death, to suffer capital punishment; — ի մարտ պատերազմի, to die on the breach, to be slain in action; — ի վերայ ազգին, ի սէր հայրենեաց, to die for one's country; — քաջութեամբ, պատուով, to die on the field of honor; մերձ է ի —, he is at the last gasp, he is expiring, dying; որպէս կեայ ոք այնպէս եո մեռանի, people generally die as they live.

Title: Մեռեալ
Definition_2: dead body, corpse; ընդ —ս համարել, to believe or take for dead; օր մեռելոց, All Soul's day; ցուցակ մեռելոց, register of the dead; պաշտօն մեռելոց, office for souls in purgatory; cf. Ննջեցեալ.

Title: Մեռելակոչութիւն
Definition_1: evocation, raising up, calling up the dead.

Title: Մեռելատիպ
Definition_1: corpse-like; — դէմք, deadly pale face, livid face.

Title: Մեռելոյթք
Definition_1: funeral expenses; the goods of the deceased.

Title: Մեռելոտի
Definition_3: idols, image.

Title: Մեռելութիւն
Definition_1: deadness, want of animation, privation of life; mortality; mortification; — արգանդի, the being past bearing, impotence, sterility.

Title: Մեռոնեմ
Definition_1: to confirm, to anoint with holy oil.

Title: Մեռուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause the death of, to put to death, to kill; to mortify.

Title: Մեսիմ
Definition_1: to be introduced or brought in, to be adopted.

Title: Մեստիմ
Definition_1: to be fortified or strengthened by, to be consolidated.

Title: Մետաղ
Definition_3: exile, banishment; դնել, արտասահմանել ի —ս, to banish, to exile, to send into banishment; արկանել ի —ս, to arrest, to imprison.

Title: Մետաքս
Definition_1: silk; անգործ —, raw silk; գործարան —ի, silk-manufactory.

Title: Մեր
Definition_2: our own; սրտիւք մերովք, with our heart; ի ձեռաց մերոց, from our hands; ի տան մերում, in our house, at home; կերպացեալ զմերս ի սրբոյ կուսէն, Christ took our nature upon him from the Virgin Mary.

Title: Մերազնանամ
Definition_1: to be naturalized among us; to become a fellow-citizen, to share in our national rights.

Title: Մերակերպ
Definition_1: of our form or nature, human, incarnate.

Title: Մերային
Definition_1: our; ours; —ս ազգի, to our nation; զ—ս սիրեմք, we love our own; ի մերայնո՞ց իցես, are you one of ours?.

Title: Մերասեր
Definition_1: of our nation, national; of our nature, our; — բնութիւն, humanity;
Definition_2: —ք, our conationals, fellow-countrymen, compatriots; mankind, the human race.

Title: Մերթ
Definition_1: sometimes, now and then, from time to time; cf. Երբեմն.

Title: Մերժեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to expel, to repel, to reject, to exclude, to drive out; to reprove, to disallow, to disapprove; to refuse, to deny; — զքուն, to disturb one's slumber; — զոք ի կենաց, to deprive of life, to slay.

Title: Մերժիմ
Definition_1: to be driven out, expelled or rejected; to abstain from, to forbear; to depart, to leave, to absent oneself, to retire.

Title: Մերժումն
Definition_1: expulsion; repulse, rebuff, refusal, denial; disapproval.

Title: Մերկ
Definition_1: naked, bare; unadorned, plain, simple, evident;
Definition_3: without;
Definition_4: evidently, obviously, palpably; — ընդ — մարտընչել, to wrestle naked.

Title: Մերկանամ
Definition_1: to undress oneself, to strip, to strip naked, to denude, to uncover, to unveil, to pull off, to throw off, to be discovered;
Definition_2: to undress, to unclothe, to strip, to lay bare, to disrobe; to bereave, to unfurnish; — զսիրտ, to unbosom oneself to, to pour out one's feelings, to open oneself to; ի բաց —, to cast, put or leave off; ի բաց — զամօթ, to cast aside all sense of shame; — յընչից, to deprive oneself of one's property; — զսուրն ի պատենաից, to draw, to bare or unsheathe a sword; — օձից, to cast the skin; այն ինչ կամէր առաւօտն ի գիշերոյն —, իբրեւ այգն զառաւօտն մարկանայր, at dawn, at day-break, in the grey of the morning, at the peep of day; յայսմ օրինակի զբանս իւր —նայր, he this expressed, or explained himself.

Title: Մերկանդամ
Definition_3: — պտուղք, drupa.

Title: Մերկապարանոց
