Definition_3: nakedly, clearly, overtly, plainly; — առնել, to make evident, to reveal, to discover, to unveil; ամենայն ինչ — կայ առաջի նորա, all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him.

Title: Մերկիմաստասէրք
Definition_1: gymnosophists (a sect of Indian philosophers who went naked, living in woods and feeding on herbs).

Title: Մերձ
Definition_1: near, nigh, next, close to, contiguous;
Definition_2: about, nearly; — ընդ —, very near, soon, in a short time; — ի վենետիկ, near Venice; — է ի մեզ, it is near or quite close to us; — առ միմեանս, together, one with another, side by side; — լինել, to be near, ready at hand; to be on the verge or brink of, at the point of; — լինել ի մահ, to be at the point of death; — ի վախճան լինել, to be drawing to a close; to be approaching one's end; — բազմիլ, to sit near; — դնել, to propose; to confront, to compare.

Title: Մերձակայ
Definition_1: near, nigh to, neighbouring, bordering on, adjacent; present; coming, next; imminent.

Title: Մերձաւոր
Definition_1: near, nigh, next; neighbouring, bordering on, adjacent, contiguous; approximate; akin, consanguineous;
Definition_2: neighbour, friend, acquaintance; relation; — ազգական, near relation.

Title: Մերձաւորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to approach, to draw or bring near; to hold, take, possess, inherit or appropriate any thing in right of relationship.

Title: Մերձաւորիմ
Definition_1: to approach, to go or come near, or towards, to go closer to; to be allied, related by marriage, to intermarry with, to marry into.

Title: Մերձաւորութիւն
Definition_1: proximity, neighbourhood, contiguity; approximation; familiarity; affinity, alliance by marriage; relationship, kindred; copulation.

Title: Մերձենամ
Definition_1: to approach, to accost, to draw near; to touch; to keep company with, to join, to be united; to know, to have carnal connection with.

Title: Մերձեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to approach, to draw near, to advance towards; to apply, to appropriate.

Title: Մերովսանն
Definition_1: to the utmost of our power, as far as depends on us, our best.

Title: Մեց
Definition_1: worm, wood-fretter; maggot; rottenness, putridity, corruption.

Title: Մեցոտիմ
Definition_1: to become worm-eaten, rotten, to rot, to putrefy, to be corrupted, spoilt.

Title: Մեք
Definition_1: we; us; — ինքնին, — մեզէն, ourselves; զի՛նչ — ողորմելիքս, what poor creatures we are!.

Title: Մեքենագործ
Definition_2: artful, masterly; very well made or done.

Title: Մեքենական
Definition_1: machinal; mechanical; — կազմութիւն, mechanism; — ձի, horse-power.

Title: Մեքենայ
Definition_2: machination, cabal, plot, device, intrigue; բազմահնար —ք, sly, crafty dealings, intrigues, machinations; —ս հառնել, cf. Մեքենայեմ; — երկանիւ, վեցանիւ կամ ութանիւ, two-wheeled, six-wheeled or eight-wheeled machine; շոգեշարժ —, steam-engine; տեղափոխ —, locomotive engine; — պարզ կամ կրկին արդասեօք, single or double-acting engine; — ջրեղէն սիւնակաւ, water-pressure engine; — վերամբարձ, jack, lifting-jack or screw-jack; — ցցահար, steam pile-driving engine; — օդահան, air-pump, pneumatic engine; գործարան —ի, engine-building; լուծել, քակել զ—, to take an engine to pieces, to dismount; յարդարել, կազմել զ—, to fit or put an engine together again, to mount; ի գործ արկանել զ—, to work an engine.

Title: Մեքենայեմ
Definition_1: to contrive, to form, to project; to machinate, to plan, to plot, to intrigue, to cabal.

Title: Մեքենաւոր
Definition_1: furnished with machines; mechanical; full of contrivances; industrious, dexterous, handy, adroit; artful, sharp, sly, intriguing.

Title: Մեքենաւորութիւն
Definition_1: contrivance, invention, machination, artifice, cunning, wile, piece of cunning.

Title: Մզանք
Definition_1: membrane, pellicle; secundine, after-birth; cf. Մզումն.

Title: Մզեմ
Definition_1: to press, to extract by pressing or squeezing, to squeeze out, to express; to filter, to distil.

Title: Մզիմ
Definition_1: to infiltrate; to distil, to trickle, to fall drop by drop.

Title: Մէգ
Definition_1: mist, fog, haze; թանձր —, dense fog, thick mist.

Title: Մէզ
Definition_1: urine, water, piss; stale; մրուր միզոյ, urinary sediment.

Title: Մէզմուղ
Definition_1: diuretic, apt to provoke urine, aperitive;

Title: Մէն
Definition_2: only, solely; — մի, each, every one, each one.

Title: Մէջ
Complement: միջոյ, ով, ոց, աց, ովք, օք
Definition_1: middle, midst; inside, interior, heart, bosom; loins, reins; ցաւք միջաց, lumbago;
Definition_2: —ք or պորտ ընդոց, hilum of beans; հացի միջաւ, with the crum;
Definition_3: ի — or ի միջի, in the midst or middle of, among, between, in, into, within; ի միջոյ, through, out of, from;
Definition_4: ընդ —, by halves; between, among; in, into; through the medium of, by means of;
Definition_5: — ընդ —, from time to time, now and then, ever and anon; ց-ս, down or up to the waist; ի միջի ձերում, among you, in the midst of you; — գիշերոյ, midnight, twelve o'clock; — ի գիշերի, at night, in the night, by night; ընդ — իւր, upon his loins or side; միջովք չափ ի վեր or ի միջոյն եւ ի վեր, from the loins upwards; միջովք չափ ի խոնարհ or ի միջոյն եւ ի խոնարհ, from the loins downwards; յապականութեան ի միջի, from or in the midst of corruption; պնդել զ—ս, to gird up one's loins, to put on a belt; խորտակել զ—ս, to break one's back; գօտի ածել ընդ — իւր, to wear a belt, girdle or sash; արկանել քուրձ զմիջովք, to put or gird sackcloth on one's loins; սուսեր ընդ — ածել, ածել սուր ընդ —, to gird on a sword; — ընդ — հերձուլ, հատանել, to cut in halves; to split into two parts; բառնալ ի միջոյ, to annihilate, to utterly destroy, to exterminate; անցանել, կալ ի —, to come forward, to show or present oneself; ի — բերել, to produce, to bring forward or out, to cite, to expose; ի անկանել, to interpose; փոյթ ի — առնուլ, to endeavour, to study, to try, to make any effort, to be solicitous; դաշինս ի միջի հաստատել, to make an alliance; արի՛, ա՛նց ի —, arise, get up, come here; քերթացք նորա չեն ի միջի, his poems are lost; ընդ — բանից մի՛ անկանիր, do not interrupt another's discourse; cf. Խորհուրդ; ի մէջ, cf. Մէջ; ի միջի, in the middle, between, among; ի միջոյ, from the middle.

Title: Մէտ
Definition_1: index of scales; weight, heaviness; moment, instant; oscillation; inclination, propensity;
Definition_2: inclined or prone to, bent on;
Definition_3: — առ —, — ի —, oscillating, balancing; undulating, floating; — ի — խոնարհել, to float, to undulate, to wave; — լինել, to be inclined, prone, to bend, to tend towards.

Title: Մթագնիմ
Definition_1: to grow dark, gloomy, to be obscured or darkened, to darken; — աչաց, to grow dim.

Title: Մթազգած
Definition_1: gloomy, dark, obscure, dismal, dull, sombre; — լինել գինւով, to have the sight or reason obscured, to get drunk, to feel giddy, to feel one's head turn round.

Title: Մթանամ
Definition_1: to darken, to grow dark, to become dusk;
Definition_2: to dim, to obscure; to tarnish; — օդոյ, to begin to lower; — աստեղաց, to be eclipsed; — մտաց, to grow dim.

Title: Մթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to darken, to obscure, to cloud, to dim; to blacken, to offuscate;
Definition_2: to eclipse; — զտիւ ի գիշեր, to change day into night.

Title: Մթեր
Definition_1: mass, heap, pile, accumulation; provision, store, hoard; remainder; filth, dirt; — առ —, in a heap, like a heap, in quantity.

Title: Մթերեմ
Definition_1: to hoard up, to amass, to accumulate, to heap together; to warehouse, to house; to provision, to victual; — ոխս, ոխս —րեալս ունել, to bear a grudge, to have a spite against one; զ—րեալ թոյնսն թափել ի բաց, to give vent to one's spite, to breathe out one's anger.

Title: Մթին
Definition_1: obscure, gloomy, dark; obscure, abstruse, occult, of difficult interpretation; — կեանք, life of obscurity; — վարս վարել, to live obscurely, to lead an austere life.

Title: Մժղուկ
Definition_1: gnat, mosquito; midge, any small fly; առաջնորդք կոյրք, որ զմժղուկս քամէք եւ զուղտս կլանէք, ye blind guides, who strain at a gnat and swallow a camel.

Title: Մի
Complement: ոյ, ոջ, ում, ի միոջէ, ով
Definition_2: first, firstly, in the first place; մի աստուած, one God, one only God; ի մի, in one, together; առ մի սիւնակ, at, or by each column; առ այր մի, to each person, a-head, a-man; մի առ մի, մի ըստ միոջէ, one by one, successively, from hand to hand; bit by bit, piece by piece, in detail, minutely, exactly; particularly, specifically, individually, distinctly; մի ըստ միոջէ ասել, նշանակել, to specify, to go into detail; ժողովել ի մի, to collect, assemble or unite together; մի ոմն, one, one person; մին ի նոցանէ, one of them; մին կամ միւսն, either, either one or the either; մէն մի նոցանէ, every one of them; ոչ մին եւ միւսն, neither; neither one nor the other; ընդ մի, ընդ մի համար, conjointly with, together, at once; in one, like on and the same thing; մի եւ նոյն, the same; մի զմիոյ կնի, one after the other; մի՛ զի կոյր էր եւ մի or երկրորդ զի աղքատ էր, in the first place he was blind, in the next poor; մի մի, միոյ միոյ, միում միում, each; every one;
Definition_3: one another; one by one; ըստ միոյ միոյ ամսոյ, monthly, month by month; մի առ միոջ, one after another, one on the other; մի զմիով, with emulation, surpassing one another, outvying; մի մի տարի, annually, every year, year by year; մի ընդ միով, one under another, in a subordinate state; մի մի իշխան մի մի օր մատուսցէն զընծայս, all the chiefs make daily offerings; մի ըստ միոջէ, cf. Մի.

Title: Մի՛
Definition_1:
no, not, none; մի՛ ասեր ինչ, say nothing about it; մի՛ արդեօք, is it not ?
մի՛ արդեօք դու իցես եգիպտացին, art not thou that Egyptian ? is it not you ?
մի՛ գուցէ, lest, for fear that; that it may not; մի՛ երբեք, մի՛ բնա, never, not at all; մի՛ եւ մի՛ or մի՛ եւ մի՛ իւիք, beware ! not at all, by no means, never; մի՛ եւս, never, not again, no more; մի՛ եւս առներ, take care not to do so again; մի՛ իւիք, by no means; մի՛ եղիցի, մի՛ լիցի, may it never be ! God forbid ! never; մի՛ ոք, nobody; մի՛ perhaps ?
կերիցէ մի՛, neither should he eat; մի՛, մի՛ վշտացուցանէք զիս, no, no, do not afflict me.

Title: Միաբան
Definition_1: unanimous, of one mind, agreeing; conformable, equal, uniform, analogous, similar, identical, the same;
Definition_2: with one accord, in concert, unanimously;
Definition_3: cf. Միաբանակեաց; — հաւանութիւն, unanimity, concord, consent; — լինել, to agree, to conform to.

Title: Միաբանական
Definition_1: unanimous; monastic; — ձայնիւ, with one voice;

Title: Միաբանեմ
Definition_1: to agree, to cause to agree, to conciliate, to reconcile, to reunite, to match; to compose, to unite, to join; ի մի —, to reunite;

Title: Միաբանիմ
Definition_1: to agree, to be of one mind or opinion, to consent, to comply; to be agreed, reconciled, to conform oneself; to unite, to join in one, to be matched; — ի չարիս, to conspire, to conjure, to plot; չ-, to disagree, to deny, to disown; — երկու երկու, to pair, to form couples or pairs.

Title: Միաբանութիւն
Definition_1: unanimity, agreement, concord, union, harmony, consent, good understanding; conciliation, union; harmony, consonance, concordance, homophony, symphony, concert; conformity, fitness, suitableness; commonalty, community, communion; company, society, club, corporation, congregation; copulation; — թագաւորաց, alliance, confederation, league; — ի չարիս, cabal, plot, conspiracy; միաբանութեամբ, unanimously, with one accord; միաբանութեամբ կեալ, to live on good terms; քակտել զ—ս, to sow division in.

Title: Միաբարբառ
Definition_1: having one language or speech; unanimous;

Title: Միաբարձ առնեմ
Definition_1: to remove or take away every thing together.

Title: Միաբարոյ
Definition_1: of the same character or disposition.

Title: Միաբնակ
Definition_1: co-habitant; Monophysite, that believes our Lord to have one nature only.

Title: Միաբուն
Definition_1: consubstantial; of the same nature or essence; natural, native;
Definition_2: having only one trunk or stem.

Title: Միագլխապետ
Definition_1: absolute prince; commander, general in chief.

Title: Միագոյ
Definition_1: having but one substance; unique of its kind.

Title: Միագոյն
Definition_1: monochromatic; of the same colour, uniform.

Title: Միախորհուրդ
Definition_1: of the same opinion or way of thinking, unanimous;

Title: Միախուռն
Definition_2: in crowds, together, in a mass.

Title: Միակի
Definition_1: sole, only; միայն —, alone, quite alone.

Title: Միակշիռ
Definition_1: equal, of the same weight, equipollent.

Title: Միակողմն
Definition_1: one side; դնել, թողուլ ի —, to put aside, to leave.

Title: Միակուղի
Definition_1: simple; — չուան, cord of a single twist.

Title: Միակրօն
Definition_1: of the same religion, coreligionary; of similar habits; uniform, conformable.

Title: Միակրօնութիւն
Definition_1: professing the same religion, conformity in religion; unanimity; conformity, uniformity.

Title: Միակցիմ
Definition_1: to unite with, to participate, to consent.

Title: Միահաղոյն
Definition_1: all at once, together, altogether, quite, at once, entirely, collectively.

Title: Միահամար
Definition_2: even, equal, like; summed up; — դնել, to vote, to come to the vote; չէ ընդ —, that is not the same thing.

Title: Միահամուռ
Definition_1: collectively, altogether, generally, all at once; in all; in a crowd, in a mass; եւ զի — ասացից, to say briefly, in short.

Title: Միահաւատ
Definition_1: of the same religion, faith or belief.

Title: Միահաւաք առնեմ
Definition_1: to gather together, to collect in one.

Title: Միահեծան
Definition_1: monarchical, absolute, despotic; — իշխան, absolute master, monarch; — իշխանութիւն, absolute power, monarchy; — ունել, to reign absolutely; — առնել, to make universal.

Title: Միահոյլ
Definition_1: all together, in crowds, in troops.

Title: Միաձոյլ
Definition_1: like one mass, of one piece, massive, cast, molten.

Title: Միաճետի
Definition_1: of one trunk, unistirpis; — ծառ, tall and straight stem.

Title: Միամեայ
Definition_1: of one year, one year old.

Title: Միամիտ
Definition_1: simple-minded, ingenuous, simple, artless, innocent; good-natured, silly, simple, foolish; faithful, attached, loyal, true, devoted.

Title: Միամտաբար
Definition_1: sincerely, ingenuously, candidly, artlessly; simply, sillily, foolishly; unadvisedly.

Title: Միամտիմ
Definition_1: to be candid, open, sincere, to behave sincerely; to conduct oneself loyally or faithfully, to ascertain, to verify, to become assured, persuaded, to believe, to acquiesce, to agree, to consent.

Title: Միամտութիւն
Definition_1: plain-dealing, sincerity, innocence, ingenuousness, artlessness; fidelity, faithfulness, loyalty; simple-mindedness, simplicity, silliness, credulity; միամտութեամբ, cf. Միամտաբար.

Title: Միամօրութիւն
Definition_1: state of an only child, or of a destitute person.

Title: Միայար
Definition_1: united, joined, attached, chained together; continuous, continual; immediate;
Definition_2: at a single stroke, at one bout, in a moment, immediately, at the same time; — տողել, to join together, to link, to chain.

Title: Միայարեմ
Definition_1: to join, to annex, to unite, to connect.

Title: Միայարութիւն
Definition_1: conjunction, concatenation, train, contiguousness, continuance, succession.

Title: Միայն
Definition_1: only, sole, singular; alone, lovely; simple, plain;
Definition_2: solely, singly, singularly, simply; solitarily; — թէ, — զի, it being well understood that, on condition that, provided that, unless; մի —, one only; ոչ —, not only.

Title: Միայնաւորութիւն
Definition_1: solitude, solitary life, loneliness; cf. Միայնակեցութիւն.

Title: Միայնուկ
Definition_1: alone, all alone, quite alone, by oneself.

Title: Միանամ
Definition_1: to be united, joined, incorporated, identified.

Title: Միանգամ
Definition_1: at once, only once, at one blow; որ —, whatever, whoever, whosoever; որպէս —ն եւ միւսանգամն, as usual, as at other times; հարից զսա գեղարդեամբս եւ ոչ կրկնեցից, I will transfix him with a single blow and he will have no need of a second.

Title: Միանգամայն
Definition_1: all at once, together, unitedly, all at the same time, altogether; jointly, in concurrence, at the same time; all, quite; totally, entirely; — եւ, yet, even, also; — ասել, եւ — իսկ ասել, եւ զի — ասացից, upon the whole, after all, in a word, in short; ոչ — առնել, to repeat several times, over and over again.

Title: Միանձն
Definition_1: solitary being, anachorite, hermit; coenobite, monk, friar, religious;

Title: Միանձնական
Definition_1: solitary, coenobitical, monkish, monachal, monastic; conventual; unitarian.

Title: Միանձնանամ
Definition_1: to retire, to live in solitude; to embrace a monastic life, to turn monk.

Title: Միանշան
Definition_1: having or wearing the same mark, uniform.

Title: Միաշաբաթի
Definition_1: first day of the week, sunday.

Title: Միաշաւիղ
Definition_1: walking in the same steps, conformable, like.

Title: Միապաղաղ
Definition_1: in one mass, in one body in a lump, massive; plain, simple; — ծով, smooth sea.

Title: Միապար
Definition_1: in the same chorus; at the same ball or dancing-party.

Title: Միապետեմ
Definition_1: to be a monarch, to reign or govern with absolute power, to have sovereign authority; — զաշխարհն, to be absolute master of the country, of the world.

Title: Միապետութիւն
Definition_1: monarchy, monarchical government; absolute dominion; — ընդ միապետութեամբ կալ, to adopt the monarchical form of government; հակառակորդ միապետութեան, republican.

Title: Միապէս
Definition_1: in the like manner, likewise, equally, evenly; indiscriminately; uniformly.

Title: Միապիշ առնեմ
Definition_1: to attract all eyes; — ինչ չառնեմ, to refuse to look at.

Title: Միասահման
Definition_1: having the same definition; having conterminous bounds of confines.

Title: Միասին
Definition_1: together, at once; conjointly; altogether, wholly, totally, completely, entirely; գալ —, to assemble; — էական, consubstantial.

Title: Միասնական
Definition_1: consubstantial; simultaneous, common, compatible; united, only, sole.

Title: Միասնունդ
Definition_1: fed, reared or brought up together.

Title: Միատարած
Definition_1: equally spread or extended every where.

Title: Միատեսակ
Definition_1: of one kind, uniform, like, equal.

Title: Միատնութիւն
Definition_1: cohabitation, living in the same house.

Title: Միատոհմ
Definition_1: of the same race, family or nation.

Title: Միատուն
Definition_1: living with, in the same house;

Title: Միաւոր
Definition_1: united, joined; one, singular; equal, alike;
Definition_2: unit; — թիւք, the units, the simple numbers.

Title: Միաւորեմ
Definition_1: to unite, to join, to conjoin; to attach, to tie together, to glue together; to mix, to combine, to annex, to incorporate, to identify; to join together, to couple, to match, to pair; վերստին —, to reunite, to rejoin, to tie again.

Title: Միաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be united, joined, attached or tied together; to be mixed; coupled, matched.

Title: Միաւորութիւն
Definition_1: union, junction, conjunction; adhesion, combination; reunion; incorporation; gluing; copulation, pairing;

Title: Միաքարոզ
Definition_1: preaching uniformly or the same truth.

Title: Միգամած
Definition_3: — աստեղք, nebula.

Title: Միգապատ
Definition_1: foggy, covered with mist or fog, caliginous, cloudy, dark, obscure, gloomy.

Title: Միգանամ
Definition_1: to become dark, obscure; to get turbid; to begin to lower.

Title: Միգապատեմ
Definition_1: to cloud, to darken, to dim.

Title: Միեղէն
Definition_1: only, single, sole, simple; solitary; cf. Միաբան.

Title: Միզագրաւ
Definition_1: troubled with strangury, subject to the gravel; cf. Միզագրաւութիւն.

Title: Միզագրաւութիւն
Definition_1: strangury, gravel, dysury, ischury, stoppage, suppression or retention of urine, pain and difficulty in discharging the urine.

Title: Միզագրաւիմ
Definition_1: to suffer from stone or strangury, to be afflicted with the gravel.

Title: Միզեմ
Definition_1: to urine, to piss, to make water; — անասնոց, to stale; — ստէպ, to piss often but little; ոչ թողուլ յամենայնէ որ զորմով միզիցէ, to destroy every male.

Title: Միզեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to urine, to move or provoke urine.

Title: Միթէ
Definition_1: is it ? can it be ? is it possible ? perhaps ? is it that ?.

Title: Միլիոն
Definition_1: million; հազար —, a thousand millions, milliard.

Title: Միմեանց
Definition_1: to each other, to one another; զ—նս, one another, each other; ի —, from one another, one from another; ընդ —նս, with one another; զկնի —, one after another; — դէմ ընդդէմ, face to face, fronting, opposite; սէր առ —նս, mutual affection; յեղբայրսիրութեան առ —նս գթացք, kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; զբեռն բարձէք, bear ye one another's burdens; սիրել զ—նս, to love one another, to love reciprocally; վնասել —, to injure one another; զ—նս գովել, to praise one another; ի —նս ածել ըզդրունս, to shut the doors; բախել զ—նս, to smite one another; ի թիկունս հասանել —, to help each other, to render mutual assistance; ի պատիւ զ—ամբք ելանել, in honour preferring one another; —ամբք վասն — պաղատել, to pray for one another.

Title: Միմեանցասէր
Definition_1: loving mutually, affectioned one to another.

Title: Միմոս
Definition_1: mime, mimic, clown, zani, buffoon, merry Andrew, pantaloon.

Title: Միմոսութիւն
Definition_1: mime, mummery, mimicry, buffoonery, harlequinade, drollery.

Title: Մինչ
Definition_1: till, until, up to; to, as far as; when, at the time that; while, whilst; — or — զի, so that, in such a manner that; այնպէս — զի, so that; — այս — այն, mean time, meanwhile, in the mean time, whilst these things were doing, during that time, in the interim.

Title: Մինչդեռ
Definition_1: when, while, at the time, as long as; — տակաւին, whilst, yet; բայց — ունէին ի դիմի հարկանիլ միմեանց, but just as the combat was about to commence; — խօսէի ընդ նմատակաւին էր յանկողնի, I spoke to him while he was yet in bed; — խօսէր, while he was speaking.

Title: Մինչեւ
Definition_1:
until, till, as far as, to; even to; that; — ցայժմ, till now, up to the present, up to this time, hitherto; — ցայդ վայր, so far, as far as, to that place; — ցայդր, so far, as far as that, to there; — ցայս վայր, thus far, as far as this, to here; — ուրանօ՞ր, how far?
— ցամպս, even to the clouds; գայ ընդ իս — ի կարս, he goes with me as far as Kars; կաց or մնա — եկեսցէ, wait till he comes; — ցե՞րբ, how long?
ոչ ելից — դարձցիս, I will not go out until you return; — ցբազում ամս, during many years; — զի, so that, insomuch that; այնպէս or այնչափ՝ զի, so that; as well as; — բազմաց իսկ ասել, so that several people said.

Title: Մինչչեւ
Definition_1: before, ere; not yet; — ծագեալ արեգական, before day, before sunrise; — աւարտեալ ամին, within the year; before a twelvemonth; — եկեալ էր նորա, he had not yet come; — մեռեալ իցեմ, before I die.

Title: Միշտ
Definition_1: always, at all times, continually, at every turn, incessantly, for ever, for ever and ever, perpetually, eternally;
Definition_2: eternal; որպէս —ն, as usual, as before, as formerly.

Title: Միոստայնի
Definition_1: woven in one piece, without seam.

Title: Միութիւն
Definition_1: one, unit; unity, union, reunion; concord, accord.

Title: Միջաբեկ
Definition_2: disheartened, discouraged; — լինել, to break one's back; to become hipshot;
Definition_3: to be disheartened, to lose one's courage.

Title: Միջաբեկեմ
Definition_1: to break one's back, to strain the loins; to dishearten, to discourage.

Title: Միջագար
Definition_1: rotten at the core; weak, useless.

Title: Միջագիտութիւն
Definition_1: divination or guessing the contents of.

Title: Միջախառն
Definition_1: composed of knots, of nodes at intervals.

Title: Միջածովեմ
Definition_1: to sail on the high seas, to go on the open sea.

Title: Միջակային
Definition_1: middling, indifferent, neither good nor bad, moderate.

Title: Միջակուրծք
Definition_1: the middle or internal part of the thorax.

Title: Միջակտուր առնեմ
Definition_1: to cut in the middle, to divide in two parts; — լինել, to be halved.

Title: Միջահասակ
Definition_1: of middling stature, middle-sized, about the middle height; middle-aged.

Title: Միջամբոխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to plunge into the crowd; to crowd in.

Title: Միջամուխ
Definition_1: entered, introduced; well versed in, initiated, instructed, intelligent, expert; free, frank, bold, daring; meddlesome; enterprising, adventurous, venturous; — լինել, to enter, to push in, to introduce oneself, to go forward or before; to intrude into, to thrust oneself forward, to intermeddle or interfere; to penetrate deeply, to pierce to the inmost parts, to dive into, to explore, to sift; to undertake, to have a hand in, *to have a finger in every body's pie; — ձեռամբ գործել, to act freely.

Title: Միջամտեմ
Definition_1: to go in, to introduce or obtrude oneself; to meddle with, to interfere, to intervene.

Title: Միջանկեալ
Definition_1: intermediate; intervening; — խաղ or — խաղարկութիւն, interlude.

Title: Միջապինդ
Definition_1: girdled, bound round the body, lusty.

Title: Միջերկնեայ
Definition_1: that is in the middle of the heavens, medicelestial.

Title: Միջին
Definition_1: that is in the middle; middle; middling; intermediate;
Definition_3: middle terms.

Title: Միջնանիւ
Definition_1: centre, or middle part of a wheel; middle wheel.

Title: Միջնաշխարհ
Definition_1: centre, interior of a country, midland districts.

Title: Միջնորդ
Definition_1: mediator; intermedium, agent, go-between; negotiator; medium; — վաճառաց, broker; — հաշտութեան, reconciler, conciliator, intermediator, intercessor.

Title: Միջնորդիմ
Definition_1: to mediate, to procure, to intercede, to interpose, to go between, to negotiate; to intervene; —եաց երդմամբ, he confirmed it by an oath.

Title: Միջնորդութիւն
Definition_1: intercession, mediation, interposition, intermeddling, intervention; negotiation, medium; — վաճառաց, brokerage, brokage, agent's commission; միջնորդութեամբ, mediately, through the medium of.

Title: Միջոց
Definition_1: middle, centre; space, interval, interstice; vacancy; division, separation; difference, distinction; empty space; *means, way; — հացի, cf. Միջուկ; — անօթոց, capacity; — աշխարհի, interior, inside part; — պատերազմաց, truce, suspension of arms, armistice; զ—աւ ռազմին, during the conflict, in the hottest of the battle, thickest of the fight; զ—աւ ճանապարհին, on the way; during the journey; ի —ի ամբոխին ամրանալ, to take refuge among the crowd.

Title: Միջուկ
Definition_1: marrow, core, heart; — հացի, crum of bread; — ձուոյ, yolk of an egg; — ընկուզոյ, kernel of a walnut; — տնկոց, pith; — պտղոյ, core; — գիսաւորաց, nucleus of comets.

Title: Միջօր
Definition_1: cf. Միջօրեայ; զմիջաւուրբ, at midday, about noon, to wards midday.

Title: Միջօրեայ
Definition_1: noon, noon-tide, midday; the south; meridian;
Definition_2: southern, meridional; half, semi; — ջերմն, intermittent fever.

Title: Միջօրէական
Definition_1: of noon, meridian; — or — շրջանակ, meridian; — գիծ, meridian line.

Title: Միս
Definition_1: flesh; meat; — դնդերային, muscular flesh; — մարդկային, human flesh; — երէոց, venison; — հաւուց, white meats, poultry; — նապաստակի, brown meats, game; — սպանդանոցի, coarse meat, butcher's meat; — որսոց, fowls and game; — պտղոց, pulp; հում, պախ, խորովեալ —, raw, boiled, roast meat; — ի կասկարայէ, broiled or grilled meat; մսոյ ջուր, broth; — ածել, to fatten, to make fat; կաթսայ մսոյ, flesh-pot.

Title: Միտ
Definition_1: mind, intellect, understanding; sense, judgement, reason, intelligence; thought, idea; intention, design, project; opinion; advice, counsel; meaning, intent; maxim; ըստ մտի, ըստ —ս, at one's will or pleasure; according to one's fancy, liking, desire; ըմբռնումն մտաց, apprehension, idea; մարդկեղէն —ք, human reason; հասարակաց —ք, good sense; —ք անմտութեան, foolish thoughts; —ք անարգութեան, reprobate sense; —ք առակիս, the moral of the fable, or of the apologue; ուղիղ մտօք, in good faith; պարզ մտօք, frankly, sincerely, without artifice; սրտի մտօք, with all one's heart; ազնուական —ք, noble sentiment; արդարակորով, խորախորհուրդ, վսեմ, հաստատուն or անյողդողդ, լուսաւորեալ, ընդարձակ, եռանդուն, սուր, թափանցող, արգասաւոր, հնարագիւտ —ք, upright, profound, elevated, firm, enlightened, vast, lively, sharp or piercing, penetrating, fertile, inventive wit, mind or intellect; թեթեւ, անարգասաւոր, շփոթ, ցրուեալ, տկար —ք, frivolous or light, barren, confused, distracted, weak mind or intellect; ունել ի մտի, to have the design or intention, to propose to oneself, to project; ի —ս լինել, գալ, —ս ուսանել, to regain one's intellectual faculties, to be restored to one's senses, to awake; դնել ի մտի, հաստատել ի —ս, to form a resolution, to take into one's head, to be determined, to resolve, to project, to propose, to presume, to imagine; — դնել, to be attentive, to apply or devote oneself to, to observe, to regard, to consider with care, to think, to reflect; ի —ս առնուլ, to understand, to comprehend, to perceive, to conceive, to know, to remark; to study, to learn by heart; զմտաւ or ընդ — ածել, to consider, to regard attentively, to meditate, to recollect, to imagine; աշխատ առնել զ—ս, to fatigue the mind, to rack one's brains; անկանել ի մտտաց, to be out of one's mind or senses, to lose one's senses, to be crazy; անկանել or ելանել ի մտաց, to escape or slip from one's memory; to forget; —ս դնել, to admonish, to warn, to apprise of; դնել ի մտի ուրուք, to suggest, to insinuate, to hint, to intimate, to entangle, to involve; ընդ — մտանել, ըստ մտի լինել, to please, to gain one's affection or good will, to conciliate one's favour, to insinuate oneself in the good graces of, to win one's favour; ընդ — տանել, to take offence at, to be offended, to take ill, to take a pique, to be nettled; արկանել ի —ս, to suggest, to inspire; տալ ի — առնուլ, to cause to understand; փոխել զ—ս, շրջիլ ի մտաց, to think better of, to change or alter one's mind or intention; ի չար կամ ի բարւոք —ս առնուլ, to take well or ill; գերել զ—ս, to captivate one's understanding; ընդ —ս անկանել ուրուք, to occur to mind, to enter the imagination or thoughts; հանել ինչ ի մտաց ուրուք, to drive out of one's head, to persuade to the contrary; —ս ունել, to be witty; ասել ի մտաց, to say to oneself; ընդ — արկանել, to think, to recollect, to conceive; բարգաւաճել, կրթել զ—ս, to cultivate, to form the mind, to improve; այսր անդր մաղել զ—ս, to distract the mind; անխիղճ —ս ունել, to keep a clear conscience; ի մտի պահել, to keep in memory; բարձրանալ ի —ս իւր, to become proud, vain, puffed up; — առնել, to listen to, to mind, to agree with; ընդ —ս հարկանիլ, to occur, to come to mind or memory, to recollect; առնել ի մտաց իւրոց, to do without intention, to do unintentionally; առ ի —ս առնուլ, to understand allegorically; իսկ առ ի —ս, and in mystic or allegorical sense; բազումք ի —ս ունողաց, the generality of intelligent persons, most witty people; ոչ ոք ի —ս ունողացն, one of good sense, no sensible person; եդեալ էր ի մտի, he decided, he was resolved; չառնում ինչ ի —, I understand nothing of it, I don't understand it, I am quite at a loss; անմարթ է ի — առնուլ զայն, nothing can be known about it, it is impenetrable, it's marvelously obscure; —ք իմ առ իս դարձան, my mind was restored; եւ ոչ ի —ս անգամ անկեալ էր նորա, he never even dreamed of it; խորհէի եւ ասէի ընդ —ս, I thought and said to myself; յորմէ ի — առնուլ է, whence it follows that; բազում անգամ եղեւ ինձ ի մտի, I was more than once tempted to, I several times intended to; գայ ի —ս իմ, it has just come into my thoughts, mind or head; ստէպ ի մտի իմում յեղյեղեմ զայն, I often repeated it to myself; յաս են —ք բանիցս, this is the sense of the passage; նա չառնու ինչ ի —, he understands nothing of it, he knows nothing about it, it is Chinese to him; այսպէս եցոյց զչարութիւն մտաց իւրոց, thus he betrayed his malicious intention; զմտաւ ածեմ, to think, to regard, to consider.

Title: Միտիմ
Definition_1: to incline, to lean, to bend, to bow, to bias;
Definition_2: to incline, to lean, to feel inclined or disposed for, to lean to the side of, to be biassed, to have an inclination for, to feel an attachment for, to adhere, to comply; միտեցաւ սիրտ նոցա զկնի նորա, their hearts inclined to follow him.

Title: Միտեալ
Definition_1: tending, bent on, inclined or prone to; — ի չարն, prone to evil; inclined to mischief.

Title: Միտումն
Definition_2: inclination; —ումն ի չարն կամ ի բարին, good or evil propensities.

Title: Միւս
Definition_1: other, another; different from, other than; —ն, the other; — քան զ—, one more than another; —ում աւուր, the other day; բայց եւ զ—ն պատմեցից, but I will tell you something else; cf. Մի; անգամ — or միւսանգամ, cf. Միւսանգամ.

Title: Միւսանգամ
Definition_1: another time, once more, afresh, anew, over again, again, bis;

Title: Միւսիոնեայ
Definition_1: mosaic, in mosaic; — յատակ, tessellated pavement.

Title: Միօրեայ
Definition_1: of a day, ephemeral, lasting only a day;
Definition_2: a day only; — ջերմն, ephemera, ephemeral fever; — ճանճ, ephemera, ephemeral fly; — ճճի, ephemeron-worm; — գեղ, fleeting beauty.

Title: Մլաւեմ
Definition_1: to mew, to caterwaul, to cry as a cat.

Title: Մլմլեմ
Definition_1: to rub one's eyes and face on awaking.

Title: Մխեմ
Definition_1: to drive in, to force into or penetrate, to fasten in, to fix, to force down, to plunge; to pierce, to prick, to run through; to temper iron or steel, to caseharden; — զձեռն, to stretch, to extend or hold out the hand; — զձեռն յարիւն ուրուք, to imbrue the hands in the blood of; մխեաց զդաշոյնն ի լանջս նորա, he has plunged the dagger in his heart; cf. Ձեռն.

Title: Մխիթար
Definition_2: consoler, comforter; cf. Մխիթարութիւն; — լինել՝ տալ՝ մատուցանել, to comfort, to console, to solace; — ինչ առնել մտաց, to flatter, to adulate, to wheedle, to coax, to allure.

Title: Մխիթարակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to be consoled or comforted mutually.

Title: Մխիթարեմ
Definition_1: to console, to soften, to soothe, to comfort, to relieve sorrow or vexation, to alleviate.

Title: Մխիմ
Definition_1: to be driven, plunged into, to penetrate, to enter; to meddle, to get in; to begin, to commence, to undertake; — բարկութեամբ, to be seized with rage, to be enraged.

Title: Մխկեմ
Definition_1: to corrupt, to rot, to putrefy.

Title: Մխրճիմ
Definition_1: to plunge, to sink, to drive, to rush, or dash into water, to duck; — ախտիւ, to plunge headlong into vice.

Title: Մկանք
Definition_2: swell, waves, billows; հարկանել ընդ —նս, to beat, to flog, to flagellate, to scourge; բառնալ ի վերայ մկանանց, to load, to put a load on the back.

Title: Մկթամ
Definition_1: to turn up one's nose, to nose; to laugh at, to mock, to make game of.

Title: Մկնաճարակ
Definition_1: gnawed or eaten by rats or mice.

Title: Մկնանկ
Definition_1: murepollutus, polluted or contaminated by the presence of dead mice.

Title: Մկնասոխ
Definition_1: squill, sea-onion, scilla; գինի — ի, wine of squills, vinum scilliticum.

Title: Մկնդեղ
Definition_1: rats-bane; — սպիտակ, arsenic; — դեղին, orpiment; — կարմիր, realgar, red arsenic.

Title: Մկնորսակ
Definition_1: mouse-hunter, mouser; — գործի, mouse-trap; քաջ —, good mouser.

Title: Մկրատեմ
Definition_1: to cut with scissors, to shear.

Title: Մկրտեմ
Definition_1: to christen, to baptize; to wash, to purify by ablution; to bathe; — զկաթն, զգինի, to put water into milk, wine; վերստին —, to rebaptize.

Title: Մկրտիմ
Definition_1: to receive baptism, to be baptized; to wash, to bathe or cleanse oneself; — արեամբ, to be martyrized.

Title: Մղեղ
Definition_1: chaff; powder, ashes, dust; — հրոյ, spark; ի — փոխել, to turn to ashes, to be burnt to ashes.

Title: Մղեղեմ
Definition_1: to levigate, to pulverize, to reduce into powder; to burn to ashes.

Title: Մղեմ
Definition_1: to push, to give a push to, to thrust, to push forward; արտաքս —, to unload, to discharge, to empty, to cast forth; — զմիմեանս, to press or crowd on one another; — զպատերազմ, զճակատ, to fight, to make or wage war, to give battle to; — զախոյեան, to win, to conquer, to subdue, to depress, to prostrate; զհոգաւոր կռիւն —, to fight against temptation; ընդդէմ իրերաց զբարկութիւնն մղել, to be exasperated one against another; — զանասուն, to train to labour, to break in or teach animals to work; cf. Ճաշ.

Title: Մղիմ
Definition_1: to be urged on or driven to; մղեցաւ մարտն այգուն, the battle was fought or took place in the morning.

Title: Մղձկեմ
Definition_1: to choke, to stifle, to suffocate, to strangle;
Definition_2: to pain, to grieve, to vex, to torment.

Title: Մղձկիմ
Definition_1: to choke, to be suffocating; to be violently affected with spite, envy, grief or rage.

Title: Մղձուկ
Definition_1: heart-break, anxiety, pain, pang, sore, anguish.

Title: Մղօն
Definition_1: impulse, impetus; — տալ, to give a push, to push, to impel.

Title: Մմկիմ
Definition_1: to soil, dirt or pollute oneself.

Title: Մնամ
Definition_1: to remain, to stay; to stop, to wait, to expect; to hope; to rest, to be at rest; to last, to consist, to hold out; cf. Բարեաւ, cf. Խաղաղութիւն, cf. Կամ.

Title: Մնացուած
Definition_1: rest, remnant, remainder; residue, relics; remains, fragments; —որդք or գիրք —որդաց, Paralipomena.

Title: Մնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to remain, to stop, to put a stop to;
Definition_2: կաց մնաց, կաց եւ մնաց, remnants of troops, wreck of an army; cf. Ժողովեմ.

Title: Մնշեմ
Definition_1: to press, to bruise, to squeeze, to express.

Title: Մնչեմ
Definition_1: to coo; to wail, to groan, to cray; մնչէ աղաւնի, the dove coos;
Definition_2: to sigh after, to long or burn for, to covet eagerly.

Title: Մնջուկ
Definition_1: without noise, silently, softly, gently, noiselessly.

Title: Մշակ
Definition_1: husbandman, farmer, tiller, cultivator; man-servant, domestic, servant.

Title: Մշակեմ
Definition_1: to cultivate, to till, to plough, to manure;
Definition_2: to cultivate; to administer, to furnish, to supply; to serve, to wait on.

Title: Մշկապորտ
Definition_1: musk bearing or producing, moschifer, ferous; — այծեամն, musk, moschifer, musk-animal, Tibet-musk.

Title: Մշտաբոյծ
Definition_1: always eating, devouring, voracious, greedy, gluttonous.

Title: Մշտաբուղխ
Definition_1: flowing, gushing out continually, never failing, perennial.

Title: Մշտագիշեր
Definition_1: in perpetual darkness, always in the dark.

Title: Մշտազեղ
Definition_1: always running or flowing, falling continually.

Title: Մշտակառոյց
Definition_1: very solid, firm, stable, enduring for ever.

Title: Մշտակոխ
Definition_1: trodden continually, frequented; — ճանապարհ, thoroughfare, public way.

Title: Մշտամռունչ
Definition_1: wailing constantly; continually begging, praying, beseeching.

Title: Մշտայօժար
Definition_1: always inclined, willing, disposed, eager, assiduous.

Title: Մշտաչարչար
Definition_1: enduring, suffering continually; always vexing or tormenting; — մեռելութիւն, continual mortification.

Title: Մշտապաշտօն
Definition_1: instant in prayer, constant in worship, fervent, devout, pious; assiduous.

Title: Մշտապիշ լինիմ
Definition_1: continually to fix one's eyes upon, to look at steadfastly or intently, to gaze at.

Title: Մշտատատան
Definition_1: shaking, agitating, moving constantly; always tempest-tost or tempest-beaten.

Title: Մշտատեւ
Definition_1: ever-during, permanent, perpetual; — առնել, to perpetuate.

Title: Մշտիկ
Definition_1: holy water-sprinkler, asperges-brush; — զոպայի, bundle of hyssop.

Title: Մշտնջենաբար
Definition_1: perpetually, eternally, to eternity, for ever, without end.

Title: Մշտնջենաճիռ
Definition_1: always loaded or adorned with grapes.

Title: Մշտնջենաւորական
Definition_1: perpetual, continual, eternal, everlasting, endless; — շարժումն, perpetual motion.

Title: Մշտնջենաւորիմ
Definition_2: to last perpetually, to be for ever; to be perpetuated; to continue, to exist, to be extant; to persist, to persevere.

Title: Մոգ
Definition_1: magician, astrologer; diviner, enchanter, wizard, sorcerer; fire-worshipper, follower of Zoroaster; wise man of the East.

Title: Մոգակրօնիկ
Definition_1: professing the religion of the magi.

Title: Մոգեմ
Definition_1: to practise or profess magic, to exercise the magic art, to bewitch, to enchant; — զուշ եւ զուրուշ, to cast a spell upon; to delight, to charm, to fascinate.

Title: Մոգութիւն
Definition_1: profession of a sorcerer; magic art, demonology, witchcraft, charm.

Title: Մոգպետ
Definition_1: grand magician, archmagician, chief of wizards or magicians.

Title: Մոզանամ
Definition_1: to remain, to last; to augment, to increase.

Title: Մոթխոթեմ
Definition_1: to repeat, to say over again, to inculcate, to impress deeply on the mind of youth.

Title: Մոլ
Definition_1: suckers, sets, offshoots; *mud mixed with straw.

Title: Մոլար
Definition_2: deceiver, perverter, seducer; աստեղք —ք, erratic stars, planets.

Title: Մոլարանուն
Definition_1: bearing a false name, false, erroneous.

Title: Մոլեգին
Definition_1: furious, raging, mad, outrageous, demoniacal, fanatical, enraged, desperate, rude, violent;

Title: Մոլեգնաբար
Definition_1: furiously, madly, passionately, with fury, violently.

Title: Մոլեգնիմ
Definition_1: to be furious, to get into a rage, to fly into a passion, to be mad with rage; to be beside oneself, to go mad, to become deranged, to fall into extasy.

Title: Մոլեգնուցք
Definition_1: frenzy, fury, madness, rage, mania, wildness, transport; delirium eroticum, violent passion.

Title: Մոլենախանձ
Definition_1: cruelly jealous, eaten up by envy; fanatic.

Title: Մոլի
Definition_1: raving, furious, frenetic, maniac, mad; vicious, petulant, passionate; great, excessive.

Title: Մոլիմ
Definition_1: to lose one's senses, to go mad; to be in a passion, enraged; to be extravagantly fond of, to fall violently in love with, to be passionately in love; — զհետ, to bend one's whole soul to, to apply oneself entirely to, to dote upon, to be destracted with; մոլիս, պաւ՛ղէ, Paul, thou art beside thyself.

Title: Մոլոր
Definition_1: strayed, erred; missed, mislaid, lost; cf. Մոլար;

Title: Մոլորական
Definition_1: wandering, vagrant; false, erroneous, heretical; deceitful; fallible; — աստղ, erratic star;

Title: Մոլորիմ
Definition_1: to go out of one's way, to ramble, to rove, to wander, to stray, to go astray, to lose oneself, to be bewildered, to err, to fail; to fall into error, to be deceived, seduced, perverted; cf. Մոլիմ.

Title: Մոլորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to turn out of the way, to mislead, to lead astray; to bewilder, to deceive, to beguile, to seduce, to pervert, to suborn, to corrupt.

Title: Մոլորութիւն
Definition_1: wandering, straying, aberration; error, heresy; seduction, perversion, subornation, corruption; fury, mania, folly, frenzy, madness; — մտաց, mental aberration; ծայրայեղ —, sad extremity, excess; բազում դպրութիունք զքեզ ի — դարձուցանեն, much learning doth make thee mad.

Title: Մոլորումն
Definition_1: cf. Մոլորութիւն; դառնալ ի մոլորմանէ, to be convinced of one's error, to correct one's mistake.

Title: Մոլութիւն
Definition_1: fury, rage, mania, frenzy, madness, folly; violent passion; transport, enthusiasm; *vice, bad habit.

Title: Մոխիր
Definition_1: ashes; օր մոխրոց, Ash-Wednesday; փոխարկումն ի —, incineration; — լինել, to burn or reduce to ashes; ի — եւ յաճիւն դարձուցանել, to incinerate, to reduce to ashes; to lay in ashes, to waste or desolate; ապաշխարել մոխրով, to do penance; հուր ծածկեալ ընդ մոխրով, fire lies under the ice; there is fire lurking under the ashes; cf. Թաւալիմ.

Title: Մոխրահեղձոյց առնեմ
Definition_1: to stifle, choke or suffocate with ashes.

Title: Մոխրաշունչ լինիմ
Definition_1: to inhale ashes, to be suffocated with ashes.

Title: Մոխրաչափ կարգ
Definition_1: fixed or established measure of ashes.

Title: Մոխրաջուր
Definition_1: lixivium, lye, wash, lye-wash; լուանալ — ջրով, to wash, to lixiviate.

Title: Մոխրատարած
Definition_1: prone on the ashes; — խշտի, a bed sprinkled with ashes.

Title: Մոխրոց
Definition_1: cf. Մոխրանոց; dunghill, dung heap, dunghole or dung pit.

Title: Մոմ
Definition_1: wax, bee's wax; wax-candle, wax-light, taper; սպեղանի ի —ոյ, cerate, medicated wax; — ճարպական, stearine candle; cf. Ճրագ.

Title: Մոմակերտ
Definition_1: made of wax; գուբ —, cell, alveolus.

Title: Մոմավաճառ
Definition_1: dealer in wax, or in articles made of wax.

Title: Մոմնեմ
Definition_1: to wax, to cere, to spread over or coat with wax.

Title: Մոյթ
Definition_1: stay, support, prop, jamb, pillar, pilaster, stanchion, buttress; — դնել, to prop, to support, to shore up;

Title: Մոյն
Definition_2: beautiful, florid, lovely, graceful; զ— տմոյն առնել, զ—ս ի տմունութիւն փոխել, to make beauty fade, to spoil, alter or ruin the beauty of.

Title: Մոյր
Definition_1: mendacity, beggary; alms; ի — ելանել, շրջել, to beg, to go begging, to ask charity, to beg alms, to mendicate; ի — տեսանել, to see any one in a begging state.

Title: Մոռանամ
Definition_1: to forget, to be forgetful or unmindful of, to neglect; — զասելին, to be at a stand, to stop short, not to know what to say, to be put to a stand or to an ou-plus; մի՛ մո ռանար զիս, don't forget me;
Definition_2: to be forgotten, to fall into oblivion.

Title: Մոռացկոտ
Definition_1: forgetful, unmindful, liable to forget; cf. Մատն.

Title: Մոռացումն
Definition_1: forgetfulness, want of memory; ի — գալ, անկանել, to fall into oblivion; ի խորանկանել, ի մոռացմունս խորոց մատնիլ, to be buried in oblivion.

Title: Մոռացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to forget, to cause to forget, to cause to fall into neglect.

Title: Մոռացօնք
Definition_1: forgetfulness; —նս առնել, ի —նս դարձուցանել, արկանել, to forget, to leave or bury in oblivion; — լինել, գալն, to forget, to forget oneself, to put out of oneʼs memory; ի —նս ածել, to cause to forget.

Title: Մովսիսաբեր
Definition_1: proclaimed, promulgated or given by Moses.

Title: Մորթ
Definition_1: skin, hide, pelt; leather; remains, relics, coil; — մարդոյ, derma, skin.

Title: Մորթազերծ
Definition_1: skinned, deprived of the skin; — առնել, to skin, to deprive of the skin; to excoriate.

Title: Մորթաղ
Definition_1: dressed skin, tanned hide; leather-bag; leather table-cover.

Title: Մորթանք
Definition_1: skinning, flaying, act of depriving of the skin.

Title: Մորթեմ
Definition_1: to flay, to skin, to deprive of one's skin; to cut the throat, to butcher, to slaughter; to kill, to slay.

Title: Մորմոքումն
Definition_1: heart-ache, heart-break, anguish, grief, distress, regret, displeasure.

Title: Մորմոքեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to give or cause great displeasure or regret, to afflict or grieve deeply, to pierce to the heart, to embitter, to harrow, to rend, to break the heart.

Title: Մորմոքիմ
Definition_1: to grieve, to be torn with pain, to be afflicted with spasms, to regret much, to be very sorry, greatly displeased; to be affected, touched, moved, to melt with compassion.

Title: Մորոս
Definition_1: foolish, mad, insane, idiot, simpleton, dolt.

Title: Մորոսաբանութիւն
Definition_1: nonsense, foolish, extravagant or silly talk.

Title: Մորոսանամ
Definition_1: to madden, to run or go mad.

Title: Մոցեմ
Definition_1: to remove, to put or set aside, to separate; — ի կաթին սովորութենէ, to wean.

Title: Մու
Definition_1: meum, meum Athamaticum, spignel, foeniculum alpinum perenne.

Title: Մուզ
Definition_1: juice, extract, any liquid expressed, squeezed or obtained from fruits.

Title: Մութն
Definition_2: dark, obscure, gloomy; — անհնարին, frightful or thick darkness, impenetrable gloom;
Definition_3: — ընդ —, ի մթան, ի մթի, in darkness, in the dark, in the gloom.

Title: Մուխ
Definition_3: proof, trial;
Definition_4: tempered; steeled; red hot, fiery, burning.

Title: Մուծանեմ
Definition_1: to introduce, to give entrance, to cause to enter, to thrust or poke in, to insert; to conduct, to guide, to lead; to admit, to receive; to think, to excogitate, to invent; to adduce, to allege.

Title: Մուկն
Definition_2: mice; cf. Դնդեր; ազգ մկանց, the micy tribe; — մեծ, rat; — վայրի, wood-mouse; — դաշտի, field-rat; — ջրային, craber, water-rat; — ալպեան, marmot; — լերանց, mountain-rat; փարաւոնի, ichneumon, cf. Հետահան, cf. Հիլոս; գեղացի եւ քաղաքացի —, the country mouse and the city mouse; ծակ, բոյն, աղբ, ականատ մկանց, mouse-hole; rat's nest; mouse-dung; mouse-trap; որսորդ մկանց, rat-catcher, mouse-hunter; (կատու) mouser; որսորդութիւն մկանց, mouse-hunt; — որսալ, to mouse, to catch a mouse; — չչէ, the mouse squeaks.

Title: Մուղ
Definition_1: tamed, tractable; երիվար —, broken in or trained horse.

Title: Մունաւոր
Definition_1: having fine carnation colour and beauty.

Title: Մունջ
Definition_1: dumb, mute; cf. Համր; — առնել, to strike dumb; — լինել, to be mute, to become dumb or speechless.

Title: Մուշտակ
Definition_1: pelisse, fur; (ըզգեստ) furred gown or robe; վաճառականութիւն —ի, fur-trade; պատել —աւ, to fur.

Title: Մուտ
Definition_1: entrance, entry, coming or going in, introduction, access, approach, admission; gate, street-door, portal; porch, atrium, vestibule; income, revenue, rent; carnal knowledge; cf. Կանացի; —ք արեւու, sun-set, setting, going down; the setting sun, the west; —ք արեւային, heliacal sun-set;
Definition_2: —ք աստեղ, immersion; յելից մինչեւ ց-ս արեւու, from sun-rise to sun-set; — եւ ել or ել եւ —, income and expenses; — եւ ել նաւաց, arrival and departure of ships; —ք եւ ելք, entering and leaving; comers and goers; — ամսոյ, first day of the month;
Definition_3: ի մտից արեւու, towards or near evening; ի —ս լինել or դառնալ արեւու, to disappear, to set; — առնել, to make one's entry, to enter to go in; — or —ս գտանել, to be admitted, to have access, to be received; — եւ ել առնել, to come in and go out; իմանալ զ—եւ զել ուրուք, to know all a person's goings out and comings in, all his designs and actions; ժամս որոշել ել եւ մտից, to fix the times of audience; համարձակ — շնորհել առ ինքն, to give free access to him; ոչ գիտեմ զել եւ զ— իմ, I do not know how to act; խաղաղութի՞ւն իցէ —դ քո, is peace with you? do you bring peace?.

Title: Մուր
Definition_1: lamp-black, pinesoot, soot, blacking; ink; սեաւ եւ —, miserable, wretched;
Definition_2: սեւ եւ մուր, black all over.

Title: Մուրանամ
Definition_1: to beg, to mendicate, to ask alms, to solicit charity, to be a vagrant.

Title: Մուրացած
Definition_1: begged, mendicated, borrowed; alien, foreign; pieced, patched up, mended.

Title: Մուրացիկ
Definition_2: begged, borrowed; — շրջել, to go begging, to mump; cf. Մուրանամ.

Title: Մուրհակ
Definition_1: obligation, bond, contract, bill, note of hand, promissory note; bulletin, cedule, act, schedule, instrument, deed; — աղաչանաց, memorial, petition; — ընդունելութեան, receipt, acknowledgment; — հատուցման, discharge, acquittance; — արքունի, decree, ordonnance, rescript, mandate; պարգեւաց —, patent, letter patent, brevet, privilege, special grant; — մոռացութեան, —մոռացման յանցանաց, amnesty, general pardon.

Title: Մուրճ
Definition_1: hammer; — քարահատաց, stone-cutter's pick; կտցաւոր —, pick-axe, mattock.

Title: Մուրողաբար
Definition_1: like a beggar, in a precarious manner.

Title: Մօրուք
Definition_1: beard; աղեբէկ —, gray-beard; տգեղ, թաւ, անյարդար —, a sorry, thick, uncouth or neglected beard; մօրուօք դալարանալ ծնօտիցն, to have the face covered with down, or soft hair; մօրուս արձակել, to grow a beard; օր սափրելոյ զմօրուս, shaving-day; սափրել զմօրուս իւր, to shave oneself; to get shaved; ածելել զմօրուս ուրուք, to shave any one, to trim; աճեցուցանել զ—ւս, to let one's beard grow; ծաղկին — նորա, his beard begins to grow.

Title: Մուրց
Definition_1: fist; — առնել ընդ միմեանս, to box, to cuff, to fight with fists.

Title: Մռայլ
Definition_2: foggy, obscure, dark, dusk; shady, woody.

Title: Մռայլեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to darken, to obscure, to offuscate.

Title: Մռզգայլիմ
Definition_1: to devour, to gobble up, to eat like a hog, to swallow or gulp down, to stuff oneself.

Title: Մռմռեմ
Definition_1: to murmur, to grumble, to mutter, to growl; — ընդ միմեանս, to fall one upon another furiously or ferociously, tooth and nail, to be cruelly and obstinately bent against one another, to be mutually enraged; միմռեալ ալիք, angry billows, surging waves.

Title: Մռնչեմ
Definition_1: to roar; to bellow, to low; to rage, to chafe, to fume, to burst into roaring; մռնչէր առ հեծութեան իմոյ, I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.

Title: Մռնչումն
Definition_1: roar, roaring; bellowing, lowing, whining, shuddering.

Title: Մսամրցութիւն
Definition_1: rivalry in gluttony, emulation in voracity.

Title: Մսապատ
Definition_1: clothed in flesh, incarnate; fleshy, plump.

Title: Մսեղ
Definition_1: fleshy, corpulent, chubby, plump, fat, brawny.

Title: Մսեղէն
Definition_1: made of flesh, fleshly, carnal, corporeal, earthly, mortal; — յարկ, mortal coil; — բլուր, man-mountain, giant.

Title: Մսեղի
Definition_2: living, living man or soul; —ք, men, mortals; animals.

Title: Մսեմ
Definition_1: to chill, to make cold, to cool, to refrigerate.

Title: Մսիմ
Definition_1: to be or feel cold, to grow frigid, to suffer cold; to catch cold, to take a cold; մսի ձեռն իմ, my hands are cold.

Title: Մսուտ
Definition_1: cf. Մսեղ; touched with meat; contaminated.

Title: Մսուր
Definition_1: crib, manger; stable; զուարակ ի մսրոյ, a fat calf; — or —ք բերանոյ, jaw bone or the interior of the mouth; — or կառք մսրի, cf. Յարդգող.

Title: Մտաբախ
Definition_1: crack-brained, cracked, crazed, frantic, frenetic, mad.

Title: Մտաբանեմ
Definition_1: to reflect, to reason, or revolve in one's mind.

Title: Մտաբերեմ
Definition_1: to recollect, to remember; to take it into one's head, to think, to purpose, to contemplate, to imagine, to conceive; to make an attempt, to attempt, to dare, to will, to be inclined to, to bring oneself to; to give oneself up to; ի կերակրիկ ինչ —, to obtain a bare livelihood; յապաշխարութիւն —, to repent, to be converted, to amend; ի նախանձ —, to be envious, jealous; cf. Խեղդ.

Title: Մտաբերեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to think; to induce, to incite, to attract, to excite desire.

Title: Մտաբերիկ լինիմ
Definition_1: cf. Մտաբերեմ; յանասուն —, to commit bestiality.

Title: Մտադիր
Definition_1: attentive, careful, vigilant, diligent, exact; considerate; — լինել, to be attentive, to pay attention to, to mind, to attend to, to take heed to, to apply, to be assiduous.

Title: Մտադիւր
Definition_2: —, — իմն, — սիրով or կամօք, willingly, voluntarily, with good will, heartily, cheerfully, with pleasure; candidly, frankly, sincerely.

Title: Մտադիւրութիւն
Definition_1: eagerness, diligence, goodwill, cheerfulness; մտադիւրութեամբ, cf. Մտադիւր.

Title: Մտաթափ
Definition_1: brainless, giddy-brained, giddy-pated, crack-brained, foolish, mad.

Title: Մտաթափութիւն
Definition_1: mental derangement or alienation, lunacy, insanity, madness.

Title: Մտախոհիմ
Definition_1: to think, to muse, to reflect, to ponder, to rack one's brains.

Title: Մտածեմ
Definition_1: to think, to reflect, to meditate, to ponder, to consider, to muse, to weigh.

Title: Մտածութիւն
Definition_1: thought, meditation, consideration, reflection, idea, imagination, fancy; ըստ իմում մտածութեան, as far as I can judge, according to my idea.

Title: Մտակոծ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be anxious, perturbed; to be vacillating, wavering.

Title: Մտակորոյս
Definition_1: out of one's mind, extravagant, mad.

Title: Մտահաճ
Definition_1: presumptuous; to one's mind or liking, pleasing.

Title: Մտահաճոյ
Definition_1: pleasing, agreeable, to one's liking; condescending, meek.

Title: Մտահաս
Definition_1: comprehensible, easy to understand, intelligible, plain.

Title: Մտամոլորեմ
Definition_1: to seduce, to pervert; — զինքն, to deceive oneself.

Title: Մտայոյզ
Definition_1: unquiet, thoughtful, wavering, agitated, undecided, perplexed, irresolute; — առնել, to disquiet, to perplex, to make uneasy, to cause anxiety; — լինել, to disquiet or fret oneself, to waver, to be agitated, vacillating, wavering, to be anxious, to be at a loss how to decide.

Title: Մտայուզութիւն
Definition_1: agitation of mind, care, inquietude, perplexity.

Title: Մտանեմ
Definition_1: to enter, to go or come in, to introduce, insinuate or intrude oneself; to penetrate into, to slip in; — առ ոք, առաջին ուրուք, to present oneself, to call on, to visit; — աղօթից առաջի ուրուք, to be heard, hearkened to; — առ ումեմն, to be a guest, to receive hospitality, to be lodged; — առ կին, to know a woman; — ի վերայ օտարի ամուսնոյ, to commit adultery; — ի or ընդ գիրկս, ընդ աղեղն, to bend a bow; ի դատաստան, ի դատ —, to sue, to bring an action against, to summon before a magistrate or court of justice; ընդ դատաւորաւ —, to act the judge; ընդ երկիր —, to plunge into an abyss, to be engulfed, swallowed up; ընդ գետին —, to be overwhelmed with shame, to hide one's confusion under the earth; — ի ծառայութիւն, to enter a person's service, to serve; — յորդեգրութիւն, to be adopted; երաշխաւոր —, to guarantee, to become security; — ի պայքար, to dispute, to contest; ի փորձ —, to prove, to try, to make an experiment; — ընդ մերով մարդկութեամբս, to be clothed with our humanity; ի քուն —, to be overcome with sleep, to sleep, to lay to sleep; — արեգական, to go down, to set; ընդ քիրտն —, to sweat, to work hard, to give oneself much trouble; — ի նաւ, to embark, to go on board a vessel; — ընդ անձին, to be at enmity with oneself; — ընդ լծով or — ընդ ձեռամբ ուրուք, to submit, to become subject to; — դիւի ի մարդ, to possess; — ի ճաշ, to sit or be at table.

Title: Մտապահ լինիմ
Definition_1: to keep in mind, to remember; to have spite against one, to be rancorous; cf. Մտայոյզ.

Title: Մտառեմ
Definition_1: to comprehend, to conceive, to understand.

Title: Մտատանջ
Definition_1: unquiet, anxious, gloomy, full of care; — լինել, to be uneasy, disquieted, to grow anxious, to care for or about.

Title: Մտացածին
Definition_1: imaginary, chimerical, fictitious, fabulous, pretended, false, visionary, extravagant, fantastical.

Title: Մտացի
Definition_1: reasonable, rational, sensible, intelligent, wise, judicious.

Title: Մտափոխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be out of one's wits, to become deranged, to be delirious.

Title: *Մտեհան լինիմ
Definition_1: to have escaped the memory, to be forgotten.

Title: Մտերիմ
Definition_2: favourite; — ծառայ, true or faithful servant.

Title: Մտերմաբար
Definition_1: faithfully, sincerely, candidly; intimately, cordially, confidently, familiarly.

Title: Մտերմանամ
Definition_1: to become familiar, to grow intimate, to obtain confidence.

Title: Մտերմութիւն
Definition_1: intimacy, cordiality, confidence, familiarity, strict, close or fraternal friendship; faithfulness, sincerity; մտերմութեամբ, cf. Մտերմաբար.

Title: Մտղեմ
Definition_1: to push strongly, to shake, to move.

Title: Մտրակ
Definition_2: stimulus; — չուանեայ, whip-cord; — հեծելոց, riding-whip; հարուածք —աց, lash, cut, stroke of a whip; cf. Կուշտ.

Title: Մտրակեմ
Definition_1: to horse whip, to lash, to whip; to prick, to spur; to stimulate.

Title: Մրազարդ
Definition_1: dark with down, downy, furnished with soft dark hair; — յօնք, black eye-brows.

Title: Մրայօն
Definition_1: black eyebrowed, having dark bushy eye-brows.

Title: Մրգաբեր
Definition_1: fruit-bearing, fructiferous; loaded with fruits; — ծառ, fruit-tree.

Title: Մրգաթափ
Definition_1: fruitless; — առնել, to shake down the fruit.

Title: Մրգուզ
Definition_1: vile, abject, low, base, mean, despicable; obscure.

Title: Մրեմ
Definition_2: to asperse, to defame, to slander; — զարտեւանունս, to paint one's eyelids.

Title: Մրկեմ
Definition_1: to roast, to toast, to burn.

Title: Մրճոտեմ
Definition_1: to smoke, to blacken with soot, to soil, to dirty.

Title: Մրճոտիմ
Definition_1: to blacken with smoke or soot.

Title: Մրմնջեմ
Definition_1: to murmur, to mutter, to mumble, to speak through the teeth; to sing low, to hum, to murmur gently; to grumble, to whine, to moan.

Title: Մրմունջ
Definition_1: murmur, whisper; low utterance, humming; moan, groan.

Title: Մրուր
Definition_1: dregs, lees, remains, grounds, sediment, dross, faeces, residuum; slime, mire, mud, ooze; — գինւոյ, tartar; cf. Գինեմրուր; — իւղոյ, dregs, lees of oil; — մաղձային, biliary calculus; — միզական փամփշտի, stones in the bladder urinary calculi; մաքրել զ—, to refine, to clarify, to purify; — տալ, to cause great grief or pain, to cause to suffer; to throw a slur or stigma on, to affront, to traduce, to slight, to revile, to injure; cf. Քամեմ.

Title: Մրջմնոց
Definition_1: pricking like the stinging of ants, formication; cf. Մրջիւնոց.

Title: Մրրատեսակ
Definition_1: mixed with lees, full of dregs.

Title: Մրրիկ
Definition_1: tempest, storm, foul weather; — ծովու, squall, gust of wind, high wind; — հողմոյ, blast, hurricane, whirlwind, tornado; — ծխոյ, dense smoke, cloud of smoke; — բոցոյ, volume of flames.

Title: Մրրիմ
Definition_1: to settle, to form a sediment.

Title: Մրրկածին
Definition_1: causing or producing tempests; cf. Մրրկաբեր; նշանք —ք, prognostics, signs which usher in the storm.

Title: Մրրկատարափ
Definition_1: raining impetuously; — նետք, սլաքք, a storm of arrows.

Title: Մրրկեմ
Definition_1: to tempest, to produce a tempest, to trouble, to ruffle, to agitate violently.

Title: Մրրկիմ
Definition_1: to be tempest-tost or tempest-tossed, to be driven, or whirled about, to be very agitated, rough; մրրկէր ծուշ ընդ երկիր, curling clouds of smoke ascended to the skies.

Title: Մրցանակ
Definition_1: premium, prize or reward; fight, combat; տանել զ—, to win, to carry the prize, to bear away the bell; — առնուլ, to get, gain or obtain a prize.

Title: Մրցիմ
Definition_1: to box, to come to blows, to fight, to combat; to rival, to vie with, to compete; մրցելով իմն, with emulation, vying.

Title: Մրցումն
Definition_1: combat, fight, wrestling; competition, concurrence, rivalry.

Title: Մցռեմ
Definition_1: to gorge, glut or cram oneself, to stuff and swill.

Title: Մօտ
Definition_1: near, nigh, next, close by, by;
Definition_2: near, next; cf. Մերձ; — այսր, near to this place;
Definition_3: — առ —, — ի —, — ի —ոյ, quite near or close, contiguously, thickly;
Definition_4: — ընդ —, — ընդ հուպ, soon, directly, instantly;
Definition_5: ի or ընդ մօտոյ, ի —է, մօտուստ ի —ուստ, near, nearly, close by or to, next; soon, shortly, soon after; lately; ընդ — աւուրս, shortly, soon; — լինել, to be near or close to, to approach, to draw near; ի — կալ, to stand near, to be present at, to attend; — կտրել, to cut quite short; — անցանել, to pass close to, or hard by; — է առ քեզ յորժամ կամի ցիս՝ կարող լինել, where there is a will there is a way; ի մօտոյ, ի նանիր, cf. Մօտ, cf. Նանիր.

Title: Մօտագնաց
Definition_1: accompanying, proceeding together, or in proximity.

Title: Մօտալուտ
Definition_1: imminent, impending, near, at hand, threatening; — վտանգ, imminent danger; — լինել, to be imminent, to threaten.

Title: Մօտակաց
Definition_1: assisting, present, neighbouring, near, close to.

Title: Մօտակտուր լինիմ
Definition_1: to be cut quite short, cut off at the roots.

Title: Մօտահաս
Definition_1: accessit, the next to the best, second best; — լինել, to obtain honourable mention, to get honours.

Title: Մօտաւոր
Definition_1: near, next, neighbouring, assistant; present; cf. Մօտասեր.

Title: Մօտաքաղաք
Definition_1: city near the capital; suburb; borough; market-town.

Title: Մօտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to approach, to place next or near to, to approximate, to draw, bring or put near.

Title: Մօտիմ
Definition_1: to approach, to approximate, to come, go or draw near, to be near.

Title: Մօր
Definition_1: dirt, mud, mire, slime; puddle, pool, fen, marsh, bog.

Title: Մօրանամ
Definition_1: to stagnate, to be stagnant, to form a swamp or bog, to stand.

Title: <letter>Յ</letter> (hi)
Definition_1: the twenty first letter of the alphabet, and the sixteenth of the consonants; three hundred, three hundredth.

Title: Յաբեթեան
Definition_1: of or belonging to Japheth; Armenian; — տոհմ, the Armenian nation, the Armenians.

Title: Յագ
Definition_3: —, ց-, to satiety, to one's fill, to the full; ց— ուտել եւ ըմպել, to eat and drink one's bellyful.

Title: Յագեցումն
Definition_1: satiety, surfeit, repletion; պատառիլ ի յագեցմանէ, to burst with eating.

Title: Յագեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to satisfy, to satiate, to sate; կշտապինդ —, to surfeit, to cloy, to glut, to stuff, to gorge; — զցասումն իւր, to vent one's wrath.

Title: Յագիմ
Definition_1: to be satisfied, to have one's fill; — յանչափս or կարի իմն, to glut, cram or gorge oneself with; չյագէր ի հայելոյ, he was never tired of looking at.

Title: Յագուրդ
Definition_1: satisfying; repletion; satiety, disgust; ի յագուրդ, for satiating; յագուրդ ասել ագահութեան, to say I have had enough; ուտել զյագուրդ, to eat one's fill; — առնել ագահութեան, to glut one's avarice; ի — փառամոլութեան իւրոյ, for satisfying his ambition.

Title: Յազեմ
Definition_1: to immolate, to offer up, to sacrifice to idols.

Title: Յազիմ
Definition_1: to be immolated to idols; to feed on meats offered to idols; to profane or render meats unclean by gnawing them.

Title: Յախճապակեմ
Definition_1: to cover or ornament with porcelain; —եալ յատակ, tessellated pavement; —եալ յօրինուած, tessellation; mosaic.

Title: Յախնթորագոյն
Definition_1: rude, rough, common, vile, low, vulgar, trivial; servile.

Title: Յախուռն
Definition_2: precipitately, headlong, furiously, impetuously, rashly, at a venture, or random, audaciously, insolently; indiscreetly, without discretion or consideration; — քաջութիւն, impetuous courage; — խիզախել, to venture headlong, to expose oneself to great peril.

Title: Յածեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to walk, to take or lead about, to conduct here and there; to veer, to turn about; to circulate; — զաչս, to turn, to roll one's eyes; շուրջ — զաչս, to glance over, or round about; տարաժամ զբերանն —, to eat out of season.

Title: Յածիմ
Definition_1: to travel, to visit different places, to rove, to ramble, to roam, to wander; to lounge; to stray; to circulate; — ընդ ծով եւ ընդ ցամաք, to travel by sea and land; cf. Ընդ վայր.

Title: Յածումն
Definition_1: wandering, travelling; circulation; round, turn, walk; agitation.

Title: Յականեմ
Definition_1: to look at, to gaze upon, to look intently at; to survey, to watch.

Title: Յաղագս
Definition_1: for, on account of, for the sake of, in consideration of.

Title: Յաղադարձիմ
Definition_1: to be impertinent or insolent; to live dissolutely, to give oneself up to debauchery.

Title: Յաղեմ
Definition_1: to salt, to season or flavour with salt.

Title: Յաղթ
Definition_1: great, large, huge, enormous, gigantic, vast, immense; strong; powerful, mighty, victorious; much, many, abundant, considerable.

Title: Յաղթաբազուկ
Definition_1: strong-armed; strong, robust, vigorous, very powerful.

Title: Յաղթական
Definition_2: triumpher, conqueror, subduer; — լինել, to triumph over, to conquer; to excel; — երգ, triumphal song, epinicion.

Title: Յաղթահասակ
Definition_1: of an immoderate height or size, gigantic, colossal.

Title: Յաղթահարեմ
Definition_1: to conquer, to vanquish, to overcome, to subdue, to subjugate; to oppress, to vex, to torment; — բանիւ, to convince, to confound, to abash.

Title: Յաղթանակ
Definition_1: prize or premium, palm, laurels; triumph, victory; reward, recompense;
Definition_3: —աւ, triumphantly, in triumph; — տանել, to obtain a triumph.

Title: Յաղթանակեմ
Definition_1: to triumph, to receive or obtain the honour of a triumph, to be triumphant, to win the victory, to carry or hear away the palm; to prevail.

Title: Յաղթանդամ
Definition_1: heavy, strong-limbed or well-limbed, stout, corpulent, gigantic.

Title: Յաղթասէր
Definition_1: eager to win; contentious, quarrelsome, litigious.

Title: Յաղթասիրեմ
Definition_1: to desire to conquer; to delight in strife or quarrelling, to dispute, to contest.

Title: Յաղթասիրութիւն
Definition_1: desire of victory; love of contradiction, contentiousness, quarrelsomeness, pugnacity, fractious temper.

Title: Յաղթեմ
Definition_1: to vanquish, to overcome, to conquer, to subdue, to subjugate; to surpass, to excel, to prevail over; — պատերազմի, to conquer, to triumph; — ցաւոցն, to overcome or master one's grief or sorrow; — ամենայն դժուարութեանց կամ ներհակաց, to overcome all sorts of difficulties, to surmount every obstacle; — անձին, կամ կրից անձին, to conquer oneself, to get the victory over self; to overcome or subdue one's passions; — ի դատաստանի, to gain one's cause.

Title: Յաղթութիւն
Definition_1: triumph, victory, success, advantage; cf. Յաղթանդամութիւն; կատարեալ —, decisive victory; ունել, տանել, ստանալ զ—, to get the victory, to carry the day, to be victorious, to prevail over, to get the better or the mastery of; լի բովանդակ ունել or տանել զ—, to obtain a complete victory; մեծապանծ —ս ի գլուխ տանել, to gain great advantages over; կանգնել —ս ի վերայ, to triumph, to be triumphant.

Title: Յաղկիմ
Definition_1: to get spoiled, to be corrupted, decomposed.

Title: Յաճախ
Definition_1: frequent, continual, incessant; prolix, long; much, full, copious, abundant;
Definition_2: frequently, often, continually; too much, too many;
Definition_3: —ք, continuity, perpetuity; հացք —աց, shewbread.

Title: Յաճախագունդ
Definition_1: powerful, very numerous; — ճամբար, numerous army, innumerable throng.

Title: Յաճախապաշտօն
Definition_1: where religious ceremonies frequently take place.

Title: Յաճախեմ
Definition_1: to do often or frequently; to redouble, to multiply, to augment, to increase, to enlarge;
Definition_2: to frequent, to haunt, to visit often; to augment, to increase, to grow; to abound, to be plentiful, to superabound, to redound; to continue, to endure, to last, to remain.

Title: Յաճախութիւն
Definition_1: frequency, abundance, great quantity or number, heap, redundance, affluence; frequenting, haunting.

Title: Յամայր
Definition_1: long; — ամս, ամօք, for a number of years, for many years; կեցցե՛ս — ամն, may you live many years ! live for ever !

Title: Յամառ
Definition_1: obstinate, stubborn, self-willed, wilful, headstrong, sullen, restive; tenacious.

Title: Յամառիմ
Definition_1: to remain obstinate, to grow stubborn, to be stubbornly bent on, to be headstrong, refractory, obdurate; to persist in, to insist, to be bent on.

Title: Յամառութիւն
Definition_1: obstinacy, stubbornness, restiveness, self-will, prejudice, perverseness, fanaticism; stiffness, harshness, tenaciousness, obduracy; յամառութեաբ, obstinately, wilfully, stubbornly, obdurately.

Title: Յամբոյր
Definition_1: out of the way, unseasonably, beside the question.

Title: Յամենամ
Definition_1: to delay, to retard, to defer, to remain, to procrastinate; to tarry, to stay, to dally, to loiter, to lag, to while; to wait, to be patient; — ի գինւոջ, to continue drinking; to remain long over one's cup; — ի հաղորդութէնէ, not to receive often the Holy Sacrament.

Title: Յամեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to retard, to defer, to delay, to put off, to procrastinate; տէր իմ յամէ զգալ, my lord delayeth his coming.

Title: Յամենուստ ամենուստ
Definition_1: on all sides, from all parts.

Title: Յամերամ
Definition_2: —ս, for many years, for ever and ever.

Title: Յամրաքայլ
Definition_1: with tardy or sluggish steps, slowly; — ընթանալ, to go slowly, to go with slow and cautious steps.

Title: Յամրութիւն
Definition_1: slowness, tardiness, delay, retardation; sluggishness, idleness.

Title: Յայ
Definition_1: hue and cry, hoot, hooting, whoop; յայ յու առնել, վաշ եւ յայ կարդալ, հայ հուչ առնել, to hoot, to whoop, to ridicule, to scoff; to treat roughly, to molest, to importune.

Title: Յայգորեմ
Definition_1: to wish any one good morning; to go to salute or compliment a person every morning; ժամ —ելի, the hour of audience; տեղի —ելի, hall of audience.

Title: Յայնժամ
Definition_1: then, at that time, just then.

Title: Յայնկոյս
Definition_1: over, on, on the other side, beyond, on that side; անցանել —, to cross over, to pass by, to go beyond; անցանել — այրարատայ, to pass Ararat; անցանել — եփրատայ, to cross the Euphrates; cf. Կոյս.

Title: Յայպանաս
Definition_2: despite, disdain; outrage; — ասել, to injure, to outrage, to affront; to curse.

Title: Յայսկոյս
Definition_1: here, on this side, this way; — յայնկոյս, on this side and on that, from one side and the other, here and there; ոմն — եւ ոմն յայնկոյս, some this way some that, some one way, some another; հայեցեալ — յայնկոյս, having glanced around; cf. Կոյս.

Title: Յայտ
Definition_1: evident, clear, manifest, plain, palpable, obvious;
Definition_3: cf. Յայտնութիւն; — է, — իսկ է, it is evident, clear; — իմն է, naturally, of course, certainly; այս — է զի, it is certain that; ապա — ուրեմն է, it is therefore clear that; — or ի — գալ, to appear, to be manifested, made known, evident, to be discovered or disclosed; — ածել, առնել, to declare, to make manifest, to display, to put or set forth, to show, to prove; to signify, to name; — առնել զընդունելութիւն, to acknowledge the receipt of.

Title: Յայտական
Definition_1: evident, apparent, plain, visible, manifest, clear; expressive, significative.

Title: Յայտանախատ
Definition_1: blamed in public or publicly reproved; — առնել, to reprove openly; — լինել, to be publicly insulted.

Title: Յայտապատում
Definition_1: narrated or narrating clearly; expounding clearly;
Definition_2: evidently, clearly; — առնել, to narrate clearly; to explain, to expound.

Title: Յայտարար
Definition_3: denominator; exponent.

Title: Յայտարարութիւն
Definition_1: declaration, exposition, manifestation, notification, statement or account; manifesto, manifest; prospectus, programme; — առնել, to make a manifestation.

Title: Յայտնաբան
Definition_1: expounding, explaining, exposing; clear, perspicuous, obvious, plain.

Title: Յայտնաբանեմ
Definition_1: to explain, to expound, to expose, to illustrate, to make clear or evident.

Title: Յայտնաբարբառ
Definition_1: speaking or spoken openly, manifestly; — վկայութիւն, undeniable or decisive witness or testimony; — խօսել, to speak openly, to speak out plainly.

Title: Յայտնապէս
Definition_1: evidently, manifestly, clearly, obviously, palpably, visibly; notoriously, publicly, openly, overtly; intelligibly, explicitly; without disguise, frankly, freely, boldly.

Title: Յայտնատեսիլ
Definition_1: apparent, evident, public, visible to all.

Title: Յայտնեմ
Definition_1: to reveal, to disclose, to discover, to unveil, to unmask, to publish a secret, to make public; to manifest, to declare, to explain, to expound, to set forth, to state, to expose; to signify, to notify; to utter, to express; — զմիտս, զկարծիս իւր, to manifest one's designs, intentions, thoughts or opinions, to declare oneself, to speak out; — զանձն, to manifest oneself, to make oneself known.

Title: Յայտնի
Definition_1: evident, clear, manifest, notorious, recognisable, obvious, explicit, apparent, palpable, visible;
Definition_2: cf. Յայտնապէս; — է, it is clear, it is evident, that is of course; — լինել, to be manifest, to appear; — առնել, to manifest.

Title: Յայտնութիւն
Definition_1: evidence, manifestation, enunciation; disclosing, unveiling; apparition; revelation, Apocalypse; Epiphany, Twelfth-day, Twelfth-night; coming, appearing of our Lord; divine oracle; ծածկուկ —ք, the Apocrypha.

Title: Յայրատ
Definition_1: impudent, immodest, wanton, unchaste, lecherous, lascivious, lustful, lewd, obscene;
Definition_2: — or —ս, impudently, unblushingly, immodestly, lewdly, lustfully, obscenely.

Title: Յայրատանամ
Definition_1: to be devoid of modesty, to behave impudently, to lead an unchaste life.

Title: Յանկ
Definition_1: term, end, finish; rhyme, cadence, numbers, termination, ending, desinence, harmony; — ելանել, հասանել, to be finished, accomplished; to expire, to end, to bound, to terminate; — հանել, տանել, to bring about, to succeed in; to complete, to put an end to, to finish;
Definition_2: convenient, suitable, congruous, becoming, apt, tit, adapted; quiet, good, kind, sweet, pleasing.

Title: Յանգագոյն
Definition_1: in a proper manner, seasonably, becomingly, befittingly.

Title: Յանգակից
Definition_1: well suited to one another, having affinity with, analogous, similar.

Title: Յանգեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to complete, to finish, to end; to render suitable, to adapt, to accommodate; to appropriate; to accord; to put into rhyme.

Title: Յանգեմ
Definition_1: to be ended, finished, bounded; to drive at, to tend to, to come to, to be reduced, to dwindle, to result; to discharge, to flow or to fall into, to empty itself.

Title: Յանգութիւն
Definition_1: relation, affinity, conformity, similarity; fitness, suitableness.

Title: Յանգումն
Definition_1: end, termination, close, conclusion; cadence; repose, rest; meeting, rencounter; — ածել, բերել, առնել, to put an end to, to finish, to terminate; գալ ի —, գալ — կատարելութեան, to be perfected, to arrive at perfection.

Title: Յանգուցանեմ
Definition_1: to draw on, to win, to attract, to charm, to captivate, to reconcile, to conciliate, to appease, to calm; to conclude, to terminate, to finish; յինքն — զսիրտս, to steal hearts, to win, to conciliate; յինքն — զոք, to win or bring over.

Title: Յանգուցիչ
Definition_1: attractive, alluring, engaging, insinuating, winning, prepossessing.

Title: Յանգչիմ
Definition_1: to be attached or affectioned to, to get fond of, to conceive an affection or liking for; to repose, to cease.

Title: Յանդգնագոյնս
Definition_1: boldly, impudently, saucily, daringly, rashly, hardily, precipitately, audaciously, temerariously.

Title: Յանդգնեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render impudent or rash, to embolden.

Title: Յանդգնիմ
Definition_1: to dare, to be bold enough, to be audacious to do or say any thing, to have the hardihood or boldness to, to arrogate, to presume, to grow insolent or saucy; to venture, to attempt, to run the risk.

Title: Յանդգնութիւն
Definition_1: audacity, boldness, rashness, temerity, hardihood; impudence, sauciness, insolence, arrogance, presumption; licence, too great liberty; frolic, youthful pranks; յանդգնութեամբ, cf. Յանդգնաբար.

Title: Յանդիման
Definition_1: before, in the presence of, in the face or sight of, hard by, against, opposite, over against, in the view of, in the face, publicly, in public; դէմ —, face to face; front to front; — իմ, before me, in my presence; — եկեղեցւոյ, in face of the church; — ամենայն աշխարհի, in the face of the whole world; — ամենեցուն, publicly, before all people; ասել —, to say to one's face; — առնել, կացուցանել, ածել, to present, to offer, to introduce, to represent, to exhibit, to set before the eyes to show, to remonstrate; — առնել, to reprove, to reproach, to blame; — լինել, կալ, to present oneself, to appear, to make one's appearance before, to show oneself; — մատչել, կալ, to appear before.

Title: Յանդիմանախօս
Definition_1: saying to a person's face, in the presence of; contradicting, opposing.

Title: Յանդիմանախօսութիւն
Definition_1: speaking face to face, dialogue, confabulation.

Title: Յանդիմանակայ
Definition_2: before, face to face; — առնել, to show, to prove, to demonstrate, to explain.

Title: Յանդիմանակաց
Definition_1: present, assisting, in the presence of;

Title: Յանդիմանակացութիւն
Definition_1: the being present, assisting, presence; proof, demonstration.

Title: Յանդիմանամերժ
Definition_1: repelling or rejecting advice, spurning or despising admonition, insolent, insubordinate.

Title: Յանդիմանաւոր
Definition_1: apparent, plain, visible, evident; reproachful, reproving.

Title: Յանդիմանեմ
Definition_1: to reprehend, to reprimand, to blame, to reproach, to cast in one's teeth, to chide, to rebuke sharply, to revile, to rate, to scold; to present, to represent, to show, to demonstrate, to discover, disclose or unveil; to prove, to convince.

Title: Յանդիմանիմ
Definition_1: to be reprehended, reproached, chided; to be presented; discovered; convinced.

Title: Յանդիմանութիւն
Definition_1: reprehension, reprimand, admonition, correction, reproach; invective, scolding, chiding; representation, exposition; proof, demonstration, manifestation, statement; ջուր յանդիմանութեան, bitter water;

Title: Յանդուգն
Definition_1: rash, foolhardy, audacious, adventurous, hardy, resolute, determined;
Definition_2: rashly, inconsiderately, audaciously, arrogantly, presumptuously, insolently, haughtily, petulantly; hardily, resolutely, determinedly.

Title: Յանզգայիմ
Definition_1: cf. Անզգայիմ; to be or become apathetic; to be out of one's senses.

Title: Յանկարգ
Definition_1: disorderly, out of order, in confusion, irregularly; inordinately, excessively, intemperately.

Title: Յանկարծ
Definition_2: unawares, unexpectedly, suddenly, on a sudden, abruptly, all at once;
