Definition_3: please God! would to God! may it please God; — եթէ, if by chance.

Title: Յանկարծադէպ
Definition_1: happening unexpectedly, unforeseen, unexpected, unhoped or unlooked for; extraordinary, fortuitous, casual, accidental;

Title: Յանկարծաթափ
Definition_1: all at once, suddenly, impetuously, precipitately, inconsiderately, rapidly.

Title: Յանկարծախօսեմ
Definition_1: to extemporise; to speak extemporally; to get up at a moment's notice.

Title: Յանկարծածին
Definition_1: happening suddenly or unexpectedly; momentaneous, of short duration.

Title: Յանկարծակի
Definition_1: sudden, unexpected, unforeseen, unthought of, abrupt;
Definition_2: —, իմն, unawares, unexpectedly, quickly, suddenly, abruptly, all at once.

Title: Յանկարծահաս
Definition_1: happening unexpectedly, coming by chance, unlooked for, unexpected; cf. Յանկարծ; — շտապ տագնապի, երկիւղ, violent fright, panic, panic terror; — մահ or օրհաս, sudden, unexpected death.

Title: Յանկարծամահ
Definition_2: sudden death; — լինել, to die a sudden death.

Title: Յանձանձանք
Definition_1: care, pains, solicitude, assiduity; management, gestion, expedition.

Title: Յանձանձեմ
Definition_1: to take care of, to pay attention to, to be careful of; to provide for, to protect, to treat with much care; to manage, to administer; to expedite.

Title: Յանձանձիչ
Definition_1: careful person, provider, protector, manager, director.

Title: Յանձն
Definition_1: recommended; աստուծոյ — ! God he with you ! Adieu !
Definition_2: — է, եղեւ, եղիցուք, եղեալ, to resign, trust, submit, abandon or recommend oneself to; — առնել, cf. Յանձնեմ; — առնուլ, to assume responsibility or care, to undertake to, to oblige or pledge oneself to do anything; չառնուլ —, not to accept, to deny, to refuse, to reject, to disallow; cf. Անձն.

Title: Յանձնաժողով
Definition_1: commission; անդամք —ոյ, the members of the -; — կարգել, to appoint or name a -.

Title: Յանձնապաստան
Definition_1: presumptuous, arrogant, presuming, self-conceited, confident, consequential.

Title: Յանձնապաստանիմ
Definition_1: to presume too much on oneself, to be self-conceited, arrogant, to trust to, or to rely on oneself, to assume a consequential air or look, to arrogate, to pretend to.

Title: Յանձնապաստանութիւն
Definition_1: presumption, self-conceit, consequentialness, arrogance; յանձնապաստանութեամբ, presumptuously, consequentially, arrogantly.

Title: Յանձնառական
Definition_1: acceptable, worth accepting or taking; voluntary, avowed, accepted; — պատուիրան, positive precept.

Title: Յանձնառութիւն
Definition_1: acceptance, acceptation, consent, engagement, avowal, approbation.

Title: Յանձնարարական
Definition_1: in commission or recommendation; — ժողով, commission; — թուղթ, letter of recommendation; — քահանայից, dimissory letter; — դեսպանաց, credentials.

Title: Յանձնարարութիւն
Definition_1: commission, order; recommendation; mission; delegation; solicitation.

Title: Յանձնեկ
Definition_1: order; — առնել, to give a command.

Title: Յանձնեմ
Definition_1: to recommend; to deliver, to commend, to put or give into the hands of, to deposit; to resign, to leave; to intrust, to confide, to trust, to rely on; to impose, to charge, to order.

Title: Յանչափս
Definition_1: immensely, infinitely, beyond measure, excessively; intemperately, immoderately; hyper-bolically.

Title: Յանցանեմ
Definition_1: to commit a fault, error or crime; to transgress, to trespass, to sin; to fall in error, to fail, to do amiss, to stumble, to go astray; to abuse, to offend, to give offence, to wrong, to injure; cf. Թեթեւ.

Title: Յանցանք
Definition_1: transgression, fault, wrong, offence, error, fall, sin, trespass, crime, delinquency; իմովս —նօք, through me, through my fault; —նս համարել ումեք, to impute as a crime to; cf. Ընկենում; cf. Թեթեւացուցանեմ.

Title: Յանցաւոր
Definition_1: faulty, guilty, delinquent, culpable, criminal; — օրինաց, transgressor, violator, criminal, delinquent; — զանձն դաւանել, խոստովանել, to confess one's fault, to plead guilty.

Title: Յանցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to transgress or to sin, to induce to crime.

Title: Յաչաղիմ
Definition_1: to envy to be envious of, to pine away with envy, to be eaten up with envy; to bear malice, to disparage, sneer or rail at, to attack through ill-will or malevolence.

Title: Յաչաղկոտ
Definition_1: envious, jealous, malicious, malevolent; fascinating, bewitching, enchanting.

Title: Յապահով
Definition_1: sure, safe, secure, out of danger, assured;
Definition_2: security, safety; place of safety, shelter; —ս լինել, to be in security, safe, sheltered; — or —ս առնել, to assure, to secure.

Title: Յապահովագրեմ
Definition_1: to secure, to insure, to assure.

Title: Յապահովագրութիւն
Definition_1: insurance, underwriting; մուրհակ յապահովագրութեան, policy of insurance; cf. Յապահովութիւն.

Title: Յապահովանամ
Definition_1: to be sure, certain, assured, tranquillized.

Title: Յապահովեմ
Definition_1: to assure, to reassure, to tranquillize, to remove a person's fears; to guarantee, to give security for.

Title: Յապահովութիւն
Definition_1: security, safety, surety, certitude; quiet, tranquillity.

Title: Յապաղանք
Definition_1: delay, hinderance, retardation; adjournment, putting off, procrastination;
Definition_2: առանց —նաց, without delay, forthwith, immediately, instantly, at once.

Title: Յապաղեմ
Definition_1: to defer, to put off, to procrastinate, to prorogue; to retard, to hinder, to stop, to protract, to delay; to prolong, to lengthen; to temporize; cf. Յապաղիմ.

Title: Յապաղիմ
Definition_1: to delay, to tarry, to remain; to linger, to loiter, to be late.

Title: Յապաղումն
Definition_1: delay, hinderance, impediment; putting off, delaying, protraction, procrastination, prorogation, respite; temporizing.

Title: Յապաւանք
Definition_1: retrenchment, cutting off, suppression, diminution; mutilation.

Title: Յապաւեմ
Definition_1: to retrench, to curtail, to diminish, to cut; to mutilate, to castrate; to cut off, to abridge; to suppress; — զաւելորդ ուղէշս, to prune, to lop, to trim, to cut; — զծառս, to detruncate; — զթեւս, to clip a bird's wings; — զհերս, to shear, to clip; to shave; — զականջս, to crop ears.

Title: Յապաւիմ
Definition_1: to be pruned, cut off; — զերեսօք or առ երեսօք, to be close shaven.

Title: Յապուրակի
Definition_1: hastily, in a hurry, suddenly, quickly, at once.

Title: Յաջող
Definition_1: favourable, propitious, advantageous, prosperous, commodious; — է, it is favourable; it is time, it is the favourable moment; — ելք, happy issue.

Title: Յաջողակ
Definition_1: adroit, clever, skilful, expert, capable, apt; industrious; nimble, expeditious, quick, alert; cf. Յաջող; cf. Ձեռն.

Title: Յաջողակաբար
Definition_1: adroitly, dexterously, cleverly, skilfully, expertly, capably.

Title: Յաջողակութիւն
Definition_1: dexterity, address, cleverness, aptitude, ingenuity, ability, skill, expertness.

Title: Յաջողեմ
Definition_1: to prosper, to make prosperous, to favour, to second, to facilitate; to direct, to govern; to do, to operate, to act; —եաց մեզ ըստ բաղդի տեսանել, we were so fortunate as to see.

Title: Յաջողիմ
Definition_1: to prosper, to be prosperous, successful or fortunate, to have great success, to thrive, to succeed in, to contrive to, to get on prosperously, to reach or attain one's aim, to come to a good issue, to terminate propitiously; — ի վեր քան զակնկալութիւն or զկարծիս, to succeed against all probability; ոչ-, չ-, to be unsuccessful, to fail, to miss one's aim, to be baffled, to miscarry, to be greatly disappointed; յաջողեսցին, յաջողեսցի քեզ, you will fully succeed; all will be well with you.

Title: Յաջողութիւն
Definition_1: success, prosperity, good luck or fortune, thriving, happy state of affairs; efficacy, virtue; convenience, leisure, ease; opportunity, occasion; —ք, achievements, exploits, heroic acts; յաջողութեամբ, successfully, with success; — ի դէպ գալ ումեք, to be favoured, befriended; — ըստ բաղդի լեալ նմա, fortune befriended him, he had the fortune to; cf. Ըմպեմ.

Title: Յաջողումն
Definition_1: cf. Յաջողութիւն; — տալ, to ensure the success of.

Title: Յաջորդ
Definition_2: following, next; succeeding, subsequent, posterior; —ք, posterity.

Title: Յաջորդաբար
Definition_1: successively, consecutively, one after the other.

Title: Յաջորդեմ
Definition_1: to cause to succeed, to replace;

Title: Յաջորդիմ
Definition_1: to succeed, to come after, to follow next, to take the place of; to inherit, to stand next heir; to follow, to ensue, to result, to spring or proceed from.

Title: Յաջորդութիւն
Definition_1: succession; inheritance; continuation, order, series; — իրաց, series of affairs; — աղետից, եղեռնութեանց, succession, concatenation, series of misfortunes, of crimes.

Title: Յառաջս
Definition_3: before, in front, over against; previously, formerly, heretofore; first, at first, at the commencement; —, եւ —, afterwards, at a later period, in the sequel, eventually;
Definition_4: — քան, before, ere; — քան զարեւ, before the sun was; — քան զամենայն, first, first of all, in the first place, before all things, first and foremost; — ժամանակաւ, anciently, formerly, long since, in days of yore; ժամաւ —, an hour before; — եւ զկնի, before and behind; ոչ — ոչ զկնի, neither before nor behind; — կոյս, forward; — բերել, to bring before, to present; to produce, to cause, to engender, to occasion; to allege, to adduce, to quote, to cite; — բղխել or գալ, to derive, to come or proceed from, to emanate; to ensue, to result, to be produced or born from; — անցանել, to make progress, to improve; — ունել, to present for choice; — առնուլ, to adduce, to draw, to bring; — կալ, կալ —, — մատչել, to present oneself, to come forward; — մատչել, to advance further; — հետեւել, to precede, to escort, to convoy; — մատուցանել, to cause to advance or to progress; to raise, to elevate, to promote; to bring to an issue; — երթալ, to advance, to gain ground, to progress, to improve; — ածել, to continue, to go on; — վարել զբանսն, to gather up the broken thread of conversation, to continue, to go on to say, to proceed in a discourse, to resume; անդր եւս — տանել, to push beyond, to stretch too far; — արկանել, —ն դնել, to propose, to put forward; — իսկ ասացի, I said already.

Title: Յառաջաբաժին
Definition_1: privilege, prerogative, special grant or endowment.

Title: Յառաջաբան
Definition_1: preface, prologue, preliminary dissertation, prefatory discourse, preamble, exordium, prelude, prolegomena;

Title: Յառաջաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak first; to open the proceedings; to make a preface or introduction; to give as a specimen.

Title: Յառաջաբանութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Յառաջաբան; the being the first to speak; prediction.

Title: Յառաջաբերեմ
Definition_2: to be produced; to advance, to progress.

Title: Յառաջագահ
Definition_1: placed in the chief seat, seated in the highest place;
Definition_2: president; —ք, precedence, primacy, the first, highest or most honourable place.

Title: Յառաջագոյն
Definition_2: before, heretofore, beforehand, antecedently, previously; formerly, anciently; — աւուրբք, some days before; — քան, before; ի —գունէ, a priori.

Title: Յառաջագրեմ
Definition_1: to write about or treat of antecedently;

Title: Յառաջադաս
Definition_1: prior, placed before, having the precedence; pre-eminent; foregoing, precedent.

Title: Յառաջադէմ
Definition_3: coryphaeus; proficient; — է, he is advancing in his studies; երթալ — եւ մեծանալ, to improve; to increase in prosperity; իրք առնն — յաջողէին, that man prospered greatly.

Title: Յառաջադիմեմ
Definition_1: to advance, to go forward, to progress, to make progress, to profit, to succeed.

Title: Յառաջադրեմ
Definition_1: to set before, to propound; to propose;
Definition_2: to purpose, to project, to devise, to form a design or resolution.

Title: Յառաջախաղ
Definition_1: foregoing; progressive; — գունդ, advanced guard, vanguard.

Title: Յառաջախոհ
Definition_1: premeditating, deliberating beforehand; premeditated; — լինել, to premeditate; to provide.

Title: Յառաջախօս
Definition_1: foretelling, predicting; presuming to speak first; pert, petulant, saucy, rash.

Title: Յառաջակատար
Definition_1: Perfect from all eternity; done or finished before.

Title: Յառաջակարգ
Definition_1: pre-ordained, destined; decreed; first in order.

Title: Յառաջակաց
Definition_1: present, assisting; first in order or rank, primary, principal, chief; coryphaeus.

Title: Յառաջակողմն
Definition_1: the first place; the front, the fore part.

Title: Յառաջահայեաց
Definition_1: provident, prudent, cautious; — լինել, to foresee.

Title: Յառաջամատոյց
Definition_1: standing forward, presenting or offering oneself, eager, forward, earnest, assiduous;
Definition_2: competitor; — լինել, to advance, to present or offer oneself, to be forward, eager, warm.

Title: Յառաջամարտիչ
Definition_1: skirmisher; champion; — զօրք, the flower of the army.

Title: Յառաջամիտ
Definition_1: generous, liberal; voluntary; — լինել, to offer, to give freely or spontaneously; to be full of good-will, ardour or eagerness.

Title: Յառաջամուխ
Definition_1: in pushing forward, in advancing; — երթալ, to open away through and advance before all.

Title: Յառաջանամ
Definition_1: to advance, to go or move forward, to precede, to walk on; to advance, to progress, to improve; to have beginning, rise or origin, to be born.

Title: Յառաջապահ
Definition_1: advanced post, sentry, sentinel; out-post, out-picket;

Title: Յառաջապատուեմ
Definition_1: to prefer, esteem or honour more.

Title: Յառաջատեմ
Definition_1: to advance, to surpass; cf. Յառաջատիմ.

Title: Յառաջատես
Definition_1: foreseeing; provident; cf. Զգուշութիւն; — լինել, to foresee.

Title: Յառաջատիմ
Definition_1: to advance, to progress, to improve; to outstrip, to surpass, to excel; to push into, to penetrate.

Title: Յառաջատութիւն
Definition_2: progression; — հասակի, growth, increase; — ի պատուի, promotion; ի վատթարն —, getting worse, deterioration; demoralization.

Title: Յառաջիմ
Definition_1: to precede, to forego, to go or march before; to be or get before, to advance, to move or go forward; to arrive before, to anticipate; to govern, to lead, to guide; ժամացոյց իմ —ջէ, my watch goes too fast; —ջէ գործն, the work is progressing.

Title: Յառաջեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to advance, to push on, to urge on, to bring or drive forward, to accelerate, to quicken; to cause to advance, to help on.

Title: Յառաջընթաց
Definition_2: fore-runner, precursor, outrider; antecessor, predecessor; — լինել, to precede, to forego, to fore-run, to outride.

Title: Յառաջընծայ
Definition_3: the first proselyte.

Title: Յառաջուստ
Definition_1: before, on the front or front part.

Title: Յառեմ
Definition_1: to hold or stretch out or forth; to push or drive in, to cause to enter or penetrate, to fix in; — զաչս or զակն, to look at fixedly, to rivet one's gaze on, to gaze earnestly on, to have the eyes fastened upon; — զգլուխն ընդ պատուհանն, to face, to come to the window, to look out, to present oneself, to appear; — զձեռս, to stretch forth one's hand.

Title: Յառիմ
Definition_1: to stretch out the head to see; to stretch, to extend, to thrust; to fasten or stick on, to be fixed or fastened on, to heed to dwell on; — մտօք, ի խորհուրդս, to contemplate, to speculate upon, to meditate or consider attentively, to penetrate, to examine thoroughly; — յոք, յառեալ կալ or հայել յոք, to fix the eyes or the gate on a person; — ի դուզնաքեայս, to be fond of trifles; աչք իւր անքթիթ յառեալ կային ի քաջազն, his eyes were fastened on that brave man.

Title: Յառնեմ
Definition_1:
to rise, to arise, to get up, to rise or stand up, to rise again; to awake, to be roused, to wake out of sleep; to resuscitate, to come to life again, to live again; — ի մեռելոց, to rise from the dead; — ի վերայ, — ընդդէմ, —ոսոխ հակառակ ուրուք, to rise against, to rebel or stand up against, to revolt, to mutiny; անդրէն —, to rise anew, to get up again; յարեաւ միւս եւս խնդիր, another question arose; արի՛, arise !
; օ՛ն արիք, get up !
արիք ընդառաջ նրան, go to meet him; յարեաւ յաթոռոյն, he rose from his seat, he got up from his chair.

Title: Յատակ
Definition_1: bottom; pavement; floor; ground, earth; the buttocks; — հայրենի or հայրենեաց, native land or country, birth-place, home; — գետոց, canal, bed of a river; — աղիւսակերտ, brick pavement; — սալայատակ, stone pavement; — նաւու, keel of a ship; առ —աւ կործանել, քանդել մինչեւ ց— or —ս, to raze to the ground, to level or lay even with the ground, to demolish, to raze or pull down; to sap, to undermine; լի լինել գետոյն յամ —ս իւր, to be swelled very high, to rise, to swell beyond, to overflow.

Title: Յատակաբաց
Definition_1: of which the bottom or bed is exposed; — բաժանել զծով, to divide the sea and lay bare its bed.

Title: Յատակագիծ
Definition_1: plan; առնուլ զ— քաղաքի, to trace or take the plan of a town.

Title: Յատակեմ
Definition_1: to raze to the ground, to cast down, to dismantle, to cast to the earth, to overthrow, to destroy, to demolish utterly;
Definition_2: to exterminate, to annihilate, to kill, to cause to perish; to pave, to flag, to cover with pavement.

Title: Յատեմ
Definition_1: to prune, to dress, to lop, to trim, to clip.

Title: Յատկապատում
Definition_1: precise, narrated in detail, detailed, particularized.

Title: Յատկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to appropriate, to appropriate to oneself, to make one's own.

Title: Յատկութիւն
Definition_1: property, attribute, particular, peculiarity, peculiar character; — լեզուի, the character or genius of a language.

Title: Յատուկ
Definition_1: proper, own, particular, special, peculiar, private; essential, natural; alone, separate; singular, unexampled, alone of its kind; cutting, sharp, taunting (answer);

Title: Յար
Definition_1: adjacent, adjoining, contiguous, next, attached, joined; equal, conformable;
Definition_2: always, continually, incessantly; — եւ նման, — եւ յարմար, quite alike, resembling; — միանգամայն, all at once; — եւեթ, — եւ հանապազ, successively, often, frequently, very often, many times.

Title: Յարաբարդեմ
Definition_1: to heap up, to agglomerate; to compound; to add.

Title: Յարաբերութիւն
Definition_1: relation, analogy, connexion, affinity, dependence, pertinence; ունել —, to relate to, to concern, to belong to, to be connected with.

Title: Յարագեմ
Definition_1: to insolate, to expose to the sun or to the open air; to hang.

Title: Յարագոմ
Definition_1: to be near or present, to assist.

Title: Յարադրեմ
Definition_1: to appose, to set, to subjoin, to add, to append, to affix.

Title: Յարաժամ
Definition_2: at every hour, at all times, always, evermore, continually.

Title: Յարախառնիմ
Definition_1: to be joined, united, mixed together.

Title: Յարածուփ
Definition_1: always fluctuating, agitated, troubled; — ի փրփրադէզ կոհակաց, ever beaten by the foaming waves.

Title: Յարակայ
Definition_3: epact;
Definition_4: preter-imperfect;

Title: Յարակայեմ
Definition_1: to confirm, to affirm; to eternize, to perpetuate.

Title: Յարակայիմ
Definition_1: to be permanent, stable, to continue, to last, to be perpetual, to endure for ever.

Title: Յարակարգեմ
Definition_1: to add, to subjoin, to conjoin.

Title: Յարակից
Definition_1: adjoining, contiguous, joined, united, connected; accessory;
Definition_2: — մասնիկ, particle, affix, suffix; —ք, accessories; attendant circumstances.

Title: Յարակցեմ
Definition_1: to join, to conjoin, to connect, to league.

Title: Յարակցիմ
Definition_1: to be joined, united, conjoined or connected.

Title: Յարակցութիւն
Definition_1: con junction, connexion, coherence, cohesion, adhesion;
Definition_3: — ընտրական, elective affinity.

Title: Յարահետեւիմ
Definition_1: to follow always, inseparably to accompany.

Title: Յարահիւսեմ
Definition_1: to join, to compound, to connect, to affix; to weave, to interwine.

Title: Յարաձգեմ
Definition_1: to continue, to prolong, to cause to last.

Title: Յարաճօճ
Definition_1: always oscillating or shaking; troubled or agitated continually.

Title: Յարամուր
Definition_1: very solid, firm; thick; dark, obscure; յարամրի ի ներքո մտանել, to obtrude or introduce oneself by stealth, to insinuate or worm oneself into.

Title: Յարանամ
Definition_1: to continue, to last, to remain, to persevere, to be perpetuated; to join, to unite, to be added.

Title: Յարանուանեմ
Definition_1: to denominate, to name, to call.

Title: Յարանունութիւն
Definition_1: denomination; affinity or resemblance of words, paronomasia.

Title: Յարառոցեմ
Definition_1: to assume together; to employ, to make use of continually.

Title: Յարատեւակ
Definition_1: persevering, steadfast, permanent, everlasting; eternal, perpetual, endless.

Title: Յարատեւիմ
Definition_1: to persevere, to continue, to remain, to persist, to last, to subsist, to perpetuate.

Title: Յարատեւութիւն
Definition_1: perseverance, assiduity; perpetuity, endless continuity, everlastingness.

Title: Յարարկանեմ
Definition_1: to appose, to subjoin, to add; to confront.

Title: Յարացոյց
Definition_1: example, model; idea, design; prototype; paradigm.

Title: Յարգ
Definition_1: price, value; valuation, estimation; esteem, consideration, high value or opinion, credit, merit, repute, reputation, fame; importance, weight; — դրամոյ, standard, quality.

Title: Յարգանք
Definition_1: respect, veneration, deference, reverence, consideration, esteem, regard; honour; compliments.

Title: Յարգեմ
Definition_1: to respect, to pay respect to, to honour, to render honour, to revere, to think very highly of, to value highly; to esteem, to value, to prize, to make much of, to account, to consider; to exercise, to employ, to make use of, to turn to account; — զհանճար, զտաղանդ, to employ or exercise one's talents.

Title: Յարգոյ
Definition_1: respectable, honourable, estimable, dear, precious, commendable; good; reverend; — դահեկան, current money; օր —գոյ, feast-day.

Title: Յարդ
Definition_1: straw; — մանրեալ, chopped or small -; —իւ պատել, լնուլ, to cover, fill or stuff with -; ծրարել —իւ, to pack in -.

Title: Յարդ
Definition_1: structure, form, ornament; ի — եւ ի զարդ գալ, to be formed; ի զարդ եւ ի — եւ ի կերպարանս ածել, to shape or form and embellish.

Title: Յարդալից
Definition_1: full of straw; — անկողին, straw-mattress, straw-bed.

Title: Յարդար
Definition_1: fitted up, adorned, furnished, arranged, contrived.

Title: Յարդարեմ
Definition_1: to fit up, to arrange, to adjust, to put in order; to fine, to refine; to form, to fashion, to dispose; to adorn, to embellish; to ameliorate, to improve, to better the condition; to make, to do;
Definition_2: to tune, to put in tune, to accord; — զսեղան, զճաշ, to get ready, to prepare, to get dinner ready; — զանկողին, to make the bed; — զսենեակ, to do the room; — զեղնգունս, to pare one's nails; — զճրագ, to snuf the candle; — զհերս, to adjust, dress or deck one's hair; — զելս իրացն, to organize, to regulate, to put in order; ճակատ առ ճակատ —եալ, drawn out in battle-array; սեղան կազմ եւ —եալ, table ready covered, a well spread table.

Title: Յարդարիչ
Definition_1: putting or setting in order, fitting up, preparing; adorning;

Title: Յարդարումն
Definition_1: dressing, fitting up, arrangement, adjustment; ornament, embellishment.

Title: Յարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to join, to attach, to tie, to annex, to affix, to add; to attribute, to impute, to ascribe; to admit to; արատ ինչ — յոք, to spot, to stain, to maculate, to defame; յինքն —, to become attached to.

Title: Յարիմ
Definition_1: to be joined, united, attached to, to adhere;
Definition_2: to adhere, to be attached to; — յոք, to take the part of, to follow, to keep company with, to stand by the flag of; — ի կարծիս, ի կողմն, to embrace an opinion, to go over to the opinion, to adopt, to side with, to join a party; — ի սէր կանանց, to abandon oneself to lasciviousness.

Title: Յարեւանամ
Definition_1: to follow, to keep close to.

Title: Յարկ
Definition_2: roof-tree, roof, home, house; shelter, refuge, cover; — բնակութեան, abode, dwelling;
Definition_3: ընդ —աւ, under shelter, under cover, in security, secure or sheltered from; — ի վիմի, tomb, sepulchre; բառնալ զ—ն, to unroof.

Title: Յարկաբնակ
Definition_1: dwelling under a roof; — ծածուկ, roofed, covered by a roof; under cover or shelter; buried in ruins.

Title: Յարկակից
Definition_1: dwelling under the same roof, in the same house, cohabiting.

Title: Յարկեմ
Definition_1: to roof a building, to put the roof on; to spread like a pavilion; to cover, to hide; ի վերայ քո որդն յարկցի, the worms will cover thee.

Title: Յարկիչ
Definition_1: roofer; — կղմնտրօք, tiler; — հերձաքարիւ, slater; — յարդիւ, thatcher.

Title: Յարձակ յարձակ
Definition_1: frankly, boldly, intrepidly; — խաղալ, to advance rapidly, at double step.

Title: Յարձակիմ
Definition_1: to assail, to affront, to attack, to storm the breach; to dash, rush or fall upon, to pounce upon with violence, to dart or fall on; — ի ներքս, to enter violently, forcibly, impetuously; արտաքս —, to make a sortie; — ի դարանացն, to leap from one's hiding-place; cf. Զհետ; — յոք, to attack one; to affront, to provoke; յիրեարս —, to attack each other, to fall upon one another.

Title: Յարձակումն
Definition_1: assault, attack; aggression, invasion; առնուլ —կմամբ, to storm, to carry by storm; յինքն ընդունել զ— ուրուք, to sustain an assault, to resist an attack.

Title: Յարմար
Definition_1: befitting, suitable, fit, proper, congruous, decorous; commodious, easy; competent, sufficient; capable, clever, apt, fit, qualified;

Title: Յարմարավէպ
Definition_1: told or related in a befitting manner.

Title: Յարմարեմ
Definition_1: to adapt, to make proper or fit, to qualify, to proportion, to accommodate, to arrange, to adjust;
Definition_2: to tune, to accord, to put in tune.

Title: Յարմարիմ
Definition_1: to suit, to be proper or suitable, to befit, to become; to match, to square with, to sort; to correspond, to answer; to agree, to be adapted.

Title: Յարմարումն
Definition_1: fitness, suitableness, adaptability, conformity, analogy, congruity, concordance; proportion, symmetry; attitude, adaptation, application; aptitude, disposition, capacity, ability, sufficiency;

Title: Յարմնիմ
Definition_1: to root, to take root, to last, to continue, to be permanent.

Title: Յարնչիմ
Definition_1: to relate or belong to, to concern, to regard.

Title: Յարութիւն
Definition_2: elation, puffing up, pride, haughtiness; օր յարութեան, sunday.

Title: Յարութիւնակից
Definition_1: sharing or participating in the resurrection.

Title: Յարումն
Definition_3: aggregation.

Title: Յարուցանեմ
Definition_1: to raise, to raise up, to cause to appear; to erect, to set upright; to awake, to wake up, to arouse; to revive, to resuscitate, to bring to life again; to stir up, to excite, to suscitate, to cause to revolt, to agitate, to move, to provoke; to raise, to build, to elevate, to erect, to set up, to construct; — զաւակ, to give sons or posterity; զօր —, to raise troops, to make levies of soldiers; — հողմ ի ծովու, to cause a wind to blow on the sea; — վրէժխնդրութիւն, to take revenge or vengeance; — բանս, to circulate false reports; — զամբաստանութիւն, to accuse, to charge; cf. Թշնամի.

Title: Յաւականիմ
Definition_1: to last, to endure, to be prolonged or protracted.

Title: Յաւակնիմ
Definition_1: to assume, to arrogate, to take too much on oneself, to pretend to, to presume.

Title: Յաւանակ
Definition_1: ass' foal or colt, young donkey or ass.

Title: Յաւանակական
Definition_1: proper to foals or colts; կառք —ք, chariot races for yearlings at the Olympic games.

Title: Յաւելուած
Definition_1: addition, increase, overplus, surplus, accession, augmentation; rest, residue; — գրոց, մատենից, addition, supplement, appendix; — չարեաց, redundant malice; —ք որովայնի, excrement; թափել զ—ս որովայնի, to ease oneself, to go to stool.

Title: Յաւելում
Definition_1: to add, to increase, to augment; to join, to adjoin, to insert, to interpolate, to apply, to supply; to reckon, to add up; — խօսել, to repeat, to say again, to reply, to rejoin; — ի զօրութիւն, to redouble one's strength; — ոյժ ումեք, to sustain another's efforts; — զինչս իւր, to increase one's wealth; աւուրս յաւուրս —, to lengthen life; — զվարձս ծառայի, to raise the wages of a domestic; յաւել յիս զօրութիւն, it gave me new strength; եւ յաւել ծնանել, and then brought forth; ոչ եւս յաւելից անիծանել, will never curse again; մի եւս յաւելուցուք տեսանել զերեսս իմ, see my face no more.

Title: Յաւելում
Definition_1: to augment, to be multiplied, to grow, to increase, to be enlarged; to adhere to, to go over to, to add, to join, to incorporate; մեռաւ եւ յաւելաւ յազգ իւր, he died and was gathered to his fathers; cf. Հայր.

Title: Յաւէժազուարճ
Definition_1: always cheerful, ever pleasing; always green.

Title: Յաւէժանամ
Definition_1: to be perpetual, to last for ever.

Title: Յաւէժացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to perpetuate, to eternize, to immortalize.

Title: Յաւէտ
Definition_1: more; at most; much more, a great deal, better; rather, more worth while, so much the better, still more; — զի, above all, principally, especially;
Definition_2: cf. Յաւէժ; — կամ նուազ, more or less.

Title: Յաւէրժահարսն
Definition_1: nymph; — անտառաց, wood fairy, dryad, hamadryad.

Title: Յաւիտեան
Definition_2: —, —ս, always, perpetually, eternally; —ենից, ի —ենից, ab eterno, from all eternity, since the world is world; ի —ենից ոք ոչ լուաւ, such a thing was never heard of since the world began; —ս —ենից, for ever and ever, to all ages, ever world without end, everlastingly, eternally; հանդերձեալ —, future life; — աշխարհի, duration of the world.

Title: Յաւիտենադիր
Definition_1: established from the beginning of the world, from time immemorial, perpetual, eternal.

Title: Յաւիտենական
Definition_1: eternal, perpetual, uncreate, immortal, without end; — կեանք, immortal life; — թշնամութիւն, bitter, irreconcilable, implacable or eternal enmity; —ն, the Eternal, the Everlasting One.

Title: Յափշտակեմ
Definition_1: to ravish, to carry off by force, to carry away with violence, to snatch, to bear off; to usurp; to rob, to pillage, to ravage, to plunder; — զմիտս, to charm, to enchant, to attract, to ravish or carry away the senses; — զանձն, to escape, to be saved or liberated; — զսիրտ, to enrapture, to captivate or enslave the heart; յինքն —, to appropriate, to usurp, to occupy ore possess illegally.

Title: Յափշտակիմ
Definition_1: to be ravished, carried away; ravaged; — մտօք, to fall into extasies or raptures; — կեալ մինչեւ յերրորդ երկնից, caught up to the third heaven; — կեալ յանձնէ ի բաց, enraptured, extatic, beside oneself;
Definition_2: — կելով, hastily, in a hurry, precipitately.

Title: Յափշտակող
Definition_3: charming, delightful, ravishing, bewitching.

Title: Յափշտակութիւն
Definition_1: ravishing, carrying off or away, ravage, usurpation, depredation; rapacity, rapine; — կնոջ, աղջկան, rape, abduction; — մտաց, enthusiasm, transport; extasy, rapture, ravishment; revery; — իրաւանց եւ արդարութեան, corrupt justice; լինել ի —, to be plundered, pillaged, sacked; մատնել ի —, to give up pillage.

Title: Յափուցանեմ
Definition_1: to quench, slake or allay thirst; to exhaust.

Title: Յափսիթերս երթամ
Definition_1: to crawl along; to go on all fours, on hands and feet; — խաղալ, to tumble, to fall head over heels, to turn a somersault.

Title: Յափրանամ
Definition_1: to get tired or sick of, to be disgusted, to have lost all relish for, to be squeamish, overfastidious.

Title: Յափրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to glut, to stuff, to surfeit; to tire of, to sicken, to disgust with, to cause to loathe.

Title: Յեզդիմ
Definition_1: dry the waters off the earth.

Title: Յեղակարծ
Definition_2: —, —ում or —ում ժամու, unexpectedly, unawares; suddenly, all at once; —ում պահու ի վերայ հասանել, to surprise, to take by surprise.

Title: Յեղանակ
Definition_1:
cf. Եղանակ; season; chapter; custom, habit, deportment, bearing, manners; աղջիկ ոմն —աւ գովելի, a praiseworthy girl; —աւ իմն, in any manner or way, anywise; որով —աւ, how ? in what manner ?
ընդ քանի —ս, in how many ways ?
ընդ երկուց —աց, in two ways; ընդ հինգ —ս, in five ways; եւ ոչ միով —աւ, in nowise; —աւ կոչման նրան, according to his vocation; որով or որպիսի եւ իցէ —աւ, in whatever way it be, in all ways, some way or other.

Title: Յեղանակեմ
Definition_1: to change, to alter, to vary, to diversify; to remodel; to convert; to repeat, to reiterate, to say again; to trill, to warble, to sing harmoniously.

Title: Յեղաշրջեմ
Definition_1: to turn upside down, to turn topsy turvy, to upset, to overset, to turn over, to change, to convert, to transmute.

Title: Յեղափոխ
Definition_1: subject to change, variable, mutable, fickle, inconstant; — արկածք, vicissitude, ups and downs; — պատերազմունք, chronic warfare.

Title: Յեղափոխեմ
Definition_1: to convert, to change, to transform; to degenerate; to translate.

Title: Յեղափոխութիւն
Definition_1: change, mutation, conversion, transformation, transmutation; revolution; vicissitude; alternation.

Title: Յեղափոխումն
Definition_1: cf. Յեղափոխութիւն; catastrophe; շրջաբերական —, roving, wandering.

Title: Յեղյեղեմ
Definition_1: to change, to convert, to transmute; to repeat, to re-iterate, to rehearse, to inculcate; to translate; — ի մտի, to turn over, to revolve in one's mind, to think over again, to reconsider; to ruminate, to ponder, to muse on; ստէպ —, վեր ի վայր —, to repeat eternally the same thing, to return often on the same subject, to twaddle, to harp always on the same string, to be ever talking about.

Title: Յեղյեղուկ
Definition_1: changing often, mutable, variable, fickle, inconstant, unstable, fleeting, flighty, unsteady, volatile; — լեզուաւ, double-tongued, double-dealer; —ս արկանել, to make one's voice often heard.

Title: Յեղյեղումն
Definition_1: change, alteration, mutation, conversion; — խօսից, tautology, repetition; ոտից —, step, pace; յեղյեղմունք արեգական, the tropics; յեղյեղմունք ժամանակաց, changes or vicissitudes of the seasons.

Title: Յեղում
Definition_1: to change, to transmute; to translate; — ի հայ բան or լեզու, to translate into Armenian, or Haiganian;

Title: Յեղումն
Definition_1: cf. Յեղյեղումն; — սրոյ, rotation of a sword; յեղմունք լուսնոյ, the phases of the moon.

Title: Յենարան
Definition_2: point of support, fulcrum, prop; — նկարչի, easel; maulstick; — աթոռոյ կամ ձեռաց, the arm or back of a chair; — սանդղոց, bannister of a staircase; — կառաց, the arm-rests of a carriage; աթոռ —աւ, cf. Թիկնաթոռ.

Title: Յենում
Definition_1: to lean upon, on or against;
Definition_2: to confide in, to rely on, to trust, to put one's trust or confidence in, to be based or grounded on;
Definition_3: cf. Յեցուցանեմ; — յորմն, to lean against the wall; —ի ծառ, to lean or set one's back against a tree; — արմկամբ, to lean on one's elbow; to rest one's elbows on; — ի ցուպ, to lean upon a stick; կալ դատարկ յեցեալ յինչ, to loll;
Definition_4: — ի ցուպ եղեգնեայ, to trust to a broken reed, to hope in, to rely or depend upon one who has no power, no interest; — յոք, to rely, to depend upon a man's power, credit or protection; — ի ծերութիւն, to advance or grow in years, to age, to become or get old; — ի հպարտութիւն ամբարտաւանութեան, to grow proud, to be puffed up; — ի վաղակաւորն, to unsheathe, to draw a sword; ամեն ինչ ի նա յեցեալ կայ, all depends upon him, all hope is in him; յեցի՛ր յիս, lean upon me.

Title: Յեռում
Definition_1: to set, to mount, to enchase, to stud; to fit in, to mortise; to connect, to join, to link, to concatenate, to tie, to attach; to insert, to interpolate, to intercalate; to compose, to weave, to entwine; — մարգարիտս, to string pearls; — ընդ պատուհանն, to loll out of window; — առ եղբայր իւր, to visit one's brother, to pay him a visit.

Title: Յեռումն
Definition_1: setting, mounting, enchasing; fitting in, mortising; insertion, intercalation; connexion, concatenation.

Title: Յեսան
Definition_1: whetstone; — ածելւոյ, զմելինի, hone; — անուաձեւ, grindstone.

Title: Յեսանասուր
Definition_1: sharpened, whetted; pointed, sharp; սուսեր —, trenchant sword.

Title: Յեսանեմ
Definition_1: to grind, to sharpen, to whet, to set.

Title: Յետ
Definition_1: after, since, afterwards; — զատկի, after Easter; — տրայիանոսի, after Trajan; — երկուց ամաց, after two years; — գալոյ քո, after or since your arrival; — մեկնելոյ քո, since you set out; — բազում ժամանակաց, a long time since; — սակաւուց, a short time since, shortly after; — այսորիկ, — այնորիկ, after that, since that time, then, since, afterwards, after; — որոյ, after that;
Definition_2: back; — յառաջ, before and behind; ի — ընկենուլ, to lay aside; — դարձուցանել, to bring back; — դառնալ, to return, to come back; — կալ, to recede from, to desist; — հայիլ, to look back; — ընթադրել, to retort, to repulse, to repel.

Title: Յետադարձ
Definition_1: recurrent; retrograde; — շարժումն, — motion or movement.

Title: Յետադիմեմ
Definition_1: to go backward instead of forward; to unlearn, to go back, to make no progress.

Title: Յետախաղամ
Definition_1: to retrograde, to retrocede, to go backwards.

Title: Յետակողմն
Definition_1: poop, stern on a ship; cf. Խելք.

Title: Յետահարկիմ
Definition_1: to fall or draw back, to withdraw, to retrocede.

Title: Յետին
Definition_1: last, furthest, ulterior, posterior; lowest, meanest; extreme, utmost, greatest, utter, uttermost; —ք, posterity; — օր, the day of judgment, doomsday; — չքաւորութիւն, utter misery, extreme poverty; — կարօտութիւն, extreme need; — կողմն, cf. Յետակողմն.

Title: Յետկոյս
Definition_1: behind, hind part, back; —կուսէ, behind, from behind; —կուսէ կալ, to remain or stay behind; — ձգել, to put in the last place.

Title: Յետնիմ
Definition_1: to be in arrears, behindhand; to stop, to tarry, to stay or lag behind; to want, to deprive oneself of; to be in a state of privation, to be destitute.

Title: Յետնորդ
Definition_1: last; vile; destitute; —ք ոմանք երեւին, they shew themselves to be the basest among men.

Title: Յետոյ
Definition_2: after, then, since, afterwards, subsequently, posterior to, after that; — կողմանէ, backward; behind, from behind; — հուսկ, — յետուստ or ուրեմն, at last, finally, at length, in fine, in conclusion; — եւ առաջոյ, behind and before; — ապա, after; — ձերմէ, behind or after you; — գտանիլ, to be deprived of.

Title: Յետոյք
Definition_1: back, fundament, arse, buttocks, bottom, breech;
Definition_2: things which are behind; — անասնոց, rump, hind-quarter, croup; — հաւու, rump.

Title: Յետուստ
Definition_3: back, the buttocks;
Definition_4: nakedness; — ուրեմն, lastly; — կողմանէ, behind, from behind.

Title: Յետս
Definition_2: walking backwards; — — չոգան, they fell back; — ընդդէմ, backward; in an opposite sense, in the contrary directions, against the grain, in a wrong sense or way, contrariwise;
Definition_3: contrary, against, opposite, inverse; ձախողակի — ընդէմքն պատահեաց նմա, every thing went wrong with him; fortune was against him; — or — ընդդէմ դառնալ, to turn back, to retrace one's steps, to return, to go or come back; կապել զձեռս —, to tie the hands behind one; cf. Ձեռն; — կալ, կասել, to cease, to stop; to abandon, to leave; — կացուցանել, to hinder, to deter, to divert from; — հարկանել, to reject, to refuse, to confute, to disprove; — ընկենուլ, to reject, to contemn, to despise; — տանել, to abandon, to leave; — ունել, to hinder, to impede, to divert from; ձեռս —, with the hands tied behind.

Title: Յետսամիտ
Definition_1: crossgrained, wrongheaded, perverse; foolish, stolid, half mad.

Title: Յերազիմ
Definition_1: to dream, to have a dream or vision; to rave, to be light-headed; — յարթմնի, to dream wide awake; երազովք —, to dream dreams; — ստէպ, to have many unquiet dreams; երազ յերազեցաւ ինձ, I have dreamed.

Title: Յերազմոյն
Definition_1: subject to dreams, full of dreams or fancies.

Title: Յերասան
Definition_1: inflammation or sores produced by the saddle from excess of riding; horse man's gonorrhea.

Title: Յերասանամ
Definition_1: to be sore from too much riding.

Title: Յերիւրեմ
Definition_1: to accommodate, to suit, to arrange, to adjust; to form, to fashion, to give a relish or zest to; to compound, to compose, to combine; — զդէմս, to compose one's countenance.

Title: Յերկար
Definition_1: long; a long or great while or time; — հիւանդանալ, to have a long illness.

Title: Յերկարակեաց
Definition_1: longliving, long-lived; — լինել, to live long; — առնել, to lengthen life.

Title: Յերկարաձգեմ
Definition_1: cf. Յերկարեմ; — օր ի յօր, to procrastinate, to postpone or defer from day to day; —ձգեցան իրքն, that affair went on slowly.

Title: Յերկարեմ
Definition_1: to prolong, to prorogue, to delay, to put off, to protract, to spin out; ոչ — զկեանս իւր, to be short-lived; ոչ յերկարեսցէ աւուրս, let his days be few; առանց յերկարելոյ իսկ ասացից, in a word; զի՞ —, in short, in fine;

Title: Յերկարիմ
Definition_1: to be prolonged, to last, to continue, to remain permanently.

Title: Յերկուանամ
Definition_1: to doubt, to have doubts, to mistrust, to hesitate, to waver, to be in suspense; to suspect.

Title: Յեց
Definition_2: confided in or relied on; կալ — առ դրանն, to stop at the door; ընդ միմեանս հարեալ — գթովն խանդազատանաց, united by the bonds of mutual affection.

Title: Յեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to support, to shore or prop up.

Title: Յէ
Definition_1:
oh !
— մարգարէ, oh prophet!
— տառապեալ, ah wretch!

Title: Յիմար
Definition_1: out of one's senses, foolish, senseless, mad, crazy, silly; ծայրագոյն —, an arch-fool, an out-fool and out fool.

Title: Յիմարաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak like a madman, foolishly, crazily.

Title: Յիմարանամ
Definition_1: cf. Յիմարիմ; to fool, to play the fool.

Title: Յիմարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to drive mad, to distract, to dement; to infatuate, to charm, to bewitch, to fascinate, to bewilder; to intoxicate.

Title: Յիմարիմ
Definition_1: to lose one's senses, to go mad, to become foolish or deranged; — սիրով, ի սէր ուրուք, to fall violently in love with, to dote on, to be smitten with, to be passionately fond of; — ի գեղ ուրուք, to fall desperately in love with a person's beauty; — ի գութ երեսաց ուրուք, to be all flame for.

Title: Յիմարութիւն
Definition_1: alienation of mind, craziness, folly, madness; fatuity, silliness, simplicity; fury, intoxication; հոգի յիմարութեան, spirit of infatuation.

Title: Յինունք
Definition_1: the fifty days from Easter to Pentecost.

Title: Յիշատակ
Definition_1: remembrance, recollection, memory; reminiscence, commemoration, mention; memorial; monument; —աց արժանի, worthy of memory, memorable; — ննջեցելոց, commemoration of the dead; — սրբոց, Saints' days, commemoration days; զոհ —ի, sacrifice or oblation in memory of; հաց —ի, bread for a memorial; —աց դպիր, amanuensis, secretary; ի —, in memory of; առ իմոյ —ի, for my sake, in remembrance of me; աղօտ —, a confused recollection of; —աւ, by the memory of; առ ի —է, in memory of; as a memorial; — առնել, to mention, to make mention of; ածել ի —, to recall, to recall to mind; to remind of, to recall to the memory of; պահել զ—, to keep or treasure up the memory of; պրծանիլ ի յուշոյ —աց, to have forgotten, to have no recollection of, not to recollect more.

Title: Յիշատակարան
Definition_1: memory, archives, annals; sepulchre, monument; album; — մատենից, գրոց, brief epilogue.

Title: Յիշատակեմ
Definition_1: to remember, to recollect, to call to memory;
Definition_2: to mention, to make mention of; to remind, to put in mind.

Title: Յիշատակութիւն
Definition_1: mention, quotation; memory, reminiscence, remembrance, recollection; commemoration; — առնել, to mention; գալ ի —, to be mentioned.

Title: Յիշեմ
Definition_1:
to bear in mind, to call to mind, to remember, to recollect; to record; յիշեա զիս, remember me; don't forget me; յիշե՞ս, do you remember ?
չյիշեմ զանունն, I don't remember his name, I have forgotten his name.

Title: Յիշեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to put one in mind of, to remind, to recall to the memory of, to recollect, to remember, to bring to mind; to admonish, to warn.

Title: Յիշողութիւն
Definition_1: memory; cf. Յիշումն; սուր յիշողութիւն, a good or happy memory; տկար յիշողութիւն, unhappy memory.

Title: Յիշոց
Definition_1: improper and offensive words, abuse names, insult, contumely.

Title: Յիշոցնատու
Definition_1: using improper language, insulting, abusive, taunting, outrageous; — լինել, to call names, to abuse, to insult, to outrage, to injury, to revile, to use like a blackguard.

Title: Յիշոցատուութիւն
Definition_1: abusive language, foul offence, low or blackguard abuse.

Title: Յիսնակ
Definition_1: fifty; period or number of fifty; Advent.

Title: Յիսնամեան
Definition_1: of fifty years; fifty years old; —մեայ ժամանակ, jubilee.

Title: Յիսներեակ
Definition_1: fiftieth; period of fifty days; Pentecost; jubilee.

Title: Յիսներորդ
Definition_2: the Advent; ամն —, the fiftieth year, jubilee.

Title: Յիսնօրեայ
Definition_1: of fifty days; fifty days old.

Title: Յիսուսածին
Definition_1: Holy Virgin, Mother of our Lord.

Title: Յիսուսաւանդ
Definition_1: taught, commanded or established by Jesus.

Title: Յիրարկեմ
Definition_1: to try, to strive, to tax one's ingenuity.

Title: Յիրաւի
Definition_1: justly, deservedly; in truth, truly, surely, certainly, and indeed, in fact, yes.

Title: Յիրեմ
Definition_1: to attach, to connect, to unite; to stretch or hold out; to fix.

Title: Յղանամ
Definition_1: to conceive; to be pregnant, to be with child or young, to be in the family way.

Title: Յղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to get with young, to impregnate, to fecundate.

Title: Յղեկիր գահաւորակ
Definition_1: chair for lying in women; couch of misery.

Title: Յղեմ
Definition_1: to send to, to forward, to despatch; — զումեքէ, to send for, to send to search after.

Title: Յղի
Definition_1: big, pregnant, in the family way; — լինել, to be with a child or young.

Title: Յղկեմ
Definition_1: to rough-hew, to roughen down, to smooth, to plane, to polish; to burnish, to gloss;

Title: Յղութիւն
Definition_1: conception, pregnancy, the being with young; breeding; տօն Յղութեան, Feast of the Conception; անարատ —, Immaculate Conception.

Title: Յղփանամ
Definition_1: to overflow with, to run over; to gorge or glut oneself, to be filled, satisfied, crammed, stuffed; to be loaded with, to swim in plenty, to wallow or roll in wealth.

Title: Յղփացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to gorge, to glut, to surfeit, to stuff, to cram.

Title: Յղփութիւն
Definition_1: plenty, abundance, satiety, surfeit; կեալ ի Յղփութեան, to live in clover.

Title: Յշտող
Definition_1: impudent, insolent, saucy; thrifty, niggard, niggardish.

Title: Յո՞
Definition_1: where ? — երթաս ? where are you going ?

Title: Յոբելեան
Definition_2: jubilee, festivity, rejoicing; — ամ, year of jubilee.

Title: Յոգնաբար
Definition_1: in many ways or manners; often, many times.

Title: Յոգնաբիծ
Definition_1: full of stains or spots, very much stained or soiled.

Title: Յոգնաթիւ
Definition_1: in great numbers or quantities, very numerous, much, many.

Title: Յոգնաթշուառ
Definition_1: very wretched, unfortunate, oppressed by grief or misfortunes.

Title: Յոգնախումբ
Definition_1: assembled in great multitudes or flocks, very numerous.

Title: Յոգնակի
Definition_1: in the plural number; often, many times;

Title: Յոգնայարդար
Definition_1: well prepared, put in order, adjusted, dressed or adorned.

Title: Յոգնատեսակ
Definition_1: protean, of many forms or shapes, divers, varied, multiple.

Title: Յոլով
Definition_1: much, great, much of, a great deal of; —ք, many, several; —ք ի մարդկանէ, most men, most people, the generality of mankind; — անգամ, many a time, often.

Title: Յոլովագոյն
Definition_1: more; much more, in greater number;

Title: Յոլովածին
Definition_1: fecund, fertile, fruitful; հայր — ազգատոհմի, father of a numerous family; — աւագ արամբք, fruitful in great men.

Title: Յոլովանամ
Definition_1: to increase, to augment, to grow, to multiply.

Title: Յոլովեմ
Definition_1: to cause to abound or increase, to augment, to multiply;

Title: Յոլովութիւն
Definition_1: great number or quantity, multitude, abundance; plurality, multiplicity.

Title: Յողամ
Definition_1: to lie down negligently, to throw oneself down heedlessly, to sleep, to stretch oneself down, to repose; to observe, to watch, to spy, to be on the watch for, to waylay, to lie in wait for, to lay snares or ambushes.

Title: Յողացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render negligent; to make proud.

Title: Յողդողդ
Definition_1: not firm, weak, tottering, unstable, unsteady; inconstant, mutable, vacillating, wavering, versatile, fickle, volatile.

Title: Յողդողդեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to shake, to cause to totter, to waver, to be irresolute, to vacillate; to stir, to agitate, to trouble.

Title: Յոյզ
Definition_1: research, examination, investigation, inquiet; emotion, agitation, perturbation, trouble, confusion;
Definition_2: troubled, agitated; — սրտի, emotion; —ք խռովութեանց, troubles, broils; — եւ խնդիր, research, perquisition, chicane, pettifogging; ի —ս կրից, in the heat of passion; ի նախկին —ս ցասման, in the first impulse of indignation; — առնել, ի — առնուլ, լինել ի — եւ ի խնդիր, — եւ խնդիր առնել, to search into, to make researches, to investigate.

Title: Յոյժ
Definition_1: too, very, more, much, considerably, very much, a great deal; — —, more and more, extremely, exorbitantly, excessively, exceedingly.

Title: Յոյս
Definition_1: hope, hopes, expectation, longing; confidence, trust; դեռածին, հաւաստի, կենդանի, եռանդուն, մխիթարիչ, մեծ, կոյր —, renewed or reviving, well-grounded, lively, ardent, solacing, great, blind hope; ընդունայն, տկար, անստոյգ, պատիր or խաբէական, սուտ, խուսափու, անմիտ —, vain, weak, uncertain, delusive or deceitful, false, fleeting, foolish hope; նշոյլք յուսոյ, the rays of hope; բառնալ զ—, to take away or put out hope; զհետ գնալ սնոտի յուսոյ, to abandon oneself to chimerical hopes, to hunt a shadow; սնոտի յուսով պարարել, ի սնոտի — կապել, to nourish oneself with vain hopes; քաղցր յուսով պարարիլ, to hug oneself with the delightful hope; գեղեցիկ յուսով պարարել, թարթափեցուցանել զոք, to feed or entertain one with flattering hopes or chimeras, to keep one in suspense; to ridicule, to deride; վհատիլ ի յուսոյ, to lose hope; հատանել զ— իւր, to despair, to give up all hope, to be in despair; յուսով կեալ, to live in hopes; դնել զ— իւր ի վերայ ուրուք, to build on one's hopes; — տալ, to cause to conceive hopes, to give hope, to inspire with hopes; ի դերեւ հանել զ— ուրուք, to deceive one's hopes or expectations; լնուլ, կատարել զ— ուրուք, to fulfil a person's hopes; ծփել ընդ մէջ յուսոյ եւ երկիւղի, to hover between hope and fear; — է ինձ, I have some hopes; — մի այսպիսի է ինձ զի, I hope that, I am in hopes that; — իմ է, that is my only hope; փակեալ յամենայն յուսոյ ակնկալութեան, hopeless; — եւս շիջեալ էր յիս, hope died within me; բարձաւ ամենայն — փրկութեան, all hope of safety was lost; պակասեալ յամենայն յուսոյ փրկութեան, despairing of life; հատաւ — նրան, he despaired; հատաւ — մեր, our hope is vanished; դու ես միակ — իմ, all my hopes are in you; cf. Հատանիմ; արծարծել զ—, to revive hope.

Title: Յոյր
Definition_1: big, fat, plump, fat and lusty;

Title: Յոռանամ
Definition_1: to become wicked or contemptible, to grow or get worse and worse, to be deteriorated; to debase, demean, degrade or disgrace oneself, to degenerate, to fall away.

Title: Յոռեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make worse, to spoil, to corrupt, to debase, to deteriorate; to underrate, to depreciate, to disparage.

Title: Յոռի
Definition_1: wicked, bad, defective, paltry, wretched, low, vile, sorry; unseemly, detestable.

Title: Յոռութիւն
Definition_1: bad condition or quality, deterioration, degeneracy, decay.

Title: Յոտնաւոր
Definition_1: upright, on foot, standing; — կալ, to stand up.

Title: Յորամ
Definition_1: to fret, to grieve, to worry or vex oneself, to be uneasy, agitated.

Title: Յորդագնաց
Definition_1: going or flowing rapidly; very impetuous, rapid, violent.

Title: Յորդալոյս
Definition_1: full of light, very luminous, shining.

Title: Յորդախօս
Definition_1: fluent in speech, eloquent, wordy, glib.

Title: Յորդահոսան
Definition_1: cf. Յորդաբուղխ; —հոսանք or —հոսք, flood or overflow of waters, torrent.

Title: Յորդահոսիմ
Definition_1: to flow or fall copiously or in abundance.

Title: Յորդառատ
Definition_2: abundantly, in large quantities, much, in torrents.

Title: Յորդեմ
Definition_1: to cause to abound or flow in abundance, to deluge with, to pour out abundantly; to augment, to increase;
Definition_2: to be full of, to abound, to superabound, to stream or flow copiously; to overflow, to run over; to flood; to be gorged with, to swim in abundance; — զափամբք, to overflow, to rise above the banks.

Title: Յորդոր
Definition_1: exhorted, encouraged; prompt, ardent, diligent, eager, desirous; copious, abundant;
Definition_3: exhortation; — սրտիւ, կամաւորութեամբ, heartily, willingly, gladly; — փութով, diligently, eagerly, promptly, readily; — լինել, to exhort, to incite, to induce; — երգել, to sing andante; առ ի — վաստակոց, to inspire with the taste for labour, to incite to work.

Title: Յորդորագոյնս
Definition_1: eagerly, cordially, with great pleasure, very willingly.

Title: Յորդորամիտ
Definition_1: full of ardour, eager, desirous, ardent, prompt, ready; — առնել, to exhort, to persuade; — լինել, to be eager, desirous.

Title: Յորդորեմ
Definition_1: to exhort, to persuade, to excite, to incite, to induce, to stimulate, to spur or urge on; to encourage, to animate, to inflame, to comfort; to multiply, to augment, to increase.

Title: Յորդորիչ
Definition_1: exhorting, persuasive; engaging, winning; stimulating, animating.

Title: Յորդորիմ
Definition_1: to be exhorted, persuaded; animated, inflamed; — գթոյ աղեաց, to be touched, moved with compassion.

Title: Յորդորումն
Definition_1: exhortation, persuasion, incitement, stimulus, spur, incentive, encouragement.

Title: Յորդութիւն
Definition_1: abundance, affluence, superabundance, exuberance; outflow, overflowing, discharge, torrent, inundation; յորդութիւն արեան, rivers of blood; յորդութիւնք պատուհասից, plagues upon plagues; յորդութեամբ, in torrents, abundantly, copiously.

Title: Յորձան
Definition_1: current, stream, torrent; eddy, whirlpool, vortex; bubble, bubbling; foaming;
Definition_2: eddy-water; —ս առնուլ, to boil hard, violently or furiously.

Title: Յորձանուտ
Definition_1: flowing rapidly; impetuous, rapid; furious, noisy, clamorous;

Title: Յորջորջանք
Definition_1: appellation, name, denomination, title; անուն —անաց, surname;

Title: Յորջորջեմ
Definition_1: to call, to name, to denominate, to qualify as, to give a name to, to entitle; to surname.

Title: Յորջորջիմ
Definition_1: to be called, named, entitled; — յանուն ուրուք, to bear another's name, to be called after.

Title: Յորջորջումն
Definition_1: cf. Յորջորջանք; փոփոխական, փոփոխեալ or այլաշրջիկ —, metaphor.

Title: Յորսայս
Definition_1: supinely, with one's face upward, lying on one's back; backwards; — զարկուցանել, to hurl or throw backwards, to overthrow, to upset, to throw down on the back, to stretch on the earth; — կալ, խաղալ, to lie down prone, flat on the face, to stretch at one's whole length; to fall backwards;
Definition_2: — կալ, լինել, to be idle, negligent, neglectful, to stand with folded arms; պրկել ի —, to throw down and hind strongly; — անկանիլ, to fall on one's back, backwards; — կացի ի դալարւոջ, I stretched myself on the grass; յինքն —եալ անկանիլ, to recede, to flow back; մինչեւ յե՞րբ —եալ կաս ոʼվ վատ, how long wilt thou sleep, o sluggard ?

Title: Յորսայսեմ
Definition_1: to throw to the ground, backwards, to overturn, to knock down, to fell or strike to the earth.

Title: Յորսայսիմ
Definition_1: to lie down on one's back, to sleep.

Title: Յուդայապէս
Definition_1: as Judas, like a traitor, treacherously, traitorously.

Title: Յուզախնդիր
Definition_1: searching, prying, investigating, scrutinizing; — լինել, to seek, to search, to make researches, to investigate, to scrutinize, to set out in quest of, to make inquiries, to inquire after.

Title: Յուզակ
Definition_1: cf. Խուզարկու; inventor, author; inciter, agitator, instigator;
Definition_2: seditious; — ալիք, agitated sea, heavy billows.

Title: Յուզական
Definition_1: agitating, grievous, vexatious; — շուն, brach, questing-dog or setting-dog.

Title: Յուզարկու
Definition_1: inquirer; cf. Խուզարկու; plunderer, marauder, spoiler, robber.

Title: Յուզեմ
Definition_1: to seek, search or inquire after, to make search for, to ferret out, to hunt after; to examine, to discuss; to agitate, to move, to trouble; to excite, to incite, to provoke, to stir up, to move sedition; — զծով եւ զցամաք, to seek everywhere for, to ransack; — խնդիրս, to breed disputes, to excite quarrels.

Title: Յուզիմ
Definition_1: to be moved, touched; to be agitated, troubled, upset, excited, provoked; to rise in rebellion, to rebel, to mutiny; յուզին գութք իմ ի նա, I yearn for him, I pity him; յուզեցան գութք նորա, he was touched, moved with compassion; յուզեաց զգութ իմ ի վերայ նորա, he moved my compassion for him.

Title: Յուզումն
Definition_1: search, research, perquisition; trouble, agitation; incitement, instigation; turbulence, confusion, tumult; — խորհրդոց, anguish, anxiety, affliction, pain; — կրից, hastiness, outburst; — սրտի, emotion, transport.

Title: Յուլանամ
Definition_1: to be idle, to grow lazy, indolent; to neglect, not to care for.

Title: Յուլացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to become idle, slothful, indifferent, to enervate, to demoralize.

Title: Յուլիս
Definition_1: July; յամսեանն —ի, in the month of -.

Title: Յուկամ
Definition_1: where one wishes; where you will, wherever you like.

Title: Յուղարկ
Definition_1: transport, expedition; — երթալ, լինել, to accompany, to attend, to escort, to convoy.

Title: Յուղարկաւոր
Definition_2: —ք, attendants, train, retinue, suit; — ճառ, funeral oration.

Title: Յուղարկաւորութիւն
Definition_1: funeral, funeral train or procession; obsequies, burial.

Title: Յուղարկեմ
Definition_1: to accompany, to attend on, to escort; to lead, to conduct, to guide; to send, to expedite, to despatch, to forward; to perform the funeral obsequies.

Title: Յուղարկիմ
Definition_1: to be accompanied; — յորովայն մահու, to be buried.

Title: Յունալեզու
Definition_1: speaking Greek; Ionic; — հրէայ, Hebrew born in Greece, i.e. in captivity.

Title: Յունական
Definition_1: Greek; — հուր, greek fire; — ոճ, grecism; վարել զոճ —, to grecize, to grecianise, to render greek.

Title: Յունարէն
Definition_2: Greek; ուսանել, գիտել, խօսել —, to learn or study, to know, to speak Greek.

Title: Յուշ
Definition_2:
cf. Յուշիկ; — ! take care ! mind !
— ածել, առնել, to recall to one's memory, to cause to remember, to remind; — լիցի քեզ, ձեզ, recollect, remember; — եղեւ նմա, he has remembered.

Title: Յուշարար
Definition_1: causing to remember, recalling to a person's recollection, mind or remembrance, commemorative; suggesting, warning;

Title: Յուշարարութիւն
Definition_1: act of reminding; warning, admonition, notice, advice.

Title: Յուշիկ
Definition_1: slowly, softly, easily, leisurely; softly, gently, mildly; — գնալ, to go fair and softly; to walk gravely along.

Title: Յուռթեմ
Definition_1: to make amulets or charms, to enchant, to cast a spell over, to bewitch, to charm, to fascinate.

Title: Յուռթի
Definition_1: abundant; watered, irriguous; fecund, fertile, fruitful, productive.

Title: Յուռթուլունք
Definition_1: enchantment, witchcraft, sorcery, magic; charm, fascination; amulet, talisman, charm, preservative, phylactery; —ս յուռթել, cf. Յուռթեմ.

Title: Յուռմարիմ
Definition_1: to murmur against, to bear rancour, to owe a grudge.

Title: Յուսադիր
Definition_1: inspiring hope, inspiriting, reviving hope or courage, encouraging, animating; consoling.

Title: Յուսադրեմ
Definition_1: to revive hope; to comfort, to encourage.

Title: Յուսալից
Definition_1: full of hope or confidence, hopeful.

Title: Յուսահատ
Definition_1: in despair, without hope, comfortless, brokenhearted, disconsolate, discouraged, despondent; — առնել, to despair, to take away all hope, to drive to despair, to throw into despair; — լինել, to be in despair, to lose all hope, to be desperate, hopeless, to give oneself up despair, to despond, to be disheartened, to get discouraged; — զումեքէ, to despair of a person's life, to give over, to deem past recovery.

Title: Յուսակցիմ
Definition_1: to hope together, to mutually encourage with hope.

Title: Յուսահատական
Definition_2: — գործ, desperate business, a hopeless affair; — հիւանդութիւն, a desperate disease.

Title: Յուսահատութիւն
Definition_1: despair, hopelessness; despondency, faint-heartedness; առ յուսահատութեան, through despair; յուսահատութեամբ, desperately, past recovery, without hope; ի — մատնել, to deprive of all hope, to deliver or abandon to despair.

Title: Յուսամ
Definition_1: to hope, to expect; to trust, to confide; to promise or flatter oneself; — ի տէր, առ աստուած, to trust in God.

Title: Յուսացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to hope, to inspire with hope, to promise, to flatter.

Title: Յուրբաթացեալ
Definition_1: friday-like; — դարու, in the sixth century.

Title: Յստակ
Definition_2: pure, sincere, candid; manifest, evident, distinct;
Definition_3: clearly, cleanly, purely; distinctly, evidently, manifestly.

Title: Յստականամ
Definition_1: to clear up; to be clarified.

Title: Յստակաջուր
Definition_1: of clear or limpid water; — աղբիւր, clear, limpid, crystal, pellucid fountain or spring.

Title: Յստակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to clean, to clear, to clarify, to render clear or limpid; to refine, to purify; to collect the refuse.

Title: Յօդ
Definition_1: articulation, joint, juncture; bond, tie, link, connexion;

Title: Յօդաթափ
Definition_1: equuleus, wooden horse used in torture;

Title: Յօդախաղաց առնեմ
Definition_1: to dislocate, to put out of joint, to lux, to luxate.

Title: Յօդակապ
Definition_2: articulated, composed of articulations; — մտերմութեան, ընկերութեան, bonds of friendship, ties of society.

Title: Յօդակոտոր՞՞՞քակտեմ
Definition_1: to dislocate, to disjoin; to tear or rend in pieces, to dilaniate.

Title: Յօդանամ
Definition_1: to be articulate, jointed, attached; organized, formed; to associate, to take part in, to admit as member.

Title: Յօդապատ
Definition_2: well, tersely, elegantly composed or written.

Title: Յօդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to articulate, to utter, to pronounce, to form; to fit, to suit, to organize; to associate, to elect or to return as member.

Title: Յօդաւոր
Definition_1: articulated, articular; articulated, uttered; well expressed, well turned, harmonious.

Title: Յօդեմ
Definition_1: to join, to unite, to tie, to bind, to annex; to articulate, to pronounce, to utter; to feign, to contrive, to invent; to compose, to form.

Title: Յօդուած
Definition_1: articulation, joint, knot; composition, construction; article, paragraph.

Title: Յօժար
Definition_1: well disposed, inclined, willing, well affected; prompt, ready, eager, desirous, anxious; — լինել, to be disposed or inclined to, in the mood for, to have an inclination for; cf. Օժարաբար.

Title: Յօժարագոյն
Definition_1: eagerly, willingly, with pleasure, with good will, voluntarily, spontaneously, heartily.

Title: Յօժարամիտ
Definition_1: voluntary, well disposed, ready to, eager, ardent.

Title: Յօժարամտաբար
Definition_1: voluntarily, spontaneously, willingly, with good will, heartily.

Title: Յօժարամտութիւն
Definition_1: goodwill, entire disposition, inclination, devotion, eagerness.

Title: Յօժարիմ
Definition_1: to be disposed towards, inclined to, to have a liking for, to lean to, to have a mind or inclination for, to be in the mood for; to will, to wish, to desire, to be eager for.

Title: Յօժարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to dispose, to incline, to excite, to inspire with inclination, to raise a desire or a passion for, to interest, to induce, to invite, to persuade.

Title: Յօժարութիւն
Definition_1: natural bent, disposition, inclination, propension, proneness, tendency, taste; յօժարութեամբ, willingly, voluntarily.

Title: Յօղեմ
Definition_1: to form, to fashion, to arrange, to set in order.

Title: Յօն
Definition_2: lofty countenance, stately look, superciliousness, haughtiness; — սեաւ, կամարաձեւ, թաւ, անօսր, նրբին, ի վայր անկեալ, ամբարհաւաճ, սպառնալից, dark, finely arched, bushy, thin, small, hanging, haughty, threatening eyebrow; ամբառնալ զ—ս, զ—ս վեր ի վայր տանել, to raise the brows through superciliousness, to put on an arch look, to look arch; վանել զ—ն, to put off pomp or pride; պռստել, ի վեր պրկել զ—ս, to frown, to knit the brow, to look sour or angry; զ—սն հանել, to paint the eyebrows; —օք ակնարկել, to wink, to wink at.

Title: Յօնակից
Definition_1: having joined eyebrows; — լինել, to knit the brow;

Title: Յօշ յօշ
Definition_1: bit by bit, piecemeal, in pieces.

Title: Յօշեմ
Definition_1: to cut to pieces, to cut up, to tear in pieces; անդամ անդամ —, to dismember, to tear limb from limb, to pull to pieces, to dilaniate; — ընդ մէջ, to divide in halves; to cut or break asunder.

Title: Յօշուած
Definition_1: a joint of meat; dismembered part, segment.

Title: Յօսեմ
Definition_1: to weave, to intertwine; to fornicate, to commit fornication; to violate, to force, to deflower; — ի բոզս, to whore, to be a whoremonger.

Title: Յօրանամ
Definition_1: to fatten, to grow fat; to stuff on gorge oneself; to live in effeminacy, idleness or debauchery, to wallow in voluptuousness, to pamper oneself; to become haughty, to enact the stately personage, to play the swell; — սիգաքայլ, to stalk, to walk proudly, to look big; — ի խաղս, ի զբօսանս, to pass the whole day in pleasure or amusement.

Title: Յօրինեմ
Definition_1: to fashion, to adapt, to fit to, to adjust; to arrange, to dispose, to organize; to get ready, to prepare, to provide with, to furnish, to order; to form, to trim, to adorn, to embellish; to compose, to write; to make, to construct, to build; — պարս, to dance; — երգս, նուագս, to sing, to modulate, to tune; թատրոնական քերթուածս —, to write a dramatic composition.

Title: Յօրինուած
Definition_1: fitting up, adjustment; formation, fashion; composition, organization, structure; construction; furniture; embellishment, ornament, decoration; disposition; harmony.

Title: <letter>Ն</letter> (nou)
Definition_1: the twenty second letter of the alphabet, and the seventeenth of the consonants; four hundred, four hundredth.

Title: Նա
Definition_1: he, she; that, it; ուտէ նա, he or she eats; ուտեն նոքա, they are eating; խնդրեմ զնա, I am looking for him, her or it; ասեն նոքա, they say; նա է, it is he or she; անուն նորա, his, her or its name; ետու նոցա, I have given them; նոքա նոքին, they; նմա, to him or her; նորա, to him or to her; նոցա, to them;
Definition_2: but, however, nevertheless, yet; indeed, really, in fact; նա՛ է, that is, that is to say, i.e.; նա աւանիկ, նա աւասիկ, look there, look here; but, yet; նա եւ, also, even, likewise, again; moreover, besides; նա զի, նա մանաւանդ թէ, above all, the more; rather; նա եւ ոչ, neither, nor; not even; նա եւ արդ իսկ ոչ, not even now; նա ուրեմն, certainly; perhaps, it may be that; well; now, then.

Title: Նազաբանեմ
Definition_1: to exalt, to extol, to eulogize, to load with praises.

Title: Նազանք
Definition_1: show, train; magnificence, glory; mincing airs or manners, smirking, simpering.

Title: Նազարացի
Definition_2: Nazarene; — գոլ ի գինւոյ, to abstain from vine.

Title: Նազելի
Definition_1: excellent, praiseworthy, egregious, honourable, respectable; honest, brave, gallant, reserved, grave, serious; delicate, nice, pretty, genteel, charming, gracious; գնացք —ք, majestic port or bearing; ճեմք —ք, languishing or languid air.

Title: Նազեմ
Definition_1: to pout, to be dainty, to give oneself airs, to stand upon ceremony, to make some difficulty, to be fussy, very particular, disdainful, overnice, to turn up one's nose, to simper, to smirk, to want asking, to hesitate; to play the bully, to set up for a beau, to boast or brag of, to pique or plume oneself; to put on the airs of a lord.

Title: Նաժիշտ
Definition_1: maid-servant, female domestic, waiting-maid, or waiting-woman.

Title: Նախ
Definition_2: firstly, in the first place, at first; — քան, before, ere; — քան զամենայն, first of all.

Title: Նախաբնաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be from the beginning; to be pre-established; predestined.

Title: Նախագահ
Definition_1: cf. Յառաջագահ; — արքեպիսկոպոս, primate; — նստել, բազմել, լինել, to preside, to be the president, to hold the first place; —ք, cf. Նախաթոռք.

Title: Նախագաղափար
Definition_1: prototype, archetype, primitive model, original, idea, pattern;

Title: Նախագիծ
Definition_2: delineation, sketch, outline, firstdraught, minute; acrostic.

Title: Նախագծեմ
Definition_1: to sketch, to delineate, to outline.

Title: Նախագործ
Definition_1: first acting or operating; made before.

Title: Նախագրեմ
Definition_1: to write beforehand; to prescribe; to say or mention before.

Title: Նախադաս
Definition_1: set over, put above, promoted, preferred, superior; — առնել, համարել, to prefer.

Title: Նախադասեմ
Definition_1: to set over, to put above, to promote; to prefer, to give the preference to, to esteem more.

Title: Նախադասութիւն
Definition_1: first order or rank, preference, precedence, pre-eminence; proposition, premises.

Title: Նախադիպիմ
Definition_1: to meet first; to happen before.

Title: Նախազգաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to have a presentiment of, to foresee, to forebode.

Title: Նախաթոռ
Definition_1: cf. Նախագահ; —թոռք, first seat, highest place.

Title: Նախաժամանեմ
Definition_1: to come, arrive or get before, to get the start of; to outstrip, to out-walk.

Title: Նախախնամեմ
Definition_1: to provide, to be the providence of, to take care, to supply, to look, to preserve, to watch.

Title: Նախածին
Definition_1: created, born or produced first; bearing young for the first time;

Title: Նախածնող
Definition_1: first father or mother; —ք, forefathers, ancestors.

Title: Նախակատար
Definition_1: perfect in itself; finished or accomplished beforehand; —ք, premises.

Title: Նախակարգ
Definition_1: predestined, pre-established, predisposed; — բան, preliminary, preamble.

Title: Նախակարգեմ
Definition_1: to preordain, to pre-establish, to predispose; to predestine.

Title: Նախակերտ
Definition_1: built before or formerly; — արարչութիւն, creation of the world.

Title: Նախակրթեմ
Definition_1: to instruct beforehand; to exercise, to prepare or form by exercise.

Title: Նախահայր
Definition_1: the primitive or first father, progenitor of the human race, Adam; patriarch;

Title: Նախաձեռն
Definition_1: spontaneous, ready, willing; prompt; the first to volunteer; — լինել ի կռիւ, to commence the attack, to begin the fight; — լինել, cf. Նախաձեռնել.

Title: Նախաձեռնեմ
Definition_1: to undertake; to presume; to preelect; to promote, to raise, to exalt; to consecrate or ordain.

Title: Նախաճաշ
Definition_1: early breakfast; ճաշակերպ —, meat breakfast; a late substantial breakfast; — առնել, cf. Նախաճաշեմ.

Title: Նախաճառ
Definition_1: predicted, foretold, prophesied; — քարոզութիւն, prediction, foretelling, prophecy.

Title: Նախաճառեմ
Definition_1: to predict, to foretell, to prophesy.

Title: Նախամայր
Definition_1: our first mother, the mother of mankind, Eve; the wives of the patriarchs.

Title: Նախամատոյց առնեմ
Definition_1: to promote, to prefer to any post or dignity.

Title: Նախամարտիկ
Definition_1: fighting in the first rank; coryphaeus, champion;

Title: Նախամեծար
Definition_1: preferable, better, preferred, most esteemed; — առնել, ընտրել, համարել, to prefer, to like better, cf. Նախամեծարեմ.

Title: Նախայարձակ
Definition_1: the first to attack, skirmisher, sharpshooter; — լինել, to attack the first, to begin or engage the battle, to open the skirmish.

Title: Նախայաւիտենական
Definition_1: existing before all ages, eternal, self-existent, increate; — որդի, the Son of God before all eternity.

Title: Նախանկարեմ
Definition_2: to trace, to shadow, to delineate, to symbolize, to represent.

Title: Նախանձ
Definition_1: envy, jealousy; rancour, hatred; emulation, rivalry; zeal, fervour, warmth; տիրասէր —, attachment, affection; zeal;
Definition_2: առ —ու, enviously, invidiously; — կրել յումեքէ, to be envied; —ու մաշիլ, to pine away with envy, to be eaten up with; ի —բարկութեան բրդիլ, to burst with envy; ի — բարկութեան բրդիլ, to burst with envy; առնուլ, բերել, ի — բերիլ, մտանել, to envy, to be envious of, to grow jealous, to bear envy, cf. Նախանձեմ; to rival, to vie with; — արկանել յոք, ի — ածել զոք, to fill with jealousy or envy, cf. Նախանձեցուցանեմ; to move, excite or provoke to emulation; ի — գրգռել զոք, to arouse the jealousy of, to create envy; խնդրել զ—, to revenge, to take vengeance; վառիլ —ու ընդ, to become jealous; ի — վառիլ ընդ ումեք, to be jealous of; — դնել, to emulate, to rival; ի — նմանութեան ուրուք կրթիլ, to emulate a person, to desire to imitate him; — առաքինութեան դնել ընդ ումեք, to desire to emulate a person's virtues; — առնել, to fascinate, to charm, to bewitch, to cast a spell on; ո՜ անմիտ գաղատացիք, ո՞ — արար զձեզ, o foolish Galatians, who hath bewitched you?.

Title: Նախանձաբեկ
Definition_1: dying with envy, full of envy, envious, jealous; — առնել, to move to envy, to provoke to jealousy, cf. Նախանձեցուցանեմ.

Title: Նախանձիմ
Definition_1: to bear envy, to envy, to be jealous of, to grow invidious, to be tormented with envy; to rival, to vie with, to emulate; — զնախանձ տեառն, to burn with zeal for the Lord.

Title: Նախանձաւոր
Definition_1: zealous, full of zeal, desirous, ardent, fervent; emulous;
Definition_2: zealot, emulator, rival, competitor; envious, jealous; — լինել, to be zealous; to bear envy, to be envious of; to vie with.

Title: Նախանձաւորութիւն
Definition_1: zeal, emulation, rivalry; enviousness, jealousy; վատ —, paltry jealousy.

Title: Նախանձելի
Definition_1: enviable, worthy of envy; to be wished for, desirable.

Title: Նախանձեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to raise envy, to cause envy, to excite or awake jealousy; — ի բարի նախանձս, to incite to emulation; — զաստուած, to excite the jealousy or anger of the Almighty.

Title: Նախանձընդդէմ
Definition_1: emulating, vying; jealous, rival, emulous, full of emulation;
Definition_2: with emulation, wying with each other; — ջանք, emulation, rivalry; — կիրք, jealousy; — լինել, գալ, to emulate, to vie with.

Title: Նախանձուկս արկանեմ
Definition_1: to raise, inspire, cause or rouse envy or jealousy; — միմեանց, to grow mutually jealous; to emulate one another.

Title: Նախաչար
Definition_1: author or cause of all evil, the Devil.

Title: Նախապատիւ
Definition_1: worthy of the greatest honours, of greater consequence, first in dignity, most esteemed, honoured, preferred; — լինել ումեք, to be preferred to another, to obtain the preference.

Title: Նախապատմեմ
Definition_1: to tell, narrate or announce beforehand.

Title: Նախապատուեմ
Definition_1: to respect, to honour most, to pay the highest honour to.

Title: Նախասկիզբն
Definition_1: first author, first principle, beginning, origin, source; chief, escort, guide.

Title: Նախավկայ
Definition_1: protomartyr, the first martyr, St. Stephen.

Title: Նախատ
Definition_1: insult, outrage, injury, opprobrium, shame, infamy;
Definition_2: infamous, ignominious, opprobrious, base, villainous; despised, scorned, vile; — լինել, to become an object of scorn or ignominy, to be infamous.

Title: Նախատական
Definition_1: offensive, outrageous, abusive, insulting, injurious, defamatory.

Title: Նախատակոծ
Definition_1: loaded with insult, shame or abuse, insulted, affronted; — առնել, to load with abuse, to insult, to affront; — լինել, to be covered with opprobrium, loaded with abuse.

Title: Նախատեմ
Definition_1: to insult, to injure, to offend, to outrage, to abuse, to load with injuries; to reproach, to blame, to censure.

Title: Նախատես
Definition_1: foreseeing, prescient; — լինել, to be provident.

Title: Նախատինք
Definition_1: wrong, affront, injury, offence, outrage; blame, reproach, censure; shame, dishonour, opprobrium, infamy, ignominy; —նս դնել, գործել ումեք, to affront, to wrong, to insult, to disgrace, to dishonour, cf. Նախատեմ; լինել — ազգաց, to become the scorn of nations; բառնալ զ—նս, to wipe off the ignominy; ի —նս քո, for thy shame.

Title: Նախատիչ
Definition_1: insulter, offender, abuser, reviler, affronter, scoffer.

Title: Նախարար
Definition_1: satrap, proconsul, lord, governor of a province, prefect, mayor; —ք, magnates, grandees, noblemen.

Title: Նախարարագունդ
Definition_1: composed of satraps or nobles, princely;

Title: Նախարարազն
Definition_1: of a noble or princely family.

Title: Նախերգեմ
Definition_1: to prelude; to make a preamble.

Title: Նախէ
Definition_3: —ք, antecedents, precedents.

Title: Նախըմպեմ
Definition_1: to taste or try beforehand, to savour.

Title: Նախընթրակ
Definition_1: luncheon, lunch, collation; after-dinner meal, tea.

Title: Նախընծայ
Definition_3: primitively, at first; — օրինակ, first example.

Title: Նախընկալ
Definition_1: received beforehand, forwarded antecedently; — լինել, to be received first.

Title: Նախիղձիկք
Definition_1: pagan oracle; —կս բարբառել, to forebode, to presage.

Title: Նախիմաց
Definition_1: knowing, acquainted with beforehand; prescient, provident.

Title: Նախճիրք
Definition_1: slaughter, carnage, blood; great loss, prejudice, waste; —րս արեան գործել, to slaughter; —րս գործեցին դժնդակս ընդդեմ թշնամեաց, they made a dreadful slaughter of the enemy.

Title: Նախնական
Definition_1: primitive, ancient; primordial, primitive (soil); — թիւ, primary number.

Title: Նախնի
Definition_3: —ք, the ancients, ancestors, antecessors, forefathers;
Definition_4: ի —նումն, anciently, formerly, in times past, in former ages.

Title: Նախողջոյն լինիմ
Definition_1: to salute first; to be the first saluted;

Title: Նահանջեմ
Definition_1: recant, to retract, to withdraw, to drive back, to revoke; to stop, to suspend, to hinder.

Title: Նահանջիմ
Definition_1: to retire, to recede, to withdraw, to fall back, to retreat; յետս —, to recoil, to recede, to go backwards.

Title: Նահապետ
Definition_1: patriarch, chief of a family; prince.

Title: Նահատակ
Definition_1: the first to begin a combat, champion, hero, martyr.

Title: Նահատակակից
Definition_1: companion in arms or in martyrdom.

Title: Նահատակեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fight, *to set by the ears; to inflict martyrdom.

Title: Նահատակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to exercise, to train, to discipline.

Title: Նահատակիմ
Definition_1: to take one's chance, to expose oneself, to attack, to be foremost in the battle, to charge the enemy; to fight, to struggle, to wrestle, to wage war; to make great efforts, to take much trouble, to persist; to exercise oneself, to practise; to devote oneself, to become a martyr; ի ճգնութեան վարս —, to lead an ascetic life.

Title: Նահատակութիւն
Definition_1: bravery, valour; great achievement, exploit, heroism; struggle, fight, wrestling, match; suffering, labour, tribulation, mortification; martyrdom.

Title: Նամակ
Definition_1: letter, writing, missive, despatch, epistle; ցանկալի, երկայն, սիրալիր —, a pleasant, long or chatty, charming letter; երկտող —, a few lines, a note; քառիջեան —, a letter of four pages; թուղթ —ի, letterpaper; կշիռ —աց, letter-balance; տուն —աց, post-office; — կանխավճար, postpaid; — գրել, ընդունել, to write, to receive a letter; տալ զ— to send a letter; փրկանաւորել զ—, to frank, to prepay, to pay the postage of a letter; թելադրել, ստորագրել, կնքել զ—, to dictate, to sign or subscribe, to seal a letter.

Title: Նամակագիր
Definition_1: letter-writer; — լինել, to write a letter.

Title: Նամականի
Definition_1: letter, epistles; — առնել, to write letters.

Title: Նամակատուն
Definition_1: post, post-office; գլխաւոր — տան, post-master; պաշտօնեայք — տան, post-office clerk; կնիք —տան, post-mark; մնալի ի —տան, poste restante, to be left at the post-office.

Title: Նամփորտ
Definition_1: cf. Նափորտ; cloak, veil, women's long mantle.

Title: Նայապէս
Definition_1: as he or she, like him or she.

Title: Նայացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to moisten, to wet; to water.

Title: Նայեաց
Definition_1: aspect, view, prospect, sight; situation, position.

Title: Նայիմ
Definition_1: to look at, to cast the eyes on; to gaze at, to stare at;
Definition_2: to view, to gaze on, to behold; to mind, to take care.

Title: Նանիր
