Definition_2: ի —, in vain, vainly, to no purpose, uselessly; ի — աշխատ լինել, to labour in vain; ի մոտօյ, ի նանիր, cf. Մօտ, cf. Նանիր.

Title: Նանրալեզու
Definition_1: talking uselessly; speaking unjustly, slanderous, biting, satirical.

Title: Նանրախորհուրդ
Definition_1: thinking of useless or chimerical things, building castles in the air.

Title: Նանրիմ
Definition_1: to become useless, to cease to be, to faint, dwindle or vanish away, to come to nothing; — ի խորհուրդս, to become wise in one's own eyes, conceited, infatuated.

Title: Նանրութիւն
Definition_1: vanity, futility, frivolity; nothingness, inanity; injustice, iniquity, wrong.

Title: Նապաստակ
Definition_2: Lepus, the hare; արու —, buck-hare; մատակ —, doe-hare; ձագ —ի, levret; հետք —ի, form, prick; գետնափոր —, rabbit, cony; cf. Ճագար;
Definition_3: —ի ականջ, hare's ear;
Definition_4: —ի ոտն, hare-foot, hare-wort.

Title: Նարդեան
Definition_1: of nard or spikenard; — իւղ, nard-oil, ointment of spikenard.

Title: Նարդոս
Definition_1: nard, spikenard, nardus Indica, (oil and perfume).

Title: Նարինջ
Definition_1: orange; բանդակ ի նարնջոյ, conserve of oranges, marmalade; շաքարապատ կեղեւ նարնջոյ, candied orange-peel.

Title: Նարտ
Definition_1: backgammon; cf. Տապալի; խաղալ ի —, to play at dice.

Title: Նարօտ
Definition_1: dye, tincture, hue; thread, ribbon or tissue of various colours; broidery or needle-work of divers colours; *cockade, rosette; — կենաց, thread of life.

Title: Նաւ
Definition_1: ship, vessel, boat; cf. Նաւակ; cf. Լաստ; water-vessel, pitcher, urn, jar, earthen-vessel; — քարեղէն, basin or vase of stone; cf. Քարենաւ; — պատերազմիկ, three benched galley, trireme; — մեծ, line of battle-ship, man of war; — հրձիգ, fire-ship; — հինից, privateer, corsair; — զօրագլխական, admiral's ship, flagship; — զրահեալ, armoured ship, armour-plated ship; — վաճառական, merchant-man, merchant-ship, trading-vessel; — շոգեմուղ, steam-ship, steamer; — առագաստաւոր, sailing-boat; — թեւճակաւոր, row-boat; գումարտակ —ուց, fleet; վարձ —ու, freight; վարձել զ—, to freight or charter a vessel; կպրով օծանել or կպրաձիւթել զ—, to tar, to careen, to caulk a ship; կպրաձիւթող —ուց, caulker; մտանել or ելանել, երթալ ի —, to embark, to go on shipboard, to go on board a ship, to take a shipping; ելանել ի —է, to land, to go a-shore, to disembark; դնել ի —, to embark, to ship, to export; հանել ի —է, to disembark, to put a-shore, to unload goods.

Title: Նաւաբեկ
Definition_1: shipwrecked; — նաւաստի, ծովագնացք, the shipwrecked mariners or people, the survivors from a wreck; — լինել, to be shipwrecked, cast away.

Title: Նաւաբեկիմ
Definition_1: to run aground, to strand, to founder, to be lost.

Title: Նաւագնացիկ
Definition_2: navigator; voyager; — լինել, to navigate; to go by sea, to voyage;
Definition_3: —ք, navigable waters.

Title: Նաւագործութիւն
Definition_1: ship-building, naval construction; կայարան, աւազան նաւագործութեան, navy yard; dock, wet-dock, dock-yard.

Title: Նաւակ
Definition_1: boat, bark, barge; — գետոյ, wherry, sculler; — վենետկեան, gondola; տաճիկ —, caic; անգղիական —, outrigger; — նաւու, yawl, skiff, shaloop; — տափարակ, ferry-boat, lighter; վարձ, սակ —ի, tariff, rate.

Title: Նաւակայք
Definition_1: bay, road, road-stead, anchoring-ground, anchorage, harbour, haven, port.

Title: Նաւական
Definition_1: naval; nautical; — զօրութիւն, sea-forces, marine, navy; — գիտութիւն, navigation, art of sailing.

Title: Նաւակառոյց
Definition_1: cf. Նաւագործ; — լինել, cf. Նաւակառեմ; to navigate; to steer.

Title: Նաւակատիք
Definition_1: inauguration, dedication, consecration; feast, festival, rejoicing; cf. Խթումն; առնել զ—իս շինուածոյ, to inaugurate a building; —իս առնել սեղանոյն, to dedicate or consecrate an altar.

Title: Նաւակոծիմ
Definition_1: to suffer shipwreck, to be lost, to perish by shipwreck.

Title: Նաւահանգիստ
Definition_2: the port of salvation; cf. Նաւակայք; ընդարձակ, անքոյթ, գեղեցիկ —, a spacious, safe, fine harbour or port; — գետոյ, wharf, quay; հրամանատար — գստից, harbour-master; դիւրամերձենալի —, port accessible at any time of the tide; դժուարամուտ —, harbour with a bar; մտանել, հասանել, իջանել ի —, to harbour; (նաւ) to sail into or enter harbour; (շոգենաւ) to steam into harbour; հասանել ողջամբ ի —, to get safe into port; to arrive safe; նաւաբեկ լինել ի —գստեան, to be wrecked in port.

Title: Նաւամարտիկ
Definition_2: naval fight; — լինել, to fight a battle at sea; — տորմիղ նաւաց, fleet, army.

Title: Նաւապետեմ
Definition_1: to command, to steer or guide a vessel; to pilot.

Title: Նաւապետութիւն
Definition_1: command, steering, working, piloting a vessel.

Title: Նաւասարդ
Definition_1: the first month of the ancient Armenian calendar, (August).

Title: Նաւաստի
Definition_1: sailor seaman, mariner, sea-faring man, tar, jack-tar; —ք, seamen, sea-faring people, crew.

Title: Նաւաստութիւն
Definition_1: profession of a sailor; seamanship; steering of a ship; piloting; navigation.

Title: Նաւավար
Definition_1: navigator; cf. Նաւուղիղ; seaman, boatman, gondolier, rower.

Title: Նաւարկեմ
Definition_1: to sail, to navigate, to go to sea; cf. Հողմ.

Title: Նաւացռուկ
Definition_1: rostrum, beak-head, cut-water, knee of the head.

Title: Նաւեմ
Definition_1: to sail, to navigate, to go to sea.

Title: Նաւթճեմ
Definition_1: to announce; to procure, to provide; to prepare, to furnish; cf. Նօթճեմ.

Title: Նաւորդ
Definition_1: navigator; passenger; cf. Նաւաստ; —ք արգեայ, the Argonauts.

Title: Նաւուղղութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Նաւապետութիւն; navigation; art of sailing, histiodromia; գիրք նաւուղղութեան, treatise on Navigation.

Title: Նափորտ
Definition_1: cloak, mantle; monk's long mantle; cope, chasuble.

Title: Նաքարակիտ
Definition_1: a farthing, two mites, fourth part of a penny.

Title: Նգեմ
Definition_1: to demolish with levers or crow-bars, to dismantle, to throw down, to raze.

Title: Նգոտիմ
Definition_1: to grow mouldy, to get spoiled.

Title: Նեարդապատ
Definition_1: fibrous, stringy, muscular, brawny; ligamentous; tendinous, sinewy.

Title: Նեխ
Definition_1: putrefaction, rottenness, putrescence, corruption; infection, bad smell, stench, stink, fetidness;
Definition_3: corrupt, spoiled, putrid, stinking; չարաթոյն —, foul smell; — անկաւ ի մարմինն, it has begun to putrefy.

Title: Նեխեմ
Definition_1: to putrefy, to corrupt, to rot.

Title: Նեխիմ
Definition_1: to become putrid, to be corrupted, spoiled, rotten, stinking.

Title: Նիհ
Definition_1: list of prices, tax, rate, tariff.

Title: Նեղ
Definition_3: anxiety, grief, distress; —ք, strait; defile; ի — արկանել, հասուցանել, to reduce to distress or to straits, to constrain, to oblige, to compel, to force, cf. Նեղեմ; to press, to urge, to embarrass; ի — մտանել, անկանել, to be pinched for means, to be in straitened circumstances, to be reduced to straits, to the last extremity, to be embarrassed, distressed.

Title: Նեղահարութիւն
Definition_1: pain or uneasiness caused by constraint.

Title: Նեղանամ
Definition_2: to become impoverished, to be reduced to misery.

Title: Նեղասիրտ
Definition_1: impatient, touchy, crabbed, peevish, surly, surly-humoured, choleric, morose, irascible, passionate, hasty.

Title: Նեղասրտիմ
Definition_1: to be impatient, fretful, to fidget, to lose patience, to be vexed; to be ill-tempered, cross, angry, irritated, exasperated.

Title: Նեղասրտութիւն
Definition_1: impatience, ill-temper, intolerance, vexatiou, irritation, exasperation, bursts or fits of passion or rage.

Title: Նեղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to worry, to afflict, to torment, to vex.

Title: Նեղեմ
Definition_1: to narrow. to make narrow, to contract, to straighten, to restrain, to tie down, to press, to constrain; to give trouble, to disquiet, to incommode, to inconvenience, to importune, to annoy, to trouble, to torment, to harass, to infest, to plague, to molest, to maltreat, to oppress; զոք ամբոխին, to crowd, to oppress, to press, to squeeze; ժողովուրդքն նեղէին զնա, he was oppressed by the throng; էշն նեղեաց զինքն ընդ որմն, the ass thrust herself unto the wall.

Title: Նեղիմ
Definition_1: to be put to straits, to be constrained or necessitated; to be uneasy, disquieted, afflicted, troubled, tormented, vexed, molested; եւ մղիլ ի սեղան, to be intruded upon or thrust in; to meddle with, to interpose.

Title: Նեղիչ
Definition_1: afflicting, troubling; molesting, oppressing, persecuting; distressing; vexatious, disquieting.

Title: Նեղութիւն
Definition_1: want of width or amplitude, narrowness, straightness; care, trouble, tribulation, grief, sorrow, affliction, inquietude, displeasure; fatigue, weariness; importunity, incommodiousness, annoyance, tedium; torment, worry, vexation, oppression.

Title: Նենգ
Definition_1: fraud, artifice, stratagem, wile, craft, guile, cunning;

Title: Նենգախոհ
Definition_1: fraudulent, malicious, sly, guileful, cunning, crafty.

Title: Նենգախոշոշ
Definition_1: killing by surprise or treachery, guileful, assassinating.

Title: Նենգախօսութիւն
Definition_1: double-dealing; crafty speech, honied or delusive words, deceitful discourse.

Title: Նենգաւոր
Definition_1: fraudulent, cunning, wily, sly, insidious; gloomy, sullen, saturnine; treacherous, disloyal, perfidious, felonious; roguish, swindling.

Title: Նենգեմ
Definition_1: to defraud, to deceive, to cheat, to dupe, to cozen, to trick, to gull, to swindle; to circumvent; to betray.

Title: Նենգիմ
Definition_1: to be deceived, betrayed; — տեսութէան, to lose the sight, to become blind.

Title: Նենգիչ
Definition_1: knavish, roguish, cheating, crafty; falsifying, forging; stealing.

Title: Նենգութիւն
Definition_1: fraud, trick, artifice, craftiness, slyness, cheating; duplicity, deception, trickery, knavery; disloyalty, perfidy, felony, treason; swindling, roguery.

Title: Նետ
Definition_1: arrow, bolt, shaft, dart; — օձ, dart-snake, acontias, jaculum; — առ ի յաստուծոյ, thunder, cf. Շանթ, cf. Կայծակն; —ս արձակել, to shoot an arrow, to discharge or let fly arrows.

Title: Նետահար
Definition_1: shot, pierced or wounded with an arrow.

Title: Նետաձիգ
Definition_1: drawing a bow; serving to launch an arrow;
Definition_2: cf. Նետընկէց; — առնել, լինել, to shoot, to let fly an arrow, to draw a bow, cf. Նետահարեմ.

Title: Ներ
Definition_1: sister-in-law; —ք, period or cycle of six hundred years, or months;
Definition_2: in, into; within; ի — անձինդ, in thyself; — արհեստին, skilled in art.

Title: Ներանձնանամ
Definition_1: to withdraw or seclude oneself from the world, to give oneself up to a spiritual life.

Title: Ներանձնաւոր
Definition_1: living retired, solitary, secluded; devoted, spiritual; contemplative.

Title: Ներանձնութիւն
Definition_1: solitude, secluded, contemplative or ascetic life; contemplation.

Title: Ներբան
Definition_1: sole of the foot; — կօշկաց, sole; — գուրպայից, foot.

Title: Ներբողեմ
Definition_1: to make the panegyric, the eulogy of; to give praises, to laud, to eulogize, to praise, to exalt.

Title: Ներգեւ
Definition_1: slim, slender, lean, thin, weak; languid, faint;

Title: Ներգեւիմ
Definition_1: to become weak, lean, faint, to grow languid.

Title: Ներգործական
Definition_1: active; — բայ, active verb; — քուէ, active voice; — շնորհք, effective grace.

Title: Ներգործեմ
Definition_1: to do, to act, to operate, to influence.

Title: Ներգործութիւն
Definition_1: activity, energy, force, virtue; influence, operation; act, deed, work; — հաւատոյ, act of faith.

Title: Ներելի
Definition_1: pardonable, excusable, remissible; — մեղք, venial sin.

Title: Ներեմ
Definition_1: to grant pardon for a fault, to pardon, to excuse, to forgive, to be indulgent; to permit, to allow; to tolerate, to endure, to suffer, to support; ներեցէք, beg pardon; pardon me; զայս ասեմ ներելով, I speak this by permission.

Title: Ներխորհուրդ
Definition_1: arcane, secret or hidden sense or meaning.

Title: Ներկանեմ
Definition_1: to dye, to colour, to tinge; — ի կարմիր, to give a red dye to, to dye red.

Title: Ներկեմ
Definition_1: cf. Ներկանեմ; տալ ի ներկել, to give out to be dyed.

Title: Ներկուռ
Definition_2: well instructed, very erudite, learned, clever, imbued with science.

Title: Ներհակութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Հակառակութիւն; ներհակութիւն գունոց, contrast of colours.

Title: Ներող
Definition_1: indulgent, condescending, forbearing, merciful, clement; — լինել, to be indulgent.

Title: Ներողամիտ
Definition_1: cf. Ներող; — քաղցրութեամբ, with the greatest kindness.

Title: Ներողութիւն
Definition_1: indulgence; pardon, remission, mercy, pity; ներողութեամբ, indulgently.

Title: Ներումն
Definition_1: pardon; — խնդրել, to beg pardon or forgiveness, to apologize.

Title: Ներտրամադրեալ
Definition_1: inward, innate, inborn; — բան, idea, thought, conceit.

Title: Ներփակեալ
Definition_1: enclosed within; — նամակս, the enclosed letter.

Title: Ներքանոց
Definition_1: any piece of furniture used as a couch, bedding.

Title: Ներքին
Definition_1: interior, internal, inner; intestine; intrinsic; intimate, cordial; underground, subterranean; — անկիւն, internal angle.

Title: Ներքինապետ
Definition_1: chief of the eunuchs; cf. Մարդպետ.

Title: Ներքինացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to eunuchate, to geld, to castrate.

Title: Ներքինի
Definition_1: eunuch; ձայն —նւոյ, shrill voice; — առնել, —ս խզել, cf. Ներքինացուցանեմ; անմորուս են —, eunuchs have no beard.

Title: Ներքնագունդ
Definition_1: troops of men, terrestrial or mortal hosts.

Title: Ներքնակ
Definition_1: under-coat, under-waistcoat; shirt-front; — կանանց, chemisette, habit-shirt, under-petticoat.

Title: Ներքոյ
Definition_2: —, ի —, under, below, beneath; in, within, through, inwardly, inside; ի — արկանել, to subdue; ի — կացեալ, անկեալ, subject, submissive, dependent, cf. Հպատակ; պատել ի —, to line, to cover on the inside;
Definition_3: —ք, the inside, interior.

Title: Ներքուստ
Definition_1: internally, inwardly; below, beneath; inside, within, inwardly; from beneath, from below.

Title: Ներքս
Definition_1: in, into, inside; մտանել ի —, to go in, to enter; ընկալաւ զնա ի —, he took him in, he received him; եդաք ի — ի սենեակն, we placed it in the room.

Title: Ներքսամուտ առնեմ
Definition_1: to cause to enter, to introduce, to bring in.

Title: Նեցուկ
Definition_1: stay, staff, prop; sustainer, support, upholder, buttress; —ս արկանել, to prop, to stay, to support; — ամրութեան լինել ումեք, to be a support of, to uphold, to sustain, to protect; — կալ հաւատոց, to support religion, to be a supporter of religion; cf. Յենարան.

Title: Նզով
Definition_1: anathema, excommunication, malediction, curse; imprecation, execration; լինել ի —ս, to become anathema, to be a subject of execration; առնել զոք ի —ս, տալ զոք ի —ս, to subject a person to execration; ընդ —իւք կապիլ or անկանիլ, to be excommunicated or execrated; —ս արձակել, —ս ի վերայ կարդալ, to anathematize, to curse; —ս ի հետ արկանել or զկնի արձակել, to load with cursing, to curse, to execrate, to imprecate; to excommunicate.

Title: Նզովեմ
Definition_1: to anathematize, to excommunicate; to curse, to condemn; to execrate, to imprecate.

Title: Նզովիմ
Definition_1: to be excommunicated, anathematized; եղիցի նզովեալ, let him he anathema.

Title: Նժոյգ
Definition_1: fresh horse, relay, led-horse; prancer; courser.

Title: Նժոյգաւոր
Definition_1: mounted on a courser, horseman, cavalier.

Title: Նիազ
Definition_1: poor, necessitous, indigent; մեզ ոչինչ — էր ի ձէնջ, we had no need of you.

Title: Նիգ
Definition_1: bolt, lock, padlock; lever, bar; traverse, cross piece of timber; trabs, trabeculae (a meteor); — փայտեղէն, mortar; փակել նգօք, to bar, to bolt, to fasten with a padlock.

Title: Նիզակ
Definition_1: lance, spear; pelta, clypheus; հարուած —ի, spear or lance-thrust; ի տէգ —ի վառեալ, armed with a lance, pikeman; անտառախիտ —ք, a forest of spears; սատակել —աւ գերանդւոյ, to slay with scythes.

Title: Նիզակախուռն
Definition_1: bristling with spears; — զօրք, company of pikemen.

Title: Նիզակակուր առնեմ
Definition_1: to subjugate with lance and spear.

Title: Նիզակակցիմ
Definition_1: fight together; to be allied, leagued, to form a coalition with, to enter into an alliance, to league together; to help, to succor, to aid.

Title: Նիզակաճօճ
Definition_1: poising a javelin or brandishing a spear.

Title: Նիզակատէգ
Definition_1: the dart or the head of a lance.

Title: Նիզակաւոր
Definition_1: lancer, pikeman, halberdier; — աստղ, lance-shaped meteor.

Title: Նիզակափակ
Definition_1: surrounded or hemmed in by pikemen.

Title: Նիզակընկէց լինիմ
Definition_1: to throw down one's arms and desert, to abandon one's post, to flee.

Title: Նիկիադաւան
Definition_1: holding or professing the doctrine of the council of Nice.

Title: Նիհար
Definition_1: thin, lean, meagre, gaunt, spare, skinny, scraggy.

Title: Նիհարանամ
Definition_1: to grow lean or spare, to become thin, to fall away.

Title: Նիհարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make thin or lean, to emaciate, to extenuate, to weaken, to attenuate.

Title: Նինջ
Definition_1: slumber, sleep, repose; մի՛ տար — արտեւանաց քոց, give not slumber to thine eyelids.

Title: Նիշ
Definition_2: point; այս —, այն —, such a one, such; so and so; յայս — աւուր, in such a day; բանից նիշ, cf. Նշանաբան.

Title: Նսեհ
Definition_2: destiny, fate, fortune; վեհ —, high destiny; վայելել ի —, to prosper, to lead a happy life.

Title: Նիսան
Definition_1: the first month of the Hebrews, Nisan (March).

Title: Նիստ
Definition_1: sitting posture; position, situation; seat, residence, abode; property, possession; sitting, session, meeting; — արքունական, seat of Government, capital city; — բանակի, encampment; ի — լինել, to sit up, to sit down, to be seated; ի — ննջել, to sleep in a sitting posture; — առնուլ, to be tranquillized, allayed, lulled into security; ի — գումարիլ, to hold a sitting; ի նստի անդ, during the sitting, forthwith, before separating; երեք նստիւ նկարել զկենդանագիր, to paint a portrait in three sittings.

Title: Նիտամ
Definition_1: to invent, to contrive to frame, to hatch, to plot.

Title: Նիրհիմ
Definition_1: to fall into a doze, to begin to nod, to doze, to nap, to be drowsy, to drop off to sleep, to take a nap or snooze; — ի քուն թանձրութեան, to fall fast asleep or into a sound sleep, to be fallen into a deep sleep; նիրհեալ ջրհորք, waterless or dried wells.

Title: Նիրհեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render drowsy or sleepy, to send to sleep; — յորորանի, to lull or rock t sleep.

Title: Նիւթ
Definition_1: matter, body; element; substance; subject, matter; cause, reason, grounds; —ք, materials; — հրոյ, matches, incentive, tinder; — ցրիւ, diffuse matter; — եւ տեսակ, form and matter; խօսեսցուք զայսր —ոյ, let us discourse on this subject.

Title: Նիւթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to give a material form or existence, to create, to produce.

Title: Նիւթաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be formed, to be composed of matter, to exist, to be.

Title: Նիւթեմ
Definition_1: to spin, to twist; to weave, to plait; to prepare, to form, to project, to design; to cause, to produce, to excite; to contrive, to machinate, to plot; — զնենգութիւն, to weave plots or snares, to conspire, to plot, to lay snares; դաւ —, to frame or plot a treacherous design, to hatch treason; կործանումն —, to ruin, to cause the ruin of; չարիս — ումեք, to meditate evil against a person, the ruin of; — խորհուրդս չարութեան, to meditate gloomy, foul or heinous thoughts; — անձին չարիս or զկորուստ, to contrive one's own ruin; — նիւթ, to accumulate; — զգործն, to undertake, to execute, to put into execution; լրբենի սէր նորա մահ նիւթեաց նմա, his infamous passion cost him his life.

Title: Նխոթեմ
Definition_1: to push with force, to drive or thrust in, to fix.

Title: Նկանակ
Definition_1: roll, manchet; քանի՞ —աց ունիք, how many loaves have you?.

Title: Նկատեմ
Definition_1: to see, to look at, to regard, to observe, to examine, to consider, to contemplate, to reflect, to ponder on; to show or pay regard to.

Title: Նկար
Definition_1: painting, picture; image, figure, effigy; embroidery or needlework of divers colours; lively description; ի —ու հանել, to paint, to take or draw a portrait; to describe; cf. Թատրոնական; cf. Մաւրիտանական.

Title: Նկարագիր
Definition_1: description; picture, painting; representation, likeness, portrait; delineation, design, plan, model, form; style; text; cf. Նկարագիծ;
Definition_2: painted; described; պատկերակերպ —, portrait, likeness; — բնութեան, the picture of nature; ըստ —գրին, literally; մեկնել ըստ —գրին, to explain literally.

Title: Նկարագրական
Definition_1: representative; descriptive; picturesque; characteristic; literal; — իմաստիւք, literally.

Title: Նկարագրեմ
Definition_1: to paint, to represent; to portray, to depict, to paint, to describe, to give a description of; to characterize.

Title: Նկարագրութիւն
Definition_1: painting, representation, portrait, image, figure, delineation, sketch; description;

Title: Նկարակերպ
Definition_1: painted, diversified with colours, variegated, checkered; embroidered;

Title: Նկարապաճոյճ
Definition_1: painted, adorned with paintings; — տախտակ, picture, painting.

Title: Նկարեմ
Definition_1: to paint; to represent, to figure, to form; to depict, to describe, to write; — ի միտս, to imagine, to fancy, to picture to oneself; — ի գրի, to write, to describe.

Title: Նկարէն
Definition_1: painted, coloured, variegated, varied with many colours; embellished with imagery; — պաստառք հնդկաց, printed calico, chintz, cotton.

Title: Նկարիչ
Definition_1: painter; կենդանագիր —, portrait painter; կին —, paintress.

Title: Նկարչութիւն
Definition_1: painting; — իւղաթուրմ, oil-painting; — ջրազանգ, water-colour painting.

Title: Նկուն
Definition_1: vanquished, conquered, humbled, lowered, abased, depressed; base, abject, vile, low, contemptible, mean, poor, little, ignoble; — առնել, to conquer, to subdue, to bear or break down, to humble, to depress, to abase, to weaken, to harass, to mortify, to humiliate; — լինել, to be conquered, overcome, humbled, abased, worsted, to succumb, to yield to.

Title: Նկրտեմ
Definition_1: to push on, to induce, to incite; to promote, to advance.

Title: Նկրտիմ
Definition_1: to endeavour, to exert oneself, to take pains, to make great efforts, to strive hard, to do one's best.

Title: Նման
Definition_1: like, similar, resembling, approaching; equal, conformable, analogous;
Definition_2: — է, it suits, it is proper, fit or becoming; it seems, it appears; ամենեւին — է նմա, he is as like him as can be; — զ—ն սիրէ, like loves like;
Definition_3: similarly, in the same manner, alike, such.

Title: Նմանաբանութիւն
Definition_1: imitating a person's voice or speech, mimicry.

Title: Նմանաբար
Definition_1: likewise, equally, in the same manner.

Title: Նմանագրեմ
Definition_1: to write a similar hand; to fac-simile.

Title: Նմանակերպիմ
Definition_1: to conform to, to become like, to resemble.

Title: Նմանակիր
Definition_1: subject to the same feeling or passions.

Title: Նմանամասն
Definition_1: composed of similar or equal parts.

Title: Նմանապէս
Definition_1: likewise, in like manner, in the same manner, conformably, equally, analogically.

Title: Նմանասեր
Definition_1: of the same kind, family or species.

Title: Նմանավիշտ
Definition_1: subject to the same afflictions or pains.

Title: Նմանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render like, to assimilate, to conform, to equalize, to liken; to imitate, to counterfeit.

Title: Նմանիմ
Definition_1: to be alike, similar, to resemble, to approach, to be equal with; to imitate, to follow, to tread in the steps of; նմանեալ մարդկան, in the human form; նմանի՛, it suits; it is very probable; — եթէ, it seems, it appears.

Title: Նմանողակից
Definition_1: imitator; — լինել, to imitate, to follow, to endeavour to resemble; to copy, to ape, to mimic.

Title: Նմանութիւն
Definition_1: similarity, resemblance, conformity, analogy; assimilation; comparison; uniformity, equality; imitation; likeness, image, effigy; figure, type, form; parable, example; ըստ նմանութեան, ի —, in imitation of, after the fashion of; ըստ նմին նմանութեան, in like manner, likewise; cf. Բերեմ.

Title: Ննջեմ
Definition_1: to sleep, to slumber, to lie down, to go to bed; to repose, to rest;
Definition_2: to die, to expire, to depart this life; — ընդ կնոջ, to lie with a woman; — արտաքոյ, to lie abroad, out of doors; — բացօթեայ, ընդ աստեղօք, to sleep in the open air, to lie under the canopy of heaven; — աչօք բացօք, to sleep like a hare; — ի տէր, to go to sleep in Jesus, to rest in God; — ի հող մահու, to sleep the sleep that knows no waking; — ընդ հարս իւր, to sleep with one's fathers.

Title: Ննջեցեալ
Definition_1: sleeping; dead in God, deceased, defunct; cf. Մեռեալ; աղօթք վասն ննջեցելոց, prayer for the dead; պաշտօն —ցելոց, requiem, obsequies; cf. Պաշտօն.

Title: Ննջեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to lull, to put to sleep, to lay down, to put to bed; — զկին ոք ի լանջս ուրուք, to marry, to join in wedlock; — զկոյս, to deflower; — զոք ի քուն յաւիտենից, to slay, to kill.

Title: Ննջումն
Definition_1: sleep, repose, dormancy; decease, death, exit, transit; coition, copulation; ի — խոնարհիլ, cf. Նիրհեմ.

Title: Նշան
Definition_1: sign, mark; sign, signal, character, symbol; trace, vestige; sign, proof, token; omen; miracle, prodigy, wonder; ensign, colours, flag, standard, banner; the Holy Cross; betrothal, affiancing; seal, mark; central point, centre; aim, butt;
Definition_2: point; — կռուոյ, arms; — յաղթութեան, trophy, triumph, victory; — or —ս տալ, to give a sign, to beckon; to signify, to indicate; to affiance; — առնուլ, to take aim at, to level at; ոչ եւս տալ — կենաց, to give no signs of life; — անձրեւի է, we shall have rain.

Title: Նշանագիր
Definition_1: character, letter; register, archives; secretary; cipher; signature, paraph, flourish; —ք, alphabet; elements, rudiments; —ք եգիպտականք, hieroglyphs.

Title: Նշանագործ
Definition_1: performing miracles, doing wonders; prodigious, marvelous;

Title: Նշանագրեմ
Definition_1: to characterize; to write, to compose; to note, to mark; to delineate.

Title: Նշանադրոշմումն
Definition_1: making the sign of the cross.

Title: Նշանակ
Definition_1: sign, mark; signal, indication, character, expression, proof; symbol; emblem; label, ticket; sign, miracle, prodigy; scepter; sign-post; flag, colours, ensign; — հրոյ, smoke; flame; փողք —աց, signal trumpet, bugle; — դատապարտութեան, judgment, sentence, condemnation; սուրբ —ք, Sacred Elements; — հաւատոյ, symbol or formula of faith, Creed; —ք ախտից, symptoms; կանգնել յաղթութեան —, to raise a trophy, a monument of victory.

Title: Նշանակաւոր
Definition_1: significative; symbolic; remarkable, worthy of note, notable.

Title: Նշանակեմ
Definition_1: to signify, to denote, to betoken, to indicate, to declare, to notify, to express, to distinguish; to signalize; to characterize; to note, to mark, to remark; to figure, to represent, to mean, to signify, to have the sense or a meaning of; to cross, to make the sign of the cross; — զգինս, to quote; — զվաճառս, to ticket.

Title: Նշանացեմ
Definition_1: to make signs, to beckon, to nod, to wink; to indicate, to point out.

Title: Նշանացի
Definition_1: by signs; — խօսել, to speak -; — առնել ձեռամբ, to point at, to signify by hand.

Title: Նշանաւոր
Definition_1: signed, marked with a sign; special, signal, famous, remarkable, notable; symbolic, mystical; ensign-bearing; նաւ մի —աւ դիոսկորացւոց, a ship bearing the sign of Castor and Pollux.

Title: Նշանեմ
Definition_1: to put a sign or mark upon, to sign, to mark, to brand; to make a sign; to promise in marriage, to affiance, to betroth.

Title: Նշաւակ
Definition_2: — or առակ —ի, spectacle, butt, object of derision, laughing-stock; առակ —ի կացուցանել, յառակ —ի դնել, to expose to the mockery or contempt of the people, to set up to public ridicule; տեսիլ —ի լինել, to make a show of oneself, to make oneself ridiculous to everybody; — լինել, կալ, գտանիլ, to become an object of opprobrium, to be a prey or victim to ignominy, to be exposed to dirision; — կալ կշտամբանաց, to be exposed to the darts of reproach or rebuke; եդին զիս — իւրեանց, they regarded me with horror, or as an abomination; եղիցին դիակունք — ընդ երեսս դաշտաց, the carcasses shall lie as dung upon the open field; — եղէ ես բազմաց, I was as a wonder unto many; cf. Առակ; — ի նետաձգութիւն, skilful in archery.

Title: Նշաւակեմ
Definition_1: to confound, to put to shame, to expose to public censure or to the ridicule of everyone, to ridicule, to cry down, to defame, to slander, to lampoon; to lead in triumph.

Title: Նշաւակութիւն
Definition_1: spectacle, laughingstock; shame, ignominy, opprobrium; nickname, by-name; hardy deed.

Title: Նշխար
Definition_1: bit, piece, particle, fragment; rest, residue; remains, mortal coil; consecrated bread, eulogia; —ք սրբոց, relic; տուփ —աց, reliquary, shrine; — պատարագի, host, wafer; — կնքոյ, wafer; — գործել or կազմել, to make wafers; —ք եւ նշմարք հայաստանի, the antiquities of Armenia (Picturesque Armenia).

Title: Նշխարատուն
Definition_1: place for making hosts or wafers.

Title: Նշխարեմ
Definition_1: to remain over and above; to leave fragments;
Definition_2: —եալ, left, remained; — ոսկերք սրբոց, relics; — կեանք իմ, my spark of life; the rest of my life.

Title: Նշկահեմ
Definition_1: to rise, to rise against, to revolt, to rebel, to mutiny, to rise in insurrection; to reject, to despise; — զոք, — ի ներքուստ ձեռին ուրուք, to shake off the yoke, to free or rid oneself from another's domination.

Title: Նշմար
Definition_1: mark, trace, sign, vestige, indication; — գեղոյ, some remains of beauty.

Title: Նշմարեմ
Definition_1: to catch a glimpse of, to see imperfectly, to perceive, to discover, to examine, to observe, to regard; զերկիր —, to cast the eyes down, to look on the ground.

Title: Նշմարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to let see, regard or perceive.

Title: Նշողեմ
Definition_1: to glitter, to glisten, to shine, to sparkle, to flash.

Title: Նշոյլ
Definition_1: light, shining; reflex, glimmer; — խնդութեան, ray or beam of joy; աղօտ, մռայլ —, faint glimmer, dim light.

Title: Նշուտ
Definition_1: full of almonds; abounding in almond-trees.

Title: Նշտրակ
Definition_1: lancet; incision-knife or surgical-knife, bistoury; — պայտարաց, fleam.

Title: Նողկտալի
Definition_1: nauseous, loathsome, fulsome; disgusting, detestable; tiresome.

Title: Նողկտամ
Definition_1: to be disgusted, to loathe, to feel sick or inclined to vomit; to abhor, to detest, to turn from with disgust.

Title: Նողկանք
Definition_1: disgust, nausea, qualms, rising of the stomach; abomination.

Title: Նողկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to disgust, to nauseate, to make loathe or sick of; to repugnate, to cause to abhor; to tire, to weary.

Title: Նոյն
Definition_1: himself, herself, itself; he, she, it;
Definition_3: ditto, do, idem or id; the same, of the same kind, after the same manner, equally, conformably, identically; մի եւ —, the same; ի —, ի նմին, together, all at once;
Definition_4: ի —, — ընդ —, ընդ —ս իսկ, ի մի եւ ի —, ի նմին ժամանակի, -ժամայն, —հետայն, soon, very soon, quickly, in the same moment, immediately, directly; — գործել, to identify.

Title: Նմին՞՞՞իրի
Definition_1: for which reason, therefore, wherefore, on that account; consequently.

Title: Նոյնաբանեմ
Definition_1: to say over and over again, to repeat, to tautologize.

Title: Նոյնաբանութիւն
Definition_1: repetition of wordsrhet. tautology; literal translation.

Title: Նոյնազաւակ
Definition_1: being as brothers, having, as it were, the same father.

Title: Նոյնանամ
Definition_1: to be the same or identical, to become identified; to unite with, to be equal.

Title: Նոյնանուն
Definition_1: of the same name; cf. Համանուն.

Title: Նոյնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to identify; to unite, to equal.

Title: Նոյնպէս
Definition_1: after the same manner, in like manner, equally, as much as, as well as, also, idem;
Definition_2: նոյնպիսի —սւոյ սեաց, even, like, equal, alike, the same.

Title: Նոյնօրին
Definition_1: in the same day; immediately, forthwith.

Title: Նոր
Definition_1: new, fresh, young; novel, recent, modern; strange, extraordinary, curious; inexperienced, unpracticed, new, raw;
Definition_2: newly, lately, freshly, recently; — ինչ, curiosity; — ոմն ղեւոնդիոս, like a second Leontius; — նորոգող բնութեան մերոյ, the renewer of our nature; ամիս —ոց, the month of first fruits; —, cf. Նորանոր; ի —ումն or —ումս, at present; under the new dispensation, according to the christian law; now, in the present age.

Title: Նորաբեր
Definition_1: recently conceded or granted; — տօն, the new year.

Title: Նորաբոյս
Definition_1: newborn, just brought forth, new, young, tender.

Title: Նորագիւտ
Definition_1: new-fangled, newly invented or discovered, new, recent, modern.

Title: Նորագործ
Definition_1: newly made, new, novel, fresh; strange, surprising, curious, paradoxical.

Title: Նորագործեմ
Definition_1: to renovate, to renew; to restore; to do something new, extraordinary, miraculous.

Title: Նորագործութիւն
Definition_1: renewing; a miracle, an extraordinary or marvelous thing, deed or act.

Title: Նորազուարճ
Definition_1: new and merry; pleasant, grown green or flowering anew.

Title: Նորալուրք
Definition_1: news, novelty; զի՞նչ — իցեն, what news?.

Title: Նորածին
Definition_1: new-born; regenerate; springing up afresh, budding anew; —ծնեալ յաւազանէ, just christened; կին —ծին, recently delivered woman.

Title: Նորակատար
Definition_1: lately finished or ended; young, raw, inexpert.

Title: Նորակերտ
Definition_1: newly built or constructed; strange, stupendous; newly ordained.

Title: Նորակրօնութիւն
Definition_1: innovation or novelty in religious matters; superstition.

Title: Նորահաս
Definition_1: arrived lately; precocious, early, premature; unexpected, sudden; young, fresh.

Title: Նորաձայն
Definition_1: strange, unheard of, innovated, invented or published lately; false, erroneous.

Title: Նորաձեւ
Definition_1: new-fashioned, innovated, newly found out or invented; modish, capricious, fantastical;
Definition_2: —ք, fashion, mode, novelty; նորաձեւս առնել՝ ձեւել՝ մուծանել, cf. Նորաձեւեմ.

Title: Նորաձեւեմ
Definition_1: to innovate, to introduce any novelty or innovation, fashion or mode.

Title: Նորաճաշակ
Definition_1: having a novel taste, agreeable to the palate, delicious, exquisite.

Title: Նորամուտ
Definition_3: —ք, innovation; —ս նորոգել, to introduce innovations or novelties.

Title: Նորամսութիւն
Definition_1: the fir st day of a month.

Title: Նորային
Definition_1: one's own, his or her own.

Title: Նորանամ
Definition_1: to become new, to be renewed; —նայ լուսին, it is new moon.

Title: Նորանշան
Definition_1: prodigious, marvelous, astonishing, surprising, wonderful; unheard of, extraordinary, incredible, paradoxical, phenomenal, monstrous; — ինչ, phenomenon, prodigy, paradox.

Title: Նորանշոյլ
Definition_1: furnished with new light or glory, shining anew; ընդ այգն —, at early dawn, at the first dawning of aurora.

Title: Նորապսակ
Definition_1: newly crowned; — հայրապետն լեւոն ժգ, Leo XIII, lately raised to the pontificate.

Title: Նորասէր
Definition_1: fond of novelty or news, modish, fashionable;

Title: Նորաստեղծում
Definition_1: to create, to recreate, to make anew.

Title: Նորավարժ
Definition_1: inexperienced, unpracticed, inexpert, young, novice; — ձի, unbroken horse.

Title: Նորատեսակ
Definition_1: of a new kind or sort.

Title: Նորատունկ
Definition_3: neophyte.

Title: Նորացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make new, to renew, to renovate.

Title: Նորափետուր
Definition_2: made young again, renewed, revived; — զարդարիլ, to moult, to get new-feathers, to put on new plumage;
Definition_3: to grow young again, to be revived.

Title: Նորափթիթ
Definition_1: new-budded, new-blossomed, freshblown; — ծաղիկ, a tender or new-budding flower; — գեղ գարնայնոյ, budding graces of spring; — ստինք, budding breasts.

Title: Նորեկ
Definition_2: newly converted; — հարսն, bride, new-married; — եղբայր, novice; — ի հաւատս, neophyte.

Title: Նորընծայ
Definition_1: newly offered, dedicated, ordained or consecrated; starting in life, entering in a profession or career, making one's outset;

Title: Նորընծայութիւն
Definition_1: outset, first steps, starting, setting out; novitiate, probationership, time of probation.

Title: Նորընտիր
Definition_1: newly elected or chosen; — աբբայ, a — Abbot-General; — լինել, to enroll fresh troops, to recruit anew.

Title: Նորի
Definition_2: —ք, first-fruits, premices; օր նորեաց, first-fruit's day.

Title: Նորոգեմ
Definition_1: mend, to do up, to repair, to restore to the first condition or state, to put in good or better condition; to regenerate, to reform;
Definition_2: to renew, to renovate, to revive, to re-establish; — զնկար, to restore a picture.

Title: Նորոգիմ
Definition_1: to be renewed, restored, regenerated, re-established;
Definition_2: to revive, to come to life again.

Title: Նորոգումն
Definition_1: renewing, renovation, restoration, reparation, mending; reform, reformation; new birth, regeneration; growing young again; cf. Տոմար.

Title: Նորօրէն
Definition_1: in a new, unheard of or extraordinary manner, prodigiously;

Title: Նորօրինակ
Definition_1: unexampled, strange, new, extraordinary, prodigious, unusual.

Title: Նու
Complement: նուոյ, ով, աւ, նուք, նուոց, նուանք, աց

Title: Նուագ
Definition_1: music, song, air, tune, melody, strain; sonnet; cup, goblet, bowl, mug; fashion, manner; bout, time; երեքսրբեան —, trisagium, agiology; յօրինել —ս, to modulate, to sing; հեշտացուցանել զ—ս, to make a sweet concert or harmony; զյաղթութեան —ս երգել, to sing an epinicion, a triumphal song; fashion, manner; bout, time; զառաջին —ն, յառաջնում —ի, the first time; ի բազում —ս, ի —ս բազումս, յայլ եւ այլ —ս, more than once, several or many times, over and over again; ի միումն —ի, once, at once; all at once; զմի — եւս, once more; վասն միոյ —ի, առ մի —, for once; զայս մի եւս —, more, once again; յերկարագոյն —օք զբանիւք անկանել, to be prolix, to prolong the discourse; յերկարագոյն —օք, long, a great while or time; զվեց օրն մի մի —, once a day for six days; լուր զայս վերջին —, hear for the last time; cup, goblet, bowl, mug; — ոսկի, golden cup or goblet.

Title: Նուագարան
Definition_1: musical instrument; music-book or song-book; — փչողական, բերանաւոր, լեզուակաւոր, wind, mouth, reed instruments.

Title: Նուագաւորեմ
Definition_1: to present the wine-cup, to hand a wine-glass.

Title: Նուագեմ
Definition_1: to sing; to give out the tune, to strike up; to play on a musical instrument, to execute, to perform; — ընդ ումեք, to accompany; — սրնդաւ, to play the flute.

Title: Նուազ
Definition_1: of little consequence, inconsiderable, few in number; lesser, smaller, very slight, weak, little; thin, slender; base, low, vile;
Definition_2: not so much, less but little, not over; ոչ ինչ —, not less, not fewer; յաւէտ կամ —, more or less; ոչ յաւէտ եւ ոչ —, neither more nor less; — առնել, cf. Նուազեցուցանեմ.

Title: Նուազեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to diminish, to reduce in bulk, to make less, to lessen, to reduce; to deduct, to abate, to retrench, to abbreviate, to shorten; to lower, to disparage, to depreciate; to extenuate, to emaciate, to attenuate; to eclipse, to throw into the shade; — զդինս, to lower the price, to cheapen; — զարժէս, to depreciate, to debase the value.

Title: Նուազիմ
Definition_1: to diminish, to grow less, to decrease; to be lessened, abated, lowered, brought down;

Title: Նուազումն
Definition_1: diminution, lessening, decrease, extenuation; want of, deficiency in, scarcity; rarity; discount, reduction, lowering; decline, wane, waning; eclipse; — գնոյ, reduction in price, abatement; երթալ ի —ումն, to fall, to decay, to decline.

Title: Նուաղ
Definition_1: languid, languishing, weak, drooping, feeble, faint, pining away; less; dark, obscure;

Title: Նուաղեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to languish, to make languid, to weaken, to enfeeble, to debilitate, to enervate, to cause to pine away; to darken, to obscure, to dim; to eclipse; to diminish.

Title: Նուաղիմ
Definition_1: to faint, to fail, to lose one's senses, to fall fainting, to fall into a swoon, to swoon or faint away; to languish, to grow weak, to wear oneself out; to diminish, to grow less, to decrease; to become dim, obscure, to be eclipsed; —ղեալ անկանել, to fall senseless; —ղի սիրտ իմ, my heart grows faint within me.

Title: Նուաղումն
Definition_1: swoon, fainting, languor, languidness, weakness, fainting-fit, syncope; diminution, lessening, decrease.

Title: Նուաճեմ
Definition_1: to subdue, to vanquish, to conquer, to master, to keep under, to subject, to subjugate, to enslave, to reduce to slavery; յինքն —, to take possession of, to make oneself master; — զզայրոյթ, to repress one's anger or resentment.

Title: Նուաճումն
Definition_1: subjection, enslaving, submission, obedience; detention, possession.

Title: Նուաստ
Definition_1: humble, low, inferior, poor, mean, sorry, ignore, vile, contemptible, cringing, servile.

Title: Նուաստախոհ
Definition_1: low-spirited, poor-witted, weak-minded, abject, vile; meek, gentle, lowly in heart; — միտք, little minds.

Title: Նուաստախոհութիւն
Definition_1: weakness of intellect; meekness, lowliness, humility.

Title: Նուաստանամ
Definition_1: to humble, debase, undervalue or degrade oneself.

Title: Նուաստացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to humble, to abase, to lower, to degrade, to disparage; — զանձն, to humble or degrade oneself.

Title: Նուաստութիւն
Definition_1: abasement, undervaluing, humiliation, abjection, baseness, degradation, meanness, vileness; առանց նուաստութեան, without meanness.

Title: Նուարտակ
Definition_1: dittander, lepidium, cock's-foot; fumaria, fumiter, fumitory;

Title: Նուէր
Definition_1: offer, offering, present, oblation; libation; sacrifice; —ք, liberality; cf. Ձօնի; հաց նուիրաց, shew-bread; արգադիր —, votive-offering.

Title: Նուիրաբեր
Definition_1: carrying and offering a present, offering.

Title: Նուիրագործեմ
Definition_1: to sacrifice, to celebrate mysteries; to consecrate, to offer.

Title: Նուիրակ
Definition_1: usher, sheriff's officer, sergeant, lictor; nuncio; deputy; cf. Նուիրանոց.

Title: Նուիրական
Definition_1: sacred, consecrated, holy, divine; — եւ փրկաւէտ երգ, toast, health.

Title: Նուիրատուր
Definition_1: offering, that offers the first-fruits to the Church.

Title: Նուիրեմ
Definition_1: to offer, to present, to give; to dedicate, to vow, to devote; to ordain; to consecrate; to sacrifice; — or — նուէրս, to pour out libations to; — զանձն, to devote, to sacrifice oneself; — զդիս, to honour idols with offering;
Definition_2: —եալ, to be ordained or consecrated; — կռոց, consecrated to idols.

Title: Նուիրումն
Definition_1: offer, oblation; dedication, inauguration; — անձին, selfsacrifice, devotion.

Title: Նուշ
Definition_1: almond; դառն —, bitter -; իւղ նշոյ, almond-oil; կիթ նշոյ, milk of almonds; — շաքարապատ, sugar-plums; բլիթ ի նշոյ, crisp almond, almond-paste.

Title: Նուռն
Definition_1: pomegranate; նռան ծաղիկ, flower of wild-tree.

Title: Նուս
Definition_1: cf. Նուք; ի — երիվարի ելանել, նստել, to mount on horseback, to take horse.

Title: Նուրբ
Definition_1: subtile, fine, slender, tenuous, lank, thin, slim; narrow;
Definition_3: finespun, subtile, difficult, abstruse, obscure, profound;
Definition_4: subtilely; — ձայն, shrill voice; — մտօք, subtle, acute, shrewd, perspicacious.

Title: Նպաստ
Definition_1: aid, assistance, succour, help, favour, subsidy, support, relief, resource, means;
Definition_2: ի —, in support of, on behalf or in favour of; — մատուցանել, to aid, to succour, to help; to care, to take care; — լինել, cf. Նպաստեմ.

Title: Նպաստեմ
Definition_1: to help, to assist, to succour, to relieve; to second, to favour, to supply, to serve, to contribute.

Title: Նպատակ
Definition_1: aim, butt, level, end; premium, prize;
Definition_2: object, goal, end, scope, view, purpose, design, intent; կէտ —ի, aim; ուղղել ի —ն, to take aim at, to aim, to level at, to point; հարկանել ի —ն, to hit the mark;
Definition_3: to attain one's end; առնուլ կամ յափշտակել զ—ն, to obtain the premium, to win the prize.

Title: Նպարակեմ
Definition_1: to victual, to provide with food.

Title: Նսեմ
Definition_1: dark, dull, obscure, sad, gloomy, horrid;

Title: Նսեմանամ
Definition_1: to begin to lower, to darken, to become cloudy; to be darkened, obscured, overclouded, eclipsed, tarnished.

Title: Նսեմաստուեր
Definition_1: obscure, gloomy, dismal; — խաւար thick darkness.

Title: Նսեմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to darken, to bedim, to blacken, to offuscate, to tarnish; to eclipse.

Title: Նստեմ
Definition_1: to lower, to diminish; — զերկաթ, to fine down, to make subtile, to sharpen.

Title: Նստիմ
Definition_1: to sit down, to be seated; to repose; to lodge, to reside, to dwell; to be settled, to be resident; — զօրաց, to be encamped, to encamp; շուրջ — զքաղաքաւ, to besiege, to blockade, to block up; ի դարան —, to lie in ambush, in wait; to plot; — ի սեղան, to sit down to table; — յաթոռ ի պէտս, to go to stool, to evacuate; — յինքեան, to retire from business, to live alone; — ի վերայ աւանդի, to neglect one's deposit.

Title: Նստոց
Definition_1: seat, residence; — փեթակի, the bottom of a bee-hive.

Title: Նստուցանեմ
Definition_1: to place on a seat, to seat, to place, to put; to push in, to thrust; — զզօրս, to encamp, to pitch a camp; — զքաղաքաւ, to besiege.

Title: Նրբաբայեմ
Definition_1: to subtilize, to refine, to cavil, to sophisticate.

Title: Նրբամասնաբար
Definition_1: like atoms, with very fine particles.

Title: Նրբամարմին
Definition_1: snaky, lanky, thin, slender, slim, delicate, spare.

Title: Նրբամիտ
Definition_1: subtle-minded, sharp-witted, subtle, piercing, keen, sagacious, witty.

Title: Նրբամտութիւն
Definition_1: sharp wit, subtle-mindedness, subtlety, sagacity, perspicacity, penetration.

Title: Նրբանամ
Definition_1: to be refined, to become more cunning or subtle.

Title: Նրբացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to subtilize, to refine; to make thinner, to sharpen, to point.

Title: Նքթիմ
Definition_1: to be very hungry, to exhaust, to die, to pine away with hunger, to be dying of hunger, to be starved to death, to die of starvation.

Title: Նքթի
Definition_1: exhausted or dying with hunger, famished, languid.

Title: Նքողիմ
Definition_1: to languish, to become faint, languid, to wear oneself out, to faint, to swoon.

Title: Նօսրահող
Definition_1: having but a thin stratum of earth.

Title: Նօտարեմ
Definition_1: to write running hand; to draw up a deed.

Title: <letter>Շ</letter> (cha)
Definition_1: the twenty third letter of the alphabet, and the eighteenth of the consonants; five hundred, five hundredth.

Title: Շաբաթ
Definition_1: sabbath, sabbath-day, day of rest; repose, rest; saturday; week; աւագ, մեծ —, holy saturday; աւագ —, holy week; — —ուց, the grand or holy sabbath; —է ի —, ի —ու —ու, every week, weekly; — ի —է, from one sabbath to another; վարձել ի —ս, to let weekly; պղծել զ—, to break the sabbath; խտրանք —ու, sabbatism; ըստ —ու ճանապարհի, a sabbath day's journey;

Title: Շաբաթամուտ
Definition_1: officer on duty for the week, septimarian; sabbath-eve.

Title: Շաբաթանամ
Definition_1: to keep, to observe sabbath; to cease from work, to repose, to rest; to be out of work.

Title: Շաբաթապահ
Definition_2: sabbatarian; priest whose week it is to officiate;
Definition_3: —ք, weekly fast or abstinence.

Title: Շաբաթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to keep the sabbath; to cause to rest or repose from work, to celebrate the sabbath.

Title: Շաբաթաւոր
Definition_1: septimarian, whose week it is to be on duty.

Title: Շաբաթումն
Definition_1: keeping the sabbath; cessation from labour, rest, holiday, vacation.

Title: Շագանակ
Definition_1: chestnut; հնդիկ —, horse chestnut; — մեծ, great or large chestnut.

Title: Շալակեմ
Definition_1: to put on the shoulders, to load;
Definition_2: to load oneself with, to take upon one's back.

Title: Շականջեմ
Definition_1: to prick up the ears, to listen attentively.

Title: Շահ
Definition_1: profit, interest, fruit, gain, lucre; advantage, good, benefit, utility, emolument; interest, usury; — օգտի or օգտութեան, utility; սէր —ու, love of lucre; ի — օգտի իւրեանց, for their advantage; for the benefit of them; ոչ առ ի — ինչ օգտի բարբառիմ, be sure I speak disinterestedly; ի —ս հարկանիլ, —ու զհետ լինել, կրթիլ, մտանել, to become avaricious, to be greedy of gain; — բերել, to be profitable, to profit, to produce gains; բառնալ զ— ուրուք, to clip a person's profits or gains; ի — ածել, to invest, to put out at interest, cf. Շահեցուցանեմ; some dance; —ս առնել, to dance; shah; — պարսից, Shah or king of Persia.

Title: Շահաբեր
Definition_1: profitable, lucrative, advantageous, gainful, fruitful, proficuous; նաւ —, merchant-ship.

Title: Շահապետ
Definition_2: guardian; — դաշտաց, dryad; — անտառաց, sylvan, satyr.

Title: Շահասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of gain, selfishness, covetousness, venality.

Title: Շահավաճառ
Definition_1: cf. Շահավաճառութիւն; trader, merchant; — լինել, to trade, to traffic, to deal.

Title: Շահատակեմ
Definition_1: to face, to brave, to attack valorously, to assail, to lead the onset.

Title: Շահատակումն
Definition_1: attack, assault, valour, bravery, military expedition or enterprise, deeds, feats of arms, exploits; success, conquest, victory.

Title: Շահաւոր
Definition_1: profitable, advantageous, useful, fruitful, lucrative, interesting.

Title: Շահաւորեմ
Definition_1: to gain, to obtain, to acquire, to purchase; to buy.

Title: Շահաւորիմ
Definition_1: to do good, to help, to avail; to profit, to derive advantage, to turn to account.

Title: Շահեկանութիւն
Definition_1: fruit, profit, advantage, gain, lucre; fertility, fecundity; enjoyment, pleasure, ease.

Title: Շահեմ
Definition_1: to cause to gain or profit.

Title: Շահեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to be lucrative or profitable; to invent money profitably;

Title: Շահիմ
Definition_1: to gain or profit by, to make a profit, to draw an emolument from; to obtain, to win, to carry away or off; բազումս —, to gain much, to make a great profit; — զկեանս, to escape, to save oneself from peril; — զմահ, to escape death, to have a narrow or hair breadth escape; — զվիշտս եւ զվնաս, to avoid this harm and loss, not to suffer, to escape suffering;
Definition_2: — զոք, to edify, to set a good example; չիք ինչ շահելոյ, there is nothing to be gained.

Title: Շաղախ
Definition_1: cement, mortar; lute; slime, mire, mud; caltrop; star-thistle;

Title: Շաղախեմ
Definition_1: to cement, to plaster; to smear, to dirty, to soil, to contaminate; — զձեռս արեամբ, to imbrue one's hands in blood.

Title: Շաղախիմ
Definition_1: to be splashed, soiled, dirtied; to imbibe, to absorb, to drink in, to soak up.

Title: Շաղակրատ
Definition_1: great talker, babbler, chatterer, tattler; talebearer, scold;

Title: Շաղակրատեմ
Definition_1: to prate, to chat, to babble, to tattle, to prattle.

Title: Շաղաղեմ
Definition_1: to wrest; to stammer, to stutter.

Title: Շաղաշարեմ
Definition_1: to entwine, to connect, to combine; to compaginate.

Title: Շաղաշարիմ
Definition_1: to be entwined, joined; to be attached, stuck; to conjoin, to match, to be coupled.

Title: Շաղաշարումն
Definition_1: conjunction, connection; interweaving, intertwining, wreathing; copulation.

Title: Շաղաշուտ
Definition_1: vagabond, good-for-nothing, wretch, scamp, blackguard, scoundrel;

Title: Շաղաշտութիւն
Definition_1: scoundrelism, meanness, bare-facedness, impudence, debauchery, licentiousness, libertinage.

Title: Շաղապատեմ
Definition_1: to twine, to twist; to implicate, to involve.

Title: Շաղապատիմ
Definition_1: to entwine, to twist round each other; to be coupled.

Title: Շաղեմ
Definition_1: to implicate, to involve; to mix, to mingle, to knead; to dilute; to soil, to stain.

Title: Շաղիղ
Definition_1: raw flesh; carrion, carcass, dead body.

Title: Շաղիմ
Definition_1: to be mixed, kneaded; wrapt together, united;

Title: Շաղկապեմ
Definition_1: to join together, to conjoin, to unite.

Title: Շաղփաղփ
Definition_2: prattling, tattling, cackling; foolish, absurd; silly, insipid, mawkish.

Title: Շաղփաղփանք
Definition_1: idle stories, idle talk, chit-chat, tittle-tattle, cackle, talking to the wind; folly, nonsense, extravagance, absurdity; silliness, dotage, second infancy.

Title: Շաղփաղփիմ
Definition_1: to talk nonsense, to tell idle stories, to babble, to gossip, to cackle, to tittle-tattle; to dote, to rave.

Title: Շաղփաղփութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Շաղփաղփանք; ի շաղփաղփութիւն զառածիլ, to rave, to be delirious or frenetic.

Title: Շամանդաղ
Definition_1: fog, haze, mist; obscurity; atom, corpuscle;
Definition_3: — աչաց, suffusion, cataract.

Title: Շամբշաբանեմ
Definition_1: to talk nonsense, to prate foolishly.

Title: Շամբշիմ
Definition_1: to become mad, to play the fool, to commit folly; to rage, to be in a fury, to be mad for, to eagerly long for, to fall madly in love, to be desperately in love, to be agitated by violent transports for, to love to distraction, to dote upon; to be wanton, lustful; — ի կանայս, to woo, to court, to rave, to be in love to extremity.

Title: Շամբշութիւն
Definition_2: violent passion, love, fury, transport, gallantry, love intrigue; debauchery, lewdness.

Title: Շամբուշ
Definition_2: carried away by passion, furious, maniac, mad for, dotingly fond of, lovestricken; lewd, libidinous.

Title: Շամբուտ
Definition_1: full of canes or reeds; — տեղի, cane-brake.

Title: Շամփրեմ
Definition_1: to spit, to put upon the spit; to run or to pierce through and through, to transpierce.

Title: Շանագլուխ
Definition_3: cynocephalus, baboon, monkey;
Definition_4: dog's-head.

Title: Շանդ
Definition_1: thunderbolt, lightning, thunder; fire, spark, flash; red hot iron; ingot; հրավառ, բոցավառ, կայծակնացայտ, հրաշունչ, սպառնալից, ահաւոր —, the burning, flaming, gleaming, smoking, threatening, dreadful thunderbolt; —ս արձակել, to hurl thunderbolts, to fulminate; հրացեալ —իւք պսակել զոք, to crown with a bent, red hot spit.

Title: Շանթակէզ
Definition_1: burning like a thunderbolt; — առնել, to fulminate, to strike with lightning; — լինել, to be lightning-struck.

Title: Շանթահար
Definition_2: with a thunder-clap; like a clap of thunder; — լինել, to be struck by lightning, to be thunder-struck.

Title: Շանթահարեմ
Definition_1: to fulminate, to strike with lightning.

Title: Շանթեքար
Definition_1: meteoric stone, meterolite; cf. Երկնաքար; cf. Օդաքար.

Title: Շանթընկէց
Definition_2: — բարկութիւն, thunder, cf. Շանթ, cf. Կայծակն; — ամպք, thunder-cloud.

Title: Շանսխուր
Definition_1: price of a dog; hire of a prostitute.

Title: *Շաշորդ
Definition_1: maker or dealer in milk products.

Title: Շաչեմ
Definition_1: to make a noise, to rumble, to clash; to clack, to crack, to crackle; to boil violently, to burst, to blow up; to shiver, to crepitate; to rustle, to murmur; to thunder, to detonate; — սողնոց, to hiss; to whistle; to whiz; — մեղուաց, ճանճից, to buzz, to hum.

Title: Շաչումն
Definition_1: noise, burst, crackling, crash; rustling, rumbling; report, clap, explosion; resounding; gurgling, murmur.

Title: Շապիկ
Definition_1: shirt, linen; — քահանայական, alb; — սարկաւագաց, դպրաց, rochet, surplice; dalmatic, tunic; — կանանց, chemise, shift.

Title: Շապկեմ
Definition_1: to incrust, to plaster, to coat.

Title: Շառագոյն
Definition_1: red, reddish; — աչք կամ երեսք, fiery or flashing eyes; cf. Տենդ.

Title: Շառագունեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to blush, to put to the blush, to shame, to confound.

Title: Շառագունիմ
Definition_1: to blush, to redden with shame, to be ashamed, confounded; —նեցան երեսք նորա ի ցասմանէ, his face flushed with anger.

Title: Շառաշիղ
Definition_1: mass of rock salt; — սառի, block of ice; iceberg.

Title: Շառաչ
Definition_1: cf. Շաչիւն; ի շաչելոյ կառաց նորա, եւ ի շառաչելոյ անուոցն նորա, at the rushing of his chariots, and at the rumbling of his chariot-wheels.

Title: Շառաւիղ
Definition_2: offspring, scion, sons, descendants, posterity; beam of light, gleam, ray; branch, part, member of body;
Definition_3: cf. Ճառագայթ; — արմատոյ, root-tips; — անուոյ, spoke of wheel; — օրհնութեան, blessed offspring; — դառնութեան, accursed progeny.

Title: Շառաւիղեմ
Definition_1: to send forth shoots, to throw out suckers, to sprout, to shoot, to bud, to put forth buds, to germinate; to generate, to procreate; to emit rays, to beam.

Title: Շատ
Definition_1: much, several, considerable, abundant, plentiful, copious, in great quantity;
Definition_2: much, too much, very, most; enough, sufficiently, as much as necessary; — անգամ, often, frequently, cf. Բազում անգամ; — իսկ, sufficiently; — կամ սակաւ, more or less; ընդ — եւ ընդ սակաւ, in all about; փոքր ի —է, somewhat, partly, a little; more or less; ոչ ընդ — եւ ընդ փոքր, in no wise, in no way;
Definition_3: — է, enough, it is enough, sufficient, no more, cf. Բաւական է; — է այդ, that is enough; — է զի, it suffices that; provided that; — ասել, to be content; — համարիլ, to content oneself with; —ք յայնցանէ, most of them, the greatest part of them; դեռ աւուր — կայ, much time still remains; ո՞չ իցէ քեզ — զի..., does it seem to you a little thing that.

Title: Շատախօս
Definition_1: talkative, verbose, loquacious, garrulous; prating, chattering, tattling, prattling;

Title: Շատախօսութիւն
Definition_1: multitude of words, loquacity, garrulousness; chit-chat, babble, tattle, prattle.

Title: Շատակեր
Definition_1: eating a great deal, great eater, glutton, gormandizer, voracious, devouring, ravenous.

Title: Շատանամ
Definition_1: to content oneself, to be content, to take up; to suffice, to be sufficient or enough; to multiply, to increase; սակաւուք, փոքու, to be satisfied or content with a little, with any thing.

Title: Շատաշրջող
Definition_2: vagabond, vagrant, roamer, stroller, idler, lounger, loiterer; — լինել, to stroll, to roam, to rove, to ramble, to wander.

Title: Շատաջուր
Definition_1: having a great deal of water, abounding with water; aqueous.

Title: Շատացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to content, to satisfy; to augment, to multiply.

Title: Շատխօսեմ
Definition_1: to talk too much, to use vain repetitions, to gossip, to prate, to chatter; to boast, to brag.

Title: Շատութիւն
Definition_1: great number of, great quantity, great deal, multitude, abundance, plenty.

Title: Շար
Definition_1: string, file, line, range, row, rank, order, long string, concatenation, chain, series, suite, train; multitude, great number; composition; —ք մարգարտաց, string of pearls; ոսկի —, gold chain; —ք լերանց, mountain-chain; — ճանճից, swarm or lot of flies; — մրջմանց, swarm of ants; anthill; — շանց, pack, number of dogs; — ազգաբանութեան, genealogy; ի —ի հարկանել, to register, to record, to set or write down; ի —ի արկանել, to string, to range, to rank; ի — արկեալ թուել, to enumerate, to number, to count; ի միում —ի հարեալ ընդ մի համարել, to be enumerated in the same series; յանտեղեաց —ին է այս, it is very far from the purpose.

Title: Շարաբանեմ
Definition_1: to compose, to write; to ratiocinate, to make a syllogism.

Title: Շարագիր
Definition_1: composer, writer, author; cf. Շարագրած; letter, character.

Title: Շարագոյր
Definition_1: cover; veil; — գրոց, cover or binding of a book, book-cover.

Title: Շարագրած
Definition_1: composition, wording; work, writing, works, treatise; memory, monument.

Title: Շարագրեմ
Definition_1: to compose, to write, to word, to put down in writing; to compile.

Title: Շարադասեմ
Definition_1: to range, to arrange in order, to set to rights, to dispose, to put in order, to lay out.

Title: Շարադրական
Definition_1: compound; composed; arranged, put in order; prosaic.

Title: Շարադրեմ
Definition_1: to put together, in order, to arrange, to re-unite, to connect, to join, to combine; to construct, to make, to form; cf. Շարագրեմ.

Title: Շարադրութիւն
Definition_1: combination, conjunction, connection; arrangement, disposition; construction;

Title: Շարալծեմ
Definition_1: to conjoin, to join with, to unite.

Title: Շարախառնեմ
Definition_1: to mix together, to compound, to intermix, to intermingle.

Title: Շարածեմ
Definition_1: to arrange, to place or put in order.

Title: Շարակցեմ
Definition_1: to conjoin, to chain or link together.

Title: Շարամանեմ
Definition_1: to interlace, to interweave, to intertwine, to lace, to join, to unite.

Title: Շարայարեմ
Definition_1: to reunite, to join together; to continue, to join, to add.

Title: Շարաւ
Definition_1: pus, matter, ichor, sanies, purulence; rottenness; stench, stink; — առնուլ; to effervesce, to swell, to become inflamed.

Title: Շարաւածոր
Definition_1: purulent, full of pus or sanies, ichorous, sanious, putrid, rotten, fetid.

Title: Շարաւահոտ
Definition_1: stinking, fetid; շարաւ արիւն, corrupt blood; cf. Շարաւահոտութիւն.

Title: Շարեմ
Definition_1: to range, to arrange, to set or put in order, to dispose; to marshal; — զմարգարիտս, to string pearls; — զնշանագիրս, to compose.

Title: Շարժեմ
Definition_1: to move, to remove, to set in motion, to stir, to cause, to move; to agitate, to shake, to flutter, to stagger;
Definition_2: to excite, to provoke, to rouse the feelings of, to move, to touch; — զգլուխ, to shake or toss one's head; — զամենայն քար, to leave no stone unturned, to move heaven and earth; — զսիրտ, to affect, to move to pity.

Title: Շարժիմ
Definition_1: to be moved, stirred, shaken, staggered; fluttered, roused, agitated; to bestir oneself, to bustle about.

Title: Շարժուած
Definition_1: movement; gesture, action; սաստիկ or տարապայման —, gesticulation; —ս առնել ի խօսելն, to gesticulate while speaking; սաստիկ —ս առնել ի խօսելն, to gesticulate, to be too full of action.

Title: Շարժումն
Definition_1: movement, motion, stir, stirring, nod, shake, toss; fluctuation, staggering; excitation, provocation;
Definition_2: agitation, motion, impulse, commotion, emotion; gesture, action; earthquake;
Definition_3: movement; զշարժմունս երակաց զննել, to feel the pulse; cf. Ընդոստ.

Title: Շարժուն
Definition_2: առաջին —, the primum mobile; — ի հողմոյ, shaken by the wind; — եւ անշարժուն ստացուածք, personal and landed property.

Title: Շարոց
Definition_1: file, row; — քաղցրաւենեաց, cf. Շոպագ; — մարգարտաց, pearl necklace.

Title: Շարումն
Definition_1: the setting in order, arranging; marshalling.

Title: Շարունակեմ
Definition_1: to contain, to enclose, to conserve; to continue, to last.

Title: Շաւիղ
Definition_1: path, road, way, passage; trace, vestige, footprint;
Definition_3: — մոլորակի, orbit of a planet; — երկաթակուռ, cf. Երկաթուղի.

Title: Շաքար
Definition_1: sugar; մաքուր, սպիտակ, refined or lump -; խակ —, moist, brown or raw -; — վանի —, candy; գործատուն —ի, sugar-mill; զտարան —ի, rugar-refinery; համեմել —աւ, to —, to sweeten, to strew or sprinkle with -.

Title: Շեղ
Definition_2: առ ի —, առ —, slopingly, overthwart, slanting, aslope; obliquely; cf. Շեղապէս.

Title: Շեղեմ
Definition_1: to bend, to bow; to cause to deviate or to swerve.

Title: Շեղիմ
Definition_1: to slant, to slope, to incline;
Definition_2: to go astray, to turn aside or away, to deviate, to swerve, to go out of one's way; շեղեալ անկիւն, oblique angle; շեղեալ քառանկիւն, rhomboid.

Title: Շեղջ
Definition_1: heap, mass, pile, stock, hoard, accumulation; — ցորենոյ, stack, rick; — խոտոյ, hay-cock, mow; — — or —ս —ս, cf. Շեղջաշեղջ; — կուտել, կուտել —ս —ս, to heap up, to pile up.

Title: Շեղջակոյտ
Definition_1: cf. Շեղջ ;pile upon pile, towering heaps.

Title: Շեղջակուտեմ
Definition_1: to collect, gather or heap together, to heap up, to amass, to pile up, to accumulate, to hoard; —կուտեալ մեղօք, laden with sins.

Title: Շեշտ
Definition_3: an Armenian note;
Definition_4: cf. Շեշտակի; — ոլորիլ, to end in a point.

Title: Շեշտակի
Definition_1: acutely, pointedly, piercingly, sharply, keenly; instantly.

Title: Շեշտեմ
Definition_1: to aim or level a blow at;

Title: Շեշտոլորակ
Definition_1: word accented on the last syllable; barytone.

Title: Շեշտումն
Definition_1: ending in a point, tapering, pyramidal form; ի — անկանիլ, to taper, to end in a point; ի — յանգեալ, pyramidal, pointed;

Title: Շեպ
Definition_2: declivity, slope; անկանել ի —, to fall in one's back, to fall supine.

Title: Շերտ
Definition_1: splinter of wood, chip, lath, strip, slip, part, morsel; — պտղոց, slice, bit, piece; — տակառաց, barrel-stave; — կերպասու, strip of fine linen; — ընդ — ստեղանցն, through the balustrade.

Title: Շերտակոտոր առնեմ
Definition_1: to chip, to cut into chips or in pieces, to shiver, to shatter.

Title: Շերտաւոր
Definition_1: provided with a hatchet; armed with a spear; striped, streaked, streaky; — զօր, sapper; pikeman; cf. Շերտափակ՞՞՞փեղկ.

Title: Շերտափակ՞՞՞փեղկ
Definition_1: blinds, Venetian blinds; — փակել, to surround with trenches, to circumvallate, to palisade.

Title: Շերտեմ
Definition_1: to bark in strips, to streak, to stripe;

Title: Շէկ
Definition_1: of fawn colour, reddish, leonine, light, tawny.

Title: Շէն
Definition_1: inhabited place; village, hamlet; inhabitation; edifice;
Definition_2: peopled, inhabited; in good state, prosperous; fertile, fruitful; happy, gay; ոչ միայն —ս, այլեւ յանշէնս, not only in inhabited but also in desert places; եւ որ —ն մնասցէ, and that which shall not be destroyed.

Title: Շիգղ
Definition_1: buckle, clasp, hasp, button; decoration; — ոսկի, golden buckle or clasp.

Title: Շիթ
Definition_1: small drop, tear; առ —, —ք —ք, drop by drop; — ի բերանոյ, saliva, drivel, slaver, slabber, cf. Լորձն; —ք բանից, few words.

Title: Շիլ
Definition_1: squint-eyed or goggle-eyed; short-sighted or dim-sighted; — ակնարկել, to goggle, to squint, to look askew.

Title: Շիկակարմիր
Definition_1: reddish, red; scarlet; — մորթ խոյոց, morocco, spanish leather; — փայտ, Brasil-wood, queen's wood.

Title: Շիղ
Definition_1: fescue, mote; bit or slip of straw; little branch.

Title: Շիղադէտ
Definition_1: beholding the mote in another's eye;

Title: Շճուկ
Definition_1: whey, buttermilk; serum, serosity; grain spoilt by rain; — արեան, ichor.

Title: Շիճիտակիմ
Definition_1: to be red with eating and drinking.

Title: Շինական
Definition_1: country-man, country-fellow, rustic, peasant, villager; —ք or —եր, the peasants, peasantry, country people;
Definition_2: rustic, gross, rude, impolite, uncivil, clownish, boorish; կին —, country-woman, peasantess; մանուկ —, country lad; աղջիկ —, country lass, cottage girl.

Title: Շինականաշէն
Definition_1: wisely governing and contenting the peasantry.

Title: Շինականութիւն
Definition_2: country manners, rusticity, clownishness, boorishness, awkwardness, rudeness; the peasants, the peasantry.

Title: Շինամէջ
Definition_1: the middle or centre of a village or town.

Title: Շինամուտ լինիմ
Definition_1: to enter the villages or towns.

Title: Շինարար
Definition_1: building many edifices; compiling good regulations.

Title: Շինաւան
Definition_1: habitable place, inhabited town; the universe, the world.

Title: Շինեմ
Definition_1: to found, to build, to erect, to construct, to make; վերստին —, to rebuild, to build up again or anew; to renew, to restore;
Definition_2: to edify, to instruct, to set a good example.

Title: Շինուածոյ
Definition_1: constructed, made, done or got up with art, artificial.

Title: Շինութիւն
Definition_2: edification, moral profit; abundance, ease, prosperity; peace, tranquillity; good regulations.

Title: Շիշ
Definition_1: glass bottle, bottle, phial; alabaster vase; խցել զ—, to cork; to put the stopper on; բանալ զ—, to draw the cork, to uncork; to take the stopper out of.

Title: Շիշակ
Definition_1: lamb of a year old, yearling sheep.

Title: Շիջանիմ
Definition_1: to go out, to be extinguished or quenched;
Definition_2: to be dimmed, obscure; to pass away, to cease, to be buried in oblivion; to cool, to grow cool, to be quenched, to become extinct; to die peaceably.

Title: Շիջելափառ
Definition_1: whose glory is extinguished; inglorious, ignoble.

Title: Շիջուցանեմ
Definition_1: to extinguish, to put out, to quench;
Definition_2: to dim, to cloud, to obscure; to quench, to cool, to allay, to cool down; to stifle, to smother; to exterminate, to kill.

Title: Շիրիմ
Definition_1: tomb, sepulchre, urn, monument; —ք, cemetery; մարմնածախ —, sarcophagus; — հոյակապ, mausoleum; — դատարկ, cenotaph.

Title: Շիրմակից
Definition_1: buried in the same tomb or cemetery.

Title: Շիւ
Definition_1: husks or grapes, grounds or dregs of pressed grapes.

Title: Շլագոյն
Definition_1: somewhat dark, obscure; short or dim-sighted.

Title: Շլանամ
Definition_1: to become shortsighted; squint-eyed; blind; to feel quite dazed, to be dazzled; to grow dim, obscure; to become blunt.

Title: Շլացութիւն
Definition_1: dim-sightedness, squinting, blindness; dazzling, hallucination; հարկանել շլացութեամբ, to strike blind; հարկանել շլացութեամբ զմիտս, to beguile, dazzle, seduce or fascinate the imagination.

Title: Շլացուցանեմ
Definition_2: to dim, to dull, to deaden; — զաչս, to dazzle the eyes; բարեբաղդութիւն —նէ զմեծատունս, prosperity spoils the rich.

Title: Շլմորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to leave in doubt, to create suspicion, to make suspicious, to embarrass, to perplex.

Title: Շլմորիմ
Definition_1: to suspect, to doubt, to be uneasy, embarrassed, perplexed.

Title: Շկահեմ
Definition_1: to whizz, to hiss, to whistle; to sound loud and shrill, to rush, whiz or whir through the air; սուսերք չկահէին ընդ իրեարս շեշտակի, the swords crossed.

Title: Շկահիւն
Definition_1: shrill or loud humming noise, hissing, whizzling; clack; — զինուց, clashing, clash; cf. Թնդիւն.

Title: Շկթիմ
Definition_1: to make a show or parade of, to vaunt in, to boast or brag of, to plume oneself.

Title: Շկօթակ առնեմ
Definition_1: to banish, to exile, to drive away.

Title: Շղաբեր
Definition_1: bearing or carrying a blade of straw or a small branch.

Title: Շղթայ
Definition_1: chain; chain, concatenation, continuity, series; — ոսկի, gold chain; —ք գերութեան, the bonds of slavery; արկանել ի —ս, to chain, to enchain, to put in chains, irons or fetters; խորտակել զ—ս, to break one's chains.

Title: Շղթայագործ
Definition_1: of chain mail, made of rings run one into another; chain-shaped, chained;

Title: Շղթայակապ
Definition_1: enchained, loaded with irons or chains.

Title: Շղթայեմ
Definition_1: to chain, to enchain; to link, join or unite together.

Title: Շճեմ
Definition_1: to be full of serosity, of matter; to liquefy, to be spoiled.

Title: Շմամ
Definition_1: to throw up, to vomit, to eruct or belch from much eating and drinking.

Title: Շմորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to trouble, to perturb, to upset.

Title: Շնական
Definition_1: canine; doggish, cynical; — քաղց, cf. Շնքաղց.

Title: Շնամ
Definition_2: to worship idols, to idolize; to usurp, to ravish.

Title: Շնթեմ
Definition_1: to flatter, to cajole, to coax, to fawn on, to cringe to.

Title: Շնիկ
Definition_2: Canis Minor, Canicula, dog-star, Sirius; բանոնեան —, lapdog; — որսական, beagle; — հրացանի, cock; շնկային աւուրք, dog-days.

Title: Շնկնճիթ
Definition_2: Scylla, nymph beloved by Glaucus and changed into the catulus or spotted shark (sea fish).

Title: Շնորդի
Definition_2: bastard, natural son or daughter; adulterine child.

Title: Շնորհք
Definition_1: grace, Divine grace; favour, good offices, auspices, service, benefit; grace, gracefulness, charm, beauty; agreeableness, pleasing or graceful manners; thanks givings, thanks; forgiveness, pardon, mercy, grace; gift, concession; merit, worth; the Graces; ի —ս, առ —ս, for, in favour of; by favour; ի նորա —ս, —ս նմա առնելով, to please him, to do him the favour, to oblige him; ի —ս երեսաց քոց, thanks to you; in your behalf, for you; —իւ տեառն, թագաւոր..., by the grace of God, king...; — արա, pray, do me the pleasure; լի —օք, most graceful; — or —ս ունել, —ս մատուցանել, to thank, to return thanks, to be thankful to, cf. Շնորհակալ լինել, cf. Գոհանամ; —ս արկանել, to be grateful, to acknowledge; —ս գտանել, to be in favour or in the good graces of, to please; —ս գտանել առաջի or առաջի աչաց ուրուք, to find favour in the sight of any one, to find grace or favour with, to win the good graces of, to please, to be liked; —ս առնել ումեք, to favour, to gratify, to befriend, to forgive, to excuse, to remit, cf. Շնորհեմ, cf. Ներեմ; —աց տալ, to give gratuitously; — ընդ —ս ինչ տալ, to discharge an obligation as if doing a favour; զրկել ի —աց, to disfavour, to disgrace; մեռանել ի —ս, to die in a state of grace, in odour of sanctity; — ունիմ քեզ, thanks, I thank you, much obliged to you; cf. Զեղումն.

Title: Շնորհաբաշխութիւն
Definition_1: distribution of favours; gift of grace.

Title: Շնորհագիւտ
Definition_1: obtaining the divine grace, pleasing to God, favoured, dear, agreeable, grateful.

Title: Շնորհազարդ
Definition_1: endued, adorned with graces, graceful, virtuous.

Title: Շնորհալից
Definition_1: full of grace, most graceful; gracious, handsome, fine, beautiful, charming, genteel, fair.

Title: Շնորհակալեմ
Definition_1: to thank, to give or return thanks, to acknowledge.

Title: Շնորհաշուք
Definition_1: graceful, handsome, charming, genteel, pretty, nice.

Title: Շնորհապարտ
Definition_1: much obliged, very grateful, mindful of benefits received; — գոհութիւն, gratefulness, gratitude, thankfulness; — գտանիլ ումեք, -զանձն դաւանել առ ոք, to be indebted for, to owe, to be under obligations, to be beholden to; — կացուցանել զոք, to oblige a person, to obtain a right to his gratitude; — եմ բիւրուց խնամոցդ, ով եղբայր, I am grateful to you for all your care, my brother.

Title: Շնորհատրութիւն
Definition_1: gift of grace; donation, favour, liberality.

Title: Շնորհաւորեմ
Definition_1: to grant favours, to endue or adorn with favours; to congratulate, to felicitate, to wish joy, to pay compliments.

Title: Շնորհաւորեալ
Definition_1: cf. Շնորհազարդ; cf. Շնորհալից; cf. Շնորհաւոր.

Title: Շնորհեմ
Definition_1: to give as a present or favour, to make a present of, to grant, to accord, to concede, to gratify; to grant pardon, to pardon, to forgive, to remit; cf. Շնորհուկս առնել; չ-, to refuse, not to grant, to withhold, to deny; դու ինձ շնորհեցեր կեանս, I owe you my life.

Title: Շնորհիմ
Definition_1: to be granted, accorded; ի բարութենէ իմմէ շնորհին կեանք ձեր, you owe your life to my forbearance.

Title: Շնորհուկք
Definition_2: —կս or առ —կս, flatteringly, by flattery or adulation; —կս առնել, խօսել, ասել, to do or speak according to a person's known proclivities, to seek to please, to shew a particular regard for, to favour, to flatter, to adulate, to wheedle.

Title: Շնչաբերիմ
Definition_1: to begin to breathe, to fetch breath, to respire; to become animated.

Title: Շնչակապ
Definition_1: out of breath, faint, senseless, exanimate, lifeless; cf. Շնչարգել.

Title: Շնչակեաց
Definition_1: having the breath of life, breathing.

Title: Շնչակից
Definition_2: of the same mind or feeling, unanimous.

Title: Շնչանամ
Definition_1: to be animated, to live, to breathe, to respire.

Title: Շնչասպառ
Definition_2: quite out of breath, panting for breath; — առնել, to put out of breath; — լինել, to put oneself or to be out of breath, to be panting or gasping; — ընթանալ, to run oneself out of breath.

Title: Շնչացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to animate, to give a soul to, to cause to breathe, to vivify.

Title: Շնչաւոր
Definition_2: carnal, sensual, gross; spiritual; — գործիք, wind instruments.

Title: Շնչաւորութիւն
Definition_1: act of breathing, respiration, animation, vitality; sensuality.

Title: Շնչեմ
Definition_1: to breathe, to respire, to puff; to blow; to inspire;
Definition_2: to exhale, to emit; — զօդ, to breathe, to take breath, to respire; զհուր —, to send forth or emit fire, to break into a volcanic eruption; — չարախօսութիւն, to whisper in the ears, to accuse in secret; շնչեսցեն հողմք, let the winds blow; let the storm rage; շնչէ հողմն ուժգին, the wind blows hard; շնչեաց հողմն աջողակ, a fair or favourable wind arose.

Title: Շնչումն
Definition_1: breath, puff, wind; whistling; respiration, breathing; inspiration.

Title: Շնջրի
Definition_1: otter; — ծովային, sea-otter, kind of seal; cf. Վիշապաձուկն.

Title: Շնքաղց
Definition_1: cynorexy, bulimy, canine hunger or appetite.

Title: Շշնջեմ
Definition_1: to whisper, to speak low, to murmur; to hum, to mutter, to grumble; — են ականջք իմ, my ears ring or tingle.

Title: Շշնջումն
Definition_1: whispering, whisper, murmur; noise, rumour; աղօտ —, a hollow or rumbling noise;

Title: Շշուկ
Definition_1: noise, racket, uproar, clatter, hubbub, tumult.

Title: Շոգենաւ
Definition_1: steam vessel, steam-boat, steamer; — թղթաբեր, steam-packet; — պտուտակաւոր, screw-ship; պատերազմիկ —, war-steamer, man-of-war steamer; cf. Նաւ.

Title: Շոգմոգեմ
Definition_1: to tell tales, to spread malicious or false reports, to slander, to speak ill of; to flatter.

Title: Շոգմոգութիւն
Definition_1: evil or malicious reports, delation, story, tale, report, backbiting, slander, scandal; flattery.

Title: Շոհեմ
Definition_1: to starch, to stiffen with starch.

Title: Շող
Definition_1: ray, flash of light, beam; —ս արձակել, to emit or throw out rays, to beam.

Title: Շողակաթ
Definition_1: stream of light, effusion of light; splendour, brightness, glory; cathedral of Etchmiadzin, and the feast of its dedication.

Title: Շողամ
Definition_1: to shoot or throw out rays, to beam, to glitter, to shine, to twinkle, to scintillate, to blaze, to flame, to flash, to glitter, to gleam, to sparkle.

Title: Շողանամ
Definition_1: to get warm, to become heated, to burn.

Title: Շողապէս
Definition_1: like a flash of light, beamingly, radiantly, brilliantly.

Title: Շողացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to shine or to glitter, to give brightness to, to brighten; to warm, to inflame, to render incandescent; to brandish, to rotate.

Title: Շողաւոր
Definition_1: beamy, radiant, shining, effulgent, luminous, brilliant, sparkling, splendid.

Title: Շողիւն
Definition_1: splendour, brightness, blaze, flash; heat, red heat.

Title: Շողոմ
Definition_2: flattery; —ս առնել, to flatter, to toady, to blandish.

Title: Շողոմեմ
Definition_1: to flatter, to palaver, to cajole, to wheedle, to coax; to caress, to fondle.

Title: Շողոմութիւն
Definition_1: adulation, flattery, palaver, cajoling, coaxing, caresses, fondling, wheedling.

Title: Շոճի
Definition_1: pine, pine-tree, fir-tree; պիստակ շոճւոյ, pine-cone;

Title: Շոյտ
Definition_1: quick, light, prompt, active, swift, nimble, agile, brisk, alert;

Title: Շոշականք
Definition_1: show, ostentation, pompous display, parade; շոշականս առնել, to be given up to ostentation.

Title: Շոպշոպեմ
Definition_1: to snatch away, to pluck off, to take away, to ravish, to carry off.

Title: Շորթեմ
Definition_1: to assume wrongfully, to usurp, to appropriate, to take forcible possession of, to ravish, to ascribe or impute to oneself.

Title: Շուայտաբարոյ
Definition_1: intemperate, gluttonous, drunken, crapulous; debauched, dissolute.

Title: Շուայտասէր լինիմ
Definition_1: to take pleasure in crapulence or debauchery.

Title: Շուայտիմ
Definition_1: to give oneself up to debauchery, to eat and drink to excess, to guzzle, to gormandize, to live in gross debauchery.

Title: Շուայտութիւն
Definition_1: low debauchery, guttling, intemperance, surfeit, excess, orgies, drunken revelry.

Title: Շուարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to stun, to astonish, to surprise; to baffle, to puzzle, to bewilder, to make giddy or dizzy.

Title: Շուարիմ
Definition_1: to be stunned, astonished, surprised, baffled or puzzled, embarrassed, bewildered, not to know what do or what way to turn.

Title: Շութափ
Definition_1: nimble, light-footed, swift, quick, agile, lithe.

Title: Շութափեմ
Definition_1: to be hurried, to hasten, to make haste.

Title: Շութափութիւն
Definition_1: agility, nimbleness, quickness, celerity; hurry, haste.

Title: Շուն
Definition_3: Canis Major; cf.
