Շնիկ; մատակ —, bitch; — անպիտան, cur; — որսորդ, hound, terrier, ranger; որսական — ոտնակառոյց, setter, pointer, setting-dog; — մազեղ, գանգրամազ or լուղակ, water-dog; — մեծականջ, long-eared dog; — տնպահ, house-dog; — պահապան, watch-dog; պահապան — հովուաց, mastiff dog; ցլամարտ —, bull-dog; շան լակոտիկ, fisting cur; — մատնիչ, խեռ, խածանող, կատաղի, a treacherous, snarling, biting, mad dog; խշտի or խղիկ շան, dog-hole, dog-kennel; կերակուր շան, dog's-meat, dog-porridge; ոջիլ շան, dog-louse; վազք շան, dog-trot; ցնկնիլ շան, to whelp, to litter, to bring forth; տալ կամ արկանել շանց, to give or to send to the dogs; կերակուր լինել շանց, to go to the dogs; — հաջէ, ոռնայ, կաղկանձէ, ղօղանջէ, կռնչէ or մռմռայ, the dog barks, howls, whines, yelps, growls; խոնջեալ իբրեւ զ—, dog-weary, tired as a dog; — հաջան՝ չէ խածան, a barking dog seldom bites.

Title: Շունչ
Definition_1: breath, puff; wind, breeze; respiration; spirit, soul, life;
Definition_2: միով շնչով, unanimously, with one accord; — կլանել, առնուլ, to breathe, to take breath, to recover one's breath, to respire, cf. Ոգի առնուլ; to repose, to rest, to take a little breath or respite; — առնուլ լիաբերան, to breathe freely; to draw a long breath; հատանիլ շնչոյ, to lose breath; ի վախճանին հասանել, to be near to one's last breath; ի մի — կլանել, to swallow in one gulp, at a draught; ամենայն — կենդանի, all that has life; every living soul; ց— վախճանին, to one's last gasp; մինչեւ ի վերջին —ն, to the last moment; ի յետին —ն հասեալ է, he is at his last breath, in the pangs of death; ցյետին — կենաց իմոց, to the last moment of my life; — վախճանին չեւ էր հասեալ, he had not yet yielded his last breath; ընդ վախճանել շնչոյն, while expiring; ի — հողմոյ գեղածփեալ, at the mercy of the winds; cf. Ընդ աղօտ; cf. Ժահահոտ.

Title: Շուշանանամ
Definition_1: to become as a lily; —ցեալ, lilied.

Title: Շուշանափայլ
Definition_1: bright, fair or candid as a lily; adorned with lilies.

Title: Շուշեմ
Definition_1: to be neglectful, to lose or waste one's time, to loiter.

Title: Շուշտակ
Definition_1: handkerchief; hairband; — աբեղայ or վարդապետ, a widowed priest.

Title: Շուրթն
Definition_3: lip; վերին —, upper-lip; ստորին —, under-lip; նուրբ, ուռոյց, թաւ, կարմրերփեան —, small or thin, swelled or blubber, thick, rosy lips; ունել լայնշի, շրջեալ, բոլորածիր շրթունս, to have flat, turned up, well-formed lips; — գետոյ, river-side.

Title: Շուրջ
Definition_1: about, round, around, all round; roundabout, in the neighbourhood; from all sides, on every side;
Definition_2: turn, round; ի —ն, around; — տեսանելիք, amphitheater, — boxes; — զեկեղեցեաւ, round the church; —, ի — ածել, to lead to, to conduct around, to walk, cf. Շրջեցուցանեմ; —, ի — գալ, — անցանել, to take a walk, to make a tour, to walk, to promenade, cf. Շրջագայիմ; — հայել, to look around; — առնուլ, to turn; — արկանել, պատել, պաշարել, to surround, to encompass, to encircle, to invest, to hem in, to beset; — բնակել, to dwell near, to be neighbouring; — տալ, to overturn, to upset, to overthrow; — տալ անձինն, to turn from side to side.

Title: Շուրջանակաւ
Definition_2: in a circle, circularly, round about; ելանելի —, winding-stairs, spiral-staircase.

Title: Շուրջանակի
Definition_1: cf. Շուրջ; round about; in a circle, circularly;
Definition_3: circumflex.

Title: Շուրջգունեմ
Definition_1: to colour, dye or stain all round.

Title: Շուք
Definition_1: shadow, shade; veil, head-cover; honour, respect, consideration; splendour, brilliancy, lustre, glory, magnificence; pomp, parade;
Definition_2: protection; — եւ ձեւք, ceremonial, etiquette; — դնել, to honour, to pay honour, to respect, to consider, to compliment, to pay court to, to court; զամենայն — եւ զպատիւ ունել, to give all the respect and honour due; ի շքի եւ ի պատուի ունել, to hold in respect; զանձն ծանր եւ ի շքի ունել, to be rave or serious; — առնուլ, to be honoured or glorified;
Definition_3: շքով, with honour, gloriously, magnificently, pompously.

Title: Շպարիմ
Definition_1: to rouge, to paint the face with rouge, to fard.

Title: Շպեմ
Definition_1: to alum, to steep in alum-water.

Title: Շռայլ
Definition_2: prodigal, lavish, wasteful, extravagant, profuse; licentious, lewd, dissolute;
Definition_3: —ք, licentiousness, lewdness, debauch.

Title: Շռայլիմ
Definition_1: to be prodigal, to live lavishly, to squander, to waste, to dissipate, to lavish, to abandon oneself to debauchery, to lead a dissolute life.

Title: Շռայլութիւն
Definition_1: prodigality, profusion, luxe, waste, dissipation; debauchery, disorder, extravagance, luxury, excess.

Title: Շռինդ
Definition_1: noise, tumult, rumour, clamour, uproar, row; public rumour, report; ի — համբաւոյն, at the news or report of; —ն աղաղակի նոցա, their cries, shouts; ի — ահեղ պատերազմի, at the terrible news of war; at the dreadful preparations for war.

Title: Շտապ
Definition_2: urgent, pressing; — տագնապի, too great haste, hurry, great urgency, hasty eagerness, precipitation; constraint, imperious or urgent obligation; pain, anguish, affliction, trouble;
Definition_3: —, — —, առ —, —աւ, hastily, in haste, expeditiously, speedily, diligently; — տագնապաւ, with all possible speed or despatch, in a hurry, precipitately, post-haste; առանց —ոյ, without hurry; — տագնապի հասուցանել, ի վերայ դնել or ի վերայ հասուցանել, to urge, to press, to force, to compel, to oblige, to constrain; to grieve, to pain, to agonize, to harass; — քան զասելն, no sooner said than done.

Title: Շտապեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to hasten, to press, to urge, to hurry, to precipitate.

Title: Շտապիմ
Definition_1: to be quick, to hasten, to hurry, to precipitate.

Title: Շտեմարան
Definition_1: magazine, storehouse; butler's pantry; larder, buttery, pantry, store-room, cellar; secret chamber; treasury; bottom;
Definition_2: heart, the secrets of the heart, the affections; — ցորենոյ, granary, loft; — գինւոյ, wine-cellar, wine-vault; — փայտից, wood-house.

Title: Շտեմարանալից
Definition_1: filling granaries and magazines; stored in a granary.

Title: Շտեմարանեմ
Definition_1: to warehouse, to store up, to house, to cellar; to treasure up; to lay or put by, to preserve.

Title: Շրշիւն
Definition_1: murmur, rustling of leaves; ի — տերեւոյ զարհուրի, he trembles at the fall of a leaf.

Title: Շրջաբանութիւն
Definition_1: periphrase, circumlocution, roundabout way of expressing oneself.

Title: Շրջաբեկութիւն
Definition_1: circumflexion of voice, uttering or pronouncing with circumflex accent.

Title: Շրջաբերական
Definition_3: vagabond.

Title: Շրջաբերիմ
Definition_1: to turn round, to rotate, to move circularly; to revolve, to walk over, to take a round.

Title: Շրջաբերութիւն
Definition_2: revolution; — աստեղական, զարտուղական, զուգընթացական, sidereal, anomalistical, synodical revolution;
Definition_3: — բեւեռային, circumpolar.

Title: Շրջաբնակ
Definition_1: living in the neighbourhood, neighboring, adjacent, circumjacent;

Title: Շրջաբնակութիւն
Definition_1: circuit, territory; neighbouring towns or districts.

Title: Շրջագայ
Definition_2: turn, circumvolution; circumference, periphery; հազար ամաց —ս անցուցանել զինքեամբ, to live for a thousand years.

Title: Շրջագայիմ
Definition_1: to take a turn, a walk, to roam; to wander over, to stroll, to prowl, to turn round, to revolve; to go round, to circulate.

Title: Շրջագայութիւն
Definition_1: turn, walk, circulation; turn, rotation, revolution.

Title: Շրջազգեստ
Definition_1: gown, dress; կէս —, petticoat; ներքին —, — under-petticoat.

Title: Շրջակայ
Definition_2: —ք, the environs, the country roundabout, neighbourhood.

Title: Շրջակտուր առնեմ
Definition_1: to cut out or trench all round; to prune or lop round.

Title: Շրջահայեաց
Definition_1: circumspect, cautious, discreet, considerate, prudent; — լինել, to look around, to observe, to explore, to spy out.

Title: Շրջահայեցութիւն
Definition_1: observation, attention, exploring, spying out; circumspection, caution, prudence, consideration, discretion.

Title: Շրջան
Definition_1: turn, gyre, turning, circuit, revolution, circumvolution, circulation, conversion; course, cycle, period, circle, round; turning, wheeling, winding; sinuosity; change, vicissitude; — մեծ, period or cycle of five hundred and thirty-two years; —ք ջուրց, whirlpool, vortex; — զօրաց, evolution; — առնուլ, to turn, to make or take a turn, to turn or whirl round and round, cf. Շրջաբերիմ, cf. Պտուտեմ; to circulate, to revolve, to move; to spin round upon one leg.

Title: Շրջանակ
Definition_1: circle, hoop; border, contour, outline, circumference; frame, frame-work, sash; enchasing; turn, circuit, ring;
Definition_2: cycle; —ք երկնից, the spheres; — կենդանական, the zodiac; բեւեռային —, polar circle; —ք ապարանից, gallery, terrace, promenade; սիւնք —օք or —աւ, peristyle;
Definition_3: —աւ, in a circle, in a ring, circularly, cf. Շուրջանակի.

Title: Շրջանակեայ
Definition_1: furnished with a circle or frame; round, circular.

Title: Շրջանակեմ
Definition_1: to turn round; to revolve, to move in a circle; to frame, to border.

Title: Շրջապատ
Definition_2: turn, round, circumference, compass, outline, circuit, fence, wall, enclosure;
Definition_3: periphery, circumference.

Title: Շրջապատեմ
Definition_1: to surround, to compass, to encircle; to envelop;

Title: Շրջապատիմ
Definition_1: to take a turn; to turn round, to whirl; to be surrounded, enclosed.

Title: Շրջափակեմ
Definition_1: to shut up all round, to hem round or in, to enclose, to encircle, to surround, to beset.

Title: Շրջափայլեմ
Definition_1: to shine on all round, to cover or surround with light.

Title: Շրջեմ
Definition_1: to overturn, to upset, to turn over, to capsize, to throw down; to change, to transmute, to convert;
Definition_2: to turn aside, to pervert, to subvert; ի բաց —, to avert, to turn away, to divert; — զմիտս, ի մտաց ի խորհրդոց, to deter, to dissuade, to dehort, to discouncil; ի փախուստ — զզօրս, to rout, to put to flight, to chase, to pursue hotly; — զգոյն, to discolour; — զբանն, to retract, to recant; cf. Միտ.

Title: Շրջեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to walk, to take or lead about; to turn, to twirl, to wind.

Title: Շրջիմ
Definition_1: to take a walk, to walk, to march, to go; to turn, to be changed, converted, transmuted; to fall back, to be upset; — ժամանակաց, changes, mutations or vicissitudes of time; — ի մտաց, ի խորհրդոց, to alter or change one's mind, to change sides; շրջեցաւ գոյն երեսաց նորա, his countenance altered; cf. Օր.

Title: Շրջշրջեմ
Definition_1: to turn or whirl round and round; to change; to walk; cf. Թուղթ.

Title: Շրջշրջիմ
Definition_1: to turn round, to turn, to move about; to walk; — աչաց, to roll one's eyes wildly; — յանկողնի, to be uneasy, to tumble and toss in one's bed, to move oneself restlessly from side to side.

Title: Շրջշրջուն
Definition_1: turning in every direction or way, versatile.

Title: Շրջումն
Definition_1: act of walking, walk, going and coming; turn; change; overturning, upsetting.

Title: Շրտնում
Definition_1: to take fright, to be startled, to start with fear; to take umbrage at, to be scare; to be dazzled.

Title: Շրտուցանեմ
Definition_1: to scare, to startle, to start; to dazzle, to hallucinate.

Title: Շփեմ
Definition_2: to impute, to ascribe, to attribute, to accuse of, to charge with; — ընդ ափ, to rub out in the hand.

Title: Շփշփեմ
Definition_1: to rub hard or often, to bruise, to clash.

Title: Շփոթ
Definition_1: confusion, broil, embarrassment, trouble, disorder, tumult, uproar;
Definition_2: confused, mixed, confounded, troubled, disordered, out of order; deranged, complicated; indistinct; —ս յուզել, յարուցանել, to excite confusion, trouble, sedition; աղմուկ —ի յարուցանել, to make a clatter, racket or uproar, to kick up a row; յայն աղմուկ —ի, in that disorder; cf. Աղմուկ.

Title: Շփոթեմ
Definition_1: to confound, to mix, to jumble, to embroil, to complicate; to trouble, to put in disorder, to disorder, to derange, to harass, to embarrass, to bewilder.

Title: Շփոթիմ
Definition_1: to be confounded, in disorder, to become intricate, complicated; to become confused, troubled, to be overthrown, upset; —եալ ես, you look troubled.

Title: Շքամ
Definition_1: to lord, to act the great man, to pique or plume oneself, to glory, to vaunt in.

Title: Շքայլեմ
Definition_1: to hinder, to stop, to prevent.

Title: Շքեղ
Definition_1: glorious, magnificent, rich, sumptuous, pompous, splendid, superb, majestic; honourable, august, illustrious, respectful, sublime; elegant, fair, handsome, genteel, agreeable.

Title: Շքեղաբար
Definition_1: honourably, magnificently, splendidly, pompously, superbly, richly, nobly, majestically.

Title: Շքեղազարդ
Definition_1: highly ornamented, richly adorned, magnificently dressed, splendid, magnificent, superb.

Title: Շքեղազարդեմ
Definition_1: to adorn richly, to decorate, to embellish.

Title: Շքեղանամ
Definition_1: to become pretty, beautiful, glorious, to be adorned.

Title: Շքեղաշուք
Definition_1: very beautiful, august, most superb; cf. Շքեղազարդ.

Title: Շքեղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to decorate, to adorn, to beautify, to embellish; to honour, to glorify.

Title: Շքեղութիւն
Definition_1: splendour, magnificence, pomp, sumptuousness, majesty; glory, honour, celebrity; beauty, elegance, comeliness; solemnity.

Title: Շքթեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to agitate, to stir, to dabble, to paddle.

Title: Շքթիմ
Definition_1: to be brazen-faced, to lose every sense of shame, to behave shamelessly, impudently.

Title: Շքողիմ
Definition_1: to starve, to die with hunger.

Title: Շօշափեմ
Definition_1: to feel, to touch, to handle; to graze.

Title: Շօշափողական
Definition_1: tangential; — զօրութիւն, tangential force; — կողմնացոյց, tangential compass.

Title: Շօշափումն
Definition_1: touch, feeling, taction, handling, contact, grazing; կէտ շօշափման, point of contact.

Title: <letter>Ո</letter> (ouô)
Definition_1: the twenty fourth letter of the alphabet and the sixth of the vowels; six hundred, six hundredth.

Title: Ո՜
Definition_1:
o ! oh ! ah !
ո՜ ո՜ փախերուք, hollo there! run away! save yourselves! out of the way!
ո՜ մեծի մարդասիրութեանն աստուծոյ, oh the great mercy of God !
ո՜ զարմանալի իրս, what wandrous thing is this !
ո՛ այրն այն յիմարեալ է, look, that man has gone mad; ո՜ ստութեանդ, ah ! what a surprising falsehood, imposture is yours !

Title: Ո
Definition_1:
who, which; ո՞, ո՞ ոք, who ?
ո՞ ի ձէնջ իշխեսցէ առնել զայդ, who among you dare do that ?
ո՞ ոք ի մարդկանէ, who is he that ?
գիտեմ ո՛ է դա, I know who he is; ո՞ ոք եւ իցէ, whoever he may be; ո՞յր է մատեանս, whose book is this ?
զո՞ խնդրէք, whom do you seek ?
ո՞յր ես, who are you for ? ո՞ւմ ասացեր, to whom have you spoken ?
ո՞ գիտէ, who knows ?
ո՞յք ոմանք իցեն, who are they who ?
ո՞ւմ ի կապելոց, to which of the prisoners ?
յո՞ւմ անձին, on which person ?
ո՞յք եմք, who are we ?
յո՞ երթաս, where ? where are you going ?.

Title: Ոգեբերիմ
Definition_1: to recover one's breath or strength.

Title: Ոգեթափ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be emaciated, exhausted; to wear oneself out.

Title: Ոգեխառնիմ
Definition_1: to be of one heart and one mind.

Title: Ոգեկործան
Definition_1: souldestroying; broken in spirit, disheartened, disconsolate, despairing.

Title: Ոգեմ
Definition_1: to utter, to pronounce, to say; to sing.

Title: Ոգեպահանջ
Definition_1: requiring back life; depriving of life; mortal.

Title: Ոգի
Definition_1: spirit; spirit, soul, ghost; breath, respiration; spirit, meaning, sense; genius; manes, shades, ghost, hobgoblin; life; heart; soul, energy, courage; puff, air, wind; — գինւոյ, spirit of wine, alcohol; cf. Հոգի; — բանական, intelligence, reason; —ք խաւարի, the spirits of darkness; — կենդանութեան, spirit of life; կենդանական —ք, animal spirits; — նախանձու, the spirit of jealousy; ոգւով չափ, with all one's soul, heartily, willingly; — առնուլ, կլանել, to breathe, to take breath, to breathe freely, to respire, to rest, to take repose, to revive, to acquire new strength or vigor, cf. Հանգչիմ, cf. Շունչ կլանել; յ—ս ապաստան լինել, to be extremely downcast, depressed, prostrated, to be tormented; cf. Ապաստան; յ—ս ապաստան առնել, to reduce to the last extremity; to exhaust, to harass, to vex; յոգւոցն (պարզել) ապաստան լինել, to be at the last extremity, near the last breath, to be dying, cf. Հատկլիմ; թափել զ— ուրուք, to keep in suspense; հարկանել զոք յ—, to sting, to gall to the quick; to deprive of life, to kill; դնել զ— ի ձեռն or ի բռին, զ— ի բռին ունել, to endanger oneself, to risk, brave or face death, to risk, expose or hazard one's life, to lavish or to be prodigal of life; յոգւոց ելանել, to sigh, to heave sighs; to groan, cf. Հեծեմ, cf. Հեծեծեմ, cf. Հառաչեմ; ոգւով չափ սիրել, to love to distraction; խռովիլ յ— իւր, to be disconcerted, perturbed or disturbed; գիտել յ— իւր, to know within oneself; արձակել, հանել, փչել զ—, to yield or give up the ghost, to breathe one's last, to expire; յոգւոցն ցամաքել, to die; տալ — կամ շունչ ի վէմս կճեայս, to give spirit or life to marble; ոգւով երգել, to sing with great expression; եւ դարձաւ — իւր առ ինքն, his spirits returned, his strength revived; հաստատեցաւ — նորա, he regained strength or vigor; քաղէին —ք նորա, he fainted or swooned; գուն գործեալ ոգւովք չափ, risking his life; —ն էր դաւոյն, he was the soul of the conspiracy; յ— խաղալ, to play at dice.

Title: Ոգորիմ
Definition_1: to brandish the horns, to butt with the horns; to butt, to run against, to contend, to fight, to come to blows, to make war; ընդ անձին —, to contend with oneself.

Title: Ոզնի
Definition_1: hedge-hog; — մեծ, porcupine; — ծովու, echinus marinus, sea-urchin, sea-egg; ձագ ոզնւոյ, hedge-pig.

Title: *Ոզոխ
Definition_1: green outer shell of walnut, walnut-husk.

Title: Ոզոր
Definition_1: wicker, osier; osier-band, straw-band; —ածեծ առնեմ, to strike with rods or osiers, to whip, to flog.

Title: Ոլոռն
Definition_1: pea; chick peas; grain; globule; wood-worm, beetle; — —, drop by drop; պատիճ կամ կեղեւ ոլեռան, peascod, peashel; նմանք են միմեանց իբր հատք ոլոռանց, they are as like as two peas.

Title: Ոլոր
Definition_1: twisting, contortion, tension; intensity, force, stress; tresses; —ք բարեկամութեան, ties of friendship.

Title: Ոլորաբոյս
Definition_1: spiraea or diosma; — կնձնային, ulmaria, dropwort.

Title: Ոլորակ
Definition_1: cf. Ոլոր; flexion of voice, accent;
Definition_2: tone — աւագ, mode major; — կրտսեր, minor tune.

Title: Ոլորան
Definition_2: peritrochium, lathe, axle-tree, wheel and axle, winch, windlass, crab, capstan; — ատամնաւոր, gear, wheel-gear, catching; — տարբերական, differential capstan.

Title: Ոլորեմ
Definition_1: to entwine, to twist, to twine, to wreathe, to braid, to plait;
Definition_2: to plot, to hatch, to frame.

Title: Ոլորտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to circumscribe, to bound, to limit.

Title: Ոլորտք
Definition_1: bounds, limits, extremities; ring, circuit, circumvolution; — երկրի, the universe; — երկնից, airy space, the vault of heaven; — բանից, ambages, circumlocution, tricks; ընդ —տս մտանել (թռչնոց), to fly about or round; to flap, to flutter in the wind, to wheel about; to turn on one's hands and feet like a wheel, to tumble, to fall head over heels, to turn a somerset.

Title: Ոխ
Definition_1: rancour, inveterate hatred, resentment, concealed hate; —ս ունել ընդ ումեք, —ս պահել ումեք, —ս ի մտի ունել, to harbour resentment, to hate, to owe or bear a grudge, to have a grudge or spite against, to bear malice or ill-will; cf. Մթերեմ.

Title: Ոխաթափ լինիմ
Definition_1: to give vent to one's wrath, to discharge or vent one's rancor, to revenge oneself.

Title: Ոխակալ
Definition_1: spiteful, rancorous, malevolent, outrageous, malicious, harbouring hate, revengeful; — լինել, to nourish hate.

Title: Ոխանամ
Definition_1: to devise, to foment hatred; to resent an injury, to be resentful, bitter, hating.

Title: Ոխացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to create, to excite rancour, to exasperate, to provoke to enmity.

Title: Ոխորիմ
Definition_1: nursing rancour, wrathful, rabid, furious, cruel, relentless; ill-natured, malevolent; — թշնամի, a sworn enemy, a mortal, declared, implacable or inexorable enemy;
Definition_2: arch-enemy, the devil; — պատերազմ, an obstinate, bloody battle.

Title: Ոխորիմք
Definition_1: antagonists or adversaries in a game.

Title: Ոխութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Ոխ; revenge; wrath, anger, indignation.

Title: Ոհ
Definition_1:
alas ! oh ! ah ! o !
վայեաց եւ ասէ, ո՜հ տէր, he cried out and said, oh! my Lord !
ո՜հ ինձ տէր, ah ! oh ! alas, oh dear ! woe is me !
ո՜հ անմտութեանն, ո՜հ կուրութեանն, oh what folly ! oh what blindness !
ո՜հ եւ աւաղ աւուրն այնորիկ, oh dreadful day !
ո՜հ հովիւք, woe to the shepherds !
ո՜հ մոլորութիւն, ո՜հ յիմարութիւն, oh what a mistake ! what nonsense !
ո՜հ թէ, would to God !
ո՜հ ո՜հ, ha ! ha !
ո՜հ, ո՜հ օր, woe, woe to the day !.

Title: Ողբ
Definition_1: lamentation, complaint, groaning, wailing, moans, tears; —ք, elegy; —ս առնուլ, յօրինել, զ—ս հարկանել, cf. Ողբամ.

Title: Ողբակցիմ
Definition_1: to weep, to deplore or lament together.

Title: Ողբաձայն
Definition_3: lamentation.

Title: Ողբամ
Definition_1: to lament, to bewail, to groan, to complain, to weep, to deplore; to wear mourning; ողբամ զքեզ հայոց աշխարհ, ողբամ զքեզ հանուրց հիւսիսականաց վեհագոյն, I mourn for you, Armenia! I mourn for you, oh chief among the nations of the North !.

Title: Ողբերգակ
Definition_2: singer of laments; tragedian, tragic author.

Title: Ողբերգեմ
Definition_1: to sing in a plaintive voice, in a lamentable tone, to deplore, to lament; to compose a dirge, an elegy or a tragedy.

Title: Ողկուզաբոյծ
Definition_1: bearing or producing bunches of grapes.

Title: Ողկուզուկ
Definition_2: artemisia, mug-wort or moth-wort; goose-foot, botrys.

Title: Ողն
Definition_1: spine, back-bone; chine, back; spinal marrow; — նաւին, deck of a ship; — երկնի, the highest heaven; ողունք երկրի, precipice, declivity; mountains; բեկանել զ—, to break the spine, to chine; — անկանել, to lie down, to lay oneself down, to stretch one's limbs;
Definition_2: to neglect, not to care for; յ— երթալ, to stretch oneself; to stretch out one's arms (in yawning or awaking); յ— կալ, to stand erect, to draw oneself up, cf. Բարձրավզիմ, cf. Խրոխտամ;
Definition_3: to grow proud; to become rebellious; խստացուցանել զ—, to stiffen one's neck, to be proud, stubborn, contumacious; — առնուլ, to lean against;
Definition_4: to find support; — առնուլ ի վշտաց, to breathe from one's troubles, to repose from care or affliction; — բեկանիլ, to sprain or break one's back or neck;
Definition_5: to end in smoke; to become discouraged, disheartened, desponding, to droop.

Title: Ողնաշար
Definition_1: vertebra; spinal marrow; —յար տանց, beams, roof.

Title: Ողնուց
Definition_1: skeleton or carcass of a ship.

Title: Ողնտեռ
Definition_1: galling on a horse's back, scratch on the withers, excoriation;

Title: Ողողանամ
Definition_1: to weep bitterly, to shed a shower of tears; to scream, to screech, to shriek.

Title: Ողողեմ
Definition_1: to inundate, to cover with water; to immerse, to plunge, to dive; to rinse, to wash.

Title: Ողողիմ
Definition_1: to be inundated; plunged in, immersed; — յանձրեւոյ, to be soaked through by the rain.

Title: Ողորկ
Definition_1: sleek, glossy, smooth, terse, polished; level, plane;
Definition_2: refined, sweet, affable, agreeable; artful, cunning, crafty; elegant, polite.

Title: Ողորկաբանութիւն
Definition_1: smoothness of speech, elegance of expression, eloquent language.

Title: Ողորկապատեան
Definition_1: provided with a smooth or even shell;

Title: Ողորկեմ
Definition_1: to smooth, to level, to plane; to curry, to polish, to set a gloss upon, to make smooth or polished; to smoothen; to iron, to hot-press, to satin; cf. Շողոմեմ.

Title: Ողորկութիւն
Definition_1: smoothness, polish, sleekness, glossiness; softness; delicacy.

Title: Ողորմ
Definition_2: pity-stirring, piteous, pitiable, moving, touching, miserable, unhappy, unfortunate, sad, deplorable, dismal;
Definition_3: —, —ս, — —, touchingly, humbly, in a suppliant manner; miserably, piteously, pitiably, deplorably, lamentably; compassionately; — խօսել, to speak pitifully or deplorably; յաղերս եւ յ— խոնարհեցուցանել, to touch, to excite or move to compassion, to inspire pity; անկցի — իմ առաջի քո, have compassion on me ! have mercy on me !.

Title: Ողորմածութիւն
Definition_1: mercy, charity, clemency, pity, compassion; charity, alms, almsgiving, goodness; գործք ողորմածութեան, good deed.

Title: Ողորմեաց
Definition_1: The Miserere and its hymn (Armenian divine service).

Title: Ողորմիմ
Definition_1: to take pity or compassion on, to commiserate, to be affected, moved to pity, to feel for, to sympathize with; to do good to, to benefit; ողորմիմ քեզ, I pity you.

Title: Ողորմութիւն
Definition_1: pity, mercy; alms, charity; — առնել, տալ, to give alms.

Title: Ողորմուկս արկանեմ
Definition_1: to excite to commiseration by loud laments, to touch with pity, to move.

Title: Ողոք
Definition_1: supplication, petition, entreaty, instance; insinuation, persuasion;
Definition_2: suppliant, beseeching, mild, humble, insinuating, persuasive, attractive, fawning;
Definition_3: —ով, softly, humbly, kindly; յ— ածել, to persuade, to soften, to affect, cf. Յորդորեմ, cf. Յօժարեցուցանեմ; յ— անկանել, դեգերել, to supplicate, to beg humbly, to entreat, to pray earnestly, cf. Աղերսեմ, cf. Աղաչեմ.

Title: Ողոքանք
Definition_1: supplication, humble prayer, instance; softness, kind things, soft words, blarney; attraction, insinuation, persuasion; fondling, caress, cajoling, coaxing, fulsome flattery, adulation.

Title: Ողոքեմ
Definition_1: to supplicate, to persuade mildly; to soften, to calm, to appease; to touch, to move to pity; to fawn upon, to toady, to flatter.

Title: Ողջ
Definition_1: alive, living; sound, safe; complete, entire, integral; wholesome; uninterrupted;
Definition_2:
— —, alive, all alive, altogether, cf. Կենդանւոյն; — բովանդակ, wholly, entirely; — եկիր, welcome ! you are welcome; — լեր or եր, keep yourself hearty; God speed you, good bye !
— լեր վարդապետ, hail Master !
— լեր թագուհի, Salve Regina! hail Mary!
— երթ, go in peace, adieu, farewell; — մնասցեն, let them go to the devil; — մնա, adieu, take care of yourself, my kind wishes.

Title: Ողջաբանութիւն
Definition_1: the whole of a discourse; sound doctrine.

Title: Ողջագուրեմ
Definition_1: to receive lovingly, to embrace, to kiss.

Title: Ողջախոհ
Definition_1: thinking soundly, wise, sensible, judicious; chaste, modest, coy, maidenly, pure, honest; — միտք, good sense, honesty, plain-dealing.

Title: Ողջախոհանամ
Definition_1: to be in one's right senses; to be chaste, to observe chastity.

Title: Ողջախոհացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render chaste, modest, sober, prudent, wise.

Title: Ողջախոհութիւն
Definition_1: sound judgment, wisdom, sagacity, good sense; chastity, pudicity, temperance, continence, modesty, sobriety, honesty.

Title: Ողջակիզեմ
Definition_1: to offer a burnt offering, to sacrifice.

Title: Ողջամբ
Definition_1: safe and sound, soundly, safely, safe; quite, totally, entirely, completely; — դառնել, հասանել, to return, to arrive safe; — եկիր, — տեսի զքեզ, you are welcome; երթ —, God keep you, God be with you, adieu!.

Title: Ողջամիտ
Definition_1: right-minded, of sound judgment, in one's right senses, sensible, rational, reasonable, judicious; orthodox; — վարդապետութիւն, sound doctrine; — լինել, to be in one's right mind.

Title: Ողջանամ
Definition_1: to recover one's health, to heal, to get cured of, to get well again.

Title: Ողջանդամ
Definition_1: perfect in body, sound in wind and limb;

Title: Ողջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cure, to heal, to restore to health, to free from sickness or any harm; to complete, to render perfect.

Title: Ողջմտութիւն
Definition_1: rightmindedness, good judgment, reasoning; rectitude, justice, sincerity, loyalty, probity; ողջմտութեամբ, soundly, sensibly.

Title: Ողջոյն
Definition_1: salute, salutation, greeting, compliments, kind regards; health, state of salubrity;
Definition_3:
entirely, wholly, completely; — հրաժարական, leave-taking, adieu, farewell; — տալ, to salute; to compliment; հարցանել զողջունէ, տեսանել զ— ուրուք, to salute affectionately, with kind expressions; հարցանել զողջունէ ուրուք, to ask news of; տալ — հրաժարական, to take leave; to say good bye, farewell; —, — քեզ, — ընդ քեզ, good morning ! good day !
— իցէ քեզ, how do you do ? how are you ?
— է, very well; — է քեզ, is all well with you ?
— է, do you bring good news ?
— է, health, peace, prosperity; — քեզ տունդ իմ սիրելի, — քեզ երկիր ծննդեան, fare well sweet home ! adieu my native land ! adieu !.

Title: Ողջութիւն
Definition_1: health, good health, soundness of body; ողջութեամբ, safe and sound, peacefully.

Title: Ողջունաբեր
Definition_1: bearing a salutation or good news; — թուղթ, letter, epistle.

Title: Ողջունեմ
Definition_1: to salute, to compliment; — ի հանգիստ սրբոց առաքելոցն, to visit the sepulchres of the holy Apostles.

Title: Ոճ
Definition_1: style; phrase; method, system, formula; rank, order, manner, fashion, form; behaviour, conduct; dogma, doctrine; culm or stalk of gramineous plants; pannier, basket; — լեզուաց, the character or genius of a language; — սուրբ գրոց, language of the Scriptures; ճեմական, բանաստեղծական, ճարտասանական, արձանական, գոթացի, լակոնական, մարոտեան, մեղրածորան ոճ, academical, poetical, oratorical, lapidary, gothic, laconic, marotic, mellifluent or honied style; բարձր, վսեմ, վայելուչ, յարդարուն, պարզ, կորովի, քաղցր, հեշտ, բարեխառն ոճ, elevated or high, sublime, elegant, florid, simple, nervous, mellifluous, fluent or easy, temperate or moderate manner or style; ընտանի, կատակաբան, երկայնաբան, անհարթ, խիստ, թոյլ or տկար ոճ, familiar, burlesque, prolix o diffuse, harsh or rough, hard, languishing style; մաքրել զոճ, to purify, to refine the style; յոճ եւ ի կարգ մուծանել, to reduce to method, to put in order; ոճով մանր հայել, to fix, to rivet the attention; մանգաղ արկանել յոճ ընկերին, to put a sickle unto one's neighbour's standing corn; գարին յոճ կայր, the barley was green;
Definition_3: ոճով, methodically; distinctly, precisely; continuously, in detail; suitably, properly, to the purpose; նովին ոճով, in the same style.

Title: Ոճիր
Definition_1: crime, guilt, criminal attempt, misdeed, villainy, felony, ribaldry, vile wickedness;
Definition_2: wicked, guilty, criminal; — եղեռան, crime; —ք ապիրատութեան, excess; ածել յ—ս, to carry to excess.

Title: Ոճրագործ
Definition_2: facinorous, ribald, flagitious, nefarious, profligate, felonious.

Title: Ոճրագործութիւն
Definition_1: villainy, abomination, misdeed, impiety, profligacy, flagitiousness, execrable conduct, horrible crime.

Title: Ոմն
Definition_1: some, certain, some one, one; այր —, a man; կին — անուն մարգարիտա, a woman named Margaret; ոմն քաղցեալ եւ ոմն արբեալ, one is dying of hunger while another is drunk; ոմանք մեծատունք եւ ոմանք աղքատք, some are rich and others poor; ցրուեցան ոմն յայս եւ ոմն յայն կոյս, they are scattered here and there; զոմանս տեսի անցանել ընդ գետն, ոմանք ի լուղ, եւ ոմանք ի նաւակի, I saw several crossing the river, some swimming, others in a boat.

Title: Ոյժ
Definition_1: force, strength, power, vigour, energy, virtue, valour; effort; weight;
Definition_2: յուժոյ, strongly, vigorously; — տալ, to force, to make efforts; to give power, to authorize, to favour; — առնուլ, to gather strength; նոր — առնուլ, to gain new strength, to recover one's strength; յուժի լինել, to be in full vigour, in the prime of strength; անկանել յուժոյ, to feel one's strength failing, to lose strength, to become weakened or enervated; cf. Թափեմ.

Title: Ոյծ
Definition_3: —ք, hiatus, gap, chasm;
Definition_4: coldness.

Title: Ոչ
Definition_1:
no, not, nor, none; ոչ կամիմ, I will not; ոչ գիտեմ, I do not know; ոչ կարեմ, I cannot; ոչ ոչ, neither nor; ոչ սիրեմ զնա եւ ոչ երկնչիմ ի նմանէ, I neither love him nor fear him; բայց գիտէի ոչ, but I did not know it; ինչ ոչ ունի, he has nothing; ոչ առանց պատճառի, not without cause; յոչ կամաց, involuntarily, against one's will, by force; ոչ եթէ, not only; no; ոչ եւս, no longer; not yet; ոչ երբէք, ոչ բնաւ, never, not at all, no; ոչ ոք, no one, nobody, none, not one; ոչ ոք ի ձէնջ, no one among you; ոչ ոք ասասցէ քեզ, nobody will tell you; ոչ ոք գտցի այնչափ յանդուգն, no one will be hardy enough; ոչ զոք գտցես, you will not find any man; յոչ գոյից ի գոյ ածել, զոչսն ածել ի գոյանալ, to produce or create from nothing; շարժել յոչ բարիսն, to provoke to evil; այո կամ ոչ, yes or no; եղիցի ձեր բան, այոն՝ այո, եւ ոչն՝ ոչ, let your conversation be, yea, yea; nay, nay; ո՞չ or ո՞չ ապաքէն ասացի քեզ, did I not tell you ?
; ոչ, տէր, no, Sir; ո՞չ իսկ, is it not true that ?
ոչ միայն չողորմեալ, far from being touched; եւ ոչ իսկ մարդ է, he is no man; ոչ արդեօք զերծաւ, perhaps he is not freed; cf. Ել.

Title: Ոչէ
Definition_1: nothing; void, vacuum; հաստել յոչէից, to create from nothing; ստայօդ ոչէիցն երկիր պագանել, to adore false gods.

Title: Ոչէութիւն
Definition_1: nothingness, void, nothing; յ— դառնալ, to be reduced to nothing.

Title: Ոչինչ
Definition_1: not any thing, nought, void, nothing;
Definition_2: none, no one, no, not any;
Definition_3: no, in no wise, not at all; — ամենեւին, nothing at all; գրեթէ —, almost nothing, scarcely any thing; — հեռի ի քէն, not very far from you; վասն ոչնչից, for nothing; — իւիք, no how, in nowise, by no means; ստեղծել յոչընչէ, to create out of nothing; առնել յոչընչէ, to produce from void; յ— դարձուցանել, to reduce or bring to nothing, to annihilate; to nullify; յ— or առ — գրել, համարիլ, to hold or esteem as nothing, to care nothing for, to make no account of, to despise, to contemn; յոչընչէ յինչ գալ, to be raised or taken from nothing; ես — ասեմ, I say nothing; — պատճառ ունիս, you are wrong; ոյր չիք առողջութիւն՝ չիք եւ —, who has not health has nothing; — գիտեմ, I know nothing, I don't know.

Title: Ոչխար
Definition_1: sheep, ewe; mutton; միս —ի, mutton; ոտն —ի, sheep's trotters; — մոլորեալ, wandering, lost sheep; վաճառանոց —ի, sheep-market; փարախ, գաւիթ —աց, sheep-cot, sheep-fold, sheep-pen; մայեն, բառաչեն —ք, sheep bleat; cf. Կտուրք.

Title: Ոչնչանամ
Definition_1: to be reduced to nothing, to be nullified, annihilated.

Title: Ոչնչացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to annul, to make null and void, to annihilate, to destroy.

Title: Ոջիլ
Definition_1: louse, vermin; մածանող —, crab-louse; — արմտեաց, grub, mite, weevil; cf. Ուտիճ; քաղել զ—ս, մաքրել յոջլոց, to louse.

Title: Ոջլակեր
Definition_2: lice-eater; — լինել արմտեաց, to be blighted with insects and worms.

Title: Ոռոգեմ
Definition_1: to water, to bathe, to bedew, to wet.

Title: Ոռոգումն
Definition_1: watering; irrigation, sprinkling; water-retting, steeping; աւազան ոռոգման, retting-pool, retting-tank, retting-pit, retting-pond.

Title: Ոսին
Definition_1: lean, emaciated, etiolated, lank, puny, dry, parched.

Title: Ոսկեակ
Definition_1: small quantity of gold; gold mine.

Title: Ոսկեզօդ
Definition_1: fastened with gold; chased in gold.

Title: Ոսկեթել
Definition_1: interlaced or interwoven with gold; embroidered with gold;

Title: Ոսկեկազմ
Definition_1: made of gold; adorned with gold; — երիվար, horse with gold accoutrements; — գիրք, book bound in gold.

Title: Ոսկեկուռ
Definition_1: made or covered with massive gold, gold plated;

Title: Ոսկեհան
Definition_1: gold-digger; — տեղի or —ք, gold mine; gold-diggings.

Title: Ոսկեհուռն
Definition_1: woven or embroidered with gold; laced with gold.

Title: Ոսկեղինիկ
Definition_1: golden, of gold, gilded, gilt; — դար, golden age.

Title: Ոսկեճաճանչ
Definition_1: shining like gold, as bright or resplendent as gold.

Title: Ոսկեճամուկ
Definition_1: embroidered with gold, covered with gold embroidery, spotted with gold, gold braided.

Title: Ոսկեման
Definition_1: spun or wove n with gold.

Title: Ոսկեսէր
Definition_1: fond of gold , loving riches, avaricious.

Title: Ոսկետուփ
Definition_1: having gold covers; bound in gold (book).

Title: Ոսկեփունջ
Definition_2: golden or yellow bouquet; — հասկք, — հունձք, golden ears; golden harvest.

Title: Ոսկեքանդակ
Definition_1: gold plated; incrusted, embossed with gold; chased in gold.

Title: Ոսկէօղ
Definition_1: adorned with, or wearing gold rings or buckles.

Title: Ոսկի
Definition_2: gold, golden, of gold; մուսիոնեան —, massive gold; — շանթաձիգ, rum fulminans, fulminating gold; մանեակ —, gold necklace;
Definition_3: — եղէգն, lysimachia, money-wort, loose-strife; cf. Ընդելուզանեմ; cf. Կշիռ.

Title: Ոսկիահատ
Definition_1: gold nugget; small piece of gold.

Title: Ոսկիաձոյլ
Definition_1: cast in gold; of massive gold, golden.

Title: Ոսկիանամ
Definition_1: to become gold, to be transmuted into gold.

Title: Ոսկր
Definition_1: bone; տարաբուն —, process, apophysis; — արմատոյ լեզուի, hyoides; անանուն —, ossa innominata; — ցայլից, os pectinis or pubis; — սրբանի, os sacrum; — կիտի, whale-bone; — փղաց, ivory; cf. Փղոսկր; գերեզման ոսկերաց, charnel-house; փոխարկութիւն յ—, ossification; հաստատիչ խախտեալ ոսկերաց, bonesetter; կցել զ—ն բեկեալ, to bonset; փոխարկել յ—, to ossify; հանել զոսկերս, to bone, to take out the bones; գողացուցանել զոսկերս, to cause the bones to shake; cf. Լեզու.

Title: Ոսկրաքանց առնեմ
Definition_1: to dislocate, to put out of joint, to disjoint, to luxate or lux.

Title: Ոսկրեղէն
Definition_1: bony, made or consisting of bone.

Title: Ոսնիմ
Definition_1: to be stunted, emaciated, withered; to etiolate, to dry up.

Title: Ոսոխ
Definition_1: adversary, enemy, opposite; antagonist, rival, competing.

Title: Ոսոխիմ
Definition_1: to be at law with, to accuse; to rival, to strive, to compete; զմիմեամբ —, to surpass each other.

Title: Ոսպնաձեւ
Definition_1: lentile-shaped, lenticular; —, —ապակի, lens, lenticular glass; — անգոյն, achromatic lens; — սանդղատեսակ, Fresnel lens.

Title: Ոսպնեայ
Definition_1: lentile, of lentiles, made or prepared with lentiles; cf. Թան; cf. Շիկաթան; —ք, lentiles; pulse.

Title: Ոստ
Definition_1: branch, bough; knot, joint; —ք մատանց ձեռին, the fingers; —ովք վարակեալ, knotty, nodous, knobby, gnarly; hill, height, hillock.

Title: Ոստախաղաց լինիմ
Definition_1: to leap from branch to branch.

Title: Ոստախիտ
Definition_1: branchy, ramous, full of branches; knotty, nodose.

Title: Ոստայն
Definition_1: texture, tissue, web, weft; — սարդի, cob-web, spider's web; խզել զ— կենաց, to cut the thread of life.

Title: Ոստան
Definition_1: free city; chief-town, capital, seat of Government; royal guard;

Title: Ոստանամ
Definition_1: to branch out, to ramify, to shoot out; to become invigorated, ramified.

Title: Ոստանիկ
Definition_1: of the royal family, of the court;
Definition_2: citizen, freeman; nobleman, noble, lord, courtier.

Title: Ոստանիմ
Definition_1: to burst forth, to fly or escape from, to go out of; ոստեան սանձք ի ձեռացն, the reins escaped from his hands.

Title: Ոստաքանց
Definition_1: lopped, trimmed; — առնել, to lop off, to cut away, to sever, to trim, to prune; — լինել, to be pruned, lopped off.

Title: Ոստիկան
Definition_1: governor, prefect; inspector, surveyor, commissary; minister.

Title: Ոստին
Definition_1: terrestrial; dry, arid, parched, adust, burnt up; — օձ, land serpent.

Title: Ոստղ
Definition_1: lime-twig; bird-lime, lime, viscum; — ծովային, marine glue.

Title: Ոստնում
Definition_1: to leap, to jump, to take a leap, to bound, to gambol, to skip, to caper; to spring on or at, to rush or fall upon; to rush forward, to fly at.

Title: Ոստոստեմ
Definition_1: to hop, to leap, skip or frisk about, to frolic, to trip along.

Title: Ո՞վ
Definition_1:
who ? which ?
who, that, he that, whoever; ո՞վ ոք, who ?
ո՞վ ի ձէնջ, who amongst you ?
ո՞վ է դա, ո՞վ է այրդ, who is this man ? what man is that ?
ո՞յր է պատկերս, whose likeness is this ?
ո՞վ ես դու, who are you ?
զո՞վ առաւել սիրես, which do you like best ?
ո՞վ եւ ո՞վ իցեն որ երթայցեն, who will go ?
Definition_2:
յո՞վ, where ?
յո՞վ երթաս, where are you going ?.

Title: Ով
Definition_1:
o ! oh ! ho ! ah ! ha ! alas !
ով աստուած իմ, o my God !
ով աղետիցս, what a pity !
cf. Աղէտ; ով սքանչելեացս, what a wonder ! wonderful !
ով, զիարդ վեհ է ազգասիրութիւն, ah ! what a noble sentiment is patriotism !
ով ժամանակ ով բարք, o tempora ! o mores ! oh times ! oh manners ! to what a depth of corruption have our manners come ! in what an age we live !
ով ո, փախերուք յերկրէ հիւսիսոյ, ho, ho, flee from the land of the north !
.

Title: Ովասիս
Definition_1: oasis, verdant spot in a desert.

Title: Ովկիանոս
Definition_1: Ocean, the mighty deep; cf. Թոհ՞՞՞եւ՞՞՞բոհ.

Title: Ոտանաւոր
Definition_1: having feet; walking, going on foot; rhythmical, measured, metrical;
Definition_3: on foot; անցանել ընդ գետ յ—, to cross the river on foot; յ— or յ—ս կալ, to be on foot; զօրացոյց զօտս իմ յ—ս, he gave me strength to stand; —ս յօրինել, գրել —ս, — չափմամբ, to rhyme, to versify, to make verses, to write poetry or verses; գձուձ, յոռի —, mean, worthless verses, doggerel.

Title: Ոտն
Definition_1: foot; foot of a mountain; foot, inches; foot (measure in prosody); պատուանդան ոտից, foot-stool; կռուան ոտին, foot-hold; ոտից ցաւ, the gout, podagra; հատանող կոշտից ոտից, pedicure, corn-cutter; լուացումն ոտից, foot-hath, pediluvy; — —, — առ —, foot by foot, step by step, inch by inch, by little and little, by degrees, gradually; առ —, յոտս, առ ոտս, at the feet; near, at, to; յոտաց, standing, upright; յոտից, on foot, walking; — ընդ ոտին, foot to foot; յոտից ցգլուխ or մինչեւ ցգլուխ, from head to foot, from top to toe; յոտին քում, at your coming; յ— կալ, to rise, to stand up; կալ ի վերայ ոտից, to stand upon one's legs; յոտին կալ, to be standing, on foot; to support or maintain oneself; յոտին ունել, to uphold, to support, to sustain; յ— կանգնիլ, to rise, to get up; — or առ — հարկանել, կոխել ընդ — հարկանել, to foot, to tread under foot, to trample upon; to despise; զ— յոտանէ փոխել, to take a step, to walk; զոտս ամբառնալ, — առնուլ, to start, to depart, to set out, to go away; զոտս արձակեալ հարկանել, to kick, to foot; զոտս ամբարձեալ փախչել, to scamper away, to be off; անկանել յոտս ուրուք, to fall prostrate at the feet of; — զոտամբ արկանել, to cross the knees; զոտն հարկանել առ բարկութեան, to stamp on the ground, to trample with anger or rage; զոտս ի բոյս հարկանել, to wander about the fields or among the mountains; զամենեսին յոտին կացուցանել, to surpass all competitors; to surprise, to astonish; առ ոտս ուրուք խրատիլ, to be brought up at the feet of; առ ոտս կալ, to be present; զոտս հատանել, to take away, to destroy, to extirpate, to exterminate.

Title: Ոտնակապ
Definition_1: fetters; — ձիոց, horse-clog, shackle; պնդել յ—ս, cf. Ոտնակապեմ.

Title: Ոտնակապեմ
Definition_1: to shackle, to fetter; to impede, to hinder, to stop, to clog.

Title: Ոտնակառեմ
Definition_1: to stop, to stay, to remain immovable; to become embarrassed.

Title: Ոտնակոխք
Definition_1: treading or trampling under foot; յ—կոխս ընկենուլ, to throw under the feet; —կոխ առնել, to foot, to tread under foot, to trample upon.

Title: Ոտնաձայն
Definition_1: tramp, foot-fall; — անձրեւի, pattering of rain; — անձրեւի է, there is a noise of much rain falling.

Title: Ոտնառեմ
Definition_1: to slip, to slide, to glide, to take a false step;
Definition_2: to stumble, to trip, to commit a fault;
Definition_3: to cause to slip.

Title: Ոտնատեղի
Definition_1: ground for the foot, footing; cf. Ոտնահետ.

Title: Ոտնատրոփ
Definition_1: trampling with one's feet; — լինել, to stamp.

Title: Ոտնաւոր
Definition_1: footed, having feet; standing on feet.

Title: Ոտնափոխ
Definition_1: foot-pace; — լինել, to make a step, to walk, to go forward foot after foot, to pace along.

Title: Ոտնափոխութիւն
Definition_1: motion of the feet, footing, walking.

Title: Ոտնխթի
Definition_1: slowly, gently, furtively, little by little.

Title: Ոտնկայ
Definition_3: յ—ս, standing, upright.

Title: Ոտնկելիք
Definition_1: standing; footboard; stepping-stone; կործանել յ—լեաց, to overthrow, to upset, to throw down; անկանել յ—լեաց ի գետին, to fall at full length on the earth; բառնալ զոսոխն յ—լեաց, to raise one's fallen enemy.

Title: Ոտնկռիւ
Definition_2: occasion, pretext, motive; — լինել, to get a hold over.

Title: Ոտնհար
Definition_1: malignant, rejoicing at another's suffering, malevolent, ill-natured; — լինել, to kick, to cause to fall;
Definition_2: to rejoice at another's woe, to be malignant, malevolent; to despise, to insult, to laugh at, to mock, to jeer; — լինել թշուառութեան ուրուք, to insult one in his misfortune.

Title: Ոտնհարութիւն
Definition_2: ill-will, ill-naturedness, malevolence; insult, sneer, derision, laugh.

Title: Ոտնքայլեմ
Definition_1: to walk slowly, with measured steps.

Title: Որ
Definition_1: who, which, what, that; որ միանգամ, որ ոք, who, whoever, whosoever; որք միանգամ, all they who; որ ինչ, what; which; all that; whatever; այրն որ գայ, the man who is coming; զոր դու գտեր, what you have found; եւ որ չար եւս է, որ չար քան զամենայն է, and what is worst of all; այրն զոր եմ սիրեմ, the man whom I love; չգիտէ զոր գործէն, he does not know what he is doing; յորմէ, whence, therefore; որ եւ իցէ, whoever, whosoever; any thing whatever, aught; որ զինչ եւ իցէ, whatever or whatsoever it may be; be that as it may; ընտրեա զոր եւ կամիս, choose which you please; որոյ աղագաւ, for this reason; որ բարիս գործէ, գտցէ զբարիս, who acts well will be rewarded; որ խնդրէ՝ առնու, he who asks will receive; ժողովեցին որ շատ եւ որ սակաւ, some have gathered much, some little; հանապազօր մեղանչեմք՝ որ խորհհրդով, որ բանիւ, we continually sin either in thought or word.

Title: Որ կան
Definition_1: things present, the present; մի վստահիր յ—դ, do not trust to the present.

Title: Յորմէ հետէ
Definition_1: since, since that; — մեկնեցար, since you set out.

Title: Որ՞
Definition_1:
which ? what ?
որո՞վ իշխանութեամբ, with what authority ?
ո՞ր որդի է, who may that child be ?
յո՞ր իրս եւ յի՞նչ միտս առաքեաց, for what and why did he send ?
որո՞վ իւիք, by which ? with what ?
յո՞ր վայր, up to where ?
յորո՞ւմ ժամու, at what hour ?
ո՞ր աղագաւ, why ? for what reason ?
զորմէ՞ օրէ ասիցէ, and what day does he fix ?
զո՞ր օրէնք ունի, what law prevails ?
վասն ո՞ր արդար վաստակոց, for what just deserts ?
որո՞վք երեսօք հալածիցեն, with what effrontery they will drive away ?
գիտէ զիւրաքանչիւր ոք ըստ կարգի՝ եթէ որ ըստ որմէ իցեն, he knows each one by the order in which he comes; եւ որ այլ or այլն եւս, եւ որ ի կարգին, եւ որ ինչ ի կարգին, and so on and so of the rest, et cetera.

Title: Որ
Definition_1: that; որ զի, that, in order that, so that; since, as; կարծեմ որ գայ, I believe that he will come; որ թէպէտեւ նոքա վեհք են, although they are superior.

Title: Որականամ
Definition_1: to be qualified; to be coloured; — յարիւն, to be changed into blood.

Title: Որայ
Definition_1: sheaf, bundle; —ս կապել, to lay corn in sheaves, to bind up into sheaves, to tie in bundles.

Title: Որբ
Definition_2: derelict, desolate, abandoned, destitute; — մնալ ի հօրէ, ի մօրէ, to lose one's father, or mother; — մնալ յումեքէ, to be bereaved, to remain desolate.

Title: Որբանամ
Definition_1: to become an orphan, to be fatherless and motherless.

Title: Որդեակ
Definition_1: little child, boy or girl; — իմ, son, my son, my boy.

Title: Որդեգիր
Definition_1: adoptive, adopted; առնուլ յ—ս, to adopt as son; սնոյց զնա յիւր —ս, he nursed him like his own son.

Title: Որդեկոտոր
Definition_1: killing or destroying progeny; bereaved of children; — նուէրք, the sacrifice of one's own children; — առնել, to massacre children; — լինել, to be bereaved of one's children, to have had one's children slain.

Title: Որդեսէր
Definition_1: fond of one's son, loving one's children.

Title: Որդի
Definition_1: son, child; — աստուծոյ, Son of God, Only Son; —ք լուսոյ, խաւարի, the children of light, of darkness; հոգւոյ —, cf. Որդեգիր; —ք բրտից, potters; —ք որդւոց, nephews; — ի հօրէ, from father to son, successively; ըստ հօրն եւ —ն, like begets or produces like.

Title: Որդիակցիմ
Definition_1: to have the same god-father, to be god-sons.

Title: Որդիանամ
Definition_1: to become the son of; to be adopted by.

Title: Որդն
Definition_1: worm, vermin, grub; — երկրի, earth-worm; — փայտի, wood-worm; հնդիկ —, silk-worm; — աղեաց or որովայնի, gut-worm, maw-worm; — միայնուկ, երէզ or երիզ —, tape-worm, taenia; — փորոտեաց ձիոց, bots; յորդունս համակիլ, to be full of worms, to be crawling with worms, to swarm with worms; cf. Թաթաւիմ.

Title: Որդնալից
Definition_1: full of worms, crawling, maggotty, rotten.

Title: Որդնածին
Definition_1: generating or producing worms; — առաջնորդ, Queen-bee.

Title: Որդնահար
Definition_1: worm-eaten, rotten, carious; — լինել, to become or grow worm-eaten.

Title: Որդնեռաց
Definition_1: all alive, swarming or crawling with worms.

Title: Որեար
Definition_1: people, men, folks, persons; աւագ —, nobility, noblemen, gentlemen.

Title: Որթ
Definition_2: colocynthis; coloquintida, bitter apple (purgative); բեր —ոյ, grapes; տերեւ —ոյ, vine-leaf; ուռ —ոյ, vine-tendril; յօտք —ոյ, vine-branches, vine-cuttings; թօթափել or քաղել զտերեւս —ոյ, to strip away the superfluous vine-leaves.

Title: Որթ
Definition_1: calf, (pl. calves); — դիեցիկ, sucking calf; միս —ու, veal; — խորովեալ, roast veal; մորթ —ու, calf-skin; cf. Քեցեմ; — եղանց, fawn, young deer; — ծովային, seal, sea-calf; cf. Փոկ; — ոսկի ձուլածոյ, golden calf.

Title: Որթագլուխ
Definition_2: Isis; golden calf of the Israelites.

Title: Որթոց
Definition_1: vineyard; stalk of dried vine-cuttings; calf-house.

Title: Ործ
Definition_1: belch, eructation, rising of the stomach.

Title: Ործամ
Definition_1: to belch; to feel inclined to vomit, to retch, to vomit.

Title: Ործացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to belch; to convulse the stomach, to cause to vomit.

Title: Որկոր
Definition_2: gluttony; զկնի —ոյ երթալ, to give oneself up to gluttony.

Title: Որկորամոլ
Definition_1: gluttonous, greedy, gormandizing, voracious, ravenous; — լինել, to be gluttonous, greedy.

Title: Որկորամոլութիւն
Definition_1: gormandizing, gluttony, greediness, guttling, voracity; որկորամոլութեամբ, gluttonously, greedily.

Title: Որմ
Definition_2: — զորմայն, from wall to wall; in groping, groping along; քանդել զ—, to unwall, to dismantle.

Title: Որմահատու
Definition_1: boring through a wall and passing.

Title: Որմայեց
Definition_1: supported against a wall; — ծառ, wall-tree, espalier.

Title: Որմաշարժ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be ruined, to be shaken down.

Title: Որմարգել
Definition_1: walled up, enclosed by a wall; — առնել, to shut up within four walls, to imprison.

Title: Որմափակ
Definition_1: enclosure, recinct, park, walled in space;

Title: Որմափոր
Definition_1: wall-piercing; — լինել, to pierce or bore through a wall; to steal.

Title: Որմեմ
Definition_1: to wall, to surround with walls, to close up with masonry, to wall up; to build.

Title: Որմզդական
Definition_1: Jupiter's, belonging to Jupiter; — դիք, Jupiter, Jove, Bacchus; — տօն, feasts in honour of Castor and Pollux; — հուր, sacred fire of the Persians; fire-worship, Persian sect; — քաղաք, Diospolis.

Title: Որմզդուհի
Definition_1: daughter or sister of king Hormisdas.

Title: Որոգայթ
Definition_1: snare, trap, net, springe; ambush, ambuscade; cf. Լարեմ; անկանել յ—, to fall into a snare; cf. Ըմբռնիմ; լարել զ— եւ ի նոյն հարկանիլ, շաղիլ, to fall into one's own snares; — դնել ումեք բանիւք, to convict a person by his own words.

Title: Որոգայթադիր
Definition_1: setting or laying a snare; lying in wait; cunning, deceitful.

Title: Որոգայթաշատ
Definition_1: very perilous, most dangerous; cf. Բազմորոգայթ.

Title: Որոգայթարան
Definition_1: place full of snares, dangerous place.

Title: Որոգայթեմ
Definition_1: to set or lay snares or traps, to entrap; to wait in ambush for, to waylay; to surprise, to deceive.

Title: Որոգայթիմ
Definition_1: to fall into a snare, to be caught, taken in a net.

Title: Որոճ
Definition_2: thought, meditation, reflection; — ածել, բերել յ—, cf. Որոճեմ; ազգի ազգի —ս որոճել, to ruminate or meditate upon, to think over, to revolve in one's mind.

Title: Որոճիմ
Definition_1: to ruminate, to chew the cud, to chew again, to rechew;
Definition_2: to ruminate, to think, to muse on, to ponder.

Title: Որոճողաբար
Definition_1: ruminatingly, in a ruminating manner; distinctly, lucidly, clearly, plainly.

Title: Որոմն
Definition_1: aira, hair-grass, kockle; darnel, zizania, tares; weeds;
Definition_2: — ցանել, to sow dissension, to create differences.

Title: Որոնեմ
Definition_1: to seek, to search, to inquire after or into, to make search, to ferret, to investigate, to rummage; to louse; — զերկիր, զքաղաք, to explore, to spy out.

Title: Որոշ
Definition_1: distinct, separate, different; decisive, precise, clear; evident, certain;

Title: Որոշակի
Definition_1: distinctly, clearly, plainly; decisively, positively, precisely; separately, specially.

Title: Որոշեմ
Definition_1: to distinguish, to discern; to divide, to separate; to decide, to determine; to specify; to choose, to select; to excommunicate.

Title: Որոշիմ
Definition_1: to detach or separate oneself; to be excommunicated.

Title: Որոշումն
Definition_1: distinction, division, separation; decision, definition, determination, resolution; difference; segregation; —ումն յեկեղեցւոյ, excommunication; չորս որոշմունք տարւոյն, the four seasons of the year; —ումն առնել, to come to a decision, to make up one's mind.

Title: Որոշտեմ
Definition_1: to destroy, to do away with.

Title: Որովայն
Definition_1: belly, paunch; womb, uterus, matrix; պտուղ —ի, fruit of the womb, child; հերձումն —ի, gastrotomy; կարան —ի, gastroraphy; կերակուր —ի, belly-timber; յագուրդ —ի, bellyful; ծառայ —ի, gastrolater, fond of one's belly, dainty; կաղ յ—է մօր իւրոյ, born-lame, lame from the womb; խճողել զ—, to cram or stuff one's belly or guts, to glut oneself; գնալ ի վերայ —ի, to go upon its belly, to crawl along; անկանել ի վերայ —ի, to fall down flat on the face; աստուածացուցանել զ—ն, to make a god of the belly; որոց աստուած —ն իւրեանց, whose God is their belly; ցաւէ — իմ, my stomach aches.

Title: Որովայնազգեաց
Definition_1: what she carries in her womb.

Title: Որովայնապարար
Definition_1: pampering one's belly, addicted to intemperance, gluttonous, guzzling; — լինել, to pamper oneself, to be a greedy-gut, to be given to over feeding, to gormandizing or to gluttony.

Title: Որովայնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to form a vase with a large belly; to make a very large or capacious vase.

Title: Որոտամ
Definition_1: to thunder, to rumble, to roar; to detonate; —ացող կազ, explosive gas.

Title: Որորեմ
Definition_1: to cradle, to rock, to lull to sleep.

Title: Որչափոյք
Definition_1:
how much, how many, how; as much as; որչա՞փ եւս, որչա՞փ եւս առաւել, how much more ?
որչա՞փ անգամ, how many times ?
որչա՞փ ժամանակ, how long ?
— յիսն է, as much as in me lies, my best; — կարեմ, as much as I can; — հնար է, as much as possible; — եւ մեծատուն իցէ, however rich he may be; այնչափ յարգեմ զնա — զքեզ, I esteem him as much as I do you; եւ — յառաջ մատչէր, in proportion as he advanced; զորս — ոք հաւաստագոյն քննեսցէ, the more one sifts or investigates them, the more one; — ի կենցաղումս կեամ, while I breathe this moral breath; յ—ից զրկեցեր զանձն քո բարութեանց, of how much you have deprived yourself !
— ծնեալ էր զիս մայր իմ՝ այսպէս հանգիստ եւ անոյշ քուն ոչ է եղեալ, never since my birth did I sleep so well; — մարդիկ, նոյնչափ կարծիք, as many men, as many minds.

Title: Որպէս
Definition_1: as, the same as, like, almost, according to, conformably, how; when;
Definition_2:
how ! what ! indeed !
— զի, in order that, that, to the end that, so that; because, for; — թէ, as if, as though; — զիարդ եւ իցէ, at all events, no matter what happens; — զիարդ եւ կամք իցեն, however they may wish, in whatever way one may wish it; մարդոյ — խոտոյ են աւուրք իւր, the days of man are like grass; որպէս, որպէս զի, — առանց քննելոյ են դատաստանք նորա, how unsearchable are His judgments !
—, մեռա՜ւ ուրեմն, what! he is dead!.

Title: Որպիսի
Definition_1:
what; such that; — ինչ, as, such as, for instance; — ինչ իցէ ողջոյնս այս, what manner of salutation this might be!
գիտես — ինչ տօնքն էին, you know what those festivals were; — եւ իցէ, whatever, whatsoever.

Title: Որջ
Definition_1: den, lair, kennel, burrow, hole; — աղուեսու, fox-hole.

Title: Որջանամ
Definition_1: to hide in a hole, to go to earth, to crouch or squat in a kennel;
Definition_2: to nestle, to creep into, to hide oneself.

Title: Որս
Definition_1: chase, hunting, hunt, sport; prey; venison, game; զբօսանք —ոյ, field-sports; եղանակ —ոյ, shooting-season; այր հմուտ —ոյ, skilful hunter, a good sportsman, a mighty huntsman; պահապան —ոյ, game-keeper; — ձկանց, fishing, fishery; — թռչնոց, shooting, fowling; — աղուեսուց, fox-hunting; — վագերց, tiger-hunting; — հեծանել, to go a hunting or shooting; յ— ածել, to shoot wild beasts.

Title: Որսաբանեմ
Definition_1: to spy into or surprise a person's sentiments, to draw a person out, to cause a person to give involuntary evidence.

Title: Որսական
Definition_2: cf. Որսորդ; շուն —, hound, greyhound; բազէ —, trained hawk; թռչուն —, bird of prey; ձի —, hunter.

Title: Որսամ
Definition_1: to chase, to hunt, to go a hunting or shooting, to shoot;
Definition_2: to try or endeavour to win or to seduce, to wrap up or involve in snares, to surprise, to entrap; — հաւս, to fowl; cf. Ձուկն; աղուէս —, to hunt a fox; — զհոգիս, to prey upon souls; — զոք, to catch or entrap a person, to insnare;
Definition_3: to captivate, to win; to entice, to attract, to allure, to flatter; — զսիրտ ուրուք, to gain a person's heart; — զոք բանիւ, to win a person with fair speech; — ինչ բանս ի բերանոյ ուրուք, to entangle a person in his own words; — զյաջողութիւն աւուրց, to watch the propitious moment or favourable occasion; — փառս կամ պատիւս, to go in search of honour or glory.

Title: Որսամասն
Definition_1: part of the produce of the chase.

Title: Որսանք
Definition_1: chase, hunting; hunting or fishing implements;

Title: Որսափոխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to charge the hunting-field, or the fishing-place.

Title: Որսորդ
Definition_1: hunter, huntsman, venator; — ձկանց, fisher, fisherman, piscator; կին —, huntress; — բանից, a pryer into other person's thoughts.

Title: Որսորդապետ
Definition_1: chief huntsman, Master of the hounds.

Title: Ութ
Definition_1: eight; ութիցս քսան, eightscore; յամի տեառն հազար — հարիւր եօթանասուն եւ —, in the year of our Lord eighteen hundred and seventy eight.

Title: Ութաշտիճանեայ
Definition_1: having eight steps or stairs; of eight degrees or orders.

Title: Ութերեակ
Definition_1: eight, octonary; eighth; the number eight; eight days.

Title: Ութերորդ
Definition_3: octant;
Definition_4: — ձայն, octave.

Title: Ութերորդեմ
Definition_1: to repeat eight times; to pay or to take the eight.

Title: Ութուտասնամեայ
Definition_1: height years old; height years since.

Title: Ուժգին
Definition_2: —, —ս, strongly, vigorously, violently, vehemently; —ս գանել, to beat violently, unmercifully; — առնուլ, to take by force; —ս ակնարկել, to eye disdainfully, to regard ferociously; —ս ընթանալ, to be swift-footed, to run swiftly.

Title: Ուժգնանամ
Definition_1: to gather strength, to get strong, to grow stronger, to be strengthened; to become prevalent, to predominate, to prevail over, to domineer.

Title: Ուժգնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to corroborate, to strengthen, to fortify; to give more intenseness, to augment, to increase; to render violent, impetuous.

Title: Ուժգնութիւն
Definition_1: vehemence, impetuosity, fury, violence, heat, ardour, intensity; force, strength, energy, vigour; efficacy, efficaciousness.

Title: Ուժեմ
Definition_1: to have strength, to be able, to resist; to oppose.

Title: Ուլն
Definition_1: neck; զուլամբ երթալ, to fall headlong, head-foremost, to tumble, to fall;
Definition_2: to be plunged in sensuality; to be sunk in debauchery, to wallow in voluptuousness; pearl necklace; Venetian pearls, bead, glass-bead, bugle; knuckle-bones, cockle.

Title: Ուխտ
Definition_1: vow; wish, desire, prayer; compact, covenant, agreement; alliance, pact, treaty; order, congregation, community; clergy, churchmen; pilgrimage; — աղի, everlasting covenant; —ք եւ դաշինք, conditional promise, alliance; մատեան —ի, Holy Writ, the Bible; տապանակ —ի, the ark of the Covenant; հին եւ նոր —, the Old and the New Testaments; — հաւատացելոց, Christians; — եկեղեցւոյ, մանկունք —ի, clergy; — կանանց, nunnery; —ի տեղիք, holy places, sanctuaries, relics; պարզ, հրապարակական, անլուծանելի —, simple, solemn, indissoluble vow; անխորհուրդ, անխոհեմ —, indiscreet, imprudent vow; — դնել, to make a vow, vows; — դնել ողջախոհութեան, to make a vow of chastity; —ս կռել հրապարակաւ, to make a solemn treaty; — դնել or յ— մտանել ընդ ումեք, to make a treaty, or an alliance with any one, to be in treaty for; կնքել — հաշտութեան, — հաստատութեան առնել, to make peace; կալ յ—ին, to remain faithful to one's vow; կատարել զ—ն, to accomplish one's vow; անցանել զ—իւ, ջրել զ—ն, ապախտ առնել զ— իւր, to break or violate one's vow; տնօրինել զ—ն, to dispense with or exempt from a vow; —իւք խնդրել, to desire ardently, to long for eagerly; երթալ յ—ս, to go on a pilgrimage; զ—ս իմ կատարեցից, I will accomplish my vow.

Title: Ուխտադիր
Definition_1: making a vow; being under a vow, Nazarean; allied, confederated; — լինել, to make a vow; to conclude a treaty.

Title: Ուխտադրեմ
Definition_1: to form an alliance or confederacy, to league.

Title: Ուխտադրութիւն
Definition_1: making a vow; concluding a treaty; vow; profession; wish, desire.

Title: Ուխտազանց
Definition_1: violator or breaker of a vow, of a convention; infringer, transgressor, offender;

Title: Ուխտազանցեմ
Definition_1: to break or violate one's vow.

Title: Ուխտազանցութիւն
Definition_1: violation of a wow, of a convention, contravention, breach, infraction of treaties; transgression.

Title: Ուխտակալ
Definition_1: observing, keeping a vow or convention, faithful, true, loyal, true-hearted.

Title: Ուխտակից
Definition_1: companion in a vow; ally, confederate.

Title: Ուխտապահութիւն
Definition_1: accomplishment, observance of a wow or convention, fidelity.

Title: Ուխտարան
Definition_1: place where one makes a vow or convention.

Title: Ուխտաւոր
Definition_1: that has made a vow; allied; Nazarite; professed (monk or nun);

Title: Ուխտաւորիմ
Definition_1: to vow, to devote or dedicate oneself to God;
Definition_2: to deprive oneself of, to abstain from.

Title: Ուխտաւորութիւն
Definition_1: consecration, state or condition of a Nazarene, of a monk; vow, profession; pilgrimage.

Title: Ուխտեմ
Definition_1: to vow, to make a vow; to take the vows, to profess; to make or conclude a treaty, or covenant; to confederate, to enter into a mutual obligation; — նուէրս, to promise offerings.

Title: Ուծանամ
Definition_1: to cool down, to be estranged; to remove, to go out of, to abandon, to fail.

Title: Ուծացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cool, to damp, to estrange; to avert, to remove.

Title: Ուղ
Definition_1: stairs; bridge; way or passage; cf. Ծուծ.

Title: Ուղեդարձ
Definition_1: return from a journey or voyage.

Title: Ուղեկեալ
Definition_1: returning from a journey or voyage, travelled.

Title: Ուղեկից
Definition_1: fellow-traveller, fellow-passenger; —ք, retinue, train, attendants, suite, cortege.

Title: Ուղեկցեմ
Definition_1: to travel together, to accompany, to go with, to follow; to convoy.

Title: Ուղեկցիմ
Definition_1: to travel together, to accompany, to go with, to follow; to convoy.

Title: Ուղեկցութիւն
Definition_1: travelling companion, accompanying, following, company; convoy.

Title: Ուղեղ
Definition_1: brain, brains; marrow; cf. Թափեալ; սենեակ ուղղոյ, skull; — ի գլուխ ունել, to be judicious, in one's right senses; մինչեւ ց— ոսկերաց, to the very marrow of the bones.

Title: Ուղերձ
Definition_1: gift, present, homage; address; — մատուցանել, to present an address.

Title: Ուղերձեմ
Definition_1: to make a present, to present, to offer, to give; to address; to push forth, to produce; to attract, to win with gifts, to seduce; to persuade, to induce.

Title: Ուղեցոյց
Definition_2: sector-guide; — օտարականի, cicerone, guide; — լինել, to guide, to escort, to conduct.

Title: Ուղեւոր
Definition_1: traveller; passenger; ի ձեւ —ի, in travelling trim.

Title: Ուղեւորեմ
Definition_1: to guide, to conduct, to direct in the way, to put on the way; to send, to despatch, to forward.

Title: Ուղեւորիմ
Definition_1: to set out on a journey, to start, to go to travel, to travel, to take a journey, to journey.

Title: Ուղեւորութիւն
Definition_1: journey, travels; itinerary; — ընդ ցամաք կամ դարձ, the journey there and back; — ընդ ծով եւ դարձ, the voyage out and home; ծախք ուղեւորութեան, travelling expenses; ուղեւորիլ զանդարձն —, to go one's last journey.

Title: Ուղէշ
Definition_1: branch, bough; shoot, slip; —ք եղջերուաց, tiers of the horns of deer; յապաւել զ—ս, to prune, to lop, to trim off the superfluous branches.

Title: Ուղի
Definition_1: road, way, route, journey; passage; յ— արկանել, to send on a voyage, to start a person on a journey; յ— անկանել, ուղւոյ լինել, to set out, to start, to leave, to depart, to go away.

Title: Ուղիղ
Definition_1: right, straight, direct, vertical, upright; correct, accurate;
Definition_3: directly, straightly, vertically; uprightly, rightly, justly, well; — գիծ, right line; — անկիւն, right angle; — սիրտ, honest, loyal heart; — միտք, upright mind, just judgment; — առնել, to smooth, to prepare; to make ready the way; cf. Ուղղեմ; — գնալ ի նպատակն, to come to the point, to aim at; — վարդապետել, to indoctrinate, to instruct in sound principles; — դատեցար, thou hast rightly judged.

Title: Ուղխ
Definition_1: mountain stream, torrent, flood; ravine; —ք հոսանաց, հեղեղաց, torrents; —ք փափկութեան, river of pleasures; —ք արեան, a river of blood; իջին յաչացն —ք արտասուաց, he shed a flood of tears.

Title: Ուղխաջուր
Definition_1: torrent-water; —ք, torrents; — հեղեղատ, a flooded or swollen torrent.

Title: Ուղղաբերձ
Definition_1: high and straight; well-shaped, straight, tall; գնալ — հասակաւ, to go haughtily, to hold one's head high.

Title: Ուղղագնաց
Definition_2: walking in uprightness, full of rectitude, virtuous.

Title: Ուղղագրեմ
Definition_1: to correct, to rectify, to set right, to spell; to write correctly.

Title: Ուղղադատ
Definition_1: of right or just judgment, judging equitably, just, right.

Title: Ուղղադատութիւն
Definition_1: sound, correct or right judgment, good sense.

Title: Ուղղածուծ
Definition_1: whose marrow is dried up; — առնել, to consume or suck the marrow; — առնել ցաւոց զոսկերս, to torment, to excruciate, to torture.

Title: Ուղղաձեւեմ
Definition_1: to direct; to rectify; cf. Ուղիղ համառօտեմ.

Title: Ուղղաձիգ
Definition_1: in a direct line, direct, straight, vertical, perpendicular, upright.

Title: Ուղղամիտ
Definition_1: sound-minded or rightminded, judicious, sensible, honest, upright.

Title: Ուղղեմ
Definition_1: to make straight, to trim, to straighten; to erect, to raise, to hold up; to address, to direct; to conduct, to govern, to rule; to correct, to rectify; to correct, to reclaim, to improve, to reform, to make better, to amend; — զգնացս, զվարս, to regulate one's conduct or actions; to repent, to amend; — զսխալանս, to confess one's errors, to redeem one's faults; — զբան, զխնդիր, to address, to direct one's words to, to question; ատեան —, to assemble or convoke a council; նիզակ ումեք —, to hurl a javelin at;

Title: Ուղղիչ
Definition_1: corrector; reformer; rector, director; conductor, leader; driver, coachman; steersman, helmsman; cf. Ղեակ;

Title: Ուղղութիւն
Definition_2: rectitude, uprightness, integrity, justice, equity; correction, rectification, adjustment, amendment; redress, reformation; direction, tendency; — վարուց, moral tendency, conduct, morality, morals; — բարուց, correction of morals; գիրք ուղղութեանց, the Book of Jasher; ածել յ—, to reclaim, to correct; յ— գալ, to be reclaimed, corrected, to repent.

Title: Ուղտ
Definition_1: camel; մատակ —, she-camel; տաճիկ —, dromedary; զ—ու զձայն ածել, to bellow like a camel.

Title: Ուղտաքաղ
Definition_1: chimaera, fabulous monster half camel half deer.

Title: Ումպ
Definition_1: drinking, drink; drinking-bout, draught, sip, gulp; ըմպել — առ —, to sip; թէպէտեւ յ— էր, although he was about to drink.

Title: Ումպէտ
Definition_1: useless, worthless, futile, flimsy; whatever, whatsoever;

Title: Ունակութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Ուն ;habit, custom, accustoming, routine, practice; ունակութեամբ, by routine, by rote; ունակութեամբ յաղթի, custom conquers custom.

Title: Ունայն
Definition_3: vacuum, void, vacuity.

Title: Ունայնախոհ
Definition_1: given to futile or vain thoughts.

Title: Ունայնահաւատ
Definition_1: of false religion, infidel, misbelieving; of little faith, incredulous.

Title: Ունայնաձայնութիւն
Definition_1: word or discourse void of meaning; chatter; erroneous doctrine.

Title: Ունայնանամ
Definition_1: to become empty, to be emptied; to vanish, to vanish or pass away, to go off in smoke, to disappear; to be deprived of, to remain without; to be debased, humbled.

Title: Ունայնարուեստ
Definition_1: attached to vain things, applying oneself to futilities.

Title: Ունայնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to empty; to render vain or useless, to do away with; — զանձն, to be annihilated, to bow down to the dust, to debase or humble oneself.

Title: Ունայնութիւն
Definition_1: vanity; inutility, futility; ունայնութեան պաշտամունք, superstition; ունայնութեանց ամենայն ինչ ընդունայն է, vanity of vanities, all is vanity.

Title: Ունելիք
Definition_1: tongs; pincers, pliers; nippers; snuffers; cf. Մազխիլ; — խեցգետնոյ, claws; — շաքարի, sugar-tongs; — վիրաբուժից, forceps; — վարսավիրայի, curling iron, curling tongs.

Title: Ունիմ
Definition_1:
to have; to take, to hold, to possess, to occupy, to enjoy; to take, to stop, to retain; to seize upon, to become master of, to subject, to subdue; to contain, to enclose; to carry, to support, to sustain; to relate to, to refer to; to be able, to know how; — առ, իբրեւ, to esteem, to repute, to take for, to look upon as, to regard as; — զտեղի, to stand instead of, to supply the place of; — զոք, to stop one, to seize; — զգուշութիւն, to take care, to watch; — ի մտի, to form a design or project, to propose to oneself, to think to; to retain; զառաջս —, to oppose, to resist, to impede, to hinder; to stand or go before; զդէմ —, to make head against, to face, to resist, to oppose, to fight; — առ իւր զխորհուրդս, to keep another's secret; — զտունն, to maintain the honour of the house; պինդ — զխոստովանութիւն, to keep the faith; ի վայր — զբարկութիւն, to refrain from anger, to control one's anger; գութ — զմէնջ, to have pity on us; — զաղանդ, զուսումն, to follow the doctrine, to be of the sect of; ոչ առ սուտս ունիմ զձեզ, I do not take you for liars; զանձինս առ իմաստունս ունէին, they thought themselves wise; իբրեւ զմարգարէ ունէին զնա, they looked on him as a prophet; սրտմտութիւն կալաւ զնա, he was enraged; զի՞նչ ունիս առնել, what have you to do ?
կալ զնա զեղջերացն, take it by the horns; հրամայեցին նմա — զգլուխ բազմականին, they gave him the highest place at the feast; տենդն կալաւ զնա, the fever has seized him, he has caught a fever; ունիմ ի վենետիկ քսան եւ չորս ամ, I stayed twenty-four years in Venice; ահ կալաւ զիս, fear seized me; ի բանի մի ունիք, never mind, do not care for that; — ունէին իւղ՝ այլ, they had indeed oil, but; խօսել կալաւ, he began to speak; կալարուք զկիրճս ջրոցն, seize the canals; դիպող պատասխանեօք ունի զբերանս նոցա, he silences them with opportune replies; խօսիլ ոչ ունիմ, ոչ ունիմ ասել, I cannot speak, I do not know how to speak.

Title: Ունկն
Definition_1:
ear; ունկունք, handle; cf. Ականջ; — դնել, մատուցանել, to give one's ear to, to lend an ear to, to listen, to hearken, to be attentive; խօսել յունկանէ, to speak in one's ear; to whisper; — արկանել, to obey; չդնել յունկան, to disobey; զոր լուայք յունկանէ, what has been confided to your year; եհաս յ— նորա, it reached even his ears; — դիք, listen! attention !
cf. Թմբուկ.

Title: Ունկնաւոր
Definition_1: ansated, having an ear or handle.

Title: Ունկնդիր
Definition_2: listening, obedient, docile, submissive; —ք, auditory, audience, the public.

Title: Ունկնդրեմ
Definition_1: to lend one's ear to, to listen, to auscultate, to hear, to hearken to, to grant; to obey.

Title: Ունողութիւն
Definition_1: possession; power, authority; շուրջ —, circuit, circumference.

Title: Ունչք
Definition_1: nose; mustachio; սրբել զունչս, to blow one's nose; զընչովք առնել, to trim one's mustaches, to twirl the mustaches; ունչս առնել, ունել, ընկենուլ, յընչաց քերել, յընչացք բանալ, to turn up one's nose at, to snap one's fingers at, to set at nought or at defiance, to take no notice of, to make no account of, to set light by, to despise, to scorn, to quiz, to laugh at, to ridicule.

Title: Ունջ
Definition_1: the inner side; bottom; earth; root; յ— բերդին, under the castle walls; յ— լերին, at the foot of the mountain; ընդ — տանել զոք, to drag a person along the ground; ընդ — տանել զլերինս, to raze the mountains to the ground, to level with the earth; բրել զ—ս այգւոյ, պատառել զ—ս որթոյ, to dig about the roots of vines.

Title: Ուշ
Definition_1: memory, remembrance; attention; intelligence, mind, sentiment, sense, instinct;
Definition_2: late; cf. Յուշիկ; — եւ ուրուշ, the senses;
Definition_3: — ի կուրծ, attentively, carefully, heedfully;
Definition_4: —ի —ով, with great attention, most attentively, more at leisure, diligently, carefully; — առնել, առնուլ, ունել, դնել, to pay attention, to be attentive, to have in view, not to lose sight of; to apply oneself to; to mind, to take care, to be heedful or cautious, to take good heed, to be on one's guard; to tend to, to aim at, to seek, to try, to endeavour, to strive; յ— ածել, առնել, արկանել, to recall to mind, to remember, to remind; cf. Յիշեցուցանեմ; յ— գալ, լինել, զ—ով գալ, to bear in mind, to recollect, to call to mind, to remember; յ—ի ունել, կապել, to preserve in one's memory, to have recollection of, never to forget; — ի կուրծս առնել, to think, to meditate, to conceive or imagine the design of; — ի կուրծս արկանել, to take a thing for serious, in earnest; զ— եւ զուրուշ գրաւել, cf. Մոգեմ; ընդոստուցանել զ—, to excite the attention; — ունել յոք, to follow with the eyes; յ— բերել, cf. Յիշեմ; յ—ի բերել, to revive, to cause a person recover his breath, to quicken, to rouse; — ունել, to wait; բառնել յ—ոյ մտաց, to cause to forget, to put out of one's head; պրծանիլ յ—ոյ յիշատակաց, to be forgotten; յ— լինի ինձ, ինձ յ— անկանի, I do remember; — ի կուրծս անկաւ գրել, the idea struck him to write, he conceived the idea of writing; — ի կուրծս քաջալերէին զմիմեանս, they incessantly encouraged one another; չէ ի յ— մտաց, he does not remember; նմա ընդ յ—ի կապեալ, calling to his memory, reminding him; — կալ, attention !.

Title: Ուշաբերեմ
Definition_1: to recall to mind, to remember, to remind of; to cause to recover from a swoon, to cause one to come to again.

Title: Ուշաբերիմ
Definition_1: to recover from a swoon, to come to life, to revive, to recover one's thoughts on senses.

Title: Ուշագնաց
Definition_1: out of one's mind; loosing one's senses, fainting, swooned; — լինել, to faint away, to swoon.

Title: Ուշաթափ
Definition_1: cf. Մտաթափ; beside oneself, out of one's mind, having lost all sensation.

Title: Ուշաթափիմ
Definition_1: to be out of one's wits; to swoon or faint away.

Title: Ուշեղ
Definition_1: of good memory; intelligent; արտաշէս —, Artaxerxes Mnemon.

Title: Ուշիմ
Definition_1: witty, intelligent, ingenious, sensible; judicious, wary, prudent; — լինել, to be attentive, wise, sagacious, to attend to.

Title: Ուշիմութիւն
Definition_1: presence or penetration of mind, readiness of wit, intelligence, sagacity; acuteness.

Title: Ուռ
Definition_1: vine-branch; branch; cf. Ուռենի; yew, yew-tree; — վարսագեղ, vine-branch with foliage and fruit.

Title: Ուռթեմ
Definition_1: to fertilize, to render fertile; cf. Յուռթեմ.

Title: Ուռի
Definition_1: willow, osier; վարսաւոր or վայրակախ —, weeping willow; դնդագլուխ —, pollard-willow; —ք, willow-plot, willow-hedge, osier bed.

Title: Ուռկանեմ
Definition_1: to fish with a net, to fish;
Definition_2: to take as in a net, to catch, to draw into a snare.

Title: Ուռկանոս
Definition_1: Vulcan, god of fire and of smiths; vulcano, Etna, Vesuvius.

Title: Ուռճալիր
Definition_1: flourishing, flowery, in full bloom or vegetation; filled up, abundant, plentiful.

Title: Ուռճանամ
Definition_1: to be vigorous, rank, flourishing;fig to be in a thriving or prosperous condition; to be full, brimful; to abound, to redound.

Title: Ուռն
Definition_2: oppressor; հարուած ուռան, hammer blow; կոփիւն ուռանց, hammering; — հարկանել, to hammer; — դարբնոցի, sledgehammer or forge hammer; — մեծ, sledge; — ճօճան, tilt hammer, tail hammer; — ճակատաւոր, front hammer, largest forge hammer; — վերացման, lift hammer; — շոգեշարժական, steam hammer; — ժայռահերձ, pounding hammer;
Definition_3: — ատամնաւոր, claw hammer or fid hammer; — ձեռաց, hand hammer, up-hand hammer.

Title: Ուռնադղորդ
Definition_2: with hammering; — բոմբիւն, hammer-blow; clang; — հնչէին սալք, the hammer-blows resounded on the anvil.

Title: Ուռնում
Definition_1: to be swollen, to swell, to puff up, to stuff out, to rise up; to bloat;
Definition_2: to be swollen or puffed up, to be inflated, to grow proud.

Title: Ուռոյց
Definition_2: —ք, swelling, puffing, rising; tumour, bump; blister, pimple; զնստուցանել զ—ս, to assuage or cure a swelling.

Title: Ուռուցանեմ
Definition_1: to swell, to puff out; to bloat; to stuff; to tumefy, to raise.

Title: Ուռուցիկ
Definition_1: swelled out, puffed up, bloated, turgent; swelling, puffing;
Definition_2: proud, fastuous, pompous; — հողմն, tempestuous or stormy wind, gust; — ոճ, turgid, inflated or fustian style; — հերք, wavy hair.

Title: Ուռուցումն
Definition_1: swelling, puffiness, bloatedness, turgescence, inflation, turgidity;

Title: Ուս
Definition_1: shoulder; back; — շինուածոց, wing of a building; ելանել ի յ— երիվարի, to ride, to mount, on horse-back; զուսովք արկանել, to put on one's back; — դնել, to become stiff-necked, obstinate; բարձր ուսովք չափ ի վեր, taller by a head and shoulders; cf. Ընդոստ.

Title: Ուսած
Definition_1: learnt; having finished a course of study.

Title: Ուսանիմ
Definition_1: to learn, to study, to read; to be instructed; to exercise oneself in; — զդասն, to learn, to study one's lesson; — ի բերան, to con over, to study by heart; cf. Թոշակ.

Title: Ուսանոց
Definition_1: shoulder-strap, shoulder-piece; ephod; epaulet; cf. Վակաս.

Title: Ուսումն
Definition_1: study, lecture, teaching, instruction; doctrine, science; religion, sect; ուսման ձեւ, affectation, studied effort, endeavours; առ ուսմանէ, by instruction; նուիրել յ— զժամանակն, to consecrate all one's time to study; cf. Թեւակոխեմ.

Title: Ուսումնապահ լինիմ
Definition_1: to preserve the knowledge or doctrine acquired.

Title: Ուսումնասէր
Definition_1: fond of study, of learning, studious, diligent; lettered, erudite.

Title: Ուսուցանեմ
Definition_1: to teach, to instruct in, to lecture, to be a teacher or professor of, to profess, to enlighten, to form, to make erudite or wise.

Title: Ո՞ւստ
Definition_1: whence ? from where ? from what place ? which way ?.

Title: Ուստեք
Definition_1: from some place; — —, from several places, in all directions; ամենայն —, on all sides; from all quarters; այլ —, այլուստ —, from another side, elsewhere, in or from another part; բազում —, յոլով —, from many places; often, in many ways; ոչ —, ոչ — այլ —, from no other place, from no other part; երկիւղ եւ ոչ —, no fear; ոչ — է իշխանութիւն, եթէ ոչ յաստուծոյ, there is no power but from God; ոչ գոյր — նմա պատերազմ, no war was undertaken in his time.

Title: Ուստի
Definition_2: whence ? from where ? from what place ? from whom ? from what ?
Definition_3:
so, for that reason, on that account; well, then, consequently, in consequence; — ճանաչես զիս, how comes it that you know me ?
— գաս, whence comest thou ?
— ես, whence are you ?
— է ինձ այս զի, how is it that it happens to me ? how is it that ?
— եւ, — եւ իցէ, from any place whatever, where you like.

Title: Ուտեմ
Definition_2: to run through, to squander, to eat up, to waste, to consume; to eat away or up, to corrode; to fret; to consume, to devour; անյագաբար —, to eat greedily, to eat up, to devour; եկեր զամենայն կեանս իւր, he lavished or squandered away all his fortune.

Title: Ուտիճ
