Definition_3: corrosive-sublimate, protochloride of mercury; — ցորենոյ, weevil; — պանրոյ, maggot, mite; — փայտի, pulsator, death-watch.

Title: Ուտիք
Definition_1: flesh-day, meat-day; — ուտել, to eat meat; ոչ ամենայն օր —, եւ ոչ երկիցս զատիկ, Christmas come but once a year.

Title: Ուր
Definition_3:
where ? in what place ?
— զի, whereas; — ուրեմն, hardly, scarcely; at last, finally; — ուրեք, where, in whatever place, wherever; — եւ, — եւ իցէ, wherever, wheresoever, any where, no matter where; — եւ իցեն, wheresoever they may be, wherever they are; — եմ, — իցեմ ես, where am I ?
— է նա, where is he ?
— գնաց, where is he gone ?
— եւ ուստի՞ եկն, how and whence came he ?.

Title: Ուրախ
Definition_1: light-hearted, gay, merry, joyful, jocund, cheerful, sportive, playful; — առնել, cf. Ուրախացուցանեմ; — լինել, to be cheerful, delighted, to rejoice, to feel glad, to have pleasure; to feed well, to feast; — լեր, hail! joy be with you! God keep you!.

Title: Ուրախալից
Definition_1: full of joy, joyful, cheerful, playful, jovial.

Title: Ուրախակից
Definition_2: congratulating; — լինել, to rejoice with; to congratulate, to felicitate, to wish joy to, to compliment; to feast together, to treat one another.

Title: Ուրախարար
Definition_1: giving or inspiring joy, rejoicing, joyous, pleasant.

Title: Ուրախացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to give joy, to enjoy, to enliven; to revive.

Title: Ուրախութիւն
Definition_1: rejoicing, joy, gaiety, mirth, merriment, pleasure; feast, festivity, entertainment; ուրախութեամբ, joyfully, cheerfully, with pleasure; ուրախութեամբ ուրախ լինել, to overflow with joy; առնել — մեծ, to give a great banquet.

Title: Ուրանամ
Definition_1: to deny; to disavow, to disown, to disclaim; — զհաւատս or — ի հաւատոց, to abjure one's faith, to apostatize, to turn apostate, to renounce, to forswear; — զանձն, to renounce, to deny oneself.

Title: Ուրանօր
Definition_1: where; — եւ կամիցիս, where you like, wherever you please.

Title: Ուրաստ
Definition_1: cf. Ուրացութիւն; յ— լինել, կալ, cf. Ուրանամ; յ— լինել յերախտեաց, to be unmindful of favours received, to pay a favour with ingratitude, to be ungrateful, unthankful; յուրաստ լինիմ, to deny, to disown.

Title: Ուրացեալ
Definition_1: apostate, renegade; —ն յուլիանոս, Julian the Apostate.

Title: Ուրացումն
Definition_1: denial, negation, disavowal; abjuration, apostasy; — անձին, self-denial, abnegation.

Title: Ուրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to deny or abjure.

Title: Ուրբաթայրք
Definition_1: Oorpatairc (Friday-Caves), cave in Armenia where mass was celebrated every friday.

Title: Ուրբաթացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fast on friday.

Title: Ուրդ
Definition_1: conduct, water-pipe, channel, trench, gutter; drain.

Title: Ուրեմն
Definition_3: about, near;
Definition_4: some, certain; աստ —, here; անագան —, too late, in the end, at last, after much time, finally; վաղ —, already, before; վերագոյն —, above; before; զքառասնամենիւք — էր, he was about forty years old.

Title: Ուրեք
Definition_3: some place; ոչ —, no where; թէ — գայցէ ի տուն, if he ever returns home; ի քաղաքի —, in a city; ի տեղւոջ —, in a place; ամենայն —, every where; — —, in some places; — —, է —, sometimes; բազում —, in many places.

Title: Ուրոյն
Definition_3: separate, different, distinct; peculiar, particular, private, own, special, individual, proper;
Definition_4: — —, separately, distinctly.

Title: Ուրուագիր
Definition_1: rough sketch or copy, rude outline, first draught;

Title: Ուրուագրեմ
Definition_1: to draw; to sketch, to design, to delineate.

Title: Ուրուական
Definition_1: fantastic, imaginary, visionary, false, apparent, chimerical;
Definition_2: shadow, image, phantom, spectre; idol, image; rough-draught, sketch; —ք, manes, shades, apparitions, ghosts, visions; —ք մարդկան, statue, likeness; — պղծութիւն, nocturnal pollution.

Title: Ոք
Definition_1: some one, some body, any one;
Definition_2:
some, one, certain; այր ոք, a man; կին ոք, a woman; ամենայն ոք, every one, every body; իւրաքանչիւր ոք, each one, any one; որ ոք, who, whoever, he that; ո՞ոք, ո՞վ ոք, who ?
եթէ կայցէ՞ ոք այնչափ յանդուգն, is there any one bold enough ?
ոչ ոք, մի ոք, no one, no body, none; ոչ սիրեմ ոք յարանցդ յայդցանէ, I love none of these men; երթիջիր առ այր ոք, address yourself to some one else.

Title: <letter>Չ</letter> (tcha)
Definition_1: the twenty fifth letter of the alphabet, and the nineteenth of the consonants; seven hundred, seven hundredth.

Title: Չ
Definition_1: no, not; չէր, it was not; չասեմ, I do not say; չգիտել, to ignore, not to know; չեմ հմուտ, I am ignorant; չասաց ինչ, he said nothing; չիք ինչ հնար, it is impossible, it cannot be.

Title: Չազգ
Definition_1: people which is not a people, foolish nation, rabble, mob.

Title: Չամչաշերեփ
Definition_1: long-necked wooden water-pot; large spoon, ladle.

Title: Չաչեր
Definition_1: cutting or slip for planting; turnip-leaves or radish-leaves.

Title: Չար
Definition_1: bad, wicked; hurtful, sinister, dangerous; mischievous, malicious, spiteful, flagitious, iniquitous;
Definition_2: evil, malice, wickedness, iniquity, perversity, impiety; trouble, affliction, disaster, misfortune;
Definition_3: —, —աւ, —իւ, —եաւ or —ով, ill, badly, wickedly; ferociously, ruthlessly, without pity; —, —ն, այս —, demon, evil spirit; մահ —, plague, pest, pestilence; օր —, unlucky day; ժամանակ —, calamitous times; — ծառ, worthless tree; — ջուր, unwholesome, polluted, very bad water; — ամօթ, bashfulness, sheepishness; —, —իս առնել, գործել, to harm, to hurt or wrong any one; —աւ կորուսանել, to destroy cruelly, without pity or remorse; զ—սն —աւ կորուսցէ, he will miserably destroy the wicked men; արար — առաջի տեառն, he did evil in the sight of the Lord; եւ որ — քան զամենայն է, այլ որ — եւսն է, the most disagreeable that can be, the worst, the worst is that, that is worse; զի մի — եւս ինչ լինիցի քեզ, for fear lest something worse should happen.

Title: Չարաբաստիկ
Definition_1: ill-fated, ill-omened, ill-starred, unlucky, unfortunate; unhappy, miserable, wretched; rascally, wicked, villainous, impious.

Title: Չարաբաստութիւն
Definition_1: evil omen; ill-luck, misfortune, mischance; unhappiness.

Title: Չարաբարոյ
Definition_1: ill-natured, perverse, ill-bred, ill-trained, ill-mannered, spiteful, malignant, malicious, malevolent, evil-disposed, inclined to evil; immoral; — լինել, to be ill-mannered, uncivilised, rough, rude.

Title: Չարաբարութիւն
Definition_1: ill-nature, wickedness, malignity, iniquity, malevolence; immorality.

Title: Չարագան
Definition_1: well or soundly thrashed, beaten unmercifully.

Title: Չարագանեմ
Definition_1: to beat severely, to thrash most cruelly, ferociously, barbarously, to load with blows, to bemaul.

Title: Չարագլուխ
Definition_1: ill-contrived, malignant, spiteful, malevolent, worst of all; — երիվար, untameable horse.

Title: Չարագոյն
Definition_1: very bad, worse; more wicked; of a bad colour;
Definition_2: cf. Չարաչար; եւ որ —ն էր, and that which was most deplorable.

Title: Չարագործ
Definition_1: evil-doing, wicked, delinquent, criminal, rascally, nefarious, felonious.

Title: Չարագործեմ
Definition_1: to do mischief, to work evil, to injure; to frame plots or conspiracies, to conspire.

Title: Չարագործութիւն
Definition_1: malefaction, misdeed, wicked deed, spiteful or ill-natured action, wickedness, malignity, malice.

Title: Չարագրգիռ
Definition_1: provoking, inciting to evil, malicious, wicked.

Title: Չարադեւ
Definition_2: possessed with a devil; diabolical, wicked.

Title: Չարադէմ
Definition_1: ill-featured, ill-shaped, misshapen, disfigured, ugly, horrible, shocking.

Title: Չարադիւութիւն
Definition_1: demoniacal wickedness, abominable malice; misadventure, very great misfortune.

Title: Չարազինեալ
Definition_1: armed with malice; incited by the devil.

Title: Չարաթոյն
Definition_1: very poisonous, very venomous, virulent; poisoned, envenomed, baleful, deadly.

Title: Չարալլուկ
Definition_1: cruelly tormented, ill-treated, vexed, oppressed; very painful, very grievous; — տանջել, to torment, to torture; — մեռանել, to die under atrocious tortures.

Title: Չարալուր
Definition_2: —ք, sad news; incredible woes, unheard of disasters.

Title: Չարախորհուրդ
Definition_1: ill-intentioned, meditating, designing or planning evil, malignant, malicious.

Title: Չարախորհրդութիւն
Definition_1: impious thought, evil counsel; perversity, malevolence.

Title: Չարախօս
Definition_1: evil-speaking, slanderous, backbiting, talebearing, calumniating, detracting, defaming;
Definition_2: — լեզու, venomous tongue, slanderer, backbiter; — լինել, cf. Չարախօսեմ.

Title: Չարախօսեմ
Definition_1: to speak ill of, to slander, to detract, to calumniate, to accuse, to defame; to tittle-tattle, to gad about gossiping.

Title: Չարախօսութիւն
Definition_1: slander, detraction, defamation, calumny, false accusation, aspersion; tittle-tattle, gossiping; — մատուցանել զումեքէ, to accuse a person.

Title: Չարակամ
Definition_1: ill-willing, malevolent, ill-intentioned, malignant; բարեկամ եւ —, friend and enemy.

Title: Չարակեղ
Definition_1: presenting the characteristics of a malignant ulcer, pestilential, infectious, contagious;

Title: Չարակնեմ
Definition_1: to look on with an evil eye, with displeasure, enviously, to envy.

Title: Չարակնութիւն
Definition_1: evil eye, malevolence, envy, jealousy; immodest, lascivious glance.

Title: Չարահալած
Definition_1: healing, driving away pain and sickness; salutary.

Title: Չարահամբաւեմ
Definition_1: to defame, to disparage, to sneer at, to blacken, to asperse.

Title: Չարահամոզ
Definition_1: ill-insinuating, persuading, exhorting or inciting to evil.

Title: Չարահարիմ
Definition_1: to conceive an illicit affection for.

Title: Չարահաւ
Definition_1: of evil origin, bad, wicked; bad, unpleasant, disagreeable.

Title: Չարահաւակ
Definition_1: author, origin of ill, of evil, of misery.

Title: Չարահնար
Definition_1: meditating or contriving evil, malignant, malicious, bad, wicked.

Title: Չարահոտ
Definition_1: nasty-smelling, rancid, stinking, fetid, infected, foul.

Title: Չարաձայն
Definition_3: cacophonic.

Title: Չարաձայնութիւն
Definition_1: disagreeable or harsh voice; ill sound;

Title: Չարաղէտ
Definition_1: very painful, very atrocious, insufferable, insupportable.

Title: Չարաճճի
Definition_2: mischievous, full of pranks, shrewd, artful, cunning.

Title: Չարամահ
Definition_2: mortally, to death; — առնել, սատակել, to kill, to slay barbarously, to massacre; — լինել, զմահ — մեռանել, to die, to perish miserably.

Title: Չարամայր
Definition_1: a bad or wicked mother; unhappy mother.

Title: Չարամարտ
Definition_1: fighting with rabid fury; combatting with malice.

Title: Չարամեռ
Definition_1: cf. Չարամահ; slaying or killing barbarously; murderous.

Title: Չարամիտ
Definition_1: evil-minded, ill-intentioned, malevolent, malignant, malicious, wicked; cunning, crafty, cheating.

Title: Չարամտութիւն
Definition_1: evil-mindedness, ill-intention, malevolence, malignity; cunning, wiliness, finesse.

Title: Չարայուշ
Definition_1: resentful, revengeful, rancorous, spiteful; — լինել, to bear or owe a grudge, to foment rancour or hate.

Title: Չարայուշութիւն
Definition_1: resentment for injuries, revengefulness, rancour, spite.

Title: Չարայօժար
Definition_1: prone, disposed or inclined to evil.

Title: Չարանամ
Definition_1: to behave or act wickedly, to become worse, to fester, to rankle, to sour, to become exasperated; cf. Նախանձիմ.

Title: Չարանենգ
Definition_1: false-hearted, perfidious, double-tongued; — դաւաճանութիւն, foul treachery.

Title: Չարաշշուկ
Definition_1: disastrous, dismal, very grievous; baleful, atrocious, ferocious.

Title: Չարաշուք
Definition_1: bad, very ignoble, vile, infamous; wicked, ferocious, cruel; unfortunate, miserable, pitiful.

Title: Չարաչար
Definition_1: very ill, very bad, detestable, execrable; excessive, extreme, great, enormous; cruel, atrocious, unmerciful, insufferable;
Definition_2: very bad, worse, wickedly, cruelly, unmercifully; very, much, enormously, extremely, greatly; basely, miserably, detestably, abominably, execrably, devilishly; — վարել, ի կիր ածել, to misuse, to make a bad use of.

Title: Չարասէր
Definition_1: inclined to evil, perverse, evil-minded, malevolent, malignant, wicked, mischievous.

Title: Չարասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of evil, ill-will, perversity, malevolence, wickedness, malignity.

Title: Չարատանջ
Definition_1: tormenting, fastidious, troublesome; — լինել, to be in difficulties, to suffer extremely.

Title: Չարատեաց
Definition_1: detesting malice or iniquity, benign, perfectly good, virtuous.

Title: Չարատեսիլ
Definition_1: of a horrible appearance, ill-looking, evil-faced, very ugly, dreadful, horrible.

Title: Չարատեցութիւն
Definition_1: hatred of vice or depravity, benignity, goodness, virtue.

Title: Չարարար
Definition_1: evil-doing, mischievous, malevolent; pernicious, hurtful, harmful; unwholesome;

Title: Չարարարեմ
Definition_1: to do evil, to harm, to injure.

Title: Չարարուեստ
Definition_1: malicious, artful, shrewd, cunning, knavish; — հնարք, artifices, intrigues.

Title: Չարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render bad, wicked or worse, to provoke or excite to evil; to incite to anger, to exasperate, to envenom.

Title: Չարիմ
Definition_1: to be no more on good terms with, to be at variance with.

Title: Չարիք
Definition_1: ill, misfortunes, adversity, disaster, calamity, misery, tribulation, disgrace; evil deeds, malice, iniquity, rascality; ill-usage, violence; — ախտից, the effects of the passions;
Definition_2: չարեօք, badly; wickedly; mischievously; spitefully; չարիս գործել, to do evil, ill or wrong, to injure, to harm; — խօսել զումեքէ, to speak ill of, to slander; cf. Չարախօսեմ; չարեաց ի չարիս վերանալ, դիմել, to rush from bad to worse, to grow or get worse and worse; զփոքրագոյնն ընտրեա ի չարիս, of two evils choose the less.

Title: Չարութիւն
Definition_1: wickedness, evil, malice, malignity, perversity, iniquity, perfidy; չարութեամբ, wickedly, maliciously, malignantly.

Title: Չարչարակցիմ
Definition_1: to suffer, endure or bear with another, to participate or share in another's woe; to compassionate, to condole with, to commiserate.

Title: Չարչարակցութիւն
Definition_1: suffering with another, participation in another's suffering; compassion.

Title: Չարչարանք
Definition_1: passion, suffering, torment, pain, vexation, torture; — քրիստոսի, our Lord's Passion; —նս կրել, to suffer; —ն, —նացն, Passover; առ քեզ արարից զ—նացն, I will keep or eat the Passover with you.

Title: Չարչարեմ
Definition_1: to torment, to harass, to molest, to pain, to ill-treat, to ill-use.

Title: Չարչարիմ
Definition_1: to suffer, to be tormented, vexed, harassed.

Title: Չաւասարիմ
Definition_1: not to be equalized or equalled.

Title: Չաւատամ
Definition_1: to disbelieve; not to believe, not to give credit to.

Title: Չափ
Definition_1: measure; that by which any thing is measured; extent, dimension, measurement; quantity, dose; measure, bounds, compass; mediocrity; moderation; rule, proportion, measure; reach, value, capacity; boundary, limits, end;
Definition_2: measure, time; cadence, metre, foot, measure, rhythm; age of discretion, manhood;
Definition_3: measured, regular, moderate; middle, moderate;
Definition_4: even, to, about, as, by, with; — ինչ, some, a little; —ով, with measure or moderation, moderately; in verse; —ով բան, բանք —աւ, verse, poetry; — հասակաւ, middle-sized; ի — հասեալ, of age, grown up, formed; ըստ —ու, in proportion; ձեօք —, as much as you; արեամբ —, to blood-shed; ի — հասանել, to arrive at or to be in the flower of manhood; to become of age, to be grown up, adult, marriageable; ի — աւուրց հասանել, to be getting old; ի —ու ունել զանձն, գիտել զ— անձին, to conduct oneself with moderation, to restrain, to regulate oneself, to be master of oneself; ի —ու ունել, to confine within due limits, to limit, to keep within bounds, to restrain, to repress; զ— առնուլ, to measure, to prove, to weigh; to try, to feel; զամենայն ինչ առնել —ով եւ կշռով, to do all by weight and measure; անդր քան զ— անցուցանել, անցանել ըստ —, to go rather too far, beyond bounds, to outstrip, to carry to excess; — դնել, — եւ սահման դնել, to place limits to, to moderate, to restrain; կալ ի —ու, to restrain oneself; to keep one's temper; ծախս առնել ըստ —ու եկամտիցն, to spend in proportion to one's income; չկալ ի —ու, to make a bad use of, to misuse; առնուլ զ— հանդերձի, to take the measure for a coat; ճանաչել զ— անձին, to know one's ability; զառն — ոչ գիտել, to know not a man; not to know mankind, to be ignorant of human nature; ուխտել երդմամբ —, to confirm on oath; բրել զտեղին իբրեւ առն —, to dig a hole to a man's depth, to excavate the earth to the depth of a man's height; ունի սա — ժամանակի առաւել քան զինն հարիւր ամաց, it has lasted for more then nine hundred years; ունի — ժամանակի հարիւր ամաց, it is a period of a hundred years, it is a century; հինգ հարիւրով —, about five hundred; cf. Հինգ; միտք նորա —ով, person of shallow intellect or weak mind; առաւել քան զ—ն, very much, immeasurably, exceedingly, extremely, excessively; միջովք — եւ բարձիւք —, from the loins to the thighs; զհասարակ — գիշերաւ, about midnight; գալով — բանին քոյոյ, when your word shall be proved true; լրացեալ է —ն, the measure is heaped up;

Title: Չափաբեր
Definition_2: moderate, regulated, of steady habits, temperate, sober.

Title: Չափաբերեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to order; to versify.

Title: Չափաբերութիւն
Definition_1: measure, symmetry, proportion; rhythm, meter; cf. Չափագիտութիւն.

Title: Չափախօս
Definition_1: moderate in one's speech, speaking guardedly.

Title: Չափակցեմ
Definition_1: to proportion, to equal, to symmetrize.

Title: Չափաւոր
Definition_1: of a just measure, measured, right, meet, proper, decorous, suitable; middling, moderate, tolerable, so so; moderate, sober, frugal; modest, discreet.

Title: Չափաւորակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to deign, to condescend, to have the goodness to, to favour.

Title: Չափաւորապէս
Definition_1: with measure, sufficiently, well enough, so so; tolerably, moderately, modestly, soberly.

Title: Չափաւորիմ
Definition_1: to keep within just bounds or due limits, to limit, to confine, to moderate, to temper, to restrain; — զանձն, to restrain oneself, to forbear, to refrain from.

Title: Չափաւորութիւն
Definition_1: measure, moderation, limitation; modesty, temperance, mitigation; sufficiency, mediocrity.

Title: Չափեմ
Definition_1: to measure; to examine, to ponder, to weigh; to judge, to conjecture; to reward, to return like for like; to versify, to make verses; չափեաց նմա վեց չափովն գարի, he gave him six measures of barley.

Title: Չափոյ
Definition_3: —իւք, moderately, with moderation; պատկառ կալ —ից, to be moderate.

Title: Չբարերարութիւն
Definition_1: want of disposition to do good; selfishness.

Title: Չգիտանք
Definition_1: ignorance; առ ի —նս, through ignorance, without knowledge, unknown to.

Title: Չգիւտ
Definition_1: want, lack; առ —, for want of, in lieu of, in default of.

Title: Չգոյ
Definition_1: nothing, not any thing, nought; առ ի —է, for want of; ի —է ի գոյ ածել, ի —ից հաստել, to create out of nothing.

Title: Չեւ
Definition_1: not yet; not till now; չեւ տեսեալ, before seeing.

Title: Չէ
Definition_1: cf. Չգոյ, cf. Չիք; չէ ինչ, no matter, that is nothing.

Title: Չէանամ
Definition_1: not to be, not to exist.

Title: Չէութիւն
Definition_1: the non-existent, the void; cf. Չգոյութիւն.

Title: Չիք
Definition_1: there is not, there does not exist;
Definition_2: nothing, nothingness; nullity; չիք ոք բարի բայց մի աստուած, no one is good save God only; զբաբելոն իմ չիք տեսեալ, I have not seen Babylon; չիք ոք չիք ուրեք, there is no one; չիք որ գիտիցէ զայդ, nobody knows that; չիք ոք որ եղծանել կարէ, no one can destroy it; չիք ինչ, there is nothing; չիք եւ չիք, indeed it is not; առ չքի, for want of; ի չիք դարձուցանել, to reduce to nothing, to annihilate; չիք լինել, չիք յաչաց լինել, to come to nothing, to be annihilated, dissipated, to disappear, to vanish; — լուսնի, wane.

Title: Չլուելոյն առնեմ
Definition_1: to turn a deaf ear to, to desire not to hear, not to hear on that side.

Title: Չհամազգի
Definition_1: of a different kind or species, not homogeneous; — գործել, to neutralize.

Title: Չհաւատալի
Definition_1: incredible, beyond all belief; — թուէր, it seemed incredible, it would be difficult to believe it.

Title: Չմեղադրանք
Definition_1: not blaming, not finding fault with.

Title: Չնաշխարհիկ
Definition_1: celestial, divine, superhuman, supernatural; excellent, extraordinary, matchless, rare, singular;

Title: Չնչին
Definition_1: of nothing, of little value, puny, light, feeble, low, despicable, frivolous, futile, vain; very little, small.

Title: Չնչինք
Definition_1: thing of nought, trifles, bagatelle; լաւ է ասել ինչ չնչին, քան թէ չասել բնաւին, better talk about trifles than remain silent.

Title: Չոր
Definition_1: dry; dried, arid, parched, dead; — հաց, dry bread; — ճաշակել, to fast on lenten diet.

Title: Չորաբեկ
Definition_1: dry, frugal; — հաց, dry toast; — սեղան, frugal table, light meal.

Title: Չորակեաց
Definition_1: xerophagus, feeding on dried aliments; very abstemious.

Title: Չորակեր լինիմ
Definition_1: to live on dried things, to practise xerophagy.

Title: Չորակերութիւն
Definition_1: nourishment composed of dried fruits, legumes or herbs, xerophagy; vegetarianism; rigorous abstinence.

Title: Չորանամ
Definition_1: to dry, to become dry; to wither, to dessicate; to dry up.

Title: Չորացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to dry, to dry up, to render dry; to decay, to wither; to drain, to lay dry.

Title: Չորեքգլխեան
Definition_1: four-chaptered, having four chapters; — աւետարան, the Four Gospels.

Title: Չորեքծագեան
Definition_1: having four sides, extremities or parts.

Title: Չորեքկարգեան
Definition_1: formed of four courses, tiers or orders; four-coursed;

Title: Չորեքկին
Definition_1: quadruple, fourfold; հատուցից —, I will repay fourfold;
Definition_3: թիւք —ք, biquadratic numbers.

Title: Չորեքկնեմ
Definition_1: to quadruple or quadruplicate, to increase fourfold.

Title: Չորեքօրեայ
Definition_3: — տենդ, quartan, quart ague; — տենդ թեթեւ, slight quartan-ague; — տենդ սաստիկ, very bad quartan-ague; չորեքօրէիւք պահել, to fast four days; կերեկրիլ զչորեքաւուրբք միանգամ, to eat once in four days.

Title: Չորիր
Definition_1: fourth; — մասն, the fourth part, a quarter, quadrant.

Title: Չորրորդ
Definition_3: four; quarter; — տասն, forty; չորից —աց զինուորք, four quaternions of soldiers; —ք, the marrying four times; the fourth marriage, or the fourth time married.

Title: Չորք
Definition_1: four; — անգամ, four times; ի չորս գնալ, to go upon all fours; բարձեալ ի չորից, borne by four men; որ օր — էին ամսոյն, on the fourth, on the fourth of the month.

Title: Չու
Definition_1: way, road; journey, travel, voyage; departure; decamping; removal, removing; march, marching; campaign; expedition; — առնել, ի — անկանել, to begin a journey, to set out, to start, to go away, to leave, to remove; — առնել զօրաց, to decamp, to break up the camp, to march.

Title: Չուան
Definition_1: twine, string, cord, rope; line, halter.

Title: Չուանեղէն
Definition_1: made of cord; —եայ խարազան, scourge of cords, rope's end.

Title: Չունկնդիր լինիմ
Definition_1: not to mind or listen, to be inattentive, to disobey.

Title: *Չոքոլատ
Definition_1: chocolate; բաժակ մի —, a dish of -; խառնիչ —ի, chocolate-stick; ըմպել —, to drink -.

Title: Չպէտ
Definition_1: useless, good for nothing, vile, bad, worthless; —ս առնել, not to care for or about, to do without, to dispense with, not to mind, to neglect, to pass over, to omit.

Title: Չտես
Definition_1: blind to, conniving at; ընդ — առնել, —անելոյն առնել, close the eyes to, to pass over, to wink at.

Title: Չքանամ
Definition_1: to come to nothing; to be annihilated, to perish, to vanish, to disappear.

Title: Չքացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce or bring to nothing, to annihilate, to dissipate, to destroy.

Title: Չքաւոր
Definition_1: needy, indigent, necessitous, poor, beggarly; — եմ յամենայնէ, I possess nothing, I am penniless; — է, he is in a state of necessity, of want, poverty or need.

Title: Չքաւորիմ
Definition_1: to grow poor, to become needy, to want, to be in need, in extreme want, without resources, in straitened circumstances; ոչ չքաւորէր անենազօր ձեռն քո արձակել, it was not difficult for Thy Almighty hand to send.

Title: Չքաւորութիւն
Definition_1: want of necessary things, indigence, necessity, dearth, beggary, misery, poverty; penury; privation; — գանձուց, embarrassed state of the finances; չքաւորութեամբ կեալ, to live in straitened circumstances, in poverty; ի չքաւորութեան կայ, he is in great want, he is very poor.

Title: Չքմեղ
Definition_2: —ք, excuse, justification; ի —ս առնել, to excuse; ի չքմեղս լինել, ի չքմեղիկս լինել, to excuse or justify oneself, to dissemble; to hide or conceal oneself.

Title: Չքնաղ
Definition_1: rare, curious, admirable, charming, superb, excellent.

Title: Չքնաղագիւտ
Definition_1: rare, excellent, singular, matchless, unique, incomparable.

Title: Չքնաղադէմ
Definition_1: fine-looking, of a charming figure, handsome, graceful, beautiful.

Title: Չքնաղութիւն
Definition_1: beauty, delicacy, gentility, grace, handsomeness, elegance, gracefulness.

Title: Չքութիւն
Definition_1: annihilation; disappearance; — խնդրոյ, the knotty point of a question.

Title: <letter>Պ</letter> (bé)
Definition_1: the twenty sixth letter of the alphabet and the twentieth of the consonants; eight hundred; eight hundredth; It is sometimes used instead of the letters բ and փ as : ամպ — ամբ, ոսպն — ոսբն, ամպարիշտ — ամբարիշտ, սեպհական — սեփական, կարապ — կարափ.

Title: Պագանեմ
Definition_1: to kiss; to adore; cf. Երկիր; cf. Համբուրեմ.

Title: Պալար
Definition_1: aposteme, imposthume, abscess, suppuration, pustule; — երանաց, bubo.

Title: Պալարակապ
Definition_1: studded, adorned or set with studs.

Title: Պալարանամ
Definition_1: to draw to a head, to gather, to suppurate, to form an abscess.

Title: Պախարակեմ
Definition_1: to blame, to reprove, to rebuke, to reproach, to find fault with, to reprobate, to disapprove, to condemn, to censure.

Title: Պախեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to frighten, to dismay, to strike with consternation, terror or dread, to terrify, to appall.

Title: Պախիմ
Definition_1: to be frightened at, struck with consternation.

Title: Պախուց
Definition_1: halter, bridle; թափել զպակուց or պախուցաթափ լինել, to break from the halters.

Title: Պախրէ
Definition_1: money, effects, property, goods; provisions, victuals; cattle.

Title: Պակաս
Definition_1:
defective, imperfect; ի՞ւ իւիք — իցեմ, զի՞նչ եւս — իցեմ, what do I still want for ?
զի՞նչ — է քեզ, what do yon want for ?
— առնել, to do without, to dispense with; to diminish; to deprive of; to destroy, to kill;

Title: Պակասամիտ
Definition_1: narrow-minded, crack-brained, senseless, insensate, foolish, stolid, silly.

Title: Պակասաւոր
Definition_1: cf. Պակաս ;faulty; պակասաւոր բայ, defective verb.

Title: Պակասեմ
Definition_1:
to fail; to want, to be wanting in, to lack, to run short; to lessen, to grow less, to diminish, to cease; to weaken, to swoon; to die; — լուսնի, wane —եալ ի մտաց, mad, foolish; —եալ են ոգիք նոցա, they are exhausted, worn out; —եցին աչք իմ յարտասուաց, my eyes are weary with weeping; մի թէ —եցա՞յք իմիք, have you perhaps wanted for any thing ?
զի՞նչ այլ —սէր ինձ ի բարեբաստութիւն, what was wanting to my happiness ?

Title: Պակասեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to lessen, to diminish, to decrease, to reduce; to deduct, to restrict; — ի միջոյ, to take away, to deprive of life.

Title: Պակասութիւն
Definition_1: want, failure, diminution, decrease; deficiency; fault, imperfection; blemish, defect; dearth, penury; — լուսնի, wane;

Title: Պակնում
Definition_1: to be amazed, surprised, petrified with astonishment; to be frightened, appalled, terrified, dismayed, palsied or stupefied with fear; to be struck with terror; to shudder, to tremble.

Title: Պակշիմ
Definition_1: to become enamoured with, to fall in love.

Title: Պակշոտ
Definition_1: impudent, salacious, lascivious, libidinous, lewd, lecherous, licentious, libertine, obscene.

Title: Պակշոտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to take the eye, to attract all eyes.

Title: Պակշոտիմ
Definition_1: to give oneself up to lechery or lasciviousness, to lead a dissolute life, to live in debauchery.

Title: Պակշոտութիւն
Definition_1: dissolute life, impurity, impudence, lust, lewdness, lasciviousness, lechery, obscenity.

Title: Պակուցանեմ
Definition_1: to scare, to affright, to terrify, to strike with terror, amazement or stupor, to astound, to dismay; to chill, to make one's blood run cold, to dispirit, to damp the courage; — ահիւ, to chill with horror.

Title: Պակուցումն
Definition_1: fear, fright, terror, consternation, stupor, astonishment, stupefaction.

Title: Պակչիմ
Definition_1: cf. Պակնում; to feel giddy, dizzy or stupefied with fear.

Title: Պահ
Definition_1: guard, guardianship; guard, sentry, mounting guard; watch; watching; hour, moment, time; guard, guard-house, post, vedette; prison; occupancy; siege; — դուռն, cf. Պահակ; — ընդ —, from time to time; յայնմ —ու, then, at that time; ի —ուն յորում, at the time when; յառաւօտուն —ուն, it was already the morning watch; ի չորրորդում —ու գիշերոյն, about the fourth watch at night; ի — աշխարհին, to keep the country; ի — անձին, to save his life; — ունել, to guard, to defend; to mount guard; ի — արկանել, ունել, ի —ու առնուլ զոք, to arrest, to put in prison; — արկանել, ի — առնուլ, to besiege, to occupy; դնել ի — to keep or place in reserve.

Title: Պահակ
Definition_1: keeper, guardian, warden; guard, garrison; guard, sentry; — դուռն, Gates, straits; pass, defile; fortress, fortified place; — մեղաց, մահու, կորստեան, the Genius of death, Satan; — ունել, վարել, to compel, to constrain, to task, to force to villein service.

Title: Պահակափոխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to change the guard, sentry or watch, to make the round.

Title: Պահակեմ
Definition_1: to apply oneself to, to avail oneself of.

Title: Պահակութիւն
Definition_1: mounting or keeping guard; villenage, statute labour, drudgery.

Title: Պահանգ
Definition_1: iron or wooden tie-piece, binding-piece, notched-rail, brace; buttress, flying-buttress.

Title: Պահանգակապ
Definition_1: fastened, tied with a tie-piece; sustained by a buttress;

Title: Պահանգեմ
Definition_1: to brace; to prop with buttresses.

Title: Պահանորդ
Definition_1: cf. Պահայոյզ; cf. Հմայեակ; —ք, garrison, guard.

Title: Պահանջարան
Definition_1: praetor's court, tribunal, court of justice, judgment-hall.

Title: Պահանջեմ
Definition_1: to exact, to recover, to require, to claim, to lay claim to; to examine, to discuss; — զինչս, to claim, to challenge, to demand; — ի դատաստանի, to require; ի բաց — յումեքէ զոգին, to require one's soul of one; — զամբարիշտս, to punish or chastise the impious; վրէժս —, to avenge, to be avenged.

Title: Պահանջիմ
Definition_1: to be exacted, claimed; դատաստան —, to be compelled to give account of; հզօրք հզօրագոյնս պահանջեսցին, the rich shall suffer great torments.

Title: Պահանջումն
Definition_1: exigence, demand, recovery, request, requisition; pretension; discussion; — անիրաւ, exaction, extortion; յետս — ընչից, claiming, claim.

Title: Պահապան
Definition_1: guard, guardian, inspector, superintendent, overseer; sentry, sentinel; —ք, guard, guards, garrison; cf. Հմայեակ; — այգեստանի, vineyard-keeper; cf. Հրեշտակ.

Title: Պահարան
Definition_1: object serving to contain another or others, trunk, box, case, scrutoire, sheath, scabbard, cover; *vestry-room; — նամակի, envelope, cover; — թղթոյ, pocket-book, portfolio.

Title: Պահարանեմ
Definition_1: to involve; to enclose, to envelop, to encase, to cover, to pack or wrap up.

Title: Պահարկեմ
Definition_1: to guard, to mount guard, to garrison, to mount sentry.

Title: Պահեմ
Definition_1: to preserve, to keep, to maintain; to guard, to watch over; to preserve, to guarantee; to keep, to observe; to hide, to keep secret, to conceal; to abstain from, to fast; լռութիւն, — to keep silence; — զանձն յիմեքէ, to refrain, to forbear, to avoid; նմա պահեալ կայ or է, it is reserved or destined for him to; cf. Խոստումն.

Title: Պահեստ
Definition_1: reserve; keeping; deposit, consignment; maintenance, keep; sequestration;
Definition_2: placed or kept in reserve; — հօտք խաշանց, fattened sheep; դնել ի —ի, to put in reserve, to reserve; դնել ի —, to deposit, to consign; to put in prison; կալ or լինել ի — or ի —ի, to be in custody, in arrest, in prison.

Title: Պահնակեմ
Definition_1: to guard, to keep, to defend.

Title: Պահպանակ
Definition_1: guard, defender, protector; armour, cuirass; preservative; phylactery; — զէնք, defensive armour; — լանջաց, breast-plate; — բազկաց, armlet, bracelet, leather gauntlet; — բարձից, greaves, legpiece; վերտ —, mail, coat of mail; ջղեայ եւ կաշեայ —, leather-cuirass, buff jerkin.

Title: Պահպանանամ
Definition_1: to be guarded, kept, protected; to beware, to take care or heed, to forbear.

Title: Պահպանարան
Definition_1: conservatory; post, post-house; shelter, refuge, asylum.

Title: Պահպանեմ
Definition_1: to guard, to preserve, to keep; to protect, to guarantee, to sustain, to defend; to shield, to screen, to secure or shelter from; to maintain, to entertain; — զանձն, to guard, to preserve oneself from; — ի ցրտոյ, to screen from the cold.

Title: Պահպանութիւն
Definition_1: preservation, guard, protection, defence; maintenance; observance, observation.

Title: Պահք
Definition_1: abstinence; fast; մեծ, քառասնորդական —, Lent; օր պահոց, fish-day, fast-day; պահս պահել, to abstain from meat; to fast.

Title: Պաղ
Definition_2: cold, icy, glacial, freezing; հալիլ, լուծանիլ —ին, to thaw, to melt, to liquefy; — ձուլել, to freeze, to ice.

Title: Պաղատանք
Definition_1: supplication, imploration, instance, entreaty, prayer, invocation, request, solicitation; rogation.

Title: Պաղատիմ
Definition_1: to beg with submission, to implore, to supplicate, to pray or entreat earnestly, to solicit, to beg for, to adjure, to beseech, to invoke, to intercede; պաղատանս —, to address the most earnest entreaties.

Title: Պաղատիտ
Definition_1: dried fig, string of dried figs, a frail.

Title: Պաղիմ
Definition_1: to freeze, to be frozen, to congeal, to coagulate, to thicken; to catch cold; — յերկաթս, to arm with cuirass.

Title: Պաղպաջ
Definition_1: shining pimple or eruption; lustre, glitter, brilliancy.

Title: Պաղպաջեմ
Definition_1: to shine, to sparkle, to glitter.

Title: Պաճար
Definition_1: cattle; —ք, means, expedient, device; —ս պաճարել, to seek the means to, to resort to all sorts of expedients, contrivances or shifts.

Title: Պաճարանք
Definition_1: the gaining or procuring one's livelihood; subsistence, maintenance; food, victuals; means, way, remedy, expedient.

Title: Պաճարեմ
Definition_1: to provide, to get, to come by; to try, to endeavour, to remedy, to find means; — զկեանս, to earn one's livelihood, to provide where with to live.

Title: Պաճոյճ
Definition_1: adorned, beautified, set off, decked, elegant;

Title: Պաճուճաբան
Definition_1: phrase-maker, bombastic, fulsome author, hireling writer, affected speaker;

Title: Պաճուճաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak elegantly; to overload a discourse with ornament.

Title: Պաճուճազարդ
Definition_1: bedizened, bedecked; adorned, embellished; studied, affected, finical; emphatic, elegant, pompous.

Title: Պաճուճան
Definition_1: attire, ornament, dress, studied or elegant toilette, finery; affectation, studied elegance; apparel, furniture; doll;

Title: Պաճուճեմ
Definition_1: to deck, to attire, to embellish, to adorn, to beautify, to decorate, to bedizen, to bedeck; to paint, to plaster; to dissemble, to feign, to disguise; to give oneself airs; — զմարմին, to embalm; —եալ, cf. Պաճուճազարդ; — առասպելք, cunningly devised fables; — կերակուր, skilfully dressed meats.

Title: Պայազատ
Definition_1: successor, heir, inheritor, descendant; noble, nobleman, prince, lord.

Title: Պայազատեմ
Definition_1: to succeed, to inherit; to make oneself master of, to master, to domineer, to lord, to rule over.

Title: Պայթեմ
Definition_2: to burst, to crack, to split, to shiver, to break, to cleave; to be transported by pride, to be puffed up.

Title: Պայթիւն
Definition_1: burst, crash, crack, eruption, rupture, explosion.

Title: Պայթուցանեմ
Definition_1: to burst, to cause to break, to shiver, to cleave, to break or burst open.

Title: Պայծառ
Definition_1: clear, limpid, pure; clear, serene, clean; gay; splendid, sparkling, brilliant, luminous, shining; bright, polished, clean; distinct, evident, plain; illustrious, glorious, farfamed, renowned, celebrated; ի հանդերձս —ս, arrayed in gorgeous apparel.

Title: Պայծառաբերիմ
Definition_1: to be adorned with fine fruits.

Title: Պայծառազգեաց
Definition_1: dressed splendidly, wearing brilliant garments; luminous, glorious.

Title: Պայծառազգեստ
Definition_1: dressed splendidly, wearing brilliant garments; luminous, glorious;

Title: Պայծառազգեստիմ
Definition_1: to dress oneself splendidly, to wear superb apparel, to bedizen or bedeck oneself elegantly.

Title: Պայծառանամ
Definition_1: to brighten, to become clear; to shine, to glitter, to sparkle, to be resplendent;
Definition_2: to shine, to render oneself illustrious, to flourish, to signalize or distinguish oneself, to be remarked, to become a person of note.

Title: Պայծառապսակ
Definition_1: crowned splendidly, wearing a brilliant crown.

Title: Պայծառատեսիլ
Definition_1: of a shining aspect, luminous, brilliant.

Title: Պայծառացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to clear, to brighten, to render brilliant, to give splendour;
Definition_2: to cause to shine, to render illustrious, to distinguish, to celebrate; — զբանս, to render clear, to explain, to dilucidate.

Title: Պայծառերես
Definition_1: of a bright countenance, gay, cheerful, sprightly.

Title: Պայծառութիւն
Definition_1: clearness, light, brightness, splendour; lustre, brilliancy, magnificence, glory, celebrity, renown; magnitude; vivacity, serenity; limpidness, purity.

Title: Պայման
Definition_1: condition, nature, state, quality, circumstance; condition, term, measure, rule, limitation, close; part, article, proposition, transaction; stipulation, agreement, treaty, bargain, compact, pact; — անհրաժեշտ, condition, sine qua non; — ժամանակի, appointment, assignation; — կենաց, condition, state, circumstance; — նամակ, original draft of a treaty or contract; հայցուածոյ —աւ, in an interrogatory manner;
Definition_2: —աւ, upon condition, on terms; — դնել, to place or impose conditions, to make a contract, to contract, to bind oneself by contract; cf. Ժամանակակէտ.

Title: Պայմանեմ
Definition_1: to agree, to conclude a treaty, to stipulate, to contract; to article; to qualify, to limit.

Title: Պայուսակ
Definition_1: bag, pouch; — որսոյ, game-bag; — ուղեւորաց, cloak-bag; — կշռոց նենգութեան, bag of false weights.

Title: Պայքար
Definition_1: debate, dispute, quarrel, strife, controversy; գալ, մատչիլ, մտանել ի — ընդ ումեք, to open a question or controversy, to debate, to dispute.

Title: Պայքարեմ
Definition_1: to create strife, contests or law-suits, to litigate, to question, to dispute; to struggle hard, to fight, to battle.

Title: Պանդխտանոց
Definition_1: this earthly pilgrimage; hospice, inn for pilgrims, foreigners or other travellers, khan, caravanserai.

Title: Պանդխտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to emigrate, to estrange, to convey, transport or remove from one's country, to cause to inhabit another place, to dwell elsewhere.

Title: Պանդխտիմ
Definition_1: to emigrate, to leave or quit one's country, to remove from, to be estranged; to go on a pilgrimage.

Title: Պանդխտութիւն
Definition_1: condition of an alien or stranger; emigration, transmigration, migration; pilgrimage.

Title: Պանդոկապան
Definition_1: inn-keeper or tavern-keeper, host, landlord, master of an hotel; major-domo, house-steward; կին —ի, hostess.

Title: Պանդրեմ
Definition_1: to propagate trees by layers of offsets, shoots or suckers, to provine.

Title: Պանիր
Definition_1: cheese; գործել մածուցանել —, to make cheese; to curdle milk.

Title: Պանծալի
Definition_1: glorious, praise-worthy, laudable; magnificent, pompous, excellent, sumptuous; sublime, illustrious, renowned, distinguished.

Title: Պանծացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to praise, to vaunt, to glorify, to sing the praises of, to extol, to cry or preach up, to exalt, to flatter, to laud, to commend.

Title: Պանրանամ
Definition_1: to curdle, to coagulate as cheese.

Title: Պաշար
Definition_1: provision, viaticum, food, victuals; victualing, providing, provisions, stores, equipment; the Holy Sacrament.

Title: Պաշարապինդ
Definition_1: well provisioned or furnished; — առնել, to victual, to provide, to store, to stock, to equip; — լնուլ, to stock or furnish with all sorts of provisions.

Title: Պաշարեմ
Definition_1: to besiege, to invest, to beset, to blockade, to occupy, to shut, to encircle, to enclose, to surround;

Title: Պաշարումն
Definition_1: siege, investment, blockade, surrounding, occupancy; — մտաց, anxiety, preoccupation; դնել զոտս ի պաշարման, to fetter, to put into irons, to shackle; ի — եւ յարգել արկանել, to besiege, to lay siege to, to invest.

Title: Պաշտեմ
Definition_1: to adore, to worship; to minister, to serve, to wait on; to administer, to confer; to officiate; to provide, to furnish; to exercise, to employ; — զխորհուրդս, to administer the Sacraments; — զծառայութիւն, to serve.

Title: Պաշտիմ
Definition_1: to employ, to use, to make use of, to avail oneself of, to adopt.

Title: Պաշտումն
Definition_1: worship, adoration; service; — առնուլ, to be served or ministered to.

Title: Պաշտպան
Definition_1: defender, patron, protector, favourer; minister, servant; — սուրբ, patron saint, patron; — դատի, advocate, attorney; — կալ, լինել ումեք, to defend, to protect, to assist.

Title: Պաշտպանեմ
Definition_1: to defend, to protect, to sustain, to favour, to support; to save, to preserve, to keep; to care, to take care; — եւեթ անձին, to do nothing but defend oneself, to remain on the defensive.

Title: Պաշտպանութիւն
Definition_1: defence, protection, guard, auspices, patronage, stay, support, favour; apology, intercession; service, office; ընդ պաշտպանութեամբ օրինաց, under the aegis of the Law.

Title: Պաշտօն
Definition_1: worship, adoration, latria, religion; service, office, ministry; ceremony, mystery; service, office; employment, function, duty, post, place; — աստուածային, divine worship; — կռոց, idolatry, the worship of idols; սնոտի —, superstition; — ննջեցելոց, burial service; burial; — բարի, piety, religion, fear of God; հասարակաց պաշտամունք, public functions; —, պաշտամունք, Olympic or public games; ի պաշտամանէ, by profession; պաշտօնեայ հասարակաց պաշտամանց, the Minister of Public worship; — առնել, to pay one's court to, to court, to flatter; — առնուլ, to be honoured or adored, to be ministered to; — հարկանել, տանել, to serve; ի պաշտաման կալ, to be in the ministry; պաշտել զ—, to exercise one's trade or calling; — տանել, to serve, to worship, to adore; ի — առնուլ, to adore; — մատուցանել, to worship, to perform a service agreeable to God; աստուածական առնուլ —, to cause oneself to be adored like a god; ի — մտանել, to enter a person's service; — կատարել, to fulfil a function; կորուսանել զ—, to lose one's place; ունել, ժառանգել զ— ուրուք, to take a person's place, to replace one; — կատարել վասն հոգւոյ ուրուք, to celebrate a mass for the repose of a person's soul; —ս երգոց կատարել, to sing psalms, to praise; — ինչ առնելով, — ինչ առնելոյ վասն, through respect, for regard, by adulation.

Title: Պաշտօնական
Definition_1: ministerial, official; — օրագիր, official paper, gazette.

Title: Պաշտօնեայ
Definition_1: clerk, official, minister; servant, domestic, waiter, valet; administrator, officiating, deacon;
Definition_2: religious, pious; — արդարութեան, Minister of Justice; cf. Պաշտօն; cf. Պատերազմ; — աստուածային վրէժխնդրութեան, instrument of divine vengeance; —ք, Therapeutae, servants of God; —ք արքունեաց, courtiers.

Title: Պապակիմ
Definition_1: to be very thirsty, to die of thirst.

Title: Պապանձեմ
Definition_1: to dumbfound, to put to silence, to non-plus, to run down, to confound, to refute, to overcome.

Title: Պապանձիմ
Definition_1: to be silent, mute or speechless, to be unable to answer, to hold one's tongue, to be dumfounded, non-plussed.

Title: Պապաչեմ
Definition_1: to bleat; to stutter, to stammer.

Title: Պառակ
Definition_1: sheep-park, sheepfold, sheepcot, pen; herd; flank; muffle-furnace;
Definition_2: laid at full length; — խոզի, pork chop; — որթու, veal cutlet, cutlet; — գառին, lamb chop; — ոչխարի, chop, mutton chop;
Definition_3: — —, in herds, in droves, in flocks;
Definition_4: ի — դնել զտունկն, to lay the plant at length.

Title: Պառական
Definition_1: hounds; ջոկ —աց, a pack of hounds.

Title: Պառակեմ
Definition_1: to lie down; to lie in ambush or in wait.

Title: Պառակտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to disunite, to divide, to disperse, to put at variance, to sow discord, to make a breach between.

Title: Պառակտիմ
Definition_1: to be disunited, dispersed, to be in dissension, to be split or torn into factions.

Title: Պառաւական
Definition_1: anile, senile; — առասպելք, idle story, tale, fable; — կրօնք, ridiculous superstition.

Title: Պառաւիմ
Definition_1: to grow old, aged, to advance in age; to become old, ancient.

Title: Պառաւութիւն
Definition_1: anileness, anility, old age of woman.

Title: Պաստառ
Definition_1: fine linen or stuff, byssus; tapestry, carpet, blanket; — դամասկացի, damask.

Title: Պաստառալի
Definition_1: hung with tapestry, draped, covered with drapery; — առնել, զարդարել, to hang with tapestry, to carpet, to mantle, to bedeck, to arrange tastefully.

Title: Պաստառակալ
Definition_1: fine linen-cover, bed-sheet, drapery, tapestry; — անկողինք, beds furnished with fine coverlets.

Title: Պաստառակալեմ
Definition_1: to wrap up in a linen or sheet; to hang, to drape.

Title: Պասքիմ
Definition_1: to be athirst, very thirsty, to be dying with thirst;
Definition_2: to pant or eagerly long for, to hunger and thirst after.

Title: Պասքութիւն
Definition_1: excessive thirst, thirstiness; siccity, dryness, aridity.

Title: Պատ
Definition_2: — ի —, — ի —է, — ի —ու, complicate, intricate, knotty, ambiguous, dark, obscure; — ի — բանք, ambages, compass of words, circuit, roundabout way, shifts; — առնուլ, — գալ, to surround, to environ, to encompass, to hem in, to beset, to encircle, to gird, to inclose; — ի — բանիւք խօսել, to make use of circumlocutions, to periphrase, to speak periphrastically, to beat about the bush; — ի — խաղան գետք, the rivers seem to delight in a thousand windings.

Title: Պատահ
Definition_1: adventure, accident, contingency, casualty, occurrence, incident, chance, hazard, fortuitous or unforeseen event;

Title: Պատահար
Definition_1: cf. Պատահ ; sad adventure, grievous accident, serious case, misfortune, mischance, catastrophe;
Definition_2: ըստ —աց, by chance, fortuitously; ի —է, unfortunately.

Title: Պատահեմ
Definition_1: to cause to happen, to bring about, to compass;

Title: Պատահիմ
Definition_1: to meet, to meet one another; to arrive, to happen, to befall, to occur; to go to meet, to encounter, to oppose, to withstand, to resist, to come to blows, to grapple with, to kill; — ումեք մարտիւ, պատերազմաւ, to meet face to face, to attack in front, to war against; փախուցեալ յանձրեւէ՝ կարկտի պատահէ, to leap out of the frying-pan into the fire.

Title: Պատահումն
Definition_2: պատահմամբ, ըստ պատահման, accidentally, fortuitously, casually, incidentally, by chance; պատահմունք ի դէպ ելանէին նմա, chance, good fortune aided him; անցեալ էր —, it was no longer time.

Title: Պատաղիմ
Definition_1: to occupy, busy or employ oneself, to give oneself up to, to apply oneself to.

Title: Պատան
Definition_1: band, bandage, wrapper; truss; — մեռելոյ, shroud, winding-sheet, grave-clothes.

Title: Պատանդ
Definition_1: hostage; pledge, gage; տալ ի —, to plight, to pledge, to offer as a pledge; առնուլ ի —, to take as a hostage or pledge; ի — կալ, to be hostage.

Title: Պատանդեմ
Definition_1: to serve as hostage; to give or receive for hostage or pledge; to tie, to enlace, to bind; to involve, to contain, to enclose.

Title: Պատանդութիւն
Definition_1: the giving or receiving in hostage; cf. Պատանդ.

Title: Պատանի
Definition_1: youth, adolescent, stripling, lad, young man; domestic, servant; waiter; groom; — անփորձ, inexperienced young man, younker, greenhorn, novice.

Title: Պատառ
Definition_1: bit, slice; mouthful; piece, shred, strip; պատառ պատառ, in pieces, in rags; piecemeal; — մի հացի, a bit or piece of bread; բրդել —ս —ս, to cut in pieces or in bits; ի մի — կլանել, to devour, to take in one mouthful; — — կոտորել, to be lacerated, torn or cut to pieces, butchered; — — երկիր անկանիլ, to fall off bit by bit, to decay gradually.

Title: Պատառաբոյծ
Definition_1: parasite, spunger, trencher-friend, hanger on, toad-eater.

Title: Պատառատուն
Definition_1: used, torn, old, worn out, threadbare, shabby, ragged, tattered; — հանդերձ, torn, ragged or tattered coat, rags, tatters; —ս զգենուլ, to be reduced to tatters.

Title: Պատառեմ
Definition_1: to tear, to tear to bits or pieces, to lacerate, to rend; to cleave, to cut, to divide, to slash; to break, to crack, to split, to burst; յօշ յօշ —, to cut to pieces, to dilaniate, to rend; զմիմեանս —, to tear each other; — զթագաւորութիւնն, to break up the kingdom; — զեզինս, to slaughter oxen; — զոք, to kill; ակօս —, to furrow, to plough; — զբանտն, to break out of prison; — զօրէնս, to transgress, to violate.

Title: Պատառիկ
Definition_1: little bit, small piece, taste; fragment.

Title: Պատառոտեմ
Definition_1: to rend, to lacerate, to tear to pieces.

Title: Պատառուած
Definition_1: rent, tear; rupture, crack, crevice, fissure, opening; chap, chink, slash, slit.

Title: Պատառումն
Definition_2: intestine broils, rupture, division, scission, disunion, party, faction.

Title: Պատասխանատուութիւն
Definition_1: answering, answer; defence, apology, excuse; responsibility.

Title: Պատասխանատրեմ
Definition_1: to answer, to make answer, to reply, to give answers or an answer; to defend, to apologize, to excuse; այլ ընդ այլոց —, to reply evasively; — իսկ ծանրացաւ, he hardly deigned or condescended to reply.

Title: Պատասխանի
Definition_1: answer, response, reply; return, repartee, rejoinder; account, reason, defence, apology, excuse, justification; հրաման —նւոյ, oracle; համարձակ, յանդուգն, խուսափական, նպաստամատոյց, հաւաստի, դրական, ժխտական, լակոնական, աննշան, չոր, անմիտ, կարճ —, haughty or imperious, impertinent, evasive, favourable, certain, positive, negative, laconic, insignificant, dry, foolish, curt or short reply; — առնել, to answer, to reply, to make answer to; — տալ, to answer for; to defend, excuse or justify oneself; տալ վասն անձին —, to plead one's own cause; ընդունել զ—, to receive the reply; ի — նամակիդ, in reply to your letter; չընդունել զ—, to receive no reply; սպասել —նւոյ, to await a reply; չիք —, there is no reply, no answer; cf. Ընդդէմ.

Title: Պատատ
Definition_1: load, burden, bundle, bale; package, roll; wrapper, cover.

Title: Պատատեմ
Definition_1: to envelop, to wrap up; to twine, to twist, to wind round, to entwine or interweave, to entangle; to implicate, to involve; — բեռինս, to pack up.

Title: Պատատիմ
Definition_1: to wrap oneself up in; to embrace, to embrace each other; to gather round, to twist about, to cling, to hold fast on.

Title: Պատատուկ
Definition_1: American bindweed, liane; — կարմրածաղիկ, quamoclit, scarlet convolvulus, red jasmine.

Title: Պատար
Definition_1: heaped up, full, brimful, rich, abundant, copious, overflowing.

Title: Պատարագ
Definition_1: sacrifice, victim, immolation; mass; oblation, offering; present, gift; bribe; հանել — to sacrifice; — ձայնաւոր, high-mass; թիւ —, low mass; — վասն ննջեցելոց, mass for the dead; պաշտել, մատուցանել զսուրբ —ն, to celebrate or say mass; տեսանել զ—, to attend mass.

Title: Պատարագամատոյց
Definition_2: sacrificer; officiating priest; missal, massbook; liturgy.

Title: Պատարագեմ
Definition_1: to sacrifice, to immolate, to offer, to give to God; to say or celebrate mass.

Title: Պատարագիք
Definition_1: things destined to be sacrificed; mass-dues, alms.

Title: Պատարեմ
Definition_1: to fill abundantly, to fill up to the brim, to fill to overflowing, to heap up.

Title: Պատարումն
Definition_1: fulness, abundance, plenty, overflow; cf. Ծայրալիր.

Title: Պատգամ
Definition_1: oracle; words; sentence; message, errand, order, ordinance; counsel, advice; —ս տալ, որոտալ, to deliver or utter oracles; ի —ս անկանել, to parley, to negotiate, to enter into treaty; —ս առաքել առ ոք, to send to say.

Title: Պատգամագնաց
Definition_1: parliamentarian, negotiator; — լինել, to parley, to negotiate.

Title: Պատգամախօս
Definition_1: oracular, giving oracles; — լինել, to pronounce or give an oracle.

Title: Պատգամաւոր
Definition_1: deputy, messenger; envoy, courier, delegate, ambassador; diplomatist;
Definition_2: minister of God's word, angel, prophet, apostle.

Title: Պատգամաւորեմ
Definition_1: to be a messenger, ambassador or deputy, to go or to come as ambassador, to negotiate, to go in mission; to treat by diplomacy, to be a diplomatist.

Title: Պատգարակ
Definition_1: hand-barrow, litter, sedan; հրեղէն —, instrument of torture, gridiron.

Title: Պատեան
Definition_1: sheath, scabbard; case; cover, envelope; scale, shell; hull, pod, cod, husk; rind, peel, bark; armour, cuirass; breast; արկանել զսուրն ի —ս, to sheathe, to put up; cf. Մերկանամ.

Title: Պատեհ
Definition_1: convenient, proper, fit, suitable, decent; well-timed, timely, opportune, seasonable, propitious, favourable;
Definition_3: ի —, ըստ —ի, conveniently, suitably;
Definition_4: — է, it is fit, it is becoming; it is due; ի — լինել, to befit, to become; — համարել, to think proper, to deem it expedient; — ժամանակ գտանել, to find a favourable opportunity; — առնուլ, to seize the occasion, to strike the iron while it is hot; յօգուտ արկանել զ—, to avail oneself of, to profit by the opportunity; cf. Կորուսանեմ.

Title: Պատեհութիւն
Definition_1: convenience, fitness, decency; opportunity, seasonableness, fitness of time, of circumstances; chance; չկորուսանել զ—, not to lose the opportunity; յօգուտ ի կիր արկանել զ—, to profit by the occasion, to avail oneself of the opportunity; կորուսանել զ—, not to seize the opportunity, to let the occasion pass, to let slip the opportunity.

Title: Պատեմ
Definition_1: to surround, to environ, to encompass, to enclose, to fence, to gird; to besiege, to invest, to beset; to surround, to beset, to hem in; to envelop, to pack up; to spread abroad, to circulate, to take or lead about; to veneer, to plate, to cover, to overlay; պատեալ պաշարել զոք, to make a ring round, to hem round; to beset; — զվէրս, to dress a wound; անդ խոր լռութիուն պատէ զամենայն, great silence prevails there; ահ պատեաց զնա, he was struck by fear; cf. Շուրջ.

Title: Պատիմ
Definition_1: to be placed round about, to be surrounded, enveloped, bound round; to take a turn, to circulate, to go round; to embrace; to be changed or transmitted; — ուռկանաւ ի պաշարումն, to be taken in a net, caught in a snare; պատեցան զնովաւ երկունք իւր, she was seized with the pains of labour; պատեալ կճով, covered with marble; cf. Երկն.

Title: Պատենազէն
Definition_1: cuirassed, furnished with armour; — նաւ, armoured ship.

Title: Պատերազմ
Definition_2: temptation; առտնին or քաղաքական —, intestine or civil war; պաշտօնարան —ի, War-Office; պաշտօնեայ or ոստիկան —ի, Minister of War; պատրաստութիւնք —ի, warlike preparations; արիւնռուշտ —, bloody battle; մահացու —, war to the death, deadly fight; դաշտ —ի, battle-field; ըստ օրինաց —ի, according to the laws of warfare; — հրատարակել, to declare war against; — ահագին ի վերայ ուրուք յարուցանել, to threaten with war; պատրաստիլ ի, —, to prepare for war; երթալ ի —, to go to the wars; առաջին նուագ մտանել ի —, to be in one's first battle; ձեռն արկանել ի —, to undertake a war; ի —գրգռել, դրդել, to excite to war; to engage in war; — յարդարել ընդդէմ, to combat, to attack; տալ —, — մղել, to be at war, to make war, to war against, to give battle to, to fight a battle with; եղեւ — խիստ յոյժ, a bloody battle was fought; գրգռել, բորբոքել զ—, to excite, to kindle war; սաստկացաւ —ն, the combat was fierce; կորուսանել զ—ն, to lose the day, or a battle; ի ժամանակս —ի, in time of war; արծաթով պնդի —ն, gold is the sinew of war; cf. Ընտանի; cf. Իր; cf. Խանձեմ; cf. Մարտ.

Title: Պատերազմակից
Definition_1: fellow-soldier, comrade, companion in arms; ally; — լինել, to fight together.

Title: Պատերազմակուր լինիմ
Definition_1: to be overcome and slain in battle.

Title: Պատերազմասէր
Definition_1: fond of war, delighting in war, warrior, belligerent, warlike.

Title: Պատերազմիկ
Definition_2: desultory war; mimic warfare; — նաւ, man-of-war, ship of war; galley, trireme, three benched galley; — երիվար, war-horse, charger.

Title: Պատերազմիմ
Definition_1: to war, to make war, to combat, to fight;
Definition_2: to be at war with, to be tempted; — ի վերայ ազատութեան, to defend liberty; զմահու պատերազմ, to wage a war of extermination; զբարւոք պատերազմն —, to fight a good fight; մեծապէս -զմեալք զառաքինութեան զհանդէս, fighting valiantly where virtue is at stake; առանց զմելոյ, without firing a shot, without striking a blow.

Title: Պատերազմիչ
Definition_1: warrior, fighting-man, combatant, belligerent; enemy, adversary;

Title: Պատժական
Definition_1: punitive, penal, repressive; — օրէնք, penal law.

Title: Պատժապարտ
Definition_1: deserving punishment, found guilty, punishable, culpable, criminal.

Title: Պատժապարտեմ
Definition_1: to declare guilty; to condemn, to punish.

Title: Պատժաւոր
Definition_1: condemned, punished, chastised; guilty, culpable, delinquent, villainous; cf. Պատժական.

Title: Պատժեմ
Definition_1: to punish, to chastise, to correct, to inflict punishment or correction.

Title: Պատիժ
Definition_1: pain, punishment, chastisement, correction, penitence; — մահու, condemnation, sentence;
Definition_2: առանց պատժոց or պատժի, with impunity; անկանել ընդ պատժով, to incur, to deserve punishment; — տալ, to order punishment or penance; դնել — ի վերայ, to inflict punishment or chastisement; զանիրաւութեան —ս արկանել զնովաւ, to punish his injustice.

Title: Պատիճ
Definition_2: follicle, univalvular pericarp, seed-vessel, husk, pod, shell.

Title: Պատիր
Definition_1: deceiving, captious, false, deceitful, fallacious, delusive, sophistical, feigned, dissembled, concealed, artificial, illusory, vain; seducing, untrue, lying;
Definition_2: —ք, deception, deceit, fraud, cheat, illusion, delusion, vanity, sophistry, feint, error, falsehood, lie; cunning, craft, wile; ի —ս արկանել, to deceive, to gull, to dupe, to lead into error.

Title: Պատիւ
Definition_1: honour, token of esteem, homage, glory; respect, veneration, reverence, regard, consideration; honours, preferments, dignities, degrees, offices, titles; testimonial, prize, gift, presentation; խոստումն պատուոյ, word of honour; լեգէոն պատուոյ, Legion of honour; — արքունի, diploma of merit; ի —, in honour of;
Definition_2: պատուով, honourably; լի պատուով, loaded with honours; ի — հասանել, to rise to dignities; ի պատուի լինել, to be in honour, in consideration; ի — առնուլ, բազում պատուովք պատուել, to load with honours, to pay great honours to, to raise to the highest honours; to set one up upon the pinnacle of glory, to raise one up to the skies; ի մեծի պատուի լինել, to be raised to the highest pitch of fortune; — անձին համարել, to take to oneself the credit of, to deem it an honour; — ընծայել, to pay honour; առնել, դնել, to do honour to, to be an honour or a credit to; — առնել սեղանոյ, to do honour to a meal; պատուով պատուէք զիս, you do me a great deal of honour, too much honour; —ս արժանաւորաց, honour to whom honour is due; cf. Թեկն; cf. Հասանեմ; cf. Միմեանց;
Definition_3: sign of abbreviation.

Title: Պատկանդարան
Definition_1: fit vessel; quiver, case for arrows.

Title: Պատկառ
Definition_2: cf. Պատկառանք; — կալ, լինել, to pay attention, to attend to, to watch, to give oneself up to, to apply oneself or one's thoughts or mind to, to tend to, to subject oneself to; — կալ օրինաց, to observe the law; — կալ արդարութեան, to be just, right, upright; — կալ յիրաց ինչ, to avoid, to shun.

Title: Պատկառանք
Definition_1: respect, reverence, veneration, regard; modesty; bashfulness, coyness, shame, reserve, blushing, blushes; the private parts;
Definition_2: —նօք, respectfully; bashfully, blushingly; —նս ածել, to create respect in, to inspire or impress with respect, to breathe respect.

Title: Պատկառելի
Definition_1: venerable, august; respectful, bashful; shameful; — զանձն ցուցանել, to make oneself respected; — գործել, ընծայեցուցանել, to render respectable, to cause to be respected.

Title: Պատկառեմ
Definition_1: to fill with respect, to put to shame, to abash, to confound, to cover with shame, to make blush, to put to the blush.

Title: Պատկառիմ
Definition_1: to be ashamed, confused, to blush at, to redden with shame; to respect, to be respectful; to mind, to take care of, to beware;

Title: Պատկառոտ
Definition_1: bashful, coy, ashamed, sheepish, timid, shy.

Title: Պատկառուկ
Definition_1: sensitive plant, mimosa; —ս առկանեմ, cf. Պատկառեցուցանեմ.

Title: Պատկեր
Definition_1: icon, image, effigy; painting, picture, representation; likeness, figure, portrait; statue, idol; sight, visage, face; design, project, plan; type, symbol; doll; —ք, the Divine Person; — աւուրն, the day of the week or month; hymn for the day; գեղեցիկ —աւ, of fine presence, of noble aspect; — ըստ —ի, in the image of, in the likeness of; ի սոյն —, in this way or manner; cf. Համառօտագիծ.

Title: Պատկերագրեմ
Definition_1: to take or draw the likeness or portrait of; to portray, to paint, to depict, to describe.

Title: Պատկերազարդ
Definition_1: illustrated, adorned with engravings or pictures, illuminated; — յօրինել, to illustrate, to adorn with engravings, to illuminate.

Title: Պատկերակից
Definition_1: of the same figure, conformable, resembling, like; — լինել, to conform, to take the form of, to resemble.

Title: Պատկերանամ
Definition_1: to be reflected in, to be the picture of, to take the form, to be formed, printed, impressed, represented;

Title: Պատկերասէր
Definition_3: amateur of pictures.

Title: Պատկերեմ
Definition_1: to paint, to form, to figure, to put on a form; to represent, to impress or imprint; to conform; — ի միտս, to picture or represent to oneself, to fancy.

Title: Պատճառ
Definition_1: cause, author; occasion, matter; principle, origin; reason, subject, motive; fault, offence, misdeed, crime; pretext, excuse, subterfuge;
Definition_2: —աւ, ի —ս, on account of, for the sake of, for, because of, out of regard for; under pretence of; ի —ս քո, for your sake, for you; — տալ, to give occasion to; —ս առնուլ, to take as a pretext, to pretend, to allege; — լինել, to be the cause or author of; to dissemble; —ս ի մէջ ածել, to allege, plead, urge or adduce reasons; բառնալ զ—ս, to take away the motive or grounds; պատճառել —ս մեղաց, to seek excuses for sins; առանց իրաւա ցի —ի, without a real motive, causelessly, groundlessly, unreasonably.

Title: Պատճառադրեմ
Definition_1: to adduce a reason in excuse, to excuse oneself.

Title: Պատճառանք
Definition_1:
cause, motive; pretext, excuse, cloak, colour; —նօք, under pretence of; վասն որո՞յ, վասն որո՞ց or յի՞նչ —նաց, why ? for what cause ?
ամբարտաւանութեան —նօք, on account of pride; զբօսանաց —նաւ, for walking; պէսպէս —նօք, under different pretexts; բառնալ զ—նս, to take away the pretext.

Title: Պատճառաւոր
Definition_1: caused, occasioned; created, done, made; guilty, culpable.

Title: Պատճառեմ
Definition_1: to cause, to do, to occasion, to make, to produce; to pretend, to seek pretexts, to take as an excuse, to allege; to dissemble, to feint; — զանգիտութիւն, to play the simpleton.

Title: Պատճեան
Definition_1: double, copy, duplicate, transcript, minute; letter, writing, edict, decree.

Title: Պատմագիր
Definition_1: historiographer, historian; — մատեան, book of history.

Title: Պատմակից
Definition_1: relating or writing the same history or annals.

Title: Պատմեմ
Definition_1: to narrate, to relate, to recount, to recite, to tell, to report, to expose, to debit an account, to say by retail; to publish, to manifest, to announce; երկինք պատմեն զփառս աստուծոյ, the heavens proclaim the glory of God.

Title: Պատմիչ
Definition_1: historian, narrator; interpreter; — վարուց, biographer, cf. Կենսագիր.

Title: Պատմող
Definition_1: narrator, historian; — լինել, to relate, to tell, to announce.

Title: Պատմութիւն
Definition_1: history; narration, recital, account; tale; explanation, exposition; — վարուց, biography; cf. Կենսագրութիւն; — արտաքնոց, profane history; — սուրբ գրոց, Sacred History; գիրք or յիշատակք պատմութեանց, Stromatum; կարգել զ—, cf. Պատմագրեմ; ի — արկանել, cf. Պատմեմ.

Title: Պատմուճակ
Definition_1: wardrobe keeper; վանք or տուն —աց, wardrobe.

Title: Պատմուճան
Definition_1: stole, long vest, garment, tunic, cassock; գեղեցիկ —ք, fine clothes; թխատեսակ —, dress coat; — հանդարձից or փոխանակաւ, a suit of new clothes.

Title: Պատնէշ
Definition_1: rampart, intrenchment, barricade, stockade, barrier, bastion, bulwark; — պաշարման, circumvallation, contravallation, siege, blockade; պատել — պաշարմամբ, to besiege; դնել — շուրջ զքաղաքաւ, to invest a city; — ածել, արկանել, կանգնել, պատել, to intrench, to throw up intrenchments, to intrench or fortify oneself, to surround with ramparts or trenches, to barricade, to palisade; to fortify with bastions.

Title: Պատշաճ
Definition_1: suitable, pertinent, proper, seemly, decorous, becoming, convenient, congruous, fit, decent, conformable, analogous, proportioned; just, reasonable;
Definition_3: — ըստ —ի or —ից, conveniently, duly, a propos, pertinently, decently, seemly, seasonably; — է, պարտ աւ — է, it is proper, suitable, right, it becomes; չէ —, it is not seemly or befitting; ըստ ոչ —ի, unseasonable; լնուլ զպարտս —ից, to behave with propriety, decorum, good breeding or politeness.

Title: Պատշաճաբար
Definition_1: properly, suitably, decorously, decently, with propriety.

Title: Պատշաճեմ
Definition_1: to render convenient, to make fit, to adapt, to adjust, to suit, to apply; to proportion; to appropriate.

Title: Պատշաճիմ
Definition_1: to be suitable or conformable, to suit, to agree; to belong, to pertain, to coincide, to match; to concern, to regard.

Title: Պատշաճողութիւն
Definition_1: suitableness, congruity, conformity; decorum, decency; relation, analogy, proportion, symmetry.

Title: Պատշգամ
Definition_1: side chamber; projecture, balcony, verandah, belvedere, terrace; porch.

Title: Պատուաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak with respect, to honour, to praise, to extol.

Title: Պատուած
Definition_1: turn, winding, sinuosity, twisting; —ք բանից, circuitous expression.

Title: Պատուածոյ
Definition_1: twined, wound round, entwined; full of sinuosities.

Title: Պատուական
Definition_1: honourable, respectable, estimable, venerable; precious, rare, excellent, exquisite; noble; հայր —, Reverend Father;
Definition_2: —ք, noblemen, nobility, principal persons; առ — ս ունել զոք, to hold or have in honour; — ամենայն ժողովրդեան, respected by all people.

Title: Պատուականութիւն
Definition_1: high value, elevated price; excellence, pre-eminence, rarity; nobleness.

Title: Պատուակցութիւն
Definition_1: parity of rank; participation in the same honour or glory.

Title: Պատուասէր
Definition_1: eager for honours, greedy of glory, ambitious, desirous of praise or distinction; vain-glorious, vain; generous, bounteous, obliging, officious.

Title: Պատուասիրեմ
Definition_1: to covet, to be ambitious of, to seek glory, fame or distinction; to make it a point of honour to, to treat generously or honourably, to oblige; to honour, to glorify; to compliment.

Title: Պատուասիրութիւն
Definition_1: immoderate desire of honour or glory, ambition, vain-glory, point of honour; generosity, liberality; obligingness.

Title: Պատուաստ
Definition_1: graft, graff; inoculation, vaccination, cow-pox; insertion, addition; conjunction, union; թարախ —ի, pus, vaccine matter; —իւ որդի, adoptive son; —իւ հայր, putative, adoptive father.

Title: Պատուաստեմ
Definition_1: to engraft, to graft; to inoculate, to vaccinate; to insert, to interpolate; to annex, to join, to reunite, to attack.

Title: Պատուար
Definition_1: bulwark, rampart, bastion, barrier, epaulment, beam, rafter; ceiling; — լինել հայրենեաց, to be a bulwark of one's country.

Title: Պատուարաւոր
Definition_1: constructed of, or made with beams, ceiled; walled; balustrated.

Title: Պատուարեմ
Definition_1: to wall; to gird with parapets.

Title: Պատուեմ
Definition_1: to honour, to render honour and respect, to respect, to esteem, to venerate, to revere, to glorify, to favour; — զախտն, to caress, to cherish, to flatter, to humour the passions; յառաջ —, to esteem most, to prefer.

Title: Պատուէր
Definition_1: commandment, order, injunction; precept; warrant, commission; instruction, lesson; ordinance, decree; — տալ, դնել, to give orders or directions, to command, to order, to charge, to dispose, to enjoin; to commission, to intrust with a message; — հրամանի ի վերայ դնել, to order; to appoint, to decree; — or հրամանի ընդունել, to receive orders to.

Title: Պատուիրակ
Definition_1: envoy, deputy; commissary, emissary, agent, mandatary, proxy.

Title: Պատուիրան
Definition_1: commandment, precept, law, command, order; անցանել զ—օք, to transgress, to violate, to break, to infringe; —աւ հրամայել, to order expressly.

Title: Պատուիրանապահութիւն
Definition_1: observance, fulfillment of a commandment or order.

Title: Պատուիրանաւանդութիւն
Definition_1: transgression, breaking or violating the law.

Title: Պատուիրեմ
Definition_1: to command, to order, to enjoin, to impose, to charge, to prescribe; to recommend.

Title: Պատուհան
Definition_1: window, casement; dormer-window; sky-light; niche, wall-press; sluice, flood-gate; chimney;
Definition_2: senses; վանդակ —ի, blinds, Venetian blinds; —ք բացան երկնից, it rains pailfuls; cf. Կարկառիմ; cf. Հայիմ.

Title: Պատուհաս
Definition_1: punishment, chastisement, pain, correction; scourge, revenge; threat, threatening tone; reprimand, reproach, rebuke; պատիժ —ի, severe punishment; — մահու, sentence or punishment of death, capital punishment; տեղի —ի, exile; ազգի մարդկան, the scourge of human kind; — կապել ի վերայ, to inflict a punishment; կրել խիստ —, to be severely punished; առնել —, to threaten.

Title: Պատուհասագոյն
Definition_1: very threatening, reproachful or scolding; severe, punishing, chastising; vendicative, cruel.

Title: Պատուհասակիր լինիմ
Definition_1: to be punished, to bear the punishment.

Title: Պատուհասակոծ առնեմ
Definition_1: to punish, to chastise, to condemn to punishment; to load with reproaches, to scold, to threaten, to speak in a threatening tone.

Title: Պատուհասակոծ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be punished, chastised; to be scolded, threatened.

Title: Պատուհասակոծս արձակեմ
Definition_1: to crush with reproaches and threats.

Title: Պատուհասեմ
Definition_1: to punish, to chastise, to correct; to avenge; to scold, to chide, to reproach, to reprimand; to threaten.

Title: Պատսպարան
Definition_1: asylum, refuge, retreat, shelter, cover; protection, patronage, defence, prop, support; resources; — լինել, to be the refuge of to protect, to defend, to take under one's protection.

Title: Պատսպարեմ
Definition_1: to surround, to encircle, to enclose, to shut in; to protect, to prop, to defend, to sustain; to shelter, to screen, to cover; to fortify, to restore; to return, to restore, to give back.

Title: Պատսպարիմ
Definition_1: to be enclosed, surrounded; to take refuge, to seek shelter, to retire, to be under cover, to shelter or defend oneself; to recover oneself, to get up; to get heart, to regain courage; to return, to reinhabit, to dwell in, to remain, to repose.

Title: Պատրանք
Definition_1: deceit, cheat, fraud, imposition, seduction, trick, imposture; mistake, error; illusion, deception; աստղ —նաց, erratic star, planet; ի —նս արկանել, —նս մատուցանել, to deceive, to cheat, to seduce, to induce or lead into error; cf. Ըմբռնիմ.

Title: Պատրաստ
Definition_1: prepared, ready, disposed, in condition; active, quick; at hand, near at hand, disposable;
Definition_2: warily, softly, slowly; — առնել, to prepare; — լինել, to prepare oneself; to be disposed; to be prompt or resolute; ի —ի ունել, to hold in readiness; to stand in readiness, to be ready; — կալ, cf. Պատկառ կամ.

Title: Պատրաստաբան
Definition_1: apt at a reply, ready witted.

Title: Պատրաստաբար
Definition_1: promptly, readily, eagerly, with great alacrity.

Title: Պատրաստեմ
Definition_1: to prepare, to make or get ready, to put in condition; to provide with, to dispose, to put in order, to fit, to dress; — բանս ի բերան ուրուք, to prompt, to suggest.

Title: Պատրաստիմ
Definition_1: to prepare oneself, to get ready, to put oneself in a condition to, to make preparations, to take one's dispositions; to beware of, to take care or heed, to mind.

Title: Պատրաստութիւն
Definition_1: preparation, preparative, disposition; furniture, household goods; train, equipage; precaution, attention, vigilance; պատրաստութեամբ, spontaneously, voluntarily, readily.

Title: Պատրեմ
Definition_1: to deceive, to cheat, to seduce, to dupe, to defraud, to circumvent, to surprise; to abuse.

Title: Պատրիարք
Definition_1: patriarch; — հայոց, patriarch of the Armenians, Catholicos.

Title: Պատրինջ
Definition_1: balm-mint, gardenbalm, melissa hortensis; ջուր պատրընջի, carmelite water.

Title: Պատրոյգ
Definition_1: wick; match; — վիրաց, lint, lineament, scraped lint.

Title: Պատրուակ
Definition_1: veil, cover; mask, cloak, appearance; fiction, pretext, excuse; — թղթոյ, envelope; address; ընդ —աւ, under the appearance.

Title: Պատրուակեմ
Definition_1: to cover, to veil, to mask, to palliate; to pretend.

Title: Պատրուճակ
Definition_1: beast for sacrifice or food; appanage, pension.

Title: Պար
Definition_1: dancing, dance; ball; ballet; choir, chorus; company, assembly, circle; troop, band; herd, drove, flock; — աստեղաց, chorus of the stars; cf. Ատամն, cf. Մեղու; — առնուլ, to dance; to surround, to encompass, to encircle; — առնուլ, գալ, յօրինել, խմբել, —ս բոլորել, տալ or պարել, ի — անցանել, to dance, to leap, to hop, to jump; to caracole; — արկանել, to surround, to environ; —ս տալ, to gather together.

Title: Պարաբառնամ
Definition_1: to raise around; to sustain, to support, to take away, to suppress.

Title: Պարագայ
Definition_2: circumstance; particular, detail; turn, revolution; —ց ամօք, for many or long years.

Title: Պարագլուխ
Definition_1: coryphaeus, chief of a choir or company;
Definition_2: leader, chief, head, first; — լինել, to be at the head of, to be the chief, to march at the head of, to lead, to conduct; to give the signal, to set the example, to take the initiative.

Title: Պարագրեմ
Definition_1: to circumscribe, to confine, to limit; to comprehend, to contain; to describe; to trace or draw the first strokes, to sketch the outline of; to rough-draw.

Title: Պարագրութիւն
Definition_1: circumscription, limitation; description; outline, sketch, rough draught.

Title: Պարադիտեմ
Definition_1: to look around; to observe, to consider, to ponder.

Title: Պարազատեմ
Definition_1: to set at absolute liberty, to free totally.

Title: Պարախմբիմ
Definition_1: to be gathered all together, to flock together.

Title: Պարածածկեմ
Definition_1: to cover on all sides, to envelope, to surround, to wrap up, to bury.

Title: Պարածածուկ
Definition_1: enveloped, completely covered or wrapped up.

Title: Պարակցիմ
Definition_1: to dance or sing together; to enter a company or society, to accompany, to associate oneself with.

Title: Պարայածիմ
Definition_1: to circulate, to take a turn.

Title: Պարան
Definition_1: cord, rope, cable; —ք, cordage, ropes; — կտաւուց, clothesline;

Title: Պարանոց
Definition_1: neck; throat; — ծովու, isthmus; strait; — սրուակաց, neck; cf. Զոյգ; անականել զ—աւ or ի վերայ —ի ուրուք, to fall upon the neck of; գնալ ի բարձր —, to walk proudly or majestically, to strut; կորացուցանել, դարձուցանել զ—, to take to flight, to flee, to run away.

Title: Պարանոցաթաղ
Definition_1: immersed or sunk up to the neck.

Title: Պարապ
Definition_1: leisure, leisure-time, cessation, respite, vacation; being without work or employment, want of occupation, rest, having nothing to do, idleness; convenient time, favourable opportunity;
Definition_2: cf. Պարապորդ; ժամանակ, օր —ոյ, favourable moment; vacation, holidays;
Definition_3:
—ով, leisurely, at one's leisure or ease; — առնուլ, to rest, to cease from work, to be unoccupied, at leisure; to take time, to find a favourable moment; ի —ս դեգերիլ, to be idle; —ոյ լինել, to rest, to repose; — խնդրել, to seek a convenient time, to lose no opportunity; — բերել, տալ, լինել, — կացուցանել զինքն, to take time to, to occupy oneself with, to give oneself to, to apply oneself to; — ժամ տալ, to give time; — ունել, to have time or leisure; — առնել, to empty; զի՞ կայք —, why are you idle ?
եթէ իցէ քո —, if you have time.

Title: Պարապատեմ
Definition_1: to surround, to encircle, to environ.

Title: Պարապատիմ
Definition_1: to scratch oneself, to stretch, to yawn on awaking.

Title: Պարապեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to occupy, to employ, to give work to; to exercise, to keep in exercise; to empty; to take away, to remove.

Title: Պարապիմ
Definition_1: to be occupied, employed, busy, to apply oneself to, to attend to, to devote oneself to, to study, to be steady, assiduous; to rest, to take repose; to be vacant, void; եկեսցէ յորժամ եւ պարապեսցէ, he will come when convenient to him.

Title: Պարապնդեմ
Definition_1: to bind in every part, to pinion, to garrott.

Title: Պարապորդ
Definition_1: unoccupied, idle, unemployed, lazy, slothful; vacant, void, empty.

Title: Պարապութիւն
Definition_1: inactivity, idleness, disoccupation; occupation, application, exercise, study; leisure, opportunity, ease.

Title: Պարապումն
Definition_1: cf. Պարապութիւն ; scholium, commentary; — առնուլ, to take time or leisure.

Title: Պարառեմ
Definition_1: to comprise, to include, to comprehend, to encompass, to embrace, to take in; to envelop, to beset, to invest.

Title: Պարառութիւն
Definition_1: comprehension, containing, embracing; syllepsis; party, assembly; — առաքինութեանց, the union of all the virtues.

Title: Պարասահմանեմ
Definition_1: to define; to relegate, to exile, to banish.

Title: Պարարեմ
Definition_1: to fatten; — զերկիր, to manure; — զոք սնոտի յուսով, to feed or entertain one with hopes, to beguile, to lull, to fool one with fair promises, to take to a fool's paradise; — զաչս, to feast, charm or delight the eyes.

Title: Պարարիմ
Definition_1: to grow fat or stout, to fatten; — սնոտի յուսով, to feed one's fancy, to lull oneself with, or feast upon false hopes.

Title: Պարարտ
Definition_1: fattened, fat, obese, lusty, plump, oily, greasy, unctuous; nutritious, succulent; rich, fertile, fruitful.

Title: Պարարտահամ
Definition_1: very sapid, well flavoured, extremely grateful to the palate.

Title: Պարարտանամ
Definition_1: to fatten, to grow fat, to become fat and plump.

Title: Պարարտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to fatten, to make fat; — զերկիր, to manure, to dung, to fertilize.

Title: Պարարտութիւն
Definition_1: fat; corpulence, stoutness; manure; sap; oiliness; produce, abundance, riches.

Title: Պարաւանդ
Definition_1: tie, rope, cord, bonds, iron, fetters.

Title: Պարաւանդեմ
Definition_1: to tie, to bind, to pinion, to put in chains or fetters.

Title: Պարաւոր
Definition_2: dancing, appertaining to dancing; surrounded, encircled.

Title: Պարաւորութիւն
Definition_1: dancing in company, ballet, ball, chorus; assembly, company, reunion.

Title: Պարգեւ
Definition_1: gift, present; donation, favour, grace, gratification, munificence, liberality; premium, remuneration, recompense; salary, pension; ի —, ի —ի, ի —ի մասին, as a gift, as a present; —աւ առնել զոք, to lavish gifts or benefits on, to gift; cf. Լնում; cf. Ճոխացուցանեմ.

Title: Պարգեւաբաշխութիւն
