Definition_1: distribution of presents; of prizes; liberality, generosity.

Title: Պարգեւախնդիր
Definition_1: seeking or asking a present or favour.

Title: Պարգեւական
Definition_1: given, accorded, granted; — երկիր, the Land of Promise.

Title: Պարգեւապետ
Definition_1: president of the games, giver of prizes.

Title: Պարգեւառ
Definition_1: donee, person to whom any thing is given or bequeathed by will.

Title: Պարգեւասէր
Definition_1: fond of making presents, liberal, generous, large-hearted, open-handed, munificent.

Title: Պարգեւեմ
Definition_1: to give, to make a present, to present with, to make largesses, to give freely and munificently, to distribute generously or liberally; to reward.

Title: Պարեկապան
Definition_1: watch, guard, patrol; —ս հանել, to place sentinels.

Title: Պարեմ
Definition_1: to dance with, to dance in company, to perform a ballet; — երգս, to sing and dance in a ring.

Title: Պարենիկ
Definition_1: scanty fare, scarce nourishment; հաղիւ զառօրեայ —ն հայթհայթել, to live from hand to mouth.

Title: Պարզ
Definition_1: simple; serene, calm; pure, clear, clean; simple, sincere, genuine; clear, evident;
Definition_2: simply; ի —ի, ի —ոյ, with a clear sky;
Definition_3: serenity, sereneness, fine weather, clear sky, serene atmosphere; evening stillness; morning freshness.

Title: Պարզաբանեմ
Definition_1: to clear up, to unravel, to unriddle, to solve.

Title: Պարզաբար
Definition_1: simply; clearly, explicitly; sincerely; — ասել, in a word, in short, in fine; — ասացից, frankly, to be plain with, openly, ingenuously, without reserve.

Title: Պարզախօս
Definition_1: speaking clearly, distinctly, explicit, intelligible, clear; — լինել, to speak clearly.

Title: Պարզամիտ
Definition_1: simple-minded, sincere, ingenuous, candid, artless, good-natured; simple, silly, foolish, imbecile.

Title: Պարզեմ
Definition_1: to simplify; to clarify, to filter; to clear, to purify; to expand, to slacken; to unfold, to unroll, to untwist, to display, to spread, to put or set forth; to unravel, to clear up, to disentangle, to develop, to explain, to expound, to illustrate; — զդրօշս, to hoist, to infurl a flag, to let fly the ensign, to display the colours; — առագաստս, to heave out, to set a sail.

Title: Պարզիմ
Definition_1: to be simplified; to be clarified, filtered; to become clear, to be purified; to be cleared up, solved, unravelled or elucidated; to grow calm or serene; to extend, to stretch out, to be unfolded, displayed or unrolled; — մեկնիլ, to depart, to go away; — ոգւոց, to be at the last gasp; պարզեցան զուարթացան դէմք նորա, his countenance brightened; cf. Ոգի.

Title: Պարզմտութիւն
Definition_1: simplicity, good nature, artlessness, plainness, sincerity, candour, ingenuousness; foolish credulity, singleness, silliness, simplicity.

Title: Պարզութիւն
Definition_1: simplicity; purity, cleanness; simplicity, sincerity; clarification, clarifying; serenity, clearness, calm weather; explication, development; ազնուական —, noble simplicity.

Title: Պարզուտ
Definition_1: strainer, filter, colander, cullendar, skimmer; beaked cruet.

Title: Պարէն
Definition_1: maintenance, food, nourishment, subsistence, victuals, provisions, stores; աւուրն —, daily bread, daily board; զաւուրն հայթհայթել or գտանել —, to gain or earn one's livelihood.

Title: Պարթեւանամ
Definition_1: to take the air, tone or manners of the Parthians, to speak in Parthian.

Title: Պարծ
Definition_1: proudly, haughtily; — շրջիլ, to walk ostentatiously, in a stately manner, to bridle up, to carry the head high, to strut, to strut about, to stalk along.

Title: Պարծանք
Definition_1: vaunt, boast, show, ostentation, pride; glory, splendour; decorum, honour; —նս տալ անձին վասն, to pique or plume oneself on, to glory in; —նս համարիլ, to be proud of, to be boasted or vaunted of, to make it one's boast to.

Title: Պարծիմ
Definition_1: to glory, to vaunt, to boast, to brag, to hector, to praise oneself; to put oneself forward, to aim at winning distinction, to preach up oneself, to make a merit of, to affect haughty airs, to play the braggart, to swagger, to be vain-glorious, proud or vain of; պանծացեալ —, to pride oneself, to look big, to be proud of; պարծիմ գոլ, I have the honour to be...

Title: Պարծուկ
Definition_1: boastful, vaunting, bragging, vain-glorious, self-conceited, swaggering, blustering;

Title: Պարկ
Definition_1: sack, bag, purse, budget, wallet, satchel; — զօրաց, knapsack; — թղթաբերի, courier's bag.

Title: Պարկայ
Definition_1: Fatal Sister, Fate; իլ —ից, the thread of -.

Title: Պարկեշտ
Definition_1: modest, virtuous, chaste, pudic, maidenly, pure; sober, moderate, temperate, frugal; discreet, well-behaved.

Title: Պարկեշտաբան
Definition_1: reserved in one's speech, speaking modestly.

Title: Պարկեշտակրօն
Definition_1: behaving modestly, modest, virtuous, chaste, pure.

Title: Պարկեշտանամ
Definition_1: to be modest, to lead a chaste life, to know how to compose one's demeanour; to be moderate, reserved or circumspect, to abstain, to be sober.

Title: Պարկեշտանոց
Definition_1: place of chastity, monastery, holy retreat.

Title: Պարկեշտասնունդ
Definition_1: well behaved, brought up in modesty, modest, chaste, virtuous.

Title: Պարկեշտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render wise or modest, continent or abstinent, to give an air of decency.

Title: Պարկեշտութիւն
Definition_1: modesty, decency, decent bearing, carriage, demeanour or deportment, honesty; chastity, pudicity, purity, bashfulness; moderation, temperance, abstinence, frugality, sobriety; gravity, stateliness, reverend aspect; պարկեշտութեամբ, cf. Պարկեշտաբար.

Title: Պարկուճ
Definition_1: follicle, shell, pericarp, capsule, pod, husk, cod.

Title: Պարոյր
Definition_1: turn, gyre, round, circle; helix, spire, spiral; show, crowd; —ք, eating and drinking, feasting; — առնուլ, to turn, to redound, to draw back.

Title: Պարունակ
Definition_1: orb, sphere, circle, circuit, orbit; — բան, circumlocution, periphrasis, roundabout phrase;

Title: Պարունակախօսք
Definition_1: Anchoraton, treatise by St. Epiphanius against heresy.

Title: Պարունակեմ
Definition_1: to surround, to encompass, to encircle; to comprehend, to contain, to enclose, to embrace.

Title: Պարուտակիմ
Definition_1: to roll one over another as waves.

Title: Պարուրաձեւ
Definition_2: screw, helix; — աջադարձ, right spired screw; — ձախադարձ, left spired screw.

Title: Պարուրեմ
Definition_1: surround; to envelop, to cover, to conceal, to enclose, to shut up; — or ի բաց —, to strike out, to eliminate, to take away, to retrench, to trim round.

Title: Պարպատեմ
Definition_1: to fill to overflowing; to break, to burst.

Title: Պարպատիմ
Definition_1: to be full to overflowing; to burst, to be broken, burst.

Title: Պարպատումն
Definition_1: filling up, overflowing; rupture, bursting, rent, tear; crash; ուտել զ— որովայնի, to eat to bursting, to burst with eating.

Title: Պարս
Definition_1: sling; swarm of bees; քարինս արձակել —իւ, to sling.

Title: Պարսաւ
Definition_1: blame, reprehension, injury, outrage, infamy, vituperation, criticism, censure;
Definition_2: blamable; — լինել, to be blamed, criticized, carped, animadverted.

Title: Պարսաւադիր
Definition_2: censor, critic, fault-finder, Zoilus; — լինել, cf. Պարսաւեմ; — կայ զամենայնէ, he finds fault with everything.

Title: Պարսաւանք
Definition_1: cf. Պարսաւ; —նս դնել, ընդ —նօք ածել, cf. Պարսաւեմ; —նս տալ ի փառս իւր, to sully one's reputation.

Title: Պարսաւեմ
Definition_1: to blame, to reproach, to find fault with, to carp, to criticize, to vituperate, to animadvert, to condemn, to censure.

Title: Պարսաքարեմ
Definition_1: to sling, to throw or cast stones with a sling.

Title: Պարսեմ
Definition_1: cf. Պարսաքարեմ; to spring up, to burst out, to jump forth.

Title: Պարսկային
Definition_1: Persic; Persian; — հաւ, peacock; — ծոց, the Persian Gulf.

Title: Պարսկանամ
Definition_1: to imitate or become Persian, to adopt the Persian tongue tone or manners.

Title: Պարսպապահ
Definition_1: guard, rounds; — լինել, to guard the wails or fortifications.

Title: Պարսպեմ
Definition_1: to encircle with a wall, to wall; to construct or elevate a rampart, to fortify; to separate by a wall;
Definition_2: to protect, to shelter; — or ի բաց —, to separate, to divide, to send away, to remove, cf. Որոշեմ, cf. Հեռի առնեմ, cf. Մեկուսացուցանեմ.

Title: Պարտ
Definition_1: debt, duty, obligation, engagement; due; active debt, credit; tribute, tax, impost; cause, reason, author;
Definition_2: in debt to, indebted, accountable, responsible; guilty, culpable; — բաշխք, tribute due; —ոյ տէր, creditor;
Definition_3: — է, there must, there ought; it is right, it is necessary; — եւ արժան էր, it was necessary; չէ —, ոչ է —, ոչ է եւ պատշաճ, it must not be, it is not right, just or lawful; չէ — կենաց, he is unworthy of life; — վարկանել, to think proper, to deem expedient; արկանել ընդ —եօք, to cause to run into debt, to get into debt, to be involved in debt; մտանել ընդ —եօք, to run into debt; to lay oneself under obligations; բազում —ս ունել, լի —եօք լինել, to be over head and ears in debt; — անձին համարել, to assume the obligation; հատուցանել զ — ս իւր, to discharge or pay a debt; հատուցանել զ —ս երախտագիտութեան, to discharge a debt of gratitude; հատուցանել զ— ս իւր առ հայրենիս, to pay one's debt to one's country; —առնել, to render culpable, to impute, to accuse; to condemn; cf. Թոյլ; cf. Պատշաճ.

Title: Պարտական
Definition_2: indebted; bond. responsible, obliged; culpable, guilty; due, fit, convenient; — առնել, to cause to run into debt; to oblige; — լինել, to remain debtor, to run into debt; to be obliged or subject; ինքն եղիցի անձին իւրում —, his blood shall be on his own head.

Title: Պարտահատութիւն
Definition_1: redemption, buying out, off or up.

Title: Պարտամասն
Definition_1: instalment, partial payment; — տալ, to give or pay by instalments.

Title: Պարտապահանջութիւն
Definition_1: exacting payment, exaction of a debt.

Title: Պարտապան
Definition_1: debtor; culprit; — լինել, to owe, to be indebted.

Title: Պարտառու
Definition_1: borrowing; guaranteeing payment of another's debt, becoming bail or surety, respondent, answerable.

Title: Պարտասեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to tire out, to weary, to fatigue too much, to harass, to jade, to overweary, to worry, to fag, to exhaust, to debilitate, to extenuate.

Title: Պարտասեցուցիչ
Definition_1: tiring, fatiguing, toilsome, wearisome, grievous, burdensome; overwhelming, crushing.

Title: Պարտասիմ
Definition_1: to grow tired, to be too much fatigued, to tire or weary oneself, to become weak, debilitated, exhausted.

Title: Պարտաւորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to find fault with, to lay the fault on, to accuse, to blame; to render or declare guilty or culpable, to judge, to condemn, to sentence; to plunge one into debt; to oblige, to engage.

Title: Պարտաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be declared guilty, to be culpable, judged, sentenced, condemned; to run into debt; to be bound.

Title: Պարտաւորութիւն
Definition_1: fault, guilt; condemnation; debt; duty; obligation, engagement.

Title: Պարտեմ
Definition_1: to worst, to overcome, to vanquish, to conquer, to subjugate, to subdue; — զչարչարանս, to suffer with fortitude, to bear up against pain or torments.

Title: Պարտիմ
Definition_1: to be conquered, to have the worst of it; յապշութիւն —, to be confounded, astounded, astonished, surprised; պարտեցաւ պատերազմն, a part was subdued.

Title: Պարտէզ
Definition_1: garden; — բանջարոյ, kitchen garden; — պտղոց, fruit —, orchard; տնկաբանական —, botanical -; գծել զձեւ պարտիզի, to lay out a -; մշակել զ —, to garden; cf. Թի.

Title: Պարտիմ
Definition_1: to owe, to contract debts, to become indebted, to be bound; to be obliged, beholden to; ought, must.

Title: Պարտիք
Definition_1: debt; duty; տալ զ —իս, to pay dear for, to smart for, to be punished, to have the smart of.

Title: Պարտոխաթափ
Definition_1: venting secret rancour; — լինել, to give way to one's resentment, to vent one's wrath, to be revenged, to upbraid most outrageously, to slander or attack from private hate.

Title: Պարտութիւն
Definition_1: overthrow, defeat, discomfit; subjection; ի — մատնել, դարձուցանել, արկանել, ընկղմել, to overcome, to conquer, to defeat, to rout, to overthrow, cf. Պարտեմ; ի — մատնիլ, to be vanquished, conquered, defeated, routed, to lose the battle, to be discomfited; — խոստովանել, to succumb, to yield, to give up, to cede, to surrender, to deliver up the arms, to submit; to avow or know one's weakness.

Title: Պարտումն
Definition_1: the act of conquering or of being conquered; cf. Պարտութիւն.

Title: Պարփակեմ
Definition_1: to envelop, to enclose, to encircle, to surround, to shut in; to circumscribe, to comprehend; — թագաւ, to crown, to gird the brows with a crown.

Title: Պեղագոս
Definition_1: pelagus, the ocean, the sea, the mighty deep, the depths of the sea, the world of waters.

Title: Պեղեմ
Definition_1: to hollow, to excavate, to dig, to delve; to sap, to mine, to sink; — գուբս, հորս, to open a trench, to sink a well; զարտասուաց աղբիւրս —, to shed tears.

Title: Պետ
Definition_1: chief, commander; — վարժից, master; — հարց, patriarch; — մարց, abbess; — գաւառաց, prefect, governor.

Title: Պետանամ
Definition_1: to be chief or head, commander, to command, to reign over, to bear sway over.

Title: Պետմոգ
Definition_1: the entire history of the Persian religion.

Title: Պետութիւն
Definition_1: command, rule, reign, sway, domination, dominion, authority, power; government, state, kingdom, empire; —ք, powers ( hierarchy of angels); հոգեւոր —ք, ecclesiastical principalities, bishops, etc.

Title: Պետրոսեան
Definition_1: Peter's, of Peter; —րեան վէմ, St. Peter; St. Peter's successors;
Definition_2: —ք, followers, colleagues or companions of St. Peter.

Title: Պերեւեթեմ
Definition_1: to bedizen, to dress up, *to rig out, to trick out.

Title: Պերեւեթիմ
Definition_1: to dizen or trick oneself out, to adonise.

Title: Պերճ
Definition_1: illustrious, famous, distinguished, celebrated, renowned; elegant, magnificent, excellent; pompous, sumptuous, fine, rich, superb; proud, haughty, stiff and starched;
Definition_2: — or —ս, proudly, haughtily; pompously; — եւ պաճոյճ, richly and magnificently; —ս խօսել, to speak elegantly.

Title: Պերճախօս
Definition_1: eloquent; — լինել, to speak eloquently, fluently.

Title: Պերճանամ
Definition_1: to be proud of, to act the master, to make parade or show of, to strut, to pique oneself on, to tower or rise above, to domineer, to lord over; to abound, to increase.

Title: Պերճանք
Definition_1: boast, boasting, bragging, vaunting; ostentation, pomp, show; gorgeousness, parade, finery.

Title: Պերճացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render illustrious, to exalt, to raise, to glorify.

Title: Պերճութիւն
Definition_1: magnificence, elegance; pride, presumption, arrogance; cf. Պերճանք.

Title: Պէս
Definition_1: as, like; — գունակ, as; — զայս օրինակ, thus, in this manner or way;

Title: Պէսպէս
Definition_1: diverse, varied, different; of divers colours, variegated; precious, excellent.

Title: Պէտ
Definition_1: cf. Պէտք; — առնել, to take care, to care, to do the needful or necessary; — լինել, to be necessary; ո եւ — whoever, whosoever; որչափ —, as much as you will or wish;
Definition_2: — է, it must be, it is necessary; չէ —, it need not be, it is unnecessary; չեն ինչ ինձ — աղօթք, I do not want prayers; ինձ ոչ է — զայնմանէ, I care not about.

Title: Պէտք
Definition_1: necessaries, the necessary, the needful; need, want, necessity, indigence; exigence, necessity; use, employ, business;
Definition_2:
concise narration; — or — մարմնոյ, needs, jobs, going to stool; ի պէտս, for use or service; for; յի՞նչ պէտս, for what use or purpose ? why ?
— կենաց; the necessities of life; — են, — է, ի պէտս է, it must, it is necessary; չեն —, it must not, it is not necessary; յոչինչ պէտս, in vain, uselessly; յանձին ունել, to have care, to be concerned, to reck; պէտս ունել, to want, to need, to be or to stand in want of; ի պէտս գալ, to be useful or serviceable; պէտս առնել, պիտօք վարիլ, to use, to make use for, to avail oneself of; պէտս ունել զիմեքէ, to devote or apply oneself to; զպէտս հոգւոյն հատուցանել or վճարել տեառն, to breathe one's last, to die; պէտս ունիմ or — են ինձ երթալ, I must go; նստիլ ի պէտս, վճարել զպէտս մարմնոյն, to go to stool, to evacuate the bowels.

Title: Պժգալի
Definition_1: abominable, execrable, loathsome, disgusting, hateful, detestable.

Title: Պժգամ
Definition_1: to detest, to hold in aversion, to abhor, to loathe, to hate, to execrate.

Title: Պիծակ
Definition_1: wasp, drone, hornet, ox-fly, gad-fly; բոյն —աց, wasp's nest.

Title: Պիղծ
Definition_1: impure, unclean, profane; filthy, foul, dirty, abominable, detestable, execrable; — առնել, cf. Պղծեմ.

Title: Պինդ
Definition_1: firm, steady; hard, solid, strong, fast, compact, close, stiff; constant, immovable, steadfast, firm, infrangible, unshaken;
Definition_2: — պնդով, strongly, steadily; — կալ, to hold fast, to preserve, to persist; — ունել, to hold firmly to, to retain.

Title: Պիսակ
Definition_1: spotted, speckled, motley, dapple; cf. Բորոտ;

Title: Պիտակ
Definition_1: false, improper, abusive, adventitious, extrinsic; degenerate, bastard;
Definition_2: note, letter, bill, card; — ի պարտուց, innocent, guiltless, faultless.

Title: Պիտակաբար
Definition_1: abusively, falsely, improperly; catachrestically; — վարիլ, to abuse, to use improperly.

Title: Պիտականունութիւն
Definition_1: catachresis; պիտականունութեամբ, by name only, abusively.

Title: Պիտանամ
Definition_1: to want, to be in want of; to be necessary, useful.

Title: Պիտանանամ
Definition_1: cf. Պիտանամ ;to use, to employ, to make use of.

Title: Պիտանացու
Definition_1: necessary, useful, advantageous; —ք, necessaries, the needful; ոչ ումեք է —, it is useful to no one; ոչ եւս իմիք է —, it is no longer good for anything.

Title: Պիտանացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render useful, to make profitable.

Title: Պիտանի
Definition_1: useful, profitable, advantageous, necessary; good, excellent.

Title: Պիտառեմ
Definition_1: to deliver oracles, to foretell, to predict; to use, to make use of.

Title: Պիտառութիւն
Definition_1: word, oracle, prediction; testimony, witness; use, employ; want, necessity; work; writing, useful treatise.

Title: Պիտիմ
Definition_1: one must, it is necessary; սակաւիկ ինչ պիտեցաւ, it was within a hair's breadth of.

Title: Պիտոյ
Definition_1: necessary; suitable; — է, cf. Պիտիմ; it is becoming, proper, suitable; զի՞ եւս — են մեզ վկայք, what need have we of witnesses ?

Title: Պիտոյք
Definition_1: want, indigence, necessity; the needful; cf. Պէտք.

Title: *Պլոկեմ
Definition_1: to strip, to despoil; to skin.

Title: Պղերգումն
Definition_1: idleness, laziness, supineness, negligence; ի — հատանիլ, to abandon oneself to sloth, to live in idleness.

Title: Պղինձ
Definition_1: copper; coppercoin; — ծխեալ, yellow copper, brass, bronze, tombac; — հրաքարային, copper pyrites, yellow copper-ore; — երփներանգ, variegated copper-ore, phillipsite.

Title: Պղծաբան
Definition_1: turpiloquent, foulmouthed, nasty, ribald, filthy, obscene, blaspheming, cursing.

Title: Պղծագործ
Definition_1: doing shameful or filthy things, immodest, impure, dirty, obscene, lascivious.

Title: Պղծագործութիւն
Definition_1: filthy action, impurity, lewdness, filthiness, obscenity.

Title: Պղծալից
Definition_1: full of filth, sunk in nastiness, dirty, impure, lewd.

Title: Պղծասէր
Definition_1: given to filthiness, immodest, impudic, impure.

Title: Պղծեմ
Definition_1: to soil, to contaminate, to stain, to spot; to profane, to pollute, to abuse; to abhor, to detest, to execrate; — զկոյս, to violate, to dishonour.

Title: Պղծութիւն
Definition_1: contamination, stain, filth, obscenity, lewdness, impurity, debauchery; profanation, pollution; abomination, execration; — կուսի, violation, rape; ի — մատնել զանձն, to prostitute oneself.

Title: Պղնձակուռ պղնձակռածոյ
Definition_1: cast in copper or in bronze.

Title: Պղնձահատք
Definition_1: copper-mine; exile; ի —հատս տալ, to exile, to condemn to the copper-mines.

Title: Պղնձանամ
Definition_1: to be coppered, changed into bronze.

Title: Պղպեղ
Definition_1: pepper; — լոսեալ, ground or pounded -; համեմել —աւ, to -.

Title: Պղպջակ
Definition_1: air-bubble or water-bubble, globule, froath, foam.

Title: Պղպջակեմ
Definition_1: to bubble up, to boil fast, to froth; to simmer, to be in ebullition.

Title: Պղտորական
Definition_1: not clear or pure; (ջուր) turbid, troubled, muddy; (գինի) thick; (օդ) obscure, misty, foggy, gloomy;

Title: Պղտորեմ
Definition_1: to muddy, to disturb, to make turbid, to mix, to mingle; to thicken;
Definition_2: to disturb, to discompose, to cause trouble, to perplex, to confound, to perturb.

Title: Պղտորիմ
Definition_1: to grow turbid, muddy or thick;
Definition_2: to become confused, disconcerted, to be unsettled, in disorder; պղտորի երկին, it is getting overcast; there will be a storm presently; յականէ աղբերն պղտորեալ է ջուր նորա, the fish begins to stink at the head.

Title: Պճեղն
Definition_1: instep, ankle, ankle-bone; foot; cf. Խստոր.

Title: *Պճկեմ
Definition_1: to pull out or to pieces hairs, feathers, flowers and similar; cf. Փեճեկեմ.

Title: Պճնագեղիմ
Definition_1: to bedeck or ornament oneself gaily.

Title: Պճնասէր
Definition_1: smart, spruce, coquettish, elegant, fond of finery, of dress, flaunting, gaudy, beamish, spanking, flaring; — լինել, to love finery, to dress oneself finely, to flaunt about fine and tawdry.

Title: Պճնեմ
Definition_1: to embellish, to bedeck, to adorn, to beautify, to set off, to trim studiously, to bedizen, to trick out.

Title: Պճնիմ
Definition_1: to bedizen oneself with coquetry and too great attention to effect, with studied neatness.

Title: Պճնող
Definition_1: coquettish, foppish, spruce, dandy; cf. Պճնասէր.

Title: Պճռեմ
Definition_1: cf. Պտռեմ; to play on the lyre; զյօնս ի վեր —, to raise the brows in sign of dissent.

Title: Պնակ
Definition_1: dish; bowl, porringer, wooden bowl; մխել զձեռն ի — ընդ ումեք, to eat together, at the same table, to be a table-companion.

Title: Պնակիտ
Definition_1: writing-tablet, table-book; — ծոցոյ, tables, memorandum-book; — նկարչի, painter's pallet; — գրաշարի, galley, composing galley, pan.

Title: Պնդագոյն
Definition_1: firmly, tightly, strongly; steadily, steadfastly; constantly, earnestly, diligently; — չարախօսէին զինէն, they stood and vehemently accused me.

Title: Պնդակազմ
Definition_1: strong, robust; brave, daring, gallant, courageous, manful; hard, firm, solid, steady.

Title: Պնդակազմեմ
Definition_1: to give heart, to encourage, to fortify; to consolidate, to strengthen.

Title: Պնդակազմութիւն
Definition_1: robustness, stoutness, vigour; consistence, density, solidity, hardness.

Title: Պնդակապ
Definition_1: strongly tied or bound, firm, steady.

Title: Պնդանամ
Definition_1: to grow stronger, to become hard or tough, to harden, to be strengthened.

Title: Պնդացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to strengthen, to affirm, to consolidate, to harden, to stiffen; — զորովայն, to bind, to constipate.

Title: Պնդեմ
Definition_1: to affirm, to fortify, to consolidate, to confirm, to strengthen; to tighten, to strain, to restrain, to draw closer, to bind faster, to tie tight; to constrain, to enforce, to press; to invigorate, to corroborate, to encourage, to inspirit, to remove one's fear; to persist, to insist, to urge, to be bent upon, to pretend, to maintain; — զմէջ or գօտի ընդ մէջ, to gird up one's loins; to arm or prepare oneself; — զանձն, to refrain oneself, to keep with in bounds, cf. Ժուժկալեմ; — զանձն ընդդէմ, to provide against; — զհաւատս, to confirm the faith.

Title: Պնդիմ
Definition_1: to harden, to grow tough; to insist, to sustain, to be obstinate; to pretend; to run, to go quick; cf. Զկնի; cf. Զհետ; ի պահս —, to be rigorous in fasting.

Title: Պնդութիւն
Definition_1: consistence, solidity, fixity, hardness, density, consolidation; steadiness, firmness, constancy; stiffness, severity, obstinacy; strength, vigour; sustained, unflagging or continued effort, endeavour, care, solicitude, diligence; — որովայնի, constipation, costiveness; պահք պնդութեան, rigorous fasting; բազում, մեծաւ or փութոյ պնդութեամբ, carefully, diligently, eagerly, cordially, earnestly.

Title: Պշնում
Definition_1: to gaze, to stare, to look at fixedly, to fasten or fix one's eyes upon, to look upon attentively, to consider, to observe, to contemplate; cf. Հայիմ.

Title: Պշուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to look at fixedly or attentively, to cause to rivet one's gaze on.

Title: Պշրիմ
Definition_1: to grow dim, to see dimly.

Title: Պոմպիլոս
Definition_1: pompilus, nautilus, a species of remora.

Title: Պոյտն
Definition_1: pot, earthen or metal pot, broth-pot;

Title: Պոնդեմ
Definition_1: to fillip, to give a fillip.

Title: Պոնտոս
Definition_2: Pontus, the Euxine or Black sea.

Title: Պոռնիկ
Definition_1: fornicator; letcher, whore-monger; adulterer; — կին, prostitute, abandoned or debauched woman, harlot, street-walker, courtesan, whore, strumpet, wench, trull; adulteress.

Title: Պոռնկեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to commit fornication, to prostitute, to abandon to prostitution;
Definition_2: to induce to idolatry, to idolize.

Title: Պոռնկիմ
Definition_1: to commit fornication, to abandon oneself to prostitution, to lewdness, to be prostituted; to commit adultery;

Title: Պոռոտող
Definition_1: boastful, bragging, vaunting; emphatic; speaking aloud, crying, bawling, brawling, noisy, squalling;

Title: Պորոմիմ
Definition_1: to contract the tongue on tasting acids.

Title: Պորտ
Definition_1: navel, umbilicus; belly; middle, centre; — երկրի, mount, mountain; — կամարաց, key-stone of an arch;
Definition_2: — ի վեր, —յորսայս, supinely, with one's face upward; —ոյ ծառայ, slave to one's belly, gourmand, *greedy-gut.

Title: Պորփիւրականութիւն
Definition_1: porphyrisation, grinding with a muller, pulverization.

Title: Պուետեմ
Definition_1: to versify, to poetize, to make or write poetry.

Title: Պուղեմ
Definition_1: to push, to repulse, to remove, to disperse, to scatter about.

Title: Պուտնարդ
Definition_1: large pot or kettle, copper, boiler; basin, laver.

Title: Պչրանք
Definition_1: affectation, studied elegance, finery; primness, prim ways, smirking, mincing air, simpering, alluring manners, enticing looks or ways, coquetry; prudery, prudishness; peevish temper, disdainful airs, grimaces; cf. Ընդվայրայօն; ընդ —նս գալ, cf. Պչրեմ, cf. Պչրիմ.

Title: Պչրիմ
Definition_1: to give oneself affected ways, to simper, to be dainty, to mince, to be disdainful, overnice, to play the prude; to adonize, to be studiously elegant, to be dandy or foppish; to be well dressed, very spruce.

Title: Պչրող
Definition_1: affected, simpering, coquettish, prudish, lackadaisical, grinning; finical.

Title: Պռեստեր
Definition_1: prester, hot and scorching wind, typhoon.

Title: Պռուգեմ
Definition_1: to portion, to give a portion, to endow.

Title: Պռստեմ
Definition_1: to be cross, illtempered, to make a wry face, to turn up one's nose, to be disdainful; յունօք —, cf. Յօն.

Title: Պսակ
Definition_1: crown, diadem; crown, prize, premium, reward; circle, coping, top, crowning, brim, frame, edge, cornice, parapet, battlement; coronation, achievement, accomplishment; nuptials, espousals, marriage, nuptial blessing; — դպրաց, tonsure, shaven crown; — ծաղկեայ, wreath, garland, chaplet; — ի փշոյ, crown of thorns; սրբոց, halo, gory, nimbus; — կուսին, chaplet, beads, string of beads; — արեգական, halo around the sun; — տարւոյ, the course of the year; — պարծանաց, փառաց, crown of honour, of glory; հիւսել —, to weave a garland or chaplet; — դնել ումեք, to marry.

Title: Պսակադրեմ
Definition_1: to marry, to give the nuptial blessing.

Title: Պսակակից
Definition_2: sharer in the crown, in empire.

Title: Պսակահամբար
Definition_1: place where prizes are kept and distributed.

Title: Պսակեմ
Definition_1: to crown, to wreath; to reward, to recompense; to give the nuptial blessing, to marry;
Definition_2: to crown, to achieve, to accomplish.

Title: Պսակիմ
Definition_1: to be crowned; to be married;

Title: Պտեղն
Definition_1: pinch; — մի պնչադեղոյ, a pinch of snuff.

Title: Պտխիմ
Definition_1: to give or addict oneself to, to be fully occupied, immersed in.

Title: Պտկիմ
Definition_1: to bud, to shoot forth buds, to shoot, to sprout, to germinate.

Title: Պտղաբեր
Definition_1: bearing or producing fruit, fructiferous; productive, fruitful, fructuous, fertile; offering; — ծառ, fruit-tree.

Title: Պտղաբերիմ
Definition_1: to fructify, to bear fruit, to bring forth, to produce; to offer; to render fertile; to profit.

Title: Պտղալից
Definition_1: full of or loaded with fruits, rich, fertile, prolific.

Title: Պտղախայծ
Definition_1: ripe, dark or deep coloured, spotted, speckled.

Title: Պտղախայծութիւն
Definition_1: the beginning to ripen, dark or deep colour of fruits.

Title: Պտղաւէտեմ
Definition_1: to render fruitful, to fecundate, to fertilize.

Title: Պտոյտք
Definition_1: eddy, whirlpool, vortex; — հողմոց, whirlwind, hurricane, squall, storm; — գլխոյ, vertigo, giddiness, dizzines, swimming in the head; — առնուլ, to turn or whirl round and round, to eddy.

Title: Պտուկ
Definition_1: button, bud, eye; nipple; cf. Պուտուկ; պտկունք կովու, ոչխարի, udder, dug, teat.

Title: Պտուղ
Definition_2: fruit, produce, effect, result; tip of finger; — աչաց, pupil, eye-ball, apple of the eye; չորս — խունք, four grains of incense; դալար, կանաչ, վաղահաս, հասուն, չոր, փտեալ —, fresh, green or unripe, premature, ripe, dried, rotten fruit; կեղեւ պտղոց, peel, paring; կեղեւել զ—ս, to pare, to peel; to decorticate, to strip; — տալ, բերել, to bear, to yield, to produce fruits; — քաղել, to gather, to pluck, to pick fruit;
Definition_3: to reap the fruit of, to derive benefit from.

Title: Պտուտակ
Definition_1: screw; windlass, hand winch; wheel and axle; *whirligig; — խոր or — մայր, hollow or female screw; screw-box, nut; — մանրաչափական, micrometrical screw; — վերակոչ, nut-screw; — օդահան, ventilating screw; — արքիմեդեայ, Archimedes' screw, spiral pump; — հոլանտացի, Dutch screw-pump; — անվախճան or — անեզր, endless or perpetual screw, worm, creeper, conveyer.

Title: Պտուտանամ
Definition_1: to turn, to twist; cf. Թոթովեմ.

Title: Պտուտիմ
Definition_1: to turn, to veer, to whirl round.

Title: Պտուտկեմ
Definition_1: cf. Պտուտեմ; to screw, to screw down or on;
Definition_2: to feel giddy, dizzy, to have a swimming in the head.

Title: Պտռեմ
Definition_1: to excavate, to hollow or dig out; to seek for, to investigate.

Title: Պտսկեմ
Definition_1: to sport, to dance, to leap as children in the lap, to coax, to fondle, to caress; to sport or play as small animals.

Title: Պրակ
Definition_1: wood, thicket, grove, bush; work, writing; chapter, paragraph or article; — թղթոյ, ream of paper; — կտաւոց, չուխայից, entire piece of linen or woollen cloth, bale, pack; —ք ուսման, lesson;
Definition_2: acts; —ք առաքելոց, the Acts of the Apostles.

Title: Պրակագեղ
Definition_1: wooded, planted with trees, bushy, leafy.

Title: Պրետոր
Definition_1: praetor; praetorium, judgment seat or hall; General's tent.

Title: Պրծանիմ
Definition_1: to escape, to evade, to break, slip or get away or off; — յուշոյ, to escape the memory, to be forgotten; — ի ձեռաց, to escape from, to slip from between the fingers, to be lost.

Title: Պրծեմ
Definition_1: to save, to deliver, to rescue.

Title: Պրկեմ
Definition_1: to bind, to strain, to tighten, to tie tight, to pinion; to stretch, to lengthen out; cf. Յօն.

Title: Պրօն
Definition_1: carded wool or goat's hair; lint, scraped linen.

Title: Պօղոսեան
Definition_1: follower of St. Paul; —ք, St. Paul's companions.

Title: <letter>Ջ</letter> (tché)
Definition_1: the twenty seventh letter of the alphabet & the twenty first of the consonants; nine hundred, nine hundredth; It is sometimes confounded with the letters չ & ճ, as : խնջոյք — խնճոյք, ջղջիկան — չղջիկան.

Title: Ջախեմ
Definition_1: to crush, to crack, to break, to dash or break to pieces, to bruise, to smash.

Title: Ջախջախանք
Definition_1: breaking up, cutting into small pieces; rout, defeat, havoc, carnage.

Title: Ջախջախեմ
Definition_1: to crush or breakup totally, to pound, to triturate.

Title: Ջահ
Definition_1: light, torch, flambeau, link; candelabra, chandelier;
Definition_2: facula, bright spot on the sun.

Title: Ջահաբորբոք
Definition_1: burning or shining like a torch.

Title: Ջահազգեաց
Definition_1: bearing or carrying light, luminous, splendid.

Title: Ջահակիր
Definition_1: carrying a lamp or a torch.

Title: Ջահացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to shine like a torch, to irradiate.

Title: Ջահաւորեմ
Definition_1: to illuminate, to enlighten, to render luminous.

Title: Ջահափայլ
Definition_1: bright as a torch-light, blazing, brilliant, refulgent.

Title: Ջահեմ
Definition_1: to shine like a torch, to blaze, to flash, to glitter.

Title: Ջամբեմ
Definition_1: to nourish, to give to eat or to suck, to feed, to suckle, to foster, to rear.

Title: Ջայլ
Definition_1: multitude, crowd, quantity; company of mourners or weepers; repeated bursts of weeping, wailing.

Title: Ջան
Definition_1: diligence, care, study, work; զուր —, labour lost, labour in vain; — դնել, տանել, յանձին ունել cf. Ջանամ.

Title: Ջանակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to study, to labour in company.

Title: Ջանահնար լինիմ
Definition_1: to endeavour, to strive, to strive hard, to make every efforts, strenuous attempts, to try all means, to exhaust oneself with exertion.

Title: Ջանամ
Definition_1: to exert oneself, to endeavour, to study, to be diligent, to hasten, to take care, to do one's possible; to take pains, to labour, to weary, to exhaust.

Title: Ջանասէր
Definition_1: diligent, active, careful, laborious, painstaking, studious, assiduous, hardworking.

Title: Ջանասիրութիւն
Definition_1: diligence, care, close application, assiduity, steadiness, painstaking.

Title: Ջանացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause exertion, to render diligent, to constrain, to give impulsion to, to push forward, to urge on, to spur on.

Title: Ջատագով
Definition_1: apologist, advocate, defender, protector, patron; — լինել՝ կալ՝ մտանել cf. Ջատագովեմ.

Title: Ջատագովեմ
Definition_1: to defend, to sustain, to plead, to excuse, to justify; — զանձն, to defend, justify or excuse oneself.

Title: Ջատագովութիւն
Definition_1: apology, defence, protection, justification, excuse, pleading.

Title: Ջատուկ
Definition_1: conjurer, sorcerer, wizard; divineress, sorceress, witch, enchantress;

Title: Ջարդեմ
Definition_1: to cut or break in pieces, to undo, to break, to shatter, to smash; to kill.

Title: Ջեռանիմ
Definition_1: cf. Ջեռնում, cf. Ջերանիմ; — ախտիւ, to be afflicted with disease, to fall sick, ill.

Title: Ջեռնում
Definition_1: to get warm, to warm oneself, to be warmed;
Definition_2: to burn, to grow warm, hot, angry or excited, to chafe; — յարեւու, to bask in the sun; ջեռեալ նստել ի վերայ ձուոց, to sit on eggs, to sit brooding, to hatch; իբրեւ արեւն ջեռնոյր, when the sun spread his beneficent heat.

Title: Ջեռուցանեմ
Definition_1: to warm, to heat, to make hot or warm; to boil; կարի իմն —, to overheat; — զանկողին, to warm a bed.

Title: Ջեռուցիչ
Definition_2: copper, kettle, boiler, pipkin; chaffing-dish; — անկողնոյ, warming-pan.

Title: Ջերանիմ
Definition_1: to warm oneself, to get warm; to catch a fever, to fall sick; to burn, to be excited, inflamed, infuriate; — յախտս, to plunge into vice; առ պատկերս կռոց —, to give oneself up to idolatry.

Title: Ջերաջերմ
Definition_1: cf. Ջերմաջերմ; — ընդերք, palpitating entrails; — արիւն, reeking blood.

Title: Ջերմ
Definition_2: ardent, burning, fervid, fiery, passionate; tender, affectionate;
Definition_3: heat, warmth; hot viands; — է, it is warm; cf. Ջերմն.

Title: Ջերմակիծ
Definition_1: burning, ardent; — առնել, to burn, cf. Կիզում, cf. Տոչորեմ.

Title: Ջերմանցիկ
Definition_1: diathermal, diathermanous, possessing free permeability to heat.

Title: Ջերմաչափ
Definition_1: thermometer; — բնական, natural -; — բուսական, vegetable -; — օդեզէն, air — or atmospherical -; — ալքոհլեան, spirit -; — տարբերական, differential —; — մետաղական, metallic —; — ծայրագոյն ջերմութեան կամ ցրտութիւն, maximum — & minimum —, self-registering —, register —; — հարիւրամասն —, centigrade -; — Ռէօմիւրի, Ֆարէնհայթի, Reaumur's —, Fahrenheit's —; —ն բարձրացաւ՝ էջ մի աստիճան, the — has ascended, has fallen one degree; —ն զրոյէն մի աստիճան վար՝ վեր է, the — is one degree ahove or below zero.

Title: Ջերմաջերմ
Definition_1: very hot, ardent, burning, boiling; warm, foil of warmth, fervent, impassioned, affectionate, very tender;
Definition_2: all hot, piping hot; quite fresh or new; warmly, ardently, eagerly, fervently.

Title: Ջերմաջուրք
Definition_1: warm mineral waters or springs, thermse, baths.

Title: Ջերմն
Definition_1: fever; heat; — եթող զիս եւ կալաւ զնա, the fever left me & has seized him; կերստին կալաւ զիս —, my fever has returned.

Title: Ջերմութիւն
Definition_1: heat, warmth; caloric; fever, fever-heat; calefaction, warming; temperature; թագուն՝ ճառագայթեալ՝ տեսակարար —, latent, radiant, specific heat; — առաձգութեան կամ գոլորշացման, steam-generating heat; — սփռեալ or ցրեալ, diffused heat; — կեդրոնական, central heat.

Title: Ջերմուկք
Definition_1: cf. Ջերմաջուրք; երթալ ի ջերմուկս, to go to a watering-place, to go to the baths.

Title: Ջիլ
Definition_2: nerve, sinews, force, vigour; — տեսաբանական, optic nerve; լուծանիլ ջղաց, to become enervated; զ—ս հարկանել ուրուք, to shock a person's nerves, to frighten, to terrify;
Definition_3: զ—ս հատանել ուրուք, <ab>fig.</ab> to hurt a person's nerves, to weaken, to enervate.

Title: Ջլաձիգ
Definition_1: convulsive; — լինել, to have the nerves strung, to have fits.

Title: Ջլապինդ
Definition_1: nervous, vigorous, sinewy, robust, strong; — առնել, to give strength to, to fortify the nerves, to render robust.

Title: Ջլատեմ
Definition_1: to enervate, to shock the nerves, to unnerve, to weaken.

Title: Ջլացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to nerve, to strengthen the nerves, to corroborate, to invigorate.

Title: Ջնեմ
Definition_1: to heat, to cudgel, to cane, to whip.

Title: Ջնթեմ
Definition_1: to collect, to gather; to win at play.

Title: Ջնջեմ
Definition_1: to clean, to dust, to purge, to wipe; to efface, to scratch out, to erase, to cancel, to expunge; to abolish, to annul; to destroy, to undo, to suppress; to extirpate, to exterminate; — զգաչինս, to cancel, to annul, to make void a contract.

Title: Ջնջոց
Definition_2: purification; cure, recovery; — առնել, to purify, to consecrate, to sacrifice.

Title: Ջնջումն
Definition_1: abstersion, cleaning; effacing, erasure; abolition, abrogation, cassation; suppression; extinction, extirpation, extermination; — դտշանց, cancelling, annulling of contracts.

Title: Ջոլիր
Definition_1: troop, band, company, flock, group; —ս տալ, առնուլ, to enrol soldiers, to levy troops; —ս տողել, to collect a multitude, to raise a troop; —ս ջախջախս ջարդոցաց հասուցանել, to make a slaughter.

Title: Ջոլորեմ
Definition_1: to assemble troops, to muster, to gather in crowds, to call together.

Title: Ջոլորիմ
Definition_1: to flock together, to form groups, to gather together, to assemble.

Title: Ջոկ
Definition_1: cf. Ջոլիր; split hair; — առ —, cf. Ջոլրաբար; —ս առնել, to make a distinction or difference; to sow division.

Title: *Ջոկեմ
Definition_1: to distinguish, to separate, to detach.

Title: Ջովանամ
Definition_1: to become rank, thick, to flourish, to shoot forth, to grow.

Title: Ջորի
Definition_1: mule, he-mule; մատակ —, mule, she-mule; մտրուկ ջորւոյ, mule colt.

Title: Ջութակ
Definition_1: violin, fiddle; violoncello; — հարկանել, to play the violin or fiddle.

Title: Ջուր
Definition_2: liquid, watery; օրհնեալ —, holy water; չած ջրոյ, water-god; անոյշ, ըմպելի, պաղ or ղով, գաղջ, տաք, եռացեալ, հանքային, ծծմբային, աղային —, good or portable, drinkable, cold or fresh, tepid, hot, boiling, thermal, sulphurous, saline water; — մսոյ, broth, cf. Արգանակ; գաւաթ մի, դոյլ մի —, a glass, a bucket or pail of water; դոյլ մի լի —, a pailful of water; ըստ — եւ ըստ ցամաք, by sea & land; տեղատութիւն եւ մակընթացութիւն ջուրց, tide, flux reflux, & reflux, ebb & flow; երթալ զջրոյ, to go to fetch water; — հանել, to draw water; — ըմպել, to drink water; — հեղուլ, թափել, առնել —, to make water, to piss, to urine; — տալ, to water, to sprinkle; to water, to give to drink to; եռացուցանել զ—, to warm, to boil water; — արկանել ձեռաց ուրուք, to pour water on a person's hands; լաւ է — հորի քան զգինի յոռի, pure water is better than bad wine; cf. Թակարդ, cf. Ըմպեմ.

Title: Ջրաբաշխ
Definition_1: pond, pool; hydraulicist; distributor or guardian of the water for irrigation in the vineyards.

Title: Ջրաբուղխ
Definition_1: springing, gushing or spouting out water, watery.

Title: Ջրաթաթախ
Definition_1: soaked or wet through with water; — լինել, to be drenched or wet to the skin;

Title: Ջրալից
Definition_3: — փոշատնկութիւն, hydrocele.

Title: Ջրախառնեմ
Definition_1: to mix with water, to dilute; — — զգինի, զկաթն, to adulterate with water (wine, milk, &c); — խողխող, cf. Ջրահեղձ.

Title: Ջրախոտ
Definition_1: nasturtium indicum, indian cress, aeriviola, cardamindum.

Title: Ջրակոյտ
Definition_1: body, mass or puddle of water, plash, pool;
Definition_2: reach; — ստորին, down or lower watercourse; — վերին, upper water-course.

Title: Ջրահեղձ
Definition_1: drowned; — առմել, to drown; — լինել (ակամայ), to be drowned; (կամաւոր) to drown oneself.

Title: Ջրանամ
Definition_1: to become aqueous, watery; to liquefy.

Title: Ջրապատ
Definition_1: surrounded or covered with water, flooded, inundated.

Title: Ջրասէր
Definition_1: fond of water, loving water, aquatic.

Title: Ջրասոյզ
Definition_1: plunged into water, immersed; drowned; — զանգակ, diving-bell; — առնել, to plunge into water, to sink, to submerge; — լինել, to be submerged, drowned.

Title: Ջրարբ
Definition_3: leakage, leaking.

Title: Ջրարբի
Definition_1: irrigated, full of water; aquatic; pervious, spungy.

Title: Ջրացիր
Definition_1: wet, damp, moist, humid; cf. Ջրացան.

Title: Ջրափակ
Definition_1: surrounded by water, by the sea.

Title: Ջրգողիմ
Definition_1: to suffer from, to be ill of the dropsy, to become or grow dropsical.

Title: Ջրգողութիւն
Definition_1: dropsy; — որովայնի, ascites, common dropsy; — գլխոյ, hydrocephalus; - աչաց, hydrophthalmia; — պորաց, hydrophalus; — սրտակրանաց, hydrocardy; — փամփշափ, hydrocele; — կրծից, hydrothorax; — ականջաց, hydrotite.

Title: Ջրդիմ
Definition_1: to strive, try or assiduously endeavour.

Title: Ջրեմ
Definition_1: to destroy, to efface; to cancel, to expiate, to absolve; to water.

Title: Ջրըմպութիւն
Definition_1: drinking water only, teetotalism; watering; water-drinking.

Title: Ջրընկէց
Definition_1: humid, damp, swampy, marshy, fenny; — տեղի, marshy place.

Title: Ջրթափեմ
Definition_2: to be of age, to attain puberty, to be pubescent, marriageable.

Title: Ջրհան
Definition_2: pump; — բազագրեալ, ձգիչ եւ ճնշիչ, lift & force —, sucking & forcing —, double-acting -; — շնչող, sucking, lifting or drawing -; — մղիչ, forcincing — set; — հրդեհի, steam —, engine, fire-engine; — կեդրոնախոյս զօրութեամբ, centrifugal -; — կրելի, portable fire-engine; — հոլովական, rotatory, rotary -; — սնուցիչ, feed —; — օդային, air —, pneumatic —.

Title: Ջրհեղ
Definition_1: urine; —ի աման, bladder, vesicle; — մարմին, cf. Ջրահեղ՞՞՞անդամ.

Title: Ջրհոր
Definition_1: well; cistern; — արգեղեան, Artesian-well; — ծծիչ, absorbing or draining well, bog, cesspool.

Title: Ջրմխեմ
Definition_1: to plunge into water, to submerge, to drown;

Title: Ջրմխիմ
Definition_1: to be plunged into water, submerged;
Definition_2: — նաւու, to founder, to go down, to sink.

Title: Ջրշեղջ
Definition_1: cistern, tank; pond; broad pool, lake.

Title: Ջրփչեմ
Definition_1: to sprinkle, to spurt water over with the mouth.

Title: Ջրօրհնէք
Definition_1: benediction of the waters (on the Epiphany).

Title: <letter>Ռ</letter> (ra)
Definition_1: the twenty eighth letter of the alphabet and the twenty second of the consonants; thousand, thousandth; It is sometimes confounded with the letter ր; When used as an initial it generally indicates foreign words.

Title: Ռազմ
Definition_1: battle-array, rank, line, order; battle, war; — առնել, կարգել զ—ն, to marshal, to array; — դնել, ի — մտանել, to make war, to fight, to assail; հատանել զ— պարւուց զօրաց, to put to rout, to disperse, to defeat, to discomfit.

Title: Ռահ
Definition_1: way, road; — գործել, հորդել, to travel, to go on a journey.

Title: Ռամղարկի արուեստ
Definition_1: cabalistic or magical note or writing.

Title: Ռամիկ
Definition_1: vulgar, low, plebeian, popular, common, vile, trivial;
Definition_2: the vulgar, the common people, lower orders; տգէտ —ն, the ignorant mob.

Title: Ռայ
Definition_1: ensign of victory; —ք, pomp, show, luxury.

Title: Ռաքիա
Definition_1: sound of breakers on the shore; reflux, ebb.

Title: Ռետին
Definition_1: resin, rosin, cedar-resin, colophony; — բեւեկն, pine-resin; — կենաց, balm of life.

Title: Ռնգախօսեմ
Definition_1: to snuffle, to speak through the nose.

Title: Ռոճիկ
Definition_1: appointment, salary, pension, pay, hire, wages; maintenance.

Title: Ռումբ
Definition_1: shell, bomb, grenade; —ս արձակել, to shell, to fire shells, to shoot bombs.

Title: <letter>Ս</letter> (sé)
Definition_1: the twenty ninth letter of the alphabet and the twenty third of the consonants; two thousand, two thousandth.

Title: Սա
Complement: սորա, սմա, սովաւ, սոքա, սոցա, սոքօք, սայք, սայց
Definition_1: this, that; սոյն սա, this one, he himself; սա է, it is he, that is to say; սա աւասիկ, however, yet, still.

Title: Սագ
Definition_1: goose; արու —, gander; ձագ —ի, gosling; — վայրի, gannet, soland goose, anser bassanus; — շչէ, the goose cackles.

Title: Սադրանք
Definition_1: instigation, suggestion, excitation, stirring up, solicitation, persuasion; counsel.

Title: Սադրեմ
Definition_1: to persuade, to advise, to excite, to suggest, to insinuate, to stir up, to provoke, to induce; to help, to contribute; to be the means of, to procure; to contrive, to invent, to form; to betray, to give up, to deliver.

Title: Սաթ
Definition_1: electrum, amber, yellow amber; սեւ —, black amber.

Title: Սալ
Definition_1: anvil; slab, paving or flag stone; sheet of metal, plate.

Title: Սալակապ
Definition_1: paved; — առնել, to pave, to flag.

Title: Սալանամ
Definition_1: to petrify, to become stone, to harden into stone.

Title: Սալարիմ
Definition_1: to take refuge, to hide oneself.

Title: Սալոր
Definition_1: plum; — դամասկեան, damson; — վայրենի, sloe, wild plum; — չոր, prune, dried plum, French plum; օշարակ ի —ոյ, plumwine.

Title: *Սալպատոր
Definition_1: ishghembe-dolmassi, (minced meat and rice wrapped in pieces of tripe).

Title: Սակ
Definition_1:
reckoning, measure, account, number; condition, position, state, manner; — արկանել ընդ ումեք, to come to terms about the price, to bargain for, to contract, to strike a bargain for, to stipulate, to come to an agreement, to settle; եւ որ ի սոցին —ի, and of other similar ones; եւ որ այլ եւս սոցին —ի իրք, and of other like things; որոց —ի են, among whom are; եւ որ սոցին —ի են, and so forth, and so on, et caetera; ո՞չ դահեկանի միոջ — արկեր ընդ իս, didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
impost, rate, duty, tax, imposition, tribute; order; convention, contract, agreement; budget; tariff.

Title: Սակայն
Definition_1: but, notwithstanding, nevertheless, however, yet, always, besides, moreover.

Title: Սակաւ
Definition_1: few in number, inconsiderable, moderate, small, slender;
Definition_2: somewhat, less; —, առ —, little by little, by degrees, by little and little, insensibly; — անգամ, — երբեք, rarely, seldom; ոչ —, many, much, not less; — ինչ, —ս, առ — մի, few, not very, somewhat, rather, a little, cf. Փոքր մի, cf. Փոքր ինչ, cf. Խուն մի; առ — մի, ի — ժամանակի, յետ —ուց, shortly, in a short time, for a moment; յետ — միոյ, shortly after; —ուք, with few attendants; in few words, briefly, in short; ոչ —ք ի նոցանէ, many of them; ճաշակեցի — մի մեղր, I ate some or a little honey; մարթի եւ ի —էն՝ — տալ, a little may be offered even of a little; cf. Շատանամ.

Title: Սակաւաբան
Definition_1: curt, dry, brief, concise in speaking, pauciloquent.

Title: Սակաւաբանութիւն
Definition_1: concise discourse, brevity of speech, pauciloquy.

Title: Սակաւախօս
Definition_1: cf. Սակաւաբան; — լինել, to speak but little, to be taciturn.

Title: Սակաւակեցութիւն
Definition_1: living but a short time, short life.

Title: Սակաւաձեռն
Definition_1: of little strength, few in number, inconsiderable, accompanied by but few people;
Definition_2: thinly attended; — գունդ, a handful of soldiers.

Title: Սակաւանամ
Definition_1: to lessen, to grow less, to diminish, to decrease, to be reduced.

Title: Սակաւապտուղ
Definition_1: having but little fruit; cf. Սակաւազաւակ.

Title: Սակաւատար
Definition_1: containing but little, not capacious, narrow.

Title: Սակաւատող
Definition_1: composed of a few lines; — բանիւք, in few words.

Title: Սակաւատուն
Definition_1: in a few verses or lines, brief, succinct.

Title: Սակաւացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to diminish, to reduce in number, to lessen, to make less.

Title: Սակաւերամ
Definition_1: of a small flock or herd.

Title: Սակաւիկ
Definition_1: a few, very few, almost none, almost nothing; in a moment or instant; — մի եւ, — միւս եւս եւ, — ինչ պիտոյ՝ եւ, little is wanting to, there was but little wanting, it would but a little.

Title: Սակաւոտն
Definition_1: of but few feet in height.

Title: Սակաւութիւն
Definition_1: small number or quantity, smallness, slenderness, scantiness, paucity; rarity.

Title: Սակաւօրեայ
Definition_1: having but few days; lasting a short time, ephemeral.

Title: Սակս
Definition_1:
on account of, for, by reason of, in order to, for the sake of, with respect to, in consideration of, touching, concerning; յայն —, that is why, for which reason, for that purpose, on that account, therefore; յայս —, it is why, for this purpose or reason, on this account, consequently; — է՞ր, why ? for what reason ?
ի ձեր —, for you, for your sake, on your account, in respect to you; յո՞յր —, for whose reason ? why ?
յոր or յոյր —, — որոյ, on which account, therefore; -՝ զի, because.

Title: Սակրաւոր
Definition_1: one armed with an axe, axeman; sapper.

Title: Սահանահոս
Definition_1: flowing like a cataract, impetuous, grand.

Title: Սահանաձայն
Definition_1: noisy as a cataract, resounding, obstreperous; purling.

Title: Սահանափակ
Definition_1: sluice, lock, water-gate or flood-gate; dam, mill-dam.

Title: Սահանք
Definition_1: water-fall, cascade, cataract; cf. Սահանափակ; water-fall of a weir; sheet of water.

Title: Սահեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to glide, to slip;

Title: Սահիմ
Definition_1: to slip, to slide, to glide; to flow, to be flowing, to run out, to pass over, to roll or glide on; to be agitated, to hurry along or away, to err, to wander, to yield to; — ի վերայ սառի, to skate; — ի մտաց, to slip from, to escape the memory; սահեալ անցանել, to run, to elapse, to glide away; սահեալ աստղ, shooting star; սահեցաւ, he slipped, his foot or feet slipped.

Title: Սահման
Definition_1: bound, term, circumscription; bounds, limits, confines, frontier, borders; extremity, sphere; definition; statute, rule, regulation; decision, determination; jurisdiction, extent; department; neighbourhood, district, provinces; —ք, outskirts, suburbs; —ք հակատոյ, articles of faith; — երկրի, կալուածոց, landmark; — հատանել, to fix the boundaries of; յարդար —ս ամփոփել զիմն, to reduce to its proper limits; — դնել, to bound, to fix bounds to, to limit, to end; — դնել անձին, to propose, to deliberate, to resolve; երդնուլ արդումն —աւ, to bind oneself by an oath; անցանել ըստ —, to overstep, to pass the limits or boundaries; —աւ ասել, to say briefly; յաղետալի — հասուցանել, to reduce to a deplorable state; cf. Զէն.

Title: Սահմանագլուխ
Definition_1: frontiers, confines, boundary line, bounds, limits.

Title: Սահմանագոչ
Definition_1: resounding or murmuring from shore to shore.

Title: Սահմանադիր
Definition_1: constituent; institutor, legislator; — ժողով, the Constituent.

Title: Սահմանադրեմ
Definition_1: to fix the boundaries; to constitute, to order, to regulate, to establish, to determine, to decide; —դրեալ կէտ, the appointed day or time.

Title: Սահմանադրութիւն
Definition_1: fixing the boundary, setting up landmarks; constitution; statute; ordinance, regulation; decision; definition.

Title: Սահմանակողմն
Definition_1: circumjacent, bordering, close to, adjacent, neighbouring.

Title: Սահմանապահ
Definition_1: frontier guard; lord of the marches, provincial governor; — զօրք, frontier garrison or guard.

Title: Սահմանափոխ լինիմ
Definition_1: to change the boundaries; to change the ancient statutes; to transmigrate, to pass from one place to another.

Title: Սահմանափոխութիւն
Definition_1: change of the ancient laws or statutes; transmigration, emigration.

Title: Սահմանեմ
Definition_1: to bound, to limit, to set bounds to, to circumscribe; to define, to determine, to fix, to decree, to establish, to institute; to regulate, to decide, to resolve, to propose, to deliberate, to stipulate, to prescribe; to destine, to design, to affect; to consist, to measure, to weigh; յառաջագոյն or յառաջ —, to predestine, cf. Նախասահմանեմ; — սահմանս զանձնէ իւրմէ, to bind oneself by an oath to; — անդր քան, to confine, to banish, to exile.

Title: Սահմանիմ
Definition_1: to have for boundaries; to be bounded, limited; to contain, to comprehend; to be measured; constituted, established; defined; մահուամբ —, to submit to death, to die; սահմանեալ ժամանակ, epoch decided on, fixed time.

Title: Սահմի
Definition_1: the third month of the ancient Armenian calendar, March.

Title: Սաղապ
Definition_1: slippery, failing, frail, wavering, unsteady, inconstant, fickle.

Title: Սաղապեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to turn aside, to pervert, to seduce; to exercise.

Title: Սաղար
Definition_1: general in chief; troop from which the generals were elected; փուշտիպան —, general commanding the Guards.

Title: Սաղարթագեղ
Definition_1: adored with leaves, leafy; — որթ, vine adorned with leafy branches.

Title: Սաղարթազուարճ
Definition_1: leafy, verdant, green, covered with leaves.

Title: Սաղարթածաղիկ
Definition_1: covered with leaves and loaded with flowers.

Title: Սաղարթանամ
Definition_1: to shoot forth leaves, to sprout, to be leafy, green.

Title: Սաղաւարտ
Definition_1: casque, helm, helmet, head-piece, morion; Armenian mitre.

Title: Սաղաւարտիմ
Definition_1: to wear a helmet or mitre.

Title: Սաղմաբոյն մզանք
Definition_1: amnios, secundine, after-birth; matrix, womb, uterus.

Title: Սաղմնառեմ
Definition_1: to conceive, to be with child; cf. Յղանամ.

Title: Սաղմոս
Definition_1: psalm; psalm-book, psalter; — ասել, to recite or sing psalms; to play on the harp, to sound the lyre; cf. Ծայր.

Title: Սաղմոսաբանեմ
Definition_1: to repeat the psalms; to compose psalms.

Title: Սաղմոսարան
Definition_1: psaltery, harp, decachord, dulcimer, tympanum; psalter, psalm-book.

Title: Սաղմոսեմ
Definition_1: to recite, chant or sing psalms.

Title: Սամետիք
Definition_1: leather thong of the yoke, knot of the yoke.

Title: Սամիթ
Definition_1: anise, dill; fennel; — վայրենի or ծովային, samphire, crithmum.

Title: Սամիք
Definition_1: yoke, wooden collar for draught oxen;

Title: Սամսարեմ
Definition_1: to strut along or about, to look grand.

Title: Սայթաք
Definition_1: fickle, inconstant, unsteady, changeable; agile, quick, nimble.

Title: Սայթաքեմ
Definition_1: to slip, to stumble, to trip, to take a false step, to fall;
Definition_2: to falter, to waver, to be unsettled, to go astray, to err.
Definition_3: cf. Սայթաքեցուցանեմ.

Title: Սայթաքեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to slip or stumble, to trip up;
Definition_2: to lead astray, into error, to delude;
Definition_3: to lead astray, into error, to delude.

Title: Սայլակ
Definition_1: small cart, truckle, dray-cart; — ձեռաձիգ, barrow, hand-barrow.

Title: Սայլակերպ աստեղք
Definition_1: arctus; Charle's wain, the Great Bear; ursa major.

Title: Սայլատունք
Definition_1: living in carts, nomads, wandering, errant.

Title: Սայր
Definition_1: edge, sharpness; cf. Սար; սատակել ի — սուսերի, to put to the edge of the sword.

Title: Սայրասուր
Definition_1: well pointed, sharp, cutting, piercing, trenchant; — սուսեր, trenchant glave.

Title: Սան
Definition_1: kettle, boiler, caldron, saucepan, stewpanchem. still, cucurbite;

Title: Սանդահարեմ
Definition_1: to pound or crush in a mortar.

Title: Սանդարամետք
Definition_1: Tartarus, hell; —ք երկրի, the deep caverns of the earth, abyss, hell, pit.

Title: Սանդարամետային
Definition_1: tartarean, hellish, infernal, satanical, devilish; — դիք, the infernal divinities; — տօնք, dionysia, dionysiaca.

Title: Սանդարամետականք
Definition_1: demons, devils, the damned, souls of the dead, shades, spirits.

Title: Սանդիտոռն
Definition_1: pestle; — մեքենական, crushing-mill or stamping-mill; — մեծ, large heavy pestle; — փոքրիկ, small pestle.

Title: Սանդուղք
Definition_1: staircase, stairs, ladder; երկբացիկ —, double ladder, trestles; ծալածոյ —, folding ladder; — չուանեայ, rope-ladder, foot-rope; — հրդեհի, fire-ladder, fire-escape; — պաշարման, scaling-ladder; — շրջանակաւ, winding staircase; ելանել ընդ —ղս, to go up stairs; իջանել ի սանդղոց, to come down stairs; ելանել ի վեր սանդղովք, to scale, to climb over, to escalade; ելանել սանդղովք ի պարիսպս, to scale the walls.

Title: Սանձ
Definition_3: — զօրութենաչափ, dynamometrical brake, friction-brake; —ս դնել, to put a check upon, to curb, to put a term to; —ս արկանել, cf. Սանձեմ.

Title: Սանձակոտոր
Definition_1: breaking the reins, untameable, indomitable; — լինել, to break loose, to break the bridle.

Title: Սանձահարեմ
Definition_1: to bridle, to curb, to check, to rein; to subdue, to break in.

Title: Սանձահարութիւն
Definition_1: bridling, reining, curbing, repressing; առանց սանձահարութեան, dissolutely, impetuously.

Title: Սանձարձակ
Definition_1: unbridled, unruly, unrestrained, unchecked, lawless; dissolute, loose; — զերասանակն թողուլ, to give a horse his head, to slacken the reins.

Title: Սանձեմ
Definition_1: to bridle, to break in; to rein in, to check, to hold in, to repress, to conquer, to abate, to mortify.

Title: Սանտր
Definition_1: comb; — նեղատամն, small-toothed comb; — լայնատամն, large-toothed -; — փղոսկրեայ, ivory -; խոզանակ սանտեր, comb-brush; քսակ սանտեր, comb-case; — ոստայնանկաց, weaver's -; — կանեփի, վշոյ, hatchel, flax comb, hemp comb; — բրդոյ, card to comb wool.

Title: Սանտրումն
Definition_1: hackling, hemp or flax dressing; combing, carding.

Title: Սապատ
Definition_1: trunk, coffer, safe; basket; cf. Զուգեմ; — ուղտու, camel's hump; — ողին, hump, humpback, gibbosity.

Title: Սառիմ
Definition_1: to freeze, to be frozen, to glaciate, to congeal; — պտղոց, ծաղկանց, to be frost-bitten, nipped by the frost

Title: Սառն
Definition_2: frozen; հատոր սառանց, piece or block of ice.

Title: Սառնագործ
Definition_1: producing frost or ice, ice-cold, frosty, freezing.

Title: Սառնակերպ
Definition_1: ice-like, icy, glassy, crystalline, translucent, pellucid;

Title: Սառնամած
Definition_1: surrounded or covered with frost or ice, frozen, ice-bound.

Title: Սառնամանիք
Definition_1: ice; frost, icy cold; շնչեն ցրտաշունչ —, sharp and biting winds blow.

Title: Սառնասառոյց
Definition_1: extremely cold, freezing, glacial, icy, chilling.

Title: Սառնասոյզ
Definition_1: caught in the ice, frost-bound or ice-bound.

Title: Սառնորակ
Definition_2: jelly; — բուսական, pectine; — հիւթն աչաց, crystalline humour.

Title: Սառոյց
Definition_1: frost, icy cold; ice, glazed frost.

Title: Սառուցանեմ
Definition_1: to freeze, to ice, to frost, to chill, to congeal, to coagulate;
Definition_2: —ցեալ, frozen; — ծով, North sea or Frozen Ocean; — գօտի, frigid zone.

Title: Սասանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to shake, to jog, to jolt, to stagger; to move, to astonish; to frighten, to terrify; — զոտն ուրուք յերկրէ իւրմէ, to cause a person to emigrate.

Title: Սասանիմ
Definition_1: to be shaken, to totter; to tremble, to shudder; to be dismayed, cast down; — ի հիմանէ, to shake to its very foundations; սասանեալ կալ, to stand abashed.

Title: Սասանումն
Definition_1: shaking, staggering, tottering; quailing, shudder, thrill, trembling; earthquake.

Title: Սաստ
Definition_1: bitter, angry reproof, scolding, rebuke, threat, menace; chastisement; — իշխանակերպ, մեծավայելուչ, majesty; — իշխանական, authority, haughtiness; — աչաց, piercing glance; ի — մատչել ընդ ումեք, to reproach bitterly, to scold sharply.

Title: Սաստեմ
Definition_1: to reprimand angrily, to rebuke, to scold, to speak authoritatively, in a threatening tone, to threaten, to apostrophize, to bid or order imperiously; to hush, to still, to quiet.

Title: Սաստիկ
Definition_1: excessive, extreme, great, grievous, enormous; intense, violent, vehement, impetuous, strong, lively, ardent, fiery; rigid, rigorous, rude, severe, austere, insupportable; — տգէտ, downright or perfectly ignorant person.

Title: Սաստիկ
Definition_1: vehemently, vigorously, impetuously, strongly, with all one's force, power or strength; greatly, excessively, extremely, grievously, violently, sharply, harshly, rigidly, severely, rigorously.

Title: Սաստկական
Definition_2: — մակբայ, intense adverb; — մասնիկ, increasing particle.

Title: Սաստկակոծ
Definition_1: severely reprimanded, sharply reproached or harshly punished; — առնել, to load with reproaches, to reprimand severely, to rebuke sharply, to huff, to lecture, to taunt, to chide, to burst or launch out bitter invectives, to break out in scolding or upbraiding; — լինել, to be sharply reprimanded, harshly scolded.

Title: Սաստկայոյզ
Definition_1: very agitated, moved, in great emotion; — սէր, ardent love.

Title: Սաստկանամ
Definition_1: to increase in force, in intensity, to be strengthened by, increased, to grow; to be enraged, very angry; — մարտին, to become exasperated, to grow most ferocious; —նայր հրաման թագաւորին, the king's order was pressing.

Title: Սաստկաշառաչ
Definition_1: very noisy, clattering; — հնչէին զագականին, all the bells rang a full peal.

Title: Սաստկապահանջ
Definition_1: required rigorously or severely exigible; severe, rigid, inexorable.

Title: Սաստկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render intense, violent or strong, to strengthen, to augment, to increase; — զպատերազմն, to foment, to exasperate warfare; to turn the enemy's flank; — զհրամանն արքունի, to enforce the king's command.

Title: Սաստկութիւն
Definition_1: intensity, vehemence, impetuosity, rage, violence; rigour, rigidity, severity, rudeness; grievousness, enormity, extremity.

Title: Սատակ
Definition_1: simple, single; unadorned; — սպիտակ, quite white; — մարդ զքրիստոս ասել, to declare our Lord a mere man.

Title: Սատակամահ մեռանիմ
Definition_1: to die a cruel death, to perish miserably.

Title: Սատակեմ
Definition_1: to kill, to slay, to massacre, to put to death, to take away life, to butcher, to slaughter, to exterminate, to extirpate; to destroy, to overthrow, to make havoc of, to get rid of.

Title: Սատակիմ
Definition_1: to perish, to die; to be destroyed or exterminated.

Title: Սատակիչ
Definition_1: that kills, that puts to death cruelly, exterminator, extirpator, destroyer.

Title: Սատակումն
Definition_1: extermination, extirpation, death, havoc, destruction; ի — մատնիլ, to perish; սատակմունս առնել, to make carnage; կոտորել ի —, to destroy utterly, to exterminate.

Title: Սատակչական
Definition_1: mortal, deadly, fatal, mortiferous, lethal, murderous, destructive.

Title: Սատան
Definition_1: adversary, opponent, antagonist, enemy; Satan; — յարուցանել ումեք, to stir up an adversary, to raise or create difficulties, to raise objections to.

Title: Սատանայ
Definition_1: Satan, demon, devil, evil spirit; cf. Սատան; cf. Բանսարկու.

Title: Սատանայազէն
Definition_1: incited to, possessed by a devil.

Title: Սատանայախօս
Definition_1: treating or dealing with the devil.

Title: Սատանայակիր
Definition_1: possessed by a devil, raging, furious, demoniacal.

Title: Սատանայամիտ
Definition_1: evil-minded, as wicked as the devil, very malicious, diabolical, devilish.

Title: Սատանայանամ
Definition_1: to become a devil, to be malevolent.

Title: Սատանայացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to become devilish, diabolical.

Title: Սատանայութիւն
Definition_1: devil's nature; devilry; malignity; witchcraft, devilish trick.

Title: Սատար
Definition_1: workman, artisan, operative; labourer, husbandman; weaver, help, succour, aid; helper, assistant, auxiliary; fellow; cause, author; — պատմութեան, additional professor of history; — լինել, cf. Սատարեմ.

Title: Սատարեմ
Definition_1: to help, to assist, to aid, to cooperate, to contribute, to serve; to do, to labour.

Title: Սատարութիւն
Definition_1: help, succour, assistance, cooperation; fellowship, admission; woollen-trade.

Title: Սատոն
Definition_1: satum, setier, ( English gallons, or English pints of wine).

Title: Սատր
Definition_1: thin silken crape; napery; seat, sofa, settee, settle.

Title: Սատրապետ
Definition_1: satrap, lieutenant of a county, prefect.

Title: Սար
Definition_1: height, eminence, top, summit, peak; cape, promontory, point; սարք, furniture, moveables, equipage; harness; all that follows, rest.

Title: Սարաբարձր
Definition_1: high-topped, very high or elevated, lofty.

Title: Սարանամ
Definition_1: to become elevated, to appear high;
Definition_2: to take ill, to be or get angry; not to deign to.

Title: Սարաս
Definition_1: form, fashion, manner, resemblance; custom, habit, usage; յայնմ —ի, in that state; ըստ —ի, so as, as; այսպիսի —իւ, so, in such a manner.

Title: Սարաւանդեմ
Definition_1: to build altars in high places.

Title: Սարաւանդիմ
Definition_1: to sit in high; to tower; to be of very ancient lineage.

Title: *Սարբի
Definition_1: emporium of corn or flour, granary.

Title: Սարդ
Definition_1: spider; երդաբնակ, նըստուկ, ուղղընթաց, շեղընթաց, թելհան, սփռող, թափառուկ, մոլար, ոստին, ջրային —ք, house spider, sedentary, retrigrade, laterigrade, spinner, snaring, vagrant, erratic, land spider, waterspiders; արագ or ժիր, նուրբ, կայտառ, խիզախ or արի, ճարտար or ճարպիկ, հնարագէտ, հանճարեղ, գիտուն, վաստակաւոր, արթուն —, agile, cunning, quick, prompt, skilful, industrious, ingenious, knowing, laborious, vigilant spider; կախուկ, վերնակառ or վերամբարձ, մանողակ, փորեղ or տղընդեր, տգեղ or մախիզ, անհեդեդ, սոսկալի, թունաւոր —ք, hanging, suspended, spinning, big-bellied, ugly, deformed, frightful, venomous spiders;
Definition_3: laurel, baytree.

Title: Սարդանկու
Definition_1: woven by a spider, as thin or fine as a cobweb.

Title: Սարդենասեր
Definition_1: produced by the laurel, lauriferous, bay.

Title: Սարդիոստայն
Definition_1: cobweb, spider's web; սրբել զ—ս, to sweep down the cobwebs; — ձգել ծածկոյտ զերեսօք, to hind behind a cobweb, to try to conceal what is manifest, to cover with pretexts.

Title: Սարեմ
Definition_1: to threaten, to cry out against.

Title: Սարկարան
Definition_1: crater, cup, large goblet; քամել զ—, to drink off, to quaff.

Title: Սարկաւագեմ
Definition_1: to serve, to minister, to attend;

Title: Սարկեւառք
Definition_1: horny tips of birds' claws; cf. Մագիլ.

Title: Սարութիւն
Definition_1: instrument, tool, apparatus, harness, furniture; նաւ կազմեալ ամենայն սարութեամբ, ship complete in stores and rigging.

Title: Սարսափ
Definition_1: shuddering, consternation, great fear, panic, horror.

Title: Սարսափելի
Definition_1: frightful, dreadful, tremendous, appalling, horrible, terrible; enormous, stupendous, wonderful.

Title: Սարսափեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause terror, to strike with consternation, to cause to shudder or shiver with fear or horror.

Title: Սարսափիմ
Definition_1: to quake with fear, to be horror-struck, seized with consternation, to have one's hair stand on end; — ոսկերաց, to be terrified, horrified; — ի ցրտոյ, to shiver with cold; սարսափեցան ոսկերք իմ, a cold shiver ran through my whole frame.

Title: Սարսեմ
Definition_1: to quake, to totter, to start, to feel a thrill of fear, to shudder, to tremble, to quiver.

Title: Սարսեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to shake, to cause to totter or shiver with fear.

Title: Սարսուռ
Definition_1: shivering, cold chill, chilliness, trembling, terror; — առնուլ or ունել զոք, to quake with fear, terror or horror.

Title: Սարսռամ
Definition_1: to quake, shake, shiver or tremble; — ի ցրտոյ, to shiver with cold, to quake all over.

Title: Սարսռացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to shiver or to tremble.

Title: Սարտչիմ
Definition_1: to be shocked at, estranged, alienated, to have an aversion to, to withdraw, to abandon; to be horrified, scared, to take umbrage; — ի ստենէ, to be weaned, disaccustomed.

Title: Սարտուցանեմ
Definition_1: to rebuff, to spurn, to repulse, to shock, to estrange, to cause a separation, to alienate, to detach; to scare, to startle, to cause or give umbrage to; — ի ստենէ, to wean, to disaccustom.

Title: Սաւառնաթեւ
Definition_1: whirring, flapping the wings, flying about, hovering, soaring.

Title: Սաւառնիմ
Definition_1: to flap the wings, to flutter about, to hover, to soar, to fly high.

Title: Սափոր
Definition_1: urn, amphora, pot, pitcher, jug, jar.

Title: Սափրեմ
Definition_1: to shave, to shear; cf. Մօրուք.

Title: Սգազգած
Definition_1: in mourning; lugubrious; — լինել, to be in mourning.

Title: Սգազգեստ
Definition_1: wearing or clad in mourning; — լինել, to wear or to put on mourning.

Title: Սգաթափեմ
Definition_1: to leave off mourning, to go out of mourning.

Title: Սգալի
Definition_1: mournful, lugubrious, sorrowful, sad, fatal, gloomy.

Title: Սգակցիմ
Definition_1: to go into mourning, to complain, deplore or condole with or together, to commiserate.

Title: Սգամ
Definition_1: to be in, or to wear mourning, to mourn; to afflict oneself, to be sorrowful, to regret, to be moved, to bewail, to lament, to deplore.

Title: Սգացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to grieve, to sadden, to afflict.

Title: Սգաւոր
Definition_1: in mourning; mournful; սուգ առնուլ —օք, to wear mourning.

Title: Սեաւ
Definition_3: ink; negro; black; — փայտ, cf. Եբենոս.

Title: Սեբինէ
Definition_1: palm-leaf vest, garment made of palm-leaves.

Title: Սեթեւեթ
Definition_1: garb, dress, ornament, attire; affectation, primness; paint;
Definition_2: — or —եալ, embellished, adorned, pompous; finical, affected.

Title: Սեթեւեթեմ
Definition_1: to dress up, to trim or trick out, to bedizen, to bedeck, to embellish, to ornament; to paint, to plaster.

Title: Սեխ
Definition_1: melon; շերտ —ի, slice of -; — մշկահոտ, musk-melon.

Title: Սեկագործեմ
Definition_1: to dress like morocco, to morocco.

Title: Սեղան
Definition_1: table, board; meal, food, table; altar; banker's counter; աւագ —, grand, high altar; — գրելոյ, writing-table; — խոհակերոցի, kitchen-table; dresser; — մարմարեայ, marble-table; — գործոյ, work-table; սփռոց —ոյ, table-cloth; անօթք, սպասք —ոյ, plates and dishes; պատառաքաղ, դանակ, դրգալ —ոյ, table-fork, table-knife, table-spoon; զրոյցք ի —ի, table-talk; — յարդարել, ուղղել, դնել, to lay out a table, to spread the table; — ուղղել, to erect or place an altar or Communion-table; բեզմել ի —, to sit down to table; ծառայել —ոյ, to wait at table; ի —ի լինել, to be at table; ելանել ի —ոյ, to rise from table; բառնալ զ—, to take away, to clear the table; ծախք —ոյ, table-expenses; cf. Կողապտեմ; cf. Ճաշ; cf. Պատիւ;

Title: Սեղանադիր
Definition_1: spreading the table, laying the cloth.

Title: Սեղանակցիմ
Definition_1: to eat at the same table, to mess together.

Title: Սեղանամեծար
Definition_1: condescending, accepting to sit at another's table.

Title: Սեղանայօրէն
Definition_1: head waiter, butler, chief steward; carver.

Title: Սեղանանամ
Definition_1: to be formed into an altar-table, to become a sacrifice.

Title: Սեղանաւոր
Definition_1: banker, changer; տալ or արկանել զարծաթ ի —ս, to place money in a bank at interest, to put out money to interest.

Title: Սեղանաւորեմ
Definition_1: to wait at table, to spread the table, to serve up; to give to eat;
Definition_2: to make known the word of God, to feed with the bread of life.

Title: Սեղեխ
Definition_1: fornicator, whorekeeper; suitor, gallant, sweet-heart, admirer.

Title: Սեղեխաբար
Definition_1: like a lover, in a coquettish manner.

Title: Սեղմ
Definition_1: close, dense, compact, firm, strait, narrow, compressed, confined.

Title: Սեղմանամ
Definition_1: to be contracted, compact, compressed, restricted, to press close, to grow narrower.

Title: Սեղմեմ
Definition_1: to render compact, to restrain, to constrain, to restrict, to restringe, to cramp, to contract, to squeeze, to strain, to press.

Title: Սեղմութիւն
Definition_1: the being compact, hardness, firmness, density; restriction, restraint; pressing, squeezing.

Title: Սենեակ
Definition_2: concubine; — միանձանց, cell; — հարսին, nuptial bed, thalamus; — ուսման, study.

Title: Սենեկակից
Definition_1: dwelling in the same chamber, comrade.

Title: Սենեկապետութիւն
Definition_1: office or charge of High Chamberlain.

Title: Սեպ
Definition_1: peak, point, summit of a rock, steep rock; peg, wedge;

Title: Սեպանամ
Definition_1: to end in a point, to be steep or pointed.

Title: Սեպատամն
Definition_1: catch, tipper, gib's end, stop, tappet.

Title: Սեպացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cut vertically, to escarp, to cut steep down.

Title: Սեպհական
Definition_1: proper, special, particular, specific, one's own; noble, illustrious, egregious;
Definition_2: —ք, one's own part, property or heritage; — էր նմա, it was specially his, it was his lot.

Title: Սեպհականեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to appropriate, attribute, ascribe or impute to oneself.

Title: Սեպուհ
Definition_1: peer, noble, gentleman, patrician, esquire; Sebooh (name of mount in Armenia); — զատք, the highest nobility; — գունդն ազատաց, knighthood, chivalry, squirehood.

Title: Սեռ
Definition_1: kind, species, race, generation; nature, complexion; *height;
Definition_2: gender; — եւ տեսակ, the genus and the species; մարդկային —, mankind; հայկական —, the Armenian nation.

Title: Սեռակնաձեւ
Definition_1: of an universal or resplendent form (the Cross).

Title: Սեռակոտոր
Definition_1: of several species, diversified, various, subdivided, heterogeneous.

Title: Սեռն
Definition_1: clean, pure, clear, limpid; sincere, true, simple.

Title: Սեռութիւն
Definition_1: the being of the same progeny or race.

Title: Սեր
Definition_1: kind, race, species; sex; cream; — գինեմրրոյ, cream of tartar;
Definition_2: gender; գեղեցիկ —, the fair sex, womankind; գալ ի ծնունդեւ ի —, to increase and multiply.

Title: Սերական
Definition_3: — or —ք, the sex, the genitals; ի բաց հատանել զ—ս, to castrate, to geld.

Title: Սերաւորեմ
Definition_1: to multiply, to reduce into one kind.

Title: Սերեմ
Definition_1: to procreate, to beget, to engender, to give rise to, to propagate.

Title: Սերիմ
Definition_1: to be born of, to draw one's origin from, to descend from, to be procreated, multiplied by generation; to spring, to issue, to derive, to proceed from.

Title: Սերկ
Definition_1: today, this very day; — եւ վաղիւ, զ— եւ զվաղիւ, today and tomorrow.

Title: Սերկեան
Definition_1: of today; ի —, ի — աւուր or աւուրս, — օր, cf. Սերկ.

Title: Սերմանանամ
Definition_1: to seed, to run to seed.

Title: Սերմանացան
Definition_1: cf. Սերմանահան; drill, sowing machine, corn-drill.

Title: Սերմանացու
Definition_1: destined or kept to be sown.

Title: Սերմանաքաղ
Definition_1: gleaning, gathering or picking up seeds;
Definition_2: babbler, tale-bearer, telltale; — լինել, to criticize, to find fault with, to censure.

Title: Սերմանեմ
Definition_1: to sow, to disseminate, to spread or cast the seed; to procreate; — սերմն, to seed; ժամանակ սերմանելոյ, seed-time or sowing-time.

Title: Սերմն
Definition_2: progeny, race, descendants; germ, bud, seeds, cause, principle;
Definition_3: cotyledon;
Definition_4: — արութեան, sperm; — ձկանց, spawn; — շողգամի, rape-seed; ի — տալ զցորեան, to sow corn; ելանել արութիւն սերման, to be afflicted with gonorrhea; — առնուլ կնոջ, to conceive.

Title: Սերմնաբանեմ
Definition_1: to play the telltale, to babble.

Title: Սերմնարկութիւն
Definition_1: power of conception; act of procreation.

Title: Սերմնընկալ
Definition_1: f. conceived, with child or young.

Title: Սերուն
Definition_1: having procreative or generative virtue, fecund, prolific.

Title: Սերունդ
Definition_1: offspring, scion, progeny, race, lineage, line, descent, posterity, descendants, generation.

Title: Սերտ
Definition_1: solid, firm, hard, compact, constant, fix, stable, strong;
Definition_3: —, —իւ, firmly, constantly; voluntarily, willingly; sincerely, intimately, closely; — առաքինութիւն, solid virtue; — սիրով, tenderly, affectionately, cordially; — սիրել, to love sincerely, with all one's heart, passionately; — աղօթել, to pray intensely, warmly, earnestly, eagerly.

Title: Սերտեմ
Definition_1: to strengthen, to fix, to make firm, to establish, to consolidate; *to learn, to study.

Title: Սերտիմ
Definition_1: to be strengthened by, consolidated, to gather strength from.

Title: Սեւագիր
Definition_2: written with ink, delineated with black lines.

Title: Սեւագունդ
Definition_2: black band or troop (of devils, rascals, etc. ).

Title: Սեւազգեստ
Definition_3: mourning suit.

Title: Սեւաթորմի
Definition_2: dark, gloomy, dismal, sullen, foul, base.

Title: Սեւամաղձութիւն
Definition_1: melancholy, black choler or bile, hyp, hypochondria.

Title: Սեւանամ
Definition_1: to blacken, to be or become black, to grow dark or brown.

Title: Սեւեմ
Definition_1: to blacken, to render black, to imbrown; to paint black.

Title: Սեւեռեմ
Definition_1: to nail, to stud, to fasten with a nail, to fix well; to attach, to stick.

Title: Սեւորակ
Definition_1: blackish, brown, dusky; — աչք, black eyes.

Title: Սեւորդիք
Definition_1: Sewortic, Blacksons or Smithsons, (name of an Armenian race whose father was named Sev or Black).

Title: Սեւութիւն
Definition_1: blackness, black or brown colour, swarthiness.

Title: Սէգ
Definition_1: imperious, high, haughty, supercilious, arrogant, proud, superb; — առ հանդերձ, fond of dress, smart, spruce, dandy; — առնուլ, cf. Սիգամ.

Title: Սէզ
Definition_1: bentgrass, couch grass, squitch grass, dog's grass, weed.

Title: Սէր
Definition_1: love; affection, fondness, tenderness; inclination, delight, liking, taste, fancy; love, passion, flame, salacity, love-suit; charity, supernatural love, christian charity; agape, love-feasts; kiss; — կանանց, hymen, vulva;
