Definition_2: the quiver of love; — վաղանցուկ, amour, intrigue, love affair; յօդակապք, ոլորք սիրոյ, ties, bonds of love; հանգոյց, տոմսակ, գաղտնիք, երգ, վէպք, ընծայ սիրոյ, love-knot, love-letter, love-secret, love-song, love-tale, love-toy; — առ աստուած, առ ընկերն, ազատութեան, հայրենեաց, արուեստից, փառաց, առաքինութեան, love of God; of our neighbours or fellow-creatures; of liberty; of our country; of arts; of glory; of virtue; ամուսնական, մայրական or մայրենի, հայրական, որդիական —, connubial or conjugal, maternal, paternal, filial love or affection; — անձնական, self-love, egoism, solipsism; — աստուածային, երկնային, մաքուր or սուրբ, նորաբողբոջ, փոխադարձ, համեստ, օրինաւոր, եռանդուն, սաստիկ, բուռն, անչափ, հաստատուն, հաւատարիմ, յաւիտենական, divine, celestial, pure, rising, reciprocal or mutual, honest, lawful, ardent, lively, violent, extreme, constant, faithful, eternal love; մոլենախանձ —, jealousy; — երկրային, յողդողդ, անցաւոր, զգայական, մարմնական, անկարգ, պիղծ, յանցաւոր, եղեռնաւոր, earthly, inconstant, fleeting or transitory, sensual, carnal, illicit, lustful, culpable, criminal love; վայելել սիրով, to make love to, to fall in love with, to court, to woo; հալիլ մաշիլ սիրով, to burn, to languish with love, to be love-sick; հատուցանել ընդ սիրոյ, to give love for love, to re-love; — ազդել, to inspire with a passion; դիւթել, բորբոքել զ—ն, to philter, to charm; — ցուցանել, to show or demonstrate love for; առնել —, to be courteous, amiable, friendly; to do or confer favours; ուտել զ—, to eat together, to make love-feasts; դնել — ի բերան, to kiss, to embrace; սիրով, lovingly, tenderly, affectionately, with pleasure, willingly; ի — աստուծոյ, for God's sake; ի — իմ, for me, for my sake; արա ինձ —, do me the kindness or the pleasure to; ամենայն սիրով, very willingly; — իմ ! my love ! my dear ! cf. Խառնեմ; cf. Հարկանիմ.

Title: Սթարեմ
Definition_1: to harness a horse, to caparison.

Title: Սթափ
Definition_1: awake, sprightly, lively, watchful, quick, prompt, speedy.

Title: Սթափանք
Definition_1: sprightliness, liveliness, sportiveness, entertainment, diversion, sports, relief; watchfulness.

Title: Սթափեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to awaken, to enliven, to inspirit, to refresh, to recreate, to revive; to cheer, to exhilarate, to divert, —եցո զխելս մտաց քոց, awake from your mental stupor; cf. Թափեմ.

Title: Սթափիմ
Definition_1: to wake up, to be lively, renewed, to recover, to come to oneself again; to brighten up, to be cheerful, to divert or amuse oneself; — ի գինւոյ, to grow sober again, to get sober; — ի քնոյ, to shake off sleep.

Title: Սթափումն
Definition_1: awaking; refreshment, distraction, diversion, pastime; sobering.

Title: Սիգաճեմ
Definition_2: with stately step; — գնացք, majestic gait, walk, bearing or port.

Title: Սիգամ
Definition_1: to strut, to stalk, to walk in a proud manner, with an air of ostentation or self complacency; to bridle up, to give oneself airs, to carry one's head too high.

Title: Սիգղ
Definition_1: decoration, distinction of honour; seal; cf. Սինկղ.

Title: Սիզաբերիմ
Definition_1: to grow spontaneously and abundantly as weeds or grass.

Title: Սիզուտ
Definition_1: weedy, grassy, abounding in weeds, in grass.

Title: Սիկ
Definition_1: slime, mud, ooze, mire, slough, dirt; deposit, sediment, dregs, lees.

Title: Սին
Definition_1: service-apple or sorbapple; service-apple or sorb-apple tree.

Title: Սինլքոր
Definition_1: refuse; low, despicable, vile; — or — ժողովըրդեան, — խուժան, riffraff, dregs and refuse of the people, mob, rabble, scum of the people, the unwashed, the many-headed, beggarhood.

Title: Սինձ
Definition_1: gluten; mordant; preserved fruits, conserves, preserves, jam; cf. Փշատ.

Title: Սիր
Definition_3: sire.

Title: Սիրաբուխ
Definition_1: born of or produced by love, effect of love.

Title: Սիրաբուն
Definition_1: whose base or root is love.

Title: Սիրազեղուն
Definition_1: filled with love or affection, affectionate, loving.

Title: Սիրալիր
Definition_1: full of love, of affection, of tenderness, kindness or good-will, affectionate, obliging, kind.

Title: Սիրական
Definition_1: amiable, benign; amatory, loving, amorous; affectionate.

Title: Սիրահարիմ
Definition_1: to fall in love with, to be enamoured of, smitten with, to burn for.

Title: Սիրամարգ
Definition_1: peacock; էգ —, peahen; ձագ —ի, pea-chick; — գոչէ, the peacock cries or screams; նազել or սիգալ որպէս զ—, to plume oneself; to boast.

Title: Սիրայ
Definition_2: սէր ի —է, file by file, line by line, in series.

Title: Սիրաշարժ
Definition_1: inciting to love; incited by love.

Title: Սիրաջան
Definition_1: done or executed with a fond enthusiasm.

Title: Սիրասուն
Definition_1: nursed affectionately, lovingly, tenderly; — սան, dear nursling.

Title: Սիրասուր
Definition_1: borne on the wings of love.

Title: Սիրատարփ
Definition_1: passionately fond, smitten, deeply in love, over head and ears in love;

Title: Սիրատխուր
Definition_1: melancholy and in love, smitten with love and melancholy.

Title: Սիրելական
Definition_1: loving, amicable, friendly, affable, kind; — դեղ, philter.

Title: Սիրելապէս
Definition_1: amiably, kindly, lovingly, affectionately, tenderly, courteously; charitably.

Title: Սիրելի
Definition_1: amiable, dear, beloved, well-beloved; affectionate, benign, kind;
Definition_2: favourite, darling, lover; —դ իմ, my dear; — ընծայել, to render amiable; — է ինձ, I prefer; — է քեզ գեղեցիկն, the beautiful affects you; — է ինձ կարծել, I should think; — է ինձ տեսանել ի քեզ, I am very happy to see in you; — էր ինձ բարերարել, I had placed all my happiness in doing good.

Title: Սիրելութիւն
Definition_1: loving; amiability, kindness, love, affection, tenderness, sympathy, fellow-feeling.

Title: Սիրեմ
Definition_1: to love, to be fond of, to have an affection or a liking for, to cherish, to like, to be pleased, to take pleasure or delight in, to delight in; — զմիմեանս, to love one another, to be fond of each other; ըստ անձին —, to love as oneself; — իբրեւ զբիր ական, to love as the apple of one's eye; — մինչեւ զշունչ վախճանին, to love to one's last breath; խանդակաթ, տարփանօք, սաստիկ, բոլորով սրտիւ or յամենայն սրտէ, ոգւով չափ, ի վեր քեան զամենայն, անկեղծ սիրով —, to love tenderly, passionately or dotingly, to distraction, with all one's heart, with all one's soul, above all, sincerely; զմի սէր —, to love with equal affection.

Title: Սիրող
Definition_2: amateur, lover; — նկարուց, amateur of pictures; — երաժշտութեան, dilettante; — գեղարուեստից, virtuoso; — ազատութեան, փառաց, lover of liberty, of glory; չես դու — մարդահաճութեան, you do not like flattery; — է նա գրենոց, books are his passion; — եմ ես տնկաբանութեան, I have a great taste for botany.

Title: Սիրուն
Definition_1: amiable, dear, pretty, darling, gracious, handsome, charming; cf. Սիրող.

Title: Սիրտ
Definition_1: heart; heart, soul, mind, intellect, memory, intelligence; courage, spirit, heart; heart, inmost thought; heart, centre;
Definition_2: առ սրտի, through anger; սրտի դիւր, ease, pleasure, contentment, satisfaction; բարութիւն, խստութիւն սրտի, kindness, hardness or obduracy of heart; լքումն սրտի, faintheartedness, despondency; ուղիղ, անկեղծ սրտիւ, sincerely, openheartedly, openly; բոլորով սրտիւ, ի բոլոր սրտէ, յամենայն սրտէ, սրտի մտօք, with all one's heart or soul, heartily, with good will, willingly, voluntarily; կրթել զ—, to form the mind or character; հեռացուցանել յանձնէ զ—ս, to alienate good will; գերել զ—, to captivate, to gain the heart or affection; յինքն արկանել զ— ուրուք, to gain a person's good; յափշտակել զ—ս, to charm or gain all hearts; գորովել, ժառանգել զ—, to touch, to move, affect or stir, to possess the heart; իջանել ի խորս սրտին, to descend into one's heart; թափանցել ի խորս սրտին, to penetrate the inmost recesses of one's heart; տալ, նուիրել զ— իւր, to give one's heart; խոտարեցուցանել զ—, to pervert, to deprave the heart; խօսել ընդ սրտի, to speak to the heart; ասել ի սրտի իւրում, to say within oneself, to say in one's heart; սրտի մտօք վաստակել, to labour heartily, to take to heart, to occupy oneself seriously with; — ի բերան շրջել, to seek painfully for; սրտի դիւր լինել, to be in a state of contentment or tranquillity, to feel pleased, comfortable, contented; զեղուլ զ— իւր առաջի աստուծոյ, to open one's heart before God; հայրական, մայրական, գողտր, զգայուն, խաղաղ or անդորր, խաղաղաւէտ, երախտագէտ, ազնուական, բարի, ազնիւ, վսեմախոհ, վեհ, անվեհեր —, paternal, maternal, tender, feeling or sensible, calm, pacific, thankful, noble, good, excellent, elevated (high-minded), great, intrepid or dauntless heart; անզգայ, ապերախտ, խիստ, ապականեալ, վատ, անգութ, անողորմ, չար, լքեալ —, unfeeling or insensible, ungrateful, flinty or obdurate, spoilt or corrupt, craven or dastard, hard(hearted), unmerciful or pitiless, cutting, drooping, dejected or despondent heart; խորհուրդք մեծամեծք ի սրտէ գան յառաջ, great thoughts take their rise in the heart; —ն բաբախէ, թնդայ, the heart palpitates; արկ ի — իմ, he placed in my heart, he inspired me; անկցի գութ ի — քո, let your heart be touched; նուաղեալ էր — նորա, his heart was weak; հրճուէր ի սրտի, he rejoiced from the bottom of his heart; եթէ ուրուք — առնուցու կերիցէ, let him eat it if he has the heart to, if he has courage enough; — իմ գելանի, my heart is moved; — ի բերանն էր, he struggled with death; որ յաչաց հեռացաւ՝ ի սրտէ հեռացաւ, out of sight, out of mind.

Title: Սիւն
Definition_1: column, pillar; — չորեքկուսի, pilaster; անջրպետ սեանց, intercolumnation; չարք սեանց, colonnade; — ամպ or ամպոյ, pillar of cloud; cf. Շրջանակ.

Title: Սլանամ
Definition_1: to soar, to take a lofty flight, to fly high; to rush, to dart, to rush on, upon or down; սլացեալ աստղ, falling star.

Title: Սլաք
Definition_1: shaft, arrow, dart; stiletto; style, needle; — ժամացուցի, hand; — ժամուց, hour-hand; — վայրկենից, minute-hand.

Title: Սխալ
Definition_2: fault, error, mistake; միով — ամս քառասուն, years wanting one.

Title: Սխալագիր
Definition_1: full of errors or mistakes, incorrect.

Title: Սխալակիմ
Definition_1: to stagger, to reel, to be a staunch toper, to be tipsy.

Title: Սխալանք
Definition_1: fault, mistake, error, oversight, failing, blunder.

Title: Սխալիմ
Definition_1: to fail, to be wanting, to err, to commit an oversight, to be led into mistakes, to mistake; to sin, to fall into error, to go astray; to make a false step, to stumble, to trip; — մեծամեծս, to make gross blunders.

Title: Սխալեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to commit faults, to lead into error; to cause to sin.

Title: Սխրագործ
Definition_1: working or doing wonders, enchanting, astonishing, wondrous, prodigious, stupendous.

Title: Սխրանամ
Definition_1: to admire, to be charmed, astonished, to marvel, to wonder, to be extremely surprised, wrapped in wonder, amazed, to stand thunderstruck.

Title: Սխրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to ravish, to enrapture, to delight, to strike with admiration, to charm, to be the delight, the charm of.

Title: Սխրիմ
Definition_1: to become extenuated, to grow thin or lean.

Title: Սկալիմ
Definition_1: to open in chinks, to split, to gape, to crack.

Title: Սկալինեան
Definition_1: scalene, having the sides and angles all unequal.

Title: Սկախառն
Definition_1: slimy, oozy, muddy, miry, sloughy; սկախառն խոնաւութիւն, cf. Ճահիճ.

Title: Սկայ
Definition_1: giant; — կին, giantess; — անարի, huge giant.

Title: Սկանամ
Definition_1: to change into slime, to form a deposit, to settle; գինիդ սկանայ, your wine is torbid.

Title: Սկզբնաբանեմ
Definition_1: to describe or treat of antiquities, or of ancient times.

Title: Սկզբնագիր
Definition_1: written from the beginning; initial letter; original, text, autograph.

Title: Սկզբնաժառանգ
Definition_1: the first heir from all eternity.

Title: Սկզբնալոյս
Definition_1: primitive light, origin or author of light.

Title: Սկզբնական
Definition_1: primitive, original, radical, pristine, primordial, first, initial; elementary; cf. Մեղք;

Title: Սկզբնակից
Definition_1: coetaneous, co-eval, equal in age or antiquity.

Title: Սկզբնապատճառ
Definition_1: first or principal cause, first author, source, spring.

Title: Սկզբնասեր
Definition_1: propagated first; — բողբոջք, the first offshoots or branches.

Title: Սկզբումն
Definition_1: beginning, outset, opening, initiative, first steps, first appearance; priority.

Title: Սկիզբն
Definition_1: beginning, commencement, outset; origin, principle; cause, matter, author, mother, motive, birth, base, foundation; principle, maxim; prelude, proem, exordium; սկզբունք անընդմիջականք, immediate principles; սկզբունք արքիմեդեայ, Archimedes' principles; ի սրզբանէ or սկզբանէ, ի սկզբնուստ, in the beginning, at first, originally, firstly, primitively; անդուստ or անդստին ի սկզբանէ, from the very beginning or outset, from the first, ab ovo, ab antiquo; ի սրզբանէ ցկատարածն, from beginning to end; ի սկզբանէ աշխարհի, since the creation of the world; ի սկզբանէ էր բանն, in the beginning was the Word; — առնել or առնուլ, ունել, cf. Սկսանիմ; ի սկզբանէ, from the beginning, at the beginning; cf. Սկիզբն.

Title: Սկիւռ
Definition_1: squirrel; թռիչ-, flying -; — գանչէ, the — growls.

Title: Սկունդ
Definition_1: small dog, poodle, lap-dog; — ատամունք, canine teeth.

Title: Սկսնում
Definition_1: to begin, to commence, to initiate, to set about, to enter upon, to start, to make one's outset; to give the signal for or of, to fall to, to undertake, to propose, to put in train; to be born, begun or commenced; վերստին —, to begin again, anew, afresh or over again; to recommence; տալ —, to cause to commence.

Title: Սկսումն
Definition_1: beginning, start, debut, first appearance or performance; prelude.

Title: Սղաբար
Definition_1: briefly, a little, by and by.

Title: Սղագրեմ
Definition_1: to take down or write in short-hand.

Title: Սղանամ
Definition_1: to become briefer or shorter, to shorten; to become or get dearer, to rise in price.

Title: Սղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to shorten, to make brief; to raise the price of.

Title: Սողոխ
Definition_1: gentle breeze, soft wind, zephyr; cf. Էրան; piece or block of ice; —ք ալեաց, curls, small waves.

Title: Սղոցեմ
Definition_1: to saw, to cut with a saw.

Title: Սղութիւն
Definition_1: brevity; exiguity; dearness, costliness, high price.

Title: Սմբակ
Definition_1: hoof; առ — պզտորել զջուրս, to foul or muddy water by walking through it.

Title: Սմբակահամ
Definition_1: tasting like water fouled by horses.

Title: Սմբատակ
Definition_1: frog or frush, (hollow part of a horse's hoof).

Title: Սնամահակ ելանեմ
Definition_1: to be baffled, balked, disappointed, deceived.

Title: Սնանամ
Definition_1: to become empty, to be emptied.

Title: Սնանիմ
Definition_1: to be nourished, fed, maintained; to be brought up, reared, educated, instructed.

Title: Սնապարծիկ
Definition_1: vain-glorious, conceited, vain, boastful, bragging, swaggering, bullying.

Title: Սնապարծիմ
Definition_1: to be vain, to grow proud, to swagger, to play the bully, the braggart.

Title: Սնապարծութիւն
Definition_1: vanity, vaunting, boasting, rodomontade, ostentation, conceit, ambition.

Title: Սնարք
Definition_1: side of the head, head; pillow, bolster; ի —ս լերին, on the mountain-top; ընդ —ս, ի —ից, at the side of; ի —ս նորա, at his pillow; ընդ —ս գահոյիցն, at the bed's head.

Title: Սնափառ
Definition_1: greedy of glory, fond of vain glory, full of vanity, ambitious.

Title: Սնափառիմ
Definition_1: to be full of vain glory, to pride oneself, to pique oneself on, to boast, to brag, to vaunt.

Title: Սնափառութիւն
Definition_1: avidity of vain or false glory, pride, ambition, vanity, self-conceitedness, foppishness.

Title: Սնգոյր
Definition_1: paint, rouge; ի — շպարիլ, to use paint, to rouge, to paint, to bedaub oneself or one's face.

Title: Սնգուրիմ
Definition_1: to paint, to fard one's face.

Title: Սնդոն
Definition_1: sindon, Tyrian stuff, cloth, linen; sheet; table-cloth; cf. Մարմնակալ.

Title: Սննդակից
Definition_1: nursed, bred or brought up together, coetaneous;

Title: Սննիկոն
Definition_1: chrytomancy, divining by means of barley; —ս արկանել, to divine by -.

Title: Սնոտի
Definition_1: useless, vain, futile, frivolous, worthless; chimerical, idle.

Title: Սնոտիք
Definition_1: vanity, foolery; vain and trifling things, trifles, bawbles, trinkets, gew-gaws, knick-knacks; foppery, silliness, nonsense; ի —իս, in vain, uselessly; գնալ զհետ սնոտեաց, to run after follies; սնոտեօք զբօսնուլ, to be taken up with trifles, to trifle time away, to fiddle-faddle.

Title: Սնոտիասէր
Definition_1: fond of futilities, running after vanity, occupied with trifles.

Title: Սնոտիմ
Definition_1: to become vain; to be reduced to nothing.

Title: Սնունդ
Definition_1: nutrition, nourishment, alimentation; nutriment, aliment, food, maintenance, subsistence;
Definition_3: nurture, instruction, education; տեղի սննդեան որբոց, orphan-house.

Title: Սնուցանեմ
Definition_1: to nourish, to feed, to maintain; to foster, to instruct, to breed, to bring up.

Title: Սոխ
Definition_1: onion; bulb, bulbous root; դալար —, scallion, green onion; — մանր, shallot.

Title: Սոխակ
Definition_1: nightingale, philomela, luscinia; porphyrio (a waterfowl); — երգէ, գեղգեղէ, the nightingale sings.

Title: Սող
Definition_1: crawling; creeping; cringing; ի — or —ս, creepingly, on all fours.

Title: Սողեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to creep or crawl.

Title: Սողիմ
Definition_1: to creep, to crawl on the belly, to wriggle; — ընդ երկիր, to crawl along on the ground; to drag or draw oneself along.

Title: Սողմիմ
Definition_1: to glide, to creep into, to slip, to steal, to penetrate into, to find its way in.

Title: Սողոսկեմ
Definition_1: to cause to glide in, to instil, to insinuate, introduce or bring in cleverly, to foist.

Title: Սողոսկիմ
Definition_1: to crawl often, to creep, to meander, to wind, to go trailing along; to be introduced or brought in; cf. Սողմիմ.

Title: Սողուն
Definition_3: — ցաւ, gangrene.

Title: Սոյն
Definition_1: this, that, be, self, the same; զսոյն հետայն, cf. Այսուհետեւ, cf. Յայսմ հետէ;
Definition_2: զ— հետայն, afterwards, soon, shortly, directly; ի —, immediately;
Definition_3: սմին իրի or վասն, for this reason.

Title: Սոյնպէս
Definition_1: thus, in this way, in like manner, equally, so.

Title: Սոնքանամ
Definition_1: to fatten, to grow fat, stout, corpulent;
Definition_2: to be puffed up, to become proud, haughty.

Title: Սոսինձ
Definition_1: paste, glue, lip-glue; — ձկան, isinglass, ichthyocolla, fish-glue.

Title: Սոսկ
Definition_3: simply, solely;
Definition_4: terror, horror;

Title: Սոսկալի
Definition_1: horrible, terrible, dreadful, ghastly, hideous, formidable, frightful; մեծաւ —լեօք, greatly wondering.

Title: Սոսկական
Definition_1: simple, pure; vulgar, ordinary; private; cf. Սոսկալի;
Definition_2: footsoldier; —, — ոք or մարդ, a private person, an individual, person of retired or secluded habits; — կեանք, private life; —ք ոմանք, some private persons.

Title: Սոսկամ
Definition_1: to be greatly afraid, to tremble, to shudder with horror, to dread, to fear; սոսկացեալ դողալ, to be horror-struck, terrified, to quake with terror.

Title: Սոսկանամ
Definition_1: to lay aside, to leave off, to discard; to give up, to abandon, to renounce, to deprive oneself of;

Title: Սոսկումն
Definition_1: horror, great fear, trembling, shuddering, terror, dread, dismay, fright, apprehension; — հերաց, bristling up of the hair; դողումն եւ — կալաւ զբանակն, a panic spread through the army; — պատահեաց ինձ, I was seized with horror; — ածել, բերել, to terrify, to strike with horror, to make one's hair stand on end.

Title: Սով
Definition_1: famine, dearth, scarcity, penury; hunger; ի —ու, by famine.

Title: Սովաբեկ
Definition_1: starving, famished; — առնել, to make suffer famine, to famish, to starve.

Title: Սովալլուկ
Definition_1: famished, suffering from famine or hunger.

Title: Սովամահ
Definition_1: dying of starvation; — առնել, to starve to death; — կորնչել, լինել, cf. Սովամահիմ.

Title: Սովամահիմ
Definition_1: to be starved to death, to die of hunger.

Title: Սովիմ
Definition_1: to be tormented with famine, with hunger, to be famished, starved, to suffer through hunger.

Title: Սովոր
Definition_1: accustomed, used to, inured, trained; customary, usual, habitual, wont; familiar; — լինել, to be accustomed or used to; որպէս — էր, as he was wont to, as he was in the habit of.

Title: Սովորաբար
Definition_1: habitually, as usual, customarily, ordinarily, commonly, usually, mostly, generally.

Title: Սովորական
Definition_1: usual, common, ordinary, customary, habitual, familiar.

Title: Սովորականութիւն
Definition_1: the being usual; the becoming habitual.

Title: Սովորիմ
Definition_1: to be accustomed, habituated, to get used or inured, to grow familiar with, to be in the habit or practice of, to take a bent, to practise; — հրոյ, to become accustomed to the fire; — աշխատութեան, to become inured to, to inure oneself to labour, to become industrious; յանիրաւութիւն —, to become obdurate or hardened in iniquity.

Title: Սովորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to accustom, to habituate; to bring up, to train, to form, to teach.

Title: Սովորութիւն
Definition_1: custom, habits, manners, usage, practice, use, bent; արդի, նոր —, mode, new fashion; հնացեալ —ք, ancient customs; տարադէպ, դժպատեհ —, abuse, corrupt practice; չար, յոռի, գարշ —, bad habit, ugly way, sad or nasty trick; ընդ սովորութեան, according to custom, as usual; ընդ ոչ սովորութեան, out of use or custom, unusual; ընդ սովորութեան իւրում, as is his wont, according to his custom; մեք չունիմք —, it is not our custom to, we are not in the habit of; երկրորդ բնութիւն է —, use is second nature; cf. Ունակութիւն.

Title: Սոր
Definition_1: hole, bore, opening, orifice, mouth; den, lair, cave, cavern;

Title: Սորամուտ
Definition_1: entering, hiding in holes and secret places; lonely, solitary; — լինել, to enter, to nestle, to creep into, to hide in, to kennel, to live retired, to lead a retired life, to withdraw into solitude.

Title: Սորեմ
Definition_1: to flow, to run out, to leak; to creep into a hole; — աչաց, to become weak, to have the sight fail or grow dim, to water, cf. Վատեմ, cf. Ծիւրեմ; սորեալ աչք, hollow, sunken eyes.

Title: Սորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to flow or fall; to weaken the sight.

Title: Սորսորեմ
Definition_1: to flow out often, abundantly; to leave the ranks, to be dispersed, to disband.

Title: Սուգ
Definition_1: mourning; grief, sorrow, affliction, weeping, sadness; աւուրք սգոյ, time of mourning; հանդերձ սգոյ, mourning clothes; — առնուլ, ունել, to go into mourning, to wear mourning, cf. Սգամ; to be sunk in grief, to be desolate, afflicted; ի — մտանել, լինել, նստիլ, to be in mourning; — զգենուլ, to put on mourning, to be clad in mourning; թողուլ զ—, to leave off mourning, to go out of mourning; — առնուլ ի վերայ ուրուք, to mourn for, to weep over, to bewail; ի — համակեալ կալ ընդ, to be inconsolable for; ի — դառնութեան ընկղմեալ կայր, he gave himself up to bitter grief; cf. Ընկղմիմ.

Title: Սուզեմ
Definition_1: to plunge, to sink, to immerge; to cover, to hide.

Title: Սուզիմ
Definition_1: to be plunged under, sunk; to be hidden, lost, to disappear, to perish.

Title: Սուլեմ
Definition_1: to whistle; to hiss, to receive with hisses.

Title: Սուղ
Definition_1: little; brief, short, succinct, concise; *dear, high-priced;
Definition_3: an Armenian note; — ինչ, իմն or մի, a little, cf. Փոքր ինչ, cf. Խուն մի, cf. Սակաւ մի; — ինչ յառաջ, some time before; — ինչ կանխագոյն, a little before; — ինչ զկնի, some time after; յաւելից այլ եւս — ինչ, one word more; ի — բանս, — բանիւ, in few words; — իշխանութիւն, իշխանք, cf. Սակաւապետութիւն.

Title: Սունկն
Definition_3: sonchus, sow-thistle; — թունաւոր, toadstool; համեմանք ի սնկոյ, mushroom sauce, ketchup; ածու սնկոյ, mushroom bed.

Title: Սուսեր
Definition_1: sword, glaive, sabre, falchion, blade, brand; — միասայրի, backsword; — սուին, side arms, edge or steel weapons;
Definition_2: — աղուեսու, erysimum, hedge-mustard; կամար —ի, sword-bolt; ժապաւէն —ի, sword-knot; յարդարիչ —ի, sword-cutle; հարուած —ի, sword-thrust; մերկանալ զ—, to draw one's sword; կռուել —աւ, to fight with swords; ի սայր —ի, at the sword's point; —ի ձեռին, sword in hand; cf. Մէջ; cf. Սուր.

Title: Սուսերահար առնեմ
Definition_1: to wound or kill with a sword.

Title: Սուսերահար լինիմ
Definition_1: to be wounded or killed with a swordthrust.

Title: Սուսերաձիգ
Definition_1: drawing the sword, able, fit for war;

Title: Սուսերամարտիկ
Definition_1: swordsman; gladiator; — լինել, to fight sword in hand.

Title: Սուսր
Definition_1: ruddle, red ochre or lead, minium.

Title: Սուտ
Definition_3: falsely; թեթեւ —, white lie; innocent falsehood; — երդումն, perjury, false oath; — վկայ, false witness; — քրիստոսք, false christs, antichrists; ամենեւին —, absolutely false; — խօսել, ասել, to tell untruths, to lie; — առնել or ի — հանել, to contradict most flatly, to give the lie to, to shew the falsehood of, to deny, to gainsay, cf. Ստացուցանեմ; ի — հանել զկայսրն, to deny the accusation made before the emperor; եդաք — զյոյսն մեր, we trusted in lies.

Title: Սուտակասպաս
Definition_1: cf. Սուտակասպասու; սուտակասպաս լինիմ, cf. Կեղծաւորանամ.

Title: Սուտակասպասեմ
Definition_1: to flatter artfully, to toady, to cajole, to blandish, to wheedle.

Title: Սուր
Definition_1: sharp, pointed, piercing, cutting, trenchant; penetrative, acute, perspicacious, keen, subtle, lively;
Definition_3: sharply;
Definition_4: acute accent; — ձայն, sharp sound, shrill voice; — ազք, ակն, keen sight; — ականջ, sharp ear; — համ, acrid savour; — ցաւ, acute pain; — ունկն կալջիր խրատու հօր քոյ, be most attentive to your father's advice.

Title: Սուր
Definition_1: sword, sabre, glaive, rapier, steel, knife;
Definition_2: plague; bulimymus. an Armenian note; ի — սուսերի մաշել, ընդ — հանել, կոտորել ի —, to put to the sword, to kill, to destroy, to perish; զսրով երթալ, to fall on a sword; ի — արկանել, to put to the sword; հարկանել սրով սուսերի, to strike with the edge of the sword; սրով վախճանիլ, to perish by the sword; — ի կող or ի կողս ուրուք ձգել, to run one through, to plunge a sword in the adversary's side, to bury a dagger in a person's heart; անկանիլ ի — սուսերի, to fall under the edge of the sword; ի — անկանիլ, to fall by the sword; — ի կող ընկերի իւրոյ ձգել, to kill each other with the sword; ընդ ինքեանց —ն ելանել, to fall on their own swords, to commit suicide.

Title: Սուրամ
Definition_1: to run swiftly, speedily, to dash, to rush or fall upon, to dart, to gallop, to rush down or headlong.

Title: Սուրբ
Definition_1: holy, sacred; pure, clean, exempt, spotless, stainless, immaculate; divine, godly, innocent;
Definition_3: holily; —ն սրբոց, the Holy of Holies; — առնել, to sanctify, to purify; — առնել զաստուած, to glorify God; — առնել զանձն, to offer, consecrate or devote oneself.

Title: Սուրհանդակ
Definition_1: courier, express, messenger, estafet; cf. Երթամ.

Title: Սուրճ
Definition_1: coffee; — անապակ, black -; — կաթնախառն, — and milk; — ջրախառն, strong -; ժամ սրճոյ, coffee-time; եփել, ըմպել —, to make, to drink coffee.

Title: Սպայ
Definition_1: army, troops, warriors, cavalry; officer; —ք զօրուն, the officers of an army.

Title: Սպանանեմ
Definition_1: to kill, to slay, to put to death, to take away life, to assassinate, to massacre, to slaughter, to cut the throat of, to behead, to execute; — զմիմեանս, to kill each other; — զկրակ, to put out, to extinguish, to quench fire; cf. Ընթադրութիւն.

Title: Սպանանիմ
Definition_1: to be killed, to meet one's death.

Title: Սպանդ
Definition_1: murder, butchery, slaughter, massacre, carnage; immolation, sacrifice; իբրեւ զոչխար ի —, like sheep for the slaughter.

Title: Սպանդագործեմ
Definition_1: to immolate, to sacrifice victims or animals.

Title: Սպանդարամետական
Definition_1: of Bacchus, bacchic, convivial, drinking; — պաշտամունք, convivial meeting, libations, drinking bout; —ք, dionysia, dionysiaca, bacchanals, orgies.

Title: Սպանդունիք
Definition_1: Grand Master of the slaughterers, (title of an Armenian satrap, who superintended immolations).

Title: Սպանումն
Definition_1: killing, murder, homicide, assassination; execution, butchery, slaughter, carnage, massacre.

Title: Սպառ
Definition_2: —, ի —, totally, entirely, quite, all, thoroughly; մինչեւ ի —, to the last extremity, utterly; մինչեւ ի — ազգին, արշակունեաց, till the extinction of the dynasty of the Arsacides; մինչեւ ի — շնչոյն, to the last breath; — եբարձ զայն ի միջոյ, he achieved its destruction; ի սպառ, to the end; finally, at length, at last; fully, altogether, wholly, entirely, quite.

Title: Սպառազէն
Definition_1: armed at all points, armed from head to foot, cap-a-pie.

Title: Սպառազինեմ
Definition_1: to arm, to arm at all points, totally; to equip, to fit out.

Title: Սպառազինիմ
Definition_1: to buckle on one's armour, to be clad in armour, to be armed cap-a-pie.

Title: Սպառազինութիւն
Definition_1: complete armour, arms, accoutrements, harness, fitting out; —ք մարտի, preparatives for war.

Title: Սպառեմ
Definition_1: to exhaust, to consume, to dissipate, to absorb, to swallow up, to eat, to devour; to complete, to finish, to destroy, to ruin, to reduce to nothing.

Title: Սպառիմ
Definition_1: to be consumed, drained, exhausted; to decay, to dry up, to finish, to cease, to stop; սպառեալ էին ոգիք նոցա, they were exhausted, quite tired; սպառէր զօրութիւն նորա, he wore himself out, his strength declined.

Title: Սպառնամ
Definition_1: to threaten, to menace, to utter threats against; կործանումն —, to threaten with ruin.

Title: Սպառումն
Definition_1: exhaustion, consumption, consummation, destruction, loss; cessation, termination, term.

Title: Սպառսպուռ
Definition_2: extremely, to the last extremity, utterly, entirely, totally.

Title: Սպաս
Definition_1: service, office, function, employment; want, requisite; furniture, ornaments, trimmings, apparel, moveables, luggage, clothes, goods, service of plate, vessels, utensils; dinner-service; meats, victuals, repast, dinner, treat, feast; pomp, train, equipage; care, earnestness, solicitude; —ք եկեղեցւոյ, church ornaments, decorations, plate, chalice; ի — հայրենեաց, in the public service; — ունել, տանել, հարկանել, ի —ու կալ, to serve, to take service, to minister; — ունել կրակի, to worship fire; — տանել կռոց, to worship idols; լինել ի —ու պաշտաման ուրուք, to serve, to be in service; հարկանել, տալ ումեք զյետին —, to pay the last honours; — տանել ախտից, to obey the passions; աստուածական մատուցանել անձին —, to be one's own idol; — առնել, to attend well, to care, to keep, to guard, to watch, to spy, to lie in wait for; to eat, to dine; — ուտել or կերակրիլ, to regale, to entertain, to give an entertainment; — ա րկանել, դնել, to prepare the requisites for the Mass; զբաղեալ էր ի բազում —ու, he was oppressed by a multitude of things, he was very busy.

Title: Սպասալար
Definition_1: general of the army; — գունդ, picked cavalry.

Title: Սպասահարկութիւն
Definition_1: service, office, function; administration; վարժել ի —, to inure or accustom to service.

Title: Սպասատուն
Definition_1: cf. Սարկաւագանոց; cupboard for gold and silver plate.

Title: Սպասաւոր
Definition_1: attendant, servant, valet, domestic, waiter; lictor, usher; cf. Գործակալ.

Title: Սպասաւորական
Definition_1: belonging to servants or to service, servile;

Title: Սպասաւորեմ
Definition_1: to serve, to wait on, to assist; to administer, to bestow, to confer; — փառաց ուրուք, to serve to a person's glory; — հրամանի, to fulfil, accomplish or execute an order or command.

Title: Սպասաւորութիւն
Definition_1: service, office, ministry; administration, dispensation; — հարկանել, մատուցանել, կատարել, լնուլ, to serve, to be a servant, to do service to, to attend, to wait upon.

Title: Սպասեակ
Definition_1: cf. Սպասաւոր; guardian; assistant, helper, sick woman's nurse.

Title: Սպասեմ
Definition_1: to hope for, to expect, to wait for, to look for, to look forward to; to observe, to watch, to spy; to serve; to be reserved for.

Title: Սպեղանեմ
Definition_1: to plaster, to poultice, to put on or apply a plaster, to cure, to dress a wound, to bind up.

Title: Սպեղանի
Definition_1: plaster, poultice, salve, unguent, ointment, pomatum; diachylum, cerate, cataplasm; —ս ի վերայ դնել, cf. Սպեղանեմ.

Title: Սպի
Definition_2: stain, spot, stigma; — կեղեքածի, scratch; ածել զ—ս ի բժշկութիւն, to heal up, to cicatrize, to close.

Title: Սպիանամ
Definition_1: to skin over, to become cicatrized, healed, whole.

Title: Սպիացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to leave a scar on, to scar; to stain, to spot.

Title: Սպիտակ
Definition_2: white, white lead, ceruse; silver coin; — մարգարտեայ, pearl-powder; — զինկի, zinc-white, oxide of zinc; ի —ս, dressed in white; — առնել, to whiten.

Title: Սպիտակազգեստ
Definition_1: dressed in white; — քորք, Nuns consecrated to the Holy Virgin.

Title: Սպիտակախայտ
Definition_1: spotted with white speckled, dapple-grey, grey.

Title: Սպիտակացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to whiten, to render white, to bleach, to blanch.

Title: Սպիտակափառ
Definition_1: snowy-white, very candid, of dazzling whiteness.

Title: Սպիտակութիւն
Definition_1: whiteness, white; candidness, splendour; — հերաց, hoarness; — լանջաց, պարանոցի, snowy bosom, ivory whiteness, alabaster of the neck.

Title: Սպիտակուց
Definition_2: white scale of lepers; — աչաց, white of the eye, conjunctiva, sclerotica; — կիտի, spermaceti; cetine.

Title: Սպուգ
Definition_1: food composed of butter and of dried curds.

Title: Սպուժեմ
Definition_1: to put off, to delay, to defer, to neglect, not to care for.

Title: Սպուժումն
Definition_1: delay, deferring, temporizing; negligence, carelessness, heedlessness.

Title: Սպունգ
Definition_1: sponge; սուտ —, bastard —, alcyonium; — լսնոսկւոյ, spongy platina; սրբել, ջնջել սպնգաւ, to sponge, to clean or wipe off with a sponge; ընդ սպնգով ծածկել զերկաթ, զնետ, to admonish kindly, to warn gently.

Title: Սպրդեմ
Definition_1: to insinuate, to introduce gently, to bring in privily, to foist, to thrust on.

Title: Սպրդիմ
Definition_1: to introduce, insinuate or worm oneself in, to glide or creep into, to penetrate, to dive into.

Title: Ստաբանեմ
Definition_1: to lie, to tell lies, untruths, stories.

Title: Ստադիոն
Definition_1: stadium; furlong; զվկայութեանն —ն ստանալ, to gain the crown of martyrdom.

Title: Ստախօսութիւն
Definition_1: lying tale, fictitious story, falsehood, untruth, imposture.

Title: Ստահակ
Definition_1: wrongheaded, headstrong, petulant, insubordinate, undisciplined; impertinent, insolent; knavish, rascally, roguish; —ս իմանալ, to rebel.

Title: Ստահակեմ
Definition_1: to grow insolent, to become a rascal, to disobey, to revolt, to plague, to behave badly.

Title: Ստահակութիւն
Definition_1: waywardness, insolence, petulance, insubordination, mutiny; ստահակութեամբ գնալ, to behave in a disorderly manner.

Title: Ստամբակ
Definition_1: indocile, morose, disobedient, reluctant, untractable, froward, restive; austere, rude, harsh, rigorous, severe.

Title: Ստամբակեմ
Definition_1: to oppose, to resist, to be obstinate, to disobey, to rebel, to be insolent.

Title: Ստամբակութիւն
Definition_1: indocility, disobedience, insolence, rebellion; rudeness, severity, rigour.

Title: Ստամոք
Definition_1: stomach; belly; ոչ գոյ յիս — կերակրոյ, I have a weak digestion; — իմ ցաւէ, I have the stomach-ache.

Title: Ստամոքացաւ
Definition_1: having a pain in the stomach;

Title: Ստայօդ
Definition_1: suppositious, false, feigned, fictitious, artificial, invented, fabulous, imaginary, chimerical, romantic, story-telling.

Title: Ստանամ
Definition_1: to acquire, to gain, to obtain, to get; to have, to possess, to hold; to purchase, to buy; to create; վերստին —, to regain, to re-acquire, to recover; փառս —, to achieve glory.

Title: Ստաշխն
Definition_1: storax; essence or oil of myrrh.

Title: Ստացուած
Definition_1: purchase, acquisition, property, possessions, goods, substance, power; creature.

Title: Ստացուածաշատութիւն
Definition_1: great quantity of goods; cf. Ընչաւէտութիւն.

Title: Ստացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to possess or acquire;

Title: Սըտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to prove to be false, to render vain, to adulterate.

Title: Ստեղեմ
Definition_1: to collocate, to place, to settle, to establish.

Title: Ստեղծաբանեմ
Definition_1: to invent, to find out, to forge.

Title: Ստեղծանեմ
Definition_1: to create, to produce from nothing, to form, to figure; to find out, to invent, to contrive, to forge.

Title: Ստեղն
Definition_1: branch, bough, shoot; stalk, stem, trunk;
Definition_3: dactyle;
Definition_4: key, stop; cf. Ստեղի;
Definition_5: umbel; — ծխոյ, pillar of smoke; ստեղունք աշտանակաց, branches of a candelabrum; ստեղունք եղջերուաց, antlers or branches of stags' horns; ստեղունք դաշնակի, keys, key-board, finger-board of a piano-forte; — արձակել, to branch out, to ramify.

Title: Ստեղնիմ
Definition_1: to shoot, to sprout, to bud forth, to pullulate, to grow.

Title: Ստեմ
Definition_1: to lie, to fib, to tell untruths, stories, to impose upon; to give the lie to, to belie; — ուխտին, to break one's promise, word or vow.

Title: Ստեպղին
Definition_1: carrot; վայրենի —, parsnip; վայրի —, madder, athamantha.

Title: Ստերիւրեմ
Definition_1: to lead astray, to turn aside, to put out of the right way, to cause to err, to pervert; to distort, to wrest, to misinterpret, to misconstrue.

Title: Ստերիւրիմ
Definition_1: to go astray, to be led astray, to leave the right path, to wander, to err, to fail.

Title: Ստերջիմ
Definition_1: to become sterile, barren, to be past breeding.

Title: Ստէպ
Definition_3: frequently, often, instantly; — —, quickly, hastily; very often, continually, incessantly; ստիպաւ or —պով, in haste, in a hurry, quick, fast, with great speed or alacrity; eagerly, hotly; — կալ, to persevere in, to be assiduous, steadfast in, constant in, to apply or addict oneself to, cf. Հանապազորդեմ

Title: Ստին
Definition_2: source, spring; ի ստեան, at the breast; մանուկ ի ստեան, sucking-child; գօտեւորեալ առ ստեամբ, girt about the paps; կերակրել ստեամբ, to suckle, to give suck, to give the breast to; դիել զ—ս, to suck, to draw the breast; cf. Հատուցանեմ; անկանիլ ստեանցն, forming or rounding of the breasts in adolescence; եռալ ստեանց, to give milk; ի ծուծ ստեանցն կախեալ, hanging to her breast; —ք անկան քեզ, thy breast are fashioned; յոյս իմ ի ստեանց մօր իմոյ, my hope from my mother's womb.

Title: Ստիպեմ
Definition_1: to press, to constrain, to oblige, to force, to necessitate, to pursue closely; to solicit, to urge, to hasten, to hurry, to expediate.

Title: Ստիպիմ
Definition_1: to be pressed, constrained, forced, obliged; to make haste, to hurry; ստիպիմ ի սիրոյ սրտիս, I cannot resist the desire to.

Title: Ստիքերոն
Definition_1: verse; հինգ — գիրք, the five poetical books of the Bible.

Title: Ստիքսեմ
Definition_1: to put or divide in verses, to versify.

Title: Ստնանեմ
Definition_1: to surmount, to prevail; to hurt, to injure, to wrong, to prejudice, to damage.

Title: Ստնգամ
Definition_1: to be taken with a spasm.

Title: Ստնդիաց
Definition_1: at the breast, sucking; — տղայ, sucking-child; — հասակ, infancy.

Title: Ստողոգի
Definition_1: chanting of the psalms by alternate voices.

Title: Ստոմանի
Definition_1: pot, pitcher; — մի մեղու, a cruse of honey.

Title: Ստոյգ
Definition_1: true, just, certain, sure, indubitable, assured, positive, infallible, veritable, real, authentic, genuine;
Definition_2: surely, certainly, assuredly, to be sured, by all means.

Title: Ստոր
Definition_1: bottom, the under or lower part; ի —, under, underneath, below; ի —է, from under, from below or beneath; downwards; ի ստորեւ, ի ստորէ, cf. Ստոր.

Title: Ստորագրեմ
Definition_1: to subscribe; to sign; to depict, to describe; to trace, to figure, to design.

Title: Ստորադասեմ
Definition_1: to submit, to place or put under; to subordinate; to subdue, to overcome.

Title: Ստորակայ
Definition_1: subaltern, inferior, subject, subordinate, serving; sublunary, terrestrial.

Title: Ստորակտուր առնեմ
Definition_1: to shorten, to dock, to cut, to retrench.

Title: Ստորային
Definition_1: inferior; terrestrial, mundane; —ք, terrestrials, mortals, mankind.

Title: Ստորանկիմ
Definition_1: to fall down, to precipitate; to fall under, to submit, to yield, to be subject to, to undergo.

Title: Ստորասեմ
Definition_1: to affirm, to say yes, to consent, to confirm.

Title: Ստորասուզեմ
Definition_1: submerge, to immerse, to send to the bottom, to ingulf.

Title: Ստորեւ
Definition_3: — or ի —, under, beneath, underneath, down, below.

Title: Ստորին
Definition_1: inferior, low; lower part or end, bottom; subterranean; tartarus, hell; — հայք, Lower Armenia; — ասորիք, Coelesyria; —ք երկրի, bowels of the earth; ի —ս մտանել, to set, to go down, to disappear.

Title: Ստորոգեմ
Definition_1: to specify, to express; to ascribe, to attribute.

Title: Ստորոտ
Definition_1: foot of a mountain; skirt of a robe or cloak; train of a gown; առ —ով լերինն, at the foot of the mountain.

Title: Ստորոտաքարշ
Definition_1: trailing one's gown, clothed in trailing robes; — պատմուճան, trailing gown; — ճեմելիք, promenade in gown and train.

Title: Ստուար
Definition_1: large, great, voluminous; thick, dense; strong, lusty;
Definition_2: harsh, close; — գունդ, բանակ, numerous, powerful army; — ծանրութիւն, great weight.

Title: Ստուարակարկատ
Definition_1: made of massive pieces or stones; very large, very voluminous.

Title: Ստուարանամ
Definition_1: to thicken, to grow thick or large, to enlarge; to become or grow larger, bigger, stouter, fatter; to increase in size, to grow.

Title: Ստուարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to thicken, to enlarge; to augment, to increase;

Title: Ստուգաբանեմ
Definition_1: to tell the truth; to verify, to explain; to trace the etymology or derivation of a word.

Title: Ստուգագէտ
Definition_1: knowing thoroughly, well informed; certain, sure, true, certified, verified.

Title: Ստուգագրեմ
Definition_1: to write with certainty; to rectify.

Title: Ստուգահմուտ
Definition_1: very erudite, learned, most expert or skilful.

Title: Ստուգապէս
Definition_1: certainly, truly, verily, in truth, without doubt.

Title: Ստուգեմ
Definition_1: to certify, to verify, to assure, to affirm, to aver, to prove; to examine thoroughly, to inform oneself of the truth of, to enquire, to ascertain; to trace etymologies.

Title: Ստուեր
Definition_2: shadow, figure, sign; —ք, shade, manes, ghost, spectre, spirit; սին —, vain shadow; —ք մահու, shades of death; the dark grave; —ք գիշերոյ, the shades of night; — երեկորին, the evening shades; — եւ լոյս ի նկարս (լուսաստուեր), light and shade in painting, chiaro-oscuro; — արկանել ի նկարս, to shade a drawing; իբրեւ զ— անցանել, to pass away like a shadow; իբրեւ զ— են կեանք մարդոյ, life is but a fleeting shadow.

Title: Ստուերաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak darkly, with a veiled meaning.

Title: Ստուերագրեմ
Definition_1: to sketch, to rough-draw, to delineate, to trace; to draw, to represent, to figure.

Title: Ստուերածս ածեմ
Definition_1: to darken, to throw into the shade, to eclipse, to offuscate, to obscure, to dim, to tarnish.

Title: Ստուերական
Definition_1: shady, shadowy, obscure; figurative, symbolical; cf. Ստուերանիստ.

Title: Ստուերամած
Definition_1: covered with shadow, shadowed, shady, dark, obscure.

Title: Ստուերանամ
Definition_1: to be covered with shadow, immersed in shade, darkened, obscured; to grow cloudy, dark.

Title: Ստուերանստեալ
Definition_1: sitting in the shade; living in obscurity.

Title: Ստուերարկեմ
Definition_1: to shadow, to shade; to shade a drawing.

Title: Ստուերացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cover with shadow, to shadow, to shade, to darken, to obscure; to hide, to veil, to overshadow; to give shade.

Title: Ստութիւն
Definition_1: falsehood, untruth, story, fib, falseness, falsity; ցուցանել զ—, to give the lie to; to belie.

Title: Ստունգանեմ
Definition_1: not to like listen to, or consent to, to disobey, to contravene.

Title: Ստրատիգիոն
Definition_1: general's tent, habitation, or quarters, head-quarters.

Title: Ստրկանամ
Definition_1: to be or become a slave, a servant.

Title: Ստրկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to slavery, to enslave, to enthrall.

Title: Ստրուկ
Definition_1: slave; vassal, subject, serf; servant; — ընդոծին, slave born in the house.

Title: Ստրջանամ
Definition_1: to repent, to regret, to rue, to be seized with repentance, touched with contrition.

Title: Ստրջումն
Definition_1: repentance, regret, concern, sorrow, grief, remorse, compunction.

Title: Սրազէն
Definition_1: armed with sharp weapons; — կառք, chariots armed with scythes.

Title: Սրահ
Definition_1: drawing-room, hall, saloon; curtain; church-porch, portico, court; corridor.

Title: Սրահակ
Definition_1: small hall; small curtain, hanging, tapestry, arras; — հարսանց, curtained bed.

Title: Սրամ
Definition_1: to desire earnestly, to long for, to sigh after.

Title: Սրամահ առնեմ
Definition_1: to kill with a sword, to put to the edge of the sword.

Title: Սրամէտ
Definition_1: acuminated, pointed; very sharp or cold.

Title: Սրամիտ
Definition_1: acute-minded, sharp-witted, clear-sighted, subtle, penetrating, quick, ingenious.

Title: Սրամտութիւն
Definition_1: acumen, acuteness, clear-sightedness, subtilty, perspicuity, penetration, sagacity.

Title: Սրանամ
Definition_1: to be pointed, sharp, to end in a point; to pass rapidly, to fly, to go quickly, to fleet away, to rush on, to precipitate, to rush on headlong; to be soured, exasperated, to chafe at; ի բաց —, to disappear, to fly away, to vanish.

Title: Սրավար
Definition_1: moving quickly, rapid, swift, impetuous, violent.

Title: Սրավարիմ
Definition_1: to go swiftly, to run rapidly, to hasten.

Title: Սրարբեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to charm, to astound, to stun.

Title: Սրբաբանեմ
Definition_1: to sing the Trisagium, to sanctify, to hallow, to laud.

Title: Սրբադեղ
Definition_1: purgative; — առնուլ, to take a purgative, to purge; — տալ, to purge.

Title: Սրբազանեմ
Definition_1: to consecrate; to deify, to idolize.

Title: Սրբազգեստ
Definition_1: clothed in a holy or white raiment; holy, pious, godly, divine.

Title: Սրբալոյս
Definition_1: enlightening the spirit, of spiritual light, pure, holy.

Title: Սրբակրօն
Definition_1: irreproachable, pure, chaste, godly, saintly, saint-like, holy.

Title: Սրբահամ
Definition_1: calm and gentle, clear and sweet.

Title: Սրբամտեմ
Definition_1: to have a pure heart or mind.

Title: Սրբանամ
Definition_1: to be holy, sacred, consecrated or set apart, to consecrate or devote oneself.

Title: Սրբասուն
Definition_1: brought up in piety, godly, pure.

Title: Սրբատեսիլ
Definition_1: seeing clearly; of calm, pure, holy aspect.

Title: Սրբարար
Definition_1: sanctifying, saving, wholesome; — շնորհք, sanctifying or saving grace.

Title: Սրբացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to sanctify; to consecrate; to canonize.

Title: Սրբափայլ
Definition_1: shining in holiness, pure, clean, holy.

Title: Սրբաքնութիւն
Definition_1: inquisition; ատեան սրբաքնութեան, the Inquisition, the Holy Office.

Title: Սրբեմ
Definition_1: to sanctify, to consecrate; to purify; to clean, to wipe off, to wipe dry, to spunge up; to expiate; to offer, to dedicate; to observe, to keep religiously;
Definition_2: to absterge, to cleanse, to deterge; — զմօրուս, to shave the beard; — զեղնգունս, to pare the nails; — զուռս, to prune, to lop; հրով —, to refine by fire; — զցորեան, to winnow.

Title: Սրբիչ
Definition_3: razor; — ձեռաց, towel; — բաժակի, the purificatory.

Title: Սրբութիւն
Definition_1: holiness; purification; purity, cleanliness, neatness; expiation; offering; sanctuary; *Communion;
Definition_3: abstersion; սրբութեանց or — սրբոց, the Holy of Holies; — սրբութեանց or սուրբ սրբութեանց, most sacred; յարկ սրբութեան, temple, church; — ձեր, Your Holiness; սրբութեամբ, holily.

Title: Սրեմ
Definition_1: to grind, to sharpen, to whet, to point, to set, to give an edge, to acuminate;
Definition_2: to spur, goad or urge on, to stimulate, to rouse up, to excite, to stir.

Title: Սրընթաց
Definition_1: running or flowing violently, impetuous, rapid; — գետ, rapid river; —իւք գալ, to hasten, to run with the utmost haste.

Title: Սրիկայ
Definition_1: ruffian, rascal, scoundrel, varlet, hired-assassin, brigand.

Title: Սրինգ
Definition_1: flute; flageolet; fife; syringe; — հաւորսաց, bird-call; — հովուական, shepherd's pipe, reed; նուագել սրնգաւ, to play the flute; to pipe.

Title: Սրնգեմ
Definition_1: to play the flute; to hiss, to whistle; to bray.

Title: Սրուակ
Definition_1: phial, flagon, bottle; cruet; gauge; — վիրաբուժից, cupping-glass.

Title: Սրութիւն
Definition_1: sharpness, acuteness, keenness, point; subtilty; rapidity, velocity, speed, celerity; — մտաց, acumen; — ձայնի, shrillness.

Title: Սրսկապան
Definition_1: cabinet, lady's private room, boudoir; nuptial bed, thalamus; bed-curtain.

Title: Սրսկեմ
Definition_1: to sprinkle, to be —, to asperse, to water, to spill, to shed, to spirt out, to bathe lightly.

Title: Սրտաբեկ
Definition_1: broken-hearted, discouraged, dejected, despondent; astonished, frightened; — առնել, to dishearten, to discourage, to deject, to take away a person's courage, to disconcert; to dismay, to frighten, to strike with astonishment; — լինել, to be broken-hearted, disheartened, down cast, dispirited, desponding, to lose or want courage; to be frightened, dismayed.

Title: Սրտակաթ
Definition_1: very desirous, anxious, longing for, amorous; — առնել, to make one's mouth water; to inflame with desire, to enamor.

Title: Սրտակիզեմ
Definition_1: to grieve deeply, to break one's heart; to rend the heart, to harrow.

Title: Սրտանամ
Definition_1: to take heart or courage, to be inspirited.

Title: Սրտաշարժ
Definition_1: pity-stirring or heart-stirring, pitiable, grievous, touching, moving, affecting.

Title: Սրտապախ առնեմ
Definition_1: to strike with consternation, to terrify, to appall.

Title: Սրտապախ լինիմ
Definition_1: to be struck with terror, to be dismayed, greatly afraid.

Title: Սրտապնդեմ
Definition_1: to re-animate, to encourage, to inspire with courage, to revive, to put new spirits into, to raise again or restore a person's spirits.

Title: Սրտապնդիմ
Definition_1: to be re-animated, to take courage, to recover one's spirits.

Title: Սրտառիմ
Definition_1: to take to heart, to get angry, to chafe.

Title: Սրտառուչ
Definition_1: touching the heart, moving, affecting, tender; touched, moved; eager, desirous, burning for; angry, displeased, shocked, wounded, exasperated; heart-of-fending, mournful, heart-piercing.

Title: Սրտատես
Definition_1: knowing the thoughts of the heart.

Title: Սրտատրոփ
Definition_1: palpitating, trembling for; desirous, longing for.

Title: Սրտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: cf. Սրտապնդեմ; to affect, to touch.

Title: Սրտեայ
Definition_1: courageous, intrepid, spirited, bold, lively; այր —, a man of heart.

Title: Սրտմտիմ
Definition_1: to lose one's temper, to be angry, out of all patience, indignant, in a passion, provoked, irritated, exasperated, enraged; սրտմտեցաւ բարկութիւն նորա յոյժ, he was seized with rage.

Title: Սրտմտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make angry, to put in a passion, to irritate, to enrage, to exasperate, to put out of all patience to excite to anger, to vex, to plague.

Title: Սրտմտութիւն
Definition_1: indignation, passion, vexation, anger, ire, spite, wrath, rage; շիջուցանել զբոց սրտմտութեան, to stifle, smother or suppress the fire of one's indignation; cf. Հրաբորբոք.

Title: Սփածանիմ
Definition_1: to put on an apron, to gird oneself with a cloth; to put on, or to wear a dressing-gown; քուրձս —, to clothe oneself in sack-cloth or hair-cloth.

Title: Սփիւռ
Definition_2: scattered about, spread here and there; — ծախիւք, profusely, with great expense, splendidly;
Definition_3: —ք, dispersion, spreading out, scattering; the Sporades; dispersed nations; ի —ս ծաւալել, to disperse, scatter or spread everywhere.

Title: Սփոփանք
Definition_1: relief, alleviation, solace, ease, consolation, soothing, comfort, balm; diversion, recreation.

Title: Սփոփեմ
Definition_1: to relieve, to allay, to ease, to soothe, to assuage, to console, to comfort, to soften, to appease; to rejoice, to divert, to recreate; — զվիշտս, to calm, to assuage, to charm away, to beguile one's sorrow or grief.

Title: Սփռեմ
Definition_1: to spread, to disseminate, to disperse, to scatter, to strew, to sow, to propagate, to diffuse; to pour out or forth, to open; սփռել ծաղիկս, to strew with flowers.

Title: Սքանչանամ
Definition_1: to admire, to be admired, astonished, amazed, surprised, to wonder at, to marvel, to be wonderstruck, entranced, in extacy.

Title: Սքանչացումն
Definition_1: admiration, wonder, astonishment, amazement, ravishment, extacy.

Title: Սքանչացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render admirable, to make wonderful, to astonish, to surprise, to amaze, to ravish, to strike with wonder, to enrapture.

Title: Սքանչելագեղ
Definition_1: of surprising beauty, charming, graceful, fine.

Title: Սքանչելագործեմ
Definition_1: to do wonderful things, to work miracles; to do miraculously or wonderfully well.

Title: Սքանչելագործութիւն
Definition_1: doing wonders, working miracles; prodigy, miracle, portent.

Title: Սքանչելազօր
Definition_1: of prodigious power, wonderfully strong, admirable in strength; omnipotent.

Title: Սքանչելակերպ
Definition_1: astonishing, surprising; of an admirable form or aspect.

Title: Սքանչելաշուք
Definition_1: wonderful, superb, majestic, very glorious, imposing.

Title: Սքանչելապատում
Definition_1: related or told wonderfully well; cf. Հրաշապատում.

Title: Սքանչելապէս
Definition_1: admirably, delightfully, astonishingly, marvelously, wonderfully, divinely, excellently, pre-eminently, to admiration; by a miracle, miraculously, prodigiously.

Title: Սքանչելատեսիկ
Definition_1: charming, ravishing, beautiful to behold, imposing, delighting the eye, graceful, superb.

Title: Սքանչելի
Definition_1: admirable, wonderful, astonishing, surprising; prodigious, marvelous, miraculous; charming, excellent.

Title: Սքանչելիք
Definition_1: sign, miracle; prodigy, wonder, marvel, phenomenon; —լիս առնել, to perform or work miracles;
Definition_3: ով —լեացս, wonderful ! marvelous ! stupendous ! good Heavens ! Goodness gracious !.

Title: Սքանչումն
Definition_1: admiration, wonder; ի — չումն կրթիլ, to be amazed, astonished, surprised.

Title: Սքեմ
Definition_1: monk's dress, monkish habit; cf. Ձեւ; — առնուլ, to become friar, to turn monk; (կուսանաց) to take the veil; թողուլ զ—, to throw off the cowl; ոչ եթէ — ինչ առնէ կրօնաւոր, it is not the cowl that makes the friar.

Title: Սքեմարկէք
Definition_1: the ceremony of giving or taking the habit or the veil.

Title: *Սքլիմ
Definition_1: to be mute with fear or astonishment.

Title: Սքօղարկեմ
Definition_1: to veil, to muffle up, to cover with a veil.

Title: Սքողումն
Definition_1: act of veiling, covering, wrapping up.

Title: Սօս
Definition_1: stately, lofty, haughty, proud; clear (colour); — երիվար, high-mettled, prancing, fiery or spirited horse.

Title: Սօսափիւն
Definition_1: noise, murmur, sough, breath; trembling, agitation; — սաղարթուց, rustling of the leaves; — հողմոց, hollow or rumbling noise of the winds.

Title: <letter>Վ</letter> (vé)
Definition_1: the thirtieth letter of the alphabet, and the twenty fourth of the consonants; three thousand, three thousandth.

Title: Վագր
Definition_1: tiger; մատակ —, tigress; կորիւն վագեր, tiger cub.

Title: Վազ
Definition_1: course; leap, jump, gambol, caper, antics, gallop; palpitation;
Definition_3: ի —, — առ —, swiftly, at full speed; by fits and starts; —ս առնուլ, to run, to gallop, to gambol, to frisk about, to play antics.

Title: Վազեմ
Definition_1: to run swiftly, impetuously; to leap, to bound, to spring or dart forward, to clear at a single bound; to overstep, to surpass, to transgress, to trespass; — սրտի, to flutter, to throb, to palpitate; — զոմամբ, to revolt against; to despise; ի բաց —, to pass away, to fly away; յօրէնսն —, to inveigh against the law; վազեալ անցանել, to overpass, to cross, to leap over, to outleap; յազատութեանն փառս, to lift up the horns against, to rebel, to rise in rebellion; to get proud, to become presumptuous.

Title: Վազվազեմ
Definition_1: to skip or frisk about, to run here and there.

Title: Վազք
Definition_1: cf. Սահանք, վազս առնուլ, cf. Վազեմ, cf. Ընթանամ.

Title: Վախ
Definition_2: — ի —է, steep, cragged; ի —ից արկանել, ընկենուլ, մղել or հոսել, to precipitate, to throw headlong down; անկանիլ or մղիլ ի —ից, to be cast down a precipice.

Title: Վախճան
Definition_1: end, term; end, scope, object; issue, event, end, result; accomplishment, finishing, conclusion, close; end, extremity; end, demise, decease, death, exit; ցմեծ —, long time, a long while;
Definition_2: —, ի —ի, in fine, finally, at last, at length, after all, in the last place; ց-, to the end; ի — ամին, at the year's end; ի —ի աւուրց, in the future; ի — աւուրցս այսոցիկ, in these latter times; — բանիս, in a word; the pith of my argument; — եհաս նմա, he died; ընկալաւ զարժանահասն —, he died as he merited; ի — կենաց իւրոց, in his last days, towards the close of his life; մերձ ի — լինել, to be at one's final agony; — առնուլ, to draw to a close or end, to cease, to end, to expire; — առնել, to make an end of, to put an end or term to, to come to a conclusion, to decide, to end; առնել զոք ի —, to send to perdition, to put to death; — դնել, to bring to a close, to conclude, to terminate, to finish, to end.

Title: Վախճանեմ
Definition_1: to finish, to put an end to, to terminate, to end, to conclude, to accomplish, to achieve, to consummate; to execute, to kill; — զաւուրսն, զկեանս, —նեալ զաւուրս իւր մեռանել, to end one's days, one's life, to make one's exit, to depart this life, to die.

Title: Վախճանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to take away life, to slay, to put to death, to kill.

Title: Վախճանիմ
Definition_1: to pass from life to death, to expire, to breathe one's last, to die; to be finished, consumed, to be drawing to a close, to terminate, to end; — լցեալ աւուրբք, to die full of years, to die very old;

Title: Վակաս
Definition_1: superhumeral, amice or amict of the Armenian priests; ephod, high priest's girdle; — լանջանոց, deacon's stole.

Title: Վակասաւոր
Definition_1: wearing an amice or an ephod.

Title: Վակժուժեմ
Definition_1: to grapple, to clutch strongly with the hand, to lock one's arms round, to hug, to hold fast on, to cling to.

Title: Վահան
Definition_1: shield, pavice, buckler; cf. Կումբ; բառնալիք —ի, handle of a shield; հաւատոյ, օրինաց —, shield, defender of the faith, or the law;

Title: Վահանակ
Definition_1: small shield, target; shield-shaped clasp; tinsel, spangle; — երեսաց, visor.

Title: Վահանաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be armed or furnished with a buckler.

Title: Վահանափակ
Definition_2: trench fortified with shields; — առնել, to cover, protect or defend with a buckler.

Title: Վահանընկէց լինիմ
Definition_1: to throw away the shield, to throw down one's arms.

Title: Վաղ
Definition_2: anciently, formerly, once on a time; early, betimes, soon, quick;
Definition_3: tomorrow; — քաջ, very early; — քաջ ընդ առաւօտն, at the break of day or of dawn, at the peep of day, very early in the morning, at dawn; — ուրեմն, in bygone times, of old, long ago, a long time ago; ի — ժամանակս, anciently, formerly; ի — ժամանակաց, time out of mind; — ընդ փոյթ, soon, quick; forthwith, directly; — կամ անագան, եթէ — եթէ անագան, sooner or later; ոչ կարի — ոչ յոյժ անագան, neither too soon nor too late; ո՞չ — իսկ ասացի քեզ, did I not tell you before ?.

Title: Վաղագոյն
Definition_1: sooner; prior, before; քան զբանն — եղեւ գործն, no sooner said than done.

Title: Վաղակաւոր
Definition_1: dagger, poniard; sword, sabre, hanger, cutlass, scimitar;
Definition_2: sworded, armed with a sword or dagger.

Title: Վաղահաս
Definition_1: arriving early, quick, prompt; early, precocious, premature, untimely.

Title: Վաղամահուկ
Definition_1: dying prematurely, young; — լինել, to die prematurely, young, before the time, in the bloom of one's youth, in the prime of life.

Title: Վաղայարոյց
Definition_1: early-riser; — լինել, to be up very early.

Title: Վաղանցուկ
Definition_1: passing, transitory, perishable, ephemeral, fugitive, instantaneous, momentary.

Title: Վաղիւ
Definition_1: tomorrow, next day, the following day; —, ի —, ի — անդր, the morrow, the day after, on the morrow, tomorrow; ի — անդր յետ մահու նորա, the day after his death; վասն երկիւղի վաղուեանն, for fear of the future; զկնի վաղուին, after tomorrow; ի միւս —ն, ի միւսում —, the day after tomorrow; վաղուենէ ի — առնել, to put off from day to day.

Title: Վաղնջուց
Definition_1: ancient, old; ի — or ի հետէ, anciently, formerly, long since; ի — ժամանակաց, of yore, time out of mind, from time immemorial.

Title: Վաղուեան
Definition_1: of tomorrow; ի վաղորդեայն աւուրն, the day following; ի վաղուեան գիշերին, tomorrow night.

Title: Վաղուց
Definition_1: ancient, old, of yore, of other times.

Title: Վաղվաղակի
Definition_1: soon, directly, suddenly, incontinently, immediately, in haste, in a hurry.

Title: Վաղվաղեմ
Definition_1: to haste, to hasten, to be in haste, to make haste, to be quick, to be hasty or precipitate.

Title: Վաղվաղուն
Definition_1: hasty, quick, lively, brisk, ready, speedy, prompt, precipitate.

Title: Վաղցասումն
Definition_1: easily offended, touchy, hasty, irascible, passionate, wrathful; — լինել, to be hasty, irascible, quick to get angry, easily provoked.

Title: Վաճառ
Definition_1: business, trade, commerce, dealings, merchandise, goods, wares, commodities; market, sale, purchase; market-place, hall, mart, fair; —ք, provisions; cf. Մեծաքանակ; փոքրաքանակ —, retail trade; ի — արկանել, to sell, to put up or offer for sale; — լինել, to be sold, to be on sale; cf. Հատանիմ.

Title: Վաճառական
Definition_1: merchant, trader; tradesman, shopkeeper, dealer; մեծաքանակ կամ փոքրաքանակ —, wholesale merchant, retail-dealer; cf. Նաւ.

Title: Վաճառականութիւն
Definition_1: commerce, trade, dealings, business; — առնել, to carry on commerce, to trade, to deal, to traffic.

Title: Վաճառակուր
Definition_1: selling or sold wretchedly; — առնել, to sell; — լինել, to be sold.

Title: Վաճառաշահ
Definition_2: opulent merchant, rich treader; — քաղաք, mercantile city; — լինել, to trade, to deal, to traffic, to gain.

Title: Վաճառաշահութիւն
Definition_1: gain, lucre, profit; cf. Շահավաճառութիւն; կենցաղօգուտ —, benefit that commerce confers on the world.

Title: Վաճառարկու
Definition_1: broker, middle man, agent; — ձիոց, jockey.

Title: Վաճառեմ
Definition_1: to sell, to debit, to sell off; — այսքանոյ, to sell at; քանո՞յ —ռես, how much ? what is the price ? cf. Մեծագնի; — զոք ի ձեռս ուրուք, to give up, to deliver, to betray.

Title: Վաճառիկ
Definition_1: saleable, marketable, venal; — լինել, to be sold, disposed of.

Title: Վայ
Definition_1: woe, cry of pain or grief, lament, wail, moans; disaster, calamity, misfortune; — զ—իւ աղաղակել or ճիչել, to cry bitterly, to wail, to lament aloud, to deplore, to complain; — կարդալ անձին, to create misfortunes for oneself; արդարեւ —ի են արժանի, they are truly unhappy.

Title: Վայ
Definition_1:
woe ! alas ! oh ! ah !
— քեզ, woe to you!
— ինձ, — զիս, — զինեւ, woe is me ! how unhappy I am !
— — քաղաքդ մեծ ! woe ! woe to the great city !.

Title: Վայել
Definition_2: վայել է, վայել են, վայելէ, վայելեն, to befit, to become, to be beseeming or seemly, to be proper; ոչ — են, it is not fit, it is unbecoming.

Title: Վայելեմ
Definition_1: to enjoy, to taste of, to possess, to have the enjoyment of; to relish, to taste with pleasure;
Definition_2: to become, to fit, to sit well on; to be proper, suitable, meet, to beseem; — յարգասիս քրտանց, to enjoy the fruit of one's labours; հանդերձս այս վայելէ քեզ, this coat fits you well.

Title: Վայելեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to enjoy; to cause to participate; to dress well.

Title: Վայելուչ
Definition_1: convenient, suitable, proper, congruous, pertinent, decent, becoming, fit; well made or shaped, comely, elegant, prepossessing, genteel, pretty, graceful; enjoyable, enjoying;

Title: Վայելչաբար
Definition_1: suitably, decently, properly, pertinently, aptly, justly; comely, elegantly, genteelly, prettily, graciously.

Title: Վայելչագեղ
Definition_1: very good-looking, handsome, lovely, fascinating, charming, prepossessing, graceful, fair, beautiful.

Title: Վայելչադիտակ
Definition_1: of fine aspect, well-shaped, good looking.

Title: Վայելչանամ
Definition_1: to be distinguished, to render oneself illustrious, to be remarked; to enjoy.

Title: Վայելչացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to adorn, to embellish, to decorate; to delight.

Title: Վայելչութիւն
Definition_1: suitableness, proportion, propriety, decency, conveniency; decorum, dignity, nobleness; comeliness, elegance, grace, beauty, splendour; enjoyment, use; delight, pleasure, advantage; — երեսաց, comeliness, loveliness, attractiveness.

Title: Վայելք
Definition_1: enjoyment, possession; delight, joy, pleasure; convenience.

Title: Վայեմ
Definition_1: to whine, to cry out, to deplore, to lament aloud;
Definition_2: to utter woes, to menace with woe.

Title: Վայթեմ
Definition_1: to empty, to pour out; to spread, to diffuse, to cause to flow or fall.

Title: Վայումն
Definition_1: whining, cry, shout, lamentation, groan, moan.

Title: Վայր
Definition_1:
place, spot, space, extent, part, ground; field, plain, camp, country; անհուն —ք, immense, vast spaces; յայսմ —ի, here, in this place; now; յայնմ —ի, there, in that same or very place; then; մինչեւ ցայս —, thus far, to this place; until now; յոր —, in which place, wherever; — մի, առ — մի, a short time, a moment, an instant, a little; ընդ —, in vain, vainly; ի —, below, under, beneath; cf. Զէն; cf. Վեր; յայլում —ի, somewhere else, in another place; ի վերուստ մինչեւ ի —, from top to bottom; from head to foot; գազանք —ի, wild beasts; մեղր ի —է, wild honey; ի —ի բնակել, to live in the open air, in camp; —ս հատանել, to go along way; զ—օք գալ, to go around, round about, to go here and there; զ—օք ածել զաչս, to look round about; ի մի — գալ, to assemble, to resort to one place; ընդ — հարկանել, to abandon, to forsake, to cast off, to desert; ի — հարկանել, արկանել, to disparage, to sneer at, to defame, to slander; ի — շարժել, to beat down, to overthrow; զաչս ի — արկեալ, looking down, with one's eyes cast or bent down; ցո՞ր — նեղութեանց հասի ես, to what trouble have I brought myself!
ընդ վայր, in vain, uselessly; ցայդ վայր, so far, as far as that, to that place, there; ցոր վայր, where, whither; ցո՞ր վայր, how far ?.

Title: Վայրաբերիմ
Definition_1: to incline, to lean or draw downwards, to descend, to come down, to be carried down.

Title: Վայրաբնակ
Definition_1: living in the open air; wild, savage; deserted, uncultivated; լինել խորանաւ ի —ս, to dwell in tents.

Title: Վայրաբնակիմ
Definition_1: to live in wild or desert scenes.

Title: Վայրագ
Definition_1: ferocious, fierce, wild, savage, inhuman, cruel.

Title: Վայրագանամ
Definition_1: to become savage, wild or rude, to grow fierce, worse.

Title: Վայրակնեմ
Definition_2: to be allured by worldly things.

Title: Վայրահար
Definition_1: common, ordinary; vagabond, dissolute; vain, chatty.

Title: Վայրապար
Definition_1: in vain, uselessly, vainly, to no purpose;

Title: Վարավատնիմ
Definition_1: to be dispersed, scattered, thrown here and there.

Title: Վայրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to depress, to lower, to humble, to abase.

Title: Վայրափակ
Definition_1: circumscribed, bounded, limited, encircled, enclosed, surrounded, shut in on all sides.

Title: Վայրաքարշ
Definition_1: cf. Գետնաքարշ; — խորհուրդք, mean, grovelling, base thoughts.

Title: Վայրաքարշութիւն
Definition_1: giving oneself up to the vanities of the world, vileness, baseness.

Title: Վայրենաբարոյ
Definition_1: of savage nature or character, churlish, clownish, intractable, unsociable, rustic, coarse, rude.

Title: Վայրենամիտ
Definition_1: fierce, wild, savage, brutal, barbarous, ferocious, cruel.

Title: Վայրենանամ
Definition_1: to become savage, to grow inhuman, brutal, ferocious, cruel.

Title: Վայրենացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to brutalize, to render savage or ferocious; to exasperate, to enrage.

Title: Վայրենի
Definition_1: wild; rustic, unmannerly, clownish, boorish, ill-bred, uncivil, savage, ferocious, fierce.

Title: Վայրենութիւն
Definition_1: savage nature, inhumanity, fierceness, ferocity, cruelty, brutality.

Title: Վայրիկ մի
Definition_1: a moment, a little time, an instant; եւ ոչ —, not a single instant, not one moment.

Title: Վայրիկ մի եւս
Definition_1: little was wanting to, it was very near, it almost.

Title: Վայրկեան
Definition_2: —, — մի, a moment, a little time; ի — ժամանակի, ի միում վայրկենի, in a moment, at that moment, instantly; directly, incontinently, instantaneously; cf. Ժամ.

Title: Վանականութիւն
Definition_1: priorship, priorate, dignity of a prior; monachism, monastic or conventual life.

Title: Վանակից
Definition_1: cohabiting, dwelling in the same convent or house.

Title: Վանատուր
Definition_1: inn-keeper, host, hospitable person; — դիք, Jupiter hospitalis.

Title: Վանատրեմ
Definition_1: to harbour, to receive into one's house or hotel, to entertain, to welcome.

Title: Վանդակ
Definition_1: network; cage; grate, gridiron; grating; window-blinds, persian; lattice, trellis; baluster, balustrade, railing; balcony, terrace, belvedere; cf. Զամբիղ.

Title: Վանդակագործ
Definition_2: lattice, grating; wire-netting, wire-work; balustrade, baluster.

Title: Վանդակակապ
Definition_1: furnished with rails or bars, grated.

Title: Վանդակապատ
Definition_2: bars, grating, trellis; — պատուհանաց, window-grating, lattice; blinds.

Title: Վանդակեմ
Definition_1: to grate, to bar, to trellis, to lattice; — զբեռինս, to cord a bale, to bind up as with netting; — զգունդս, to levy, to assemble, to muster soldiers.

Title: Վանդեմ
Definition_1: to undo, to destroy, to ruin, to upset, to overthrow, to overcome.

Title: Վանդիմ
Definition_1: to be infected with, to have contracted or caught a disease.

Title: Վանդումն
Definition_1: ruin, destruction; ածել —, to devastate, to desolate, to ruin, to lay waste.

Title: Վանեմ
Definition_1: to drive out, to expel, to thrust or push back or aside, to chase, to drive away, to pursue; to repel, to beat off or back, to attack, to defeat, to rout, to conquer.

Title: Վաներէց
Definition_1: butler, house-steward, major-domo; chaplain; cf. Վանահայր.

Title: Վանկ
Definition_3: tune.

Title: Վանք
Definition_1: convent, monastery, cloister, friary; lodging, dwelling, home, habitation, abode; house, mansion; hotel; inn, hostelry; cabin, hut; — կուսանաց, nunnery, convent; վանս ունել, to stay, to lodge, to take up one's lodgings, to dwell, to stop; փակել ի վանս, to cloister, to shut up in a convent.

Title: Վաշ
Definition_1: bravo! courage! cheer up! come! ho!.

Title: Վաշխեմ
Definition_1: to practise usury, to lend on usury, at unlawful interest; դահեկանս —, to lend money on usury.

Title: Վառ
Definition_1: ardent, burning, inflamed, on fire; shining, brilliant;
Definition_3: — ի —, glittering, sparkling, resplendent, cf. Փայլուն, cf. Շողշողենի, cf. Պայծառ.

Title: Վառ
Definition_1: standard, banner; purple, royal mantle, veil, tulle, gold brocade, royal robes.
Definition_2: grave; bass; — ձայն, the sixth metre in the Armenian hymnal; cf. Խաչվառ.

Title: Վառարան
Definition_1: cf. Կրակարան; — ապակւոյ, focus; — օդամուղ, draught chimney.

Title: Վառեկ
Definition_1: pullet, chick, chicken; — բիբէ, the — pules.

Title: Վառեմ
Definition_1: to light up, to set fire to, to fire;
Definition_2: to fire, to inflame, to enliven, to inspirit, to vivify, to cheer, to raise the spirits of, to urge on, to excite, to rouse; to arm, to equip, to fit out; to put on, to attire, to dress, to bedeck; վառեալ բորբոքել, to inflame, to heat, to electrify, to fill with enthusiasm, to enrapture, to fire; — զդրօշս, to hoist the colours.

Title: Վառիմ
Definition_1: to take fire, to be kindled, lighted, to be on fire, to burn; to arm oneself, to take up arms, to fly to arms; to equip oneself; վառեցաւ բորբոքեցաւ, he was filled with indignation, disgust, anger.

Title: Վառվառիմ
Definition_1: to be on fire; to shine out, to blaze, to glow.

Title: Վառօդ
Definition_1: gunpowder, powder; — բամբակի, pyroxyline, gun-cotton, explosive; շտեմարան —ի, powder-magazine.

Title: Վասն
Definition_1:
for, by reason of, for the sake of, on account of, in consideration of, considering, touching, concerning, upon the subject of; as to, as for, with respect to; — սիրոյն աստուծոյ, for the love of God; — իմ, for me, for my sake; as for me, for my part; — թեթեւ ինչ յանցանաց, for a slight fault; — երկիւղի, for fear of; — ընտրելոց, in favour of the elect; — զի, for, because, wherefore; — է՞ր, why ? for what reason ?
— այնր or այնորիկ — այդր or այդորիկ —այսր or այսորիկ, for that reason, therefore, to that end, on that account; — ո՞յր, for which ? for whom ?
— որոյ, why, therefore, by reason of which, consequently, wherefore; — անգիտութեան, through ignorance, ignorantly; — խաչի քո պատուականի, by means of Thy most precious Cross, through Thy intercession; cf. Մեղք; սմին իրի or վասն, for this reason.

Title: Վասնէր
Definition_1: the reason, the wherefore; զ—ն հարցանել, խնդրել, գիտել, to ask, to know the -.

Title: Վաստակ
Definition_1: work, labour, toil; pains, trouble, fatigue; merit, worth, service; profit, gain, earnings;
Definition_2: tired, fatigued; — ծառայութեան, service rendered; — ձեռաց, handiwork; — արքունի, military service; գիրք —ոց, Geoponics; — առնել, to tire, to fatigue, to weary; — լինել, to labour, to work, to toil, to work hard, to strive, to fatigue or tire oneself with, to be fatigued or tired.

Title: Վաստակաբեկ
Definition_1: worn out with fatigue, overweary, tired, fatigued, harassed; — առնել, to overweary, to tire out, to fag, to jade, to overburden with labour, to break down with fatigue; — առնել զերիվարն, to strain, to over-ride or overwork a horse; — լինել, to overwork or overfatigue oneself, to be wearied with, crushed, worn out, harassed, faint or spent with fatigue, to knock oneself up, to work oneself to death.

Title: Վաստակասէր
Definition_1: fond of labour, laborious, painstaking, hard working, indefatigable, industrious, diligent.

Title: Վաստակաւոր
Definition_1: fatiguing, labouring, giving oneself trouble, laborious; meritorious, well deserving; tired, weary;
Definition_2: husbandman; — այր, a man of merit, a deserving man.

Title: Վաստակեմ
Definition_1: to work, to labour at, to do; to gain, to acquire, to earn; — զերկիր, to till, to dig, to cultivate.

Title: Վաստակիմ
Definition_1: to labour, to fatigue, to give oneself trouble; to be fatigued, tired; to deserve well, to merit, to be worthy of; — սրտի, to feel annoyed, to be wearied, disgusted; սրտի մտօք —, to labour earnestly, to work with a will, with zeal; անհնարինս —, to labour excessively, to work like a galley-slave, to drudge, to sweat; —կեին ձեռօք իւրեանց, they wrought with their own hands.

Title: Վատ
Definition_1: bad, wicked, vile, low; cowardly, weak, pusillanimous, dastardly, craven-hearted, unmanly, poor-spirited or mean-spirited; idle, lazy, slothful, sluggish;
Definition_2: damage, loss, hurt, ruin, misfortune; — անուն, infamy, brand of infamy; — արանց, the most cowardly of men, the basest of wretches.

Title: Վատաբախտութիւն
Definition_1: unhappiness, misfortune, ill or bad luck; misery, calamity.

Title: Վատագրոհութիւն
Definition_1: lowness of birth, low extraction; abjectness, vileness.

Title: Վատազգի
Definition_1: of mean extraction, of base birth, lowborn, vile, ignoble.

Title: Վատախառն
Definition_1: of bad constitution, quality or temper; bad, hurtful; unhealthy.

Title: Վատախառնութիւն
Definition_1: bad temperament, evil disposition, ill nature; — օդոյ, inclemency of the weather;

Title: Վատախորհուրդ
Definition_1: evil-minded, wicked, malicious; wanting in judgment, silly, stupid, foolish.

Title: Վատախտարակ
Definition_1: ill-starred, luckless, unfortunate; — առնել, to render unhappy, to oppress, cf. Թշուառացուցանեմ, cf. Վատթարեմ; to discomfit, to overcome.

Title: Վատահամբաւ
Definition_1: of ill repute, infamous, defamed, discredited; — լինել, to be in ill repute.

Title: Վատահամբաւեմ
Definition_1: to defame, to discredit, to decry, to disparage, to cast a stain, or to put a slur upon.

Title: Վատահիւթութիւն
Definition_1: ill state of the humours, cacochymy.

Title: Վատամահ
Definition_1: dead miserably; — լինել, մեռանել, to die or perish miserably.

Title: Վատամտութիւն
Definition_1: inconsideration, thoughtlessness; malicious intention; evil disposition.

Title: Վատանամ
Definition_1: to be or become cowardly, pusillanimous, faint-hearted; to grow idle or lazy, slothful.

Title: Վատառողջ
Definition_1: of frail or weak constitution, sickly, delicate, puling, gracile, thin, valetudinarian, languid, weak.

Title: Վատասիրտ
Definition_1: fainthearted, chickenhearted, fearful, timid, timorous, pusillanimous, cowardly, craven; ընդէ՞ր —ք էք, why are you fearful?.

Title: Վատասրտիմ
Definition_1: to want heart, to be cowardly, to lose courage, to be afraid, discouraged.

Title: Վատասրտութիւն
Definition_1: want of courage, cowardice, poltroonery, cowardliness, pusillanimity, weakness, despondency, loss of heart.

Title: Վատափառ
Definition_1: inglorious; ignoble, obscure; vile, abject; cf. Չարափառ.

Title: Վատիմ
Definition_1: to be weak of sight; to have sore eyes; աչք իւր վատեալ էին, his eyes were dim; cf. Վատեմ; cf. Վատանամ.

Title: Վատթար
Definition_1: bad, wicked, low, vile, base, contemptible, ignoble, degenerate, unworthy, puny, sorry; cowardly.

Title: Վատթարանամ
Definition_1: to grow worse, to degenerate, to debase or degrade oneself, to fall into baseness, to be marred, spoiled; to succumb, to be beaten.

Title: Վատթարեմ
Definition_1: to render worse, to cause to degenerate, to debase, to corrupt, to deteriorate, to alter; to weaken, to abase, to undo, to defeat, to rout; to insult, to defame, to dishonour; to despise.

Title: Վատթարիմ
Definition_1: to grow worse and worse; cf. Վատթարանամ.

Title: Վատթարութիւն
Definition_1: deterioration, alteration, marring, debasement, corruption, decay, degeneracy, depravity; meanness, vileness, cowardice; defeat, rout; insult, affront.

Title: Վատնեմ
Definition_1: to dissipate, to consume, to use up, to lavish, to scatter, to dilapidate, to fritter away, to waste, to run through, to exhaust; — զինչս, to waste one's substance or goods, to squander away one's fortune.

Title: Վատնող
Definition_1: lavisher, dissipator, spendthrift, squanderer, waster, prodigal.

Title: Վատնումն
Definition_1: dissipation, waste, dilapidation, prodigality; loss, havoc, dispersion.

Title: Վատշուէր
Definition_1: bad, wicked, malicious, perverse, froward; infamous, unchaste; wretched, miserable, unhappy.

Title: Վատութիւն
Definition_1: laziness, idleness; cowardice, dastardliness, poltroonery, pusillanimity; vileness, meanness, cringing; worthlessness; ingratitude; wickedness; վատութեամբ, cowardly, unmanly, basely, meanly; անուն վատութեան, ignominy, shame, dishonour, stain, slur, stigma, opprobrium; ի — հատանիլ, to give oneself up to idleness or sloth; — յանձն առնուլ, ի — խոնարհիլ, to bow and cringe, to be guilty of meanness, to behave meanly.

Title: Վատուժ
Definition_1: weak, debilitated; thin, emaciated, spare, meagre, slender.

Title: Վար
Definition_1: tillage, ploughing, tilth, husbandry; ploughed land; culture; use, employment;
Definition_3: common; —ս վարել, հարկանել, ցելուլ, կակղել, to plough, to furrow, to dig, to cultivate land; ի — առնուլ, արկանել, to use, to make use of, to practise, to exercise; ի — երկոց մտանել, to apply oneself to work, to labour; ի — տալ, to lend, to loan.

Title: Վարագոյր
Definition_2: veil; պատուհանաց, մահճաց, window-curtain; bed-curtain; — դրան, door-curtain; թատրոնի, —, drop-scene; — մետաքսեայ, silken curtain; — ծալածոյ, զսպանակաւոր, roller-blind, spring-blind; ձգել զ—, to draw the curtain, to draw down the blind; բանալ զ—, to open or to draw back the curtain; փակել զ—, to shut the curtain; —աւ խօսել, to speak under a pretext.

Title: Վարագուրեմ
Definition_1: to veil, to cover, to hide.

Title: Վարազ
Definition_1: wild-boar; boar; — խանչէ, the grunts; ժանիք —ի, razors.

Title: Վարազագիր
Definition_1: sculptured with the figure of a wild-boar.

Title: Վարազանամ
