Definition_1: to become like a wild-boar, to become infuriate, ferocious, outrageous.

Title: Վարազացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to change into a boar, to render ferocious; to put in a rage, to drive mad.

Title: Վարակ
Definition_1: knot; knob; զ—ն կապանաց արձակել, to untie or loosen a knot.

Title: Վարակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to impede, to embarrass, to entangle, to engage, to involve; to communicate, to give; to infect, to taint.

Title: Վարակիմ
Definition_1: to be embarrassed, to get entangled, encumbered; to be catching or infectious, to spread, to communicate itself; to catch a disease; to be infected, tainted, contaminated; cf. Ոստ.

Title: Վարակումն
Definition_1: entanglement, embarrassment, labyrinth, puzzle, scrape; infection, contagion.

Title: Վարանք
Definition_1: embarrassment of mind, agitation of spirit, want of determination, perplexity, hesitation, uncertainty, vacillation, irresolution; —ք մտաց, mental agony, grief, anguish, intense anxiety; ի —ս տագնապի մտանել, ի —ի կալ, to hesitate, to be uncertain, to be at a loss, in a great perplexity; ի —ս լինել, to be uncertain whether, to be in suspense, undecided; կեալ ի —ս, to remain in suspense, to be undecided what course to take, what to do; ի —ս տարակուսի անկանել, to be involved in difficulties, in great embarrassments; ի —ս տարակուսի կալ, to be in the utmost perplexity; ի —ս արկանել զոք, to cause disturbance of mind, to create uncertainty, to perplex, to embarrass; — է ինձ ամենայն ուստեք, I am quite embroiled, perplexed, embarrassed, troubled, I do not know what to do, what course to take, where to turn; ի —ս տարակուսին, as he was in this state of embarrassment, in this extremity.

Title: Վարանեմ
Definition_1: to entwine in, to wind around, to involve, to tangle, to knot; to lay snares, to wait in ambush;

Title: Վարանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to throw into uncertainty, to render perplexed, to embarrass, to puzzle.

Title: Վարանիմ
Definition_1: to be beset, seized or caught; to hesitate, to be uncertain, embarrassed, in suspense, to vacillate, to waver, to float, to haw, to boggle; to lie in ambush, in wait for, to plot; to apply one's thoughts or one's mind to; վարանեալ կայր, he was at a loss how to.

Title: Վարապանակ
Definition_1: sagum, great coat; cassock, brigandine, coat of mail, hauberk, hocqueton, cuirass.

Title: Վարատական
Definition_1: sent as a colony, dispersed, scattered; vagabond, wandering;

Title: Վարատեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to drive away, to scatter, to disperse, to defeat, to rout, to destroy.

Title: Վարատիմ
Definition_1: to be dispersed, scattered; to desert, to go over.

Title: Վարարեմ
Definition_1: to luxuriate, to be riotous, lustful, to give oneself up to libertinism, to lead a dissolute life.

Title: Վարդ
Definition_1: rose; եղանակ —ից, rose-season; մշտափթիթ —, monthly —, semper florens; — հարիւրթերթի, centifolia; մամռաւոր —, moss rose; դամասկեան —, damask rose; վայրի —, wild rose, eglantine; դեղին —, single yellow rose; կոկոն, բոլորք —ից, rose-bud; գոյն —ի, rose-colour; փայտ —ի, rosewood; կարմրագեղ, ծիրաներփեան, գեղեցիկ, քաղցրաբոյր, գեղափթիթ, փշալից, թարշամ —, scarlet, purple, beautiful, perfumed or odorous, full-blown, thorny, faded rose; —ք մանկութեան, այտից, շրթանց նորա, the roses of youth, of his cheeks, of his lips; պսակ ի —ից, crown or wreath of roses; քաղել —, to gather roses; չիք — անփուշ, no — without a thorn; cf. Իսկութիւն.

Title: Վարդագեղ
Definition_1: as beautiful as a rose; — շրթունք, rosy lips.

Title: Վարդակարմիր
Definition_1: of a lively red, rosy; — այտք, rosy cheeks.

Title: Վարդահոտ
Definition_1: rose-scented, roseate, as fragrant as a rose.

Title: Վարդամատն
Definition_1: rosy-fingered; — բանայ արշալոյս զդրունս արեւելից, the — Morn opens the gates of the East.

Title: Վարդապետ
Definition_1: vartabed, doctor; lecturer, professor; master, preceptor; school-master; archimandrite; — օրինաց, doctor of laws, cf. Օրէնսուսոյց; — աստուածաբանութեան, doctor in divinity; — բժշկութեան, doctor in physic; cf. Թեկն; cf. Օրէնսգէտ.

Title: Վարդապետական
Definition_1: doctoral, doctrinal, magisterial, preceptorial; didactic; dogmatical; — աստիճան, Doctor's degree.

Title: Վարդապետեմ
Definition_1: to indoctrinate, to lecture, to dogmatize; to teach, to instruct in, to catechise.

Title: Վարդապետիմ
Definition_1: to be instructed, teached, to learn, to study.

Title: Վարդապետութիւն
Definition_1: doctrine, dogma, tenets; teaching, instruction, precept, maxim, sentiment; theory; doctor's degree, lectureship; աստիճան վարդապետութեան, doctorate; քրիստոնէական —, catechism;

Title: Վարդենի
Definition_1: rose-bush, rose-tree; վայրի —, dog-rose, hip-rose; —ք, rosery, ground planted with rose-bushes.

Title: Վարեմ
Definition_1: to labour, to cultivate, to plough, to till; to sow; to lead, to conduct, to guide; to lead away, to drive, to cause to go; to chase away, to drive out, to expel, to dispossess; to draw or carry along, to drag along; to direct, to guide, to govern, to rule, to manage; to use, to employ, to make use of, to handle, to wield; to thrust in, to drive into, to fix in; cf. Վարիմ; — ամենազօր իշխանութիւն, to wield absolute authority; գերի or ի գերութիւն —, to catch, to make captive, prisoner, to reduce to slavery; — զկեանս, կենցաղ, to live; դատ —, to act against, to pursue to justice; to be concerned in a law-suit; — ի խաղաղութիւն, to make peace, to pacify, to appease, to accommodate; — զճանապարհ, to travel; to go, to walk, to march; — զնաւ, to navigate, to steer a ship; յառաջ —, to drive forward; to urge or push on.

Title: Վարժ
Definition_1: exercised, practised, versed, erudite, skilful, accustomed, inured, trained;
Definition_2: exercise, instruction, study, science; — երիվար, a broken or trained horse; —ք չափականք, study of mathematics; — լինել, to be practised or well versed in; լինել ի —ս ուսման, to be studying, learning; to be at school or at college; ի — կացուցանեմ, cf. Վարժեմ; անցուցանէր —իւք զբազում գիտնովք, his erudition surpassed that of very many learned men; կատարեցի զ—ս իմաստասիրականին, I have passed in philosophy.

Title: Վարժական
Definition_1: practical, fit or apt to exercise.

Title: Վարժապետ
Definition_1: professor, master, teacher; school-master; preceptor, tutor, instructor; gymnasiarch, ludi magister; — իմաստասիրութեան, professor of philosophy; — օրէնսգիտութեան, բժշկութեան, աստուածաբանութեան, law-professor, physic-professor, divinity-professor.

Title: Վարժապետեմ
Definition_1: to be a professor or teacher of, to teach, to profess.

Title: Վարժեմ
Definition_1: to exercise, to train, to inure, to bring up, to form, to instruct, to tutor, to accustom, to use, to cultivate; — զերիվար, to break in a horse; — զանձն, cf. Վարժեցուցանեմ.

Title: Վարժեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to instruct, to educate, to discipline.

Title: Վարժիմ
Definition_1: to exercise oneself in, to practise, to get used, accustomed or inured, to grow familiar with; to be formed, instructed; — աշխատութեան, to get inured to work; ի գիրս վարժեալ, brought up in letters, educated or well versed in literature.

Title: Վարժումն
Definition_1: exercise, practice, use; instruction, culture, discipline, study.

Title: Վարիմ
Definition_1: to behave, to conduct oneself, to go on, to act, to treat; to make use of, to use, to employ; to be conducted, carried, to go; cf. Զհետ; որպէս եւ միտք իւր վարէին, as his own propensities dictated.

Title: Վարիչ
Definition_3: leading into captivity, driving out; fulfilling, carrying into effect.

Title: Վարկ
Definition_1: opinion, advice; esteem, consideration, reputation, high value; account, sum; judgment, sentence; tribute, tax; տեարք —ի, arbiters of strife, judges; զարդարակ հատուցէք —, pronounce a sentence worthy of.

Title: Վարկանիմ
Definition_1: to conjecture, to judge, to presume, to think, to deem, to find, to esteem, to look upon as, to repute or regard as; արժանի —, to think, deem or find worthy.

Title: Վարկատրեմ
Definition_1: to pronounce, to manifest, to deliberate, to decide.

Title: Վարկեմ
Definition_1: to close in, to surround, to envelope.

Title: Վարկպարազի
Definition_1: additionally, over and above, by the way, by accident, incidentally; negligently, carelessly, unheedingly, for form's sake;
Definition_2: unessential, accessory, secondary, supplementary, extra, useless, frivolous, vain.

Title: Վարձ
Definition_1: stipend, salary, hire, pay, wages; emoluments, perquisities; retribution, recompense, payment; letting out on hire, hiring, renting; —ք տան, rent, house-rent; — բժշկի, physician's fees; cf. Նաւ; տուն ի —ու տալի, house to let; —ս արկանել, դնել, to contract, to make an agreement, to agree; ի —ու ունել, առնուլ, to rent, to farm, to hire;
Definition_2: to freight, to charter; ի —ու տալ, to let on hire, to let out, to lease; ի —ու ունել զտուն, to rent a house; հատուցանել զ—ս տան, to pay house-rent; տալ զարծաթ ի —ու, to put out money to interest; արժանի է մշակն —ու իւրոյ, the labourer is worthy of his hire.

Title: Վարձախնդիր
Definition_1: asking wages, requiring a stipend, mercenary.

Title: Վարձակ
Definition_1: cantatrice, singer, songstress, ballad-singer; dancer; strumpet, whore.

Title: Վարձանք
Definition_1: portion, dowry; hire of an harlot; cf. Կապէնք.

Title: Վարձառութիւն
Definition_1: the receiving a salary or remuneration.

Title: Վարձատրեմ
Definition_1: to remunerate, to recompense, to reward, to requite.

Title: Վարձաւորեմ
Definition_1: to take at a fixed price; to hire, to keep in pay.

Title: Վարձաւորիմ
Definition_1: to merit, to obtain a reward, to be recompensed or rewarded.

Title: Վարձիմ
Definition_1: to hire, to take on hire, to farm, to rent; to let out on hire; to gain, to get, to acquire; — զարծաթ, զքանքար, to put money at interest; — զկին, to endow, to enrich with a portion; — զօրս, to enlist mercenaries; — զսենեակ, to rent a room; cf. Նաւ.

Title: Վարձկան
Definition_2: hireling, paid or hired man, servant, mercenary, day-labourer, workman; farmer;
Definition_3: mistress, courtesan, harlot.

Title: Վարձկանագրիչ
Definition_1: salaried clerk or secretary; a vile, mercenary, or hack writer.

Title: Վարձկանեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to hire, to take on hire.

Title: Վարձկանիմ
Definition_1: to be hired, to serve or work for money.

Title: Վարձկանութիւն
Definition_1: mercenariness, venality; mercenary soldier or troop.

Title: Վարձող
Definition_1: letter out on hire; — կառաց կամ ձիոց, livery-stable keeper.

Title: Վարձում
Definition_1: to let, to let out on a lease.

Title: Վարճոխուտ
Definition_1: full of, or abounding in oats.

Title: Վարմարկեմ
Definition_1: to catch, to take in a net.

Title: Վարշամակ
Definition_1: handkerchief; towel, napkin, linen; head-band, hand-cover, veil; amict.

Title: Վարշամակապատ
Definition_1: bound round with a napkin, wrapped up in a linen, swathed round.

Title: Վարոց
Definition_1: switch, stick, rod, verge; penis, member, genitals.

Title: Վարոցաւոր
Definition_1: verger, beadle, mace-bearer, lictor, usher of the black rod, serjeant.

Title: Վարուն
Definition_1: beaten, trodden, used, frequented; — ճանապարհ, well frequented road, well beaten track.

Title: Վարունգ
Definition_1: cucumber; cf. Կիտրոն; մանր —, gherkin; cf. Թթուուտ; cf. Իշուկ.

Title: Վարչութիւն
Definition_1: government, direction, conduct; triangular table of laws.

Title: Վարս
Definition_1: hair, head of hair, locks, tresses;
Definition_2: foliage, leafy branches, leaves, green dress;
Definition_3: coma, beams; —ք գիսաւորի, beams or tail of a comet; —ք բերինիկեայ, Berenice's hair, coma Berenicis; —ք առիւծու, ձիոյ, mane; —ք գեղածփեալ, waving, flowing locks; cf. Հիւսակ; հողս արկանել զ—իւք, to cover the head with ashes; cf. Հեր, cf. Մազ.

Title: Վարսագեղ
Definition_1: having a fine head of hair, adorned with tresses;
Definition_3: leafy, covered with leaves.

Title: Վարսագեղութիւն
Definition_1: thickness, abundance or beauty of hair.

Title: Վարսակալ
Definition_1: ornament for the hair, riband, frontlet, diadem.

Title: Վարսաւոր
Definition_3: comose, leafy, tufted;
Definition_4: Nazarite; comet.

Title: Վարսաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be leafy, dresses in green, clothed or covered with leaves.

Title: Վարսեմ
Definition_1: to drive in, to fix, to thrust in, to plant.

Title: Վարք
Definition_1: life, habits, manners, conduct, behaviour, morals; use, employment; անարատութիւն վարուց, morality; ընտիր, բարեկիր —, good morals; անարատ, անբիծ —, pure morals; գեղեցիկ վարովք վարեցան, they led a good life; որք գերաշխարհիկք են վարուք, who show themselves pure of heart; է երբեք զի եւ անբարիք ծնանին օրէնս բարիս, good laws are often produced by evil customs.

Title: Վաւաշ
Definition_1: luxurious, profligate, licentious, dissolute, lewd, rakish, libertine, lecherous, obscene.

Title: Վաւաշամոլ
Definition_1: given to lechery, abandoned to lust, lost in depravity and dissoluteness.

Title: Վաւաշիմ
Definition_1: to follow ill courses, to abandon oneself to debauchery, to luxuriate in coarse sensual pleasures, to wallow in lust, to be sunk in debauchery.

Title: Վաւաշութիւն
Definition_1: profligacy, libertinism, dissolute life, debauchery, lewdness, dissoluteness, rakishness, obscenity, whoredom.

Title: Վաւերական
Definition_2: —, —ն, seal, signet, ring; — մատանի, signet-ring; — արքունի, great seal.

Title: Վաւերականութիւն
Definition_1: authenticity, validity; legalization, authorization; ratification, sanction.

Title: Վաւերացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to authenticate, to legitimate, to make valid; to legalize, to ratify, to approve; to authorize, to empower.

Title: Վեհ
Definition_1: sublime, majestic, imposing, high, elevated, superior, grand, noble, generous; divine, godlike, supernatural, celestial, heavenly;
Definition_2: the Supreme Being; — կերպարան, imposing aspect; — ինձ արտաշէս պարթեւ քան զմակեդոնացին աղեքսանդր, Artaxerxes the Parthian seems to me to be superior to Alexander the Macedonian.

Title: Վեհազն
Definition_1: noble, grand; — տէր, my lord, your lordship.

Title: Վեհանամ
Definition_1: to be exalted, ennobled or elevated.

Title: Վեհացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to exalt, to elevate, to extol, to deify.

Title: Վեհերիմ
Definition_1: to be afraid, downcast, discouraged, to be a coward, to take fright, to lose courage, to shrink for fear of, to be held back by fear, to quail before, or at sight of danger; to start back, to recoil; to grow lazy, indolent.

Title: Վեհերոտ
Definition_1: weak, wanting courage or heart, fearful, timid, cowardly, pusillanimous, craven; idle, slothful; ի փոյթ մի՛ —ոտք, not slothful in business.

Title: Վեհերումն
Definition_1: fear, timidity, want of courage, of heart, faint-heartedness, cowardice, poltroonery, pusillanimity; sloth, remissness, indolence, idleness, sluggishness.

Title: Վեհինաճեմ
Definition_1: endowed with supernatural excellence, most glorious.

Title: Վեր
Definition_1: above, upon, on, over; on high, high, high up; վեր ի վայր, ի վեր եւ ի վայր, up and down, high and down, upside down; topsy turvy; frequently; ի վեր եւ ի խոնարհ, up and down, always, incessantly, at every moment, ever; ի վեր անդր, above, up there; ի վեր քան զամենայն, above all; վեր ի վայր կործանել, to turn upside down, to turn topsy turvy, to upset, to overset; վեր ի վայր շրջել, to turn over, to overthrow, to overturn; to disorder, to disturb; ի վեր մատչել, to go higher up, to ascend; ի վեր ունել, to bear up, to support, to sustain, to prop; ի վեր հանել, բերել, to elevate, to raise on high;
Definition_2: to discover, to manifest, to unmask, to unveil, to denounce, to disclose, to reveal; ակն ի վեր տալ, to lift up one's eyes, to look up, to raise one's head; ձի ի վեր առնուլ, to ride, to mount on horseback;
Definition_3: ի վեր գալ տնկոյն, to peep out heads, to pullulate and grow, to sprout, to bud; ի վեր կացուցանել զսպանեալն, to raise from the dead, to bring to life again; ի վեր քան զբան, ineffable; inexplicable; ի վեր է այս քան զկար զօրութեան իմոյ, that is beyond my power; ի վեր քան զպայման մերասեր բնութեան, above humanity; որպէս ի վեր անդր ասացաք, as we have already said;
Definition_4: վեր ի վերոյ, apparent, superficial, feigned, affected; երկիր պագին նմա —, they feigned to worship him;
Definition_5: superficially, apparently, affectedly; — ունելով գիտութիւն, without a thorough knowledge of, having a smattering of.

Title: Վերաբերեմ
Definition_1: to elevate, to raise; to appose, to subjoin, to superadd; to manifest, to disclose; to utter, to pronounce; to translate; to present, to offer; to attribute, to ascribe, to refer;
Definition_2: to eructate, to retch, to vomit, to cast up, to reject.

Title: Վերաբերիմ
Definition_1: to be elevated, carried up, to ascend, to rise; to be referred, to belong to, to regard, to concern.

Title: Վերաբերութիւն
Definition_1: elevation, rise, ascension; presentation, offering, Anaphora; relation, reference, regard;
Definition_3: anaphora; — ունել, to be in correspondence or relation with.

Title: Վերաբուսանիմ
Definition_1: to grow again, to be produced anew.

Title: Վերագայիմ
Definition_1: to supervene, to happen, to befall; to descend, to come.

Title: Վերագլխեմ
Definition_1: to conclude, to recapitulate, to sum up, to abridge.

Title: Վերագոյն
Definition_2: —, ի —, գոյնս, above; firstly, before, antecedently.

Title: Վերագոչեմ
Definition_1: to cry out, to exclaim; to predict; — առ աստուած, to invocate divine help.

Title: Վերագրեմ
Definition_1: to write upon, to inscribe; to attribute, to refer to; to write above, before.

Title: Վերադասեմ
Definition_1: to put in the first place, to prefer before others.

Title: Վերադարձուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to return; to transport, to transfer.

Title: Վերադիտեմ
Definition_1: to look up, to gaze at, to contemplate; to consider, to examine, to scrutinize.

Title: Վերադիր
Definition_3: exponent, index;
Definition_4: article (ս, դ, ն);

Title: Վերադրեմ
Definition_1: to impose, to put upon, to add, to join.

Title: Վերաթեւեմ
Definition_1: to fly away, to take flight; — յերկինս, to be borne to heaven.

Title: Վերաթուեմ
Definition_1: to number or count from the first to the last.

Title: Վերածեմ
Definition_1: to elevate, to raise, to bear on high; to reduce; — զոք ի զառածանացն, to reclaim a person from disorderly or ill conduct.

Title: Վերածնեմ
Definition_1: to regenerate, to endow with new life, to cause to be born again, to revive, to reproduce.

Title: Վերածնիմ
Definition_1: to be regenerated or born again;
Definition_2: to spring up anew, to revive, to come to life again.

Title: Վերականգնեմ
Definition_1: to raise again, to restore, to set up again.

Title: Վերակատարեմ
Definition_1: to accomplish or fulfill totally, perfectly.

Title: Վերակարգեմ
Definition_1: to put in the highest seat, to place above all.

Title: Վերակարդամ
Definition_1: to cry out, to exclaim; to implore, to invoke.

Title: Վերակացու
Definition_1: superintendent, overseer, intendant, inspector, director; prefect, governor; protector, defender, guardian.

Title: Վերակացութիւն
Definition_1: superintendence, management, inspection, intendance, direction; prefecture, government; protection, assistance.

Title: Վերակենցաղիմ
Definition_1: to revive, to be reanimated, to come to life again; to outlive, to survive.

Title: Վերակնեմ
Definition_1: to look on high, to lift up one's eyes.

Title: Վերակնքեմ
Definition_1: to confirm, to affirm, to re-establish.

Title: Վերակոչեմ
Definition_1: to invoke, to implore, to call on; to recall, to call back; to surname, to call.

Title: Վերահայեցողութիւն
Definition_1: contemplation, meditation, elevation of the mind, intellect or thoughts.

Title: Վերահայցեմ
Definition_1: to ask from above, to implore, to invoke.

Title: Վերահանգչիմ
Definition_1: to sit upon, to take rest, to repose.

Title: Վերահասու լինիմ
Definition_1: to understand, to apprehend, to catch.

Title: Վերահասու առնեմ
Definition_1: to cause to know, to enlighten.

Title: Վերահնչեմ
Definition_1: to exclaim, to raise the voice, to cry out.

Title: Վերաձայնեմ
Definition_1: to cry or pronounce aloud, to vociferate, to proclaim; to call, to name.

Title: Վերաձգեմ
Definition_1: to uplift, to stretch; to carry up, to elevate, to raise.

Title: Վերաձգողն երկնից
Definition_1: the Spreader of the high heavens.

Title: Վերաճառեմ
Definition_1: to repeat, to treat again; to state above.

Title: Վերամարտիկ
Definition_1: defender; — լինել հայրենեաց, to fight for one's country, in defence of one's native land.

Title: Վերամբառնամ
Definition_1: to raise, to elevate, to lift up on high; — զգլուխ, cf. Ըմբոստանամ, cf. Ընդվզիմ; — յինքն, cf. Ըստանձնեմ.

Title: Վերամբառնամ
Definition_1: to be raised up, to surpass, to dominate, to command.

Title: Վերամբարձ
Definition_1: raised on high, lifted up, ascending; ascensive;
Definition_2: bearing, carrying in the arms, raising from the earth.

Title: Վերամբարձահան
Definition_1: bearing, carrying or leading on high.

Title: Վերայ
Definition_1: on, upon; over, above; for, in behalf of, on account of; յայնր —, upon that; about that; ի — ամենայնի, above all, before all else; յորոց — աշտարակն անկաւ, on whom the tower fell; ի ճշմարտութեան — չեւ է հասեալ, he has not yet heard the truth; յաւելին ցաւս ի ցաւոց —, they increased my sorrows, they added to my grief; հարուածս ի — նոցա հասուցանէին, they charged them with the massacres; առած ի — արաբացւոց, threatening announcement for Arabia; փակեմ զդուռն ի —ս, I shut the door behind me; կործանումն նմա ի — կայր, he was on the brink of ruin, on the point of ruining himself cf. Կամ; cf. Հասանեմ.

Title: Վերանամ
Definition_1: to rise, to soar, to ascend, to mount; to vanish, to disappear; to go away, to leave, to escape; վերացեալ հպարտացեալ կալ, to swell with pride, to be puffed up, to become presumptuous.

Title: Վերանստիմ
Definition_1: to sit on, to take a seat on, to be seated or placed on; to mount, to ride.

Title: Վերաշնչումն
Definition_1: respiration, breathing; — հողմոց, blowing of the wind.

Title: Վերաչուեմ
Definition_1: to go up wards, to fly on high.

Title: Վերապատմեմ
Definition_1: to praise aloud, openly, to extol, to cry up, to celebrate.

Title: Վերապատուեմ
Definition_1: to revere, to honour, to respect.

Title: Վերառնում
Definition_1: to take or carry on high, to raise, to heave up; to receive, to take home; to glow, to leap with joy, to exult; յաստուածութիւն — զոք, to place among the gods; յաստուածութիւն վերառեալ լինել, to receive divine honours.

Title: Վերարկեմ
Definition_1: to palliate, to veil, to cover, to cloak, to shroud.

Title: Վերարկու
Definition_1: over-coat, mantle, cloak; coverlet, quilt; — ձիոյ, horse-cloth; caparison.

Title: Վերացեալ
Definition_3: abstract.

Title: Վերացումն
Definition_1: elevation, exaltation; abstraction; — խաչի, exaltation of the Cross.

Title: Վերացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to raise, to lift on high, to set up; — մտօք, to abstract.

Title: Վերափոխեմ
Definition_1: to transport, to convey, to bear or carry on high, to transform.

Title: Վերաքարոզեմ
Definition_1: to preach, to announce, to publish, to divulge.

Title: Վերբերիմ
Definition_1: to rise to the surface, to float, to swim on; — ի ջուրց, to rise from the waves.

Title: Վերելակեմ
Definition_1: to mount on, to ascend; — ի նաւ, to go on board ship, to embark; — սանդղօք, to ascend, to scale.

Title: Վերերգակ
Definition_1: to be sung aloud; — սաղմոսք, gradual psalms.

Title: Վերերգեմ
Definition_1: to sing loudly, to fill the air with song, to warble, to trill; to extol, to praise highly, to laud, to magnify.

Title: Վերերեւիմ
Definition_1: to appear, to shoot forth, to be born, produced.

Title: Վերընձիւղեմ
Definition_1: to repullulate, to shoot or bud again.

Title: Վերին
Definition_1: that is above, high, upper, superior; celestial; outward, exterior, external; cf. Երեսք.

Title: Վերիվայրեմ
Definition_1: to move up and down; — զյօնս, to wink.

Title: Վերճեմիմ
Definition_1: to go, to fly on high.

Title: Վերնագաւառ
Definition_1: upper or higher region; ethereal region; ի —ս հայոց, in Upper Armenia.

Title: Վերնագիր
Definition_1: epigraph, inscription, title; — նամակի, superscription or direction of a letter.

Title: Վերնագրեմ
Definition_1: to place, to engrave an inscription; to ascribe, to attribute.

Title: Վերնադուռն
Definition_1: high gate; flood-gate, sluice; stocks, ceps.

Title: Վերնական
Definition_1: superior, celestial; aerial, ethereal; cf. Վերին;

Title: Վերնակենցաղ
Definition_1: of divine or celestial behaviour, pious, angelic, godly.

Title: Վերնամարտ
Definition_1: warring against the Most High, against the celestial powers.

Title: Վերնատուն
Definition_1: highest floor or story, upper room; guest-chamber; high place, heathen temple; belvedere, gallery, terrace; երկրորդ —, the second floor; — եկեղեցւոյ, women's gallery in churches.

Title: Վերնատուող
Definition_1: giving from Heaven, granting from on high;

Title: Վերնափեղկ
Definition_1: upper or skin-covering of a tent; outer-shutter.

Title: Վերնոտիմ
Definition_1: to be subject to catalepsy; cf. Լուսնոտ.

Title: Վերոյ
Definition_1: up, upon, above; beyond; over, aloft; ի — կողմանէ, from above; ի — քան, above, over; — գրեալ, written above.

Title: Վերոտնեմ
Definition_1: to mount, to go up step by step, gradually.

Title: Վերուստ
Definition_2: ի —, from above, from on high, from heaven; from the beginning; — ի վայր, from top to bottom; անդուստ ի —, from ancient times, from the beginning; ի — եւ ի սկզբանէ այնպիսիք էին, they were so from the beginning; յառաջագոյն ի — գիտէի զայս, I knew that long since.

Title: Վերջ
Definition_1: end, finish, conclusion, close; end, extremity, bound, limit; tail; back; the rear of the army; cadence, fall; —ք, cf. Վերջաւոր; ի —, ի —է, ի —ոյ, after, behind, at last, after all, in conclusion, finally, lastly; ի — կոյս, backwards, back, behind; ի — նահանջել, to draw back, to repress, to hold in, to check, to restrain;
Definition_2: ի — հասանել, to have already one foot in the grave; ի — կոյս գնալ, to go backwards; ի —ի թեւոյն անկեալ, assailed the army in the rear; հասէք ի —ս նոցա, destroy the enemy's rear; ի — or ի —է եկեալք, survivors, posterity; ժամանակաւ ի —է, latest or nearest; ի —ոյս երթեալ զօրէն չար գազանի, given to perversity as a beast; — բանիս այս, the pith of my discourse is this; եկն ի —ն, he was at his life's end.

Title: Վերջայք
Definition_1: last days, last years of life;
Definition_2: ի —յս, on the wane, at the close of one's life, in one's declining days, in the sere and yellow leaf.

Title: Վերջանամ
Definition_1: to remain back, to be behind; to abandon, to leave off, to desist, to renounce; to fail, to want, to be short of; to die.

Title: *Վերջապէս
Definition_1: at last, at length, finally, in fine.

Title: Վերջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to withhold, to retain, to keep back, to detain; to deprive of.

Title: Վերջաւոր
Definition_2: border, hem, selvage; fringe, trimming; pinking, ribbon, galloon; զարդարել ի —ս, to fringe, to border, to bind with ribbon, to pink.

Title: Վերջեանք
Definition_2: ի —նսն, lastly, in the last place, after all.

Title: Վերջեմ
Definition_1: to hold back, to deter, to withhold, to cause to loiter or while away.

Title: Վերջին
Definition_1: posterior, ulterior; last, extreme, final; չորք —ք մարդոյ, the four last things, (death, judgment, heaven and hell).

Title: Վերջոտնիմ
Definition_1: to go backwards, to fall back, to recede, to retreat, to give way.

Title: Վերստին
Definition_1: once more, anew, over again, afresh, again, repeatedly.

Title: Վերտ
Definition_1: mail, made of mail, of chains, meshed, linked, woven;
Definition_2: coat of mail; network; զրահք —ք, cuirass, hauberk; շապիկս —ս զգենուլ, to wear a coat of mail.

Title: Վերտառանամ
Definition_1: to be resolved, to be reducible to its elements.

Title: Վերտառեմ
Definition_1: to reintegrate, to reduce to elements.

Title: Վերտիմ
Definition_1: to dance, to hop, to jump, to skip about; to put on a cuirass, to wear a coat of mail.

Title: Վերօրհնեմ
Definition_1: to praise highly, to extol, to exalt, to cry up to the skies.

Title: Վեցամսեայ
Definition_1: of six months, six months old; —, — ժամանակ, six months, half year.

Title: Վեցանձնական
Definition_1: containing six persons; carrying six persons.

Title: Վեցերորդ
Definition_3: sixth.

Title: Վեցկին
Definition_1: six times as much, sextuple, sixfold.

Title: Վզանոց
Definition_1: neck-cloth, cravat, stock, collar; — կանանց, necklace, string, carcanet.

Title: Վզենկեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to pay damages, to make amends.

Title: Վզենկիմ
Definition_1: to make amends, to pay damages, to make compensation.

Title: Վէգ
Definition_1: dispute, debate, contest, discussion, variance, contestation, quarrel, wrangling; ի — գալ ընդ ումեք, to dispute or wrangle, to debate, to contest, to discuss; knucklebones, cockal.

Title: Վէճ
Definition_1: quarrel, controversy, litigation, contention, difference; cf. Վէգ.

Title: Վէմ
Definition_1: stone; rock; — անկեան, corner stone, head-stone; — շափիղայ, sapphire; ի վիմէ ասր ստանալ, to squeeze oil from marble, to desire impossibilities.

Title: Վէպ
Definition_1: history, narration, tale, story, account; romance; poem, poetry.

Title: Վէս
Definition_1: highflown, arrogant, proud, saucy, insolent, haughty, fierce; harsh, hard-hearted, cruel, inhuman, brutal; cross, crabbed, surly, peevish.

Title: Վէտ
Definition_3: — մետաղական, moire metallic, crystallized tin-plate; rippling, waving gently, flowing, undulating; —ս —ս, curling, rippling gently, playfully; — —, — ի — խաղալ, to ripple, to undulate, to rise in small waves, to swell with a gentle breeze; ալիք կուտակին —ք —ք, the surging waves accumulate.

Title: Վէր
Definition_1: sore, wound; ulcer; —, հիւթ վիրի, sanies, matter, pus, gore; կեղեւ վիրաց, scab, scurf; cf. Պատրոյգ; — սրտի, heart-sore, heart-ache, heart-break, heart-burn; —ս առնել, —ս ի վերայ դնել, to wound, to cover with sores, to ulcerate; —ս ընդունել, to be wounded; դարմանել զ—ս, to dress, to cure a wound; ցաւ վիրին խստանայր, the pain caused by the wound became insupportable; տայ —ս եւ ինքն ոչ առնու, he wounds others but receives no hurt.

Title: Վթարեմ
Definition_1: to damage, to injure, to wrong; to waste, to spoil, to destroy.

Title: Վթարիմ
Definition_1: to suffer damage, to get spoiled; to get out of repair.

Title: Վիզ
Definition_1: neck, crag; — ամբառնալ, to become rebellious, proud, insubordinate.

Title: Վիթխարի
Definition_1: colossal, gigantic, of great stature, of enormous magnitude; — արձան, colossus; — այր, giant.

Title: Վիժակ
Definition_1: curtain, veil, hangings, tapestry; water-spout, jet; cf. Վիժանք; — զինուց, sheath for arms.

Title: Վիժանք
Definition_1: course, current, flux, flow, stream; abortion, miscarriage.

Title: Վիժաքրտնիմ
Definition_1: to drudge, to toil and moil, to be in a profuse perspiration, to sweat blood.

Title: Վիժեմ
Definition_1: to have an abortion, a premature birth, to miscarry, to abort, to slink, to be brought to bed before time;
Definition_2: to flow, to run, to gush or spout out, to be shed, poured out.

Title: Վիհ
Definition_1: abyss, gulf, chasm; chaos; hell, the bottomless pit; grave, tomb; great distance;
Definition_2: profound, deep; անդնդախոր —ք ծովու, the depths of Ocean; — թշուառութեան, depths of misery.

Title: Վիճաբանութիւն
Definition_1: dispute, debate, contest, strife, controversy, question, discussion.

Title: Վիճակ
Definition_1: lot, chance, destiny, fate, fortune; ballot, suffrage, vote, voice; lot, state, condition; lot, portion, share; lottery; sorcery; inheritage, possession; fief, farm; department, district, liberties, precinct, extent of jurisdiction, territory; diocese; clergy; situation, condition, fortune, rank, quality, dignity, office, employment, profession; —ս արկանել, to draw or cast lots, to ballot, to vote; to practise witchcraft; — արկանել ի վերայ իրիք, to cast lots or to draw for anything; —աւ տալ, to give through lottery; ետուն —ս նոցա, they drew their names by lot; եւ ել վիճակն մատաթեայ, and the lot fell upon Matthias.

Title: Վիճակախաղ
Definition_1: lottery; շահել ի —ի, to win in the lottery.

Title: Վիճակակից
Definition_1: having the same lot or fate;

Title: Վիճակաւոր
Definition_1: clergyman, ecclesiastic; incumbent; — եպիսկոպոս, diocesan, bishop.

Title: Վիճակաւորիմ
Definition_1: to be chosen by lot, destined by fortune, to inherit.

Title: Վիճակաւորութիւն
Definition_1: share, inheritance, portion; chance; benefice, ecclesiastical dignity or state.

Title: Վիճակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to give or distribute by lot, to allot, to assign in lots, to appoint; to indicate as heir, to put in possession of an inheritance, or of a benefice; to give a title to orders.

Title: Վիճակիմ
Definition_1: to fall or arrive by chance, to be appointed by lot, to fall to the lot, to happen, to obtain by chance; to inherit; դիւրազգաց բնութեան է վիճակեալ, he has sensibility for his lot.

Title: Վիճասէր
Definition_1: fond of disputing, contentious, quarrelsome, litigious.

Title: Վիճիմ
Definition_1: to dispute, to argue, to contest, to squabble, to wrangle, to discuss, to debate, to brawl, to quarrel, to attack, to fight.

Title: Վիմագլումն
Definition_1: the rolling of stones; throwing stones.

Title: Վիմադարան
Definition_1: hidden in a rock, in a cavern, in ambush, waiting for among the rocks.

Title: Վիմական
Definition_1: stony; stone; living in a stone.

Title: Վիմանամ
Definition_1: to become stone, to change into stone, to be petrified; to grow hard.

Title: Վիմասոյզ
Definition_1: entering, hiding among or under stones.

Title: Վիմատաշ
Definition_2: — տառեմ, to change into stone, to petrify, to harden.

Title: Վիմարգել
Definition_1: shut in, enclosed or surrounded by rocks.

Title: Վիմարդեան
Definition_1: resembling a stone, stone-like, stony, stone.

Title: Վիմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make stone, to render as a stone, to petrify, to harden, to strengthen.

Title: Վիմափուլ
Definition_1: crushed under fallen rocks or stones.

Title: Վիմուտ
Definition_1: full of or abounding in stones, stony, pebbly; —ք, stony place.

Title: Վիշապ
Definition_1: dragon; leviathan; typhon, vortex, whirlpool, exhydria;
Definition_2: dragon, draco; — ծովային, araneus piscis, quaviver, weever; — ձուկն, cachalot.

Title: Վիշապակ
Definition_1: small or young dragon; — թռուցիկ, cf. Փռռան.

Title: Վիշապամուխ
Definition_1: tempered or imbrued in dragon's blood.

Title: Վիշապանամ
Definition_1: to become a dragon, to change into a serpent.

Title: Վիշտ
Definition_1: inconvenience, discomfort, displeasure, vexation, pain, trouble, grief, affliction, sorrow, suffering, torment, tribulation; —ք ամպրոպաց, tempest, foul weather; — դառնութեան, bitter grief, desolation; դժնդակ —ք, great hardships, misfortunes; ի վշտէն, առ վշտի, առ վշտի վտանգին, through affliction, tribulation or grief; —ս հասուցանել, to grieve, to pain, to concern, to distress, to cause sorrow, to afflict, to vex; ի —ս մտանել, to grieve at, to be pained at, to take to heart, to sorrow for, to be afflicted; — է ինձ, I am greatly concerned at, it is with pain that I; բազում —ք ի վշտաց հասանէին ազգին, many disasters successively fell on the nation; ամենայն փափկութիւն հայոց եհաս ի —ս վտանգի, all the pleasures of the Armenians were changed for extreme dangers; ի վշտի մաշեն զանձինս, they consume themselves with mourning; չիք ինչ հեշտի առանց վշտի, no joy without alloy.

Title: Վիպասանեմ
Definition_1: to relate, to narrate; to write romance.

Title: Վիպեմ
Definition_1: to relate, to tell, to recount, to recite, to narrate.

Title: Վիսանամ
Definition_1: to be haughty, to grow proud; to be harsh, cruel, cross-grained, waspish, shrewish.

Title: Վիսացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render haughty, hard, inhuman, crabbed.

Title: Վիրալից
Definition_1: full of wounds, covered or riddled with wounds, ulcerous; — առնել, to cover with wounds.

Title: Վիրապ
Definition_1: oubliette, dungeon of death; խոր —, deep dungeon, profound gulf, bottomless pit.

Title: Վիրառնութիւն
Definition_1: act of being wounded, state of ulceration.

Title: Վկայ
Definition_1: witness, testifier; voucher; martyr; աստուած ինձ —, God is my witness; — լինել, to be a witness of, the witnesses of, to be admitted as evidence; — կոչել, to summon as witness; to invoke or call on to witness; — առնուլ, to take to witness.

Title: Վկայագիր
Definition_1: certificate, testimonial; ticket; diploma; — ծննդեան, certificate of birth; — բարի վարուց, certificate of character, testimonial, certificate of good conduct.

Title: Վկայակից
Definition_2: fellow-martyr; — լինել, to attest together, to vouch for with another.

Title: Վկայեմ
Definition_1: to witness, to bear witness, to give evidence, to testify, to depose, to attest, to vouch, to certify; to acknowledge, to own; to approve;
Definition_2: to be martyrized, to suffer martyrdom; սուտ —, to give false evidence, to bear false witness, to perjure; վկայ անիրաւ վկայեաց զանիրաւութիւն, he has perjured himself, he has borne false witness; վկայեմ օրինացն թէ բարւոք են, as the law is good I approve it; պետրոս եւ պօղոս վկայեցին յամս ներոնի, Peter and Paul were tortured in Nero's reign; վկայեն միտք իմ, I am convinced, I am conscientiously persuaded.

Title: Վկայութիւն
Definition_1: witness, testimony, evidence, deposition, attestation; opinion, authority; certificate; allegation, citation; martyrdom; — յաւիտենից, eternal witness; — տալ, դնել, to bear witness or testimony to, to testify; to protest; — ի մէջ բերել, մատուցանել, to quote, to cite; ըստ վկայութեան ամենայն աշխարհի, according to universal opinion.

Title: Վկանդեմ
Definition_1: to beat off, to drive or beat back, to rout, to scatter, to disperse, to defeat, to crush, to discomfit.

Title: Վհատեմ
Definition_1: to discourage, to dishearten, to cast down, to dispirit, to deject, to unnerve.

Title: Վհատիմ
Definition_1: to lose courage, to droop, to be disheartened, to despond, to despair, to be disconsolate.

Title: Վհատութիւն
Definition_1: discouragement, faint-heartedness, dejection, despondency, grief, languor, despair.

Title: Վճար
Definition_1: payment, pay, requital, retribution, compensation; discharge; acquittance, receipt; end, finish; ի —, received; — առնել, to finish, to bring to an end or conclusion, to accomplish.

Title: Վճարեմ
Definition_1:
to finish, to end, to complete, to bring to an end, to terminate, to carry out, to perform, to fulfil, to conclude; to recompense, to restore, to compensate; to pay, to acquit, to discharge, to settle; to deliver, to release, to free from, to rid of, to disentangle, to set free; to forbid, to prohibit, to obstruct, to hinder; — զկեանս, to end one's life, to depart this life, to die; — զոք ի կորուստ, to despatch, to kill; — զպարտս, to pay, to settle a debt; — զհաշիւն, to pay a balance; գործս —, to despatch business; զիրս դատաստանին արեամբ —, to condemn to capital punishment; — զհաճոյսն, to content, to satisfy; զառաջի եդեալ ճանապարհն —, to finish the journey undertaken; ոչ ինչ կարացին ի ժամուն —, they could do nothing at that moment; անձամբ ինչ ոչ կարէր —, he could do nothing alone; չոր թզով եւեթ զպէասն վճարէր, he satisfied his hunger with dried figs alone; վճարեցէք զնա ամենայն իրօք, provide for all his requirements; վճարեաց վասն նորա հայրն, his father resolved to kill him; տեսից եթէ ըստ աղաղակին վճարեցին, I shall see if their works equal their cry ?
լինել ի միջի եւ չլինել՝ զնոյն վճարէ, to be there or not is the same thing; աստուածպաշտութեամբ վճարեցին զկեանս, they led a pious life to the end.

Title: Վճարիմ
Definition_1:
to be accomplished, finished; to be done, effected; to be paid, discharged, acquitted; to die; to get rid of, to be delivered; — ի կենաց, to finish one's days, to die; սպառնալիք նորա ինչ ոչ կարացին —, his threats were useless; վճարեալ է չարութիւն առ ի նմանէ, his malignity is excessive; այն արշաւան թագաւորին այսպիսի դարձիւ վճարեցաւ, such was the end of the king's journey; հրեշտակն աւետիս տուեալ կնոջն՝ վճարեցաւ, the angel, having delivered his message to the woman, disappeared; ընդէ՞ր յարգանդէ ի գերեզման ոչ վճարեցայ, why was I not carried from the womb to the grave ?
անճառելեաւդ ձրիւ՝ մերայնովքդ վճարիս, in exchange for your inestimable gifts, we beseech you to accept our trifles; վճարել է գործդ, it is a bargain; վճարեալ է վասն իմ, my business is done, it is all over with me; յորժամ կամէրն -՝ բարբառ արձակեաց, when he wished to die, he cried out; ամենայն ինչ վճարեալ է վասն իմ, it is all up with me.

Title: Վճարումն
Definition_1: accomplishment, execution, carrying out; delivery, release; death; payment, pay.

Title: Վճիռ
Definition_1: sentence, award, judgment, decree, decision, act, ordinance; sentence, maxim;
Definition_2: decisive, peremptory; — բանիւք, with a peremptory voice; — հատանել, առնել, բերել, ի վերայ ածել, դնել, տալ, to issue a warrant or writ, to sentence, to adjudge, to judge, to declare, to pronounce, to ordain, to condemn; to deliberate, to decide, to resolve, to decree; to enact, to order; — մահու հատանել, ի վերայ դնել, to sentence to death, to sign a deathwarrant.

Title: Վճիտ
Definition_1: clear, pure, clean; — ջուր, limpid, crystal, pellucid water.

Title: Վնաս
Definition_1:
wrong, prejudice, injury, detriment; damage, harm, hurt, loss, grievance; ill, fault, sin, injustice, mischief; հասուցանել, տալ, գործել, cf. Վնասեմ; —ուք վաճառել, to sell at a loss; ի — ուրուք, at the peril, at the loss, at the detriment, at the expense of a person; ոչ մեծ ինչ է —ն, there is no great harm done; ի — իւր շրջեցաւ իրն, the affair turned out to his disadvantage; էր գիր —ու նորա գրեալ, his accusation was written above; զի՞նչ — է իմ, what fault have I ?
— է քեզ գինին, wine is bad for your health; որ — գործէ նոյն եւ հատուսցէ, he that does the damage must answer for it.

Title: Վնասաբանեմ
Definition_1: to accuse, to find fault with, to blame, to lay the fault on.

Title: Վնասաբեր
Definition_1: causing damage, loss or harm, offensive, hurtful, prejudicial.

Title: Վնասակար
Definition_1: hurtful, pernicious, injurious, disadvantageous, detrimental, prejudicial; bad, wicked; guilty.

Title: Վնասակարութիւն
Definition_1: hurtfulness, damage, prejudice, danger; — օդոյ, inclemency of the weather.

Title: Վնասեմ
Definition_1: to hurt, to iujure, to prejudice, to damage, to bring loss or harm, to offend, to wrong, to shock, to wound; — միմեանց, to injure one another.

Title: Վշտաբեկ
Definition_1: afflicted, worn out, bowed down by suffering.

Title: Վշտաբերական
Definition_1: pain-giving, distressing, sad, painful, grievous, woeful.

Title: Վշտագին
Definition_1: afflicted, sorrowful, deeply grieved, in pain, in affliction; doleful, grievous, sad, vexatious, hard, mournful, painful.

Title: Վշտագնեմ
Definition_1: to afflict, to grieve, to concern, to pain, to distress, to cause sorrow to, to vex, to torment.

Title: Վշտագնիմ
Definition_1: to be afflicted, sorry, concerned, pained or grieved at, to take to heart.

Title: Վշտալից
Definition_1: full of affliction, sorrowful, anxious, very afflicted; perplexing, afflicting, vexatious.

Title: Վշտակեաց
Definition_1: living in trouble or care, unfortunate, wretched, miserable.

Title: Վշտակիր
Definition_1: harassed, enduring or suffering pain or trouble, distressed, drudged.

Title: Վշտակից
Definition_1: sympathizing, sensible to another's woe, compassionate, condoling with; — լինել ումեք, to grieve or condole with, to sympathize in suffering, to partake one's grief, to share in one's affliction, to take pity on, to pity, to commiserate, to compassionate.

Title: Վշտահան
Definition_1: afflicting oneself or toiling needlessly; suffering willingly.

Title: Վշտահար
Definition_1: afflicted, pained, grieved, distressed, vexed, plagued, tormented.

Title: Վշտանամ
Definition_1: to suffer, to endure, to bear; to be sad, afflicted, to sorrow, to mourn, to be deeply grieved, to have one's heart full of affliction, to fret for; to be offended, vexed, irritated.

Title: Վշտատես
Definition_1: in distress, in pain, plagued, discomposed, suffering.

Title: Վշտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause displeasure, to sadden, to offend, to afflict, to grief, to plague, to discompose, to vex, to torment.

Title: Վշտովիմ
Definition_1: to be greatly concerned or grieved.

Title: Վուշ
Definition_1: flax; tow, hards of flax, flaxen tow, stuffing;

Title: Վռամական կրակ
Definition_1: Orosmades, god of the ancient Persians, inextinguishable fire.

Title: Վսեմ
Definition_1: sublime, eminent, high, elevated, grand, august, noble, excellent.

Title: Վսեմախոհ
Definition_1: sublime in thought, sublime genius; high-hearted.

Title: Վսեմախոհութիւն
Definition_1: extraordinary wit, great sagacity, acumen, genius.

Title: Վսեմամիտ
Definition_1: high-minded, endowed with an elevated mind, with lofty sentiments, noble, magnanimous.

Title: Վսեմանամ
Definition_1: to rise above, to excel, to surpass.

Title: Վսեմութիւն
Definition_1: sublimity, elevation, highness, excellence, eminence, grandeur.

Title: Վսեր
Definition_2: boldness, effrontery; cf. Վզանութիւն; ի — գալ, to grow bold, to withstand, to oppugn, to impugn, to contend, to dispute.

Title: Վստահ
Definition_1: confiding, trusty, unsuspicious; — լինել, to be sure, reassured; to trust; — առնել, to strengthen, to reassure, to remove one's fears, to give one's word for; — եմ զի, I am sure, I am convinced that, I do not doubt that; — լերուք յիս, rely, reckon on me; ոչ էր — յերեւելիսս, he had not placed his hopes in wordily things.

Title: Վստահանամ
Definition_1: to be assured, to trust to, to confide in, to rely on, to have confidence in, to put one's trust in, to place confidence in, to rely or reckon on; to hope;
Definition_2: to trust with, to confide to, to commit to, to put into the hands of, to deposit; չ-, to distrust, to mistrust, to suspect, to be mistrustful; յինքն or յանձն —, to rely on oneself, to presume, to have a great conceit of oneself, to assume too much.

Title: Վստահացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to assure, to reassure, to inspire confidence, to embolden, to give hopes.

Title: Վստահութիւն
Definition_1: trust, confidence, reliance on, assurance, security, conviction; expectation, hope; consignment, deposit; վստահութեամբ, cf. Վստահաբար.

Title: Վտակ
Definition_1: brook, rivulet, stream, small river or current of water;
Definition_2: — արտասուաց, արեան, flood, stream; — ս արտասուաց իջուցանել, to shed a flood or torrent of tears; բազում —ս արեան հեղուլ, to cause immense bloodshed; cf. Զեղումն.

Title: Վտակալից
Definition_1: streamy, abounding in brooks or rivers, well irrigated.

Title: Վտակայեղց
Definition_1: overflowing; — արտասուօք, eyes swimming with tears.

Title: Վտականամ
Definition_1: to stream down, to fall or flow as a river.

Title: Վտականի
Definition_1: brooks, rivulets; — վայրք, places interspersed with rivers or brooks.

Title: Վտանկ
Definition_1: peril, danger, risk, chance, hazard, ill, misfortune; punishment;
Definition_2: —աւ, perilously, hazardously, dangerously; ի — արկանել, դնել ի —ի, մատնել ի —, to put in jeopardy, to endanger, to compromise; ի — արկանել զանձն, to put oneself in jeopardy, to risk or venture oneself; ի —ի լինել, to be in jeopardy, to incur danger, to run risk; խուսել, փրկել ի —ից, to shun danger, to avoid perils; նաւն ի —ի կայր խորտակել, the ship was in danger of being wrecked; — ի վերայ կայր նորա, he was in peril; — է նմա, he is in danger, he runs the risk of; —աւ կենացն, at the risk of his life; —աւ անձինս, at the peril of my life.

Title: Վտանգակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to be a companion in danger, to encounter risks or dangers together.

Title: Վտանգաւոր
Definition_1: perilous, dangerous, hazardous; in danger, exposed in jeopardy; sad, fatal, disastrous; — ժամանակ, critical moment; — վայրկեան, crisis.

Title: Վտանգեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to put in peril, to endanger, to expose, to venture, to hazard, to put in jeopardy, to risk; to ill-treat, to importune, to torment; — զառողջութիւն, to ruin the health.

Title: Վտանգիմ
Definition_1: to be in peril, in jeopardy, to risk, to run danger.

Title: Վտառ
Definition_1: multitude, band, flock, herd; —ք ձկանց, shoal of fish; — —, in herds, in troops or flocks;

Title: Վտարական
Definition_1: chasing, driving out, expulsive; — լինել, to be driven out, banished, exiled.

Title: Վտարանդեմ
Definition_1: to drive away, to expel, to banish, to exile, to expatriate, to cause to wander or stray; — ի ծառայութիւն, to reduce to slavery to lead into bondage.

Title: Վտարանդիկ
Definition_1: banished, exiled; vagabond, wandering; uncertain, in doubt, doubtful;
Definition_3: anguish; — առնել, to cause to wander; — տալ, to deliver up, to betray; զգազանացն բարս առեր, եւ — ետուր զազնուականութիւնդ, false to your original nobility of soul, you have fallen to the level of the beasts of the forest.

Title: Վտարանդիմ
Definition_1: to be exiled, expatriated; to be uncertain.

Title: Վտարանդումն
Definition_1: slavery, bonds; banishment, exile, expatriation; exodus, emigration; uncertainty.

Title: Վտարանջեմ
Definition_1: to revolt, to rebel, to rise up against, to mutiny.

Title: Վտարեմ
Definition_1: to dislodge, to remove, to expel, to drive away, to send off, to banish, to exile; to usurp, to seize, to assume wrongfully.

Title: Վտարեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to drive from home, to cause to become fugitive, wandering, houseless, homeless.

Title: Վտարիմ
Definition_1: to go away, to roam, to wander.

Title: Վտաւան
Definition_1: stadium; իբրեւ —աւ, as it were a bow-shot.

Title: Վտիտ
Definition_1: lean, meagre, scraggy, skinny, gaunt, spare, slender, thin, lank, sorry, dry; — մարմնով, leanfleshed.

Title: Վտտեմ
Definition_1: to make lean or thin, to emaciate, to weaken.

Title: Վտտիմ
Definition_1: to grow lean, to fall away, to become thin, emaciated, weakened.

Title: Վտտութիւն
Definition_1: leanness, meagerness, spareness, thinness; emaciation, extenuation, weakness.

Title: Վրան
Definition_1: tent, pavilion; — ժամու, Tabernacle; — հարկանել, կանգնել, to pitch a tent, to dress a pavilion; ի —ս բնակել, to dwell in tents; բառնալ զ—ն, to strike a tent.

Title: Վրանաբնակիչ
Definition_1: dwelling, living in tents, nomad, bedouin; ազգ —աց, wandering tribe.

Title: Վրանակից
Definition_1: dwelling in the same or a neighbouring tent.

Title: Վրանայարկ
Definition_1: the inmost division or room in a tent.

Title: Վրանեայ
Definition_1: tent-like or pavilion-like; — եկեղեցի, portable altar.

Title: Վրացի
Definition_2: — կոճ, hellebore, bear's foot; տարազ — կոճակի, agaric, mushroom.

Title: Վրդովեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to alarm, to rouse, to disquiet, to trouble, to disturb, to perturb, to agitate.

Title: Վրդովիմ
Definition_1: to be alarmed, disquieted, disturbed, agitated, to be out of one's reckoning.

Title: Վրդովումն
Definition_1: alarm, trouble, disquiet, restlessness, agitation, confusion, disorder, tumult.

Title: Վրէժ
Definition_1: revenge, vengeance; ի —, in return, in requital; առնուլ, խնդրել, հանել զ—ն, —ս պահանջել, հանել զքէն վրիժուն, to avenge, to revenge, to avenge oneself, to take vengeance, to be revenged, to have revenge; —ս լուծանիլ, պահանջիլ, տալ, to suffer vengeance, to bear punishment, to pay dear for, to smart for; ի — նախատանաց դստեր իւրոյ, to avenge his daughter; առից ի նմանէ զ— իմ, I will revenge myself or him, he shall pay me dearly; խնդրեաց զ— զրկելոյն, he avenged the wrongs of him who suffered; հատուցից —ս թշնամեաց իմոց եւ ատելեաց իմոց հատուցից, I will be avenged of my enemies and I will requite them who hate me; եօթն —ս լուծցէ, he shall be avenged seven fold.

Title: Վրէժխնդիր
Definition_1: revengeful, vindicative, avenging; — լինել, to call for vengeance, to be revenged.

Title: Վրէպ
Definition_2: defective, wanting, failing in, deprived of; ոչ — ի ճշմարտութենէ, likely, probable; — ելանել, գտանիլ, to want, to fail, to miss, to be deprived of; to be rendered useless, inefficacious, to be deluded, annulled.

Title: Վրիժակ
Definition_2: defensive weapon; means of defence; —ք կնճի, razors; —ք փղի, tusks of an elephant.

Title: Վրիժակազէն
Definition_1: armed with a weapon of offence;

Title: Վրիժակեմ
Definition_1: to make use of defensive weapons; — զոք, to slay with a weapon.

Title: Վրիպալուր
Definition_1: hearing erroneously, understanding one thing for another.

Title: Վրիպակ
Definition_1: error, mistake; failing, fault, perversity; unforeseen event, accident, casualty, hazard, chance;
Definition_2: wanting, failing, wrong, mistaken, false, erroneous, perverse;
Definition_3: —աւ, by mistake, erroneously; accidentally, casually, by chance; — տպագրութեան, erratum; — ժամանակագրական, anachronism; — գտանիլ, to wander, to go astray, to deviate.

Title: Վրիպանք
Definition_1: error, fault, misunderstanding, oversight, blunder, mistake; delusion, deception, frustration, disappointment.

Title: Վրիպեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to fail or miss, to turn aside, to mislead, to deceive, to delude, to pervert; to deprive of, to take away; cf. Մազ.

Title: Վրիպիմ
Definition_1: to be mistaken, to commit an oversight, to err, to miscarry, to be under a mistake; to be deceived, frustrated, deluded, disappointed; to turn away, to swerve, to go astray, to wander; — ի մտաց, to escape from one's memory; ոչ վրիպեաց բան մի, not one word remained without its effect; վրիպեալ ըստ բժշկութիւն, past cure, incurable, hopeless.

Title: Վրձին
Definition_1: brush; — նկարչաց, brush, pencil; — զգեստուց, հերաց, ատամանց, եղնգանց, clothes-brush, hair-brush, tooth-brush, nail-brush.

Title: Վրնջողական
Definition_3: concupiscence.

Title: <letter>Տ</letter> (dioun)
Definition_1: the thirty first letter of the alphabet, and the twenty fifth of the consonants; four thousand, four thousandth.

Title: Տագնապ
Definition_1: anxiety, anguish, restlessness, embarrassment, perplexity, agitation, alarm, trouble; crisis; haste, precipitation;
Definition_2: —աւ, in haste, hastily, with all possible speed, in a hurry, hurriedly, precipitately; anxiously, with anxiety; — մտաց, grief, anxiety, mental torture, constraint, heaviness of heart, oppression; — մահու, pangs or agony of death, death-struggle; արկանել, մատնել ի —ս անհնարինս, to embarrass extremely, to place in a strait, in a scrape, embarrassment or perplexity; արկանել զանձն ի —, to embarrass oneself; կալ ի —ի, to be in trouble, anxiety or embarrassment; հասանել ի յետին —, to be reduced to extremities; եղիցի — հեթանոսաց, the nations shall be plunged in consternation; եկն յանկարծակի դողումն եւ —, a sudden fear fell on them; ամենայն — հասցէ ի վերայ նորա, every kind of grief shall fall upon him; ըմբռնեալ յանլոյծ — հասանէր, he found himself embarrassed by that insuperable necessity; — էր նմա յամենայն կողմանց, he was hemmed in by necessities; — մեծ էր նմա, he had extreme difficulty, he turned on all sides; հարից զամենայն երիվարս —աւ եւ զհեծեալս նորա յիմարութեամբ, I will turn the horses into stone and their riders will I stultify; յետին — կալաւ զնա, he was brought to the last extremity; փոյթ եւ — եղեւ ի ջուրս, the waters rivalled each other.

Title: Տագնապեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to put to trouble, to embarrass, to perplex, to puzzle, to torment, to grieve; to constrain, to force, to tease, to importune; to urge, to hasten, to solicit, to quicken; ահիւ —, to strike with terror, to appall, to terrify.

Title: Տագնապիմ
Definition_1: to be grieved, distressed, disturbed, embarrassed, to be torn with anguish, to be in great pain; to have an urgent and pressing necessity, to be in despair; to be hurried, in haste; տագնապէր ջերմամբ մեծաւ, he had been seized with a violent fever.

Title: Տաժան
Definition_1: worn out by fatigue, overwhelmed with labour, weary, tired out.

Title: Տաժանաբար
Definition_1: painfully, with much trouble, laboriously, with difficulty.

Title: Տաժանագործ
Definition_1: working hard, very laborious; troublesome, tiresome.

Title: Տաժանելի
Definition_1: painful, grievous, hard, difficult, incommodious, vexatious, laborious, fatiguing, tiring, toilsome, annoying, rude, heavy.

Title: Տաժանեմ
Definition_1: to fatigue, to tire, to overdo, to harass, to oppress, to vex.

Title: Տաժանիմ
Definition_1: to give oneself trouble, to have much trouble, to toil, to be fatigued, worn out with fatigue, to drudge, to work hard.

Title: Տաժանք
Definition_2: great fatigue, much labour, trouble, toil, weariness, pain, hard work, drudgery.

Title: Տալիթայ
Definition_1:
talitha; — կումի, cumi ! damsel, arise !
— սարկաւագ, deaconess.

Title: Տախտակ
Definition_1: board, plank, shelf, table, tablet; tables; book;
Definition_2: cf. Երկնացոյց; — երկաթի; iron-plate, sheet-iron; — մետաղեայ; plate of metal; —ք վկայութեան, the tables of the decalogue; — դատաստանաց, breastplate, pectoral, rational; — նկարուց, canvass, wood; — ճատրակի, chess-board; — զստի, the hollow of the thigh; — խոհանոցի, trencher.

Title: Տախտակագործ
Definition_1: built of wood or of planks (ship).

Title: Տախտակամած
Definition_1: covered with boards, planks, boarded, planked, floored; wainscoted;
Definition_2: wooden floor; scaffolding; wainscot; — նաւու, deck; — առնել, գործել, to wainscot, to plank, to board, to floor.

Title: Տախտապար
Definition_1: stretched on the earth; ի տախտապար արկանել, cf. Տախտապարեմ.

Title: Տախտապարեմ
Definition_1: to stretch on the earth; to beat down, to overthrow.

Title: Տածեմ
Definition_1: to care, to take care of, to preserve; to nourish, to maintain, to sustain, to feed; to cultivate; to foment, to stir up; — զախտս, to cherish, to flatter vices; — զխռովութիւն, to foment disturbances; cf. Ձու.

Title: Տակ
Definition_1: bottom, under part or side; root;
Definition_2: beet; — առնուլ, to take root, to be rooted; մամլոյ —, in the press;
Definition_3: race, row, range, string; խոտս —աւ մեծաւ, great provision.

Title: Տակակոտոր առնեմ
Definition_1: to root up, to pluck up by the roots, to extirpate.

Title: Տակառ
Definition_1: barrel, cask, puncheon, butt; tun; խից —ի, spigot; ծորակ —ի, tap; շերտ or կողք —աց, staff.

Title: Տակառապետութիւն
Definition_1: office or dignity of a butler, butler-ship.

Title: Տակաւ
Definition_1: by little and little, by slow degrees, insensibly; yet, still; — little by little, slowly, by degrees.

Title: Տաղանդ
Definition_2: talent, ability, parts, attainments; — ոսկի, golden talent.

Title: Տաղաւար
Definition_1: tabernacle, tent, booth; hut, lodging, cabin, vine-arbour; scene, stage; — մրգապահաց, fruit-house.

Title: Տաղաւարաշինութիւն
Definition_1: erecting a tabernacle or pavilion, building a hut or cottage; տօն —ահարաց, feast of tabernacles; scenopegia.

Title: Տաղաւարիմ
Definition_1: to dwell in tents or in huts.

Title: Տաղտապեմ
Definition_1: to annoy, to disturb, to importune, to trouble, to molest.

Title: Տաղտապիմ
Definition_1: to be distressed, harassed, uneasy, annoyed, plagued.

Title: Տաղտկանամ
Definition_1: to be disgusted, wearied, sick or tired of, to loathe, to nauseate; տաղտակացեալ եմ ի մարդկանէ, I am weary of men.

Title: Տաղտկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to tire, to disgust, to put out of conceit, to annoy, to sicken, to plague.

Title: Տաղտկութիւն
Definition_1: displeasure, disgust, dislike, aversion, nausea; annoyance, vexation, trouble.

Title: Տաղտուկ
Definition_1: wearisome, tedious, tiresome, bothering, troublesome; idle, cowardly, tedious to oneself;

Title: Տաճար
Definition_1: temple, fane, church; palace, court, hotel; banqueting-hall; banquet, feast; — խորհրդոյ, council-hall, House of Parliament.

Title: Տաճարայարդար
Definition_1: guardian or minister of a temple.

Title: Տաճարանամ
Definition_1: to become a temple of the Holy Ghost.

Title: Տաճարապետ
Definition_1: house-steward; chief-captain; high-priest; governor or ruler of the feast, high seneschal; cf. Հացերէց.

Title: Տաճարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to convert the soul into a temple.

Title: Տաճիկ
Definition_2: Arabian; Turkish; swift-footed; — ձի, barb, Barbary or Arabian horse; — ասորի, Canaanite; cf. Ուղտ.

Title: Տաճկաբար
Definition_1: like a Turk, in the Turkish fashion.

Title: Տամ
Definition_1:
to give, to present, to offer; to concede, to grant, to bestow; to provide, to furnish, to lend; to give up, to deliver, to abandon, to expose; to make, to render, to produce, to cause; — զանձն, to apply to, to addict oneself to; to give oneself up to, to abandon oneself; — խօսել, to cause to speak; — պատասխանի, to answer, to reply, to respond; cf. Պատասխանի; չ— դուլ եւ դադար, to give neither peace nor rest, to disturb continually; — իշխանութիւն, to invest or intrust with authority; վկայագիր, անցագիր —, to deliver a certificate, to grant a passport; մրցանակ, վարձս —, to decree rewards, to award prizes or premiums; — ածել, to cause to bring; — գերեզմանի, to bury, to inter; — ի բանտ, to put in jail or prison, to imprison; ժողով —, to come together, to assemble, to reunite, to meet, to hold a meeting; քարամբք —, to strike with stones; տաց զքեզ յազգ մեծ, I will make of you a great nation; տացէ քեզ տէր լինել, may you be!
չէ տուեալ ամենեցուն, it is not every one that can; զորս ընդ ձեռամբ ձերով ետու, which I put in subjection to you; ես ետու տանել զուլդ, I have sent the kid; հօրն իւրում ետ տանել, he sent to his father; տուր բերել ինձ փայտս մայրս, send me cedar wood; ետ զանձն իւր երթալ, he went; զլէգէոնս այսոցն՝ անդնդոց տայ, he sends the legions of devils into the pit; զպատիժս տայցեն յաւիտենից տանջանաց, they will suffer eternal punishment; զմեզ ի կորուստ եւ յոչէութիւն տան, they load us with evil and annihilate us; մի տայք մեռանել, do not leave to die.

Title: Տամկանամ
Definition_1: to be wet, moistened, to become humid, moist.

Title: Տամկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to moisten, to damp, to wet, to dew, to bedew, to soak, to steep.

Title: Տաներես
Definition_1: elevation or front of a building, frontispiece.

Title: Տանիմ
Definition_1: to carry, to carry away or off, to bear off, to take or convey away, to lead, to bring, to fetch away, to transport; to drive at, to tend or lead to; to hold, to contain, to comprise, to include, to comprehend; to bear, to suffer, to endure; to carry to an end, to accomplish, to crown;
Definition_2: to be brought, conducted, led; յինքն —, to appropriate to oneself, to assume wrongfully, to arrogate, to lay claim to; ընդ միտ —, to take exception or offence at, to find fault with; — եւ ածել ինչ, to publish, to celebrate, to make public.

Title: Տանուտէր
Definition_1: master of a house, head of a family; landlord, house-holder; patriarch, chief of a tribe or race;

Title: Տանուտէրական
Definition_1: appertaining to the head of a house, feudal.

Title: Տանուտէրութիւն
Definition_1: condition or authority of the master of a house, or of the chief of a tribe; feudality.

Title: Տանջանք
Definition_1: torment, torture, punishment, suffering, pain, plague, grief; —նս ածել ի վերայ or արկանել զգլխով ուրուք, cf. Տանջեմ.

Title: Տանջեմ
Definition_1: to torment, to torture, to rack, to afflict, to cause to suffer, to harrow.

Title: Տանջիմ
Definition_1: to be tormented, to suffer tortures; զանհնարին տանջանս տանջի, he suffers cruel torments; տանջին զանմահ մահն, they die eternal death.

Title: Տանտիկին
Definition_1: mistress of a house, matron; housewife.

Title: Տանտիկնութիւն
Definition_1: authority of a mistress or matron.

Title: Տաշեմ
Definition_1: to rough-hew, to roughen down, to chip, to square, to plane, to smooth, to polish.

Title: Տաշտ
Definition_1: cup, mug; bowl, basin; vat, trough; tub, bucket, wash-tub or lye-tub; basket; — խմորոյ, kneading-trough, hutch; — խնկոց, bed of spices; cf. Խնկանոց; — որմածուաց, hod, tray;

Title: Տաշտաթաղ
Definition_1: layer, slip, provine, shoot, sprig or a vine, etc; — առնել, to lay vines, to provine, to propagate the vine by layers, to plant with slips.

Title: Տաշտախիլ լինիմ
Definition_1: to have branches torn away; to be rooted up or out; — առնել, to root out, to pull up, to pluck up.

Title: Տաշտաւոր
Definition_1: full of, or loaded with vine-branches;

Title: Տապ
Definition_1: heat, ardour, warmth, solar heat; inflammation; over-excitement; foaming or frothing of the sea, storm.

Title: Տապալ
Definition_2: cf. Թաւալագլոր; — յերկիր կործանել, to fall down; to be struck dead on the spot.

Title: Տապալեմ
Definition_1: to fell or throw to the ground, to beat down, to prostrate, to overturn, to overthrow, to upset; to subvert, to demolish, to destroy, to ruin, to roll, to turn; — զխորհուրդս ուրուք, to destroy a person's projects; cf. Խոչ.

Title: Տապալիմ
Definition_1: to be fallen down, overthrown, to fall or go to ruin; to roll, to tumble; գելոյր տապալէր երկդիմի մտօք, he tortured himself with uncertainty; տապալեալ անկաւ երիվարն, the horse fell, was broken down; տապալեցաւ ի մէջ ոտից նորա սիսարա, Sisera rolled under her feet.

Title: Տապալումն
Definition_1: throwing down, overturning, subversion, ruin, fall; rolling;

Title: Տապախարշ
Definition_1: burning; — առնել, to burn, to be burnt.

Title: Տապակէզ
Definition_1: very hot, burning; — լինել, to be scorched up.

Title: Տապակիմ
Definition_1: to be fried; to be parched with thirst.

Title: Տապան
Definition_1: large box or trunk; Noah's ark; coffin, bier; tomb, sarcophagus, sepulchre, urn.

Title: Տապանակ
Definition_1: chest, box, coffer, small trunk; poor's box; tabernacle; cf. Ուխտ; — պրտուեայ, ark of bulrushes.

Title: Տապանամ
Definition_1: to grow warm, to be excessively hot, to be burnt, scorched; to be in a fever.

Title: Տապանատեղ
Definition_1: niche or place for a sarcophagus.

Title: Տապաստ
Definition_1: mange, scab in cattle; — արկանել, to strike or fell to the ground, to stretch dead, to kill on the spot; — անկանել, to be struck dead, to fall dead on the spot, to be slain; — անկանել ի փոշւոջ, to bite the dust or the ground, to be killed; — անկանել ի սայր սուսերի, to fall by the edge of the sword.

Title: Տապաստիմ
Definition_1: to fall dead on the spot.

Title: Տապար
Definition_1: hatchet, axe; դնել զ— առ արմին, to lay the axe to the tree.

Title: Տապացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to warm, to heat, to overheat, to burn.

Title: Տառ
Definition_1: cf. Տարր; letter, character; letter, episite; book; աստուածեղէն —ք, the Holy Scriptures; մարգարէական —ք, the prophecies; —ք կանոնականք, canons, constitutions, statutes, written laws.

Title: Տառադարձութիւն
Definition_1: anagram; առնել —, to anagrammatize; յօրինող տառադարձութեան, anagrammatist; յօրինումն տառադարձութեան, anagrammatism.

Title: Տառապանք
Definition_1: tribulation, affliction, anguish, distress, grief, trouble, vexation, pain, torment, fatigue, misery, misfortune, disaster.

Title: Տառապեալ
Definition_1: loaded with misfortunes, with trouble, poor, pitiable, unhappy, miserable.

Title: Տառապեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to trouble, to afflict, to oppress, to molest, to maltreat, to vex; to violate, to dishonour, to deflower; —եցուցանես զաղիսս իմ, I am afflicted by your woes.

Title: Տառապիմ
Definition_1: to grieve at, to be pained, uneasy, afflicted, tormented, vexed, to be unhappy, miserable; տառապէաք խնդրէաք զքեզ, we have sought thee sorrowing.

Title: Տառատոկ
Definition_1: military coat or mantle, cassock, capote; doublet, jerkin.

Title: Տասանորդ
Definition_1: tenth part, tithe; decime or dime; առնուլ զ—սն, to decimate, to tithe, to collect tithes.

Title: Տասանորդեմ
Definition_1: to decimate, to tithe, to take tithes.

Title: Տասն
Definition_1: ten; ի — ամսոյն, on the tenth of the month;

Title: Տասնամեան
Definition_1: decennial, of ten years; ten years old.

Title: Տասնփեղկեան
Definition_1: of ten curtains, shutters, pieces or breadths.

Title: Տատամսիմ
Definition_1: to be embarrassed, disturbed or pained in mind, to have difficulty in deciding, to hesitate, to waver, to be unsettled, uneasy, concerned, in trouble.

Title: Տատամսութիւն
Definition_1: vexatious perplexity, titubation, hesitation, wavering, inquietude, embarrassment.

Title: Տատան
Definition_2: swing, see-saw; cf. Տատանումն; կալ ի —ի, cf. Տատանիմ; — առնել, to swing, to send up and down, to see-saw.

Title: Տատանեմ
Definition_1: to jog, to stagger, to shake, to swing, to oscillate, to wag, to toss, to agitate; to bandy about, to titubate, to vacillate.

Title: Տատանիմ
Definition_1: to jog, to wag, to totter, to vacillate, to flutter about, to struggle, to tremble, to be shaken, agitated, staggered; to hesitate, to waver, to be in suspense.

Title: Տատանումն
Definition_1: jogging, jostling, staggering, shaking, tottering, vacillating, trembling.

Title: Տատասկ
Definition_1: star-thistle; caltrop; — երկաթի, iron-thistle, instrument of torture.

Title: Տատրակ
Definition_1: turtle-dove; ձագ —ի, young -; — վուվուս արձակէ —, the coos;

Title: Տար
Definition_1: far off, distant, remote; — աշխարհ հատանել or հարկանել, երթալ ի — աշխարհ, ի — աշխարհս ընթանալ, անցանել, to travel abroad; ի — աշխարհէ գալ, to return from abroad.

Title: Տարաբաժանիմ
Definition_1: to start from, to remove, to expatriate oneself.

Title: Տարաբաժին
Definition_1: divided, separated, removed; separating, removing; — հանել, կացուցանել, to alienate, to transfer, to separate; to expatriate; ելանել —, to abandon one's country.

Title: Տարաբարձիմ
Definition_1: to be taken away; to be divided.

Title: Տարաբերեմ
Definition_1: to bear here and there, to shake, to agitate, to move, to stir.

Title: Տարաբերիմ
Definition_1: to be borne about, to be shaken, agitated; to differ, to be unlike.

Title: Տարաբնակիմ
Definition_1: to dwell abroad, afar off; to estrange oneself, to be removed.

Title: Տարաբնակութիւն
Definition_1: act of living at a distance, removal, pilgrimage.

Title: Տարաբուն
Definition_1: unnatural, contrary to nature; far from one's country or home, abroad.

Title: Տարագիր
Definition_1: proscribed, removed, driven away, expatriated, banished, exiled; — առնել, լինել, cf. Տարագրեմ, cf. Տարագրիմ; — ելանել ի կենաց, to pass from this world; ի հայրենի ընչից — գտանիլ, to be disinherited.

Title: Տարագծեալ
Definition_1: counterfeit, base; դահեկան —, coin, false money.

Title: Տարագործ
Definition_1: misplaced, unbecoming, useless; — առնել, to render useless, inefficacious, to cause to miscarry, to foil, to delude.

Title: Տարագրեմ
Definition_1: to proscribe, to banish, to exile, to drive away, to remove, to exclude.

Title: Տարագրիմ
Definition_1: to be proscribed, banished or excluded.

Title: Տարագրութիւն
Definition_1: proscription, ban, banishment, exile, exclusion, transportation, expatriation.

Title: Տարադէմ
Definition_1: far, far off, far distant, remote; — գնալ, դէմ եդեալ — գնալ, to go afar, abroad, to be estranged, to leave one's native land, to go from home.

Title: Տարադէպ
Definition_1: unsuitable, improper, unbecoming, undue, disagreeing, absurd, extravagant; թէ ի հանդէպս եւ թէ ի —դէպս, per fas et nefasby right or wrong.

Title: Տարազ
Definition_2: formula; —, գործ —ու, clever work, artistic production; գրահաշուական —, algebraic formula; — խօսից, style; cf. Վրացի; ի — քաղաքացի, in plain, in private clothes; ի — եկեղեցական, in clerical attire, dressed like a clergyman; զգեցաւ աշխարհական —, he dressed like a layman.

Title: Տարաժամ
Definition_1: mistimed, ill-timed, inopportune, unseasonable, untimely; premature;
Definition_2: unseasonably, inopportunely, at the wrong time or moment, out of season; prematurely; too late, when too late;
Definition_3: cf. Տարաժամութիւն; — հասակաւ, not full grown, young; — ծերանալ, to age prematurely.

Title: Տարալածեմ
Definition_1: to chase, to expel, to drive away.

Title: Տարած
Definition_1: spread out, extended, stretched out; extensible;
Definition_2: —, —ածք, extent, extension; volume, bulk, size; show, display.

Title: Տարածական
Definition_1: ductile, extensive, extensible, dilatable, expansible; — հեղուկ, elastic fluid.

Title: Տարածեմ
Definition_1: to spread, to extend, to stretch out, to dilate; to unfold, to open, to spread out, to display; to propagate, to diffuse, to spread abroad, to strew, to spread.

Title: Տարածանիմ
Definition_1: to be spread, stretched out, extended; to be propagated, spread out; անկեալ կան մահու —ծեալ, slain they lay stretched on earth; դրօշքն —ծանեին, the banners were displayed; տգիտութիւն յաշխարհի —ի, ignorance is spreading over the world; —ծեցաւ յամենեսին, it became general.

Title: Տարածոց
Definition_1: volume; — արկանել, to spread, to extend.

Title: Տարածումն
Definition_1: extent, dimension, latitude; dilatation, extension, expansion, diffusion; propagation, spread, reach, sphere.

Title: Տարականամ
Definition_1: constitute itself, to proceed, to issue.

Title: Տարակարծ
Definition_1: unthought of, unlooked for, unforeseen; absurd, strange, extraordinary; — լինել, to form strange suspicions.

Title: Տարակոյս
Definition_1: doubt, uncertainty, wavering, vacillation, irresolution, hesitation, embarrassment; tribulation, anguish, anxiety;
Definition_2: doubtful, uncertain; ի —կուսի կացուցանել, ի — արկանել, to cause to doubt, to call into question; կալ ի —կուսի, to doubt, to be in doubt, to waver; — ի —ս կցել, to multiply doubts, questions; չիք ինչ —, there is no doubt; undoubtedly.

Title: Տարակորզեմ
Definition_1: to pull up, to root out, to pluck up.

Title: Տարակուսանք
Definition_1: cf. Տարակոյս; ընդ —կուսանօք անկանել, to be called in question; ընդ — կուսանօք արկանել, to call into question.

Title: Տարակուսեմ
Definition_1: to cause to doubt, to create doubts, to cause doubts to.

Title: Տարակուսիմ
Definition_1: to doubt, to have doubts, to question, to hesitate, to be irresolute, embarrassed, to demur; — ի դիւէ, to become furious, to rage like a madman.

Title: Տարաձայնիմ
Definition_1: to dissent, to disagree, to differ, to be at variance.

Title: Տարամերժ
Definition_1: reprobate, cast out, rejected, thrown out; disowned, disapproved.

Title: Տարամերժեմ
Definition_1: to cast out, to reject, to reprobate; to expel, to drive away; to disown, to disapprove.

Title: Տարաշխարհ
Definition_1: distant country, remote region, abroad, foreign lands;

Title: Տարապայման
Definition_1: exorbitant, excessive, unbounded, inordinate, extravagant, immoderate, enormous.

Title: Տարապարհակ վարեմ
Definition_1: to oppress, to compel, to constrain, to vex, to tax unmercifully.

Title: Տարապարտ
Definition_1: wrong, undue, unjust, unreasonable; unnecessary, needless, useless, vain;
Definition_2: —, ի —, unduly, in vain, uselessly, without reason, improperly, wrongfully; — ամօթ, bashfulness, sheepishness; հոգալ ի բանս —ս, to believe in idle gossip.

Title: Տարասահմանեմ
Definition_1: to banish, to exile, to drive away, to remove.

Title: Տարասուզիմ
Definition_1: to be engulfed, swallowed up, precipitated, sunk to the bottom.

Title: Տարավարժիմ
Definition_1: to get accustomed to a climate or place.

Title: Տարատարափ
Definition_1: scattered about, spread here and there.

Title: Տարատրոհեմ
Definition_1: to disjoin, to separate, to remove.

Title: Տարափ
Definition_1: shower, abundant rain; — ձեան, flake of snow; տեղ եւ — նետից, a shower of arrows; a cloud of darts; ծակոտեալ ի —ոյ նետից, pierced with a hundred arrow wounds.

Title: Տարափեմ
Definition_1: to rain or to snow heavily.

Title: Տարափոխիկ
Definition_1: contagious, epidemical, infectious, catching; — ախտ, contagion, epidemical disease, infection.

Title: Տարբեր
Definition_1: different, unlike, various, diverse, dissimilar, sundry;

Title: Տարբերեմ
Definition_1: to difference, to diversify, to distinguish, to vary, to change;

Title: Տարբերիմ
Definition_1: to differ, to be unlike or different, to stand out, to be distinguished; to be agitated, to flutter, to waver, to turn on all sides.

Title: Տարբերութիւն
Definition_1: difference; dissimilitude, diversity, variety, distinction, disparity; shade; agitation, inconstancy, wavering;

Title: Տարեգլուխ
Definition_1: new year, new year's day; cf. Կաղանդ.

Title: Տարեդարձ
Definition_1: anniversary; — ծննդոց, birthday; կատարել զ— ծննդոց, յաղթութեան, to keep the anniversary of a birth; to commemorate a victory.

Title: Տարեկան
Definition_1: yearly, annual, anniversary, once a year;
Definition_2: year; solemnity, feast, festival; etesian or trade-winds; օր —ի or —աց, anniversary, — day; կարգեցին ամ յամէ զօրն զայն տօն —աց, it was ordered that this day be annually commemorated; ոչ գոյր երթեւեկ տօնից —աց նորա, no one frequented his festivals any longer; յաւուր նշանաւորի —աց, on the festival day.

Title: Տարեւորական
Definition_1: annual, yearly; cf. Հողմ; գառն —, teg; դահեկանաց —, early stipend.

Title: Տարի
Definition_1: year, twelve-months; պարականոն —, embolismic year; տարւոջէ ի —, տարւոյ տարւոյ, տարւոյ —, annually, yearly, year by year, every year; ի տարւոջ, in the year; per annum, a year; cf. Ամ; cf. Թողութիւն.

Title: Տարմ
Definition_1: cf. Տարմահաւ; —, — թռչնոց, flock, flight of birds; — — or տարմաբար, cf. Տարմաբար.

Title: Տարմաբար
Definition_1: in flocks, in troops, in great numbers.

Title: Տարմանամ
Definition_1: to flock together, to form troops.

Title: Տարորոշեմ
Definition_1: to distinguish, to separate, to divide.

Title: Տարուբեր
Definition_1: agitated, tossed about, driven here and there; carrying or bringing merchandise;

Title: Տարուբերեմ
Definition_1: to agitate, to toss about, to stir, to drive here and there; to repeat.

Title: Տարուբերիմ
Definition_1: to hesitate, to vacillate, to be in suspense; to carry messages, to negotiate, to parley; to trade, to carry on commerce.

Title: Տարումն
Definition_1: cf. Տարողութիւն; յանտեղի —, carrying to absurdity.

Title: Տարտամ
Definition_1: unsteady, irresolute, perplexed, wavering, indeterminate, uncertain, cowardly, slothful, sluggish, idle; — տագնապի տարակուսանաց, painful thoughts, mental anguish.

Title: Տարտամիմ
Definition_1: to be irresolute, undecided, uncertain; to grow slothful, lazy; to move slowly.

Title: Տարտամութիւն
Definition_1: want of determination, irresolution, indecision, uncertainty, embarrassment, perplexity; cowardice, poltroonery; sloth, idleness.

Title: Տարտարոս
Definition_1: Tartarus, hell; մշտագիշեր —, the gloomy Tartarus.

Title: Տարր
Definition_1: element, elementary substance or matter; տարերք, elements; rudiments; տարերք կենաց, the elements of life; ըստ տարերց աշխարհի, according to the worldly maxims.

Title: Տարրաբար
Definition_1: in an elementary state or form, elementally, rudimentally; materially.

Title: Տարրանամ
Definition_1: to be compounded of elements, to be reduced to elements, to be produced, formed, to exist, to be; to incorporate, to adhere, to be united, attached; to be inculcated, impressed or imprinted; բանիւ տարրացեալ մարմինք, created beings furnished with reasoning faculties; սողոմոն տարրանայր ի խորս էակաց, Solomon penetrated the secrets of nature; յերկիւղի նորա տարրասցուք, let us keep his fear in our hearts; տարրացեալ են ի սիրտ իմ, they have penetrated to my inmost soul; տարրացաւ խաւարն ի վերայ երկրի, darkness covered the face of the earth; տարրացեալ առ աստուած սիրով, bound to God by love.

Title: Տարրատռփութիւն
Definition_1: immoderate love or desire of terrestrial things; idolatry.

Title: Տարրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to element, to compound of elements, to constitute, to produce, to form, to give being to; to incorporate, to attach together, to mix, to unite; to inculcate, to impress.

Title: Տարրութիւն
Definition_1: elementariness, elementarity, substance, existence; elements, rudiments.

Title: Տարփածու
Definition_1: lover, wooer, sweetheart, beau, gallant, fop; lover, mistress, sweetheart.

Title: Տարփամ
Definition_1: to wish for ardently, to long or sigh for, to covet eagerly; to burn with desire or passion, to be in love.

Title: Տարփանք
Definition_1: love, passion, ardent desire, over-eagerness; բայց զի՞նչ — քեզ առասպելքն իցեն, why are you so fond of fables?.

Title: Տարփատենչ
Definition_1: ardently longing for, sighing after, very desirous.

Title: Տարփողեմ
Definition_1: to announce loudly, with shouts and cries, to cry aloud, to shout; to celebrate, to publish.

Title: Տարօրէն
Definition_2: unlawfully, illegally, unjustly, contrary to equity, iniquitously, wickedly.

Title: Տարօրինակ
Definition_1: unlike, dissimilar, unequal, extraordinary, strange, eccentric, odd, singular, uncouth, outlandish.

Title: Տաւաղեմ
Definition_1: to aggregate, to assemble, to reunite, to collect, to gather together.

Title: Տաւաղիմ
Definition_1: to be aggregated, united or collected together.

Title: Տաւիղ
Definition_1: psaltery, harp, dulcimer; հարկանել զ— or տաւղեմ, cf. Տաւղեմ.

Title: Տափարակ
Definition_1: flat, level, plane, smooth, even, shorn;

Title: Տափարակեմ
Definition_1: to flat, to flatten, to plane.

Title: Տափերական
Definition_1: extremities or flat sides of a bridge.

Title: Տգեղ
Definition_1: ill-favoured, ill-featured, unsightly, ugly, deformed, hideous, squalid; foul, villainous, bad.

Title: Տգեղանամ
