Definition_1: to grow ugly, to become deformed, to disfigure oneself.

Title: Տգեղացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to deform, to render ugly, to disfigure, to distort.

Title: Տգեղութիւն
Definition_1: ugliness, deformity, ill-featuredness, unsightliness; անհնարին —, frightful ugliness, hideousness.

Title: Տգէտ
Definition_1: ignorant; unlearned, untaught, illiterate; idiotic, silly, simple.

Title: Տգիտանամ
Definition_1: to be ignorant, unaware of, unacquainted with.

Title: Տգիտութիւն
Definition_1: ignorance, nescience, rudeness, rawness, unskilfulness; մեծ, թանձրամած, սոսկալի —, great, utter, gross, complete ignorance; առ տգիտութեան, through ignorance; զգածնուլ տգիտութեամբ, թաւալիլ ի տգիտութեան, to live, to wallow in ignorance.

Title: Տեառնագալուստ
Definition_1: relating to the advent of our Saviour.

Title: Տեառնագիր
Definition_1: ordered by Jesus; signed with the sign of the cross.

Title: Տեառնագրեմ
Definition_1: to sign with the cross, to make the sign of the cross.

Title: Տեառնագրութիւն
Definition_1: sign of the cross; — կնքոյ; baptism.

Title: Տեառնորդի
Definition_1: Son of God; son of a freeman or noble; —ք, sons of illustrious families.

Title: Տեղ
Definition_1: shower, abundant rain; յամենայն —, every where; always; տեղի, տեղային ի ձեզ զ— երկնաւոր շնորհիցն, heavenly graces rained thick upon you; — ոսկի տեղայր ի փեսայութեանն արտաշիսի, gold fell in showers at the nuptials of Artaxerxes; spot, place; post; ի —, instead, in substitution for, in the place of; անցանել ի — ուրուք, to stand instead of, to supply the place of, to substitute, to replace.

Title: Տեղազերծ
Definition_1: driven from a place or post, removed.

Title: Տեղաթափ առնեմ
Definition_1: to set free from a place.

Title: Տեղակալ
Definition_1: fixed in place, firm, stable, immovable, constant, stationary;

Title: Տեղակալութիւն
Definition_1: stability, firmness; lieutenancy; vicegerency, vicariate; substitution.

Title: Տեղում
Definition_1: to cause to rain heavily, to open the windows of heaven;
Definition_2: to shower down, to rain abundantly;
Definition_3:
to shower, to rain hard, to pour; նետս — ի վերայ ուրուք, to send a shower of arrows; տեղաց ի նոսա մանանայ, manna rained down upon them; տեղայր մարգարիտ ի հարսնութեան սաթինկան, pearls were showered round at the nuptials of Sathinig; նետք տեղային, arrows fell in showers; զեւս, տեղա ի մեզ փորձութիւն, o great Jupiter, load us with evils!
կայծակունք տեղացին, thunderbolts fell.

Title: Տեղատարափ
Definition_1: very heavy shower, pelting or drenching rain, floods, torrents of rain; heavy fall of snow or hail;
Definition_2: — լինել սպառնալեօք, to rain threats; ետես զնետս — խաղացեալ, he saw a storm of arrows coming.

Title: Տեղափոխ
Definition_1: changing place, translocating, transferring, displacing; transferred, displaced; — լինել, to change place, to be translocated, to move from place to place.

Title: Տեղափոխեմ
Definition_1: to translocate, to transport, to carry off from one place to another, to transfer, to displace, to remove.

Title: Տեղափոխութիւն
Definition_1: change of place, translocation, displacing, removal; locomotion;

Title: Տեղեակ
Definition_1: well informed, instructed, skilled, versed in, intimately acquainted with, expert;

Title: Տեղեկագոյն
Definition_1: thoroughly, to the bottom, minutely, in detail; — քննել, to examine thoroughly, to go to the bottom of, to sift.

Title: Տեղեկանամ
Definition_1: to be informed of, instructed in, acquainted with, to make inquiries, to acquire instruction or knowledge, to inquire, to teach oneself.

Title: Տեղեկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to inform, to instruct, to give knowledge of, to acquaint with, to teach, to apprise of.

Title: Տեղեկութիւն
Definition_1: information, knowledge, instruction, notice; վեր ի վերոյ ինչ —, general information; տալ —, to inform, to instruct; — առնուլ, to inform oneself, to make inquiries.

Title: Տեղի
Definition_3: հասարակ —ք, common-place topics; հասարակաց —ք, public places, squares; սուրբ —ք, holy place; the Holy Land; — ապաւինի, refuge, shelter, retreat, cover; առ տեղեաւս, here; ի — or ի տեղւոջ, in the room of, instead of, in lieu or place of; ի —ս —ս, տեղեաց տեղեաց, in different places, in some or several places; ընդ ամենայն —ս, in all places, every where; omnipresent; առ տեղեաւն, there, in the very place; just then, for that time, for a short time; ունել զ—, to supply the place of, to substitute for, to take or fill the place of, to succeed; ունել զառաջին —, to hold or occupy the most advantageous place, to be on the side of the wall; զ— առնուլ, ունել, to stop, to cease to go, to rest, to take repose, to halt; անկանել ի տեղւոջ, to be left dead on the spot; — առնել ումեք, to give the first place to a person; — տալ ումեք, to yield, to give up, to acquiesce, to consent, to condescend, to submit; — տալ իմիք, to expose oneself, to give hold; — տալ յիմեքէ or յումեքէ, to evade, to avoid, to draw back, to withdraw, to retire, to depart, to go away; շրջէր փախստական տեղւոյ ի —, as a fugitive he wandered; բանին իմոյ չիք — ի ձեզ, my words have no place in you; — տուր գնա՛, get thee hence ! cf. Թատր, cf. Ժահահոտ.

Title: Տենչիմ
Definition_1: to desire, to wish, to envy, to covet, to burn for; տենչայ սաթենիկ տենչանս զարտախուր խաւարտն, Sathinig is seized by a violent desire for curled endive.

Title: Տենչումն
Definition_1: desire, wish, envy, avidity, cupidity, covetousness, longing for.

Title: Տեռ
Definition_1: gauze, crape, thin veil; galling; callosity, corn.

Title: Տեռազերծեմ
Definition_1: to unveil, to raise the veil; to despoil, to strip, to rob, to spoil.

Title: Տեռատես
Definition_1: f. troubled with the bloody flux.

Title: Տեռեմ
Definition_1: to gall, to rub the skin off, to graze, to excoriate; to render callous, hard as a corn.

Title: Տեռիմ
Definition_1: to have the skin rubbed off; to become callous, to harden.

Title: Տես
Definition_1: sight, view; spectacle, scene; aspect, look, figure, face; vision, apparition; visit; ի — երթալ, to go to see, to call upon, to pay a visit to; չ-ոյն առնել, to pretend not to see; — առնել ի բանակն, to send forth spies; ակն ունիմք — ոյն աստուծոյ, we desire to see God; եկն ի — իմ, he came to see me, he called upon me.

Title: Տեսակ
Definition_1: species; sort, kind, race; fashion, manner, way; form, figure, appearance, look; sight, countenance, aspect, air; image, idea; dress, costume;
Definition_3: visible; հաղորդել կրկին —աւ, to receive the Communion in both kinds; սեռ՝ կենդանի, — մարդ, եւ տարբերութիւն՝ բանական, genus animal, species man, whose distinctive characteristic is the faculty of reason.

Title: Տեսակագործեմ
Definition_1: to specify, to qualify, to form, to figure.

Title: Տեսական
Definition_1: visible, apparent, plain; theoretical, contemplative, speculative; perspicacious, sharp; prophetical, prescient, foreknowing;
Definition_3: —ն, theory; — ազն, ազգ, տոհմ, the nation, race, tribes of Israel; —ն ընդ զգայութեամբ անկանի, the visible is subject to the senses.

Title: Տեսականամ
Definition_1: to be specified, qualified, formed, figured.

Title: Տեսականեմ
Definition_1: to give being and form; cf. Տեսակագործեմ.

Title: Տեսանելի
Definition_2: —ք, organ of sight, the eyes; cf. Շուրջ.

Title: Տեսանեմ
Definition_1: to see, to perceive; to regard, to contemplate; to observe, to consider, to remark, to examine; to know; to provide, to supply, to furnish; to take care of, to tend; to go to see, to visit; to spy, to watch; — զմիմեանս պատերազմաւ, to engage in war amongst themselves; to grapple with each other; — զպէտս ուրուք, to provide with necessaries; զտուն —, to manage household or domestic affairs; չ-ոյն առնել, to pretend not to see; տեսէք զինչ լսէքդ, pay attention to what you hear; տեսջիր, զամենայն նշանսն արասցես, take care to work all the wonders; աստուած տեսցէ իւր ոչխար յողջակէզ, God will provide himself with a lamb for the burnt offering; հիւանդ էի եւ տեսէք զիս, I was sick, and you visited me; տես ինձ, see, you see; ապա թէ ոչ՝ տեսից վասն քո, if not you will see how I will pay you; տես քեզ արս զօրաւորս, choose valiant men to accompany you.

Title: Տեսանելով
Definition_1: apparently, in appearance; by sight; գեղեցիկ տեսանելով, handsome, beautiful; կոյսս գեղեցիկ տեսանելով, fair girls, charming maidens; շինեցին սեղան մեծ տեսանելով, they built an altar of immense size; որ խուժադուժ եւս էր տեսանելով, who was still more barbarous in appearance.

Title: Տեսարան
Definition_1: theatre, spectacle; scene; sight, the eyes; landscape, scenery; watch-tower; look-out man, top-man; vedette; շուրջ —, amphi-theatre; — աշխարհի լինել, to be a subject of scorn or opprobrium.

Title: Տեսարանեմ
Definition_1: to put upon the stage, to represent, to perform, to expose to public view, to make a spectacle.

Title: Տեսաւորիմ
Definition_1: to make oneself seen, to become visible, to be in sight, to appear; to have an interview, a meeting.

Title: Տեսիլ
Definition_1: aspect; appearance, look, sight, view; air, mien, visage, image; spectacle, representation; vision, apparition, phantom, spectre, dream; phenomenon; contemplation; theory, idea; գեղեցիկ —, — գեղոյ, beauty, loveliness; գեղեցիկ տեսլեամբ, handsome, beautiful, charming; երկնային —, celestial vision; — դիմաց, figure, physiognomy; ի — ածել, to represent, to perform, to put upon the stage; — լինել աշխարհի, to be made a spectacle unto the world; — տեսանել, to have a vision; արար տօն տեսլեան, խաղու, he held a festival with public games; ի — ամենեցուն, before all men, or all eyes; եղեւ բան տեառն առ աբրամ ի տեսլեան, God spoke in a dream to Abram; տեսլեամբ բնութեան պարապեալ, given to the contemplation of nature; — աչացն է հաւատարիմ եւ ոչ լուր ականջացն, hearing is believing but seeing has no fellow.

Title: Տեսլարան
Definition_1: circus, theatre, spectacle, scene; sight, the eyes.

Title: Տեսուած
Definition_1: intelligence, flash of wit, conceit, witticism.

Title: Տեսութիւն
Definition_1: sight, vision, look, view; theory, plan, speculation; visit; contemplation, consideration; idea, conception, knowledge, notion; vision, dream; prophecy; ecstasy; տեսութեան or դիտական ասպարէզ, field of view or vision; համառօտ —, cursory view, short notice, sketch; հասարակաբար տեսութիւն, at or with a single glance, in a summary way.

Title: Տեսչաւորեմ
Definition_1: to take care of, to tend, to provide.

Title: Տեսչութիւն
Definition_1: Providence; direction, inspection, superintendence, survey, watch; incarnation; police; government; աստուածական, վերին —, Divine Providence.

Title: Տետրակ
Definition_1: quire of paper, stitched-book, copy-book; pamphlet.

Title: Տերեւ
Definition_1: leaf; leaves; — ծաղկանց, corolla, petal; տատանիլ որպէս զ—, to quiver like an aspen leaf; եւ — չանկանի թէ աստուած չկամի, no leaf falls but God's will drops it.

Title: Տերեւաբուխ
Definition_1: producing leaves; — ժամանակ, spring time, spring;

Title: Տերեւազգեստ
Definition_1: clothed, covered with leaves, leafy, green.

Title: Տերեւաթափ
Definition_1: deprived, stripped of leaves, leafless; stripping or despoiling of leaves; — առնել, to pluck or strip off leaves; — լինել, to shed or lose leaves.

Title: Տերեւաշարժ
Definition_1: shaking or quivering like an aspen leaf.

Title: Տերեւապատ
Definition_1: girt with leaves; — լինել, to be -.

Title: Տերեւիմ
Definition_1: to leaf, to put forth or produce leaves, to be covered with foliage, to become green.

Title: Տեւ
Definition_1: duration; *oak or elm leaves for fodder;
Definition_2: ի —, durably, lastingly, for ever; ի — երթալ or — պահիլ, cf. Տեւեմ.

Title: Տեւակութիւն
Definition_1: constant duration, permanence, stability, persistence; constancy, perseverance.

Title: Տեւեմ
Definition_1: to last, to persevere, to continue; to endure, to support, to bear; — ի մարմնի, to live, to subsist; ժուժկալեալ տեւէր չարչարանաց, he patiently suffered the tortures.

Title: Տզրուկ
Definition_3: cf. Բզրուկ; դնել —ս, to apply leeches.

Title: Տէգ
Definition_1: pike; spade in cards; — մօրուաց, fresh beard, down, downy beard; ի — նիզակի or — նիզակաց, ի սուր — նիզակի, with the lance, with arms; with lance or spear thrusts; ի — նիզակի տապալեցի զնա, I brought him down with a lance thrust; տիգօք աչաց ակնարկել, to glare at, to frown at, to dart an angry or threatening look, to look daggers at; տիգօք աչաց խաղաց ի վերայ իմ, be sharpened his eyes upon me, he frowned on me.

Title: Տէգընկէց
Definition_2: discobolus, quoit-player; tilter; — լինել, to joust, to tilt; to play at quoits.

Title: Տէր
Definition_1:
God, the Lord; Sir, lord, master, Mister, Mr.; possessor, owner, master; Reverend, Rev.; ով —, Lord! o Lord! good God! Heavens! goodness! good gracious!
— արքայ, Sire!
— իմ արքայ, o King! o Majesty!
— իմ, My Lord; — թովմաս, Mr. Thomas; Rev. Thomas; — լինել, կալ, to be or become master of, to be lord over, to rule, to overcome, to master; յամի տեառն, in the year of our Lord, Anno Domini; յիս տէր, oh my lord! I pray you my lord! tell me my lord!
յի՛ս դարձ տէր, oh king hear us!

Title: Տէրութիւն
Definition_1: Estate, State; domination, rule, power; sovereignty, empire; Barony, lordship; —ք, the dominions; — ձեր, Your Majesty; առաջի քոյոյ հզօր տէրութեանդ, before your high Majesty; — քո ազգէ մինչեւ յազգ, your dominion endures throughout all generations.

Title: Տէրունական
Definition_1: Lord's, dominical; — աղօթք, the Lord's prayer; — տուն, church; — օր, sunday; — գիրք, Holy Scriptures.

Title: Տէրունուստ
Definition_1: from God, on the Lord's side.

Title: Տժգնեմ
Definition_1: to depreciate, to underrate, to undervalue.

Title: Տժգոյն
Definition_1: colourless, discoloured, pale, wan, ghastly, leaden-hued, livid.

Title: Տժգունեմ
Definition_1: to discolour, to cause to lose colour, to render pale, to tarnish.

Title: Տժգունիմ
Definition_1: to lose colour, to fade, to become wan, to grow pale.

Title: Տի
Definition_3: — նա, rather, it is better; moreover; տի՜նա, cf. Տի՛.

Title: Տիգաբուն
Definition_1: pike-staff, shaft of a spear; rest of a lance.

Title: Տիգախոց
Definition_1: wounded by a lance or pike; — առնել, to wound with a lance.

Title: Տիգեմ
Definition_1: to lance, to strike with a lance.

Title: Տիեզերախօս
Definition_1: spoken or published through all the world.

Title: Տիեզերակալեմ
Definition_1: to become lord of the whole universe, to conquer, subject or subjugate the world.

Title: Տիեզերակալութիւն
Definition_1: universal dominion, rule over the whole world.

Title: Տիեզերահռչակ
Definition_1: known all the world over, known to the whole world.

Title: Տիեզերահրաշ
Definition_1: universally wondered at, marvelled at by all the world, by every one.

Title: Տիեզերասաստ
Definition_1: making every one, or all the world tremble.

Title: Տիեզերասոյզ
Definition_1: overflowing, submerging or drowning all the world.

Title: Տիեզերատօնակ
Definition_1: celebrated or feasted by all the world.

Title: Տիեզերաքարոզ
Definition_1: preached, published to all the world.

Title: Տիեզերք
Definition_1: the universe, the whole world, the earth, macrocosm; ընդ —րս, ընդ ամենայն or բնաւ —ս, ընդ ոլորտս —րաց, throughout the world, every where; առնել —րս անապատ, to reduce the earth to a waste.

Title: Տիզ
Definition_1: tick, acarus; Mexico-seed, castor-oil, ricinine oil.

Title: Տիկ
Definition_1: leather bottle, goat's skin; — գինւոյ, a skin of wine; — հովուաց, bagpipe.

Title: Տիկին
Definition_1: mistress, Mrs, dame, lady; princess, queen, empress; վիկտորիա տիկնանց —, Queen Victoria; — մանկամարդ, young lady, miss, damsel;
Definition_2: — երկնից, queen of heaven, moon; — վանաց, superioress, abbess.

Title: Տիկնունի
Definition_1: womanish; womanly; — ապարանք, gynecaeum, women's apartment, cf. Խորոպճին; — գունդ, party, group or bevy of ladies.

Title: Տիկտեսակ
Definition_1: skin-like; — գործել, to inflate or blow out as a goat's skin.

Title: Տիղմ
Definition_1: mire, mud, slime, dirt, filth, soil, slough, muck; cf. Թաթաւիմ, cf. Թաւալիմ; ի քարշ ածել ընդ —, to drag in the mud;
Definition_2: to cover with shame; մաքրել զ—, to rub of the dirt, to perfrigate, to clean, to brush off.

Title: Տիպ
Definition_1: type, model, example, pattern; manner; figure, image, form; expression; style; impression, stamp, print, mark; edition; —ք կերպարանաց, feature, lineament, character; —ք մեռելոց, phantom, ghost, shadow; — կերպարանաց բանից, style; այսու տպով, in this manner or way; ի —, similar, like, conform, in the form of; վաթսներորդ —, sixtieth edition; բերել զ— ուրուք, իրիք, to be like, to resemble, to have likeness to;

Title: Տիտան
Definition_3: titanium.

Title: Տիր
Definition_1: cf. Տի; — օ՛ն անդր, — օ՛ն ի բաց տար, oh ! shocking ! fye ! fye upon you ! God forbid !.

Title: Տիրաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak imperiously, lordly; seriously, sensibly.

Title: Տիրագլուխ
Definition_2: as a master, independently, assolutely, freely.

Title: Տիրադրուժ
Definition_1: betraying one's master, faithless, traitorous, treacherous, false.

Title: Տիրական
Definition_1: dominical; divine; feudal; lordly, predominant, prevailing, despotic, absolute, sovereign, supreme; own, proper; — պատկեր, God's image or likeness; — իշխանութիւն, absolute power.

Title: Տիրակիր
Definition_1: carrying, bearing or containing the Lord.

Title: Տիրահաւաք
Definition_1: gathered together in the Lord's name.

Title: Տիրահրաւէր
Definition_1: called or invited by the Lord.

Title: Տիրամայր
Definition_1: Mother of God, the Holy Virgin, mother of our Lord;

Title: Տիրամարտ
Definition_1: waging war against the Lord, against Heaven.

Title: Տիրանամ
Definition_1: to make oneself master of, to become master, to rule, to dominate, to govern, to have dominion over, to sway; to pass under the dominion.

Title: Տիրապատուաստ
Definition_1: woven or made by the Lord.

Title: Տիրապատուեմ
Definition_1: to honour, to pay homage as to God, truly to revere.

Title: Տիրապետեմ
Definition_1: to domineer, to rule, to lord over.

Title: Տիրապէս
Definition_1: lordly, imperiously, authoritatively, sovereignly, absolutely; in effect, properly, truly, verily;
Definition_2: proper, own, real, true, genuine, veritable; — ազատ, really free; — հաւատք, true faith; — բարի, real good; — խօսելով, properly speaking; եթէ — կամիս գիտել, if you will to know thoroughly.

Title: Տիրասէր
Definition_1: fond of, attached, devoted to one's master.

Title: Տիրասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love, attachment, devotion to one's master, zeal, warmth, affection.

Title: Տիրարար
Definition_1: rendering master or lord, giving possession or power over.

Title: Տիրացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render or make master, to cause to rule or govern; to authorize, to empower; to effectuate, to fulfil.

Title: Տիրաւանդ
Definition_1: transmitted or handed down b y the Lord.

Title: Տիրեմ
Definition_1: to bear sway, to reign over, to rule; to become master, to seize, to conquer, to occupy, to hold, to possess, to subject; to predominate;
Definition_2:
to become subject, to pass under the rule or dominion of; տիրելդ ամենեցուն, your power over all; կամ տիրելո՞վ տիրեցես մեզ, or shall we be subject to your rule?
տիրեսցեն երկրին, they shall possess the earth; տիրեցին նոցա առիւծքն, they were caught by lions; յորժամ ի նիւթ ինչ տիրէ հուր, when any thing is set on fire; ոչ տիրէին նմա տանջանքն, torture had no power over him; դու տիրես զօրութեանց ծովու, thou rulest the proud waves; արքայութիւն նորա ամենեցուն տիրէ, (his kingdom embraces all), all shall be subject to his kingdom.

Title: Տիրուհի
Definition_1: the blessed Virgin; mistress or lady; քաղաք —, capital.

Title: Տիւ
Definition_1: dayast. —, day-time; — եւ գիշեր, nyctemeron; ի տուէ or ի տունջեան, during the day, by day, in the day-time; ի լուսապայծառ or ի լոյս տունջեան, in broad day light; ընդ —ն ողջոյն, all day long; ի տուէ եւ ի գիշերի, զ— եւ զգիշեր, day and night, night and day; չեւ խոնարհեալ տունջեան, before the end of the day, before nightfall; արփիաճաճանչ —, fine day, fine weather; ի տունջենիս յայսմիկ, this day, today; cf. Օր.

Title: Տիք
Definition_1: age, years, time of life; century; — մանկութեան, infancy, tender age, first period of life; անլիութիւն տիոց, immaturity, unripe age; — ծերութեան, old age; ի տղայ տիոց, անդստին յառաջին տիոցն, from one's infancy; from one's boyish or girlish days, from boyhood or girlhood; ի մատաղ or ի մանուկ տիոց, from one's earliest years; ի հասակ եւ ի տիս հասեալ, grown up; ի կատարեալ տիս հասեալ, arrived at years of discretion; յերեքտասանամեան տի, thirteen years old; մանկագոյն տիովք, young, in infancy; ի նոյն տիս հասակաց, հաւասար տիօք, of the same age, coetaneous; cf. Մատաղ.

Title: *Տլիմ
Definition_1: to get splashed, covered with mud.

Title: Տխատիմ
Definition_1: to grieve, to fret, to be afflicted, sorry, to deplore, to bewail; to be in mourning for.

Title: Տխեղծ
Definition_1: young, in infancy; deformed, disfigured, ugly, sorry, bad.

Title: Տխուր
Definition_1: cheerless, sad, afflicted, grieved, gloomy, sorrowful, melancholy; sullen, morose, surly, peevish; sombre, gloomy, dismal, dull, dark, obscure; — տրտմութիւն գիշերոյն, the thick darkness of the night; լրջացուցանել զ— գիշերն, to dispel that horrible darkness.

Title: Տխրալից
Definition_1: full of sadness or affliction, greatly dejected, oppressed with sorrow.

Title: Տխրանամ
Definition_1: to lose splendour, to become insignificant.

Title: Տխրասէր
Definition_1: fond of, or loving sadness, melancholy.

Title: Տխրեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to sadden, to afflict, to grieve, to weigh on the spirits.

Title: Տխրիմ
Definition_1: to be sad, sorry, afflicted, chagrined, to grieve, to take to heart; to wither, to fade.

Title: Տխրութիւն
Definition_1: sadness, grief, sorrow, chagrin, dejection, melancholy.

Title: Տկար
Definition_1: feeble, weak, debilitated; powerless, impotent, infirm, languid, faint; small, slight, slender, trifling; fragile, frail.

Title: Տկարանամ
Definition_1: to lose strength, to become weak, to be weakened, to decay; to become infirm, unwell, indisposed, poorly, to fall sick; to be incapable, unable; to have the weakness to; to be scandalized; — ի հաւատս, to be of little faith; որում —նայ եւ ոչ ինչ, nothing is impossible with Him.

Title: Տկարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to weaken, to debilitate, to render feeble, infirm, to enervate, to unnerve, to cast down, to deject.

Title: Տկարութիւն
Definition_1: weakness, debility, imbecility, infirmity; languor, extenuation; impotency; indisposition, sickness; fragility; cf. Տկարամտութիւն; — ածել or արկանել զաստուծով, to accuse God of weakness.

Title: Տկճոր
Definition_1: cf. Տիկ; cf. Գրեխ; — առնուլ, to take a clyster.

Title: Տհաճ
Definition_1: displeased, discontent, crabbed, cross, sulky, morose, surly, peevish, pouting.

Title: Տհաճութիւն
Definition_1: displeasure, discontent, disgust, dislike; disagreement; sulkiness.

Title: Տհաս
Definition_2: very young, ignorant, unpracticed, inexpert, raw, crude.

Title: Տղայ
Definition_1: infant, baby, child; stripling, youth, lad;
Definition_2: simple-minded, innocent; novice, ignorant; — մանուկ, little child.

Title: Տղայակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to be a child like the others.

Title: Տղայամիտ
Definition_1: child-minded or simple-minded, of child-like simplicity.

Title: Տղայամտութիւն
Definition_1: child-mindedness or simple-mindedness, simpleness, simplicity; lightness, silliness, imprudence.

Title: Տղայանամ
Definition_1: to be or become a child; to behave as a child; to act the child;
Definition_2: to grow or become young again.

Title: Տղայերամ
Definition_1: where is an assemblage of children.

Title: Տղայութիւն
Definition_1: infancy, childhood, puerility, childishness; girlhood, girlishness; զտղայութեանն ի բաց խափանել, to put away childish things, to renounce puerilities.

Title: Տղիմ
Definition_1: to begin or to wish to move.

Title: Տղմաբնակ
Definition_1: living, dwelling in the dirt or mud.

Title: Տղմաթաթաւ
Definition_1: dabbled, covered with mire, all over or quite dirty.

Title: Տղմաթաւալ
Definition_1: rolling, wallowing or draggling in the mud.

Title: Տղմալից
Definition_1: full of mud, muddy, diry, miry, filthy.

Title: Տղմանամ
Definition_1: to get dirty, to be dabbled or covered with mire, to draggle in the mud.

Title: Տղմացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to bespatter with mud, to dirty, to soul to foul.

Title: Տմահանամ
Definition_1: to become immortal, to be immortalized.

Title: Տմարդիկ
Definition_1: disobliging, uncivil, impolite, gross, rough, rude, clownish, rustic, brutal, cruel, ferocious, barbarous, inhuman.

Title: Տմարդութիւն
Definition_1: impoliteness, incivility, ungraciousness, rudeness, grossness, rusticity, brutality, barbarity, inhumanity; տմարդութեամբ, disobligingly, uncivilly, roughly, rudely, churlishly, boorishly, brutally, cruelly, barbarously, inhumanly.

Title: Տմոյն
Definition_1: discoloured, wan, sallow, pale; gloomy, sorry, sullen, mournful; — առնել, to discolour, to cause to fade; cf. Մոյն.

Title: Տնական
Definition_1: domestic, household, family, private; — տնտեսութիւն, domestic economy; cf. Առտնին, cf. Ընտանի.

Title: Տնակից
Definition_1: living, lodging or dwelling in the same house, cohabiting; neighbouring; — լինել, to live in the same house, to cohabit.

Title: Տնանկանամ
Definition_1: to lose wealth, to decay, to go to ruin, to become poor, needy or necessitous; to be expelled, driven out or deprived of one's house, to be forsaken, abandoned; to fail, to become a bankrupt.

Title: Տնանկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to impoverish, to make poor, to render indigent.

Title: Տնանկութիւն
Definition_1: poverty, indigence, beggary; impoverishment; bankruptcy; ի վերջին տնանկութեան կայ, he is reduced to extremities, he is at his last shift, in utmost distress, in a despairing condition.

Title: Տնանկօրէն
Definition_1: like a poor man; cf. Տնանկաբար.

Title: Տնաշէն
Definition_1: erecting, building a house; cf. Տնարար.

Title: Տնապանութիւն
Definition_1: house-keeper's calling or office; domestic life, staying at home.

Title: Տնասէր
Definition_1: fond of home, domestic, retired, sedentary; — լինել, to delight in domestic or sedentary life.

Title: Տնասուն
Definition_1: homebred, homeborn, nourished, brought up at home, domestic, private; tame.

Title: Տնարար
Definition_3: thrifty, housewifely, frugal.

Title: Տնաւեր
Definition_1: whose house is destroyed, ruined, homeless; *cf. Վատնիչ.

Title: Տնկաբեր
Definition_1: bearing or producing plants or trees.

Title: Տնկախիտ
Definition_1: thick with plants; thick, branchy, bushy.

Title: Տնկական
Definition_1: vegetable, vegetative, vegetating; innate, inborn; possessive, adventitious.

Title: Տնկակից
Definition_1: springing up, shooting forth, or vegetating together, planted together; inborn, innate, natural; participating.

Title: Տնկեմ
Definition_1: to plant; to constitute, to place, to establish, to collocate.

Title: Տնտես
Definition_1: steward, economist, manager, bursar; — վանաց, cellarist; — եկեղեցւոյ, church-warden; — աստուածային օրինաց, dispenser of the divine precepts.

Title: Տնտեսեմ
Definition_1: to manage, to have the direction, to regulate; to economize; to govern, to rule, to dispose; to dispense, to distribute, to provide, to administer.

Title: Տնտեսութիւն
Definition_1: economy; stewardship, housekeeping, management, direction, administration, distribution; Providence; the mystery of the incarnation; առտնին, քաղաքական —, domestic, political economy.

Title: Տնօրէնութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Տնտեսութիւն; disposition, measure; տնօրէնութեան տեղիք, the Holy places.

Title: Տնօրինական
Definition_1: economical, administrative; relating to the incarnation of our Lord; — տեղիք, the Holy Land.

Title: Տնօրինեմ
Definition_1: cf. Տնտեսեմ; to dispose; to dispense with, to exempt from; — բարւօք զկեանս, to lead a more regular life;

Title: Տնօրինումն
Definition_1: dispensation; — խնդրել, տալ, ընդունել, to demand, to grant, to obtain a -.

Title: Տոգորեմ
Definition_1: to imbibe, to impregnate, to saturate; to penetrate, to dive into.

Title: Տոգորիմ
Definition_1: to imbibe, to soak, to be penetrated, saturated with, to become impregnated with.

Title: Տոկ
Definition_3: ի — or —ս, long, a long time; ի — անկանել, ձգել, to be prolonged, protracted, to last; — ունել, to have duration; ի — կտտել or տանջել, to subject to lingering torture.

Title: Տոկամ
Definition_1: to resist, to persist, to support, to endure, to bear, to maintain, to suffer.

Title: Տոկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to corroborate, to strengthen, to fortify, to consolidate.

Title: Տոկոսեմ
Definition_1: to extort usury, to lend upon usury.

Title: Տոկոսիք
Definition_3: —սեօք, with usury.

Title: Տոհմ
Definition_1: family, tribe, house, race, line, lineage, extraction.

Title: Տոհմական
Definition_1: of good family, high-born, illustrious, noble, patrician; national;
Definition_2: relation, kindred; —ք, produce, fruit, revenue, harvest.

Title: Տոհմային
Definition_1: of the same family, descent or lineage, related, consanguineous;

Title: Տոհմապետ
Definition_1: chief of a family or race.

Title: Տոհմիմ
Definition_1: to take rise or origin, to descend from.

Title: Տոհմորոշ առնեմ
Definition_1: to distinguish or separate according to family or tribe.

Title: Տողաբար
Definition_1: in rank, in files, in line, by series.

Title: Տողագլուխ
Definition_2: at the head of a line.

Title: Տողադրեմ
Definition_1: to put in a straight line.

Title: Տողան
Definition_1: row, range, series, course, chain, train, concatenation.

Title: Տողանիմ
Definition_1: to descend or arrive in order; to be classified, arranged methodically.

Title: Տողեմ
Definition_1: to thread, to string; to arrange, to place or put in order, to classify; to draw up, to range, to marshal, to array; to write, to compose.

Title: Տողք
Definition_1: saliva, spittle, slaver, drivel, pituite, phlegm.

Title: *Տոճկիմ
Definition_1: to be reduced to paste, to be overdone.

Title: Տոմար
Definition_1: tome, volume; book; calendar, almanac; նորոգութիւն —ի, Reform of the Calendar; — լեւոնի, Dogmatical Letter of Pope Leo I to the Patriarch Flavian.

Title: Տոմսակ
Definition_1: roll, scroll; note, letter, lines; card, billet; ticket; — երթուդարձի, ticket there and back, return ticket; մահագոյժ —, announcement of decease; invitation to a funeral; — հարսանեկան, announcement of matrimony.

Title: Տոյժ
Definition_1: cf. Տուգան; damage, loss, disadvantage, prejudice, injury, wrong; տուժիւք անձին, at one's expense; փոխարինել տուժիցն, to indemnify, to recompense.

Title: Տոշկեմ
Definition_1: to torment, to harass, to vex, to ill-treat.

Title: Տոչորեմ
Definition_1: to burn, to set on fire, to fire.

Title: Տոչորիմ
Definition_1: to be burning on fire, in a glow, to glow;
Definition_2: to be fired, to long, to burn, to be eager or impatient; —եցայ յառ քեզ տռփանացդ, thy love burned in my heart.

Title: Տոռն
Definition_2: tie, band, bond, link; — շան, leash.

Title: Տոռնիմ
Definition_1: to be tied by a string.

Title: Տորոմիմ
Definition_1: to swell, to bloat, to puff up; to rot, to putrefy.

Title: Տորրեմ
Definition_1: to bud, to shoot, to sprout, to put forth buds.

Title: Տուբիղ
Definition_1: Tobe or Tybi (the fifth month of the ancient Egyptian solar year).

Title: Տուգանք
Definition_1: amends, fine, mulct, penalty, indemnity, damages, amends, compensation;

Title: Տուժեմ
Definition_1: to amerce, to fine, to mulct, to punish with a fine.

Title: Տուժիմ
Definition_1: to pay a fine, to indemnify, to make amends, to recompense.

Title: Տուն
Definition_1: house, habitation, home; house, family, race, nation; family, household; goods, fortune; house, commercial house; couplet, strophe, stanza, verse; — ադամայ, the human race, mankind; — թորգոմայ, the Armenian nation; — թագաւորի or — արքայի, the king's household; — մատենագրաց, library; — պղատոնեայ, Plato's Academy or school; փայտակերտ, աղիւսակերտ, քարաշէն, քարուկիր —, wooden, brick, stone house; հանգիստ, բնակելի, լաւ, մեծ, փոքրիկ, գեղեցիկ, տձեւ or անպիտան —, commodious, inhabitable, good, large, small, fine, wretched house; հիմունք, որմունք, տան, the foundations, the walls of a house; վարձելի կամ վաճառելի —, house to be let or sold; — ի տանէ, տանէ ի —, from house to house; արտաքոյ տան, ըստ — ն, out, not at home; ի տան, at home; կալ ի տան, to stay, to be at home; ելանել ի տանէ, to go out; մեկնել ի տանէ, չուել, to remove, to move; դառնալ, գնալ ի —, to go home again, to come home, to go home; — վարձել, to let a house; վարձել զ— իւր, to let his house; — շինել, կառուցանել, քանդել, to build, to pull down a house; ական հատանել զտան, to break into a house; շրջել տանէ ի —, to wander from house to house.

Title: Տունկ
Definition_1: plant, shrub, tree; planting; տնկել —, to set plants, to plant trees;

Title: Տունջէն
Definition_1: day's, belonging to the day, diurnal.

Title: Տուող
Definition_3: manipulator.

Title: Տուչութիւն
Definition_1: gift, donation; collation; tradition; giving in, delivery, surrender; — օրինաց, legislation, forming laws; — եօթանասնից, the Septuagint.

Title: Տուր
Definition_1: giving; donation, gift, presents; alms; duty, taxes, impost; —ք առատ՝ առնեն զբարեկամ զուարթ, short reckonings make long friends.

Title: Տուրեւառ
Definition_1: commerce, traffic, trade; interchange, exchange; conference, communication, correspondence, frequentation, society;
Definition_2: commercial, mercantile, trading; — շնչոյ, respiration, breath; — ամուսնութեանց, marriages, weddings; դադարումն —ից, stagnation of business, of affairs; ի յետին — շնչոյն, at the last moment or gasp; — առնել, to trade, to traffic, to negotiate; ի — գեղարդանցն ճայթիւն որոտման ելանէր, a sound as of thunder proceeded from the clash of the spears; cf. Թեւակոխեմ.

Title: Տուրեւառիկ
Definition_1: merchant, trader; տուրեւառիկք or —իկ փոփոխումն, շահաւետութիւն, վաճառք, commerce, trade; ի —իկ վաճառս ընդ ուրուք բերիլ, to trade, to negotiate, to traffic.

Title: Տուրտուութիւն
Definition_1: tax giving, paying tribute, being tributary.

Title: Տուփ
Definition_1: box, case, chest; cf. Խնկաման. book-case;
Definition_3: — սահուն, movable, running or drop-box; չքնաղագիւտք ի յակունս՝ պահին ի —ս մանունս, precious things are packed in small parcels.

Title: Տոփեմ
Definition_1: to beat with a batlet; to ram, to drive in; to tread under foot.

Title: Տպագրեմ
Definition_1: to stamp, to mould, to cast, to model, to shape; to print, to publish.

Title: Տպանամ
Definition_1: to be printed, stamped or impressed.

Title: Տպաւոր
Definition_1: typical, original; figured; printed, marked, impressed.

Title: Տպաւորագոյն
Definition_1: more or very like, precise, genuine, true;
Definition_2: —ս, precisely; — ասացից, properly speaking; կամ — ասել, or more correctly to say.

Title: Տպաւորեմ
Definition_1: to form, to figure, to model; to imprint, to print, to mark; to grave, to engrave; to inculcate, to impress.

Title: Տպաւորութիւն
Definition_1: impression, stamp, print, mark, figure, form;
Definition_2: impression; — գործել յոք, to produce an impression on a person;
Definition_3: fixation

Title: Տռփանամ
Definition_1: to love to distraction, to be madly in love with; to love tenderly, to covet, to long for, to desire ardently, to wish eagerly, to burn for, to be athirst for.

Title: Տռփանք
Definition_1: amours, amorous desire, concupiscence; cupidity, strong desire, ardent wish; եղանակ —նաց անասնոց, rutting-season, rutting-time.

Title: Տռփոտ
Definition_1: passionate, impassioned, amorous, smitten with love or desire.

Title: Տտիպ
Definition_1: sour, rough, sharp, acerb, hard, tart, astringent, acrid, pungent; — գինի, racy or brisk wine.

Title: Տտպութիւն
Definition_1: sour taste, acidity, acrity, pungency, acerbity, harshness.

Title: Տրամ
Definition_1: firm, solid, substantial, hard, resisting; — երկիր, solid earth; — գործել, to render firm.

Title: Տրամանամ
Definition_1: to become firm, to harden, to solidify, to grow hard or tough.

Title: Տրամաշրջիմ
Definition_1: to go round about, to travel over, to wander here and there.

Title: Տրամատպաւորեմ
Definition_1: to impress well, to imprint solidly.

Title: Տրամորոշեմ
Definition_1: to divide, to distinguish, to separate.

Title: Տրէ
Definition_1: the fourth month of the ancient Armenian calendar (November).

Title: Տրիէր
Definition_1: three-banked or benched; — նաւ, three-benched galley, trireme.

Title: Տրմխեմ
Definition_1: to rake, to gather with a rake, to racle.

Title: Տրմուղ
Definition_1: inexperienced, inexpert, raw, unpracticed, new; untamed, wild.

Title: Տրոհումն
Definition_3: sorting, choice.

Title: *Տրորեմ
Definition_1: to grind, to pound, to crush; to dissolve, to dilute, to spoil.

Title: Տրորիմ
Definition_1: to rot, to become rotten, to grow putrid or corrupt, to spoil; to fester.

Title: Տրուպ
Definition_1: humble, lowly, unworthy, inferior, least, vile, abject, despicable.

Title: Տրոփեմ
Definition_1: to stamp on the ground; to trample or tread under foot; ոտս or զոտս — ի վերայ, to despise, to insult, to outrage.

Title: Տրպանամ
Definition_1: to degenerate, to become abject, vile, mean, base.

Title: Տրտմագին
Definition_1: much afflicted, sad, melancholy, oppressed with grief; unpleasant, afflicting, grievous.

Title: Տրտմալից
Definition_1: full of affliction, doleful, sorrowful, sad, unhappy.

Title: Տրտմակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to compassionate, to be afflicted for another, to share another's grief or care.

Title: Տրտմեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to displease, to discontent, to afflict, to chagrin, to pain, to grieve; to cast a gloom over, to darken.

Title: Տրտմիմ
Definition_1: to be displeased, afflicted, grieved, chagrined, to sorrow, to take to heart, to repine, to fret.

Title: Տրտմութիւն
Definition_1: sorrow, chagrin, affliction, dejection, sadness, melancholy; cf. Ընկղմիմ.

Title: Տրտնջեմ
Definition_1: to grumble, to murmur, to complain, to cry out, to quarrel.

Title: Տրտում
Definition_1: sad, sorry, afflicted, chagrined, melancholy, dull;
Definition_2: sadly; — լինել, to be sorry, grieved, to have one's heart full of affliction or sorrow.

Title: Տրտունջ
Definition_1: complaint, grumbling, murmur, lament, cry, quarrel;
Definition_2: complaining, murmuring; — ունել, to make a complaint, to complain; — լինել, cf. Տրտնջամ; — առնել, to dissatisfy, to discontent.

Title: Տրցակ
Definition_1: bundle, bunch; — խոտոյ, truss, bottle; — փայտի, faggot, bundle of wood; — մագնիտական, pencil of magnetic rays; առնել տրցակ or տրցակեմ, to truss, to tie in a bundle, to bottle, to bind up in faggots.

Title: *Տրփամ
Definition_1: to palpitate, to throb, to flutter; *cf. Կոտտամ.

Title: *Տփկիմ
Definition_1: to be flattened, to shrink; to sit, to squat.

Title: *Տքամ
Definition_1: to moan, to whine, to whimper, to pule.

Title: Տքնիմ
Definition_1: to be vigilant or watchful, to be awake, to watch.

Title: Տքնեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to keep up, to keep awake.

Title: Տօթ
Definition_1: hot weather, great or ardent heat, burning atmosphere, solar heat, sunburning;
Definition_3: —ոյ, during the heat; — ամարայնոյ, summer heat; հարկանիլ ի —ոյ, to be corrupt, to rot, to putrefy.

Title: Տօթագին
Definition_2: — ժամ or — ժամանակ, hot hours of the day; ի — ժամու աւուրն, in the heat of the day; — ժամու or ի — ժամու, during the heat.

Title: Տօթանամ
Definition_1: to be consumed by heat, to burn.

Title: Տօն
Definition_1: feast, solemnity, festival, celebration; — նշանաւոր, հանդիսաւոր or մեծահանդես, extraordinary, solemn feast; օր —ի, feast-day, holiday; ամենաժողով —, fair day, market day; — անուան, saint's day; — ամենայն սրբոց, All-Saints' day, All Hallows day; — մարմնոյ եւ արեան տեառն, Corpus Christi day; — անմեղ մանկանց, Childermas-day; սրբել, խմբել, կատարել, տօնել զ—, to keep, to observe, to celebrate a feast; շնորհաւորել ուրուք զ— իւր, to wish a person many happy returns of the day; cf. Տարեկան.

Title: Տօնախմբեմ
Definition_1: to solemnize, to celebrate, to feast, to keep a holiday.

Title: Տօնախմբութիւն
Definition_1: celebration of a feast, solemn reunion, solemnity, festivity, festival, solemnization, feast, commemoration, holiday.

Title: Տօնական
Definition_1: festive, festival; holy, solemn, public; — օր, feast-day, holiday; — գիրք, cf. Տօնացոյց.

Title: Տօնակարգեմ
Definition_1: to fix or establish a commemoration or feast-day.

Title: Տօնակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to feast, to celebrate a feast in company, to solemnize together.

Title: Տօնամակ
Definition_1: church-calendar, table of lessons for the day; lectionary, service-book.

Title: Տօնապետ
Definition_1: chief of a feast or solemnity; chairman of a banquet, host, inviter.

Title: Տօնատեղի
Definition_1: festive hall or board, place where festivals are held.

Title: Տօնացոյց
Definition_1: calendar of feasts or high days, ordo, directory, rubric.

Title: Տօնեմ
Definition_1: to feast, to keep holiday, to celebrate, to solemnize.

Title: Տօնընծայք
Definition_1: New year's gift, reciprocal gifts on festive occasions.

Title: <letter>Ր</letter> (ré)
Definition_1: the thirty second letter of the alphabet, & the twenty sixth of the consonants; five thousand, five thousandth; It is sometimes confounded with ռ, as : մրմռամ — մռմռամ, ձմեռն — ձմերան. Also with the լ & ղ letters, as : բելիար — պէլիալ. And also with the յ : աներկբար — աներկբայ; It is sometimes redundant in words, for example : բարժանեմ — բաժանեմ; There are but few words which commence with this letter, & those are either abbreviations or foreign words, it is rather used as a medial final.

Title: Րաբուն
Definition_1: my master, my lord; master, doctor.

Title: Րաբունապետ
Definition_1: chief master or doctor, pontiff; our Lord & Master jesus Christ.

Title: Րաբունարան
Definition_1: residence of a bishop or patriarch.

Title: Րաբունեմ
Definition_1: to teach, to instruct, to give precepts.

Title: Րաբունի
Definition_1: rabbi, master, doctor, instructor; —նեաց պետ, chief-rabbi.

Title: Րոպէ
Definition_1: second; instant, moment; the world, the universe; Europe.

Title: Րոպէահամար
Definition_1: counting the seconds; casting one's nativity.

Title: Րոտեմ
Definition_1: to assemble, to reunite; to beseech, to beg; to drive away.

Title: Րոտումն
Definition_1: assemblage, reunion; prayer; րոտմամբ սրտի, with palpitating heart.

Title: <letter>Ց</letter> (tzo)
Definition_1: the thirty third letter of the alphabet, and the twenty seventh of the consonants; six thousand, six thousandth; As a prefix to words it is a sign of the dative, for example : ասէ ցտէր, he says to the Lord;
Definition_2: to, as far as; till; ցայդ վայր եկեսցես, heither shalt thou come, come thus far ! ցմեծ ժամս, for long time; կասկածեմ ցառաւօտն, եւ հառեալ յառաւօտն՝ երկնչիմ ցերեկոյն, suspicions assail me till morning light, from break of day fear torments me till evening.

Title: Ցախ
Definition_1: branches, brushwood; furze; birch-tree; maple; — մօրուք, matted beard; *— ասել, birch-broom.

Title: Ցած
Definition_2: humble, lowly, modest, moderate, mild, docile, good; low, vile, abject, ignoble, base, mean, grovelling, worthless; — հայելով, looking down, modestly.

Title: Ցածագին
Definition_3: — գնաց, slow-gowing, gentle-moving.

Title: Ցածնում
Definition_1: to become or grow low, to go down, to subside, to fall, to diminish, to lower, to be humbled; to calm, to stoop, to be appeased;

Title: Ցածութիւն
Definition_2: modesty, moderation, sobriety, decency; humiliation; humility; vileness, meanness, baseness;
Definition_3: ցածութեամբ, with a lowly air, meekly, modestly; meanly, basely.

Title: Ցածուն
Definition_1: humble, meek, modest, moderate, sober, good; low, lower; — վայրք, lowlands; — խորհուրդ, wise or prudent counsel.

Title: Ցածուցանեմ
Definition_1: to lower, to put or bring down, to stoop; to reduce, to abate, to diminish, to lessen; to abase, to debase, to disparage, to humiliate; to soften, to assuage, to calm, to moderate, to appease, to allay, to tranquillize; ցածոյց Տէր շուրջ զինեւ, the Lord has given me peace on all sides.

Title: Ցականեմ
Definition_1: to be in want, in a miserable state, without resources, to be reduced to extremities.

Title: Ցականեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reduce to want, to impoverish, to make unhappy.

Title: Ցամաք
Definition_2: terra firma, continent, mainland; — կղզի, peninsula; — երկիր, dry land; հաց —, dry bread; — փայտ, dry wood; — աչօք, with tearless or dry eyes; զ— ծարաւոյն շիջուցանել, to quench or allay thirst; յածիլ ընդ ծով եւ ընդ —, to scour sea & land; անցանել ընդ —, to pass dry-footed, dry-shod; ելանել or իջանել ի —, to land, to go ashore or ou shore; հասանել ի —, to reach the shore; — երթալ, անցանել, to travel by land.

Title: Ցամաքաբնակ
Definition_1: dwelling on the continent, on terra firma.

Title: Ցամաքաթեւ
Definition_1: without turning a hair, safe & sound.

Title: Ցամաքեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to dry, to des-sicate; to dry up, to parch, to render arid; to drain, to dry up, to exhaust.

Title: Ցամաքիմ
Definition_1: to dry, to dry up; to drain, to be exhausted; to wither, to fade, to die; — յոգւոց, to expire, to breath one's last, to die; — զօրութեան, to grow weak, to lose strength, to fall away, to languish; — սիրոյ, to grow indifferent.

Title: Ցամաքեալ
Definition_1: dry, arid; — զոտի, torrid zone; ստինք —ք, flabby breasts, withered teats; ոսկերք —ք, dried bones.

Title: Ցամաքութիւն
Definition_1: dryness, aridity, siccity; drying up, draining; withering, leanness, exhaustion.

Title: Ցայգ
Definition_2: — or զցայգ, nightly, by night, during the night; զ— եւ զցերեկ, night & day, day & night; by night & by day.

Title: Ցայգագնաց
Definition_1: prowling by night; —ս առնել, to cause to march by night.

Title: Ցայգութիւն
Definition_1: night, night time or hour, the whole night; բղխումն ցայգութեան, nocturnal pollution.

Title: Ցայդ վայր
Definition_1: so far, as far as that, to that place, there.

Title: Ցայնժամ
Definition_1: until or up to that time, hour or epoch, till than.

Title: Ցայնքան
Definition_1: so, so much, to such a degree.

Title: Ցայս վայր
Definition_1: here, to this place; down to there.

Title: Ցայս ցայն
Definition_1: both as to this to that, considering both sides of the case.

Title: Ցայսօր
Definition_1: hitherto, to this day, till today, until now.

Title: Ցայտք
Definition_1: jet, gush, spirt, splash; — ջրոյ, jet deau, water-spout, fountain;

Title: Ցայտեմ
Definition_1: to spout, to cause to gush out, to spirt out; to shine, to beam, to emit rays; տիղմ —, to splash, to bespatter.

Title: Ցայտիմ
Definition_1: to gush, to spout out, to spring up, to break, to burst.

Title: Ցայտուկ
Definition_1: cf. Ցայտումն; —ք տղմոյ, splash of mud.

Title: Ցայտումն
Definition_1: cf. Յայտ; squirt, gushing, spirting; breaking; flashing, reflection; — սերման, ejaculation.

Title: Ցան
Definition_2: scattered, disseminated, spread; — եւ ցիր, ցիր եւ —, scattered about, dispersed every where;
Definition_3: here & there; — եւ ցիր առնել, կացուցանել, սրփել, to scatter here & there, to disperse; — աստ անդ հարցանել, to interrogate (a scholar) promiscuously.

Title: Ցանեմ
Definition_1: to sow, to strew; to spread, to scatter, to diffuse; to sprinkle, to besprinkle.

Title: Ցանկ
Definition_1: hedge, fence, enclosure, boundary, wall; index, catalogue, list, table; desire, love, lust;
Definition_3: always, continually; պատել, փակել —ով, to surround with hedges, to fence in; — արկանել, to hedge in, to encompass, to surround.

Title: Ցանկալի
Definition_1: desirable, to be wished for, longed for, much sought after, amiable, dear; — պարզութիւն, amiable simplicity; — է ինձ, I desire, I wish for, I would that, I dream of nothing but;

Title: Ցանկալիք
Definition_1: whatever is pleasing, desirable or dear; — աչաց, that which is pleasing to the sight.

Title: Ցանկամ
Definition_1: to desire, to wish, to envy, to covet, to long for; to desire inordinately, to covet greedily.

Title: Ցանկապատեմ
Definition_1: to surround with hedges; to encompass, to encircle.

Title: Ցանկասէր
Definition_1: amorous, lecherous, lewd, voluptuous, sensual, libidinous.

Title: Ցանկասիրութիւն
Definition_1: passion, love, lust, sensuality, lechery, concupiscence; զվավաշոտ ցանկասիրութեամբ թեւակոխել, to abandon one-self to voluptuousness.

Title: Ցանկեմ
Definition_1: to surround with hedges, to hedge or wall in, to enclose, to encircle; — զհամարս տանց, to divide into chapter and verse.

Title: Ցանկորդեմ
Definition_2: to continue, to persevere, to perpetuate, to last.

Title: Ցանկութիւն
Definition_1: desire, longing, envy; will, pleasure; sensual pleasures, lust, concupiscence, voluptuousness, sensuality, passion, love; cupidity; — փառաց, ambition; գալ ի —, to desire, to wish; լինել ի ցանկութեան մեծի, to desire ardently, to wish for eagerly; առնել ընդ ցանկութեան անձին, to act according to one's caprice.

Title: Ցանց
Definition_3: cf. Ցանցատեսակ; սփռել զ—, to spread nets; անկանիլ ի —ս, to be caught, taken in a net; to be snared, netted, entrapped.

Title: Ցանցատեսակ
Definition_1: retina, net-ike tunic or innermost coat of the eye.

Title: Ցանցեմ
Definition_1: to fish with nets, to take or catch in a net.

Title: Ցասկոտ
Definition_1: inclined to anger, hasty, irascible, passionate, choleric.

Title: Ցասնում
Definition_1: to lose one's temper, to put oneself in a passion, to fall or fly into a passion, to fire up, to be indignant, very cross, greatly incensed, violently enraged, angry, vexed, exasperated; — տարապարտուց, to fire up at the least thing, to be easily provoked, put out.

Title: Ցասումն
Definition_1: anger, indignation, passion, wrath, ire, rage, fury; ի — ածել, to provoke, to anger, to incense; գրգռել զ— ուրուք, to rouse or stir up wrath, to put into a passion; թափել զ— բարկութեան, to vent one's anger or spleen; մեծապէս ցասմամբ եռալ ախտից, to be aggravated, to become worse; լինել ցասմամբ ընդ ումեք, to be angry with, to quarrel with a person.

Title: Ցասուցանեմ
Definition_1: tooffeild, to rouse the indignation of, to put in a passion, to irritate, to incense, to chafe, to provoke, to exasperate.

Title: Ցարդ
Definition_1: until now, still, yet; — եւս ոչ, not yet.

Title: Ցաւ
Definition_2: sorrow, grief, affliction, displeasure, bitterness; regret; disease, illness;
Definition_3: ցաւովք, painfully, sorrowfully, sadly; դառնակակիծ —, sharp, smarting, poignant or bitter pain; — սրբազան, epilepsy, falling sickness; —ք ցանկութեան, concupiscence; ի —ս լինել, —ս լինել, —ս կրել, տանել or բերել —ոց, to suffer or endure pain, to feel unwell, to be in pain, full of pain; զմահու — ջերանիլ, to be ill of a fatal disease; մեղմել զ—ս, to calm, to allay, assuage or lull pain; դժոխըմբեր կալաւ զիս —, a cruel pain seized me; փարատեցան յինէն —ք իմ, I have no more illness, I am free from pain; — է or —է ինձ, it displeases me, I am vexed, I am very sorry; cf. Ըմբռնիմ.

Title: Ցաւագար
Definition_1: unhealthy, infirm, sickly, broken down, feeble, weak.

Title: Ցաւագին
Definition_1: painful, doleful, afflicted, sorrowful, dismal, mournful;
Definition_2: dolefully, dolesomely, painfully, sadly; — ձայնիւ, in a monrnful tone; — սիրտ, sorrowful heart; — անէծք, atrocious curse; — կեանք, tiresome life.

Title: Ցաւագնեմ
Definition_1: to be in pain, to have a pain, to be ill, to suffer; to pain, to be afflicted, vexed, chagrined, sorry.

Title: Ցաւագնոտեմ
Definition_1: to fall sick, to be ailing, poorly.

Title: Ցաւագնութիւն
Definition_1: pain, grief, affliction, tribulation; condolence, compassion.

Title: Ցաւակից
Definition_1: condoling with, compassionate, feeling for; — լինել, to condole with, to commiserate, to share in another's affliction, to be compassionate, to sympathise with, to pity.

Title: Ցաւակցութիւն
Definition_1: condolence, compassion, sympathy; թուղթ ցաւակցութեան, letter of condolence.

Title: Ցաւեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause pain or sorrow, to pain, to afflict.

Title: Ցաւէ
Definition_1: to be in or to suffer pain or grief; to be displeased, to regret, to be sorry; to be afflicted, to grieve; to compassionate, to pity, to complain; ցաւէ գլուխ իմ, my head aches, I have a pain in my head, I have the headache; ցաւեցին ոտք իւր, he suffered from a pain in his foot; ոչ ումեք ցաւէ ընդ իս, nobody pities me; ցաւէ ինձ ի վերայ քո, I pity you, I weep for you; ցաւեաց մեծ վասն իմ, were you sorry for me ? did you feel compassion for me ? աչինչ զաւէր նմա վասն քո, he had no compassion for you.

Title: Ցաւիմ
Definition_1: to have a pain, an ailing; to be afflicted, chagrined; to regret; cf. Ցաւէ.

Title: Ցելում
Definition_1: to rend, to break, to split, to cleave, to cut, to divide lengthways.

Title: Ցելում
Definition_1: to be torn, rent; tobe split, cloven; ցելաւ յերկուս, it was rent in twain.

Title: Ցեղ
Definition_1: tribe, caste, race, branch; —ից —ից, various, diverse.

Title: Ցեղակարգութիւն
Definition_1: separation of one tribe from another.

Title: Ցեղակից
Definition_1: of the same tribe, family or race.

Title: Ցեղապետ
Definition_1: patriarch; chief of a race, tribe or clan.

Title: Ցեղապետեմ
Definition_1: to be chief or patriarch of a tribe.

Title: Ցեղացեղ
Definition_3: diversely.

Title: Ցեղընտիր
Definition_1: of a different tribe or clan; ցեղընտիր առնեմ, ցեղընտիր լինիմ, to distinguish one tribe or family from another.

Title: Ցեղըննտրութիւն
Definition_1: distinction of one tribe from another.

Title: Ցեղիմ
Definition_1: to descend or derive from, to take origin.

Title: Ցերեակ
Definition_1: by day, in daytime, during the day, in broad daylight; զցայգ եւ զցերեկ, day & night; զօրն ցերեկ, all day long.

Title: Ցերեկութիւն
Definition_1: daytime, duration of a day, the whole day.

Title: Ցեցակերիմ
Definition_1: to be worm-eaten; — ամէց, cf. Ցեցակեր.

Title: Ցիխ
Definition_1: mud, mire, dirt; ընդ — գալ, to get splashed, to be covered with mud.

Title: Ցիռ
Definition_1: onager, wild ass; — խանչէ, the — brays.

Title: Ցիր
Definition_2: — or — եւ ցան, dispersed, scattered about, spread; cf. Ցան; ցիր ընդ ցիր լինել, to be dispersed, scattered about, spread over; — եւ ցան մտօք absent-minded, distracted.

Title: Ցիրդ
Definition_2: pimpernel, burnet; smilax, rough bindweed; cf. Գի; ցրդոյ պտուղ, juniper-berries.

Title: Ցից
Definition_2: upright, erect, straight; acute, sharp; դատապարտել ի —, to sentence to be empaled; հանել, վարսել ի —, to empale.

Title: Ցիւ
Definition_1: tiling, roof; ընդ or զցուոցն կախել, to let down through the roof.

Title: Ցլագլուխ
Definition_3: bull-head.

Title: Ցխոտիմ
Definition_1: to soil oneself, to get dirty.

Title: Ցմախ
Definition_1: water-parsley, apium palustre; white hellebore, veratrum.

Title: Ցնդեմ
Definition_1: to dissipate, to disperse; to volatilize, to exhale, to evaporate, to vanish; — զմիտս ուրուք, to distract, to divert from, to turn from or away; — զոք յարտօսր, to excite a person's compassion, to move, to affect.

Title: Ցնդիմ
Definition_1: to be dissipated, dispersed; to be turned to vapour, to be evaporated, volatilized, exhaled; tobe in one's dotage, to twaddle, to dote, to get heedless; — յարտասուս, to melt in tears; — մտօք, to be wrapt or absorbed in contemplation, to be absent in mind, inattentive.

Title: Ցնդումն
Definition_1: dispersion, dissipation; volatilization, exhalation, evaporation; — գլխոյ, մտաց, inattention, distraction.

Title: Ցնծալի
Definition_1: joyful, joyous, merry, cheerful, blithe, gay, exhilarated.

Title: Ցնծամ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to be joyful, to be transported with happiness, to be full of merriment.

Title: Ցնծացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to rejoice, to gladden, to make joyqus, to exhilarate, to delight.

Title: Ցնծութիւն
Definition_1: exultation, rejoicing, cheerfulness, blithesomeness, mirth, joy, exhilaration; — զգենուլ, to be festive, joyous, gladsome, blithe.

Title: Ցնկնիմ
Definition_1: to bring forth, to litter, to have young; — շան, to pup; — կատուի, to kitten; — գաղանաց, to cub; — (ծնանել) ծովու, to calve; — (ծնանել) խաշանց, to lamb; — (ծնանել) գրաստուց, to foal; — այծի (ծնանել), to kid

Title: Ցնորք
Definition_1: giddiness, delirium, raving, vertigo, frenzy, madness; phantom, shadow, whimsical fancy, vision, illusion, imagination, fantasy, chimera; — անդոհականք, անժպիտք, horrible visions, fantastic apparitions.

Title: Ցնորական
Definition_1: imaginary, fanciful, fantastic, illusory, chimerical, extravagant, air-built.

Title: Ցնորակոծ
Definition_1: deranged, frantic, delirious, frenzied, raving, mad; — առնել, to strike with frenzy, to torment with madness; — լինել, to be a prey to delirium, to be tormented by a diseased imagination, to be infatuated.

Title: Ցնորեմ
Definition_1: to cause giddiness, to induce to idle fancy, vagaries, day dreams, to building castles in the air, to creating oneself illusions, to running after chimeras or vain show, to seduce, to infatuate, to craze, to drive mad.

Title: Ցնորիմ
Definition_1: to be delirious, deranged or light-headed, to feel giddy, dizzy, to be crazy, to talk nonsense, to rave; to be beside oneself, to wander, to run mad; to create oneself illusions, to build castles in the air.

Title: Ցնորումն
Definition_1: wandering of mind, delirium, folly; illusion; distraction.

Title: Ցնցեմ
Definition_1: cf. Ցունց տամ; — զձեռն, to shake hands.

Title: Ցնցղաձեւ
Definition_1: perforated with many holes, like the rose of a watering-pot.

Title: Ցնցղանամ
Definition_1: to gush forth, to spout out.

Title: Ցնցուղ
Definition_1: pipe, conduit, duct, tube; watering-pot; besprinkling; dispersion.

Title: Ցոլամ
Definition_1: to shine, to sparkle, to glitter; to reflect, to be reflected, to reverberate, to flash

Title: Ցոլացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to reflect, to reverberate; to emit, to exhale, to send forth.

Title: Ցոլումն
Definition_1: reflection, reflex, reverberation; sparkling, flashing, lightening.

Title: Ցոյց
Definition_1: showing, indication, mark, index, sign, testimony; demonstration, evident proof; show, appearance, parade, ostentation; spectacle, laughing-stock, butt; հաստատուն —, plain proof; — բարեկամութեան, show of friendship; — մեծարանաց, demonstration of respect; ի —, ի —ս, ի —ս ինչ, only for show, for pretence, for ostentation; —ս առնել, to shew, to show off, to make parade or display of, to display; առնել ինչ ի —ս մարդկան, to do any thing so as to be seen of men, ostentatiously, for mere shew, to obtain applause fraudulently; լինել ի —ս, to be exposed to mockery or contempt, to be the laughing-stock, the butt of; զոմանս — առնել ի խրատ այլոց, to hold up to opprobrium for example to others.

Title: Ցորեան
Definition_1: wheat; corn, grain; տուրք ցորենոյ, cornage; փոխինդ ի ցորենոյ եւ ի կաթանէ, frumenty; հարկանեն ճճիք զ—, weevils destroy corn.

Title: Ցորժամ
Definition_1: till, until, as long as; ցո՞րժամ, how long?

Title: Ցոր վայր
Definition_1: where, whither; ցո՞ր վայր, how far ?

Title: Ցորքան
Definition_1: as long as, during, whilst; ցո՞րքան, until when ? how long ?

Title: Ցուլ
Definition_1: bull; — վայրի, ure-ox, urus; միս, մորթ ցլու, bull-beef; bull's-hide; բառաչ, պոչիւն or պոռոչիւն ցլու, bellowing, lowing; — բառաչէ, the bull bellows; զոհ ցլուց, taurobolium;

Title: Ցունց
Definition_1: shock, shake; — տալ, to shake, to agitate, to stir.

Title: Ցուպ
Definition_1: stick, switch, rod; beams or rays of light;
Definition_2: — ծերութեան իմոյ, the staff of my old age; — պանդխտաց, Jacob's-staff; — հովուի, shepherd's crock; — կտղաց, crutch; — հնդիկ, ebony; — եպիսկոպոսական, pastoral staff, crosier; — ի ձեռին, stick in hand; շրջիլ ի ցպոյ, to go or walk with crutches.

Title: Ցուրտ
Definition_2: cold, senseless, silly, stupid, insipid; vain, frivolous, trifling;
Definition_3: cold, chill; — մարդ, cold, frigid, unconcerned, indifferent person; — ցաւ, piercing cold; — պատճառք, poverty of argument; — մահահամբոյր, chill of death; — սաստիկ, a violent or biting cold; սոսկալի, խիստ, անտանելի, թափանցող —, horrible, bitter, insupportable, piercing cold; — է, it is cold; սարսռացեալ դողալ ի ցրտոյ, to tremble all over with cold, to be benumbed with cold; պատսպարիլ ի ցրտոյ, to provide against the cold; վարժիլ ցրտոյ, to be inured to cold; — առնուլ, to take cold, to catch cold; դի — յերկիր ընկենուլ, to kill on the spot, to strike, a cold corpse, to the ground; cf. Ընդարմանամ.

Title: Ցուց
Definition_1: shouts of joy; air, song, glee, ditty, ballad; pomp, show; — բառնալ, to sing a song.

Title: Ցուցակ
Definition_2: indicator, sign, mark, token; catalogue, index, table, list; repertory; Ritual; hand, index;
Definition_3: coefficient; — վաճառուց, inventory; — մեռելոց, table of mortality; — կերակրոց, bill of fare; — արգելեալ գրոց, index ex-purgatorius, list of prohibited books.

Title: Ցուցական
Definition_1: demonstrative, indicative; — առնել, to demonstrate, to evince, to evidence, to prove, to show; cf. Մատն;

Title: Ցուցակութիւն
Definition_1: demonstration, proof, reason; ածել ի —, to show, to manifest; յանէութենէ ի — ածել, to create, to give being, to cause to exist.

Title: Ցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to shew, to indicate, to designate, to point out; to cause to be seen or known, to expose, to declare, to represent; to demonstrate, to proof; — զանձն թէ աստուած, to pretend to be a god.

Title: Ցոփ
Definition_1: garrulous, glib, chattering; loose, disordered, dissolute, lewd.

Title: Ցոփաբան
Definition_1: silly-talking, nasty, indiscreet, unbridled; debauched, licentious.

Title: Ցոփագնացք
Definition_1: dissolute life, disorderly conduct; — կեաց, cf. Ցոփագանաց.

Title: Ցոփանամ
Definition_1: to follow ill courses, to lead a dissolute life, to rush headlong into vice.

Title: Ցոփացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to debauch, to lead into wrong courses, to corrupt, to vitiate, to pervert.

Title: Ցոփութիւն
Definition_1: profligacy, disorder, libertinism, licentiousness, debauchery, lewdness, scandalous behaviour.

Title: Ցռկանաւ
Definition_1: rostral, beaked ship, galley; — մեծ, galeas; — փոքր, galiot; cf. Հնգաթի.

Title: Ցռկիմ
Definition_1: to jut out, to project, to protrude; to spout or rush out.

Title: Ցռուկ
Definition_2: rostrum, cut-water, prow; կապել զ— եղին, to muzzle the ox; — հարկանել ի ջուրսն, to plunge the nose & mouth under water

Title: Ցտեմ
Definition_1: to graze, to rub the skin off, to scratch, to bruise, to notch, to jag; to make incisions, to cut; to wrest, to extort, to carry off;
Definition_2: to scarify, to cup; — զհերս, to tear out one's bair.

Title: Ցտիմ
Definition_1: to bruise oneself, to rub the skin off, to scratch oneself.

Title: Ցտումն
Definition_1: scratch, cut, bruise; — հերաց, plucking out of the hair.

Title: Ցրեմ
Definition_1: cf. Ցրուեմ; to transgress, to violate, to break, to infringe; — զխորհուրդս, to reveal secrets; to thwart the projects, to counteract the designs, to baffle the devices of a person; — ցինչս, to lavish, to waste, to squander, to run through, to dissipate; — զմիտս, to distract, to divert, to call off; — զխաւար, to dispel the darkness.

Title: Ցրիչ
Definition_3: dispersive.

Title: Ցրիւ
Definition_1: dispersedly, here & there; — արկանել, to scatter about.

Title: Ցրուեմ
Definition_1: to disperse, to dissipate, to scatter, to spread; to rout, to disperse, to put to the rout, to destroy; — զտառս, to distribute the letters, to take down the types; cf. Ցրեմ.

Title: Ցրուիմ
Definition_1: to disperse, to spread; to be scattered or dispersed; — մտաց, to divert one's attention or mind from; — ընդ երեսս երկրի, to spread all over the world.

Title: Ցրումն
Definition_1: dispersion, diffusion, scattering; — մտաց, distraction; — ուխտի, violation, transgression.

Title: Ցրտաբան
Definition_1: talking insipidly, mawkish, dull, stupid, silly, witless.

Title: Ցրտաբանեմ
Definition_1: to jest or talk sillily or insipidly, to talk nonsense.

Title: Ցրտաբանութիւն
Definition_1: nauseous speech or conversation, insipid talk, silliness, nonsense.

Title: Ցրտահար
Definition_2: blasted, spoiled by cold; — առնել, to chill, to benumb with cold; to dazzle, to blast; — լինել՝ հարիմ, to become rigid, stiff, benumbed with cold, to be frozen.

Title: Ցրտանամ
Definition_1: to become cold, to grow cool, chilly; to be seized with cold, to catch cold;
Definition_2: to become lukewarm, to grow cool; to talk nonsense, to prate

Title: Ցրտացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cool, to chill, to freeze;

Title: Ցրցտեմ
Definition_1: to rend, to tear or lacerate.

Title: Ցցահար
Definition_2: pile-driver; — ոլորանաւոր, pile-driving engine with pincers; — չուանաձիգ, ringing pile-engine.

Title: Ցցեմ
Definition_1: to thrust down, to drive in, to fix, to plant, to set up, to erect, to raise.

Title: Ցցուեմ
Definition_1: to shooth forth, to sprout, to pullulate; to be planted, set up; — հերաց, to stand erect, on end, to bristle up.

Title: Ցցումն
Definition_1: driving or thrusting in, standing up.

Title: Ցցունք
Definition_1: curl, ringlet, lock; egret, tuft of feathers, plume.

Title: Ցփսի
Definition_1: serge, camlet stuff, woollen stuff; cf. Խարազն; — ազնիւ, shawl.

Title: Ցքի
Definition_1: alcohol, spirits of wine; brandy, arrack; — հանեալ ի պտղոց, cider.

Title: Ցօղ
Definition_1: dew; չիթ —ոյ, dew-drop; — քաղցրածաւալ, the gently-falling dew; — քաղցրութեան, the benign dew.

Title: Ցօղալի
Definition_1: full of dew, wet with dew, dew-besprinkled.

Title: Ցօղածին
Definition_1: cf. Ցօղաբեր; born of dew; — որգ, dew-worm.

Title: Ցօղանամ
Definition_1: to grow cool, to cool, to be refreshed; to drop with dew.

Title: Ցօղարկեմ
Definition_1: to bedew, to besprinkle; to refresh.

Title: Ցօղաւոր
Definition_1: full of or sprinkled with dew; ոմպ —, mist, fog.

Title: Ցօղեմ
Definition_1: to dew; to bedew, to sprinkle or cover with dew, to besprinkle, to wet, to water; — անձրեւ, to rain; — արտօսր, to shed tears, to weep; — բերանով, to sprinkle with the mouth; ցօղէ, the dew falls; ամպք զօղեցին ջուր, the clouds melted in rain.

Title: <letter>Ւ</letter> (ioune)
Definition_1: the thirty fourth letter of the alphabet and the seventh of the vowels; seven thousand; seven thousandth; It is used both as a vowel & as a consonant. As a vowel for example in the words իւրաքանչիւր, ուխտ, etc., and as a consonant in the words հաւատ, սեաւ, հիւանդ, etc.; It is only used as a medial final letter, sometimes serves for the consonant վ, for instance : օթեւան — օթեվան, երիւար — երիվար, վաւաշ — վավաշ, etc, or for the diphthong u, as, հւսւտ instead of հիւսիւս; There is no proper word beginning with this letter, but on account of its affinity with the letter հ, it is sometimes substituted for it; Joined with ի (իւ), it is generally pronounced like the French u as : դիւր, հիւր, դիւթ, & preceding the ո (ու) is pronounced like the English ou. Preceded also by ա (աւ), was anciently pronounced o as : աւրհնեմ — օրհնեմ, աւր — օր; It is sometimes used instead of the suffixes ի & յ as : ւայդմանէ — յայդմանէ, ւիւրաքանչիւր — յիւրաքանչիւր; In poetry, it is sometimes used instead of the conjunction եւ or ու.

Title: <letter>Փ</letter> (piour)
Definition_1: the thirty fifth letter of the alphabet, and the twenty ninth of the consonants; eight thousand, eight thousandth.

Title: *Փաթաթ
Definition_1: patat, tandoorer's pad, padded disk used by bakers to press the dough for loaves against the sides of the tandoor.

Title: Փաթաթեմ
Definition_1: to wrap up, to envelope; to bandage, to wind round.

Title: Փախուստ
Definition_1: flight, escape; evasion, subterfuge, shift, tergiversation; — զօրաց, rout, defeat, overthrow; ի — դարձուցանել, to put to flight, to rout; ի — մտաբերել, to meditate flight; — առնուլ, ի — դառնալ, աճապարել, երթալ, մտանիլ, լինել, կալ, to take to flight, to flee, to run away, to turn one's back, to turn tail.

Title: Փախուցանեմ
Definition_1: to put to flight, to cause to flee, to drive away, to dislodge.

Title: Փախչիմ
Definition_1: to flee, to run away, to escape, to get away, to evade, to elude, to avoid.

Title: Փախստական
Definition_3: fleeting, transient; — ծառայ, runaway slave; — առնել, արկանել, հանել, վարել, տալ, to put to flight; — լինել, գնալ, երթալ, դառնալ, անկանել, դիմել, to take to flight, to turn tail, to run away.

Title: Փակ
Definition_2: shut; — արկանել, to lock, to padlock, to latch, to bolt, to shut.

Title: Փակակալ
Definition_3: cf. Փակաղակ.

Title: Փականք
Definition_1: fastening, lock, padlock, latch, bolt; key.

Title: Փակեղն
Definition_1: turban; head-dress, head-band, fillet, band; hood, cowl; cf. Վակաս, cf. Ուրար.

Title: Փակեմ
Definition_1:
to shut, to close; to shut up, to enclose, to fence in, to bar; to shut, to lock; ի ներքս —, to shut up, to beset, to hem round, to encircle, to surround, to encompass; — բանտի, to imprison, to put in jail; — զբան, to conclude, to close, to end; — ինչ յումեքէ, to prohibit, to forbid; — զարգանդ (կնոջ), to procure sterility; — զոք ի ձեռս ուրուք, to deliver up, to betray; ի ներքս փակեալ, herein enclosed; փակեալ էին ընդ իշխանութեամբ մահու, they were subject to death; փառքն աստուծոյ զքեւ փակեսցին, may divine glory encompass you !
cf. Դուռն, cf. Յոյս.

Title: Փակնում
Definition_1: to be shut in or up.

Title: Փակուցանեմ
Definition_1: to attach, to stick, to cement.

Title: Փաղաղեմ
Definition_1: to devour, to consume; to burn.

Title: Փաղաքշանք
Definition_1: endearments, caresses, wheedling, coaxing; flattery, adulation, palaver.

Title: Փաղաքշեմ
Definition_1: to caress, to fondle, to coax, to wheedle, to cajole, to flatter, to fawn, to adulate.

Title: Փաղաքուշ
Definition_2: flatterer, fawner, toadeater, adulator, smooth-tongued fellow, sycophant.

Title: Փաղիժ
Definition_1: phalangium, tarantula (a venomous insect, whose bite is supposed to be cured by music)!.

Title: Փաղփաղիմ
Definition_1: to shine, to glitter, to gleam.

Title: Փաղփեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to shine or gitter, to give brightness to.

Title: Փամփուշտ
Definition_1: bladder, vesicle; — ապակեղէն, balloon; — հրետի, gun cartridge; — հրաձիգ, fusee; cf. Հրատիկք; — լողական, air-bladder.

Title: Փայլ
Definition_2: shining, brilliant, glittering; — ի —, extremely bright, dazzling;
Definition_3: sparklingly;
Definition_4: — զ—ի տալ, cf. Փայլեմ.

Title: Փայլակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to flash or flare.

Title: Փայլակն
Definition_1: lightning, flash of lightning; սրավար, արագաթռիչ, իբրեւ զ—, quick, swift as lightning.

Title: Փայլակնաբորբոք
Definition_1: ardent, vivid as a flash of lightning; flashing, dazzling.

Title: Փայլակնահար
Definition_1: striking like a thunderbolt; — առնել, to fulminate, to lighten.

Title: Փայլակնաձեւ
Definition_1: like lightning, very luminous, radiant, coruscant.

Title: Փայլակնանամ
Definition_1: to flash like lightning, to gleam transiently.

Title: Փայլակնանշոյլ
Definition_1: bright as a flash of lightning.

Title: Փայլակնատարած
Definition_1: gleaming flashes; extending, diffused as a lightning flash.

Title: Փայլակնատեսիլ
Definition_1: resembling a flash of lightning, flashing, flaring.

Title: Փայլատակեմ
Definition_1: to lighten; to throw out sparks, to scintillate, to sparkle, to gleam, to shine;
Definition_2: to cause to flash or sparkle; — զփայլատակունս, to make the lightning flash; բոց աստուածային յաչաց նորա —կէր, divine fire flashed from his eyes;
Definition_3: —կէ, it lightens.

Title: Փայլատակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: cf. Փայլատակեմ; կայծակունս յաչաց —, to flash fire from the eyes.

Title: Փայլատակն
Definition_1: lightning, flash; spark; brightness, brilliancy; thunderbolt.

Title: Փայլատակումն
Definition_1: lightning, flashing; coruscation, scintillation, fulguration; sparkling; thunderbolt; —կմամբ սատակել, to thunderstrike; —կունս տեղալ, to rain lightnings and thunderbolts.

Title: Փայլեմ
Definition_1: to shine, to glitter, to gleam, to flash, to sparkle, to glisten, to be resplendent;
Definition_2: to cause to shine, to give a lustre or brightness to, to polish, to furbish, to burnish; խնդութիւն փայլէ յաչս նորա, joy shines in his looks.

Title: Փայլեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: cf. Փայլեմ; — զկօշիկս, to black or polish shoes.

Title: Փայլուն
Definition_1: clear, polished, bright, shining, sheen, splendid, brilliant; — պղինձ, brass, yellow copper.

Title: Փայծաղնացաւ
Definition_1: spleen-sick, troubled with the spleen, splenetic;

Title: Փայտ
Definition_1: wood; tree; — կենաց, the Holy-Rood, the Cross;
Definition_2: tree of life, lignum-vitae, guaiacum, thula or thuya; — խնկոց, odorous, scented wood; — իւղոյ, olive-wood, olive; չնչին —, fragile wood; — այրելի, fire-wood; — հարկանել, պատառել, to cut wood; to cut down, to fell; — ընկենուլ, to draw or cast lots; կախել զ—է, to crucify.

Title: Փայտակոյտ
Definition_1: heap or pile of wood; pyre, funeral pile.

Title: Փայտահար
Definition_1: woodsman, wood-cutter, wood-cleaver, feller; axe, hatchet.

Title: Փայտանամ
Definition_1: to become wood, to be changed into wood;
Definition_2: to be benumbed, to become stiff.

Title: Փայտատ
Definition_1: hatchet, axe; hoe, mattock, spade, pick-axe.

Title: Փայտաւէտ
Definition_1: abounding in forests, woody, sylvan, woodland.

Title: Փայտփոր
Definition_1: wood-pecker; կանանչ —, hick-wall, hickway; — ծովային, sea-pik, pica marina.

Title: Փայփայանք
Definition_1: pretty ways, caressing, coaxing; cajoling, fawning, flattering.

Title: Փայփայեմ
Definition_1: to pet, to take great care of, to nurse tenderly, to fondle, to caress, to make much of; to fawn upon, to cajole, to flatter.

Title: Փանաքի
Definition_1: weak; mean, wile, worthless, contemptible, poor, miserable.

Title: Փանաքիմաց
Definition_1: weak-minded or poor-minded, of slender parts.

Title: Փանաքիմացութիւն
Definition_1: slender wit, mediocrity, weakness or poverty of mind.

Title: Փանդանեմ
Definition_1: to rend asunder, to tear to pieces, to dilaniate.

Title: Փանդռնահար
Definition_1: player on the pandura, guitar-player, guitarist; trumpeter.

Title: Փաշաման
Definition_1: anguish, affliction; blame, reproach; — կրել, to suffer invectives; to receive reproaches.

Title: Փապար
Definition_1: crevice, rift, cleft; cave, cavity, hollow, hole;

Title: Փառ
Definition_1: cf. Մեղեդի; thin skin, pellicle, cuticle, film, husk;

Title: Փառաբանեմ
Definition_1: to laud, to praise, to glorify.

Title: Փառազարդեմ
Definition_1: to cover with glory, to load with honours, to render glorious.

Title: Փառակից
Definition_1: equally glorious, having the same glory as another, sharing another's glory.

Title: Փառամոլ
Definition_1: greedy of glory, vain, very ambitious.

Title: Փառամոլութիւն
Definition_1: inordinate love of glory, insatiate or immoderate ambition.

Title: Փառասէր
Definition_1: fond of glory, full of vanity, ambitious, vain.

Title: Փառասիրեմ
Definition_1: to be fond of glory, to aspire but to glory.

Title: Փառատենչիկ
Definition_1: greedy of fame, thirsting after glory.

Title: Փառատրեմ
Definition_1: to praise, to laud, to glorify.

Title: Փառաւոր
Definition_1: glorious, illustrious; — առնել, to pay honours to, to glorify, to praise, to celebrate, to extol; — լինել, to be glorious, glorified, honoured, extolled.

Title: Փառաւորապէս
Definition_1: with much honour, gloriously, magnificently, pompously.

Title: Փառաւորեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to glorify, to render honour and glory, to honour, to exalt, to praise, to magnify, to celebrate.

Title: Փառաւորութիւն
Definition_1: glorification; glory, magnificence, pomp, splendour; փառաւորութեամբ, cf. Փառաւորապէս.

Title: Փառք
Definition_1: glory; honour, praise, fame, renown, celebrity; majesty, splendour, magnificence.

Title: Փառօք
Definition_1:
gloriously, with glory, pompously, splendidly; ճշմարիտ, անարատ or անստգիւտ, անեղծ, անկապուտ, շքեղ, յաւերժական —, true, spotless, solid, real, great, imperishable glory; սուտ, փախստական, սնոտի, կորստական —, false, fleeting, vain, perishable glory; սիրել զփառս, to love glory; փառս ստանալ, to acquire fame or glory; փառաց ի փառս բարձրանալ, to be raised or exalted to the highest pitch of glory; ընթանալ ի փառս, to be in a fair way the glory; անկապուտ փառս անձին համարել, to put one's chief glory in; ուղիղ փառս ունել, to be of an orthodox belief or profession, to have a catholic sense; տալ փառս աստուծոյ, to glorify God, to give or render glory to God, to thank God; վասն փառաց մեռանել, to die for glory; անկանել փառօք, to fall gloriously; յաւերժացուցանել զփառս իւր, to make one's glory eternal; կնիք տալ փառաց, to put the seal to one's fame; տենչալ փառաց, զակատիլ զհետ փառաց, to aim at glory, to pursue glory; աղարտել զփառս իւր, to tarnish one's glory, to stain one's reputation; աղօտացուցանել, նսեմացուցանել զփառս իւր, obscure, darken or efface one's glory; անկանել ի փառաց, to abase, degrade or dishonour oneself; առանց փառաց, inglorious; փառաւորեալ փառօք, covered with glory, with laurels, renowned, famous; շքեղապանծ փառօք, with extraordinary splendour; փառս քեզ համարեսջիր, make it your aim and glory to; տեսէք, մի գուցէ քակտեսջիք ի փառացդ, take care not to lose your renown; անմահական փառս յաւելցէ քեզ այս, this will bring you immortal glory; նսեմացեալ անհետանայր գոգցես եւ — նորա զոյգ ընդ բաղդին, his glory seemed to be eclipsed with his fortune; ի փառս աստուծոյ, to the glory of God; — հօր, the Gloria Patri; — տեառն, — աստուծոյ, glory to God ! God be praised! thank God !
— քեզ, տէր, glory to Thee, o God; — ի բարձունս աստուծոյ, glory to God in the highest; որում միայնոյ վայելեն —, to Whom alone glory belongs.

Title: Փասիան
Definition_1: pheasant; էգ —, hen -; արու —, cock -; ձագ —, pheasant-poult; ծովային —, sea-pheasant, cracker, pin-tail duck.

Title: Փաստաբանեմ
Definition_1: to reason, to seek or allege reasons, to adduce grounds or motives, to plead, to argue.

Title: Փասքուս
Definition_1: chattering, prattling, tale-bearing, whispering, slanderous, back-biting.

Title: Փասքսեմ
Definition_1: to tattle, to repeat, to whisper, to murmur or grumble, to tell tales, to speak ill of, to slander.

Title: Փարախ
Definition_2: church, convent, hotel; ժողովել ի —, to bring back to the fold.

Title: Փարախեմ
Definition_1: to stable, to put in a stable, to gather into the fold.

Title: Փարատեմ
Definition_1: to dissipate, to disperse, to scatter, to remove, to drive away, to destroy, to take away;
Definition_2: to be dissipated, dispelled, removed, to vanish; — զհոգս, to charm away, to beguile care.

Title: Փարատեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: cf. Փարատեմ; — զցաւս, to soothe, to allay pain; — զտրտմութիւն, to drive away melancholy.

Title: Փարաւազեմ
Definition_1: to comfort, to console, to solace, to cheer, to amuse.

Title: Փարելի
Definition_2: offscum, offscouring, cf. Ջնջան; — առնել, ասել, to conjure, to beseech, to entreat, to beg, to supplicate.

Title: Փարեմ
Definition_1: to embrace, to take in, to encompass, to contain;

Title: Փարթամանամ
Definition_1: to become or grow rich, to thrive.

Title: Փարթամացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to enrich, to render rich, to make wealthy.

Title: Փարիմ
Definition_1: to embrace, to clasp in one's arms, to throw one's arms round, to hug, to fold or lock in one's arms; to surround, to encircle; — զմիմեամբք, to embrace mutually; — զիւիք, to apply oneself, to give oneself up to; — զփառօք, to be ambitious; cf. Ծունգ.

Title: Փարսախ
Definition_1: parasang, ancient Persian measure of length.

Title: Փարտ
Definition_1: odd, uneven; դար եւ — խաղալ, cf. Կոճատ.

Title: Փարփար
Definition_1: moor-hen or water-hen, coot, fen-duck, cf. Հաւալուսն;

Title: Փափագեմ
Definition_1: to desire, to wish, to long for, to want; —է տեսանել զքեզ, he desires to see you.

Title: Փափագեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to excite the wish for, to render desirous, to inspire desire.

Title: Փափագումն
Definition_1: cf. Փափաք; կատարել, լցուցանել զ—, to content, to satisfy; որով ի — ածէ զնոսա, with which he excited desire in their hearts.

Title: Փափկակեաց
Definition_1: tender, delicate, living delicately, leading a dainty life, foppish, effeminate, voluptuous; — լինել, cf. Փափկանամ.

Title: Փափկակեցութիւն
Definition_1: delicate or voluptuous life, daintiness, softness, delicacy, effeminacy.

Title: Փափկանամ
Definition_1: to soften, to become tender, soft;
Definition_2: to become nice, delicate, to get soft or effeminate, to live in idleness, in pleasures, to pamper oneself, to give oneself up to effeminacy or voluptuousness; — յանկողինս, to throw oneself listlessly or lazily on divans or conches, to sleep in soft beds; — որովայնիւ, to addict oneself to epicurism; տօն փափակացեալ, a duly kept feast or festival.

Title: Փափկասէր
Definition_1: fond of softness, of delights, dainty, voluptuous, effeminate.

Title: Փափկասիրութիւն
Definition_1: love of delicacy, of delights, voluptuousness, effeminacy.

Title: Փափկասուն
Definition_1: brought up delicately, petted, delicate, nice; — մանուկ, petted, spoilt child, child cockered too much, brought np in lavender; — կեանք, softness.

Title: Փափկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to soften, to render tender; to take the greatest care of, to pet, to render delicate, soft; — զծոմական աւուրս, to banquet on fast days.

Title: Փափկին
Definition_1: very delicate, dainty, most tender, young, fresh, new.

Title: Փափկութիւն
