Definition_1: delicacy, tenderness; effeminacy, daintiness, delight, pleasure, voluptuousness; — խղճի, scrupulousness of conscience, scrupulosity; — իմաստից, niceties or delicacies of thoughts; — սրտի, ախորժակի, delicacy of heart, — of taste; — կերակրոց, luxurious feeding, delicacies, dainty meats, good living; արօտք փափկութեան, pleasant pastures; պարտէզ փափկութեան, garden of delights; օր փափկութեան, holiday; ի հանդերձս փափկութեան զարդարեալ, tastefully, daintily clothed or dressed; ընկղմիլ ի —ս, to revel in voluptuousness; cf. Հատանեմ.

Title: Փափուկ
Definition_1: delicate, soft, dainty, voluptuous; delicious, tender, nice, exquisite; charming, gentle, graceful; holy, sacred;
Definition_2: —ս, delicately, tenderly, gently; — ախորժակ, fine taste; — խիղճ, tender or scrupulous conscience.

Title: Փեգենայ
Definition_1: ruta, rue; վայրի —, wild rue, ruta sylvestris, harmala.

Title: Փեղկ
Definition_1: tent-curtain, curtain; linen; breadth; — լերանց, side or spur of mountains; — պատուհանաց, shutter.

Title: Փեղմոնի
Definition_1: phelmoni, such a one; եղմոնի — or — եղմոնի, in such and such a place.

Title: Փեճոկ
Definition_1: shell, husk; — պտղոց, rind, peel, paring; — ծառոց, bark; — ընկուզի, nut-shell; — ձուոց, egg-shell; — ընդեղինաց, pod, cod, husk; — խեցեմորթից, oyster-shell or tortoise-shell; scale; — արեւելեան, coculus Iudicus, fisher's berry.

Title: Փեճոկեմ
Definition_1: to bark, to peel, to pare; — զընկոյզ, to shell nuts.

Title: Փեռեկեմ
Definition_1: to cleave, to rend, to tear, to divide, to open, to break, to burst.

Title: Փեռեկիմ
Definition_1: to be divided, separated, to be in discord, to disagree; —կեալ կոկորդ, open-mouth; gaper.

Title: Փեսայական
Definition_1: pertaining to the bridegroom, marital, conjugal.

Title: Փեսայանամ
Definition_1: to espouse, to marry a person's daughter, to be or become a son-in-law.

Title: Փեսայացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to marry, to give one's daughter in marriage.

Title: Փետեմ
Definition_1: to pull or pluck out, to depilate; — զփետուրս, to pluck or strip off feathers; — զհերս, զմօրուս, to tear out the hair or beard; — զոք, to fleece a person.

Title: Փետուր
Definition_1: feather; նուրբ, մանր —ք, down, soft feathers; խոշոր —ք, master or longest quills; յարդարել զ—ս, to preen, cleanse or dress the feathers; աւել ի փետրոց, featherbroom.

Title: Փետրաթափ
Definition_1: featherless, stripped of feathers, plumeless, bare, plucked; — առնել, to pick, to shake the feathers, to pluck; — լինել, to moult, to change feathers.

Title: Փետրալից
Definition_1: well-feathered, covered with feathers, plumy; պաղլեղ —, plumeallum;

Title: Փերեւերտեմ
Definition_1: to dress oneself with studied elegance, with affected neatness, with too great attention to effect, to be very spruce or smart; to bridle up, to strut, to carry proudly, to walk with affected dignity.

Title: Փերթեմ
Definition_1: to tear, to rend, to lacerate.

Title: Փթթեմ
Definition_1: to put or shoot forth, to cause to blow or blossom, to deck with flowers.

Title: Փթթիմ
Definition_1: to sprout, to germinate, to shoot; to blow, to bloom, to blossom, to open; cf. Ընդ.

Title: Փթիթ
Definition_2: blossomed, flowered; ի —ս հարկանիլ, to blow.

Title: Փթրիմ
Definition_1: to dry up, to fall to dust.

Title: Փիծ
Definition_1: spotted, stained, sullied, dirty; unclean, impure, obscene.

Title: Փիղ
Definition_1: elephant; — մատակ, she —, female -; գոչիւն փղի, trumpeting of the —, cf. Ժանիք.

Title: Փին
Definition_2: — բերել or գալ ընդ բերանն, — ընդ բերան գալ, iliac passion, twisting of the intestines, volvulus; cf. Վերադարձութիւն.

Title: Փլանիմ
Definition_1: to fall, to fall or sink in or down, to crumble, to fall or go to ruin.

Title: Փլուցանեմ
Definition_1: to beat down, to cause to fall, to destroy, to demolish, to ruin; to rout, to defeat, to disperse.

Title: Փխրեմ
Definition_1: to pound, to crush, to crumble, to bruise, to grind; to roast, to toast, to torrefy.

Title: Փծեմ
Definition_1: to stain, to foul, to sully, to maculate, to contaminate.

Title: Փծուն
Definition_1: soiled, dirty, impure, filthy, bad, vile, abject.

Title: Փղակոյտ
Definition_1: with many elephants; — բազմութիւն, herd of elephants.

Title: Փղծկիմ
Definition_1: to be deeply grieved at, to have one's heart full of pity, to be much touched, moved; փղձկեցաւ յարտասուաց, his eyes filled with tears.

Title: Փղոսկրեայ
Complement: էի, իւ, եաւ, իւք, էից, եայց, եաց, եօք

Title: Փնչեմ
Definition_1: to puff, to blow; to sneeze; cf. Մռնչեմ.

Title: Փշալից
Definition_1: full of thorns or briars, thorny, braky, prickly, briery.

Title: Փշախիլ
Definition_1: extirpating briars; — շրջել, to pull up, to root out thorns or briars.

Title: Փշայեղց
Definition_1: choked with briars, full of thorns.

Title: Փշանամ
Definition_1: to grow thorny, to bristle with thorns;
Definition_2: to have one's hair stand on end from terror, to be horror-struck.

Title: Փշանիւթ
Definition_1: made of thorn; — պսակ, crown of thorns.

Title: Փշրեմ
Definition_1: to grind to dust or powder, to pound, to bruise, to crush, to triturate, to pulverize; to crumble.

Title: Փոթիմ
Definition_1: to be folded or plaited; to wrinkle, to pucker, to shrink, to shrivel up;
Definition_2: to fold, to plait; to wrinkle, to contract.

Title: Փոթորիկ
Definition_1: tempest, storm, hurricane, whirlwind; —ս յարուցանել, to raise a tempest; — ել, a tempest burst, a storm arose; cf. Մրրիկ.

Title: Փոթորկիմ
Definition_1: to whirl, to whirl round; to rush on like a tempest, impetuously;

Title: Փոթտեմ
Definition_1: to irritate or bite the tongue or palate.

Title: Փոխ
Definition_1: loan, borrowing; anthem, response, antistrophe, antiphon; — առ —, —ն ի —, by turns, reciprocally, alternatively, mutually; խնդրել —, to ask in loan; — տալ, to lend, to make a loan; — առնուլ, to receive as a loan, to borrow; ընդ —ս մտանել, to be overburdened by loans, to be obliged to beg; —ով կեալ, to live upon trust, or upon credit.

Title: Փոխաբաշխեմ
Definition_1: to retribute, to requite, to remunerate, to reward.

Title: Փոխաբերեմ
Definition_1: to transfer, to transport; to transpose; to translate, to change; to reward; to succeed.

Title: Փոխաբնակեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to translocate, to change residence or place.

Title: Փոխաբուսանիմ
Definition_1: to change nature, to be transformed.

Title: Փոխագործեմ
Definition_1: to execute the like, to make a copy.

Title: Փոխադարձ
Definition_3: — անկիւնք, alternate angles.

Title: Փոխադարձեմ
Definition_1: to recompense, to reward; to return like for like.

Title: Փոխադրեմ
Definition_1: to transpose, to transfer, to transport, to displace; to remove; to copy; to translate;
Definition_2: to depart from this world, to die.

Title: Փոխակերպեմ
Definition_1: to transform, to metamorphose, to transmute, to change.

Title: Փոխահատոյց գտանիմ
Definition_1: to repay a loan; to reward, to remunerate.

Title: Փոխայեղյեղեմ
Definition_1: to convert reciprocally, to the contrary.

Title: Փոխան
Definition_1: instead of, in the place of, for; cf. Փոխանորդ.

Title: Փոխանագիր
Definition_1: bill of exchange, bill, note, draft; փոխանցել զ—, to endorse a note or bill; cf. Ընդունելութիւն.

Title: Փոխանակ
Definition_1: instead of, in place of; in exchange or in return for, as a reward for; — նորա, in his place; — ընդ, instead of; — զի, whereas; for as much as, since, because; անձն քո — անձին նորա, your life shall be surety for his; ասել —ուրուք, to say in a person's name.

Title: Փոխանակ
Definition_1: substitute; lieutenant; vicar; successor; exchange, barter, compensation;
Definition_2: —աւ, by turns, alternatively, reciprocally, mutually; — արքայի, vice-roy; — բդեշխի, vice-consul; proconsul; — հանդերձից, change of clothes, changes of raiment; արարի — քո զեգիպտոս, have given Egypt as your ransom.

Title: Փոխանակաբանեմ
Definition_1: to answer, to contradict, to gainsay.

Title: Փոխանակեմ
Definition_1: to exchange, to make an exchange, to barter; to substitute for, to fill the place of; to succeed; to permute, to alternate; to compensate, to counterbalance; — զտեղի, to take the place of, to substitute for; — զանձն ի վերայ ճշմարտութեան, to give oneself for the truth; — զոք ի վերայ ապահովութեան հասարակաց, to sacrifice a person for the public safety; — զկեանս իւր ի վերայ ուրուք, to hazard one's life in defence of a person; զմահ ընդ կենաց — քան, t o die rather than yield.

Title: Փոխանակութիւն
Definition_1: change, exchange, barter, counter-change; supplying the place, substitution; succession, permutation; turn, vicissitude; — բդեշխի, vice-consulship; proconsulship.

Title: Փոխանորդ
Definition_1: substitute, representative; vicegerent, vicar; successor; compensation, equivalent; — արքայի, vice-roy; — պատրիարքի, patriarch's vicar general; — բանալեաց, duplicate key; false key.

Title: Փոխանորդեմ
Definition_1: to substitute, to fill or take the place of, to succeed to; — զկեանս, to die.

Title: Փոխանորդութիւն
Definition_1: substitution, succession; vicarship, vicariate; permutation, exchange; compensation.

Title: Փոխանցեմ
Definition_2: to be converted, turned, changed or transformed; cf. Փոխանագիր.

Title: Փոխատրեմ
Definition_1: to restitute, to requite, to recompense; cf. Փոխադրեմ.

Title: Փոխատրութիւն
Definition_1: restitution, restoration, retribution, recompense; change, mutation; lending.

Title: Փոխարէն
Definition_1: recompense, compensation, retribution, remuneration, reward; return, requital, satisfaction, revenge;
Definition_2: in exchange or return for, instead of, for;
Definition_3: reciprocally; — վնասուն, amends, indemnity, reparation; — այցելութիւն, return visit; դարձ —րինի, condign recompense; առնել զդարձ —րինի, to give like for like; հատուցանել զ— վնասուն, to make up to, to indemnify for.

Title: Փոխարինեմ
Definition_1: to compensate, to return, to reward, to content, to satisfy, to acknowledge; to indemnity, to requite.

Title: Փոխարկեմ
Definition_1: to convert, to change, to turn, to transform.

Title: Փոխելաբանեմ
Definition_1: to talk nonsense, to rave, to dote.

Title: Փոխելապատճառ լինիմ
Definition_1: to adduce or allege pretexts, to make pretence of, to feign, to counterfeit.

Title: Փոխեմ
Definition_1: to change, to convert, to transform, to modify; to remove, to displace, to transfer, to transport; to succeed; to translate; — զհրամանս or զիրաւունս տեառն, to transgress God's commandments; — զհանդերձս, to change one's clothes; — զշապիկ, to shift one's shirt or shift; — զբնակութիւն, to shift one's quarters, to remove; — զկարծիս, to alter or change one's mind; — զպատիժ (ամոքել), to commute a punishment; — զաչս յերկինս, to raise the eyes to heaven; — ի հայ լեզու, to translate into Armenian; cf. Լեզու.

Title: Փոխընդեայք
Definition_1: food made of the flour of parched corn, as helva, etc.

Title: Փոխիմ
Definition_1: to change, to be changed or modified; to be transported, to leave, to remove; to go, to pass; — յաշխարհէ, — յաստեացս, to depart this life, to cease to live, to die; — ի կատաղութիւն, to break or fall into a fit of rage; — մտօք ի, to transport oneself in thought to.

Title: Փոխինդ
Definition_1: flour of parched corn; hasty-pudding made of butter and honey.

Title: Փոխումն
Definition_1: change, mutation; — յաշխարհէ, passing from this world to the next, exit, decease, death; — Ս. Կուսի, Assumption.

Title: Փոկ
Definition_1: thong, leather thong, strap, girth; leather whip; — գօտի, leather belt;
Definition_3: phoca, seal, sea-calf.

Title: Փոկաձեւութիւն
Definition_1: art or calling of a cordwainer, saddler or harness-maker.

Title: Փող
Definition_2: apostle; tube, pipe; conduit, canal; reed; asper, mite, sou, halfpenny; money; — ականջաց, ear-trumpet; ձայնատար —, speaking-trumpet; հնչիւն —ոյ, blast of trumpet; ի ձայն —ոյ, by sound of trumpet; — հարկանել, հնչեցուցանել, to trumpet, to sound the trumpet, to wind or blow the horn, to play on the horn; — երգեհոնի, organ-pipe; — ծխաքարշի, shank of a tobacco-pipe; — գրչի, barrel; — հրազինուց, gun-barrel; — կապարեայ, lead-pipe, conduit-pipe; cf. Խողովակ; cf. Եղէգն;
Definition_3: հովուի —, water-plantain, alisma.

Title: Փող
Definition_1: throat; neck; street; corridor, lobby, passage, gallery; — սրուակի, neck or gullet of a bottle; ունել զոք զ—ից, to seize or take one by the throat, to arrest.

Title: Փողակարդաց
Definition_1: warning by sound of trumpet; cf. Փողահար.

Title: Փողանշան
Definition_1: trumpet-signal; —ս հարկանել, to signal with the trumpet.

Title: Փողացաւ
Definition_1: angina, quinsy, mumps, the croup, diphtheria;
Definition_2: attended with angina, having a quinsy.

Title: Փողեմ
Definition_1: to trumpet, to announce with the trumpet, to sound the horn, to intimate or warn by sound of a trumpet; to cause to march on to the sound of the trumpet;

Title: Փողերանոց
Definition_1: the Mint; ոստիկան ի, Master of the Mint.

Title: Փողոտեմ
Definition_1: to cut the throat, to behead, to slaughter, to kill; — զմիմեանս, to cut each other's throats.

Title: Փողոց
Definition_1: street; մանր —, narrow-street, alley; —ք վաճառաց, mercery, mercer's shops; —ք գնացից ջրոյ, water-pipe, water-conduit; ի —ի, in the open street; — տալ, կտրել, կազմել, թողուլ, to open a way, to fray a way, to cut a road through the enemy.

Title: Փողրակ
Definition_1: cf. Ագուգայ; pipe; — շնչողական, suction-pipe; — փախստի, blast-pipe, eduction-pipe.

Title: Փողփողեալ
Definition_1: woven, furnished with fringes or trimmings, fringed.

Title: Փողփողիմ
Definition_1: to play in the light, to shine, to glitter, to sparkle, to gleam, to sheen, to blaze, to twinkle, to scintillate, to coruscate; to trim, to adorn with fringes; to cause to shine, to emit rays.

Title: Փոյթ
Definition_1: care, solicitude, study, attention, entreaty; diligence, promptitude, activity, celerity, hast, hurry;
Definition_2: active, diligent, careful, prompt, vigilant, assiduous; — պնդութեան, eagerness, assiduity, interest, care;
Definition_3:
—, ընդ —, — ընդ —, — —, — ի փութոյ, diligently, soon, promptly, hastily; փութոյ պնդութեամբ, eagerly, carefully, earnestly, ardently, passionately; — առնել, ունել, դնել, — ի մէջ առնուլ, — յանձին ունել, to be or zealous about, to apply oneself with diligence to, to take to heart, to be warm about, to endeavour or strive to; — տանել, to take care of, to care, to solicit, to watch; — ի մէջ առեալ, seriously, earnestly; մեզ չէ —, that is no matter to us, what is that to us ?
; չէ —, չէ ինչ —, no matter, never mind, it is nothing; ոչ զի զաղքատաց ինչ — էր նմա, not that he cared for the poor; — մեծ էր նորա այսմ, he took great care of that; ոչ — ինչ առնեմ, I don't c are, it is no matter to me; ամենայն — նոցա, all their care, effort or thought; զի՞ — է, what does that matter ? what does it signify ? what of that ?
զի՞ — է քեզ, what is that to you ? what does it matter to you ?
զի՞ — է ինձ, what does it concern me ? what does it matter to me ? nonsense !
— ինչ չառնէր, he did not take it into account, he took no heed of it; չէ — ինձ, it is no matter to me, it is all the same to me, I don't care about it, I am indifferent about it; չառնեն ինչ — զիմեքէ, they care for nothing; վաղ ընդ փոյթ, cf. Վաղ.

Title: Փոշահող
Definition_1: the soil of which is as the sand of the desert.

Title: Փոշեխառն
Definition_1: covered with or full of dust, dusty.

Title: Փոշետեսակ
Definition_1: like dust, powdery; very small, thin, light.

Title: Փոշի
Definition_1: dust; — or — հրացան, gun-powder, powder; — կաղնւոյ, tan, oak-bark; — շաքարի, powder-sugar; — իւղեփեցաց, sweet-powder; — հերաց, hair-powder; տուփ փոշւոյ հերաց, powder-box; ամպ փոշւոյ, a cloud or whirlwind of dust; դնել ինչ ի —, ի — դարձուցանել, to powder, to grind to dust, to reduce to powder, to pulverize; լնուլ փոշւով, to cover or sprinkle with dust; ի — դառնալ, to be reduced to powder, to be pulverized; to crumble into dust, to moulder away; — յարուցանել, to raise a dust; ընդ — թաւալիլ, to roll in the dust; թօթափել զ—, to dust, to beat the dust out of, to shake off the dust, to free from dust; — դէզադէզ ամբառնայր յամպս հասանէր, a thick cloud of dust rose up to the skies; — ամպաձեւ մրրկեալ դիզացեալ ծածկէ զերկին, a cloud of dust arose and obscured the heavens; cf. Մանրամաղ; cf. Վառօդ; cf. Ջաղացք.

Title: Փոշոտիմ
Definition_1: to be covered with, or full of dust.

Title: Փոշտանկ
Definition_1: scrotocele; — մսեղէն, sarcocele; — or փոշտանկաւոր, cf. Փոշտանկաւոր.

Title: Փոս
Definition_1: ditch, pit, foss; trench, hollow; grave; — or — հատանել, գործել, փորել, to dig a ditch, to ditch, to trench; — հատանել քաղաքին, to intrench, to circumvallate.

Title: Փոստ
Definition_1: measure, th part of a pot.

Title: Փոր
Definition_1: belly, abdomen, paunch; womb, bowels, entrails; concavity, cavity, hollow; side, part;
Definition_2: hollow, empty, void; — անօթոց, capacity of vases;
Definition_3: — նաւի, keel, ship's bottom, careen; — սեխի, seed-pulp of melon.

Title: Փորագրեմ
Definition_1: to engrave, to grave; — ժանտաջրով, to etch.

Title: Փորագրող
Definition_1: engraver; — ի փայտի, wood engraver; — ժանտաջրով, etcher.

Title: Փորագրութիւն
Definition_1: engraving; — լուսագրական, heliographic engraving; պողպատային —, steel engraving; փայտեղէն —, wood engraving, wood-cut; — ժանտաջրային, etching; վաճառական փորագրութեանց, print-seller.

Title: Փորամոլ
Definition_1: indiscreet, light of tongue, tattling, babbling.

Title: Փորացաւութիւն
Definition_1: belly-ache, pain in the bowels; colick, gripes.

Title: Փորեմ
Definition_1: to dig, to hollow, to ditch, to excavate, to hollow out; to sap, to undermine; to engrave, to notch, to jag; — զաչս, to tear out the eyes.

Title: Փորձ
Definition_1: trial, test, proof, attempt; specimen, sample; experience, proof; endeavour, undertaking, enterprise, expedient; trial, adversity, misfortune; temptation; probation;
Definition_2: experienced, expert, practised; approved, tried, pure;
Definition_3: ի —ոյ, by or from experience; խիստ — ,a hard trial; բազմամեայ —, experience; բնագիտական —, physical experiment; —ով ուսեալ, taught by experience; լինել —, to be experienced, versed, exercised; զ— առնու րձել, ի — մտանել, to experience, to make an experiment of, to attempt, to make attempts, to try, to assay, to prove, to experiment; ի — արկանել, to put to the trial or test, to torture; — փորձել վերստին, to renew an attempt, to make a new effort; ի վերջին — մատուցանել զիմն, to put to the final proof; ի մահու — գալ, to prove death, voluntarily to encounter death; հայաստան նախ զ— առ զօրութեան նորա, Armenia was the first to feel his strength; ընդ նոր — հանդ իսի էանց նա, he was put to a new trial; մատեաւ եւ յարդարսն — մահու, even the righteous were in mortal danger; գիտելով զ— առն, well knowing what a man he is; զգանից զ— առ, he was beaten; — է, he is experienced, he has much practice; — արծաթոյ եւ ոսկւոյ ի բովս, gold and silver are tried in the furnace; cf. Զէն.

Title: Փորձանք
Definition_1: temptation; evil, tribulation, misfortune, disaster, mischance; cf. Փորձան.

Title: Փորձեմ
Definition_1: to attempt, to try, to experiment, to make an experiment of; to prove, to assay, to put to the test; to tempt, to sound, to try; to tempt, to allure, to entice.

Title: Փորձիմ
Definition_1: to be tried, tempted; to try, to endeavour, to seek; to be purified, refined.

Title: Փորձութիւն
Definition_1: temptation; misfortune, calamity; — ունել, to be tempted to; ի — արկանել, տանել, to lead into temptation; յաղթել փորձութեան, to resist temptation; յաղթիլ, ընկճիլ ի փորձութենէ, to succumb to temptation.

Title: Փորոտիք
Definition_1: entrails, intestines, bowels, guts; pith, heart, kernel.

Title: Փորուած
Definition_1: hollow, cavity, excavation; notch, score, hole; — խելաց, the ventricles or cavity of the brain.

Title: Փութ
Definition_1: hastily, soon; — — առնել, to rend, to tear in pieces.

Title: Փութաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak too fast, and too indistinctly.

Title: Փութամ
Definition_1:
to make haste, to hasten, to be quick, eager, to hurry; to strive, to endeavour; to be diligent, to apply oneself to; չ-, to be slow, not to hurry, to take one's time; փութալով առնել զիմն; to do anything in a hurry; փութա՛, quick! make haste!
փութա՛ էջ այտի, come down quickly!
յայն միայն փութայր, he dreamed of nothing else than; յայն առաւել փութամ զի, my chief desire is to; եւ զիա՛րդ փութամ մինչեւ կատարեսցի, and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !.

Title: Փութապէս
Definition_1: in haste, hastily, diligently, promptly, rapidly, quickly, soon.

Title: Փութացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make haste, to hasten, to urge, to solicit, to accelerate, to dispatch, to expedite.

Title: Փութկոտ
Definition_1: very diligent, active, quick, speedy, prompt.

Title: Փուլ
Definition_2: wane; —ք, ruins, rubbish; ի — ածել, to ruin, to destroy, to crumble; ի — գալ, to go to ruin; լուսին ի — է, the moon is waning.

Title: Փունջ
Definition_1: root or stalk; bunch, nosegay, bouquet; — հրեղէն, bouquet, girandole, crowning-piece; —ս յօրինել, to make a nosegay.

Title: Փուշ
Definition_3: an Armenian note; — ձկան, bone, fish-bone; — պսակ, crown of thorns.

Title: Փուռն
Definition_1: oven; bake-house; kiln; ծակ փռան, kiln-hole; — հացագործի, baking-oven; — խորովածոյ, Dutch oven; — հասարակաց, common, parish oven; — խոհակերոցի, kitchen-range; — խնայողական, economical stove, soup-kitchen; — կղմինտրի, brick-kiln; — կրելի, portable oven; portable air furnace; ի — or փռան, in the oven; ջեռուցանել զ—, to heat the oven, to charge, to fill; արկանել ի —ն, to put in the oven; cf. Թի.

Title: Փուտ
Definition_2: rottenness, corruption, putrefaction; — ատամանց, caries, cariosity; cf. Ատամն.

Title: Փուրծ
Definition_1: broken piece, bit, chip, splinter, fragment; — կտաւոյ, shearings or flue of linen or cloth, stuff, hards.

Title: Փուք
Definition_1: breath, wind; intestinal gas, fart, wind, flatulency, windiness; swelling, puffiness;
Definition_2: turgidness, bombast; — հպարտութեան, gust or fit of pride; անձայն —, noiseless fart, fizzle, foist; —ս արձակել, հանել —ս, to fart, to let a fart, to break wind; (անձայն) to fizzle, to foist; — արձակող, farter; fizzler, foister.

Title: Փուքք
Definition_3: bag-pipe;
Definition_4: follicle, seed vessel; — ձեռաց, snapper bellows; պարզ —, single bellows; — դարբնաց, smith's or forge bellows; — երգեհոնի, organ-bellows; — կրկին հողմով, double bellows.

Title: Փոփոգեմ
Definition_1: to palliate, to relieve, to lighten.

Title: Փոփոխական
Definition_1: changeable, variable, changing, mutable, varying, inconstant; restless, unsettled, unsteady; transmutable, alterable.

Title: Փոփոխամիտ
Definition_1: fickle-minded, fickle, unsteady, unsteadfast, inconstant, volatile.

Title: Փոփոխեմ
Definition_1: to change, to alter, to turn, to convert, to vary, to modify, to permute, to transform, to transmute.

Title: Փոփոխումն
Definition_1: change, mutation, alteration, variation, conversion, permutation, transformation, transmutation; change, vicissitude, turn; commutation; season.

Title: Փոքր
Definition_1: little, small; few; inconsiderable, trifling; minor; — ինչ, — մի, somewhat, a little; փոքու իմն, in few; almost; յետ փոքու, զկնի փոքու ինչ, յետ — ինչ, shortly after, in a short time, shortly; ի փոքուստ, from small matters; ի փոքուն, in small things; ի փոքուստ or փոքրուստ, in infancy, yet young; — —, առ — —, ըստ փոքու փոքու, առ ի — —, by little and little, little by little, by degrees, insensibly; — մի յառաջ, shortly before; — մի եւս՝ եւ, — միւս եւս, — ինչ՝ եւ, little was wanting, there was little wanting to, almost, nearly; — միւս եւս եւ անկանէի, I was very near falling in; — մի եւս սասանեալ էին ոտք իմ, my feet were near sliding; — ինչ համարել, վարկանիլ, — իմն թուիլ յաչս, to hold as trifles, to consider as insignificant; ի փոքունս յարեալ հայիլ, to stand upon trifles, to lay much stress upon things of no importance.

Title: Փոքրեմ
Definition_1: to shave; to trim, to cut the hair; — զհերս իւր, to cut one's hair, to have the hair cut.

Title: Փոքրիկ
Definition_1: very little, quite small, tiny, wee, slender, scanty, petty, slight; minor.

Title: Փոքրկանամ
Definition_1: to grow less or shorter, to shorten, to become smaller, to be lessened, diminished, to decrease.

Title: Փոքրկացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render less, to make smaller, to shorten, to lessen, to decrease, to diminish; to extenuate.

Title: Փոքրկութիւն
Definition_1: littleness, smallness, tenuity, diminution, decrease, lessening; extenuation.

Title: Փոքրոգի
Definition_1: pusillanimous; shortwitted, shallow, weak-minded; light, easy; բեռն —, light burden; — առնել, to lighten, to lessen, to ease.

Title: Փոքրոգութիւն
Definition_1: lightness, slenderness; pusillanimity; low-mindedness, baseness, cowardliness.

Title: Փչեմ
Definition_1: to blow, to breathe; to swell, to inflate; to expire; to die; cf. Հոգի, cf. Ոգի; հողմն փչէ, the wind blows.

Title: Փռանկ
Definition_1: frank, French; European; ազգն —աց, the Franks (German tribe who conquered France).

Title: Փռընքտամ
Definition_1: to boast, to become haughty, insolent, to fume, to puff, to chafe.

Title: Փռնչեմ
Definition_1: to sneeze; to cry, to bellow; to neigh.

Title: *Փռոց
Definition_1: cloth, table-cloth; — սեղանոյ, altar-cloth; սփռել զ—, արկանել —, to lay the cloth; բառնալ զ—, to remove the cloth.

Title: Փսիաթեայ
Definition_1: made of mat; woven with rushes.

Title: Փսխած
Definition_1: vomit; շուն դառնայ ի — իւր, the dog returns to his vomit.

Title: Փսխեմ
Definition_1: to vomit, to cast or throw up, to puke, to spew.

Title: Փստածաղիկ
Definition_1: pronounced on the top of tongue.

Title: Փտեմ
Definition_1: to rot, to let rot, to corrupt, to render putrid, to putrefy, to spoil; — or փտիմ, cf. Փտիմ.

Title: Փտիմ
Definition_1: to rot, to become or get rotten, to be corrupted, spoiled; փտեալ ատամն, carious tooth.

Title: Փտղեմ
Definition_1: to pinch, to test the ripeness of fruit.

Title: Փտութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Փուտ; — ոսկերաց, caries, cariosity; — տնկոց, brown rust, cariosity.

Title: Փրթանիմ
Definition_1: to be detached, broken, to break off, to come off.

Title: Փրթուած
Definition_1: detached or broken part, bit, fragment.

Title: Փրթուցանեմ
Definition_1: to detach, to separate, to take away; — զմածուցեալն, to unglue, to unsolder; — զնետն, to let fly an arrow; — զբեւեռեալն, to unnail, to unhook; — զշղթայն, to unchain, to unfetter, to unshackle.

Title: Փրծանիմ
Definition_1: to be detached, taken away, to escape, to break away, to shake off, to get rid of; cf. Յիշատակ.

Title: Փրծուցանեմ
Definition_1: to detach, to save, to deliver, to free, to set free.

Title: Փրկանակ
Definition_1: offering oneself as ransom for others.

Title: Փրկանաւորեմ
Definition_1: to deliver or save by means of ransom, to redeem; cf. Նամակ.

Title: Փրկանք
Definition_1: ransom, price of redemption; ransoming; redeeming, deliverance; — նամակի, prepayment, postage.

Title: Փրկեմ
Definition_1: to save, to deliver, to liberate, to redeem.

Title: Փրկիչ
Definition_1: Saviour, Redeemer, saver, liberator; թուական or թուականութիւն փրկչին, christian era.

Title: Փրկութիւն
Definition_1: salvation; liberation, recovery, deliverance, redemption; ransom; — or —ք, փրկութեանցն, զոհ փրկութեան, victim, peace-offering.

Title: Փրփուր
Definition_1: froth, foam, scum; slaver, drivel; — օճառի, soap-lather; — ի վեր բերել, to froth, to foam; ի բաց առնուլ or բառնալ զ—ն, to skim, to scum, to despumate.

Title: Փրփրադէզ
Definition_1: covered with foam or froth, frothy, foaming; — ալիք, foaming billows.

Title: Փրփրանամ
Definition_1: to foam, to froth, to spume, to mantle; to slaver; — օճառի, to lather.

Title: Փրփրեմ
Definition_1: to cause to froth, to cover with foam;
Definition_2: cf. Փրփրամ; — առ կատաղութեան, to foam with rage, to fume with anger.

Title: Փրփրերախ
Definition_1: foaming-mouthed, slobbering, slavering, drivelling; — երիվար, foaming courser or steed.

Title: Փրքամ
Definition_1: to spout or blow water from the nostrils.

Title: Փքանամ
Definition_2: to be puffed up, elated, to grow proud, to be swollen with pride, to take a pride in one's successes, to be bloated with pride and presumption.

Title: Փքացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to bloat, to swell, to inflate;
Definition_2: to puff up, to swell, to elate.

Title: Փքին
Definition_1: shaft, arrow, dart, javelin; ի քէն եւ անդր է —ն, the arrows are beyond thee.

Title: Փքոցուռոյց
Definition_1: swollen, bloated, inflated, puffy, turgid, high-flown, fustian, bombastic, emphatic.

Title: <letter>Ք</letter> (ké)
Definition_1: the thirty sixth letter of the alphabet, and the thirtieth of the consonants; nine thousand, nine thousandth.

Title: Քակեմ
Definition_1: to undo, to unmake, to untie, to loosen, to unbind, to detach, to disjoin, to disunite, to dissolve, to resolve; to destroy, to demolish, to beat down, to take to pieces, to take asunder, to dismount; — զկարեալն, to unsew, to unstitch, to rip up; — զհիւսեալն, to unweave, to unravel; — զբեռինս, to unpack; — զբարձս, to dislocate, to put out of joint, to disjoint; — զազդերս, to make hip-shot, to dislocate one's thighs; — զոք յաթոռոց, to depose from the throne; — զբարեկամս, to part, to separate, to sever; զկնի քակելոյ տօնիցն, the holidays being finished.

Title: Քակոր
Definition_1: animal excrement, ordure; — արջառոյ, cow-dung, manure.

Title: Քակտեմ
Definition_1: totally, to decompose, to destroy; to dissolve; to divide, to separate; քակտիմ — ի փառաց, to lose one's renown.

Title: Քակտումն
Definition_1: dissolution, decomposition, separation, rupture, destruction, total ruin.

Title: Քահանայանամ
Definition_1: to take orders, to become or to be ordained priest; to perform the duties of priest.

Title: Քահանայապետ
Definition_1: priest, chief priest; pontiff; hierarchy; —ն, հռովմայ, sovereign pontiff.

Title: Քահանայապետեմ
Definition_1: to be or become high priest or pontiff; to perform the duties of pontiff.

Title: Քահանայապետութիւն
Definition_1: dignity of a high priest, pontificate; hierarchy.

Title: Քահանայարան
Definition_1: temple, church, holy place; priest's residence.

Title: Քաղածու
Definition_3: collected, compiled.

Title: Քաղահան
Definition_2: — առնել, to weed, to hoe, to pluck up weeds;
Definition_3: to scan, to sift, to pick out, to select, to choose; — հեղձոյց լինիմ, to be choked by weeds.

Title: *Քաղան
Definition_1: log of wood, beam of timber.

Title: Քաղաք
Definition_1: town, city; cf. Թագաւորեալ; ի —ս, ընդ —աց —աց, —ի —ի, in every city or town, every where; —է ի-, from one town to another; մարտաքս քան զ—ն, out of town; բնակիչք —ի, towns-people, towns-folk; վիճակ, սահման —ի, township.

Title: Քաղաքաբնակ
Definition_1: townsman, inhabitant of a town, citizen, cit, burgess; — լինել, live in a town.

Title: Քաղաքագեղ
Definition_1: small town, village; market town, borough.

Title: Քաղաքաժողով
Definition_2: public meeting; popular assembly; — ընկերութիւն, society.

Title: Քաղաքական
Definition_1: civil, political, civic; citizen, cf. Քաղաքավար;

Title: Քաղաքամարտութիւն
Definition_1: civil war; war between city and city.

Title: Քաղաքամէջ
Definition_1: the centre or chief square of a city.

Title: Քաղաքանամ
Definition_1: to become a town; to be peopled like a town.

Title: Քաղաքապետ
Definition_1: governor or a town; chief magistrate or mayor of a town.

Title: Քաղաքավարիմ
Definition_1: to behave well, to conduct oneself honestly; to rule with wisdom.

Title: Քաղաքավարութիւն
Definition_1: behaviour; policy; police; good breeding, civility, urbanity, courtesy, politeness, affability; — կենաց, personal conduct; անսագիւտ —, unimpeachable morality or integrity; ծայրացեալ —, deep policy.

Title: Քաղաքորմ
Definition_1: wall of a town, fortification, rampart; interval between two lines of defence.

Title: Քաղդեայ
Definition_1: Chaldean; caster of nativities; astrologer, soothsayer.

Title: Քաղեմ
Definition_1: to gather, to gather together, to collect, to assemble, to amass; to draw, to extract; to pick, to pluck up, to take away; — զոգիս, զշունչ ուրուք, to keep in suspense, to amuse, to keep at bay; — բանս ի բերանոյ ուրուք, to catch something out of one's mouth;
Definition_2: to get, to obtain his secret surreptitiously; սկսաւ ոգի նորա քաղիլ ի նմանէ, he began to faint away; լոյս իմ քաղի, my life is consuming; cf. Ընկոյզ.

Title: Քաղհանեմ
Definition_1: cf. Քաղ հանեմ; — ձեռօք, to handweed.

Title: Քաղոց
Definition_1: the fifth month of the ancient Armenian calendar.

Title: Քաղց
Definition_2: hungry; — դժնդակ, ուժգին, անհնարին, violent, canine, ravenous, appetite, or hunger; յուղել զ—, to excite, sharpen or quicken the appetite; —իւ հարկանիլ, to be hunger-beaten, to be or feel hungry; մեռանել առ —ոյն, to starve, to die of starvation; հարկանել զ—, to stay or satiate hunger.

Title: Քաղցեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause hunger, to famish, to starve.

Title: Քաղցկեղ
Definition_1: cancer, gangrene, mortification, impetigo, moist tetter.

Title: Քաղցնում
Definition_1: to feel hungry, to by hungry, famished;
Definition_2: to hunger after, to thirst for, to by greedy of, thirsty or eager for.

Title: Քաղցու
Definition_2: full of or drunk with new wine.

Title: Քաղցր
Definition_1: sweet, delicious; mild, pleasant, agreeable, charming, amiable, affable, dear, be loved;
Definition_3: — or —ցունս, sweetly, softy, gently, pleasantly, nicely; — հայեցուածք, mild, looking; — բնաւորութիւն, good temperedness; — բարք, gentle manners; — յիշատակ, pleasing remembrance; — է տեսանել, it is pleasant to see; — է նեաց, it is a pleasure for them to; — է ինձ, I should like; — էր մեզ տեսանել, we saw with pleasure.

Title: Քաղցրաբանութիւն
Definition_1: sweet tongue, kind things, honeyed, fine or soft words, flattering discourse, flattery, wheedling, blarney.

Title: Քաղցրալուր
Definition_1: agreeable, sweet to the ear, gentle, docile, submissive.

Title: Քաղցրախառն
Definition_1: mixed with sweetness, sweet; mild, soft, temperate; — բանք, honeyed words.

Title: Քաղցրախորժ
Definition_1: agreeable to the taste, sweet to the palate.

Title: Քաղցրախօսիկ
Definition_1: speaking or singing sweetly, sweet, harmonious, tuneful; cf. Քաղցրաբան.

Title: Քաղցրահամբոյր
Definition_1: sweet, demure, affable, obliging, complaisant, kind.

Title: Քաղցրաձայն
Definition_1: sweet voiced, melodious, tuneful, musical; — բարբառով, melodiously.

Title: Քաղցրաձայնութիւն
Definition_1: sweet-voice. melody, harmony, euphony, music; քաղցրաձայնութեամբ իւրով, by his harmonious voice.

Title: Քաղցրանամ
Definition_1: to become or grow sweet, mild;

Title: Քաղցրանուագ
Definition_1: causing harmonious chants to be heart.

Title: Քաղցրասնոյց
Definition_1: brought up tenderly, in delicacy, delicate.

Title: Քաղցրատուր
Definition_1: given with gentleness, by fair means.

Title: Քաղցրացուցանեմ
Definition_3: to soften, to temper, to calm, to allay.

Title: Քաղցրութիւն
Definition_1: sweetness, suavity; saviour; softening; gentleness; affability, meekness, amiability, benignity, amenity, urbanity; քաղցրութեամբ, sweetly, softly, gently, mildly; քաղցրութեամբ օձն ի ծակէն ելանէ, a smooth tongue draws (gentleness is better than force).

Title: Քաղցրուսոյց
Definition_1: teaching with gentleness; pleasant to learn.

Title: Քամահեմ
Definition_1: to despise, to scorn, to disdain, to slight, to set, at nought, to take no heed of, to take no account of.

Title: Քամեմ
Definition_1: to press, to squeeze, to extract, to wring; to strain, to filter; to drain, to cause to flow;
Definition_2: to exhaust, to drain, to use up, to empty; — զբաժակ, to swallow up, to drain, the cup; — զբաժակ մինչեւ ցմրուր, to drink the cup to the dregs, to swallow the pill; — զամենայն մրուրս դառնութեան, բաղդին, to drain or exhaust the rigours of fate; յինքն —, to suck, to imbibe, to draw in; արտասուք յաչաց նորա քամէին, he wept bitterly; հողմով —, to winnow.

Title: Քայլ
Definition_1: pace, step, stride; — մի ոտին, a foot of earth;
Definition_2: — առ —, — —, step by step; ընդ — —, at each step; հազար —, mile; առնուլ զառաջին —, to take the first step, to break the ice; —ս փոխել, to step, to walk; եւ — առ —յուշիկ ընթաց՝ վարեալ տանի քաջ անդր ի բաց, fair and softly goes far in a day.

Title: Քայլափոխ
Definition_1: motion of the feet, step, pace, walk, gait.

Title: Քայլեմ
Definition_1: to step, to take a step, to walk, to stride, to go.

Title: Քայքայեմ
Definition_1: to dissolve, to undo, to destroy, to take to pieces; to disperse, to break up; — զմիտս, to dissipate, to distract; — զխաւար, to chase the darkness.

Title: Քայքայիմ
Definition_1: to be dissolved, destroyed; to be dispersed, spread over; — յոք, to be violently fond of.

Title: Քայքայումն
Definition_1: dissolution, destruction, division, separation; looseness; — մտաց, dissipation.

Title: Քան
Definition_1: more than, more, under, beneath, over; as, as well as, as much as; or;
Definition_2: —եթէ, —թէ, that; more, than; անդր —, further, beyond; ոչ ոք — զնա, no one but he; առաւել -զե րեսուն եւ հինգ ամք են իմ, I am more than thirty five years old; զքեզ ըն տրեաց -զազգս ամենայն, he chosed thee before all the nations; պատրաստ եմք մեռանել —անցանել ընդ օրէնս հայրենիս, we are ready to die, rather than violate our country's laws; հասաւ — զամենայն սուր, much keener than any other sword; ո՛րքան քաղաղութիւն է ի տունս շինականաց — ի տունս թագաւորաց, when will peace reign alike in the cottage and in the palace !.

Title: Քանակեմ
Definition_1: to assign the quantity; to measure; to contain, to comprehend.

Title: Քանդակ
Definition_1: carving, sculpture, chiselling, chasing; notch; cameo; բարձր —ակ, relief, relievo, embossment.

Title: Քանդակագործ
Definition_1: sculpture; chiselling; sculptured or chased object; sculptor, carver; chaser;

Title: Քանդակեմ
Definition_1: to sculpture, to carve, to chisel; to notch, to cut.

Title: Քանդեմ
Definition_1: to demolish, to destroy, to beat, to knock or pull down, to subvert, to overturn, to ruin, to dismantle, to rase; to ravage, to devastate, to desolate; cf. Քանդակեմ.

Title: Քանդուկ
Definition_1: jar, large earthen vessel to contain corn.

Title: Քանզի
Definition_1: for, because, since, considering that, whereas, inasmuch as, though; քանի —նոյ or նւոյ նիք նեաց, how! how much!
Definition_3:
quantity; — անգամ՞, how many times?
— առաւել, —եւս, how much more! with still more reason; — ամաց է՞, how old is he?
— ժամանակք են, how long is it?
— մարտ պատե րազմի մղեցաք ! how often have we fought !
ն — աւուրս, in how many days?
ո —, ի —սն ամսոյն, on what day of the mouth ?
— ինչ պարտիս՞, how much do you owe?
— գնոյ or քանո՞յ վաճա ռեցեր, how much did you sell it for ? at what price did you sell it ?
քանո՞յ գնեցեր, how much did you give for it ? at what price did you buy it ?
— մի, some; աւուրս — մի, some days; քանի՛ քանի, how ! how much ! how often ! how many times !
քանի գեղեց կացար եւ քանի քաղցրացար, how fair and how pleasant art thou !
—գեղեցիկ, է առաքինութիւն ! how lovely is virtue !
ոʼհ, — վեհ է հայրենասիրութիւն ! how sublime is patriotism!.

Title: Քանի օրինակ
Definition_1: in how many manners or ways?.

Title: Քանի՞ցս անգամ
Definition_1:
how many times ?
քանիցս անգամ, every time that.

Title: Քանիօն
Definition_1: cf. Քանի; — ! — եւս! — առաւել՞, how much more! with still more reason.

Title: Քանցեմ
Definition_1: to lacerate, to tear in pieces, to rend asunder; to separate, to detach, to divide; — զոսկերս, to bone.

Title: Քանքարազերծեմ
Definition_1: to take away, to snatch away, to rob, to despoil.

Title: Քանքարաւոր
Definition_1: having talents; of the weight, or value of a talent;
Definition_2: cf. Սնակուշտ; ի — բերել, to cause the coupling of animals; cf. Քարշ;
Definition_3: cf. Պատիւ; false religion, sect;
Definition_4: cf. Փուշ.

Title: Քաջ
Definition_1: brave, gallant, valiant, courageous, intrepid, valorous, manful, stout, bold, daring; good, honest, worthy; clever, excelling in, of good abilities, fit for; noble, distinguished, eminent;
Definition_3:
good, well, right, suitably, very, much, very much; — արանց, emperor, Caesar, Augustus; — ի բաց, very far; very, much, much more; կարի —, կարի իսկ —, very well, as well as can be; — է, that will do, that is settled; well, very well !
— լեր ! courage ! be of good cheer ! cf. Կարի; cf. Վաղ.

Title: Քաջաբանիկ
Definition_1: well-spoken, abounding in words, eloquent, fluent.

Title: Քաջաբարութիւն
Definition_1: probity, integrity, honesty; fortune, good fortune.

Title: Քաջաբոյս
Definition_1: well sprouted, flourishing; good-tempered; well affected.

Title: Քաջաբուսութիւն
Definition_2: good temper or nature; happy disposition.

Title: Քաջագօտի
Definition_1: having the clothes well tucked up, or well girdled round the body, agile, brisk, active, alert, lithe.

Title: Քաջադիպութիւն
Definition_1: opportunity; քաջադիպութեամբ, opportunely, at the proper time.

Title: Քաջազեկ
Definition_1: well warned, very clear, plain, evident;

Title: Քաջազէն
Definition_1: well armed; այր —, man at arms.

Title: Քաջազուարճ
Definition_1: flourishing, full-blown; cheerful, brisk, joyous, merry-looking.

Title: Քաջաթուխ
Definition_1: very dark, as black as ebony; — հերք, raven locks.

Title: Քաջալաւ
Definition_1: very good, excellent, honest, upright; — այր, honest man.

Title: Քաջալեր
Definition_1: encouraging, inspiriting; — լինել, —ս մատուցանել, տալ, to rouse the courage, to give heart to, to inspirit; cf. Քաջալերեմ; —ս առնուլ, to pluck up courage, to take heart, to cheer up.

Title: Քաջալերեմ
Definition_1: to encourage, to give courage, to animate, to reanimate, to invigorate, to incite, to embolden, to cheer up.

Title: Քաջալերիմ
Definition_1: to take courage, to be inspirited; —լերեա՛ց, courage ! be courageous, take heart, don't be disheartened, cheer up !.

Title: Քաջախոր հուրդ
Definition_1: giving or suggesting good counsel, wise.

Title: Քաջածաղիկ
Definition_1: well blossomed, adorned or ornamented with pretty flowers, full-blown, flourishing.

Title: Քաջածերութիւն
Definition_1: a prosperous or happy old age.

Title: Քաջածնութիւն
Definition_1: the having many children; fecundity, fruitfulness.

Title: Քաջածնունդ
Definition_1: having many children, prolific, fecund; fruitful, rich, fertile.

Title: Քաջակազմութիւն
Definition_1: good furniture; strong or iron constitution.

Title: Քաջակիրթ
Definition_1: well disciplined, educated, instructed, versed or exercised.

Title: Քաջակորով
Definition_1: very robust, vigorous, valorous; cf. Քաջաձիգ.

Title: Քաջակուռ
Definition_1: very solid, well beaten or hammered.

Title: Քաջահանճար
Definition_1: very talented, full of intelligence, witty.

Title: Քաջահմուտ
Definition_1: very erudite, well versed, skilful, very learned;
Definition_2: bachelor; — գիտունեանց, bachelor of sciences; — լինել իմիք, to be well acquainted with, to be a connoisseur in, to know thoroughly.

Title: Քաջահմտութիւն
Definition_1: vast erudition, great knowledge; — դպրութեանց, baccalaureate of sciences.

Title: Քաջահնար
Definition_1: very clever, ingenious, witty; — լինել, to task one's ingenuity, to set one's wits to, to exert or strain oneself.

Title: Քաջահոտ
Definition_1: sweet-smelling, pleasant, balmy, odoriferous; — լինել, to have an agreeable odour.

Title: Քաջաձայնութիւն
Definition_1: powerful or agreeable voice; euphony, harmony.

Title: Քաջաձի
Definition_1: wellhorsed, mounted on a good horse; skilful in horsemanship.

Title: Քաջաձիգ
Definition_1: hold in well, dexterous, clever; well-bent.

Title: Քաջաղեղն
Definition_1: having a strong how; skilful in archery.

Title: Քաջամարմին
Definition_1: endowed with strength, vigorous, strong, robust.

Title: Քաջամիտ
Definition_1: sharp-witted, very intelligent, full of wit.

Title: Քաջայայտ
Definition_1: very clear, plain, very evident, obvious; — առնել, to throw light on, to clear up, to bring to light, to put in evidence; — լինել, to be as plain as day, to be quite evident.

Title: Քաջայանդուգն
Definition_1: very bold, most audacious or daring, hardy, dauntless;

Title: Քաջայարմար
Definition_1: very suitable, becoming, very fit or proper, apt, appropriate.

Title: Քաջայարմարութիւն
Definition_1: fitness, aptitude, right proportion; adaptability; harmony.

Title: Քաջայոյս
Definition_1: full of hope, well secured, in good hopes, full of faith or reliance.

Title: Քաջայօժար
Definition_1: well disposed, very willing, very diligent.

Title: Քաջանամ
Definition_1: to set forth one's value or worth, to make oneself known, to shew one's courage or energy, to exert one's abilities, to excel.

Title: Քաջանուն
Definition_1: highly renowned, far-famed, celebrated, very famous.

Title: Քաջապաճար
Definition_1: abounding in cattles, full of cattle.

Title: Քաջապինդ
Definition_1: very solid, fir, constant; strong, robust, vigorous;

Title: Քաջապնդութիւն
Definition_1: solidity, firmness; vigour, sustained effort, unflagging force.

Title: Քաջապտուղ
Definition_1: producing much or good fruits, abundant, fertile, fruitful.

Title: Քաջառնաբար
Definition_1: like a valiant man, gallantly, valiantly.

Title: Քաջառողջ
Definition_1: very healthy, of good constitution, sound of body, in perfect health; — լինել, to be well, to enjoy health.

Title: Քաջառողջութիւն
Definition_1: good health, soundness of body, plumpness.

Title: Քաջառոյգ
Definition_1: in the full vigour of youth, in the springtime of life, lively, brisk, vivacious, vigorous.

Title: Քաջասրտիմ
Definition_1: to take courage, to be animated.

Title: Քաջավայելուչ
Definition_1: very suitable, very decent; very elegant, handsome, charming.

Title: Քաջավարժ
Definition_1: well exercised, well instructed, expert, highly versed in;

Title: Քաջավարժութիւն
Definition_1: great exercise, great practice; licentiate's degree.

Title: Քաջատոհմիկ
Definition_1: high-born, of good birth, noble, illustrious.

Title: Քաջարի
Definition_1: very brave, valiant, gallant, valorous, courageous.

Title: Քաջարշաւ
Definition_1: light-footed, running swiftly; — լինել, to run fast, to gallop.

Title: Քաջարութիւն
Definition_1: act of courage or valour, great bravery, prowess.

Title: Քաջացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render courageous, brave, to inspire courage, to give heart, to reanimate, to revive.

Title: Քաջափայլ
Definition_1: very bright, brilliant, splendid, illustrious, superb.

Title: Քաջեփ
Definition_1: well cooked, well done, done to a turn; — առնել, to cook well.

Title: Քաջընտիր
Definition_1: choice, select, picked; — զօրք, choice troops, picked soldiers.

Title: Քաջիկ
Definition_1: well, very well, properly, as it ought to be.

Title: Քաջողկոյզ
Definition_1: well loaded with grapes; — գինի, generous wine.

Title: Քաջորդի
Definition_1: having virtuous or illustrious children; good, dutiful.

Title: Քաջութիւն
Definition_1: valour, courage, bravery, manhood, gallantry; stoutness, vigour, force; exploit, achievement, heroic acts; virtue, nobility, integrity; քաջութեամբ, bravely, manfully, stoutly, courageously, valiantly, valorously; ստոյգ —, true courage; — ցուցանել, to display courage; — առնուլ, to take heart, to cheer up.

Title: Քաջուշեղ
Definition_1: very intelligent, full of wit, ingenious; — է մանուկդ, there's good stuff in that boy.

Title: Քաջուշութիւն
Definition_1: great intelligence, sharpness of wit, good, happy disposition.

Title: Քաջուսումն
Definition_1: well instructed, learned; fond of science.

Title: Քաջուսումնութիւն
Definition_1: great learning, vast erudition, well grounded knowledge; fondness for science, learning well.

Title: Քառակուսի
Definition_1: square; — արմատ, root — թուոյ, of a number.

Title: Քառակուսութիւն
Definition_1: quadrature; — բոլորակի, quadrature or squaring of the circle.

Title: Քառահոլով
Definition_1: turning or rolling in four manners; ի եղանակս տարւոյ, in all seasons.

Title: Քառամեայ
Definition_1: four years, quadrennial; — ժամանակ, four years.

Title: Քառանիւթեայ
Definition_1: composed of four matters or elements.

Title: Քառասուն
Definition_1: forty; սուրբ —ք, the forty martyrs of Sebaste; էր ամաց —ունից, he was forty years old; ամս երկու ընդ —սնիւ, forty two years; քաղաքս ութ առ —սնիւք, forty eight cities; —սուն, —սուն զպահքն լուծանել, break the fast once in forty days.

Title: Քառորդ
Definition_1: fourth; quarter, fourth part; quarter of an hour; *quadrant; — լուսնի, quarter; cf. Ժամ.

Title: Քասղեւ
Definition_1: Chisleu, the ninth month of the Hebrews.

Title: Քասքնիմ
Definition_1: to be afraid greatly, to shudder with fear, to thrill with horror, to be horrorstruck.

Title: Քասքնեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to frighten, to startle, to scare, to dismay, to terrify.

Title: Քատակեմ
Definition_1: to liken, to assimilate, to form, to proportion.

Title: Քար
Definition_1: stone; պատուական —, precious stone, jewel, gem;
Definition_2: — դժոխայինշ, infernal stone, caustic; — կրային, limestone; — ծանրակշիռ, ponderous, heavy spar, cawk; — մանրիկ, small stone, pebble, gravel; հարկանել —իւ, քար կոծել ամբք, to stone, to lapidate, to stone to death; հալածել —ամբք, to pelt with stones; չթողուլ, չմնալ, — ի —ի վերայ, not to leave, not to remain one stone standing; հարկանել զոտն զ—ի, to strike the foot against a stone; միով —ամբ զերկուս պարսաքարել (ընդ աջ եւ ընդ ահեակ յջողել), to kill two birds with one stone;

Title: Քարաբոյս
Definition_1: rocella, alga tinctoria, lichen, cinereus terrestris, white moss.

Title: Քարաբուխ
Definition_1: flowing or springing forth from a rock.

Title: Քարագնաց
Definition_1: wandering among mountains, among rocks, in craggy places.

Title: Քարագործ
Definition_1: stony, of stone, made of stone;
Definition_3: gravel, stone.

Title: Քարադր
Definition_1: plover, pluvialis, lapwing; or jaundice-bird, icterus, galbula.

Title: Քարալից
Definition_1: full of stones, stony; — առնել, to fill or block up with stones.

Title: Քարածեծ
Definition_1: pelted with stones, stoned, lapidated; — պատառիլ, to be stoned to death.

Title: Քարակարկառ
Definition_2: like a heap or pile of stones.

Title: Քարակերտ
Definition_1: stone, build to stone; — տուն, stonehouse.

Title: Քարակոշկոճ
Definition_1: cf. Քարածեծ; — առնել, to stone, to lapidate.

Title: Քարահար
Definition_1: troubled with the stone or gravel, nephritic.

Title: Քարանամ
Definition_1: to turn to or become stone, to be changed into stone, to be petrified;

Title: Քարասրտիմ
Definition_1: to have a heart of flint, to be stony-hearted, cruel, obdurate.

Title: Քարավէժ
Definition_1: precipitated, fallen or thrown headlong; struck with a stone, stoned; — առնել, արկանել, to precipitate, to fling or hurl headlong; to stone, to cast stones; — լինել, to fling, cast or throw oneself headlong.

Title: Քարացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to petrify, to turn into stone, to stone;

Title: Քարափն
Definition_1: steepy side, bank or shore, precipice; — ժայռին, edge or verge of a rock.

Title: Քարբեկ
Definition_1: stone-break, saxifrage, alchemilla or lady's mantle.

Title: Քարենաւ
Definition_1: boat-shaped stone vase used by grape-pressers.

Title: Քարընդոտն
Definition_1: stumbling-block, stumbling-stone; — լինել, to stumble over a stone, to trip, to stumble.

Title: Քարընդոտնեմ
Definition_1: to serve as a stumbling-block, to cause to stumble, fail or fall, to trip up, to supplant.

Title: Քարընկէց
Definition_3: — բարբառ, biting words; իբրեւ — մի, a stone's cast or throw; — առնել, to precipitate; — լինել, to throw stones;
Definition_4: to fling at one.

Title: Քարխոտ
Definition_1: the great consound; symphytum, solidago, golden rod; cf. Շամղիտակ.

Title: Քարկատեմ
Definition_1: to hack or hew to pieces, to kill.

Title: Քարկոծեմ
Definition_1: to stone, to lapidate, to kill by stoning.

Title: Քարշ
Definition_2: ի —, ընդ —, trailingly, creepingly; ըստ or ի — ածել, արկանել, ձգել, to train, to trail, to draggle, to drag or draw along; ի — գնալ, to crawl, to creep in the belly.

Title: Քարշեմ
Definition_1: to draw, to drag, to pull or haul about, to drag along, to lead away; — յինքն, to attract, to win, to gain or bring over; — ընդ գետին, to drag on the ground; — առ դատաւորն, to lead or drag before the judge, to bring to justice; յարտասուս —, to stir to pity, to affect, to move; — զոք, to defame, to slander, to bite.

Title: Քարշիմ
Definition_1: to be led, drawn, dragged, trailed; — ընդ երկիր, to crawl along on the ground, to creep; — ընդ փոշի, to be dragged along in the dust.

Title: Քարշումն
Definition_1: attraction, act of drawing to, dragging or drawing along.

Title: Քարոզ
Definition_1: herald, crier; preacher; musician; preach, sermon; — լինել կարդալ, to announce, to publish, to herald, to proclaim; — տալ, to preach, to make or to preach a sermon.

Title: Քարոզեմ
Definition_1: to herald, to proclaim by heralds, to announce publicly, to publish loudly, to cry; to preach; թագաւոր —, to proclaim king; — յանապատի, to preach in the desert; — օրինակաւ անձին, to practise what one preaches, to be the first to set an example to others.

Title: Քարոզիչ
Definition_1: herald, crier; promulgator; reacher; missionary, missioner.

Title: Քարոզութիւն
Definition_1: act of proclaiming, of publishing by means of heralds, promulgation; preaching; mission.

Title: Քարուակ
Definition_1: infamous, disparaged, disgraced, blasted; — կալ, to bear, to pocket an affront, to put up with an insult, to behave in an infamous manner, to behave brutally, filthily.

Title: Քարուականք
Definition_1: ill treatment, outrage, dishonour, brand or stigma, infamy, disgrace, opprobrium, turpitude, crime.

Title: Քարտէս
Definition_1: card, paper, parchment; cartoon, pasteboard; letter; book.

Title: Քացախեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to sour, to render sour or acid.

Title: Քացախիմ
Definition_1: to taste acid, to turn sour, acid, sharp.

Title: Քացախուտ
Definition_3: *stewed fruit.

Title: Քաւ
Definition_1: not, no, never, not at all;
Definition_2: away with! go along ! fye! for shame!
Definition_3:
without, besides, except; — յինէն, far be it from me, God save me!
— լիցի ինձ ի տեառնէ, God preserve me!
— քեզ, — լիցի, — մի լիցի, no! God forbid !
— լիցի քեզ, tar be such thoughts from thee; — լիցի մեզ, we will not, we don't like; — ի մէնջ, God preserve us, God save us; օն անդր, — լիցի, oh! never fye! fye upon it!.

Title: Քաւարան
Definition_1: place or instrument of expiation; purgatory; *catafalco.

Title: Քաւեմ
Definition_1: to expiate, to atone for; to justify; to propitiate, to satisfy, to conciliate, to render favorable or propitious; աստուած, քաւեա զիս զմեղա ւորս, God, be merciful to me, a sinner; քաւեալ եմ ես, I am innocent.

Title: Քաւութիւն
Definition_1: expiation, atonement, pardon, propitiation; — or, սեղան, քաւութեան, libation; propitiatory; զոհ քաւութեան, offering.

Title: Քաքար
Definition_1: cake, bun, pastry, wafer, simnel, hearth-cake.

Title: Քեղանամ
Definition_1: to govern, to be at the helm, to steer.

Title: Քեղի
Definition_1: rudder, helm, tiller; — կառաց, pole, carriage-pole, shaft.

Title: Քետուրական
Definition_1: horn of, or descended from Keturah.

Title: Քերանք
Definition_1: act of scraping, scratching or rubbing off;

Title: Քերեմ
Definition_1: to erase, to scratch out; to scrape, to scratch, to grate, to graze, to rasp, to plane, to polish; to rub the skin off, to excoriate, to flay, to lacerate, to torture; to take away, to remove, to annul; to engrave, to inscribe, to write; — առ, to graze, to touch slightly; — առ ափամբք, to skirt, to coast along, to keep close to the shore;
Definition_2: — զափամբք, to go terra a terra, to sail along the coast; — զամօթն ի բաց —, to lay aside all sense of shame, cf. Ունչք.

Title: Քերթեմ
Definition_1: to flay, to strip, to excoriate, to peel off; to make, to compose, to write; to versify, to poetize.

Title: Քերթողաբանեմ
Definition_1: to speak or write like a poet, to poetize, to versify.

Title: Քերթողահայր
Definition_1: prince or father of poets, of grammarians.

Title: Քերիչ
Definition_1: scraper; rasp, grater, eraser; rake; plane; planer, polisher; iron-harrows, combs or hooks of iron, instruments of torture; — ձիոց, currycomb; — շաքարի, sugar-rasp.

Title: Քերծում
Definition_1: to strip off, to peel, to bark, to pare; to shave.

Title: Քեցեմ
Definition_1: to detach, to separate, to extrange, to remove, to take away; — ի ստենէ զորթն, — զմանուկն ի կաթին սովորութենէ, to wean; — զսիրտ յաշխարհէ, ի հեշտութեանց, to wean or detach one's heart from worldly matters.

Title: Քէն
Definition_1: rancour inveterate hate, spite, ill-will, resentment; revenge; — ի վրիժուց, out of or from hatred; — պահել, ի —ս մտանել, to bear or owe a grudge, to bear malice or ill-will, to bear hard; — ի մտի ունել, to keep alive resentment for an injury; — ունել ընդ ումեք, to have a grudge or spite against; հանել զվրէժ քինու, խնդրել զ— վրիժուց, to by revenged, to revenge oneself.

Title: *Քէնթ
Definition_1: female of domestic animals, she-cat, hitch.

Title: Քթախոտ
Definition_1: snuff; տուփ —ոյ, snuff-box; առնուլ զ—, to take snuff.

Title: Քթթելիք
Definition_1: winking, blinking of the eye; twinkling, trice.

Title: Քթթել ական
Definition_1: to winkle, to twinkle, to wink, to blink; ի — ական, in a twinkling, in a trice, in no time, as if by magic; արագոյնք զքթթել մի ական, swifter than lightning.

Title: Քիթ
Definition_1: nose; — կենդանեաց, snout, muzzle; մեծ, փոքր, սրածայր, շրջեալ, տափակ —, a large, big or bottle, little, pointed, turned up, snub or fiat nose; զ—ս, ի վեր տանել, to turn up the nose, to look scornful, haughty; այսրէն ընդ ս-ն դառնալ, to get into the nose, to go the wrong way in swallowing.

Title: Քիլ
Definition_1: space between the tips of the thumb and forefinger; or.

Title: Քիմք
Definition_2: liking, caprice, fancy; ընդ քմաց, by whim, humorously, capriciously, fantastically; ի քմաց, according to one's fancy, liking; ընդ քիմս ժպտիլ, to laugh constrainedly, from the teeth outward; լեզու նորա ի քիմս իւր կցեցաւ, his tongue clove to his palate.

Title: Քինախնդիր
Definition_1: revengeful, vindictive, malevolent; — լինել, ելանել, to revenge oneself; եղեւ մահու նորա, he revenged his death.

Title: Քինանամ
Definition_1: to hear a grudge, to nourish hate, to resent.

Title: Քինապահ
Definition_1: harbouring resentment or an injury, resentful, rancorous.

Title: Քինապահութիւն
Definition_1: resentment, remembrance of an injury, spite, ill-will.

Title: Քիսամն
Definition_1: heathpease, ervum, orobus, bitter vetch, fitch.

Title: Քիրտն
Definition_2: fatigue, labour, hard work, toil, hardship; — մահու, death-sweat, perspiration preceding death; առատ, կծու, գարշահոտ, թթու —, copious, acrid, fetid, sour or unpleasant perspiration; ընդ — մտանել or հարկանել ի քրտան լինել, to sweat, to perspire, to transpire, to be all in a perspiration; ի քրտունս համակիլ, ողողիլ յաւի, քրտան, to be all over in a sweat, to be bathed in perspiration; քրտամբք երեսաց հայթայթել զկեանս, to earn one's bread or livelihood by the sweat of one's brow; հարայ ընդ — ցուրտ, I fell into a cold sweat; — ցուրտ ընդ անդամսն իջանէր, a cold sweat ran from all his members; cf. Ապաժոյժ; cf. Թաթաւիմ.

Title: Քիւ
Definition_1: eaves-lath, penthouse, cornice; — տան, eaves of a house; — քարայրի, entrance to a cavern, mouth of a cave; ընդ քուաւ, under cover, sheltered.

Title: Քլաչափ
Definition_1: measure, distance between tips of thumb and forefinger extended; span.

Title: Քծինք
Definition_1: caresses, fondling, endearment, coaxing, fawning; wooing, court, courtship, gallantry; ածել ի —նս, to tame, to domesticate, to familiarize; գալ ի —նս, to grow tame, to be tamed; —նս տալ, ի —նս հարկանիլ, cf. Քծնիմ.

Title: Քծնի
Definition_1: caressing, affectionate, coaxing, flattering; wooing, courting.

Title: Քծնիմ
Definition_1: to endeavour to please, to affect, to caress, to flatter, to fondle; to court, to woo, to pay one's court to.

Title: Քծնումն
Definition_1: cf. Քծինք; flattery, affected airs, adulation.

Title: Քղանցք
Definition_1: skirt of a cloak, lappet of a coat, border, tail; fringe, trimming.

Title: Քճքճեմ
Definition_1: to tear, to rend, to tear in pieces, to reduce in tatters.

Title: Քնածու
Definition_1: sleep-begetting, somniferous, soporific; — դեղ, narcotic, opiate.

Title: Քնար
Definition_2: Lyra; — հարկանել, to play on or sound the lyre.

Title: Քնէութիւն
Definition_1: sleepiness, drowsiness, lethargy; — մահաքուն, trance, lethargic sleep.

Title: Քնթմթամ
Definition_1: to move nose and mouth whilst eating.

Title: Քնթռնոց
Definition_1: folds of serpents; rings or wrinkles in the elephant's trunk.

Title: Քնին
Definition_1: examination; ի — առնուլ, to examine, to consider, to ponder; to argue, to discuss; ի — գալ, to be examined, criticized; ի — արկանել, մտանել, լինել, to examine, to study, to criticize.

Title: Քննախնդիր
Definition_1: investigating, making researches, seeking inquisitively; — արատոյ, fault-finder.

Title: Քննայոյզ խնդրեմ
Definition_1: to make a diligent search, to investigate, to make researches.

Title: Քննասէր
Definition_1: fond of examination, desirous or eager to know how, curious.

Title: Քննասիրութիւն
Definition_1: passion for research, desire of information, curiosity.

Title: Քննեմ
Definition_1: to examine, to study, to investigate, to discuss; to censure, to control; to meditate, to consider, to think; cf. Տեղեկագոյն.

Title: Քննիմ
Definition_1: to be examined, to undergo an examen.

Title: Քննիչ
Definition_1: examiner; inquisitor; controller; fault-finder; critic; — գրոց, censor.

Title: Քննութիւն
Definition_1: examination; research, discussion; inquiry, inquest, inquisition; control; thorough investigation; — խղճի, self-examination; ի — մտանիլ, to examine; ընդ քննութեամբ անցանել, to pass the censorship; ընդ քննութեամբ արկանել, to examine, to control; to criticize, to censure.

Title: Քնքշանք
Definition_1: pretty ways, mincing manner, smirking, prettiness, nicety, daintiness; caress, endearment, fondling.

Title: Քնքշեմ
Definition_1: to smirk, to be treated delicately, to cuddle or indulge oneself, to be nice, dainty, to give oneself airs.

Title: Քնքշեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to render delicate, to pamper, to pet, to fondle, to coddle, to make much of.

Title: Քնքուշ
Definition_1: delicate, tender, soft, morbid, pretty, darling, mincing;

Title: Քշեմ
Definition_1: to chase, to drive away or out, to expel.

Title: Քշոց
Definition_1: fly-flap, fan; keshotz, flabellum, ringing-instrument agitated by the deacons during the Armenian and Greek Mass.

Title: Քշտեմ
Definition_1: to lop off, to trim, to prune; to cut, to retrench.

Title: Քողախնդրեմ
Definition_1: to discover, to unveil, to unmask.

Title: Քողաձեւեմ
Definition_1: to veil, to cloak, to shroud.

Title: Քողաձիգ
Definition_2: coy, shy, modest, timid; drawing the veil.

Title: Քողարկեմ
Definition_1: to veil, to conceal, to hide, to cover.

Title: Քոյինագործ
Definition_1: made by thee or by thyself, thy.

Title: Քոյինահրաման
Definition_1: ordered or imposed by thee or by thyself.

Title: Քոշքոտիմ
Definition_1: to scratch oneself, to stretch and yawn.

Title: Քոսոտիմ
Definition_1: to be infected with the itch.

Title: Քուահարցութիւն
Definition_1: cybomancy, indovination by means of cubes or dice.

Title: Քուեայ
Definition_1: cube, die; suffrage, vote, ball, ballot; տուփ քուէից, urn, ballot-box; տուփ քուէիւք, by an unanimous vote; — արկանել, տալ ձգել, to vote, to ballot, to come to the vote, to poll.

Title: Քուէարկութիւն
Definition_1: balloting, voting, ballot; գաղտնի —, vote by ballot; արգասիք քուէարկութեան, result of the poll; — խնդրել, to demand a poll; քուէարկութեամբ ընտրել, to elect by ballot; — առնել, to poll, to go to the poll; ներկայ լինել քուէարկութեան, to be present at the poll; մասնակից լինել քուէարկութեան, to take part in the ballot.

Title: Քուէհամար
Definition_1: summing up of votes, counting of votes by ballot.

Title: Քուճապ
Definition_1: coarse or obscene word, coarse language.

Title: Քուն
Definition_1: sleep, slumber, nap, rest, repose, pause; — մահու, sleep of death; քաղցր, ախորժ, հան գիստ, խաղաղ, փրկաւէտ, կենսանորոգ, —, soft, agreeable, tranquil, calm, healthy, refreshing slumber; — թեթեւ, ընդհատ, անհանգիստ, յուղեալ or խռովեալ, դժնդակ, ծանր, վնասակար, մահացու —, light, broken, agitated, troubled, hard, heavy, dangerous, mortal sleep; ի — լինել, երթալ, քնոյ տալ զանձն, to sleep, to go to sleep, to lie down, to repose; զքնով անկանիլ, ի — մտանել, to be overcome with sleep, to fall asleep; ննջել — յաւիտենից, to sleep the sleep that knows no waking; ի — առնուլ, to send to sleep; (յորորանի ) to lull or rock to sleep; խոր — ի լինել, to be in a sound sleep, to sleep soundly; ճաշակել զքաղցրութիւնս քնոյ, to enjoy sleep; ի — գտանել զոք, to find a person asleep; խռովել, ընդհատել, խափանել, զ—, to trouble, to disturb or break one's sleep, to awake, to rouse; իբրեւ — ընդ արթունս լինել, to be half asleep; հատանիլ քնոյ յաչաց, to lose one's sleep; — քաղցրանինջ հատեալ էր յարտեւանաց նորա, calm sleep was unknown to him; փախեաւ յինէն —, sleep fled far from me; այս ի — տանի, that causes sleep; ընկղմեալ ի — թանձրութեան, buried in sleep, fast asleep; — հատեալ է յաչաց իմոց զցայգ եւ զցերեկ, I sleep neither night nor day, I am sleepless.

Title: Քունեմ
Definition_1: to sleep, to repose, to take rest; to lie with, to sleep with a woman, to know her; — ընդ հարս, to sleep with one's fathers.

Title: *Քուչորիմ
Definition_1: to squat, to sit as fowls.

Title: Քուսիթայ
Definition_1: monk's cap, cowl, capuche, hood, cuculla.

Title: Քուրձ
Definition_1: hair-cloth, sackcloth; sack; — զգենուլ, to put on, or to wear hair-cloth.

Title: Քուքամ
Definition_1: to groan, to moan, to wail, to sigh heavily.

Title: Քռստեմ զյօնս
Definition_1: to knit one's brows, to be haughty.

Title: Քսակ
Definition_1: purse, little bag, satchel; pack, packet; — արծաթոյ, purse, flat-purse, money-bag, billcase, portfolio; — հասարակաց ունել, to have the same, or a common purse.

Title: Քսակագին
Definition_1: bought very dear, at a high price.

Title: Քսանամեան
Definition_1: twenty years old; of twenty years.

Title: Քսեմ
Definition_1: to whisper, to make false or indiscreet reports, to report, to tell tales, to detract, to intrigue, to denounce, to defame.

Title: Քսեստ
Definition_1: sextary; pitcher, jar; measure of bushels, or English gallons.

Title: Քսութիւն
Definition_1: tale-bearing, story, report, tale, delation, secret accusation.

Title: Քստմնափուշ
Definition_1: terrifying, striking with horror, making one's hair stand on end, horrible, fearful, awful.

Title: Քստմնիմ
Definition_1: to have one's hair stand on end, to feel the hair of one's head stand erect, to be horror-struck, to shudder with fear; քստմնեալ դիզացան բաշք առիւծուն, the lion bristled np his mane; cf. Հեր.

Title: Քստմնեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to make one's hair stand on end, to cause to shiver, shudder, thrill with fear; to jar upon, to irritate the nerves.

Title: Քստումն
Definition_1: thrill, great dread, cold shiver or shudder of horror.

Title: Քրածեփ
Definition_1: cement composed of powdered charcoal and clay.

Title: Քրայական
Definition_1: metallic, mineral; — նիւթ, metal mineral, ore.

Title: Քրէական
Definition_1: cf. Քրայական; criminal, enormous, horrible; — մեղք, յանցանք, high treason; — մետաղք, mine, galleys, place of detention for criminals.

Title: Քրթմնջեմ
Definition_1: to murmur, to complain, to growl, to grumble, to mutter, to mumble.

Title: Քրթմնջիւն
Definition_1: murmur, complaint, grumbling, hum, growling, mumble.

Title: Քրիստոնէաբար
Definition_1: like a christian, christianly; — կեալ, to live, to lead a life worthy of a christian.

Title: Քրիստոնէացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to christianize, to make christian, to convert to christianity.

Title: Քրիստոս
Definition_1: Christ, the Anointed, Jesus Christ, Messiah, the Saviour of the world.

Title: Քրիստոսադաւան
Definition_1: professing the faith of J.-C., christian.

Title: Քրիստոսադրոշմ
Definition_1: signed by J.-C, or with the sign of the Cross, or with Christ, s name.

Title: Քրիստոսազգեստ
Definition_1: bearing J.-C. in one's soul, christian.

Title: Քրիստոսազգեստեմ
Definition_1: to christen, to baptize, to make christian.

Title: Քրիստոսազօր
Definition_1: strengthened by J.-C.; called to be a soldier of Christ.

Title: Քրիստոսածանօթ
Definition_1: having the knowledge of J.-C, knowing J.-C., christian.

Title: Քրիստոսական
Definition_1: of J.-C, belonging to J.-C, Christ's; — հաւատք, christianity.

Title: Քրիստոսակրօն
Definition_1: cf. Քրիստոսադաւան; living like a christian.

Title: Քրիստոսամարտութիւն
Definition_1: war against J.-C.; the denying the divinity of Christ.

Title: Քրիստոսամուտ գալուստ
Definition_1: the first and the second coming of Christ.

Title: Քրիստոսանշան
Definition_1: bearing or representing the sign of J.-C;

Title: Քրիստոսանուէր
Definition_1: offered, consecrated to J.-C, holy, divine.

Title: Քրիստոսասէր
Definition_1: fond of J.-C., loving J.-C, devout, pious.

Title: Քրիստոսաւանդ
Definition_1: transmitted, given or taught by J.-C.

Title: Քրիստոսընկալ
Definition_1: having received J.-C.; bound up in J.-C.

Title: Քրիստոսիմաստ
Definition_1: sharing in the spirit and knowledge of J.-C.

Title: Քրիստոսունակ
Definition_1: having or bearing J.-C. in the heart.

Title: Քրձազգած
Definition_1: clothed in hair-cloth; — լինել, to put on, or to wear; sack-cloth.

Title: Քրմաժողով
Definition_1: assembled by heathen or pagan priests.

Title: Քրմանամ
Definition_1: to become a pagan priest, to perform the functions of priest of a divinity.

Title: Քրմանոյշ
Definition_1: daughter or wife of a heathen priest, priestess.

Title: Քրտիկար
Definition_1: worship among the ancient Persians; good and faithful minister.

Title: Քրտնագին
Definition_1: all over in perspiration, bathed in sweat.

Title: Քրտնալից
Definition_1: full of sweat, in a profuse perspiration.

Title: Քրտնածին
Definition_1: born of, or produced by sweat.

Title: Քրտնահար
Definition_1: sweat-struck, sweating profusely, too much fatigued; cf. Քրտնաբեր.

Title: Քրտնացուցանեմ
Definition_1: to cause to sweat or. perspire, to throw into a perspiration.

Title: Քրտնիմ
Definition_1: to sweat, to perspire, to transpire, to be in a perspiration; to work much, to toil, to drudge, to sweat, to strive hard; to sweat out, to exude, to exsudate; to transude.

Title: Քրքիջ
Definition_1: hearty laugh, loud or derisive laughter, burst of laughter; — բառնալ, to burst out a laughing, to burst into a loud derisive laugh, to laugh outright or immoderately, to roar with laughter; — կալ, to be laughed at, derided, scorned.

Title: Քրքմաւէտ
Definition_1: abounding in saffron or in crocus.

Title: Քրքուիմ
Definition_1: to vaunt, to boast, to brag, to be proud of.

Title: Քրքում
Definition_2: crocus; — վայրենի, սուտ —, carthamus, bastard or mock saffron, safflower; հնդիկ —, curcuma, turmeric, terra merita.

Title: Քրքռեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to heap up, to accumulate, to increase.

Title: Քրքրեմ
Definition_1: to search or dive into, to investigate carefully, to examine with care; to agitate, to undo, to destroy; — զմիտս, to excite, to rouse up or awake the mind, to stimulate; — զախորժակ, to sharpen, to quicken the appetite.

Title: Քրքրեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to excite, to stir up, to agitate.

Title: Քքուանք
Definition_1: distraction, upsetting, confusion, agitation, emotion; groaning, complaint, outcry.

Title: Քքուիմ
Definition_1: to moan, to howl, to sigh; to be agitated, confused; to laugh out loud; cf. Քրքուիմ.

Title: Քօշումն
Definition_1: leap of a wild beast on its prey.

Title: <letter>Օ</letter> (o)
Definition_1: the thirty seventh letter of the alphabet, the eighth of the vowels. It was introduced in the Armenian alphabet towards the end of the XIIth century to facilitate or distinguish the two different pronunciations of the syllable աւ, which is generally pronounced "av" when followed by a vowel, as աւետարան; on the contrary, when followed by a consonant, it is pronounced like the English "o", as աւգնեմ, աւրհնեմ, աւրէնք.

Title: Օգն
Definition_1: help, aid, assistance, succour; յ— գալ, հասանել, to help, aid or succour a person; յ— կոչել, to call for help.

Title: Օգնական
Definition_2: aid, helper, assistant, adjutant, coadjutor, colleague; — զորք, auxiliary forces, reinforcements, auxiliaries; — լինել, to help, to aid, to give help to, to succour; — լինել միմեանց, to help one another; — իւր առնուլ, to profit by, to avail oneself of զխաւար — առեալ, under cover or favour of the darkness.

Title: Օգնականութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Օգնութիւն; alliance, league cooperation, collaboration.

Title: Օգնեմ
Definition_1: to aid, to succour, to assist, to second, to back; to be good for, to serve, to favour, to sustain; — միմեանց, to help one another.

Title: Օգնութիւն
Definition_1: aid, succour, assistance, help, furtherance, support, stay, prop; favour, relief, resource, means; forces; դրամական —, pecuniary aid, relief, subsidy, grant; փութալ, հասանել յ— ուրուք, to hasten to a person's aid.

Title: Օգոստոս
Definition_1: august, empress; — Տիրուհի, Holy Virgin, Queen of heaven & earth.

Title: Օգուտ
Definition_1: utility, profit, interest, advantage, emolument, gain, lucre;
Definition_3: — or յ— է, օգտի է, են, it is good for, it is useful, profitable; գտանել զ— իւր, to find one's interest; — քաղել, to derive or reap benefit from; — լինել, to be useful, advantageous, to serve; յ— արկանել, յ—ի կիր or ի վար արկանել, յ— անձին վարել, յ— իւր շրջել, առնուլ, to profit by, to avail oneself of, to turn to account, to turn to the best account; յաչս դնել զամենայն ի շահ օգտի անձին, to sacrifice all to one's interest; վասն օգտի քո է, յ— քոյին է, it is for your good, for your interest; զ— ժամս աւուրն, the greater part of the day; cf. Շահ.

Title: Օգտասէր
Definition_1: fond of one's profit or gain, very interested.

Title: Օգտեմ
Definition_1: to profit, to boot, to be advantageous or profitable, to fructify.

Title: Օգտեցուցանեմ
Definition_1: to interest, to give an interest, to advantage, to profit, to benefit, to improve.

Title: Օգտիմ
Definition_1: profit, to derive use or advantage from, to take advantage of, to turn to account, to reap benefit from.

Title: Օդ
Definition_1: air; weather; wind, light wind, breeze; shoe, boot, half-boot; կանացի օդք, lady's boot; պարղ, անոյշ or քաղցրասիւք, բարեխառն, հանդարտ, գեղեցիկ, լապ, զով, ծծելի օդ, serene, mild, temperate, calm, fine, good, cool, breathable air or weather; ցուրտ, չոր, փոփոխական, անհաստատ, վատ, վնասակար, վատառողջ, ժանտ, ապականեալ, խոնաւ, ամպամած, մրըրկայոյզ օդ, cold, dry, changeable, inconstant, bad weather; deadly or deleterious, unwholesome, infectious, corrupt or foul air or atmosphere; damp, overcast or cloudy, tempestuous or stormy weather; կածք օդոյ, the injuries of the weather; յօդս, ընդ օդս, in vain, vainly, sillily; at venture or random; բանք, խորհուրքդ ընդ օդս, idle talk, silly words, empty discourse, vain, extravagant designs, castles in the air; ընդ օդս խօսել, հարկանել, to talk idly, to beat the wind, to talk to the winds; — առնուլ, to air oneself, to take an airing or walk; — փոխել, to have a change of air, to go abroad, to go into the country; թօնուտ են օդք, we shall have rain; խաղաղին, պարղին օդք, it is getting fair again, it is clearing up; cf. Հողմ.

Title: Օդաբան
Definition_1: idly speaking, talking to the winds;

Title: Օդագնաց
Definition_1: traversing, moving, flying in the air.

Title: Օդադիւր
Definition_1: variable, changeable, uncertain as the wind.

Title: Օդաթռիչ
Definition_1: flying in the air, very swift, like the wind.

Title: Օդախիտ
Definition_1: full of or condensed with air; hermetical.

Title: Օդախոնաւ
Definition_1: affected by damp, damped by the atmosphere.

Title: Օդական
Definition_1: aerial, etherial; raised in the air.

Title: Օդակառոյց
Definition_1: situated or built in the air, aerial.

Title: Օդայած
Definition_1: wandering in the air, in space.

Title: Օդայատակ
Definition_1: whose floor or pavement is in the air.

Title: Օդանամ
Definition_1: to be changed or resolved into air; to be transparent as the air.

Title: Օդափոխեմ
Definition_1: to change the air, to ventilate, to air; to aerify.

Title: Օդափոխութիւն
Definition_1: change of air, taking a walk, going into the country, going abroad; ventilation, airing.

Title: Օթ
Definition_1: pernoctation, passing the night in a place; sleeping place, lodging, inn; evening; առ —, towards dusk, in the evening; — առնել, to stop or stay with, to logde at; գնացեալ ընդ անապատ —ս երկուս, journeying two nights in the desert.

Title: Օթագայանամ
Definition_1: to lodge, to pass the night in, to sojourn, to dwell, to stay in a person's house.

Title: Օթակից լինիմ
Definition_1: to lodge, to dwell together, to live under the same roof.

Title: Օթանոց
Definition_1: lodging or sleeping place, inn, hotel, hostelry.

Title: Օթեակ
Definition_1: cf. Օթ; bivouac; —ս առնել, cf. Օթեվանեմ; to bivouac.

Title: Օթեվան
Definition_1: inn, hostelry; dwelling, lodging, habitation, convent; a day's journey; երանաւէտ — արդարոց, the happy abode of the just; օթեւանս առնել՝ առնուլ՝ ունել, to lodge in, to dwell in, to reside in, to live in, to inhabit; ո՞ւր են —ք քո, where do you live ? հեռի երեսուն —օք, thirty days journey distant.

Title: Օթեվանեմ
Definition_1: to receive into ones house or botel, to lodge, to harbour.

Title: Օթեվանիմ
Definition_1: to take up ones lodgings, to stay, to sojourn.

Title: Օթոց
Definition_1: sleeping-place, bedroom; blanket; carpet, tapestry, hangings, arras; cf. Վերարկու.

Title: Օժանդակ
Definition_1: aiding, helping, assisting, auxiliary, subsidiary; confer derate, allied; — — բայ, auxiliary verb.

Title: Օժանդակեմ
Definition_1: to aid, to succour, to assist, to protect, to favour, to support, to sustain.

Title: Օժտաբեր
Definition_1: bearing gifts; — լինել, to bring a portion or dowry; to make a present.

Title: Օժտեմ
Definition_1: to portion, to assign a dower, to endow with a fortune; to offer, to make a present.

Title: Օծանեմ
Definition_1: to anoint; to consecrate; — ոսկւով, to gild; — արծաթով, to silver; — զանձն իւղով անուշիւ, to pomatum, to perfume one's person.

Title: Օծութիւն
Definition_1: cf. Օծելութիւն; anointing, consecration; վերջին օծումն, extreme unction.

Title: Օձ
Definition_1: serpent, adder, snake; — or — աւազակ, the devil; — խարամանի, dipsas or dipsade; — շչէ, the serpent hisses; cf. Քաղցրութիւն.

Title: Օձախռիւ
Definition_1: snaky-haired, Gorgon-headed or Medusa-headed, having thehead bristling with serpents.

Title: Օձաձեւ
Definition_1: snake-shaped, snaky; full of turnings & windings, going or running winding about, zigzag, crankling;

Title: Օձանան
Definition_1: to become a serpent, or like a serpent; to be changed into a serpent, to turn into a snake.

Title: Օձապտոյտ
Definition_1: serpentine, winding, meandering, sinuous, tortuous, crankling; cf. Օձաձեւ.

Title: Օձաջամբ
Definition_1: given by the serpent to eat.

Title: Օձիք
Definition_1: collar; — շապկաց, shirt-collar; զօձիս պատառել, to rend one's garments.

Title: Օձտեմ
Definition_1: to divide, to disunite, to separate, to detach, to sever, to part, to distract, to divert from; to dissipate, to disperse, to scatter; to sow discord or strife; to tear, to lacerate;
Definition_2: to be divided, dissipated, to dissent.

Title: Օձտումն
Definition_1: separation, disunion, dissension; dispersion; tearing to pieces.

Title: Օղ
Definition_1: ring, slide; curl, ringlet; — շղթայի, link; — ճարմանդի, button-hole.

Title: Օճան
Definition_1: assistance, favour, protection, goodness, grace; առնուլ —, to gain one's cause.

Title: Օճառ
Definition_1: soap; cf. Օշնան; cf. Աճառ; bride's dress, furniture, ornaments; means, remedy.

Title: Օն
Definition_1: cheer, shout of encouragement; — առնում, to cheer up, to pluck up courage;
Definition_2: Օ՛ն առ, Օ՛ն առեալ, now! come! cheer up! courage! bravo! օ՛ն անդր, oh fie! for shame! pshaw! avaunt! back ! stand back ! off or away with you! օ՛ն անդր, իբաց կաց, be off! go away! begone! get you gone! օ՛ն արի, rise up! come! օ՜ն եկայք, come along ! օ՜ն եկայք եւ մեք, let us go too; օ՜ն արիք, arise! get up! օ՜ն եւ օն, so, in this or that way, thus, such; certainly, to be sure, assuredly; օ՛ն եւ օն արասցէ ինձ Աստուած եւ օ՛ն եւ օն յաւելցէ եթէ ոչ մահու մեռանիցիս, may God strike me if you die not ! օ՛ն եւ օն արասցեն դիք աստուածք եւ օ՛ն եւ օն յաւելցեն եթէ, the gods do so unto me, more also, if...; օ՛ն եւ օն արասցէ ինձ Աստուած եւ օ՛ն եւ օն յաւելցէ եթէ, may the gods load or afflict you withevery evil if ...; օն իբաց թողցուք, oh too much! leave off ! have done !

Title: Օ՜շ
Definition_1: would to God ! Please God ! God grant it !

Title: Օտար
Definition_1: stranger; foreign; remote, distant; other; extraordinary, strange;

Title: Օտարազգի
Definition_1: of an another nation, foreign, outlandish.

Title: Օտարախորհուրդ
Definition_1: excentric, strange, odd, fantastical, extravagant; cf. Այլափառ.

Title: Օտարածին
